A glacier गुफा is a गुफा formed भीतर the बर्फ of a glacier.
Glacier caves are often called ice caves, but इस पद is properly प्रयुक्त to describe bedrock गुफाएं that contain year-round ice.
In physics, circular motion is a गति of an ऑब्जेक्ट साथ the परिधि of a वृत्त or rotation along a circular path.
It can be वर्दी, साथ निरंतर कोणीय रेट of रोटेशन ( and constant speed ), or non-uniform with a changing rate of rotation.
The rotation around a fixed axis of a three-dimensional देह involves गोलाकार गति of इसके भाग.
The equations of motion describe the गति of the बीच of mass of a body.
Examples of circular motion include : an artificial satellite orbiting the Earth at constant height, a stone which is tied to a rope and is being swung in circles, a car turning through a curve in a रेस track, an इलेक्ट्रॉन चलती लम्बवत to a वर्दी चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड, और a गियर turning inside a mechanism.
Since the ऑब्जेक्ट 's गति वेक्टर is constantly बदलना दिशा, the moving object is undergoing acceleration by a centripetal force in the direction of the center of rotation.
बगैर इस त्वरण, the ऑब्जेक्ट होता मूव in a straight line, according to Newton 's laws of motion.
Apollo Creed is a fictional अक्षर इससे the रॉकी films, initially portrayed as the Undisputed Heavyweight Champion of the World.
He was played by कार्ल weathers.
Creed had multiple nicknames, including The Master of Disaster, The King of स्टिंग, the नाचना विनाशक, the प्रिंस of पंच, the एक और तभी और the गिनती of Monte Fisto.
शहरी लेजेंड राज्य कि अपोलो पंथ 's नाम is a wordplay on the Apostles ' Creed, a statement of belief used in Christian churches.
All of Apollo 's चैंपियनशिप झगड़े यहूद अनुसूचित लिये the 15 round distance.
Championship fights did not convert इससे 15 rounds to 12 rounds जबतक 1987.

In the United States, the title of federal judge usually means a judge नियुक्त by the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य और पुष्टि by the United States Senate pursuant to the Appointments Clause in Article II of the United States Constitution.
In addition to the Supreme Court of the United States, whose existence and some aspects of whose jurisdiction are beyond the constitutional power of Congress to alter, acts of Congress have established 13 courts of appeals ( also called `` circuit courts '' ) with appellate क्षेत्राधिकार over अलग regions of the संयुक्त राज्य, और 94 संयुक्त राज्य ज़िला न्यायालयों.
Every judge appointed to such a court may be categorized as a federal judge ; such positions include the Chief Justice and Associate Justices of the Supreme Court, Circuit न्यायाधीशों of the न्यायालयों of appeals, और ज़िला न्यायाधीशों of the संयुक्त राज्य district courts.
All of ये न्यायाधीशों वर्णित यूँ दूर हैं referred to sometimes as `` आलेख iii न्यायाधीशों '' क्युकी वे कसरत the न्यायिक शक्ति vested in the न्यायिक branch of the federal government by Article III of the U.S. Constitution.
In addition, judges of the अदालत of अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार कसरत न्यायिक power pursuant to Article III.
Other judges serving in the federal courts, including magistrate judges and bankruptcy judges, हैं भी sometimes referred to as `` संघीय न्यायाधीशों '' ; however, वे हैं neither नियुक्त by the अध्यक्ष nor पुष्टि by the सीनेट, और उनके शक्ति गर्भाशयी इससे Article I instead.
See Article i और आलेख iii अधिकरणों.
The Beretta 21A Bobcat is a छोटी pocket-sized semi-automatic पिस्टल designed by Beretta in Italy.
Production began in late 1984, solely in the beretta u.s.A. सुविधा in Accokeek, Maryland.
It is a further विकास of the beretta मॉडल 20, जिनकी उत्पादन ended in 1985.
Variable Universal Life Insurance ( प्रायः shortened to vul ) is a प्रकार of जीवन बीमे that builds a cash value.
In a VUL, the cash value can be invested in a wide variety of पृथक खाते, समान to परस्पर निधि, और the choice of which of the available separate accounts to use is entirely up to the contract owner.
The 'variable ' component in the नाम refers to इस क्षमता to invest in पृथक accounts whose values vary—they vary because they are invested in stock and/or bond markets.
The 'universal ' component in the name refers to the लचीलापन the मालिक रै in बनाना प्रीमियम भुगतान.
The premiums can vary इससे nothing in a दिए माह up to maximums पारिभाषित by the आतंरिक Revenue Code for life insurance.
This flexibility is in contrast to whole life insurance that has fixed प्रीमियम भुगतान कि typically can नहीं be छूटी बगैर lapsing the नीति ( हालांकि एक may कसरत an स्वचालित प्रीमियम Loan feature, or surrender dividends to pay a Whole Life premium ).
Variable universal life is a type of permanent life insurance, because the death benefit होगा be सशुल्क if the insured मरता कोई समय as long as वहीँ is sufficient नकदी मान to अदा the costs of insurance in the policy.
With most if not all VULs, unlike whole life, वहीँ is no endowment आयु ( the आयु at जिससे the नकदी मान बराबरी the मौत लाभ राशि, which for whole life is typically 100 ).
This is yet another कुंजी लाभ of vul over Whole Life.
With a typical पूरे जीवन नीति, the मौत लाभ is सीमित to the फेस राशि निर्दिष्ट in the नीति, and at endowment age, the face amount is all that is paid out.
Thus with either death or endowment, the बीमे कम्पनी keeps कोई cash value built up over the years.
However, some participating पूरे जीवन नीतियों प्रस्ताव राइडर्स जिससे बताएँ कि कोई dividends सशुल्क on the नीति be प्रयुक्त to खरीदें `` सशुल्क up additions '' to the policy which increase both the cash value and the death benefit over time.
If investments made in the separate accounts out-perform the general account of the insurance company, a higher rate-of-return can occur than the फिक्स्ड rates-of-return ठेठ for whole life.
The combination over the years of no endowment age, continually increasing मौत लाभ, और if a ऊँची rate-of-return is अर्जित in the पृथक खाते of a vul नीति, इस could परिणाम in उच्चतर value to the owner or beneficiary than that of a whole life policy with the same amounts of money paid in as premiums.

Girl Scout Cookies are cookies बेची by लड़की स्काउट of the यूएसए ( gsusa ) as एक of इसके प्रमुख fundraisers for local Scout units.
Members of the GSUSA have been selling कुकीज़ चूंकि 1917 to उठाएँ funds.
लड़कियों जो participate can earn पुरस्कार लिये their efforts.
There are also unit incentives if the ईकाई as a पूरे करता खूब.
As of 2007, sales were estimated at about 200 लाख बाक्स per year.
विश्वविद्यालयों हॉल
Purdue University, स्तिथ in वेस्ट lafayette, इंडियाना, is the फ्लैगशिप university of the six-campus Purdue University system.
Purdue was संस्थापित on may 6, 1869, as a land-grant विश्वविद्यालयों जब the इंडियाना सामान्य सभा, लेने लाभ of the morrill अधिनियम, स्वीकृत a दान of जमीन and money from Lafayette businessman John Purdue to establish a college of science, technology, and agriculture in his name.
The first classes were held on सितंबर 16, 1874, साथ छह instructors और 39 विद्यार्थी.
आज, purdue is a सदस्य of the Big Ten Conference, and is a well known world-class research institution.
Purdue enrolls the second largest student body of any विश्वविद्यालयों in इंडियाना as खूब as the चौथी largest अंतरराष्ट्रीय छात्र जनसांख्यिकी of any university in the United States.
Purdue offers both undergraduate और ग्रैजुएट कार्यक्रम in over 211 प्रमुख areas of study, and is well known for its competitive engineering curricula.
The university has also been highly influential in America 's history of aviation, having established the first college credit offered in flight training, the पहला four-year स्नातक 's उपाधि in विमानन, और the पहला विश्वविद्यालयों विमानक्षेत्र ( purdue विश्वविद्यालयों विमानक्षेत्र ).
Purdue 's aviation प्रौद्योगिकी कार्यक्रम remains एक of the सबसे प्रतिस्पर्धी aviation-specific programs in the world.
In the mid-20th century, Purdue 's aviation program विस्तारित to encompass उन्नत spaceflight प्रौद्योगिकी giving वृद्धि to purdue 's nickname, Cradle of Astronauts.
Twenty-three Purdue graduates have gone on to become astronauts, including गस grissom ( एक of the असली पारा सात astronauts ), neil आर्मस्ट्रांग ( the पहला व्यक्ति to चलना on the moon ), and Eugene Cernan ( the most recent person to walk on the moon ).
A sebaceous cyst ( ) is a term that loosely refers to either epidermoid cysts ( भी ज्ञात as epidermal cysts ; l72.0 ) or पिलर cysts ( also known as trichilemmal cysts ; L72.1 ).
Because an epidermoid cyst originates in the epidermis and a pilar cyst originates इससे बाल follicles, by परिभाषा, neither प्रकार of गाँठ is सख्ती a वसामय cyst.
The name is regarded as a misnomer as the fatty, white, semi-solid material in both of ये गाँठ entities is नहीं sebum, लकिन keratin.
furthermore, अंतर्गत the सूक्ष्मदर्शी neither entity contains sebaceous glands.
In practice, however, the शर्तें हैं प्रायः प्रयुक्त interchangeably.
`` True '' sebaceous cysts are relatively rare and हैं ज्ञात as steatocystomas or, if अनेक, as steatocystoma multiplex.
Modern pointe जूते.
The किनारे of the टो pad, जिससे is inserted between the पैर and toe box for cushioning, can be seen on the right foot.
A pointe shoe is a प्रकार of जूता worn by बैले नर्तक जब performing pointe work.
Pointe shoes developed from the ख्वाहिश लिये नर्तक to appear weightless और sylph -like और have विकसित to enable dancers to dance en pointe ( on the tips of their toes ) for extended periods of time.
They are normally worn by female dancers, though male dancers may पहनें उन्हें लिये अपरंपरागत भूमिकाएँ ऐसे as the भद्दा stepsisters in सिंडरेला, नीचे in a midsummer रात्रि 's सपना, or मेन performing as महिलाओं in नृत्य कंपनियाँ such as Les Ballets Trockadero and Grandiva.
They are manufactured in a किस्में of रंगों, सबसे commonly in shades of light pink.
This tablespoon रै a क्षमता of परिचय 15 mL.
measuring spoons
In the us और भाग of कनाडा, a tablespoon is the largest type of spoon used for eating from a bowl.
In the UK, Europe and most Commonwealth countries, a tablespoon is a प्रकार of विशाल चमचा usually used for serving.
In देशों जहाँ a tablespoon is a सेवारत चमचा, the निकटतम समतुल्य to the us tablespoon is either the dessert spoon or the soup spoon.
A tablespoonful, nominally the क्षमता of एक tablespoon, is commonly प्रयुक्त as a माप of volume in cooking.
It is abbreviated as T, tb, tbs, tbsp, tblsp, or tblspn.
The capacity of ordinary tablespoons is नहीं regulated by विधि और is विषय to considerable variation.
In the USA one tablespoon ( measurement unit ) is लगभग 15 ml ; the क्षमता of an वास्तविक tablespoon ( डाइनिंग utensil ) सीमाएँ from 7 mL to 14 mL.
In ऑस्ट्रेलिया एक tablespoon ( measurement unit ) is 20 mL.
Harry Potter is a श्रेणी of सात काल्पनिक novels लिखा by the British author J. K. Rowling.
The books chronicle the adventures of a जादूगर, हैरी कुम्हार, और उसके मित्रों रोनाल्ड वीज़्ली और हर्माइनी ग्रेंजर, सब of जिसको हैं विद्यार्थी at हॉग्वार्ट्स School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
The main story arc concerns Harry 's quest to overcome the अंधेरा जादूगर रब voldemort, जिनकी aims हैं to become अमर, जीतें the wizarding world, subjugate non-magical people, and destroy all those who stand in his way, especially Harry Potter.
Since the release of the first novel Harry Potter and the Philosopher 's Stone on 30 June 1997, the किताबे have gained immense लोकप्रियता, नाजुक acclaim और वाणिज्यिक success worldwide.
The श्रेणी रै भी था कुछ share of आलोचना, including concern for the increasingly dark tone.
, the book श्रेणी रै बेची परिचय 450 लाख नक़ल, बनाना it the best-selling किताब श्रेणी in history, and has been translated into 67 languages.
The last four books consecutively set records as the fastest-selling किताबे in इतिहास.
A series of many genres, including fantasy and coming of आयु ( साथ तत्व of रहस्य, थ्रिलर, एडवेंचर, और रोमांस ), it has many cultural meanings and references.
According to Rowling, the प्रमुख थीम is मौत.
There हैं भी अनेक अन्य विषयवस्तु in the श्रेणी, such as prejudice and corruption.
The initial major publishers of the books यहूद bloomsbury in the संयुक्त किंगडम और scholastic दबायें in the United States.
The books have चूंकि महरूम प्रकाशित by many publishers worldwide.
The किताबे, साथ the सातवाँ किताब विभाजित into दो भाग, have महरूम बना into an eight-part film series by Warner Bros. Pictures, the highest-grossing film series of all time.
The series also originated much tie-in merchandise, बनाना the हैरी कुम्हार ब्रांड लायक in excess of $ 15 billion.
Also due to the success of the books and films, Harry Potter has been प्रयुक्त लिये a थीम पार्क, the wizarding संसार of हैरी कुम्हार in सार्वभौमिक पार्क & Resorts 's Islands of Adventure.

Viking 5C प्रक्षेपास्त्र इंजन
A rocket engine, or बस `` प्रक्षेपास्त्र '', is a जेट इंजन कि उपयोग तभी भंडारित propellant mass for forming its high speed propulsive jet.
Rocket engines are reaction engines and obtain thrust in accordance साथ न्यूटन 's third law.
Since they need no external material to form their jet, rocket engines can be प्रयुक्त लिये spacecraft नोदन as खूब as स्थलीय उपयोग, such as missiles.
Most rocket इंजन हैं आतंरिक दहन इंजन, although non-combusting forms also exist.
प्रक्षेपास्त्र इंजन as a समूह have the उच्चतम exhaust गतियाँ, हैं by दूर the lightest, but are the least propellant efficient of all types of jet engines.
``... baby एक अधिक समय '' is a सोंग by American recording artist Britney Spears.
It served as Spears 's डेब्यू सिंगल और शीर्षक track इससे उसके डेब्यू स्टुडियो एल्बम,... Baby One More Time ( 1999 ).
Written by Max Martin and produced by Martin and Rami, ``... Baby One More समय '' थी released on सितंबर 30, 1998, by Jive Records.
After recording and sending a डेमो टेप साथ an अप्रयुक्त सोंग इससे toni braxton, स्पीयर्स signed a multi-album deal with Jive.
``... Baby One More Time '' is a टीन पॉप और dance-pop सोंग कि refers to a लड़की जो संताप तोड़कर up साथ her boyfriend.
The song received generally favorable reviews इससे आलोचकों, जो praised इसके संयोजन.
``... Baby One More Time '' attained वैश्विक कामयाबी, reaching क्रमांक एक in प्रत्येक देश it charted.
It also received numerous certifications around the संसार, और is एक of the best-selling singles of all time, with over 10 million copies sold.
An accompanying music video, directed by Nigel Dick, portrays स्पीयर्स as a छात्र इससे a कैथोलिक ऊँची स्कूल, जो starts to daydream कि वो is गायन और नाचना around the स्कूल, जबकि watching her love interest from afar.
The music video was later referenced in the music video of `` If U Seek Amy `` ( 2008 ), जहाँ स्पीयर्स 's fictional बेटी is वेश साथ a समान schoolgirl पहनावा while wearing pink ribbons in her hair.
In 2010, the music video for ``... baby एक अधिक समय '' थी voted the तीसरा सबसे influential वीडियो in the इतिहास of pop music, in a poll held by Jam !.
Spears has performed ``... Baby One More Time '' in a number of live दिखावे और in सब of उसके कॉन्सर्ट टुर.
It was the encore of the... baby एक अधिक समय दौरे ( 1999 ) और सपना भीतर a सपना दौरे ( 2001 ) ; स्पीयर्स भी performed remixed versions of the song during the Oops !...
I Did It Again World Tour ( 2000 ), The Onyx Hotel Tour ( 2004 ), The M+M 's Tour ( 2007 ), The Circus अभिनीत britney स्पीयर्स ( 2009 ), और the Femme Fatale Tour ( 2011 ).
``... Baby One More Time '' was nominated लिये a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन मादा पॉप गायन प्रदर्शन, और रै महरूम शामिल in सूचियाँ by Blender, Rolling Stone and VH1.
it रै महरूम विख्यात लिये redefining the sound of late 1990s music.
Spears has named ``... baby एक अधिक समय '' as एक of उसके favorite songs from her career.
It was also the final सोंग to be निभाई on the बीबीसी 's म्यूज़िक कार्यक्रम Top of the Pops.
Cholera is an infection in the small आंत caused by the bacterium Vibrio cholerae.
The प्रमुख लक्षण हैं watery diarrhea and vomiting.
Transmission occurs primarily by drinking water or eating food that has been contaminated by the मल ( बर्बाद उत्पाद ) of an संक्रमित व्यक्ति, सहित एक साथ no apparent लक्षण.
The severity of the diarrhea and vomiting can सीसे to रैपिड निर्जलीकरण और electrolyte असंतुलन, and death in some cases.
The primary treatment is oral rehydration therapy, typically with oral पुनर्जलीकरण समाधान, to बदलें water and electrolytes.
If this is not tolerated or does not provide improvement fast पर्याप्त, intravenous fluids can भी be प्रयुक्त.
Antibacterial drugs are beneficial in those with कठोर बीमारी to shorten इसके अवधि और गंभीरता.
Worldwide, it affects 3–5 लाख लोगों और कल्याणकारी 100,000–130,000 deaths a year.
Cholera was one of the earliest infections to be पढ़ाई by epidemiological methods.
The Picture of Dorian Gray is the only published novel by Oscar Wilde, appearing as the lead story in Lippincott 's मासिक पत्रिका on 20 जून 1890, मुद्रित as the जुलाई 1890 समस्या of इस पत्रिका.
The magazine 's editors feared the स्टोरी थी अभद्र as सुपुर्द, so they censored roughly 500 words, without Wilde 's knowledge, before publication.
But even with that, the story was still greeted with outrage by British reviewers, some of whom सुझाया कि वाइल्ड चाहिए be prosecuted on moral grounds, अग्रणी वाइल्ड to बचाव the अनोखा aggressively in letters to the British press.
Wilde later revised the story for book प्रकाशन, बनाना substantial alterations, हटाना विवादास्पद passages, adding नई अध्याय and including an aphoristic Preface which has since become famous in its own right.
The amended version was published by वार्ड, ताला और कम्पनी in अप्रैल 1891.
Some scholars believe that Wilde would today have wanted us to पढ़ा the संस्करण he originally सुपुर्द to lippincott 's.
The novel tells of a young man named Dorian Gray, the विषय of a पेंटिंग by कलाकार Basil Hallward.
बेसिल is प्रभावित by डोरियन 's सौंदर्य और becomes infatuated साथ उसे, believing his beauty is responsible for a new mode in his art.
Dorian meets Lord Henry Wotton, a friend of Basil 's, and becomes enthralled by रब हेनरी 's संसार दृश्य.
Espousing a नई hedonism, रब हेनरी suggests the तभी बाते लायक pursuing in life are beauty and fulfilment of the senses.
Realizing that one day his beauty will fade, डोरियन ( whimsically ) expresses a ख्वाहिश to बेचें उसके आत्मा to ensure the पोर्ट्रेट बेसिल रै चित्रित होता आयु बल्कि than he.
Dorian 's wish is fulfilled, and when he subsequently pursues a life of debauchery, the पोर्ट्रेट serves as a स्मरण of the प्रभाव प्रत्येक अधिनियम रै upon उसके आत्मा, साथ प्रत्येक सिन प्रदर्शित as a disfigurement of his form, or through a sign of aging.
the चित्र of डोरियन धूसर is माना a कार्य of क्लासिक Gothic fiction with a strong Faustian theme.
Sári Gábor ( born 6 फ़रवरी 1917 ), ज्ञात as ज़ा ज़ा गैबर ( ), is a हंगेरियाई -born अमरीकी actress who acted in supporting roles in movies, on Broadway, and occasionally on television.
गैबर थी भी a socialite.
वो began उसके स्टेज करियर in वियना at आयु 15, and was crowned Miss Hungary in 1936.
She emigrated to the United States in 1941 और became a sought-after अभिनेत्री साथ `` यूरोपीय फ्लेयर और स्टाइल '', with a personality that `` exuded charm and grace ''.
Her first फिल्म भूमिका थी as supporting अभिनेत्री in Lovely to Look At.
She बाद acted in we 're Not Married !
and played one of her few leading भूमिकाएँ in moulin रूज ( 1952 ), निर्देशित by जॉन हस्टन, who described her as a `` creditable '' actress.
besides उसके फिल्मी और टेलीविज़न दिखावे, वो is बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये having nine husbands, including hotel magnate Conrad Hilton and actor George Sanders.
She once stated, `` Men have always liked me और i have सदा liked men.
लकिन i जैसे a mannish man, a man जो knows कैसा to talk to and treat a woman – not just a man with muscles. ''
Bruce Lee ( traditional : 李小龍 ; born Lee Jun-fan ; 27 November 1940 – 20 जुलाई 1973 ) थी a चाइनीज अमरीकी martial कलाकार, कर्ता, martial कला प्रशिक्षक, पारस, and filmmaker.
The founder of Jeet Kune Do, ली थी the बेटे of cantonese opera star Lee Hoi-Chuen.
He is widely considered by commentators, critics, media and other martial कलाकारों to be एक of the सबसे influential martial कलाकारों of all time, and a pop culture icon of the 20th century.
He is often credited with helping to बदलें the रास्ता एशियाइ यहूद प्रस्तुत in American films.
Lee was born in चाइनाटाउन, सैन फ्रांसिस्को on 27 नवम्बर 1940 to अभिभावक इससे हांग काँग and was raised in Kowloon with his family until his late teens.
He was introduced to the film उद्योग by उसके पिता और appeared in अनेक films as a child actor.
Lee moved to the United राज्य at the आयु of 18 to प्राप्त उसके उच्चतर शिक्षा, और it was during this time that he began teaching martial arts.
His Hong Kong और हॉलीवुड -उपजd films elevated the परंपरागत हांग काँग martial कला फिल्मी to a new level of popularity and acclaim, sparking a surge of interest in Chinese martial arts in the West in the 1970s.
The direction and tone of his films बदला और बहकावे martial कला और martial कला films in हांग काँग और the rest of the world.
He is noted for his roles in five feature-length films : Lo Wei 's The Big Boss ( 1971 ) and Fist of Fury ( 1972 ) ; रास्ता of the ड्रैगन ( 1972 ), निर्देशित और लिखा by Lee ; Warner Brothers ' Enter the Dragon ( 1973 ) and The Game of Death ( 1978 ), both directed by Robert Clouse.
Lee became an iconic figure known throughout the world, particularly among the चाइनीज, as he portrayed चाइनीज nationalism in his films.
He initially प्रशिक्षित in wing chun, लकिन बाद अस्वीकृत well-defined martial आर्ट शैलियाँ, favouring instead the use of techniques from various sources, in the spirit of his personal martial arts philosophy, which he dubbed Jeet Kune Do ( The Way of the Intercepting Fist ).
Lee held dual citizenship of Hong Kong and the संयुक्त राज्य.
he died in कोलून टोंग on 20 July 1973 at age 32.
Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ), also known as chronic obstructive lung disease ( COLD ), chronic obstructive airway disease ( COAD ), दीर्घकालिक airflow limitation ( कैलोरी ) और दीर्घकालिक obstructive respiratory बीमारी ( cord ), is the occurrence of chronic bronchitis or emphysema, a pair of commonly co-existing diseases of the lungs in which the airways narrow over time.
This limits airflow to and from the फेफड़े, causing shortness of साँस ( dyspnea ).
In clinical practice, COPD is पारिभाषित by इसके characteristically low airflow on lung function tests.
In contrast to asthma, इस limitation is poorly reversible and usually gets progressively worse over time.
COPD is caused by noxious particles or gas, सबसे commonly इससे तम्बाकू धूम्रपान, जिससे triggers an abnormal inflammatory response in the lung.
The निदान of copd requires lung function tests.
Important management strategies are smoking cessation, vaccinations, पुनर्वास, और ड्रग therapy ( often using inhalers ).
Some मरीजों go on to आवश्यकता long-term oxygen therapy or lung transplantation.
Worldwide, COPD ranked as the छठे अग्रणी कारण of मौत in 1990.
It is projected to become the fourth leading cause of death worldwide by 2030, due to an बढ़ाएँ in धूम्रपान दरों और जनसांख्यिकी परिवर्तन in many countries.
COPD is the third leading cause of मौत in the u.S., और the आर्थिक बोझ of copd in the u.S. in 2007 was $ 42.6 billion in health care costs and lost productivity.
Annelies `` Anne '' Marie Frank (, ?, ; 12 June 1929early कूच 1945 ) is एक of the सबसे discussed यहूदी पीड़ितों of the Holocaust.
Her diary रै महरूम the आधार लिये अनेक plays and films.
Born in the city of Frankfurt am Main in Weimar Germany, she lived most of उसके जीवन in or निकट एम्सटर्डम, in the नीदरलैंड्स.
Born a जर्मनी नेशनल, फ़्रैंक lost her citizenship in 1941.
She gained international कीर्ति मरणोपरांत बाद उसके डायरी थी प्रकाशित.
It दस्तावेज़ उसके अनुभवों छुपाना दौरान the German occupation of the Netherlands in World War II.
The Frank family moved from Germany to एम्सटर्डम in 1933, the साल the nazis gained control over Germany.
By the beginning of 1940, they were trapped in एम्सटर्डम by the नाजी occupation of the नीदरलैंड्स.
as persecutions of the यहूदी जनसांख्यिकी increased in जुलाई 1942, the family went into hiding in the hidden rooms of Anne 's father, Otto Frank 's, office building.
बाद दो सालो, the समूह थी गद्दारी and transported to concentration camps.
Anne Frank and her sister, Margot, were eventually transferred to the bergen-belsen विशेषज्ञता शिविर, जहाँ वे died of सन्निपात in कूच 1945.
Otto Frank, the only survivor of the family, लौटे to एम्सटर्डम बाद the युद्ध to ढूँढें कि ऐनी 's डायरी था महरूम saved, and his efforts led to its publication in 1947.
It was translated from its original Dutch and first प्रकाशित in अंग्रेज़ी in 1952 as The Diary of a Young Girl.
It has since महरूम अनूदित into अनेक भाषाएं.
The diary, which was given to Anne on her 13th जन्मदिवस, क्रॉनिकल्स उसके जीवन इससे 12 जून 1942 जबतक 1 अगस्त 1944.
Kurt 's हस्ताक्षर
Kurt Donald Cobain ( February 20, 1967 – April 5, 1994 ) was an American संगीतकार और कलाकार, बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the सीसे सिंगर, guitarist and primary songwriter of the grunge band Nirvana.
Cobain formed Nirvana with Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen, Washington in 1985 and established it as part of the Seattle music झाँकी, having इसके डेब्यू एल्बम ब्लीच released on the स्वतंत्र रिकार्ड लेबल sub Pop in 1989.
After signing with major label DGC Records, the band मिला भेदन कामयाबी साथ `` खुश्बू जैसे टीन स्पिरिट `` इससे its second album Nevermind ( 1991 ).
Following the कामयाबी of nevermind, निर्वाण थी labeled `` the flagship band '' of Generation X, and Cobain hailed as `` the spokesman of a generation ''.
Cobain, however, थी प्रायः असहज और कुंठित, believing उसके संदेश और कलाकारी vision to have been misinterpreted by the public, with his personal issues often subject to media attention.
He challenged Nirvana 's audience with its फाइनल स्टुडियो एल्बम in utero ( 1993 ).
During the last years of his life, कोबेन struggled साथ हेरोइन व्यसन, बीमारी and depression.
He also had difficulty coping with his fame and public image, और the पेशेवर और lifelong निजी pressures surrounding himself and his wife, musician Courtney Love.
On April 8, 1994, Cobain was found dead at his home in सिएटल, the शिकार of कया थी officially शासित a आत्महत्या by a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the head.
The हालातों of उसके मौत at age 27 have become a topic of public fascination and debate.
Since their debut, निर्वाण, साथ कोबेन as a songwriter, रै बेची over 25 लाख albums in the U.S., and over 50 million worldwide.

The रेडियल इंजन is a प्रत्यागमनी type internal combustion engine configuration in which the cylinders point outward from a central crankshaft like the spokes of a wheel.
It resembles a stylized star when viewed from the front, and is पुकारा a `` स्टार इंजन '' ( जर्मनी sternmotor ) in कुछ languages.
The radial विन्यास थी बहुत commonly प्रयुक्त in वायुयान engines before turbine engines became predominant.
The Golden Girls is an American sitcom, निर्मित by सुसान हैरिस, कि originally aired on एनबीसी इससे सितंबर 13, 1985, to May 9, 1992.
Starring Bea Arthur, Betty White, Rue mcclanahan और estelle getty, the दिखाएँ centers on चार पुरानी महिलाओं sharing a home in Miami, Florida.
It was produced by Witt/Thomas/Harris प्रोडक्शन्स, in संघ साथ touchstone टेलीविज़न, और पॉल junger witt, टोनी थामस, और हैरिस परोसा as the original executive producers.
The सुनहरी लड़कियों प्राप्त नाजुक acclaim throughout सबसे of इसके चलाएं और जीती अनेक awards, including the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Comedy Series twice.
It also won three Golden Globe पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन टेलीविज़न श्रेणी – musical or Comedy.
All four stars each received an Emmy Award throughout the श्रेणी ' चलाएं और था अनेक nominations.
The series also ranked among the top ten highest-rated कार्यक्रम लिये छह आउट of इसके सात सीज़न.
Deepwater drilling is the प्रक्रम of आयल और गैस खोजी और उत्पादन in depths of more than 500 feet.
By this परिभाषा, वहीँ हैं लगभग 600 deepwater wells in the Gulf of Mexico.
It has been economically infeasible लिये अनेक सालो, लकिन साथ उठती आयल कीमतें, अधिक कंपनियाँ हैं investing in this area.
Major companies working in this sector include डायमंड offshore, transocean, और बेकर Hughes.
There are basically two kinds of mobile deepwater खुदाई rigs : semi-submersible खुदाई rigs और drillships.
Drilling can भी be performed इससे a fixed-position संस्थापना such as a floating spar ( platform ) or tension-leg platform.
Recent industry analysis has estimated that the total expenditure in the वैश्विक deepwater अवसंरचना मार्केट होगा पहुँचें $ 145bn in 2011.
“not सब आयल is accessible on land or in shallow water.
You can find some oil deposits buried deep under the ocean floor.”... using सोनिक उपकरण, आयल कंपनियाँ determine the खुदाई साइट most likely to produce oil.
Then they use a mobile offshore drilling ईकाई ( मोदू ) to खुदाई the आरंभिक खूब.
Some units are converted into उत्पादन rigs, अर्थ वे switch from drilling for oil to capturing oil once it 's found.
Most of the time, the आयल कम्पनी होगा बदलें the मोदू साथ a अधिक स्थाई आयल उत्पादन रिग to कैप्चर oil.”... the मोदू 's job is to drill down into the ocean 's floor to find oil deposits.
The part of the drill that extends नीचे the डेक और through the water is called the riser.
The riser allows लिये खुदाई fluids to मूव between the मंजिल and the rig.
Engineers lower a drill स्ट्रिंग -- a श्रेणी of पाइप designed to ड्रिल bas to the आयल deposit -- through the riser.”
“The विस्तार of deepwater खुदाई is happening despite दुर्घटनाओं in offshore fields... ”
In 2010 a large explosion occurred killing 11 workers and spilling लाखो of गैलन of आयल into the गल्फ of मैक्सिको जबकि a bp आयल रिग was drilling in deep waters.
“... Despite the risks, the deepwater drilling trend is spreading in the Mediterranean and off the coast of ईस्ट अफ़्रीकी बाद a स्ट्रिंग of विशाल discoveries of प्राकृतिक gas.”
“The reason for the resumption of ऐसे drilling, analyst say, is continuing high demand for energy worldwide.”
America needs the oil so it is almost necessary to face the ऊँची risks कि आइये साथ deepwater खुदाई in अनुक्रम लिये अमेरिकी to continue to carry on their everyday lives.
“The Energy Department recently प्रक्षिप्त कि गल्फ आयल उत्पादन होता विस्तार इससे इसके 2011 स्तर of 1.3 लाख barrels a दिन, स्टिल nearly a quarter of total domestic production, to 2 million barrels a day by 2020.”
Deepwater खुदाई affects the पर्यावरण in दोनो ऋणात्मक and positive ways.
Although Deepwater drilling rarely causes आयल spills it is स्टिल a hazardous संभावित outcome.
Oil spills परिणाम in आयल डूब to the नीचे of the समंदर smothering संयंत्र life leaving fish without food and shelter to survive.
On the other hand deepwater खुदाई प्रभाव the पर्यावरण in a positive ways too.
In time once the deepwater oil well is not in use anymore plants will grow on and around the well बनाना a गुफा or cavern जैसे आश्रय आदर्श लिये पशु to thrive in.
Deepwater drilling also lets us see the depths of the समंदर मंजिल कि हैं hardly कभी seen.
”Cameras on rovers at the bottom of the wells record footage and take फ़ोटो of विरल मछली कि हैं in वहीँ प्राकृतिक आवास, giving scientist a look at animals they rarely seen” ( Chevron Corporation ). ''
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born July 23, 1973 ) is an American स्त्री साथ जिसको संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्ष विधेयक क्लिंटन admitted to having था an `` improper संबंध '' while she worked at the White House in 1995 and 1996.
The affair and its परखना ( जिससे शामिल क्लिंटन 's महाभियोग ) became known as the Lewinsky scandal.
Francis Albert `` फ़्रैंक '' सिनात्रा,, ( दिसम्बर 12, 1915 – may 14, 1998 ) was an American singer and film actor.
Beginning his musical career in the swing era with Harry James and Tommy dorsey, सिनात्रा मिला unprecedented कामयाबी as a सोलो कलाकार इससे the जल्दी to mid-1940s बाद होने हस्ताक्षरित to Columbia Records in 1943.
Being the आइडल of the `` bobby soxers ``, he released उसके first album, The Voice of Frank Sinatra in 1946.
His professional career had stalled by the 1950s, लकिन it थी पुनर्जन्म in 1953 बाद he जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये Best Supporting Actor for his performance in From Here to Eternity.
He signed with Capitol Records in 1953 and released अनेक critically lauded एल्बम ( ऐसे as in the मूत छोटी घंटों, गीतों लिये swingin ' प्रेमियों !, Come Fly with Me, Only the Lonely and Nice 'n ' Easy ).
Sinatra left Capitol to found his own record label, Reprise Records in 1961 ( finding success with albums such as Ring-a-Ding-Ding !, Sinatra at the Sands and Francis Albert Sinatra & Antonio Carlos Jobim ), toured internationally, थी a founding सदस्य of the चूहा पैक और fraternized साथ हस्तियाँ और कूटनीतिज्ञों, सहित जॉन F. कैनेडी.
Sinatra turned 50 in 1965, recorded the retrospective September of My Years, स्ट्रक्चर in the एमी -winning टेलीविज़न खास फ़्रैंक सिनात्रा : a man और His Music, and scored hits with `` Strangers in the Night `` and `` My Way ``.
With sales of his music dwindling and after appearing in अनेक poorly प्राप्त films, सिनात्रा रिटायर्ड for the first time in 1971.
Two years later, however, he came आउट of रिटायरमेंट और in 1973 अंकित अनेक एल्बम, स्कोरिंग a Top 40 hit with `` ( Theme From ) New York, New York `` in 1980.
Using his Las Vegas shows as a home base, he toured दोनो भीतर the संयुक्त राज्य और internationally, जबतक a छोटी समय पहले उसके death in 1998.
Sinatra also forged a अत्यधिक कामयाब करियर as a फिल्मी actor.
After winning Best Supporting Actor in 1953, he also garnered a नामांकन लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता लिये the man साथ the Golden Arm, and critical acclaim for his performance in The Manchurian Candidate.
He also starred in such musicals as ऊँची समाज, pal जॉय, यारों and Dolls and On the Town.
Sinatra was honored at the कैनेडी बीच honors in 1983 और थी awarded the अध्यक्षीय पदक of Freedom by Ronald Reagan in 1985 and the Congressional Gold Medal in 1997.
He was the recipient of eleven Grammy Awards, including the Grammy Trustees Award, ग्रैमी लेजेंड पुरस्कार और the ग्रैमी आजीवन उपलब्धि Award.
Sinatra is also एक of world’s best-selling कलाकारों of सब समय, having बेची अधिक than 150 million copies worldwide.
ठेठ cornhole board
Cornhole, also known as bean bag toss, corn toss, baggo or bags, is a लॉन खेल in जिससे खिलाड़ी लो turns फेंकना corn hole bags at a raised platform with a hole in the far end.
A थैला in the छेद स्कोर 3 अंक, जबकि एक on the platform scores 1 point.
Play continues जबतक a टोली or खिलाड़ी reaches the score of 21.
The American सुनहरा त्रिभुज is an आधिकारिक सुनहरा bullion coin of the United States.
Authorized under the सुनहरा bullion सिक्का अधिनियम of 1985, it थी पहला released by the संयुक्त राज्य Mint in 1986.
Bikram Yoga is a system of yoga कि बिक्रम choudhury synthesized इससे परंपरागत hatha योग तकनीकों और popularized beginning in the early 1970s.
All Bikram Yoga classes run for 90 minutes and consist of the same series of 26 postures और 2 श्वास exercises.
Bikram Yoga is ideally practiced in a रूम heated to 105°f ( ≈ 40.6°C ) with a humidity of 40 %,.
Christopher Michael Massey ( born 26 January 1990 ) is an American actor, comedian and rapper बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये अभिनीत as माइकल barret in निकलोडियन टेलीविज़न श्रेणी Zoey 101.
Massey has received many awards and nomination including a Young कलाकार पुरस्कार और एमी पुरस्कार nominations.
He is भी ज्ञात लिये appearing in अनेक commercials in the early 2000s.
A conventional teaspoon बना of बेदाग स्टील.
a teaspoon is an मद of cutlery and/or a measuring instrument, as well as a unit of measurement of volume in some countries and customs.
A fern is any one or more of a group of about 12,000 प्रजाति of पौधे belonging to the वनस्पति समूह known as Pteridophyta.
Unlike mosses, वे have जाइलम और फ्लोएम ( making them vascular plants ).
They have stems, पत्ते, और जड़ें like other vascular plants.
Ferns reproduce via spores और have neither seeds nor flowers.
By far the largest group of ferns is the leptosporangiate ferns, but ferns as defined here ( also called monilophytes ) शामिल horsetails, whisk ferns, marattioid ferns, and ophioglossoid ferns.
The term pteridophyte also refers to ferns और a few अन्य बीजरहित vascular पौधे ( देखिए वर्गीकरण खण्ड below ).
Ferns first appear in the चट्टान रिकार्ड 360 लाख सालो पहले in the carboniferous लकिन अनेक of the वर्तमान families and species did not appear until roughly 145 million years ago in the early Cretaceous ( after flowering plants came to dominate many environments ).
Ferns are not of major economic importance, but some are grown or gathered for food, as ornamental plants, for remediating contaminated soils, और have महरूम the विषय of शोध लिये उनके ability to remove some chemical pollutants from the air.
Some हैं significant weeds.
They भी खेल a भूमिका in mythology, medicine, and art.
Flat roofs in इसराईल
Flat छत in लॉस एंजिल्स
A flat roof is a प्रकार of covering for a building.
In contrast to the more sloped form of छत, a चपटा छत is आड़ा or nearly horizontal.
The slope of a roof is properly ज्ञात as इसके पिच : roofs जिससे हैं nearly चपटा हैं ज्ञात as low-pitch roofs ( as the angle of slope increases, so the pitch is said to increase ).
Any sheet of material used to cover a flat or low-pitched छत is प्रायः ज्ञात as a झिल्ली और the प्राथमिक purpose of ये झिल्लियों is to waterproof the roof area.
Materials कि कवर चपटा roofs typically allow the जल to चलाएं बंद इससे a पतला inclination or camber into a gutter system.
Water from some flat roofs such as on garden sheds sometimes flows freely बंद the किनारे of a छत, हालांकि gutter प्रणालियों हैं of लाभ in keeping दोनो दीवारें and foundations dry.
Gutters on smaller roofs often lead water directly onto the मैदान, or बेहतर, into a विशेषकर बना soakaway.
Gutters on larger roofs usually lead water into the rainwater नाले प्रणाली of कोई निर्मित up area.
occasionally चपटा roofs हालांकि हैं designed to collect water in a pool, usually for aesthetic purposes, or for rainwater buffering.
Flat roofs मौजूद सब over the संसार और प्रत्येक area has its own tradition or preference for materials used.
In warmer climes where rainfall is less and freezing is unlikely to occur, many flat roofs are simply built of masonry or concrete and this is शुभ at keeping आउट the ऊष्मा of the सूर्य और सस्ती और आसान to निर्माण where timber is not readily available.
In areas जहाँ the छत could become संतृप्त by बरसात और लीक, or जहाँ जल soaked into the brickwork could फ्रीज to बर्फ और यूँ lead to 'blowing ' ( breaking up of the mortar/brickwork/concrete by the expansion of ice as it forms ) these roofs are not suitable.
Traditionally most flat roofs in the western संसार मेक उपयोग of तारकोल or अधिक प्रायः तारकोल पेपर लागू over छत decking to keep a building watertight.
The tar or tarpaper is in turn covered in gravel to keep the sun 's ऊष्मा, uv किरणें और मौसम बंद it और helps protect it इससे cracking or blistering and degradation.
Roof decking is usually of plywood, chipboard or osb फलक ( osb = उन्मुख strand फलक, भी ज्ञात as स्टर्लिंग board ) of around 18mm thickness.
The tar coating is applied in one or more coats as a hot liquid, heated in a tar kettle, or as चादरें of तारकोल impregnated 'paper ' चिपके bas और sealed साथ at joints by hot तारकोल - एकबार it रै cooled, the gravel is spread evenly over it.
A main reason for failure of these traditional roofs is अनभिज्ञता or कमी of मेंटेनेंस जहाँ लोगों or कार्यक्रम कारण the बजरी to be स्थानांतरित or removed इससे the तारकोल or tarpaper waterproofing, यूँ exposing it to weather and sun whereupon cracking and blistering occurs over time and eventually water gets in.
Tarpaper is प्रायः a 'paper ' or fibre material soaked or impregnated in tar.
As gravel can not protect tarpaper सतहों जहाँ वे वृद्धि खड़ा इससे the छत ऐसे as on मुंडेर दीवारें or upstands, tarpaper विसंगतियाँ हैं उत्पादित साथ ठीक बजरी लागू to the hot tar during the process of manufacture such that a permanent layer of gravel is stuck to it in order to give it ongoing protection.
Tarpapers vary in quality as does the कारीगरी और प्रशिक्षण of those applying it to उपज अधिक or कम successful results.
In some micro climates or छायांकित क्षेत्रों ये बल्कि 'basic ' tarpaper roofs can पिछला खूब in संबंध to the cost of materials purchase and cost of laying them, however the cost of modern membranes such as EPDM has come down over recent years to make them more and more affordable.
There are now more firms supplying आधुनिक विकल्प और वहीँ is generally a growing awareness of their performance and availability.
If a leak does occur on a flat roof then damage often goes unnoticed for long अवधि of समय दौरान जिससे जल penetrates और soaks the अलंकार और कोई इन्सुलेशन and/or ढांचा beneath it.
This can lead to expensive damage इससे the दुर्गन्ध जिससे प्रायः develops और if left can weaken the roof structure.
There are also various health risks to people and animals breathing the सांचे बीजाणुओं : the गंभीरता of इस स्वास्थ्य रिस्क remains a debated point.
One problem with maintaining चपटा roofs is कि if जल करता घुस the अवरोध covering ( be it traditional or a modern membrane ) it can travel a long way before causing visible damage or leaking into a building where it can be seen.
Thus it is not आसान to देखिए जहाँ it is leaking in order to repair it.
Once underlying roof decking is soaked it often sags causing a further संग्रहण or puddling of जल in कि क्षेत्रफल और the प्रॉब्लम worsens.
A CD-ROM ( ) is a pre-pressed कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क जिससे contains data.
The name is an acronym which स्टैंड लिये `` कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क read-only मेमोरी ``.
Computers can पढ़ा cd-roms, लकिन can नहीं write on them.
CD-ROMs are popularly used to वितरित कंप्यूटर तन्त्र, सहित वीडियो खेल और मल्टीमीडिया applications, though any data can be stored ( up to the capacity limit of a disc ).
Some CDs, called enhanced CDs, hold both computer data and audio with the latter capable of being played on a CD player, while data ( such as तन्त्र or डिजिटल वीडियो ) is तभी usable on a कंप्यूटर ( ऐसे as आईएसओ 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ).
The Yellow Book is the technical standard कि defines the स्वरूप of cd-roms.
One of a set of color-bound books that contain the तकनीकी विशेषताएँ लिये सब cd स्वरुप, the पीला किताब, निर्मित by सोनी और Philips, was the first extension of Compact Disc Digital Audio.
It adapted the format to थाम कोई रूप of आंकड़ा.
Joanne `` Jo '' Rowling ( ), ( born 31 July 1965 ), pen name J. K. रोलिंग, is a अंग्रेजों उपन्यासकार, बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the लेखक of the हैरी कुम्हार काल्पनिक series.
The Potter books have gained worldwide ध्यान, जीती अनेक पुरस्कार, and sold more than 400 million copies.
They have become the best-selling book series in history, and been the basis for a श्रेणी of films जिससे रै become the highest-grossing फिल्मी श्रेणी in इतिहास.
Rowling had overall approval on the स्क्रिप्ट as खूब as maintaining रचनात्मक control by serving as a producer on the final instalment.
Born in Yate, Gloucestershire, Rowling was working as a शोधकर्ता और दुभाषिया सचिव लिये माफ़ी अंतरराष्ट्रीय जब वो conceived the विचार लिये the Harry Potter series on a delayed train from Manchester to London in 1990.
The seven-year period that followed entailed the मौत of उसके माँ, तलाक इससे उसके पहला husband and poverty until Rowling finished the first novel in the series, Harry Potter and the Philosopher 's Stone ( 1997 ).
Rowling subsequently प्रकाशित 6 sequels—the पिछला, हैरी कुम्हार और the Deathly Hallows ( 2007 ) —as well as 3 supplements to the series.
In 2012, Rowling parted with her agency and resumed लिखने in the रूप of a tragicomedy अनोखा aimed at वयस्क readership, हकदार The Casual Vacancy.
Rowling has said she is फिलहाल working on दो books—one aimed लिये वयस्कों, the अन्य लिये children younger than the हैरी Potter audience, and she expects the latter to be published first.
Rowling has led a `` rags to riches `` life स्टोरी, in जिससे वो progressed इससे जीना on राज्य लाभ to multi-millionaire औकात within five years.
She is the संयुक्त किंगडम 's best-selling author since records began, with sales in excess of £238m.
The 2008 Sunday Times Rich सूची अनुमानित रोलिंग 's सौभाग्य at £560 लाख ( $ 798 लाख ), ranking her as the twelfth richest woman in the United Kingdom.
फोर्ब्स क्रमित रोलिंग as the forty-eighth सबसे शक्तिशाली हस्ती of 2007, और समय पत्रिका नामित her as a runner-up for its 2007 Person of the Year, noting the social, moral, and political inspiration she has given her fans.
In October 2010, Rowling was नामित the `` सबसे influential स्त्री in ब्रिटेन '' by अग्रणी magazine editors.
She has become a notable philanthropist, supporting ऐसे धर्मार्थ as कॉमिक राहत, एक जनक परिवारों, अनेक काठिन्य समाज of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और lumos ( formerly the children 's High Level Group ).
auburndale is a नगर in polk काउंटी, Florida, United States.
The population थी 11,032 at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी.
According to the U.S Census estimates of 2005, the नगर था a जनसांख्यिकी of 12,381.
It is भाग of the lakeland – शीत Haven Metropolitan Statistical Area.
Hurricane Isabel ( 2003 ) as seen from orbit during expedition 7 of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय स्पेस Station.
The eye, eyewall, and surrounding rainbands, विशेषताएँ of तीव्र cyclones, हैं clearly दृश्य in this view from space.
A tropical cyclone is a storm system characterized by a low-pressure center surrounded by a सर्पिल व्यवस्था of thunderstorms कि उपज strong winds and heavy rain.
Tropical cyclones strengthen when water evaporated from the ocean is released as the संतृप्त एयर उदय, resulting in संघनन of जल vapor contained in the moist air.
They are fueled by a different heat mechanism than other cyclonic windstorms ऐसे as nor'easters, यूरोपीय windstorms, और polar lows.
The characteristic that separates तीव्र cyclones इससे अन्य cyclonic प्रणालियों is कि at कोई ऊँचाई in the माहौल, the बीच of a तीव्र cyclone will be warmer than its surroundings ; a phenomenon called `` warm core `` storm systems.
The term `` tropical '' refers both to the भौगोलिक उत्पत्ति of ये प्रणालियों, जिससे प्रायः रूप in तीव्र regions of the globe, and to their formation in maritime tropical air masses.
The term `` cyclone '' refers to ऐसे तूफ़ान ' cyclonic प्रकृति, साथ counterclockwise हवा प्रवाह in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध और clockwise wind flow in the Southern Hemisphere.
The opposite दिशा of the हवा प्रवाह is a परिणाम of the Coriolis force.
depending on इसके स्थान और शक्ति, a तीव्र चक्रवात is referred to by names such as hurricane (, ), typhoon ( ), tropical storm, cyclonic storm, tropical depression, and simply cyclone.
While tropical cyclones can produce अत्यधिक शक्तिशाली हवाएँ और मूसलाधार बरसात, वे हैं भी समर्थ to produce high waves, damaging storm surge, and tornadoes.
They develop over विशाल लाशें of गरम जल, और खोना उनके शक्ति if they move over land due to increased surface friction and loss of the warm ocean as an energy source.
This is why coastal regions can receive significant damage इससे a तीव्र चक्रवात, जबकि अंतर्देशीय regions हैं अपेक्षाकृत सुरक्षित इससे receiving strong winds.
Heavy rains, however, can produce significant flooding inland, और तूफ़ान surges can उपज extensive तटीय बाढ़ up to from the coastline.
Although their effects on human populations can be विनाशकारी, तीव्र cyclones can relieve सूखा conditions.
They also carry ऊष्मा उर्जा दूर इससे the ऊष्णकटिबन्ध और हस्तांतरण it toward शीतोष्ण latitudes, which makes them an important part of the global atmospheric circulation mechanism.
As a result, tropical cyclones help to maintain equilibrium in the धरती 's क्षोभमण्डल, और to maintain a अपेक्षाकृत stable और गरम temperature worldwide.
Many tropical cyclones develop जब the वायुमंडलीय शर्तें around a कमजोर disturbance in the atmosphere are favorable.
The background environment is modulated by climatological cycles and पैटर्न ऐसे as the madden-julian दोलन, el niño-southern दोलन, और the अटलांटिक multidecadal दोलन.
Others form जब अन्य प्रकार of cyclones acquire tropical characteristics.
Tropical systems are then moved by steering winds in the क्षोभमण्डल ; if the शर्तें remain अनुकूल, the तीव्र disturbance intensifies, and can even develop an eye.
On the other end of the spectrum, if the conditions around the प्रणाली deteriorate or the तीव्र चक्रवात makes landfall, the system weakens and eventually dissipates.
It is not possible to artificially induce the dissipation of ये प्रणालियों साथ वर्तमान technology.
Kirk Douglas ( born Issur Danielovitch, ; December 9, 1916 ) is an अमरीकी स्टेज और फिल्मी कर्ता, film producer and author.
His popular films include Out of the Past ( 1947 ), Champion ( 1949 ), Ace in the Hole ( 1951 ), The Bad and the खूबसूरत ( 1952 ), 20,000 लीग अंतर्गत the समुद्र ( 1954 ), हवस लिये जीवन ( 1956 ), राहें of महिमा ( 1957 ), gunfight at the o.k. corral ( 1957 ), the वाइकिंग्स ( 1958 ), स्पार्टाकस ( 1960 ), निर्जन हैं the वीर ( 1962 ), सात दिनों in may ( 1964 ), the नायक of telemark ( 1965 ) and Tough Guys ( 1986 ).
He is No.17 on the American Film Institute 's list of the greatest पुरूष अमरीकी स्क्रीन महापुरूष of सब समय, बनाना उसे the highest-ranked living person on the list.
in 1996, he प्राप्त the अकादमी मानद पुरस्कार `` for 50 years as a creative and moral force in the motion picture community. ''
He is one of the पिछला surviving अभिनेताओं इससे हॉलीवुड 's `` golden age ''.
Robert Clark `` Bob '' Seger ( born may 6, 1945 ) is an अमरीकी rock and roll singer-songwriter, guitarist and pianist.
As a locally successful detroit-area कलाकार, he performed और अंकित as bob seger and the Last Heard and Bob Seger System throughout the 1960s.
By the early 1970s, he had dropped the `` प्रणाली '' इससे उसके रिकार्डिंग और जारी to नीयत for broader success with other various bands.
In 1973, he put together The Silver Bullet Band, a group of Detroit-area musicians, with जिसको he became सबसे कामयाब on the नेशनल स्तर साथ the एल्बम सजीव गोली, अंकित live with the Silver Bullet Band in 1975 at Cobo Hall in Detroit, Michigan.
In 1976, he हासिल a नेशनल ब्रेकआउट साथ the studio album Night Moves.
On his studio albums, he also worked extensively साथ the alabama-based मांसपेशी shoals लय खण्ड, जिससे appeared on अनेक of Seger 's best-selling singles and albums.
A roots rocker with a classic raspy, चिल्लाना आवाज़, seger लिखा और अंकित गीतों कि dealt साथ प्रेम, महिलाओं, blue-collar themes and was an exemplar of heartland rock.
Seger has recorded many hits, including `` Night Moves, '' `` Turn the Page, '' `` We 've Got Tonight, '' `` विरूद्ध the हवा, '' और shakedown कि थी लिखा लिये बेवर्ली पहाड़ियाँ cop ii और `` जैसे a चट्टान, '' and also co-wrote the Eagles ' number-one hit `` Heartache Tonight. ''
उसके iconic रिकॉर्डिंग of `` बूढ़ा समय चट्टान और Roll `` was named one of the Songs of the Century in 2001.
With a career spanning five decades, Seger continues to perform और रिकार्ड today.
Seger was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of कीर्ति in 2004 और the songwriters हॉल of कीर्ति in 2012.
Richard Milhous Nixon ( January 9, 1913 – April 22, 1994 ) थी the 37th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, सेवारत इससे 1969 to 1974, जब he became the तभी अध्यक्ष to इस्तीफा the office.
Nixon had previously परोसा as a रिपब्लिकन u.S. प्रतिनिधि और सीनेटर from California and as the 36th Vice President of the United States from 1953 to 1961.
निक्सन थी born in Yorba Linda, California.
He graduated from Whittier College in 1934 and Duke University School of Law in 1937, returning to कैलिफ़ोर्निया to अभ्यास विधि.
He and उसके बीवी, पैट निक्सन, स्थानांतरित to वॉशिंगटन to कार्य for the federal government in 1942.
He subsequently served in the संयुक्त राज्य नेवी दौरान संसार युद्ध II.
Nixon was elected in California to the House of प्रतिनिधि in 1946 और to the सीनेट in 1950.
His pursuit of the Alger Hiss case established his reputation as a leading anti-communist, और elevated उसे to नेशनल prominence.
He was the running mate of Dwight D. Eisenhower, the Republican Party अध्यक्षीय nominee in the 1952 चुनाव.
Nixon परोसा लिये आठ सालो as वाइस अध्यक्ष.
He waged an unsuccessful presidential अभियान in 1960, narrowly खोने to जॉन F. कैनेडी, और खोया a race for Governor of California in 1962.
In 1968, he भागा again लिये the प्रेसिडेंसी and was elected.
Although Nixon initially escalated अमेरिका 's भागीदारी in the Vietnam War, he subsequently ended U.S. involvement in 1973.
Nixon 's visit to the People 's Republic of China in 1972 opened diplomatic संबंध between the दो राष्ट्र, और he initiated détente और the Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty with the Soviet Union the same year.
domestically, उसके प्रशासन generally embraced नीतियों कि transferred power from Washington to the states.
Among other things, he launched पहलों to लड़ो कर्कट और illegal दवाएँ, imposed मजदूरी और दाम नियंत्रण, enforced desegregation of some Southern schools, and established the Environmental Protection Agency.
Though he presided over the lunar अवतरण शुरूआत साथ अपोलो 11, he scaled back manned space exploration.
He was re-elected by a भूस्खलन in 1972.
Nixon 's second term saw an Arab oil embargo, the resignation of his vice president, Spiro Agnew, and a continuing series of revelations परिचय the वाटरगेट कांड और अन्य misconduct by सदस्यों of the administration.
The scandal escalated, costing Nixon much of his political support, and on अगस्त 9, 1974, he resigned in the फेस of लगभग निश्चित महाभियोग और हटाना इससे दफ्तर.
After his resignation, he controversially प्राप्त a pardon जारी by उसके successor, Gerald Ford.
In retirement, Nixon 's work as an elder statesman, authoring अनेक किताबे और undertaking अनेक विदेशी यात्राएँ, helped to rehabilitate his public image.
he suffered a debilitating स्ट्रोक on अप्रैल 18, 1994, and died four days later at the age of 81.
{ { infobox Senator
The Dominican Republic annexation treaty caused कड़वा contention between अध्यक्ष ग्रान्ट और Sen. Sumner.
Brady 1869 ] ]
Sen. Sumner, opposed to American imperialism in the Caribbean and fearful that annexation would lead to the conquest of the neighboring ब्लैक गणतंत्र of हैती, became कायल कि भ्रष्टाचार lay पीछे the treaty, and that men close to the president shared in the corruption.
As chairman of the Senate विदेशी संबंध कमेटी, sen. sumner initially withheld उसके राय on the treaty on January 18, 1870.
Sen. Sumner had महरूम लीक सूचना इससे सहायक सचिव of राज्य, bancroft डेविस, कि U.S. Naval ships were being used to protect President Báez.
sen. sumner 's कमेटी voted विरूद्ध annexation और at sen. sumner’s सुझाव और काफी संभवतः to सहेजें the पार्टी from an ugly fight or the president from embarrassment, the Senate held its debate of the treaty behind closed doors in executive session.
President Grant persisted and sent संदेश to कॉंग्रेस in एहसान of annexation on March 14, 1870, and May 31, 1870.
In closed session, Sen. Sumner spoke out against the treaty ; warnng that there would be difficulty with the foreign nationals, noting the दीर्घकालिक विद्रोह कि took प्लेस on the द्वीप, और the रिस्क कि the स्वतंत्रता of हैती, पहचाना by the United States in 1862, would be lost.
Sumner stated that Grant 's use of the u.S. नेवी as a प्रोटेक्टोरेट थी a उल्लंघन of International law and unconstitutional.
Finally, on June 30, 1870 the treaty थी voted on by the सीनेट और विफल to लाभ the जरूरी 2/3 majority for treaty passage.
The following day, President Grant, feeling गद्दारी by sen. sumner, retaliated by ordering the dismissal of sumner’s बंद dost J. lothrop motley, दूत to Britain.
By autumn, Sumner 's personal hostility to the president was public knowledge, and he blamed the सचिव of राज्य लिये failing to have resigned, बल्कि than let ग्रान्ट have उसके रास्ता.
the दो मेन, मित्रों जबतक तब, cooled into bitter enemies.
In December, 1870, still fearful that Grant meant to acquire Santo Domingo somehow, Sumner gave a fiercely नाजुक वाक accusing the अध्यक्ष of usurpation और babcock of unethical conduct.
Already, President Grant, supported by his Secretary of State Hamilton मछली, था initiated a अभियान to depose sumner इससे the अध्यक्षता of the सीनेट विदेशी संबंध Committee.
Although Sumner stated he was an `` Administration man '', in addition to having stopped Grant 's Dominican Republic treaty attempt, Sumner had पराजित ग्रान्ट 's पूरा repeal of the कार्यकाल of दफ्तर अधिनियम, अवरोधित ग्रान्ट 's नामांकन of सिकंदर स्टीवर्ट to u.S. सचिव of राजकोष, और महरूम a निरंतर harassing फ़ोर्स pushing Reconstruction policies faster than Grant had been willing to go.
Grant resented sumner 's बड़प्पन of manner, as well.
Told once कि sumner किया नहीं मानना in the बाइबल, the अध्यक्ष is supposed to have said that he was not surprised : `` he did n't write it. ''
As the rift between ग्रान्ट और sumner increased, sumner’s health began to decline.
When the 42nd U.S. Congress convened on कूच 4, 1871, सीनेटरों संबद्ध साथ अध्यक्ष ग्रान्ट, ज्ञात as ‘’new radicals’’ voted to oust Sen. Sumner from the Senate Foreign Relations Committee chairmanship.
Business ethics ( also corporate ethics ) is a रूप of लागू आचार or पेशेवर आचार कि examines नैतिक principles and moral or ethical problems that arise in a business environment.
It applies to all aspects of business conduct and is relevant to the conduct of individuals और संपूर्ण संगठन.
Business ethics has both normative और वर्णनात्मक आयाम.
As a corporate practice and a career specialization, the फ़ील्ड is primarily normative.
Academics attempting to समझे कारोबार बर्ताव employ descriptive methods.
The range and मात्रा of कारोबार नैतिक मुद्दे reflects the बातचीत of profit-maximizing behavior with non-economic concerns.
Interest in business ethics त्वरित dramatically दौरान the 1980s and 1990s, both within major corporations and within academia.
For example, today most major corporations प्रचार उनके प्रतिबद्धता to non-economic मान अंतर्गत headings such as ethics codes and social responsibility charters.
Adam Smith said, `` People of the same trade seldom meet together, even for merriment and diversion, but the वार्तालाप ends in a षड्यंत्र विरूद्ध the पब्लिक, or in कुछ contrivance to raise prices. ''
Governments use laws and regulations to point business behavior in what वे perceive to be beneficial directions.
आचार implicitly regulates areas and details of behavior that lie beyond governmental control.
the emergence of विशाल corporations साथ सीमित relationships and sensitivity to the communities in which they operate accelerated the development of formal ethics regimes.
A burn is a type of injury to flesh or स्किन caused by ऊष्मा, विद्युत, रसायन, friction, or radiation.
Most burns affect only the superficial skin ( known as superficial or first degree ) or extend into the deeper skin but do नहीं involve the पूरा मोटाई of the स्किन ( ज्ञात as partial thickness or second degree ).
Rarely all layers of the skin or deeper ऊतकों, ऐसे as मांसपेशी or अस्थि can be घायल in जिससे मामला the बर्न is either पूरा मोटाई ( तीसरा degree ) or fourth degree.
The उपचार जरूरी depends on the severity of the burn.
Superficial burns maybe प्रबंधित साथ छोटी अधिक than सरल पीड़ा हत्यारे जबकि प्रमुख burns may require prolonged treatment in specialized burn centers.
Cooling with tap water may aid pain and decrease damage however if एक्सपोज़र is prolonged it may परिणाम in कम देह तापमान.
Partial thickness burns may require सफ़ाई साथ साबुन और जल followed by dressings.
फफोले चाहिए typically be left unbroken.
पूरा मोटाई burns प्रायः आवश्यकता सर्जिकल उपचार such as skin grafting and extensive burns often require large amount of intravenous fluids.
The सबसे आम जटिलताओं of burns हैं related to infection.
While विशाल burns can be fatal, आधुनिक उपचार विकसित in the पिछला 50 सालो have significantly improved the outcomes, especially in children and young adults.
Globally about 11 लाख लोगों तलाश चिकित्सा उपचार और 300,000 people die from burns.
In the United राज्य, of those admitted to a बर्न center, approximately 4 % die from their injuries.
The long पद निष्कर्ष is primarily सम्बन्धित to the size of burn and the age of the person effected.
The Atlantic Ocean, नहीं सहित आर्कटिक and Antarctic regions
This video was लिया by the क्रू of expedition 29 on board the ISS.
The pass starts from just north-east of the Island of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड over the उत्तर अटलांटिक समंदर to सेंट्रल Africa, over South Sudan.
The Atlantic Ocean is the second-largest of the संसार 's oceanic divisions.
With a total area of about, it covers approximately 20 प्रतिशत of the धरती 's सतह और परिचय 29 प्रतिशत of its water surface area.
The first part of its name refers to Atlas of यूनानी mythology, बनाना the अटलांटिक the `` समुद्र of एटलस ''.
The oldest ज्ञात जिक्र of `` अटलांटिक '' is in the histories of हिरोडोटस around 450 bc ( hdt. 1.202.4 ) : Atlantis thalassa ( Greek : Ἀτλαντὶς θάλασσα ; English : Sea of Atlas ).
The term Ethiopic Ocean, derived from Ethiopia, was लागू to the दक्षिणी अटलांटिक as लेट as the mid-19th century.
Before Europeans discovered other oceans, the term `` ocean '' itself was synonymous साथ the waters परे the जलसन्धि of जिब्राल्टर कि we अभी जान as the अटलांटिक.
The early Greeks believed this समंदर to be a gigantic नदी encircling the world.
The Atlantic समंदर occupies an elongated, s-shaped जलाशय extending longitudinally between यूरेशिया और अफ़्रीकी to the east, and the Americas to the west.
As one component of the interconnected global ocean, it is connected in the north to the Arctic Ocean ( जिससे is sometimes माना a समुद्र of the अटलांटिक ), to the प्रशांत समंदर in the दक्षिणपश्चिम, the भारतीय Ocean in the southeast, and the Southern Ocean in the south.
( Other definitions describe the अटलांटिक as extending southward to Antarctica. )
The equator subdivides it into the उत्तर अटलांटिक समंदर और दक्षिण अटलांटिक Ocean.
Due to their long-term persistence, and the need for a unique identifier in issuing forecasts and चेतावनियाँ, तीव्र cyclones और उपोष्ण cyclones हैं दिए names according to policy ( see Tropical cyclone naming ).
The following are lists from जिससे ये तीव्र और उपोष्ण चक्रवात names हैं derived.
White light is dispersed by a प्रिज़्म into the रंगों of the optical spectrum.
The visible spectrum is the portion of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम कि is visible to ( can be detected by ) the human eye.
इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण in इस दायरा of wavelengths is called visible light or simply light.
A typical human eye होगा respond to wavelengths इससे परिचय 390 to 700 nm.
In terms of आवृत्ति, इस corresponds to a बैंड in the vicinity of 430–790 THz.
A light-adapted eye generally has its maximum sensitivity at around 555 nm ( 540 thz ), in the ग्रीन region of the optical spectrum ( see : luminosity function ).
The spectrum does नहीं, however, contain सब the रंगों that the human eyes and brain can distinguish.
Unsaturated colors such as pink, or purple variations such as magenta, are absent, for example, क्युकी वे can be बना तभी by a मिक्सर of अनेक wavelengths.
Colors containing तभी एक wavelength हैं भी पुकारा pure colors.
Visible wavelengths pass through the `` ऑप्टिकल खिड़की ``, the प्रदेश of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम which allows wavelengths to pass largely unattenuated through the Earth 's atmosphere.
An example of इस घटना is कि साफ एयर scatters ब्लू light more than red wavelengths, and so the midday sky appears blue.
The optical window is also called the visible खिड़की क्युकी it overlaps the इंसान दृश्य जवाब spectrum.
The near infrared ( NIR ) window lies just out of the human vision, as well as the Medium wavelength ir ( mwir ) खिड़की और the long wavelength or दूर इन्फ्रारेड ( lwir or FIR ) window though other animals may experience them.
Many species can see light साथ बारंबारता बाहर the `` दृश्य वर्णक्रम, '' which is defined in terms of human vision.
Bees and many other कीट can detect पराबैंगनी लाइट, जिससे helps them find nectar in flowers.
Plant species that depend on insect pollination may owe reproductive success to their appearance in ultraviolet लाइट, बल्कि than कैसा रंगीन वे appear to इंसानो.
Birds, too, can see into the पराबैंगनी ( 300–400 nm ), और कुछ have sex-dependent markings on their plumage that are visible only in the ultraviolet range.
Many पशु कि can देखिए into the पराबैंगनी दायरा, however, can नहीं see red light or any other reddish wavelengths.
मधुमक्खियों ' दृश्य वर्णक्रम ends at about 590nm, just before the orange wavelengths start.
Birds, however, can see some red wavelengths, लकिन नहीं as अनेक as इंसानो.
Zebras ( or ) हैं अनेक प्रजाति of अफ़्रीकी equids ( घोड़ा परिवार ) संयुक्त by their distinctive black and white stripes.
उनके धारियाँ आइये in अलग पैटर्न, unique to each individual.
They are generally सोशल पशु कि live in small harems to large herds.
Unlike their closest relatives, घोड़े और asses, zebras have never been truly domesticated.
There are तीन प्रजाति of zebras : the मैदान जेब्रा, the grévy 's zebra and the mountain zebra.
The plains zebra and the mountain जेब्रा belong to the subgenus hippotigris, लकिन Grévy 's zebra is the sole species of subgenus Dolichohippus.
The latter resembles an गधा, to जिससे it is closely सम्बन्धित, while the former two are more horse-like.
सब तीन belong to the genus equus, along with other living equids.
the अद्वितीय धारियाँ of zebras make them one of the animals most familiar to people.
They occur in a variety of habitats, such as grasslands, savannas, वुडलैंड्स, thorny scrublands, mountains, and coastal hills.
however, विभिन्न anthropogenic कारकों have था a कठोर प्रभाव on zebra populations, in particular hunting for skins and habitat destruction.
Grévy 's zebra and the पहाड़ जेब्रा हैं endangered.
While plains zebras are much more plentiful, one subspecies, the quagga, became extinct in the late 19th century – though there is currently a plan, called the Quagga Project, that aims to breed zebras that हैं phenotypically समान to the quagga in a प्रक्रम पुकारा प्रजनन back.
Barry श्वेत, born बैरी यूजीन कार्टर ( – ), थी an American composer and singer-songwriter.
A two-time Grammy Award -winner known for his distinctive bass voice and romantic image, White 's greatest success came in the 1970s as a सोलो सिंगर और साथ the प्रेम असीमित ऑर्केस्ट्रा, crafting अनेक enduring आत्मा, दुर्गंध, और डिस्को गीतों ऐसे as उसके दो biggest हिट्स, `` तुम 're the First, the Last, My Everything `` and `` Ca n't Get Enough of Your Love, Babe. ''
Along साथ इसहाक़ हेज़, श्वेत is माना by allmusic.com as a पायोनियर of disco music in the early 1970s.
During the course of his करियर in the म्यूज़िक कारोबार, श्वेत हासिल 106 सुनहरा एल्बम विश्वव्यापी, 41 of which also attained platinum status.
White had 20 सुनहरा और 10 प्लेटिनम singles, साथ worldwide sales in excess of 100 million, according to critics Ed Hogan and Wade Kergan.
उसके प्रभाव शामिल रेव. जेम्स क्लीवलैंड, रे चार्ल्स, Aretha Franklin plus Motown artists The Supremes, The Four Tops and Marvin Gaye.
Angelina Jolie (, born एंजेलीना जोली वोइट ; जून 4, 1975 ) is an American actress, film director, and screenwriter.
वो रै प्राप्त an अकादमी पुरस्कार, दो स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड पुरस्कार, और three Golden Globe Awards, and was named Hollywood 's highest-paid actress by Forbes in 2009 and 2011.
Jolie promotes humanitarian कल्याणकारी, और is विख्यात लिये उसके कार्य साथ शरणार्थियों as a खास Envoy and former Goodwill Ambassador for the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees ( UNHCR ).
She has often been cited as the world 's `` most beautiful '' woman, a title for which she रै प्राप्त substantial मीडिया ध्यान.
Jolie made her screen debut as a child alongside her father Jon Voight in Lookin ' to Get Out ( 1982 ), but her film करियर began in सच्चाई a दशक बाद साथ the low-budget उत्पादन साइबोर्ग 2 ( 1993 ).
Her first leading role in a प्रमुख फिल्मी थी in the cyber-thriller हैकर्स ( 1995 ).
She starred in the critically acclaimed biographical television films George Wallace ( 1997 ) and Gia ( 1998 ), and won an अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन supporting अभिनेत्री लिये उसके प्रदर्शन in the नाटक लड़की, बाधित ( 1999 ).
Jolie achieved wide fame after her portrayal of video खेल नायिका लारा क्रॉफ्ट in लारा क्रॉफ्ट : मकबरा रेडर ( 2001 ), और स्थापित herself among the highest-paid अभिनेत्रियों in Hollywood with the sequel The Cradle of Life ( 2003 ).
She continued her action star career with Mr. & Mrs. Smith ( 2005 ) and Wanted ( 2008 ) —her biggest non-animated commercial successes to date—and प्राप्त further नाजुक acclaim लिये उसके प्रदर्शन in the dramas a mighty दिल ( 2007 ) और changeling ( 2008 ), जिससे अर्जित उसके a नामांकन लिये an अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन Actress.
Jolie made her directorial debut with the wartime नाटक in the जमीन of रक्त और मधु ( 2011 ).
Divorced from actors Jonny Lee मिलर और बिली bob थॉर्नटन, जोली अभी जीवनदान साथ कर्ता ब्रैड pitt, in a relationship notable for fervent media attention.
Jolie and Pitt have three biological children और तीन अपनाया children.

Erosion is the process by which मृदा और चट्टान हैं removed इससे the धरती 's सतह by exogenetic processes such as wind or water flow, and then transported and deposited in other locations.
While erosion is a प्राकृतिक प्रक्रम, इंसान क्रियाएँ have increased by 10-40 times the rate at which erosion is occurring globally.
Excessive erosion causes problems such as desertification, decreases in agricultural उत्पादकता due to जमीन degradation, sedimentation of जलमार्गों, और ecological पतन due to घाटा of the nutrient rich upper soil layers.
Water and wind erosion are now the दो प्राथमिक कल्याणकारी of जमीन degradation ; संयुक्त, वे हैं जिम्मेदार लिये 84 % of degraded acreage, बनाना excessive erosion one of the most significant global environmental problems.
Industrial agriculture, deforestation, roads, anthropogenic climate change and urban sprawl हैं amongst the सबसे significant इंसान क्रियाएँ in लिहाज़ to their effect on stimulating erosion.
However, there are अनेक उपलब्धियाँ वैकल्पिक जमीन उपयोग practices कि can काटना or सीमा अपरदन, ऐसे as terrace -building, no-till agriculture, and revegetation of denuded soils.
जर्सी shore is an अमरीकी वास्तविकता टेलीविज़न श्रेणी जिससे भागा on एमटीवी इससे December 3, 2009 to December 20, 2012 in the United States.
The series follows the lives of eight housemates spending their गर्मियाँ at the जर्सी shore in the u.S. राज्य of नई जर्सी.
Season 2 followed the cast escaping the cold northeast winter to Miami बीच, साथ ऋतु 3 returning to the Jersey Shore.
The fourth ऋतु, फिल्माया in इटली, premiered on August 4, 2011.
The show returned for a पांचवां ऋतु, at seaside हाइट्स on जनवरी 5, 2012.
The fifth season finale aired on कूच 15, 2012.
On March 19, 2012, एमटीवी पुष्टि कि the श्रेणी होता return for their sixth season.
On August 30, 2012, MTV announced that the series होगा समाप्त बाद the छठे ऋतु, जिससे premiered on October 4.
The series finale aired on December 20, 2012.
The show debuted amid large amounts of विवाद regarding the उपयोग of the शब्द `` guido / guidette, '' portrayals of Italian-American stereotypes, and scrutiny from locals because the cast members were not residents of the area.
The series garnered record दरजा लिये एमटीवी, बनाना it the संजाल 's सबसे viewed series telecast ever.
The series ' cast have भी महरूम credited साथ introducing अद्वितीय lexicon and phrases into American popular culture.
The University of शिकागो और the विश्वविद्यालयों of ओक्लाहोमा हैं among the educational institutions that have had classes or conferences about the show.
in 2010, the डाल of जर्सी shore थी named on Barbara Walters ' 10 Most Fascinating People list, and the series has since been exported to dozens of countries worldwide.
There are several remakes of the show in other countries, with two नियत in the संयुक्त किंगडम ; the खूब ज्ञात geordie shore, नियत in Newcastle upon Tyne, England.
The other is The घाटियों, the वेल्श समतुल्य, जिससे is फिल्माया और नियत in Cardiff.
The only other official remake of the show is gandía shore, नियत in gandía, Spain.

United States territory is any extent of region under the jurisdiction of the संघीय सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य, सहित सब waters ( around islands or continental tracts ) and all U.S. Naval vessels.
The United राज्य रै traditionally proclaimed the sovereign अधिकारों लिये exploring, exploiting, conserving, and managing its territory.
This extent of territory is सब the क्षेत्रफल belonging to, और अंतर्गत the डोमिनियन of, the संयुक्त राज्य संघीय सरकारी ( जिससे शामिल tracts lying at a distance from the country ) for administrative and other purposes.
The United States total territory शामिल a उपसमुच्चय of राजनैतिक विभाजन.
The U.S. सरकारी is a सरकारी साथ प्रतिनिधित्व शक्तियां under the United States Constitution.
`` The powers not delegated to the United States by the Constitution, nor prohibited by it to the राज्य, हैं सुरक्षित to the राज्य क्रमशः, or to the लोगों '' by the Tenth Amendment.
टर्मिनेटर 3 : वृद्धि of the मशीने ( commonly abbreviated as t3 ) is a 2003 विज्ञान fiction कार्रवाई film directed by Jonathan Mostow and starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Nick Stahl, Claire Danes and Kristanna Loken.
It is the दूसरी sequel to The Terminator ( 1984 ).
After Skynet fails to kill Sarah Connor before उसके बेटे is born और to मार जॉन खुद as a चाइल्ड, it भेजना वापस another टर्मिनेटर, the t-x, in an attempt to wipe out as many Resistance officers as possible.
This includes John 's भविष्य बीवी, लकिन नहीं जॉन खुद as उसके whereabouts are unknown to Skynet.
John 's life is placed in danger when the t-x accidentally पाता him.
A cord of लकडी
The cord is a unit of measure of dry volume प्रयुक्त in कनाडा और the संयुक्त राज्य to माप ईधन and pulpwood.
a cord is the राशि of लकडी कि, when `` ranked and well stowed '' ( arranged so pieces are aligned, parallel, touching and compact ), occupies a volume of.
This corresponds to a well stacked woodpile ऊँची, long, और गहन ; or कोई अन्य व्यवस्था of linear measurements that yields the same volume.
The name cord probably comes from the उपयोग of a cord or स्ट्रिंग to measure it.
The, is an 8-bit हैंडहेल्ड वीडियो खेल यंत्र विकसित और manufactured by Nintendo.
It was released in जापानी on, in उत्तर अमेरिका in, and in Europe on.
It is the first handheld console in the Game Boy line, and was created by Gunpei Yokoi and Nintendo Research & Development 1 —the same staff who had designed the Game & देखें श्रेणी as खूब as अनेक लोकप्रिय खेल लिये the निन्टेंडो Entertainment System.
Redesigned संस्करण यहूद released in 1996 और 1998, in the रूप of खेल लड़के जेब, and Game Boy Light ( Japan only ), respectively.
the खेल लड़के is निन्टेंडो 's दूसरी हैंडहेल्ड प्रणाली following the खेल & देखें series introduced in, and it combined features from both the Nintendo Entertainment System and Game & Watch.
It थी originally bundled साथ the puzzle game Tetris.
As part of the चौथी पीढी of गेमिंग, the खेल लड़के competed साथ the Sega Game Gear, Atari Lynx, and the TurboExpress.
Despite these other technologically superior हैंडहेल्ड consoles, the खेल लड़के was a tremendous success.
The Game Boy and its successor, the Game Boy Color, have दोनो संयुक्त बेची 118.69 लाख इकाई विश्वव्यापी.
upon इसके रिलीज in the संयुक्त राज्य, it sold its entire shipment of one million units within weeks.
The World Trade Center is a complex of इमारतें अंतर्गत निर्माण in निम्नतर मैनहटन, नई यॉर्क नगर, संयुक्त राज्य, replacing an पहले जटिल of seven buildings with the same name on the same site.
the असली संसार व्यापार बीच प्रदर्शित लैंडमार्क जुड़वा मीनारें, which opened on April 4, 1973 and were destroyed in the September 11 attacks of 2001, along with 7 World Trade Center.
The other इमारतें in the जटिल यहूद क्षतिग्रस्त in the हमले, and their ruins were eventually demolished.
The site is being rebuilt with five नई skyscrapers और a मेमोरियल to those killed in the attacks.
, only one skyscraper has been completed ; the other four are अपेक्षित to be समाप्त पहले 2020.
One World Trade Center will be the सीसे भवन लिये the नई जटिल, reaching अधिक than 100 कहानियां at इसके completion.
It became the tallest भवन in नई यॉर्क नगर on April 30, 2012, and is expected to be finished by 2013.
A sixth tower is प्रतीक्षारत पुष्टि.
At the time of their completion, the original 1 World Trade Center ( the North Tower ) and 2 संसार व्यापार बीच ( the दक्षिण मीनार ), ज्ञात collectively as the `` जुड़वा मीनारें '', were the tallest buildings in the world.
The other buildings included 3 wtc ( the मैरियट संसार व्यापार बीच ), 4 wtc, 5 wtc, 6 WTC, and 7 WTC.
All of these buildings यहूद निर्मित between 1975 and 1985.
The cost for the construction was $ 400 लाख ( $ in डॉलर ).
The जटिल थी स्तिथ in the दिल of नई यॉर्क नगर 's शहर वित्तीय ज़िला और contained 13.4 million square feet ( 1.24 million m2 ) of office space.
The World व्यापार बीच अनुभवी a आग on, 1975, a bombing on, 1993 and a robbery on, 1998.
In 1998, the Port प्राधिकार decided to privatize the संसार व्यापार बीच, पट्टे the इमारतें to a निजी company to manage, and awarded the lease to Silverstein Properties in.
On the morning of September 11, 2001, Al-Qaeda -संबद्धd hijackers उड़ाया दो बोइंग 767 jets into the जटिल, एक into प्रत्येक मीनार, in a समन्वित terrorist attack.
After burning for 56 minutes, the South Tower ( 2 ) collapsed, followed a half-hour later by the North मीनार ( 1 ), साथ the हमले on the संसार व्यापार बीच resulting in 2,753 deaths.
Falling debris from the towers, combined with fires that the मलबा initiated in अनेक surrounding इमारतें, led to the आंशिक or पूरा पतन of सब the other buildings in the complex and caused catastrophic damage to ten other large structures in the surrounding area.
The process of cleanup and recovery at the संसार व्यापार बीच साईट took आठ महीने.
Over the following सालो, योजनाएँ लिये a rebuilt संसार व्यापार बीच took form.
The first new building at the site was 7 World व्यापार बीच, जिससे खोली in.
The निम्नतर मैनहटन विकास निगम ( lmdc ), स्थापित in to oversee the rebuilding process, organized competitions to select a site plan and memorial design.
Memory Foundations, designed by Daniel Libeskind, was selected as the निपुण योजना, लकिन इस गई through substantial परिवर्तन in डिज़ाइन.
The new World Trade Center complex will include One World Trade Center, three अन्य high-rise दफ्तर मीनारें, और the नेशनल सितंबर 11 मेमोरियल & Museum.
