The Transverse Ranges are a group of mountain सीमाएँ of दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया, in the प्रशांत coast Ranges physiographic region in North America.
The Transverse Ranges begin at the southern end of the California Coast सीमाएँ और झूठ between सांता बारबरा और San Diego counties.
They derive the name Transverse Ranges due to उनके east-west अभिविन्यास, बनाना उन्हें अनुप्रस्थ to the सामान्य north-south अभिविन्यास of most of California 's coastal mountains.
आवधिक तालिका साथ electron shells
An electron shell may be thought of as an orbit followed by electrons around an अणु 's केंद्रक.
The closest shell to the nucleus is called the `` 1 shell '' ( also called `` K shell '' ), followed by the `` 2 शेल '' ( or `` l शेल '' ), तब the `` 3 शेल '' ( or `` m शेल '' ), और so on दूर और दूर from the nucleus.
the शेल अक्षर k, l, m,..., used in the X-ray notation, are alphabetical.
प्रत्येक शेल can contain तभी a फिक्स्ड क्रमांक of electrons : the 1st शेल can थाम up to दो electrons, the 2nd shell can hold up to eight electrons, the 3rd shell can hold up to 18, and 4th shell can hold up to 32 and so on.
Since electrons are electrically attracted to the केंद्रक, an अणु 's electrons होगा generally occupy बाहरी शेल तभी if the अधिक भीतरी शेल have already महरूम completely filled by other electrons.
However, this is नहीं a सख्त आवश्यकता : अणु may have दो or even three incomplete outer shells.
( See Madelung rule लिये अधिक विवरण. )
For an explanation of why electrons मौजूद in ये शेल देखिए इलेक्ट्रॉन configuration.
The electrons in the outermost occupied shell ( or shells ) determine the रासायनिक गुण of the अणु ; it is पुकारा the valence shell.
Each shell consists of एक or अधिक subshells, और प्रत्येक subshell consists of one or more atomic orbitals.
Vickie Lynn Marshall ( née होगन ; नवम्बर 28, 1967 – फ़रवरी 8, 2007 ), ज्ञात by उसके moniker anna निकोल स्मिथ, थी an अमरीकी model, actress, and television personality.
स्मिथ पहला gained लोकप्रियता in प्लेबॉय, becoming the 1993 Playmate of the Year.
वो modeled लिये कपडे companies, including Guess jeans and Lane Bryant.
Smith dropped out of high स्कूल और थी शादीशुदा in 1985.
Her highly publicized second marriage to oil business mogul, J. Howard Marshall, 62 years her वरिष्ठ, resulted in अटकलें कि वो शादीशुदा the octogenarian लिये his money, which she denied.
Following Marshall 's मौत, स्मिथ began a lengthy विधिक बैटल over a share of his estate.
Her case, Marshall v. Marshall, reached the U.S. Supreme Court on a question of federal jurisdiction, और again on a सवाल of दिवालियापन अदालत प्राधिकार ( अभी पुकारा stern v. Marshall ).
Smith died on February 8, 2007 in a हॉलीवुड, फ्लोरिडा होटल रूम as a परिणाम of an overdose of prescription drugs.
Within the फाइनल छह महीने of उसके जीवन, स्मिथ थी the फ़ोकस of a नवीनीकृत दबायें coverage surrounding the death of her son, Daniel, and the paternity and custody battle over her newborn daughter, Dannielynn.
The is one denomination of जापानी येन.
The current design was first minted in 1959 using Japanese characters known as the `` new script ``, and were भी minted इससे 1949-1958 using `` old-script '' जापानी characters.
Five-yen coins date to 1870 ( जब, due to the much उच्चतर मान of the येन, they were minted in gold ).
The front of the coin depicts a rice plant growing out of the water, with `` five yen '' written in kanji ; the वापस is stamped साथ `` जापानी '' और the साल of समस्या, भी in कांजी, अलग by sprouts of a tree.
The three graphic elements of the coin represent कृषि और fisheries, the कुंजी तत्व of the जापानी first-sector economy.
Around a hole, there is a गियर कि represents उद्योग.
It is the only Japanese coin in circulation to कमी अरबी numerals on either फेस.
TLC is an American लड़की समूह जिनकी रंगमंडल spanned r & b, हिप हॉप, आत्मा, funk, and new jack swing.
Originally consisting of singer Tionne `` t-boz '' वाटकिंस, rapper लिसा `` बाएँ नजर '' lopes और सिंगर rozonda `` chilli '' थामस, the समूह found unprecedented success in the 1990s while also enduring a series of spats with the law, each other, and the group 's record label.
Initially, TLC achieved वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी following the रिलीज of their debut album Ooooooohhh...
on the tlc टिप, जिससे sold 6 million copies worldwide.
However, it was their दूसरी एल्बम, crazysexycool, कि catapulted the समूह to superstar status.
CrazySexyCool went on to be certified diamond by the riaa — a पहला लिये a मादा समूह, और आखिरकार बेची 23 लाख नक़ल विश्वव्यापी.
Five years later, the group released their third album FanMail, जिससे became the समूह 's पहला एल्बम to डेब्यू at क्रमांक एक and sold more than 11 million copies worldwide.
The subsequent tour following FanMails release became the उच्चतम grossing दौरे of सब समय by a मादा band.
In 2002, Lisa `` Left Eye '' Lopes died in a car दुर्घटना in Honduras.
Seven months later, T-Boz and Chilli released the समूह 's चौथी एल्बम 3d, जिससे बेची 2 लाख नक़ल विश्वव्यापी, it प्रदर्शित unreleased vocals from Left Eye.
Billboard magazine क्रमित tlc as एक of the महानतम musical trios.
between 1992 और 2003, the बैंड संचित टेन शीर्ष टेन singles, four number one singles, four multi-platinum albums, and four Grammy Awards.
At the end of 1999, TLC थी क्रमित as the सातवाँ सबसे कामयाब अधिनियम of the 1990s by Billboard.
In 2008, the group was inducted into the सब समय hot 100 कलाकार हॉल of कीर्ति by the same magazine, at 56th place.
That year it was also listed as the # 25 r & b/hip-hop कलाकार of the preceding 25 सालो.
TLC has sold more than 65 million records worldwide and they are क्रमित as the दूसरी बेहतरीन selling मादा समूह of सब समय, और the बेहतरीन selling मादा R & B group of all time.
In 2012, TLC ranked 12th on VH1 's 100 महानतम महिलाओं in म्यूज़िक, होने क्रमित the number one all girl group on that list.
Tarzan is a 1999 अमरीकी एनिमेटेड एडवेंचर फिल्मी उत्पादित by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी विशेषता Animation and distributed by Walt Disney Pictures.
The 37th film in the Walt Disney Animated Classics, it is based on the story Tarzan of the Apes by Edgar Rice Burroughs, और is the तभी प्रमुख गति चित्र संस्करण of the स्टोरी टार्ज़न प्रॉपर्टी to be animated.
Directed by Chris Buck and Kevin Lima with a screenplay by Tab Murphy, Bob Tzudiker, and Noni White, Tarzan सुविधाएँ the आवाज़ें of टोनी goldwyn, minnie ड्राइवर, ग्लेन बंद, और रोजी o'donnell with Brian Blessed, Lance Henriksen, Wayne Knight, and Nigel Hawthorne.
It was the last bona fide hit पहले the डिज़्नी slump of the जल्दी 2000s grossing $ 171,091,819 domestically और $ 448,191,819 worldwide, outgrossing its predecessors Hercules ( 1997 ) and Mulan ( 1998 ).
At the time of इसके रिलीज, इसके उत्पादन बजट of $ 130 लाख बना it the सबसे महंगी एनिमेटेड film ever made, until topped by Disney 's own $ 140 million Treasure Planet in 2002.
It was भी the पहला डिज़्नी एनिमेटेड विशेषता to open at # 1 since Pocahontas.
This was the last major box office कामयाबी of the डिज़्नी पुनर्जागरण.
Oil Platform P-51 off the Brazilian coast is a semi-submersible मंच.
Oil मंच mittelplate in the North sea
An oil platform, ( offshore platform or colloquially oil rig ) is a large structure with facilities to ड्रिल कुएं, to निकालें और प्रक्रम आयल और प्राकृतिक गैस, और to temporarily स्टोर उत्पाद until it can be brought to shore for refining and marketing.
In many cases, the मंच contains सुविधाएं to हाउस the workforce as well.
Depending on the circumstances, the platform may be fixed to the ocean floor, may consist of an कृत्रिम द्वीप, or may float.
Remote subsea कुएं may भी be कनेक्ट to a मंच by प्रवाह लाइनों और by umbilical connections.
These subsea solutions may consist of one or अधिक subsea कुएं, or of एक or अधिक manifold centres for multiple wells.
Slaughter is the हत्या of पशु, प्रायः that of domestic livestock for food.
The animals most commonly slaughtered लिये खाना हैं चौपायों, जल भैंस ( लिये बीफ और वील ), शीप, बकरियों ( लिये मेमने and mutton ), pigs ( for pork ), horses ( for horse meat ), and fowl, largely chickens, turkeys, and ducks and increasingly fish from the aquaculture industry ( fish farming ).
The White House, the अध्यक्ष 's आधिकारिक निवास and center of the administration
Under the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान, the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य is the head of state and head of government of the United States.
As chief of the executive शाखा और सिर of the संघीय सरकारी as a पूरे, the प्रेसिडेंसी is the उच्चतम राजनैतिक दफ्तर in the United States by influence and recognition.
The president is also the commander-in-chief of the संयुक्त States Armed Forces.
the अध्यक्ष is indirectly निर्वाचित to a four-year पद by an चुनावी कॉलेज ( or by the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि should the Electoral College fail to award an absolute majority of votes to any person ).
Since the ratification of the twenty-second amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान in 1951, no व्यक्ति may be निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष अधिक than twice, and no one who has served more than two years of a term to which someone else was elected may be elected more than once.
Upon the death, resignation, or removal from office of an लाज़िम अध्यक्ष, the वाइस अध्यक्ष assumes the दफ्तर.
The अध्यक्ष जरूर be at तनिक 35 सालो of आयु और a `` प्राकृतिक born '' citizen of the United States.
This list includes only those persons who were sworn into दफ्तर as अध्यक्ष following the अनुसमर्थन of the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान, which took effect on March 4, 1789.
For अमरीकी नेताओ पहले इस अनुसमर्थन, see President of the Continental Congress.
The list does not include कोई एक्टिंग राष्ट्रपतियों अंतर्गत the twenty-fifth amendment to the संयुक्त States Constitution.
There have been 43 people sworn into office, and 44 presidencies, as ग्रोवर क्लीवलैंड परोसा two non-consecutive terms and is counted chronologically as both the 22nd and 24th president.
Of the individuals elected as president, four died in office of natural causes ( William Henry Harrison, Zachary Taylor, Warren G. Harding, and फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट ), चार यहूद assassinated ( अब्राहम lincoln, जेम्स A. गारफ़ील्ड, विलियम mckinley, और जॉन F. कैनेडी ) and one resigned ( Richard Nixon ).
George Washington, the first अध्यक्ष, थी उदघाटन in 1789 बाद a सर्वसम्मत vote of the Electoral College.
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest time in दफ्तर साथ 32 दिनों in 1841, और फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट खर्च the longest साथ over twelve years, but died shortly into his fourth term in 1945.
He is the only president to serve more than two terms, and a constitutional amendment, affecting राष्ट्रपतियों बाद हैरी ट्रूमैन, थी passed to सीमा the क्रमांक of टाइम्स an individual can be elected president.
Andrew Jackson, the seventh president, was the first to be निर्वाचित by मेन of सब वर्ग in 1828 बाद सबसे laws barring non-land-owners from voting were repealed.
वारेन हार्डिंग थी the पहला निर्वाचित बाद women gained voting rights in 1920.
History records four presidents – John Q Adams, रदरफोर्ड B. हेज़, बेंजामिन हैरिसन और जार्ज W. Bush – who lost the popular vote but assumed office.
John F. Kennedy has been the only president of Roman Catholic faith, and the current president, Barack Obama, is the पहला अध्यक्ष of African descent.
Several firearms with detachable suppressors, from शीर्ष to नीचे : an uzi, an ar-15, A Heckler & Koch USP Tactical, A Beretta 92FS, and a SIG Mosquito.
bolt कार्रवाई rimfire राइफल with suppressor
AWM-F sniper राइफल साथ संलग्न suppressor.
A suppressor, sound suppressor, or sound moderator, is a device attached to or part of the बैरल of a firearm जिससे reduces the राशि of रव, और प्रायः the राशि of muzzle flash, generated by firing the weapon.
A suppressor can be प्रयुक्त दोनो साथ a firearm और साथ संपीडित air gun.
Though it is sometimes referred to as a silencer, this term is a misnomer popularized by cinematic fiction : the ध्वनि of a प्रक्षेप्य, विशेषकर one moving faster than the speed of sound, through the air can not be eliminated.
Using a suppressor in long अलहदा शूटिंग ( i.e. वृहद than 300 मीटर ) can lessen, or retard, the report at the moment of impact, and create the impression of silence near the target.
The रव सुना निकट the muzzle as a प्रक्षेप्य पत्ते the बैरल, though subdued, is not silent at all.
A suppressor is usually a metal cylinder with internal mechanisms to reduce the ध्वनि of फायरिंग by slowing the escaping propellant गैस और sometimes by reducing the velocity of the bullet.
Early suppressors were created around the beginning of the 20th सदी by अनेक आविष्कारक.
American inventor Hiram Percy Maxim ( not to be confused with Hiram Stevens Maxim, Hiram Percy 's father, and the inventor of the कहावत यंत्र गन ), is credited साथ inventing और selling the पहला commercially कामयाब मॉडल circa 1902 ( patented 30 March 1909 ).
Maxim gave his device the trademarked नाम कहावत silencer.
The muffler for internal combustion engines was developed in parallel with the firearm suppressor by कहावत in the जल्दी 20th सदी, using अनेक of the वही तकनीकों to provide quieter-running engines ( in many European countries automobile mufflers are still called silencers ).
The word silencer in reference to gun suppressor remains in फैली उपयोग, हालांकि it रै चूंकि गिरे आउट of एहसान साथ कुछ, विशेषकर among the firearms उद्योग, होने replaced साथ the अधिक वस्तुतः सटीक पद ध्वनि suppressor or बस suppressor, because a `` sound suppressor '' does not `` silence '' any weapon, rather it eliminates muzzle flash and reduces the sonic pressure of a firearm discharging.
Common उपयोग और u.S. विधान भाषा एहसान the historically earlier term, silencer.
In U.S. law, the terms `` firearm मफलर '' और `` firearm silencer '' हैं synonymous.
suppressors यहूद regularly प्रयुक्त by एजेंटों of the संयुक्त राज्य दफ्तर of रणनीतिक सेवाएं, जो favored the newly designed High Standard HDM.22 Long Rifle pistol during World War II.
oss निदेशक विलियम जोसेफ `` जंगली विधेयक '' डोनोवन demonstrated the pistol for President Franklin D. Roosevelt at the White House.
According to OSS शोध मुख्य स्टेनली लोवेल, डोनोवन ( an बूढ़ा और विश्वसनीय dost of the अध्यक्ष ) was waved into the Oval Office, where Roosevelt was dictating a letter.
जबकि रूज़वेल्ट समाप्त उसके संदेश, डोनोवन turned उसके वापस और fired टेन गोलियाँ into a sandbag he had brought with him, announced what he had done and handed the smoking gun to the astonished president.
The British SOE ( Special Operations Executive ) Welrod हत्या पिस्टल साथ an अभिन्न suppressor थी भी प्रयुक्त by the अमरीकी OSS on clandestine operations in Nazi occupied Europe during the Second World War.
Beatrice `` Bea '' Arthur ( May 13, 1922 – April 25, 2009 ) थी an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री, comedienne, और सिंगर जिनकी करियर spanned seven decades.
Arthur achieved fame as the character Maude Findlay on the 1970s sitcoms सब in the परिवार और maude, और as डोरोथी zbornak on the 1980s sitcom The Golden Girls, winning Emmy Awards for both roles.
A stage अभिनेत्री दोनो पहले और बाद उसके टेलीविज़न कामयाबी, वो जीती the टोनी पुरस्कार लिये Best Featured Actress in a Musical for her performance as Vera Charles in the original cast of Mame ( 1966 ).
is a 2011 Japanese 3D computer-animated film based on the Tekken video game series, produced by Digital Frontier and वितरित by asmik इक्का entertainment in संघ साथ बंदाई entertainment.
The film premiered in North America by Bandai Entertainment on July 26, 2011, and in ऑस्ट्रेलिया on जुलाई 27, 2011 in a खास exclusive one-off screening.
It was released on सितंबर 3, 2011 in Japan.
The film was released on Blu-ray Disc on November 22, 2011 लिये यूएसए, और दिसम्बर 1, 2011 लिये जापानी.
This film was also released on dvd on नवम्बर 22, 2011 ( 2d संस्करण only ).
The film थी additionally शामिल साथ the प्लेस्टेशन 3 खेल, tekken संकर, और the Nintendo 3DS title, Tekken 3D : Prime Edition.
For a discussion of nonprofit, voluntary neighborhood वकालत समूह, देखिए पड़ोस संघ.
In the United States, a homeowner संघ is a निगम formed by a रियल एस्टेट डेवलपर लिये the purpose of विपणन, मैनेजिंग, and selling of homes and lots in a residential subdivision.
It grants the developer privileged voting rights in governing the association, while allowing the developer to exit financial and legal responsibility of the organization, typically by transferring स्वामित्व of the संघ to the homeowners after selling off a predetermined number of lots.
Membership in the homeowners association by a residential buyer is typically a कंडीशन of खरीदें ; a खरीदार is n't दिए an विकल्प to अस्वीकृत it.
Most homeowner associations are incorporated, and हैं विषय to राज्य statutes कि govern non-profit corporations and homeowner associations.
State oversight of homeowner associations is minimal, and mainly takes the रूप of कानून जिससे हैं असंगत इससे state to state.
Some राज्य, ऐसे as फ्लोरिडा और कैलिफ़ोर्निया, have a विशाल देह of homeowner संघ law, and some states, such as Massachusetts, have virtually no homeowner association law.
The fastest growing form of housing in the United States today is common-interest developments ( cids ), a श्रेणी कि शामिल planned-unit developments of single-family homes, condominiums, and cooperative apartments.
Since 1964, homeowner associations have become increasingly आम in the यूएसए.
The Community Associations Institute trade association अनुमानित कि hoas governed 24.8 लाख अमरीकी घरों और 62 लाख residents in 2010.

There are many breeds of गिनी सुअर जिससे have महरूम विकसित चूंकि इसके domestication ca. 5000 BC.
Breeds vary widely in appearance and purpose, ranging इससे दिखाएँ breeds साथ long, बहती बाल to those in उपयोग as model organisms by science.
From ca. 1200 AD to the Spanish conquest of the Inca साम्राज्य in 1532, चयनात्मक प्रजनन by स्वदेशी दक्षिण अमरीकी peoples resulted in अनेक किस्में of घरेलू गिनी pigs, which form the basis for some of the modern domestic breeds.
Early Andean breeds were primarily kept as agricultural भण्डार लिये खाना, और प्रयत्न at improving the गिनी सुअर as a खाना source continue to the modern era.
With the export of गिनी सूअर to यूरोपीय in the 15th सदी, the लक्ष्य in प्रजनन shifted to focus on the development of appealing pets.
To this end, various प्रतिस्पर्धी प्रजनन संगठन यहूद संस्थापित by fanciers.
The American Cavy Breeders Association, an adjunct to the American Rabbit Breeders Association, is the शासी देह in the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा.
the अंग्रेजों cavy परिषद governs cavy clubs in the United Kingdom.
Similar organizations exist in ऑस्ट्रेलिया ( ऑस्ट्रेलियाई नेशनल cavy परिषद ) और New Zealand ( New Zealand Cavy Club ).
Each club publishes its own Standard of Perfection and determines जिससे breeds हैं योग्य for showing.
New breeds continue to emerge in the 21st सदी.
Though there हैं अनेक breeds of गिनी सुअर, तभी a few breeds हैं commonly found on the show table as pets.
Most Guinea pigs found as pets were either मिला अवांछनीय by प्रजनक or यहूद करवाया to be सुखद पालतु regardless of how well they meet the breed standard of perfection.
The छोटी बाल, abyssinian, peruvian और sheltie ( उर्फ silkie ) breeds हैं those सबसे अक्सर देखी as पालतु, और the former three are the core breeds in the history of the competitive showing of Guinea pigs.
In addition to their मानक रूप, nearly सब breeds आइये in a Satin variant.
Satins, due to their खोखला बाल shafts, possess coats of a खास gloss and shine.
However, there is growing evidence कि the जीनों जिम्मेदार लिये the साटन कोट भी can कारण कठोर bone problems, including Osteodystrophy and Paget 's disease.
प्रर्दशित साटन विसंगतियाँ is निषिद्ध by some cavy breeders ' associations because of animal welfare reasons.
All cavy breeds have some shared general standards : the head profile should be rounded, साथ विशाल आँखें और विशाल, smooth ears.
the देह चाहिए be strong and of compact build.
Coat colour should in all variations be clearly पारिभाषित और thorough इससे रूट to tip.
These standards are best met by long established, commonly करवाया breeds, as उनके प्रजनक have था पर्याप्त समय और पशु to effectively breed for these qualities.
The coat colour ideal of good definition and thoroughness is rarely मिले by अन्य than the चिकना coated breeds, जिससे have था खूब स्थापित, पृथक प्रजनन लाइनों लिये अलग रंग.
State schools ( also known as public schools or government schools ) generally refer to primary or secondary schools mandated लिये or offered to सब children बगैर चार्ज सशुल्क लिये, in पूरे or in भाग, by taxation.
The term may भी refer to संस्थानों of post-secondary शिक्षा वित्तपोषित, in पूरे or in part, and overseen by government.
The ribosome assembles polymeric प्रोटीन अणुओं जिनकी अनुक्रम is नियंत्रित by the sequence of messenger RNA molecules.
इस is जरूरी by all living cells and associated viruses.
The ribosome ( इससे ribonucleic एसिड और the यूनानी सोम, अर्थ `` देह '' ) is a विशाल और complex molecular machine, found within all living cells, that serves as the primary site of biological protein synthesis ( translation ).
Ribosomes link amino acids together in the अनुक्रम निर्दिष्ट by मेसेंजर rna ( mRNA ) molecules.
Ribosomes consist of two major subunits—the small ribosomal subunit reads the mrna, जबकि the विशाल subunit joins अमीनो acids to form a polypeptide chain.
Each subunit is रचित of एक or अधिक ribosomal rna ( rrna ) molecules and a variety of proteins.
The sequence of डीएनए एन्कोडिंग लिये a प्रोटीन may be कॉपी अनेक टाइम्स into मेसेंजर rna ( mRNA ) chains of a similar sequence.
Ribosomes can bind to an mRNA chain और उपयोग it as a टेम्पलेट लिये determining the सही अनुक्रम of अमीनो acids in a particular protein.
Amino acids are selected, collected and carried to the राइबोसोम by ट्रांसफ़र rna ( trna अणुओं ), जिससे enter one part of the ribosome and bind to the messenger RNA chain.
The attached अमीनो acids हैं तब linked साथ by another part of the ribosome.
Once the protein is produced, it can then 'fold ' to produce a विशिष्ट कार्यात्मक three-dimensional ढांचा.
A ribosome is made from complexes of RNAs and proteins और is इसलिए a ribonucleoprotein.
Each राइबोसोम is विभाजित into दो subunits : the छोटी subunit binds to the mRNA pattern, while the larger subunit binds to the tRNA and the amino acids.
When a ribosome finishes पढना an mrna अणु, these two subunits split apart.
ribosomes हैं ribozymes, क्युकी the catalytic peptidyl transferase activity that links amino acids together is performed by the ribosomal RNA.
ribosomes इससे जीवाणु, आर्किया और eukaryotes ( the तीन domains of life on Earth ) differ in their size, sequence, structure, and the ratio of protein to RNA.
The differences in structure allow some antibiotics to kill जीवाणु by inhibiting उनके ribosomes, जबकि leaving इंसान ribosomes unaffected.
In bacteria and archaea, more than one ribosome may move साथ a सिंगल mrna कड़ी at एक समय, प्रत्येक `` reading '' its sequence and producing a corresponding protein molecule.
The ribosomes in the mitochondria of eukaryotic कोशिकाएं functionally resemble अनेक सुविधाएँ of those in जीवाणु, reflecting the likely evolutionary origin of mitochondria.
Albert Claude, Christian de Duve, and George Emil palade यहूद jointly awarded the नोबेल पुरस्कार in physiology or आयुर्विज्ञान, in 1974, लिये the डिस्कवरी of the ribosomes.
The Nobel Prize in Chemistry 2009 was awarded to venkatraman रामकृष्णन, थामस A. steitz और एडीए E. yonath लिये determining the detailed structure and mechanism of the ribosome.
The सरलीकृत आतंरिक structure of a chloroplast
Overview of the calvin साईकिल और carbon fixation
The light-independent reactions of photosynthesis are chemical reactions कि बदलें कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड और अन्य यौगिकों into glucose.
These reactions occur in the stroma, the fluid-filled क्षेत्रफल of a हरितलवक बाहर of the thylakoid membranes.
These reactions take the light-dependent प्रतिक्रियाएँ और perform further chemical processes on them.
There are three phases to the light-independent reactions, collectively called the Calvin साईकिल : कार्बन fixation, कटौती प्रतिक्रियाएँ, और ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration.
Despite इसके नाम, इस प्रक्रम occurs तभी when light is available.
Plants do नहीं carry आउट the Calvin cycle by night.
They, बजाय, रिलीज sucrose into the phloem from their starch reserves.
This process happens when light is available independent of the kind of photosynthesis ( C3 carbon fixation, C4 carbon fixation, और crassulacean एसिड चयापचय ) ; कैम पौधे स्टोर malic एसिड in उनके vacuoles प्रत्येक रात्रि और रिलीज it by दिन in अनुक्रम to मेक इस प्रक्रम कार्य.
In mathematics, a square number or perfect वर्गाकार is an पूर्णांक कि is the वर्गाकार of an integer ; in other words, it is the product of some integer with itself.
For example, 9 is a square क्रमांक, चूंकि it can be लिखा as.
The usual notation for the formula for the square of a number is not the उत्पाद, लकिन the समतुल्य घातांक, प्रायः सुनाया as `` squared ''.
The name square क्रमांक आता इससे the नाम of the shape ; see below.
Square numbers are non-negative.
Another way of saying that a ( non-negative ) क्रमांक is a वर्गाकार क्रमांक, is कि इसके square roots are again integers.
For example, = ±3, so 9 is a वर्गाकार क्रमांक.
A positive integer that has no perfect square divisors मगर 1 is पुकारा square-free.
For a non-negative पूर्णांक, the th वर्गाकार क्रमांक is, with being the zeroth square.
The concept of square can be विस्तारित to कुछ अन्य क्रमांक systems.
If rational numbers are included, then a square is the ratio of two square integers, and, conversely, the ratio of two square integers is a वर्गाकार ( e.g., 4/9 = ( 2/3 ) 2 ).
starting साथ 1, वहीँ हैं वर्गाकार संख्याएँ up to और सहित, जहाँ the अभिव्यक्ति represents the floor of the number.
The Era of Good Feelings marked a period in the political इतिहास of the संयुक्त राज्य कि reflected a भाव of नेशनल purpose और a ख्वाहिश लिये एकता among अमेरिकी in the aftermath of the Napoleonic Wars.
The era saw the collapse of the Federalist Party और an समाप्त to the कड़वा दलगत विवादों between it और the प्रबल democratic-republican party during the First Party System.
President James Monroe endeavored to downplay partisan affiliation in making his nominations, with the परम लक्ष्य of नेशनल एकता और eliminating पार्टियों altogether इससे नेशनल राजनीती.
The काल is so closely संबद्ध साथ मुनरो 's प्रेसिडेंसी ( 1817–1825 ) and his administrative goals that his name and the era are virtually synonymous.
The Era of Good जज्बात चिह्नित a परिवर्तन in अमरीकी राजनीती साथ the समाप्त of the federalist Party as America began to develop after the War of 1812.
While America was experiencing growth and prosperity after the war साथ ब्रिटेन, इस era भी marks the पहला उदाहरण of आर्थिक परेशानियों in the growing संयुक्त राज्य.
Mirroring the American System proposed by Henry Clay, सुरक्षात्मक tariffs और the chartering of the दूसरी बैंको of the संयुक्त राज्य complicated the tension between the North and South with the coming of the first financial crisis.
While the term “Era of शुभ feelings” is प्रायः viewed साथ विडंबना क्युकी of the political turmoil, economic factors caused animosity between the North and South.
The designation of the period by historians as one of “good feelings” is often conveyed with irony or skepticism, as the history of the era was one in which the political atmosphere was strained और divisive, विशेषकर among गिरोहों भीतर the मुनरो प्रशासन और the रिपब्लिकन Party.
The phrase “Era of Good Feelings” was coined by Benjamin Russell, in the बोस्टन federalist समाचारपत्र, columbian centinel, on जुलाई 12, 1817, following मुनरो 's विज़िट to Boston, Massachusetts as part of his good will tour of America.
Mariel Margaret `` Mia '' Hamm ( born कूच 17, 1972 ) is a रिटायर्ड अमरीकी professional soccer player.
Hamm played अनेक सालो as a आगे लिये the संयुक्त राज्य महिलाओं 's national soccer team and was a founding member of the Washington Freedom.
Hamm scored 158 अंतरराष्ट्रीय लक्ष्य, अधिक than कोई अन्य खिलाड़ी, पुरूष or मादा, in the इतिहास of सॉकर और is the तीसरा सबसे capped मादा खिलाड़ी in soccer history behind Kristine Lilly and Christie Rampone, appearing in 275 international matches.
Hamm was named the women 's फीफा संसार खिलाड़ी of the साल the पहला दो टाइम्स कि पुरस्कार थी दिए ( in 2001 और 2002 ), और is सूचीबद्ध as one of FIFA 's 125 best living players ( as chosen by Pelé ).
She was inducted into the National Soccer Hall of कीर्ति as खूब as the अलबामा खेल हॉल of कीर्ति and Texas Sports Hall of Fame.
She is the author of Go For the Goal : A Champion 's Guide to Winning in Soccer and Life और appeared in the एचबीओ वृत्तचित्र हिम्मत to सपना : the स्टोरी of the U.S. Women 's Soccer Team.
Washington Post columnist माइकल wilbon पुकारा hamm, `` शायद the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण खिलाड़ी of the last 15 years. ''
Hamm takes a कोने kick.
The New York Red Bulls is an अमरीकी पेशेवर सॉकर टोली आधारित in हैरिसन, नई जर्सी, representing the New York metropolitan area.
The team competes in the पूर्वी सम्मेलन of प्रमुख League Soccer ( MLS ).
It is one of the ten charter clubs of mls, having competed in the लीग चूंकि its inception.
The team was a founding member of MLS ( 1996 ), but has गए through अनेक नाम परिवर्तन.
The team was originally ज्ञात as the New York/New Jersey MetroStars through 1997.
From the 1998 season through the 2005 ऋतु, the टोली थी ज्ञात as the metrostars.
On March 9, 2006, the टोली थी बेची to रेड सांड gmbh, अग्रणी to the team 's current name.
They are the only original MLS मताधिकार नहीं to have जीती कोई significant ट्रॉफी ( सहित नियमित season, playoffs, and knockout competition ) since inception.
The team 's best result in the MLS थी the mls कप फाइनल in 2008.
In the US Open Cup, the MetroStars पहुँचे तीन semifinals ( 1997, 1998, 2000 ), पहले reaching उनके पहला final in 2003, losing 1–0 to the Chicago Fire.
On अगस्त 26, 2000, the metros ' क्लिंट mathis नियत an mls रिकार्ड by स्कोरिंग five goals in a game against the Dallas Burn.
Some well-known players that have निभाई लिये the टोली शामिल giovanni savarese, टिम हावर्ड, टोनी meola, tab ramos, alexi lalas, क्लिंट mathis, jozy altidore, माइकल ब्राडली, क्लाउडियो reyna, एडी पोप, Roberto Donadoni, Lothar Matthäus, Adolfo Valencia, Youri Djorkaeff, Amado Guevara, Juan Pablo Ángel, Thierry Henry, Juninho Pernambucano, Jan Gunnar Solli, Rafael Márquez, and Tim Cahill.
The team has also था well-known कोच, सहित कार्लोस queiroz, कार्लोस अल्बर्टो parreira, बोरा Milutinović, Bob Bradley, Mo Johnston, Bruce Arena and Hans Backe.
confucianism, taoism, और buddhism हैं एक, a पेंटिंग in the litang style portraying three men laughing by a river stream, 12th century, Song Dynasty.
Estimating the number of Buddhists in the संसार, or in अनेक देशों, is मुश्किल due to definitional issues as well as practical problems of enumeration.
To begin with, the religious beliefs, practices, and identities of East Asians ( who comprise the majority of the world 's Buddhists by कोई माप ) प्रायः मिश्रण buddhism साथ अन्य परंपराओं सहित confucianism, the चाइनीज लोक धर्म, Daoism, Shinto, and Korean shamanism.
Most followers of Buddhism do not belong to structured congregations, or observe a definite ritual of adherence such as लेने शरण, बनाना it मुश्किल to accurately अनुमान the क्रमांक of practitioners.
An अतिरिक्त चुनौती is the दुश्मनी of अनेक नेशनल सरकारें ( often Communist ones such as China or North Korea ) to religion generally or to Buddhism specifically.
Government policies in these countries may encourage the under-reporting or non-reporting of धार्मिक adherence, resulting in आधिकारिक योग कि may drastically underestimate the number of religious practitioners in these countries.
अनुमान of the विश्वव्यापी बौद्ध जनसांख्यिकी दायरा इससे 350 लाख to over one billion, but cluster nearer to the first figure.
Adherents.com ( as of 2012 ) suggests a फिगर of 397 million.
By प्रमुख शाखाओं, the संख्याएँ are as follows:
( 1 ) Mahayana Buddhism, including East Asian Buddhism, with no fewer than 185 लाख adherents, और संभवतः अनेक टाइम्स कि अनेक ( again, depending on definitional issues ).
This is the predominant रूप of buddhism practiced in चीन, South Korea, Japan, Taiwan, Singapore, and Vietnam.
( 2 ) Theravada buddhism, साथ no कम than 125 million adherents.
This is the predominant form of Buddhism practiced in कंबोडिया, थाईलैंड, लाओस, श्री लंका, and Burma.
( 3 ) वज्रयान buddhism, साथ लगभग 20 million adherents.
This form predominates in the वृहद तिब्बती और Mongolian regions, as well as in the Himalayas.
Besides the independent countries of Mongolia and Bhutan, and विभिन्न territories भीतर कया is अभी पश्चिमी चीन, वज्रयान is परंपरागत to निश्चित regions of Russia ( e.g. Kalmykia, Buryatia ), India ( e.g. Ladakh, Sikkim ), and Nepal ( e.g. Khumbu ).
वज्रयान, भी ज्ञात as तिब्बती buddhism, is प्रायः conflated साथ तांत्रिक buddhism, but this is imprecise, as Shingon and other forms of East Asian Buddhism also practice tantra.
At least 7 देशों ( श्री लंका, थाईलैंड, कंबोडिया, लाओस, Burma, Bhutan, and Mongolia ) have unambiguous Buddhist majorities.
Depending on how one calculates चाइनीज और अन्य ईस्ट एशियाई adherents, इस फिगर might expand to include several more countries.
In addition, Buddhism is the state religion of Cambodia and भूटान, और receives prominent जिक्र in the constitutions of थाईलैंड and Sri Lanka.
In उत्तरी इण्डिया और नेपाल, the जमीन जहाँ buddhism थी born, the धर्म severely declined during the first millennium.
Whether इस मनाही थी due to the इस्लामी conquest of उत्तरी इण्डिया, or to other factors, remains controversial.
See the आलेख मनाही of buddhism in India.
James Butler Hickok ( May 27, 1837 – August 2, 1876 ), बेहतर ज्ञात as जंगली विधेयक hickok, थी a लोक hero of the American Old West.
His skills as a gunfighter and scout, along with his reputation as a lawman, provided the आधार लिये उसके कीर्ति, हालांकि कुछ of उसके reported कारनामे हैं fictionalized.
Born and raised on a farm in rural Illinois, Hickok गई वेस्ट at आयु 18 as a भगोड़े इससे इंसाफ, पहला working as a stagecoach ड्राइवर, पहले he became a lawman in the frontier territories of Kansas and Nebraska.
He लड़ा लिये the संघ फौज दौरान the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध, और gained publicity after the war as a scout, marksman, actor, and professional gambler.
Between his law-enforcement duties and gambling, which easily overlapped, hickok थी शामिल in अनेक notable shootouts.
He was shot and killed while playing पोकर in the nuttal & मन 's सैलून in deadwood, Dakota Territory ( now South Dakota ).
Artist 's conception of the Curiosity rover vaporizing चट्टान on मंगल.
The rover landed on मंगल in अगस्त 2012.
A Mars रोवर is an स्वचालित मोटर गाडी जिससे propels itself across the surface of the planet Mars after landing.
Rovers have several लाभ over stationary landers : वे जाँचें अधिक territory, वे can be निर्देशित to दिलचस्प सुविधाएँ, वे can प्लेस themselves in sunny positions to weather winter months and they can advance the knowledge of how to perform very remote robotic vehicle control.
वहीँ have महरूम चार कामयाब robotically operated Mars rovers.
The Jet Propulsion Laboratory प्रबंधित the मंगल pathfinder मिशन और इसके अभी निष्क्रिय Sojourner rover.
It फिलहाल manages the मंगल खोजी रोवर मिशन 's क्रियाशील अवसर rover and inactive Spirit, and, as part of the Mars Science Laboratory mission, the Curiosity rover.
A वित्तीय ऑडिट, or अधिक accurately, an ऑडिट of वित्तीय statements, is the verification of the financial statements of a legal entity, with a view to express an audit opinion.
The audit opinion is intended to provide उचित परख, लकिन नहीं निरपेक्ष परख, कि the वित्तीय कथन हैं प्रस्तुत fairly, in all material respects, and/or give a true and fair view in accordance with the financial reporting framework.
The purpose of an ऑडिट is provide और उद्देश्य स्वतंत्र परिक्षा of the वित्तीय कथन, जिससे increases the मान और विश्वसनीयता of the वित्तीय कथन उत्पादित by management, thus increase user confidence in the financial statement, reduce investor risk and consequently reduce the cost of capital of the preparer of the financial statements.
Financial audits are typically performed by firms of practicing लेखपाल जो हैं विशेषज्ञ in वित्तीय रिपोर्टिंग.
The financial audit is one of अनेक परख कृत्यों provided by accounting firms.
Many organizations separately employ or hire आतंरिक auditors, जो do नहीं attest to वित्तीय रिपोर्ट्स लकिन फ़ोकस मुख्यतः on the internal controls of the organization.
External auditors may choose to place सीमित रिलायंस on the कार्य of आतंरिक auditors.
Auditing promotes transparency and accuracy in the financial disclosures बना by an संगठन, इसलिए होता संभावित to reduce of ऐसे corporations to conceal unscrupulous dealings.
Internationally, the International Standards on Auditing ( ISA ) जारी by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय auditing और परख मानकों फलक ( iaasb ) is माना as the benchmark for audit process.
Almost all jurisdictions आवश्यकता auditors to follow the isa or a लोकल विभिन्नता of the ISA.
Dollar coins have been minted in the संयुक्त राज्य in सुनहरा, चांदी, and base metal versions.
The term silver dollar is often used for any large white metal coin issued by the United States साथ a फेस मान of एक डालर, हालांकि purists जिद कि a डालर is नहीं चांदी unless it contains some of that metal.
Silver डॉलर, the पहला डालर सिक्का समस्या, were minted beginning in 1794.
सुनहरा डॉलर और gold-colored डॉलर have also been produced by the United States.
The Sacagawea and अध्यक्षीय डॉलर हैं प्रायः referred to as `` golden dollars ''.
In modern टाइम्स, डालर सिक्के have नहीं been very popular in the United States.
Despite efforts by the government to प्रचार उनके उपयोग, सबसे अमेरिकी फिलहाल उपयोग the एक डालर विधेयक बल्कि than dollar coins.
In straight and level flight लिफ्ट ( l ) बराबरी वज़न ( w ).
in a banked फेरे of 60°, लिफ्ट equals double the weight ( L=2W ).
The पायलट अनुभवों 2g और a doubled weight.
The steeper the bank, the वृहद the g-forces.
This top-fuel dragster can accelerate इससे शून्य to in 0.86 seconds.
This is a horizontal acceleration of 5.3 g. Combined with the vertical g-force in the stationary मामला the pythagorean प्रमेय yields a g force of 5.4 g.
g-force ( साथ g इससे गुरुत्वाकर्षक ) is a पद for accelerations felt as weight and measurable by accelerometers.
it is नहीं a फ़ोर्स, प्रति se, but a force per unit mass.
Since such a force is perceived as a weight, any g-force can be वर्णित as a `` वज़न प्रति ईकाई द्रव्यमान '' ( देखिए the पर्याय विशिष्ट weight ).
The g-force acceleration acts as a multiplier of weight-like forces for every unit of an object 's mass, and ( save for certain electromagnetic force प्रभाव ) is the कारण of an ऑब्जेक्ट 's त्वरण in संबंध to free-fall.
This त्वरण अनुभवी by an ऑब्जेक्ट is due to the vector sum of non-gravitational forces acting on an object free to move.
The accelerations that are not produced by gravity are termed उचित accelerations, और it is तभी ये कि हैं measured in g-force इकाई.
वे कारण तनावों और strains on objects.
क्युकी of ये strains, विशाल g-forces may be destructive.
Gravitation acting alone does not उपज a g-force, भी हालांकि g-forces हैं expressed in multiples of the acceleration of a standard gravity.
यूँ, the मानक गुरुत्वाकर्षक त्वरण at the धरती 's सतह produces g-force तभी indirectly, as a result of resistance to it by mechanical forces.
The 1 g-force on an object sitting on the Earth 's surface is caused by mechanical फ़ोर्स exerted in the upward दिशा by the मैदान, keeping the ऑब्जेक्ट from going into free-fall.
The upward फ़ोर्स इससे the मैदान ensures कि an ऑब्जेक्ट at बाकी on the धरती 's सतह is accelerating relative to the free-fall condition, which is the path that the object would follow when falling freely toward the Earth 's center.
Objects allowed to free-fall in an inertial trajectory अंतर्गत the influence of gravitation-only, महसूस no g-force.
This is demonstrated by the `` zero-g '' conditions inside a freely falling लिफ्ट गिरना toward the धरती 's बीच ( in वैक्यूम ), or ( to शुभ सन्निकटन ) conditions inside a spacecraft in Earth orbit.
These are examples of coordinate acceleration ( a change in velocity ) बगैर a सनसनी of weight.
The experience of no g-force ( zero-g ), however it is उत्पादित, is synonymous साथ weightlessness.
In the absence of gravitational fields, or in दिशानिर्देश at सही कोण to उन्हें, उचित और निर्देशांक accelerations हैं the same, and any coordinate acceleration must be produced by a corresponding g-force acceleration.
An example here is a rocket in free space, in जिससे सरल परिवर्तन in गति हैं उत्पादित by the engines, and produce g-forces on the rocket and passengers.
An augur holding a lituus, the curved wand प्रायः प्रयुक्त as a प्रतीक of augury on Roman coins
The augur was a priest and आधिकारिक in the शास्त्रीय संसार, विशेषकर प्राचीन रोम और etruria.
His main role was to interpret the will of the देवताओं by अध्ययन the उड़ान of पक्षियों : whether वे हैं उड़ती in समूह or अलोन, what noises they make as they fly, direction of flight and what kind of birds they are.
This was known as `` लेने the auspices. ''
The ceremony और फलन of the augur थी सेंट्रल to कोई प्रमुख undertaking in रोमन society—public or private—including matters of war, commerce, and religion.
The Roman historian Livy stresses the importance of the augurs : `` जो करता नहीं जान कि इस नगर थी संस्थापित तभी बाद लेने the auspices, कि सबकुछ in युद्ध and in peace, at home and abroad, was done only after taking the auspices ? ''
Farmington पहाड़ियाँ is an affluent जातियाँ in southeastern Michigan.
It is the दूसरी largest नगर in ओकलैंड काउंटी in the U.S. state of Michigan.
Its population थी 79,740 at the 2010 census.
It is part of the upscale northwestern उपनगरों of महानगर Detroit and is also northeast of downtown Ann Arbor.
Farmington Hills consistently बाँधने as एक of the safest शहरों in the संयुक्त राज्य, as well as in the state of Michigan.
In 2010, the area ranked as the 30th safest नगर in अमेरिका.
Although the two शहरों have पृथक सेवाएं और पता, farmington और farmington पहाड़ियाँ हैं often thought of as the same community.
Features of the community include a recently renovated downtown, boutiques, a विंटेज सिनेमा, numerous रेस्तरां, exotic car dealerships, आर्ट गैलरी, और पब्लिक parks including Heritage Park.
There are several historical sites including the longacre हाउस और the राज्यपाल warner Mansion.
दोनो शहरों हैं परोसा by Farmington Public Schools.
Farmington Hills serves as a major business बीच लिये the वृहद डेट्रॉयट क्षेत्रफल.
present-day छाप of a Late Bronze Age seal
Town seal ( मेट्रिक्स ) of Náchod from 1570
a मुहर is a यंत्र लिये बनाना an छाप in मोम, मिट्टी, पेपर, or कुछ अन्य मीडियम, including an embossment on paper, and is also the impression thus made.
The original purpose was to authenticate a दस्तावेज़, a wrapper लिये एक ऐसे as a आधुनिक लिफाफा, or the कवर of a संग्राहक or package holding valuables or other objects.
The sealing process is essentially कि of a सांचे, साथ the फाइनल चित्र represented on the यंत्र लिये बनाना the impression by a mirror-image design, incised in sunken- ( or counter- ) relief or intaglio.
The seal-making device is also referred to as the मुहर मेट्रिक्स or die ; the imprint it creates as the मुहर छाप ( or, more rarely, the sealing ).
If the impression is made purely as a relief resulting इससे the वृहद दबाव on the पेपर जहाँ the ऊँची भाग of the matrix touch, the seal is known as a dry seal ; in all other cases a liquid or liquified medium ( such as ink or wax ) is used, usually in another color than the paper.
For legal purposes, the definition of a seal may be extended to include rubber stamps, or लिखने निर्दिष्ट शब्द ( `` मुहर '' or `` L.S. `` ).
In the United राज्य, the शब्द `` मुहर '' is sometimes assigned to a facsimile of the seal design ( in monochrome or color ), which may be used in a variety of contexts including architectural settings, on flags, or on official letterheads.
Thus, for example, the Great Seal of the United States, among अन्य उपयोग, appears on the रिवर्स of the one-dollar विधेयक ; और अनेक of the seals of the U.S. states appear on their respective state flags.
In Europe, although coats of arms and heraldic badges may well feature in ऐसे contexts as खूब as on seals, the मुहर डिज़ाइन in इसके entirety rarely appears as an emblem.
The study of seals is known as sigillography or sphragistics.
Groundhog Day ( पेन्सिलवेनिया जर्मनी : grundsaudaag, murmeltiertag ) is a day celebrated on February 2.
According to folklore, if it is cloudy when a groundhog emerges from its burrow on this day, then spring will come early ; if it is sunny, the groundhog होगा माना देखिए इसके छाया और रिट्रीट वापस into इसके burrow, और the शीत मौसम होगा continue for six more weeks.
Modern customs of the holiday involve celebrations where early morning festivals are held to देखें the groundhog उभरते इससे इसके burrow.
In southeastern Pennsylvania, Groundhog Lodges ( Grundsow Lodges ) celebrate the holiday साथ fersommlinge, सोशल कार्यक्रम in जिससे खाना is परोसा, भाषणों हैं बना, और one or more g'spiel ( plays or skits ) are performed for entertainment.
The Pennsylvania German dialect is the only language spoken at the event, and those who speak अंग्रेज़ी अदा a दंड, प्रायः in the रूप of a निकल, dime, or क्वार्टर प्रति शब्द बोला, साथ the money put into a bowl in the center of the table.
The largest groundhog दिन जश्न is held in Punxsutawney, Pennsylvania.
Groundhog Day, already a widely recognized and popular tradition, received widespread attention as a result of the 1993 film Groundhog Day, which was set in punxsutawney, pa ( हालांकि फिल्माया primarily in वुडस्टॉक, il ) और portrayed punxsutawney Phil.
High resolution चित्र of tampa खाड़ी प्रदेश
The Tampa Bay area has a humid subtropical जलवायु ( koppen cfa ), साथ गरम और आर्द्र ग्रीष्म साथ बारंबार thunderstorms और drier सर्दियों with freezing temperatures occurring every 2–3 years.
The area अनुभवों a significant गर्मियाँ गीला ऋतु, as nearly two-thirds of the सालाना precipitation falls in the months of June through September.
The area is listed by the United राज्य विभाग of कृषि ( यूएसडीए ) as होने in hardiness मण्डल 10, जिससे is about the northern limit of where coconut palms and royal palms can be grown.
Highs प्रायः दायरा between 65 and 95 °F ( 18 and 35 °C ) year round.
Though known for hot summers, tampa 's आधिकारिक ऊँची रै never पहुँचे 100 °f ( 38 °c ) – the city 's all-time record temperature is 99 °F ( 37 °C ).
St. Petersburg 's all-time रिकार्ड ऊँची is exactly 100 °F ( 38 °C ).
Pinellas County lies on a peninsula between Tampa Bay and the Gulf of Mexico, and much of the नगर of tampa झूठ on a छोटी peninsula jutting out into Tampa Bay.
This proximity to large लाशें of जल दोनो नरमपंथियों temperatures और introduces large amounts of humidity into the atmosphere.
In general, the local communities farthest from the coast have larger तापमान सीमाएँ, दोनो दौरान a सिंगल दिन और throughout the seasons of the year.
A diagram of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम, प्रर्दशित विभिन्न गुण आरपार the दायरा of बारंबारता and wavelengths
the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम is the दायरा of all possible frequencies of electromagnetic radiation.
The `` electromagnetic spectrum '' of an object has a different meaning, and is instead the characteristic वितरण of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण उत्सर्जित or अवशोषित by that particular object.
The electromagnetic spectrum extends इससे नीचे the कम बारंबारता प्रयुक्त लिये आधुनिक रेडियो संचार to गामा विकिरण at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) end, thereby covering wavelengths from thousands of kilometers down to a fraction of the size of an atom.
The limit for long wavelengths is the आकार of the ब्रह्मांड itself, जबकि it is thought that the short wavelength limit is in the vicinity of the Planck length, although in principle the spectrum is infinite and continuous.
Most parts of the electromagnetic spectrum are used in science for spectroscopic और अन्य probing interactions, as ways to study and characterize matter.
In addition, radiation from various parts of the वर्णक्रम रै मिला अनेक अन्य उपयोग लिये संचार और निर्माण ( देखिए इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण लिये अधिक अनुप्रयोग ).
लेजेंड
Franklin Delano Roosevelt ( or ; January 30, 1882 – April 12, 1945 ), भी ज्ञात by उसके आद्याक्षर, fdr, थी the 32nd अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1933–1945 ) और a सेंट्रल फिगर in संसार कार्यक्रम during the mid-20th century, leading the United States during a time of worldwide economic depression and total war.
A dominant leader of the Democratic Party and the only American president elected to more than two terms, he built a नई सौदे गठबन्धन कि realigned अमरीकी राजनीती बाद 1932, as उसके घरेलू नीतियों पारिभाषित अमरीकी उदारतावाद for the middle third of the 20th century.
With the bouncy popular song `` Happy Days Are Here Again `` as his campaign theme, FDR defeated लाज़िम रिपब्लिकन हर्बर्ट हूवर in नवम्बर 1932, at the गहराई of the ग्रेट अवसाद.
Energized by his personal victory over polio, fdr 's unfailing आशावाद और सक्रियता contributed to a नवीकरण of the national spirit.
He worked closely साथ अंग्रेजों प्रधान मंत्री विंस्टन चर्चिल और सोवियत सामान्य सचिव जोसेफ स्टालिन in leading the Allies against Germany and Japan in World War II, and restoring prosperity to the nation 's economy.
In his first hundred days in office, which began कूच 4, 1933, रूज़वेल्ट पथप्रदर्शन प्रमुख विधान और जारी a profusion of कार्यपालिका आदेश कि instituted the New Deal —a variety of programs designed to produce relief ( government jobs for the unemployed ), recovery ( economic growth ), and reform ( through regulation of Wall Street, banks and transportation ).
The economy improved rapidly from 1933 to 1937, लकिन तब relapsed into a गहन recession.
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937 prevented his packing the Supreme Court or passing कोई considerable विधान ; it abolished अनेक of the राहत कार्यक्रम जब बेरोजगारी diminished during World War II.
सबसे of the regulations on कारोबार यहूद ended परिचय 1975–85, except for the regulation of Wall Street by the Securities and Exchange Commission, which still exists.
Along with several smaller programs, major surviving programs include the Federal Deposit Insurance निगम, जिससे थी निर्मित in 1933, और सोशल सुरक्षा, जिससे Congress passed in 1935.
As World War II loomed after 1938, with the Japanese invasion of China and the aggression of Nazi Germany, FDR दिया दमदार राजनयिक और वित्तीय support to चीन और ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, जबकि बाकी officially neutral.
His goal was to make America the `` Arsenal of लोकतंत्र `` जिससे होता सप्लाई munitions to the Allies.
In March 1941, Roosevelt, with congressional स्वीकृति, provided lend-lease सहायता to the देशों fighting against Nazi Germany with Britain.
With very strong national support, he made war on जापानी और जर्मनी बाद the जापानी आक्रमण on पर्ल हार्बर on दिसम्बर 7, 1941, कॉलिंग it a `` date which will live in infamy ``.
He पर्यवेक्षित the mobilization of the U.S. economy to support the Allied war effort.
As an active military leader, Roosevelt implemented an overall war strategy on two fronts कि ended in the शिकस्त of the अक्ष शक्तियां और the विकास of the संसार 's पहला अणु बमबारी.
In 1942 रूज़वेल्ट ordered the internment of 100,000 Japanese American civilians.
Unemployment dropped to 2 %, relief programs largely ended, and the industrial economy grew rapidly to new heights as लाखो of लोगों स्थानांतरित to नई कार्य in युद्ध centers, और 16 लाख मेन और 300,000 महिलाओं यहूद drafted or volunteered for military service.
Roosevelt dominated the American political scene not only during the बारह सालो of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी, लकिन भी लिये दशकों afterward.
He orchestrated the realignment of मतदाता कि निर्मित the Fifth Party System.
fdr 's नई सौदे गठबन्धन संयुक्त मजदूर संघ, big city machines, white ethnics, African Americans and rural white Southerners.
He also influenced the बाद सृष्टि of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र और bretton Woods.
Roosevelt is consistently रेटेड by विद्वानों as एक of the शीर्ष तीन u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों, along with Abraham Lincoln and George Washington.
A liberal Democrat, Roosevelt defined his वैचारिक स्थिति as `` a छोटी बाएँ of center. ''
A Joint Committee is a term in politics that is used to refer to a कमेटी बना up of सदस्यों of दोनो कक्षों of a bicameral विधानमंडल.
in अन्य contexts, it refers to a कमेटी साथ सदस्यों from more than one organization.
The regulation of prostitution in the United States is not among the enumerated powers of the federal government ; Under the Tenth Amendment to the United States Constitution, it is therefore exclusively the domain of the राज्य to परमिट, prohibit, or वरना विनियमित वाणिज्यिक sex, मगर insofar as कॉंग्रेस may विनियमित it as भाग of अंतरराज्यीय कॉमर्स साथ कानून जैसे the मन Act.
In most states, वेश्यावृति is माना a misdemeanor in the श्रेणी of पब्लिक अनुक्रम crime, a crime that disrupts the order of a community.
It was at one time माना to be a vagrancy crime.
फिलहाल, नेवाडा is the तभी राज्य to allow वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति, the terms of which are stipulated in the Nevada Revised Statutes.
Only 8 काउंटी currently contain active brothels.
All forms of वेश्यावृति हैं illegal in क्लार्क काउंटी ( जिससे contains the लास vegas–paradise महानगर area ), Washoe County ( which contains Reno ), Carson City, Douglas County, and Lincoln County.
The अन्य काउंटी theoretically allow वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति, but some of these counties currently have no active brothels.
Street prostitution, `` pandering, '' and living off of the proceeds of a वेश्या remain illegal अंतर्गत नेवाडा विधि, as elsewhere in the देश.
As with other देशों, वेश्यावृति in the संयुक्त राज्य can be विभाजित into three broad categories : street prostitution, brothel prostitution, and escort prostitution.
The national flag of the United States of America, often simply referred to as the अमरीकी ध्वज, consists of तेरह बराबर आड़ा धारियाँ of रेड ( शीर्ष और नीचे ) प्रत्यावर्ती साथ श्वेत, साथ a ब्लू आयताकार in the कैण्टन ( referred to specifically as the `` union '' ) bearing fifty small, white, five-pointed stars arranged in nine offset horizontal rows of six stars ( top and bottom ) alternating with rows of five stars.
The 50 stars on the flag represent the 50 राज्य of the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका और the 13 धारियाँ represent the तेरह अंग्रेजों colonies that declared independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain and became the first states in the Union.
Nicknames for the flag include the `` सितारों और धारियाँ '', `` बूढ़ा महिमा ``, and `` The Star-Spangled Banner. ''
India is a federal union of states comprising twenty-eight राज्य और सात संघ territories.
The states and territories हैं further subdivided into जिले और so on.
congressional जिले लिये the 113th United States Congress
2010 जनसांख्यिकी change:
Change in apportionment of congressional जिले, starting in 2013, as a परिणाम of the 2010 census.
2000 जनसांख्यिकी change:
बदलें in apportionment of congressional districts, from 2003 to 2013, as a result of the 2000 census.
This is a complete list of congressional जिले लिये प्रतिनिधित्व in the संयुक्त States House of Representatives.
The quantity ( apportionment ) और सीमाएँ ( redistricting ) of जिले हैं संकल्पित बाद प्रत्येक जनसांख्यिकी, although in some cases states have changed the boundaries more than once per census.
This list शामिल the 435 वर्तमान और over 200 obsolete districts.
For example, since the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी, नेब्रास्का रै था तीन जिले, लकिन it प्रयुक्त to have as अनेक as six.
In the first decade of the twenty-first century, Texas had 32 जिले, लकिन रै चूंकि added चार due to reapportionment as a result of the 2010 census.
अन्य राज्य have खोया जिले चूंकि the क्रमांक of congressional seats has been set at 435 by statute.
Also शामिल यहाँ हैं non-voting delegations : six current and four obsolete.
The boundaries of जिले प्रायः शिफ़्ट साथ each redistricting.
Over time, the region and जनसांख्यिकी represented in a ज़िला can बदलें substantially.
Furthermore, districts sometimes retain the वही सीमाएँ जबकि बदलना उनके ज़िला संख्याएँ.
Mariah Carey ( born March 27, 1970 ) is an American singer, songwriter, रिकार्ड निर्माता, अभिनेत्री, और लोकसेवक.
Under the guidance of Columbia Records executive Tommy mottola, कैरी released उसके self-titled डेब्यू स्टुडियो एल्बम mariah कैरी in 1990 ; it गई multi-platinum और शाखित four consecutive number one singles on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 chart.
following उसके विवाह to mottola in 1993 और कामयाबी साथ hit रिकॉर्ड भाव ( 1991 ), Music Box ( 1993 ), and Merry Christmas ( 1994 ), Carey was established as Columbia 's highest-selling act.
Daydream ( 1995 ) made music history when its second single `` एक मीठी दिन ``, a duet साथ बॉयज ii मेन, खर्च a रिकार्ड सोलह सप्ताह on शीर्ष of the बिलबोर्ड hot 100, और remains the longest-running number-one song in U.S. chart history.
During the recording of the album, Carey began to deviate from उसके r & b और पॉप beginnings और धीरे traversed into hip hop.
This musical change became evident with the रिलीज of तितली ( 1997 ), at जिससे समय कैरी था अलग इससे mottola.
Carey left Columbia in 2000, and signed a record-breaking $ 100 लाख रिकॉर्डिंग contract with Virgin Records.
पहले the रिलीज of उसके पहला विशेषता फिल्मी glitter ( 2001 ), she suffered a physical and emotional breakdown and was hospitalized for severe exhaustion.
Following the film 's poor reception, she was bought out of her recording contract for $ 50 लाख, जिससे led to a मनाही in उसके करियर.
वो हस्ताक्षरित a multi-million डालर अनुबंध सौदे साथ द्वीप रिकॉर्ड in 2002, और बाद an unsuccessful period, returned to the top of music charts with The Emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ).
Its second single `` We Belong Together `` became उसके सबसे कामयाब सिंगल of the 2000s, और थी बाद नामित `` सोंग of the दशक '' by Billboard.
Carey once again ventured into film with a well-received starring भूमिका in ( 2009 ) ; वो थी awarded the `` भेदन प्रदर्शन पुरस्कार '' at the ताड़ स्रोतों अंतरराष्ट्रीय फिल्मी Festival, and Black Reel and NAACP Image Award nominations.
In a career spanning over two decades, Carey has sold more than 200 million रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी, बनाना उसके एक of the best-selling म्यूज़िक कलाकारों of all time.
In 1998, she was honored as the world 's best-selling रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार of the 1990s at the संसार म्यूज़िक Awards.
Carey was also named the best-selling मादा कलाकार of the millennium in 2000.
According to the रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग संघ of अमेरिका, she is the third best-selling female artist in the United States, with 63.5 million certified albums.
With the release of `` Touch My Body `` ( 2008 ), कैरी gained उसके eighteenth क्रमांक एक सिंगल in the संयुक्त States, more than any other solo artist.
In 2012, Carey was ranked second on vh1 's सूची of the `` 100 महानतम महिलाओं in Music ''.
Aside from her वाणिज्यिक accomplishments, कैरी रै जीती पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, 17 संसार Music Awards, 11 American Music Awards, and 31 Billboard Music Awards.
Referred to as the `` songbird परम् '' by the गिनीज संसार रिकॉर्ड, वो is famed for her five-octave vocal range, power, melismatic style and signature use of the whistle register.
Stratocumulus stratiformis cumulogenitus
In meteorology, a cloud is a visible mass of द्रव droplets or frozen crystals बना of जल or various chemicals suspended in the atmosphere above the surface of a planetary body.
These suspended particles हैं भी ज्ञात as aerosols.
बादल in धरती 's माहौल हैं पढ़ाई in the cloud physics branch of meteorology.
Two processes, संभवतः एक्टिंग साथ, can सीसे to एयर बनने संतृप्त ; cooling the air or adding water vapor to the air.
In general, precipitation will fall to the surface ; an एक्सेप्शन is virga, जिससे evaporates पहले reaching the सतह.
The international cloud classification system is based on the fact clouds in their सबसे मौलिक फ़ॉर्म can दिखाएँ free-convective upward विकास जैसे कपासी, appear in non-convective परतदार चादरें ऐसे as stratus, or take the form of thin fibrous wisps, as in the case of cirrus.
Prefixes are used in कनेक्शन साथ बादल to एक्स्प्रेस विसंगतियाँ or complexities in ये मौलिक फ़ॉर्म or to specify middle or high altitude ranges.
These include strato- for low clouds with limited convection that form mostly in uneven layers, cumulo- for complex highly-convective storm clouds, nimbo- for thick layered बादल of कुछ जटिलता कि can उपज मॉडरेट to भारी वर्षण, alto- लिये मध्य बादल, और cirro- लिये ऊँची बादल ; the latter two of which may be of simple or moderately complex structure.
Whether or not a cloud is low, middle, or ऊँची स्तर depends on कैसा दूर ऊपर the मैदान its base forms.
Cloud types with significant vertical extent can form in the low or middle ऊँचाई सीमाएँ depending on the नमी सामग्री of the air.
Clouds in the troposphere have लैटिन names due to the लोकप्रिय अनुकूलन of ल्यूक हावर्ड 's बादल categorization system, which began to spread in popularity during December 1802.
Synoptic surface weather observations use code numbers to record and report the types of tropospheric cloud दृश्य at प्रत्येक अनुसूचित अवलोकन समय आधारित on the ऊँचाई and physical appearance of the clouds.
While a majority of clouds form in Earth 's क्षोभमण्डल, वहीँ हैं अवसरों जब बादल in the stratosphere and mesosphere can be observed.
These three main layers of the atmosphere where बादल may be देखी हैं collectively known as the homosphere.
Above this lies the thermosphere और exosphere, जिससे साथ मेक up the heterosphere that marks the transition to outer space.
Clouds have been observed on other planets and moons भीतर the सौर प्रणाली, लकिन, due to उनके अलग तापमान विशेषताएँ, वे हैं रचित of अन्य substances such as methane, ammonia, and sulfuric acid.
galveston काउंटी is a काउंटी स्तिथ in the u.S. राज्य of Texas within the Houston–Sugar Land–Baytown metropolitan area.
As of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी, the जनसांख्यिकी was 291,309.
Its county seat is galveston.
League City is the largest नगर in galveston काउंटी in शर्तें of जनसांख्यिकी ; url_http between 2000 और 2005 it surpassed Galveston as the county 's largest city.
galveston काउंटी थी संस्थापित in 1838.
nassau
Freeport, बहामा
This is a सूची of शहरों in the बहामा.
The following तालिका सूचियाँ the नगर or कस्बा नाम, the भौगोलिक निर्देशांक, the population as of the 1990 census, an estimate of the population as of 2009, and the island name.
The Big Ten Conference, formerly Western Conference and Big Nine सम्मेलन, is the oldest प्रभाग i कॉलेज एथलेटिक सम्मेलन in the United States.
Its twelve member institutions ( which are primarily flagship research universities in their respective राज्य, well-regarded academically, और साथ अपेक्षाकृत विशाल छात्र नामांकन ) हैं स्तिथ primarily in the मिडवेस्ट, stretching from Nebraska in the west to Penn State in the east.
The conference competes in the NCAA 's Division I ; its football teams compete in the Football Bowl Subdivision ( FBS ), formerly ज्ञात as प्रभाग i-a, the उच्चतम स्तर of ncaa प्रतियोगिता in कि खेल.
सदस्य स्कूलों of the बिग टेन ( or, in दो मामले, उनके जनक विश्वविद्यालयों प्रणालियों ) भी are members of the Committee on Institutional Cooperation, a leading educational and research consortium.
Despite the conference 's name, the Big Ten actually consists of 12 schools, following the जोड of the पेन्सिलवेनिया राज्य University in 1993 and the University of Nebraska–Lincoln in 2011.
In 2014, the conference will विस्तार to 14 सदस्यों साथ the परिवर्धन of the विश्वविद्यालयों of मेरीलैंड, College Park and Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey.
It is नहीं to be उलझन साथ the बिग 12 सम्मेलन, जिससे रै only ten schools and represents a different region of the country.
Single Malt Scotch is single malt whisky made in स्कॉटलैंड using a घट स्टिल आसवन प्रक्रम at a सिंगल डिस्टिलरी, साथ malted barley as the only grain ingredient.
As with any Scotch whisky, a सिंगल malt स्कॉच जरूर be आसुत in स्कॉटलैंड और matured in ओक casks in स्कॉटलैंड for at least three years ( most single malts are matured longer ).
`` malt '' indicates कि the व्हिस्की is distilled from a `` malted '' grain.
Several types of grains can be malted ( लिये उदाहरण, जौ, rye और गेहूं हैं सब दाने जिससे can be malted ) ; however, in the मामला of single malt Scotch, barley is always the only grain used.
`` Single '' indicates कि सब the malts in the बोतल come from a single distillery.
Bottlings containing malt व्हिस्की इससे अनेक distilleries हैं called `` blended malt ``.
Until the Scotch Whisky Regulations 2009 ( SWR 2009 ), the word `` blended '' only appeared ( in the context of Scotch व्हिस्की ) on बोतलों of व्हिस्की कि contained a मिश्रण of दोनो जौ और non-barley अनाज व्हिस्की, लकिन इस is no longer the case.
Under the terminology established by the SWR 2009, a `` blended malt स्कॉच व्हिस्की '' is a मिश्रण of सिंगल malt स्कॉच whiskies, नहीं a मिश्रण of malted जौ व्हिस्की और non-barley व्हिस्की ; those हैं पुकारा `` blended Scotch whisky '', without the word `` malt ''.
the पद `` blended malt '' replaced `` vatted malt '' प्रयुक्त under the prior labelling conventions.
The age statement on a बोतल of सिंगल malt स्कॉच is the number of years the whisky spent maturing in cask.
As very few whiskies are bottled इससे a सिंगल cask the आयु बयान reflects the आयु of the youngest malt in the mix.
A texture may be arranged so as to, `` closely दृष्टिकोण the single-object औकात of fused-ensemble timbres, लिये उदाहरण, the खूबसूरत 'northern लाइट्स ' chord..., in a very interesting distribution of pitches, produces a fused sound supported by a suspended cymbal roll `` ( Erickson ( 1975 ), p.166 & 168 ).
In contrast to more traditional musical textures, sound mass composition `` minimizes the importance of individual pitches in preference लिये बनावट, timbre, और डायनामिक्स as प्राथमिक shapers of भाव और प्रभाव. ''
Developed from the modernist टोन क्लस्टर और स्प्रेड to orchestral लिखने by the लेट 1950s और 1960s, sound-mass `` obscures the boundary between sound and noise `` ( Edwards 2001, pp. 326–27 ).
तकनीकों जिससे may बनाएँ or be प्रयुक्त साथ ध्वनि द्रव्यमान शामिल विस्तारित तकनीकों ऐसे as मूक पीतल or स्ट्रिंग्स, आतुर tonguing, wide vibrato, extreme ranges, and glissandos.
Composers and works include Barbara Kolb, Pauline Oliveros ' Sound Patterns for chorus ( 1961 ), Norma Beecroft 's इससे सपनो of पीतल लिये कोरस ( 1963–1964 ), और Nancy Van de Vate.
Beecroft `` blurs individual pitches in favor of a सामूहिक timbre through the उपयोग of गायन और इंस्ट्रूमेंटल क्लस्टर, choral वाक, narrator, और a धो of ध्वनि इससे an electronic tape. ''
( ibid )
A very early example is the opening of Jean-Féry Rebel 's ballet Les Elémens ( 1737–38 ), where chaos is represented by a धीरे cumulating orchestral क्लस्टर of सब सात टीप of the d नाबालिग स्केल ( henck 2004, pp. 52–54 ).
A later उदाहरण is the तीसरा गति of रुथ क्रॉफर्ड seeger 's स्ट्रिंग quartet 1931 ( Nonesuch H-71280 ) while more recently Phill Niblock 's multiple drone based music serves as an example.
The use of `` chords approaching timbres '' begins with Debussy and Edgard Varèse often carefully scored व्यक्तिगत इंस्ट्रूमेंटल भाग so कि वे होता फ्यूज into एक ensemble timbre or ध्वनि द्रव्यमान ( एरिक्सन 1975, pp. 18 and 21 ).
Other examples include European `` textural '' compositions of the fifties and sixties such as Krzysztof Penderecki 's Threnody to the Victims of Hiroshima ( 1959 ) और györgy ligeti 's works featuring micropolyphony in works जैसे atmosphères ( 1961 ) और उसके requiem ( 1963-65 ).
Other composers with works using this technique include henryk górecki, karel husa, witold lutosławski, kazimierz serocki, और Steven Stucky.
Sound mass techniques also appear in the म्यूज़िक of जार्ज crumb ( anon. n.d. ).
Students attending a लेक्चर on रैखिक बीजगणित at the हेलसिंकी विश्वविद्यालयों of Technology
विद्यार्थियों in ग्रामीण सूडान, 2002
A student is a learner, or किसी जो attends an शैक्षणिक संस्था.
In some nations, the English term ( or its cognate in another language ) is reserved for those जो attend विश्वविद्यालयों, जबकि a schoolchild अंतर्गत the आयु of अठारह is पुकारा a pupil in अंग्रेज़ी ( or an equivalent in other languages ), although in the United States a person enrolled in grades K–12 is often called a student.
In its widest use, छात्र is प्रयुक्त लिये anyone जो is learning.
Australia is a continent comprising मेनलैंड ऑस्ट्रेलिया, तस्मानिया, नई गिनी, seram, संभवतः timor, and neighbouring islands.
The continent is sometimes ज्ञात in तकनीकी contexts by the names sahul, australinea or Meganesia, to distinguish it from the Australian mainland.
It is the smallest of the सात परंपरागत continents in the English conception.
New Zealand is not part of the continent of Australia, but of the पृथक, submerged महाद्वीप of Zealandia.
Zealandia and Australia are both part of the wider regions ज्ञात as australasia और Oceania.
the महाद्वीप of ऑस्ट्रेलिया झूठ on a महाद्वीपीय शेल्फ overlain by उथले समंदर जिससे divide it into several landmasses — the Arafura Sea and Torres Strait between mainland Australia and New Guinea, and Bass Strait between mainland Australia and Tasmania.
When sea levels were निम्नतर दौरान the pleistocene बर्फ आयु, सहित the last glacial maximum about 18,000 BC, they were connected by dry land.
दौरान the पास्ट टेन हजार सालो, उठती समुद्र स्तर overflowed the lowlands और अलग the continent into today 's low-lying arid to semi-arid mainland and the two mountainous islands of New Guinea and Tasmania.
Geologically, a continent extends to the किनारे of इसके महाद्वीपीय शेल्फ, so the now-separate islands are considered part of the continent.
Due to the spread of animals, fungi and plants across the सिंगल pleistocene landmass the पृथक lands have a related biota.
Central Park is nearly twice as big as the संसार 's second-smallest देश, Monaco.
historically इसके टंकी यहूद महत्वपूर्ण components of the city 's water supply.
Environmental issues in New York City are affected by the city 's आकार, घनत्व, abundant पब्लिक परिवहन अवसंरचना, और स्थान at the मुँह of the हडसन नदी.
New York 's जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व has environmental pros and cons.
It facilitates the उच्चतम द्रव्यमान पारगमन उपयोग in the संयुक्त राज्य, but also concentrates pollution.
गैसोलीन खपत in the नगर is at the रेट the नेशनल औसत थी in the 1920s, और ग्रीनहाउस गैस emissions हैं a भिन्न of the national average, at 7.1 metric tons per person per year, below San Francisco, at 11.2 metric tons, and the national average, at 24.5 metric tons.
New York City accounts for तभी 1 % of संयुक्त राज्य ग्रीनहाउस गैस emissions जबकि आवास 2.7 % of its population.
In September 2012, New यॉर्क थी नामित the # 1 `` अमेरिका 's dirtiest नगर, '' by a Travel+Leisure readership survey that rated the environmental quality of 35 prominent cities in the United States.
Atlanta (, stressed, locally ) is the capital of और the सबसे populous नगर in the u.S. राज्य of जॉर्जिया, साथ an अनुमानित 2011 जनसांख्यिकी of 432,427.
Atlanta is the cultural and economic center of the Atlanta metropolitan area, home to 5,457,831 people और the नवीं largest महानगर क्षेत्रफल in the संयुक्त States.
Atlanta is the county seat of Fulton काउंटी, और a छोटी portion of the नगर extends eastward into DeKalb County.
Atlanta was established in 1837 at the intersection of two railroad लाइनों, और the नगर रोज़ इससे the राख of the Civil War to become a national center of commerce.
In the decades following the Civil Rights Movement, during which the city earned a प्रतिष्ठा as `` too व्यस्त to नफ़रत '' लिये the प्रगतिशील दृश्य of इसके नागरिकों और leaders, Atlanta attained international prominence.
Atlanta is the primary transportation hub of the Southeastern United States, via राजमार्ग, रेलरोड, और एयर, साथ hartsfield–jackson अटलांटा अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र होने the संसार 's व्यस्ततम विमानक्षेत्र since 1998.
Atlanta is considered an `` alpha ( - ) संसार नगर, '' और, साथ a सकल घरेलू उत्पाद of us $ 270 billion, Atlanta’s economy ranks 15th among world cities and sixth in the nation.
Although Atlanta’s economy is considered diverse, dominant sectors include logistics, professional and कारोबार सेवाएं, मीडिया परिचालन, सरकारी प्रशासन, और उच्चतर education.
Topographically, Atlanta is चिह्नित by रोलिंग पहाड़ियाँ और घना tree coverage.
Revitalization of अटलांटा 's पड़ोस, initially spurred by the 1996 Olympics, has intensified in the 21st century, altering the city 's demographics, politics, and culture.

McCarthyism is the practice of making accusations of disloyalty, subversion, or देशद्रोह बगैर proper regard for evidence.
It also means `` the practice of making अन्यायपूर्ण दोषारोपण or using अन्यायपूर्ण investigative तकनीकों, विशेषकर in order to restrict dissent or political criticism. ''
The term has its origins in the period in the संयुक्त राज्य ज्ञात as the दूसरी रेड scare, स्थायी roughly इससे 1950 to 1956 और characterized by heightened fears of कम्युनिस्ट influence on American institutions and espionage by Soviet agents.
originally coined to criticize the anti-communist pursuits of रिपब्लिकन u.s. सीनेटर जोसेफ McCarthy of Wisconsin, `` McCarthyism '' soon took on a broader meaning, describing the excesses of similar efforts.
The term is also now used अधिक generally to describe लापरवाह, unsubstantiated आरोपों, as well as demagogic attacks on the character or patriotism of political adversaries.
During the McCarthy era, thousands of Americans were अभियुक्त of होने साम्यवादियों or कम्युनिस्ट sympathizers और became the विषय of आक्रामक investigations and questioning before government or private-industry panels, committees and agencies.
The प्राथमिक लक्ष्य of ऐसे suspicions यहूद सरकारी employees, those in the entertainment industry, educators and union activists.
Suspicions were often given credence despite inconclusive or questionable प्रमाण, और the स्तर of threat posed by a व्यक्ति 's रियल or supposed वामपंथी एसोसिएशन or beliefs was often greatly exaggerated.
Many people suffered loss of नियुक्ति and/or विनाश of उनके करियर ; कुछ भी suffered imprisonment.
Most of these punishments came about through trial verdicts बाद विकल, कानून कि होता be घोषित असंवैधानिक, dismissals लिये कारण बाद घोषित illegal or actionable, or extra-legal procedures that would come into general disrepute.
The most famous examples of McCarthyism include the speeches, investigations, and hearings of Senator McCarthy himself ; the Hollywood ब्लैकलिस्ट, संबद्ध साथ hearings conducted by the हाउस un-american क्रियाएँ कमेटी ( huac ) ; और the विभिन्न anti-communist activities of the Federal Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ) under Director J. Edgar Hoover.
McCarthyism was a widespread social and cultural phenomenon that affected all levels of society और थी the सोर्स of a ग्रेट सौदे of बहस और विरोध in the संयुक्त States.
नेपोलियन is a fictional अक्षर and the main antagonist in George Orwell 's Animal Farm.
While he is at first a आम फार्म सुअर, he gets rid of स्नोबॉल, another pig which shares the power.
He then takes लाभ of the पशु ' uprising विरूद्ध उनके मास्टर्स to आखिरकार become the tyrannical `` President of Animal Farm, '' which he turns into a dictatorship.
