Elizabeth II ( Elizabeth Alexandra Mary ; born 21 April 1926 ) is the constitutional monarch of 16 sovereign states, known as the Commonwealth realms, और उनके territories और dependencies, और सिर of the 54-member राष्ट्रमंडल of Nations.
She is Supreme Governor of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड और, in कुछ of उसके realms, carries the शीर्षक of defender of the Faith as part of her full title.
On her accession on 6 फ़रवरी 1952, एलिज़ाबेथ became सिर of the राष्ट्रमंडल और महारानी regnant of सात independent Commonwealth countries : the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, Pakistan and Ceylon.
From 1956 to 1992, the क्रमांक of उसके realms varied as territories gained independence and some realms became republics.
At present, in addition to the पहला चार aforementioned देशों, एलिज़ाबेथ is महारानी of जमैका, बारबाडोस, the बहामा, हरा, पापुआ नई Guinea, the Solomon Islands, Tuvalu, Saint Lucia, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, Belize, Antigua and Barbuda and Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Her reign of years is फिलहाल the दूसरी longest लिये a अंग्रेजों monarch ; तभी महारानी विक्टोरिया रै reigned longer at over 63 years.
एलिज़ाबेथ थी born in लंदन and educated privately at home.
Her father acceded to the throne as George VI in 1936 on the abdication of his bhai एडवर्ड viii, इससे जिससे समय वो थी the वारिस presumptive.
She began to undertake public duties दौरान the दूसरी संसार युद्ध, in जिससे वो परोसा in the auxiliary territorial Service.
In 1947, she शादीशुदा प्रिंस फिलिप, ड्यूक of एडिनबर्ग, साथ whom she has four children : Charles, Anne, Andrew, and Edward.
Her coronation service took place in 1953 and was the पहला to be televised.
The Queen 's many historic visits and बैठक शामिल a राज्य विज़िट to the गणतंत्र of आयरलैंड और reciprocal visits to and from the Pope.
The Queen has seen major constitutional changes in her realms, such as devolution in the संयुक्त किंगडम और the patriation of the Canadian constitution.
Times of personal significance have included the births and marriages of her children, the births of उसके grandchildren, the प्रतिष्ठापन of the प्रिंस of वेल्स, और the जश्न of माइलस्टोन such as her Silver, Golden, and Diamond Jubilees in 1977, 2002, and 2012, respectively.
Major events in the महारानी 's शासनकाल have शामिल the परेशानियों in उत्तरी आयरलैंड, the Falklands War, wars with Iraq and the War in Afghanistan.
There have been times of personal sorrow for her which include the death of her father at 56, the assassination of Prince Philip 's uncle, Lord Mountbatten, the breakdown of her children 's marriages in 1992 ( a year deemed her annus horribilis ), the death in 1997 of her former daughter-in-law, डायना, राजकुमारी of वेल्स, और the मौतों of उसके माँ और सिस्टर in 2002.
The महारानी रै occasionally faced कठोर दबायें आलोचना of the royal परिवार और रिपब्लिकन sentiments, but support for the monarchy and her personal popularity remain high.
Christianity is the largest धर्म सूचीबद्ध by australians in the नेशनल जनसांख्यिकी.
In the 2011 जनसांख्यिकी, 61.1 % of Australians were listed as Christian.
Australia has no official राज्य धर्म और the ऑस्ट्रेलियाई संविधान protects freedom of religion.
The presence of Christianity in Australia began साथ the आगमन of the पहला बेड़े of British convicts in 1788.
The religion grew to account for 96.1 % of the नेशनल जनसांख्यिकी at the समय of the संघ of ऑस्ट्रेलिया in 1901.
The anglican गिरिजाघर of ऑस्ट्रेलिया ( formerly ज्ञात as the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड in Australia ) remained the largest denomination until 1986, when it was surpassed by the Roman Catholic Church in Australia.
Post-war multiculturalism and a decline in religious observance among some sections of the जनसांख्यिकी have diversified the जनसांख्यिकी of धर्म in Australia.
Of the roughly 61 % identifying as Christian in 2011, the largest denominations were either रोमन कैथोलिक ( 25 % ) or anglican ( 17 % ), साथ the तीसरा largest denomination होने the 5 % संबद्ध साथ the Uniting Church in Australia.
Post-war immigration has grown the numbers belonging to चर्च जैसे the यूनानी परंपरागत archdiocese of ऑस्ट्रेलिया and there are large and growing Pentecostal groups, such as Sydney 's Hillsong Church.
The त्यौहार of ईस्टर और क्रिसमस are public holidays in Australia.
Around a quarter of students attend church schools and Christian organisations are leading non-government providers of health and welfare सेवाएं through संगठनों जैसे कैथोलिक स्वास्थ्य ऑस्ट्रेलिया, anglicare, unitingcare ऑस्ट्रेलिया, the मोक्ष फौज और St Vincent de Paul Society.
Historically significant Australian Christians have शामिल रेव dr जॉन dunmore लैंग, संत मरियम mackillop, कैथरीन हेलेन spence, पादरी David Unaipon, the Reverend John Flynn and Pastor Sir Doug Nicholls.
High profile contemporary Australian Christians include : Tim Costello Baptist minister and current CEO of World Vision Australia, Frank Brennan, Jesuit human rights lawyer, Cardinal George Pell, Catholic archbishop of सिडनी, फिलिप aspinall the वर्तमान anglican primate और archbishop of ब्रिसबेन, केविन रड, पूर्व मजदूर Prime Minister, and Tony Abbott, leader for the Federal Opposition Liberal Party.
Charter creating कॉलेजिएट स्कूल, जिससे became yale कॉलेज, October 9, 1701
Yale University is a private Ivy League शोध विश्वविद्यालयों स्तिथ in नई Haven, Connecticut.
Founded in 1701 in the Colony of कनेक्टिकट, the विश्वविद्यालयों is the third-oldest संस्था of higher education in the United States.
Originally chartered as the `` Collegiate School '', the institution traces its roots to 17th-century clergymen जो sought to स्थापित a कॉलेज to ट्रैन clergy and political leaders for the colony.
In 1718, the College was renamed `` yale कॉलेज '' to सम्मान a तोहफा from Elihu Yale, a governor of the British East India Company.
In 1861, the Graduate School of Arts and Sciences became the first U.S. institution to award the phd. yale became a founding सदस्य of the संघ of अमरीकी विश्वविद्यालयों in 1900.
Yale College was transformed, beginning in the 1930s, through the स्थापना of आवासीय कॉलेजों : 12 अभी मौजूद और दो अधिक हैं planned.
Yale employs over 1,100 faculty to teach and सलाह परिचय 5,300 undergraduate और 6,100 ग्रैजुएट और पेशेवर students.
Almost all tenured professors सिखा undergraduate पाठ्यक्रम, अधिक than 2,000 of which are offered annually.
The University 's assets include an endowment valued at $ 19.4 अरब, the second-largest of कोई अकादमिक institution in the world.
Yale 's प्रणाली of अधिक than दो दर्जन पुस्तकालयों holds 12.5 million volumes.
49 Nobel Laureates have महरूम संबद्ध साथ the विश्वविद्यालयों as विद्यार्थी, faculty, and staff.
Yale has उत्पादित अनेक notable alumni, सहित पाँच u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों, 19 u.S. Supreme Court Justices, and several foreign heads of state.
At the graduate level, Yale Law स्कूल, yale स्कूल of आर्ट, और yale स्कूल of नाटक हैं consistently क्रमित the top programs in their field.
yale विधि स्कूल is the most selective law school in the United States.
Yale students compete intercollegiately as the yale bulldogs in the ncaa Division I Ivy League.
The oldest intercollegiate एथलेटिक इवेंट in the संयुक्त राज्य is the Yale-Harvard regatta.
Artemisia tridentata ( `` big sagebrush '' or `` sagebrush '' ) is an aromatic shrub from the family Asteraceae, which grows in arid and semi-arid conditions, throughout a range of cold desert, स्तान, और पहाड़ habitats in the intermountain वेस्ट of उत्तर अमेरिका.
The vernacular name `` sagebrush '' is also प्रयुक्त लिये अनेक सम्बन्धित सदस्यों of the genus artemisia, ऐसे as कैलिफ़ोर्निया sagebrush ( Artemisia californica ).
Big sagebrush और अन्य artemisia प्रजाति हैं the प्रबल पौधे आरपार विशाल portions of the ग्रेट Basin, covering some 422,000 square miles in 11 western U.S. & Canadian states.
It is the राज्य पुष्प of Nevada.
Sagebrush provides खाना और आवास लिये a किस्में of प्रजाति, ऐसे as sage grouse, pronghorn antelope, gray vireo, pygmy rabbit, and mule deer.
Big sagebrush was used as an herbal medicine by Native Americans throughout the Intermountain West of North america—especially लिये preventing संक्रमण in wounds, stopping आतंरिक bleeding, और treating headaches and colds.
Chemically, the क्रियाशील औषधीय constituents शामिल camphor, terpenoids, and tannins.
Several major खतरे मौजूद to ऋषि ब्रश ecosystems, सहित इंसान settlements, conversion to agricultural land, livestock grazing, invasive plant species, wildfires, and climate change.
Yahoo ! Mail is a फ़्री ईमेल सेवा offered by the अमरीकी ढूंढें इंजन company Yahoo !
It थी शुभारम्भ in 1997, और, according to comscore, Yahoo ! Mail is the third-largest web-based email service with 281 million users as of December 2012.
फिलहाल, याहू ! offers तीन versions of Yahoo ! Mail.
the परंपरागत `` याहू ! मेल क्लासिक '' continues the availability of the original interface introduced in 1997.
A version introduced in 2005 included a new Ajax interface, drag-and-drop सुविधाएँ, improved ढूंढें कार्यक्षमता, कुंजीपटल शॉर्टकट, address auto-complete, tabs, and other updated features.
In October 2010, Yahoo ! released a beta version of Yahoo ! Mail, जिससे शामिल सुधार to the डिज़ाइन, प्रदर्शन, ढूंढें कार्यक्षमता, और फेसबुक integration.
In May 2011, beta testing for the new version रोका, और it became the डिफॉल्ट इंटरफ़ेस लिये याहू ! Mail.
In early 2008, Yahoo ! began offering असीमित मेल भंडार to इसके उपयोक्ता in जवाब to heated प्रतियोगिता in the फ़्री web-mail मार्केट segment.
On June 27, 2009, याहू ! Messenger was integrated with Yahoo ! Mail.
Tacoma (, ) is a mid-sized शहरी बंदरगाहों नगर और the काउंटी सीट of पियर्स काउंटी, Washington, United States.
The city is on Washington 's Puget Sound, दक्षिणपश्चिम of सिएटल, पूर्वोत्तर of the राज्य पूंजी, ओलंपिया, और northwest of Mount Rainier National Park.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 198,397, according to the 2010 census.
Tacoma is the second-largest नगर in the puget ध्वनि क्षेत्रफल और the तीसरा largest in the state.
टकोमा भी serves as the बीच of कारोबार कार्यकलाप लिये the South Sound region, which has a population of around 1 million people.
Tacoma अपनाया इसके नाम बाद the आसपास माउंट rainier, originally called Mount Tahoma.
It is known as the `` City of नियति '' क्युकी the क्षेत्रफल थी चुनी to be the पश्चिमी टर्मिनस of the उत्तरी Pacific Railroad in the late 19th century.
The निर्णय of the रेलरोड was influenced by Tacoma 's neighboring deep-water harbor, Commencement Bay.
By connecting the खाड़ी साथ the रेलरोड टकोमा 's motto became `` When rails meet sails. ''
Today Commencement Bay serves the Port of Tacoma, a center of अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार on the प्रशांत coast और वॉशिंगटन राज्य 's largest बंदरगाहों.
Like most central cities, टकोमा suffered a prolonged मनाही in the mid-20th सदी as a परिणाम of suburbanization and divestment.
Since the 1990s, developments in the downtown core include the University of Washington Tacoma ; Tacoma Link, the first modern electric light rail सेवा in the राज्य ; the राज्य 's उच्चतम घनत्व of आर्ट और इतिहास संग्रहालय ; और a लौटी शहरी waterfront, the thea foss Waterway.
With a long history of blue-collar labor politics — from the railroad workers of the 19th सदी, to the longshoremen of the 20th सदी, to the मजदूर तैयार मजदूर of आज — टकोमा रै long been known for its rough, gritty image.
A song about Tacoma, `` thrice सब अमरीकी '', by अमरीकी singer-songwriter और पूर्व निवासी neko मामला, describes it as `` a dusty old jewel in the South Puget Sound / where the factories churn / and the timber 's all cut down ''.
Tacoma-Pierce काउंटी रै महरूम नामित एक of the सबसे livable areas in the country.
Tacoma was also recently सूचीबद्ध as the 19th सबसे walkable city in the country.
In contrast, the city is भी क्रमित as the सबसे stressed-out नगर in the country in a 2004 survey.
In 2006, women 's magazine Self named Tacoma the `` सबसे sexually स्वस्थ नगर '' in the United States.
In 2012, The Advocate gave Tacoma the title of `` gayest नगर in अमेरिका '', in भाग क्युकी of the विशाल विविधता of पब्लिक कार्यालयों आयोजित, and Washington State passing a bill in 2012 allowing LGBT couples to marry.
Tacoma is प्रसिद्ध लिये the 1940 पतन of the Tacoma Narrows Bridge.
Chula Vista ( ; ) is the second largest city in the San Diego metropolitan area, the seventh largest नगर in दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया, the fourteenth largest नगर in the राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, और the 77th-largest city in the United States.
The population was 243,916 as of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
स्तिथ बस इससे शहर सैन डिएगो और इससे the मैक्सिकन किनारा in the दक्षिण खाड़ी प्रदेश of the महानगर area, the city is at the center of one of the richest economic and culturally diverse zones in the United States.
Chula Vista is so named क्युकी of इसके दर्शनीय स्थान between the सैन डिएगो Bay and coastal mountain foothills.
संस्थापित in the जल्दी 19th सदी, तेज़ जनसांख्यिकी growth has recently been observed in the city.
As the second largest नगर in सैन डिएगो काउंटी, chula Vista has quickly become a destination popular to many tourists.
स्तिथ in the नगर is एक of अमेरिका 's few year-round संयुक्त राज्य ओलम्पिक प्रशिक्षण centers और लोकप्रिय पर्यटक गंतव्यों include Cricket Wireless Amphitheater, the Chula Vista marina, and the Chula Vista Nature Center.
Metes and bounds is a system or method of describing जमीन, रियल प्रॉपर्टी ( in कंट्रास्ट to निजी प्रॉपर्टी ) or रियल estate.
The system has been used in England for अनेक सदियां, और is स्टिल प्रयुक्त there in the definition of general boundaries.
By custom, it थी लागू in the असली तेरह colonies कि became the संयुक्त States, and in many other land jurisdictions based on English common law.
Typically the system uses physical features of the local भूगोल, साथ साथ दिशानिर्देश और दूरियाँ, to define और describe the सीमाएँ of a पार्सल of land.
The boundaries are वर्णित in a कार्यशील गद्य स्टाइल, working around the पार्सल in अनुक्रम, इससे a पाइंट of शुरूआत, returning वापस to the वही point ; compare with the oral ritual of beating the bounds.
It may include references to अन्य adjoining parcels ( और उनके स्वामी ), और it, in फेरे, could also be referred to in later surveys.
At the समय the वर्णन is compiled, it may have महरूम चिह्नित on the ground with permanent monuments placed where there were no suitable natural monuments.
The term `` metes '' refers to a boundary defined by the measurement of प्रत्येक सीधा चलाएं, निर्दिष्ट by a अलहदा between the टर्मिनल points, and an orientation or direction.
A direction may be a सरल कम्पास bearing, or a precise orientation determined by accurate survey methods.
The term `` bounds '' refers to a अधिक सामान्य boundary वर्णन, ऐसे as साथ a निश्चित watercourse, a स्टोन वॉल, an adjoining public road way, or an existing building.
The system is often used to define larger pieces of property ( e.g. farms ), and राजनैतिक subdivisions ( e.g. कस्बा सीमाएँ ) जहाँ precise परिभाषा is नहीं जरूरी or होता be दूर too महंगी, or previously designated boundaries can be incorporated into the description.
Sir Isaac Newton ( 25 December 164220 March 1727 ) was an English physicist और गणितज्ञ जो is widely regarded as एक of the सबसे influential वैज्ञानिकों of सब समय और as a कुंजी फिगर in the वैज्ञानिक revolution.
His book Philosophiæ Naturalis Principia Mathematica ( `` Mathematical Principles of Natural दर्शनशास्त्र '' ), पहला प्रकाशित in 1687, रखी the मूलाधार for most of classical mechanics.
Newton also made seminal contributions to प्रकाशिकी और साझा क्रेडिट साथ गॉटफ्राइड लैबनिट्ज़ लिये the आविष्कार of the infinitesimal calculus.
Newton 's Principia formulated the laws of motion and universal gravitation कि वर्चस्व वैज्ञानिकों ' दृश्य of the शारीरिक ब्रह्मांड for the next three centuries.
It also demonstrated that the motion of objects on the धरती और कि of celestial लाशें could be वर्णित by the वही सिद्धान्त.
By deriving Kepler 's laws of ग्रहीय गति इससे उसके गणितीय वर्णन of गम्भीरता, न्यूटन removed the last doubts about the validity of the heliocentric model of the cosmos.
Newton built the first practical reflecting दूरदर्शी और विकसित a सिद्धान्त of रंग आधारित on the अवलोकन कि a प्रिज़्म decomposes श्वेत light into the many colours of the visible spectrum.
He also formulated an empirical law of कूलिंग और पढ़ाई the गति of ध्वनि.
In addition to his work on the कलन, as a गणितज्ञ न्यूटन contributed to the पढ़ाई of शक्ति श्रेणी, generalised the द्विपद प्रमेय to non-integer exponents, and developed Newton 's method for approximating the roots of a function.
Newton was a fellow of Trinity College and the second lucasian प्राध्यापक of गणित at the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैम्ब्रिज.
He was a devout but unorthodox Christian and, unusually for a member of the Cambridge faculty, he refused to लो पावन आदेश in the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड, शायद क्युकी he privately अस्वीकृत the doctrine of trinitarianism.
In addition to his work on the mathematical sciences, Newton also dedicated much of his time to the study of alchemy और biblical कालक्रम, लकिन सबसे of उसके कार्य in those क्षेत्रों remained अप्रकाशित जबतक long बाद उसके मौत.
In his later life, Newton became president of the royal समाज.
He also served the अंग्रेजों सरकारी as वार्डन और निपुण of the Royal Mint.
Prof. Walter lewin explains न्यूटन 's law of gravitation in MIT course 8.01
Satellites और projectiles सब obey Newton 's law of gravitation
Newton 's law of universal gravitation states that every point mass in the ब्रह्मांड attracts प्रत्येक अन्य पाइंट द्रव्यमान साथ a फ़ोर्स that is directly proportional to the product of their masses and inversely proportional to the square of the distance between them.
( Separately it थी दिखाया कि विशाल spherically सममित masses आकर्षित और हैं आकर्षित as if सब उनके द्रव्यमान यहूद concentrated at their centers. )
This is a general physical law derived from अनुभवजन्य observations by कया न्यूटन पुकारा प्रेरण.
It is a part of शास्त्रीय यांत्रिकी और थी प्रतिपादित in न्यूटन 's कार्य philosophiæ Naturalis Principia Mathematica ( `` the Principia '' ), first published on 5 July 1687.
( When Newton 's book was presented in 1686 to the Royal Society, Robert Hooke made a claim that न्यूटन था प्राप्त the विलोम वर्गाकार विधि इससे उसे – देखिए इतिहास खण्ड below. )
In modern भाषा, the विधि राज्य the following:
Assuming SI units, F is measured in newtons ( n ), m1 और m2 in गामा ( kg ), r in मीटर ( m ), and the constant G is approximately equal to.
The value of the constant G was first accurately determined from the results of the Cavendish experiment conducted by the British scientist Henry Cavendish in 1798, हालांकि कैवेंडिश किया नहीं खुद गणना a numerical मान for G.
This experiment was also the first test of न्यूटन 's सिद्धान्त of gravitation between masses in the laboratory.
It took place 111 years after the प्रकाशन of न्यूटन 's प्रिन्सिपिया और 71 सालो बाद न्यूटन 's मौत, so none of Newton 's calculations could use the value of G ; instead he could only calculate a force relative to another force.
Newton 's law of gravitation resembles Coulomb 's law of विद्युत शक्तियां, जिससे is प्रयुक्त to गणना the परिमाण of विद्युत फ़ोर्स between two charged bodies.
Both are inverse-square laws, in which force is inversely आंशिक to the वर्गाकार of the अलहदा between the bodies.
Coulomb 's Law has the product of two charges in place of the product of the masses, and the electrostatic निरंतर in प्लेस of the गुरुत्वाकर्षक constant.
Newton 's law has since been superseded by Einstein 's theory of general आपेक्षिकता, लकिन it continues to be प्रयुक्त as an बेहतरीन सन्निकटन of the effects of gravity.
Relativity is required only when there is a need लिये चरम परिशुद्धता, or जब dealing साथ gravitation for extremely massive and dense objects.
White और रेड ध्वज, representing इराकी और अमरीकी मौतों, बैठना in the ग्रास चतुष्कोण of The Valley Library on the Corvallis, Oregon, campus of Oregon State University.
As part of the traveling Iraq Body Count exhibit from 2008 to 2009 ( not सम्बन्धित to इराकी देह गिनती प्रोजेक्ट ), the ध्वज उद्देश्य to `` उठाएँ जागरूकता of the इंसान cost of the Iraq War. ''
( may 2008 )
Casualties of the conflict in Iraq since 2003 ( beginning with the 2003 invasion of Iraq, and continuing with the ensuing occupation of Iraq, as well as the activities of the various armed groups operating in the country ) have come in many फ़ॉर्म, और the सटीकता of the सूचना उपलब्धियाँ on अलग प्रकार of इराकी युद्ध हताहत varies greatly.
The table below summarizes विभिन्न estimates of the Iraqi casualty figures.
For troops in the U.S.-led multinational coalition, the death toll is carefully tracked और अद्यतनीकृत रोज़, और the names और छायाचित्र of those मारे in action as well as in accidents have been published widely.
A total of 4,486 u.S. सैनिको यहूद मारे in इराकी between 2003 and 2012.
Regarding the Iraqis, however, information on both सैन्य और civilian हताहत is दोनो कम precise and less consistent.
Estimates of casualty levels are available from reporters on the झाँकी, इससे officials of शामिल संगठन, और इससे समूह कि summarize सूचना on incidents reported in the news media.
The word `` casualties `` in इसके सबसे सामान्य भाव शामिल the घायल as well as the dead.
Accounts of the number of coalition wounded vary widely, partly because it is not obvious what should be counted : should only those injuries serious पर्याप्त to put a सिपाही आउट of commission be included ?
Do illnesses or injuries caused by accidents count, or चाहिए the फ़ोकस be प्रतिबंधित to wounds caused by शत्रु engagement ?
स्त्रोत using अलग परिभाषाएं may arrive at very different numbers, and sometimes the precise definition is not clearly specified.

A highwayman थी a चोर और brigand who preyed on travellers.
This type of outlaw usually travelled and robbed by घोड़ा, as compared to a footpad जो travelled और robbed on foot.
Mounted robbers यहूद widely माना to be socially superior to footpads.
Such robbers operated in Great Britain and Ireland from the elizabethan era जबतक the जल्दी 19th सदी.
The word highwayman is first known to be used in the year 1617 ; अन्य euphemisms शामिल `` शूरवीरों of the road '' and `` gentlemen of the road. ''
Two terms applied to 19th-century उत्तर अमरीकी highwaymen यहूद सड़क एजेंटों in कुछ उदाहरण लिये पहाड़ डाकुओं while in other cases the term is Rlallaala for mountain-based ruffians.
In the same time period in Australia, वे यहूद ज्ञात as bushrangers.
Earvin `` Magic '' Johnson, Jr. ( born August 14, 1959 ) is a retired American professional basketball player who निभाई पाइंट गार्ड लिये the लॉस एंजिल्स लेकर्स of the National Basketball Association ( NBA ).
After winning championships in high school and college, Johnson was चयनित पहला overall in the 1979 एनबीए ड्राफ्ट by the लेकर्स.
He won a championship and an NBA Finals Most Valuable Player पुरस्कार in उसके रुकी ऋतु, और जीती four more championships with the Lakers during the 1980s.
Johnson retired abruptly in 1991 after announcing that he had contracted HIV, but returned to खेल in the 1992 all-star खेल, जीतना the all-star mvp Award.
After protests from his fellow players, he retired again for four years, but returned in 1996, at आयु 36, to खेल 32 खेल लिये the लेकर्स पहले retiring लिये the तीसरा और फाइनल time.
जॉनसन 's करियर उपलब्धियाँ शामिल तीन एनबीए mvp पुरस्कार, nine NBA Finals appearances, twelve All-Star games, and ten All-NBA First and Second Team nominations.
He led the लीग in regular-season assists चार टाइम्स, और is the NBA 's all-time leader in average assists per game, at 11.2.
Johnson was a member of the `` Dream Team ``, the U.S. basketball टोली कि जीती the ओलम्पिक gold medal in 1992.
After leaving the NBA in 1992, Johnson formed the जादू जॉनसन all-stars, a barnstorming टोली कि travelled around the world playing exhibition games.
Johnson was honored as एक of the 50 महानतम खिलाड़ी in एनबीए इतिहास in 1996, and enshrined in the Basketball Hall of Fame in 2002.
He was rated the महानतम एनबीए पाइंट गार्ड of सब time by ESPN in 2007.
His friendship and rivalry with Boston सेल्टिक्स स्टार लैरी बर्ड, जिसको he faced in the 1979 ncaa फाइनल और three NBA championship series, were well documented.
Since his retirement, Johnson has been an advocate for HIV/ AIDS prevention and safe sex, as well as an entrepreneur, लोकसेवक, प्रसारणकर्ता और प्रेरक स्पीकर.
Johnson was a part-owner of the Lakers for several years, and was part of a समूह कि खरीदा the लॉस एंजिल्स Dodgers in 2012.
allium कोशिकाएं in अलग phases of the cell cycle
The cells of eukaryotes ( बाएँ ) और prokaryotes ( सही )
The cell is the मौलिक संरचनात्मक, कार्यात्मक और biological unit of all known living organisms.
It is the smallest unit of life that is वर्गीकृत as a जीना बात ( मगर वायरस, जिससे consists तभी इससे dna/rna covered by प्रोटीन and lipids ), and is often called the building block of life.
It consists of a जीवद्रव्य enclosed भीतर a झिल्ली, जिससे contains many biomolecules such as proteins and nucleic acids.
Organisms can be वर्गीकृत as एककोशिकीय ( consisting of a सिंगल कोशिका ; including most bacteria ) or multicellular ( including plants and animals ).
While the क्रमांक of कोशिकाएं in पौधे और पशु varies इससे प्रजाति to प्रजाति, Humans contain about 100 trillion ( 1014 ) cells.
Most plant और एनिमल कोशिकाएं हैं between 1 और 100 micrometres और therefore are visible only under the microscope.
The cell थी खोजा by रॉबर्ट Hooke in 1665.
The cell theory, first developed in 1839 by Matthias Jakob Schleiden and Theodor Schwann, states that all organisms are composed of one or more cells, that all cells come from preexisting cells, that vital कृत्यों of an सजीव occur भीतर कोशिकाएं, और कि सब कोशिकाएं contain the खानदानी सूचना जरुरी लिये regulating कोशिका कृत्यों and for transmitting information to the next generation of cells.
Cells emerged on ग्रह धरती at तनिक 4.0–4.3 billion years ago.
The word cell comes इससे the लैटिन गर्भगृह, अर्थ `` small room ''.
The descriptive term for the smallest living biological structure was coined by Robert Hooke in a किताब he प्रकाशित in 1665 जब he compared the कॉर्क कोशिकाएं he देखी through उसके सूक्ष्मदर्शी to the small rooms monks lived in.
Grecian सूत्र is a मेन 's बाल coloring उत्पाद in the United States.
Canada and Europe previously बैन the उत्पाद क्युकी of इसके use of lead acetate.
A motor स्कूटर 's सामने साथ an अव्यवहारिक क्रमांक और किस्में of headlamps, added for decorative purposes
A headlamp is a बल्ब संलग्न to the सामने of a vehicle to light the road ahead.
Headlamp performance has steadily improved throughout the automobile age, spurred by the ग्रेट disparity between दिन और nighttime ट्रैफ़िक fatalities : the u.S. नेशनल राजमार्ग ट्रैफ़िक सुरक्षा प्रशासन राज्य कि nearly हाफ of all traffic-related fatalities occur in the dark, despite only 25 % of traffic travelling during darkness.
While it is common for the term headlight to be used interchangeably in informal discussion, headlamp is the पद लिये the यंत्र itself, जबकि हेडलाइट properly refers to the बीम of लाइट उत्पादित and distributed by the device.
Other vehicles, such as trains and aircraft, हैं जरूरी to have headlamps.
Bicycle headlamps are often used on साइकिल, और हैं जरूरी in कुछ jurisdictions.
They can be powered by a बैटरी or a छोटी विद्युत सृजनकर्ता on the wheel.
Additionally automotive रात्रि दृष्टि प्रणालियों कार्य to संपूरक headlamps.
Women 's rights are the rights and entitlements claimed लिये महिलाओं और लड़कियों of अनेक समाजों विश्वव्यापी.
In some स्थान ये अधिकारों हैं institutionalized or समर्थित by law, local custom, and behaviour, whereas in others they may be ignored or suppressed.
वे differ इससे broader धारणाएं of इंसान अधिकारों through दावा of an अंतर्निहित ऐतिहासिक and traditional bias against the exercise of rights by women and girls in favour of men and boys.
Issues commonly associated with notions of women 's rights include, though are not limited to, the right : to bodily integrity and autonomy ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to थाम पब्लिक दफ्तर ; to कार्य ; to मेला मजदूरी or बराबर अदा ; to अपना प्रॉपर्टी ; to शिक्षा ; to serve in the military or be conscripted ; to enter into legal contracts ; and to have marital, parental and religious rights.
Caryn Elaine Johnson, best known as whoopi गोल्डबर्ग (, ( born नवम्बर 13, 1955 ) is an अमरीकी comedienne, actress, singer-songwriter, political activist, author and talk show host.
गोल्डबर्ग बना उसके फिल्मी डेब्यू in the रंग Purple ( 1985 ), playing Celie, a mistreated black woman in the Deep South.
She received a नामांकन लिये the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन Actress and won her first Golden Globe Award for her role in the film.
In 1990, she played Oda Mae Brown, a wacky मानसिक helping a slain man ( पैट्रिक swayze ) save his lover ( Demi Moore ) in the blockbuster Ghost.
This performance won her a second Golden Globe and an Academy पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन supporting अभिनेत्री ; इस बना गोल्डबर्ग तभी the दूसरी ब्लैक स्त्री in the इतिहास of the अकादमी पुरस्कार to जीत an एक्टिंग oscar—the पहला होने हैटी mcdaniel who won for Gone With the Wind in 1939.
Notable later films include Sister Act and Sister Act 2, the खिलाड़ी, बना in अमेरिका, कैसा स्टेला मिला उसके नाली वापस, लड़की, Interrupted and Rat Race.
She is also acclaimed for her roles as the bartender Guinan in स्टार ट्रेक : the अगला पीढी, as टेरी doolittle in jumpin ' जोकर फ्लैश, और as कार्मेन Tibideaux in Glee, as well as the voice of Shenzi the hyena in The Lion King.
गोल्डबर्ग रै महरूम मनोनीत लिये 13 Emmy Awards for her work in television.
She थी co-producer of the लोकप्रिय game show Hollywood Squares from 1998 to 2004.
She has been the moderator of the दिन बात दिखाएँ the दृश्य since 2007.
Goldberg has a Grammy, two Daytime Emmys, दो सुनहरी ग्लोब्स, a टोनी ( लिये production, not acting ), and an Oscar.
In जोड, गोल्डबर्ग रै a अंग्रेजों अकादमी फिल्मी पुरस्कार, four People 's Choice Awards, and has been honored with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
She is one of the few entertainers जो have जीती an एमी, ग्रैमी, Oscar, and Tony Award.
The National Hockey League ( NHL ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit संघ '' जिससे operates a प्रमुख पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी लीग of 30 franchised member clubs, of which seven are currently located in Canada and 23 in the United States.
Headquartered in New York City, the NHL is widely considered to be the premier professional ice hockey league in the संसार, और एक of the प्रमुख पेशेवर खेल लीग in the संयुक्त States and Canada.
The Stanley Cup, the oldest professional sports trophy in North America, is awarded annually to the लीग playoff चैंपियन at the समाप्त of प्रत्येक ऋतु.
The league was organized on November 26, 1917, in Montreal, Quebec, कनाडा, बाद the बर्खास्तगी of परिचालन of इसके पूर्ववर्ती organization, the National Hockey Association ( NHA ), which had been founded in 1909.
It started with four teams and, through a श्रेणी of expansions, contractions, और relocations, the league is now composed of 30 active franchises.
The nation to which the name of the league originally referred was Canada, although the लीग रै अभी महरूम binational चूंकि 1924 जब it विस्तारित into the United States.
After a labour dispute कि led to the रद्दीकरण of the संपूर्ण 2004–05 ऋतु, the लीग resumed खेल अंतर्गत a new collective bargaining agreement that included a salary cap.
In 2009, the एनएचएल enjoyed रिकार्ड highs in शर्तें of sponsorships, उपस्थिति, and television audiences.
The NHL draws many highly skilled खिलाड़ी इससे सब over the संसार और फिलहाल रै खिलाड़ी from about 20 different countries.
Although Canadians have historically constituted the majority of the players in the एनएचएल, over the पास्ट चार प्लस दशकों the percentages of us और यूरोपीय खिलाड़ी have increased दोनो क्युकी of the एनएचएल 's जारी विस्तार इससे six to thirty clubs since 1967, and the increased availability of highly skilled European players.
Maggots feeding on carrion.
A maggot is the larva of a fly ( order Diptera ) ; it is applied in particular to the larvae of Brachyceran flies, such as houseflies, चीज उड़ता, और blowflies, बल्कि than लार्वे of the nematocera, ऐसे as मच्छरों और क्रेन flies.
`` Maggot '' is not a technical term and should not be लिया as ऐसे ; in अनेक मानक पाठ्यपुस्तकों of कीटविज्ञान it करता नहीं appear in the index at all.
In many non-technical texts the term is प्रयुक्त लिये कीट लार्वे in सामान्य.
Other स्त्रोत have coined उनके अपना परिभाषाएं ; for example : ``...
The term applies to a ग्रब जब सब ट्रेस of limbs रै disappeared... '' और ``... Applied to the footless larvae of Dipters. ''
Maggot-like fly larvae are of wide importance in ecology and medicine ; among other roles, विभिन्न प्रजाति हैं prominent in रीसाइक्लिंग carrion और कचरा, attacking फसलों और foodstuffs, spreading microbial infections, and causing myiasis.
हेरोदेस (, hordos, यूनानी :, hērōdēs ), भी ज्ञात as हेरोदेस the ग्रेट ( 73/74 BCE – 4 BCE in Jericho ), was a Roman client king of Judea.
His epithet of `` the Great '' is widely disputed as he is described as `` a madman जो murdered उसके अपना परिवार और a ग्रेट अनेक rabbis ``.
He is also known for his colossal building projects in Jerusalem and elsewhere, including his expansion of the दूसरी टेम्पल in जेरूसलम ( sometimes referred to as हेरोदेस 's टेम्पल ) और the निर्माण of the port at Caesarea Maritima.
महत्वपूर्ण विवरण of उसके जीवनी हैं gleaned from the works of the 1st century CE Roman–Jewish historian Josephus Flavius.
The romans बना हेरोदेस 's बेटे, हेरोदेस archelaus, ethnarch of judea, Samaria, and Idumea ( biblical Edom ) from 4 BCE to 6 CE, referred to as the tetrarchy of Judea.
Archelaus was judged incompetent by the Roman सम्राट augustus जो तब संयुक्त samaria, judea उचित और idumea into iudaea province under rule of a prefect until age 41.
हेरोदेस 's अन्य बेटे हेरोदेस antipas थी tetrarch of Galilee from 4 BCE–39 CE.
ABO blood group antigens present on red blood कोशिकाएं और igm antibodies उपस्थित in the serum
The ABO blood group system is the most महत्वपूर्ण रक्त प्रकार प्रणाली ( or रक्त समूह प्रणाली ) in इंसान blood transfusion.
The associated anti-a और anti-b antibodies हैं प्रायः igm antibodies, which are usually produced in the first years of life by sensitization to environmental substances such as food, bacteria, and viruses.
ABO blood types are also present in कुछ अन्य पशु, लिये उदाहरण apes ऐसे as chimpanzees, bonobos, and gorillas.
Year 1907 ( MCMVII ) was a common year starting on मंगलवार ( कड़ी होगा प्रदर्शक the पूरा पंचांग ) of the gregorian पंचांग और a आम साल starting on सोमवार of the 13-day-slower Julian calendar.
Northville is an affluent नगर स्तिथ in और विभाजित by Oakland and Wayne counties in the U.S. state of Michigan.
The क्षेत्रफल is a उपनगरीय of महानगर Detroit.
the जनसांख्यिकी was 5,970 at the 2010 census.
Most of the city is in Oakland काउंटी, और is घिरी by the city of Novi.
The Wayne County portion is घिरी by northville township.
Northville is served by northville पब्लिक स्कूलों.
The city is located northeast of Ann Arbor and उत्तरपश्चिम of डेट्रॉयट.
Elaine Stritch ( born फ़रवरी 2, 1925 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री and vocalist.
She has appeared in numerous stage plays और musicals, विशेषता films, और अनेक टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम.
She is known for her performance of `` The Ladies Who Lunch '' in Stephen Sondheim 's 1970 musical Company, her 2001 one-woman show, ऐलेन stritch at स्वतंत्रता, और recently लिये उसके भूमिका as जोकर donaghy 's mother Colleen on NBC 's 30 Rock.
She has been nominated for the Tony Award पाँच टाइम्स in विभिन्न categories.
Stritch is also a three-time एमी पुरस्कार विजेता.
Misfits is a British science fiction comedy-drama television show about a group of यंग अपराधियों sentenced to कार्य in a जातियाँ सेवा कार्यक्रम, जहाँ वे obtain supernatural powers after a strange electrical storm.
The series opened in 2009 और is फिलहाल जारी.
Antonia Thomas, Iwan rheon, लॉरेन socha, नाथन stewart-jarrett, और रॉबर्ट sheehan are introduced as Alisha Daniels, Simon Bellamy, Kelly Bailey, Curtis Donovan, and Nathan Young respectively.
Sheehan left बाद the दूसरी श्रेणी, replaced in the तीसरा by Joseph Gilgun as Rudy Wade.
After the fourth series was announced Rheon, Thomas and Socha had left their roles and would be replaced by new वर्ण कार्ला crome, नाथन mcmullen और मैट stokoe, as Jess, Finn and Alex respectively.
Midway through the fourth series, stewart-jarrett left while Natasha O'Keeffe joined the cast as Abbey Smith.
On 19 March 2013, Channel 4 announced at a दबायें इवेंट कि वे have नवीनीकृत misfits लिये a पांचवां and final series containing 8 episodes.
Brett lorenzo favre ( born अक्तूबर 10, 1969 ) is a पूर्व अमरीकी football quarterback who spent the majority of his career with the Green Bay Packers of the National Football League ( NFL ).
He was a 20-year veteran of the एनएफएल, having निभाई क्वार्टरबैक लिये the अटलांटा falcons ( 1991 ), ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स ( 1992 – 2007 ), नई यॉर्क Jets ( 2008 ) and Minnesota Vikings ( 2009 – 2010 ).
Favre is the only quarterback in NFL history to throw लिये over 70,000 गज, over 500 touchdowns, over 300 interceptions, over 6,000 completions, and over 10,000 pass attempts.
Favre started at the quarterback स्थिति लिये the विश्वविद्यालयों of दक्षिणी मिसिसिपी लिये चार सालो पहले होने चयनित in the दूसरी गोलाकार of the 1991 NFL Draft by Atlanta ( 33rd overall ).
He was traded to Green Bay on फ़रवरी 10, 1992, लिये the 19th चुनें in the 1992 NFL Draft.
Favre became the Packers ' starting quarterback in the fourth game of the 1992 ऋतु, stepping in लिये घायल क्वार्टरबैक डॉन majkowski, and started every game through the 2007 season.
He was traded to the New York Jets and started at क्वार्टरबैक लिये the 2008 ऋतु पहले हस्ताक्षर साथ the वाइकिंग्स on अगस्त 18, 2009 as their starting quarterback.
He made an एनएफएल रिकार्ड 297 लगातार starts ( 321 including playoffs ).
He is the only player to win the AP Most Valuable खिलाड़ी तीन लगातार टाइम्स ( 1995–97 ).
He has led teams to eight division championships ( 1995, 1996, 1997, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2007, 2009 ), पाँच nfc चैंपियनशिप खेल ( 1995, 1996, 1997, 2007, 2009 ), and two Super Bowl appearances ( Super Bowl XXXI, Super Bowl XXXII ), winning one ( Super Bowl XXXI ).
He holds many NFL records, including most career touchdown passes, most career passing yards, most career pass completions, सबसे करियर pass कोशिशें, सबसे करियर interceptions thrown, सबसे लगातार starts by a खिलाड़ी, सबसे लगातार starts by a क्वार्टरबैक, सबसे करियर victories as a starting quarterback, most sacked, and most fumbles.
He is भी referred to by उसके उपनाम `` The Gunslinger ''.

The World Wide Web ( abbreviated as www or w3, commonly known as the web ), is a system of interlinked hypertext documents accessed via the Internet.
With a web browser, one can view web pages that may contain text, images, वीडियो, और अन्य मल्टीमीडिया, और navigate between उन्हें via hyperlinks.
Using concepts from his earlier hypertext systems like ENQUIRE, British engineer, कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक और at कि समय कर्मचारी of the cern, सर टिम berners-lee, अभी निदेशक of the संसार चौड़ी वेब consortium ( w3c ), wrote a proposal in March 1989 for what would eventually become the World Wide Web.
At CERN, a European research organisation near जेनेवा straddling the किनारा between फ़्रांस और स्विट्ज़रलैंड, berners-lee और belgian कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक रॉबर्ट cailliau प्रस्तावित in 1990 to उपयोग हाइपरटेक्स्ट `` to कड़ी और अभिगम सूचना of विभिन्न kinds as a वेब of nodes in which the user can browse at will '', and they publicly introduced the project in December of the same year.
Wayne Lyman Morse ( October 20, 1900July 22, 1974 ) was a politician and attorney from Oregon, United States, known for his proclivity for opposing उसके पार्टियों ' नेतृत्व, और specifically लिये उसके विपक्ष to the वियतनाम War on constitutional grounds.
Born in Madison, Wisconsin, और शिक्षित at the विश्वविद्यालयों of wisconsin-madison और the विश्वविद्यालयों of मिनेसोटा विधि स्कूल, मोर्स स्थानांतरित to Oregon in 1930 and began teaching at the University of Oregon School of Law.
During World War II he was निर्वाचित to the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट as a रिपब्लिकन ; he became an Independent after Dwight D. Eisenhower 's election to the presidency in 1952.
While an independent, he नियत a रिकार्ड लिये performing the दूसरी longest one-person filibuster in the history of the Senate.
Morse joined the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी in 1955, और थी reelected twice while a member of that party.
Morse बना a ब्रैड चलाएं लिये the लोकतांत्रिक Party 's presidential nomination in 1960.
A few years later, Morse was one of तभी दो सीनेटरों जो opposed the गल्फ of tonkin रेज़ोल्यूशन, which authorized the president to take military action in Vietnam without a declaration of war.
He continued to speak out against the युद्ध in the ensuing सालो, और खोया उसके 1968 बोली लिये reelection to bob packwood, who criticized his strong opposition to the war.
Morse made दो अधिक बोलियों लिये reelection to the Senate before his death in 1974.
In parliamentary procedure, a गति to तालिका रै दो अलग और contradictory meanings:
In the United States, to table usually means the to lay [ the topic ] on the table or to मूव लिये postponement of विचार ; a प्रस्ताव to बर्खास्तगी consideration of a pending motion.
much कम प्रायः, it अर्थात् a गति to `` put on the तालिका '' : a प्रस्ताव to शुरू विचार ( or reconsideration ), a usage consistent with the rest of the English-speaking world.
In the rest of the English-speaking world such as the United Kingdom, to तालिका अर्थात् to मूव to प्लेस [ the टॉपिक ] upon the तालिका ( or to मूव to प्लेस on the तालिका ) : a प्रस्ताव to begin consideration ( or reconsideration ) of a proposal.
Both the American और the अंग्रेजों dialects have the भाव of `` to तालिका '' as to lay [ the टॉपिक ] on the तालिका or to कारण [ the topic ] to lie on the table.
The difference is the idea of what the तालिका is लिये, कि of a शेल्फ बंद to the side, or an active work bench.
The British meaning has the sense of the table as होने an क्रियाशील कार्य बेंच, साथ the टॉपिक होने the बीच of ध्यान, माना और discussed by all until it can be resolved, at which point it is taken off the 'table '.
The American sense is that the table is जैसे कि of a शेल्फ, अभिलेख, or long-term भंडार device, where the topic has been disposed of by sending it to the 'table ' and leaving it there.
खिलौना स्टोरी 3 is a 2010 अमरीकी 3d कंप्यूटर एनिमेटेड comedy-drama prison film, and the third installment in the Toy Story series.
It was produced by Pixar एनिमेशन studios और वितरित by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी तस्वीरें.
निर्देशित by ली unkrich, the फिल्मी थी released विश्वव्यापी इससे जून through October in Disney Digital 3-D, RealD, and IMAX 3D.
खिलौना स्टोरी 3 थी भी the पहला film to be released theatrically with Dolby Surround 7.1 sound.
The screenplay was written by Michael Arndt, जबकि unkrich लिखा the स्टोरी साथ साथ जॉन lasseter और एंड्रयू stanton, respectively director and co-writer of the two first films.
The plot focuses on the toys Woody, Buzz lightyear, और उनके मित्रों dealing साथ an अनिश्चित future as their owner, Andy, prepares to leave for college.
Actors Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Don Rickles, Estelle Harris, John Ratzenberger, Wallace Shawn, Jeff pidgeon, jodi बेंसन, R. ली ermey, जॉन मॉरिस, और लॉरी metcalf reprised उनके voice-over भूमिकाएँ इससे the पिछला films.
Jim varney, जो निभाई slinky श्वान in the पहला दो films, and Joe Ranft, who portrayed Lenny and Wheezy, both died before production began on Toy Story 3.
The role of Slinky Dog was taken over by Blake Clark ( a friend of varney ), जबकि ranft 's वर्ण और विभिन्न अन्य यहूद लिखा आउट of the story.
New characters include प्रदर्शन by ned beatty, टिमोथी डाल्टन, क्रिस्टन schaal, bonnie Hunt, Whoopi Goldberg, Jeff Garlin, Richard Kind, and Michael Keaton.
The feature broke Shrek the Thirds record as the biggest opening दिन उत्तर अमरीकी सकल लिये an एनिमेटेड फिल्मी unadjusted लिये महंगाई, और a बिग खोलने साथ an unadjusted gross of $ 110,307,189.
It is also the highest-grossing opening वीकेंड लिये a पिक्चर्स फिल्मी, as खूब as the highest-grossing खोलने वीकेंड for a film to have opened in the month of June.
This is the highest-grossing film of 2010, दोनो in the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा, और worldwide.
In early August, it became Pixar 's highest-grossing film at the North अमरीकी बक्सा दफ्तर ( surpassing ढूंढना nemo ), और the highest-grossing एनिमेटेड फिल्मी of सब समय विश्वव्यापी ( surpassing shrek 2 ) ; बाद कि month, Toy Story 3 became the first ever animated film in history to make over $ 1 billion worldwide.
It is फिलहाल the 10th-highest-grossing film of all time.
Toy Story 3 was nominated for five Academy पुरस्कार, सहित बेहतरीन चित्र, बेहतरीन adapted पटकथा, and Best Sound Editing.
It was the third animated film ( after Beauty और the जानवर और up ) to be मनोनीत लिये अकादमी पुरस्कार for Best Picture.
It जीती the पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन एनिमेटेड Feature and Best Original Song.
John Levell Starks ( born August 10, 1965 ) is an अमरीकी रिटायर्ड पेशेवर basketball shooting guard.
Starks was सूचीबद्ध at 6'5 '' और 190 पाउंड दौरान his NBA playing career.
Although he was not drafted in the 1988 NBA Draft after attending four कॉलेजों in उसके देशी ओक्लाहोमा, सहित ओक्लाहोमा राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों, he gained कीर्ति जबकि playing लिये the नई यॉर्क knicks of the National Basketball Association in the 1990s.
Secure Digital or ( SD ) is a non-volatile memory कार्ड स्वरूप लिये उपयोग in पोर्टेबल डिवाइस, ऐसे as मोबाईल फोन, डिजिटल कैमरे, GPS navigation devices, and tablet computers.
The Secure डिजिटल मानक is कायम by the sd कार्ड संघ ( SDA ).
SD technologies have been implemented in more than 400 brands आरपार दर्जनों of उत्पाद श्रेणी और अधिक than 8,000 models.
The Secure Digital स्वरूप शामिल चार कार्ड परिवारों उपलब्धियाँ in three different form factors.
The four families are the original Standard-Capacity ( sdsc ), the high-capacity ( sdhc ), the extended-capacity ( sdxc ), और the SDIO, which combines input/output functions with data storage.
The three form factors are the original size, the `` मिनी '' आकार, और the `` सूक्ष्म '' आकार ( देखिए उदाहरण ).
There are many combinations of रूप कारकों and device families.
Electrically passive adapters allow the उपयोग of a छोटी कार्ड in a मेजबान device built to hold a larger card.
Host डिवाइस कि comply साथ नए संस्करण of the specification provide पिछड़ा संगतता and accept older SD cards, but this article explains several factors that can prevent the use of a newer SD card:
A newer card may offer वृहद क्षमता than the मेजबान यंत्र can handle.
A newer card may उपयोग a संचिका प्रणाली the मेजबान device can not navigate.
Use of an sdio कार्ड requires the मेजबान यंत्र be designed लिये the input/output functions the card provides.
The संगठन of the कार्ड थी बदला starting with the SDHC family.
Some vendors produced SDSC cards ऊपर 1 gb पहले the sda था मानकीकृत a विधि of doing so.
The SDA uses several trademarked लोगो to enforce अनुपालन साथ इसके specifications and assure users of compatibility.
ह्यूज जॉन mungo ग्रान्ट ( born 9 September 1960 ) is a British actor and film producer.
He has received a सुनहरी ग्लोब, a bafta, और an मानद César.
His films have earned more than US $ 2.4 अरब इससे 25 नाट्य रिलीज विश्वव्यापी.
Grant हासिल अंतरराष्ट्रीय स्टारडम बाद appearing in रिचर्ड कर्टिस 's successful Four Weddings and a Funeral ( 1994 ).
He used this breakthrough role as a frequent cinematic persona दौरान the 1990s, delivering कॉमिक प्रदर्शन in मुख्यधारा films like Mickey Blue Eyes ( 1999 ) and Notting Hill ( 1999 ).
By the turn of the 21st century, he had established खुद as a अग्रणी man skilled साथ a satirical comic talent.
Grant has expanded his oeuvre with critically acclaimed turns as a cad in Bridget Jones 's डायरी ( 2001 ), परिचय a लड़के ( 2002 ), प्रेम दरअसल ( 2003 ), और अमरीकी dreamz ( 2006 ).
He later played विरूद्ध प्रकार साथ अनेक कैमियो भूमिकाएँ in the epic drama film Cloud Atlas ( 2012 ).
Within the film industry, Grant is cited as an anti-film स्टार जो approaches उसके भूमिकाएँ जैसे a अक्षर कर्ता, और कोशिशें to make his acting appear spontaneous.
Hallmarks of his comic skills include a nonchalant टच of विडंबना / sarcasm और पढ़ाई शारीरिक mannerisms as खूब as उसके precisely-timed संवाद delivery and facial expressions.
The entertainment media 's कवरेज of ग्रान्ट 's जीवन बंद the बिग स्क्रीन रै प्रायः overshadowed his work as a thespian.
He has been vocal about his अनादर लिये the व्यवसायिक of एक्टिंग, और in उसके तिरस्कार towards the culture of celebrity and hostility towards the media.
In a career spanning 30 सालो, ग्रान्ट रै repeatedly claimed कि एक्टिंग is नहीं a सच्चा calling but just a job he fell into.
the हान राजवंश ( ; ) ( 206 bc – 220 ad ) थी an इम्पीरियल राजवंश of चीन, preceded by the Qin Dynasty ( 221–207 BC ) and succeeded by the Three Kingdoms ( 220–280 AD ).
It was founded by the rebel leader Liu Bang, known मरणोपरांत as सम्राट gaozu of Han.
It was briefly interrupted by the xin राजवंश ( 9–23 ad ) of the पूर्व रीजेंट Wang Mang.
This interregnum separates the हान into दो अवधि : the पश्चिमी हान ( 206 bc – 9 ad ) और Eastern Han ( 25–220 AD ).
Spanning over four centuries, the period of the Han Dynasty is माना a सुनहरी आयु in चाइनीज इतिहास.
To this day, चीन 's बहुमत जातीय समूह refers to itself as the `` हान लोगों '' and the Chinese script is referred to as `` Han characters ``.
The Han साम्राज्य थी विभाजित into क्षेत्रों सीधे नियंत्रित by the सेंट्रल सरकारी, ज्ञात as commanderies, and a number of semi-autonomous kingdoms.
These kingdoms धीरे खोया सब vestiges of उनके स्वतंत्रता, विशेषकर following the Rebellion of the Seven States.
The Xiongnu, a nomadic कनफेडरेशन जिससे वर्चस्व the पूर्वी यूरेशियाई स्तान, पराजित the हान army in battle in 200 BC.
Following the defeat, a political marriage alliance was negotiated in जिससे the हान became the de facto अवर partner.
When, despite the treaty, the Xiongnu continued to raid Han borders, Emperor Wu of Han ( r. 141–87 bc ) शुभारम्भ अनेक सैन्य अभियान विरूद्ध them.
The ultimate Han victory in these wars eventually forced the xiongnu to accept vassal औकात as हान tributaries.
These campaigns expanded Han sovereignty into the Tarim Basin of Central एशिया और helped स्थापित the विशाल व्यापार संजाल ज्ञात as the रेशा सड़क, जिससे पहुँचे as दूर as the Mediterranean world.
Han forces managed to divide the Xiongnu into two स्पर्धा राष्ट्र, the दक्षिणी और उत्तरी xiongnu, और मजबूर the उत्तरी xiongnu आरपार the Ili River.
Despite these victories, the territories उत्तर of हान 's सीमायें यहूद जल्दी overrun by the nomadic Xianbei Confederation.
After 92 AD, the राजमहल हिजड़े increasingly शामिल themselves in अदालत राजनीती, engaging in हिंसक शक्ति struggles between the various consort clans of the empresses and empress dowagers, causing the Han 's ultimate downfall.
Imperial authority थी भी seriously challenged by विशाल daoist धार्मिक समाजों जिससे instigated the Yellow Turban Rebellion and the Five Pecks of Rice Rebellion.
Following the death of Emperor Ling ( r. 168–189 AD ), the palace eunuchs suffered wholesale massacre by military officers, allowing सदस्यों of the aristocracy और सैन्य राज्यपालों to become warlords और divide the empire.
When Cao Pi, King of वेई, usurped the सिंहासन इससे सम्राट xian, the Han Dynasty ceased to exist.
The Han Dynasty was an age of economic prosperity and saw a significant विकास of the धन अर्थव्यवस्था पहला स्थापित दौरान the Zhou Dynasty ( c. 1050–256 BC ).
The coinage जारी by the सेंट्रल सरकारी मिंट in 119 BC remained the standard coinage of China until the Tang Dynasty ( 618–907 AD ).
To pay for its military campaigns and the उपनिवेश of newly conquered frontier territories, the government nationalized the private salt and iron industries in 117 BC.
These government monopolies were repealed दौरान the पूर्वी हान काल, और the खोया revenue was recouped through heavily taxing private entrepreneurs.
The सम्राट थी at the शिखर of हान society.
He presided over the Han सरकारी लकिन साझा शक्ति साथ दोनो the धामों और नियुक्त मंत्रियों who came largely from the scholarly gentry class.
From the reign of Emperor Wu onward, the Chinese court officially sponsored Confucianism in education and court politics, synthesized with the cosmology of बाद विद्वानों ऐसे as डांग Zhongshu.
This policy endured until the fall of the Qing राजवंश in 1911 AD.
Science and technology during the Han period saw significant अग्रिम, सहित papermaking, the nautical परिचालन अरित्र, the उपयोग of ऋणात्मक संख्याएँ in mathematics, the raised-relief map, the hydraulic -powered armillary sphere for astronomy, and a seismometer employing an inverted pendulum.
Tourette syndrome ( भी पुकारा tourette 's सिंड्रोम, tourette 's विकार, गाइल्स de la tourette सिंड्रोम, gts or, more commonly, simply Tourette 's or TS ) is an inherited neuropsychiatric disorder with onset in childhood, characterized by multiple physical ( motor ) tics and at least one vocal ( phonic ) tic.
These tics characteristically मोम और wane, can be suppressed temporarily, and are preceded by a premonitory urge.
Tourette 's is defined as part of a spectrum of टिक विकार, जिससे शामिल क्षणिक और chronic tics.
Tourette 's was once considered a rare and विचित्र सिंड्रोम, सबसे प्रायः संबद्ध साथ the मुँह of obscene शब्द or socially अनुचित और अपमानजनक remarks ( coprolalia ), but this symptom is present in only a small minority of people with Tourette 's.
Tourette 's is no longer considered a rare condition, but it is not always correctly पहचाना क्युकी सबसे मामले हैं mild और the गंभीरता of tics decreases for most children as they pass through adolescence.
Between 0.4 % and 3.8 % of children ages 5 to 18 may have Tourette 's ; the व्यापकता of क्षणिक और दीर्घकालिक tics in school-age children is उच्चतर, साथ the अधिक आम tics of नजर blinking, coughing, throat clearing, sniffing, and facial movements.
Extreme Tourette 's in adulthood is a rarity, and tourette 's करता नहीं adversely affect intelligence or life expectancy.
Genetic and environmental factors play a role in the etiology of tourette 's, लकिन the सटीक कल्याणकारी हैं अनजान.
In सबसे मामले, दवा is unnecessary.
There is no प्रभावी उपचार लिये प्रत्येक मामला of tics, लकिन निश्चित medications and therapies can help when their use is warranted.
Education is an महत्वपूर्ण भाग of कोई उपचार योजना, और स्पष्टीकरण and reassurance alone are often sufficient treatment.
Comorbid conditions ( co-occurring diagnoses अन्य than tourette 's ) ऐसे as attention-deficit अतिसक्रियता विकार ( adhd ) और obsessive–compulsive disorder ( OCD ) are present in many patients seen in tertiary specialty clinics.
These other conditions प्रायः कारण अधिक कार्यात्मक पुतलियों to the व्यक्तिगत than the tics कि हैं the hallmark of tourette 's, hence it is important to correctly identify comorbid conditions and treat them.
The eponym was bestowed by Jean-Martin Charcot ( 1825–1893 ) on behalf of his resident, Georges Albert Édouard Brutus गाइल्स de la tourette ( 1859–1904 ), a फ्रेंच चिकित्सक और neurologist, who published an account of nine patients with Tourette 's in 1885.
सनबीम बैज.
Sunbeam was a marque registered by जॉन marston co. ltd of wolverhampton, England, in 1888.
The company first made bicycles, then motorcycles and cars from the लेट 19th सदी जबतक परिचय 1936, और लागू the marque to सब तीन फ़ॉर्म of transportation.
The company also manufactured एयरो इंजन in the पहला संसार War and 647 aircraft during the Second World War.
A Sunbeam was the first British car to win a Grand प्रिक्स रेस, और नियत a क्रमांक of जमीन गति रिकॉर्ड.
The company went into receivership in 1935 and was purchased by the rootes समूह, जिससे जारी to उपयोग the सनबीम marque.
Fox News Channel ( FNC ), also known as Fox News, is a केबल न्यूज चैनल स्वामित्व by the फॉक्स entertainment समूह, a subsidiary of न्यूज Corporation.
As of April 2009, the channel was available to 102 million households in the संयुक्त राज्य और to दर्शक internationally, प्रसारण primarily इससे इसके नई यॉर्क studios.
The channel was created by australian-american मीडिया mogul रुपर्ट मर्डोक, जो नियुक्त पूर्व एनबीसी executive Roger Ailes as its founding CEO.
It launched on October 7, 1996 to 17 लाख केबल subscribers.
It grew during the late 1990s and 2000s to become the प्रबल केबल न्यूज संजाल in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Critics have stated कि फॉक्स न्यूज चैनल promotes रूढ़िवादी political positions and biased reporting.
Commentators, news anchors, and reporters at Fox News Channel have responded that news reporting and political commentary operate independently of प्रत्येक अन्य, और have अस्वीकृत any bias in news reporting.
The mandibular first molar or six-year molar is the tooth located distally ( away from the midline of the face ) from both the mandibular दूसरी premolars of the मुँह लकिन mesial ( toward the midline of the फेस ) इससे दोनो mandibular दूसरी molars.
It is located on the mandibular ( निम्नतर ) मेहराब of the मुँह, और generally opposes the ऊर्ध्वहनु ( अपर ) पहला molars और the ऊर्ध्वहनु 2nd premolar in normal class I occlusion.
The function of this molar is समान to कि of सब molars in लिहाज़ to पीस होने the प्रिंसिपल कार्रवाई दौरान mastication, commonly known as chewing.
There are usually five well-developed cusps on mandibular पहला molars : दो on the buccal ( पक्ष निकटतम the गाल ), दो lingual ( पक्ष निकटतम the tongue ), and one distal.
There are ग्रेट मतभेद between the पतझड़ी ( baby ) mandibular molars and those of the permanent mandibular molars, even though their function are similar.
The permanent mandibular molars हैं नहीं माना to have कोई दांत कि precede it.
Despite being नामित molars, the पतझड़ी molars हैं followed by permanent premolars.
In the universal प्रणाली of संकेतन, the पतझड़ी mandibular पहला molars are designated by a letter written in uppercase.
The right deciduous mandibular first molar is ज्ञात as `` s '', और the बाएँ एक is ज्ञात as `` L ''.
The international notation has a अलग प्रणाली of संकेतन.
Thus, the सही पतझड़ी mandibular पहला molar is ज्ञात as `` 84 '', and the left one is known as `` 74 ''.
In the universal प्रणाली of संकेतन, the स्थाई mandibular पहला molars are designated by a number.
The सही स्थाई mandibular पहला molar is ज्ञात as `` 30 '', and the left one is known as `` 19 ''.
The Palmer notation uses a number in संयोजन साथ a प्रतीक designating in जिससे quadrant the tooth is found.
लिये इस दाँत, the बाएँ और सही पहला molars होता have the वही number, `` 6 '', but the right one would have the symbol, `` ┐ '', over it, while the left one would have, `` ┌ ''.
The international notation has a different numbering system than the previous two, and the right permanent mandibular first molar is ज्ञात as `` 46 '', और the बाएँ एक is ज्ञात as `` 36 ''.
Mandibular प्राथमिक पहला molars प्रायः have four pulp horns.
The first molar is प्रायः the पहला स्थाई tooth to erupt and has adult undertones.
Anatomy : The mandibular first molar has five cusps : the mesiobuccal ( MB, toward midline and cheek ), mesiolingual ( ML, toward midline and tongue ), distolingual ( DL, away from midline and towards जीभ ), distobuccal ( db, दूर इससे midline और toward गाल ), और distal ( d, दूर इससे midline ), सूचीबद्ध in अनुक्रम of अवरोहण आकार.
Listed in order of decreasing height they are : ML, dl, df, mf, और D. an आठवीं cusp थी मिला in a प्राथमिक दूसरी निम्नतर molar in an Argentinean child.
Viewed from the top of the tooth ( occlusal view ), the mandibular first molar is pentagonal ( five sided ) in आकार और tapers toward the lingual, साथ the पहलू होने the buccal सतह, the mesial सतह, the lingual surface, distal surface, and the distobuccal surface.
The occlusal सतह रै four grooves.
The central नाली is नहीं सीधा लकिन रनों bas the बीच of the tooth mesially to distally and contains four pits ( mesial, central, central, and distal ).
The distobuccal groove runs from the distal गड्ढे in the सेंट्रल नाली distobuccally separating the distal and distobuccal cusps.
The lingual groove runs from the more distal of the central pits in the सेंट्रल नाली toward the lingual सतह between the mesiolingual और distolingual cusps.
The buccal नाली रनों इससे the अधिक mesial of the सेंट्रल गड्ढों in the सेंट्रल groove toward the buccal surface between the mesiobuccal and distobuccal cusps ending in the buccal pit.
The portion of the central नाली between the सेंट्रल गड्ढों is termed the लुईस ऑफसेट और is अनिवार्य to खाता लिये the स्थितियाँ of the buccal और lingual डोले ( buccal groove being more mesial than the lingual groove while they are parallel ).
From the buccal ( buccal दृश्य ), two roots are present.
The distal root is generally straighter, although दोनो प्रायः have a पतला distal गोलाई.
The heights of contour on the mesial और distal सम्पर्क the सटा teeth and are located at the junction of the occlusal and middle thirds of the crown.
The Florida Legislature is the two houses कि अधिनियम as the राज्य विधानमंडल of the u.S. राज्य of फ्लोरिडा.
The Florida Constitution states that `` The legislative power of the राज्य shall be vested in a विधानमंडल of the राज्य of फ्लोरिडा, '' रचित of a सीनेट और हाउस of प्रतिनिधि.
The legislature is seated at the फ्लोरिडा राज्य कैपिटल in tallahassee.
stained कांच चित्रण of Daniel interceding with Arioch, the king 's guard.
Arioch had been charged with killing all the हिकमत मेन बाद वे यहूद नहीं समर्थ to interpret nebuchadnezzar 's dream.
Daniel 2 is the दूसरी अध्याय of the किताब of Daniel in the Hebrew Bible.
The अध्याय 's सोर्स टेक्स्ट is predominantly written in Aramaic.
According to the text, nebuchadnezzar is the किंग of बाबुल जो is troubled by his dreams.
He मांगे an निर्वचन लिये उसके dreams or will have his mystic interpreters executed.
Daniel seeks दैवी अक्ल to interpret the किंग 's सपनो और गुणगान God with a short psalm.
God देता डेनियल a दृष्टि in the night to reveal the king 's dream.
Able to satisfy the king, Daniel is प्रचारित over the पूरे प्रांत of Babylon.
One comcast बीच, the मुख्यालय of Comcast in Philadelphia, PA.
The बूढ़ा comcast लोगो इससे 1969 to 1999, जब it थी replaced with the crescent logo.
The Comcast Corporation is an American provider of entertainment, सूचना और संचार उत्पाद और services.
It is the largest cable operator, one of the biggest mass media, घर अंतरजाल सेवा प्रदाता, और तीसरा largest घर टेलीफोन सेवा प्रदाता in the संयुक्त राज्य, providing केबल टेलीविज़न, ब्रॉडबैंड अंतरजाल, टेलीफोन सेवा and in some areas home security ( including burglar alarms, surveillance cameras, fire alarm systems and home automation ) to both residential and commercial customers in 40 states and the District of Columbia.
The company is headquartered in फिलाडेल्फिया, Pennsylvania.
In 2011, Comcast acquired a 51 % majority stake in media conglomerate NBCUniversal from GE in January 2011, and began the प्रक्रम of खरीदना the बाकी 49 % on फ़रवरी 12, 2013, at a लागत of $ 16.7 billion.
It completed the purchase on कूच 19, 2013.
Comcast also has significant पकड़कर in अनेक केबल संजाल ( including E !
Entertainment टेलीविज़न, स्टाइल संजाल, g4, the गोल्फ़ चैनल और NBC Sports Network ), distribution ( ThePlatform ), and related businesses.
Comcast has been the subject of criticism for activities including its stance on net neutrality, as खूब as ग़रीब परिणाम on ग्राहक संतोष surveys.
Porcupines हैं rodents साथ a कोट of शार्प कांटे, or quills, that defend and camouflage them from predators.
They are indigenous to the Americas, दक्षिणी एशिया, और अफ़्रीकी.
Porcupines are the तीसरा largest of the rodents, पीछे the capybara and the beaver.
Most porcupines हैं परिचय long, साथ an long tail.
weighing, वे हैं rounded, large and slow.
Porcupines come in विभिन्न शेड्स of भूरा, धूसर, और the असामान्य white.
Porcupines ' spiny protection resembles that of the unrelated erinaceomorph hedgehogs और monotreme echidnas.
The common साही is a herbivore.
It eats leaves, herbs, टहनियों और ग्रीन पौधे जैसे skunk गोभी and clover and in the winter it may eat bark.
The उत्तर अमरीकी साही प्रायः climbs trees to find food.
The अफ़्रीकी साही is नहीं a climber and forages on the ground.
it is ज़्यादातर nocturnal, लकिन होगा sometimes forage for food in the day.
Porcupines have become a pest in कीनिया और हैं खाया as a कोमलता.
The name साही आता इससे मध्य फ्रेंच porc espin ( spined pig ).
A regional अमरीकी नाम लिये the एनिमल is quill pig.

Elijah J. McCoy ( May 2, 1844 – अक्तूबर 10, 1929 ) थी a ब्लैक canadian-american आविष्कारक और इंजीनियर, जो थी notable for his 57 U.S. patents, most to do with lubrication of steam engines.
Born free in Canada, he returned as a five-year-old चाइल्ड साथ उसके परिवार to the संयुक्त States in 1847, where he lived for the rest of his life and became a US citizen.
Honda FCX स्पष्टता, a हाइड्रोजन ईंधन कोशिका demonstration vehicle introduced in 2008
A hydrogen गाडी is a गाडी कि उपयोग हाइड्रोजन as its onboard fuel for motive power.
Hydrogen वाहनों शामिल हाइड्रोजन fueled स्पेस rockets, as well as automobiles and other transportation vehicles.
The power plants of such vehicles convert the chemical energy of हाइड्रोजन to mechanical उर्जा either by burning हाइड्रोजन in an आतंरिक दहन इंजन, or by reacting hydrogen with oxygen in a fuel cell to run electric motors.
Widespread use of hydrogen for fueling परिवहन is a key element of a proposed hydrogen economy.
Hydrogen fuel does नहीं occur naturally on धरती and thus is not an energy source ; rather it is an energy carrier.
It is most frequently made from methane or other fossil fuels, but it can be produced using स्त्रोत ( ऐसे as हवा, सौर, or नाभिकीय ) कि हैं intermittent, too व्याप्त or too cumbersome to directly propel vehicles.
Integrated wind-to-hydrogen plants, using electrolysis of water, are exploring technologies to उद्धार लागत कम पर्याप्त, और quantities ग्रेट पर्याप्त, to compete with traditional energy sources.
Many companies are working to develop technologies that might efficiently exploit the संभावित of hydrogen energy for mobile uses.
The attraction of using hydrogen as an energy currency is that, if hydrogen is prepared बगैर using चट्टान ईंधन inputs, गाडी नोदन होता नहीं योगदान to कार्बन dioxide emissions.
The drawbacks of hydrogen use are high capital cost, low energy content per unit volume, high tankage weights, very high storage vessel pressures, the storage, transportation and filling of gaseous or liquid hydrogen in वाहनों, the विशाल निवेश in अवसंरचना कि होता be जरूरी to ईंधन वाहनों, और the inefficiency of उत्पादन प्रक्रियाओं.
Sacramento is the पूंजी नगर of the u.S. राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the सीट of सरकारी of Sacramento County.
It is located at the confluence of the Sacramento नदी और the अमरीकी नदी in the उत्तरी portion of कैलिफ़ोर्निया 's expansive Central Valley.
With an estimated 2011 population of 477,891, it is the sixth-largest नगर in California and the 35th largest city in the United States.
Sacramento is the core cultural and economic center of the sacramento महानगर क्षेत्रफल जिससे शामिल सात काउंटी साथ an अनुमानित 2009 population of 2,527,123.
Its metropolitan area is the fourth largest in California after the Greater Los Angeles Area, San Francisco Bay Area, and the San Diego metropolitan क्षेत्रफल, as खूब as the 25th largest in the United States.
Sacramento was cited by समय पत्रिका as अमेरिका 's सबसे ethnically and racially integrated city in 2002.
Sacramento became a city through the प्रयत्न of the स्विस अप्रवासी John Sutter, Sr., his son John Sutter, Jr., and James W. Marshall.
Sacramento grew quickly thanks to the protection of sutter 's फोर्ट, जिससे थी स्थापित by sutter in 1839.
During the California Gold Rush, Sacramento was a प्रमुख वितरण पाइंट, a वाणिज्यिक और agricultural बीच, और a टर्मिनस लिये वैगन रेल, stagecoaches, riverboats, the telegraph, the Pony Express, and the First Transcontinental Railroad.
California State University, Sacramento, more commonly known as Sacramento State or सैक राज्य, is the largest लोकल विश्वविद्यालयों.
It is one of the twenty-three campuses of the कैलिफ़ोर्निया राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों प्रणाली.
Drexel विश्वविद्यालयों sacramento is स्तिथ in Downtown, Sacramento.
University of the प्रशांत 's mcgeorge School of Law is located in the Oak Park neighborhood.
In addition, the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, डेविस is स्तिथ in आसपास डेविस, west of the capital.
The UC Davis चिकित्सा बीच, a world-renowned research hospital, is located in the city of Sacramento.
The Apple Store is a chain of खुदरा स्टोर्स स्वामित्व और संचालित by Apple Inc., dealing in computers and consumer electronics.
The stores sell Macintosh personal computers, software, iPods, ipads, आईफ़ोन, third-party accessories, और अन्य उपभोक्ता electronics such as Apple TV.
Some high profile stores feature a थिएटर लिये प्रस्तुतियों और वर्कशॉप और a स्टुडियो लिये प्रशिक्षण साथ ठहराना उत्पाद ; सब स्टोर्स प्रस्ताव a प्रतिभाशाली बार लिये तकनीकी support and repairs, as well as free workshops available to the public.
Under the leadership of Ron Johnson, the former Senior Vice President of Retail Operations, the Apple Stores have, according to an आलेख in the नई यॉर्क टाइम्स, महरूम जिम्मेदार लिये `` [ turning ] the उबाऊ कंप्यूटर sales floor into a sleek playroom filled with gadgets ''.
, Apple has 405 स्टोर्स विश्वव्यापी, साथ वैश्विक बिक्री of अरब in merchandise in 2011, and they lead the United States retail market in terms of sales per unit area.
Steven Paul `` Steve '' Jobs ( ; February 24, 1955 – October 5, 2011 ) was an American उद्योगों और आविष्कारक, बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the co-founder, अध्यक्ष, and CEO of Apple Inc.
Through Apple, he was widely recognized as a charismatic pioneer of the personal computer revolution and for his influential career in the computer and consumer electronics fields, transforming `` एक उद्योग बाद another, इससे कंप्यूटर और स्मार्टफ़ोन to म्यूज़िक और movies... ''
Jobs also co-founded and served as chief executive of Pixar Animation Studios ; he became a सदस्य of the फलक of निर्देशकों of the वॉल्ट डिज़्नी कम्पनी in 2006, when Disney acquired Pixar.
Jobs was among the first to see the commercial potential of Xerox PARC 's mouse -ड्राइवn आलेखीय उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस, जिससे led to the सृष्टि of the ठहराना लिसा और, एक year later, the Macintosh.
He also played a role in introducing the laserwriter, एक of the पहला widely उपलब्धियाँ लेज़र मुद्रक, to the market.
After a power संघर्ष साथ the फलक of निर्देशकों in 1985, कार्य बाएँ ठहराना and founded NeXT, a computer platform development company specializing in the higher-education and business markets.
In 1986, he acquired the कंप्यूटर ग्राफिक्स प्रभाग of लुकासफ़िल्म, जिससे थी spun off as Pixar.
he थी credited in खिलौना स्टोरी ( 1995 ) as an executive producer.
he परोसा as सीईओ और बहुमत shareholder until Disney 's purchase of Pixar in 2006.
In 1996, बाद ठहराना था विफल to उद्धार इसके ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली, copland, Gil Amelio turned to NeXT Computer, and the NeXTSTEP platform became the foundation for the Mac OS X.
Jobs returned to ठहराना as an सलाहकार, और took कंट्रोल of the company as an interim CEO.
Jobs brought ठहराना इससे निकट bankruptcy to profitability by 1998.
As the new CEO of the company, Jobs oversaw the development of the iMac, iTunes, iPod, iPhone, and iPad, and on the सेवाएं पक्ष, the कम्पनी 's ठहराना खुदरा स्टोर्स, itunes स्टोर और the app स्टोर.
The success of these products and services provided several years of stable financial returns, और propelled ठहराना to become the संसार 's सबसे मूल्यवान सरेआम traded company in 2011.
The reinvigoration of the कम्पनी is regarded by अनेक टीकाकारों as one of the greatest turnarounds in business history.
In 2003, Jobs was diagnosed साथ a अग्न्याशय neuroendocrine tumor.
हालांकि it थी initially treated, he reported a हार्मोन असंतुलन, underwent a जिगर प्रत्यारोपण in 2009, and appeared progressively thinner as his health declined.
On medical leave for most of 2011, Jobs resigned in August कि साल, और थी निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष of the फलक.
He died of respiratory arrest related to his metastatic ट्यूमर on अक्तूबर 5, 2011.
Jobs received a number of honors and public मान्यता लिये उसके influence in the प्रौद्योगिकी और म्यूज़िक industries.
He रै महरूम referred to as `` legendary '', a `` futurist '' or simply `` visionary '', and has been described as the `` Father of the Digital Revolution '', a `` master of innovation '', and a `` design perfectionist ''.

Roman numerals, the numeric system in ancient Rome, uses combinations of अक्षर इससे the लैटिन वर्णमाला to signify मान.
the संख्याएँ 1 to 10 can be expressed in Roman numerals as follows:
और.
The रोमन numeral प्रणाली is a cousin of Etruscan numerals.
Use of रोमन numerals जारी बाद the मनाही of the Roman Empire.
From the 14th century on, Roman numerals began to be replaced in most contexts by more सुविधाजनक hindu-arabic numerals ; however इस प्रक्रम थी क्रमिक, और the उपयोग of रोमन numerals in कुछ minor applications continues to this day.
Effective नाभिकीय चार्ज Diagram
The effective nuclear charge ( often symbolize as or Z* ) is the जाल धनात्मक चार्ज अनुभवी by an electron in a multi-electron atom.
The term `` प्रभावी '' is प्रयुक्त क्युकी the shielding प्रभाव of negatively चार्ज electrons रोकता higher orbital electrons from experiencing the full nuclear charge by the repelling effect of inner-layer electrons.
The effective nuclear charge अनुभवी by the बाहरी शेल electron is also called the core charge.
It is possible to determine the strength of the नाभिकीय चार्ज by looking at the oxidation number of the atom.
