The Dwight D. आइज़नहावर नेशनल प्रणाली of अंतरराज्यीय और रक्षा राजमार्गों ( commonly ज्ञात as the Interstate Highway System, Interstate Freeway System, Interstate System, or simply the Interstate ) is a network of freeways that forms a part of the National Highway System of the United States.
The system is named for President Dwight D. आइज़नहावर, जो championed इसके गठन.
Construction was authorized by the संघीय सहायता राजमार्ग अधिनियम of 1956, और the असली portion was completed 35 years later.
The network has since been extended, and, it था a कुल लंबाई of, बनाना it the संसार 's दूसरी longest बाद चीन 's., परिचय one-quarter of सब गाडी मील चलित in the country use the Interstate system.
The cost of construction has been estimated at $ 425 billion ( in 2006 डॉलर ), बनाना it the `` largest पब्लिक works program since the Pyramids ``.
The system has contributed in shaping the United States into a world आर्थिक महाशक्ति और a अत्यधिक industrialized nation.
.eu is the country code top-level डोमेन ( cctld ) लिये the यूरोपीय Union ( EU ).
Launched on 7 December 2005, the domain is available लिये संगठनों in और निवासियों of eu member states.
The TLD is administered by EURid, a consortium originally consisting of the नेशनल cctld रजिस्ट्री ऑपरेटर of बेल्जियम, स्वीडन, and Italy, joined later by the national registry operator of the Czech Republic.
ट्रेडमार्क स्वामी यहूद समर्थ to submit पंजीकरण through a sunrise period, in an effort to prevent cybersquatting.
Full पंजीकरण प्रारंभ on 7 अप्रैल 2006.
Meister means master in German ( as in निपुण craftsman, or as an honorific शीर्षक such as Meister Eckhart ).
the शब्द is akin to maestro.
In sports, Meister is प्रयुक्त लिये the वर्तमान नेशनल, यूरोपीय or संसार चैंपियन ( deutscher Meister, *Europameister, Weltmeister ).
Many modern day जर्मनी पुलिस शक्तियां उपयोग the शीर्षक Meister.
During the Second World War, Meister was the उच्चतम आयोजिक रैंक of the ordnungspolizei.
meister रै महरूम उधार into अंग्रेज़ी slang, where it is used in compound nouns.
A person referred to as “Meister” is one who has extensive theoretical knowledge and व्यावहारिक कौशल in उसके व्यवसायिक, कारोबार, or कुछ अन्य दयालु of work or activity.
For example, a “puzzle-meister” होता be किसी highly skilled at solving puzzles.
These neologisms sometimes have a sarcastic intent ( for example, “stubble-meister” for किसी साथ a छोटी, neat दाढ़ी or “crier-meister” लिये किसी जो प्रायः cries ).
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers is an American live-action children 's television series about teenagers साथ super-powers, आधारित on the 16th किश्त of the जापानी सुपर sentai मताधिकार, kyōryū sentai Zyuranger.
Both the show and its सम्बन्धित merchandise देखी unbridled overnight कामयाबी, बनने a staple of 1990s pop culture in mere months.
Under the original name, `` Mighty Morphin Power Rangers '' the series ran from 1993 to 1995 और शाखित the विशेषता फिल्मी mighty morphin शक्ति रेंजरों : the फिल्म.
The second and third seasons of the show drew on footage and तत्व इससे the सुपर sentai श्रेणी gosei sentai dairanger और निंजा sentai kakuranger क्रमशः, though the Zyuranger costumes were still used for the five main Rangers and several regular villains.
Only the mecha and the Kiba Ranger costume ( worn by the White Ranger ) were retained from dairanger लिये the दूसरी ऋतु, जबकि तभी the mecha इससे kakuranger यहूद प्रदर्शित in the third season.
However the Kakuranger वेशभूषा यहूद बाद प्रयुक्त लिये the शीर्षक वर्ण of the mini-series, Mighty Morphin Alien Rangers.
The series was produced by MMPR Productions, वितरित by saban entertainment, और aired on Fox Kids.
the दिखाएँ 's merchandise थी उत्पादित और distributed by Bandai Entertainment.
In 1996, the series was rebranded as the Power Rangers franchise ; renaming the श्रेणी प्रत्येक साल बाद, और using वेशभूषा, प्रॉप्स, और फुटेज इससे subsequent Super Sentai series, as well as changing the cast and storyline.
While an overarching storyline would continue जबतक शक्ति रेंजरों खोया आकाशगंगा, subsequent श्रेणी बाद MMPR are not sequels or spin-offs in the traditional sense.
In 2010, a re-version of Mighty Morphin Power रेंजरों, साथ a नई लोगो, कॉमिक book-referenced ग्राफिक्स, और अतिरिक्त वैकल्पिक special effects, was broadcast on ABC Kids, and Bandai produced brand new toys to coincide with the series.
Edgar Allan Poe ( born Edgar Poe ; January 19, 1809 – October 7, 1849 ) थी an अमरीकी लेखक, कवि, एडिटर और साहित्यिक critic, considered part of the American Romantic Movement.
Best known for his tales of mystery and the macabre, Poe was one of the earliest अमरीकी practitioners of the छोटी स्टोरी और is generally considered the inventor of the detective fiction genre.
He is further credited with contributing to the emerging genre of science fiction.
He was the first well-known American writer to try to earn a living through writing अलोन, resulting in a financially मुश्किल जीवन और करियर.
He was born as Edgar Poe in Boston, Massachusetts ; he was orphaned यंग जब उसके माँ died shortly बाद उसके पिता abandoned the परिवार.
पो थी लिया in by जॉन और frances Allan, of Richmond, Virginia, but they never formally adopted him.
He attended the विश्वविद्यालयों of वर्जिनिया लिये एक semester but left due to lack of money.
After enlisting in the Army and later failing as an अधिकारी 's cadet at वेस्ट पाइंट, पो parted ways with the Allans.
His publishing career began humbly, साथ an बेनाम संग्रहण of कविताएं, tamerlane and Other Poems ( 1827 ), credited only to `` a Bostonian ''.
Poe switched उसके फ़ोकस to गद्य और खर्च the अगला अनेक सालो working लिये साहित्यिक जर्नल्स और periodicals, becoming known for his own style of literary criticism.
His work forced उसे to मूव among अनेक शहरों, सहित बाल्टीमोर, Philadelphia, and New York City.
In Baltimore in 1835, he शादीशुदा वर्जिनिया clemm, उसके 13-year-old cousin.
In January 1845 Poe प्रकाशित उसके कविता, `` the रेवेन ``, to तत्काल success.
His wife died of तपेदिक दो years after its publication.
He began planning to produce his own journal, The Penn ( later renamed The स्टाइलस ), हालांकि he died पहले it could be उत्पादित.
On October 7, 1849, at age 40, Poe died in बाल्टीमोर ; the कारण of उसके मौत is अनजान और रै been variously attributed to alcohol, brain congestion, cholera, drugs, heart disease, rabies, suicide, tuberculosis, and other agents.
Poe and his works influenced literature in the United राज्य और around the संसार, as खूब as in specialized फ़ील्ड, ऐसे as cosmology and cryptography.
Poe and his work appear throughout लोकप्रिय संस्कृति in साहित्य, music, films, and television.
A क्रमांक of उसके घरों हैं समर्पित museums today.
The Mystery Writers of America present an सालाना पुरस्कार ज्ञात as the एडगर पुरस्कार लिये विशिष्ट work in the mystery genre.
Lions are obligate carnivores ; वे आवश्यकता up to सात गामा ( 15 lbs ) of meat per day.
A major component of their diet is the flesh of विशाल स्तनधारियों, जैसे इस African buffalo.
A carnivore ( ) meaning 'meat eater ' ( Latin, caro अर्थ 'meat ' or 'flesh ' और vorare अर्थ 'to devour ' ) is an सजीव that derives its energy and nutrient requirements from a diet consisting mainly or exclusively of animal tissue, whether through predation or scavenging.
Animals that depend solely on एनिमल flesh लिये उनके nutrient आवश्यकताएँ हैं माना carnivores जबकि those that also consume non-animal food are considered carnivores.
Omnivores also consume both एनिमल और non-animal खाना, और अलावा इससे the अधिक सामान्य परिभाषा, वहीँ is no clearly पारिभाषित अनुपात of संयंत्र to एनिमल सामग्री कि would distinguish a facultative carnivore from an omnivore.
A carnivore कि sits at the शीर्ष of the foodchain is an apex predator.
Plants that capture and डाइजेस्ट कीट हैं पुकारा मांसाहारी plants.
Similarly, fungi that capture microscopic पशु हैं प्रायः पुकारा मांसाहारी fungi.
The FIFA World Cup, often simply the World Cup, is an international association football competition contested by the senior men 's national टीमों of the सदस्यों of fédération internationale de फ़ुटबॉल संघ ( फीफा ), the sport 's global governing body.
The championship has been awarded every four years चूंकि the inaugural टूर्नामेंट in 1930, मगर in 1942 और 1946 जब it was not held because of the Second World War.
the वर्तमान champions हैं स्पेन, जो won the 2010 tournament.
The current format of the टूर्नामेंट involves 32 टीमों स्पर्धा लिये the शीर्षक at venues भीतर the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ) over a काल of परिचय a माह ; इस phase is प्रायः called the World Cup Finals.
A qualification phase, which currently takes place over the preceding तीन सालो, is प्रयुक्त to determine जिससे teams qualify for the tournament together with the host nation ( s ).
The 19 World Cup tournaments have been won by eight अलग नेशनल टीमों.
Brazil have won five times, and they हैं the तभी टोली to have निभाई in every tournament.
The other World Cup winners are Italy, with four titles ; जर्मनी, साथ तीन शीर्षक ; अर्जेंटीना और inaugural विजेता उरुग्वे, साथ दो शीर्षक प्रत्येक ; और इंग्लैण्ड, फ़्रांस, and Spain, with one title each.
the संसार कप is the संसार 's सबसे widely viewed sporting इवेंट ; an अनुमानित 715.1 million people watched the final match of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany.
The अगला तीन संसार cups होगा be hosted by Brazil in 2014, Russia in 2018, and Qatar in 2022.
नायक is an अमरीकी विज्ञान fiction टेलीविज़न नाटक श्रेणी निर्मित by टिम क्रिंग कि appeared on NBC for four seasons from September 25, 2006 through February 8, 2010.
The series tells the कहानियां of ordinary लोगों जो discover superhuman abilities, और how these abilities take effect in the characters ' lives.
The series emulates the aesthetic style and storytelling of American comic books, using multi-episode story arcs कि निर्माण upon a larger, अधिक encompassing चाप.
The series was produced by Tailwind प्रोडक्शन्स in संघ साथ सार्वभौमिक मीडिया Studios.
It was फिल्माया primarily in लॉस Angeles, California.
Four पूरा सीज़न aired, समाप्ति on February 8, 2010.
The critically acclaimed first season had a run of 23 episodes and garnered an average of 14.3 लाख दर्शक in the संयुक्त राज्य, receiving the उच्चतम दरजा लिये an एनबीसी नाटक प्रीमियर in five years.
The second season of Heroes attracted an औसत of 13.1 लाख दर्शक in the u.S., और चिह्नित एनबीसी 's एकमात्र श्रेणी among the top 20 ranked programs in total viewership for the 2007–2008 season.
नायक रै अर्जित a क्रमांक of पुरस्कार और nominations, सहित प्राइमटाइम एमी पुरस्कार, Golden Globes, People 's Choice Awards and British Academy Television Awards.
An ऑनलाइन एक्सटेंशन of the श्रेणी, नायक 360 अनुभव, बाद rebranded as नायक evolutions, was created to explore the Heroes universe and provides insight into the show 's mythology.
Other official Heroes media include magazines, action figures, tie-in and interactive websites, a मोबाईल खेल, a अनोखा, कपडे और अन्य merchandise.
In the fall of 2008, एनबीसी डिजिटल entertainment released a श्रेणी of ऑनलाइन सामग्री लिये the गर्मियाँ, सहित more original web content, wireless iTV interactivity, graphic novels available for mobile viewing and webisodes.
एनबीसी घोषित नायक रद्दीकरण on May 14, 2010.
Afterward, the network considered बनाना a टेलीविज़न खास इवेंट to conclude the श्रेणी ; however, on सितंबर 9, 2010, NBC announced the decision to stop any further development of the Heroes franchise.
Tim Kring then suggested that the व्यापक आधार of नायक storylines अनुमत लिये the मताधिकार to return for fans, but he did not specify when or in what media format.
On April 17, 2013, tv लकीर reported कि MSN was in talks to revive the series with a new cast.
John pierpont `` J. P. ''
Morgan ( अप्रैल 17, 1837 – कूच 31, 1913 ) थी an अमरीकी फाइनेंसर, banker, philanthropist and art collector who dominated corporate finance and industrial consolidation during his time.
In 1892 मॉर्गन arranged the विलय of एडिसन General Electric and Thomson-Houston Electric Company to form General Electric.
After financing the creation of the Federal Steel Company, he merged in 1901 with the Carnegie स्टील कम्पनी और अनेक अन्य स्टील और आयरन व्यवसायों, सहित संचित स्टील और तार कम्पनी स्वामित्व by विलियम Edenborn, to form the United States Steel Corporation.
Morgan died in रोम, इटली, in उसके नींद in 1913 at the आयु of 75, leaving उसके सौभाग्य and business to his son, John Pierpont `` Jack '' Morgan, Jr., and bequeathing his mansion and large book collections to The Morgan Library & Museum in New York.
at the ऊँचाई of मॉर्गन 's करियर दौरान the early 1900s, he and his partners had financial investments in many large corporations and were accused by critics of controlling the nation 's high finance.
He directed the बैंकिंग गठबन्धन कि रोका the Panic of 1907.
He was the leading financier of the Progressive Era, and his समर्पण to दक्षता और modernization helped रूपांतरण अमरीकी business.
This is a list of एपीसोड of the टेलीविज़न series.
the एपीसोड यहूद निर्देशित by शिगेरू ueda और उत्पादित by the Yggdrasil Executive Committee which included Xebec and Genco.
The plot of the episodes is set in Tokyo and घूमती around रिन asōgi, an अमर निजी अन्वेषक, as वो explores the रहस्य of आधुनिक और near-future संसार और the supernatural events that surround the fictional society of immortals like herself.
There हैं विशाल समय गैप in the आतंरिक कालक्रम between the पहला पाँच episodes, ranging from one to thirty years.
The six एपीसोड यहूद ब्रॉडकास्ट मासिक on at-x चैनल in Japan, between February 3 and July 6, 2008.
Each एपीसोड is 45 मिनट्स long.
दो टुकड़े of थीम म्यूज़िक हैं प्रयुक्त लिये the एपीसोड : the खोलने theme `` Alsatia '' and the ending theme `` Cause Disarray ''.
Both were composed और performed by the जापानी मेटल बैंड galneryus.
The series was produced to commemorate the tenth anniversary of the at-x संजाल it originally aired on.
Aerial photo of FLETC, जहाँ us डिजिटल forensics मानकों यहूद विकसित in the 1980s and '90s
Digital forensics ( sometimes known as digital forensic science ) is a शाखा of forensic विज्ञान encompassing the रिकवरी और छानबीन of सामग्री मिला in digital devices, often in relation to computer crime.
The term digital forensics was originally used as a synonym for computer forensics but रै विस्तारित to कवर छानबीन of सब डिवाइस सक्षम of storing डिजिटल आंकड़ा.
With roots in the personal computing revolution of the लेट 1970s और जल्दी '80s, the अनुशासन विकसित in a haphazard manner दौरान the 1990s, और it थी नहीं जबतक the जल्दी 21st century that national policies emerged.
Digital forensics investigations have a किस्में of applications.
The most common is to support or refute a परिकल्पना पहले दण्ड or सिविल ( as भाग of the electronic discovery process ) courts.
Forensics may also विशेषता in the निजी सेक्टर ; ऐसे as दौरान आतंरिक corporate investigations or intrusion investigation ( a specialist probe into the nature and extent of an unauthorized network intrusion ).
The technical aspect of an investigation is divided into several sub-branches, relating to the type of digital devices involved ; कंप्यूटर forensics, संजाल forensics, forensic आंकड़ा विश्लेषण और मोबाईल device forensics.
The typical forensic प्रक्रम encompasses the seizure, forensic इमेजिंग ( अधिग्रहण ) और विश्लेषण of digital media and the production of a report into collected evidence.
As well as identifying direct evidence of a crime, digital forensics can be प्रयुक्त to विशेषता प्रमाण to विशिष्ट संदिग्धों, confirm alibis or कथन, determine intent, पहचानो sources ( for example, in copyright cases ), or authenticate documents.
Investigations are much broader in scope than other areas of forensic analysis ( where the usual aim is to provide जवाब to a श्रेणी of simpler सवाल ) प्रायः involving जटिल time-lines or hypotheses.
A comparison of the chromaticities enclosed by कुछ रंग स्पेसेस.
A color model is an abstract mathematical model describing the way colors can be represented as tuples of संख्याएँ, typically as तीन or चार मान or रंग components ( e.g. आरजीबी और cmyk हैं रंग मॉडल ).
However, a color model with no associated mapping function to an absolute color space is a more or less मनमानी रंग प्रणाली साथ no कनेक्शन to कोई globally समझा प्रणाली of रंग interpretation.
adding a निश्चित मानचित्रण फलन between the रंग मॉडल और a निश्चित सन्दर्भ color space results in a definite `` footprint '' within the reference color space.
This `` footprint '' is known as a gamut, and, in संयोजन साथ the रंग मॉडल, defines a नई रंग स्पेस.
For example, Adobe आरजीबी और srgb हैं दो अलग निरपेक्ष रंग spaces, both based on the RGB model.
In the सबसे जेनेरिक भाव of the परिभाषा ऊपर, रंग स्पेसेस can be defined without the use of a color model.
These spaces, such as Pantone, are in effect a given set of names or numbers which are defined by the अस्तित्व of a सम्बन्धित नियत of शारीरिक रंग swatches.
This article focuses on the गणितीय मॉडल concept.
मजदूर दिन is an अमरीकी संघीय अवकाश observed on the पहला सोमवार in September, that celebrates the economic and social contributions of workers.
Life insurance is a contract between an insured ( insurance policy holder ) and an insurer, जहाँ the insurer वादे to अदा a designated लाभार्थी a योग of धन ( the `` benefits '' ) upon the death of the insured person.
Depending on the contract, other कार्यक्रम ऐसे as टर्मिनल बीमारी or नाजुक illness may also trigger payment.
The नीति होल्डर typically pays a प्रीमियम, either regularly or as a lump sum.
Other expenses ( such as अंत्येष्टि खर्च ) हैं भी sometimes शामिल in the benefits.
Life नीतियों हैं विधिक अनुबंध और the शर्तें of the अनुबंध describe the limitations of the insured events.
Specific exclusions are often written into the अनुबंध to सीमा the देयता of the insurer ; आम उदाहरण हैं दावा relating to आत्महत्या, धोखाधड़ी, युद्ध, riot and civil commotion.
Life-based अनुबंध tend to पतन into two major categories:
Protection policies – designed to provide a लाभ in the इवेंट of निर्दिष्ट इवेंट, typically a lump योग भुगतान.
A common form of this डिज़ाइन is पद बीमे.
Investment policies – where the main उद्देश्य is to सुकर the विकास of पूंजी by नियमित or single premiums.
Common forms ( in the us ) हैं पूरे जीवन, सार्वभौमिक life and variable life policies.

Mitzi Gaynor Donahue ( born May 2, 1962 in Yorba Linda, Orange County, कैलिफ़ोर्निया ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री, भी credited and more popularly known as Mitzi Kapture.
Kapture began her career in films, सबसे of जिससे यहूद not huge commercial successes.
She went on to make a few television अतिथि दिखावे ( macgyver, 1st & टेन, और as a प्रतियोगी on the $ 100,000 पिरामिड ) पहले वो gained अंतरराष्ट्रीय exposure with her first major television role as Sergeant Rita Lee Lance in the television series Silk Stalkings.
Kapture 's role as Rita, the अन्य हाफ of the दो `` sams '' लिये almost 5 years, cemented her popularity.
Paired with Rob Estes who निभाई सार्जेंट क्रिस lorenzo, kapture gained वैश्विक मान्यता along with her costar since the show was broadcast in several countries.
Sergeant Lance eventually became Lieutenant तलवार by the समय kapture बाएँ the series in 1995 to have her first child Madison.
During her time with the series, kapture briefly सत in the निदेशक 's कुर्सी, लिये दो episodes.
She was interviewed लिये the रेशा stalkings ऋतु 1 DVD which was distributed by Anchor Bay Entertainment and released in September 2004.
After a छोटी अंतराल इससे the स्क्रीन following उसके निकास इससे रेशा stalkings, Kapture returned in 1997 to the small screen and USA Network.
She played lead roles in two USA तस्वीरें मूल telemovies, पूर्ण अपराधों ( आधारित on a सच्चा story, also called Hide and Seek : The Joanne Jensen Story ), which also starred Jasmine Guy and His Bodyguard.
She later स्ट्रक्चर in a few अन्य स्वतंत्र फिल्मी प्रोजेक्ट और थिएटर productions and had several television guest appearances.
kapture भी था a पुनरावर्ती भूमिका on बेवाच as Alexis Ryker.
She played Anita Hodges on The यंग और the बेचैन इससे 2002 through 2004, जहाँ वो थी credited as mitzi kapture donahue, और स्ट्रक्चर in the made-for-tv movie Night of Terror which premiered March 26, 2006 on Lifetime Network.
Her latest is a supporting भूमिका in परमेश्वर 's Ears, released in 2007.
Kapture is the आधिकारिक हस्ती प्रवक्ता लिये the xeroderma Pigmentosum Society.
The Xbox 360 is the दूसरी वीडियो खेल कंसोल विकसित by और उत्पादित लिये Microsoft and the successor to the Xbox.
The Xbox 360 competes साथ सोनी 's प्लेस्टेशन 3 और निन्टेंडो 's Wii as part of the seventh generation of video game consoles.
As of September 30, 2012, 70 लाख एक्सबॉक्स 360 consoles have महरूम sold worldwide.
The Xbox 360 was officially unveiled on MTV on May 12, 2005, with detailed launch and game सूचना divulged बाद कि माह at the इलेक्ट्रॉनिक entertainment एक्सपो ( e3 ).
The console बेची आउट completely upon रिलीज in all regions except in Japan.
Several major features of the Xbox 360 are its integrated Xbox Live service कि allows खिलाड़ी to compete ऑनलाइन ; डाउनलोड आर्केड खेल, खेल demos, trailers, tv shows, म्यूज़िक and movies ; and its Windows Media Center multimedia capabilities.
The Xbox Live also offers access to विभिन्न ( प्रायः region-specific ) third-party मीडिया streaming applications.
At their E3 presentation on June 14, 2010, microsoft घोषित a redesigned एक्सबॉक्स 360 कि would ship on the same day.
The redesigned console is slimmer than the previous Xbox 360 model and features एकीकृत 802.11 b/g/n wi-fi, toslink s/pdif ऑप्टिकल ऑडियो आउटपुट, पाँच usb 2.0 पोर्ट ( compared to the three from older versions ) and a special AUX port.
Older models of the Xbox 360 have चूंकि महरूम discontinued.
The first new console to be released features a 250 GB hard drive, while a later, कम महंगी sku सुविधाएँ 4 gb आतंरिक भंडार.
backpack may भी refer to a 2001 novel by Emily Barr
A आधुनिक backpack
स्विस फौज backpack ca. 1960
एकीकृत bearer frame.
A backpack ( also called rucksack, knapsack, packsack, पैक ) is, in इसके सरलतम रूप, a cloth बोरी carried on एक 's वापस और secured साथ दो straps that go over the shoulders, but there can be exceptions.
Lightweight types of backpacks हैं sometimes worn on तभी एक shoulder strap.
Backpacks are often preferred to handbags for carrying heavy loads or carrying any sort of equipment, because of the सीमित क्षमता to carry भारी weights लिये long periods of time in the hands.
Large backpacks, used to carry loads over 10 kg ( 22 पाउंड ), प्रायः offload the largest भाग ( up to परिचय 90 % ) of उनके वज़न onto padded हिप बेल्ट, leaving the shoulder straps mainly for stabilising the load.
This improves the potential to carry heavy loads, as the कूल्हों हैं stronger than the कन्धों, और भी increases चपलता और संतुलन, चूंकि the लोड rides nearer the wearer 's own center of mass.
In ancient times, the backpack थी प्रयुक्त as a अर्थात् to carry the hunter 's larger game and other types of prey and as a way of easier transport for other materials.
In the cases of larger hunts, the hunters would dismember उनके शिकार और वितरित the टुकड़े of the एनिमल around, प्रत्येक one packing the meat into many wrappings and then into bags which they placed on to their backs.
The bag itself was made up of different animal hide and skin ( depending on what sorts of animals were in the area ) and sewn साथ by the आंतों of कहा पशु, जिससे यहूद woven साथ tightly to मेक a sturdy thread-like material.
मैक्सिको ( ; ; ), officially the संयुक्त मैक्सिकन राज्य ( ), is a federal constitutional republic in North America.
It is bordered on the उत्तर by the संयुक्त राज्य ; on the दक्षिण और वेस्ट by the प्रशांत Ocean ; on the southeast by Guatemala, Belize, and the Caribbean Sea ; and on the east by the Gulf of Mexico.
Covering almost two million square किलोमीटर ( over 760,000 sq mi ), मैक्सिको is the पांचवां largest देश in the americas by कुल क्षेत्रफल और the 13th largest स्वतंत्र nation in the world.
With an अनुमानित जनसांख्यिकी of over 113 लाख, it is the world 's eleventh most populous country and the most populous Spanish-speaking country.
Mexico is a संघ comprising thirty-one राज्य और a Federal District, the capital city.
In pre-Columbian Mexico अनेक संस्कृतियों matured into उन्नत सभ्यताओं ऐसे as the olmec, the toltec, the Teotihuacan, the Zapotec, the Maya and the Aztec before first contact with Europeans.
In 1521, Spain conquered and colonized the territory इससे इसके आधार in méxico-tenochtitlan, जिससे थी administered as the Viceroyalty of New Spain.
This territory would eventually become Mexico following मान्यता of the उपनिवेश 's स्वतंत्रता in 1821.
The post-independence काल थी characterized by आर्थिक अस्थिरता, the mexican-american युद्ध और territorial cession to the United States, a civil war, two empires and a domestic dictatorship.
The latter led to the मैक्सिकन क्रान्ति in 1910, जिससे culminated with the promulgation of the 1917 Constitution and the emergence of the country 's current political system.
Elections held in July 2000 marked the first time that an opposition party जीती the प्रेसिडेंसी इससे the संस्थागत Revolutionary Party.
Since 2006 the country has been in the midst of a ड्रग युद्ध जिससे रै caused 60,000 deaths.
Mexico has one of the world 's largest economies, और is माना दोनो a क्षेत्रीय शक्ति and middle power.
In addition, मैक्सिको थी the पहला लैटिन अमरीकी सदस्य of the संगठन for Economic Co-operation and Development OECD ( since 1994 ), and considered an upper-middle income country by the World Bank.
Mexico is माना a newly industrialized देश and an emerging power.
It has the fourteenth largest नाममात्र जीडीपी और the eleventh largest GDP by purchasing power parity.
The economy is strongly linked to those of इसके उत्तर अमरीकी फ़्री Trade Agreement ( NAFTA ) partners, especially the United States of America.
Mexico ranks छठे in the संसार और पहला in the americas by क्रमांक of युनेस्को संसार विरासत साइट साथ 31, and in 2007 was the tenth most visited country in the world with 21.4 million international arrivals per year.
Babe रुथ holds the एमएलबी करियर slugging प्रतिशत record (.690 ).
In baseball statistics, slugging प्रतिशत ( abbreviated slg ) is a लोकप्रिय माप of the शक्ति of a hitter.
It is गणना as कुल bases divided by at bats :
where AB is the number of at-bats for a दिए खिलाड़ी, और 1b, 2b, 3b, और hr हैं the number of singles, doubles, triples, and home runs, respectively.
Walks are specifically excluded इससे इस गणना.
For example, in 1920, Babe रुथ निभाई उसके पहला ऋतु लिये the New York Yankees.
In 458 at bats, Ruth had 172 hits, comprising 73 singles, 36 युगल, 9 तिगुना, और 54 घर रनों, जिससे brings the कुल आधार गिनती to ( 73 × 1 ) + ( 36 × 2 ) + ( 9 × 3 ) + ( 54 × 4 ) = 388.
His total number of bases ( 388 ) divided by his total at-bats ( 458 ) is.847, उसके slugging प्रतिशत लिये the season.
The अगला साल he slugged.846, और ये रिकॉर्ड गई अखंड जबतक 2001, when Barry Bonds achieved 411 bases in 476 at-bats, bringing his slugging percentage to.863, unmatched since.
is a role-playing video game developed and प्रकाशित by वर्गाकार ( अभी वर्गाकार एनिक्स ) लिये the सुपर निन्टेंडो entertainment System in 1995.
Chrono Trigger 's development team included three designers that Square dubbed the `` Dream Team '' : hironobu sakaguchi, the निर्माता of वर्गाकार 's फाइनल काल्पनिक श्रेणी ; yuji horii, a freelance designer and creator of Enix 's popular Dragon Quest series ; and Akira Toriyama, a freelance manga artist famed for his work with Dragon Quest and Dragon Ball.
Kazuhiko Aoki produced the game, masato काटो लिखा सबसे of the प्लाट, जबकि composer yasunori mitsuda scored सबसे of the खेल पहले falling ill and deferring remaining tracks to Final Fantasy composer Nobuo Uematsu.
The game 's story follows a group of adventurers who सफर through समय to prevent a वैश्विक प्रलय.
Square re-released a ported version by Tose in Japan for Sony 's प्लेस्टेशन in 1999, बाद repackaged साथ a फाइनल काल्पनिक iv बंदरगाहों as फाइनल काल्पनिक क्रॉनिकल्स in 2001 for the North American market.
A slightly enhanced Chrono Trigger was released for the Nintendo DS on November 25, 2008, in North America and Japan, and गई on बिक्री in ऑस्ट्रेलिया on फ़रवरी 3, 2009 और in यूरोपीय on February 6, 2009.
The game was never released in PAL territories पहले the निन्टेंडो ds संस्करण.
Chrono Trigger was a critical and commercial success upon release and is माना आज to be एक of the महानतम video games of all time.
निन्टेंडो शक्ति पत्रिका वर्णित पहलुओं of chrono ट्रिगर as क्रांतिकारी, सहित इसके अनेक endings, plot-related sidequests focusing on character development, unique battle system, and detailed graphics.
Chrono Trigger was the third best-selling game of 1995, और the खेल 's snes और प्लेस्टेशन iterations have shipped 2.65 million copies as of March 2003.
The version for the Nintendo DS sold 790,000 नक़ल as of कूच 2009.
Chrono Trigger was also ported to mobile phones, आभासी कंसोल, the प्लेस्टेशन संजाल ( तभी in the USA ), iOS devices, and Android devices.
बकरी चीज
Goat cheese, or chèvre ( from the फ्रेंच शब्द लिये बकरी ), is चीज made out of the milk of goats.
Hyperthermia is elevated body temperature due to विफल thermoregulation कि occurs जब a देह produces or absorbs अधिक ऊष्मा than it dissipates.
Extreme temperature elevation then becomes a medical emergency requiring तात्कालिक उपचार to prevent विकलांगता or death.
the सबसे आम कल्याणकारी शामिल heat stroke and adverse reactions to drugs.
The former is an acute temperature elevation caused by exposure to excessive heat, or संयोजन of ऊष्मा और आर्द्रता, कि overwhelms the heat-regulating mechanisms.
The latter is a अपेक्षाकृत विरल पक्ष प्रभाव of many drugs, particularly those that affect the central nervous system.
Malignant hyperthermia is a rare complication of कुछ प्रकार of सामान्य एनेस्थीसिया.
Hyperthermia can also be deliberately induced using drugs or medical devices and may be used in the उपचार of कुछ kinds of कर्कट और अन्य शर्तें, most commonly in conjunction with radiotherapy.
अतिताप differs इससे ज्वर in that the body 's temperature set point remains unchanged.
The opposite is hypothermia, जिससे occurs जब the तापमान बूंदें नीचे कि जरूरी to maintain normal metabolism.
Belize, is a country located on the northeastern coast of सेंट्रल America.
It is the only देश in the क्षेत्रफल जहाँ अंग्रेज़ी is the official language, although Kriol and Spanish are more commonly spoken.
Belize is bordered on the north by मैक्सिको, to the दक्षिण और वेस्ट by ग्वाटेमाला and to the east by the Caribbean Sea.
Its मेनलैंड is परिचय long and wide.
With of land and a population of only 312,698 inhabitants ( 2010 census ), Belize possesses the न्यूनतम जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व in सेंट्रल अमेरिका.
The country 's जनसांख्यिकी विकास रेट of 3.15 % ( 2012 est. ) is the दूसरी उच्चतम in the प्रदेश और one of the highest in the western hemisphere.
Belize 's abundance of स्थलीय और समुद्री प्रजाति, और इसके विविधता of ecosystems give it a key place within the globally significant Mesoamerican Biological Corridor.
Belize has a विविध समाज, comprising अनेक संस्कृतियों और languages.
It is the only स्वदेश in the प्रदेश साथ a अंग्रेजों औपनिवेशिक विरासत, लकिन as a भाग of the पश्चिमी caribbean मण्डल, it भी shares a common heritage with the fellow Anglophone Caribbean countries.
In general, Belize is considered to be a सेंट्रल अमरीकी और caribbean nation with strong ties to both the Caribbean and Latin America.
Belize is a सदस्य of the caribbean जातियाँ ( caricom ), the जातियाँ of लैटिन अमरीकी और Caribbean States ( CELAC ), and Central American Integration System ( SICA ).
Belize is known for its सितंबर जश्न, और is the जन्मस्थान of चबाने gum and Punta Rock.
The `` बेट्सी रॉस '' flag
A `` Betsy Ross '' flag flying बाहर सैन फ्रांसिस्को नगर Hall
The Betsy Ross flag is an early design of the flag of the United States, popularly attributed to बेट्सी रॉस, using the आम motifs of प्रत्यावर्ती red-and-white धारीदार फ़ील्ड साथ five-pointed stars in a blue canton.
The flag was designed during the अमरीकी क्रान्ति और सुविधाएँ 13 सितारों to represent the original 13 colonies.
The distinctive feature of the रॉस ध्वज is the व्यवस्था of the सितारों in a circle.
Although the Betsy Ross story is accepted by सबसे अमेरिकी, कुछ ध्वज इतिहासकारों और revisionists do नहीं accept the बेट्सी रॉस डिज़ाइन as the first American flag.
According to the traditional account, the असली ध्वज थी बना in जून 1776, जब a छोटी committee—including जार्ज वॉशिंगटन, रॉबर्ट मॉरिस और relative George Ross —visited Betsy and discussed the need for a new American flag.
Betsy accepted the जॉब to manufacture the ध्वज, altering the कमेटी 's design by replacing the six-pointed stars with five-pointed stars.
While the Betsy Ross legend is questionable, the flag design is known to have महरूम in उपयोग by 1777 ; अल्फ्रेड b. गली वर्णित it at the आत्मसमर्पण of सामान्य burgoyne और समझा the वृत्त of सितारों to represent equality among the American states.
It is one of the oldest versions of U.S. flags known to exist ; while it is not the oldest surviving flag artifact in cloth रूप, इसके likeness appears on पुरानी शारीरिक अरबिंदो, namely, the समकालीन रणभूमि paintings by जॉन trumbull और चार्ल्स willson Peale.
They depict the circular star व्यवस्था होने flown इससे जलयान masts और अनेक अन्य स्थान, और यूँ provide the पहला known historical documentation of the flag 's appearance.
The seal of the U.S. Department of दिग्गजों अफेयर्स उपयोग the बेट्सी रॉस ध्वज to represent सेवा to सब दिग्गजों इससे the अमरीकी क्रान्ति to the present day.
The Betsy Ross डिज़ाइन of 13-star us ध्वज रै महरूम प्रदर्शित in अनेक लोकप्रिय artworks ( sometimes inaccurately, as in Washington Crossing the Delaware ) and films, such as the 1960 version of Pollyanna.
The flag continues to be one of the most popular symbols of the अमरीकी क्रान्ति.
A purr is a sound made by all प्रजाति of felids और is a भाग of बिल्ली संचार.
It varies between cats ( for example by loudness and tone ), and from प्रजाति to प्रजाति, लकिन can be characterized as a tonal गुलजार.
The term `` purring '' has महरूम प्रयुक्त liberally in साहित्य, और it रै महरूम claimed that viverrids ( civet, mongoose, genet ), bears, badgers, hyaenas ( et cetera ) purr.
Other animals that have been said to purr are rabbits, squirrels, guinea pigs, tapirs, ring-tailed lemurs, हाथियों, raccoons और gorillas while eating.
However, using a strict definition of purring that continuous sound उत्पादन जरूर वैकल्पिक between pulmonic egressive और ingressive airstream ( और प्रायः go on लिये मिनट्स ), पीटर्स ( 2002 ), in an विस्तृत पुनर्विलोकन of the scientific literature, reached the conclusion that until then only ‘purring cats’ ( Felidae ) and two species of genets, Genetta tigrina, and most likely also Genetta genetta, had been documented to purr.
The platypus ( ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is a semiaquatic स्तनधारी endemic to पूर्वी ऑस्ट्रेलिया, including Tasmania.
Together with the four species of एकिडना, it is एक of the पाँच extant प्रजाति of monotremes, the तभी mammals that lay eggs instead of giving birth.
It is the एकमात्र जीना प्रतिनिधि of इसके परिवार ( ornithorhynchidae ) और genus ( ornithorhynchus ), though a number of related species have been found in the fossil record.
The unusual appearance of this egg-laying, duck -billed, beaver -tailed, otter -footed mammal baffled European naturalists जब वे पहला encountered it, साथ कुछ considering it an विस्तृत fraud.
It is one of the few venomous mammals, the male platypus having a spur on the हिन्द पैर कि delivers a venom capable of causing severe pain to humans.
The unique features of the platypus मेक it an महत्वपूर्ण विषय in the पढ़ाई of विकासवादी जीवविज्ञान और a recognisable और iconic प्रतीक of ऑस्ट्रेलिया ; it रै appeared as a शुभंकर at national events and is featured on the reverse of its 20-cent coin.
The platypus is the animal emblem of the राज्य of नई दक्षिण वेल्स.
Until the early 20th century, it was hunted for इसके फर, लकिन it is अभी सुरक्षित throughout इसके range.
Although captive breeding programmes have had only limited success and the platypus is vulnerable to the प्रभाव of प्रदूषण, it is नहीं अंतर्गत कोई तात्कालिक threat.
St. Elizabeth is a गाँव in मिलर काउंटी, Missouri, United States.
The population थी 336 at the 2010 census.
Wilton is a census-designated place ( CDP ) in sacramento काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, संयुक्त States.
It is part of the Sacramento – Arden-Arcade – roseville महानगर सांख्यिकीय Area.
the जनसांख्यिकी थी 5,363 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी, up from 4,551 at the 2000 census.
in human-computer बातचीत, काटें और paste और नक़ल और paste हैं सम्बन्धित कमांड कि प्रस्ताव a user-interface interaction technique for transferring text, data, files or objects from a source to a destination.
सबसे ubiquitously, उपयोक्ता आवश्यकता the क्षमता to cut and paste sections of plain text.
The cut command removes the चयनित आंकड़ा इससे इसके असली स्थिति, जबकि the नक़ल कमांड creates a नकल ; in दोनो मामले the selected data is placed in a clipboard.
The data in the clipboard is बाद inserted in the position where the paste command is issued.
the कमांड names हैं an इंटरफ़ेस रूपक आधारित on the शारीरिक procedure used in manuscript editing to create a page layout.
This interaction technique has close associations with सम्बन्धित तकनीकों in आलेखीय उपयोक्ता अंतरफलक कि use pointing devices such as a computer mouse ( by drag and drop, for example ).
Economic order quantity is the order मात्रा कि minimizes कुल inventory पकड़कर लागत और ordering costs.
It is one of the oldest classical production scheduling मॉडल.
The framework used to determine इस अनुक्रम मात्रा is also known as Barabas EOQ Model or Barabas Formula.
The मॉडल थी विकसित by घाट W. हैरिस in 1913, लकिन R. H. विल्सन, a सलाहकार who applied it extensively, is given credit for his in-depth analysis.
Stephen `` स्टीवी '' रे vaughan ( अक्तूबर 3, 1954 – अगस्त 27, 1990 ) थी an अमरीकी guitarist, singer-songwriter, and record producer.
प्रायः referred to by उसके आद्याक्षर srv, vaughan is बेहतरीन known as a founding member and leader of Double Trouble.
Together with drummer Chris Layton and bassist टॉमी शैनन, वे ignited the ब्लूज़ revival of the 1980s.
With a career spanning seven years, vaughan और दोगुना ट्रबल consistently बेची आउट कॉन्सर्ट while their albums frequently went gold.
He was born and उठाया in डलास, टेक्सास, और लिये a छोटी काल of time lived in Graham, Texas.
As the younger brother of Jimmie vaughan, vaughan प्रारंभ playing the गिटार at आयु सात और formed अनेक bands कि occasionally performed in local nightclubs.
At age 17, he dropped out of high school and moved to Austin to further pursue उसके musical करियर, joining समूह ऐसे as krackerjack, the nightcrawlers, और the Cobras.
In 1977, he formed Triple Threat Revue, a band that eventually evolved into दोगुना ट्रबल और regularly performed around Austin.
In 1982, vaughan और दोगुना ट्रबल performed at the montreux जैज़ पर्व in Switzerland, catching the attention of musicians David Bowie and Jackson Browne.
Bowie asked vaughan to खेल on उसके आगामी स्टुडियो एल्बम let 's नृत्य, जबकि browne offered the band free use of his personal studio in Los Angeles to record an album.
In March 1983, Vaughan and Double Trouble were signed to Epic Records by veteran record producer जॉन हैमंड sr. और released उनके डेब्यू एल्बम, टेक्सास Flood in June of that year.
After कामयाब touring, the समूह released the एल्बम, could n't स्टैंड the Weather ( 1984 ) and Soul to Soul ( 1985 ), the latter of which featured new keyboardist Reese Wynans.
Although his career had progressed successfully, Vaughan checked into a rehabilitation hospital in Atlanta, Georgia to give up a कोका और दारू आदत और लौटे to touring साथ the बैंड.
In June 1989, in कदम थी released और अर्जित उन्हें a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन Contemporary Blues Performance.
On August 27, 1990, Vaughan was killed in a helicopter crash following a प्रदर्शन in ईस्ट ट्रॉय, विस्कॉन्सिन.
Vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet तीव्र स्टाइल थी निकला इससे a किस्में of musical genres.
He was influenced by blues musicians including अल्बर्ट किंग, फ्रेडी किंग, ओटिस Rush, and Muddy Waters, and rock guitarists such as Jimi Hendrix and Lonnie Mack.
His guitar playing reflected the क्लासिक ब्लूज़ और pentatonic scales.
He has received wide critical मान्यता लिये उसके गिटार playing, रैंकिंग at # 6 on रोलिंग Stones list of `` 100 Greatest Guitarists '' in 2011.
He was posthumously inducted into the Blues Hall of Fame in 2000 और a मेमोरियल प्रतिमा थी erected in ऑस्टिन 's ऑडिटोरियम Shores park.
Stevie Ray Vaughan is widely considered to be one of the महानतम संगीतकारों to आइये इससे the राज्य of Texas.
The Las Vegas Strip World of coca-cola museum in 2003
Coca-Cola is a कार्बोनेटेड नरम पेय बेची in स्टोर्स, रेस्तरां, और वेंडिंग मशीने in every country except Cuba and North Korea.
It is produced by The Coca-Cola कम्पनी of अटलांटा, जॉर्जिया, और is प्रायः referred to बस as कोक ( a पंजीकृत trademark of The Coca-Cola Company in the United States since March 27, 1944 ).
Originally intended as a पेटेंट आयुर्विज्ञान जब it थी invented in the लेट 19th सदी by जॉन pemberton, coca-cola थी खरीदा आउट by बिजनेसमैन asa griggs candler, जिनकी marketing tactics led Coke to its dominance of the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century.
The company produces concentrate, which is then बेची to licensed coca-cola bottlers throughout the world.
The bottlers, जो थाम territorially विशेष अनुबंध साथ the कम्पनी, उपज समाप्त उत्पाद in डिब्बे and bottles from the concentrate in combination with filtered water and sweeteners.
The bottlers then sell, distribute and merchandise Coca-Cola to खुदरा स्टोर्स और वेंडिंग मशीने.
Such bottlers include Coca-Cola उद्यमों, जिससे is the largest सिंगल coca-cola bottler in North America and western Europe.
The Coca-Cola Company भी बिकता concentrate लिये सोडा स्रोतों to प्रमुख restaurants and food service distributors.
The Coca-Cola Company has, on occasion, introduced अन्य कोला पेय अंतर्गत the कोक brand name.
The most common of these is Diet Coke, with others including Caffeine-Free Coca-Cola, Diet Coke Caffeine-Free, Coca-Cola चेरी, coca-cola शून्य, coca-cola वैनिला, और खास संस्करण साथ नीबू, लाइम or coffee.
आधारित on interbrand 's बेहतरीन वैश्विक ब्रांड 2011, coca-cola was the world 's most valuable brand.
Barry Louis Larkin ( born अप्रैल 28, 1964 ) is a रिटायर्ड प्रमुख League Baseball player.
Larkin played shortstop लिये the सिनसिनाटी लाल इससे 1986 to 2004 और थी एक of the pivotal खिलाड़ी on the 1990 Reds ' World Series championship team.
Larkin was elected to the National Baseball हॉल of कीर्ति in जनवरी 2012 और थी inducted on July 22.
larkin is माना एक of the शीर्ष खिलाड़ी of उसके era, जीतना nine Silver Slugger awards and three Gold Glove awards.
He was चयनित to the प्रमुख लीग all-star खेल बारह टाइम्स, और थी निर्वाचित the 1995 National League Most Valuable Player.
Brasília ( ) is the federal पूंजी of ब्राज़ील और the सीट of सरकारी of the Federal District.
administratively, the नगर is स्तिथ in the संघीय District which is in the Central-West Region.
Physically, it is located in the ब्राज़ीलियाई हाइलैंड्स.
It has a population of about 2,562,963 ( 3,716,996 in the महानगर क्षेत्रफल ) as of the 2008 ibge अनुमान, making it the fourth largest city in Brazil.
However, as a metropolitan area, it ranks lower at छठे in जनसांख्यिकी.
Brasília is the largest city in the संसार कि किया नहीं मौजूद at the शुरूआत of the 20th century.
Brasília has the fifth largest जीडीपी among लैटिन American cities and the third in Brazil.
At around R $ 62,000 Brazilian reais ( equal to लगभग $ 30,900 us डॉलर or €23,000 euros ), the नगर 's प्रति capita आय is the उच्चतम among Brazil 's largest cities.
as the नेशनल पूंजी, brasília is the seat of all three branches of the federal government of Brazil.
the नगर भी होस्ट the मुख्यालय of many Brazilian companies.
Planning नीतियों ऐसे as the स्थान of आवासीय इमारतें around expansive शहरी क्षेत्रों, as खूब as भवन the नगर around विशाल avenues and dividing it into sectors, have sparked a debate and reflection on life in big cities in the 20th century.
The city 's design divides it into numbered blocks as well as sectors for specified क्रियाएँ, ऐसे as the होटल सेक्टर, the बैंकिंग सेक्टर or the दूतावास सेक्टर.
Brasília होस्ट 124 विदेशी embassies.
The नगर थी नियोजित और विकसित in 1956 साथ lúcio कोस्टा as the प्रिंसिपल शहरी planner, Oscar Niemeyer as the principal architect and Roberto Burle Marx as the landscape designer.
Brasilia is in the युनेस्को 's संसार Hertitage List due to its architecture.
On अप्रैल 22, 1960, it formally became Brazil 's national capital.
viewed इससे ऊपर, the प्रमुख portion of the city resembles an airplane or a butterfly.
The नगर is commonly referred to as पूंजी Federal, or simply BSB.
Residents of Brasília are known as brasilienses or candangos ( the latter referring to those नहीं born in the नगर लकिन जो migrated वहीँ after it was established ).
In local usage, the word `` Brasília '' usually refers only to the पहला प्रशासनिक प्रदेश ( ra i ) भीतर the संघीय ज़िला ( distrito संघीय ), जहाँ the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण सरकारी इमारतें are located.
Brasília has a unique status in Brazil, as it is an administrative division बल्कि than a विधिक नगरपालिका जैसे nearly सब शहरों in ब्राज़ील.
Nationally, the term is almost always used synonymously with the संघीय ज़िला, जिससे constitutes an indivisible federative ईकाई, analogous to a state.
Several `` satellite cities '' exist which are also भाग of the संघीय ज़िला.
brasília अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र is the प्रमुख विमानक्षेत्र in brasília, connecting the capital to all major Brazilian cities and many international destinations.
It is the third सबसे महत्वपूर्ण विमानक्षेत्र in ब्राज़ील, in terms of passengers and aircraft movements.
Personifications of Germany, France, Russia, Austria-Hungary, और the संयुक्त किंगडम attempting to रखना the ढक्कन on the simmering cauldron of imperialist और राष्ट्रवादी तनाव in the Balkans to prevent a general European war.
They were कामयाब in 1912 और 1913 लकिन किया नहीं सफल in in 1914.
The causes of World War I, which began in central Europe in late July 1914 and finished in 1918, शामिल अनेक कारकों, ऐसे as the विरोध और दुश्मनी of the चार दशकों अग्रणी up to the war.
सैन्यवाद, alliances, साम्राज्यवाद, और राष्ट्रवाद played major roles in the conflict as well.
The immediate origins of the war, however, lay in the decisions लिया by कूटनीतिज्ञों और सेनापतियों दौरान the संकट of 1914, casus belli लिये जिससे थी the हत्या of archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड ( the archduke of ऑस्ट्रिया हंगेरियाई ) और उसके wife Sophie by Gavrilo Princip, an irredentist Serb.
The crisis came after a long and difficult series of diplomatic clashes between the ग्रेट शक्तियां ( इटली, फ़्रांस, जर्मनी, the अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य, the austria-hungarian साम्राज्य और रूस ) over European and colonial issues in the decade before 1914 that had left tensions high.
In turn these diplomatic clashes can be traced to परिवर्तन in the संतुलन of power in Europe since 1867.
The more immediate cause लिये the युद्ध थी तनाव over territory in the Balkans.
Austria-Hungary competed साथ सर्बिया और रूस लिये territory और influence in the प्रदेश और वे खींचा the बाकी of the Great Powers into the conflict through their various alliances and treaties.
Although the chain of events unleashed by the assassination triggered the युद्ध, the युद्ध 's origins go deeper, involving नेशनल राजनीती, संस्कृतियों, अर्थशास्त्र, और a जटिल वेब of alliances और counterbalances that had developed between the various European powers since 1870.
Some of the most important long term or structural causes are : the growth of nationalism across Europe, unresolved territorial disputes, an intricate प्रणाली of alliances, the आभास विश्लेषण of the संतुलन of शक्ति in यूरोपीय, convoluted और fragmented शासन, the बाहें races of the previous decades, previous military planning, imperial and colonial rivalry for wealth, power and prestige, and economic and military rivalry in industry and trade – e.g., the Pig War between Austria and Serbia.
Other causes that came into play during the diplomatic crisis that preceded the war included misperceptions of intent ( e.g., the जर्मनी विश्वास कि the संयुक्त किंगडम होता remain न्यूट्रल ) और देरी और misunderstandings in राजनयिक संचार.
The various categories of explanation for World War I correspond to अलग इतिहासकारों ' overall methods.
Most historians and popular commentators include causes इससे अधिक than एक श्रेणी of स्पष्टीकरण to provide a rounded account of the causes of the war.
The deepest distinction among these accounts is between stories that see it as the inevitable and predictable निष्कर्ष of निश्चित कारकों, और those कि describe it as an मनमानी और unfortunate mistake.
In attributing causes for the war, historians and लड था to सौदे साथ an unprecedented बाढ़ of memoirs और आधिकारिक दस्तावेज़, released as प्रत्येक country involved tried to avoid blame for starting the war.
Early releases of information by governments, particularly those released for उपयोग by the `` आयोग on the जिम्मेदारी of the लेखक of the युद्ध '' यहूद दिखाया to be incomplete and biased.
In जोड कुछ दस्तावेज़, विशेषकर diplomatic cables between Russia and France, were found to have been doctored.
Even in बाद दशकों however, जब much अधिक सूचना था महरूम released, historians from the same culture have been shown to come to differing conclusions on the causes of the war.
Johnson 's new chart of नेशनल प्रतीक, प्रकाशित c. 1868.
The large flags shown in the corners are the 37-star flag of the United States ( flown 1867-1877 ), the royal मानक of the संयुक्त किंगडम, the रूसी इम्पीरियल मानक, और the फ्रेंच tricolore with inset Imperial Eagle.
विभिन्न अन्य ध्वज flown by ships are shown.
the ध्वज of क्यूबा is labelled `` Cuban ( so called ) ``.
The Chinese ड्रैगन on the ध्वज of चीन थी drawn mistakenly as a western dragon.
A national flag is a flag कि symbolizes a देश.
The flag is flown by the सरकारी, लकिन प्रायः can भी be flown by नागरिकों of the country.
Both public and निजी इमारतें ऐसे as स्कूलों और courthouses may fly the national flag.
In some countries, the national flags are only flown इससे non-military इमारतें on निश्चित flag days.
There are three distinct types of national flag for use on land, and three for use at sea, though many देशों उपयोग एकसमान डिजाइन लिये अनेक ( और sometimes all ) of these types of flag.
The American Civil War ( ACW ), also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ), was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) और अनेक दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य कि घोषित उनके secession और formed the confederate राज्य of अमेरिका ( the `` confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had its origin in the issue of slavery, especially the extension of गुलामी into the पश्चिमी territories.
Foreign शक्तियां किया not intervene.
After four years of खूनी कॉम्बैट कि बाएँ over 600,000 सैनिको मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना, the Confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential election, Republicans, led by Abraham Lincoln, opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त राज्य ' territories.
Lincoln जीती, लकिन पहले उसके उद्घाटन on कूच 4, 1861, सात cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan और the आवक republicans rejected secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural पता घोषित उसके प्रशासन होता नहीं initiate civil war.
Eight बाकी स्लेव राज्य जारी to अस्वीकृत calls for secession.
Confederate शक्तियां जब्त numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace Conference failed to find a सुलह, और दोनो पहलू prepared for war.
the confederates assumed कि यूरोपीय देशों यहूद so निर्भर on `` किंग कपास `` that they would intervene ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on अप्रैल 12, 1861, जब confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट sumter, a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina.
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the fort ; consequently, four more स्लेव राज्य joined the confederacy, bringing उनके कुल to ग्यारह.
The Union soon नियंत्रित the किनारा राज्य और स्थापित a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy.
the पूर्वी थिएटर थी inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln issued the emancipation उदघोषणा, जिससे बना समाप्ति गुलामी a war goal.
To the वेस्ट, by गर्मियाँ 1862 the संघ नष्ट the confederate नदी नेवी, then much of their western armies, and the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, रॉबर्ट E. ली 's confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western successes led to ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड of सब संघ armies in 1864.
In the Western Theater, William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the समुद्र, destroying confederate अवसंरचना साथ the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to आक्रमण the confederacy इससे सब दिशानिर्देश, और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army failed, leading to Lee 's surrender to ग्रान्ट at appomattox अदालत हाउस on अप्रैल 9, 1865.
The अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध थी एक of the earliest true industrial wars.
railroads, the टेलीग्राफ, steamships, और mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian कारखानों, खानों, shipyards, banks, transportation and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest war in American history, resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined क्रमांक of civilian casualties.
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death टोल at टेन प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 years old, and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40.
Norrie बीमारी is a जेनेटिक विकार कि primarily affects the eye and almost always leads to blindness.
In जोड to the जन्मजात ocular लक्षण, कुछ मरीजों suffer इससे a progressive hearing loss starting mostly in their 2nd decade of life, while another portion may be mentally challenged.
Patients with Norrie disease may develop cataracts, leukocoria ( a condition where the विद्यार्थियों appear श्वेत जब लाइट is shone on उन्हें ), साथ साथ अन्य developmental मुद्दे in the eye, such as shrinking of the globe and the wasting away of the iris.
Around 30–50 % of उन्हें होगा भी have developmental डेलाy/ दिमागी retardation, psychotic-like सुविधाएँ, incoordination of movements or behavioral abnormalities.
Most patients are born साथ सामान्य सुनना ; however, the onset of सुनना घाटा is बहुत आम in early adolescence.
About 15 % of the मरीजों हैं अनुमानित to develop सब the features of the disease.
The disease affects almost only male infants at जनम or जल्द बाद जनम, क्युकी the बीमारी is inherited X-linked recessive.
Only in very विरल मामले, महिलाओं have महरूम diagnosed with Norrie disease as well.
The exact incidence number is unknown ; only a few सौ मामले have महरूम reported so far.
It is a very rare disorder that is not संबद्ध साथ कोई विशिष्ट जातीय or जातिगत groups.
A contract is an agreement having a lawful object entered into voluntarily by दो or अधिक पार्टियों, प्रत्येक of जिसको intends to create one or more legal obligations between them.
The elements of a contract are `` offer '' and `` acceptance '' by `` competent व्यक्तियों '' having विधिक क्षमता जो एक्सचेंज `` विचार '' to create `` mutuality of obligation. ''
Proof of some or all of these elements may be done in लिखने, हालांकि अनुबंध may be बना entirely orally or by conduct.
The remedy for breach of contract can be `` damages '' in the रूप of मुआवजे of धन or विशिष्ट performance enforced through an injunction.
Both of ये remedies पुरस्कार the पार्टी at घाटा the `` लाभ of the सौदेबाजी '' or अपेक्षा damages, which are greater than mere reliance damages, as in promissory estoppel.
The parties may be प्राकृतिक व्यक्तियों or juristic persons.
A contract is a legally enforceable promise or undertaking कि कुछ होगा or होगा not occur.
The word promise can be used as a विधिक पर्याय लिये अनुबंध, हालांकि परवाह is जरूरी as a promise may not have the full standing of a contract, as when it is an agreement without consideration.
Contract law varies greatly from one jurisdiction to another, including differences in आम विधि compared to सिविल विधि, the प्रभाव of प्राप्त विधि, विशेषकर इससे इंग्लैण्ड in आम विधि देशों, और of law codified in regional legislation.
regarding ऑस्ट्रेलियाई अनुबंध विधि लिये उदाहरण, वहीँ हैं 40 प्रासंगिक अधिनियमों which impact on the interpretation of contract at the Commonwealth ( Federal / national ) level, and an additional 26 acts at the level of the state of NSW.
In जोड वहीँ हैं 6 अंतरराष्ट्रीय यंत्र or प्रथाओं जिससे हैं लागू लिये अंतरराष्ट्रीय dealings, such as the United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods.
asp.net is a server-side वेब अनुप्रयोग फ्रेमवर्क designed for Web development to produce dynamic Web pages.
It was developed by Microsoft to allow प्रोग्रामर्स to निर्माण dynamic web sites, web applications and web services.
It was first released in January 2002 with version 1.0 of the.neT फ्रेमवर्क, और is the successor to microsoft 's क्रियाशील Server Pages ( ASP ) technology.
ASP.NET is built on the आम भाषा runtime ( clr ), allowing प्रोग्रामर्स to write ASP.NET code using any supported.NET language.
The ASP.NET SOAP extension framework allows asp.net components to प्रक्रम SOAP messages.
Lysergic acid diethylamide, abbreviated LSD or LSD-25, also known as lysergide ( INN ) and colloquially as acid, is a semisynthetic psychedelic drug of the ergoline family, well known for its psychological effects which can include altered thinking processes, closed and open eye visuals, synesthesia, an altered भाव of समय और आध्यात्मिक अनुभवों, as खूब as लिये इसके कुंजी भूमिका in 1960s counterculture.
It is प्रयुक्त मुख्यतः as an entheogen, recreational ड्रग, और as an agent in psychedelic therapy.
एलएसडी is non-addictive, is नहीं ज्ञात to कारण दिमाग क्षति, और has extremely low toxicity relative to dose.
However, adverse psychiatric प्रतिक्रियाएँ ऐसे as चिंता, paranoia, और delusions are possible.
LSD was first synthesized by अल्बर्ट hofmann in 1938 इससे ergotamine, a रासायनिक निकला by आर्थर Stoll from ergot, a grain fungus that typically grows on rye.
The छोटी रूप `` एलएसडी '' आता इससे इसके जल्दी कोड नाम lsd-25, जिससे is an संक्षिप्त for the German `` Lysergsäure-diethylamid '' followed by a sequential number.
LSD is sensitive to oxygen, ultraviolet लाइट, और क्लोराइड, विशेषकर in समाधान, हालांकि इसके potency may पिछला लिये years if it is stored away from light and moisture at low temperature.
In pure रूप it is a colorless, गंधहीन, tasteless solid.
LSD is typically delivered orally, usually on a substrate ऐसे as absorbent blotter पेपर, a sugar cube, or gelatin.
In इसके द्रव रूप, it can भी be administered by intramuscular or intravenous injection.
LSD is very potent, with 20–30 μg ( micrograms ) होने the दहलीज dose.
New experiments साथ एलएसडी प्रारंभ in 2009 लिये the पहला समय in 40 years.
Introduced by Sandoz Laboratories, with trade-name Delysid, as a ड्रग साथ विभिन्न मनोरोग उपयोग in 1947, एलएसडी जल्दी became a therapeutic एजेंट कि appeared to show great promise.
In the 1950s, officials at the U.S. Central Intelligence Agency ( CIA ) विचार the ड्रग might be लागू to दिमाग कंट्रोल और रासायनिक warfare ; the एजेंसी 's mkultra research program propagated the drug among young servicemen and students.
The subsequent recreational use of the drug by युवावस्था संस्कृति in the पश्चिमी संसार दौरान the 1960s led to a राजनैतिक firestorm that resulted in its prohibition.
Currently, a number of organizations—including the Beckley Foundation, MAPS, Heffter Research Institute and the अल्बर्ट hofmann foundation—exist to निधि, प्रोत्साहित और निर्देशांक शोध into the औषधीय और आध्यात्मिक uses of LSD and related psychedelics.
The United States Navy 's Sea, Air, Land Teams, commonly known as the Navy SEALs, are the U.S. नेवी 's प्रिंसिपल खास परिचालन फ़ोर्स और a part of the Naval Special Warfare Command and United States Special Operations Command.
`` SEAL '' is सदा capitalized in सन्दर्भ to members of the Naval Special Warfare community.
The acronym is derived from their capacity to operate at समुद्र, in the एयर, और on जमीन.
SEALs are पुरूष सदस्यों of the United States Navy.
An exchange program with the Coast Guard, which graduated तीन coast guardsmen as seals, थी निलंबित in 2011.
The CIA 's highly secretive Special Activities Division ( SAD ) and more specifically इसके elite खास परिचालन समूह ( sog ) रंगरूटों ऑपरेटर इससे the मुहर टीमों.
Joint Navy seals और सीआईए परिचालन go वापस to the famed MACV-SOG during the Vietnam War.
This cooperation still exists today and is seen in the wars in इराकी और अफगानिस्तान, और in the ढूंढना और हत्या of ओसामा बिन लादेन in Pakistan.
World population estimates इससे 1800 to 2100, आधारित on un 2010 projections ( रेड, orange, green ) and US Census Bureau historical estimates ( black ).
Actual recorded जनसांख्यिकी आंकड़े हैं in ब्लू.
According to the highest estimate, the संसार जनसांख्यिकी may वृद्धि to 16 अरब by 2100 ; according to the न्यूनतम estimate, it may decline to 6 billion.
The world population is the कुल क्रमांक of जीना humans on Earth.
As of today, it is अनुमानित to क्रमांक अरब by the संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी Bureau ( USCB ).
The uscb estimates कि the संसार जनसांख्यिकी exceeded 7 billion on March 12, 2012.
according to a पृथक अनुमान by the संयुक्त राष्ट्र जनसांख्यिकी Fund, it reached this milestone on October 31, 2011.
The world population has experienced continuous विकास चूंकि the समाप्त of the ग्रेट अकाल और the ब्लैक Death in 1350, when it stood at around 370 million.
The highest rates of growth – global population increases above 1.8 % per year – were seen briefly दौरान the 1950s, और लिये a longer काल दौरान the 1960s and 1970s.
The growth rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, और था अस्वीकृत to 1.1 % by 2011.
Total annual births were highest in the लेट 1980s at परिचय 138 लाख, और हैं अभी अपेक्षित to remain essentially निरंतर at उनके 2011 स्तर of 134 लाख, while deaths number 56 million per year, and are expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040.
Current projections दिखाएँ a जारी बढ़ाएँ in जनसांख्यिकी in the निकट भविष्य ( लकिन a स्थिर मनाही in the जनसांख्यिकी विकास रेट ), with the global population expected to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050.
Various longer-term estimates predict further growth, stagnation, or even overall मनाही in the वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी by 2150.
Some analysts have questioned the स्थिरता of further संसार जनसांख्यिकी विकास, citing the growing pressures on the पर्यावरण, global food supplies, and energy resources.
Memphis is a नगर in the southwestern कोने of the U.S. state of Tennessee, and the county seat of Shelby County.
The city is located on the 4th chickasaw bluff, दक्षिण of the संगम of the Wolf and Mississippi rivers.
Memphis had a population of 672,277 in 2011 making it the largest city in the state of टेनेसी, the largest नगर on the मिसिसिपी नदी, the तीसरा largest in the southeastern संयुक्त राज्य, and the 20th largest in the United States.
The greater Memphis metropolitan area, सहित सटा काउंटी in मिसिसिपी और अरकंसास, had a 2010 population of 1,316,100.
This makes Memphis the second largest metropolitan area in Tennessee, surpassed only by महानगर नैशविले, जिससे रै overtaken मेम्फिस in हाल years.
मेम्फिस is the youngest of Tennessee 's major cities.
A resident of Memphis is referred to as a Memphian, और the मेम्फिस प्रदेश is ज्ञात, विशेषकर to मीडिया outlets, as `` Memphis & The Mid-South ``.
The Cattenom नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र in फ़्रांस.
France produces around तीन quarters of इसके विद्युत by nuclear power.
The grafenrheinfeld नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र in Germany.
Chancellor Angela Merkel 's गठबन्धन घोषित on may 30, 2011, कि germany’s 17 नाभिकीय power stations will be shut down by 2022, in a policy reversal following Japan 's Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster.
फिलहाल, 68 रिएक्टरों हैं अंतर्गत construction in 15 countries.
Nuclear power stations operate in thirty countries.
In 2010, before the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster, it was reported that an average of about 10 nuclear reactors were expected to become operational per year, although according to the संसार नाभिकीय संघ, of the 17 civilian रिएक्टरों नियोजित to become operational between 2007 and 2009, only five actually came on stream.
As of June 2011, जर्मनी और स्विट्ज़रलैंड are phasing-out nuclear power.
As of June 2011, countries such as Australia, ऑस्ट्रिया, डेनमार्क, यूनानियों, आयरलैंड, इटली, लातवियाई, liechtenstein, ध्वज, मलेशिया, Malta, New Zealand, Norway and Portugal remain opposed to nuclear power.
Skeletal मांसपेशियां होमो sapiens
इस is a तालिका of मांसपेशियां of the human anatomy.
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles within the typical human, and almost every muscle constitutes one part of a pair of identical द्विपक्षीय मांसपेशियां, मिला on दोनो पहलू, resulting in लगभग 320 pairs of मांसपेशियां, as प्रस्तुत in this article.
Nevertheless, the सटीक क्रमांक is मुश्किल to define क्युकी अलग स्त्रोत समूह मांसपेशियां differently, e.g. regarding what is defined as different parts of a single muscle or as several muscles.
उदाहरण दायरा इससे 640 to 850.
The muscles of the human देह can be categorized into a क्रमांक of समूह जिससे शामिल मांसपेशियां relating to the head and neck, muscles of the torso or trunk, muscles of the upper limbs, and muscles of the lower limbs.
The action refers to the action of प्रत्येक मांसपेशी इससे the मानक anatomical position.
In other स्थितियाँ, अन्य क्रियाएँ may be performed.
a reenactment of a बैटल at फोर्ट फोस्टर, 1837 ( at Hillsborough River State Park )
The Seminole Wars, also known as the Florida Wars, were three conflicts in Florida between the Seminole — the collective name दिए to the amalgamation of विभिन्न समूह of देशी अमेरिकी और ब्लैक लोगों जो settled in फ्लोरिडा in the जल्दी 18th century — and the United States Army.
The First Seminole War थी इससे 1814 to 1819 ( हालांकि स्त्रोत differ ), the दूसरी Seminole War from 1835 to 1842, and the Third Seminole War from 1855 to 1858.
The first विरोध साथ the seminoles arose आउट of तनाव relating to सामान्य Andrew Jackson 's attack and destruction of Negro Fort in Florida in 1816.
Jackson also attacked the स्पेनी at pensacola.
Ultimately, the Spanish Crown ceded the उपनिवेश to संयुक्त राज्य नियम.
Orono is a town in penobscot काउंटी, maine, संयुक्त राज्य.
It was first settled in 1774 and named in सम्मान of मुख्य जोसेफ orono of the penobscot Nation.
It is home to The विश्वविद्यालयों of maine.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 10,362 at the 2010 census.

Luxor लास वेगास is a होटल और कसीनो on the लास Vegas Strip in Paradise, Nevada.
The 30-story hotel, owned and operated by MGM Resorts अंतरराष्ट्रीय, रै a कसीनो साथ over 2,000 स्लॉट मशीने and 87 table games.
In the 2008 to 2009 renovation, it has a new, highly modernized, and contemporary design and contains a total of 4,400 कक्ष, सहित 442 suites, अस्तर the आंतरिक दीवारें of a पिरामिड स्टाइल मीनार और भीतर जुड़वा 22-story ziggurat मीनारें कि were built as later additions.
The hotel is नामित बाद the नगर of लक्सर ( प्राचीन Thebes ) in Egypt.
Luxor is the दूसरी largest होटल in लास वेगास ( the largest होने the MGM Grand ) and the eighth largest in the world.
As of 2010, the Luxor has a 4 Key rating from the ग्रीन कुंजी eco-rating कार्यक्रम, जिससे evaluates `` चिरस्थायी '' होटल परिचालन.
A pilot experiment, also called a pilot study, is a small scale preliminary study conducted in order to evaluate feasibility, time, cost, adverse events, and effect size ( statistical variability ) in an attempt to भविष्यवाणी an उचित नमूना आकार और improve upon the पढ़ाई डिज़ाइन prior to प्रदर्शन of a full-scale research project.
Pilot studies, इसलिए, may नहीं be उचित लिये मामला studies.
The Los Angeles Fire Department ( LAFD ) is the agency that provides fire protection और आपात चिकित्सा सेवाएं लिये the नगर of लॉस एंजिल्स.
It may be unofficially referred to as the Los Angeles City Fire Department to फर्क it इससे the लॉस एंजिल्स काउंटी आग Department.
The acre is a unit of क्षेत्रफल प्रयुक्त in the इम्पीरियल and U.S. customary systems.
An acre is about 40 % of a hectare – slightly छोटी than an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल फ़ील्ड.
The acre is no longer commonly प्रयुक्त, हालांकि a few notable अपवाद शामिल the संयुक्त राज्य, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, बर्मा और the United Kingdom ( as of 2010, the acre is no longer officially used in the United Kingdom, though is still used in real estate descriptions ).
It is still used, to कुछ extent, in कनाडा.
The international प्रतीक of the एकड़ is ac, और is पारिभाषित as 1/640 of a square mile.
The most commonly प्रयुक्त एकड़ आज is the अंतरराष्ट्रीय acre.
In the United राज्य दोनो the अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़ और the थोड़ा different US survey acre are in use.
The most common use of the acre is to माप tracts of जमीन.
One international acre is पारिभाषित as 4046.8564224 square metres.
During the Middle Ages, an acre थी the राशि of जमीन कि could be plowed in one day with a yoke of oxen.

Language processing refers to the रास्ता इंसान beings उपयोग शब्द to communicate ideas and feelings, and how such communications are processed and understood.
Thus it is how the दिमाग creates और understands language.
Most हाल theories consider कि इस प्रक्रम is carried out entirely by and inside the brain.
This is considered one of the सबसे characteristic abilities of the human species - perhaps the most characteristic.
However very little is known about it and वहीँ is विशाल पैमाना लिये शोध on it.
Most of the knowledge acquired to date on the subject has come from patients who have suffered some प्रकार of significant सिर चोट, whether बाह्य ( wounds, bullets ) or internal ( strokes, tumors, degenerative diseases ).
अध्ययन have दिखाया कि सबसे of the language processing functions are carried out in the cerebral cortex.
The essential function of the cortical भाषा क्षेत्रों is सांकेतिक प्रतिनिधित्व.
Even though language exists in अलग फ़ॉर्म, सब of उन्हें हैं आधारित on symbolic representation.

The सुपर खेल संस्करण of the veyron is the तीव्रतम street-legal production car in the world, with a top speed of.
The original संस्करण रै a शीर्ष गति of.
It was named Car of the Decade ( 2000–2009 ) by the बीबीसी टेलीविज़न programme Top Gear.
The standard Veyron won Top Gears Best car चलित सब साल पुरस्कार in 2005.
On 6 April 2013, Bugatti set the रिकार्ड लिये the तीव्रतम roadster in the संसार साथ the veyron Grand Sport Vitesse, reaching on average a top speed of.
The Veyron 's chief designer was Hartmut Warkuss, and the exterior was designed by jozef kabaň of volkswagen, साथ much of the अभियान्त्रिकी कार्य होने conducted अंतर्गत the guidance of engineering chief Wolfgang Schreiber.
A number of special विसंगतियाँ have महरूम उत्पादित.
In दिसम्बर 2010, bugatti began offering prospective खरीदार the क्षमता to customize exterior and interiors colours by using the Veyron 16.4 Configurator application on the marque 's official website.
DVD is an optical disc storage format, invented and developed by फिलिप्स, सोनी, तोशिबा, और पैनासोनिक in 1995.
DVDs offer higher भंडार क्षमता than कॉम्पैक्ट discs जबकि having the same dimensions.
Pre-recorded DVDs are mass-produced using molding मशीने कि physically स्टैम्प आंकड़ा onto the DVD.
Such discs are known as DVD- ROM, because आंकड़ा can तभी be पढ़ा and not written nor erased.
Blank recordable DVD discs ( DVD-R and DVD+R ) can be recorded once using a dvd रिकॉर्डर और तब फलन as a dvd-rom. rewritable dvds ( dvd-rw, dvd+rw, और dvd-ram ) can be अंकित और erased अनेक times.
dvds हैं प्रयुक्त in dvd-video उपभोक्ता डिजिटल वीडियो स्वरूप और in dvd-audio उपभोक्ता digital audio format, as well as for authoring AVCHD discs.
dvds containing अन्य प्रकार of सूचना may be referred to as DVD data discs.
What Chilli Wants is an American वास्तविकता श्रेणी on vh1 अभिनीत chilli, one-third of the Grammy Award -winning R & B trio TLC.

Peter Gene Hernandez ( born October 8, 1985 ), known by his stage name ब्रूनो मंगल, is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter और रिकार्ड निर्माता.
Raised in Honolulu, Hawaii, by a family of musicians, Mars began making music at a यंग आयु और performed in विभिन्न musical venues in उसके hometown throughout his childhood.
He graduated from high school and then moved to लॉस एंजिल्स, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, to pursue a musical करियर.
मंगल उत्पादित गीतों लिये अन्य artists, joining production team The Smeezingtons.
Mars had an unsuccessful कार्यावधि साथ motown Records, but then signed with Atlantic in 2009.
He became पहचाना as a सोलो कलाकार बाद lending उसके vocals और co-writing the hooks लिये the songs `` Nothin ' on You `` by B.o.B, and `` Billionaire `` by Travie McCoy.
He also co-wrote the hits `` Right Round `` by Flo Rida featuring ke $ ha, और `` wavin ' ध्वज `` by K'naan.
In October 2010, he released उसके डेब्यू एल्बम, doo-wops & Hooligans.
Anchored by the worldwide number-one singles `` Just the Way You Are `` और `` ग्रेनेड ``, the एल्बम peaked at क्रमांक तीन on the Billboard 200.
Mars was nominated for seven Grammys at the 53rd Grammy Awards, जीतना बेहतरीन पुरूष पॉप गायन प्रदर्शन लिये `` बस the Way You Are ''.
His second studio album, अपरंपरागत ज्यूकबॉक्स, थी released on December 11, 2012.
Mars ' music is विख्यात लिये displaying a चौड़ी किस्में of शैलियाँ और influences, and contains elements of many musical genres.
He रै worked साथ an assortment of artists from various genres.
As a चाइल्ड, he थी अत्यधिक बहकावे by कलाकारों ऐसे as छोटी रिचर्ड, एल्विस Presley and Michael Jackson and would often impersonate these artists from a young age.
Mars also incorporates रेगी - और motown -inspired ध्वनि into his work.
Worldwide, मंगल became the best-selling digital artist in 2011.
He had three singles in the top ten, सहित पहला प्लेस साथ `` बस the रास्ता तुम हैं '', which sold 12.5 million copies.
Mars won Best International Male सोलो कलाकार at the 2012 ब्रिट Awards.
Bruno Mars has sold 6 million एल्बम और 40 लाख singles विश्वव्यापी as a singer.
Althought as a song-writer, निर्माता और सिंगर उसके कुल सिंगल डाउनलोड बिक्री surpass 100 million worldwide.

Greek mythology is the देह of मिथकों और शिक्षाओं कि belong to the प्राचीन यूनानियों, concerning उनके gods and heroes, the nature of the world, and the origins and significance of their own cult and ritual practices.
It थी a भाग of the धर्म in प्राचीन यूनानियों और is भाग of धर्म in आधुनिक Greece and around the world, known as Hellenismos.
Modern scholars refer to और पढ़ाई the मिथकों in an attempt to throw लाइट on the धार्मिक और राजनैतिक संस्थानों of Ancient Greece and its civilization, and to gain understanding of the nature of myth-making itself.
Greek mythology is explicitly embodied in a large collection of narratives, and implicitly in यूनानी representational कला, ऐसे as vase-paintings और votive gifts.
Greek myth attempts to explain the origins of the संसार, और विवरण the जीवनदान और adventures of a चौड़ी किस्में of gods, goddesses, heroes, heroines, and mythological creatures.
These accounts initially यहूद disseminated in an oral-poetic परंपरा ; आज the यूनानी मिथकों हैं known primarily from Greek literature.
The oldest ज्ञात यूनानी साहित्यिक स्त्रोत, होमर 's एपिक कविताएं इलियड and Odyssey, focus on events surrounding the Trojan War.
Two poems by Homer 's near समकालीन hesiod, the theogony और the works और दिनों, contain खाते of the उत्पत्ति of the world, the succession of divine rulers, the succession of human ages, the origin of human woes, and the origin of sacrificial practices.
Myths are also preserved in the Homeric Hymns, in fragments of epic poems of the Epic Cycle, in lyric poems, in the works of the tragedians of the पांचवां सदी bc, in कृतियाँ of विद्वानों और कवियों of the hellenistic आयु, और in ग्रन्थ इससे the समय of the Roman Empire by writers such as Plutarch and Pausanias.
पुरातत्व निष्कर्षों provide a प्रिंसिपल सोर्स of विवरण परिचय यूनानी mythology, साथ देवताओं और नायक featured prominently in the decoration of many artifacts.
ज्यामितीय डिजाइन on pottery of the आठवीं सदी bc depict scenes from the Trojan cycle as well as the adventures of Heracles.
In the succeeding Archaic, Classical, and hellenistic अवधि, homeric और विभिन्न अन्य पौराणिक दृश्यों appear, supplementing the existing literary evidence.
Greek mythology has had an extensive influence on the संस्कृति, कला, और साहित्य of पश्चिमी सभ्यता और remains part of Western heritage and language.
Poets and कलाकारों इससे प्राचीन टाइम्स to the उपस्थित have निकला प्रेरणा इससे यूनानी mythology and have discovered contemporary significance and relevance in the themes.

Mouth & MacNeal थी a पॉप duo इससे the Netherlands.
