The boise राज्य broncos फ़ुटबॉल कार्यक्रम represents boise State University in college football and compete in the Football Bowl Subdivision ( FBS ) of Division I as a member of the Mountain West Conference.
They are currently led by सिर कोच क्रिस petersen और खेल उनके घर games at Bronco Stadium.
The franc ( sign : Fr. or SFr. ; German : Franken, French and Romansh : franc, इतालवी : फ्रेंको ; कोड : chf ) is the करेंसी और विधिक टेंडर of स्विट्ज़रलैंड and Liechtenstein ; it is also legal tender in the Italian exclave Campione d'Italia.
Although not formally legal tender in the German exclave Büsingen ( the एकमात्र विधिक करेंसी is the यूरोपियन ), it is in चौड़ी रोज़ use there.
The Swiss National Bank issues banknotes और the संघीय मिंट swissmint मुद्दे coins.
The Swiss फ़्रैंक is the तभी संस्करण of the franc still issued in Europe.
The smaller denomination, a hundredth of a फ़्रैंक, is a rappen ( rp. ) in जर्मनी, centime ( c. ) in फ्रेंच, centesimo ( ct. ) in Italian, and rap ( rp. ) in Romansh.
the आईएसओ कोड of the करेंसी प्रयुक्त by बैंको और वित्तीय संस्थानों is chf, हालांकि `` fr. '' is used by most businesses and advertisers ; some use SFr. ; the Latinate `` CH '' stands for Confoederatio Helvetica.
Given the different languages प्रयुक्त in स्विट्ज़रलैंड, लैटिन is प्रयुक्त लिये language-neutral inscriptions on the coins.
Sir Charles Spencer `` Charlie '' Chaplin, ( 16 April 188925 December 1977 ) was a अंग्रेजों कॉमिक कर्ता और फिल्मकार जो रोज़ to कीर्ति in the मूक era.
चैपलिन became a विश्वव्यापी प्रतीक through उसके स्क्रीन persona `` the Tramp `` and is considered one of the most important figures of the film industry.
His career spanned more than 75 years, from a child in the विक्टोरियन era to बंद to उसके मौत at the आयु of 88, और encompassed दोनो adulation and controversy.
Raised in London, Chaplin 's बाल्यकाल थी पारिभाषित by poverty and hardship.
He was sent to a workhouse twice पहले the आयु of नौ ; उसके पिता थी अनुपस्थित, और his mother was committed to a mental asylum.
Chaplin began performing from a young age, touring म्यूज़िक हॉल और बाद working as a स्टेज कर्ता and comedian.
At 19 he was हस्ताक्षरित to the prestigious फ्रेड karno कम्पनी, which took him to America.
Chaplin was scouted by the film industry, and बना उसके पहला दिखावे in 1914 with Keystone Studios.
He soon विकसित the ट्रैम्प persona और formed a large fan base.
Chaplin directed his films from an early stage, and continued to hone his craft as he स्थानांतरित to the essanay, परस्पर, and First National corporations.
By 1918, he was one of the सबसे प्रसिद्ध men in the world.
In 1919, चैपलिन co-founded the वितरण कम्पनी संयुक्त कलाकारों, giving him complete control over his films.
His first feature-length picture was the बच्चा ( 1921 ), followed by a स्त्री of पेरिस ( 1923 ), the Gold Rush ( 1925 ), and The Circus ( 1928 ).
He refused to move to sound films in the 1930s, बजाय producing नगर लाइट्स ( 1931 ) and Modern Times ( 1936 ) without dialogue.
Chaplin became increasingly राजनैतिक और उसके अगला फिल्मी, the ग्रेट तानाशाह ( 1940 ), satirised Adolf Hitler.
The 1940s was a decade चिह्नित साथ विवाद लिये चैपलिन, और उसके लोकप्रियता declined rapidly.
He was accused of communist sympathies, while his भागीदारी in a paternity सूट और विवाह to much younger women were considered scandalous.
An FBI investigation was opened on चैपलिन, और he थी आखिरकार मजबूर to छोड़ the संयुक्त राज्य और settle in Switzerland.
He abandoned the ट्रैम्प लिये उसके बाद films, जिससे शामिल monsieur Verdoux ( 1947 ), Limelight ( 1952 ), A King in New York ( 1957 ), and A Countess From Hong Kong ( 1967 ).
चैपलिन लिखा, निर्देशित, उत्पादित, edited, scored, and starred in most of his films.
He थी a perfectionist, और उसके वित्तीय स्वतंत्रता meant he प्रायः खर्च सालो on the development and production of a picture.
His films are characterised by slapstick संयुक्त साथ pathos, और प्रायः विशेषता the Tramp struggling against adversity.
Many contain social and political themes, as खूब as autobiographical elements.
In 1972, as part of a renewed appreciation for his work, Chaplin received an Honorary Academy Award for `` the incalculable effect he has had in बनाना गति तस्वीरें the आर्ट रूप of इस सदी ''.
He continues to be held in ऊँची लिहाज़, साथ the सुनहरा फटाफट, नगर लाइट्स, आधुनिक टाइम्स, और The Great Dictator often ranked among the greatest films of all time.
Planned Parenthood Federation of America ( PPFA ), commonly shortened to नियोजित parenthood, is the u.S. संबद्ध of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय नियोजित parenthood संघ ( ippf ) and one of its larger members.
PPFA is a non-profit संगठन providing reproductive स्वास्थ्य और मातृ और child health services.
The Planned Parenthood Action Fund, Inc. ( PPAF ) is a सम्बन्धित संगठन जिससे lobbies लिये pro-choice विधान, comprehensive sex education, and access to affordable health care in the United States.
Planned Parenthood is the largest U.S. provider of reproductive स्वास्थ्य सेवाएं, सहित कर्कट स्क्रीनिंग, hiv स्क्रीनिंग और counseling, contraception, and abortion.
Contraception accounts for 35 % of PPFA 's total services and abortions account for 3 % ; ppfa conducts roughly 300,000 abortions प्रत्येक साल, among 3 लाख लोगों परोसा.
The organization has its जड़ें in ब्रुकलीन, नई यॉर्क, जहाँ मार्गरेट सैंगर opened the country 's first birth-control clinic.
Sanger founded the American Birth कंट्रोल लीग in 1921, which in 1942 became part of the Planned Parenthood Federation of America.
Since then, Planned Parenthood has grown to have over 820 clinic स्थितियाँ in the u.S., साथ a कुल बजट of us $ 1 अरब.
PPFA provides an array of services to over three लाख लोगों in the संयुक्त राज्य, और supports सेवाएं लिये over one million clients outside the United States.
Mens rea is लैटिन लिये `` अपराधी दिमाग ''.
In criminal law, it is viewed as एक of the necessary elements of some crimes.
The standard common law test of criminal liability is usually expressed in the Latin phrase, actus non facit reum nisi पुरुषों बैठना rea, जिससे अर्थात् `` the अधिनियम is not culpable unless the mind is guilty ''.
Thus, in jurisdictions with due प्रक्रम, वहीँ जरूर be an actus reus, or `` अपराधी अधिनियम, '' accompanied by कुछ स्तर of पुरुषों rea to constitute the crime with which the defendant is charged ( see the technical requirement of concurrence ).
As a general नियम, दण्ड देयता करता नहीं संलग्न to a व्यक्ति who acted with the absence of mental fault.
The एक्सेप्शन is सख्त liability crimes.
In civil law, it is प्रायः नहीं जरुरी to prove a subjective दिमागी तत्व to स्थापित देयता लिये breach of contract or tort, for example.
however, if a अपकृत्य is intentionally वचनबद्ध or a अनुबंध is intentionally breached, ऐसे intent may increase the scope of liability as well as the measure of damages payable to the plaintiff.
इसलिए, पुरुषों rea refers to the दिमागी तत्व of the अपराध कि accompanies the actus reus.
In some jurisdictions, the terms पुरुषों rea और actus reus have महरूम replaced by वैकल्पिक शब्दावली.
In Australia, for example, the elements of the संघीय offences हैं अभी designated as `` दोष तत्व '' or `` दिमागी तत्व '' ( पुरुषों rea ) और `` शारीरिक तत्व '' or `` external elements '' ( actus reus ).
This terminology was अपनाया to बदलें the अस्पष्टता of the Latin terms with simple and accurate phrasing.
Ulysses S. Grant ( born hiram ulysses ग्रान्ट ; अप्रैल 27, 1822 – जुलाई 23, 1885 ) थी the 18th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1869–1877 ) following his highly successful role as a war general in the second half of the Civil War.
Under Grant, the Union Army defeated the Confederate सैन्य ; having effectively ended the युद्ध और secession साथ the आत्मसमर्पण of Robert E. Lee 's army at Appomattox.
As president he led the Radical Republicans in their effort to eliminate all vestiges of confederate राष्ट्रवाद और slavery.
Upset over uncontrolled violence in the South and having desired to protect African अमरीकी नागरिकता, अध्यक्ष ग्रान्ट effectively नष्ट the ku Klux Klan in 1871.
Grant was the first अध्यक्ष to स्थापित सिविल सेवा सुधार having निर्मित a two-year federally funded Civil Service Commission in 1871.
In terms of विदेशी नीति, ग्रान्ट नाज़िल an `` unexpected capacity for deliberation and consultation '' that promoted the national interest.
His प्रतिष्ठा थी marred by उसके दोहराया रक्षा of भ्रष्ट appointees, और by अमेरिका 's पहला औद्योगिक age economic depression ( called the `` Panic of 1873 `` ) that dominated his second term.
Although his Republican पार्टी विभाजित in 1872 साथ reformers denouncing उसे, Grant was easily reelected.
By 1875 the conservative white Southern opposition regained कंट्रोल of प्रत्येक राज्य in the दक्षिण और as he बाएँ the श्वेत House in March 1877 his policies were being undone.
A career soldier, he graduated from the United States सैन्य अकादमी at वेस्ट पाइंट और परोसा in the mexican–american War.
When the सिविल युद्ध began in 1861, ग्रान्ट प्रशिक्षित Union volunteer regiments in Illinois.
In 1862, as a general he fought a series of लड़ाइयों और थी प्रचारित to प्रमुख सामान्य बाद forcing the आत्मसमर्पण of a विशाल Confederate army and gaining control of Kentucky and most of Tennessee.
He then led Union forces to victory after initial setbacks in the Battle of Shiloh, कमाई a प्रतिष्ठा as an आक्रामक कमांडर.
In July 1863, after a long, जटिल अभियान, ग्रान्ट पराजित पाँच uncoordinated confederate सेना ( capturing एक of them ) and seized Vicksburg.
This famous victory gave the Union full control of the Mississippi River, split बंद the पश्चिमी confederacy, और खोली the रास्ता for more Union triumphs.
After another win at the Battle of Chattanooga in late 1863, President Abraham lincoln बना उसे लेफ्टिनेंट सामान्य और कमांडर of सब of the Union Armies.
As commanding general of the army, Grant confronted Robert E. Lee in a series of very bloody battles in 1864 known as the Overland Campaign कि ended साथ the bottling up of ली at पीटर्सबर्ग, outside the Confederate capital of Richmond.
During the siege, Grant coordinated a series of devastating campaigns launched by विलियम tecumseh शरमन, फिलिप sheridan, और जार्ज Thomas.
Finally breaking through ली 's trenches, the संघ फौज captured Richmond in April 1865.
Lee surrendered his depleted forces to Grant at appomattox as the confederacy collapsed.
Although pro-Confederate इतिहासकारों attacked ग्रान्ट as a निष्ठुर कसाई who won by brute force, most historians have hailed his military genius.
Grant 's दो लगातार शर्तें as अध्यक्ष stabilized the स्वदेश बाद the American Civil War and during the turbulent Reconstruction period that followed.
As president, he enforced पुनर्निर्माण by enforcing सिविल अधिकारों कानून और लड़ ku klux Klan violence.
Grant won passage of the Fifteenth Amendment ; giving संवैधानिक सुरक्षा लिये african-american voting rights.
He used the army to निर्माण the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी in the दक्षिण, आधारित on ब्लैक मतदाता, उत्तरी newcomers ( `` carpetbaggers `` ) and native white supporters ( `` Scalawags. '' )
As a result, अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी यहूद represented in the u.S. कॉंग्रेस for the first time in American history in 1870.
Reformers praised Grant 's Indian peace policy by having broken the deadlock on Indian appropriations in Congress, the creation of the Board of Indian Commissioners to make reform recommendations, and his enlistment of quaker protestants जो नियंत्रित मिड पश्चिमी भारतीय एजेंसियों, कि effectively curbed congressional patronage.
Grant remained determined in keeping Indians from being exterminated इससे श्वेत settler अतिक्रमण or by the u.S. सैन्य.
Grant 's reputation as president by 1875 was at an all-time high for his पिछला वीटो of the महंगाई विधेयक, the ड्योढ़ी of the resumption of specie अधिनियम, और सचिव bristow 's कामयाब छापे कि shut bas the Whiskey Ring.
Grant 's foreign policy, led by Secretary of State Hamilton Fish, implemented International मध्यस्थता, settled the अलबामा दावा साथ ब्रिटेन और avoided युद्ध साथ स्पेन over the virginius Affair.
A jukebox is a partially स्वचालित music-playing यंत्र, प्रायः a coin-operated machine, that will play a patron 's selection from self-contained media.
The classic jukebox has buttons साथ अक्षर और संख्याएँ on उन्हें कि, जब डाला in संयोजन, are used to play a specific selection.
A drug test is a technical विश्लेषण of a biological नमूना – लिये उदाहरण मूत्र, बाल, रक्त, स्वेद, or मौखिक द्रव / लार – to determine the presence or absence of specified parent drugs or their metabolites.
Major uses of drug testing are to detect the presence of प्रदर्शन बढ़ाना steroids in खेल or लिये दवाएँ निषिद्ध by कानून, ऐसे as कैनबिस, कोका and heroin.
A `` 10-panel urine screen '' consists of the following:
Amphetamines ( सहित methamphetamine )
barbiturates
benzodiazepines
cannabinoids ( THC )
कोका
methadone
methaqualone
Opiates ( codeine, मॉरफीन, हेरोइन, oxycodone, Hydrocodone, etc. )
phencyclidine ( pcp )
propoxyphene
शनि v प्रक्षेपास्त्र, प्रयुक्त लिये the अमरीकी manned lunar landing missions
Space exploration is the discovery and exploration of बाहरी स्पेस by अर्थात् of स्पेस प्रौद्योगिकी.
Physical exploration of space is conducted दोनो by इंसान spaceflights and by robotic spacecraft.
While the observation of objects in space, known as खगोलशास्त्र, predates विश्वसनीय अंकित इतिहास, it थी the विकास of विशाल and relatively efficient rockets during the early 20th century that allowed physical space exploration to become a reality.
Common rationales for exploring space include advancing वैज्ञानिक शोध, uniting अलग राष्ट्र, ensuring the भविष्य अस्तित्व of मानवता और विकासशील सैन्य और रणनीतिक advantages against other countries.
विभिन्न आलोचनाओं of स्पेस खोजी are sometimes made.
Space exploration has often महरूम प्रयुक्त as a प्रॉक्सी competition for geopolitical rivalries such as the Cold War.
The early era of space exploration was driven by a `` स्पेस रेस `` between the सोवियत संघ और the संयुक्त राज्य, the launch of the first man-made object to orbit the Earth, the USSR 's Sputnik 1, on 4 October 1957, and the first Moon landing by the American Apollo 11 craft on 20 July 1969 are often taken as the boundaries for this initial period.
the सोवियत स्पेस कार्यक्रम हासिल अनेक of the पहला माइलस्टोन, सहित the पहला जीना होने in कक्षा in 1957, the first human spaceflight ( Yuri Gagarin aboard Vostok 1 ) in 1961, the first spacewalk ( by Aleksei Leonov ) on 18 March 1965, the first automatic landing on another celestial body in 1966, and the launch of the first space station ( Salyut 1 ) in 1971.
After the first 20 years of exploration, फ़ोकस shifted इससे one-off फ़्लाइट to बेदर्दी हार्डवेयर, ऐसे as the स्पेस शटल कार्यक्रम, and from competition to cooperation as with the International Space Station ( ISS ).
With the substantial completion of the iss following sts-133 in कूच 2011, योजनाएँ for space exploration by the USA remain in flux.
Constellation, a Bush Administration program for a return to the Moon by 2020 was judged inadequately वित्तपोषित और unrealistic by an विशेषज्ञ पुनर्विलोकन फलक रिपोर्टिंग in 2009.
The Obama Administration प्रस्तावित a संशोधन of नक्षत्र in 2010 to फ़ोकस on the विकास of the काबिलियत लिये crewed मिशन परे कम धरती कक्षा ( leo ), envisioning extending the आपरेशन of the iss परे 2020, transferring the development of launch vehicles for human crews from NASA to the private sector, and developing technology to enable missions to beyond LEO, such as Earth/Moon L1, the Moon, Earth/Sun L2, near-earth asteroids, and Phobos or Mars orbit.
As of March 2011, the US Senate and House of प्रतिनिधि हैं स्टिल working towards a सुलह नासा funding विधेयक, जिससे होगा संभवतः terminate Constellation and fund development of a heavy lift launch vehicle ( HLLV ).
In the 2000s, the People 's Republic of China initiated a कामयाब मानवयुक्त spaceflight कार्यक्रम, जबकि the यूरोपीय संघ, जापानी, और इण्डिया have भी नियोजित भविष्य manned space missions.
China, Russia, Japan, and India have advocated manned missions to the Moon during the 21st century, while the European Union has advocated मानवयुक्त मिशन to दोनो the चंद्रमा और मंगल दौरान the 21st सदी.
From the 1990s onwards, private interests began promoting space पर्यटन और तब निजी स्पेस खोजी of the चंद्रमा ( देखिए Google Lunar X Prize ).
John calvin कूलिज, jr. ( जुलाई 4, 1872january 5, 1933 ) was the 30th President of the United States ( 1923–1929 ).
A रिपब्लिकन वकील इससे वर्मांट, कूलिज worked उसके रास्ता up the ladder of Massachusetts state politics, eventually becoming governor of that state.
His conduct दौरान the बोस्टन पुलिस स्ट्राइक of 1919 thrust उसे into the नेशनल स्पॉटलाइट and gave him a reputation as a man of decisive action.
जल्द बाद, he थी निर्वाचित as the 29th Vice President in 1920 and succeeded to the Presidency upon the sudden death of Warren G. Harding in 1923.
Elected in his own सही in 1924, he gained a प्रतिष्ठा as a small-government conservative, and also as a man who said very little.
Coolidge restored public विश्वास in the श्वेत हाउस बाद the घोटालों of उसके पूर्ववर्ती 's प्रशासन, and left office with considerable popularity.
As a Coolidge biographer put it, `` He embodied the स्पिरिट और उम्मीदें of the मध्य क्लास, could interpret उनके longings और एक्स्प्रेस उनके opinions.
That he did represent the genius of the औसत is the सबसे convincing प्रमाण of his strength. ''
Some later criticized Coolidge as भाग of a सामान्य आलोचना of laissez-faire government.
His reputation underwent a पुनर्जागरण दौरान the रोनाल्ड reagan प्रशासन, लकिन the परम मूल्यांकन of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी is स्टिल विभाजित between those who approve of his reduction of the size of government programs and those who believe the federal government should be more involved in regulating and controlling the economy.
एस्प्रेसो is a concentrated पेय brewed by forcing a छोटी राशि of nearly boiling water under pressure through finely ground coffee beans.
Espresso often has a thicker consistency than coffee brewed by other methods, a higher concentration of suspended and dissolved solids, and crema ( अर्थ मलाई, लकिन होने a सन्दर्भ to the झाग साथ a मलाईदार बनावट कि फ़ॉर्म as a परिणाम of the दबाव ).
As a result of the pressurized brewing प्रक्रम the जायका और रसायन in a typical cup of espresso are very concentrated.
Espresso is the आधार लिये अन्य पेय, ऐसे as a latte, कापुचीनो, macchiato, mocha, or americano.
Espresso has more caffeine per unit volume than most beverages, but the usual सेवारत आकार is smaller—a ठेठ 60 ml ( 2 us द्रव ounce ) of एस्प्रेसो रै 80 to 150 mg of caffeine, little less than the 95 to 200 mg of a standard 240 mL ( 8 US fluid ounces ) cup of drip-brewed coffee.
ब्रायन कैथ केली ( born अक्तूबर 25, 1961 ) is an American football coach and former player.
He is currently the head football coach for the Notre Dame लड़ आयरिश, a स्थिति he रै आयोजित चूंकि दिसम्बर 2009.
Kelly was previously सिर कोच at ग्रैंड घाटी राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों ( 1991–2003 ), Central Michigan University ( 2004–2006 ), and University of Cincinnati ( 2006–2009 ).
A contract is an agreement having a lawful object डाला into voluntarily by दो or अधिक पार्टियों, प्रत्येक of जिसको intends to create one or more legal obligations between them.
The elements of a contract are `` offer '' and `` acceptance '' by `` competent persons '' having legal capacity who एक्सचेंज `` विचार '' to बनाएँ `` mutuality of obligation. ''
Proof of some or all of these elements may be किया in लिखने, हालांकि अनुबंध may be बना entirely orally or by conduct.
The remedy for उल्लंघन of अनुबंध can be `` क्षतिपूर्ति '' in the रूप of compensation of money or specific performance enforced through an injunction.
Both of these remedies award the party at loss the `` benefit of the सौदेबाजी '' or अपेक्षा क्षतिपूर्ति, जिससे हैं वृहद than mere रिलायंस क्षतिपूर्ति, as in promissory estoppel.
The parties may be प्राकृतिक व्यक्तियों or juristic व्यक्तियों.
A contract is a legally enforceable वादा or undertaking कि कुछ होगा or होगा not occur.
The word promise can be used as a legal पर्याय लिये अनुबंध, हालांकि परवाह is जरूरी as a वादा may not have the full standing of a contract, as when it is an agreement without consideration.
Contract law varies greatly from one jurisdiction to another, including मतभेद in आम विधि compared to सिविल विधि, the प्रभाव of प्राप्त विधि, विशेषकर इससे इंग्लैण्ड in आम विधि देशों, और of law codified in regional legislation.
Regarding Australian Contract Law for example, there are 40 relevant acts which impact on the interpretation of contract at the Commonwealth ( संघीय / नेशनल ) स्तर, और an अतिरिक्त 26 अधिनियमों at the स्तर of the राज्य of NSW.
In addition there are 6 international यंत्र or प्रथाओं जिससे हैं लागू लिये अंतरराष्ट्रीय dealings, such as the United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods.
Sidney Patrick Crosby, ONS ( born August 7, 1987 ) is a Canadian professional ice हॉकी खिलाड़ी जो is कप्तान of the पिट्सबर्ग penguins of the नेशनल Hockey League ( NHL ).
Crosby was drafted first overall by the Penguins out of the क्यूबेक प्रमुख जूनियर हॉकी League ( QMJHL ).
During his two-year major junior career with the Rimouski Océanic, he earned back-to-back CHL Player of the साल पुरस्कार और led उसके क्लबों to the 2005 मेमोरियल कप फाइनल.
Nicknamed `` The Next One ``, he was one of the most अत्यधिक regarded ड्राफ्ट चयन in हॉकी इतिहास, अग्रणी अनेक to refer to the 2005 Draft Lottery as the `` Sidney Crosby Sweepstakes ''.
In his first NHL ऋतु, crosby समाप्त छठे in लीग स्कोरिंग साथ 102 अंक ( 39 लक्ष्य, 63 assists ) और was a runner-up for the Calder Memorial Trophy ( won by Alexander Ovechkin ).
By his second season, he led the NHL with 120 points ( 36 goals, 84 assists ) to capture the Art Ross Trophy, becoming the youngest खिलाड़ी और the तभी किशोरावस्था to जीत a स्कोरिंग शीर्षक in कोई प्रमुख उत्तर अमरीकी खेल लीग.
That same season, Crosby also won the Hart मेमोरियल ट्रॉफी as the पेशेवर हॉकी लेखक संघ 's चुनाव लिये सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी और the लेस्टर B. पियर्सन पुरस्कार as the NHL Players Association 's choice for most outstanding player, becoming the seventh player in NHL history to earn all three awards in one year.
Crosby started the 2007–08 season with the team 's captaincy and subsequently led उन्हें to the 2008 स्टेनली कप फाइनल, जहाँ वे यहूद पराजित by the डेट्रॉयट Red Wings in six games.
The Penguins returned to the Finals against Detroit the following साल और जीती in सात खेल ; crosby became the youngest कप्तान in एनएचएल history to win the Stanley Cup.
In the 2009–10 season, Crosby scored a career-high 51 goals, tying him with Steven stamkos लिये the प्रक्षेपास्त्र रिचर्ड ट्रॉफी as the league-leader ; साथ 58 assists, he totaled 109 points, second in the NHL.
During the off-season, Crosby प्राप्त the चिह्नित मेसियर Leadership Award.
In 2010–11, Crosby sustained a concussion as a result of हिट्स to the सिर in back-to-back games.
The injury left उसे sidelined लिये टेन और a हाफ months.
However, after playing eight games in the 2011–12 season, crosby 's concussion-like लक्षण लौटे in दिसम्बर 2011, और he किया नहीं return until mid-March 2012.
Internationally, Crosby has represented कनाडा in numerous tournaments लिये the देश 's junior and men 's teams.
After competing in the 2003 u-18 जूनियर संसार कप, he represented कनाडा in back-to-back IIHF World U20 Championships, winning silver in 2004 and gold in 2005.
At the 2006 IIHF World Championship, he led the टूर्नामेंट in स्कोरिंग, जबकि भी कमाई शीर्ष आगे and All-Star Team honours.
Four years later, crosby थी नामित to टोली कनाडा for the 2010 Winter Olympics in Vancouver.
Playing the United States in the सुनहरा पदक खेल, he scored the game-winning goal in overtime.
A संयुक्त राज्य cent, भी known as a penny.
`` My two cents '' ( 2¢ ) and its longer version `` put my दो सेंट in '' is an संयुक्त राज्य ( us ) idiomatic अभिव्यक्ति, लिया इससे the असली अंग्रेज़ी मुहावरा अभिव्यक्ति : to put in `` my two pennies worth '' or `` my tuppence worth. ''
It is used to preface the tentative stating of one’s राय.
By deprecating the opinion to follow – suggesting its value is only two cents, a very small amount – the उपयोक्ता of the phrase उम्मीदें to lessen the प्रभाव of a possibly statement, showing politeness and humility.
However, it is also sometimes प्रयुक्त साथ विडंबना जब expressing a strongly felt opinion.
The phrase is also used out of आदत to preface uncontentious opinions.

The Chinese Civil War was a civil war in China fought between forces loyal to the government of the गणतंत्र of चीन led by the kuomintang ( kmt ) और शक्तियां of the कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी of चीन ( cpc ).
The war began in April 1927, amidst the उत्तरी expedition, और essentially ended when major active battles ceased in 1950.
The conflict eventually resulted in two de facto states, the Republic of China ( ROC ) in Taiwan and the People 's Republic of China ( PRC ) in मेनलैंड चीन, दोनो claiming to be the legitimate सरकारी of चीन.
The war represented an ideological split ( Left vs. सही ) between the कम्युनिस्ट cpc, और the kmt 's ब्रांड of राष्ट्रवाद.
The civil war continued intermittently until late 1937, जब the दो पार्टियों formed a दूसरी संयुक्त Front to counter a Japanese invasion.
China 's full-scale civil war resumed in 1946, a year बाद the समाप्त of hostilities साथ Japan.
After four more years, 1950 देखी the cessation of प्रमुख सैन्य hostilities—with the newly संस्थापित लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन controlling मेनलैंड चीन ( सहित हाइनान ), और the गणतंत्र of China 's jurisdiction being restricted to Taiwan, Penghu, Quemoy, Matsu and several outlying islands.
The Kuomintang शिकस्त is attributed to अनेक कारकों : भ्रष्टाचार - च्यांग लिखा in उसके डायरी on June 1948 that the KMT had failed, not because of external enemies but because of rot from within.
Strong initial support from the U.S. diminished, और तब, रोका.
( partly क्युकी of kmt भ्रष्टाचार और anti-democratic शासन, और partly क्युकी of the uncertain U.S. foreign policy towards Communism between 1945 and 1950 ) ; Communist land reform policy promised poor peasants farmland from their landlords.
This ensured pla लोकप्रिय support.
After the surrender of Japan at the end of World War ii, सोवियत शक्तियां turned over उनके captured जापानी हथियार to the cpc और अनुमत the CPC to take control of territory in Manchuria.
To this day, no armistice or सलाम सन्धि रै कभी महरूम हस्ताक्षरित, और it is debated as to the whether the Civil War has legally ended.
Cross-Strait relations have been hindered by military threats and राजनैतिक और आर्थिक दबाव, विशेषकर over ताईवान 's राजनैतिक औकात, साथ दोनो सरकारें officially adhering to a `` One-China policy. ''
The PRC still actively claims Taiwan as part of इसके territory और continues to threaten the आरओसी साथ a सैन्य आक्रमण if the आरओसी officially declares स्वतंत्रता by बदलना its name to and gaining international recognition as the Republic of Taiwan.
the आरओसी mutually दावा मेनलैंड चीन, and they both continue the fight over diplomatic recognition.
Today, the युद्ध as ऐसे occurs on the राजनैतिक और आर्थिक fronts in the रूप of cross-Strait relations ; however, the two separate de facto states have close economic ties.
The One Hundred Twelfth United States Congress was the meeting of the legislative branch of the संयुक्त राज्य संघीय सरकारी, इससे जनवरी 3, 2011 जबतक January 3, 2013.
It convened in Washington, D.C. on January 3, 2011, and ended on January 3, 2013, 17 days before the end of the अध्यक्षीय पद to जिससे बराक ओबामा थी निर्वाचित in 2008.
सीनेटरों निर्वाचित to नियमित शर्तें in 2006 completed those terms in this Congress.
This Congress included the last House of प्रतिनिधि निर्वाचित इससे congressional जिले कि यहूद apportioned based on the 2000 census.
In the 2010 midterm elections, the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी जीती the बहुमत in the हाउस of Representatives.
While the Democrats kept their सीनेट बहुमत, it थी घटाया इससे the previous Congress.
This was the first Congress in which the House and Senate were controlled by different parties since the 107th Congress ( 2001–2003 ), और the पहला कॉंग्रेस to शुरू कि रास्ता चूंकि the 99th कॉंग्रेस ( 1985–1987 ).
In this कॉंग्रेस, the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि था the largest number of Republican members, 242, since the 80th Congress ( 1947–1949 ).
It was also the first Congress since 1947 in which no member of the कैनेडी परिवार परोसा, as खूब as the सबसे नीतियां polarized कॉंग्रेस चूंकि पुनर्निर्माण, साथ रिकार्ड low approval ratings.
Wealth in the United राज्य is commonly measured in शर्तें of जाल लायक, जिससे is the योग of सब एसेट, सहित घर equity, minus all liabilities.
The total net worth of US households and nonprofit संगठन 1945–2009, unadjusted लिये महंगाई or population change.
For example, a household in possession of an $ 800,000 house, $ 5,000 in mutual funds, $ 30,000 in cars, $ 20,000 लायक of भण्डार in उनके अपना कम्पनी, और a $ 45,000 ira होता have एसेट totaling $ 900,000.
Assuming that this household would have a $ 250,000 बंधक, $ 40,000 in car लोन, और $ 10,000 in credit card debt, its debts would total $ 300,000.
Subtracting the debts from the worth of इस household 's एसेट ( 900,000 - $ 300,000 = $ 600,000 ), इस household would have a net worth of $ 600,000.
जाल लायक can vary साथ fluctuations in value of the underlying assets.
The wealth —more specifically, the median net worth—of households in the संयुक्त राज्य is varied साथ संबंध to रेस, शिक्षा, भौगोलिक location and gender.
As one would expect, households साथ वृहद आय विशेषता the highest net worths, though high income can not be taken as an always accurate indicator of net worth.
Overall the number of wealthier households is on the वृद्धि, साथ baby boomers hitting the highs of their careers.
In addition, wealth is unevenly distributed, साथ the wealthiest 25 % of us households owning 87 % of the माल in the United States, which was $ 54.2 trillion in 2009.
Including human capital such as skills, the संयुक्त राष्ट्र अनुमानित the कुल माल of the संयुक्त राज्य in 2008 to be $ 118 trillion.
This article deals with Selective Dorsal Rhizotomy ( sdr ) बल्कि than the rhizotomy प्रक्रियाओं लिये पीड़ा राहत ; लिये those प्रक्रियाओं, जिससे have begun to take the name `` rhizotomy '' in certain instances, see facet rhizotomy and similar.
A rhizotomy ( ) is a term chiefly referring to a neurosurgical procedure that selectively destroys problematic nerve roots in the स्पाइनल cord, सबसे प्रायः to relieve the लक्षण of neuromuscular शर्तें ऐसे as spastic diplegia and other forms of spastic cerebral palsy.
The selective dorsal rhizotomy ( SDR ) for spastic cerebral palsy has been the main use of rhizotomy for neurosurgeons specialising in spastic cp चूंकि the 1980s ; in इस सर्जरी, the spasticity-causing nerves are isolated and then targeted and destroyed.
The संवेदी तंत्रिका जड़ें, जहाँ spasticity is स्तिथ, हैं पहला अलग इससे the मोटर ones, और the तंत्रिका मछली to be cut are then identified via electromyographic stimulation.
The ones producing spasticity are तब selectively lesioned साथ छोटा विद्युत pulses.
In spasticity, rhizotomy precisely targets and destroys the क्षतिग्रस्त nerves कि don’t प्राप्त गामा अमीनो butyric एसिड, which is the core problem for people with spastic cerebral palsy.
These over-firing, non-GABA-absorbing nerves generate unusual विद्युत कार्यकलाप दौरान the emg परीक्षण phase in sdr और हैं यूँ माना to be the सोर्स of the रोगी 's hypertonia ; वे हैं eliminated साथ the विद्युत pulses once identified, while the remaining nerves and nerve routes carrying the correct messages remain fully intact and untouched.
This means that the spasticity is permanently dissolved, and that this is किया बगैर affecting बेचैन प्रणाली संवेदनशीलता or फलन in अन्य areas, because the only nerves destroyed are the over-firing ones responsible for the muscle tightness.
The शर्तें rhizotomy और neurotomy are also increasingly becoming interchangeable in the treatment of chronic back pain from degenerative disc disease.
This is a procedure called a facet rhizotomy and is not a surgical procedure but is बजाय किया on an outpatient आधार using a सरल जांच to लागू radiofrequency लहरें to the impinged pain-causing तंत्रिका रूट lying between the facet joint and the vertebral body.
Such रेडियो आवृत्ति तंत्रिका lesioning परिणाम in पाँच to आठ or अधिक महीने of पीड़ा राहत पहले the तंत्रिका regenerates और another round of the procedure needs to be performed.
A facet rhizotomy is just one of many different forms of radiofrequency ablation, और इसके उपयोग of the `` rhizotomy '' नाम चाहिए not be confused with the SDR procedure.
Migrant मजदूर in कैलिफ़ोर्निया, 1935
The term migrant worker has अलग आधिकारिक meanings और connotations in अलग parts of the world.
The United Nations ' definition is व्यापक, सहित कोई लोगों working बाहर of उनके home country.
The term can also be used to describe किसी जो migrates भीतर a देश, संभवतः उनके अपना, in अनुक्रम to pursue work such as seasonal work.
फोटोग्राफ of लील वेन साथ teardrop tattoos below his eyes.
The teardrop tattoo or tear tattoo is a सांकेतिक टैटू कि is लगाई underneath the eye.
It has no fixed meaning but लगभग सब meanings ( देखिए नीचे ) have some connection to prison.
U.S. रूट 75 is a north–south U.S. Highway.
the राजमार्ग 's उत्तरी टर्मिनस is in kittson काउंटी, मिनेसोटा, at the कनाडाई किनारा, जहाँ it once continued as Manitoba Highway 75 on the other side of the now-closed border crossing.
Its southern टर्मिनस is at अंतरराज्यीय 30 और अंतरराज्यीय 45 in Dallas, Texas, where it is known as North Central Expressway.
U.S. 75 was a border-to-border रूट, इससे कनाडा to the गल्फ of मैक्सिको at Galveston, Texas.
However, the entire segment south of Dallas, Texas has been decommissioned in एहसान of अंतरराज्यीय 45, a कटऑफ खण्ड of town-to-town सतह सड़क having become State Highway 75.
Lower Ninth वार्ड is a पड़ोस of the city of New Orleans.
As the name implies, it is भाग of the नवीं वार्ड of नई ऑरलियन्स.
The Lower Ninth Ward is often thought of as the entire area within New Orleans downriver of the औद्योगिक कनाल ; however, the नगर नियोजन आयोग divides इस क्षेत्रफल into the निम्नतर नवीं Ward ( 2 ) and Holy Cross ( 3 ) neighborhoods.
The term `` Lower '' refers to its location farther towards the mouth of the मिसिसिपी नदी, `` bas '' or `` नीचे '' the बाकी of the नगर in लोकल भौगोलिक शब्दावली.
But the 9th वार्ड, जैसे सब wards in नई ऑरलियन्स, is a voting district.
The 9th वार्ड थी added as a मतदान district in 1852.
The `` lower '' 9th Ward is composed of Ward 9 Districts 1, 2, 4, and 7 which मेक up the पावन क्रॉस क्षेत्रफल और वार्ड 9 जिले 3, 5, 6, और 8.
उच्चतर मतदान ज़िला संख्याएँ in the 9th Ward ( 8-27 ) are on the upriver side of the Industrial Canal.
The area came to नेशनल ध्यान लिये इसके devastation in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina in 2005.

Red and orange tinted Moon, as seen from Earth during a lunar ग्रहण, जहाँ the धरती आता between the Moon and Sun
the चंद्रमा is the तभी प्राकृतिक उपग्रह of the Earth, and the fifth largest satellite in the Solar System.
It is the largest प्राकृतिक उपग्रह of a ग्रह in the सौर प्रणाली सापेक्ष to the आकार of its primary, having 27 % the diameter and 60 % the density of Earth, resulting in its mass.
The Moon is the दूसरी densest उपग्रह बाद io, a satellite of Jupiter.
The Moon is in synchronous rotation with Earth, always showing the same face with its near side चिह्नित by अंधेरा volcanic मरिया कि भरण between the उज्जवल प्राचीन crustal हाइलैंड्स और the prominent impact craters.
It is the brightest ऑब्जेक्ट in the आसमान बाद the सूर्य, हालांकि इसके सतह is दरअसल बहुत अंधेरा, साथ a reflectance similar to that of coal.
Its prominence in the sky and its regular cycle of phases have, चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स, बना the चंद्रमा an महत्वपूर्ण सांस्कृतिक influence on भाषा, calendars, art and mythology.
The Moon 's gravitational influence produces the समंदर tides और the मिनट lengthening of the दिन.
The Moon 's current orbital distance, about thirty times the diameter of the Earth, causes it to appear almost the same size in the आसमान as the सूर्य, allowing it to कवर the सूर्य nearly precisely in कुल सौर eclipses.
This matching of apparent विज़ुअल आकार is a संयोग.
The Moon 's linear अलहदा इससे the धरती is फिलहाल increasing at a रेट of 3.82±0.07cm per year, but this rate is not constant.
The Moon is thought to have formed nearly 4.5 अरब सालो पहले, नहीं long बाद the Earth.
Although there have been several hypotheses for its origin in the past, the current most widely accepted स्पष्टीकरण is कि the चंद्रमा formed इससे the मलबा बाएँ over बाद a दानव प्रभाव between Earth and a Mars -sized body.
The चंद्रमा is the तभी celestial देह अन्य than धरती on which humans have set foot.
The Soviet Union 's Luna programme was the first to reach the Moon with unmanned spacecraft in 1959 ; the संयुक्त राज्य ' नासा अपोलो कार्यक्रम हासिल the तभी मानवयुक्त मिशन to तिथि, शुरूआत साथ the पहला मानवयुक्त चंद्र orbiting मिशन by अपोलो 8 in 1968, और छह मानवयुक्त चंद्र अवतरण between 1969 and 1972, with the first being Apollo 11.
These missions returned over 380 kg of lunar rocks, which have महरूम प्रयुक्त to develop a geological समझना of the चंद्रमा 's origins, the formation of its internal structure, and its subsequent history.
बाद the अपोलो 17 मिशन in 1972, the चंद्रमा रै been visited only by unmanned spacecraft, notably by the final Soviet Lunokhod rover.
Since 2004, Japan, चीन, इण्डिया, the संयुक्त राज्य, और the यूरोपीय Space Agency have each sent lunar orbiters.
These spacecraft have contributed to confirming the डिस्कवरी of चंद्र जल बर्फ in permanently shadowed craters at the डंडे और bound into the lunar regolith.
भविष्य मानवयुक्त मिशन to the चंद्रमा have महरूम नियोजित, including government as well as privately funded efforts.
The Moon remains, under the Outer स्पेस सन्धि, फ़्री to सब राष्ट्र to explore for peaceful purposes.
Ronald Wilson Reagan ( ; फ़रवरी 6, 1911 – जून 5, 2004 ) थी the 40th President of the United States ( 1981–1989 ).
Prior to that, he was the 33rd Governor of California ( 1967–1975 ), and a रेडियो, फिल्मी और टेलीविज़न कर्ता.
Born in Tampico, Illinois, and raised in Dixon, Reagan was educated at Eureka कॉलेज, कमाई a स्नातक of कला उपाधि in अर्थशास्त्र and sociology.
After graduating, Reagan moved first to Iowa to कार्य as a रेडियो प्रसारणकर्ता और तब, in 1937, to लॉस एंजिल्स जहाँ he began a करियर as an actor, first in films and later television.
Some of his most notable films include Knute Rockne, All American ( 1940 ), किंग्स पंक्ति ( 1942 ), और bedtime लिये bonzo ( 1951 ).
Reagan served as President of the Screen Actors Guild and later as a प्रवक्ता लिये सामान्य इलेक्ट्रिक ( ge ) ; उसके प्रारंभ in राजनीती occurred दौरान his work for GE.
originally a सदस्य of the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी, उसके स्थितियाँ began shifting rightward in the 1950s, and he switched to the Republican Party in 1962.
बाद delivering a rousing वाक in support of बैरी goldwater 's अध्यक्षीय candidacy in 1964, he was persuaded to seek the California governorship, winning two years later and again in 1970.
He was defeated in his run for the रिपब्लिकन अध्यक्षीय नामांकन in 1968 और in 1976, लकिन जीती दोनो the nomination and general election in 1980, defeating incumbent Jimmy Carter.
As president, Reagan implemented sweeping नई राजनैतिक और आर्थिक initiatives.
His supply-side economic policies, dubbed `` Reaganomics ``, advocated reducing tax rates to spur economic growth, controlling the धन सप्लाई to reduce महंगाई, deregulation of the अर्थव्यवस्था, and reducing government spending.
In his first term he survived an assassination attempt, took a hard line विरूद्ध मजदूर संघ, घोषित a नई युद्ध on दवाएँ, और ordered an invasion of Grenada.
He थी re-elected in a भूस्खलन in 1984, proclaiming कि it was `` Morning in America ``.
His second term was primarily marked by foreign matters, such as the ending of the Cold War, the 1986 bombing of लीबिया, और the revelation of the Iran-Contra affair.
Publicly describing the Soviet Union as an `` evil साम्राज्य ``, he समर्थित anti-communist आंदोलनों विश्वव्यापी और खर्च उसके पहला पद forgoing the रणनीति of détente by ordering a massive military buildup in an arms race with the USSR.
Reagan negotiated with Soviet General Secretary Mikhail Gorbachev, culminating in the inf सन्धि और the घटी of दोनो countries ' nuclear arsenals.
reagan बाएँ दफ्तर in 1989.
In 1994, the former president disclosed कि he था महरूम diagnosed साथ अल्जाइमर 's बीमारी पहले in the साल ; he died ten years later at the age of 93.
A conservative icon, he बाँधने अत्यधिक in पब्लिक राय पोल of u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों और is credited लिये generating an वैचारिक renaissance on the American political right.
Complete set of scrolls, constituting the entire Tanakh.
The Tanakh (, or ; also Tenakh, Tenak, Tanach ) is a नाम प्रयुक्त in judaism लिये the canon of the Hebrew Bible.
the tanakh is भी ज्ञात as the Masoretic Text or the Miqra.
The name is an acronym formed इससे the आरंभिक यहूदी अक्षर of the masoretic टेक्स्ट 's तीन परंपरागत subdivisions : The Torah ( `` Teaching '', also known as the Five Books of Moses ), Nevi'im ( `` Prophets '' ) and Ketuvim ( `` Writings '' ) —hence TaNaKh.
The नाम `` miqra '' ( מקרא ), अर्थ `` कि जिससे is पढ़ा '', is an alternative Hebrew term for the Tanakh.
The books of the Tanakh यहूद relayed साथ an accompanying मौखिक परंपरा passed on by प्रत्येक पीढी, called the Oral Torah.
The Kawasaki Ninja ZX-6R is a कावासाकी 600 cc क्लास sport motorcycle.
It was introduced in 1995, and has महरूम constantly अद्यतनीकृत throughout the सालो in जवाब to नई उत्पाद इससे Honda, Suzuki, and Yamaha.
The ZX series is what was known as the निंजा लकीर of कावासाकी मोटरसाइकिल in the 1980s and still carries the name today.
Assassination attempts and plots on राष्ट्रपतियों of the संयुक्त राज्य have महरूम numerous : अधिक than 20 कोशिशें to kill sitting and former presidents, as well as the Presidents-elect, are known.
Four sitting presidents have been killed : Abraham Lincoln ( the 16th President ), James A. Garfield ( the 20th अध्यक्ष ), विलियम mckinley ( the 25th अध्यक्ष ) और जॉन F. कैनेडी ( the 35th President ).
Two presidents were injured in attempted assassinations : पूर्व अध्यक्ष थियोडोर रूज़वेल्ट ( the 26th अध्यक्ष ), और अध्यक्ष Ronald Reagan ( the 40th President ).
Although the historian j.w. क्लार्क रै सुझाया कि सबसे अमरीकी assassinations were politically motivated actions, carried out by rational men, not all such attacks have been undertaken for political reasons.
Some attackers had questionable दिमागी स्थिरता, और a few यहूद judged legally insane.
Since the Vice President of the United States has for more than a सदी महरूम निर्वाचित इससे the वही राजनैतिक पार्टी as the अध्यक्ष, the हत्या of the President is unlikely to result in major policy changes.
This may explain why political groups typically do नहीं मेक ऐसे हमले.
Where the Red Fern Grows is a अनोखा लिखा by विल्सन राल्स in 1961 परिचय a लड़के जो खरीदता और रेल दो redbone Coonhound hunting dogs.
Oklahoma ( ) ( pawnee : uukuhuúwa, cay : gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a राज्य स्तिथ in West South Central United States.
Oklahoma is the 20th सबसे extensive और the 28th सबसे populous of the 50 संयुक्त राज्य.
The state 's name is derived from the Choctaw words okla and humma, अर्थ `` रेड लोगों '', और it is ज्ञात informally by इसके nickname, The Sooner State.
Formed by the combination of Oklahoma territory और भारतीय territory on नवम्बर 16, 1907, ओक्लाहोमा थी the 46th state to enter the union.
Its residents are known as Oklahomans or, informally `` okies '', और इसके पूंजी और largest नगर is Oklahoma City.
A major निर्माता of प्राकृतिक गैस, आयल, और कृषि, ओक्लाहोमा relies on an economic base of aviation, energy, telecommunications, and biotechnology.
It has one of the तीव्रतम growing economies in the स्वदेश, रैंकिंग among the शीर्ष राज्य in per capita income growth and gross domestic product growth.
Oklahoma City and Tulsa serve as Oklahoma 's primary economic anchors, with nearly two thirds of Oklahomans living भीतर उनके महानगर सांख्यिकीय areas.
With small mountain ranges, prairie, mesas, and eastern forests, most of Oklahoma lies in the Great मैदान और the u.s. आंतरिक हाइलैंड्स —a प्रदेश विशेषकर prone to severe weather.
In addition to having a prevalence of English, German, स्कॉटिश, आयरिश और देशी अमरीकी ancestry, अधिक than 25 देशी अमरीकी भाषाएं हैं spoken in Oklahoma, second only to California.
Oklahoma is located on a confluence of three major American cultural regions and historically served as a रूट लिये चौपायों ड्राइव, a गंतव्य लिये दक्षिणी settlers, and a government-sanctioned territory for Native Americans.
Redwall, by Brian ज़ाक, is a श्रेणी of children 's काल्पनिक novels.
It is the title of the first book of the series, published in 1986, as well as the name of the Abbey featured in the किताब और the नाम of an एनिमेटेड tv श्रेणी आधारित on तीन of the novels ( redwall, mattimeo, and Martin the Warrior ), which first aired in 1999.
The books are primarily aimed at older children, लकिन have प्रशंसक of सब ages.
There have been twenty-two novels और दो चित्र किताबे published.
The twenty-second, और फाइनल, अनोखा, The Rogue Crew, was posthumously released on May 3, 2011.
Natural Gas is usually measured by volume in the संयुक्त राज्य और is stated in cubic feet.
A cubic foot of gas is the amount of gas needed to fill a volume of one cubic foot under set शर्तें of दबाव और temperature.to माप larger amounts of natural gas, a `` therm '' is used to denote 100 cubic feet, and `` mcf '' is used to denote 1,000 cubic feet.
To provide वृहद सटीकता in comparing fuels, energy content is measured in terms of `` British Thermal Units ( BTU 's ). ''
A BTU is the amount of heat required to raise one पाउंड of जल ( लगभग a pint ), एक degree Fahrenheit at or close to its point of maximum density.
One British therm ( symbol thm ) is a non- si ईकाई of ऊष्मा उर्जा बराबर to 100,000 British thermal units ( BTU ).
It is approximately the energy समतुल्य of burning 100 घन फीट ( प्रायः referred to as 1 CCF ) of natural gas.
Since ( Natural Gas ) meters measure volume and not energy content, a therm फ़ैक्टर is प्रयुक्त by ( प्राकृतिक ) गैस कंपनियाँ to बदलें the आवाज़ of गैस प्रयुक्त to इसके ऊष्मा समतुल्य, और यूँ calculate the actual energy use.
The therm factor is प्रायः in the इकाई therms/ccf.
It होगा vary साथ the मिक्सर of hydrocarbons in the natural gas.
Natural gas with a higher than average concentration of ethane, प्रोपेन or ब्यूटेन होगा have a उच्चतर therm factor.
Impurities, such as कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड or नाइट्रोजन, निम्नतर the therm factor.
The volume of the gas is calculated as if measured at मानक तापमान और दबाव ( STP ).
The heat content of natural gas is solely dependent on the संयोजन of the गैस, और is स्वतंत्र of तापमान और दबाव.
One therm is equal to परिचय 105.5 megajoules, 25,200 kilocalories or 29.3 kilowatt-hours.
One therm can also be provided by परिचय of natural gas.
The therm sometimes रै महरूम उलझन साथ the thermie ( see below ).
The names of both units आइये इससे the यूनानी शब्द लिये ऊष्मा.
A thermie ( th ) is a metric unit of heat उर्जा, भाग of the meter-tonne-second प्रणाली sometimes प्रयुक्त by यूरोपीय engineers.
The thermie is equal to the amount of energy required to उठाएँ the तापमान of 1 tonne of water by 1 °C.
The thermie is equivalent to 1,000 kilocalories, 4.1868 megajoules or 3968.3 btu.
The American Civil War ( ACW ), also known as the War between the States or बस the सिविल युद्ध ( देखिए नामकरण ), थी a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
the युद्ध था इसके उत्पत्ति in the issue of slavery, especially the extension of slavery into the western territories.
विदेशी शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene.
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 सैनिको मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना, the confederacy collapsed, गुलामी थी abolished, और the मुश्किल Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential election, republicans, led by अब्राहम lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories.
Lincoln won, but before his उद्घाटन on कूच 4, 1861, सात cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan and the आवक republicans अस्वीकृत secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural पता घोषित उसके प्रशासन होता नहीं initiate civil war.
Eight बाकी स्लेव राज्य जारी to अस्वीकृत calls for secession.
Confederate forces seized numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace Conference failed to ढूँढें a सुलह, और दोनो sides prepared for war.
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` किंग कपास `` कि वे होता intervene ; none किया और none पहचाना the new Confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on अप्रैल 12, 1861, जब confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट Sumter, a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina.
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the fort ; नतीजतन, चार अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined the confederacy, bringing उनके कुल to eleven.
The Union soon controlled the border राज्य और स्थापित a नवल नाकेबंदी कि अबोध the दक्षिणी economy.
The पूर्वी थिएटर थी inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union राज्य ) ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट at the बैटल of antietam, dissuading British intervention.
lincoln जारी the emancipation उदघोषणा, which made ending slavery a war goal.
To the west, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy, then much of उनके पश्चिमी सेना, और the संघ at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, रॉबर्ट E. ली 's confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
पश्चिमी सफलताओं led to Ulysses S. Grant command of all Union armies in 1864.
In the Western Theater, विलियम T. शरमन drove ईस्ट to कैप्चर अटलांटा और marched to the समुद्र, destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way.
The Union marshaled the संसाधन और जनशक्ति to आक्रमण the confederacy इससे सब दिशानिर्देश, और could afford to लड़ो battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending Confederate army failed, leading to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at appomattox अदालत हाउस on अप्रैल 9, 1865.
The American Civil War was one of the earliest सच्चा औद्योगिक युद्धों.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, और mass-produced हथियार यहूद employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, mines, shipyards, बैंको, परिवहन और खाना आपूर्तियाँ सब foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest war in American history, resulting in the deaths of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined क्रमांक of civilian हताहत.
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of all उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा, और 30 प्रतिशत of सब दक्षिणी श्वेत males aged 18–40.
William Bruce Jenner ( born अक्तूबर 28, 1949 ) is a पूर्व u.S. track और फ़ील्ड खिलाड़ी, प्रेरक स्पीकर, socialite, television personality and businessman.
He won the gold medal लिये decathlon in the मॉन्ट्रियल 1976 Summer Olympics.
Following his Olympic win and the related recognition, he married Kris Kardashian, and his पेशेवर करियर विकसित into होने a टेलीविज़न celebrity.
By 1981, he था स्ट्रक्चर in अनेक made-for-tv फिल्मों and was Erik Estrada 's replacement on the top rated TV series CHiPs.
He has छह children : बर्ट, केसी, ब्रैंडन, Brody, Kendall and Kylie.
Since his 1991 marriage to क्रिस जेनर, he is the stepfather to कोर्टनी, Kim, Khloe and Rob Kardashian.
Since 2007, he रै appeared साथ उसके blended परिवार on Keeping Up with the Kardashians.
Escherichia coli ( ; commonly abbreviated E. कोलाई ) is a gram-negative, rod-shaped bacterium that is commonly found in the lower intestine of warm-blooded organisms ( endotherms ).
Most E. coli strains are harmless, but कुछ serotypes can कारण गंभीर खाना विषाक्तता in इंसानो, और हैं occasionally responsible for product recalls due to food contamination.
The harmless strains हैं भाग of the सामान्य फ्लोरा of the आंत, और can लाभ उनके होस्ट by producing विटामिन k2, और by preventing the establishment of pathogenic bacteria within the intestine.
E. coli and related bacteria constitute about 0.1 % of gut flora, and fecal–oral हस्तांतरण is the प्रमुख रूट through जिससे रोगजनक strains of the bacterium कारण disease.
Cells are able to survive outside the body for a limited amount of समय, जिससे makes उन्हें आदर्श indicator जीवों to परीक्षण पर्यावरणीय नमूने for fecal contamination.
There is, however, a growing body of शोध कि रै examined environmentally persistent E. कोलाई जिससे can जीवित लिये extended periods outside of the host.
The bacterium can also be grown easily and inexpensively in a प्रयोगशाला सेटिंग, और रै महरूम intensively investigated for over 60 years.
E. coli is the most widely studied prokaryotic model organism, and an important species in the फ़ील्ड of जैवप्रौद्योगिकी और सूक्ष्मजैविकी, जहाँ it रै परोसा as the मेजबान सजीव लिये the majority of work with recombinant DNA.
Area code 217 is the North अमरीकी टेलीफोन क्षेत्रफल कोड लिये much of पश्चिमी और सेंट्रल इलिनोइस.
The 217 area includes Illinois ' पूंजी, springfield, प्लस champaign, Urbana, Decatur, Danville, Quincy, and Rantoul.
217 was one of the original area कोड, जिससे यहूद निर्मित in 1947.
The only significant change in 217 's सीमाएँ थी in 1957, जब इसके उत्तरी portion थी संयुक्त with part of area code 815 to form area code 309.

Ozone depletion describes two distinct but related phenomena observed चूंकि the लेट 1970s : a स्थिर मनाही of परिचय 4 % प्रति दशक in the कुल आवाज़ of ओज़ोन in Earth 's stratosphere ( the ozone layer ), and a much larger springtime decrease in stratospheric ozone over Earth 's polar regions.
The latter phenomenon is referred to as the ओज़ोन hole.
In addition to these well-known stratospheric phenomena, वहीँ हैं भी springtime polar tropospheric ozone depletion events.
The details of ध्रुवीय ओज़ोन छेद गठन differ इससे कि of mid-latitude thinning, लकिन the most important process in both is catalytic destruction of ozone by atomic halogens.
The main source of these halogen atoms in the stratosphere is photodissociation of man-made halocarbon refrigerants ( CFCs, freons, halons ).
ये यौगिकों हैं transported into the stratosphere after being emitted at the surface.
Both types of ozone depletion were observed to बढ़ाएँ as emissions of halo-carbons increased.
CFCs and अन्य contributory substances हैं referred to as ozone-depleting substances ( ODS ).
Since the ozone layer prevents most harmful UVB wavelengths ( 280–315 nm ) of ultraviolet light ( UV light ) from passing through the Earth 's atmosphere, observed and projected decreases in ozone have generated विश्वव्यापी चिंता अग्रणी to अपनाना of the मॉन्ट्रियल प्रोटोकॉल कि bans the उत्पादन of cfcs, halons, और अन्य ozone-depleting chemicals such as carbon tetrachloride and trichloroethane.
It is suspected that a variety of biological consequences such as increases in स्किन कर्कट, cataracts, क्षति to पौधे, और कटौती of प्लवक populations in the ocean 's photic zone may result from the increased UV exposure due to ozone depletion.
The Preamble to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान is a ब्रैड परिचयात्मक बयान of the संविधान 's fundamental purposes and guiding principles.
It राज्य in सामान्य शर्तें, और न्यायालयों have referred to it as विश्वसनीय evidence of, the Founding Fathers ' intentions regarding the Constitution 's meaning and what they hoped the Constitution would achieve as it pertains to all of the people of the United States.
As the phrase, `` we the people '' suggests that the new government originates इससे the लोगों of the संयुक्त राज्य और it सेट into गति a सवाल as it pertains to कि विशाल जनसांख्यिकी concerning the व्यक्तिगत अधिकारों और समता among all people ; this can be seen most broadly in the divide between republicanism and social democracy.
