The shot put ( सुनाया ) is a track और फ़ील्ड इवेंट involving `` फेंकना '' / '' putting '' ( फेंकना in a pushing motion ) a heavy spherical object —the shot—as far as possible.
The shot put प्रतियोगिता लिये मेन रै महरूम a भाग of the आधुनिक ओलंपिक चूंकि उनके पुनरुद्धार in 1896, women 's competition began in 1948.
Map of the United Nations ( UN ) member states, with their territories ( सहित निर्भर territories ) पहचाना by the UN in blue
There are संयुक्त राष्ट्र ( un ) सदस्य राज्य, और प्रत्येक of उन्हें is a member of the United Nations General Assembly.
The criteria for admission of new members are नियत आउट in the संयुक्त राष्ट्र चार्टर, Chapter II, Article 4:
A recommendation for admission from the Security Council requires affirmative मत इससे at तनिक नौ of the परिषद 's पंद्रह सदस्यों, साथ none of the five permanent members voting against.
the सुरक्षा परिषद 's अनुशंसा जरूर तब be subsequently approved in the General Assembly by a two-thirds majority vote.
In principle, only sovereign राज्य can become un सदस्यों, और फिलहाल सब un सदस्यों हैं sovereign राज्य ( हालांकि a few members were not sovereign when they joined the UN ).
Because a state can only be admitted to the UN by the approval of the Security Council and the General Assembly, a number of states that may be considered sovereign राज्य according to the montevideo सम्मेलन मापदण्ड हैं नहीं सदस्यों क्युकी the un करता नहीं consider उन्हें to possess sovereignty, mainly due to the lack of international recognition or opposition from certain members.
In addition to the member states, the UN also invites non-member states ( फिलहाल दो : the पावन देखिए और फिलिस्तीन ), intergovernmental संगठन, और अन्य अंतरराष्ट्रीय संगठन और entities जिनकी statehood or sovereignty are not precisely defined, to become observers at the General Assembly, allowing them to participate and speak, but not vote, in General Assembly meetings.
The Eiffel मीनार (, ) is an आयरन जाली मीनार स्तिथ on the champ de मंगल in Paris, named after the engineer Gustave Eiffel, whose company designed and built the tower.
Erected in 1889 as the entrance arch to the 1889 World 's Fair, it has become both a वैश्विक सांस्कृतिक प्रतीक of फ़्रांस और एक of the सबसे recognizable structures in the world.
The tower is the tallest ढांचा in पेरिस और the most-visited सशुल्क स्मारक in the संसार ; 7.1 लाख people ascended it in 2011.
The third level observatory 's upper मंच is at the उच्चतम accessible to पब्लिक in the European Union and the highest in Europe as long as the platform of the Ostankino Tower, at, remains closed as a result of the fire of August 2000.
The tower received its 250 millionth आगंतुक in 2010.
The tower stands tall, about the same ऊँचाई as an 81-storey building.
During its construction, the Eiffel Tower surpassed the Washington Monument to assume the title of the tallest man-made ढांचा in the संसार, a शीर्षक it आयोजित लिये 41 सालो, जबतक the क्रिसलर भवन in नई यॉर्क नगर थी निर्मित in 1930.
Because of the addition, in 1957, of the एंटीना atop the एफिल मीनार, it is now taller than the Chrysler Building.
Not including broadcast antennas, it is the second-tallest ढांचा in फ़्रांस, बाद the Millau Viaduct.
the मीनार रै तीन levels for visitors.
Tickets can be खरीदा to ascend, by सीढ़ियाँ or लिफ्ट ( elevator ), to the first and second levels.
The walk from मैदान स्तर to the पहला स्तर is over 300 कदम, as is the walk from the first to the second level.
The third और उच्चतम स्तर is accessible तभी by lift—stairs do exist but are usually closed to the public.
the पहला और second levels have restaurants.
the मीनार रै become the सबसे prominent प्रतीक of दोनो पेरिस और France, often in the establishing shot of films set in the city.
Kenneth Wayne `` Ken '' Jennings III ( born May 23, 1974 ) is an अमरीकी खेल दिखाएँ प्रतियोगी and author.
Jennings is noted for holding the record for the longest जीतना streak on the u.S. syndicated game show Jeopardy !
and as being the all-time अग्रणी धन विजेता on अमरीकी game shows.
In 2004, जेनिंग्स जीती 74 jeopardy !
games before he was पराजित by चैलेंजर नैंसी zerg on उसके 75th appearance.
उसके कुल आय on Jeopardy !
are $ 3,172,700, consisting of $ 2,520,700 over his 74 wins, a $ 2,000 second-place पुरस्कार in उसके 75th रूप, a $ 500,000 second-place prize in the Jeopardy !
Ultimate Tournament of Champions, as खूब as हाफ of a $ 300,000 पुरस्कार in the ibm चुनौती.
During उसके पहला चलाएं of jeopardy !
appearances, Jennings earned the record for the उच्चतम अमरीकी खेल दिखाएँ winnings.
His total was surpassed by Brad Rutter, जो पराजित जेनिंग्स in the फाइनल of the Jeopardy !
Ultimate Tournament of Champions ( पहला aired on may 25, 2005 ), adding $ 2,000,000 to Rutter 's existing Jeopardy !
winnings.
Jennings regained the record after appearing on several other game shows, culminating in an रूप on हैं तुम होशियार Than a 5th Grader ?
( first aired on अक्तूबर 10, 2008 ), हालांकि rutter retains the Jeopardy !
रिकार्ड.
After his success on Jeopardy !, जेनिंग्स लिखा परिचय उसके अनुभव और छान अमरीकी ट्रिविया इतिहास और संस्कृति in उसके किताब brainiac : Adventures in the Curious, Competitive, Compulsive World of Trivia Buffs, published in 2006.
The Canadian फ़ुटबॉल लीग or cfl ( ' [ lcf ] in फ्रेंच ) is a पेशेवर खेल लीग located in Canada.
The CFL is the highest level of competition in Canadian फ़ुटबॉल, a रूप of gridiron फ़ुटबॉल closely related to American football.
Its eight current teams, which are located in eight separate cities, are विभाजित into दो विभाजन of चार टीमों प्रत्येक — the East Division and the West Division.
The league 's 19-week नियमित ऋतु रनों इससे लेट जून to जल्दी नवम्बर ; प्रत्येक team plays 18 games with one bye week.
Following the regular season, the three teams with the best records in their division ( except if the fourth place team in one division रै a बेहतर रिकार्ड than the तीसरा प्लेस टोली in the अन्य प्रभाग, जब the टोली साथ the बेहतर रिकार्ड makes the playoffs and `` crosses over '' to the other division 's playoff ) compete in the league 's three-week divisional playoffs, which culminate in the late-November Grey Cup championship, the country 's largest annual sports and television event.
The CFL was officially founded on January 19, 1958, बनाना it the दूसरी oldest gridiron फ़ुटबॉल लीग in उत्तर अमेरिका स्टिल in operation, although all its teams long predate the modern formation of the league.
It is the highest level of play in Canadian फ़ुटबॉल, the सबसे लोकप्रिय फ़ुटबॉल लीग in कनाडा, और the second-most लोकप्रिय प्रमुख खेल league in Canada, after the National Hockey League.
Although ice hockey is Canada 's सबसे लोकप्रिय खेल, the cfl रै increased the लोकप्रियता of कनाडाई फ़ुटबॉल in Quebec and Western Canada.
Canadian football is also निभाई at amateur स्तर ( i.e. युवावस्था, ऊँची स्कूल, cjfl, QJFL, CIS and senior leagues such as the Alberta Football League ).
The 2010s will be a significant दशक लिये the cfl in शर्तें of विकास, as टीमों have संवर, विस्तारित स्टेडियम, or plan to build entirely new stadiums.
the मॉन्ट्रियल अलॉतेस संपन्नता इस पहला, adding 5,000 सीटे to Percival Molson Memorial Stadium in time for the 2010 CFL season.
The Edmonton Eskimos and Calgary स्तेमपेड्रस भी संवर उनके संबंधित स्टेडियम और सुविधाएं for the 2010 season.
In 2011, the bc शेर निभाई under a new, retractable roof in BC Place after spending one and a half seasons at Empire Field.
Then the Winnipeg ब्लू बमवर्षक होगा खेल in an entirely नई स्टेडियम at the University of Manitoba, scheduled to open in time for the 2013 season.
The Hamilton Tiger-Cats, Saskatchewan Roughriders and the new Ottawa franchise are also looking at नई or extensively-renovated स्टेडियम in the following years.
वहीँ हैं भी उम्मीदें of expanding the लीग to अटलांटिक कनाडा ( ideally basing a टोली in either the अधिक आबादी halifax, or the more centralized Moncton ), as 2010 and 2011 had regular season games hosted in Moncton.
According to sports historian Douglas Brei, the Canadian Football League holds the distinction of being the only पेशेवर खेल लीग in उत्तर अमेरिका, प्रमुख or नाबालिग लीग, in जिससे प्रत्येक मौजूदा मताधिकार रै जीती at तनिक one league title while in their current location.
Each antibody binds to a विशिष्ट प्रतिजन ; an बातचीत समान to a lock and key.
An antibody ( Ab ), also known as an immunoglobulin ( Ig ), is a large Y-shaped protein produced by b-cells कि is प्रयुक्त by the प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली to पहचानो और neutralize foreign objects such as bacteria and viruses.
The antibody recognizes a अद्वितीय भाग of the foreign target, called an antigen.
Each tip of the `` Y '' of an antibody contains a paratope ( a ढांचा analogous to a ताला ) कि is विशिष्ट लिये एक particular epitope ( similarly analogous to a कुंजी ) on an प्रतिजन, allowing ये दो structures to bind together with precision.
Using this binding mechanism, an antibody can tag a microbe or an infected cell for attack by other भाग of the प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली, or can neutralize इसके निशाना सीधे ( for example, by blocking a part of a microbe that is essential for its invasion and survival ).
The production of antibodies is the main फलन of the humoral immune system.
Antibodies are secreted by a प्रकार of श्वेत रक्त कोशिका पुकारा a plasma cell.
Antibodies can occur in two physical forms, a soluble form that is स्रावित इससे the कोशिका, और a झिल्ली -bound रूप कि is संलग्न to the सतह of a B cell and is referred to as the B cell receptor ( BCR ).
The BCR is only found on the surface of B cells and facilitates the activation of these cells and their subsequent differentiation into either एंटीबॉडी कारखानों पुकारा प्लाज्मा कोशिकाएं, or मेमोरी b कोशिकाएं कि होगा जीवित in the देह और याद कि वही प्रतिजन so the B cells can respond faster upon future exposure.
In most cases, interaction of the B cell with a T helper cell is जरुरी to उपज पूरा सक्रियण of the b कोशिका और, इसलिए, एंटीबॉडी पीढी following antigen binding.
Soluble antibodies are released into the रक्त और ऊतक fluids, as खूब as अनेक secretions to continue to survey for invading microorganisms.
antibodies हैं glycoproteins belonging to the immunoglobulin superfamily ; the terms antibody and immunoglobulin are often used interchangeably.
Antibodies are typically बना of मौलिक संरचनात्मक units—each साथ two large heavy chains and two small light chains.
There are several different types of antibody heavy chains, and several different kinds of antibodies, which are grouped into अलग isotypes आधारित on जिससे भारी कड़ी वे possess.
Five different antibody isotypes are known in स्तनधारियों, जिससे perform अलग भूमिकाएँ, और सहायता सीधा the उचित प्रतिरक्षा जवाब for each different type of foreign object they encounter.
Though the general structure of all antibodies is very similar, a small region at the tip of the protein is अत्यधिक परिवर्तनीय, allowing लाखो of antibodies साथ थोड़ा अलग टिप structures, or प्रतिजन बाइंडिंग sites, to exist.
इस प्रदेश is ज्ञात as the hypervariable region.
Each of ये विसंगतियाँ can bind to a different antigen.
This enormous diversity of antibodies allows the immune system to recognize an बराबर चौड़ी किस्में of antigens.
The large and diverse population of antibodies is generated by random combinations of a नियत of जीन खण्ड कि encode अलग प्रतिजन बाइंडिंग साइट ( or paratopes ), followed by यादृच्छिक mutations in this area of the antibody gene, which create further diversity.
Antibody genes also re-organize in a process called class switching that changes the base of the भारी कड़ी to another, बनाना a अलग isotype of the antibody that retains the antigen specific variable region.
This allows a सिंगल एंटीबॉडी to be प्रयुक्त by अनेक अलग भाग of the immune system.
The symbol used by the zodiac कातिल to चिह्न उसके पत्राचार
the zodiac कातिल थी a सीरियल कातिल जो संचालित in Northern California in the late 1960s and early 1970s.
The कातिल 's पहचान remains unknown.
The Zodiac murdered victims in Benicia, Vallejo, Lake berryessa, और सैन फ्रांसिस्को between दिसम्बर 1968 और अक्तूबर 1969.
Four men and three women between the आयु of 16 और 29 यहूद targeted.
The killer originated the name `` zodiac '' in a श्रेणी of taunting अक्षर भेजा to the local Bay Area press.
These letters included चार cryptograms ( or ciphers ).
Of the four cryptograms sent, only one has महरूम definitively हल.
Suspects have been named by law प्रवर्तन और amateur जांचकर्ताओं, लकिन no conclusive प्रमाण has surfaced.
In April 2004, the San Francisco Police Department marked the case `` निष्क्रिय '', yet re-opened the मामला at कुछ पाइंट prior to March 2007.
The case also remains खोलें in the नगर of vallejo, as खूब as in Napa County and Solano County.
The California Department of इंसाफ रै कायम an खोलें मामला संचिका on the zodiac murders since 1969.
जेनिंग्स is a छोटी नगर in और the मोहल्ला सीट of जेफरसन Davis Parish, Louisiana, United States, near Lake Charles.
The population was 10,383 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी, a छोटी मनाही इससे the 2000 tabulation.
the नगर is 68 प्रतिशत white.
Jennings is the principal city of the जेनिंग्स micropolitan सांख्यिकीय Area, which includes all of Jefferson Davis Parish.
It is also part of the larger झील Charles-Jennings Combined Statistical Area.
Nanotechnology ( sometimes shortened to `` nanotech '' ) is the हेरफेर of पदार्थ on an atomic and molecular scale.
The earliest, फैली वर्णन of nanotechnology referred to the particular technological लक्ष्य of precisely manipulating atoms and molecules for fabrication of macroscale products, also now referred to as molecular nanotechnology.
A more generalized description of nanotechnology was subsequently established by the National nanotechnology पहल, जिससे defines nanotechnology as the हेरफेर of पदार्थ साथ at तनिक एक आयाम sized from 1 to 100 nanometers.
This परिभाषा reflects the फैक्ट कि क्वांटम mechanical प्रभाव हैं महत्वपूर्ण at इस quantum-realm scale, and so the definition shifted from a particular technological goal to a research category inclusive of all types of research and technologies that deal with the special properties of matter that occur below the given size threshold.
It is therefore common to see the plural form `` nanotechnologies '' as well as `` nanoscale technologies '' to refer to the व्यापक दायरा of शोध और अनुप्रयोग whose common trait is size.
Because of the variety of potential अनुप्रयोग ( सहित औद्योगिक और सैन्य ), सरकारें have invested अरबों of डॉलर in nanotechnology research.
through इसके नेशनल nanotechnology Initiative, the USA has invested 3.7 billion dollars.
The European Union has invested 1.2 अरब और जापानी 750 million dollars.
Nanotechnology as defined by size is naturally very broad, सहित फ़ील्ड of विज्ञान as विविध as सतह विज्ञान, सशुल्क रसायन, आणविक जीवविज्ञान, सेमीकंडक्टर physics, microfabrication, etc.
The associated research and applications are equally विविध, ranging इससे एक्सटेंशन of conventional यंत्र भौतिकी to completely नई approaches आधारित upon आणविक self-assembly, इससे विकासशील new materials with dimensions on the nanoscale to direct control of matter on the atomic scale.
Scientists फिलहाल बहस the भविष्य implications of nanotechnology.
Nanotechnology may be able to create many new materials and devices with a vast दायरा of अनुप्रयोग, ऐसे as in आयुर्विज्ञान, electronics, biomaterials and energy production.
On the other hand, nanotechnology raises many of the same issues as any new technology, including concerns about the toxicity और पर्यावरणीय प्रभाव of nanomaterials, और उनके संभावित प्रभाव on वैश्विक अर्थशास्त्र, as खूब as अटकलें about various doomsday scenarios.
These concerns have led to a बहस among वकालत समूह और सरकारें on whether special regulation of nanotechnology is warranted.
Map of the पूर्वी Bloc
The term Eastern Bloc or Communist Bloc refers to the former communist states of सेंट्रल और पूर्वी यूरोपीय, generally the सोवियत Union and the countries of the Warsaw Pact.
The terms Communist Bloc and सोवियत bloc यहूद भी प्रयुक्त to denote groupings of राज्य लकीर साथ the Soviet Union, although these terms might include states outside Central and Eastern Europe.
The New Jersey gubernatorial चुनाव of 2009 took प्लेस on नवम्बर 3, 2009.
Democratic राज्यपाल jon corzine थी कार्यशील लिये a दूसरी पद और थी होने challenged by Republican Chris Christie, Independent Christopher Daggett and nine others, in addition to several write-in candidates.
क्रिस्टी जीती the चुनाव, साथ परिचय 48.5 प्रतिशत of the vote, to 44.9 percent for Corzine and 5.8 percent for Daggett.
Christie जीती the largest हाशिया for a first term Republican since 1969.
Christie assumed office on जनवरी 19, 2010.
This was the first election to fill the newly निर्मित दफ्तर of लेफ्टिनेंट राज्यपाल.
The candidates for governor and lieutenant राज्यपाल यहूद joined साथ as a सिंगल चुनाव, so कि मतदाता किया not have the opportunity to split the ticket.
Kim Guadagno, क्रिस्टी 's कार्यशील mate, became नई जर्सी 's first lieutenant governor following her inauguration.
Health care in the संयुक्त राज्य is provided by many distinct organizations.
Health care सुविधाएं हैं largely स्वामित्व और संचालित by निजी sector businesses.
Health insurance लिये पब्लिक सेक्टर कर्मचारी is primarily provided by the government.
60-65 % of healthcare provision and spending comes from programs such as Medicare, Medicaid, tricare, the children 's स्वास्थ्य बीमे कार्यक्रम, और the दिग्गजों स्वास्थ्य प्रशासन.
Most of the population under 65 is insured by उनके or a परिवार सदस्य 's नियोक्ता, कुछ buy health insurance on their own, and the remainder are uninsured.
Of 17 high-income countries studied by the National Institutes of Health in 2013, the संयुक्त राज्य थी at or निकट the नीचे in शिशु मृत्यु, दिल और फेफड़ों बीमारी, sexually transmitted infections, adolescent pregnancies, injuries, homicides, and rates of disability.
Together, such issues प्लेस the u.S. at the नीचे of the list for life expectancy.
On average, a u.S. पुरूष can be अपेक्षित to सजीव लगभग चार fewer years than those in the top-ranked country.
According to the संसार स्वास्थ्य संगठन ( जो ), the संयुक्त राज्य खर्च अधिक on स्वास्थ्य परवाह per capita ( $ 7,146 ), and more on health care as percentage of its GDP ( 15.2 % ), than any other nation in 2008.
The Commonwealth Fund ranked the United राज्य पिछला in the विशेषता of स्वास्थ्य परवाह among समान countries, and notes U.S. care costs the most.
The U.S. Census ब्यूरो reported कि 49.9 लाख निवासियों, 16.3 % of the जनसांख्यिकी, यहूद uninsured in 2010 ( up from 49.0 million residents, 16.1 % of the population, in 2009 ).
A 2004 Institute of Medicine ( IOM ) report said : `` The United States is among the few industrialized nations in the संसार कि करता नहीं गारंटी अभिगम to स्वास्थ्य परवाह लिये इसके population. ''
A 2004 OECD report said : `` With the exception of मैक्सिको, तुर्कों, और the संयुक्त राज्य, सब oecd देशों था हासिल universal or near-universal ( at least 98.4 % insured ) coverage of their populations by 1990. ''
A 2010 report observed that lack of स्वास्थ्य बीमे कल्याणकारी roughly 48,000 अनावश्यक मौतों प्रत्येक साल in the United States.
In 2007, 62.1 % of filers for bankruptcies claimed ऊँची चिकित्सा खर्च.
A 2013 study found कि परिचय 25 % of सब वरिष्ठ नागरिकों घोषित दिवालियापन due to medical expenses, and 43 % are forced to mortgage or sell their primary residence.
On कूच 23, 2010, the रोगी सुरक्षा और सस्ती परवाह अधिनियम ( PPACA ) became law, providing for major changes in health insurance.
In physiology, body water is the water सामग्री of the इंसान देह.
A significant भिन्न of the इंसान देह is water.
Arthur Guyton 's Textbook of Medical Physiology states कि `` the कुल राशि of जल in a man of औसत वज़न ( 70 गामा ) is approximately 40 litres, averaging 57 percent of his total body weight.
In a newborn infant, this may be as high as 75 percent of the body वज़न, लकिन it progressively decreases इससे जनम to बूढ़ा आयु, सबसे of the घटी occurring during the first 10 years of life.
Also, obesity decreases the प्रतिशत of जल in the देह, sometimes to as low as 45 percent ''.
These figures are statistical averages, so are illustrative, and like all biostatistics, will vary साथ बाते जैसे प्रकार of जनसांख्यिकी, आयु और क्रमांक of लोगों sampled, और methodology.
So there is not, and can not be, a figure that is exactly the same लिये सब लोगों, लिये इस or कोई अन्य physiological माप.
For example, Jackson 's ( 1985 ) Anatomy & Physiology for Nurses gives a फिगर of 60 % लिये the proportion of body-weight attributable to water, which approximates Guyton 's 57 %.
In diseased states where body water is affected, the कम्पार्टमेंट or compartments कि have बदला can दे clues to the प्रकृति of the problem.
Body water is regulated by हार्मोन, सहित anti-diuretic हार्मोन ( ADH ), aldosterone and atrial natriuretic peptide.
Per Netter 's Atlas of Human Physiology, देह जल is टूटा bas into the following compartments:
Intracellular द्रव ( 2/3 of देह water ).
Per Guyton, in a body containing 40 लीटर of द्रव, परिचय 25 लीटर is intracellular, जिससे amounts to 62.5 % ( 5/8 ), close enough to the 2/3 rule of thumb.
Jackson 's ग्रन्थ राज्य 70 % of देह द्रव is intracellular.
extracellular द्रव ( 1/3 of body water ).
Per Guyton 's illustration, for a 40 litre body, about 15 लीटर is extracellular, जिससे amounts to 37.5 % Again, this is close to the 1/3 rule of thumb cited here.
प्लाज्मा ( 1/5 of extracellular fluid ).
Per guyton 's उदाहरण, of the 15 लीटर of extracellular fluid, plasma volume averages 3 litres.
This amounts to 20 %, the वही as per Netter 's Atlas.
अंतरालीय द्रव ( 4/5 of extracellular fluid )
Transcellular fluid ( a.k.a. `` तीसरा स्पेस, '' सामान्यतः ignored in calculations )
Contained inside organs, such as the gastrointestinal, cerebrospinal, peritoneal, और ocular fluids.
self-esteem is a पद प्रयुक्त in मनोविज्ञान to प्रतिबिंबित a व्यक्ति 's overall emotional evaluation of his or her own worth.
It is a judgement of oneself as खूब as an रवैया toward the self.
Self-esteem encompasses beliefs ( for उदाहरण, `` i am competent, '' `` i am worthy '' ) और भाव ऐसे as triumph, despair, pride and shame.
Smith and Mackie define it by saying `` The self-concept is कया we सोचो परिचय the स्वः ; self-esteem, is the positive or negative evaluations of the self, as in how we feel about it. ''
Self-esteem is also known as the evaluative dimension of the self that includes जज्बात of worthiness, prides और discouragement.
One 's self-esteem is भी closely संबद्ध with self-consciousness.
Self-esteem is a disposition कि a व्यक्ति रै जिससे represents their judgements of their own worthiness.
In the mid-1960s, मॉरिस rosenberg और social-learning पैरोकार पारिभाषित self-esteem as a personal worth or worthiness.
Nathaniel branden in 1969 पारिभाषित self-esteem as `` the अनुभव of होने competent to cope साथ the basic challenges of life and being worthy of happiness. ''
According to Branden, self-esteem is the sum of self-confidence ( a अहसास of निजी क्षमता ) और self-respect ( a अहसास of personal worth ).
It exists as a consequence of the अव्यक्त निर्णय कि प्रत्येक व्यक्ति रै of उनके क्षमता to face life 's challenges, to understand and solve problems, and their right to achieve happiness, and be given respect.
As a social psychological construct, self-esteem is attractive because researchers have conceptualized it as an influential predictor of relevant outcomes, ऐसे as अकादमिक उपलब्धि ( दलदल 1990 ) or कसरत बर्ताव ( hagger et al. 1998 ).
In addition, self-esteem has also been treated as an महत्वपूर्ण निष्कर्ष due to इसके बंद संबंध साथ मनोवैज्ञानिक well-being ( दलदल 1989 ).
Self-esteem can apply specifically to a particular dimension ( for example, `` I मानना i am a शुभ लेखक और i महसूस प्रसन्न परिचय कि '' ) or a वैश्विक extent ( लिये उदाहरण, `` I believe I am a bad person, and feel bad about myself in general '' ).
Psychologists प्रायः लिहाज़ self-esteem as an enduring व्यक्तित्व characteristic ( `` trait '' self-esteem ), though normal, short-term variations ( `` state '' self-esteem ) also exist.
Synonyms or near-synonyms of self-esteem include : self-worth, self-regard, self-respect, और self-integrity.
A Masonic Lodge, often termed a निजी आवास or constituent आवास, is the मौलिक organisational unit of Freemasonry.
Every new Lodge must be warranted or chartered by a ग्रैंड आवास, लकिन is विषय to इसके दिशा तभी in enforcing the published Constitution of the jurisdiction.
By exception the three surviving lodges that formed the world 's first known Grand Lodge in London ( today पुकारा the संयुक्त ग्रैंड आवास of इंग्लैण्ड ) have the अद्वितीय विशेषाधिकार to operate as समय immemorial i.e. बगैर ऐसे वारंट ; तभी एक अन्य आवास operates बगैर a वारंट - this is the Grand Stewards ' Lodge in London, although it is not also entitled to the `` time immemorial '' title.
A Freemason is generally हकदार to विज़िट कोई आवास, in कोई क्षेत्राधिकार ( i.e. under any Grand Lodge ) in amity with his own.
In some jurisdictions this privilege is restricted to निपुण masons ( कि is, freemasons जो have attained the Order 's third degree ).
He is first usually required to check, and certify, the नियमितता of the संबंध of the आवास - और be समर्थ to satisfy that Lodge of his regularity of membership.
freemasons एकत्रित साथ as a आवास to कार्य the three basic Degrees of Entered Apprentice, Fellowcraft and Master Mason.
Pilkington Group Limited is a multinational glass manufacturing company headquartered in St Helens, United किंगडम और a wholly स्वामित्व subsidiary of the japan-based एनएसजी समूह.
Prior to its acquisition by NSG in 2006 it was an independent company listed on the London Stock Exchange और लिये a समय थी a constituent of the FTSE 100 Index.
A quotation is the repetition of एक अभिव्यक्ति as भाग of another एक, विशेषकर जब the कोटेड अभिव्यक्ति is well-known or explicitly attributed by citation to its original source, and it is indicated by ( punctuated with ) quotation marks.
A quotation can also refer to the दोहराया उपयोग of इकाई of कोई अन्य रूप of अभिव्यक्ति, especially parts of artistic works : elements of a painting, scenes from a movie or sections from a musical composition.
Year 1877 ( MDCCCLXXVII ) was a common year starting on Monday ( link होगा प्रदर्शक the पूरा पंचांग ) of the gregorian पंचांग और a आम साल starting on शनिवार of the 12-day slower Julian calendar.
Black pepper ( Piper nigrum ) is a flowering बेल in the परिवार piperaceae, cultivated लिये इसके fruit, which is usually dried and used as a spice and seasoning.
The fruit, ज्ञात as a peppercorn जब सूखी, is लगभग in व्यास, dark red when fully mature, and, like all drupes, contains a single seed.
peppercorns, और the मैदान pepper निकला इससे उन्हें, may be वर्णित बस as pepper, or अधिक precisely as ब्लैक pepper ( cooked and dried unripe fruit ), green pepper ( dried unripe fruit ) and white pepper ( dried ripe seeds ).
Black pepper is native to दक्षिण इण्डिया, और is extensively cultivated there and elsewhere in tropical regions.
Currently Vietnam is the संसार 's largest निर्माता and exporter of pepper, producing 34 % of the world 's Piper nigrum crop as of 2008.
Dried ground pepper has महरूम प्रयुक्त चूंकि प्राचीनता लिये दोनो इसके फ्लेवर and as a medicine.
ब्लैक pepper is the world 's most traded spice.
It is one of the most common spices added to यूरोपीय भोजन और its descendants.
The spiciness of black pepper is due to the chemical piperine, not to be उलझन साथ the capsaicin कि देता मांसल मिर्च theirs.
It is in the modern world, प्रायः युग्म साथ salt.
Fire hydrant in charlottesville, वर्जिनिया, USA
A fire hydrant ( भी ज्ञात colloquially as a आग प्लग in the संयुक्त राज्य or as a जॉनी पंप in नई यॉर्क नगर ), is an क्रियाशील आग सुरक्षा माप, और a सोर्स of water provided in most urban, suburban and rural areas with municipal water service to enable firefighters to tap into the municipal water supply to assist in extinguishing a fire.
इमारतें निकट a hydrant may qualify लिये an बीमे छूट चूंकि अग्निशमन चाहिए be समर्थ to more rapidly extinguish a fire on the insured property.
The concept of fire plugs dates to at तनिक the 17th सदी.
This was a time when firefighters responding to a call would dig down to the wooden जल मेन्स और hastily bore a छेद to सुरक्षित जल to लड़ो फ़ायर.
The water would fill the hole creating a temporary खूब, और be transported इससे the खूब to the आग by बाल्टी brigades or, later, by hand-pumped fire engines.
The holes were then plugged with stoppers, सामान्यतः redwood, जिससे over समय आए to be ज्ञात as आग plugs.
The स्थान of the प्लग होता प्रायः be recorded or marked so that it could be reused in future fires.
This is the source of the colloquial पद आग प्लग स्टिल प्रयुक्त लिये आग hydrants आज.
After the Great Fire of London in 1666, the city installed जल मेन्स साथ छेद drilled at intervals, equipped साथ उठते, allowing an अभिगम पाइंट to the wooden fire plugs from street level.
The invention of a post- or pillar-type fire hydrant is generally credited to Frederick graff sr., मुख्य इंजीनियर of the फिलाडेल्फिया जल works around the साल 1801.
It had a combination hose/faucet outlet and was of `` wet बैरल '' डिज़ाइन साथ the वाल्व in the top.
It is said that Graff held the first patent for a fire hydrant, but this can not be सत्यापित क्युकी the पेटेंट दफ्तर in वॉशिंगटन d.C. caught on आग in 1836 destroying many patent records from that period in the process.
The President of the Republic of South Africa is the सिर of राज्य और सिर of सरकारी अंतर्गत South Africa 's Constitution.
From 1961 to 1994, the head of राज्य थी पुकारा the राज्य अध्यक्ष.
The President is निर्वाचित by सदस्यों of the नेशनल सभा, the निम्नतर हाउस of पार्लियामेंट, और is प्रायः the नेता of the largest party, which has been the African National Congress since the first non-racial elections were held on 27 April 1994.
The भूमिका थी originally संस्थापित to be पृथक इससे the अभी defunct role of prime minister, but the two roles were merged in the 1983 constitution which specified a four-year term of office.
The 1993 and later constitutions हद the अध्यक्ष 's समय in दफ्तर to two five-year terms.
The first President to be निर्वाचित अंतर्गत the नई संविधान थी नेल्सन मंडेला, and the incumbent president is Jacob Zuma.
Under the interim Constitution ( valid from 1994 to 1996 ), there was a सरकारी of नेशनल एकता, in जिससे an mp इससे the largest विपक्ष party was entitled to a position as Deputy President.
Along with Thabo Mbeki, the last State President, F.W. De Klerk also served as Deputy President, in his क्षमता as the नेता of the नेशनल पार्टी जिससे थी the second-largest पार्टी in the नई Parliament.
But De Klerk बाद resigned and went into opposition with his party.
A voluntary coalition government continues to exist under the new संविधान ( अपनाया in 1996 ), हालांकि वहीँ have महरूम no नियुक्ति of विपक्ष राजनेता to the post of deputy president.
खास शिक्षा or खास needs शिक्षा is the शिक्षा of students with special needs in a way that addresses the students ' individual differences and needs.
Ideally, this process involves the individually planned and systematically monitored arrangement of teaching procedures, adapted equipment and materials, accessible settings, and other interventions designed to help learners with खास needs achieve a उच्चतर स्तर of निजी self-sufficiency और कामयाबी in स्कूल और जातियाँ than would be available if the student were only given access to a typical classroom education.
Common special needs include challenges साथ सीखना, संचार चुनौतियां, emotional और behavioral विकार, physical disabilities, and developmental disorders.
Students with these kinds of special needs are likely to benefit इससे अतिरिक्त शैक्षणिक सेवाएं ऐसे as अलग approaches to teaching, use of technology, a specifically adapted teaching area, or resource room.
Intellectual giftedness is a difference in learning and can also benefit from specialized teaching techniques or different educational programs, but the term `` special शिक्षा '' is generally प्रयुक्त to specifically indicate निर्देश of विद्यार्थी जिनकी खास needs reduce उनके क्षमता to सीख independently or in an ordinary कक्षा, और gifted शिक्षा is handled separately.
In most developed countries, educators हैं modifying शिक्षण विधि और environments so कि the अधिकतम क्रमांक of students are served in general education environments.
Special education in developed देशों is प्रायः regarded कम as a `` प्लेस '' and more as `` a range of services, available in every school. ''
Integration can reduce social stigmas and improve अकादमिक उपलब्धि लिये अनेक विद्यार्थी.
The विपरीत of खास शिक्षा is general education.
General education is the मानक curriculum प्रस्तुत साथ मानक शिक्षण विधि और without additional supports.
George Soros ( or ; ; ; born अगस्त 12, 1930, as schwartz györgy ) is a Hungarian-American business magnate, investor, and philanthropist.
He is the अध्यक्ष of सोरोस निधि Management.
Soros supports progressive-liberal causes.
He is known as `` The Man जो broke the बैंको of इंग्लैण्ड `` क्युकी of उसके in निवेश profits during the 1992 Black Wednesday UK currency crisis.
Between 1979 and 2011, Soros gave away over $ 8 billion to इंसान अधिकारों, पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य, और शिक्षा कल्याणकारी.
He played a significant भूमिका in the शांतिपूर्ण परिवर्तन इससे साम्यवादी to पूंजीवाद in हंगेरियाई ( 1984–89 ) and provided one of Europe 's largest higher education endowments to Central European University in Budapest.
सोरोस is भी the अध्यक्ष of the Open Society Institute.
An actor portraying सिकंदर ग्राहम घंटी बोलना into an early model telephone.
The invention of the telephone is the culmination of कार्य किया by अनेक individuals, the इतिहास of जिससे involves a संग्रहण of दावा और counterclaims.
The development of the modern electrical telephone involved an array of lawsuits संस्थापित upon the पेटेंट दावा of अनेक individuals and numerous companies.
This article covers the early years from 1844 to 1898, इससे धारणा of the विचार of an इलेक्ट्रिक voice-transmission यंत्र, to विफल कोशिशें to उपयोग `` make-and-break '' वर्तमान, to कामयाब प्रयोग साथ इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक telephones by Alexander Graham Bell and Thomas Watson, and finally to commercially successful telephones in the late 19th century.
A Master of Fine Arts ( MFA, M.F.A. ) is a ग्रैजुएट उपाधि typically requiring 2–3 सालो of postgraduate पढ़ाई परे the bachelor 's degree ( BFA ), although the term of study will vary by country or by university.
The MFA is a रचनात्मक उपाधि प्रायः awarded as a टर्मिनल उपाधि in विज़ुअल कला, रचनात्मक लिखने, filmmaking, dance, or theatre and other performing arts.
Coursework is primarily of an लागू or performing प्रकृति साथ the कार्यक्रम प्रायः culminating in a major work or performance.
Master of ठीक कला कार्यक्रम have generally जरूरी a स्नातक 's उपाधि prior to प्रवेश, लकिन अनेक do नहीं require that the undergraduate major be the same as the MFA field of study.
The most important admissions requirement रै प्रायः महरूम a नमूना पोर्टफोलियो or a प्रदर्शन ऑडिशन.
The Master of Fine Arts differs from the Master of Arts in that the MFA, while an academic program, centers around practice in the particular फ़ील्ड, whereas कार्यक्रम अग्रणी to the ma प्रायः बीच on the scholarly, अकादमिक, or नाजुक study of the field.
Additionally, in the United States, an MFA is recognized as a terminal degree for practitioners of Visual Art, Design, Dance, Theatre, Film/Video, New Media, and Creative Writing - meaning कि it is माना to be the उच्चतम उपाधि in इसके फ़ील्ड, और is प्रयुक्त as a न्यूनतम योग्यता to be समर्थ to लागू to become a full-time प्राध्यापक शिक्षण at the विश्वविद्यालयों level in these disciplines.
There are exceptions to this standard in the Arts, notably in the case of music प्रदर्शन, जहाँ the mfa is नहीं देखी as a टर्मिनल उपाधि in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of the more standardized DMA degree.
It is also critical to note that in the interest of extending the connection between creative production और जारी अकादमिक शोध, कुछ विश्वविद्यालयों have स्थापित practice-based Ph.D programs in fields such as creative writing, visual arts, new media, design and theater.
While this has had an effect in Creative Writing, and to a lesser extent in design and new media, the influx of graduates इससे practice-based phd कार्यक्रम रै नहीं appreciably बदला the मानक लिये the MFA as the terminal degree in most Arts disciplines yet.
This is an ongoing contentious topic, और is the बारंबार विषय of अकादमिक panels, विशेषकर at the annual College Art Association conference.
The CAA 2008 guidelines regarding the MFA strongly re-affirms कि the phd is नहीं जरूरी as a टर्मिनल degree in the visual arts.
The atomic bombings of the cities of Hiroshima और नागासाकी in जापानी यहूद conducted by the United States during the final stages of World War II in 1945.
The two events are the only use of नाभिकीय हथियार in युद्ध to date.
following a firebombing अभियान कि नष्ट अनेक जापानी शहरों, the Allies prepared for a costly invasion of Japan.
The war in यूरोपीय ended जब नाजी जर्मनी हस्ताक्षरित इसके यंत्र of आत्मसमर्पण on 8 May, but the Pacific War continued.
Together with the United Kingdom and the गणतंत्र of चीन, the संयुक्त राज्य पुकारा लिये a आत्मसमर्पण of जापानी in the पॉट्सडैम घोषणा on 26 July 1945, threatening Japan with `` prompt and utter destruction ''.
The Japanese government उपेक्षित इस ultimatum, और the United States deployed two nuclear weapons developed by the Manhattan Project.
American airmen dropped छोटी लड़के on the नगर of हिरोशिमा on 6 अगस्त 1945, followed by Fat Man over Nagasaki on 9 August.
Within the first two to four months of the bombings, the acute effects killed 90,000–166,000 people in हिरोशिमा और 60,000–80,000 in नागासाकी, साथ roughly हाफ of the मौतों in प्रत्येक नगर occurring on the पहला day.
The Hiroshima prefecture health department estimated that, of the people who died on the day of the explosion, 60 % died इससे फ्लैश or ज्वाला burns, 30 % इससे गिरना मलबा और 10 % इससे अन्य कल्याणकारी.
During the following months, large numbers died from the effect of burns, विकिरण बीमारी, और अन्य चोटों, compounded by illness.
In a US अनुमान of the कुल तात्कालिक और छोटी पद कारण of मौत, 15–20 % died from radiation sickness, 20–30 % from burns, and 50–60 % from other injuries, compounded by illness.
In both cities, most of the मुर्दे यहूद नागरिकों, हालांकि हिरोशिमा had a sizeable garrison.
On 15 August, six days after the bombing of नागासाकी, जापानी घोषित इसके आत्मसमर्पण to the allies, हस्ताक्षर the यंत्र of Surrender on 2 September, officially ending World War II.
The bombings led, in part, to post-war जापानी 's adopting तीन non-nuclear सिद्धान्त, forbidding the nation from nuclear armament.
The role of the bombings in जापानी 's आत्मसमर्पण और उनके नैतिक औचित्य are still debated.
Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi ( ; 2 October 1869 – 30 January 1948 ), commonly known as Mahatma Gandhi, थी the preeminent नेता of भारतीय nationalism in British-ruled India.
Employing non-violent civil disobedience, Gandhi led India to स्वतंत्रता और प्रेरित आंदोलनों लिये non-violence, सिविल अधिकारों और स्वतंत्रता आरपार the संसार.
The son of a वरिष्ठ सरकारी आधिकारिक, गांधी थी born and raised in a Hindu Bania community in coastal Gujarat, and trained in law in London.
गांधी became प्रसिद्ध by लड़ लिये the सिविल अधिकारों of Muslim and Hindu Indians in South Africa, using new techniques of non-violent civil disobedience that he developed.
Returning to India in 1915, he set परिचय organising peasants to विरोध excessive land-taxes.
A lifelong प्रतिद्वन्दी of `` सांप्रदायिकता `` ( i.e. basing politics on religion ) he reached out widely to all religious groups.
He became a leader of Muslims protesting the घटती औकात of the खिलाफत.
Assuming leadership of the भारतीय नेशनल Congress in 1921, Gandhi led nationwide campaigns for easing poverty, expanding women 's rights, building religious and ethnic amity, ending untouchability, increasing economic self-reliance, and above all for achieving Swaraj —the independence of India from British domination.
Gandhi led Indians in protesting the national salt tax with the Dandi Salt March in 1930, और बाद in demanding the अंग्रेजों to तत्काल छोड़ो इण्डिया in 1942, दौरान World War II.
he थी imprisoned लिये कि और लिये numerous other political offenses over the years.
Gandhi sought to practice non-violence और सच्चाई in सब परिस्थितियों, और advocated that others do the same.
he देखी the गांवों as the कोर of the सच्चा इण्डिया और प्रचारित self-sufficiency ; he किया नहीं support the industrialization programs of his disciple Jawaharlal Nehru.
He lived modestly in a self-sufficient residential community and wore the traditional Indian dhoti and shawl, woven with yarn he had hand spun on a charkha.
His chief political enemy in Britain was विंस्टन चर्चिल, जो ridiculed उसे as a `` half-naked fakir. ''
He was a dedicated vegetarian, and undertook long fasts as अर्थात् of दोनो self-purification और राजनैतिक mobilization.
In his last year, unhappy at the partition of India, Gandhi worked to stop the carnage between Muslims, Hindus and सिखों कि raged in the किनारा क्षेत्रफल between इण्डिया और पाकिस्तानी.
He was assassinated on 30 January 1948 by nathuram गोडसे जो विचार गांधी थी too सहानुभूतिपूर्ण to इण्डिया 's Muslims.
30 January is observed as शहीदो ' Day in India.
The honorific महात्मा ( `` ग्रेट आत्मा '' ) थी लागू to him by 1914.
In India he थी भी पुकारा bapu ( `` पिता '' ).
He is known in India as the Father of the Nation ; his birthday, 2 October, is commemorated there as गांधी jayanti, a नेशनल अवकाश, और world-wide as the International Day of Non-Violence.
Gandhi 's philosophy was not सैद्धांतिक लकिन एक of व्यावहारिकतावाद, कि is, practicing his principles in the moment.
Asked to give a message to the people, he होता respond, `` my जीवन is my संदेश. ''
Joan क्रॉफर्ड ( कूच 23, ca. 1904 – may 10, 1977 ), born lucille fay lesueur, was an American actress in film, television and theatre.
Starting as a dancer in traveling theatrical companies before debuting on Broadway, क्रॉफर्ड थी हस्ताक्षरित to a गति चित्र अनुबंध by metro-goldwyn-mayer in 1925.
Initially frustrated by the size and quality of her parts, Crawford began a campaign of self-publicity और became nationally ज्ञात as a flapper by the end of the 1920s.
In the 1930s, Crawford 's fame rivaled, और बाद outlasted, mgm सहयोगियों norma शियर्र और Greta Garbo.
Crawford often played मेहनती यंग महिलाओं जो ढूँढें रोमांस and financial success.
These `` rags-to-riches '' कहानियां यहूद खूब प्राप्त by Depression -era audiences and were popular with women.
Crawford became one of Hollywood 's most prominent movie stars and one of the उच्चतम सशुल्क महिलाओं in the संयुक्त राज्य, लकिन उसके films began खोने धन और by the end of the 1930s she was labeled `` box office poison ''.
After an absence of nearly two सालो इससे the स्क्रीन, क्रॉफर्ड मंचन a वापसी by अभिनीत in मिल्ड्रेड पियर्स ( 1945 ), लिये जिससे she won the Academy Award for Best Actress.
In 1955, she became involved with the pepsi-cola कम्पनी through उसके विवाह to कम्पनी Chairman Alfred Steele.
After his death in 1959, Crawford was elected to भरण उसके रिक्ति on the फलक of निर्देशकों but was forcibly retired in 1973.
She continued acting in film and television regularly through the 1960s, जब उसके प्रदर्शन became कम ; बाद the रिलीज of the अंग्रेजों हॉरर फिल्मी Trog in 1970, Crawford retired from the screen.
Following a public appearance in 1974, after which unflattering छायाचित्र यहूद प्रकाशित, क्रॉफर्ड withdrew इससे पब्लिक life and became increasingly reclusive until her death in 1977.
Crawford शादीशुदा चार टाइम्स.
Her first तीन विवाह ended in तलाक ; the पिछला ended साथ the death of husband Alfred Steele.
She adopted five children, one of whom थी reclaimed by उसके जनम माँ.
क्रॉफर्ड 's संबंध साथ her two older children, Christina and Christopher, were acrimonious.
Crawford disinherited the two and, after Crawford 's death, Christina लिखा a `` tell-all '' संस्मरण, mommie dearest, in जिससे वो alleged a lifelong pattern of physical and emotional abuse perpetrated by Crawford.
She थी voted the दसवाँ महानतम मादा स्टार in the history of American cinema by the American Film Institute.
