Tonneau cover ( or ) describes a मुश्किल or नरम कवर प्रयुक्त to protect unoccupied यात्री सीटे in a convertible or roadster, or the cargo bed in a pickup truck.
Hard tonneau covers open by a hinging or folding यांत्रिकी जबकि नरम कवर खोलें by रोलिंग up.
The tonneau कवर is प्रयुक्त to छिपाते cargo.
When the cover is pulled out, it keeps items out of the सूर्य और provides अतिरिक्त सुरक्षा by keeping निजी वस्तुएं आउट of sight, as well as shielding the driver from view.
Twitter is an online सोशल नेटवर्किंग सेवा और microblogging सेवा कि enables इसके उपयोक्ता to भेजें और पढ़ा text-based messages of up to 140 characters, known as `` tweets ''.
Twitter was created in March 2006 by Jack dorsey और by जुलाई, the सोशल नेटवर्किंग साईट थी launched.
the सेवा rapidly gained विश्वव्यापी लोकप्रियता, साथ over 500 million registered users as of 2012, generating over 340 million tweets daily and handling over 1.6 billion search queries per day.
Since its launch, Twitter has become one of the ten most visited वेबसाइटों on the अंतरजाल, and has been described as `` the SMS of the Internet. ''
Unregistered users can read tweets, while registered users can post tweets through the जालस्थल इंटरफ़ेस, sms, or a दायरा of ऐप्स लिये मोबाईल devices.
Twitter Inc. is based in San Francisco, with अतिरिक्त सर्वर और कार्यालयों in नई यॉर्क नगर, बोस्टन, and San Antonio.
The Hangover is a 2009 American कॉमेडी फिल्मी, co-produced और निर्देशित by टॉड phillips और लिखा by Jon Lucas and Scott Moore.
It is the first film of The hangover मताधिकार.the फिल्मी सितारों ब्राडली कूपर, ed helms, zach galifianakis, हीथर Graham, Justin Bartha, and Jeffrey Tambor.
The Hangover tells the story of फिल wenneck, stu दाम और एलन गार्नर, जो सफर to लास वेगास for a bachelor party to celebrate their friend Doug Billings ' impending marriage.
However, Phil, Stu and Alan have no memory of the पिछला रात्रि 's कार्यक्रम और जरूर ढूँढें डग पहले the wedding can take place.
Lucas and Moore wrote the script after executive producer Chris Bender 's friend disappeared और था a विशाल विधेयक बाद होने भेजा to a स्ट्रिप club.
After Lucas and Moore sold it to the studio for $ 2 लाख, फिलिप्स और जेरेमी garelick rewrote the स्क्रिप्ट to include a tiger as well as a subplot involving a baby and a police cruiser, and also including boxer Mike Tyson.
Filming took place in Nevada for 15 days, and दौरान फिल्मांकन, the तीन प्रमुख अभिनेताओं ( कूपर, helms और galifianakis ) formed a दोस्ती.
The hangover थी released on जून 5, 2009, बनने a critical and commercial success.
It became the tenth-highest-grossing फिल्मी of 2009, साथ a worldwide gross of over US $ 467 million.
आलोचकों praised the फिल्मी 's comedic approach but criticized it for its vulgarity.
The film won the Golden Globe पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन गति चित्र – musical or कॉमेडी, और received multiple other accolades.
It is the tenth-highest-grossing film of 2009 in the संसार, as खूब as the दूसरी highest-grossing r-rated कॉमेडी कभी in the संयुक्त राज्य, surpassing a रिकार्ड previously आयोजित by Beverly Hills Cop for almost 25 years and later being surpassed by Ted in 2012.
Out of all R-rated films, it is the third highest-grossing कभी in the u.S., पीछे तभी the जुनून of the Christ and The Matrix Reloaded.
A sequel, The Hangover Part II, थी released in 2011, और a तीसरा और फाइनल film, The Hangover Part III, is set for release in 2013.
Events involving meiosis, प्रर्दशित chromosomal crossover
Meiosis ( ) is a special type of कोशिका प्रभाग जरुरी लिये यौन जनन in eukaryotes.
the कोशिकाएं उत्पादित by meiosis are gametes or spores.
In many organisms, including all animals and land plants ( but not some other groups such as fungi ), गैमीट हैं पुकारा शुक्राणु और अंडा कोशिकाएं.
Whilst the प्रक्रम of meiosis bears a क्रमांक of similarities with the 'life-cycle ' cell division process of mitosis, it differs in two important respects:
the chromosomes in meiosis undergo a recombination जिससे shuffles the जीनों producing a अलग जेनेटिक संयोजन in प्रत्येक gamete, compared with the co-existence of each of the two separate pairs of each chromosome ( one received from each parent ) in each cell which results from mitosis.
the निष्कर्ष of meiosis is potentially चार ( genetically अद्वितीय ) haploid cells, compared with the two ( genetically identical ) diploid cells produced from mitosis.
Meiosis begins with one diploid कोशिका containing दो नक़ल of प्रत्येक chromosome —one from the organism 's mother and one from its father.
The कोशिका divides twice, potentially producing up to चार अगुणित cells containing one copy of each chromosome.
( `` Potentially '' because in some cases, such as the गठन of oocytes in स्तनधारियों, तभी एक of the संभावित चार अगुणित कोशिकाएं survives. )
In animals the haploid cell resulting इससे meiosis is a पुरूष or मादा gamete.
Each of the resulting गुणसूत्रों in the gamete कोशिकाएं is a अद्वितीय मिश्रण of मातृ और paternal DNA, resulting in offspring that are genetically distinct from either parent.
This देता वृद्धि to जेनेटिक विविधता in sexually reproducing populations.
This genetic diversity can provide the variation of physical and behavioural attributes ( phenotypes ) upon जिससे प्राकृतिक चयन can अधिनियम, लकिन, as वर्णित नीचे in खण्ड 6, उत्पत्ति और फलन of meiosis, the जेनेटिक विविधता may be largely a by-product of the समजात recombination that is primarily employed for its DNA repair function during meiosis.
It is also noteworthy that during meiosis, specific genes are more highly transcribed, and these are called the meiome, the पद प्रयुक्त in कार्यात्मक जीनोमिक्स लिये the meiotic transcriptome.
Meiosis is a key feature for all sexually reproducing eukaryotes in जिससे समजात chromosome pairing, अन्तर्ग्रथन और recombination occur.
In addition to strong meiotic stage-specific अभिव्यक्ति of mrna ( the meiome ), however, वहीँ हैं भी pervasive translational नियंत्रण ( e.g. चयनात्मक उपयोग of preformed mRNA ), regulating the ultimate meiotic stage-specific protein expression of genes during meiosis.
Thus, both the meiome और translational नियंत्रण determine the व्यापक restructuring of meiotic cells needed to carry out meiosis.
Prior to the meiosis process the cell 's chromosomes are duplicated by a round of DNA replication, creating from the maternal and पैतृक संस्करण of प्रत्येक chromosome ( homologs ) दो सटीक नक़ल, सिस्टर chromatids, संलग्न at the centromere region.
In the beginning of meiosis the maternal and पैतृक homologs जोड़ी to प्रत्येक अन्य.
Then they typically exchange parts by homologous recombination अग्रणी to crossovers of डीएनए between the मातृ और पैतृक संस्करण of the chromosome.
Spindle fibers bind to the centromeres of प्रत्येक जोड़ी of homologs और arrange the pairs at the spindle equator.
तब the मछली खींचो the recombined homologs to opposite poles of the cell.
As the chromosomes move away from the center the cell divides into दो बेटी कोशिकाएं, प्रत्येक containing a अगुणित क्रमांक of chromosomes composed of two chromatids.
After the recombined maternal और पैतृक homologs have अलग into the two daughter cells, a second round of cell division occurs.
There meiosis ends as the two सिस्टर chromatids बनाना up प्रत्येक homolog हैं अलग और मूव into one of the four resulting gamete cells.
Upon fertilization, लिये उदाहरण जब a शुक्राणु enters an अंडा कोशिका, दो gamete cells produced by meiosis fuse.
The gamete from the mother and the gamete from the father each contribute one half of the नियत of गुणसूत्रों कि मेक up the नई औलाद 's genome.
Meiosis uses अनेक of the वही mechanisms as समसूत्रण, a प्रकार of कोशिका प्रभाग प्रयुक्त by eukaryotes जैसे पौधे and animals to split one cell into two identical daughter cells.
In all plants and in many protists meiosis परिणाम in the गठन of बीजाणुओं : अगुणित cells that can divide vegetatively without undergoing fertilization.
Boxing ( pugilism, पुरस्कार लड़, the मीठी विज्ञान or in यूनानी pygmachia ) is a martial आर्ट और कॉम्बैट खेल in जिससे दो लोगों engage in a contest of strength, speed, reflexes, endurance and will by throwing punches with gloved hands.
Amateur मुक्केबाज़ी is an ओलम्पिक और राष्ट्रमंडल खेल और is a आम fixture in सबसे of the प्रमुख अंतरराष्ट्रीय games - it also has its own World Championships.
Boxing is supervised by a referee over a series of one- to three-minute intervals पुकारा rounds.
The result is decided when an opponent is deemed incapable to continue by a referee, is disqualified लिये तोड़कर a नियम, resigns by फेंकना in a तौलिया, or is सुनाया the winner or loser based on the judges ' scorecards at the end of the contest.
The birth hour of boxing as a sport may be its acceptance by the ancient Greeks as an ओलम्पिक खेल as जल्दी as 688 BC.
Boxing evolved from 16th- and 18th-century prizefights, largely in Great Britain, to the forerunner of modern boxing in the mid-19th सदी, again initially in ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और बाद in the United States.
In 2004, ESPN ranked मुक्केबाज़ी as the सबसे मुश्किल sport in the world.
Agreement or concord happens जब a शब्द परिवर्तन रूप depending on the other words to which it relates.
It is an instance of inflection, and usually involves making the मान of कुछ व्याकरणिक श्रेणी ( ऐसे as लिंग or व्यक्ति ) `` सहमत '' between different words or parts of the sentence.
For example, in Standard English, one may say I am or he is, लकिन नहीं `` i is '' or `` he am ''.
This is because the grammar of the language requires कि the क्रिया और इसके विषय सहमत in person.
The pronouns I और he हैं पहला और तीसरा व्यक्ति क्रमशः, as are the verb forms am and is.
The verb form must be चयनित so कि it रै the same person as the subject.
The agreement based on overt grammatical categories as above is formal अनुबंध, in कंट्रास्ट to notional अनुबंध, जिससे is आधारित on अर्थ.
For instance, the phrase The संयुक्त राज्य is treated as एकवचन लिये उद्देश्य of अनुबंध, भी though it is formally plural.
This is a list of स्थान नीचे औसत समुद्र स्तर that are on land.
Places in tunnels, mines, तहखानों, खोदा छेद ( भी साथ खोलें आसमान ), अंतर्गत जल, under ice, or existing temporarily as a result of ebbing of sea tide etc. are not included.
All आंकड़े हैं in मीटर below sea level:
Debbie Macomber ( born अक्तूबर 22, 1948 in yakima, वॉशिंगटन ) is a best-selling American author of over 150 romance novels and contemporary women 's fiction.
Over 140 million copies of her books हैं in छपाई throughout the संसार, and four have become made-for-TV-movies.
Macomber was the inaugural winner of the fan-voted quill पुरस्कार लिये रोमांस in 2005 और रै महरूम awarded दोनो a रोमांस लेखक of अमेरिका रीता और a आजीवन achievement award by the Romance Writers of America.
Catonsville is a census-designated प्लेस ( cdp ) in बाल्टीमोर काउंटी, मेरीलैंड, United States.
The population was 41,567 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
The community झूठ to the वेस्ट of बाल्टीमोर साथ the city 's border.
catonsville is the घर of the विश्वविद्यालयों of मेरीलैंड, Baltimore County ( UMBC ), a public research university with over 12,000 students.
A lawyer, according to Black 's Law Dictionary, is `` a व्यक्ति सीखे in the विधि ; as an attorney, counsel or solicitor ; a person who is practicing law. ''
Law is the system of rules of conduct established by the sovereign सरकारी of a समाज to सही wrongs, maintain the स्थिरता of राजनैतिक और सोशल प्राधिकार, और उद्धार इंसाफ.
Working as a lawyer involves the व्यावहारिक अनुप्रयोग of अमूर्त विधिक theories और ज्ञान to solve विशिष्ट individualized समस्याएं, or to advance the interests of those who retain ( i.e., hire ) lawyers to perform legal services.
The role of the lawyer varies significantly across legal jurisdictions, और so it can be treated यहाँ in तभी the सबसे general terms.
Vector Marketing is the domestic sales भुजा of cutco निगम, an olean, नई यॉर्क आधारित cutlery manufacturer.
The Family and Medical Leave Act of 1993 ( FMLA ) is a United States संघीय विधि requiring covered नियोक्ता to provide कर्मचारी job-protected और unpaid छोड़ लिये योग्य medical and family reasons.
Qualified medical and family कारण शामिल : निजी or परिवार बीमारी, family military leave, pregnancy, adoption, or the foster care placement of a child.
The FMLA is administered by the मजदूरी और घंटा प्रभाग of the संयुक्त States Department of Labor.
The bill was a major part of President Bill क्लिंटन 's कार्यसूची in उसके पहला term.
President Clinton signed the bill into law on February 5, 1993 ( ; 29 U.S.C. sec. 2601 ; 29 cfr 825 ) और it took प्रभाव on अगस्त 5, 1993, six months later.
The FMLA थी intended `` to संतुलन the मांगे of the workplace with the needs of families. ''
The Act allows eligible employees to take up to 12 work weeks of unpaid छोड़ दौरान कोई 12-month काल to attend to the गंभीर स्वास्थ्य कंडीशन of the कर्मचारी, जनक, जीवनसाथी or चाइल्ड, or लिये गर्भावस्था or care of a newborn child, or for adoption or foster care of a child.
In order to be eligible for FMLA leave, an employee must have been at the business at तनिक 12 महीने, और worked at तनिक 1,250 घंटों over the पास्ट 12 महीने, और कार्य at a स्थान जहाँ the company employs 50 or more employees within 75 miles.
The FMLA covers both public- and private-sector employees, लकिन निश्चित श्रेणी of कर्मचारी हैं excluded, सहित निर्वाचित officials और उनके निजी staff members.
The Vietnam War ( ) थी a ठंडा युद्ध -era सैन्य विरोध कि occurred in वियतनाम, लाओस, और कंबोडिया इससे 1 नवम्बर 1955 to the fall of Saigon on 30 April 1975.
This war followed the पहला इंडोचायना युद्ध और थी लड़ा between उत्तर वियतनाम, supported by its communist allies, and the government of South Vietnam, supported by the United States and other anti-communist countries.
The Viet Cong ( also known as the National Liberation Front, or NLF ), a हलके हथियारबंद दक्षिण वियतनामी कम्युनिस्ट आम सामने निर्देशित by the उत्तर, largely लड़ा a छापामार युद्ध विरूद्ध anti-communist शक्तियां in the region.
The Vietnam People 's Army ( North Vietnamese Army ) सगाई in a अधिक conventional युद्ध, at times committing large units into battle.
U.S. and South Vietnamese forces relied on air superiority and overwhelming firepower to conduct ढूंढें और नष्ट परिचालन, involving मैदान शक्तियां, तोपखाने, and airstrikes.
The U.S. government viewed involvement in the war as a way to prevent a कम्युनिस्ट कब्ज़ा of दक्षिण वियतनाम as भाग of उनके wider रणनीति of containment.
The North Vietnamese government और viet cong यहूद लड़ to reunify वियतनाम under communist rule.
They viewed the conflict as a औपनिवेशिक युद्ध, लड़ा initially विरूद्ध फ़्रांस, समर्थित by the u.S., और बाद विरूद्ध दक्षिण वियतनाम, which it regarded as a U.S. puppet state.
American military advisors arrived in कया थी तब फ्रेंच इंडोचायना शुरूआत in 1950.
U.S. भागीदारी escalated in the जल्दी 1960s, साथ troop स्तर tripling in 1961 and tripling again in 1962.
U.S. combat units were तैनात शुरूआत in 1965.
Operations spanned अंतरराष्ट्रीय सीमायें, साथ लाओस and Cambodia heavily bombed.
अमरीकी भागीदारी in the युद्ध peaked in 1968, at the time of the Tet Offensive.
After this, U.S. ground शक्तियां यहूद धीरे withdrawn as भाग of a policy known as Vietnamization.
Despite the Paris Peace Accords, signed by सब पार्टियों in जनवरी 1973, fighting continued.
U.S. military involvement ended on 15 August 1973 as a परिणाम of the case–church amendment passed by the u.S. कॉंग्रेस.
the कैप्चर of साइगॉन by the वियतनाम लोगों 's फौज in अप्रैल 1975 marked the end of the war, and North and South Vietnam were reunified the following year.
The war exacted a विशाल इंसान लागत in शर्तें of fatalities ( see Vietnam War casualties ).
Estimates of the number of वियतनामी सैनिको और नागरिकों मारे vary इससे 800,000 to 3.1 million.
Some 200,000–300,000 cambodians, 20,000–200,000 laotians, और 58,220 U.S. service members also died in the conflict.
Cleveland Volcano in the Aleutian Islands of अलास्का photographed इससे the अंतरराष्ट्रीय स्पेस स्टेशन, May 2006.
Ash plumes reached a height of 19 km during the climactic eruption at माउंट pinatubo, फिलीपीन in 1991.
A volcano is an opening, or rupture, in a ग्रह 's सतह or क्रस्ट, जिससे allows hot मैग्मा, volcanic राख और गैसों to escape from the magma chamber below the surface.
ज्वालामुखी हैं generally मिला जहाँ tectonic plates are diverging or converging.
A mid-oceanic लकीरें, लिये उदाहरण the mid-atlantic लकीरें, रै उदाहरण of ज्वालामुखी caused by अपसारी tectonic plates pulling apart ; the Pacific Ring of Fire has examples of volcanoes caused by convergent tectonic plates coming together.
By contrast, volcanoes are usually not निर्मित जहाँ दो tectonic प्लेटों स्लाइड पास्ट एक another.
Volcanoes can also form where there is stretching और thinning of the धरती 's क्रस्ट in the इंटीरियर्स of प्लेटों, e.g., in the ईस्ट अफ़्रीकी दरार, the Wells Gray-Clearwater volcanic field and the Rio Grande Rift in North America.
This प्रकार of volcanism जलप्रपात अंतर्गत the छतरियाँ of `` Plate hypothesis '' volcanism.
Volcanism away from plate सीमाएँ रै भी महरूम समझाया as mantle plumes.
These so-called `` hotspots ``, for example Hawaii, are postulated to उठता इससे upwelling diapirs साथ मैग्मा इससे the core–mantle boundary, 3,000 km deep in the Earth.
Erupting volcanoes can pose अनेक जोखिमों, नहीं तभी in the तात्कालिक vicinity of the eruption.
Volcanic ash can be a threat to वायुयान, in particular those साथ जेट इंजन जहाँ राख अणु can be melted by the high operating temperature.
Large eruptions can affect temperature as ash and droplets of sulfuric acid obscure the sun and कूल the धरती 's निम्नतर माहौल or क्षोभमण्डल ; however, वे भी अवशोषित heat radiated up from the Earth, thereby warming the stratosphere.
historically, so-called volcanic सर्दियों have caused catastrophic famines.
A गहन pothole on नई यॉर्क नगर 's Second Avenue
A pothole ( sometimes पुकारा a केतली और ज्ञात in भाग of the पश्चिमी संयुक्त राज्य as a chuckhole ) is a प्रकार of disruption in the surface of a roadway where a portion of the road material has broken away, leaving a hole.
Renal cell carcinoma ( RCC, also known as hypernephroma ) is a kidney cancer that originates in the lining of the proximal convoluted tubule, the बहुत छोटी tubes in the गुर्दा कि हस्तांतरण gf ( glomerular filtrate ) इससे the glomerulus to the descending limb of the nephron.
RCC is the most common type of kidney cancer in वयस्कों, जिम्मेदार लिये लगभग 80 % of cases.
it is भी ज्ञात to be the सबसे lethal of all the genitourinary tumors.
Initial treatment is most commonly a radical or आंशिक nephrectomy और remains the mainstay of curative treatment.
Where the tumor is confined to the renal parenchyma, the 5-year अस्तित्व रेट is 60-70 %, लकिन इस is lowered considerably जहाँ metastases have स्प्रेड.
It is relatively resistant to radiation चिकित्सा और कीमोथेरेपी, हालांकि कुछ मामले respond to immunotherapy.
Targeted cancer therapies such as sunitinib, temsirolimus, bevacizumab, interferon-alpha, और sorafenib have improved the आउटलुक लिये RCC.
estée lauder कंपनियाँ, inc. is a निर्माता और marketer of prestige skincare, makeup, fragrance and hair care products.
The company has its headquarters in midtown मैनहटन, नई यॉर्क City.
The peritoneum ( ) is the serous झिल्ली कि फ़ॉर्म the अस्तर of the abdominal गुहा or the coelom —it कवर सबसे of the intra-abdominal ( or coelomic ) organs—in amniotes and some invertebrates ( annelids, for instance ).
It is composed of a layer of mesothelium समर्थित by a पतला परत of connective tissue.
The peritoneum दोनो supports the abdominal अंगों और serves as a conduit लिये their blood and lymph vessels and nerves.
The abdominal cavity ( the space bounded by the vertebrae, abdominal muscles, diaphragm and pelvic floor ) चाहिए नहीं be उलझन साथ the intraperitoneal space ( located within the abdominal cavity, but wrapped in peritoneum ).
The structures within the intraperitoneal space are called `` intraperitoneal '' ( e.g. the stomach ), the structures in the abdominal cavity that are located behind the intraperitoneal space are called `` retroperitoneal `` ( e.g. the गुर्दे ), और those structures नीचे the intraperitoneal स्पेस हैं पुकारा `` subperitoneal '' or `` infraperitoneal '' ( e.g. the bladder ).
आधुनिक 2.5 '' ssd प्रयुक्त in consumer laptops and desktop computers.
DDR sdram आधारित SSD.
अधिकतम और.
PCI संलग्न io त्वरक SSD
PCI-E, DRAM, and नन्द आधारित SSD.
It uses an बाह्य शक्ति सप्लाई to मेक the DRAM non-volatile.
A solid-state drive ( SSD ) ( also known as a solid-state disk or electronic disk, though it contains no वास्तविक `` डिस्क '' of कोई दयालु ) is a आंकड़ा भंडार यंत्र using एकीकृत सर्किट सभाओं as मेमोरी to स्टोर आंकड़ा persistently.
ssd प्रौद्योगिकी उपयोग इलेक्ट्रॉनिक अंतरफलक संगत with traditional block input/output ( I/O ) hard disk drives.
SSDs have no moving mechanical components, which distinguish them from परंपरागत electromechanical चुम्बकीय डिस्क ऐसे as मुश्किल डिस्क ड्राइव ( hdds ) or floppy disks, which contain spinning disks and movable read/write heads.
Compared with electromechanical डिस्क, ssds हैं typically कम susceptible to शारीरिक शॉक, much quieter, have lower access time, and less latency.
However, जबकि the दाम of ssds रै जारी to मनाही in 2012, SSDs are still about 7 to 8 times more expensive per unit of storage than HDDs.
Many SSDs use I/O interfaces विकसित लिये मुश्किल डिस्क ड्राइव, यूँ permitting simple replacement in common applications.
, most SSDs use NAND-based फ्लैश मेमोरी, जिससे retains आंकड़ा बगैर power.
For अनुप्रयोग requiring तेज़ अभिगम, लकिन नहीं necessarily आंकड़ा हठ बाद शक्ति loss, SSDs may be constructed from random-access memory ( RAM ).
Such devices may employ separate power sources, such as बैटरी, to maintain आंकड़ा बाद शक्ति घाटा.
Hybrid ड्राइव or ठोस राज्य संकर ड्राइव ( sshd ) combine the सुविधाएँ of ssds और hdds in the वही ईकाई, containing a large hard disk drive and an SSD cache to improve performance of frequently accessed data.
ये डिवाइस may प्रस्ताव near-ssd प्रदर्शन for many applications.
Salmon roe ( left ) and sturgeon caviar ( right ) served with mother of pearl caviar spoons to avoid tainting the स्वाद of the caviar.
Ossetra caviar, salmon creme fraiche, आलू shallot croquette, बेसिल आयल, egg whites and yolks
caviar, according to the Food and Agriculture Organization, is a product made from salt-cured fish-eggs of the Acipenseridae family.
The roe can be `` fresh '' ( non-pasteurized ) or pasteurized, साथ pasteurization reducing इसके culinary and economic value.
Traditionally the term caviar refers तभी to roe इससे जंगली sturgeon in the कैस्पियन और ब्लैक समंदर ( बेलुगा, ossetra and Sevruga caviars ).
Depending on the country, caviar may also be used to describe the roe of अन्य मछली ऐसे as सामन, steelhead, ट्राउट, lumpfish, whitefish, and other species of sturgeon.
Caviar is considered a luxury कोमलता और is खाया as a गार्निश or a spread.
In 2012, caviar sold for $ 2,500 per pound, or $ 3,000 to $ 5,500 प्रति किलो.
The SEC Network is a television syndication network featuring live broadcasts of college football और बास्केट कार्यक्रम इससे the southeastern सम्मेलन.
It is owned and operated by ESPN Plus and is दिखाया in अधिक than 50 प्रतिशत of households in the United States, mostly Southeastern United States markets.
The सेक संजाल typically airs in the नून पूर्वी स्लॉट that was former home to the Raycom Sports SEC game of the week.
Games are shown locally on broadcast stations, regional sports संजाल, as खूब as on ईएसपीएन gameplan, ईएसपीएन Full Court, and ESPN3.com.
The SEC Network is also उपलब्धियाँ in कनाडा via अटलांटा 's WPCH-TV.
The SEC Network uses the same on-screen ग्राफिक्स फिलहाल प्रयुक्त by ईएसपीएन on एबीसी, a संस्करण of ESPN 's graphics package.
SEC Network 's फ़ुटबॉल प्रोग्रामिंग स्टिल उपयोग a शीर्षक सुरक्षित क्षेत्रफल क्युकी सबसे of इसके affiliates do नहीं letterbox उनके मानक Definition feeds, while ESPN 's television networks have allowed their graphics to abandon the title safe, but letterbox for SD viewers.
Starting with the SEC 2012 Basketball season, SEC संजाल 's ग्राफिक्स have महरूम परिवर्तित to a 16:9 Widescreen-only format.
This is also होने प्रयुक्त लिये the 2013 बास्केट ऋतु, लकिन था स्टिल adapted the former 4:3-safe graphics format for the 2012 SEC football season.
The 1990s, pronounced and भी ज्ञात as `` the nineteen-nineties '' or abbreviated as `` the Nineties '' or `` the '90s '', was a decade that began on January 1, 1990, and ended on December 31, 1999.
It was the 10th and पिछला दशक of the 20th सदी and the 100th and last decade of the 2nd millennium.
The decade is best known for the end of the Cold War at the शुरूआत of the दशक और the विस्तार और व्यावसायीकरण of the अंतरजाल दौरान the दूसरी half of the decade.
In much of the वेस्ट the 1990s is remembered as a काल of unprecedented सलाम और समृद्धि, हालांकि many parts of the so-called Third World faced various problems including genocide, AIDS and new or continuing ethnic tensions and civil wars.
Culturally बोलना the दशक थी characterized by the वृद्धि of multiculturalism and alternative media.
Movements such as grunge, the rave scene and hip hop स्प्रेड around the संसार to यंग लोगों दौरान the दशक, aided by then-new प्रौद्योगिकी ऐसे as cable television and the Internet.
A combination of factors, including the mass mobilization of पूंजी बाज़ार through neoliberalism, the शुरूआत of the फैली अप्रसार of नई media such as the Internet, and the dissolution of the Soviet Union led to a realignment and reconsolidation of economic and political power across the world, and within countries.
आय असमानता among देशों in the संसार रोज़ sharply between the 1980s and the mid-1990s, before levelling off and then falling after 2000.
New जातीय विरोध उभरा in अफ़्रीकी, the balkans और the काकेशस, the पूर्व दो जिससे led to the Rwandan genocide and Bosnian genocide, respectively.
The United States began its current military occupation of the मध्य ईस्ट दौरान the गर्मियाँ of 1990 साथ मरुस्थल शील्ड बाद it काटें बंद a विशाल portion of the world 's petroleum supply.
Signs of any resolution of tensions between Israel and the Arab world remained elusive, though the Irish Troubles came to a standstill in 1998 साथ the शुभ शुक्रवार अनुबंध बाद 30 सालो of violence.
The gray wolf or grey wolf ( Canis lupus ) is a प्रजाति of canid देशी to the wilderness और रिमोट क्षेत्रों of North America, Eurasia, and North Africa.
it is the largest सदस्य of इसके परिवार, साथ males averaging, and females.
It is similar in general appearance and proportions to a German shepherd, or sled श्वान, लकिन रै a larger सिर, narrower छाती, longer टाँगे, straighter tail and bigger paws.
Its winter fur is long and bushy, और predominantly a mottled धूसर in रंग, हालांकि nearly pure श्वेत, red, or brown to black also occur.
Within the genus Canis, the gray wolf represents a more specialised and progressive form than its छोटी cousins ( the कायोटी और सुनहरी jackal ), as demonstrated by इसके morphological adaptations to शिकार विशाल शिकार, इसके अधिक मिलनसार प्रकृति और its highly advanced expressive behavior.
It is a social एनिमल, यात्राएं in नाभिकीय परिवारों consisting of a पन्द्रहवें जोड़ी, accompanied by the pair 's adult offspring.
The gray wolf is typically an apex परभक्षी throughout इसके दायरा, साथ तभी इंसानो and tigers posing a serious threat to it.
It feeds primarily on विशाल ungulates, हालांकि it भी eats smaller animals, livestock, carrion, and garbage.
The gray wolf is one of the world 's most well researched animals, with संभवतः अधिक किताबे लिखा परिचय it than कोई अन्य वन्यजीव प्रजाति.
It has a long history of association with humans, having महरूम despised और hunted in सबसे agricultural समुदायों due to इसके हमले on पशुधन, while conversely being respected by some Native American tribes.
It is the sole ancestor of the dog, जिससे थी पहला domesticated in the Middle East.
Although the fear of भेड़ियों is प्रचलित in अनेक इंसान समाजों, the बहुमत of अंकित attacks on people have been attributed to animals suffering from rabies.
Non-rabid wolves have attacked and killed people, मुख्यतः children, लकिन इस is असामान्य, as भेड़ियों हैं अपेक्षाकृत few, सजीव दूर from people, and have been taught to fear humans by hunters and shepherds.
Hunting and trapping has reduced the प्रजाति ' दायरा to, हालांकि इसके स्टिल अपेक्षाकृत फैली दायरा और stable जनसांख्यिकी अर्थात् that the species is not threatened at a global level, and is therefore classified by the IUCN as Least Concern.
The Roman Empire ( ) was the post- Republican period of the ancient रोमन सभ्यता, characterised by an निरंकुश रूप of सरकारी और विशाल territorial holdings around the Mediterranean in Europe, Africa, and Asia.
The 500-year-old Roman Republic, which preceded it, had been destabilized through a series of civil wars.
Several events marked the परिवर्तन इससे गणतंत्र to साम्राज्य, सहित जूलियस सीज़र 's नियुक्ति as perpetual dictator ( 44 BC ) ; the Battle of Actium ( 31 BC ) ; and the granting of the honorific Augustus to Octavian by the Roman Senate ( 27 BC ).
The first two centuries of the Empire were a period of unprecedented stability and समृद्धि ज्ञात as the pax romana ( `` रोमन सलाम '' ).
It reached its महानतम expanse दौरान the शासनकाल of Trajan ( 98–117 AD ).
In the 3rd century, the Empire underwent a crisis that threatened its अस्तित्व, लकिन थी reunified और stabilized अंतर्गत the emperors Aurelian and Diocletian.
Christians rose to power in the 4th सदी, दौरान जिससे समय a प्रणाली of डुअल नियम थी developed in the Latin West and Greek East.
After the collapse of central government in the West in the 5th century, the पूर्वी हाफ जारी as कया होता बाद be ज्ञात as the बीज़ान्टिन Empire.
क्युकी of the साम्राज्य 's विशाल extent और long सहनशीलता, the संस्थानों और संस्कृति of रोम था a profound और स्थायी influence on the विकास of language, religion, architecture, philosophy, law, and forms of government in the territory it governed, particularly Europe, and by means of European expansionism throughout the modern world.
Education in the United राज्य is मुख्यतः provided by the पब्लिक सेक्टर, साथ कंट्रोल और funding coming from three levels : local, state, and federal, in that order.
Child education is compulsory, and there हैं भी a विशाल क्रमांक और चौड़ी किस्में of उच्चतर शिक्षा संस्थानों throughout the देश कि one can choose to attend, both publicly and privately administered.
Public education is universally उपलब्धियाँ.
School curricula, funding, teaching, employment, और अन्य नीतियों हैं नियत through locally निर्वाचित स्कूल फलक साथ क्षेत्राधिकार over स्कूल districts with many directives from state legislatures.
School districts हैं प्रायः पृथक इससे अन्य लोकल jurisdictions, with independent officials and budgets.
शैक्षणिक मानकों और मानकीकृत testing decisions are usually made by state governments.
The ages लिये अनिवार्य शिक्षा vary by state.
It begins from ages five to eight और ends इससे आयु चौदह to अठारह.
Compulsory education requirements can generally be संतुष्ट by educating children in पब्लिक स्कूलों, state-certified निजी schools, or an approved home school program.
In most public and private schools, education is divided into three levels : elementary स्कूल, मध्य स्कूल ( sometimes पुकारा जूनियर ऊँची स्कूल ), और ऊँची स्कूल ( sometimes referred to as secondary education ).
In almost all schools at these levels, children हैं विभाजित by आयु समूह into ग्रेड, ranging इससे किंडरगार्टन ( followed by पहला grade ) for the youngest children in elementary school, up to twelfth grade, the final year of high school.
The exact age दायरा of विद्यार्थी in ये ग्रेड स्तर varies slightly from area to area.
post-secondary शिक्षा, बेहतर ज्ञात as `` कॉलेज `` in the संयुक्त राज्य, is generally governed separately from the elementary and high school system, and is described in a separate section below.
Government supported, free पब्लिक स्कूलों लिये सब प्रारंभ होने स्थापित बाद the क्रान्ति, और expanded in the 19th century, as the results of efforts of men like Horace Mann and Booker T. Washington.
By 1870, all राज्य था फ़्री elementary schools, albeit only in urban centers.
As the 20th century खींचा nearer, राज्य प्रारंभ गुजर कानून to मेक schooling अनिवार्य, and by 1910, 72 percent of children attended school.
Private स्कूलों जारी to स्प्रेड दौरान इस time, as well as colleges and—in the rural centers— land grant colleges.
The year of 1910 भी देखी the पहला सच्चा ऊँची स्कूलों.
During the बाकी of the 20th सदी, शैक्षणिक efforts centered on reducing the inequality of the schooling system.
The landmark Supreme Court case Brown v. Board of Education made the desegregation of elementary और ऊँची स्कूलों a नेशनल प्रधानता, जबकि the pell ग्रान्ट कार्यक्रम helped ग़रीब अल्पसंख्यकों लाभ access to college.
खास शिक्षा थी बना into federal law in 1975.
The Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 made मानकीकृत परीक्षण a आवश्यकता, और in 1983, a आयोग थी स्थापित to evaluate उनके results and propose a course of action.
The resulting no चाइल्ड बाएँ Behind Act of 2001 was controversial and its goals proved to be unrealistic.
A आयोग स्थापित in 2006 evaluated उच्चतर शिक्षा, but its recommendations have yet to be fully implemented.
Paul Bragg ( February 6, 1895 – दिसम्बर 7, 1976 ), nutritionist, थी a पायोनियर in America’s wellness movement.
Health spending per capita, in $ US PPP-adjusted, with the US और कनाडा compared amongst अन्य पहला संसार राष्ट्र.
Comparison of the health care प्रणालियों in कनाडा और the संयुक्त राज्य हैं प्रायः बना by government, public health and public policy analysts.
The two देशों था समान स्वास्थ्य परवाह प्रणालियों before Canada reformed its system in the 1960s and 1970s.
The United States spends much more money on health care than कनाडा, on दोनो a per-capita आधार और as a percentage of GDP.
In 2006, per-capita बिता लिये स्वास्थ्य परवाह in कनाडा थी us $ 3,678 ; in the U.S., US $ 6,714.
The U.S. spent 15.3 % of GDP on स्वास्थ्य परवाह in कि साल ; कनाडा spent 10.0 %.
In 2006, 70 % of health care spending in Canada थी financed by सरकारी, versus 46 % in the United States.
Total government spending per capita in the U.S. on health care was 23 % उच्चतर than कनाडाई सरकारी बिता, और u.S. सरकारी व्यय on स्वास्थ्य परवाह थी बस अंतर्गत 83 % of कुल कनाडाई बिता ( पब्लिक और private ) though these statistics do n't take into account population differences.
Studies have come to different conclusions परिचय the परिणाम of इस disparity in बिता.
A 2007 पुनर्विलोकन of सब अध्ययन comparing स्वास्थ्य outcomes in कनाडा और the us in a कनाडाई peer-reviewed medical journal found that `` health outcomes may be superior in patients cared for in Canada versus the United States, but differences are not consistent. ''
Life expectancy is longer in Canada, and its infant mortality rate is lower than that of the U.S., but वहीँ is बहस परिचय the underlying कल्याणकारी of these differences.
One commonly cited comparison, the 2000 World Health Organization 's ratings of `` overall health service performance '', which used a `` composite measure of achievement in the level of health, the वितरण of स्वास्थ्य, the स्तर of responsiveness और निष्पक्षता of वित्तीय योगदान '', क्रमित कनाडा 30th और the us 37th among 191 सदस्य nations.
This study rated the US `` responsiveness '', or quality of service for individuals receiving उपचार, as 1st, compared साथ 7th लिये कनाडा.
While the average life expectancy for Canadians was 80.34 years compared with 78.6 years for residents of the US, simply comparing the जीवन प्रत्याशा of दो समूह साथ अलग जातिगत मेकअप और अलग मोटापा दरों is संभावित नहीं an प्रभावी रास्ता of determining जिससे healthcare प्रणाली is श्रेष्ठ.
The WHO 's study methods were criticized by कुछ analyses.
Although there is a measure of consensus that life-expectancy and infant mortality mark the most reliable ways to compare nation-wide health care, assuming the जनसांख्यिकी मेकअप is समान, a हाल रपट by the congressional शोध सेवा carefully summarizes कुछ हाल आंकड़ा and notes the `` difficult research issues '' facing international comparisons.
The sound source has अभी टूटा through the ध्वनि गति अवरोध, और is traveling at 1.4 times the speed of sound, ( Mach 1.4 ).
Since the source is moving faster ( with a speed ) than the sound लहरें it creates, it दरअसल लीड the advancing तरंगाग्र.
The sound source will pass by a stationary निरीक्षक ( साथ a गति ) पहले the निरीक्षक दरअसल hears the sound it creates.
As a result, an निरीक्षक in सामने of the सोर्स will detect
and an observer पीछे the सोर्स.
A sonic boom produced by an वायुयान चलती at m=2.92, calculated from the cone angle of 20 degrees.
An observer hears the boom when the shock wave, on the edges of the कोन, crosses उसके or उसके स्थान.
mach कोन angle
A sonic boom is the sound associated with the shock लहरें निर्मित by an ऑब्जेक्ट traveling through the एयर तेज़ than the गति of sound.
Sonic booms generate विशाल amounts of ध्वनि energy, sounding much like an explosion.
The crack of a सुपरसोनिक गोली गुजर ओवरहेड is an उदाहरण of a sonic boom in miniature.
The Tonight Show with Jay Leno is an American late-night talk show hosted by Jay लीनो कि initially aired इससे may 25, 1992 to may 29, 2009, और resumed उत्पादन on कूच 1, 2010.
The fourth incarnation of the tonight दिखाएँ मताधिकार बना इसके डेब्यू on may 25, 1992, तीन दिनों following Johnny Carson 's retirement as host of the program.
The program originates from NBC Studios in Burbank, California, and is broadcast Monday through शुक्रवार at 11:35 pm in the पूर्वी and Pacific time zones ( 10:35 PM Central / Mountain time ).
Unlike Carson or his predecessor Jack Paar, Leno only एकबार utilized a अतिथि मेजबान, preferring to मेजबान the श्रेणी by himself.
On April 26, 1999, the show began broadcasting in 1080i hdtv, बनने the पहला अमरीकी nightly talk show to be shot in high definition.
The दिखाएँ is शॉट in 16:9 aspect ratio.
The series, which followed the same basic format as that of his predecessors ( an opening monologue followed by कॉमेडी दिनचर्या, साक्षात्कार और प्रदर्शन ), भागा जबतक may 29, 2009, बाद जिससे लीनो थी succeeded by Conan O'Brien.
NBC signed Leno to a new सौदे लिये a nightly बात दिखाएँ in the 10:00 pm ET timeslot.
The primetime series, titled The Jay Leno Show, debuted on सितंबर 14, 2009, following a समान स्वरूप to the लीनो अवतार of Tonight.
Neither O'Brien 's version of the program, which premiered June 1, 2009, nor The Jay लीनो दिखाएँ उत्पन्न the दरजा that NBC had expected.
The network decided to मूव a सघन 30-minute संस्करण of लीनो 's दिखाएँ to o'brien 's समय स्लॉट, and O'Brien 's Tonight Show a half-hour later.
This decision met साथ विपक्ष इससे o'brien, जिनकी कार्यावधि on the tonight दिखाएँ ended January 22, 2010, after which he began his own talk show on TBS.
The Tonight Show with Jay Leno then began इसके दूसरी और वर्तमान अवतार, the छठे of the मताधिकार, on March 1, 2010.
RFID चिप अगला to a अनाज of rice.
This chip contains a radio-frequency electromagnetic field कुंडली कि modulates an बाह्य चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड to ट्रांसफ़र a coded पहचान क्रमांक जब queried by a reader device.
This small type is incorporated in उपभोक्ता उत्पाद, और implanted in पालतु, for identification purposes.
Radio-frequency पहचान ( rfid ) is the बेतार non-contact उपयोग of radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ील्ड to transfer data, for the purposes of automatically identifying and tracking tags attached to objects.
The टैग contain electronically stored information.
Some tags are powered and read at छोटी सीमाएँ ( a few मीटर ) via चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड ( इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक induction ).
अन्य उपयोग a लोकल शक्ति सोर्स ऐसे as a बैटरी, or else have no बैटरी लकिन collect उर्जा इससे the interrogating em फ़ील्ड, और तब अधिनियम as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or UHF radio waves ( i.e., electromagnetic radiation at high frequencies ).
बैटरी संचालित टैग may operate at सैंकड़ों of meters.
Unlike a bar code, the tag does not necessarily need to be भीतर लकीर of sight of the रीडर, and may be embedded in the tracked object.
RFID tags are प्रयुक्त in अनेक उद्योग.
An RFID tag attached to an automobile during production can be प्रयुक्त to track इसके प्रगति through the सभा line.
दवाएँ can be tracked through warehouses.
Livestock and pets may have tags injected, allowing धनात्मक पहचान of the animal.
Since RFID tags can be attached to clothing, possessions, or even implanted within people, the possibility of reading personally-linked सूचना बगैर सहमति रै उठाया गोपनीयता चिंताएं.
Id, ego and super-ego are the three parts of the psychic apparatus defined in Sigmund Freud 's संरचनात्मक मॉडल of the psyche ; वे हैं the तीन सैद्धांतिक constructs in शर्तें of जिनकी कार्यकलाप and interaction mental life is described.
According to this model of the psyche, the id is the set of uncoordinated instinctual trends ; the super-ego plays the नाजुक और moralizing भूमिका ; और the अहंकार is the व्यवस्थित, यथार्थवादी भाग कि mediates between the इच्छाओं of the id and the super-ego.
The super-ego can stop you from doing certain बाते कि अपना id may want तुम to do.
Even though the model is structural and makes सन्दर्भ to an apparatus, the id, अहंकार और super-ego हैं कृत्यों of the mind rather than parts of the brain and do not correspond one-to-one with actual somatic structures of the kind dealt with by neuroscience.
The concepts themselves arose at a late stage in the विकास of फ्रायड 's विचार : the `` संरचनात्मक मॉडल '' ( जिससे succeeded उसके `` आर्थिक मॉडल '' और `` topographical मॉडल '' ) थी पहला discussed in उसके 1920 निबन्ध `` परे the ख़ुशी Principle `` and was formalized and elaborated upon three years later in his `` The Ego and the Id ``.
Freud 's proposal was influenced by the ambiguity of the term `` बेहोश `` और इसके अनेक conflicting उपयोग.
Air Force rotc emblem
The Air Force Reserve Officer Training Corps ( AFROTC ) is एक of the तीन प्राथमिक commissioning स्त्रोत लिये अधिकारियों in the संयुक्त राज्य एयर फ़ोर्स, the अन्य दो होने the संयुक्त राज्य Air Force Academy ( USAFA ) and Air Force Officer Training School ( OTS ).
A subordinate command of the Air University within the Air Education and Training Command ( AETC ), AFROTC is लकीर अंतर्गत the jeanne M. holm बीच लिये अधिकारी accessions और नागरिक Development at Maxwell AFB, Alabama.
The Holm Center, formerly ज्ञात as the एयर फ़ोर्स अधिकारी accession और प्रशिक्षण स्कूलों ( afoats ), retains direct responsibility for both AFROTC and OTS.
afrotc is the largest और oldest सोर्स of commissioned officers for the U.S. Air Force.
AFROTC 's stated मिशन is to उपज विशेषता leaders for the U.S. Air Force.
AFROTC units are located on 144 college and विश्वविद्यालयों campuses साथ 984 अतिरिक्त संस्थानों of उच्चतर सीखना participating in cross-town समझौतों कि allow their students to attend AFROTC classes at a nearby `` host '' college or university.
According to AFOATS HQ, in 2006, AFROTC commissioned 2,083 यूएसएएफ दूसरी lieutenants, साथ afrotc नामांकन ranging इससे 23,605 in 1985 to 10,231 in 1993, and around 13,000 enrolled today.
AFROTC units at colleges and universities are called `` detachments, '' और हैं typically headed by an क्रियाशील ड्यूटी यूएसएएफ अधिकारी in the रैंक of कर्नल or लेफ्टिनेंट कर्नल जो कृत्यों as दोनो the detachment कमांडर for USAF purposes and with the nominal title of Professor of Aerospace Studies ( PAS ) within the institution 's academic community.
सबसे कॉलेजों और विश्वविद्यालयों होगा designate the afrotc detachment as the Department of Aerospace Studies.
The PAS is assisted by three to four सहायक professors of aerospace अध्ययन ( apas ), सब क्रियाशील ड्यूटी यूएसएएफ अधिकारियों in the ranks of major or captain.
Three USAF non-commissioned अधिकारियों और एक वरिष्ठ non-commissioned अधिकारी होगा typically provide सैन्य administrative support and are often augmented by one to two civilian staff support employees of the academic institution.
Within AFROTC detachments, the students ( referred to as `` cadets '' ) हैं व्यवस्थित into विंग्स, समूह, squadrons, और flights, mirroring the USAF functional wing structure.
The AFROTC detachment 's cadet wing or cadet समूह is अलग into दो विभाजन : the सामान्य सैन्य कोर्स ( जीएमसी ) consisting of the पहला two years of training, and the Professional Officer Course ( POC ) consisting of the last two years of training.
The afrotc कार्यक्रम is भी विभाजित into दो प्रशिक्षण कृत्यों : the अकादमिक कक्षा कार्यक्रम ( Aerospace Studies classes ) and Cadet Activities ( i.e., Leadership Laboratory, Physical Training, and other training ).
Paper density ( also known as basis weight and grammage ) is a term used in the pulp and paper industry and also लिये कपड़ा उद्योग to denote a माप of द्रव्यमान of the उत्पाद प्रति ईकाई of क्षेत्रफल for a type of fabric, paper or paperboard.
The term `` घनत्व '' is नहीं प्रयुक्त in इसके परंपरागत sense of mass per unit volume.
`` Paper घनत्व '', बल्कि, is a माप of the area density.
Paper products that let little or no light pass through ( e.g. पोस्टर फलक ) हैं माना dense or heavy.
Paper products that allow some लाइट to pass through ( e.g. ऊतक पेपर ) are considered lightweight.
In the pulp and paper industry, it is आम to नियत a वाणिज्यिक पेपर यंत्र to उपज paper to a target paper density.
Paper density can also be प्रयुक्त to फर्क पेपर इससे paperboard as the latter प्रायः रै a grammage greater than 134 g/m2.
Two ways of expressing पेपर घनत्व हैं commonly used:
Expressed in grams per square meter ( g/m2 ), paper घनत्व is भी ज्ञात as grammage.
This is the measure used in सबसे भाग of the संसार.
Expressed in terms of the द्रव्यमान ( expressed as वज़न ) प्रति क्रमांक of चादरें, it is known as basis weight.
The सम्मेलन प्रयुक्त in the संयुक्त राज्य और a few अन्य देशों using us पेपर sizes is pounds of a ream of 500 ( or in some cases 1000 ) sheets of a given ( raw, still uncut ) basis size.
Japanese paper is expressed as the वज़न in kg of 1000 sheets.
Candace Nicole Parker ( born April 19, 1986 ) is an अमरीकी बास्केट खिलाड़ी लिये the wnba 's लॉस एंजिल्स स्पार्क्स and UMMC Ekaterinburg of Russia.
She is the younger सिस्टर of एनबीए खिलाड़ी एंथोनी Parker.
She attended the University of Tennessee और थी drafted by the स्पार्क्स in 2008.
She may be best known for होने the पहला स्त्री to डंक in an ncaa टूर्नामेंट खेल और the पहला स्त्री to डंक twice in a कॉलेज game—she set both milestones as a redshirt freshman on March 19, 2006.
She also became तभी the दूसरी खिलाड़ी to डंक in a wnba खेल on June 22, 2008.
A versatile player, she is mainly a आगे, लकिन थी सूचीबद्ध on टेनेसी 's रोस्टर as a forward, center, and guard.
She was a starter on the Lady Vols basketball team, विजेता of the 2007 और 2008 ncaa championships.
Parker won the 2009 निकलोडियन बच्चे ' चुनाव पुरस्कार as the favorite female athlete in the sports category.
And she was a अतिथि स्टार on फिगर It Out.
A खाना मार्गदर्शिका पिरामिड is a पिरामिड तराशा मार्गदर्शिका of स्वस्थ भोजन विभाजित into भाग to show the recommended intake for each food group.
the पहला खाना पिरामिड थी published in Sweden in 1974.
The most widely known food पिरामिड थी introduced by the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of कृषि in the year 1992, was updated in 2005, and then replaced in 2011.
Over 25 other countries and organisations have भी प्रकाशित खाना पिरामिडों.
Hans ईसाई andersen ( ; प्रायः referred to in scandinavia as H. C. Andersen ; April 2, 1805August 4, 1875 ) was a Danish author and poet.
Although a prolific writer of plays, travelogues, novels, and कविताएं, andersen is बेहतरीन remembered लिये उसके परी किस्से, a साहित्यिक विधा he so mastered कि he himself has become as mythical as the tales he wrote.
Andersen 's popularity is not limited to children ; उसके stories—called, or `` fantastic किस्से '' —express विषयवस्तु कि transcend age and nationality.
During his lifetime he was acclaimed for having प्रसन्न children विश्वव्यापी और थी feted by royalty.
Andersen 's fairy tales, which have been अनूदित into अधिक than 125 भाषाएं, have become culturally अंतःस्थापित in the वेस्ट 's सामूहिक चेतना, readily accessible to children, लकिन पेश lessons of virtue and resilience in the face of adversity for mature readers as well.
They have प्रेरित गति तस्वीरें, plays, नाटिकाओं, and animated films.

Eye contact occurs when `` two people look at प्रत्येक अन्य 's आँखें at the वही time. ''
In human beings, eye सम्पर्क is a रूप of अशाब्दिक संचार और is विचार to have a large influence on social behavior.
Coined in the early to mid-1960s, the term has come in the West to often define the act as a सार्थक और महत्वपूर्ण चिह्न of विश्वास and social communication.
The customs and significance of नजर सम्पर्क vary widely between संस्कृतियों, साथ धार्मिक और सोशल मतभेद often altering its meaning greatly.
The study of नजर सम्पर्क is sometimes ज्ञात as oculesics.
Bed bugs are parasitic कीट of the cimicid परिवार कि feed exclusively on blood.
The term most commonly refers to members of the genus Cimex of which Cimex lectularius, the common bed कीड़ा, is the बेहतरीन ज्ञात as it prefers to फीड on इंसान रक्त हालांकि अन्य cimex प्रजाति हैं specialized to अन्य पशु, e.g., चमगादड़ बग, C. pipistrelli ( Europe ), C. pilosellus ( western US ), and C. adjunctus ( entire eastern US ).
The name of the `` bed bug '' is derived from the preferred habitat of Cimex lectularius : warm houses and विशेषकर आसपास or अंदर of beds और bedding or अन्य sleep areas.
Bed bugs are mainly क्रियाशील at रात्रि, लकिन हैं नहीं exclusively nocturnal.
They usually feed on उनके होस्ट बगैर होने noticed.
A number of adverse health effects may result इससे bed कीड़ा bites, सहित स्किन rashes, मनोवैज्ञानिक effects, and allergic symptoms.
Diagnosis involves both ढूंढना bed बग और the occurrence of संगत symptoms.
Bed bugs have महरूम ज्ञात as इंसान परजीवी लिये thousands of years.
At a point in the early 1940s, they यहूद ज़्यादातर eradicated in the विकसित संसार, लकिन have increased in prevalence since 1995.
Because infestation of human habitats has been on the increase, bed bug bites और सम्बन्धित शर्तें have महरूम on the वृद्धि as खूब.
The Book of Isaiah ( ) is the पहला of the latter नबियों in the यहूदी बाइबल, preceding Ezekiel, Jeremiah and the Book of the Twelve.
( The order of the subsequent किताबे differs somewhat in the ईसाई बूढ़ा Testament ).
The first 39 अध्याय prophesy यातना लिये a गुनाहगार यहूदा और लिये सब the राष्ट्र of the संसार कि oppose परमेश्वर, जबकि the पिछला 27 prophesy the बहाली of the स्वदेश of इसराईल और a नई सृष्टि in परमेश्वर 's गौरवशाली भविष्य किंगडम ; this section includes the Songs of the Suffering Servant, four separate passages referring to the nation of Israel, interpreted by Christians as prefiguring the coming of Jesus Christ.
परंपरा ascribes authorship of the किताब to यशायाह बेटे of amoz, लकिन अभी विद्वानों widely सहमत that the book is the work of three different authors - few scholars deny this view, and those that do, do so for theological reasons.
The first, termed Proto-Isaiah ( chapters 1–39 ), contains the words of the 8th-century BCE prophet with 7th-century BCE expansions ; the second, Deutero-Isaiah ( chapters 40–55 ), is the work of a 6th-century BCE author writing near the end of the Babylonian captivity ; और the तीसरा, the काव्य trito-isaiah ( अध्याय 56–66 ), थी रचित in जेरूसलम shortly बाद the वापसी इससे निर्वासन, probably by multiple authors.
Oregon State University ( OSU ) is a coeducational, पब्लिक शोध विश्वविद्यालयों स्तिथ in corvallis, ऑरेगॉन, संयुक्त States.
The विश्वविद्यालयों offers undergraduate, ग्रैजुएट और doctoral degrees and a multitude of research opportunities.
वहीँ हैं अधिक than 200 अकादमिक उपाधि कार्यक्रम offered through the university.
OSU 's programs in microbiology, nuclear engineering, पारिस्थितिकी, वानिकी, पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य, biochemistry, zoology, oceanography, food science and pharmacy are recognized nationally as top tier programs.
The OSU 's liberal कला कार्यक्रम have भी grown significantly and the department is considered a `` cornerstone '' of the institution.
More than 200,000 लोगों have attended osu चूंकि इसके founding.
The Carnegie Foundation classifies ऑरेगॉन राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों as भाग of इसके शीर्ष tier of research institutions.
As of 2008, OSU is one of only seventy-three land-grant universities.
The school is also recognized as a sea-grant, space-grant and sun-grant institution, making it one of only two us संस्थानों to retain सब चार designations और the तभी पब्लिक विश्वविद्यालयों to do so ( Cornell is the only other with similar designations ).
As one of the two flagship universities of the Oregon University System, OSU receives more funding लिये शोध, annually, than सब अन्य पब्लिक उच्चतर शिक्षा संस्थानों in ऑरेगॉन combined.
Female ejaculation is the expulsion of द्रव by इंसान महिलाओं इससे the paraurethral ducts through and around the female urethra during or before an orgasm.
It is also known colloquially as gushing or squirting, हालांकि ये हैं माना to be अलग phenomena in some research publications.
The exact source और प्रकृति of the द्रव continue to be a टॉपिक of बहस among चिकित्सा पेशेवर, which is also related to doubts over the existence of the G-Spot.
The Kanab ambersnail, scientific name Oxyloma haydeni kanabensis or oxyloma kanabense, is a critically endangered subspecies or प्रजाति of small, air-breathing land snail, a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusc in the family Succineidae, the amber snails.
The common name of the amber snails is based on the शेल, जिससे is पारदर्शी और जब खाली प्रायः resembles एम्बर in color.
This species is endemic to the United States, specifically the राज्य of एरिज़ोना और यूटा, जहाँ it थी पहला एकत्रित in the early 20th century.
It has been listed as endangered on the United राज्य मछली और वन्यजीव सेवा सूची of endangered species since 8 August 1991.
This snail lives in wetlands, springs, and seeps, and तभी दो of इसके प्राकृतिक habitats हैं ज्ञात to मौजूद : तीन झीलों, a meadow near Kanab, Utah, and Vasey 's Paradise, a spring along the Colorado River within Grand Canyon National Park.
In its natural habitat it is rather polyphagous, feeding mainly on जीवाणु, पौधे और fungi, और reproduces during the summer.
Now considered a Critically Endangered species on the आईयूसीएन रेड सूची of threatened प्रजाति due to a श्रेणी of कारकों ( सहित influence ), the kanab ambersnail रै been reintroduced to three springs above the historic high water level along the Colorado River.
The Spanish language is the second most used language in the संयुक्त राज्य.
There are more Spanish speakers in the United States than there are speakers of चाइनीज, फ्रेंच, जर्मनी, इतालवी, हवाई, and the Native American languages combined.
According to the 2010 American Community Survey conducted by the U.S. Census Bureau, Spanish is the प्राथमिक भाषा बोला at घर by लगभग 37 लाख लोगों aged पाँच or पुरानी, a फिगर अधिक than दोगुना that of 1990.
There are 45 million hispanophones जो बोलो स्पेनी as a पहला or दूसरी भाषा, as खूब as छह लाख स्पेनी भाषा विद्यार्थी, composing the largest नेशनल spanish-speaking community outside of Mexico and making Spanish the Romance language and the Indo-European language with largest number of native speakers in the world.
Roughly half of सब u.S. स्पेनी अध्यक्षों भी बोलो अंग्रेज़ी `` बहुत खूब, '' based on the self-assessment Census question respondents.
The language came to the country since the 16th and 17th centuries with the arrival of स्पेनी colonists in क्षेत्रों कि होता बाद become the राज्य of फ्लोरिडा, टेक्सास, कोलोराडो, नई मैक्सिको, एरिज़ोना, नेवाडा, यूटा, और California and of the Spanish explorers - who explored areas of 42 states-.
Also west of louisiana territory थी स्पेनी between 1763 - 1800 ( year of the French recovery of territory ), after the French and Indian War.
After of the incorporation of these states to the U.S. in first half of 19th सदी, the स्पेनी भाषा थी बाद reinforced by the अधिग्रहण of प्यूर्टो रीको in 1898 और by बाद लहरें of the हिस्पैनिक करणों, basically from Hispanic America, to the United States beginning in the second half of 19th century until today.

alt=five मुस्कुराना यंग लड़कियों in विभिन्न मुद्राएँ wearing श्वेत smocks over thigh-length dresses of similar color to their hair.
The Tokyo Mew Mew manga and anime श्रेणी सुविधाएँ a डाल of वर्ण designed by मिया ikumi.
The series takes place in Tokyo, Japan, where five adolescent लड़कियों, पुकारा mew mews, हैं infused साथ the डीएनए of endangered प्रजाति to कॉम्बैट एलियंस attempting to लो over the धरती.
The manga श्रेणी is followed by a छोटी sequel श्रेणी, टोकियो mew mew a la Mode, which introduces a new Mew Mew and a new threat.
The Mew Mews are led by the प्रमुख अक्षर, ichigo momomiya, जिनकी पहला कार्य is to एकत्रित the अन्य four Mew Mews : Mint Aizawa, Lettuce Midorikawa, Pudding Fong, and Zakuro Fujiwara.
As the series progresses, Ichigo goes इससे having a crush on masaya aoyama to बनने उसके गर्लफ्रेंड जबकि trying to hide her secret double life from him.
The series antagonists शामिल तीन एलियंस, kish, पाई, और तीखा, and their leader, Deep Blue.
Originally from Earth, the एलियंस यहूद मजबूर to छोड़ long पहले due to deadly environmental changes.
They have returned to kill the humans, who they feel are destroying उनके ग्रह, और reclaim the planet.
In a la Mode, middle school student Berry Shirayuki is introduced as the sixth Mew Mew and, in the अनुपस्थिति of ichigo, the अस्थाई नेता of the mew Mews.
A la Mode also introduces new set of antagonists, the Saint Rose Crusaders, a समूह of इंसान teenagers साथ विभिन्न मानसिक abilities साथ a ख्वाहिश to create their own utopia.
Led by Duke, they make several attempts to kill बेरी, आखिरकार turning the लोकल populace against the Mew Mews.
Ikumi 's initial vision for Tokyo Mew Mew was a story called Tokyo ब्लैक बिल्ली लड़की कि प्रदर्शित a cat-girl battling alien invaders.
After the story was transitioned to a more upbeat स्टोरी of पाँच मादा superheroes, the अक्षर डिजाइन यहूद redone to have a lighter, more colorful feel.
The main series characters were praised for being a perfect अनुरूप लिये the overall स्टोरी, as खूब as लिये उनके cute appearances.
The characters introduced in a la Mode were भी praised लिये उनके विज़ुअल दिखावे, लकिन criticized as being repeats of the original series.
The character Duke was also criticized for having a डिज़ाइन reminiscent of the श्वेत सर्वोच्चता समूह, the Ku Klux Klan.
Middle Triassic marginal marine sequence of siltstones ( below ) and limestones ( ऊपर ), वर्जिन गठन, southwestern यूटा, यूएसए
Sedimentary rocks are types of चट्टान कि हैं formed by the deposition of सामग्री at the धरती 's सतह और within bodies of water.
Sedimentation is the collective name for processes that cause mineral and/or सशुल्क अणु ( detritus ) to settle और accumulate or खनिज to precipitate from a solution.
अणु कि रूप a sedimentary चट्टान by accumulating are called sediment.
Before being deposited, sediment was formed by weathering and erosion in a सोर्स क्षेत्रफल, और तब transported to the प्लेस of deposition by जल, wind, ice, mass movement or glaciers which are called agents of denudation.
The sedimentary rock cover of the continents of the Earth 's क्रस्ट is extensive, लकिन the कुल योगदान of sedimentary रॉक्स is अनुमानित to be only 8 % of the total volume of the crust.
Sedimentary rocks are तभी a पतला veneer over a क्रस्ट consisting mainly of igneous and metamorphic rocks.
Sedimentary rocks हैं deposited in परतों as strata, forming a ढांचा called bedding.
the पढ़ाई of sedimentary रॉक्स और चट्टान strata provides सूचना परिचय the subsurface that is useful for civil engineering, for example in the construction of roads, houses, tunnels, canals or other constructions.
Sedimentary rocks are also महत्वपूर्ण स्त्रोत of प्राकृतिक संसाधन जैसे कोयले, fossil fuels, drinking water or ores.
The study of the sequence of sedimentary चट्टान strata is the प्रमुख सोर्स लिये वैज्ञानिक ज्ञान about the Earth 's history, including palaeogeography, paleoclimatology and the history of life.
The scientific discipline that studies the properties and origin of sedimentary रॉक्स is पुकारा sedimentology.
Sedimentology is both part of geology and physical geography and overlaps partly with other disciplines in the Earth sciences, such as pedology, geomorphology, भूरसायन or संरचनात्मक भूविज्ञान.

Humans हैं born साथ over 270 हड्डियों, कुछ of जिससे फ्यूज साथ into a अनुदैर्ध्य axis, the axial skeleton, to which the appendicular skeleton is attached.
Saint Patrick ( ; ; Modern ; ; c. 387 – 17 कूच c. 460 or c. 492 ) थी a romano-british ईसाई missionary and bishop in Ireland.
Known as the `` Apostle of Ireland '', he is the प्राथमिक संरक्षक संत of the द्वीप साथ साथ संतो brigid और columba.
Two authentic letters from him survive, from which come the तभी generally स्वीकृत विवरण of उसके जीवन.
When he was about 16, he was captured from his home and taken as a स्लेव to आयरलैंड, जहाँ he जिया लिये छह सालो पहले escaping और returning to उसके परिवार.
After becoming a cleric, he returned to उत्तरी और पश्चिमी आयरलैंड as an ordained बिशप, लकिन छोटी is ज्ञात about the places where he worked.
By the seventh century, he had already आइये to be revered as the patron saint of Ireland.
Most available details of his life are from subsequent hagiographies, और ये हैं अभी नहीं स्वीकृत बगैर विस्तृत criticism.
The Annals of Ulster state that he arrived in आयरलैंड in 432, ministered in ulster around 443, और died in 457 or 461.
The text, however, distinguishes between `` Old Patrick '' ( विचार to औसत palladius ) और `` पैट्रिक, archapostle of the स्कॉट्स, '' जो died in 492.
The actual dates of Patrick 's life can not be फिक्स्ड साथ certainty लकिन, on a फैली निर्वचन, he थी क्रियाशील as a मिशनरी in आयरलैंड during the second half of the 5th century.
He is generally credited with being the first बिशप of armagh, primate of सब Ireland.
Saint पैट्रिक 's दिन is observed on कूच 17, the date of his death.
It is celebrated both अंदर और बाहर आयरलैंड, as दोनो a धार्मिक और, especially outside Ireland, secular holiday.
In the dioceses of आयरलैंड, it is both a solemnity and a holy day of obligation ; outside Ireland, it can be a celebration of Ireland itself.
Line खण्ड in the सुनहरी ratio
A golden rectangle with longer side a और shorter पक्ष b, जब लगाई सटा to a वर्गाकार साथ पहलू of लंबाई a, होगा उपज a समान सुनहरी आयताकार साथ longer पक्ष a + b and shorter side a.
This illustrates the संबंध.
In mathematics और the कला, दो quantities हैं in the सुनहरी अनुपात if the अनुपात of the sum of the quantities to the larger quantity is equal to the ratio of the larger quantity to the smaller one.
The figure on the right illustrates the ज्यामितीय संबंध.
expressed algebraically:
where the Greek अक्षर फाई ( ) represents the सुनहरी अनुपात.
इसके मान is:
The golden अनुपात is भी पुकारा the सुनहरी खण्ड ( लैटिन : sectio aurea ) or golden mean.
Other names शामिल चरम और औसत अनुपात, medial खण्ड, दैवी proportion, दैवी खण्ड ( लैटिन : sectio divina ), golden proportion, golden cut, and golden number.
Many 20th century artists and architects have proportioned their works to सन्निकट the सुनहरी ratio—especially in the रूप of the सुनहरी आयताकार, in जिससे the अनुपात of the longer पक्ष to the shorter is the सुनहरी ratio—believing इस proportion to be aesthetically pleasing ( देखिए Applications and observations below ).
Mathematicians since Euclid have studied the properties of the golden ratio, including its appearance in the dimensions of a regular प्रस्तुतीकरण और in a सुनहरी आयताकार, जिससे can be काटें into a वर्गाकार और a छोटी आयताकार with the same aspect ratio.
The golden ratio has also been used to analyze the proportions of natural वस्तुएँ as खूब as man-made प्रणालियों ऐसे as वित्तीय बाज़ार, in कुछ मामले आधारित on संदिग्ध fits to data.
North Myrtle बीच is a तटीय रिज़ॉर्ट नगर in horry काउंटी, दक्षिण Carolina, United States.
It was created in 1968 इससे चार मौजूदा municipalities उत्तर of myrtle बीच, और serves as one of the primary tourist towns along the Grand Strand.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 13,752 at the 2010 census.
World युद्ध i ( wwi ) थी a वैश्विक युद्ध केंद्रित in यूरोपीय कि began on 28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918.
It was predominantly called the World युद्ध or the ग्रेट युद्ध इससे इसके occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of संसार युद्ध ii in 1939, and the First World War or World War I thereafter.
It involved all the world 's great powers, which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom, फ़्रांस और रूस ) और the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the ट्रिपल गठबंधन of जर्मनी, austria-hungary और इटली ; लकिन, as austria–hungary था लिया the अप्रिय विरूद्ध the अनुबंध, इटली किया not enter into the war ).
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the war : Italy, Japan and the संयुक्त राज्य joined the allies, और the उस्मानी साम्राज्य और Bulgaria the Central Powers.
ultimately, अधिक than 70 लाख सैन्य कर्मियों, सहित 60 million Europeans, were mobilised in one of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 million combatants were killed, largely because of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of हथियार बगैर सम्बन्धित सुधार in protection or mobility.
It was the fifth- deadliest विरोध in संसार इतिहास, subsequently paving the रास्ता लिये various political changes, such as revolutions in many of the nations involved.
One of the long-term causes of the war was the resurgence of imperialism in the विदेशी नीतियों of the great powers of Europe.
More immediately, the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary, on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip in साराजेवो triggered a राजनयिक संकट जब austria-hungary subsequently वितरित an ultimatum to the किंगडम of सर्बिया.
Several alliances formed over the previous decades were invoked.
Within weeks, the प्रमुख शक्तियां यहूद at युद्ध और, via उनके colonies, the विरोध soon spread around the world.
On 28 July, the Austro-Hungarians fired the पहला गोलियाँ of the युद्ध as तैयारी for the invasion of Serbia.
While the Russians mobilised, the germans invaded न्यूट्रल बेल्जियम और ध्वज on the रास्ता to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany.
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called चमत्कार of the marne —the पश्चिमी Front settled into a static battle of attrition with a trench line that changed little until 1917.
On the Eastern Front, the Russian फौज थी कामयाब विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians, लकिन थी रोका in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans.
In November the उस्मानी साम्राज्य joined the युद्ध, खोलने up fronts in the Caucasus, Mesopotamia and the Sinai.
Italy and बुल्गारिया गई to युद्ध in 1915 और रोमानिया in 1916.
In Russia, the tsar 's सरकारी collapsed in कूच 1917 और a subsequent क्रान्ति in November brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers.
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front, the Allies drove back the Germans in a श्रेणी of कामयाब offensives और अमरीकी शक्तियां began प्रवेश the trenches.
Germany, which had its own trouble with क्रांतिकारियों, सहमत to an armistice on 11 नवम्बर 1918.
The war ended in विजय लिये the allies.
Events on the घर fronts यहूद as उग्र as on the बैटल fronts, as the भागीदार आजमाया to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to fight a total war.
By the समाप्त of the युद्ध, चार प्रमुख इम्पीरियल powers—the German, Russian, Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist.
The successor states of the former two lost a great amount of territory, जबकि the latter दो यहूद dismantled entirely.
The map of सेंट्रल यूरोपीय थी redrawn into several smaller states.
The League of राष्ट्र थी formed in the आशा of preventing another such conflict.
The European nationalism spawned by the युद्ध और the ब्रेकअप of empires, the परखना of जर्मनी 's शिकस्त और problems with the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II.
Camden is a city in Camden काउंटी, नई जर्सी, संयुक्त राज्य.
It is the काउंटी सीट, स्तिथ across the Delaware River from Philadelphia.
As of the 2010 United States Census the city had a कुल जनसांख्यिकी of 77,344, representing a मनाही of 2,560 ( 3.2 % ) इससे the 79,904 residents enumerated during the 2000 Census, which had in turn declined by 7,588 ( 8.7 % ) from the 87,492 counted in the 1990 Census.
Camden ranked as the 12th-most populous municipality in the राज्य in 2010 बाद having महरूम क्रमित 10th in 2000.
Camden was originally incorporated as a नगर on फ़रवरी 13, 1828, इससे portions of the now-defunct Newton Township, while the area was still part of Gloucester County.
On March 13, 1844, camden became भाग of the newly formed Camden County.
Although एकबार a thriving बीच लिये निर्माण और उद्योग, Camden is perhaps best known for its struggles with urban dysfunction.
तीन camden mayors have महरूम jailed लिये भ्रष्टाचार, the most recent being Milton Milan in 2000.
Since 2005 the school system and police विभाग have महरूम संचालित by the राज्य of नई जर्सी ; the कब्ज़ा समाप्त in 2012.
In 2008, Camden had the highest crime rate in the U.S. with 2,333 violent अपराधों प्रति 100,000 लोगों जबकि the नेशनल औसत was 455 per 100,000.
Camden public schools spent $ 23,770 प्रति छात्र ( $ 19,118 on a budgetary per-pupil आधार ) in the 2009–10 school year and two-thirds of the students graduate.

Amitriptyline ( Tryptomer, Elavil, tryptizol, laroxyl, saroten, sarotex, lentizol, endep ) is a tricyclic antidepressant ( TCA ).
It is the most widely used tca और रै at तनिक बराबर efficacy विरूद्ध अवसाद as the newer class of SSRIs according to a study from early 2001.
As खूब as reducing depressive लक्षण, ये प्रकार of tricyclics भी आसानी migraines, tension headaches, anxiety attacks and some schizophrenic symptoms.
it is भी ज्ञात to reduce आक्रामकता and violent behavior.
A computer is a general purpose device that can be प्रोग्रामित to carry आउट a परिमित नियत of गणित or logical operations.
Since a sequence of operations can be readily बदला, the कंप्यूटर can solve अधिक than one kind of problem.
Conventionally, a computer consists of at तनिक एक प्रसंस्करण तत्व, typically a सेंट्रल processing unit ( CPU ) and some form of memory.
The processing element carries out arithmetic and logic operations, और a sequencing और कंट्रोल ईकाई कि can बदलें the अनुक्रम of परिचालन आधारित on stored information.
Peripheral डिवाइस allow सूचना to be पुनर्प्राप्त इससे an बाह्य source, and the result of operations saved and retrieved.
The first electronic digital कंप्यूटर यहूद विकसित between 1940 और 1945 in the संयुक्त Kingdom and United States.
originally वे यहूद the आकार of a विशाल रूम, consuming as much power as several hundred modern personal computers ( PCs ).
In इस era mechanical एनालॉग computers were used for military applications.
Modern computers based on integrated circuits are millions to अरबों of टाइम्स अधिक सक्षम than the जल्दी मशीने, और occupy a भिन्न of the स्पेस.
Simple computers are small पर्याप्त to अनुरूप into मोबाईल डिवाइस, और मोबाईल कंप्यूटर can be संचालित by small batteries.
Personal computers in उनके विभिन्न फ़ॉर्म हैं प्रतीक of the सूचना Age and are what most people think of as “computers.”
However, the embedded कंप्यूटर मिला in अनेक डिवाइस इससे mp3 खिलाड़ी to सेनानी वायुयान और इससे खिलौने to औद्योगिक robots are the most numerous.
`` Barefoot and pregnant '' is a phrase most commonly associated with the विवादास्पद विचार कि महिलाओं चाहिए नहीं कार्य बाहर the घर और चाहिए have अनेक children दौरान उनके reproductive years.
It has several अन्य meanings as खूब.
it is a फिगर of speech.
The phrase `` barefoot and गर्भवती '' थी संभवतः पहला प्रयुक्त sometime before 1950.
An article from 1949 states, `` By जल्दी 1949, twa was—in the शब्द of इसके नई अध्यक्ष, ralph S. damon—both 'barefoot and pregnant. ' ''
Its usage may तिथि as जल्दी as the 1910s.
An article published in 1958 states the phrase was पहला प्रयुक्त by a `` Dr. Hertzler '' 40 years earlier.
`` Some forty years ago, Dr. Hertzler advanced a hypothesis which यंग महिलाओं of आज seem झुकी on proving correct. '
The only way to keep a स्त्री प्रसन्न, ' he कहा, 'is to रखना उसके barefoot and pregnant. ' ''

University of Phoenix Stadium, खोली अगस्त 1, 2006, is a बहुउद्देशीय फ़ुटबॉल स्टेडियम स्तिथ in Glendale, Arizona.
It is the home of the Arizona Cardinals of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( NFL ) and the annual Fiesta Bowl.
The stadium is located next door to the Jobing.com एरिना और it सुविधाएँ the पहला fully retractable प्राकृतिक ग्रास playing सतह निर्मित in the संयुक्त राज्य on top of an AirField Systems drainage system.
An opening on one side of the stadium allows the playing field to move to the exterior of the भवन, allowing the संपूर्ण प्राकृतिक turf playing सतह to be उजागर to daylight.
The stadium has hosted सुपर कटोरी xlii, और the 2011 bcs नेशनल चैंपियनशिप खेल, a खेल कि it होस्ट प्रत्येक चार सालो, जिससे set the venue 's entertainment attendance record of 78,603 on January 11, 2011.
It will again मेजबान सुपर कटोरी XLIX in 2015.
The विश्वविद्यालयों of फीनिक्स acquired the नामकरण अधिकारों in सितंबर 2006, shortly after the stadium had opened under the name Cardinals Stadium.
The `` विश्वविद्यालयों of फीनिक्स `` नाम is लागू as a कॉरपोरेट प्रायोजक, और नहीं as the घर स्टेडियम of the University ( which has no intercollegiate athletics program ).
The स्टेडियम रै भी hosted the डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई इवेंट रेसलमेनिया XXVI with 72,219 fans in attendance.
The event was held in the stadium on कूच 28th 2010.
Joshua Lawrence Chamberlain ( September 8, 1828 – February 24, 1914 ), born as Lawrence जोशुआ चेम्बरलेन, थी an अमरीकी कॉलेज प्राध्यापक इससे the राज्य of maine, जो volunteered during the American Civil War to join the Union Army.
Although having no earlier education in military strategies, he became a अत्यधिक आदरणीय और सजा Union officer, reaching the rank of brigadier general ( and brevet major general ).
For his gallantry at gettysburg, he थी awarded the पदक of Honor.
He was given the honor of commanding the संघ सैनिकों at the आत्मसमर्पण रस्म लिये the infantry of रॉबर्ट E. ली 's फौज at appomattox, Virginia.
After the war, he entered politics as a Republican and served चार one-year शर्तें of दफ्तर as the 32nd राज्यपाल of Maine.
He served on the faculty, and as अध्यक्ष, of उसके अल्मा मेटर, bowdoin College.
An inning, or innings, is a fixed-length segment of a game in any of a variety of sports – सबसे notably क्रिकेट और बेसबॉल दौरान जिससे एक टोली कोशिशें to स्कोर जबकि the अन्य टोली कोशिशें to prevent the पहला from scoring.
In क्रिकेट, the पद पारी is दोनो एकवचन और बहुवचन and is always spelled and pronounced with the terminal `` s ''.
In baseball and softball, the एकवचन रूप is inning और तभी the बहुवचन takes an `` s ''.
In many other sports, the length of the game is dictated by a clock and teams swap offensive and रक्षात्मक भूमिकाएँ dynamically by लेने कब्ज़ा of a बॉल or similar item.
In बेसबॉल और क्रिकेट, however, एक टोली, कहा to be `` बल्लेबाजी '', कोशिशें to स्कोर `` रनों '' —see चलाएं ( बेसबॉल ) and run ( cricket ) —while the other team, said to be `` fielding '', attempts to prevent the scoring of runs and get members of the batting team out.
The teams switch places after the क्षेत्ररक्षण टोली रै succeeded in getting a फिक्स्ड क्रमांक of खिलाड़ी आउट, बनाना a क्लॉक unnecessary.
In cricket, the term innings is also used to refer to the खेल of एक particular खिलाड़ी ( स्मिथ था a poor innings, scoring only 12 ).
By extension, इस पद can be प्रयुक्त in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी लिये लगभग कोई कार्यकलाप जिससे takes a काल of समय ( the उदार सरकारी था a शुभ पारी, but finally lost office in 1972, or You 've had a fair innings, now it 's my turn, meaning `` you have spoken for long enough, now let me speak '' ).
It is also प्रयुक्त in सन्दर्भ to किसी जो रै died at a reasonably old age or lived a rich and rewarding life ( Ah, well.
John थी 89.
At least he था a शुभ पारी ).
The baseball-derived parallel to इस in अमरीकी अंग्रेज़ी is the पद at bat.
According to the Oxford English शब्दकोष, the पद पारी रै महरूम प्रयुक्त in सन्दर्भ to क्रिकेट चूंकि at तनिक 1735.
As cricket was a mature, अत्यधिक व्यवस्थित खेल in the 1600s in इंग्लैण्ड, the पद 's उत्पत्ति could well precede this first recorded usage.
The word inning अर्थ 'a महफ़िल in ' is पहला अंकित in 1522, and could be related.
एडीनोसिन deaminase कमियां, भी पुकारा एडीए कमियां or ADA-SCID, is an autosomal recessive metabolic disorder that causes immunodeficiency.
It occurs in fewer than one in 100,000 सजीव births विश्वव्यापी.
It accounts for परिचय 15 % of सब मामले of severe combined immunodeficiency ( SCID ).
It is very rare, तुम have a 3 % मौका of getting this gene.
ADA deficiency may be उपस्थित in शैशव, बाल्यकाल, adolescense, or adulthood.
Age of onset and गंभीरता is सम्बन्धित to कुछ 29 ज्ञात genotypes associated with the disorder.
