Poverty is the state of one जो lacks a निश्चित राशि of सामग्री possessions or money.
Absolute poverty or destitution refers to the deprivation of मौलिक इंसान needs, जिससे commonly शामिल खाना, water, sanitation, clothing, shelter, health care and education.
Relative poverty is defined contextually as economic inequality in the स्थान or समाज in which people live.
For much of history, poverty was considered largely unavoidable as traditional मोड्स of उत्पादन यहूद अपर्याप्त to दे an संपूर्ण जनसांख्यिकी a आरामदायक मानक of living.
After the industrial revolution, mass production in कारखानों बना माल increasingly अधिक inexpensive और accessible.
Of more importance is the modernization of कृषि, ऐसे as fertilizers, in order to provide enough yield to feed the population.
The supply of basic needs can be restricted by constraints on government services such as भ्रष्टाचार, कर avoidance, कर्ज़ और ऋण conditionalities और by the दिमाग नाली of स्वास्थ्य परवाह और educational professionals.
Strategies of increasing income to make basic needs more affordable typically शामिल welfare, आर्थिक freedoms, और providing वित्तीय services.
Poverty reduction is a प्रमुख लक्ष्य और समस्या लिये अनेक international organizations such as the United Nations and the World Bank.
the संसार बैंको अनुमानित 1.29 अरब people were living in absolute poverty in 2008.
Of these, about 400 million लोगों in निरपेक्ष गरीबी जिया in इण्डिया और 173 million people in China.
In यूएसए 1 in 5 children lives in poverty.
In terms of percentage of क्षेत्रीय populations, sub-saharan अफ़्रीकी at 47 % had the highest incidence rate of absolute poverty in 2008.
between 1990 और 2010, परिचय 663 लाख people moved above the absolute poverty level.
Still, extreme poverty is a global challenge ; it is observed in सब भाग of the संसार, सहित the विकसित economies.
Mushroom poisoning ( also known as mycetism ) refers to harmful effects from ingestion of विषाक्त substances उपस्थित in a मशरूम.
These लक्षण can vary इससे पतला जठरांत्र तकलीफ to death.
The toxins present are secondary metabolites उत्पादित in विशिष्ट biochemical pathways in the fungal cells.
मशरूम विषाक्तता is प्रायः the परिणाम of ingestion of जंगली मशरूम बाद misidentification of a toxic mushroom as an edible species.
The most common reason लिये इस misidentification is बंद प्रतिरूप in शर्तें of रंग और general morphology of the toxic mushrooms species with edible species.
Even very experienced wild mushroom gatherers are upon rare अवसर poisoned by खाने विषाक्त प्रजाति, despite होने खूब जागरूक of the risks, through carelessness.
To prevent mushroom poisoning, mushroom gatherers need to be very familiar with the मशरूम वे intend to collect as खूब as साथ कोई similar-looking विषाक्त species.
In addition, edibility of मशरूम may निर्भर on विधि of तैयारी लिये cooking.
Collectors also need to be well जागरूक कि edibility or toxicity of कुछ प्रजाति varies with geographic location.
इंसान ऊँचाई is the अलहदा इससे the नीचे of the feet to the top of the head in a human body, standing erect.
When populations share जेनेटिक पृष्ठभूमि और पर्यावरणीय कारकों, औसत ऊँचाई is frequently characteristic within the group.
Exceptional height variation ( around 20 % deviation from average ) within such a population is sometimes due to gigantism or dwarfism, जिससे हैं चिकित्सा शर्तें caused by विशिष्ट जीनों or अंतःस्रावी abnormalities.
In regions of extreme poverty or prolonged warfare, environmental factors like chronic malnutrition during बाल्यकाल or किशोरावस्था may खाता लिये विलम्बित विकास and/or ( in कठोर मामले ) चिह्नित reductions in वयस्क stature भी बगैर the उपस्थिति of कोई of ये medical conditions.
Apollo 11 was the spaceflight that landed the पहला इंसानो, अमेरिकी neil आर्मस्ट्रांग और बज़ एल्ड्रिन, on the चंद्रमा on July 20, 1969, at 20:18 UTC.
Armstrong became the पहला to कदम onto the चंद्र सतह 6 hours later on July 21 at 02:56 UTC.
आर्मस्ट्रांग खर्च परिचय दो और a हाफ घंटों बाहर the spacecraft, एल्ड्रिन थोड़ा कम ; and together they collected of lunar material for return to Earth.
A third member of the mission, Michael Collins, piloted the command spacecraft alone in lunar orbit until आर्मस्ट्रांग और एल्ड्रिन लौटे to it बस अंतर्गत a दिन बाद लिये the ट्रिप back to Earth.
Launched by a Saturn V rocket from Kennedy Space Center in merritt द्वीप, फ्लोरिडा on जुलाई 16, अपोलो 11 थी the पांचवां मानवयुक्त मिशन of नासा 's अपोलो program.
The Apollo spacecraft had three parts : a Command मोड्यूल साथ a केबिन लिये the तीन astronauts जिससे थी the तभी भाग जिससे उतरा वापस on Earth ; a Service Module which supported the Command Module with propulsion, electrical power, oxygen and water ; and a Lunar Module for landing on the Moon.
After being sent to the Moon by the शनि v 's अपर स्टेज, the astronauts separated the spacecraft from it and travelled for three days until they entered into lunar orbit.
Armstrong and Aldrin then स्थानांतरित into the चंद्र मोड्यूल और उतरा in the समुद्र of Tranquility.
They stayed a total of about 21 और a हाफ घंटों on the चंद्र surface.
After lifting off in the अपर भाग of the चंद्र मोड्यूल और rejoining कॉलिन्स in the Command Module, they returned to Earth and landed in the Pacific Ocean on July 24.
Broadcast on live TV to a world-wide audience, आर्मस्ट्रांग stepped onto the चंद्र सतह और वर्णित the इवेंट as `` एक छोटी कदम लिये [ a ] man, one giant leap for mankind. ''
Apollo 11 effectively ended the Space Race and fulfilled a नेशनल लक्ष्य प्रस्तावित in 1961 by the लेट u.S. अध्यक्ष जॉन F. कैनेडी in a speech before the United States Congress, `` before this decade is out, of landing a man on the Moon and returning him safely to the Earth. ''
The FIFA World Cup, often बस the संसार कप, is an अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ फ़ुटबॉल प्रतियोगिता लडे by the वरिष्ठ मेन 's नेशनल टीमों of the members of Fédération Internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ), the sport 's global governing body.
The championship has been awarded प्रत्येक चार सालो चूंकि the inaugural टूर्नामेंट in 1930, मगर in 1942 और 1946 जब it थी not held because of the Second World War.
The current champions are स्पेन, जो जीती the 2010 tournament.
The current format of the टूर्नामेंट involves 32 टीमों स्पर्धा लिये the शीर्षक at venues within the host nation ( s ) over a period of about a month ; this phase is often called the World Cup Finals.
A qualification phase, which currently takes place over the preceding three years, is used to determine जिससे टीमों qualify लिये the टूर्नामेंट साथ साथ the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ).
The 19 World Cup tournaments have महरूम जीती by आठ अलग national teams.
Brazil have won five times, and वे हैं the तभी टोली to have निभाई in every tournament.
the अन्य संसार कप विजेता हैं इटली, साथ चार शीर्षक ; जर्मनी, with three titles ; Argentina and inaugural winners Uruguay, with two titles each ; and England, France, and Spain, with one title each.
The World Cup is the world 's most widely viewed sporting इवेंट ; an अनुमानित 715.1 लाख लोगों देखी the final match of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany.
The next तीन संसार cups होगा be hosted by Brazil in 2014, Russia in 2018, and Qatar in 2022.
Genocide is a term coined in 1944 by Raphael Lemkin to describe the deliberate and systematic destruction, in पूरे or in भाग, of an जातीय, racial, religious, or national group.
It is defined in Article 2 of the Convention on the Prevention and Punishment of the Crime of Genocide ( CPPCG ) of 1948 as `` any of the following acts committed with intent to destroy, in whole or in part, a national, ethnical, racial or religious group, as ऐसे : हत्या सदस्यों of the समूह ; causing गंभीर bodily or दिमागी नुक़सान to सदस्यों of the समूह ; deliberately inflicting on the समूह शर्तें of जीवन, गणना to लाओ परिचय इसके शारीरिक विनाश in पूरे or in भाग ; imposing उपायों intended to prevent births within the group ; [ and ] forcibly transferring children of the group to another group. ''
Skulls of पीड़ितों of the Rwandan Genocide
The preamble to the CPPCG not only states that `` नरसंहार is a अपराधों अंतर्गत अंतरराष्ट्रीय विधि, contrary to the स्पिरिट और aims of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र और condemned by the civilized world '', but also that `` at all periods of history genocide has inflicted great losses on humanity ''.
Determining what historical कार्यक्रम constitute a नरसंहार और जिससे हैं merely दण्ड or inhuman behavior is not a clear-cut matter.
In nearly every case where accusations of genocide have circulated, partisans of various sides have fiercely विवादित the निर्वचन और विवरण of the इवेंट, प्रायः to the point of promoting wildly different versions of the facts.
an accusation of नरसंहार is कतई not taken lightly and will almost always be controversial.
The following list of genocides and alleged genocides should be understood in इस कॉन्टेक्स्ट और can नहीं be regarded as the फाइनल शब्द on these subjects.
A timing belt is a non-slipping mechanical ड्राइव बेल्ट और the पद may refer to either:
Toothed belt, a लचीली बेल्ट साथ दांत moulded onto its inner surface
Timing belt ( camshaft ), a toothed बेल्ट प्रयुक्त to drive the camshaft ( s ) within an internal combustion engine
The culture of the United States is primarily a पश्चिमी संस्कृति, लकिन is भी बहकावे by देशी अमरीकी, अफ़्रीकी, एशियाई, Polynesian, and Latin American cultures.
American culture started its formation over 10,000 सालो पहले साथ the माइग्रेशन of paleo-indians इससे एशिया into the region that is today the continental United States.
It has its own unique social and cultural विशेषताएँ ऐसे as dialect, म्यूज़िक, कला, सोशल आदतें, भोजन, और folklore.
The United States of अमेरिका is an ethnically और racially विविध देश as a परिणाम of large-scale आव्रजन इससे many different countries throughout its history.
Its chief early European influences came from English, Scottish, वेल्श और आयरिश settlers of औपनिवेशिक अमेरिका दौरान British rule.
British culture, due to colonial ties with ब्रिटेन कि स्प्रेड the अंग्रेज़ी भाषा, विधिक प्रणाली और अन्य सांस्कृतिक inheritances, had a formative influence.
Other important प्रभाव आए इससे अन्य भाग of पश्चिमी Europe, especially Germany, France, and Italy.
असली तत्व भी खेल a दमदार भूमिका, ऐसे as the invention of Jeffersonian democracy.
Thomas जेफरसन 's टीप on the राज्य of वर्जिनिया थी शायद the पहला influential घरेलू सांस्कृतिक critique by an American and a reactionary piece to the prevailing European consensus that America 's domestic originality was degenerate.
प्रचलित विचार और आदर्शों कि विकसित domestically, ऐसे as नेशनल छुट्टियाँ, uniquely अमरीकी sports, military tradition, and innovations in the arts and entertainment give a strong sense of national pride among the population as a whole.
American संस्कृति शामिल दोनो रूढ़िवादी और उदार तत्व, वैज्ञानिक और धार्मिक competitiveness, political structures, risk taking and free expression, materialist and moral elements.
Despite certain consistent ideological principles ( e.g. individualism, egalitarianism, और आस्था in स्वतंत्रता और लोकतंत्र ), अमरीकी संस्कृति रै a किस्में of expressions due to इसके भौगोलिक scale and demographic diversity.
The flexibility of U.S. culture और इसके अत्यधिक सांकेतिक प्रकृति सीसे कुछ शोधकर्ताओं to categorize अमरीकी संस्कृति as a mythic पहचान ; others see it as American exceptionalism.
It also includes elements that विकसित इससे स्वदेशी अमेरिकी, और अन्य जातीय cultures—most prominently the culture of African Americans, cultures from Latin America, and Asian American cultures.
Many American cultural elements, especially from लोकप्रिय संस्कृति, have स्प्रेड आरपार the ग्लोब through modern mass media.
The United States has often been thought of as a melting घट, लकिन शुरूआत in the लेट 1990s और जल्दी 2000s, it रुझान towards सांस्कृतिक विविधता, बहुलवाद and the image of a salad bowl instead.
Due to the extent of American culture, there हैं अनेक एकीकृत लकिन अद्वितीय सोशल subcultures भीतर the United States.
The cultural affiliations an individual in the United States may have commonly depend on social class, political orientation and a multitude of जनसांख्यिकी विशेषताएँ ऐसे as धार्मिक पृष्ठभूमि, occupation and ethnic group membership.
Samoan ( Gagana fa'a Sāmoa or Gagana Sāmoa — IPA : ) is the language of the Samoan Islands, comprising the स्वतंत्र देश of समोआ और the संयुक्त राज्य territory of American Samoa.
It is an आधिकारिक language—alongside अंग्रेज़ी —in दोनो jurisdictions.
Samoan, a पोलिनेशियाई भाषा, is the पहला language for most of the Samoa Islands ' population of about 246,000.
With many Samoan people living in अन्य देशों, the कुल क्रमांक of अध्यक्षों विश्वव्यापी is estimated at 370,000.
The language is notable for the phonological differences between formal and अनौपचारिक वाक as खूब as a ceremonial रूप प्रयुक्त in samoan छाये.
A ग्लूकोज सहिष्णुता परीक्षण is a चिकित्सा परीक्षण in which glucose is given and blood samples taken afterward to determine how quickly it is cleared from the blood.
The test is usually used to test for diabetes, इंसुलिन प्रतिरोध, और sometimes प्रतिक्रिया hypoglycemia और acromegaly, or rarer disorders of carbohydrate metabolism.
In the सबसे commonly performed संस्करण of the परीक्षण, an मौखिक ग्लूकोज सहिष्णुता परीक्षण ( ogtt ), a मानक खुराक of glucose is ingested by mouth and blood levels are checked two hours later.
Many variations of the GTT have been devised over the years for विभिन्न उद्देश्य, साथ अलग मानक doses of ग्लूकोज, अलग रूट of प्रशासन, अलग intervals और durations of sampling, और विभिन्न substances measured in addition to blood glucose.
`` कया परिचय me '' is a सोंग लिखा by गैरी तुषार और frances swan, first recorded by Australian rock band Moving Pictures from their album Days of Innocence.
It was the band 's first number-one single in Australia spending six लगातार सप्ताह on the शीर्ष ; वहीँ, it थी the second-highest selling सिंगल of 1982.
The success of the song led them to अमेरिका जहाँ it became a hit, reaching # 29 on the u.s. Billboard Hot 100 chart.
The song stayed in the U.S. charts for such a long time that it managed to मेक billboards शीर्ष 100 पॉप singles of 1983, at # 88, a विरल feat for a single with such a low peak position.
The song made an असामान्य वापसी in 1989, peaking at # 46.
On the left a chicken egg, the अंडा सबसे commonly खाया by इंसानो, and on the right two quail eggs
Eggs are laid by females of many different species, including birds, reptiles, amphibians, और मछली, और have महरूम खाया by mankind लिये हज़ारों of सालो.
Bird and reptile eggs consist of a सुरक्षात्मक eggshell, albumen ( अंडा श्वेत ), और vitellus ( अंडा yolk ), contained within various thin membranes.
Popular choices for egg consumption are chicken, duck, quail, roe, and caviar, but the egg most प्रायः खपत by इंसानो is the मुर्गा अंडा, by a wide margin.
Egg yolks and whole अंडे स्टोर significant amounts of प्रोटीन और choline, and are widely used in cookery.
Due to their protein content, the United States विभाग of कृषि ( यूएसडीए ) categorizes अंडे as meats भीतर the Food Guide Pyramid.
Despite the nutritional मान of अंडे, वहीँ हैं कुछ संभावित स्वास्थ्य issues arising from egg quality, storage, and individual allergies.
Chickens and other egg-laying creatures are widely kept throughout the संसार, और द्रव्यमान उत्पादन of मुर्गा अंडे is a वैश्विक उद्योग.
In 2009, an estimated 62.1 million metric tons of अंडे यहूद उत्पादित विश्वव्यापी इससे a कुल लेटा flock of approximately 6.4 billion hens.
वहीँ हैं मुद्दे of क्षेत्रीय विभिन्नता in माँग और अपेक्षा, as खूब as current debates concerning methods of mass production, with the European Union 's ban on battery farming of chickens.
Major League Soccer ( MLS ) is a professional soccer लीग representing the खेल 's उच्चतम स्तर in the United States and Canada.
Sanctioned by the संयुक्त राज्य सॉकर संघ ( u.S. सॉकर ), the लीग is रचित of 19 teams — 16 in the U.S. and 3 in Canada.
Seasons presently run from March to December, साथ प्रत्येक टोली playing 34 खेल in the नियमित season.
Ten teams compete in the postseason mls कप playoffs culminating in the चैंपियनशिप खेल, the MLS Cup.
Major लीग सॉकर थी संस्थापित in 1993 as part of the United States ' bid to host the 1994 FIFA World Cup.
The first season took place in 1996 शुरूआत साथ ten teams.
Instead of operating as an association of independently owned teams, MLS is a single entity where each team is owned and नियंत्रित by the लीग 's निवेशकों.
The league 's बंद सदस्यता makes it एक of the world 's few soccer leagues not using promotion and relegation.
The legality of कैनबिस varies इससे देश to country.
Possession of cannabis is illegal in सबसे देशों और रै महरूम चूंकि the शुरूआत of फैली कैनबिस prohibition in the late 1930s.
however, अनेक देशों have decriminalized the कब्ज़ा of छोटी quantities of cannabis, particularly in North America, South America and Europe.
Furthermore, possession is legal or effectively legal in the Netherlands, North Korea and would be in the U.S. states of कोलोराडो और वॉशिंगटन if it यहूद नहीं लिये संघीय विधि, जिससे governs व्यक्तियों in all states.
The medicinal use of कैनबिस is विधिक in a क्रमांक of देशों, सहित Canada, the Czech Republic and Israel.
While federal law in the United States bans all sale and possession of cannabis, enforcement varies widely at the state level and some states have established medicinal marijuana programs in कि खण्डन संघीय विधि ; दो राज्य ( कोलोराडो और वॉशिंगटन ) have repealed उनके कानून prohibiting the recreational उपयोग of कैनबिस and replaced them with a regulatory regime, also contrary to federal statute.
Some countries have laws that are not as vigorously prosecuted as others but, apart from the countries कि प्रस्ताव अभिगम to चिकित्सा मारिजुआना, सबसे देशों have विभिन्न दंड ranging इससे lenient to very severe.
Some infractions हैं लिया अधिक seriously in कुछ देशों than अन्य in regard to the cultivation, use, possession or transfer of cannabis for recreational use.
A few jurisdictions have lessened दंड लिये कब्ज़ा of छोटी quantities of cannabis, making it punishable by confiscation and a fine, rather than imprisonment.
Some jurisdictions/ drug courts use mandatory treatment programs for young or बारंबार उपयोक्ता, साथ स्वतंत्रता इससे narcotic दवाएँ as the लक्ष्य और a few jurisdictions परमिट कैनबिस उपयोग लिये medicinal purposes.
There are also परिवर्तन in a अधिक प्रतिबंधक direction as in Canada.
Drug tests to detect cannabis are increasingly common in अनेक देशों और have resulted in कारावास वाक्य and people losing their jobs.
However, simple possession can carry long jail sentences in कुछ देशों, विशेषकर in भाग of ईस्ट Asia and Southeast Asia where the sale of cannabis may lead to a sentence of life in prison or even execution.
in cardiovascular physiology, ejection भिन्न ( ef ) represents the volumetric fraction of blood pumped out of the ventricle ( heart ) with each heart beat or cardiac cycle.
It can be applied to either the right ventricle which ejects via the pulmonary वाल्व into the pulmonary परिसंचरण or the बाएँ ventricle जिससे ejects via the aortic वाल्व into the systemic circulation.
इमेजिंग of the physiology of the mammalian दिल is the आर्ट कि allows meaningful mathematical expression defining EF.
noninvasive हृदय इमेजिंग रै become a विश्वव्यापी यूटिलिटी enabling study of cardiac performance reproducibly and inexpensively.
Simplified, ejection भिन्न is a गणितीय उत्पाद अनुमत by cardiac imaging.
As a mathematical term, ejection भिन्न is an एक्सटेंशन of the कार्य of Adolph Fick in cardiac output.
Dedicated technology such as Echocardiography, Computed Tomography, चुम्बकीय अनुनाद इमेजिंग और muga स्कैनिंग have definitively अनुमत clinically प्रासंगिक गणित regarding Ischemia, Congenital Heart Disease and Heart Failure.
State Route 14 ( sr 14 ) is a north–south राज्य राजमार्ग in the U.S. state of California, largely in the Mojave Desert.
The southern portion of the highway is हस्ताक्षरित as the antelope घाटी फ्रीवे.
The route connects Interstate 5, or Golden State फ्रीवे, निकट सांता clarita और साथ u.S. Route 395 near Inyokern.
Legislatively, the route extends south of I-5 to State Route 1 in the Pacific Palisades area of Los Angeles, however the portion दक्षिण of the जंक्शन साथ i-5 has not been constructed.
The southern part of the constructed रूट is a व्यस्त commuter फ्रीवे सेवारत और connecting the समुदायों of सांता clarita, palmdale और lancaster with the rest of the Greater Los Angeles area.
The northern portion, from Vincent ( south of Palmdale ) to Route 395, is legislatively named the Aerospace Highway, as the राजमार्ग serves एडवर्ड्स एयर फ़ोर्स आधार, एकबार एक of the प्राथमिक लैंडिंग स्ट्रिप्स लिये नासा 's स्पेस शटल.
This section is rural, following the line between the hot mojave मरुस्थल और the forming Sierra Nevada mountain range.
Most of Route 14 is loosely paralleled by a main line of the Southern Pacific Railroad, used for the Antelope Valley Line of the metrolink commuter रेल प्रणाली as खूब as a कनेक्शन between लॉस एंजिल्स और the कैलिफ़ोर्निया सेंट्रल घाटी via tehachapi pass.
Linked with US 395, इस सड़क connects लॉस एंजिल्स साथ ऐसे स्थान as Mammoth Mountain, Mono Lake, Yosemite National Park and Reno, Nevada.
Route 14 was part of U.S. रूट 6 prior to truncation in 1964, जब u.S. 6 थी a coast-to-coast route from Long Beach to Provincetown, Massachusetts.
The non-freeway segment of SR 14 from Silver Queen Road north of Rosamond to Mojave is known as सिएरा राजमार्ग, as is the बूढ़ा रूटिंग between अंतरराज्यीय 5 और चांदी महारानी सड़क जहाँ sr 14 रै been moved to a newer freeway alignment.
portions of रूट 14 remain हस्ताक्षरित साथ names संबद्ध साथ us 6, including Midland Trail, Theodore Roosevelt Highway and Grand Army of the Republic Highway.
इस रूट is भाग of the कैलिफ़ोर्निया फ्रीवे और एक्सप्रेसवे System.
Blindness is the condition of lacking विज़ुअल बोध due to physiological or neurological factors.
Various scales have been developed to describe the extent of दृष्टि घाटा और define दृष्टिहीनता.
कुल दृष्टिहीनता is the पूरा कमी of रूप और विज़ुअल लाइट बोध and is clinically recorded as NLP, an abbreviation for `` no light perception. ''
दृष्टिहीनता is अक्सर प्रयुक्त to describe कठोर visual impairment with vision.
Those described as having only light perception have no अधिक sight than the क्षमता to बताना लाइट इससे अंधेरा और the सामान्य दिशा of a light source.
To determine which people may need special assistance because of their visual disabilities, various governmental jurisdictions have formulated more complex परिभाषाएं referred to as विधिक दृष्टिहीनता.
In उत्तर अमेरिका और सबसे of यूरोपीय, विधिक blindness is defined as visual acuity ( vision ) of 20/200 ( 6/60 ) or less in the better eye with best correction possible.
इस अर्थात् कि a legally अँधा व्यक्तिगत होता have to स्टैंड इससे an ऑब्जेक्ट to see it—with corrective lenses —with the same degree of clarity as a normally sighted person could from.
In many areas, people with average acuity who nonetheless have a visual field of कम than 20 डिग्री ( the norm होने 180 डिग्री ) are also classified as being legally blind.
लगभग टेन प्रतिशत of those deemed legally अँधा, by any measure, have no vision.
The rest have some vision, from लाइट बोध अलोन to अपेक्षाकृत good acuity.
Low दृष्टि is sometimes प्रयुक्त to describe विज़ुअल acuities from 20/70 to 20/200.
By the 10th Revision of the WHO International Statistical Classification of Diseases, Injuries and Causes of Death, low vision is defined as visual acuity of कम than 20/60 ( 6/18 ), लकिन बराबर to or बेहतर than 20/200 ( 6/60 ), or सम्बन्धित विज़ुअल फ़ील्ड घाटा to कम than 20 डिग्री, in the बेहतर नजर साथ best possible correction.
Blindness is defined as visual acuity of less than 20/400 ( 6/120 ), or सम्बन्धित विज़ुअल field loss to less than 10 degrees, in the better eye with best possible correction.
Blind people with undamaged eyes may still register light non-visually लिये the purpose of circadian entrainment to the 24-hour light/dark cycle.
Light signals for this purpose travel through the retinohypothalamic tract और हैं नहीं प्रभावित by ऑप्टिक तंत्रिका क्षति परे जहाँ the retinohypothalamic ट्रैक्ट exits.
Earl Simmons ( born दिसम्बर 18, 1970 ), बेहतर ज्ञात by his stage names DMX and Dark Man X, is an American rapper and actor.
In 1999, DMX released his best-selling album... And Then वहीँ थी x, जिससे प्रदर्शित the hit सिंगल `` Party Up ( Up in Here ) ``.
He has acted in films such as Belly, रोमियो जरूर die, निकास wounds, पालना 2 The Grave, and Last Hour.
In 2006, he स्ट्रक्चर in the वास्तविकता टेलीविज़न श्रेणी, जिससे थी primarily aired on the BET cable television network.
In 2003, dmx प्रकाशित a किताब of उसके memoirs entitled, E.A.R.L. : The Autobiography of DMX.
DMX released a mixtape The Weigh In as a prelude/promotion towards उसके एल्बम undisputed ( 2012 ).
DMX रै बेची over 30 लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी, making him one of the best-selling hip-hop artists of all time.
Professional certification, trade certification, or professional designation, प्रायः पुकारा बस प्रमाणन or योग्यता, is a नामांकन अर्जित by a person to assure qualification to perform a job or task.
Not सब certifications कि उपयोग post-nominal अक्षर हैं an acknowledgement of educational achievement, or an agency appointed to safeguard the public interest.
Bugs Bunny is a मजेदार एनिमल कार्टून अक्षर, बेहतरीन remembered लिये उसके अभिनीत भूमिकाएँ in the looney धुनें and Merrie Melodies series of theatrical short films produced by Warner Bros. during the Golden age of American animation.
His popularity during this era led to उसके बनने a कॉरपोरेट शुभंकर of Warner Bros. Entertainment.
Bugs is an anthropomorphic gray hare or rabbit who is famous for his flippant, व्यक्तित्व, a सुनाया नई यॉर्क एक्सेंट, उसके portrayal as a छलिया, और उसके कैच phrase `` Eh...
What 's up, दस्तावेज़ ? ''
( usually said जबकि चबाने a carrot ).
Bugs has appeared in more films than कोई अन्य कार्टून अक्षर और is the नवीं most portrayed film personality in the world.
According to his 1990 `` जीवनी '' बग बनी : 50 सालो और तभी एक धूसर हरे, बग थी born on जुलाई 27, 1940 in Brooklyn, New York in a warren under Ebbets Field, home of the Brooklyn Dodgers.
In reality, he was brought to life by the animators and staff of Leon Schlesinger Productions ( later Warner Bros. cartoons ) : सहित टेक्स एवेरी, जो निर्देशित बग ' जल्दी निर्णायक छोटी a जंगली हरे ( 1940 ) ; Robert McKimson, who created Bugs ' definitive character design ; and Mel Blanc, who originated the voice of Bugs.
The mucous membranes ( or mucosae or mucosas ; singular mucosa ) हैं linings of ज़्यादातर endodermal उत्पत्ति, covered in epithelium, which are involved in absorption and secretion.
They line cavities कि हैं उजागर to the बाह्य पर्यावरण and internal organs.
They are at several places contiguous with स्किन : at the नथुनों, the होठ of the मुँह, the eyelids, the कानों, the genital area, and the anus.
The sticky, thick fluid secreted by the श्लेष्मक झिल्लियों और ग्रंथियों is termed mucus.
The term mucous झिल्ली refers to जहाँ वे हैं मिला in the देह और नहीं प्रत्येक श्लेष्मक membrane secretes mucus.
The glans clitoridis, glans penis ( head of the penis ), along साथ the अंदर of the अग्रत्वचा और the clitoral हुड, हैं श्लेष्मक झिल्लियों.
The urethra is also a श्लेष्मक झिल्ली.
The secreted mucus traps the pathogens in the देह, preventing कोई further activities of diseases.
A master सार्जेंट is the सैन्य रैंक लिये a वरिष्ठ non-commissioned officer in some armed forces.
Cake is a रूप of ब्रैड or bread-like food.
In its modern forms, it is typically a मीठी baked मिठाई.
In its oldest forms, cakes were normally fried breads or cheesecakes, और सामान्यतः था a disk shape.
Determining whether a given food should be वर्गीकृत as ब्रैड, केक, or पेस्ट्री can be मुश्किल.
Modern cake, especially layer cakes, सामान्यतः contain a संयोजन of आटा, शुगर, अंडे, और मक्खन or आयल, साथ कुछ किस्में भी requiring द्रव ( typically मिल्क or जल ) और leavening एजेंटों ( such as yeast or baking powder ).
Flavorful ingredients like fruit purées, nuts, सूखी or candied फल, or extracts हैं प्रायः added, और numerous substitutions लिये the primary ingredients are possible.
Cakes are often filled with fruit preserves or dessert sauces ( like pastry cream ), आइस्ड साथ buttercream or अन्य icings, और सजा साथ marzipan, piped सीमायें or candied fruit.
Cake is often the dessert of choice for meals at ceremonial occasions, विशेषकर विवाह, वर्षगांठ, और जन्मदिन.
There are countless केक व्यंजनों ; कुछ हैं bread-like, कुछ समृद्ध और विस्तृत, and many are centuries old.
Cake making is no longer a complicated procedure ; while at one time considerable labor went into cake making ( particularly the whisking of egg foams ), baking equipment and दिशानिर्देश have महरूम सरलीकृत so कि भी the सबसे amateur कुक may बेक a केक.
Tamara Faye LaValley Bakker Messner ( March 7, 1942 – July 20, 2007 ) was an American ईसाई सिंगर, इंजीलवादी, उद्योगों, लेखक, बात दिखाएँ मेजबान, और टेलीविज़न personality.
She was married इससे 1961 to 1992 to televangelist, और later convicted felon, Jim Bakker.
She co-hosted साथ उसे on the ptl क्लबों ( 1976–1987 ).
She was a participant in the 2004 ऋतु of the वास्तविकता दिखाएँ the surreal जीवन.
Cambria is a गाँव in कोलंबिया काउंटी, विस्कॉन्सिन, United States.
The population was 767 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
It is part of the मैडिसन महानगर सांख्यिकीय Area.
पब्लिक नीति is the principled मार्गदर्शिका to कार्रवाई लिया by the प्रशासनिक executive branches of the state with regard to a class of issues in a manner consistent with law and institutional customs.
In general, the foundation is the pertinent नेशनल और substantial संवैधानिक विधि और implementing legislation such as the US Federal code.
Further substrates include both judicial interpretations और regulations जिससे हैं generally प्राधिकृत by विधान.
Other scholars define it as a प्रणाली of `` पाठ्यक्रम of कार्रवाई, नियामक उपायों, कानून, और funding priorities concerning a given topic promulgated by a governmental entity or its representatives. ''
Public policy is commonly समाविष्ट `` in constitutions, विधान acts, and judicial decisions. ''
In the United States, this concept refers नहीं तभी to the परिणाम of नीतियों, लकिन अधिक broadly to the decision-making and analysis of governmental decisions.
As an academic अनुशासन, पब्लिक नीति is पढ़ाई by professors और students at public policy schools of major universities throughout the country.
The U.S. पेशेवर संघ of पब्लिक नीति practitioners, शोधकर्ताओं, scholars, and students is the Association for Public Policy Analysis and Management.
Digestion is the mechanical और रासायनिक विश्लेषण of खाना into छोटी components that are more easily absorbed into a blood stream, for instance.
Digestion is a form of catabolism : a विश्लेषण of विशाल food molecules to smaller ones.
When food enters the मुँह, पाचन of the खाना starts by the कार्रवाई of mastication, a form of mechanical digestion, and the wetting contact of saliva.
Saliva, a liquid secreted by the salivary ग्रंथियों, contains salivary amylase, an एंजाइम जिससे starts the पाचन of मंड in the food.
After undergoing mastication और मंड पाचन, the food will be in the form of a small, round slurry mass called a bolus.
It will then travel down the esophagus and into the stomach by the कार्रवाई of peristalsis.
Gastric juice in the stomach starts प्रोटीन पाचन.
Gastric juice mainly contains हाइड्रोक्लोरिक acid and pepsin.
As ये दो रसायन may क्षति the पेट wall, mucus is secreted by the stomach, providing a slimy layer that acts as a shield against the damaging effects of the chemicals.
At the same time protein पाचन is occurring, mechanical mixing occurs by peristalsis, जिससे are waves of muscular contractions that move along the stomach wall.
This allows the mass of खाना to further मिक्सर साथ the digestive enzymes.
After some time ( typically an घंटा or दो in इंसानो, 4–6 घंटों in कुत्तो, somewhat shorter अवधि in हाउस बिल्लियों ), the resulting thick liquid is called chyme.
When the pyloric sphincter valve opens, chyme enters the duodenum जहाँ it mixes साथ digestive enzymes from the pancreas, and then passes through the small intestine, in which digestion continues.
When the chyme is fully पचता, it is अवशोषित into the blood.
95 % of अवशोषण of nutrients occurs in the small intestine.
Water and minerals are reabsorbed back into the रक्त in the कोलन ( विशाल आंत ) जहाँ the ph is slightly acidic about 5.6 ~ 6.9.
Some vitamins, such as biotin and vitamin K ( K2MK7 ) produced by जीवाणु in the कोलन हैं भी अवशोषित into the रक्त in the कोलन.
Waste सामग्री is eliminated इससे the rectum during defecation.
Henry VIII ( 28 June 1491 – 28 जनवरी 1547 ) थी किंग of इंग्लैण्ड इससे 21 अप्रैल 1509 जबतक उसके मौत.
He was रब, और बाद किंग, of आयरलैंड, as खूब as continuing the नाममात्र claim by the English monarchs to the Kingdom of France.
Henry was the second monarch of the ट्यूडर राजवंश, succeeding his father, Henry VII.
Besides his six marriages, Henry VIII is known for his role in the separation of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड इससे the रोमन कैथोलिक Church.
Henry 's struggles with Rome led to the separation of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड इससे papal प्राधिकार, the विच्छेद of the monasteries, and his own establishment as the Supreme Head of the Church of England.
Yet he remained a believer in core Catholic theological शिक्षाओं, भी बाद उसके excommunication इससे the Roman Catholic Church.
Henry oversaw the विधिक संघ of इंग्लैण्ड और वेल्स साथ the Laws in Wales Acts 1535 and 1542.
In 1513, the new king allied with the पावन रोमन सम्राट, maximillian i, और invaded फ़्रांस in 1513 साथ a विशाल, well-equipped फौज, but achieved little at a considerable financial cost.
Maximillian, for his part, used the English invasion to his own ends, and this prejudiced इंग्लैण्ड 's क्षमता to शिकस्त the फ्रेंच.
This foray होता prove the प्रारंभ of an obsession for Henry, who invaded again in 1544.
This time, Henry 's शक्तियां captured the महत्वपूर्ण नगर of boulogne, लकिन again the पावन रोमन सम्राट, चार्ल्स v, समर्थित Henry only as long as he needed to and England, strained by the enormous cost of the war, ransomed the city back for peace.
His contemporaries considered हेनरी in उसके प्रधान to be an आकर्षक, शिक्षित और संपन्नता किंग, और he रै महरूम वर्णित as `` one of the most charismatic rulers to sit on the English throne ''.
Besides ruling with absolute शक्ति, he भी सगाई खुद as an author and composer.
His desire to provide England with a male heir – which stemmed partly from personal vanity and partly because he believed a बेटी होता be असमर्थ to consolidate the ट्यूडर राजवंश और the नाजुक सलाम कि existed following the युद्धों of the गुलाब – led to the दो बाते लिये जिससे हेनरी is most remembered : his six marriages and the English Reformation.
Henry became रुग्ण मोटे और उसके स्वास्थ्य suffered, contributing to his death in 1547.
he is अक्सर characterised in उसके बाद जीवन as a lustful, egotistical, harsh, and insecure king.
Bongos ( स्पेनी : bongó ) are an Afro-Cuban percussion instrument.
The ड्रम हैं of अलग आकार : the larger ढोल is पुकारा in स्पेनी the hembra ( female ) and the smaller the macho ( male ).
They are membranophones, or यंत्र कि बनाएँ ध्वनि by a स्पंदन of a stretched membrane.
अलग धार्मिक समूह शामिल अलग किताबे in उनके Biblical canons, in varying orders, and sometimes divide or combine books, or incorporate additional material into canonical books.
Christian Bibles range from the sixty-six books of the Protestant canon to the eighty-one किताबे of the ethiopian परंपरागत tewahedo गिरिजाघर canon.
The Hebrew Bible, or Tanakh, contains twenty-four books divided into three parts ; the five books of the तोरा ( `` शिक्षण '' or `` विधि '' ), the nevi'im ( `` नबियों '' ), और the ketuvim ( `` कृतियाँ '' ).
The first part of Christian Bibles is the Old Testament, which contains, at minimum, the twenty-four books of the Hebrew बाइबल विभाजित into thirty-nine किताबे और ordered differently इससे the यहूदी बाइबल.
The Catholic गिरिजाघर और पूर्वी ईसाई चर्च भी थाम निश्चित deuterocanonical किताबे and passages to be part of the Old Testament canon.
The second part is the New Testament, containing twenty-seven books ; the चार canonical gospels, अधिनियमों of the रसूलों, twenty-one epistles or अक्षर and the Book of Revelation.
The Eastern Orthodox, Oriental Orthodox and Eastern Catholic चर्च may have नाबालिग मतभेद in उनके सूचियाँ of स्वीकृत books.
The list given here for these churches is the सबसे समावेशी : if at तनिक एक पूर्वी गिरिजाघर स्वीकृत the book it is included here.
The national flag of the United States of America, often simply referred to as the American flag, consists of तेरह बराबर आड़ा धारियाँ of रेड ( शीर्ष और नीचे ) प्रत्यावर्ती साथ श्वेत, साथ a ब्लू आयताकार in the कैण्टन ( referred to specifically as the `` संघ '' ) bearing fifty small, white, five-pointed stars arranged in nine offset horizontal rows of six stars ( top and bottom ) alternating with rows of five stars.
The 50 stars on the flag represent the 50 states of the United States of America and the 13 stripes represent the तेरह अंग्रेजों colonies कि घोषित स्वतंत्रता इससे the Kingdom of Great Britain and became the first states in the Union.
Nicknames for the flag include the `` सितारों और धारियाँ '', `` बूढ़ा महिमा ``, और `` the star-spangled ध्वज. ''
Dred Scott v. Sandford,, भी ज्ञात as the dred स्कॉट निर्णय, थी a लैंडमार्क निर्णय by the U.S. Supreme Court.
It बना दो प्रमुख rulings.
The first ruling was that african-americans यहूद नहीं नागरिकों, और इसलिए था no standing to sue in federal court.
The second ruling was that the federal government had no power to विनियमित गुलामी in कोई territory acquired subsequent to the सृष्टि of the संयुक्त राज्य.
Given the first ruling, most scholars and many समकालीन राजनैतिक आंकड़े ( सहित the नेतृत्व of the then-new रिपब्लिकन Party ) considered that the second ruling was not binding precedent, but mere dictum.
The युक्तिसंगत of the परम् अदालत regarding the jurisdictional सत्ताधारी implied कि लोगों of अफ़्रीकी descent ( both slave and free ) were not protected by the Constitution and were not U.S. citizens.
Since passage of the 14th Amendment to the U.S. Constitution, both rulings are superseded और no longer मान्य यही.
Nonetheless, the case retains historical significance as it is widely regarded as the worst निर्णय कभी बना by the परम् अदालत.
The opinion of the अदालत, लिखा by मुख्य इंसाफ रोजर B. taney, stirred debate.
The decision was 7–2, and every इंसाफ besides taney लिखा a पृथक concurrence or dissent.
For the first time since Marbury v. Madison, the अदालत आयोजित an अधिनियम of कॉंग्रेस to be असंवैधानिक.
Dred Scott, an African-American slave, had पूछा a संयुक्त राज्य सर्किट अदालत to पुरस्कार उसे उसके स्वतंत्रता क्युकी he और उसके निपुण था resided in a राज्य ( इलिनोइस ) और a territory ( Wisconsin Territory ) where slavery had been banned.
Chief Justice Roger Taney, writing for the court, held that Scott, as a person of African ancestry, was नहीं a नागरिक of the संयुक्त राज्य और इसलिए था no सही to sue in federal court.
This holding was contrary to the practice of numerous states at the time, particularly Free राज्य, जहाँ फ़्री अश्वेतों किया in फैक्ट आनंद the अधिकारों of नागरिकों, ऐसे as the सही to vote और थाम पब्लिक दफ्तर.
In what is sometimes considered mere obiter dictum, the Court गई on to थाम कि कॉंग्रेस था no प्राधिकार to prohibit गुलामी in संघीय territories क्युकी स्लेव हैं निजी प्रॉपर्टी और the Fifth Amendment to the Constitution protects property owners against deprivation of their property without due process of law.
In reaching this decision, Taney had hoped to settle the growing विवाद surrounding गुलामी in the संयुक्त राज्य, लकिन it था the विपरीत प्रभाव.
The decision was fiercely debated आरपार the देश, as शायद बेहतरीन सरंचनाओं by the lincoln–douglas debates of 1858.
Abraham Lincoln, the second-ever Republican nominee लिये अध्यक्ष, थी समर्थ to जीत the अध्यक्षीय चुनाव in 1860 ; the stopping of the further expansion of slavery was a key Republican party plank.
the निर्णय निभाई an महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in the समय of राज्य secession and the Civil War, although it is extreme to say the decision `` caused '' the war.
The decision is acknowledged for the influential role it played in altering the national political landscape : it is credited साथ शुभारंभ अब्राहम lincoln’s नेशनल राजनैतिक करियर और ultimately allowing लिये उसके चुनाव.
Although the Supreme Court has never explicitly overruled the Dred Scott case, the Court stated in the Slaughter-House Cases that at least एक भाग of it था already महरूम overruled by the fourteenth amendment in 1868, जिससे begins by stating, `` सब व्यक्तियों born or देशीयकृत in the संयुक्त राज्य, और विषय to the jurisdiction thereof, are citizens of the United States and of the State wherein they reside. ''
To which the अदालत नोटd:
The first observation we have to make on this clause is, that it puts at rest both the questions जिससे we stated to have महरूम the विषय of मतभेद of opinion.
It declares कि व्यक्तियों may be नागरिकों of the संयुक्त राज्य बगैर लिहाज़ to उनके नागरिकता of a particular राज्य, और it overturns the Dred Scott decision by making all persons born within the United States and subject to its jurisdiction citizens of the United States.
There हैं दर्जनों of पड़ोस in Columbus, Ohio.
Some are hard to define, as they encompass large areas developed at different times—often साथ sub-neighborhoods भीतर उन्हें.
Borders can भी बदलें आधारित on लोकप्रिय समझना of the क्षेत्रफल, as well as the whims of the residents.

excerpts और किनारा सूचना are drawn directly from the main articles.
A biologist is a वैज्ञानिक जो अध्ययन living organisms and their relationship to their environment.
biologists शामिल in मौलिक शोध attempt to discover underlying mechanisms that govern how organisms work.
Biologists involved in applied research attempt to develop or improve चिकित्सा, औद्योगिक or agricultural processes.
Martinus विलेम beijerinck, a वनस्पतिशास्त्री and microbiologist
Base कूद इससे a चट्टान in a wingsuit.
BASE jumping, also sometimes written as b.a.s.e. कूद, is an कार्यकलाप जहाँ भागीदार jump from fixed objects and use a parachute to break their fall.
`` BASE '' is an एक्रोनिम कि स्टैंड लिये चार श्रेणी of फिक्स्ड वस्तुएँ इससे जिससे एक can जम्प : इमारतें, antennas, spans ( bridges ), and earth ( cliffs ).
The British Shorthair is a domesticated बिल्ली जिनकी सुविधाएँ make it a popular breed in cat shows.
It has been the most popular breed of cat पंजीकृत by the uk 's शासी परिषद of the बिल्ली फैंसी ( gccf ) since 2001, when it overtook the Persian breed.
The USA Basketball Men 's Senior National Team, commonly known as the United राज्य मेन 's नेशनल बास्केट टोली, represents the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका in अंतरराष्ट्रीय मेन 's basketball.
The USA is the most successful team in international प्रतियोगिता, जीतना medals in सब सत्रह ओलम्पिक tournaments it रै डाला, coming away with fourteen golds.
Two of its gold medal-winning squads were inducted to the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame as teams in August 2010—the 1960 team, which featured six Hall of famers ( 4 खिलाड़ी, 2 कोच ), और the 1992 `` सपना Team '', featuring 14 Hall of Famers ( 11 players, 3 coaches ).
The United राज्य is फिलहाल क्रमित पहला in the FIBA World Rankings.
Traditionally रचित of amateur खिलाड़ी, a 1989 नियम बदलें by fiba अनुमत USA Basketball to field teams with professional players.
The first such टोली, ज्ञात as the `` सपना टोली '', जीती the सुनहरा पदक at the 1992 गर्मियाँ ओलंपिक in बार्सिलोना, Spain, playing in the final against Croatia.
With the introduction of पेशेवर, the टोली थी समर्थ to चिंगारी a दूसरी run of dominance after capturing only a bronze medal in 1988.
A team of पेशेवर खिलाड़ी competed at the 1994 fiba संसार चैंपियनशिप, finishing first.
In 1996, 2000, 2008, और 2012 the यूएसए again captured gold medals.
Facing increased प्रतियोगिता, the यूएसए विफल to जीत a पदक at the 2002 FIBA World Championship, finishing sixth.
The 2004 Summer Olympic team lost three games on its way to a bronze medal, a record that represented अधिक नुकसान in a सिंगल साल than the देश 's ओलम्पिक टीमों था suffered in सब पिछला olympiads combined.
Determined to put an end to these असफलताओं, यूएसए बास्केट initiated a long-term प्रोजेक्ट aimed at creating better, more cohesive teams.
The USA won its first seven games at the 2006 FIBA World Championship in जापानी पहले खोने विरूद्ध यूनानियों in the semi-finals, समाप्ति the प्रतियोगिता साथ the कांस्य medal.
The USA won gold two years later, though, at the 2008 गर्मियाँ ओलंपिक साथ a dominant performance.
This success was followed up at the 2010 FIBA World Championship, where despite fielding a roster featuring no players from the 2008 ओलम्पिक टोली, the यूएसए किया नहीं खोना a सिंगल खेल en रूट to defeating host Turkey for the gold medal.
The USA continued this streak of दबदबा by going अपराजित और capturing gold once more at the 2012 Summer Olympics.

Joe theismann 's सुपर कटोरी रिंग ( right )
The Super Bowl ring is an पुरस्कार in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग दिए to the विजेता of the लीग 's सालाना World Championship game, the Super Bowl.
चूंकि तभी एक विंस लोम्बार्डी ट्रॉफी is awarded to the टोली ( स्वामित्व ) itself, the Super Bowl ring offers a collectible memento for the actual players and team members to keep for themselves to symbolize the victory.
