to दृश्य लेबल्स.
the डायन 's उंगली in the Carlsbad Caverns
A stalagmite ( or ; from the Greek σταλαγμίτης - stalagmitês, इससे σταλαγμίας - stalagmias, `` छोड़ने, trickling '' ) is a प्रकार of speleothem कि उदय इससे the मंजिल of a चूना गुफा due to the टपकता of mineralized solutions and the deposition of calcium carbonate.
This stalagmite formation occurs तभी अंतर्गत निश्चित ph conditions within the underground cavern.
The corresponding formation on the छत of a गुफा is ज्ञात as a stalactite.
If ये formations grow साथ, the result is known as a column.
The Hall of दिग्गज in the carlsbad caverns
Stalagmites should normally not be touched, since the rock buildup is formed by minerals precipitating out of the water solution onto the old surface ; skin oils can alter the सतह जहाँ the खनिज जल होगा चिपकी, यूँ affecting the विकास of the formation.
Oils and dirt from human contact can also stain the formation and बदलें इसके रंग permanently.
Similar structures can also form in lava tubes, संबद्ध साथ कुछ प्रकार of lavacicles, हालांकि the यांत्रिकी of formation is very different.
Stalactites and stalagmites can also form on concrete ceilings and floors, हालांकि वे रूप much अधिक rapidly वहीँ than in the natural cave environment.
The largest stalagmite in the संसार is ऊँची और is स्तिथ in the गुफा of Cueva Martin Infierno, Cuba.
In the Zagros Mountains of south Iran, approximately from the ancient city of Bishapur, in the shapur गुफा on the चौथी of पाँच बरामदा स्टैंड the 3rd सदी CE statue of Shapur I, second ruler of the Sassanid Empire.
The statue, carved इससे एक stalagmite, is nearly high.
How I मिले अपना माँ is an अमरीकी sitcom कि premiered on CBS on September 19, 2005.
the दिखाएँ थी निर्मित by क्रेग Thomas and Carter Bays.
How I Met Your Mother is framed by the year 2030, when Ted Mosby ( voiced by Bob Saget ) gathers his daughter ( lyndsy fonseca ) और बेटे ( दाउद henrie ) to बताना उन्हें the स्टोरी of कैसा he मिले उनके माँ.
We flashback to where it begins in 2005 with Ted Mosby ( Josh Radnor ) as a single, 27-year-old वास्तु जीना साथ उसके दो बेहतरीन मित्रों इससे wesleyan विश्वविद्यालयों, मार्शल eriksen ( जेसन सेगल ), a विधि छात्र, और लिली एल्ड्रिन ( alyson हनिंगन ), a kindergarten teacher, who have been dating for almost nine years when Marshall proposes.
Their सगाई कल्याणकारी टेड to सोचो परिचय ढूंढना उसके अपना आत्मा mate, much to the disgust of उसके dost बार्नी Stinson ( Neil Patrick Harris ), a womanizer with an unnamed corporate job.
And thus, Ted begins his ढूंढें लिये उसके पूर्ण mate, और meets रोबिन scherbatsky ( कोबी स्मल्डर्स ), जिसको he also befriends.
The 100th episode of How I Met Your माँ aired on जनवरी 11, 2010.
On December 21, 2012, the श्रेणी was renewed for a ninth season.
On January 30, 2013, it थी घोषित कि ऋतु 9 होगा be इसके final season.
Gringo (,, ) is a slang स्पेनी और पुर्तगाली शब्द प्रयुक्त in ibero-america, to denote foreigners, often from the United States.
The term can be applied to किसी जो is दरअसल a foreigner, or it can denote a दमदार संघ or assimilation into foreign ( particularly US ) society and culture.
in स्पेनी it करता नहीं have a negative connotation.
रोजर axtell, a सफर तहज़ीब विशेषज्ञ, टीप कि `` [ t ] he word gringo is not necessarily a bad word.
It is slang but is अपमानजनक तभी in इसके उपयोग और context. ''
The word was used in Spain long before it crossed the अटलांटिक to denote विदेशी, non-native अध्यक्षों of Spanish.
The great white shark, carcharodon carcharias, भी ज्ञात as the ग्रेट श्वेत, श्वेत सूचक, श्वेत शार्क, or श्वेत मौत, is a species of large lamniform shark which can be found in the coastal surface waters of all the major oceans.
The great white shark is mainly known for its size, with the largest individuals known to have approached or exceeded in लंबाई, और in वज़न.
This shark पहुँच इसके परिपक्वता around 15 सालो of आयु और can have a life span of over 30 years.
The ग्रेट श्वेत शार्क is arguably the संसार 's largest ज्ञात extant macropredatory fish, and is one of the primary predators of marine mammals.
It is also ज्ञात to शिकार upon a किस्में of other marine animals, including fish and seabirds.
It is the only known surviving species of its genus carcharodon, और is क्रमित पहला in having the most attacks on humans.
The IUCN list the great श्वेत शार्क as a vulnerable प्रजाति, while it is included in Appendix II of CITES.
The bestselling novel जबड़े by पीटर benchley और the subsequent ब्लॉकबस्टर फिल्मी by स्टीवन स्पिलबर्ग depicted the great white shark as a `` ferocious man eater ``.
In वास्तविकता, इंसानो हैं नहीं the पसन्दीदा शिकार of the great white shark.
the संयुक्त राज्य हथियारबंद शक्तियां हैं the सैन्य forces of the United States of America.
They consist of the फौज, नेवी, समुद्री corps, Air Force, and Coast Guard.
The U.S. has a strong tradition of civilian कंट्रोल of the सैन्य.
The President is the military 's overall head, and helps form सैन्य नीति साथ the u.S. विभाग of रक्षा ( dod ), a संघीय कार्यपालिका विभाग, एक्टिंग as the प्रिंसिपल organ by which military policy is carried out.
The DoD is headed by the सचिव of रक्षा, who is a civilian and Cabinet member.
The Defense Secretary is दूसरी in the सैन्य 's कड़ी of कमांड, बस नीचे the अध्यक्ष, and serves as the principal assistant to the President in all DoD-related matters.
To निर्देशांक सैन्य कार्रवाई साथ कूटनीति, the अध्यक्ष रै an advisory National Security Council headed by a National Security Advisor.
Both the President and Secretary of Defense are advised by a seven-member संयुक्त chiefs of स्टाफ, जिससे शामिल the सिर of प्रत्येक of the रक्षा विभाग 's सेवा शाखाओं as well as the chief of the National Guard Bureau.
Leadership is provided by the Chairman of the संयुक्त chiefs of स्टाफ और the वाइस अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त Chiefs of Staff.
The Commandant of the Coast गार्ड is नहीं a सदस्य of the Joint Chiefs of Staff.
All of the branches work together during operations and joint missions, under the एकीकृत combatant कमांड, अंतर्गत the प्राधिकार of the सचिव of रक्षा with the exception of the Coast Guard.
The Coast Guard falls under the administration of the विभाग of मातृभूमि सुरक्षा और receives इसके operational orders from the Secretary of Homeland Security.
The coast गार्ड may be transferred to the विभाग of the Navy by the President or Congress during a time of war.
All five armed services are among the seven uniformed services of the United States ; the others are the U.S. Public Health Service commissioned corps और the नेशनल oceanic और वायुमंडलीय प्रशासन Commissioned Corps.
इससे the समय of इसके inception, the सैन्य निभाई a निर्णायक भूमिका in the history of the United States.
A sense of national unity and identity was forged as a परिणाम of विजय in the पहला barbary युद्ध और the Second Barbary War.
Even so, the Founders were suspicious of a permanent military force and not until the outbreak of संसार युद्ध ii किया a विशाल खड़ा फौज become officially established.
The National Security Act of 1947, adopted following World War II and during the Cold War 's onset, created the आधुनिक u.S. सैन्य फ्रेमवर्क ; the अधिनियम मिलाया previously cabinet-level विभाग of युद्ध और the विभाग of the नेवी into the नेशनल सैन्य Establishment ( renamed the Department of Defense in 1949 ), headed by the Secretary of Defense ; and created the Department of the Air Force and National Security Council.
The U.S. सैन्य is एक of the largest militaries in terms of number of personnel.
It draws इसके जनशक्ति इससे a विशाल पूल of सशुल्क स्वयंसेवक ; हालांकि conscription रै महरूम प्रयुक्त in the past in various times of both war and peace, it has not been used since 1972.
As of 2013, the U.S. spends परिचय $ 554.2 अरब annually to निधि इसके सैन्य शक्तियां, और appropriates लगभग $ 88.5 अरब to निधि विदेशी Contingency Operations.
Put together, the U.S. constitutes roughly 43 प्रतिशत of the संसार 's military expenditures.
The U.S. Armed Forces as a whole possess large quantities of advanced and शक्तिशाली उपकरण, साथ साथ फैली अवस्थिति of शक्तियां around the संसार, giving उन्हें significant capabilities in both defense and power projection.
Freedom of speech is the political right to communicate एक 's राय और विचार using एक 's देह और प्रॉपर्टी to anyone जो is willing to receive them.
The term freedom of expression is sometimes used synonymously, लकिन शामिल कोई अधिनियम of seeking, receiving and imparting information or ideas, regardless of the medium used.
In practice, the right to freedom of speech is not absolute in any country and the right is commonly subject to limitations, as with libel, slander, obscenity, sedition ( सहित, लिये उदाहरण inciting जातीय द्वेष ), कापीराइट उल्लंघन, रहस्योद्घाटन of सूचना कि is वर्गीकृत or वरना.
The right to freedom of expression is पहचाना as a इंसान सही अंतर्गत आलेख 19 of the सार्वभौमिक घोषणा of इंसान अधिकारों और पहचाना in अंतरराष्ट्रीय इंसान अधिकारों law in the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights ( ICCPR ).
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to hold opinions without interference '' and `` everyone shall have the right to freedom of expression ; this right shall include freedom to seek, receive and impart information and ideas of सब kinds, regardless of frontiers, either orally, in लिखने or in छपाई, in the रूप of art, or through any other media of his choice ''.
Article 19 goes on to say that the exercise of these rights carries `` special duties and responsibilities `` and may `` therefore be subject to certain restrictions '' when जरुरी `` [ f ] or आदर of the अधिकारों or प्रतिष्ठा of अन्य '' or `` [ f ] or the सुरक्षा of नेशनल सुरक्षा or of पब्लिक अनुक्रम ( अनुक्रम पब्लिक ), or of पब्लिक health or morals ''.
Freedom of वाक may be legally curtailed in कुछ धार्मिक विधिक प्रणालियों और in धर्मनिरपेक्ष jurisdictions जहाँ it is मिला to कारण धार्मिक offense, such as the British Racial and Religious Hatred Act 2006.
The Big Bang सिद्धान्त लोगो.
The Big Bang Theory is an अमरीकी कॉमेडी टेलीविज़न श्रेणी निर्मित और कार्यपालिका produced by Chuck Lorre and Bill Prady.
Like the name of the series itself, साथ the एक्सेप्शन of the पहला episode— '' पायलट '' —episode शीर्षक of the बिग बंग सिद्धान्त सदा प्रारंभ साथ `` The '' and resemble the name of a scientific principle, theory or experiment, whimsically referencing a plot point or quirk.
, 133 एपीसोड have aired.
the बिग बंग सिद्धान्त has been renewed for a seventh season.
Dwight David `` Ike '' Eisenhower ( सुनाया, ; अक्तूबर 14, 1890 – कूच 28, 1969 ) थी the 34th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य इससे 1953 जबतक 1961.
He had previously been a five-star general in the United States Army during World War II and served as Supreme Commander of the अलाइड शक्तियां in यूरोपीय ; he था जिम्मेदारी लिये नियोजन और supervising the आक्रमण of उत्तर अफ़्रीकी in आपरेशन मशाल in 1942–43 and the successful invasion of France and Germany in 1944–45 from the Western Front.
In 1951, he became the first परम् कमांडर of नाटो.
Eisenhower was of Pennsylvania Dutch ancestry and was reared in a large family in कान्सास by अभिभावक साथ a मजबूत कार्य ethic और धार्मिक background.
As one of six sons, he was conditioned by a प्रतिस्पर्धी माहौल जिससे instilled self-reliance.
He attended and graduated from West पाइंट और बाद शादीशुदा और था two sons.
After World युद्ध ii, आइज़नहावर परोसा as फौज मुख्य of स्टाफ अंतर्गत अध्यक्ष Harry S. Truman, then assumed the post of President at Columbia University.
Eisenhower entered the 1952 presidential race as a Republican to काउंटर the non-interventionism of सीनेटर रॉबर्ट A. taft और to crusade विरूद्ध `` Communism, Korea and corruption ''.
He won by a भूस्खलन, defeating डेमोक्रेट adlai stevenson and ending two decades of the New Deal Coalition.
In the first year of his प्रेसिडेंसी, आइज़नहावर अपदस्थ the नेता of इरान in the 1953 Iranian coup d'état and used nuclear threats to conclude the Korean War with China.
His New Look policy of nuclear deterrence gave priority to inexpensive nuclear weapons while reducing the funding लिये conventional सैन्य शक्तियां ; the लक्ष्य थी to रखना दबाव on the सोवियत संघ and reduce federal deficits.
In 1954, Eisenhower first articulated the domino theory in his वर्णन of the threat प्रस्तुत by the spread of communism.
The Congress agreed to his request in 1955 for the Formosa रेज़ोल्यूशन, जिससे सक्रिय उसे to prevent चाइनीज कम्युनिस्ट आक्रामकता विरूद्ध चाइनीज nationalists and established the U.S. policy of defending Taiwan.
When the Soviets launched sputnik in 1957, he था to खेल catch-up in the space race.
Eisenhower forced Israel, the UK, and France to end उनके आक्रमण of मिश्र दौरान the स्वेज संकट of 1956.
In 1958, he sent 15,000 US troops to Lebanon to prevent the pro-western सरकारी इससे गिरना to a Nasser -inspired revolution.
Near the end of his term, his efforts to set up a समिट बैठक साथ the soviets collapsed क्युकी of the U-2 incident.
On the domestic सामने, he covertly opposed जोसेफ मैकार्थी और contributed to the समाप्त of mccarthyism by खुलकर invoking the modern expanded version of executive privilege.
He वरना बाएँ सबसे राजनैतिक कार्यकलाप to his Vice President, Richard Nixon.
He थी a मॉडरेट रूढ़िवादी जो जारी New Deal agencies and expanded Social Security.
Among his enduring नवप्रवर्तनों, he शुभारम्भ the अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग प्रणाली ; the रक्षा उन्नत शोध प्रोजेक्ट एजेंसी ( darpa ), जिससे led to the अंतरजाल, among अनेक invaluable आउटपुट ; the नेशनल aeronautics और स्पेस प्रशासन ( नासा ), ड्राइविंग peaceful discovery in space ; the establishment of strong science education via the National Defense Education Act ; and encouraging peaceful use of nuclear power via amendments to the Atomic Energy Act.
In social policy, he sent federal troops to छोटी चट्टान, अरकंसास, लिये the पहला समय चूंकि पुनर्निर्माण to enforce संघीय अदालत आदेश to desegregate public schools.
He also signed civil rights विधान in 1957 और 1960 to protect the right to vote.
He implemented desegregation of the armed शक्तियां in दो सालो और बना पाँच नियुक्ति to the Supreme Court.
He was the first term-limited अध्यक्ष in accordance साथ the 22nd Amendment.
Eisenhower 's two terms were peaceful ones for the सबसे भाग और देखी considerable आर्थिक समृद्धि मगर लिये a शार्प मंदी in 1958–59.
आइज़नहावर is प्रायः क्रमित अत्यधिक among the U.S. Presidents.
Air Force One is the official air traffic कंट्रोल कॉल चिह्न of a संयुक्त राज्य एयर फ़ोर्स वायुयान carrying the President of the United States.
In common parlance the term refers to those Air Force aircraft specifically designed, निर्मित, और प्रयुक्त लिये the purpose of transporting the president.
The अध्यक्षीय वायुयान is a prominent symbol of the American presidency and its power.
The विचार of designating विशिष्ट सैन्य वायुयान to हस्तांतरण the अध्यक्ष arose in 1943, जब officials of the संयुक्त राज्य फौज एयर शक्तियां – the predecessor to the U.S. Air Force – became concerned with relying on commercial airlines to transport the President.
A C-87 Liberator एक्स्प्रेस थी reconfigured लिये उपयोग as a अध्यक्षीय हस्तांतरण ; however, it was rejected by the Secret Service amid concerns over the aircraft 's safety record.
A C-54 skymaster थी तब परिवर्तित लिये अध्यक्षीय उपयोग ; इस aircraft, dubbed the Sacred Cow, transported President Franklin D. Roosevelt to the Yalta Conference in February 1945, and was subsequently used for another two years by President Harry S. Truman.
The `` Air Force One '' call sign was created बाद a 1953 घटना दौरान जिससे a उड़ान carrying अध्यक्ष ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर डाला the वही airspace as a commercial airline flight using the same call sign.
Several aircraft have been used as Air Force One since the creation of the presidential fleet, including two Boeing 707s introduced in the 1960s and 1970s, क्रमशः ; चूंकि 1990, the अध्यक्षीय बेड़े रै consisted of दो बोइंग vc-25as – specifically विन्यस्त, अत्यधिक customized बोइंग 747-200b श्रेणी aircraft.
the एयर फ़ोर्स is looking into replacing the दो vc-25 वायुयान with three replacement aircraft beginning in 2017.
A wedding anniversary is the वर्षगांठ of the date a wedding took place.
परंपरागत names मौजूद लिये सबसे of उन्हें : लिये उदाहरण, 50 सालो of marriage is called a `` golden wedding anniversary '' or simply a `` golden anniversary ''.
A scanner साथ duplexing स्वचालित Document Feeder.
In multifunction or all-in-one printers, fax machines, photocopiers and scanners, an automatic document feeder or adf is a विशेषता जिससे takes अनेक पृष्ठों और फ़ीड्स the पेपर एक पेज at a समय into a स्कैनर or कॉपियर, allowing the उपयोक्ता to स्कैन, और thereby नक़ल, छपाई, or fax, multiple-page documents without having to manually replace each page.
Most copiers allow स्कैनिंग on the फ्लैटबेड or platen ( the `` glass '' ) or through a document feeder.
The vast majority of fax machines have an adf, allowing the unattended sending of multi-page faxes.
Due to the ubiquity of ADF in fax machines, some fax machine स्वामी उपयोग the फैक्स यंत्र as a स्कैनर, faxing multi-page दस्तावेज़ to themselves.
Document feeders are described by speed, in pages per minute or ppm, and क्षमता, प्रायः in a दायरा इससे 10 चादरें to 200.
There are two kinds of document feeders capable of two-sided ( duplex ) scanning : a reversing automatic document फीडर or radf scans एक पक्ष of a पेज, तब flips it और scans the अन्य पक्ष.
A duplexing स्वचालित दस्तावेज़ फीडर or dadf scans both sides in one pass.
the लाभ of the dadf is तेज़ speed for two-sided originals.
RADFs and DADFs are rated in बिंब प्रति मिनट ( ipm ), the number of sides they can scan each minute.
Fair Park is a recreational और शैक्षणिक जटिल located in Dallas, Texas ( USA ).
The जटिल is पंजीकृत as a डलास लैंडमार्क, नेशनल ऐतिहासिक लैंडमार्क and is home to nine museums, six performance facilities, a lagoon, and the largest Ferris wheel in North America.
अनेक of the इमारतें on the जटिल यहूद constructed लिये the टेक्सास centennial Exposition in 1936 which drew over six million visitors.
Most of the buildings built for the exposition स्टिल जीवित और it is पहचाना as a significant उदाहरण of Art Deco architecture.
Fair पार्क रै महरूम designated a ग्रेट प्लेस in America by the American Planning Association.
The American नियोजन संघ ( apa ) “is an स्वतंत्र, not-for-profit शैक्षणिक organization that provides leadership in the development of vital communities.”
The Great Places in American program helps to celebrate क्षेत्रों साथ “exemplary अक्षर, विशेषता, और planning.”
Being designated as a Great प्लेस in अमेरिका, मेला पार्क थी एक of only ten cities chosen in 2011.
San Jose ( ; Spanish : St. Joseph ) is the third-largest city in कैलिफ़ोर्निया, the tenth-largest in the u.S., और the काउंटी सीट of Santa Clara County which is located at the southern end of San Francisco Bay.
San Jose is the largest city within Silicon Valley, which is a प्रमुख घटक of the वृहद सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल, a प्रदेश of 8.4 लाख लोगों और the पांचवां largest महानगर क्षेत्रफल ( CSA ) in the United States.
It is the largest नगर in उत्तरी कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
San Jose was founded on November 29, 1777, as El Pueblo de San José de Guadalupe, the first civilian कस्बा in the स्पेनी उपनिवेश of नुएवा कैलिफ़ोर्निया, जिससे बाद became alta कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
The नगर परोसा as a खेती जातियाँ to support Spanish military installations at San Francisco and Monterey.
When California gained statehood in 1850, सैन जोस परोसा as इसके first capital.
बाद अधिक than 150 सालो as a छोटी खेती नगर, सैन जोस और the surrounding सांता क्लारा Valley became the last ( and largest ) contiguous area of undeveloped land surrounding the San Francisco Bay.
San Jose अनुभवी increased माँग लिये आवास इससे सैनिको और veterans returning from World War II.
San Jose then जारी इसके आक्रामक विस्तार during the 1950s and 1960s by annexing more land area.
The rapid growth of the high-technology और इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स उद्योग further त्वरित the परिवर्तन इससे an agricultural बीच, to an urbanized metropolitan area.
By the 1990s, San जोस 's स्थान भीतर the booming लोकल प्रौद्योगिकी industry earned the city its nickname, Capital of Silicon Valley.
San Jose now maintains global city status and is the largest city in the San फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल in शर्तें of जनसांख्यिकी, जमीन क्षेत्रफल, and industrial development.
The U.S. Census Bureau reported the जनसांख्यिकी of the नगर to be 945,942 as of the 2010 Census.
As of April 2013, the अनुमानित जनसांख्यिकी of सैन जोस थी 984,000.
San Jose, along with the Santa Clara Valley, experienced about half a century of spectacular suburban sprawl, साथ विशेषताएँ of तीव्र शहरी समान to the Los Angeles area of Southern California.
The city has taken definite कदम to avoid बनने `` l.A. North ''.
However, the sprawl in सैन जोस is बदतर than in लॉस एंजिल्स by उपायों ऐसे as जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व and public transit safety, investment, and ridership.
Europe depicted by Antwerp cartographer अब्राहम ortelius in 1595
The history of Europe covers the people inhabiting the European continent since it was पहला आबादी in प्रागैतिहासिक टाइम्स to उपस्थित, साथ the पहला होमो sapiens arriving between 45,000 और 25,000 BC.
The earliest settlers to Prehistoric यूरोपीय आए दौरान the paleolithic era.
The arrival of agriculture around 7000 bc ushered in the पाषाणकालीन age.
Neolithic Europe lasted for 4000 years, अतिव्यापी साथ metal-using संस्कृतियों that gradually spread throughout the continent.
Technological advances during the प्रागैतिहासिक आयु tended to arrive इससे the मध्य East, spreading gradually to the northwest.
Some of the best-known सभ्यताओं of प्रागैतिहासिक यूरोपीय यहूद मिनोआई और माइसीनियाई, जिससे flourished during the Bronze Age until they collapsed in a short period of time around 1200 BC.
The period known as classical antiquity began साथ the वृद्धि of the city-states of प्राचीन Greece.
Greek influence पहुँचे इसके zenith अंतर्गत the expansive empire of Alexander the Great, spreading throughout Asia.
Northern and western Europe were वर्चस्व by the la tène संस्कृति, a precursor to the Celts.
Rome, a small city-state traditionally संस्थापित in 753 bc, होता grow to become the रोमन गणतंत्र in 509 bc और होता succeed Greek culture as the dominant Mediterranean civilization.
The events of the rule of जूलियस सीज़र led to reorganization of the Republic into the Roman Empire.
The empire was later divided by the emperor diocletian into the पश्चिमी और पूर्वी empires.
During the later years of the Roman Empire, the Germanic peoples of उत्तरी यूरोपीय grew in शक्ति और दोहराया हमले led to the पतन of the पश्चिमी रोमन साम्राज्य in ad 476, a तिथि जिससे traditionally marks the end of the classical period and the start of the Middle Ages.
During the Middle Ages, the Eastern रोमन साम्राज्य बच, हालांकि आधुनिक इतिहासकारों refer to इस state as the Byzantine Empire.
In Western Europe, Germanic peoples moved into positions of power in the remnants of the पूर्व पश्चिमी रोमन साम्राज्य और स्थापित kingdoms और empires of their own.
Of all of the Germanic peoples, the franks होता वृद्धि to a स्थिति of आधिपत्य over पश्चिमी यूरोपीय, the Frankish Empire reaching its peak under Charlemagne around AD 800.
Francia was divided into several parts ; West Francia would evolve into the किंगडम of फ़्रांस, जबकि ईस्ट francia होता evolve into the Holy Roman Empire, a precursor to modern Germany.
The British isles यहूद the साईट of अनेक large-scale migrations.
Native Celtic peoples had been marginalized during the period of Roman Britain, and when the Romans abandoned the British Isles during the 400s, waves of Germanic Anglo-Saxons migrated to southern ब्रिटेन और स्थापित a श्रेणी of क्षुद्र kingdoms in कया होता आखिरकार develop into the किंगडम of इंग्लैण्ड by ad 927.
During this काल, the किंगडम of कैंडल और किंगडम of हंगेरियाई ( 1000–1945 ) were organized as well.
The Viking Age, a period of migrations of scandinavian peoples, वर्चस्व the काल इससे the late 700s to the middle 1000s.
Chief among the Viking states was the Empire of cnut the ग्रेट, a डैनिश नेता जो होता become king of England, Denmark, and Norway.
The Normans, a Viking people who settled in उत्तरी फ़्रांस और संस्थापित the duchy of normandy, होता have a significant प्रभाव on अनेक भाग of यूरोपीय, इससे the नॉर्मन conquest of England to Southern Italy and Sicily.
Another Scandinavian people, the rus ' लोगों, होता go on to मिला kievan rus ', an early state which was a precursor for the modern country of Russia.
As the Viking Age drew to a close, the period known as the Crusades, a series of religiously-motivated सैन्य रिझाने originally intended to लाओ the levant back into Christian rule, began.
Several जेहादी राज्य यहूद संस्थापित in the eastern Mediterranean.
These were all short-lived.
the crusaders होता have a profound impact on many parts of Europe.
Their Sack of Constantinople in 1204 brought an abrupt समाप्त to the बीज़ान्टिन साम्राज्य.
Extinct dog breeds is a compilation of dog breeds कि have become विलुप्त.
Wii Speak is a माइक्रोफोन accessory लिये निन्टेंडो 's Wii video game console.
Connected to the console via USB, the device can be placed near the वीडियो प्रदर्शक, allowing आवाज़ गपशप to be conducted साथ the entire room.
The यंत्र सुविधाएँ an led to indicate when the microphone is active.
Wii Speak was घोषित at निन्टेंडो 's 2008 E3 media briefing.
It was released separately and bundled साथ एनिमल क्रासिंग : नगर लोक on नवम्बर 16, 2008, in North America, and was released on December 5, 2008, in Europe.
The Wii Speak accessory is succeeded by the अंतःस्थापित माइक्रोफोन on the वी u 's GamePad controller.
Nissan बुद्धिमान Key®
A smart key is an electronic access and प्राधिकरण प्रणाली जिससे is उपलब्धियाँ as an विकल्प or standard in several cars.
it थी पहला विकसित by siemens in the mid-1990s और introduced by mercedes-benz अंतर्गत the नाम `` keyless go '' in 1998 on the W220 S-Class following its design patent filed by Daimler-Benz on May 17, 1997.
univisión ( ) is a spanish-language टेलीविज़न network in the United States.
The संजाल is primarily समर्पित लिये लैटिन अमरीकी families who reside in the United States.
It has the largest audience of Spanish-language television दर्शक in the संसार according to nielsen ratings.
Randy Falco, ( CEO as of जून 29, 2011 ) coo, रै महरूम in चार्ज of the कम्पनी चूंकि the departure of Univision Communications president and CEO Joe Uva in April 2010.
In हाल सालो the संजाल रै पहुँचे पैरिटी साथ the u.S. 's पाँच प्रमुख english-language टेलीविज़न संजाल, और is प्रायः a दमदार पांचवां, outranking The CW, with some fourth-place weekly placings, and as of 2012, even first place rankings for individual programs over all five English networks due to the network 's consistent schedule of new telenovelas all 52 weeks of the year.
Univisión is headquartered in नई यॉर्क, और रै इसके प्रमुख studios, उत्पादन सुविधाएं, and operations in Doral, Florida, a suburb of Miami.
In 2009, another टेलीविज़न स्टुडियो थी घोषित, univision studios, to be built in Doral.
Univision is available on cable and satellite in most of the country, with local stations in over 50 markets with large Hispanic and Latino populations and a national cable network फीड वितरित in बाज़ार बगैर either the उपलब्धता or the माँग लिये a locally-based station.
Most of these stations air full local news and other local programming in addition to network shows, and in प्रमुख बाज़ार ऐसे as लॉस एंजिल्स, नई यॉर्क, और मियामी the लोकल newscasts carried by the संजाल 's owned-and-operated स्टेशन ( O & O ) stations are equally competitive with their English-language counterparts ratings-wise.
Univisión was acquired on March 29, 2007 by a consortium led by Haim Saban 's Saban पूंजी समूह ( जो था previously स्वामित्व the एंटिटी saban entertainment ), tpg पूंजी, l.P., विधाता इक्विटी साझेदार, Madison Dearborn Partners, and Thomas H. Lee Partners for $ 13.7 billion or $ 36.25 per share plus $ 1.4 billion in acquired debt.
The buyout बाएँ the कम्पनी साथ a कर्ज़ स्तर of बारह times its annual cash flow, which was twice the norm in buyouts done over the previous two years.
Artist 's धारणा of a आदिग्रह disk
The formation and of the Solar System is estimated to have begun 4.6 billion years ago साथ the गुरुत्वाकर्षक पतन of a छोटी भाग of a दानव आणविक cloud.
Most of the collapsing द्रव्यमान एकत्रित in the centre, forming the Sun, while the rest flattened into a protoplanetary disk out of which the planets, moons, asteroids, and other small Solar System bodies formed.
This widely accepted model, known as the nebular परिकल्पना, थी पहला विकसित in the 18th सदी by emanuel Swedenborg, Immanuel Kant, and Pierre-Simon Laplace.
Its subsequent development has interwoven a variety of वैज्ञानिक disciplines सहित खगोलशास्त्र, भौतिकी, भूविज्ञान, और planetary science.
Since the भोर of the स्पेस आयु in the 1950s और the डिस्कवरी of extrasolar ग्रह in the 1990s, the model has been both challenged and refined to account for new observations.
The सौर प्रणाली रै विकसित considerably since its initial formation.
Many moons have formed from circling discs of gas and dust around उनके जनक ग्रह, जबकि अन्य moons हैं विचार to have formed independently और बाद महरूम captured by their planets.
Still others, as the धरती 's चंद्रमा, may be the परिणाम of giant collisions.
Collisions between bodies have occurred continually up to the present day और have महरूम सेंट्रल to the एवोल्यूशन of the Solar System.
The positions of the ग्रह प्रायः shifted, and planets have switched places.
This planetary migration is now thought to have been responsible for much of the सौर प्रणाली 's जल्दी एवोल्यूशन.
In roughly 5 billion years, the Sun होगा कूल और विस्तार outward अनेक टाइम्स इसके वर्तमान व्यास ( बनने a रेड दानव ), पहले ढलाई बंद इसके बाहरी परतों as a planetary nebula and leaving behind a stellar remnant known as a white dwarf.
In the far distant future, the gravity of passing stars होगा धीरे reduce the सूर्य 's retinue of ग्रह.
Some planets will be नष्ट, अन्य ejected into interstellar space.
Ultimately, over the कोर्स of tens of अरबों of सालो, it is likely that the Sun will be left with none of the original bodies in orbit around it.
The Trial ( Kafka 's original जर्मनी शीर्षक :, बाद as, और ) is a अनोखा लिखा by फ्रांज काफ्का in 1914 and 1915 but not published until 1925.
One of Kafka 's best-known works, it tells the story of a man arrested and prosecuted by a remote, अभिगम्य प्राधिकार, साथ the प्रकृति of उसके अपराधों नाज़िल to neither उसे nor the reader.
Like Kafka 's other novels, The Trial was never completed, हालांकि it करता शामिल a अध्याय जिससे brings the story to an end.
Because of this there are certain inconsistencies जिससे मौजूद भीतर the अनोखा, ऐसे as disparities in timing in addition to other discontinuities in narration.
After Kafka 's death in 1924 his friend and साहित्यिक executor अधिकतम brod संपादित the टेक्स्ट लिये प्रकाशन by verlag Die Schmiede.
The असली पाण्डुलिपि is आयोजित at the संग्रहालय of आधुनिक साहित्य, Marbach am Neckar, Germany.
In 1999, the book was listed in le mondes 100 किताबे of the सदी और as no. 2 of the Best German Novels of the Twentieth Century.
Lisa Anne Loeb ( born कूच 11, 1968 ) is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter and actress.
She launched her career in 1994 साथ the सोंग, `` रहो ( i छूटी तुम ) ``, जिससे was included in the film Reality Bites.
She was the पहला कलाकार to have a क्रमांक एक सिंगल in the संयुक्त States while not signed to a recording contract.
Her five studio CDs include her major label debut, the gold-selling Tails and इसके follow-up, the grammy-nominated, gold-selling Firecracker.
Loeb has also worked in फिल्मी, टेलीविज़न, voice-over work and children’s recordings.
Loeb has appeared in two television series, Dweezil & Lisa, a weekly culinary adventure for the Food संजाल और क्रमांक 1 सिंगल, a वास्तविकता दिखाएँ on the E !
Network in 2006 focused on her quest for love, कामयाबी, करियर, और परिवार.
Her children 's music includes the albums कैच the चंद्रमा ( 2003 ), और शिविर Lisa ( 2008 ).
Her first joint children 's किताब और एल्बम लिसा लोएब 's पगली sing-along : The Disappointing Pancake and Other Zany Songs was published in 2011.
In 2010 she संस्थापित the लिसा लोएब चश्मा संग्रहण, जिससे is आधारित on her own designs.
the कोट of बाहें of the State of New Jersey includes:
A शील्ड साथ तीन plows emblazoned, representative of New Jersey 's agricultural tradition.
A forward-facing नाईट 's helmet.
A horse 's head as the crest of the हेल्मेट.
The female आंकड़े स्वतंत्रता और ceres, प्रतिनिधि of the राज्य 's motto ( see next item ).
Liberty is holding a staff supporting a `` liberty cap `` ; ceres is पकड़कर an overflowing cornucopia.
The streamer at the foot of the emblem contains the State motto of नई जर्सी, `` स्वतंत्रता और समृद्धि '', और the साल of statehood, 1776.
it थी originally designed by पियरे यूजीन du Simitiere in 1777 and was modified slightly in 1928.
The seal is the सेंट्रल मोटिफ in the ध्वज of नई जर्सी and the Great Seal of the State of New Jersey.
The Coat of arms contains a घोड़ा 's head.
A helmet showing that New Jersey governs itself accordingly and three plows on a शील्ड referring to the राज्य 's कृषि परंपरा, giving it the nickname `` Garden State ''.
The two देवियाँ represent the राज्य motto, `` स्वतंत्रता और Prosperity ''.
Liberty is on the left.
She is holding a स्टाफ साथ a स्वतंत्रता कैप on it, और the शब्द स्वतंत्रता underneath her.
The देवी on the सही is ceres, goddess of agriculture.
She is पकड़कर a cornucopia साथ prosperity written below her.
According to the minutes of the New Jersey General Assembly for March 11, 1896, the date in जिससे the सभा officially स्वीकृत the ध्वज as the राज्य emblem, the buff रंग is due indirectly to जार्ज Washington, who had ordered on October 2, 1779, that the uniform coats of the New Jersey Continental Line be dark ( Jersey ) blue, with buff facings.
Buff-colored facings had until then been सुरक्षित तभी लिये उसके अपना वर्दी और those of अन्य Continental generals and their aides.
Then, on February 28, 1780, the Continental War Officers in फिलाडेल्फिया निर्देशित कि the वर्दी कोट facings of सब regiments यहूद to be the वही as the पृष्ठभूमि color of the regiments ' state flag.
The seal is described in New Jersey statute शीर्षक 52, §2-1:
`` We Can Work It Out '' is a सोंग by the बीटल्स, लिखा by पॉल mccartney and John Lennon.
It was released as a `` double A-sided `` single with `` Day tripper ``, the पहला समय दोनो पहलू of a सिंगल यहूद so designated in an आरंभिक release.
Both songs were recorded दौरान the रबर आत्मा सत्र.
The song is an उदाहरण of lennon–mccartney सहयोग at a गहराई कि happened तभी rarely बाद they wrote the hit singles of 1963.
This song, `` A Day in the Life ``, `` Baby, You 're a Rich Man `` और `` i 've मिला a अहसास ``, हैं among the notable exceptions.
As a medical diagnosis, pedophilia or paedophilia is a psychiatric disorder in persons 16 years of age or older typically characterized by a primary or exclusive sexual interest toward prepubescent children ( generally आयु 11 सालो or younger, हालांकि विशिष्ट निदान मापदण्ड for the disorder extends the cut-off point for prepubescence to age 13 ).
An adolescent who is 16 सालो of आयु or पुरानी जरूर be at तनिक पाँच सालो पुरानी than the prepubescent चाइल्ड पहले the attraction can be diagnosed as pedophilia.
the पद रै a दायरा of परिभाषाएं, as मिला in psychiatry, psychology, the vernacular, and law enforcement.
The International Classification of Diseases ( ICD ) defines pedophilia as a `` विकार of वयस्क व्यक्तित्व और आचरण '' in जिससे वहीँ is a sexual preference for children of prepubertal or early pubertal age.
According to the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders ( DSM ), it is a paraphilia in जिससे वयस्कों or adolescents 16 सालो of आयु or पुरानी have तीव्र और तूल यौन प्रेरणाएं towards और कल्पनाओं परिचय prepubescent children that they have either acted on or which cause them distress or interpersonal difficulty.
In popular usage, pedophilia अर्थात् कोई यौन ब्याज in children or the अधिनियम of चाइल्ड यौन abuse, often termed `` pedophilic behavior ''.
For example, The American विरासत stedman 's चिकित्सा शब्दकोष राज्य, `` pedophilia is the अधिनियम or fantasy on the part of an adult of engaging in sexual activity with a child or children. ''
This common use application also extends to the यौन ब्याज in और यौन सम्पर्क साथ रोमिल or post-pubescent minors.
Researchers recommend that these imprecise uses be avoided because although people who commit child sexual abuse commonly exhibit the विकार, कुछ अपराधियों do नहीं मिलें the नैदानिक निदान मानकों लिये pedophilia and these standards pertain to prepubescents.
additionally, नहीं सब pedophiles दरअसल commit such abuse.
Pedophilia was first formally पहचाना और नामित in the late 19th century.
A significant राशि of शोध in the area has taken place since the 1980s.
Although mostly documented in men, there are also women who exhibit the disorder, and शोधकर्ताओं assume उपलब्धियाँ estimates underrepresent the सच्चा क्रमांक of female pedophiles.
No cure for pedophilia has been developed, but there are therapies that can reduce the incidence of a person committing चाइल्ड यौन abuse.
In the United States, following Kansas v. Hendricks, sex offenders जो हैं diagnosed साथ निश्चित दिमागी विकार, विशेषकर pedophilia, can be विषय to indefinite सिविल प्रतिबद्धता, अंतर्गत विभिन्न राज्य कानून ( generically पुकारा svp कानून ) और the संघीय आदम वाल्श चाइल्ड सुरक्षा and Safety Act of 2006.
At present, the exact causes of pedophilia have नहीं महरूम conclusively स्थापित.
Research suggests कि pedophilia may be correlated साथ अनेक अलग neurological abnormalities, and often co-exists with other personality disorders and psychological pathologies.
In the contexts of forensic psychology और विधि प्रवर्तन, a किस्में of typologies have महरूम सुझाया to categorize pedophiles according to behavior and motivations.
Julio César Chávez ( born जूलियो césar chávez gonzález on जुलाई 12, 1962 ) is a retired Mexican professional boxer.
Chávez is माना by अनेक लोगों लिये उनके खेल आंकडे the महानतम सेनानी ever to come out of Mexico.
He is a six-time world चैंपियन in तीन वज़न विभाजन, और लिये अनेक years he was considered one of the best pound-for-pound boxer in the world.
In a career that spanned over 25 years, Chávez won पाँच संसार शीर्षक in तीन वज़न विभाजन : wbc सुपर featherweight in 1984, wba lightweight in 1987, WBC Lightweight in 1988, WBC Light Welterweight in 1989, IBF Light Welterweight in 1990, and WBC Light Welterweight in 1994.
He holds रिकॉर्ड लिये सबसे कामयाब लगातार defenses of संसार शीर्षक ( 27 ), सबसे शीर्षक झगड़े ( 37 ), सबसे title-fight victories ( 31 ) और he is after Joe Louis with ( 23 ) for most title defenses won by knockout ( 21 ).
chávez भी रै the longest अपराजित streak in boxing history, 13 years.
His record was 89-0-1 going into his first loss to Frankie रान्डेल और था an 87 लड़ो जीत streak जबतक his `` draw '' with Whitaker.
Julio César Chávez was known for his outstanding punching शक्ति, विनाशकारी देह आक्रमण, remarkably दमदार chin और the relentless stalking of his opponents.
He बाँधने # 24 on ईएसपीएन 's 50 महानतम मुक्केबाज Of All Time.
On December 7, 2010, he was inducted in the prestigious अंतरराष्ट्रीय मुक्केबाज़ी हॉल of कीर्ति लिये the Class of 2011.
He is the father of prospect Omar Chávez and पूर्व wbc middleweight चैंपियन जूलियो césar chávez, Jr.

The Holocaust ( from the Greek ' : hólos, `` whole '' and kaustós, `` burnt '' ) also known as the Shoah ( Hebrew :, HaShoah, `` catastrophe '' ; Yiddish :, Churben or Hurban, from the Hebrew for `` destruction '' ), was the mass murder or नरसंहार of लगभग छह लाख यहूदियों दौरान संसार युद्ध ii, a कार्यक्रम of व्यवस्थित state-sponsored हत्या by नाजी जर्मनी, led by एडोल्फ हिटलर and the Nazi Party, throughout German-occupied territory.
Of the nine million Jews who था resided in यूरोपीय पहले the holocaust, approximately two-thirds were killed.
Over one million Jewish children were killed in the holocaust, as यहूद लगभग दो लाख यहूदी women and three million Jewish men.
A network of over 40,000 सुविधाएं in जर्मनी और german-occupied territory यहूद used to concentrate, hold, and kill Jews and other victims.
Some scholars argue that the mass murder of the Romani and people with disabilities should be included in the definition, and some use the common noun `` holocaust '' to describe अन्य नाजी द्रव्यमान हत्याएं, सहित those of सोवियत बंदियों of युद्ध, पॉलिश और सोवियत नागरिकों, and homosexuals.
Recent estimates based on figures प्राप्त चूंकि the पतन of the सोवियत संघ indicates कुछ टेन to ग्यारह लाख नागरिकों और बंदियों of युद्ध were intentionally murdered by the Nazi regime.
The persecution और नरसंहार यहूद carried out in stages.
Various laws to remove the यहूदियों इससे सिविल समाज, सबसे prominently the nuremberg Laws, were enacted in Germany years before the outbreak of World War II.
Concentration camps were established in which inmates यहूद वशीभूत to स्लेव मजदूर जबतक वे died of exhaustion or disease.
Where Germany conquered new territory in पूर्वी यूरोपीय, specialized इकाई पुकारा einsatzgruppen murdered Jews and political opponents in mass shootings.
The occupiers required Jews and Romani to be confined in overcrowded ghettos पहले होने transported by भाड़ा ट्रैन to extermination शिविरों जहाँ, if वे बच the यात्रा, सबसे यहूद systematically killed in gas chambers.
Every arm of Germany 's अफसरशाही थी शामिल in the लोजिस्टिक्स कि led to the genocides, turning the तीसरा Reich into what one Holocaust scholar has called `` a genocidal state ''.
4-H in the United States is a youth संगठन administered by the नेशनल संस्थान of खाना और कृषि of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of कृषि ( यूएसडीए ), with the mission of `` engaging youth to reach their fullest potential while advancing the field of youth development. ''
the नाम represents चार निजी development areas of focus for the organization : head, heart, hands, and health.
The organization has over 6.5 लाख सदस्यों in the संयुक्त राज्य, इससे आयु पाँच to twenty-one, in लगभग 90,000 clubs.
The goal of 4-H is to develop citizenship, leadership, जिम्मेदारी और जीवन कौशल of युवावस्था through experiential सीखना कार्यक्रम and a positive youth development approach.
Though typically thought of as an agriculturally focused organization as a परिणाम of इसके इतिहास, 4-h आज focuses on नागरिकता, स्वस्थ जीना, science, engineering, and technology programs.
Today, 4-H and सम्बन्धित कार्यक्रम मौजूद in over अस्सी देशों around the world ; the organization and administration varies from country to country.
Each of these programs operates independently, but cooperatively through अंतरराष्ट्रीय exchanges, वैश्विक शिक्षा कार्यक्रम, और communications.
the 4-h motto is `` to मेक the बेहतरीन better '', while its slogan is `` Learn by doing '' ( sometimes written as `` Learn to do by doing '' ).
The national flag of Chile, consists of two unequal horizontal bands of white and red and a ब्लू वर्गाकार the वही ऊँचाई as the श्वेत बैंड in the कैण्टन, जिससे bears a श्वेत five-pointed स्टार in the center.
It थी अपनाया on 18 October 1817.
The chilean ध्वज is भी ज्ञात in स्पेनी as La Estrella Solitaria ( The Lone Star ).
The star represents a guide to progress and honor ; blue symbolizes the sky and the Pacific Ocean, white is for the snow-covered andes, और रेड स्टैंड लिये the रक्त spilled to achieve independence.
According to the epic poem La Araucana, the रंगों यहूद निकला इससे those इससे the ध्वज flown by the Mapuche during the Arauco War.
`` Flag Day '' is held each year on the नवीं of जुलाई to commemorate the 77 सैनिको जो died in the 1882 बैटल of la concepción.
पीढी y, भी ज्ञात as the अंतर्दृष्टियों पीढी, is the जनसांख्यिकी cohort following Generation X.
There are no precise तिथियाँ लिये जब पीढी y starts और ends.
Commentators use beginning birth dates from the latter 1970s, or इससे the जल्दी 1980s to the जल्दी 2000s.

According to Tacitus, Nero targeted Christians as those जिम्मेदार लिये the आग.
The Great Fire of रोम ( ) थी an शहरी आग कि occurred शुरूआत 19 July AD 64.
Virginia ( ), officially the Commonwealth of Virginia, is a u.S. राज्य स्तिथ in the दक्षिण अटलांटिक प्रदेश of the संयुक्त राज्य.
Virginia is nicknamed the `` Old Dominion '' और the `` माँ of राष्ट्रपतियों '' बाद the आठ u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों born there.
The geography and climate of the राष्ट्रमंडल हैं तराशा by the ब्लू लकीरें kyu और the chesapeake खाड़ी, जिससे provide आवास लिये much of its flora and fauna.
The capital of the Commonwealth is रिचमंड ; और वर्जिनिया बीच is the सबसे populous city.
फेयरफैक्स काउंटी is the सबसे populous political subdivision.
the wealthiest is Loudoun County.
the राष्ट्रमंडल 's जनसांख्यिकी is over eight million.
The area 's history begins with several स्वदेशी समूह, सहित the Powhatan.
In 1607 the लंदन कम्पनी स्थापित the Colony of Virginia as the first permanent New World English colony.
Slave labor and the land acquired from displaced देशी अमरीकी जनजातियों प्रत्येक निभाई a significant भूमिका in the उपनिवेश 's जल्दी राजनीती and plantation economy.
Virginia was one of the 13 Colonies in the American Revolution and joined the Confederacy in the American Civil War, during जिससे रिचमंड थी बना the confederate पूंजी और वर्जिनिया 's northwestern काउंटी seceded to रूप the राज्य of वेस्ट Virginia.
Although the Commonwealth थी अंतर्गत रूढ़िवादी single-party नियम लिये nearly a सदी following पुनर्निर्माण, दोनो major national parties are competitive in modern Virginia.
The Virginia General सभा is the oldest विधानमंडल in the पश्चिमी गोलार्ध.
The state सरकारी रै महरूम repeatedly ranked most effective by the Pew Center on the States.
It is unique in how it treats cities and counties equally, manages local roads, और prohibits इसके राज्यपालों इससे सेवारत लगातार terms.
Virginia 's economy has many sectors : agriculture in the Shenandoah Valley ; federal agencies in Northern Virginia, including the मुख्यालय of the विभाग of रक्षा और सीआईए ; और सैन्य सुविधाएं in हैम्पटन सड़कें, the site of the region 's main seaport.
Virginia 's पब्लिक स्कूलों और अनेक कॉलेजों और विश्वविद्यालयों have contributed to growing media and technology sectors.
As a परिणाम, कंप्यूटर चिप्स have become the state 's leading export.
Windows Movie Maker ( formerly ज्ञात as खिड़कियाँ सजीव फिल्म मेकर, codenamed Sundance ) is a freeware video editing software by Microsoft.
It is a part of Windows Essentials software suite और offers the क्षमता to बनाएँ और संपादन वीडियो as खूब as to प्रकाशित them on SkyDrive, Facebook, YouTube, and Flickr.
`` Brenda 's Got A Baby '' is the solo debut सिंगल by तुपाक shakur, और दसवाँ track इससे his debut album, 2Pacalypse Now.
The song, which features R & B singer Dave Hollister, is about a twelve year-old लड़की नामित ब्रेंडा जो जीवनदान in a ghetto, रै a baby, और is incapable of supporting it.
The song explores the समस्या of टीन गर्भावस्था और इसके प्रभाव on the young mothers and their families.
Like many of Shakur 's गीतों, `` ब्रेंडा 's मिला a baby '' draws from the plight of the impoverished.
using ब्रेंडा to represent यंग माताओं in सामान्य, shakur criticises the low level of support from the baby 's father, the government, and society in general.
Shakur wrote the song when he read a newspaper article about a twelve-year-old girl who got pregnant from her cousin and, because she did नहीं want उसके अभिभावक to जान परिचय the baby, फेंका it in a trash can.
The official logo of Pokémon for इसके अंतरराष्ट्रीय रिलीज ; `` पोकीमॉन '' is short for the original Japanese title of `` Pocket Monsters ''.
is a मीडिया मताधिकार प्रकाशित और स्वामित्व by जापानी वीडियो game company Nintendo and created by Satoshi Tajiri in 1996.
originally released as a जोड़ी of interlinkable खेल लड़के role-playing वीडियो खेल विकसित by खेल Freak, Pokémon has since become the second-most successful and lucrative video game-based media franchise in the world, behind only Nintendo 's own Mario franchise.
Pokémon properties have since महरूम merchandised into दुश्मनी, manga, व्यापार ताश, toys, books, and other media.
The franchise celebrated in 2006, and, cumulative sales of the video games ( including home console संस्करण, ऐसे as the `` pikachu '' निन्टेंडो 64 ) have पहुँचे अधिक than 200 लाख नक़ल.
In November 2005, 4Kids entertainment, जिससे था प्रबंधित the non-game सम्बन्धित लाइसेंसिंग of पोकीमॉन, announced that it had agreed not to renew the Pokémon representation agreement.
Pokémon USA Inc. ( now The Pokémon Company International ), a subsidiary of जापानी 's पोकीमॉन co., अभी oversees सब पोकीमॉन लाइसेंसिंग outside of Asia.
The name पोकीमॉन is the romanized contraction of the Japanese brand.
The term Pokémon, in addition to referring to the Pokémon franchise itself, also collectively refers to the 649 fictional species that have made appearances in पोकीमॉन मीडिया as of the रिलीज of the पांचवां पीढी शीर्षक पोकीमॉन ब्लैक 2 और श्वेत 2 ; साथ the आगामी रिलीज of पोकीमॉन x और y, 6 नई पोकीमॉन have महरूम प्रदर्शित in promotions for the games.
`` Pokémon '' is identical in both the एकवचन और बहुवचन, as is प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत प्रजाति नाम ; it is grammatically सही to say `` one Pokémon '' and `` many Pokémon '', as well as `` one Pikachu `` and `` many Pikachu ''.
Cover of the first edition of the प्रकाशन दादा by ट्रिस्टन tzara ; ज्यूरिख, 1917
दादा ( ) or dadaism थी an आर्ट गति of the यूरोपीय avant-garde in the early 20th century.
Many claim Dada began in Zurich, स्विट्ज़रलैंड in 1916, spreading to बर्लिन shortly thereafter but the height of New York Dada was the year before in 1915.
To quote Dona budd 's the भाषा of आर्ट ज्ञान, दादा थी born आउट of ऋणात्मक प्रतिक्रिया to the horrors of World War I.
This international movement was begun by a समूह of कलाकार और कवियों संबद्ध साथ the कैबरे Voltaire in Zurich.
Dada rejected reason and logic, prizing nonsense, irrationality और अंतर्ज्ञान.
The origin of the name Dada is unclear ; कुछ मानना कि it is a nonsensical शब्द.
Others maintain that it originates from the रोमानियाई कलाकारों ट्रिस्टन tzara और मार्सल janco 's बारंबार उपयोग of the शब्द da, da, meaning yes, yes in the Romanian language.
Another theory says that the name `` Dada '' came दौरान a बैठक of the समूह जब a पेपर चाकू stuck into a french-german शब्दकोष happened to point to 'dada ', a French word for 'hobbyhorse '.
The गति primarily शामिल विज़ुअल कला, साहित्य, काव्य, आर्ट manifestoes, आर्ट सिद्धान्त, थिएटर, और ग्राफिक डिज़ाइन, और concentrated इसके anti-war politics through a rejection of the prevailing standards in art through anti-art cultural works.
In addition to being anti-war, दादा थी भी anti- बुर्जुआ और था राजनैतिक affinities with the radical left.
Dada activities included public gatherings, demonstrations, and publication of art/literary जर्नल्स ; passionate कवरेज of आर्ट, राजनीती, और संस्कृति यहूद विषय प्रायः discussed in a variety of media.
Key figures in the movement included Hugo Ball, एमी hennings, hans arp, raoul hausmann, हन्ना höch, योहानेस baader, ट्रिस्टन tzara, फ्रांसिस picabia, रिचर्ड Huelsenbeck, Georg Grosz, John Heartfield, Marcel Duchamp, Beatrice Wood, Kurt Schwitters, and Hans Richter, among others.
The movement influenced later styles like the avant-garde and शहर म्यूज़िक आंदोलनों, और समूह सहित surrealism, देवानंद réalisme, pop art and Fluxus.
Dada is the groundwork to abstract आर्ट और ध्वनि काव्य, a starting पाइंट लिये प्रदर्शन आर्ट, a prelude to postmodernism, an influence on पॉप आर्ट, a जश्न of antiart to be बाद embraced लिये anarcho-political uses in the 1960s and the movement that lay the foundation for Surrealism.
पहला trophic level.
the पौधे in इस चित्र, और the शैवाल और phytoplankton in the lake, are primary producers.
They take nutrients from the soil or the water, और manufacture उनके अपना खाना by photosynthesis, using उर्जा from the sun.
The trophic स्तर of an सजीव is the स्थिति it occupies in a food chain.
The word trophic गर्भाशयी इससे the यूनानी τροφή ( trophē ) referring to food or feeding.
A food chain represents a succession of organisms that eat another सजीव और हैं, in फेरे, खाया themselves.
The number of steps an सजीव is इससे the प्रारंभ of the कड़ी is a माप of its trophic level.
Food chains प्रारंभ at trophic स्तर 1 साथ प्राथमिक निर्माता ऐसे as पौधे, मूव to herbivores at स्तर 2, predators at level 3 and typically finish with carnivores or apex predators at level 4 or 5.
The path along the chain can form either a one-way प्रवाह, or a खाना `` वेब. ''
Ecological समुदायों साथ उच्चतर biodiversity रूप अधिक complex trophic paths.
Four of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण domesticated silk moths.

A silk-producing raspy क्रिकेट.
Silk is a natural protein fibre, some forms of which can be woven into वस्त्र.
The protein fibre of silk is composed mainly of fibroin and produced by निश्चित कीट लार्वे to रूप cocoons.
The best-known type of silk is प्राप्त इससे the cocoons of the लार्वे of the शहतूत silkworm bombyx mori reared in captivity ( sericulture ).
The shimmering appearance of silk is due to the triangular prism -like structure of the silk fibre, which allows silk cloth to refract आवक लाइट at अलग कोण, यूँ producing अलग colors.
Silks are produced by several other insects, but generally तभी the रेशा of शलभ caterpillars रै महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये वस्त्र निर्माण.
There has महरूम कुछ शोध into अन्य silks, which differ at the molecular level.
Many silks are mainly produced by the लार्वे of कीट undergoing पूरा metamorphosis, लकिन कुछ वयस्क कीट ऐसे as webspinners produce silk, and some insects such as raspy crickets produce silk throughout their lives.
Silk production also occurs in Hymenoptera ( bees, wasps, और चींटियों ), silverfish, mayflies, thrips, leafhoppers, भृंग, lacewings, fleas, flies and midges.
Other types of सन्धिपाद उपज रेशा, सबसे notably विभिन्न arachnids such as spiders ( see spider silk ).
Late Show with David Letterman is an American late-night talk show hosted by दाउद लेटरमैन on सीबीएस.
The show debuted on अगस्त 30, 1993, और is उत्पादित by लेटरमैन 's production company, Worldwide Pants Incorporated.
The show 's music director and band-leader of the हाउस बैंड, the सीबीएस ऑर्केस्ट्रा, is Paul Shaffer.
The head writer is Matt रॉबर्ट्स और the उद्घोषक is एलन Kalter.
Of the major U.S. late-night programs, Late Show ranks second in cumulative average viewers over समय और तीसरा in क्रमांक of एपीसोड over time.
The show leads other late night shows in ad आय साथ $ 271 लाख in 2009.
In most U.S. markets the show airs at 11:35 p.m. Eastern/Pacific time, but is अंकित सोमवार through बुधवार at 4:30 p.m., और गुरुवार at 3:30 p.m and 6:00 p.m.
The second Thursday episode प्रायः airs on शुक्रवार of कि सप्ताह.

The Real Housewives of Orange County is an American reality documentary television कार्यक्रम on ब्रावो, नियत in नारंगी काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
It was the पहला the रियल housewives program in the series.
The series is a voyeuristic look into the wealthy lives of these housewives, as वे दूकान, मिलेंगी प्लास्टिक सर्जरी, गपशप, लड़ो और सजीव lavishly.
The financial crisis, the beginning of which coincided लगभग exactly साथ the पहला ऋतु 's ब्रॉडकास्ट, रै चूंकि trimmed the housewives ' lifestyles साथ जॉब नुकसान, evictions, बंधक मूलभूत, foreclosures, and marital stress—all recorded in progressive seasons of the show.
Cyberstalking is the use of the Internet or अन्य इलेक्ट्रॉनिक अर्थात् to stalk or harass an व्यक्तिगत, a समूह of individuals, or an organization.
It may include the making of false accusations or statements of fact ( as in मानहानि ), निगरानी, बनाना खतरे, पहचान चोरी, क्षति to आंकड़ा or उपकरण, the solicitation of नाबालिग लिये sex, or gathering information that may be used to harass.
The definition of `` harassment '' must meet the criterion that a उचित व्यक्ति, in कब्ज़ा of the वही सूचना, होता लिहाज़ it as sufficient to cause another reasonable person distress.
Cyberstalking is different from spatial or offline stalking in that it occurs through the use of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक संचार प्रौद्योगिकी ऐसे as the अंतरजाल.
However, it sometimes लीड to it, or is accompanied by it.
Both are दण्ड offenses.
cyberstalking साझा महत्वपूर्ण विशेषताएँ with offline stalking.
Many stalkers – online or off – are प्रेरित by a ख्वाहिश to कंट्रोल उनके पीड़ितों.
A cyberstalker may be an ऑनलाइन अजनबी or a व्यक्ति whom the target knows.
A cyberstalker may be anonymous और may solicit भागीदारी of अन्य लोगों ऑनलाइन जो do नहीं even know the target.
Cyberstalking is a criminal offense that आता into खेल अंतर्गत राज्य anti-stalking कानून, बदनामी कानून, and harassment laws.
A cyberstalking conviction can result in a restraining अनुक्रम, probation, or even criminal penalties against the assailant, including jail.
A business letter is usually used when writing from one कम्पनी to another, or लिये पत्राचार between ऐसे संगठन and their customers, clients and other external parties.
The overall स्टाइल of अक्षर होगा निर्भर on the संबंध between the parties concerned.
There हैं अनेक कारण to लिखें a कारोबार letter.
It could be to निवेदन सीधा सूचना or कार्रवाई इससे another पार्टी, to अनुक्रम आपूर्तियाँ इससे a प्रदायक, to पहचानो a mistake that was committed, to reply directly to a request, to apologize for a wrong or simply to convey goodwill.
Even today, the business letter is स्टिल बहुत उपयोगी क्युकी it produces a स्थाई रिकार्ड, is गोपनीय, formal and delivers persuasive, well-considered messages.
Tilapia ( ) is the आम नाम लिये nearly a सौ प्रजाति of cichlid fish from the tilapiine cichlid tribe.
Tilapia are mainly freshwater fish, inhabiting shallow streams, ponds, rivers and lakes, और कम commonly मिला जीना in brackish जल.
Historically, they have महरूम of प्रमुख महत्व in artisan fishing in Africa and the Levant, and are of increasing importance in aquaculture.
Tilapia can become problematic invasive species in new warm-water habitats, whether deliberately or accidentally introduced, लकिन generally not in temperate climates due to their inability to survive in cooler waters below about.
Turner & Hooch is a 1989 comedy drama crime film starring Tom Hanks and beasley the श्वान as the eponymous वर्ण, टर्नर और Hooch respectively.
The film also stars घोड़ी winningham, क्रेग T. नेल्सन, and Reginald VelJohnson.

It was co-written by माइकल blodgett इससे परे the घाटी of the Dolls fame.
Although K-9 ( with James Belushi ) was released prior to this film ( exactly three महीने पहले ), टर्नर & hooch became अधिक लोकप्रिय और seemingly निष्प्रभ इसके वृहद success, even though K-9 had a very similar plot.
A pilot for a Turner & hooch tv श्रेणी थी बना और भागा as a भाग of the Magical World of Disney.

Adolf Hitler ( ; 20 April 1889 – 30 अप्रैल 1945 ) थी an आस्ट्रिया -born जर्मनी राजनेता और the नेता of the नाजी Party ( ( NSDAP ) ; National Socialist German Workers Party ).
He was chancellor of Germany from 1933 to 1945 और तानाशाह of नाजी जर्मनी ( as führer und Reichskanzler ) from 1934 to 1945.
Hitler was at the केन्द्र of नाजी जर्मनी, संसार युद्ध ii in यूरोपीय, और the Holocaust.
Hitler was a सजा दिग्गज of संसार War I.
He joined the जर्मनी मजदूर ' पार्टी ( precursor of the NSDAP ) in 1919, and became leader of the NSDAP in 1921.
In 1923, he attempted a तख्तापलट d'état in Munich, known as the Beer Hall Putsch.
The failed coup resulted in हिटलर 's कारावास, दौरान which time he wrote his memoir, Mein Kampf ( My Struggle ).
After his release in 1924, Hitler gained popular support by attacking the Treaty of Versailles and promoting pan-germanism, antisemitism, और anti-communism साथ charismatic oratory and Nazi propaganda.
After his appointment as chancellor in 1933, he transformed the Weimar Republic into the तीसरा reich, a single-party तानाशाही आधारित on the अधिनायकवादी and autocratic ideology of Nazism.
Hitler 's aim was to establish a New अनुक्रम of निरपेक्ष नाजी जर्मनी आधिपत्य in continental Europe.
To this end, his foreign and घरेलू नीतियों था the उद्देश्य of seizing lebensraum ( `` living space '' ) for the Germanic people.
He directed the rearmament of जर्मनी और the आक्रमण of कैंडल by the Wehrmacht in September 1939, resulting in the outbreak of World War II in Europe.
Under Hitler 's rule, in 1941 जर्मनी शक्तियां और उनके यूरोपीय allies occupied सबसे of Europe and North Africa.
In 1943, Germany had been forced onto the रक्षात्मक और suffered a श्रेणी of escalating defeats.
In the final days of the युद्ध, दौरान the बैटल of बर्लिन in 1945, हिटलर शादीशुदा उसके long-time partner, Eva Braun.
On 30 April 1945, less than two days later, the two वचनबद्ध आत्महत्या to avoid कैप्चर by the रेड फौज, और उनके शवों यहूद burned.
Hitler 's aggressive foreign policy is माना the प्रमुख कारण of the outbreak of World War II in Europe.
His antisemitic policies and racially motivated ideology resulted in the deaths of at least 5.5 million Jews, and millions of अन्य लोगों deemed racially अवर.

A domain name is an identification string that defines a realm of प्रशासनिक स्वायत्तता, प्राधिकार, or कंट्रोल on the अंतरजाल.
Domain names are formed by the नियम और प्रक्रियाओं of the Domain Name System ( DNS ).
technically, कोई नाम पंजीकृत in the DNS is a domain name.
Domain names are used in विभिन्न नेटवर्किंग contexts और application-specific naming and addressing purposes.
In general, a domain name represents an Internet Protocol ( IP ) resource, such as a personal computer used to अभिगम the अंतरजाल, a सर्वर कंप्यूटर होस्टिंग a वेब साईट, or the वेब साईट itself or कोई अन्य सेवा communicated via the Internet.
Domain names हैं व्यवस्थित in अधीनस्थ स्तर ( subdomains ) of the DNS root domain, which is nameless.
The first-level set of domain names are the top-level domains ( TLDs ), including the generic top-level domains ( gTLDs ), such as the prominent डोमेन com, सूचना, जाल और org, और the देश कोड top-level डोमेन ( ccTLDs ).
Below ये top-level डोमेन in the डीएनएस पदानुक्रम हैं the second-level और third-level डोमेन names कि हैं typically खोलें लिये रिज़र्वेशन by end-users who wish to connect local area networks to the Internet, create other publicly accessible Internet resources or run web sites.
The registration of these domain names is प्रायः administered by डोमेन नाम registrars जो बेचें उनके services to the public.
A fully योग्य डोमेन नाम ( fqdn ) is a डोमेन नाम कि is completely specified in the hierarchy of the DNS, having no omitted parts.
Domain names are usually written in lowercase, हालांकि लेबल्स in the डोमेन नाम प्रणाली हैं case-insensitive.
Nitrate is a polyatomic ion with the molecular सूत्र no3− और a आणविक द्रव्यमान of 62.0049 g/mol. Nitrates also describe the organic functional group RONO2.
ये नाइट्रेट esters हैं a specialized class of explosives.

कृषि is a प्रमुख उद्योग in the संयुक्त राज्य and the country is a net exporter of food.
As of the last census of कृषि in 2007, वहीँ यहूद 2.2 लाख खेतो, covering an area of, an average of per farm.
Although agricultural activity occurs in most states, it is particularly concentrated in the विशाल expanse of चपटा, arable जमीन ज्ञात as the ग्रेट मैदान, जिससे encompasses the सेंट्रल प्रदेश of the nation.
The Mpemba effect, named after Tanzanian student Erasto mpemba, is the assertion कि warmer जल can फ्रीज तेज़ than colder water.
Although there is anecdotal support for the effect, there is no अनुबंध on exactly कया the प्रभाव is और अंतर्गत कया हालातों it occurs.
वहीँ have महरूम रिपोर्ट्स of समान phenomena चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स, although with insufficient detail for the claims to be replicated.
The phenomenon seems contrary to ऊष्मागतिकी, लकिन a क्रमांक of संभावित स्पष्टीकरण लिये the effect have been proposed.
Further investigations will need to decide on a precise definition of `` freezing '' and control a विशाल क्रमांक of starting पैरामीटर्स in अनुक्रम to confirm or explain the effect.
The Siamese (, ) is एक of the पहला distinctly पहचाना breeds of प्राच्य cat.
The breed originated in Thailand ( formerly known as Siam ), where वे हैं एक of अनेक देशी breeds और हैं पुकारा wichian mat ( วิเชียรมาศ, a name meaning `` moon diamond '' ).
In the 20th सदी the siamese बिल्ली became एक of the most popular breeds in Europe and North America.

In economics, the धन सप्लाई or धन भण्डार, is the कुल राशि of मौद्रिक एसेट उपलब्धियाँ in an economy at a specific time.
There are several ways to define `` money, '' but standard measures usually include currency in परिसंचरण और माँग जमा ( जमाकर्ताओं ' easily पहुँचा एसेट on the किताबे of वित्तीय संस्थानों ).
Money supply data are recorded and published, usually by the सरकारी or the सेंट्रल बैंको of the देश.
Public and private sector analysts have long monitored परिवर्तन in money supply because of its effects on the price level, inflation, the exchange rate and the business cycle.
कि संबंध between धन और कीमतें is historically संबद्ध with the quantity theory of money.
There is दमदार अनुभवजन्य प्रमाण of a सीधा संबंध between money-supply विकास और long-term price inflation, at least for rapid increases in the amount of money in the economy.
That is, a country such as Zimbabwe which देखी रैपिड increases in इसके धन सप्लाई भी saw rapid increases in prices ( hyperinflation ).
This is one reason लिये the रिलायंस on मौद्रिक नीति as a अर्थात् of controlling inflation.
The nature of this causal chain is the विषय of contention.
Some heterodox economists argue that the money supply is endogenous ( determined by the workings of the अर्थव्यवस्था, नहीं by the सेंट्रल बैंको ) और कि the स्त्रोत of महंगाई जरूर be found in the distributional structure of the economy.
In addition, those economists seeing the central bank 's कंट्रोल over the धन सप्लाई as feeble कह कि वहीँ हैं दो कमजोर कड़ी between the विकास of the धन सप्लाई and the inflation rate.
First, in the aftermath of a recession, when many resources are underutilized, an increase in the धन सप्लाई can कारण a sustained बढ़ाएँ in रियल उत्पादन बजाय of inflation.
Second, if the velocity of money, i.e., the ratio between nominal GDP and money supply, changes, an increase in the money सप्लाई could have either no प्रभाव, an अतिरंजित प्रभाव, or an मनमौजी effect on the growth of nominal GDP.

IMAX ( an abbreviation for Image Maximum ) is a motion चित्र फिल्मी स्वरूप और a नियत of सिनेमा प्रक्षेप मानकों निर्मित by the कनाडाई कम्पनी imax Corporation.
IMAX has the capacity to record and display images of far greater आकार और रेज़ोल्यूशन than conventional फिल्मी प्रणालियों.
Since 2002, some feature films have been converted ( or upgraded ) into IMAX format लिये प्रदर्शक in imax थिएटर और कुछ have भी महरूम partially shot in IMAX.
IMAX is the सबसे widely प्रयुक्त प्रणाली लिये special-venue film presentations.
, there are 697 imax थिएटर in 52 countries.
Today 's Special is a कनाडाई children 's टेलीविज़न show produced by Clive VanderBurgh at TVOntario from 1981 to 1987.
It also ran on Nickelodeon and the Faith and Values Channel/Odyssey ( now the hallmark चैनल ) as खूब as अनेक pbs स्टेशन throughout the United States.
It was set in a department store, based on the फ्लैगशिप स्थान of the अभी defunct सिम्पसन 's in Toronto.
Many sequences लिये it यहूद शॉट at the महारानी Street West and Yonge Street store after hours.
Constitutionalism, in its most general meaning, is `` a complex of ideas, attitudes, and पैटर्न of बर्ताव elaborating the principle कि the प्राधिकार of सरकारी गर्भाशयी इससे और is limited by a body of fundamental law ''.
A political organization is constitutional to the extent that it `` contain [ s ] institutionalized mechanisms of शक्ति कंट्रोल लिये the protection of the interests and liberties of the citizenry, including those that may be in the minority ``.
As described by political scientist and संवैधानिक विद्वान दाउद fellman :
An ice-cream headache, also known as brain freeze, cold-stimulus headache, or इसके दिए वैज्ञानिक नाम sphenopalatine ganglioneuralgia ( अर्थ `` तंत्रिका पीड़ा of the sphenopalatine गंडिका `` ), is a रूप of ब्रैड cranial पीड़ा or सिरदर्द commonly संबद्ध with consumption ( particularly quick consumption ) of cold beverages or foods such as ice cream and ice pops.
It is caused by having something cold touch the roof of the mouth ( palate ), and is believed to result from a nerve response causing रैपिड constriction और सूजन of रक्त बरतन or a `` referring `` of पीड़ा इससे the छत of the मुँह to the head.
The rate of intake लिये ठंडा भोजन रै महरूम पढ़ाई as a contributing factor.
There are people who can नहीं अनुभव `` दिमाग फ्रीज '' or समान symptoms.
The term ice-cream सिरदर्द रै महरूम in उपयोग चूंकि at तनिक 31 जनवरी 1937, contained in a जर्नल प्रविष्टि by रेबेका timbres प्रकाशित in the 1939 book We did n't ask Utopia : a Quaker family in Soviet Russia.
the पहला प्रकाशित उपयोग of the पद दिमाग फ्रीज, as it pertains to cold-induced headaches, was on 27 May 1991.
`` Auld Lang Syne '' ( : note `` s '' rather than `` z '' ) is a स्कॉट्स कविता लिखा by रॉबर्ट burns in 1788 और नियत to the धुन of a परंपरागत folk song ( Roud # 6294 ).
It is well known in many countries, especially in the english-speaking संसार ; इसके परंपरागत उपयोग होने to celebrate the start of the New Year at the stroke of midnight.
By extension, it is also sung at funerals, graduations and as a विदाई or समाप्ति to अन्य अवसरों.
The international लड़के स्काउट युवावस्था गति, in अनेक देशों, उपयोग it as a close to jamborees and other functions.
The song 's Scots title may be translated into English literally as `` बूढ़ा long चूंकि '', or अधिक idiomatically, `` long long पहले '', `` दिनों गए by '' or `` old times ''.
नतीजतन `` लिये auld लैंग syne '', as it appears in the पहला लकीर of the chorus, might be loosely translated as `` for ( the sake of ) old times ''.
The phrase `` Auld Lang Syne '' is also used in similar कविताएं by रॉबर्ट ayton ( 1570–1638 ), allan ramsay ( 1686–1757 ), और जेम्स Watson ( 1711 ) as well as older folk songs predating Burns.
मैथ्यू fitt उपयोग the phrase `` in the दिनों of auld lang syne '' as the equivalent of `` Once upon a time...
`` in उसके retelling of परी किस्से in the Scots language.
