leeroy जेनकींस, sometimes misspelled लेरॉय जेनकींस और प्रायः elongated साथ numerous additional letters, is an Internet meme named for a player character created by Ben Schulz in Blizzard Entertainment 's MMORPG, World of Warcraft.
The character became लोकप्रिय due to a वीडियो of the खेल कि परिचालित around the Internet.
The phenomenon has since स्प्रेड परे the सीमाएँ of the गेमिंग जातियाँ into other online and mainstream media.
Oscar Grant was fatally shot by BART police officer Johannes Mehserle in Oakland, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, संयुक्त राज्य, in the जल्दी morning घंटों of नई साल 's दिन 2009.
Responding to reports of a fight on a भीड़ खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल रैपिड पारगमन ट्रैन returning इससे सैन फ्रांसिस्को, बार्ट पुलिस अधिकारियों detained ऑस्कर ग्रान्ट और अनेक अन्य यात्री on the platform at the Fruitvale BART Station.
अधिकारी योहानेस mehserle और another अधिकारी यहूद restraining Grant, who was prostrate and allegedly resisting arrest.
Officer Mehserle stood and, according to गवाह, कहा : `` मिलेंगी वापस, I 'm gon na tase him. ''
Then Mehserle drew उसके गन और शॉट ग्रान्ट एकबार in the वापस ; mehserle appeared दंग, put his hands to his head and exclaimed, `` Oh, my God ! ''
During उसके अदालत गवाही, mehserle कहा कि ग्रान्ट then exclaimed, `` You shot me ! ''
Grant turned out to be unarmed ; he was pronounced dead the next morning at highland हॉस्पिटल in ओकलैंड.
The events were captured on multiple digital वीडियो और कोशिका फोन कैमरे.
The footage was disseminated to मीडिया आउटलेट और to various websites, where it was watched millions of times.
The following days saw दोनो शांतिपूर्ण and violent protests.
the शूटिंग रै महरूम variously labeled an involuntary manslaughter and a summary execution.
On January 13, Alameda County prosecutors चार्ज mehserle साथ हत्या लिये the shooting.
He resigned उसके स्थिति और pleaded not guilty.
The विचारण began on June 10, 2010.
Michael Rains, Mehserle 's criminal defense attorney, argued that mehserle mistakenly शॉट ग्रान्ट साथ उसके पिस्टल, intending to उपयोग उसके तासीर जब he देखी ग्रान्ट reaching for his waistband.
Pretrial filings argue that his client did not commit first-degree murder and पूछा a लॉस एंजिल्स न्यायधीश to instruct the जूरी to सीमा इसके deliberations to either second-degree murder or acquittal.
ओकलैंड सिविल अधिकारों attorney जॉन burris filed a $ 25 million wrongful death claim against BART on behalf of Grant 's family.
On July 8, 2010, the जूरी लौटे इसके verdict : mehserle थी मिला अपराधी of involuntary manslaughter and not guilty of second-degree murder and voluntary manslaughter.
Initial protests against the ruling were peacefully organized ; लूटने, आगजनी, विनाश of प्रॉपर्टी, और छोटी दंगे broke out after dark.
Nearly 80 लोगों यहूद आखिरकार गिरफ्तार.
On शुक्रवार, जुलाई 9, 2010, the u.S. इंसाफ विभाग खोली a सिविल अधिकारों मामला विरूद्ध mehserle ; the संघीय government can prosecute him independently for the same act under the separate sovereigns exception to double jeopardy.
The Department of Justice will be working साथ the u.S. attorney 's दफ्तर in San Francisco and the FBI.
On November 5, 2010, Mehserle was sentenced to दो सालो, ऋण समय served.
He served his time in the Los एंजिल्स काउंटी कारावास, occupying a निजी कोशिका दूर from other prisoners.
He was released on June 13, 2011 और is अभी on पैरोल.
प्रमुख प्रतिनिधि of the Harlem Renaissance.
The Harlem Renaissance थी a सांस्कृतिक गति that spanned the 1920s.
At the time, it थी ज्ञात as the `` नई नीग्रो गति '', नामित बाद the 1925 anthology by Alain Locke.
Though it was centered in the हार्लेम पड़ोस of नई यॉर्क नगर, अनेक french-speaking ब्लैक लेखक इससे अफ़्रीकी और caribbean colonies who lived in Paris were also influenced by the Harlem Renaissance.
The Harlem पुनर्जागरण is unofficially पहचाना to have spanned from about 1919 until the early or mid-1930s.
Many of its विचार जिया on much longer.
The zenith of this `` flowering of Negro literature '', as James Weldon Johnson preferred to call the Harlem Renaissance, was लगाई between 1924 ( the साल कि अवसर : a जर्नल of नीग्रो जीवन hosted a पार्टी लिये ब्लैक लेखक जहाँ अनेक श्वेत प्रकाशक यहूद in उपस्थिति ) और 1929 ( the year of the stock market crash and the beginning of the Great Depression ).
African राज्य between 500 bce और 1500 CE
Obelisk at temple of लक्सर, मिश्र.
c. 1200 bce.
अफ़्रीकी नाईट of baguirmi in full padded armour suit.
The history of Africa begins with the prehistory of Africa and the emergence of होमो sapiens in ईस्ट अफ़्रीकी, continuing into the उपस्थित as a patchwork of विविध और नीतियां developing nation states.
Some early evidence of agriculture in अफ़्रीकी तिथियाँ इससे 16,000 bce, और metallurgy इससे परिचय 4000 bce.
The recorded history of early सभ्यता arose in मिश्र, और बाद in Nubia, the Maghreb and the Horn of Africa.
During the मध्य आयु, islam spread through the regions.
Crossing the मग़रिब और the सहेल, a प्रमुख बीच of मुस्लिम संस्कृति was Timbuktu.
Some notable pre-colonial states and societies in Africa शामिल the nok संस्कृति, माली साम्राज्य, ashanti साम्राज्य, किंगडम of mapungubwe, किंगडम of ज्या, किंगडम of saloum, किंगडम of baol, किंगडम of ज़िम्बाब्वे, किंगडम of kongo, प्राचीन कार्थेज, numidia, Mauretania, the Aksumite Empire, the Ajuuraan State and the Adal Sultanate.
From the late 15th century, Europeans and Arabs took स्लेव इससे वेस्ट, सेंट्रल और southeast Africa overseas in the African slave trade.
European colonization of अफ़्रीकी विकसित rapidly in the Scramble for Africa of the late 19th and early 20th centuries.
Following struggles for independence in many parts of the महाद्वीप, as खूब as a weakened यूरोपीय बाद the दूसरी संसार War ; decolonization took place.
Africa 's history has been चुनौतीपूर्ण लिये शोधकर्ताओं in the फ़ील्ड of अफ़्रीकी studies because of the scarcity of written sources in large parts of sub-Saharan Africa.
Scholarly techniques such as the रिकॉर्डिंग of मौखिक इतिहास, ऐतिहासिक भाषाविज्ञान, पुरातत्व and genetics have been crucial.
Curry Foley was the पहला खिलाड़ी in प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल history to hit for the cycle.
In baseball, hitting for the cycle is the accomplishment of one बैटर hitting a सिंगल, a दोगुना, a ट्रिपल, और a घर run in the same game.
Collecting the hits in that अनुक्रम is ज्ञात as a `` प्राकृतिक cycle ''.
Cycles are uncommon in Major लीग बेसबॉल ( एमएलबी ), और have occurred 294 टाइम्स since the first by Curry Foley in 1882.
The cycle is roughly as common as a no-hitter ( 279 occurrences in MLB history ) ; it has been called `` one of the rarest '' और `` सबसे मुश्किल feats '' in baseball.
Based on 2009 offensive levels, the probability of an average MLB player hitting लिये a साईकिल विरूद्ध an औसत टोली in a खेल is लगभग 0.00590 % ; इस corresponds to परिचय 2.5 cycles in a 162-game season with 30 teams.
In other baseball लीग, the साईकिल is हासिल कम frequently.
Through September 4, 2008, 62 players in Nippon Professional Baseball ( NPB ), the top-level baseball संगठन in जापानी, have hit लिये the साईकिल, the most recent being Michihiro Ogasawara.
दो खिलाड़ी have hit लिये the साईकिल on the same day once in NPB history ; this has occurred twice in MLB history.
One NPB player रै भी hit लिये the साईकिल in an npb All-Star game.
No player has ever hit लिये the साईकिल in the एमएलबी all-star Game or the postseason.
The main slave रूट in मध्यकालीन Africa.
This आलेख discusses प्रणालियों, इतिहास, and effects of slavery within Africa.
See Arab slave trade, अटलांटिक स्लेव व्यापार, maafa, और गुलामी in समकालीन Africa for other discussions.
`` स्लेव हस्तांतरण in Africa ''.
Europeans usually did not enter the आंतरिक regions.
Slavery in Africa has existed throughout the महाद्वीप लिये अनेक centuries, and continues in the current day.
Systems of servitude and slavery were आम in अनेक भाग of the महाद्वीप, as वे यहूद in much of the प्राचीन संसार.
In most African societies where slavery was प्रचलित, the enslaved लोगों यहूद largely treated as indentured servants and not treated as chattel slaves.
When the Arab slave trade and Atlantic slave trade began, many of the लोकल स्लेव प्रणालियों बदला और began supplying captives लिये स्लेव बाज़ार बाहर of Africa.
Slavery in ऐतिहासिक अफ़्रीकी थी practiced in अनेक अलग फ़ॉर्म और कुछ of ये do not clearly fit the definitions of slavery elsewhere in the world.
Debt slavery, enslavement of युद्ध captives, सैन्य गुलामी, और दण्ड गुलामी यहूद all practiced in various parts of Africa.
Although वहीँ था महरूम कुछ trans-saharan व्यापार इससे the आंतरिक of sub-saharan अफ़्रीकी to अन्य regions, गुलामी was a small part of the economic life of many societies in Africa until the introduction of transcontinental slave trades ( Arab and Atlantic ).
Slave practices were again transformed with European colonization of अफ़्रीकी और the औपचारिक abolition of गुलामी in the early 1900s.
Windows Task Manager is a task manager or System monitor application included with the Microsoft Windows NT family of operating systems that provides limited information about कंप्यूटर प्रदर्शन और कार्यशील अनुप्रयोग, प्रक्रियाओं और cpu उपयोग, कमिट चार्ज और मेमोरी सूचना, संजाल कार्यकलाप और आंकडे, logged-in उपयोक्ता, और प्रणाली सेवाएं ( और as प्रायः is the मामला साथ तन्त्र टूल्स provided by microsoft लिये खिड़कियाँ, 3rd पार्टी तन्त्र is उपलब्धियाँ जिससे भरता the आवश्यकताएँ अधिक thoroughly, e.g, `` प्रक्रम एक्सप्लोरर '', `` विस्तारित कार्य मैनेजर '', `` Anvir Task Manager '', `` Process Hacker '', and `` System Explorer '' ).
The Task Manager can also be used to set प्रक्रम प्राथमिकताएं, प्रोसेसर अपनापन, forcibly terminate प्रक्रियाओं, और shut bas, restart, hibernate or log off from Windows.
खिड़कियाँ कार्य मैनेजर थी introduced with Windows NT 4.0.
Previous versions of खिड़कियाँ nt शामिल the कार्य सूची अनुप्रयोग, which had far fewer features.
The task list थी सक्षम of लिस्टिंग फिलहाल कार्यशील processes and killing them, or creating a new process.
In Windows xp तभी, a shutdown मेनू is भी उपस्थित कि allows access to Standby, Hibernate, Turn off, Restart, Log Off and Switch User.
Earlier versions of Microsoft Windows ( Microsoft खिड़कियाँ 3.x, खिड़कियाँ 95, खिड़कियाँ 98 ) था a कार्यक्रम ज्ञात as कार्य to प्रदर्शक the programs currently running.
This संचिका थी चलाया by कार्यशील the taskman.exe file from the C : \Windows directory.
The Troop is an American-Canadian live-action, single camera comedy -adventure television series about a trio of teenagers who fight and कैप्चर राक्षस और अन्य अलौकिक phenomena कि invade the fictional कस्बा of Lakewood.
Created और कार्यपालिका उत्पादित by अधिकतम burnett, ग्रेग कूलिज और क्रिस मॉर्गन, the series premiered on Nickelodeon on September 18, 2009.
The दूसरी ऋतु premiered on जून 25, 2011 और निकलोडियन रद्द the series midway through it 's second season.
The बाकी एपीसोड of ऋतु 2 were aired on Nicktoons except the last 3..
Sparsely populated in relation to its area, the Democratic Republic of the Congo ( DRC ) is home to a vast potential of natural resources and mineral wealth, its untapped जमा of कच्चा खनिज हैं अनुमानित to be लायक in excess of us $ 24 खरब, yet the अर्थव्यवस्था of the drc रै अस्वीकृत drastically चूंकि the mid-1980s.
At the समय of इसके स्वतंत्रता in 1960, drc थी the दूसरी सबसे industrialized देश in अफ़्रीकी बाद दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी ; it boasted a thriving mining sector and its agriculture sector was relatively productive.
If the viewer stares at इस चित्र लिये 20–60 सेकेंड और stares at a श्वेत ऑब्जेक्ट, a negative afterimage will appear ( in this case, it will be cyan on magenta ).
This can also be achieved by the viewer closing his/her आँखें and tilting their head up.
An afterimage or ghost image or image burn-in is an optical illusion that refers to an image continuing to appear in एक 's दृष्टि बाद the एक्सपोज़र to the असली चित्र रै ceased.
One of the most common afterimages is the bright glow कि seems to फ्लैश पहले एक 's आँखें बाद looking into a लाइट सोर्स लिये a few सेकेंड.
Closing the eye can help achieve a बेहतर भाव of the रंग in इसके अपना पहलू.
Afterimages come in two forms, ऋणात्मक ( उलट ) और धनात्मक ( retaining असली color ).
The process behind धनात्मक afterimages is अनजान, though thought to be related to neural adaptation.
On the other hand, negative afterimages हैं a retinal घटना और हैं well understood.
Lost is an American serial drama television series that premiered on September 22, 2004 on the अमरीकी प्रसारण Company ( ABC ).
The series was created by J. J. Abrams and Damon Lindelof, आधारित upon an असली पायलट स्क्रिप्ट titled nowhere लिखा by जेफरी Lieber.
Six seasons of the show aired, in जोड to numerous clip shows to recap previous episodes.
ABC announced that Lost would end बाद छह सीज़न, having उत्पादित a कुल of 121 episodes.
The series follows the past, present, and future experience ( s ) of the survivors of a प्लेन क्रैश on a यात्री जेट, oceanic उड़ान 815, उड़ती इससे सिडनी to लॉस एंजिल्स बाद it क्रैश on a तीव्र द्वीप in the South Pacific.
The series also includes कहानियां of the जीवनदान of लोगों already जीना on the द्वीप — they include the `` Others ``, who initially antagonize the survivors, as well as a group of people who arrive on the freighter Kahana.
Each episode typically features action on the island as खूब as a द्वितीयक कथानक इससे another पाइंट in a अक्षर 's life.
Season 6 features a detailing of the जीवनदान of the survivors in a अलग वास्तविकता, as if the flight had never crashed.
In the following list, the term `` featured character ( s ) '' refers to the character or वर्ण जो हैं प्रदर्शित in the द्वितीयक कथानक of प्रत्येक एपीसोड.
`` no.
in श्रेणी '' refers to the एपीसोड 's क्रमांक in the overall series, whereas `` No.
in season '' refers to the episode 's number in each particular season.
`` U.S. दर्शक ( लाख ) '' refers to the number of Americans in millions who watched the episode live.
A total of 121 एपीसोड of खोया यहूद उत्पादित, the last of which aired on May 23, 2010.
All seasons are available on dvd in regions 1–4 और on blu-ray in Regions A and B.
Flat feet ( also called pes planus or fallen arches ) is a formal reference to a medical condition in which the arch of the पैर collapses, साथ the संपूर्ण एकमात्र of the पैर coming into complete or near-complete contact with the ground.
In some individuals ( an अनुमानित 20–30 % of the सामान्य जनसांख्यिकी ) the मेहराब बस never develops in one foot ( unilaterally ) or both feet ( bilaterally ).
Three studies ( see citations below in military section ) of military recruits have दिखाया no प्रमाण of बाद increased चोट, or पैर समस्याएं, due to चपटा फीट, in a जनसांख्यिकी of people who reach military service age without prior foot problems.
However, these studies can not be प्रयुक्त to न्यायधीश संभावित भविष्य क्षति इससे इस कंडीशन when diagnosed at younger ages.
They also can not be applied to persons whose flat feet are associated with foot symptoms, or certain लक्षण in अन्य भाग of the देह ( ऐसे as the लेग or वापस ) संभवतः referable to the foot.
Generation X, commonly abbreviated to gen x, is the पीढी born बाद the पश्चिमी post-World War II baby boom.
Demographers, historians and टीकाकारों उपयोग शुरूआत जनम dates from the early 1960s to the early 1980s.
The term was popularized by डगलस coupland 's 1991 अनोखा पीढी x : Tales for an Accelerated Culture.
Before that, it had महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये विभिन्न subcultures or countercultures after the 1950s.
Pressure ulcers, also known as decubitus ulcers or bedsores, are localized injuries to the skin and/or underlying ऊतक प्रायः over a बोनी prominence, as a परिणाम of दबाव, or दबाव in संयोजन साथ shear and/or friction.
Most commonly this will be the sacrum, coccyx, heels or the hips, but other साइट ऐसे as the elbows, अदब, ankles or the वापस of the cranium can be प्रभावित.
The cause of pressure ulcers is pressure applied to soft ऊतक so कि रक्त प्रवाह to the नरम ऊतक is completely or partially obstructed.
Shear is also a cause ; shear खींचता on रक्त बरतन that feed the skin.
Pressure ulcers most commonly develop in व्यक्तियों जो हैं नहीं चलती परिचय or are confined to wheelchairs.
It is widely believed that other factors can influence the सहिष्णुता of स्किन लिये दबाव और shear thereby increasing the risk of pressure ulcer development.
These factors are protein-calorie malnutrition, microclimate ( skin wetness caused by sweating or incontinence ), diseases that reduce blood flow to the स्किन, ऐसे as arteriosclerosis or रोगों कि reduce the अहसास in the स्किन, ऐसे as paralysis or neuropathy.
The healing of pressure ulcers may be slowed by the आयु of the व्यक्ति, चिकित्सा शर्तें ( ऐसे as arteriosclerosis, diabetes or infection ), smoking or medications such as antiinflammatory drugs.
Although often prevented and treatable if found early, pressure ulcers can be very मुश्किल to prevent in critically बीमार मरीजों, frail बड़ो, व्हीलचेयर उपयोक्ता ( विशेषकर where spinal injury is involved ) and terminally ill patients.
Primary prevention is to redistribute दबाव by turning the patient regularly.
The benefit of turning to avoid further sores is खूब प्रलेखित चूंकि at least the 19th century.
In addition to turning and re-positioning the patient in bed or wheelchair, खाने a संतुलित आहार साथ पर्याप्त प्रोटीन और keeping the skin free from exposure to urine and stool is very important.
The व्यापकता of दबाव छाले in हॉस्पिटल settings is high, but improvements are being made.
According to the 2010 IPUP ( International Pressure Ulcer Prevalence Survey ) conducted in कनाडा, वहीँ थी a significant घटी in the overall facility-acquired prevalence of pressure ulcers from 2009-2010.
Ulcers were most commonly पहचाना at the sacral/coccyx अल्सर स्थान ; however, एड़ी छाले यहूद the सबसे आम facility-acquired location in the survey.
overboard is a 1987 अमरीकी रोमांटिक कॉमेडी film starring Goldie Hawn and Kurt Russell.
It was निर्देशित by गैरी मार्शल, उत्पादित by roddy mcdowell, and loosely inspired by the 1974 Italian film Swept Away.
In turn, Overboard was adapted into the 2006 South कोरियाई टेलीविज़न श्रेणी, युगल or ट्रबल.
Green Bay is a city in and the county seat of Brown County in the u.S. राज्य of विस्कॉन्सिन, स्तिथ at the सिर of Green Bay, a sub-basin of Lake Michigan, at the mouth of the Fox River.
It has an उन्नयन of ऊपर समुद्र स्तर और is स्तिथ north of Milwaukee.
The population थी 104,057 at the 2010 census.
It is the third-largest नगर in the राज्य of विस्कॉन्सिन, after Milwaukee and Madison.
It is भी the third-largest नगर on the वेस्ट shore of Lake Michigan, after Chicago and Milwaukee.
Green Bay is home to the Green Bay Packers of the National फ़ुटबॉल लीग, बनाना it by दूर the smallest महानगर क्षेत्रफल in the यूएसए to मेजबान a प्रमुख पेशेवर खेल franchise.
Green Bay is the principal city of the Green Bay Metropolitan सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल, जिससे कवर भूरा, kewaunee, और oconto Counties and had a combined population of 282,599 at the 2000 census.
Green Bay is an औद्योगिक नगर साथ अनेक meatpacking और पेपर पौधे, और a बंदरगाहों on ग्रीन खाड़ी, an arm of Lake Michigan that locals call the Bay of Green Bay, to avoid conflating it with the eponymous city.
It is home to the National Railroad संग्रहालय ; the नेविली पब्लिक संग्रहालय, साथ प्रदर्शनियों of आर्ट, इतिहास, and science ; and the University of Wisconsin–Green Bay.
luteinizing हार्मोन ( lh, भी ज्ञात as lutropin और sometimes lutrophin ) is a hormone produced by gonadotroph cells in the anterior pituitary gland.
In females, an acute rise of LH ( `` lh surge '' ) triggers ovulation and development of the corpus luteum.
In males, where LH had also been called interstitial cell-stimulating हार्मोन ( icsh ), it stimulates leydig कोशिका उत्पादन of testosterone.
It acts synergistically with FSH.
Selena Quintanilla-Pérez ( April 16, 1971 – कूच 31, 1995 ), ज्ञात बस as Selena, was an American singer-songwriter.
She was named the `` top लैटिन कलाकार of the '90s '' और `` बेहतरीन selling लैटिन कलाकार of the दशक '' by बिलबोर्ड लिये उसके fourteen top-ten singles in the Top Latin Songs chart, including seven number-one hits.
Selena had the most successful singles of 1994 और 1995, `` amor prohibido `` और `` No Me Queda Más ``.
She थी पुकारा `` the महारानी of tejano music `` and the Mexican equivalent of Madonna.
Selena released her first album, सेलिना y लॉस dinos, at the आयु of twelve.
She won Female Vocalist of the Year at the 1987 Tejano Music Awards and उतरा a रिकॉर्डिंग अनुबंध साथ emi a few सालो later.
Her fame grew throughout the early 1990s, विशेषकर in spanish-speaking देशों, और वो था begun recording in English as well.
Selena was murdered at the आयु of 23 on कूच 31, 1995 by yolanda saldívar, the पूर्व president of her fan club.
On April 12, 1995, two weeks बाद उसके मौत, जार्ज W. बुश, राज्यपाल of टेक्सास at the समय, घोषित her birthday `` Selena Day '' in Texas.
Warner भाईs. उत्पादित सेलिना, a फिल्मी आधारित on her life starring Jennifer Lopez, in 1997.
Selena 's जीवन थी भी the आधार of the musical सेलिना forever starring Veronica Vazquez as Selena.
In जून 2006 सेलिना थी commemorated साथ a life-sized कांस्य प्रतिमा ( Mirador de la Flor in Corpus Christi, Texas ) and a Selena museum opened there.
She has sold over 60 million albums विश्वव्यापी, बनाना उसके एक of the best-selling कलाकारों of सब time.
She is also the only female artist to have पाँच एल्बम in u.s. बिलबोर्ड 200 at the वही time.
जर्मनी stahlhelm from World War II
Insignia of the Bolivian Army colorados रेजीमेंट, प्रर्दशित a stahlhelm और दो crossed bayonets
Stahlhelm ( plural, stahlhelme ) is जर्मनी लिये `` steel helmet ''.
The इम्पीरियल जर्मनी फौज began to बदलें the परंपरागत boiled-leather pickelhaube ( spiked combat helmet ) with the Stahlhelm during World War I in 1916.
The term Stahlhelm refers both to a जेनेरिक स्टील हेल्मेट, और अधिक specifically to the distinctive ( and iconic ) German design.
The Stahlhelm, with its distinctive `` coal scuttle `` आकार, थी an तुरन्त recognizable प्रतीक लिये सैन्य imagery और became a आम तत्व of सैन्य propaganda on both sides, just like the Pickelhaube before it.
Its name थी भी प्रयुक्त by the stahlhelm, a अर्धसैनिक nationalist organization established at the end of 1918.
glow-in-the-dark may refer to:
Bioluminescence, the उत्पादन और उत्सर्जन of light by a living organism
Chemiluminescence, is the उत्सर्जन of लाइट ( luminescence ) without emission of heat
स्फुरदीप्ति, a विशिष्ट प्रकार of photoluminescence related to fluorescence
radioluminescence, उत्पादन of संदीप्ति in a material by the bombardment of ionizing radiation
Glow in the अंधेरा दौरे, a 2008 कॉन्सर्ट tour by Kanye West
फ्रैंकफर्ट विमानक्षेत्र serves as a हब नगर लिये लुफ़्थान्सा and receives flights from Star Alliance carriers.
Airline hubs are airports ranked as large, medium, small, and non-hubs as one of the FAA airport श्रेणी जिससे हैं re-evaluated प्रत्येक साल आधारित on क्रमांक of commercial passengers.
The more common but अनौपचारिक उपयोग लिये the phrase एयरलाइन हब is an विमानक्षेत्र कि an एयरलाइन उपयोग as a transfer point to get passengers to their intended destination.
It is part of a hub and spoke model, जहाँ travelers चलती between एयरपोर्ट नहीं परोसा by सीधा flights change planes en route to their destinations.
This is as opposed to the Point to Point model.
Many hubs of the एयरलाइंस हैं भी situated at एयरपोर्ट in the cities of the respective head offices.
Some एयरलाइंस may उपयोग तभी a सिंगल हब, जबकि अन्य airlines use multiple hubs.
Hubs are used for both यात्री फ़्लाइट as खूब as cargo flights.
अनेक एयरलाइंस भी उपयोग फ़ोकस शहरों, which function much the same as hubs.
एयरलाइंस may भी उपयोग द्वितीयक hubs, a non-technical पद लिये विशाल focus cities.
A hub in the middle of a route is more effective than at either समाप्त as connecting ट्रैफ़िक अधिक easily भरता the प्लेन - यात्री prefer a one-stop ( two-leg ) route over a two-stop ( three-leg ) route.
Hollow lacedaemon.
Site of the Menelaion, the shrine to Helen and Menelaus constructed anciently in the कांस्य आयु नगर कि stood on the हिल of Therapne on the left bank of the Eurotas River overlooking the future site of Dorian Sparta.
आरपार the घाटी the successive ridges of Mount Taygetus are in evidence.
Sparta ( Doric Greek : ; Attic Greek : ), or Lacedaemon, was a prominent city-state in प्राचीन यूनानियों, situated on the बैंको of the Eurotas River in Laconia, in south-eastern Peloponnese.
It emerged as a political entity around the 10th century bc, जब the आक्रमणकारी dorians subjugated the लोकल, non-dorian जनसांख्यिकी.
Around 650 BC, it rose to become the प्रबल सैन्य land-power in ancient Greece.
Given its military pre-eminence, स्पार्टा थी पहचाना as the overall नेता of the संयुक्त यूनानी forces during the Greco-Persian Wars.
Between 431 and 404 BC, Sparta was the principal दुश्मन of एथेंस दौरान the peloponnesian युद्ध, इससे जिससे it उभरा विजयी, हालांकि at ग्रेट लागत.
Sparta 's defeat by Thebes in the Battle of Leuctra in 371 BC ended स्पार्टा 's prominent भूमिका in यूनानियों.
However, it कायम इसके राजनैतिक स्वतंत्रता until the Roman conquest of Greece in 146 BC.
It then underwent a long period of decline, विशेषकर in the मध्य आयु, जब अनेक spartans स्थानांतरित to सजीव in mystras.
Modern Sparta is the capital of the Greek क्षेत्रीय ईकाई of laconia और a बीच लिये the प्रसंस्करण of goods such as citrus and olives.
Sparta was unique in प्राचीन यूनानियों लिये इसके सोशल प्रणाली और संविधान, जिससे completely focused on military training and excellence.
Its निवासियों यहूद वर्गीकृत as spartiates ( spartan नागरिकों, जो enjoyed पूरा अधिकारों ), mothakes ( non-spartan फ़्री मेन raised as Spartans ), Perioikoi ( freedmen ), and Helots ( state-owned serfs, enslaved non-Spartan local population ).
Spartiates underwent the rigorous agoge training and शिक्षा regimen, और spartan phalanges यहूद widely माना to be among the बेहतरीन in battle.
Spartan women enjoyed considerably more rights और समता to मेन than elsewhere in the classical world.
Sparta was the subject of fascination in its own day, as खूब as in the वेस्ट following the पुनरुद्धार of शास्त्रीय सीखना.
This love or admiration of स्पार्टा is known as Laconism or Laconophilia.
Fantasy football is an इंटरैक्टिव प्रतियोगिता in जिससे उपयोक्ता compete विरूद्ध प्रत्येक अन्य as सामान्य प्रबंधक of virtual teams.
The players that an individual is able to manage are पेशेवर अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल खिलाड़ी in the National Football League.
The different actions people are able to make are drafting, trading, adding or छोड़ने खिलाड़ी, और बदलना rosters.
Due to the growth of the अंतरजाल, काल्पनिक फ़ुटबॉल रै vastly increased in लोकप्रियता, विशेषकर क्युकी काल्पनिक फ़ुटबॉल प्रदाताओं ऐसे as ईएसपीएन, याहू, सीबीएस, और the एनएफएल itself are able to keep track of statistics entirely online, eliminating the need to check box scores and newspapers regularly to keep track of players.
Most leagues have a सिंगल सप्ताह चैंपियनशिप in सप्ताह 16 of the NFL season.
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100, based on UN 2010 projections ( रेड, नारंगी, ग्रीन ) और us जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो ऐतिहासिक estimates ( black ).
Actual recorded जनसांख्यिकी आंकड़े हैं in ब्लू.
According to the उच्चतम अनुमान, the संसार जनसांख्यिकी may वृद्धि to 16 billion by 2100 ; according to the lowest estimate, it may decline to 6 billion.
The world population is the कुल क्रमांक of जीना इंसानो on Earth.
As of today, it is estimated to number billion by the United States जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो ( uscb ).
The USCB estimates that the संसार जनसांख्यिकी exceeded 7 अरब on March 12, 2012.
According to a separate estimate by the United Nations Population Fund, it पहुँचे इस पड़ाव on अक्तूबर 31, 2011.
The world population has अनुभवी निरन्तर विकास चूंकि the समाप्त of the Great Famine and the Black Death in 1350, when it stood at around 370 million.
The highest rates of growth – global population increases above 1.8 % per year – were देखी briefly दौरान the 1950s, और लिये a longer काल दौरान the 1960s और 1970s.
The विकास रेट peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, and had declined to 1.1 % by 2011.
Total annual births were highest in the लेट 1980s at परिचय 138 लाख, और हैं अभी अपेक्षित to remain essentially निरंतर at their 2011 level of 134 million, while deaths number 56 million per year, and are expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040.
Current projections show a continued increase in population in the near future ( but a steady decline in the जनसांख्यिकी विकास रेट ), साथ the वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी अपेक्षित to पहुँचें between 7.5 और 10.5 billion by 2050.
Various longer-term estimates predict further growth, stagnation, or भी overall decline in the global population by 2150.
Some analysts have questioned the स्थिरता of further संसार जनसांख्यिकी विकास, citing the growing pressures on the environment, global food supplies, and energy resources.
Skeletal मांसपेशियां होमो sapiens
इस is a तालिका of muscles of the human anatomy.
There are approximately 642 skeletal मांसपेशियां भीतर the ठेठ इंसान, और लगभग प्रत्येक मांसपेशी constitutes एक भाग of a जोड़ी of एकसमान द्विपक्षीय मांसपेशियां, मिला on दोनो sides, resulting in approximately 320 pairs of muscles, as presented in this article.
Nevertheless, the exact number is difficult to define because different sources group muscles differently, e.g. regarding कया is पारिभाषित as अलग भाग of a single muscle or as several muscles.
Examples दायरा इससे 640 to 850.
The muscles of the human body can be categorized into a number of groups which शामिल मांसपेशियां relating to the सिर और गर्दन, मांसपेशियां of the धड़ or ट्रंक, muscles of the upper limbs, and muscles of the lower limbs.
The action refers to the कार्रवाई of प्रत्येक मांसपेशी इससे the standard anatomical position.
In अन्य स्थितियाँ, अन्य क्रियाएँ may be performed.
A gold bar is a quantity of refined metallic gold of any shape that is made by a bar निर्माता बैठक मानक शर्तें of manufacture, labeling, और record keeping.
Larger gold बार कि हैं उत्पादित by pouring the molten metal into molds are called ingots.
Smaller bars may be manufactured by minting or stamping इससे appropriately लिपटे सुनहरा sheets.
The standard gold bar held as gold reserves by central banks and traded among bullion डीलर is the 400-troy-ounce ( 12.4 kg or 438.9 ounces ) Good Delivery gold bar.
The kilobar, which is to say 1000 grams in द्रव्यमान, is the बार कि is अधिक manageable और is प्रयुक्त extensively for trading and investment.
The प्रीमियम on ये बार जब traded is बहुत कम over the स्पॉट मान of the सुनहरा बनाना it ideal for small transfers between banks and traders.
Most kilobars are flat, हालांकि कुछ निवेशकों, विशेषकर in यूरोपीय, prefer the brick shape.
Elisha Archibald `` Archie '' Manning III ( born May 19, 1949 ) is a पूर्व अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग, playing लिये the नई ऑरलियन्स संतो इससे 1971 to 1982, then for the Houston Oilers and Minnesota Vikings.
He is the father of current डेनवर broncos क्वार्टरबैक peyton मैनिंग, वर्तमान नई यॉर्क Giants starting quarterback Eli Manning, and former Ole Miss receiver Cooper Manning.
Advocacy is a political process by an individual or group जिससे aims to influence public-policy और संसाधन आवंटन निर्णय भीतर राजनैतिक, आर्थिक, और सोशल प्रणालियों and institutions.
Advocacy can include many activities that a person or organization undertakes including media campaigns, public speaking, commissioning और प्रकाशन शोध or पोल or the दाखिल of an amicus ब्रैड.
Lobbying ( often by lobby groups ) is a form of advocacy where a direct दृष्टिकोण is बना to विधायक on an समस्या जिससे plays a significant भूमिका in modern politics.
Research is beginning to explore how advocacy groups in the U.S. और कनाडा हैं using सोशल मीडिया to सुकर नागरिक सगाई और सामूहिक action.
The flag of Mexico ( Spanish : Bandera de México ) is a लंबवत तिरंगा of ग्रीन, श्वेत, और रेड साथ the नेशनल coat of arms charged in the center of the white stripe.
While the meaning of the colors has changed over time, these three colors were adopted by Mexico following independence from Spain during the country 's युद्ध of स्वतंत्रता, और subsequent पहला मैक्सिकन साम्राज्य.
The current flag was अपनाया in 1968, लकिन the overall डिज़ाइन रै महरूम प्रयुक्त चूंकि 1821, when the First National Flag was created.
The current law of national symbols, Law on the National Arms, Flag, and Anthem, that governs the use of the नेशनल ध्वज रै महरूम in प्लेस चूंकि 1984.
Red, white, and green are the colors of the नेशनल मुक्ति फौज in Mexico.
the सेंट्रल emblem is the एज़टेक pictogram लिये Tenochtitlan ( now Mexico City ), the center of their empire.
It recalls the legend that inspired the aztecs to settle on कया थी originally a lake-island.
The form of the कोट of बाहें थी सबसे recently revised in 1968.
A ribbon in the नेशनल रंगों is at the नीचे of the coat of arms.
Throughout history, the flag has changed चार टाइम्स, as the डिज़ाइन of the कोट of बाहें and the length-width ratios of the flag have been modified.
However, the coat of arms has had the same features throughout : an eagle, holding a serpent in its talon, is perched on top of a prickly नाशपाती कैक्टस ; the कैक्टस is situated on a चट्टान कि उदय ऊपर a lake.
The coat of arms is derived from an Aztec legend that their gods told them to build a नगर जहाँ वे स्पॉट an त्रिभुज on a nopal खाने a serpent, जिससे is अभी Mexico City.
The current नेशनल ध्वज, the चौथी नेशनल ध्वज, is also used as the Mexican naval ensign by ships registered in Mexico.
a गंतव्य विपणन संगठन or सम्मेलन और visitor bureau promotes a town, city, region, or country in order to increase the number of visitors.
It promotes the विकास और विपणन of a गंतव्य, focusing on convention sales, tourism marketing, and services.
Such संगठन प्रचार आर्थिक विकास of a गंतव्य by increasing विज़िट इससे पर्यटकों and business travelers, which generates overnight lodging for a destination, visits to restaurants, and shopping revenues.
Convention and visitor bureaus are the most important tourism marketing organizations in their respective tourist destinations, as they are directly responsible लिये विपणन the गंतव्य ब्रांड through सफर और पर्यटन `` उत्पाद जागरूकता '' to visitors.
DMOs produce billions of डॉलर in सीधा और अप्रत्यक्ष आय और कर लिये उनके गंतव्यों ' economies with their marketing and sales expertise.
Destination marketing organizations are often called travel, सम्मेलन, विज़िटर, or पर्यटन bureaux, स्वागत centers, सूचना centers and more.
regardless of the नाम, ये संगठन प्रस्ताव many services to the traveling public.
The elk or wapiti ( cervus canadensis ) is एक of the largest प्रजाति of हिरण in the संसार, and one of the largest land mammals in North America and eastern Asia.
It was long believed to be a subspecies of the European red deer ( Cervus elaphus ), लकिन प्रमाण इससे a 2004 पढ़ाई of the mitochondrial डीएनए indicates कि the दो हैं distinct species.
इस एनिमल चाहिए नहीं be उलझन साथ the larger मूस ( Alces alces ), to which the name `` elk '' applies in Eurasia.
अलावा इससे the मूस, the तभी अन्य सदस्य of the deer family to rival the elk in size is the south Asian sambar ( Rusa unicolor ).
Elk range in forest and forest-edge habitat, feeding on grasses, पौधे, पत्ते, और bark.
Although native to North अमेरिका और पूर्वी एशिया, वे have adapted खूब to देशों जहाँ वे have been introduced, including Argentina, Australia, and New Zealand.
Their great adaptability may threaten endemic species और ecosystems into जिससे वे have महरूम introduced.
पुरूष नीलगाय have विशाल antlers जिससे are shed each year.
Males also engage in ritualized mating behaviors during the rut, including posturing, antler कुश्ती ( sparring ), और bugling, a लाउड श्रेणी of vocalizations जिससे establishes दबदबा over अन्य males and attracts females.
Elk are susceptible to a क्रमांक of संक्रामक रोगों, कुछ of which can be transmitted to livestock.
Efforts to eliminate संक्रामक रोगों इससे नीलगाय populations, largely through vaccination, have had mixed success.
Some संस्कृतियों आदर the elk as a spiritual force.
In parts of Asia, antlers और उनके मखमल हैं प्रयुक्त in traditional medicines.
Elk are hunted as a game species ; the मांस is leaner और उच्चतर in प्रोटीन than beef or chicken.
the जार्ज वॉशिंगटन विश्वविद्यालयों ( gw, gwu, or जार्ज वॉशिंगटन ) is a व्यापक private, coeducational research university located in Washington, D.C..
It awards प्रमाणपत्र, स्नातक डिग्री, मास्टर्स डिग्री, and PhDs across several dozen disciplines.
The university was chartered by an Act of Congress on फ़रवरी 9, 1821 as the columbian कॉलेज in the ज़िला of Columbia.
The शेर ( पेंथेरा leo ) is one of the four big cats in the genus Panthera and a member of the family Felidae.
With some males exceeding in वज़न, it is the second-largest जीना cat after the tiger.
Wild lions currently exist in sub-Saharan Africa and in Asia ( where an endangered remnant population resides in Gir Forest National पार्क in इण्डिया ) जबकि अन्य प्रकार of शेर have disappeared इससे उत्तर अफ़्रीकी और दक्षिणपश्चिम एशिया in ऐतिहासिक times.
Until the late Pleistocene, about 10,000 years पहले, the शेर थी the सबसे फैली विशाल जमीन स्तनधारी बाद humans.
वे यहूद मिला in सबसे of अफ़्रीकी, आरपार यूरेशिया इससे western Europe to India, and in the Americas from the Yukon to Peru.
The lion is a vulnerable species, having seen a major population decline of 30–50 % over the पास्ट दो दशकों in इसके अफ़्रीकी दायरा.
Lion populations are untenable बाहर designated reserves and national parks.
Although the cause of the decline is not fully understood, habitat loss and conflicts साथ इंसानो हैं फिलहाल the महानतम कल्याणकारी of concern.
Within Africa, the वेस्ट अफ़्रीकी शेर जनसांख्यिकी is particularly endangered.
Lions live for 10–14 years in the जंगली, जबकि in captivity they can live longer than 20 years.
In the wild, males seldom live longer than 10 years, as injuries sustained इससे continual लड़ साथ प्रतिद्वंद्वी males greatly reduce their longevity.
They typically inhabit सवाना और घासभूमि, हालांकि वे may take to bush and forest.
Lions हैं unusually सोशल compared to other cats.
A pride of शेर consists of सम्बन्धित महिलाओं and offspring and a small number of adult males.
Groups of female lions typically हंट साथ, preying ज़्यादातर on विशाल ungulates.
Lions are apex and keystone परभक्षी, हालांकि वे scavenge as opportunity allows.
While lions do not typically hunt humans, कुछ have महरूम ज्ञात to do so.
sleeping मुख्यतः दौरान the दिन, शेर हैं primarily nocturnal, although bordering on crepuscular in nature.
Highly distinctive, the male lion is easily recognised by its mane, and its face is one of the सबसे widely recognised एनिमल प्रतीकों in इंसान culture.
Depictions have existed from the Upper Paleolithic period, साथ उत्कीर्णन और paintings इससे the lascaux और chauvet गुफाएं, through वस्तुतः सब प्राचीन and medieval cultures where they once occurred.
It has been extensively depicted in sculptures, in paintings, on नेशनल ध्वज, and in contemporary films and literature.
Lions have been kept in menageries since the time of the Roman Empire, and have महरूम a कुंजी प्रजाति sought लिये प्रदर्शनी in zoos over the संसार चूंकि the late 18th century.
zoos हैं cooperating विश्वव्यापी in breeding programs for the endangered Asiatic subspecies.
In the history of video games, the सातवाँ पीढी of consoles is the पिछला पीढी, and includes consoles released since late by Nintendo, Microsoft, and Sony.
For home consoles, the seventh generation began on 22 November 2005 with the release of एक्सबॉक्स 360 और जारी साथ the रिलीज of प्लेस्टेशन 3 on 11 नवम्बर 2006, and Wii on 19 November 2006.
Each new console introduced a नई प्रकार of breakthrough in technology.
The Xbox 360 offered games rendered natively at hd रिज़ॉल्यूशन, the प्लेस्टेशन 3 offered, in जोड to fhd गेमिंग, hd फिल्म प्लेबैक via a built-in 3d blu-ray Disc player, and the Wii focused on integrating controllers with movement sensors as well as joysticks.
Joining Nintendo in the motion market, Sony released the प्लेस्टेशन मूव in सितंबर 2010.
The प्लेस्टेशन मूव सुविधाएँ गति संवेदन गेमिंग, समान to that of the Wii.
microsoft भी joined सोनी और निन्टेंडो, with its Kinect.
Unlike the अन्य दो प्रणालियों ( PlayStation 3 and Wii ), Kinect does not use any controllers of any sort and makes the users the `` controller. ''
Having sold 8 लाख इकाई in इसके पहला 60 दिनों on the मार्केट, kinect रै claimed the गिनीज World Record of being the `` fastest selling consumer electronics device ''.
While the Xbox 360 offers wired परिरक्षक as a स्टैंडअलोन उत्पाद, सब प्लेस्टेशन 3 परिरक्षक can be प्रयुक्त in wired and wireless configurations.
Starting with हैंडहेल्ड consoles, the सातवाँ पीढी began on 21 नवम्बर 2004 साथ the उत्तर अमरीकी परिचय of the Nintendo DS as a `` third pillar '', alongside Nintendo 's existing Game Boy Advance and GameCube consoles.
the निन्टेंडो ds ( nds ) सुविधाएँ a टच स्क्रीन और built-in microphone, and supports wireless IEEE 802.11 ( Wi-Fi ) standards.
Additionally, the संशोधित संस्करण of the nds, the dsi, सुविधाएँ दो निर्मित in कैमरे, the ability to download games from the DSi store, and a web browser.
The PlayStation Portable, or PSP, released later the वही साल on 12 दिसम्बर 2004, followed a अलग pattern.
It became the first handheld video game कंसोल to उपयोग an ऑप्टिकल डिस्क स्वरूप, सार्वभौमिक Media Disc ( UMD ), as its primary storage media.
सोनी भी दिया the psp मजबूत multi-media काबिलियत, कनेक्टिविटी with the PlayStation 3 and other PSPs, and Internet connectivity.
The Nintendo DS likewise has connectivity to the internet through the Nintendo wi-fi कनेक्शन और निन्टेंडो ds ब्राउजर, as खूब as बेतार कनेक्टिविटी to other DS systems and Wii consoles.
Despite ऊँची बिक्री संख्याएँ लिये दोनो consoles, प्लेस्टेशन पोर्टेबल बिक्री have consistently पिछड़ापन पीछे those of the निन्टेंडो ds ; nevertheless, the PlayStation Portable has the distinction of being the best-selling non-Nintendo handheld gaming system.
Sgt. Pepper 's Lonely दिल क्लबों बैंड ( प्रायः shortened to sgt. pepper ) is the आठवीं स्टुडियो album by English rock band the Beatles.
Released in June 1967, the album included songs such as `` With a Little Help from My मित्रों ``, `` लुसी in the आसमान साथ ईंट ``, और `` a दिन in the जीवन ``.
continuing the कलाकारी maturation देखी on the बैंड 's एल्बम रिवाल्वर ( 1966 ), sgt. pepper further departed from the conventional pop rock idiom of the time and incorporated balladry, psychedelic, music hall, and symphonic influences.
During the Sgt. Pepper sessions, the समूह improved upon the विशेषता of उनके म्यूज़िक 's उत्पादन जबकि exploring experimental recording techniques.
निर्माता जार्ज मार्टिन 's अभिनव दृष्टिकोण शामिल the use of an orchestra.
Widely acclaimed and imitated, the album cover, designed by English pop कलाकारों पीटर ब्लेक और jann haworth, थी प्रेरित by a स्केच by पॉल mccartney कि चित्रित the बैंड posing in front of a collage of some of their favourite celebrities.
Sgt. Pepper was a worldwide critical and commercial success, बिता 27 सप्ताह at the शीर्ष of the uk एल्बम चार्ट और 15 सप्ताह at क्रमांक एक on the us बिलबोर्ड 200.
A seminal work in the emerging psychedelic चट्टान स्टाइल, the एल्बम थी critically acclaimed upon रिलीज and won four Grammy Awards in 1968.
With an estimated 32 लाख नक़ल बेची, it is एक of the world 's best selling albums.
Sgt. Pepper is considered by many to be the most influential और प्रसिद्ध चट्टान एल्बम कभी, और रै महरूम नामित the महानतम एल्बम of सब समय by both All Time Top 1000 Albums and Rolling Stone.
The temporal lobe is a region of the cerebral cortex that is located beneath the lateral फिशर on दोनो दिमागी बांटती of the mammalian brain.
The temporal lobes are involved in the स्तंभन of विज़ुअल यादें, प्रसंस्करण संवेदी इनपुट, comprehending language, storing new memories, emotion, and deriving meaning.
the इंसान फेफड़े हैं the organs of respiration in humans.
इंसानो have दो फेफड़े, a सही lung and a left lung.
The right lung consists of three lobes while the left lung is slightly छोटी consisting of तभी दो निर्मोक ( the बाएँ फेफड़ों रै a `` हृदय पायदान '' allowing स्पेस लिये the heart within the chest ).
Together, the lungs contain approximately of airways and 300 to 500 million alveoli, having a कुल सतह क्षेत्रफल of परिचय ( ) in वयस्कों — roughly the same area as one side of a tennis court.
furthermore, if सब of the capillaries कि घेर the alveoli यहूद unwound and laid end to end, they would extend for about.
Each lung weighs, therefore making the संपूर्ण अंग परिचय.
इंसान फेफड़े
The trachea divides into two bronchi ( one for प्रत्येक पक्ष ) at the स्तर of T4.
This junction is भी ज्ञात as the carina.
The conducting zone contains the trachea, the bronchi, the bronchioles, और the टर्मिनल bronchioles the respiratory मण्डल contains the respiratory bronchioles, the alveolar ducts, and the alveoli.
The conducting मण्डल और the respiratory stuffers ( लकिन नहीं the alveoli ) are made up of airways.
The conducting मण्डल रै no गैस एक्सचेंज साथ the रक्त, और is reinforced with cartilage in order to hold open the airways.
The conducting मण्डल warms the एयर to और humidifies the air.
It also cleanses the air by निकालना अणु via cilia स्तिथ on the दीवारें of सब the passageways.
The lungs are घिरी by the पसली पिंजरा.
The respiratory zone is the साईट of गैस एक्सचेंज साथ रक्त.
The sympathetic nervous system via noradrenaline एक्टिंग on the बीटा receptors कल्याणकारी bronchodilation.
The parasympathetic nervous प्रणाली via acetylcholine, जिससे अधिनियमों on the m-3 muscarinic receptors, maintains the resting tone of the bronchiolar smooth muscle.
This action is related, हालांकि माना पृथक इससे bronchoconstriction.
Many other non-autonomic nervous and biochemical stimuli, सहित कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड और ऑक्सीजन, हैं भी शामिल in the विनियमन process.
The pleural cavity is the संभावित स्पेस between the parietal pleura, अस्तर the भीतरी wall of the thoracic cage, and the visceral pleura lining the lungs.
the फेफड़ों parenchyma is सख्ती प्रयुक्त to refer solely to alveolar ऊतक साथ respiratory bronchioles, alveolar ducts and terminal bronchioles.
However, it often includes any form of lung tissue, also including bronchioles, bronchi, रक्त बरतन और फेफड़ों interstitium.
The margarita is a Mexican cocktail consisting of tequila mixed with Cointreau or similar orange -flavoured liqueur और लाइम or नीबू रस, प्रायः परोसा साथ salt on the glass rim.
It is the सबसे आम tequila-based कॉकटेल in the United States.
The drink is served shaken with बर्फ ( on the रॉक्स ), blended साथ बर्फ ( frozen मार्गरिटा ), or without ice ( straight up ).
Two bottles of red Burgundy wine from gevrey-chambertin, côtes de nuits
Burgundy is a dark red color associated with the बरगंडी वाइन of the वही नाम, जिससे in फेरे is नामित बाद the बरगंडी प्रदेश of France.
The color burgundy is समान to अन्य शेड्स of अंधेरा रेड ऐसे as maroon.
When referring to the रंग, `` बरगंडी '' is प्रायः नहीं capitalized.
The first recorded use of `` बरगंडी '' as a रंग नाम in अंग्रेज़ी was in 1881.

Because his identity is अनजान, he is लापता in कार्रवाई.

Missing in action ( MIA ) is a casualty Category assigned under the Status of लापता to हथियारबंद सेवाएं कर्मियों जो हैं reported लापता दौरान क्रियाशील सेवा.
They may have महरूम मारे, wounded, become a prisoner of war, or deserted.
If deceased, neither उनके remains nor संगीन can be positively identified.
बनने मिया रै महरूम an occupational रिस्क लिये सेवा कर्मियों for as long as there has been warfare.

The जनसांख्यिकी थी 5,193 at the 2010 census.

Intense red-eye प्रभाव in ब्लू आँखें साथ dilated pupil
The red-eye effect in photography is the common रूप of रेड विद्यार्थियों in रंग छायाचित्र of eyes.
It occurs when using a फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक फ्लैश बहुत close to the camera lens ( as with most compact cameras ), in ambient low light.
The प्रभाव appears in the आँखें of इंसानो और animals that have tapetum lucidum.
नाट्य followspot ऑपरेटर, positioned nearly coincidentally साथ a very bright light and somewhat distant from the actors, occasionally witness red-eye in actors on stage.
The effect is not visible to the rest of the audience because it is reliant on the बहुत छोटी कोण between the followspot ऑपरेटर and the light.
The University of California, सांता बारबरा ( commonly referred to as uc सांता बारबरा or ucsb ) is a पब्लिक शोध विश्वविद्यालयों and one of the ten general campuses of the University of California system.
The main campus is स्तिथ on a साईट in goleta, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, संयुक्त States, from Santa Barbara and northwest of Los Angeles.
Tracing इसके जड़ें वापस to 1891 as an स्वतंत्र शिक्षक ' कॉलेज, ucsb joined the विश्वविद्यालयों of California system in 1944 and is the third-oldest general-education campus in the system.
UCSB is one of America 's Public Ivy universities, जिससे recognizes शीर्ष पब्लिक शोध विश्वविद्यालयों in the संयुक्त राज्य.
The university is a व्यापक डॉक्टरेट विश्वविद्यालयों और is व्यवस्थित into पाँच कॉलेजों और स्कूलों offering 87 undergraduate degrees and 55 graduate degrees.
The campus is the 6th-largest in the uc प्रणाली by नामांकन साथ 18,977 undergraduate और 2,950 ग्रैजुएट students.
In 2012, UCSB was ranked 41st among `` नेशनल विश्वविद्यालयों '' और 10th among पब्लिक विश्वविद्यालयों by u.S. News & World Report.
The university was also ranked 35th विश्वव्यापी by the टाइम्स उच्चतर शिक्षा संसार विश्वविद्यालयों rankings और 34th विश्वव्यापी ( 6th विश्वव्यापी लिये अभियान्त्रिकी ) by the अकादमिक रैंकिंग of संसार Universities in 2012. < ref name= '' Shanghairanking.com/FieldENG2012 '' >
UC Santa Barbara is a `` very high activity '' research university and spent $ 191.2 लाख on शोध expenditures in the 2007 फिस्कल साल, 97th-largest in the United States.
UCSB houses twelve national research centers, including the प्रसिद्ध kavli संस्थान लिये सैद्धांतिक भौतिकी.
UCSB संकाय शामिल पाँच नोबेल पुरस्कार laureates, एक फ़ील्ड medalist, 29 सदस्यों of the National Academy of Sciences, 27 members of the National Academy of Engineering, and 31 members of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences.
UCSB was the No. 3 host on the ARPAnet and was निर्वाचित to the संघ of अमरीकी विश्वविद्यालयों in 1995.
The UC Santa Barbara Gauchos compete in the ncaa प्रभाग i बिग वेस्ट Conference.
The gauchos have जीती ncaa नेशनल championships in मेन 's soccer and men 's water polo.
संत जोसेफ साथ the Infant Jesus by Guido Reni
Saint Joseph 's Day, March 19, the Feast of st. जोसेफ is in पश्चिमी christianity the प्रिंसिपल feast दिन of संत जोसेफ, जीवनसाथी of the Blessed Virgin Mary.
He is भी the step-father of Jesus of Nazareth /Jesus Christ.
It has the rank of a solemnity in the Roman कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर ; catholics जो follow the missal of 1962 celebrate it as a first class feast.
Previous to 1962 it was celebrated as a feast of the रैंक of दोगुना of the पहला क्लास.
It is a feast or commemoration in the प्रांतों of the anglican नियाज़, और a feast or festival in the Lutheran Church.
Saint Joseph 's Day is the Patronal Feast day for Poland as well as for Canada, persons नामित जोसेफ, josephine, etc., लिये धार्मिक संस्थान, स्कूलों और parishes bearing उसके name, and for carpenters.
It is also Father 's दिन in कुछ कैथोलिक देशों, मुख्यतः स्पेन, Portugal, and Italy.
March 19 was dedicated to Saint Joseph in several Western calendars by the tenth सदी, और इस कस्टम थी स्थापित in रोम by 1479.
Pope St. Pius V extended its use to the संपूर्ण रोमन रीति by उसके अपोस्टोलिक Constitution Quo Primum ( July 14, 1570 ).
Since 1969, Episcopal Conferences may, if they काश, ट्रांसफ़र it to a तिथि बाहर Lent.
Between 1870 and 1955, a feast was celebrated in honor of St. Joseph as Spouse of the Blessed Virgin Mary और संरक्षक of the सार्वभौमिक गिरिजाघर, the latter title having been given to him by Pope Pius IX.
Originally celebrated on the third Sunday after Easter with an octave, after Divino Afflatu of st. पायस x ( देखिए सुधार of the रोमन breviary by पोप पायस x ), it थी स्थानांतरित to the preceding Wednesday.
The feast was also retitled the solemnity of संत Joseph.
This celebration and its accompanying octave was abolished during the modernisation और सरलीकरण of rubrics अंतर्गत पोप पायस बारहवीं in 1955.
It is स्टिल कायम by catholics जो follow the missal of 1962 or earlier missals.
As the traditional holiday of the Apostles Ss. Philip and जेम्स, may 1, था धुंधली इससे the मेमोरी of सबसे catholics by the mid-twentieth सदी, कि of जोसेफ the कार्यकर्ता was created in order to coincide with the celebration of international Labour Day ( May Day ) in many countries.
The feast of Ss. फिलिप और जेम्स, जिससे था महरूम मनाये on कि तिथि चूंकि the sixth century, was moved from its traditional place.
In the new calendar published in 1969, the feast, जिससे at एक समय occupied the उच्चतम संभावित रैंक in the गिरिजाघर पंचांग, was reduced to an optional Memorial, the lowest rank for a saint 's day.
The Eastern Orthodox Church celebrates संत जोसेफ on the संडे बाद Christmas.
Mariah Carey ( born March 27, 1970 ) is an अमरीकी सिंगर, songwriter, रिकार्ड निर्माता, अभिनेत्री, and philanthropist.
Under the guidance of Columbia Records executive Tommy Mottola, Carey released her self-titled debut studio album Mariah Carey in 1990 ; it went multi-platinum और शाखित चार लगातार क्रमांक एक singles on the u.s. बिलबोर्ड hot 100 chart.
Following her marriage to Mottola in 1993 and success with hit रिकॉर्ड भाव ( 1991 ), Music Box ( 1993 ), and Merry Christmas ( 1994 ), Carey was established as Columbia 's highest-selling act.
Daydream ( 1995 ) made music history when its second single `` One Sweet Day ``, a duet with Boyz II Men, खर्च a रिकार्ड सोलह सप्ताह on शीर्ष of the बिलबोर्ड hot 100, और remains the longest-running number-one सोंग in u.S. चार्ट history.
दौरान the रिकॉर्डिंग of the एल्बम, कैरी began to deviate from her R & B and pop beginnings and slowly traversed into hip hop.
This musical बदलें became evident साथ the रिलीज of तितली ( 1997 ), at which time Carey had separated from Mottola.
Carey left Columbia in 2000, and signed a record-breaking $ 100 लाख रिकॉर्डिंग अनुबंध साथ वर्जिन रिकॉर्ड.
Before the release of her first feature film Glitter ( 2001 ), she suffered a शारीरिक और emotional विश्लेषण और थी hospitalized लिये severe exhaustion.
Following the film 's poor रिसेप्शन, वो थी खरीदा आउट of उसके रिकॉर्डिंग अनुबंध लिये $ 50 million, which led to a decline in her career.
She signed a multi-million dollar contract deal with Island Records in 2002, और बाद an unsuccessful काल, लौटे to the शीर्ष of म्यूज़िक चार्ट with The Emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ).
Its second single `` We belong साथ `` became उसके सबसे कामयाब सिंगल of the 2000s, और थी बाद नामित `` सोंग of the Decade '' by Billboard.
Carey एकबार again ventured into फिल्मी साथ a well-received अभिनीत भूमिका in ( 2009 ) ; वो थी awarded the `` भेदन प्रदर्शन पुरस्कार '' at the ताड़ स्रोतों अंतरराष्ट्रीय फिल्मी Festival, and Black Reel and NAACP Image Award nominations.
In a career spanning over two decades, Carey has sold more than 200 लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी, बनाना उसके एक of the best-selling म्यूज़िक कलाकारों of all time.
In 1998, she was honored as the world 's best-selling रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार of the 1990s at the संसार म्यूज़िक Awards.
Carey was also named the best-selling female artist of the मिलेनियम in 2000.
According to the रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग संघ of अमेरिका, वो is the तीसरा best-selling female artist in the United States, with 63.5 million certified albums.
With the release of `` Touch My Body `` ( 2008 ), Carey gained उसके eighteenth क्रमांक एक सिंगल in the संयुक्त राज्य, अधिक than कोई अन्य सोलो artist.
In 2012, Carey was ranked second on VH1 's सूची of the `` 100 महानतम महिलाओं in Music ''.
Aside from her commercial accomplishments, Carey रै जीती पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, 17 संसार म्यूज़िक Awards, 11 American Music Awards, and 31 Billboard Music Awards.
Referred to as the `` songbird supreme '' by the Guinness World Records, she is famed लिये उसके five-octave गायन दायरा, शक्ति, melismatic स्टाइल और हस्ताक्षर use of the whistle register.
A bumblebee is कोई सदस्य of the मधुमक्खी genus Bombus, in the family Apidae.
There are over 250 ज्ञात प्रजाति, मौजूदा primarily in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध हालांकि they also occur in South America.
They have been introduced to New जीलैंड और the ऑस्ट्रेलियाई राज्य of तस्मानिया.
Bumblebees are सोशल कीट कि हैं characterised by black and yellow body hairs, often in bands.
however, कुछ प्रजाति have नारंगी or रेड on their bodies, or may be entirely black.
Another obvious ( but not unique ) characteristic is the soft nature of the hair ( long, branched setae ), पुकारा pile, कि कवर उनके संपूर्ण देह, बनाना उन्हें appear और महसूस fuzzy.
They हैं बेहतरीन विशिष्ट इससे similarly विशाल, फजी मधुमक्खियों by the रूप of the मादा हिन्द लेग, जिससे is परिवर्धित to रूप a corbicula : a चमकदार concave सतह कि is bare, but surrounded by a fringe of hairs used to transport pollen ( in similar bees, the hind leg is completely hairy, and pollen grains are wedged into the hairs for transport ).
Like their relatives the honey bees, bumblebees फीड on मकरंद और एकत्रित pollen to feed their young.
A man openly carrying a handgun in a बर्गर King in Eagle, Colorado.
In the United States, open carry is shorthand terminology for `` खुलकर carrying a firearm in पब्लिक '', as विशिष्ट इससे concealed carry, जहाँ firearms can not be seen by the casual observer.
The practice of open carry, where gun owners खुलकर carry firearms जबकि वे go परिचय उनके रोज़ कारोबार, रै देखी an बढ़ाएँ in the U.S. in recent years.
This has been marked by a क्रमांक of व्यवस्थित कार्यक्रम intended to increase the visibility of open carry and public awareness about the practice.
proponents of खोलें carry पाइंट to इतिहास और statistics, noting that criminals usually conceal their weapons.
Encouraged by groups like OpenCarry.org, GeorgiaCarry.org and some participants of the Free State Project, open carry has seen a पुनरुद्धार in हाल सालो, लकिन it is नहीं yet साफ if इस represents just a short-term trend.
The gun rights community रै महरूम मिश्रित in इसके जवाब.
Alan Gottlieb of the Second Amendment Foundation and the NRA have been cautious in expressing support, while special-interest समूह ऐसे as the aforementioned opencarry.org और georgiacarry.org, और निश्चित नेशनल समूह ऐसे as the गन स्वामी of अमेरिका ( GOA ) have been more outspoken in favor of the practice.
Open carry is strongly opposed by gun control समूह ऐसे as the ब्रैडी अभियान और the Coalition to Stop Gun Violence.
The cattenom नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र in France.
फ़्रांस produces around तीन quarters of इसके electricity by nuclear power.
the grafenrheinfeld नाभिकीय शक्ति Plant in Germany.
Chancellor Angela Merkel 's coalition announced on may 30, 2011, कि germany’s 17 नाभिकीय शक्ति स्टेशन होगा be shut bas by 2022, in a नीति reversal following Japan 's Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster.
Currently, 68 रिएक्टरों हैं अंतर्गत निर्माण in 15 countries.
Nuclear power stations operate in तीस देशों.
In 2010, before the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster, it was reported that an average of about 10 nuclear reactors were expected to become operational per year, हालांकि according to the संसार नाभिकीय संघ, of the 17 civilian रिएक्टरों नियोजित to become operational between 2007 और 2009, only five actually came on stream.
As of जून 2011, जर्मनी and Switzerland are phasing-out nuclear power.
As of June 2011, countries such as Australia, Austria, Denmark, Greece, आयरलैंड, इटली, लातवियाई, liechtenstein, ध्वज, मलेशिया, माल्टा, नई जीलैंड, नार्वे और पुर्तगाल remain opposed to nuclear power.
रंग गति चित्र फिल्मी refers दोनो to unexposed रंग फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक फिल्मी in a स्वरूप उपयुक्त लिये उपयोग in a motion picture camera, and to finished motion picture film, ready for use in a projector, which bears images in color.
The first color cinematography थी by अर्थात् of योगात्मक रंग प्रणालियों ऐसे as the एक patented in England by Edward Raymond Turner in 1899 and tested in 1902.
A simplified योगात्मक प्रणाली थी विकसित by जार्ज अल्बर्ट स्मिथ और सफलतापूर्वक commercialized in 1909 as Kinemacolor.
These early systems used black-and-white film to photograph and project दो or अधिक घटक बिंब through अलग रंग filters.
Still from footage अंकित by एडवर्ड टर्नर in 1902
With the present-day technology, there are two distinct प्रक्रियाओं : eastman रंग ऋणात्मक 2 रसायन ( कैमरा ऋणात्मक स्टॉक्स, duplicating interpositive और internegative stocks ) and Eastman Color Positive 2 chemistry ( positive prints for direct projection ), usually abbreviated as ECN-2 and ECP-2.
Fuji 's products are संगत साथ ECN-2 and ECP-2.
Ashanti Shequoiya Douglas ( born October 13, 1980 ) is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter, रिकार्ड producer, and actress.
Ashanti is most famous for her eponymous debut album, which featured the hit song `` Foolish ``, और बेची over 503,000 नक़ल in इसके पहला सप्ताह of रिलीज throughout the U.S. in April 2002.
The album set a Soundscan रिकार्ड as the biggest खोलने सप्ताह बिक्री लिये a नई मादा कलाकार, outselling debuts by Alicia Keys and Lauryn Hill.
In the same week, she became the first female performer to simultaneously hold the top two स्थान on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 singles चार्ट साथ `` foolish '', और `` कया 's luv ? ``
( with मोटे जो ).
Ashanti broke records again by having three top ten songs, `` Foolish, '' `` What 's Luv ? '' and `` Always on Time ``, on the Billboard Hot 100 charts in the वही सप्ताह, होने the पहला स्त्री to accomplish इस feat और होने दूसरी तभी to the बीटल्स.
In 2003, the self-titled डेब्यू एल्बम जीती ashanti उसके पहला ग्रैमी Award for Best Contemporary R & B album.
As of अप्रैल 1st 2013, ashanti रै बेची over 27.7 million records worldwide.
ashanti ended the दशक ( 2000–09 ) as the तीसरा शीर्ष new R & B artist behind Alicia Keys and Beyoncé.
She also ended the decade at number 38 on the शीर्ष कलाकार of the दशक सूची.
She is currently on the list of The Twenty Best Selling Music singles चूंकि 1990 लिये उसके सिंगल foolish लिये selling 7.2 million copies to-date.
Ashanti has an estimated net लायक of $ 40 लाख डॉलर [ usd ].
Ashanti wrote and sang background on Jennifer Lopez 's `` Ai n't it मजेदार ( हत्या रिमिक्स ) ``, जिससे पहुँचे क्रमांक एक on बिलबोर्ड hot 100, जिससे थी भी in the शीर्ष 10 चार्ट at the वही time as `` Foolish '', `` Always on Time '' ( with Ja Rule ), and `` What 's Luv '' ( with Fat Joe ).
Later that year, she थी acclaimed as the `` राजकुमारी of hip-hop & r & b '' by उसके लेबल और capped off her successful debut by winning eight Billboard awards and two American Music Awards.
Within seven years of Ashanti 's करियर, वो रै scored 16 शीर्ष 40 हिट्स on the Hot 100.
Ashanti has endorsed numerous उत्पाद सहित Gap, Herbal Essences and Mudd Jeans.
Ashanti cites Whitney Houston, Janet Jackson, Prince, Madonna, Tupac Shakur, मरियम J. blige, एला fitzgerald, नशीले रॉबिन्सन, डोना गर्मियाँ, और ब्लू जादू as her musical influences.
Praised as a gifted songwriter by her peers and आलोचकों alike, ashanti रै written/co-written the bulk of all her music.
She is फिलहाल working on उसके अपना प्रकाशन कम्पनी हकदार Written Entertainment.
She released her fourth studio album हकदार the घोषणा on जून 3, 2008 और is फिलहाल in the studio working on her fifth.
She also performed the charity tune `` Just Stand up `` alongside 15 अन्य मादा गायकों लिये the `` स्टैंड up to Cancer '' live television special which helped raise $ 100 million dollars for cancer research.
The United States Army Air Forces ( USAAF or AAF ) was the military aviation arm of the United States of अमेरिका दौरान और तत्काल बाद संसार युद्ध ii, और the सीधा पूर्ववर्ती of the United States Air Force.
The AAF was a component of the United राज्य फौज, जिससे in 1942 थी विभाजित functionally by कार्यपालिका अनुक्रम into तीन autonomous शक्तियां : the Army Ground Forces, the Services of Supply ( which in 1943 became the Army Service Forces ), and the AAF.
Each of these forces had a commanding सामान्य जो reported सीधे to the मुख्य of स्टाफ of the United States Army.
The AAF administered all parts of military aviation formerly वितरित among the फौज एयर corps, सामान्य मुख्यालय एयर फ़ोर्स, और मैदान शक्तियां corps area commanders, and thus became the first air organization of the U.S. Army to control its own installations and support personnel.
In अभ्यास, the aaf थी virtually autonomous inside the Army.
The peak size of the AAF was over 2.4 million मेन और महिलाओं in सेवा और nearly 80,000 aircraft in 1944, and 783 domestic bases in December 1943.
By VE Day it had 1.25 million men stationed overseas and संचालित इससे अधिक than 1,600 airfields worldwide.
The Air Corps became the Army Air Forces in जून 1941 to provide the एयर भुजा a वृहद स्वायत्तता in जिससे to विस्तार more efficiently, and to provide a structure for the additional command echelons required by a vastly increased force.
Although other nations already had separate air forces independent of the army or नेवी ( ऐसे as the अंग्रेजों royal एयर फ़ोर्स और the जर्मनी luftwaffe ), the aaf remained a भाग of the संयुक्त राज्य फौज जबतक the संयुक्त राज्य एयर Force came into being in September 1947.
However, in its expansion और conduct of the युद्ध, the aaf became more than just an arm of the greater organization.
By the end of World War II the aaf था become वस्तुतः an independent service.
By regulation and executive order, the AAF was a subordinate agency of the War Department tasked only with organizing, प्रशिक्षण, और equipping कॉम्बैट इकाई, सीमित in जिम्मेदारी to the महाद्वीपीय संयुक्त राज्य, as were the Army Ground Forces and the Army Service Forces.
in वास्तविकता, मुख्यालय aaf नियंत्रित the conduct of सब पहलुओं of the एयर युद्ध in प्रत्येक भाग of the world, determining air policy and issuing orders without transmitting them through the Chief of Staff.
This `` contrast between theory and fact is... आधारभूत to an समझना of the aaf. ''
The Freedom of Information Act ( FOIA ) is a federal freedom of सूचना विधि कि allows लिये the पूरा or आंशिक प्रकटीकरण of previously unreleased सूचना और documents controlled by the United States government.
The Act defines agency records subject to disclosure, outlines mandatory प्रकटीकरण प्रक्रियाओं और अनुदान नौ छूटों to the statute.
It was originally signed into law by President Lyndon B. Johnson, despite उसके misgivings, on जुलाई 4, 1966 as और गई into प्रभाव the following साल.
The Federal Government 's Freedom of Information Act should नहीं be उलझन साथ the अलग और varying स्वतंत्रता of सूचना अधिनियमों passed by the individual states.
Many of those state अधिनियमों may be समान लकिन नहीं एकसमान to the federal act.
The यूरोपीय संघ ( eu ) is an आर्थिक और राजनैतिक संघ of 27 member states that are located primarily in Europe.
The EU operates through a system of supranational स्वतंत्र संस्थानों और intergovernmental negotiated निर्णय by the member states.
Institutions of the EU include the European Commission, the Council of the यूरोपीय संघ, the यूरोपीय परिषद, the अदालत of इंसाफ of the यूरोपीय संघ, the European Central Bank, the Court of Auditors, and the European Parliament.
The यूरोपीय पार्लियामेंट is elected every five years by EU citizens.
The EU 's de facto पूंजी is Brussels.
The EU traces its origins from the यूरोपीय कोयले और स्टील जातियाँ ( ecsc ) और the यूरोपीय आर्थिक जातियाँ ( eec ), formed by the भीतरी छह देशों in 1951 and 1958 respectively.
In the intervening years the community and its successors have grown in आकार by the accession of नई सदस्य राज्य और in शक्ति by the addition of policy areas to its remit.
The Maastricht सन्धि स्थापित the यूरोपीय संघ under its current name in 1993.
The latest major amendment to the संवैधानिक आधार of the EU, the Treaty of Lisbon, came into force in 2009.
The EU has developed a single market through a standardised प्रणाली of कानून कि लागू in सब सदस्य states.
Within the शेंगेन क्षेत्रफल ( जिससे शामिल 22 eu और 4 non-eu राज्य ) पासपोर्ट controls have been abolished.
EU policies aim to ensure the free movement of people, goods, सेवाएं, और पूंजी, enact विधान in इंसाफ और घर अफेयर्स, और maintain आम नीतियों on व्यापार, agriculture, fisheries and regional development.
A मौद्रिक संघ, the eurozone, थी स्थापित in 1999 and is composed of 17 member states.
through the आम विदेशी और सुरक्षा नीति the eu रै developed a role in external relations and defence.
Permanent राजनयिक मिशन have महरूम स्थापित around the world.
The EU is represented at the United राष्ट्र, the wto, the g8 और the g-20.
With a combined population of over 500 million inhabitants, or 7.3 % of the संसार जनसांख्यिकी, the eu, in 2012, उत्पन्न a नाममात्र सकल घरेलू उत्पाद ( जीडीपी ) of 16.584 खरब us डॉलर, representing लगभग 20 % of the global GDP when measured in terms of purchasing power parity, and represents the largest nominal GDP and GDP PPP in the world.
The EU was the प्राप्तकर्ता of the 2012 Nobel Peace Prize.
The Wales national rugby league team represent Wales in अंतरराष्ट्रीय रग्बी लीग फ़ुटबॉल मिलान.
Currently the team is seventh in the rlif संसार rankings.
The team were run under the auspices of the Rugby Football League, but an independent देह, वेल्स रग्बी लीग, अभी रनों the टोली इससे कार्डिफ.
A total of three Welsh players have महरूम डाला into the रग्बी लीग हॉल Of Fame.
Similar to many other Welsh national sporting टीमों, वेल्स स्ट्रिप रै महरूम primarily रेड लिये अनेक सालो, सहित now.
However in their last World Cup campaign in 2000 they did wear a shirt featuring the वेल्श ध्वज, adding a टच of green and white.
The team is known as `` The Dragons '' and so the टीमों लोगो on the कमीज़ is a रेड ड्रैगन.
The team date back to 1907, बनाना उन्हें the तीसरा oldest नेशनल पक्ष बाद England and New Zealand.
And it was a touring नई जीलैंड पक्ष कि वेल्स पहला निभाई against in 1908, winning 9-8 at Aberdare.
Since then Wales have regularly played England, since 1935 France, as well as welcomed the touring Australia and नई जीलैंड टीमों, हालांकि वे rarely toured themselves, नहीं playing a मैच in the दक्षिणी Hemisphere until 1975.
For twenty-six years Wales competed against their two biggest rivals, England and फ़्रांस, in the यूरोपीय राष्ट्र कप, जीतना the ट्रॉफी चार times.
Wales have भी competed in the संसार कप on तीन occasions, the first time being in 1975.
In 1995 and 2000 they had उनके सबसे कामयाब tournaments to तिथि, surprisingly बनाना the Semi-Finals on both occasions before being beaten by England and Australia respectively.
Wales failed to qualify लिये the 2008 संसार कप, होने the दूसरी उच्चतम क्रमित पक्ष नहीं to do so, having lost to Scotland on points difference over two matches.
In 2008 Australian John Dixon became the new सिर कोच और नियुक्त ली briers as कप्तान, having निभाई लिये Wales since 1998.
In हाल सीज़न वेल्स have लिया विशाल strides अंतर्गत पूर्व खिलाड़ी iestyn हैरिस जो रै coached वेल्स to back to back European Cup successes, which culminated in a Four Nations appearance in 2011.
Cardiomyopathy ( literally `` heart muscle disease '' ) is the measurable deterioration of the function of the myocardium ( the heart muscle ) for any reason, प्रायः अग्रणी to दिल विफलता ; आम लक्षण हैं dyspnea ( breathlessness ) और परिधीय एडिमा ( सूजन of the टाँगे ).
लोगों साथ cardiomyopathy हैं प्रायः at रिस्क of खतरनाक forms of irregular heart beat and sudden cardiac death.
The most common form of cardiomyopathy is dilated cardiomyopathy.
Fuck in its literal meaning refers to the अधिनियम of यौन मैथुन.
It is an अंग्रेज़ी शब्द कि is प्रायः प्रयुक्त as a profanity, either to denote disdain or as an intensifier.
The उत्पत्ति of the word is obscure.
It is usually considered to be पहला attested to around 1475, लकिन it may be considerably older.
In modern usage, fuck and its derivatives ( such as fucker and fucking ) can be प्रयुक्त in the स्थिति of a संज्ञा, a क्रिया, an क्रियाशील or an adverb.
वहीँ हैं अनेक आम वाक्यांश जिससे मेक उपयोग of the शब्द, as well as a number of compounds incorporating it, such as motherfucker.
Note : this article adopts the U.S. विभाग of परिवहन 's परिभाषा of a यात्री गाडी, to औसत a car or ट्रक, used for passengers, excluding buses and trains.
The United States is home to the largest यात्री गाडी मार्केट of कोई देश in the संसार.
Overall, there were an estimated 254.4 लाख पंजीकृत यात्री वाहनों in the संयुक्त राज्य according to a 2007 DOT study.
This number, साथ साथ the औसत आयु of वाहनों, रै increased steadily since 1960, indicating a growing number of vehicles per capita.
The Chinese car market, however, is poised to जल्द exceed the संयुक्त राज्य ; by the समाप्त of 2012, there were over 240 million cars on the road in China.
The United States is also home to three large vehicle manufacturers : General Motors, Ford Motor Company and क्रिसलर, जिससे have historically महरूम referred to as the `` बिग तीन. ''
Chrysler however is no longer among the शीर्ष तीन ; लकिन is क्रमांक पाँच, पीछे टोयोटा and Honda.
the मोटर car रै clearly become an अभिन्न भाग of अमरीकी life, with vehicles outnumbering licensed drivers.
Clinical प्रयोगशाला in a हॉस्पिटल सेटिंग प्रर्दशित अनेक स्वचालित analysers.
A medical laboratory or clinical laboratory is a laboratory where परीक्षण हैं किया on नैदानिक नमूनों in अनुक्रम to मिलेंगी सूचना परिचय the स्वास्थ्य of a रोगी as pertaining to the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of disease.
In poker, players construct hands of five cards according to predetermined नियम, जिससे vary according to जिससे रूपांतर of पोकर is being played.
These hands are compared using a हाथ रैंकिंग प्रणाली कि is मानक आरपार सब विसंगतियाँ of poker, the player with the highest-ranking hand winning that particular deal in most variants of poker.
In some विसंगतियाँ, the lowest-ranking hand can win or tie.
These hand rankings हैं भी प्रयुक्त in कुछ अन्य कार्ड खेल, and in poker dice.
The ranking of a particular hand is increased by including अनेक ताश of the वही कार्ड रैंक, by सब पाँच ताश होने from the same suit, or by all five cards being of consecutive rank.
The relative ranking of the various hand श्रेणी is आधारित on the संभाव्यता of being randomly dealt such a hand from a well- shuffled deck.
Bruce रान्डेल hornsby ( born नवम्बर 23, 1954 ) is an अमरीकी virtuoso ; a सिंगर, pianist, synthesizer, accordion, and dulcimer player, and songwriter.
Known for the spontaneity and creativity of his live performances, Hornsby draws अक्सर इससे शास्त्रीय, जैज़, ब्लूग्रास, लोक, motown, इन्जील, चट्टान, ब्लूज़, और jam बैंड musical परंपराओं साथ उसके songwriting और the seamless improvisations contained within.
Hornsby 's recordings have been recognised on a क्रमांक of अवसरों साथ उद्योग पुरस्कार, सहित the बेहतरीन नई कलाकार ग्रैमी in 1987 साथ ब्रूस hornsby और the दायरा, the बेहतरीन ब्लूग्रास Recording Grammy in 1990, and the Best Pop Instrumental Grammy in 1993.
Hornsby has also हासिल मान्यता लिये उसके सोलो एल्बम और प्रदर्शन, उसके touring बैंड ब्रूस hornsby और the noisemakers, उसके ब्लूग्रास प्रोजेक्ट साथ रिकी Skaggs and his appearances as a session- and guest-musician.
He also collaborated with Grateful Dead and was a member of the बैंड इससे सितंबर 1990 to कूच 1992, playing at over एक सौ shows during that period.
Sugarcane plantation in ग्रामीण क्यूबा
कृषि in क्यूबा रै निभाई an महत्वपूर्ण part in the economy for several hundred years.
Agriculture contributes कम than 10 प्रतिशत to the सकल घरेलू उत्पाद ( GDP ), but it employs roughly 20 percent of the working population.
परिचय 30 प्रतिशत of the देश 's land is used for crop cultivation.
The अकुशल agricultural उद्योग in क्यूबा has led to the need to import large amounts of foods.
Cuba now imports परिचय 80 % of the खाना it rations to the public.
The rationing कार्यक्रम खाते लिये परिचय a तीसरा of the खाना उर्जा the औसत Cuban consumes.
Overall, however, Cuba is निर्भर on imports लिये तभी 16 % of its food.
