Mega Millions ( initially पुकारा the बिग खेल आचमन लाखो as the successor of the Big Game ) is an American multi-jurisdictional $ 1 lottery game.
The first ( The Big Game ) Mega लाखो आरेखण थी in 2002 ( see below ).
The minimum Mega Millions advertised jackpot is $ 12,000,000, सशुल्क in 26 बराबर वार्षिक किश्तों ( जबतक the cash option is chosen ) ; usually, the jackpot increases when there is no top-prize winner.
However, despite no जैकपॉट विजेता लिये the $ 12,000,000 दिसम्बर 18, 2012 आरेखण, the jackpot remained at $ 12,000,000 for the drawing to be held on December 21.
( See below लिये सूचना on कैसा the game 's jackpot is funded. )
Reflecting common practice among American lotteries, the जैकपॉट is advertised as a नाममात्र मान of annual installments.
A cash value विकल्प ( the usual चुनाव ), जब चुनी by a जैकपॉट विजेता ( देखिए नीचे ), pays the approximate present value of the installments.
Mega लाखो फिलहाल उपयोग a 5/56 ( श्वेत गेंदें ) प्लस 1/46 ( the आचमन बॉल ) double matrix to select its winning numbers.
Each game लागत $ 1.
In 43 of the 44 Mega Millions jurisdictions ( कैलिफ़ोर्निया is the एक्सेप्शन ), वहीँ is an विकल्प, पुकारा megaplier ( ऐसे खेल are $ 2 each ) where non-jackpot prizes are multiplied by 2, 3, or 4.
The Megaplier was made available to all Mega लाखो jurisdictions in जनवरी 2011 ; it began as a टेक्सास -only option.
Mega लाखो is drawn at 10:59 p.m. पूर्वी समय मंगलवार and Fridays, including holidays.
Mega Millions is administered by a consortium of इसके 12 original lotteries and the drawings are held at WSB-TV in Atlanta, Georgia.
पर्यवेक्षित by the Georgia Lottery.
The largest jackpot in Mega Millions, as well as in American lottery history, was $ 656,000,000 annuitized ( with a cash option of $ 474,000,000 ) लिये the कूच 30, 2012 आरेखण in जिससे वहीँ यहूद three jackpot-winning tickets ; one each in Illinois, Kansas, and Maryland.
All three tickets था महरूम claimed as of अप्रैल 18, साथ प्रत्येक नियत of winners choosing the cash option.
is a जापानी manga श्रेणी निर्मित by लेखक tsugumi Ohba and manga artist Takeshi Obata.
The main अक्षर is लाइट yagami, a ऊँची स्कूल छात्र जो discovers a अलौकिक notebook, the `` Death Note '', dropped on Earth by a shinigami ( a god of death ) named Ryuk.
the मौत नोट अनुदान इसके उपयोक्ता the क्षमता to kill anyone whose name and face they know, by writing the name in the notebook while picturing their face.
The series centers around Light 's attempt to create and rule a world `` cleansed of evil '' as `` परमेश्वर '' using the कोपी, और the प्रयत्न of a जासूस known as L to stop him.
Death Note was first serialized in 108 अध्याय by shueisha in the जापानी manga magazine Weekly Shōnen Jump from December 2003 to May 2006.
The series was also published in tankōbon format in Japan starting in May 2004 और समाप्ति in अक्तूबर 2006 साथ a total of thirteen volumes.
the दुश्मनी श्रेणी aired in Japan from October 3, 2006, to June 26, 2007.
Composed of 37 episodes, the दुश्मनी थी विकसित by Madhouse and directed by Tetsuro Araki.
A light novel based on the श्रेणी, लिखा by nisio isin, थी released in Japan.
additionally, विभिन्न वीडियो games have been published by Konami for Nintendo DS.
The series was adapted into live-action films released in जापानी on जून 17, 2006, नवम्बर 3, 2006, और फ़रवरी 2, 2008.
Viz Media licensed the Death Note manga in North America and has published सब the बारह आयतन इससे the श्रेणी, a 13th आवाज़ जिससे serves as a `` reader 's guide '', as well as the light novels.
The episodes from the anime पहला appeared in उत्तर अमेरिका as downloadable by IGN.
Viz later licensed the दुश्मनी श्रेणी और it aired on bionix in कनाडा और on कार्टून संजाल in the United States.
The live-action films briefly निभाई in certain North American theaters since 2008.
However, none of the video games have thus far महरूम प्रकाशित in उत्तर अमेरिका or यूरोपीय.
Death Note is one of Weekly shōnen jumps best-selling manga श्रेणी of सब समय, साथ बिक्री over 26.5 million copies.
हैलोवीन or hallowe'en ( a संकुचन of `` सब hallows ' संध्या `` ), भी ज्ञात as सब hallows ' संध्या, is a वार्षिक जश्न observed in a number of countries on October 31, the eve of the Western Christian feast of All Hallows ( or All Saints ) and the day initiating the triduum of Hallowmas.
according to अनेक विद्वानों, सब hallows ' Eve is a Christianised feast originally influenced by western European harvest festivals, and festivals of the dead with possible pagan roots, particularly the Celtic Samhain.
Other विद्वानों maintain कि it originated independently of Samhain and has solely Christian roots.
Typical festive हैलोवीन क्रियाएँ शामिल trick-or-treating ( भी ज्ञात as `` guising `` ), उपस्थित वेशभूषा पार्टियों, नक्काशी pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns, lighting bonfires, ठहराना bobbing, visiting haunted attractions, playing pranks, telling scary stories, and watching horror films.
नई यॉर्क नगर taxicabs दौरान Midtown rush hour in Manhattan
The taxicabs of New York City, with उनके distinctive पीला पेंट, हैं a widely recognized icon of the city.
Taxicabs are operated by private companies and licensed by the नई यॉर्क नगर टैक्सी और लिमोज़ीन Commission ( TLC ).
It भी oversees over 40,000 अन्य for-hire वाहनों, सहित `` ब्लैक गाड़ियाँ '', commuter vans and ambulettes.
`` Medallion taxis, '' the familiar yellow कैब, हैं the तभी वाहनों in the नगर permitted to चुनें up यात्री in response to a street hail.

Xylem is one of the दो प्रकार of हस्तांतरण ऊतक in vascular plants ( phloem is the other ).
The word जाइलम is निकला इससे the यूनानी शब्द ξύλον ( xylon ), अर्थ `` लकडी '' ; the best-known xylem tissue is wood, though it is found throughout the plant.
Its basic function is to transport water, but it भी transports कुछ nutrients through the plant.
U.S. women suffragists demonstrating लिये the सही to vote, फ़रवरी 1913.
Women 's suffrage भी ज्ञात as स्त्री suffrage is the सही of women to vote and to run for office.
Limited मतदान अधिकारों यहूद gained by महिलाओं in स्वीडन, फिनलैंड और some western U.S. states in the late 19th century.
International organizations were formed to coordinate efforts, विशेषकर the अंतरराष्ट्रीय परिषद of महिलाओं ( 1888 ) और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय स्त्री suffrage Alliance ( 1904 ).
In 1893, New Zealand, then a self-governing British colony, granted adult women the right to vote and the self-governing अंग्रेजों उपनिवेश of दक्षिण ऑस्ट्रेलिया किया the वही in 1895, लकिन भी permitted women to run for office.
Australia federated in 1901, and women acquired the right to vote और स्टैंड in संघीय चुनावों इससे 1902, हालांकि uneven प्रतिबंध on Aboriginal women voting in national elections were not completely removed until 1962.
The first European country to introduce women 's suffrage was the ग्रैंड duchy of फिनलैंड, तब भाग of the रूसी साम्राज्य, जिससे भी उत्पादित the संसार 's पहला मादा members of parliament in the 1907 parliamentary elections.
नार्वे followed, granting full women 's suffrage in 1913.
In most Western देशों, महिलाओं 's suffrage आए बाद संसार i युद्ध I I, with some important late adopters being France in 1944 and Switzerland in 1971.
Women 's suffrage रै generally महरूम पहचाना बाद राजनैतिक campaigns to obtain it were waged.
in अनेक देशों it थी granted पहले universal suffrage.
Women 's suffrage is explicitly stated as a right under the Convention on the Elimination of सब फ़ॉर्म of पक्षपात विरूद्ध महिलाओं, अपनाया by the संयुक्त Nations in 1979.
The Thirteenth Tale ( 2006 ) by डायने setterfield is a गोथिक suspense novel, the author 's first published book.
Jehovah 's Witnesses is a millenarian restorationist Christian denomination with nontrinitarian beliefs distinct from mainstream Christianity.Sources for descriptors : • Millenarian : • Restorationist : • Christian : • Denomination : The organization reports worldwide membership of over 7.78 लाख adherents शामिल in इंजीलवाद, सम्मेलन उपस्थिति of over 12 लाख, और सालाना मेमोरियल उपस्थिति of over 19 million.
They are directed by the Governing Body of Jehovah 's गवाह, a समूह of बड़ो in ब्रुकलीन, नई यॉर्क, कि establishes सब doctrines.
Jehovah 's Witnesses ' मान्यताओं हैं आधारित on उनके interpretations of the बाइबल और वे prefer to use their own translation, the New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures.
They believe कि the विनाश of the उपस्थित संसार प्रणाली at armageddon is निकट, और कि the स्थापना of God 's kingdom on earth is the only solution for all problems faced by mankind.
The group emerged from the Bible Student movement —founded in the लेट 1870s by चार्ल्स taze रसेल साथ the गठन of zion 's देखें मीनार ट्रैक्ट समाज —with significant organizational and doctrinal changes under the leadership of Joseph Franklin Rutherford.
The name Jehovah 's witnesses, based on Isaiah 43:10–12, थी अपनाया in 1931 to फर्क themselves इससे अन्य बाइबल छात्र समूह और symbolize a ब्रेक साथ the legacy of Russell 's traditions.
Jehovah 's Witnesses are best known for their door-to-door preaching, distributing साहित्य ऐसे as the बुर्ज और जाग !
, and refusing military सेवा और रक्त transfusions.
They consider use of the नाम यहोवा vital लिये proper worship.
They reject Trinitarianism, inherent immortality of the soul, and hellfire, जिससे वे consider to be unscriptural doctrines.
They do not observe Christmas, ईस्टर, जन्मदिन, or अन्य छुट्टियाँ और कस्टम वे consider to have pagan origins incompatible with Christianity.
Adherents commonly refer to उनके देह of मान्यताओं as `` the सच्चाई '' और consider themselves to be `` in the truth ''.
They consider secular समाज to be morally भ्रष्ट और अंतर्गत the influence of शैतानी, और सबसे सीमा उनके social interaction with non-Witnesses.
संकीर्तन अनुशासनात्मक क्रियाएँ शामिल disfellowshipping, उनके term for formal expulsion and shunning.
Baptized individuals जो formally छोड़ हैं माना disassociated and are also shunned.
Disfellowshipped and disassociated individuals may आखिरकार be reinstated if deemed repentant.
The religion 's position regarding conscientious objection to military service and refusal to सलाम नेशनल ध्वज रै brought it into विरोध साथ कुछ सरकारें.
Consequently, यहोवा 's गवाह have महरूम persecuted और उनके क्रियाएँ हैं banned or restricted in some countries.
Persistent विधिक चुनौतियां by यहोवा 's गवाह have बहकावे legislation related to civil rights in several countries.
पिछला टैंगो in पेरिस ( ) is a 1972 franco-italian रोमांटिक नाटक फिल्मी निर्देशित by बर्नार्डो bertolucci जिससे portrays a recent American widower who begins an anonymous sexual relationship with a young, betrothed Parisian woman.
it सितारों मार्लोन ब्रैंडो, मरिया श्नाइडर, and Jean-Pierre Léaud.
The film 's raw portrayal of sexual violence and emotional turmoil led to अंतरराष्ट्रीय विवाद और खींचा विभिन्न स्तर of government censorship.
The MPAA gave the फिल्मी an x दरजा upon release in the United States.
After revisions यहूद बना to the mpaa दरजा code, it was classified as an NC-17 in 1997.
MGM released a censored r-rated काटें in 1981.
The film has its nc-17 दरजा लिये `` कुछ सुस्पष्ट sexual content. ''
Windows XP is an ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली उत्पादित by microsoft लिये उपयोग on निजी कंप्यूटर, including home and business desktops, laptops and media centers.
पहला released to कंप्यूटर निर्माताओं on अगस्त 24, 2001, it is the दूसरी सबसे लोकप्रिय version of Windows, based on installed user base.
The name `` XP '' is short for `` eXPerience '', highlighting the उन्नत उपयोक्ता अनुभव.
Windows XP, the successor to Windows 2000 and Windows ME, was the पहला consumer-oriented operating system produced by Microsoft to be built on the Windows NT kernel.
खिड़कियाँ xp थी released विश्वव्यापी लिये खुदरा बिक्री on अक्तूबर 25, 2001, and over 400 million copies were in use in January 2006.
It was succeeded by खिड़कियाँ विस्टा in जनवरी 2007.
Direct OEM and retail sales of खिड़कियाँ xp ceased on जून 30, 2008.
Microsoft continued to sell Windows XP through their System Builders ( smaller oems जो बेचें समवेत कंप्यूटर ) कार्यक्रम until January 31, 2009.
On April 10, 2012, Microsoft reaffirmed that extended support for Windows XP and Office 2003 would end on अप्रैल 8, 2014 और सुझाया कि प्रशासकों शुरू तैयारी to migrate to a newer OS.
The NT -based versions of Windows, which are programmed in C, C++, and सभा, हैं ज्ञात लिये उनके improved stability and efficiency over the 9x versions of Microsoft Windows.
Windows XP presented a significantly redesigned graphical user इंटरफ़ेस, a बदलें microsoft प्रचारित as अधिक user-friendly than पिछला संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ.
In an attempt to further ameliorate the `` DLL hell `` that plagued the past संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ, improved side-by-side सभा प्रौद्योगिकी in खिड़कियाँ xp allows side-by-side संस्थापना, पंजीकरण और सर्विसिंग of अनेक संस्करण of globally साझा तन्त्र components in full isolation.
it is भी the पहला संस्करण of Windows to use product activation to combat illegal copying.
During Windows XP 's विकास, the प्रोजेक्ट थी codenamed `` whistler '', बाद whistler, अंग्रेजों कोलंबिया, as अनेक microsoft employees skied at the Whistler-Blackcomb ski resort.
According to web analytics data generated by Net अनुप्रयोग, खिड़कियाँ xp थी the सबसे widely प्रयुक्त ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली until August 2012, when Windows 7 overtook it.
, Windows XP market share is at 38.99 %, having decreased almost every month since at least नवम्बर 2007, the पहला माह लिये जिससे आंकडे are publicly available from Net Applications.
`` Por una Cabeza '' is an Argentine tango साथ म्यूज़िक और गीत लिखा in 1935 by कार्लोस gardel और अल्फ्रेडो le Pera respectively.
the नाम is a स्पेनी horse-racing phrase अर्थ `` by a सिर '', जिससे refers to a horse winning a race by the length of one head.
The lyrics speak of a compulsive horse-track gambler who compares उसके व्यसन लिये घोड़े साथ उसके attraction to women.
Alfredo Le Pera was a Brazilian from São Paulo, a much Italian-influenced area in ब्राज़ील, और भी the जन्मस्थान of zequinha de abreu, composer of tico-tico no Fubá.
Le Pera and gardel died in an वायुयान क्रैश in medellín, ( Colombia ), on June 24, 1935.
पोर ऊना Cabeza
The tango has since been performed by numerous टैंगो orchestras.
Tango scenes with `` Por una Cabeza '' appear in Delicatessen ( 1991 ), Scent of a Woman ( 1992 ), Schindler 's List ( 1993 ), True झूठ ( 1994 ), टाइटैनिक ( 1996 ), ख़राब सांता ( uncut संस्करण, 2003 ), सब the किंग 's Men ( 2006 ), Planet 51 ( 2009 ), episode 37 of Nip/Tuck ( 2003–2010 ), episode 9 of South Korean drama series Sweet Spy ( 2005–08 ), the beginning and ending credits of the South Korean drama broadcast I 'm Sorry, I Love You ( 2004 ), and the episode `` Down the Rabbit Hole `` ( 2007 ).
In the फिल्म frida ( सलमा हायेक, 2002 ), Gardel is heard singing it on a radio.
It is भी कोटेड in दाउद डेल Tredici 's `` Good News !
Nilda is Back '' ( इससे the सोंग साईकिल Miz Inez Sez ).
In Scent of a Woman ( 1992 ), the tango is performed by the `` The Tango Project '', who actually appear in the नाचना झाँकी अभिनीत al पचिनो ( the रिकॉर्डिंग प्रयुक्त is उपलब्धियाँ on one of their CD albums ).
John विलियम्स arranged a संस्करण of the टुकड़ा कि appears on the एल्बम `` सिनेमा Serenade '' with the violin solo performed by Itzhak Perlman.
Perlman and Williams ( conducting ) have भी performed the टुकड़ा साथ in सजीव concerts.
In 2012 a dance version was released by the समूह `` da करेरा '' featuring the असली vocal recording by Carlos Gardel.
The baroreflex or baroreceptor reflex is एक of the देह 's homeostatic mechanisms for maintaining blood pressure.
It provides a negative feedback लूप in जिससे an elevated रक्त दबाव reflexively कल्याणकारी दिल रेट to घटी इसलिए causing blood pressure to decrease ; likewise, decreased blood pressure activates the baroreflex, causing heart rate to increase thus causing an increase in blood pressure.
The system relies on specialized न्यूरॉन्स, ज्ञात as baroreceptors, in the aortic मेहराब, carotid साइनस, and elsewhere to monitor changes in blood pressure and relay them to the brainstem.
Subsequent changes in blood pressure are mediated by the autonomic बेचैन प्रणाली.
Atrial natriuretic peptide forms a parallel negative feedback loop in an endocrinological कंट्रास्ट to the renin-angiotensin प्रणाली.
The Loma Prieta earthquake, भी ज्ञात as the भूकंप of '89 और the संसार श्रेणी भूकंप, थी a प्रमुख भूकंप कि struck the सैन Francisco Bay Area of California on October 17, 1989, at 5:04 pm local time.
Caused by a slip along the San Andreas Fault, the quake lasted 10–15 सेकेंड और measured 6.9 on दोनो the पल परिमाण स्केल ( surface-wave magnitude 7.1 ) and on the open-ended Richter Scale.
The quake killed 63 people throughout northern California, injured 3,757 और बाएँ कुछ 3,000–12,000 लोगों बेघर.
The earthquake occurred during the warm-up practice for the third game of the 1989 World Series, featuring both of the Bay Area 's प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल टीमों, the ओकलैंड एथलेटिक्स और the सैन Francisco Giants.
Because of game-related खेल कवरेज, इस थी the पहला प्रमुख भूकंप in the United States to have its initial jolt broadcast live on television.

The pawn ( ♙♟ ) is the most numerous and in most हालातों the weakest टुकड़ा in the खेल of शतरंज, historically representing infantry or, more particularly, armed peasants or pikemen.
In chess, each player begins the खेल साथ आठ प्यादे, एक on प्रत्येक वर्गाकार of the रैंक तत्काल in front of the other pieces.
( In algebraic notation, the white pawns start on a2, b2, c2,..., h2, while black प्यादे प्रारंभ on a7, b7, c7,..., h7. )
Individual pawns are referred to by the संचिका on जिससे they stand.
For उदाहरण, एक बोलती of `` श्वेत 's f-pawn '' or `` ब्लैक 's b-pawn '', or कम commonly ( using descriptive notation ), `` White 's king 's bishop pawn '' or `` Black 's queen 's knight pawn ''.
It is also common to refer to a rook pawn, meaning कोई साहूकार on the a- or h-file, a नाईट साहूकार ( on the b- or g-file ), a बिशप साहूकार ( on the c- or f-file ), a queen pawn ( on the d-file ), a king pawn ( on the e-file ), and a central pawn ( on either the d- or e-file ).
The military forces of the world have differing approaches to the enlistment of homosexual ( gay and lesbian ) and bisexual individuals.
The armed forces of most developed countries have अभी removed नीतियों excluding non-heterosexual individuals ( साथ सख्त policies on sexual harassment ).
Nations that permit gay people to serve openly in the military include the 4 of the 5 members of the UN Security Council ( United राज्य, संयुक्त किंगडम, फ़्रांस, और रूस ), the गणतंत्र of चीन ( ताईवान ), ऑस्ट्रेलिया, इसराईल, दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी, अर्जेंटीना, और सब नाटो सदस्यों excluding Turkey.
हाइड्रोजन उत्पादन is the परिवार of औद्योगिक methods for generating hydrogen.
Currently the dominant प्रौद्योगिकी लिये सीधा उत्पादन is भाप reforming from hydrocarbons.
अनेक अन्य विधि हैं known including electrolysis and thermolysis.
In 2006, the United States was estimated to have a उत्पादन क्षमता of 11 लाख टन of hydrogen.
5 million tonnes of hydrogen were consumed on-site in आयल शोधन, और in the उत्पादन of अमोनिया ( haber प्रक्रम ) और methanol ( reduction of carbon monoxide ).
0.4 लाख टन यहूद an incidental by-product of the chlor-alkali process.
Hydrogen production is an अनुमानित $ 100 अरब उद्योग.
A basis point ( often denoted as bp, colloquially referred to in the plural as `` bips '', भी ज्ञात as a `` बीप '' ) is a ईकाई बराबर to एक hundredth of a प्रतिशत पाइंट, or one part per ten thousand, 1/10000.
The same unit is also ( rarely ) called a permyriad, literally meaning 'for ( every ) myriad ( ten thousand ) ', and in that context is written साथ जिससे looks जैसे a प्रतिशत चिह्न ( % ) साथ दो अतिरिक्त zeroes at the समाप्त ( जैसे a stylized रूप of the चार zeros in the denominator, हालांकि it originates as a natural extension of the percent ( % ) and permille ( ‰ ) signs ).
A basis point is पारिभाषित as:
1 basis point = 1 permyriad = one one-hundredth प्रतिशत
1 bp = 1 = 0.01 % = 0.1‰ = 10−4 = = 0.0001
1 % = 100 bp = 100
Basis points are used as a convenient unit of मापन in contexts जहाँ प्रतिशत मतभेद of कम than 1 % are discussed.
The most common उदाहरण is ब्याज दरों, जहाँ मतभेद in ब्याज दरों of कम than 1 % प्रति साल are usually meaningful to talk about.
For example, a difference of 0.10 percentage points is equivalent to a change of 10 basis points ( e.g. a 4.67 % रेट increases by 10 आधार points to 4.77 % ).
Like percentage points, basis points avoid the ambiguity between सापेक्ष और निरपेक्ष चर्चाएँ परिचय ब्याज दरों by dealing तभी साथ the absolute change in numeric value of a rate.
For example, if a report says there has been a `` 1 % increase '' from a 10 % ब्याज रेट, इस could refer to an बढ़ाएँ either इससे 10 % to 10.1 % ( सापेक्ष, 1 % of 10 % ), or from 10 % to 11 % ( absolute, 1 % plus 10 % ).
If, however, the report says there has been a `` 10 basis point increase '' from a 10 % interest rate, तब we जान कि the ब्याज रेट of 10 % रै increased by 0.10 % ( the निरपेक्ष बदलें ) to a 10.1 % rate.
It is common practice in the financial उद्योग to उपयोग आधार अंक to denote a रेट बदलें in a वित्तीय यंत्र, or the अंतर ( स्प्रेड ) between two interest rates, including the yields of fixed-income securities.
Since certain loans and bonds may commonly be quoted in संबंध to कुछ अनुक्रमणिका or underlying सुरक्षा, वे होगा प्रायः be कोटेड as a स्प्रेड over ( or अंतर्गत ) the index.
For example, a loan that bears interest of 0.50 % per annum ऊपर the लंदन interbank offered रेट ( libor ) is कहा to be 50 आधार अंक over libor, जिससे is commonly expressed as `` L+50bps '' or simply `` L+50 ''.
The पद `` आधार पाइंट '' रै इसके origins in व्यापार the `` basis '' or the spread between two interest rates.
चूंकि the आधार is प्रायः छोटी, ये हैं कोटेड multiplied up by 10000, and hence a `` full point '' movement in the `` basis '' is a basis point.
कंट्रास्ट साथ pips in FX forward markets.
The relationship between percentage changes and basis points can be summarized as फ़ॉलो : 1 प्रतिशत पाइंट बदलें = 100 आधार अंक, और 0.01 प्रतिशत अंक = 1 basis point.
So, a bond whose yield increases from 5 % to 5.5 % is said to increase by 50 basis अंक ; or ब्याज दरों कि have risen 1 प्रतिशत पाइंट हैं कहा to have increased by 100 basis points.
The British Royal परिवार is the समूह of बंद relatives of the monarch of the United Kingdom.
The term is also commonly applied to the same group of people who are the relations of the monarch in her or his role as sovereign of कोई of the अन्य राष्ट्रमंडल realms, यूँ sometimes at variance साथ आधिकारिक नेशनल शर्तें for the family.
Members of the Royal Family belong to, either by जनम or विवाह, the हाउस of विंडसर, चूंकि 1917, जब जार्ज v बदला the name of the royal house from Saxe-Coburg and Gotha.
This decision was primarily taken because Britain and her Empire were at war with Germany and given the British Royal Family 's strong जर्मनी ancestry ; it थी लगा कि इसके पब्लिक चित्र could be improved by चुनना a अधिक अंग्रेजों house name.
The new name चुनी, विंडसर, था बिल्कुल no कनेक्शन अन्य than as the name of the castle which was and continues to be a royal residence.
Although in the United Kingdom there is no strict legal or formal definition of who is or is not a member of the Royal Family, and different lists will include different people, those carrying the style Her or His majesty ( hm ), or उसके or उसके royal highness ( hrh ) हैं सदा माना सदस्यों, जिससे प्रायः परिणाम in the अनुप्रयोग of the पद to the monarch, the consort of the monarch, the विधवा consorts of पिछला monarchs, the children of the monarch और पिछला monarchs, the male-line grandchildren of the monarch and previous monarchs, and the spouses and the widows of a monarch 's and previous monarch 's sons and male-line grandsons.
On 30 November 1917, King George V जारी अक्षर पेटेंट धमक जो हैं सदस्यों of the Royal Family ; the text of the notice from the London Gazette is as follows:
In 1996, Her Majesty The Queen modified ये अक्षर पेटेंट, as थी evidenced by इस सूचना इससे the London Gazette:
In 2013 Letters Patent were issued to extend a शीर्षक और a स्टाइल borne by सदस्यों of the royal परिवार to additional persons to be born, evidenced by this Notice from the London Gazette:
Members and relatives of the British Royal Family historically represented the monarch in various places throughout the British Empire, sometimes for extended अवधि as viceroys, or लिये विशिष्ट ceremonies or events.
Today, वे प्रायः perform ceremonial और सोशल कर्तव्य throughout the संयुक्त किंगडम and abroad on behalf of the United Kingdom.
Aside from the monarch, their only संवैधानिक भूमिका in the अफेयर्स of सरकारी is to serve, if योग्य और जब नियुक्त by अक्षर पेटेंट, as a काउंसलर of राज्य, दो or अधिक of जिसको कसरत the प्राधिकार of the Crown ( within stipulated limits ) in the indisposal or absence from the British realm of the monarch.
In the other realms of the राष्ट्रमंडल रॉयल्टी do नहीं serve as Counsellors of State.
However in each such realm the monarch 's family members may act on निमित्त of, हैं वित्तपोषित by, और represent the sovereign of that particular state, and not the United Kingdom.
The Queen, her consort, her children and grandchildren, as well as all पूर्व अधिपति ' children और grandchildren थाम स्थान in the पहला भाग of the आधिकारिक आदेश of पूर्वता in इंग्लैण्ड और वेल्स, स्कॉटलैंड, and Northern Ireland.
Wives of the said enjoy their husbands ' precedence, and husbands of राजकुमारियों हैं unofficially लकिन habitually लगाई साथ their wives as well.
However, the Queen changed the private order of precedence in the Royal Family in favour of Princesses Anne and Alexandra, who henceforth take private precedence over the duchess of कॉर्नवॉल, जो is वरना the फ्रेम 's उच्चतम रैंकिंग स्त्री बाद the महारानी herself.
She did not alter the relative precedence of other born-princesses, ऐसे as the बेटियां of उसके younger बेटे.
Haiti ( ; Haitian Creole Ayiti ), officially the गणतंत्र of हैती ( ; ), is a caribbean country.
it occupies the पश्चिमी, छोटी portion of the द्वीप of हिस्पानिओला, in the Greater Antillean archipelago, which it shares with the Dominican Republic.
ayiti ( जमीन of ऊँची kyu ) थी the स्वदेशी taíno or amerindian name for the island.
The country 's उच्चतम पाइंट is pic la selle, at.
The total क्षेत्रफल of हैती is और इसके पूंजी is Port-au-Prince.
Haitian Creole and फ्रेंच हैं the आधिकारिक भाषाएं.
Haiti 's regional, ऐतिहासिक, और ethno-linguistic स्थिति is unique for several reasons.
It was the first independent nation of Latin America and the caribbean, the पहला ब्लैक -led गणतंत्र in the संसार, और the दूसरी गणतंत्र in the americas when it gained independence in 1804 as part of a successful slave revolution lasting nearly a decade.
In 2012, हैती घोषित इसके इरादे to तलाश associate membership status in the African Union.
Haiti is the most populous of the predominantly Francophone स्वतंत्र राष्ट्र in the americas.
It is one of only two independent nations in the Americas ( along with Canada ) to designate French as an official language ; the अन्य french-speaking क्षेत्रों हैं सब विदेशी départements, or collectivités, of France.
Haiti is the most populous full member-state of the caribbean Community ( CARICOM ).
It is the poorest देश in the americas as measured by the Human Development Index.
Political हिंसा रै occurred regularly throughout इसके इतिहास, leading to government instability.
Most recently, in February 2004, a coup d'état originating in the उत्तर of the देश मजबूर the इस्तीफा और निर्वासन of President Jean-Bertrand Aristide.
A अस्थायी सरकारी took कंट्रोल साथ सुरक्षा provided by the United Nations Stabilization Mission in Haiti ( MINUSTAH ).
Michel Martelly, the वर्तमान अध्यक्ष, थी निर्वाचित in the haitian general election, 2011.
The island has had a इतिहास of destructive earthquakes.
A 7.0 magnitude भूकंप struck हैती on 12 जनवरी 2010 और तबाह port-au-prince.
The highest विश्वसनीय मौत गिनती was estimated at 220,000.
Haitian government estimates यहूद उच्चतर.
The Presidential palace, Parliament and many other important structures यहूद नष्ट, साथ साथ अनगिनत घरों और व्यवसायों, leaving सैंकड़ों of हज़ारों of people homeless.
The country has yet to recover from the 2010 earthquake ( and subsequent incidents ) due to both the severity of the damage हैती endured in 2010, as खूब as a सरकारी कि थी अप्रभावी खूब पहले the भूकंप.
United राज्य सहायता संगठन have donated $ 2 billion.
Combined with other international donations, ये निधि हैं intended to योगदान to the पुनर्निर्माण of the country.
The Bloody Beetroots is the pseudonym of Sir Bob Cornelius rifo, the इतालवी इलेक्ट्रो हाउस और dance-punk म्यूज़िक निर्माता, DJ and photographer.
The Bloody Beetroots is well-known लिये the ब्लैक venom मुखौटा he wears during performances.
In fact, the only identifying public feature of Rifo is the साल `` 1977 '' tattooed आरपार उसके छाती, जिससे is दोनो the year that the producer and punk-rock was born.
`` The Bloody beetroots dj नियत '' contains सर bob कॉर्नेलियस Rifo and Tommy Tea.

A pager is a wireless telecommunications device that receives और प्रदर्शक न्यूमेरिक or टेक्स्ट संदेश, or receives and announces voice messages.
One-way pagers can only receive messages, while response pagers और two-way pagers can भी acknowledge, reply to, and originate messages using an internal transmitter.
Pagers operate as भाग of a paging प्रणाली जिससे शामिल एक or अधिक फिक्स्ड transmitters ( or in the case of response pagers and two-way pagers, one or more base stations ), as well as a number of pagers carried by mobile users.
These systems can range from a रेस्तरां प्रणाली साथ a सिंगल low-power ट्रांसमीटर, to a देशभर प्रणाली साथ हज़ारों of high-power base stations.
One of the पहला व्यावहारिक paging सेवाएं थी launched in 1950 for physicians in the New York City area.
Physicians paid us $ 12 प्रति माह लिये the सेवा और carried a ( 6 oz ) पेजर that would receive phone messages within ( 25 mi ) of a single transmitter tower.
The system was manufactured by the reevesound कम्पनी और संचालित by telanswerphone.
In 1960, John Francis Mitchell combined elements of मोटोरोला 's walkie talkie और ऑटोमोबाइल रेडियो technologies to बनाएँ the पहला transistorized पेजर, और इससे इस point, paging technology continued to advance, and pager adoption continued to expand, until the early 1990s.
However, by the mid-1990s, as सेल्यूलर technologies became सस्ता और अधिक widely उपलब्धियाँ, advanced services began to displace paging as a commercial product.
Today, pagers exist largely as niche उत्पाद, ढूंढना preferential उपयोग in अनुप्रयोग ऐसे as अस्पताल, पब्लिक सुरक्षा, और खुदरा स्थितियाँ where their simplicity, high reliability, and low cost represent significant advantages.
Reevesville is a कस्बा in dorchester काउंटी, South Carolina, United States.
the जनसांख्यिकी थी 196 at the 2010 census.
As defined by the U.S. Office of Management and Budget, और प्रयुक्त by the u.S. जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो लिये सांख्यिकीय उद्देश्य तभी, reevesville is शामिल भीतर the Charleston-North Charleston-Summerville metropolitan area.
Frida Kahlo de Rivera ( born Magdalena Carmen Frieda Kahlo y calderón ; जुलाई 6, 1907 – जुलाई 13, 1954 ) थी a मैक्सिकन चित्रकार, born in Coyoacán, who is best known for her self-portraits.
Kahlo 's life began and ended in मैक्सिको नगर, in उसके घर ज्ञात as the Blue House.
She दिया उसके जनम तिथि as जुलाई 7, 1910, लकिन उसके जनम certificate shows July 6, 1907.
Kahlo had allegedly wanted the year of her birth to coincide with the year of the beginning of the Mexican revolution so कि उसके जीवन होता शुरू साथ the जनम of आधुनिक मैक्सिको.
Her work has been celebrated in Mexico as emblematic of national and indigenous परंपरा, और by नारीवादी लिये इसके uncompromising चित्रण of the female experience and form.
Mexican culture and Amerindian cultural tradition are important in her work, which has महरूम sometimes characterized as naïve आर्ट or folk art.
Her work has also been described as `` surrealist '', and in 1938 André Breton, principal initiator of the surrealist movement, वर्णित kahlo 's आर्ट as a `` रिबन around a bomb ''.
Kahlo had a volatile marriage साथ the प्रसिद्ध मैक्सिकन कलाकार डिएगो Rivera.
वो suffered lifelong health problems.
Many of her health problems were the result of a ट्रैफ़िक दुर्घटना वो बच as a किशोरावस्था.
Recovering from उसके चोटों पृथक उसके इससे अन्य लोगों और इस अलगाव बहकावे her works, many of which are self-portraits of one sort or another.
Kahlo suggested, `` I paint खुद क्युकी i am so प्रायः अलोन और क्युकी i am the subject I know best. ''
She also stated, `` I थी born a कुतिया.
i थी born a चित्रकार. ''

Theresienwiese on the day पहले oktoberfest 2006
Oktoberfest is a 16-day festival celebrating beer held annually in म्यूनिख, बायर्न, जर्मनी, कार्यशील इससे लेट सितंबर to the पहला वीकेंड in October.
It is one of the सबसे प्रसिद्ध कार्यक्रम in जर्मनी और is the संसार 's largest मेला, साथ more than 6 million people from around the world attending the event every year.
To the locals, it is not called Oktoberfest, but `` die Wiesn '', बाद the colloquial नाम of the fairgrounds themselves.
The oktoberfest is an महत्वपूर्ण भाग of bar संस्कृति, having been held since 1810.
Other cities across the संसार भी थाम oktoberfest जश्न, modeled after the original Munich event.
The म्यूनिख oktoberfest originally took प्लेस दौरान the सोलह days up to, and including, the first Sunday in October.
In 1994, the schedule was modified in response to German reunification so that if the first संडे in अक्तूबर जलप्रपात on the 1st or 2nd, तब the पर्व होता go on जबतक अक्तूबर 3 ( German Unity Day ).
Thus, the पर्व is अभी 17 दिनों जब the पहला संडे is अक्तूबर 2 and 18 days when it is October 1.
in 2010, the पर्व lasted जबतक the पहला Monday in October, to mark the anniversary of the event.
The पर्व is आयोजित in an क्षेत्रफल नामित the theresienwiese ( field, or meadow, of Therese ), often called Wiesn for short, located near Munich 's center.
Large quantities of oktoberfest बियर हैं खपत, साथ लगभग 7 लाख liters served during the 16 day festival in 2007.
Visitors may also enjoy a wide variety of traditional food such as Hendl ( chicken ), Schweinebraten ( roast pork ), Schweinshaxe ( grilled ham hock ), Steckerlfisch ( grilled fish on a stick ), Würstl ( sausages ) along साथ brezeln ( pretzel ), knödel ( आलू or ब्रैड पकौड़ी ), käsespätzle ( चीज नूडल्स ), reiberdatschi ( आलू pancakes ), sauerkraut or rotkohl/blaukraut ( red cabbage ) along with such Bavarian delicacies as Obatzda ( a spiced cheese-butter spread ) and Weisswurst ( a white sausage ).
A platter साथ चीज और garnishes
पहियों of Gouda
Cheese is a generic term for a विविध समूह of milk-based खाना उत्पाद.
Cheese is produced in wide-ranging जायका, बनावट, और फ़ॉर्म.
चीज consists of प्रोटीन और मोटे from milk, usually the milk of cows, buffalo, goats, or sheep.
It is produced by जामन of the मिल्क प्रोटीन casein.
Typically, the milk is acidified और जोड of the एंजाइम rennet कल्याणकारी जामन.
The solids are separated and दबाया into फाइनल रूप.
Some cheeses have molds on the rind or throughout.
Most cheeses melt at कुकिंग temperature.
Hundreds of प्रकार of चीज इससे विभिन्न countries are produced.
Their styles, textures and flavors निर्भर on the उत्पत्ति of the मिल्क ( सहित the एनिमल 's आहार ), whether वे have महरूम pasteurized, the butterfat content, the bacteria and mold, the processing, and aging.
Herbs, मसाले, or लकडी धुँआ may be प्रयुक्त as flavoring agents.
The yellow to red रंग of अनेक cheeses, ऐसे as रेड लीसेस्टर, is सामान्यतः formed from adding annatto.
For a few cheeses, the milk is curdled by adding acids ऐसे as सिरका or नीबू रस.
Most cheeses are acidified to a lesser degree by जीवाणु, जिससे फेरे मिल्क sugars into लैक्टिक एसिड, तब the addition of rennet completes the curdling.
Vegetarian alternatives to rennet are उपलब्धियाँ ; सबसे हैं उत्पादित by fermentation of the कवक mucor miehei, लकिन अन्य have महरूम extracted from various species of the Cynara thistle family.
Cheese is valued लिये इसके पोर्टेबिलिटी, long जीवन, और ऊँची सामग्री of मोटे, protein, calcium, and phosphorus.
Cheese is more compact and has a longer shelf life than milk, although how long a cheese will रखना may निर्भर on the प्रकार of चीज ; लेबल्स on पैकेट्स of चीज प्रायः अर्जी कि a cheese should be consumed within three to five days of opening.
Generally speaking, hard cheeses last longer than नरम cheeses, ऐसे as brie or बकरी 's मिल्क cheese.
Cheesemakers near a dairy region may benefit from fresher, lower-priced मिल्क, और निम्नतर शिपिंग लागत.
The long storage life of some cheese, especially if it is encased in a सुरक्षात्मक rind, allows selling जब बाज़ार हैं अनुकूल.
Additional ingredients may be added to कुछ cheeses, ऐसे as black peppers, garlic, chives or cranberries.
A specialist seller of चीज is sometimes ज्ञात as a cheesemonger.
To become an expert in this field, जैसे वाइन or कुकिंग, requires कुछ औपचारिक शिक्षा और सालो of चख और hands-on experience.
This position is typically जिम्मेदार लिये सब पहलुओं of the चीज inventory ; selecting the cheese menu, purchasing, receiving, storage, and ripening.
Legal citation signals are a set of brief abbreviated वाक्यांश or शब्द प्रयुक्त to clarify the प्राधिकार or significance of a legal citation as it relates to a proposition.
Signals help a रीडर जल्दी discern अर्थ or उपयोगिता of a particular reference when the reference itself does not provide adequate information.
Most citation signals हैं लगाई in सामने of the citation to which they apply.
For example, in the अनुच्छेद जब लिखने a legal argument, it is important to refer to primary sources.
To assist readers in locating ये स्त्रोत, it is वांछनीय to उपयोग a standardized citation format.
See generally Harvard Law Review Association, the bluebook : a वर्दी प्रणाली of citation ( 18th ed. 2005 ).
Note, however, that some courts may आवश्यकता कोई विधिक papers कि हैं सुपुर्द to उन्हें to conform to a अलग citation format.
the signal is the phrase `` see generally, '' which indicates that the citation `` the bluebook : a वर्दी प्रणाली of citation ( 18th ed. 2005 ) '' provides सामान्य पृष्ठभूमि सूचना on the topic.
Neil Alden आर्मस्ट्रांग ( अगस्त 5, 1930 – अगस्त 25, 2012 ) थी an अमरीकी astronaut and the first person to walk on the Moon.
He was also an aerospace engineer, naval एविएटर, परीक्षण पायलट, और विश्वविद्यालयों प्राध्यापक.
Before becoming an astronaut, Armstrong was an officer in the u.S. नेवी और परोसा in the कोरियाई War.
After the war, he अर्जित उसके स्नातक 's उपाधि at purdue विश्वविद्यालयों और परोसा as a परीक्षण पायलट at the नेशनल सलाहकार Committee for Aeronautics High-Speed Flight Station, now known as the Dryden Flight Research Center, where he logged over 900 flights.
He later completed graduate अध्ययन at the विश्वविद्यालयों of दक्षिणी California.
A participant in the U.S. Air Force 's Man in Space soonest और x-20 dyna-soar इंसान spaceflight कार्यक्रम, आर्मस्ट्रांग joined the NASA Astronaut Corps in 1962.
He made his first space flight, as कमांड पायलट of मिथुन 8, in 1966, बनने NASA 's first civilian astronaut to fly in space.
On this mission, he performed the first डॉकिंग of दो spacecraft, साथ पायलट दाउद Scott.
Armstrong 's दूसरी और पिछला spaceflight थी as मिशन कमांडर of the Apollo 11 moon landing, in July 1969.
on इस मिशन, आर्मस्ट्रांग और बज़ एल्ड्रिन descended to the चंद्र सतह और खर्च दो और a half hours exploring, while Michael Collins remained in lunar orbit in the Command Module.
Along with Collins and Aldrin, Armstrong was awarded the Presidential Medal of स्वतंत्रता by अध्यक्ष रिचर्ड निक्सन ; in 1978, अध्यक्ष jimmy कार्टर प्रस्तुत आर्मस्ट्रांग the congressional स्पेस पदक of सम्मान in 1978 ; he and his former crewmates received the Congressional Gold Medal in 2009.
Armstrong died in Cincinnati, ओहियो, on अगस्त 25, 2012, at the आयु of 82, बाद जटिलताओं from coronary artery bypass surgery.
Secretariat ( March 30, 1970 – October 4, 1989 ) थी an अमरीकी thoroughbred racehorse कि in 1973 became the first U.S. Triple Crown champion in 25 years.
He set race records in all three कार्यक्रम in the श्रेणी — the केंटकी डर्बी ( 1:59.4 ), the preakness stakes ( 1:53 ), and the Belmont Stakes ( 2:24 ) — records that still stand today.
He is माना to be एक of the महानतम Thoroughbreds of all time.
In 1999, ESPN ranked Secretariat the 35th best athlete of the 20th सदी, the उच्चतम रैंकिंग racehorse on the सूची url_http.
He ranked second behind Man o ' War in the blood-horse 's सूची of the शीर्ष 100 U.S. Racehorses of the 20th Century.
Secretariat was sired by बिंदास शासक आउट of somethingroyal, by princequillo.
He was foaled at The Meadow in कैरोलीन काउंटी, वर्जिनिया.
Like his famous predecessor Man o ' युद्ध, सचिवालय थी a विशाल शाहबलूत टट्टू और थी दिए the वही nickname, `` Big Red. ''
Secretariat 's grandsire, nasrullah, is भी the great-great-grandsire of 1977 Triple Crown winner Seattle Slew.
Owned by Penny Chenery, he was trained by Lucien Laurin and mainly ridden by Canadian jockey Ron turcotte, साथ साथ प्रशिक्षु jockey पॉल फेलिसियानो ( पहला दो races ), and veteran Eddie Maple ( last race ).
He raced in chenery 's मर्ग stable 's ब्लू and white checkered colors and his groom was Eddie Sweat.
सचिवालय stood लगभग लम्बा, और weighed, with a 75-inch girth, in his racing prime.
Madrid (, ) is the capital और largest नगर of Spain.
The population of the city is roughly 3.3 million and the entire population of the मैड्रिड महानगर क्षेत्रफल is गणना to be around 6.5 million.
It is the third-largest city in the European Union, after London and Berlin, and इसके महानगर क्षेत्रफल is the third-largest in the European Union after London and Paris.
The नगर spans a total of.
The city is located on the manzanares नदी in the केन्द्र of दोनो the देश और the जातियाँ of मैड्रिड ( जिससे comprises the नगर of मैड्रिड, इसके conurbation और extended suburbs and villages ) ; this community is bordered by the autonomous communities of Castile and León and Castile-La Mancha.
As the capital city of स्पेन, सीट of सरकारी, और निवास of the स्पेनी monarch, मैड्रिड is also the political, economic and cultural centre of Spain.
the वर्तमान महापौर is ana botella from the People 's Party ( PP ).
The Madrid urban agglomeration has the third-largest जीडीपी in the यूरोपीय संघ और इसके प्रभाव in राजनीती, शिक्षा, entertainment, पर्यावरण, मीडिया, फ़ैशन, विज्ञान, culture, and the arts all contribute to its status as one of the world 's major global cities.
Due to इसके आर्थिक आउटपुट, ऊँची मानक of जीना, और मार्केट आकार, मैड्रिड is माना the प्रमुख वित्तीय केन्द्र of दक्षिणी यूरोपीय and the Iberian Peninsula ; it hosts the head offices of the vast majority of the major Spanish companies, such as Telefónica, Iberia or Repsol.
Madrid is the most touristic city of Spain, the fourth-most touristic of the महाद्वीप, और the सातवाँ सबसे visited नगर in the संसार according to Forbes.
Is the 10th most livable नगर in the संसार according to monocle magazine, in its 2010 index.
Madrid also बाँधने among the 12 greenest यूरोपीय शहरों in 2010. < संदर्भ name= '' एचटीटीपी : //www.citymayors.com/environment/greenest-cities-europe.html '' > Madrid is currently a Candidate City for the 2020 Summer Olympics.
Madrid houses the headquarters of the World Tourism Organization ( wto ), belonging to the संयुक्त राष्ट्र संगठन ( un ), the segib, the संगठन of Ibero-American States ( OEI ), and the Public Interest Oversight Board ( PIOB ).
It also hosts major अंतरराष्ट्रीय संस्थानों regulators of स्पेनी : the खड़ा कमेटी of the संघ of Spanish Language Academies, headquarters of the Royal Spanish Academy ( RAE ), the Cervantes Institute and the Foundation of Urgent Spanish ( Fundéu ).
Madrid organizes मेलों as fitur, आरको, simo tci and the Cibeles Madrid Fashion Week.
While Madrid possesses a modern infrastructure, it has preserved the look and feel of many of its ऐतिहासिक neighbourhoods और गलियों.
Its landmarks include the Royal Palace of Madrid ; the Teatro Real ( Royal theatre ) with its restored 1850 Opera House ; the Buen Retiro Park, founded in 1631 ; the 19th-century नेशनल पुस्तकालयों भवन ( संस्थापित in 1712 ) containing कुछ of स्पेन 's ऐतिहासिक अभिलेख ; a विशाल क्रमांक of नेशनल संग्रहालय, और the सुनहरी त्रिभुज of Art, located along the Paseo del Prado and comprising three art museums : Prado Museum, the Museo Nacional Centro de Arte Reina Sofía, a museum of modern art, and the Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum, which completes the shortcomings of the other two museums.
Cibeles Palace and Fountain have become the स्मारक प्रतीक of the city.
The path of the Via Appia and of the via appia traiana.
Remains of the Appian रास्ता in रोम, निकट quarto Miglio
Near रोम.
the appian रास्ता ( लैटिन और इतालवी : via appia ) थी एक of the earliest और रणनीतिक most important Roman roads of the ancient republic.
It connected रोम to brindisi, apulia, in southeast Italy.
Its importance is indicated by इसके आम नाम, अंकित by Statius :
appia teritur रेजिना longarum viarum
`` the Appian रास्ता is the महारानी of the long roads ''
The road is named after Appius Claudius Caecus, the Roman censor who began and completed the first section as a सैन्य सड़क to the दक्षिण in 312 bc दौरान the samnite युद्धों.
The Draupner wave, a single giant wave measured on New Year 's Day 1995, आखिरकार पुष्टि the अस्तित्व of freak लहरें, जिससे था previously been considered near-mythical
Rogue waves ( also known as freak waves, monster waves, कातिल लहरें, चरम लहरें, और असामान्य लहरें ) हैं अपेक्षाकृत large and spontaneous ocean surface waves that occur far out at sea, and are a threat even to large ships and ocean liners.
In oceanography, they are more precisely पारिभाषित as लहरें जिनकी ऊँचाई is अधिक than twice the significant वेव ऊँचाई ( swh ), जिससे is itself defined as the mean of the largest third of waves in a wave record.
Therefore rogue waves हैं नहीं necessarily the biggest लहरें मिला at समुद्र ; वे हैं, rather, surprisingly large waves for a given sea state.
Rogue waves seem not to have a single distinct cause, लकिन occur जहाँ शारीरिक कारकों ऐसे as ऊँची हवाएँ और दमदार currents cause waves to merge to create a single exceptionally large wave.
Electress sophia of हनोवर ( 1630–1714 )
The line of succession to the British throne is the ordered sequence of सब those लोगों योग्य to सफल to the सिंहासन of the संयुक्त किंगडम और the other 15 Commonwealth realms.
The Act of Settlement 1701 bestowed succession on the Electress sophia of हनोवर और उसके वंशजों जबकि excluding Roman Catholics.
The British सरकारी करता नहीं प्रकाशित an आधिकारिक सूची of सब those in लकीर to सफल, लकिन the कार्य of genealogical लेखक और amateur researchers suggests that there are several thousand people potentially in line.
At a summit in Perth, Western Australia in 2011, the heads of government of all 16 Commonwealth realms agreed to take steps to adopt absolute primogeniture, end the exclusion of लोगों शादीशुदा to रोमन catholics, और मेक अन्य परिवर्तन in the उत्तराधिकार नियम.
The line of succession is also प्रयुक्त to चुनें the counsellors of राज्य ( और a रीजेंट if the need arises ) under the provisions of the Regency Act 1937.
For earlier संस्करण of the लकीर of उत्तराधिकार, see History of the British line of succession.
Edward Montgomery Clift ( October 17, 1920July 23, 1966 ) was an American film and स्टेज कर्ता the नई यॉर्क times’ obituary विख्यात उसके portrayal of `` मूडी, संवेदनशील young men ''.
He often played outsiders and `` victim-heroes '' ; examples include the सोशल climber in जार्ज स्टीवंस 's a प्लेस in the सूर्य, the anguished कैथोलिक पुजारी in हिचकॉक 's i कबूल, the doomed नियमित सिपाही रॉबर्ट E. ली prewitt in फ्रेड zinnemann 's From Here to Eternity, and the Jewish GI bullied by antisemites in Edward Dmytryk 's The Young Lions.
Later, after a disfiguring car क्रैश in 1956, और दारू और नुस्खा drug abuse, he became erratic.
Nevertheless महत्वपूर्ण भूमिकाएँ यहूद स्टिल उसके, सहित `` the लापरवाह, alcoholic, mother-fixated रोडियो यजमान '' in जॉन हस्टन 's The Misfits, the title role in Huston 's, and the concentration camp victim in Stanley Kramer 's Judgment at Nuremberg. ''
Clift received four Academy Award nominations दौरान उसके करियर, तीन लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता and one for Best Supporting Actor.
The War on Terror ( also ज्ञात as the वैश्विक युद्ध on आतंक ) is a पद commonly लागू to an अंतरराष्ट्रीय सैन्य अभियान जिससे started as a result of the 11 September 2001 terrorist attacks on the United States.
This resulted in an अंतरराष्ट्रीय सैन्य अभियान to eliminate al-qaeda and other militant organizations.
The United किंगडम और अनेक other NATO and non-NATO nations participate in the conflict.
The phrase 'War on आतंक ' थी पहला प्रयुक्त by us अध्यक्ष George W. Bush on 20 September 2001.
The Bush administration and the Western मीडिया have चूंकि प्रयुक्त the पद to signify a वैश्विक सैन्य, राजनैतिक, lawful, और conceptual struggle—targeting both organizations designated as terrorist and regimes accused of supporting them.
It was typically used with a particular फ़ोकस on उग्रवादी islamists, al-qaeda, and other jihadi groups.
Although the term is not officially used by the administration of US President Barack Obama ( which instead uses the term Overseas Contingency Operation ), it is still commonly used by politicians, in the मीडिया और by कुछ पहलुओं of सरकारी officially, ऐसे as the संयुक्त राज्य ' वैश्विक युद्ध on आतंक सेवा पदक.
German battleship schleswig-holstein, westerplatte, September 1, 1939
Destroyer USS Shaw exploding बाद उसके आगे पत्रिका थी detonated during the Attack on Pearl Harbor
The main causes of World War II were nationalistic मुद्दे, अनसुलझे मुद्दे, और resentments resulting इससे संसार युद्ध i और the interwar period in Europe, in addition to the effects of the Great Depression in the 1930s.
The culmination of events that led to the outbreak of war are generally understood to be the 1939 invasion of कैंडल by जर्मनी और सोवियत रूस और the 1937 आक्रमण of the गणतंत्र of चीन by the Empire of Japan.
These military aggressions were the परिणाम of निर्णय बना by the सत्तावादी सत्ताधारी नाजी elite in Germany and by the leadership of the Kwantung Army in Japan.
World War II started after these आक्रामक क्रियाएँ यहूद मिले साथ an आधिकारिक घोषणा of युद्ध and/or armed resistance.
The following is a सूची of देवताओं और अन्य दैवी और semi-divine आंकड़े from Greek mythology.
The list does not include creatures ; for these, see List of यूनानी पौराणिक जीव.
The Mitsubishi Galant is an automobile manufactured by मित्सुबिशी मोटर्स between 1969 और 2012.
The नाम थी निकला इससे the French word galant, meaning `` chivalrous ''.
There have महरूम नौ पृथक पीढियां, और संचयी sales now exceed five million.
It began as a compact sedan, लकिन over the कोर्स of इसके जीवन रै विकसित into a larger mid-size car.
Initial production was only based in Japan, but since 1994 the American market has been served by वाहनों समवेत at the पूर्व diamond-star Motors ( DSM ) facility in Normal, Illinois.
Blood pressure ( BP ), sometimes referred to as arterial रक्त दबाव, is the दबाव exerted by circulating रक्त upon the walls of blood vessels, and is one of the principal vital signs.
When used without further specification, `` blood pressure '' प्रायः refers to the arterial दबाव of the प्रणालीगत परिसंचरण.
During each heartbeat, blood pressure varies between a अधिकतम ( systolic ) और a न्यूनतम ( diastolic ) pressure.
The blood pressure in the परिसंचरण is प्रधानतया due to the pumping action of the heart.
मतभेद in औसत रक्त दबाव हैं जिम्मेदार लिये blood flow from one location to another in the circulation.
The rate of mean blood flow depends on the resistance to प्रवाह प्रस्तुत by the रक्त बरतन.
Mean blood pressure decreases as the circulating blood moves away from the heart through arteries और capillaries due to viscous नुकसान of energy.
Mean blood pressure drops over the whole circulation, हालांकि सबसे of the पतन occurs साथ the small arteries and arterioles.
Gravity affects blood pressure via hydrostatic forces ( e.g., दौरान खड़ा ) और valves in रगों, श्वास, और pumping इससे संकुचन of skeletal muscles also influence blood pressure in veins.
Blood pressure without further specification प्रायः refers to the प्रणालीगत arterial दबाव measured at a व्यक्ति 's अपर भुजा और is a माप of the दबाव in the brachial artery, the major artery in the upper arm.
A person’s blood pressure is usually expressed in terms of the systolic pressure over diastolic दबाव और is measured in millimetres of पारा ( mmhg ), लिये उदाहरण 120/80.
A veto – Latin for `` I forbid '' – is the power ( used by an officer of the state, for example ) to unilaterally रोकें an आधिकारिक कार्रवाई, विशेषकर the enactment of legislation.
A veto can be absolute, as for instance in the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सुरक्षा परिषद, जिनकी स्थाई सदस्यों ( China, France, Russia, United Kingdom, United States of America ) can block any resolution.
Or it can be सीमित, as in the विधान प्रक्रम of the संयुक्त राज्य, जहाँ a two-thirds vote in दोनो the House and Senate may override a Presidential veto of legislation.
A veto only gives power to stop परिवर्तन, नहीं to अपनाना उन्हें ( मगर लिये the विरल `` amendatory veto '' ).
Thus a veto allows its होल्डर to protect the औकात quo.
The concept of a वीटो देह originated साथ the रोमन consuls and tribunes.
Either of the two consuls holding दफ्तर in a दिए साल could ब्लाक a सैन्य or सिविल निर्णय by the अन्य ; कोई ट्रिब्यून था the शक्ति to unilaterally block legislation passed by the Roman Senate.
गंधक डाइऑक्साइड ( भी गंधक डाइऑक्साइड ) is the chemical compound with the formula.
It is a toxic gas साथ a pungent, तकलीफदेह महकते, कि is released by volcanoes and in various industrial processes.
Since coal and petroleum often contain sulfur यौगिकों, उनके दहन generates गंधक डाइऑक्साइड जबतक the गंधक यौगिकों are removed before burning the fuel.
Further oxidation of SO2, usually in the presence of a उत्प्रेरक ऐसे as no2, फ़ॉर्म h2so4, और thus acid rain.
Sulfur dioxide emissions are also a precursor to अभिकण in the माहौल.
Both of these impacts हैं कारण लिये चिंता over the पर्यावरणीय impact of these fuels.
Myasthenia gravis ( from Greek μύς `` muscle '', `` weakness '', और `` गंभीर '' ; abbreviated mg ) is an असंक्राम्य neuromuscular बीमारी leading to fluctuating muscle weakness and fatigability.
It is an autoimmune disorder, in which weakness is caused by circulating antibodies that block acetylcholine receptors at the postsynaptic neuromuscular जंक्शन, inhibiting the excitatory प्रभाव of the neurotransmitter acetylcholine on nicotinic receptors throughout neuromuscular junctions.
Myasthenia is treated medically साथ acetylcholinesterase inhibitors or immunosuppressants, and, in selected cases, thymectomy.
the बीमारी incidence is 3–30 मामले प्रति लाख प्रति year and rising as a result of increased awareness.
MG must be distinguished from congenital myasthenic syndromes कि can उपस्थित समान symptoms but offer no response to immunosuppressive treatments.
Reflective twisted nematic liquid क्रिस्टल प्रदर्शक.
polarizing फिल्टर फिल्मी साथ a लंबवत अक्ष to polarize light as it enters.
Glass substrate साथ ito electrodes.
The shapes of these electrodes होगा determine the आकार कि होगा appear when the LCD is turned ON.
Vertical ridges etched on the सतह हैं चिकना.
Twisted nematic द्रव क्रिस्टल.
Glass substrate with common electrode film ( ITO ) साथ आड़ा ridges to लकीर up साथ the आड़ा filter.
Polarizing filter film with a आड़ा अक्ष to block/pass light.
Reflective surface to send लाइट वापस to दर्शक.
( In a backlit एलसीडी, इस परत is replaced with a light source. )
A liquid-crystal display ( LCD ) is a flat panel प्रदर्शक, इलेक्ट्रॉनिक विज़ुअल प्रदर्शक, or वीडियो प्रदर्शक कि उपयोग the लाइट modulating properties of liquid crystals.
Liquid crystals do not emit लाइट सीधे.
LCDs are available to display arbitrary images ( as in a general-purpose कंप्यूटर प्रदर्शक ) or फिक्स्ड बिंब जिससे can be प्रदर्शित or छुपा, such as preset words, digits, and 7-segment displays as in a digital clock.
They use the same basic technology, except that arbitrary images are made up of a large number of छोटी पिक्सेल, जबकि अन्य प्रदर्शक have larger elements.
lcds हैं प्रयुक्त in a चौड़ी दायरा of अनुप्रयोग सहित कंप्यूटर मॉनीटर, टेलीविज़न, instrument panels, aircraft cockpit displays, and signage.
They are common in consumer devices such as video players, gaming devices, घड़ियाँ, घड़ियाँ, calculators, और telephones, और have replaced कैथोड रे ट्यूब ( crt ) प्रदर्शक in most applications.
They are available in a wider दायरा of स्क्रीन आकार than crt और प्लाज्मा प्रदर्शक, and since they do not use phosphors, they do not suffer image burn-in.
LCDs are, however, susceptible to image persistence.
The LCD स्क्रीन is अधिक उर्जा कुशल and can be disposed of more safely than a CRT.
Its low electrical power खपत enables it to be प्रयुक्त in बैटरी -powered electronic equipment.
It is an electronically modulated optical device made up of any number of segments filled with liquid crystals और arrayed in सामने of a लाइट सोर्स ( backlight ) or reflector to उपज बिंब in color or monochrome.
Liquid crystals were पहला खोजा in 1888.
By 2008, worldwide sales of televisions with LCD screens exceeded annual sales of CRT units ; the crt became obsolete लिये सबसे उद्देश्य.
The Borgata Hotel Casino and Spa is a luxury hotel, casino, और स्पा in अटलांटिक नगर, नई जर्सी, United States.
It is owned by Marina District Development, a joint venture between Boyd Gaming and a divesture विश्वास स्थापित by mgm रिसॉर्ट अंतरराष्ट्रीय.
The $ 1.1 billion कसीनो होटल सुविधाएँ 2,002 कक्ष और is the largest hotel in New Jersey.
The Borgata opened in July 2003 as a Las Vegas-style megaresort और is the top-grossing कसीनो in अटलांटिक नगर.
A bottle of high potency B-complex विटामिन संपूरक pills.
A vitamin ( or ) is an organic compound required by an organism as a vital nutrient in सीमित amounts.
An organic chemical compound ( or related set of compounds ) is called a विटामिन जब it can नहीं be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an सजीव, और जरूर be प्राप्त इससे the diet.
Thus, the term is conditional दोनो on the हालातों और on the particular organism.
For example, ascorbic acid ( vitamin C ) is a vitamin for humans, but not for most अन्य पशु, और biotin और विटामिन d हैं जरूरी in the human diet only in certain circumstances.
By convention, the term vitamin includes neither other essential nutrients, ऐसे as dietary खनिज, अनिवार्य वसीय acids, or अनिवार्य अमीनो acids ( जिससे हैं needed in larger amounts than विटामिन ) nor the large number of other nutrients that promote health but are otherwise required less often.
तेरह विटामिन हैं universally recognized at present.
Vitamins are वर्गीकृत by उनके biological और रासायनिक कार्यकलाप, not their structure.
Thus, each `` vitamin '' refers to a number of vitamer यौगिकों कि सब दिखाएँ the biological कार्यकलाप संबद्ध साथ a particular vitamin.
Such a set of chemicals is grouped under an alphabetized vitamin `` generic descriptor '' title, such as `` विटामिन a ``, जिससे शामिल the यौगिकों retinal, रेटिनॉल, और चार ज्ञात carotenoids.
Vitamers by definition are convertible to the क्रियाशील रूप of the विटामिन in the देह, और हैं sometimes inter-convertible to one another, as well.
विटामिन have विविध biochemical functions.
Some have hormone-like कृत्यों as regulators of खनिज चयापचय ( ऐसे as विटामिन D ), or regulators of cell and tissue growth and differentiation ( such as some forms of vitamin A ).
Others फलन as antioxidants ( e.g., vitamin E and sometimes vitamin C ).
The largest number of विटामिन ( ऐसे as b जटिल विटामिन ) फलन as precursors लिये एंजाइम cofactors, that help enzymes in their work as catalysts in metabolism.
In this role, vitamins may be tightly बंधी to एंजाइमों as भाग of prosthetic groups : For example, biotin is part of enzymes involved in making fatty acids.
Vitamins may also be less tightly bound to enzyme catalysts as coenzymes, detachable molecules कि फलन to carry रासायनिक समूह or electrons between अणुओं.
For example, folic acid may carry मिथाइल, formyl, और methylene groups in the cell.
Although these roles in assisting enzyme-substrate प्रतिक्रियाएँ हैं विटामिन ' best-known फलन, the other vitamin functions are equally important.
Until the mid-1930s, when the first commercial yeast-extract vitamin B complex and semi-synthetic vitamin C supplement tablets were sold, vitamins were प्राप्त solely through खाना सेवन, और परिवर्तन in आहार ( जिससे, लिये उदाहरण, could occur दौरान a particular growing ऋतु ) प्रायः greatly altered the प्रकार और amounts of विटामिन ingested.
However, vitamins have been produced as कमोडिटी रसायन और बना widely उपलब्धियाँ as inexpensive semisynthetic और synthetic-source multivitamin dietary और खाना पूरक और additives, since the middle of the 20th century.
संसार मुस्लिम जनसांख्यिकी by प्रतिशत ( pew Research Center, 2009 )
World Muslim जनसांख्यिकी in लाखो
islam is the संसार 's दूसरी largest religion after Christianity.
According to a 2010 पढ़ाई, islam रै 1.62 अरब adherents, making up over 23 % of the world population.
Islam is the predominant धर्म in the मध्य ईस्ट, in सहेल, in the सींग of अफ़्रीकी और उत्तरी Africa, and in some parts of Asia.
Large communities of मुसलमान हैं भी मिला in चीन, the balkans, and Russia.
Other parts of the world host large Muslim immigrant communities ; in Western Europe, लिये उदाहरण, islam is the दूसरी largest धर्म बाद christianity, जहाँ it represents 6 % of the total population.
According to the Pew Research बीच in 2010 वहीँ यहूद 49 muslim-majority देशों.
Around 62 % of the world 's मुसलमान सजीव in दक्षिण और southeast एशिया, साथ over 1 billion adherents.
The largest Muslim देश is इंडोनेशिया, घर to 12.7 % of the संसार 's मुसलमान, followed by Pakistan ( 11.0 % ), India ( 10.9 % ), and Bangladesh ( 9.2 % ).
About 20 % of मुसलमान सजीव in Arab countries.
In the Middle East, the non-Arab देशों of तुर्कों और इरान हैं the largest muslim-majority देशों ; in Africa, Egypt and Nigeria have the most populous Muslim communities.
A study conducted by the Pew Research Center in 2010 and released जनवरी 2011 मिला कि वहीँ हैं 1.62 अरब मुसलमान around the world.
The study found more Muslims in the United किंगडम than in लेबनान और अधिक in चीन than in सीरियाई.
Rhode Island ( or ), officially the राज्य of rhode द्वीप और विधाता बागानों, is a state in the New England region of the United States.
Rhode Island is the smallest in area, the eighth least populous, but the second सबसे densely आबादी of the 50 us राज्य पीछे नई जर्सी.
Rhode Island is bordered by Connecticut to the west and Massachusetts to the उत्तर और ईस्ट, और it साझा a जल boundary साथ नई यॉर्क 's long द्वीप to the southwest.
Rhode द्वीप थी the पहला of the 13 असली colonies to घोषित स्वतंत्रता from British rule, declaring itself independent on May 4, 1776, two months before any other colony.
the राज्य थी भी the पिछला of the तेरह original colonies to ratify the United States Constitution.
Rhode Island 's official nickname is `` The Ocean State '', a reference to the State 's geography, चूंकि rhode द्वीप रै अनेक विशाल bays और inlets कि राशि to about 14 % of its total area.
Its land area is, लकिन इसके कुल क्षेत्रफल is significantly larger.
Dubai ( ; ', ) is a city in the संयुक्त अरब अमीरात, स्तिथ भीतर the अमीर of the same name.
The अमीर of दुबई is स्तिथ on the southeast coast of the पारसी गल्फ on the arabian प्रायद्वीप and is one of the seven emirates that make up the country.
It has the largest जनसांख्यिकी in the uae ( 2,106,177 ) और the second-largest land territory by area ( 4,114 km2 ) after Abu Dhabi.
Dubai and abu धाबी, the नेशनल पूंजी, हैं the तभी दो अमीरात to have वीटो शक्ति over नाजुक matters of नेशनल importance in the country 's legislature.
The city of Dubai is located on the अमीर 's उत्तरी तटरेखा और heads up the dubai-sharjah-ajman metropolitan area.
Dubai is nowadays often misperceived as a देश or city-state और, in कुछ मामले, the uae as a whole has been described as 'Dubai '.
The earliest जिक्र of दुबई is in 1095 ad, और the earliest recorded settlement in the region dates from 1799.
The Sheikhdom of Dubai was formally established in 1833 by शेख़ maktoum बिन butti al-maktoum जब he persuaded around 800 सदस्यों of उसके जनजाति of the bani yas, जीना in कया थी तब the दूसरी Saudi State and now part of Saudi Arabia, to follow him to the Dubai Creek by the Abu Falasa clan of the Bani Yas.
It remained under the tribe 's control when the संयुक्त किंगडम assumed सुरक्षा of the sheikhdom in 1892 और joined the nascent संयुक्त अरब अमीरात upon स्वतंत्रता in 1971 as the country 's second emirate.
Its strategic geographic स्थान बना the कस्बा an महत्वपूर्ण व्यापार हब और by the शुरूआत of the 20th century, Dubai was already an important regional port.
Today, Dubai has emerged as a cosmopolitan metropolis that has grown steadily to become a वैश्विक नगर और a कारोबार और सांस्कृतिक हब of the मध्य ईस्ट और the Persian Gulf region.
Although Dubai 's अर्थव्यवस्था थी historically निर्मित on the आयल उद्योग, the अमीर 's western-style मॉडल of कारोबार ड्राइव इसके अर्थव्यवस्था साथ the main revenues now coming from tourism, real estate, and financial services.
Dubai has recently आकर्षित संसार ध्यान through अनेक अभिनव विशाल construction projects and sports events.
The city has become symbolic for its skyscrapers and high-rise buildings, such as the संसार 's tallest burj खलीफा, in जोड to महत्वाकांक्षी विकास प्रोजेक्ट सहित man-made आइलैंड्स, होटल, और कुछ of the largest shopping malls in the region and the world.
This increased attention has also highlighted labor and human अधिकारों मुद्दे concerning the नगर 's largely दक्षिण एशियाई paid workforce.
Dubai 's property मार्केट अनुभवी a प्रमुख deterioration in 2008–2009 as a परिणाम of the विश्वव्यापी आर्थिक downturn following the financial crisis of 2007-2008.
However, Dubai has made a steady and क्रमिक रिकवरी साथ सहायता coming इससे neighboring emirates.
The handful of new projects that are in the पाइपलाइन have महरूम समर्थ to सहायता दुबई real estate make a comeback.
As of 2012, Dubai is the 22nd most expensive city in the संसार, और the सबसे महंगी नगर in the मध्य ईस्ट, surpassing इसराईल 's Tel Aviv ( 31st ).
Dubai has also been rated as एक of the बेहतरीन स्थान to सजीव in the मध्य ईस्ट, सहित by us अमरीकी global consulting firm Mercer who rated the city as the best place to live in the Middle East in 2011.
