This animation uses Earth science आंकड़ा इससे a किस्में of सेंसर on नासा धरती observing satellites to माप शारीरिक oceanography पैरामीटर्स such as ocean currents, ocean winds, sea surface height and sea surface temperature.
An ocean ( ; the World समंदर of शास्त्रीय प्राचीनता ) is a देह of saline जल that composes a large part of a planet 's hydrosphere.
In the context of Earth, it refers to एक or सब of the प्रमुख विभाजन of the ग्रह 's संसार समंदर – वे हैं, in descending अनुक्रम of क्षेत्रफल, the Pacific, Atlantic, Indian, Southern ( Antarctic ), and Arctic Oceans.
The word `` sea `` is often used interchangeably with `` ocean '', but सख्ती बोलना a समुद्र is a देह of saline जल ( संभवतः a प्रभाग of the संसार समंदर ) partly or fully enclosed by land.
धरती is the तभी ग्रह ज्ञात to have an ocean ( or any large amounts of open liquid water ).
Approximately 72 % of the planet 's surface ( ~3.6x108 km2 ) is covered by saline जल कि is customarily विभाजित into अनेक प्रिंसिपल महासागर और छोटी समंदर, साथ the ocean covering approximately 71 % of the Earth 's surface.
In terms of the hydrosphere of the धरती, the समंदर contains 97 % of the Earth 's water.
Oceanographers have stated that out of 97 %, only 5 % of the समंदर as a पूरे on धरती रै महरूम छान.
Because it is the principal component of Earth 's hydrosphere, the world ocean is integral to all known life, forms part of the carbon cycle, और प्रभाव जलवायु और मौसम पैटर्न.
The total volume is लगभग 1.3 अरब घन किलोमीटर ( 310 million cu mi ) with an average depth of.
It is the habitat of 230,000 known species, हालांकि much of the समंदर 's गहराइयों remain unexplored और it is अनुमानित कि over दो लाख marine species exist.
The origin of Earth 's oceans is स्टिल अनजान, लकिन महासागर हैं believed to have formed in the Hadean period and may have been the impetus for the emergence of life.
Extraterrestrial महासागर may be रचित of a चौड़ी दायरा of elements and compounds.
The only confirmed large stable bodies of extraterrestrial surface liquids are the lakes of Titan, हालांकि वहीँ is प्रमाण लिये the अस्तित्व of महासागर elsewhere in the सौर प्रणाली.
Early in उनके भूगर्भिक histories, मंगल और Venus are theorized to have had large water oceans.
The Mars ocean परिकल्पना suggests कि nearly a तीसरा of the सतह of मंगल थी एकबार covered by जल, हालांकि the जल on मंगल is no longer oceanic, and a runaway greenhouse effect may have boiled away the global ocean of Venus.
Compounds such as salts and ammonia dissolved in water lower its freezing point, so that water might मौजूद in विशाल quantities in extraterrestrial environments as brine or convecting बर्फ.
Unconfirmed oceans are speculated beneath the सतह of अनेक बौना ग्रह और प्राकृतिक satellites ; notably, the समंदर of यूरोपा is believed to have over twice the water volume of Earth.
The Solar System 's gas giant planets are also believed to possess द्रव वायुमंडलीय परतों of yet to be confirmed compositions.
Oceans may भी मौजूद on exoplanets और exomoons, सहित सतह oceans of liquid water within a circumstellar habitable zone.
समंदर ग्रह हैं a काल्पनिक type of planet with a surface completely covered with liquid.
Elvis Aaron Presley ( January 8, 1935 – अगस्त 16, 1977 ) थी an अमरीकी सिंगर and actor.
A cultural icon, he is commonly ज्ञात by the सिंगल name Elvis.
One of the most लोकप्रिय संगीतकारों of the 20th सदी, he is प्रायः referred to as the `` King of Rock and Roll '' or `` the King ''.
Born in Tupelo, Mississippi, प्रेस्ली स्थानांतरित to मेम्फिस, टेनेसी, साथ उसके family at the age of 13.
He began his career there in 1954, working with Sun Records owner sam phillips, जो चाही to लाओ the ध्वनि of african-american म्यूज़िक to a wider दर्शक.
Accompanied by guitarist Scotty Moore and bassist Bill Black, प्रेस्ली थी the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण popularizer of rockabilly, an uptempo, backbeat -ड्राइवn संलयन of देश and rhythm and blues.
RCA Victor acquired his contract in a deal arranged by Colonel Tom पार्कर, जो गई on to मैनेज the सिंगर लिये over two decades.
Presley 's पहला आरसीए सिंगल, `` Heartbreak Hotel ``, released in January 1956, was a number-one hit.
He became the leading figure of the newly popular sound of चट्टान और फेंकें साथ a श्रेणी of संजाल टेलीविज़न दिखावे और chart-topping records.
His energized interpretations of गीतों, अनेक इससे african-american स्त्रोत, और उसके uninhibited प्रदर्शन स्टाइल बना उसे enormously popular—and controversial.
in नवम्बर 1956, he बना उसके film debut in Love Me Tender.
Drafted into सैन्य सेवा in 1958, प्रेस्ली relaunched उसके रिकॉर्डिंग करियर दो सालो बाद with some of his most commercially successful work.
He staged few concerts however, और हिदायत by पार्कर, proceeded to devote much of the 1960s to बनाना हॉलीवुड movies and soundtrack albums, most of them critically derided.
In 1968, after seven years away from the stage, he लौटे to सजीव प्रदर्शन in a मनाये वापसी टेलीविज़न खास कि led to an विस्तारित Las Vegas concert residency and a string of profitable tours.
In 1973 Presley staged the first कॉन्सर्ट ब्रॉडकास्ट globally via उपग्रह, aloha from Hawaii.
Prescription drug abuse severely deteriorated उसके स्वास्थ्य, और he died एकाएक in 1977 at the age of 42.
Presley is regarded as एक of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण आंकड़े of 20th-century popular culture.
He had a बहुमुखी आवाज़ और unusually चौड़ी कामयाबी encompassing अनेक जाति, including country, pop ballads, gospel, and blues.
He is the best-selling solo artist in the इतिहास of लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक.
Nominated लिये 14 प्रतिस्पर्धी grammys, he जीती तीन, और प्राप्त the Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award at age 36.
He has महरूम inducted into अनेक म्यूज़िक halls of fame.
A कांच of रूट beer with foam
Root beer is a carbonated, sweetened beverage, originally made using the रूट of a sassafras संयंत्र ( or the छाल of a sassafras पेड़ ) as the primary flavor.
Root beer, popularized in North America, आता in दो फ़ॉर्म : alcoholic और नरम पेय.
the ऐतिहासिक रूट बियर थी analogous to छोटी बियर in कि the प्रक्रम provided a drink with a very low alcohol content.
Although roots are प्रयुक्त as the सोर्स of अनेक नरम पेय throughout the संसार, often different names are used.
Fluorescent minerals emit दृश्य लाइट जब उजागर to पराबैंगनी light
Fluorescence is the emission of लाइट by a पदार्थ कि रै अवशोषित लाइट or अन्य electromagnetic radiation.
It is a form of संदीप्ति.
In most cases, the emitted light has a longer wavelength, और इसलिए lower energy, than the absorbed radiation.
However, when the absorbed electromagnetic radiation is intense, it is possible for one electron to अवशोषित दो photons ; इस two-photon अवशोषण can सीसे to उत्सर्जन of विकिरण having a shorter wavelength than the absorbed radiation.
The emitted radiation may भी be of the वही wavelength as the अवशोषित विकिरण, termed `` resonance fluorescence ''.
The most striking examples of fluorescence occur when the अवशोषित विकिरण is in the पराबैंगनी प्रदेश of the वर्णक्रम, और यूँ अदृश्य to the इंसान नजर, and the emitted light is in the visible region.
Fluorescence has many practical applications, including mineralogy, gemology, chemical sensors ( प्रतिदीप्ति स्पेक्ट्रमिकी ), fluorescent लेबलिंग, dyes, biological डिटेक्टरों, और, सबसे commonly, fluorescent दीये.
Informal logic, intuitively, refers to the सिद्धान्त of लॉजिक और लॉजिकल विचार बाहर of a formal setting.
However, perhaps because of the अनौपचारिक in the शीर्षक, the precise परिभाषा of informal logic is a matter of some dispute.
Ralph H. Johnson and J. Anthony Blair define अनौपचारिक लॉजिक as `` a शाखा of लॉजिक जिनकी कार्य is to develop non-formal मानकों, मापदण्ड, procedures for the analysis, interpretation, evaluation, criticism and construction of argumentation. ''
This definition reflects what had been implicit in उनके अभ्यास और कया अन्य यहूद doing in उनके informal logic texts.
Informal logic is associated with ( informal ) fallacies, नाजुक सोच, the सोच कौशल गति and the interdisciplinary inquiry known as argumentation theory.
Frans H. van Eemeren writes that the लेबल `` अनौपचारिक लॉजिक '' कवर a `` संग्रहण of normative approaches to the study of reasoning in ordinary language that remain closer to the practice of argumentation than formal logic. ''
USA annual real GDP 1910–60, with the years of the ग्रेट अवसाद ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
Unemployment rate in the US 1910–1960, साथ the सालो of the ग्रेट अवसाद ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
The Great Depression began in August of 1929, when the संयुक्त राज्य अर्थव्यवस्था पहला गई into an आर्थिक मंदी.
हालांकि the देश खर्च दो महीने साथ घटती जीडीपी, it थी नहीं जबतक the Wall Street Crash of October, 1929 that the effects of a declining economy were felt, and a major worldwide economic downturn ensued.
The market crash marked the शुरूआत of a दशक of ऊँची बेरोजगारी, गरीबी, कम profits, अपस्फीति, plunging फार्म incomes, and lost opportunities for economic growth and personal advancement.
Although its causes are still uncertain and controversial, the net effect was a अचानक और सामान्य घाटा of विश्वास in the आर्थिक भविष्य.
The usual explanations include numerous factors, especially high consumer debt, ill-regulated markets that permitted overoptimistic लोन by बैंको और निवेशकों, और the कमी of high-growth नई उद्योग, सब interacting to बनाएँ a downward आर्थिक सर्पिल of घटाया spending, falling confidence, and lowered production.
Industries कि suffered the सबसे शामिल निर्माण, कृषि as dust-bowl conditions persisted in the agricultural heartland, shipping, mining, and logging as well as durable goods like automobiles and appliances that could be postponed.
The economy reached bottom in the winter of 1932–33 ; then आए चार सालो of बहुत रैपिड विकास जबतक 1937, जब the मंदी of 1937 brought back 1934 levels of unemployment.
The Depression caused प्रमुख राजनैतिक परिवर्तन in America.
Three years into the depression, Herbert Hoover lost the 1932 अध्यक्षीय चुनाव to फ्रैंकलिन delano Roosevelt in a sweeping landslide.
Roosevelt 's economic recovery plan, the New Deal, instituted unprecedented कार्यक्रम लिये राहत, रिकवरी और सुधार, और brought परिचय a प्रमुख realignment of American politics.
The Depression also resulted in an बढ़ाएँ of करणों of लोगों to अन्य देशों for the first time in American history.
For example, some immigrants went back to their देशी देशों, और कुछ देशी us नागरिकों went to Canada, Australia, and South Africa.
It also resulted in the mass माइग्रेशन of लोगों इससे badly hit क्षेत्रों in the ग्रेट मैदान and the South to places such as California and the North, respectively ( see Okies and the Great Migration of African Americans ).
Racial तनाव भी increased दौरान this time.
By the 1940s immigration had लौटे वापस to सामान्य, और करणों declined.
A well-known example of an emigrant was Frank McCourt, who went to आयरलैंड, as recounted in उसके किताब एंजेला 's Ashes.
The memory of the Depression also shaped modern theories of economics और resulted in अनेक परिवर्तन in कैसा the सरकारी dealt साथ आर्थिक downturns, ऐसे as the उपयोग of stimulus packages, Keynesian economics, and Social Security.
It also shaped आधुनिक अमरीकी साहित्य, resulting in प्रसिद्ध novels ऐसे as जॉन steinbeck 's `` The Grapes of Wrath `` and `` Of Mice and Men ``.
The Great Depression of the 1930s प्रारंभ साथ the भण्डार मार्केट क्रैश of अक्तूबर 1929.
Turkey ( ), officially the Republic of Turkey, is a transcontinental देश, स्तिथ ज़्यादातर on आनातोलिया in Western Asia and on East Thrace in Southeastern Europe.
Turkey is bordered by eight countries : बुल्गारिया to the उत्तरपश्चिम ; यूनानियों to the वेस्ट ; जॉर्जिया to the पूर्वोत्तर ; अर्मेनिया, इरान और the Azerbaijani exclave of Nakhchivan to the east ; and Iraq and Syria to the southeast.
The Mediterranean Sea is to the south ; the Aegean Sea is to the वेस्ट ; और the ब्लैक समुद्र is to the उत्तर.
The Sea of Marmara, the Bosphorus and the dardanelles ( जिससे साथ रूप the तुर्की straits ) demarcate the boundary between thrace और आनातोलिया ; वे भी separate Europe and Asia.
Turkey 's location at the क्रॉसरोड्स of यूरोपीय और एशिया makes it a country of significant geostrategic importance.
The country 's official language is Turkish, a turkic भाषा, जिससे is बोला by लगभग 85 % of the population as mother tongue.
The most numerous जातीय समूह is the turks, who constitute between 70 % and 75 % of the population according to The World Factbook.
Kurds are the largest ethnic minority and, according to the वही सोर्स, क्रमांक around 18 % of the जनसांख्यिकी जबकि अन्य जातीय अल्पसंख्यकों हैं अनुमानित to be at 7–12 %.
The vast majority of the जनसांख्यिकी is मुस्लिम.
The area now called Turkey has been inhabited since the paleolithic, सहित विभिन्न प्राचीन आनातोलियाई सभ्यताओं और thracian peoples.
After Alexander the Great 's conquest, the area was Hellenized, which जारी साथ the रोमन नियम और the परिवर्तन into the बीज़ान्टिन साम्राज्य.
The Seljuk Turks began migrating into the area in the 11th century, starting the प्रक्रम of turkification, जिससे थी greatly त्वरित by the सलजूक़ victory over the Byzantines at the Battle of Manzikert in 1071.
The Seljuk Sultanate of Rûm ruled आनातोलिया जबतक the mongol आक्रमण in 1243, upon which it disintegrated into several small Turkish beyliks.
Starting from the late 13th सदी, the उस्मानी beylik संयुक्त आनातोलिया और निर्मित an साम्राज्य encompassing much of Southeastern Europe, Western Asia and North Africa.
After the Ottoman Empire collapsed following इसके शिकस्त in संसार युद्ध i, भाग of it were occupied by the victorious Allies.
A cadre of young military officers, led by mustafa kemal अतातुर्क और उसके सहयोगियों, व्यवस्थित a कामयाब प्रतिरोध to the allies ; in 1923 they established the modern Republic of Turkey, with Atatürk as its first president.
तुर्कों is a लोकतांत्रिक, धर्मनिरपेक्ष, एकात्मक, constitutional republic with a diverse cultural heritage.
तुर्कों रै become increasingly एकीकृत साथ the वेस्ट through सदस्यता in संगठनों ऐसे as the Council of Europe, NATO, OECD, OSCE and the G-20 major economies.
Turkey began full membership negotiations with the यूरोपीय संघ in 2005, having महरूम an संबद्ध सदस्य of the यूरोपीय Economic Community since 1963 and having joined the EU Customs Union in 1995.
Turkey has also fostered बंद सांस्कृतिक, राजनैतिक और आर्थिक संबंध साथ the मध्य ईस्ट, काकेशस, the turkic राज्य of सेंट्रल एशिया और the अफ़्रीकी देशों through सदस्यता in संगठनों such as the Turkic Council, Joint Administration of Turkic Arts and Culture, Organisation of Islamic Cooperation and the Economic Cooperation Organisation.
Turkey 's growing economy and diplomatic पहलों have led to इसके मान्यता as a क्षेत्रीय power.
Turkey is the world 's 17th largest economy by नाममात्र जीडीपी और the 16th largest by खरीदना power parity.
Caryn ऐलेन जॉनसन, बेहतरीन ज्ञात as whoopi गोल्डबर्ग (, ( born नवम्बर 13, 1955 ) is an American comedienne, actress, singer-songwriter, political activist, author and talk show host.
Goldberg made उसके फिल्मी डेब्यू in the रंग जामुनी ( 1985 ), playing Celie, a mistreated black woman in the Deep South.
She प्राप्त a नामांकन लिये the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन Actress and won her first Golden Globe Award for her role in the film.
In 1990, she played Oda Mae Brown, a wacky मानसिक helping a slain man ( पैट्रिक swayze ) सहेजें उसके प्रेमी ( demi Moore ) in the blockbuster Ghost.
This performance won her a second Golden Globe and an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress ; this made Goldberg only the दूसरी ब्लैक स्त्री in the इतिहास of the अकादमी पुरस्कार to जीत an एक्टिंग oscar—the पहला होने हैटी mcdaniel जो जीती लिये गए साथ the Wind in 1939.
notable बाद films शामिल सिस्टर अधिनियम और सिस्टर अधिनियम 2, The Player, Made in America, How Stella Got Her Groove Back, Girl, Interrupted and Rat Race.
She is also acclaimed for her roles as the bartender Guinan in Star Trek : The Next पीढी, as टेरी doolittle in jumpin ' जोकर फ्लैश, और as कार्मेन tibideaux in ग्ली, as well as the voice of Shenzi the hyena in The Lion King.
Goldberg has been nominated for 13 Emmy Awards for her कार्य in टेलीविज़न.
She was co-producer of the लोकप्रिय खेल दिखाएँ हॉलीवुड Squares from 1998 to 2004.
She has been the moderator of the दिन बात दिखाएँ the View since 2007.
Goldberg has a Grammy, two Daytime Emmys, two Golden Globes, a टोनी ( लिये उत्पादन, नहीं एक्टिंग ), और an Oscar.
In addition, गोल्डबर्ग रै a अंग्रेजों अकादमी फिल्मी पुरस्कार, चार लोगों 's Choice Awards, and has been honored with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
She is one of the few entertainers who have जीती an एमी, ग्रैमी, ऑस्कर, और टोनी पुरस्कार.
Augusta is a संचित नगर in the u.S. राज्य of जॉर्जिया, स्तिथ at the fall line of the Savannah River, at the head of its navigable portion.
As of the 2010 census, the Augusta– Richmond County population was 195,844 नहीं गिनती the unconsolidated शहरों of hephzibah और blythe.
Augusta is the principal city of the Augusta – Richmond County Metropolitan Statistical Area, which as of 2010 था an अनुमानित जनसांख्यिकी of 556,877, बनाना it दोनो the second-largest नगर और the second-largest metro area in the state after Atlanta.
It is the 116th-largest city in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Internationally, Augusta is बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये होस्टिंग the मास्टर्स टूर्नामेंट in golf each spring.
A CD-ROM ( ) is a pre-pressed कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क जिससे contains data.
The name is an एक्रोनिम जिससे स्टैंड लिये `` Compact Disc Read-only memory ``.
Computers can पढ़ा cd-roms, लकिन can नहीं लिखें on them.
CD-ROMs are popularly used to वितरित कंप्यूटर तन्त्र, सहित वीडियो खेल और मल्टीमीडिया अनुप्रयोग, हालांकि कोई data can be stored ( up to the capacity limit of a disc ).
Some CDs, called enhanced CDs, hold both computer data and audio with the latter capable of being played on a CD खिलाड़ी, जबकि आंकड़ा ( ऐसे as तन्त्र or डिजिटल वीडियो ) is तभी usable on a कंप्यूटर ( ऐसे as ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ).
The Yellow Book is the technical standard that defines the स्वरूप of cd-roms.
One of a set of color-bound books that contain the technical विशेषताएँ लिये सब CD formats, the Yellow Book, created by Sony and Philips, was the first extension of Compact Disc Digital Audio.
It adapted the स्वरूप to hold any form of data.
The Chicago Blackhawks ( spelled as Black Hawks before 1986, and known colloquially as the Hawks ) हैं a पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी टोली आधारित in शिकागो, इलिनोइस.
They are members of the Central Division of the Western Conference of the नेशनल हॉकी लीग ( NHL ).
वे have जीती चार स्टेनली कप championships चूंकि their founding in 1926, most recently in 2009–10.
The ब्लैकहॉक्स हैं एक of the असली छह एनएचएल टीमों, साथ साथ the Detroit Red Wings, Montreal Canadiens, Toronto Maple Leafs, Boston Bruins and New York Rangers.
Since the Blackhawks have played their home games at the United Center बाद having खर्च 65 सालो playing at शिकागो स्टेडियम.
Lent celebrants carrying आउट a गली बारात दौरान पावन सप्ताह.
The violet रंग is प्रायः संबद्ध with penance and detachment.
Similar Christian penitential practice is देखी in अन्य कैथोलिक देशों, sometimes संबद्ध with mortification of the flesh.
Granada, निकारागुआ.
Lent ( Latin : Quadragesima ) is a solemn observance in the liturgical year of many Christian denominations, स्थायी लिये a काल of लगभग छह सप्ताह अग्रणी up to Easter Sunday.
In the general Latin-rite and most पश्चिमी denominations lent is लिया to चलाएं इससे राख बुधवार to maundy गुरुवार ( पावन गुरुवार ) morning or to Easter Eve.
In the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर, lent lasts जबतक Holy Thursday, while other denominations run until Easter Eve.
The traditional purpose of Lent is the तैयारी of the आस्तिक through दुआ, penance, repentance, almsgiving, and self-denial.
Its institutional purpose is heightened in the annual commemoration of Holy सप्ताह, अंकन the मौत, दफ़न और क़यामत of यीशु, जिससे recalls the कार्यक्रम of the बाइबल जब यीशु is crucified on Good Friday, which then culminates in the celebration on Easter Sunday of the Resurrection of Jesus Christ.
During Lent, many of the वफादार कमिट to उपवास or giving up निश्चित प्रकार of luxuries as a form of penitence.
The Stations of the क्रॉस, a devotional commemoration of मसीह 's carrying the Cross and of his execution, are often observed.
Many Roman Catholic and some Protestant churches remove flowers from their altars, while crucifixes, धार्मिक मूर्तियाँ, और अन्य विस्तृत धार्मिक प्रतीकों हैं प्रायः रहमत in बैंगनी fabrics in solemn observance of the event.
In certain pious Catholic countries, some adherents mark the season साथ the परंपरागत abstention इससे the खपत of मांस.
In some countries, grand religious processions and cultural customs हैं observed, और the वफादार attempt to विज़िट सात churches during Holy Week in honor of Jesus Christ heading to Mount Calvary.
Lent is traditionally described as lasting for forty days, in commemoration of the चालीस दिनों जिससे, according to the gospels of मैथ्यू, चिह्नित और ल्यूक, यीशु खर्च उपवास in the desert before the beginning of his public ministry, where he endured temptation by the Devil.
however, अलग ईसाई denominations calculate the forty days of Lent differently.
In most Western परंपराओं the sundays हैं नहीं गिने as भाग of lent ; यूँ the काल from Ash Wednesday until Easter consists of 40 days when the Sundays are excluded.
However in the Roman Catholic गिरिजाघर lent is अभी लिया to समाप्त on पावन गुरुवार बल्कि than Easter Eve, and hence lasts 38 days excluding Sundays, or 44 days in total.
This event, along with इसके परहेज़गारों कस्टम हैं observed by catholics, lutherans, methodists, Presbyterians, and Anglicans.

The Chernobyl disaster (, Chornobylska Katastrofa – Chornobyl Catastrophe ) was a catastrophic nuclear accident that occurred on 26 अप्रैल 1986 at the chernobyl नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र in युक्त ( तब officially the यूक्रेनी ssr ), जिससे थी अंतर्गत the सीधा क्षेत्राधिकार of the central authorities of the Soviet Union.
An explosion and fire released large quantities of radioactive particles into the माहौल, जिससे स्प्रेड over much of the पश्चिमी ussr और यूरोपीय.
The Chernobyl disaster is widely considered to have been the worst नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र दुर्घटना in इतिहास, और is एक of तभी दो वर्गीकृत as a स्तर 7 इवेंट on the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Nuclear Event Scale ( the other being the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster in 2011 ).
The battle to contain the संदूषण और avert a वृहद प्रलय ultimately शामिल over 500,000 workers and cost an estimated 18 billion rubles.
The official Soviet casualty गिनती of 31 मौतों रै महरूम विवादित, और long-term प्रभाव ऐसे as cancers और deformities are still being accounted for.
In grammar, a subject complement is a predicative expression that follows a linking क्रिया ( copula ) और कि complements ( completes ) the विषय of the वाक्य by either ( 1 ) renaming it or ( 2 ) describing it.
in the पूर्व मामला, a renaming संज्ञा phrase ऐसे as a संज्ञा or pronoun is called a predicative nominal.
An adjective following the copula and describing the विषय is पुकारा a predicative क्रियाशील.
In either मामला the predicative पूरक in प्रभाव mirrors the subject.
Subject complements are used साथ a छोटी क्लास of क्रियाएँ पुकारा linking क्रियाएँ or copula, of which be is the most common.
Since copula हैं stative क्रियाएँ, विषय complements हैं नहीं प्रभावित by any action of the verb.
Subject complements हैं typically नहीं clause वितर्क, nor are they clause adjuncts.
Throughout the fifty-five साल इतिहास of the ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, अनेक significant records have been set.
This पेज तभी शामिल the प्रतिस्पर्धी awards won by various artists.
This does not include the various special awards that are प्रस्तुत by the नेशनल अकादमी of रिकॉर्डिंग कला और sciences ऐसे as आजीवन उपलब्धि पुरस्कार, trustees पुरस्कार, तकनीकी पुरस्कार or लेजेंड Awards.
The page however does include other non-performance related grammys ( ज्ञात as the शिल्प & उत्पादन फ़ील्ड ) कि may have महरूम presented to the artist ( s ).
Marshall Bruce Mathers III ( born October 17, 1972 ), better known by his stage name Eminem ( stylized as EMINƎM ) और by उसके alter अहंकार पतला छायादार, is an अमरीकी rapper, रिकार्ड निर्माता, songwriter and actor.
Eminem, along साथ उसके सोलो करियर, is a सदस्य of उसके समूह d12, और भी एक हाफ of the हिप हॉप duo ख़राब meets Evil, with Royce da 5'9 ''.
Eminem is one of the best-selling कलाकारों in the संसार और is the best-selling artist of the 2000s.
He has been listed and ranked as one of the महानतम कलाकारों of सब समय by अनेक मैगज़ीन, सहित रोलिंग स्टोन पत्रिका जिससे क्रमित उसे 82nd on its list of The 100 Greatest Artists of All Time.
The same पत्रिका घोषित उसे The King of Hip Hop.
Including his work with D12 and Bad meets दुष्ट, एमिनेम रै हासिल टेन number-one एल्बम on the Billboard 200.
He has sold अधिक than 100 लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी, सहित 42 million tracks and 49.1 million albums in the United States.
As an underground rapper एमिनेम released उसके डेब्यू सोलो एल्बम, अनन्त in 1996.
The एल्बम थी a नाजुक and commercial failure.
He gained mainstream popularity in 1999 after the release of his major-label डेब्यू एल्बम the पतला छायादार lp.
The LP also earned Eminem his पहला ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन रैप एल्बम.
His next two records The Marshall Mathers LP, and The Eminem दिखाएँ, भी जीती बेहतरीन रैप एल्बम ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, बनाना एमिनेम the पहला artist to win Best Rap Album for three consecutive LPs.
This was followed by another स्टुडियो रिलीज in 2004 titled Encore.
Eminem then went on अंतराल बाद touring in 2005.
He released his first album in five सालो titled पतन, on may 15, 2009.
In 2010, Eminem released उसके सातवाँ स्टुडियो एल्बम Recovery.
Recovery was an अंतरराष्ट्रीय कामयाबी और थी नामित the बेहतरीन selling एल्बम of 2010 विश्वव्यापी, joining The Eminem Show, which was the best seller of 2002.
एमिनेम जीती ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये दोनो पतन और रिकवरी, giving him a total of 13 Grammys in his career.
Eminem has opened other ventures, सहित उसके अपना रिकार्ड लेबल छायादार रिकॉर्ड with his manager Paul Rosenberg.
He also has his own radio चैनल, शेड 45 on sirius xm रेडियो.
Eminem began an एक्टिंग करियर in 2002, जब he स्ट्रक्चर in the hip hop drama film 8 Mile.
he जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन असली सोंग, बनने the first rap artist ever to win the award.
He has also made cameo appearances in The Wash ( 2001 ), मजेदार लोगों ( 2009 ) और the टेलीविज़न श्रेणी Entourage.
The एकड़ is a ईकाई of क्षेत्रफल प्रयुक्त in the imperial and U.S. customary systems.
An acre is about 40 % of a हेक्टेयर – थोड़ा छोटी than an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल field.
The acre is no longer commonly used, हालांकि a few notable अपवाद शामिल the संयुक्त राज्य, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, बर्मा और the संयुक्त किंगडम ( as of 2010, the acre is no longer officially used in the United Kingdom, though is still used in real estate descriptions ).
It is still used, to कुछ extent, in Canada.
The international symbol of the एकड़ is ac, और is पारिभाषित as 1/640 of a square mile.
The most commonly used acre today is the अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़.
In the संयुक्त राज्य दोनो the अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़ और the slightly different US survey acre are in use.
The most आम उपयोग of the एकड़ is to measure tracts of land.
One अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़ is पारिभाषित as 4046.8564224 वर्गाकार मीटर.
During the मध्य आयु, an एकड़ थी the राशि of जमीन कि could be plowed in one day with a yoke of oxen.
Antoine Lavoisier 's discovery of the विधि of संरक्षण of द्रव्यमान led to अनेक new findings in the 19th century.
Joseph Proust 's law of definite proportions और जॉन डाल्टन 's परमाणु सिद्धान्त branched इससे the discoveries of Antoine Lavoisier.
Lavoisier 's quantitative प्रयोग नाज़िल कि दहन शामिल oxygen rather than what was previously thought to be phlogiston.
The law of conservation of mass, or principle of mass conservation, states that for any system closed to all transfers of matter and energy ( both of which have द्रव्यमान ), the द्रव्यमान of the प्रणाली जरूर remain निरंतर over समय, as प्रणाली द्रव्यमान can नहीं बदलें मात्रा if it is नहीं added or removed.
Hence, the मात्रा of द्रव्यमान is `` conserved '' over time.
The law implies that mass can neither be created nor नष्ट, हालांकि it may be rearranged in स्पेस, or the entities संबद्ध साथ it may be बदला in form, as for example when light or physical work is transformed into particles that contribute the same mass to the system as the light or work had contributed.
The law implies ( requires ) that during any chemical reaction, nuclear reaction, or रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय in an पृथक प्रणाली, the द्रव्यमान of the reactants or starting सामग्री जरूर बराबर the द्रव्यमान of the products.
The concept of mass संरक्षण is widely प्रयुक्त in अनेक फ़ील्ड ऐसे as रसायन, mechanics, and fluid dynamics.
Historically, mass conservation was खोजा in रासायनिक प्रतिक्रियाएँ by एंटोनी लाव्वाज़्ये in the लेट 18th सदी, और थी of निर्णायक महत्व in the progress from alchemy to the modern natural science of chemistry.
The closely related concept of matter conservation was found to hold good in chemistry to such high approximation that it failed only for the high energies treated by the later refinements of आपेक्षिकता सिद्धान्त, लकिन वरना remains उपयोगी और fear सटीक लिये सबसे रासायनिक calculations, भी in आधुनिक practice.
In special relativity, needed for accuracy when विशाल उर्जा हस्तांतरण between प्रणालियों is शामिल, the अंतर between thermodynamically बंद और पृथक प्रणालियों becomes महत्वपूर्ण, since conservation of mass is strictly and perfectly upheld only for so-called isolated systems, i.e. those completely isolated from all exchanges with the environment.
In this circumstance, the mass-energy equivalence प्रमेय राज्य कि द्रव्यमान संरक्षण is समतुल्य to कुल उर्जा conservation, which is the first law of thermodynamics.
By contrast, for a thermodynamically closed system ( i.e., one which is closed to exchanges of matter, but खोलें to exchanges of non-material उर्जा, ऐसे as ऊष्मा और कार्य, साथ the परिवेश ) mass is ( usually ) only approximately conserved.
The input or output of non-material energy must change the द्रव्यमान of the प्रणाली in आपेक्षिकता सिद्धान्त, हालांकि the बदलें is प्रायः छोटी, चूंकि अपेक्षाकृत विशाल amounts of ऐसे उर्जा ( by comparison with ordinary experience ) carry only a small amount of mass ( again by ordinary standards of measurement ).
In special relativity, mass is not converted to energy, since energy in सब of इसके फ़ॉर्म सदा retains इसके समतुल्य राशि of द्रव्यमान throughout कोई परिवर्तन or translocation into, or out of, a system.
However, निश्चित प्रकार of पदार्थ ( a अलग अवधारणा ) may be converted to energy, so long as the mass of the system is unchanged in the process.
However, if such energy is removed from systems, they जरूर खोना the द्रव्यमान कि is संबद्ध with it.
In general relativity, mass ( and energy ) संरक्षण in expanding आयतन of स्पेस is a जटिल अवधारणा, विषय to अलग definitions, and neither mass nor energy is as strictly and simply conserved as is the case in special relativity and in Minkowski space.
For a चर्चा, देखिए द्रव्यमान in सामान्य आपेक्षिकता.
A pig is any of the animals in the genus सस, भीतर the suidae परिवार of even-toed ungulates.
Pigs include the domestic pig, its ancestor the wild boar, और अनेक अन्य जंगली रिश्तेदारों.
Young और छोटी सूअर हैं known as piglets.
सूअर हैं omnivores और हैं highly social and intelligent animals.

A 3.5-inch diskette 's `` फ्लॉपी '' चुम्बकीय material, removed from its housing
A floppy डिस्क, or diskette, is a डिस्क भंडार मीडियम रचित of a डिस्क of पतला और लचीली चुम्बकीय भंडार मीडियम, sealed in a rectangular plastic carrier lined with fabric that removes dust particles.
They are पढ़ा और लिखा by a फ्लॉपी डिस्क drive ( FDD ).
Floppy disks, initially as media and later in and 3.5-inch ( 90 mm ) आकार, यहूद a सर्वव्यापी रूप of आंकड़ा भंडार और एक्सचेंज इससे the mid-1970s खूब into the first decade of the 21st century.
By 2010, computer motherboards were rarely manufactured साथ फ्लॉपी ड्राइव support ; `` floppies could be प्रयुक्त as an बाह्य usb ड्राइव, लकिन ``, 8 ``, and non-standard drives could only be handled by old equipment.
While floppy disk drives still have some limited uses, विशेषकर साथ विरासत औद्योगिक कंप्यूटर उपकरण, वे have महरूम superseded by आंकड़ा भंडार विधि with much greater capacity, such as USB flash drives, portable external hard disk drives, optical discs, memory cards, and computer networks.

In baseball, a cutter, or cut fastball, is a type of fastball जिससे ब्रेक थोड़ा toward the पिचर 's दस्ताने पक्ष as it reaches home plate.
This pitch is somewhere between a स्लाइडर और a fastball, as it is प्रायः thrown तेज़ than a स्लाइडर लकिन with more motion than a typical fastball.
Some pitchers use a कटर as a रास्ता to prevent hitters from expecting their regular fastballs.
A common technique used to throw a cutter is to use a four-seam fastball grip with the बेसबॉल नियत थोड़ा बंद बीच in the हाथ.
When a बैटर is समर्थ to hit a कटर पिच, it प्रायः परिणाम in नरम सम्पर्क और an आसान आउट, due to the pitch 's movement keeping the ball away from the bat 's sweet spot.
The cutter is typically 2–5 mph slower than a पिचर 's four-seam fastball.
In 2010, the average pitch classified as a cutter by PITCHf/x thrown by a right-handed पिचर थी 88.6 किमी ; the औसत four-seamer थी 92.1 mph.
`` What It takes '' is a शक्ति ballad by अमरीकी hard rock band Aerosmith.
it थी लिखा by स्टीवन टायलर, जो Perry, and Desmond Child.
It was released in 1990 as the तीसरा सिंगल इससे एरोस्मिथ 's critically and commercially successful 1989 album Pump.

The एल्बम संस्करण of the सोंग is followed by an untitled hidden track.

Odysseus ( or ; यूनानी :, ), भी ज्ञात by the रोमन नाम ulysses ( ; ), थी a legendary Greek king of Ithaca and a hero of Homer 's epic poem the Odyssey.
Odysseus also plays a key role in Homer 's इलियड और अन्य works in कि वही Epic Cycle.
Husband of Penelope, पिता of telemachus, और बेटे of laërtes ( or sisyphus ) and Anticlea, Odysseus is renowned for his brilliance, guile, and versatility ( polytropos ), and is hence known by the epithet Odysseus the Cunning ( mētis, or `` cunning intelligence `` ).
He is most famous for the ten eventful सालो he took to वापसी घर बाद the decade-long Trojan War and his famous Trojan Horse ploy to capture the city of Troy.
Erie is a Statutory Town in बोल्डर और वेल्ड काउंटी in the u.S. state of Colorado.
The जनसांख्यिकी according to the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी is 18,135 और was recorded as 6,291 at the 2000 census.
The कस्बा of erie is स्तिथ बस वेस्ट of i-25 लिये आसान अभिगम to i-70, डेनवर अंतरराष्ट्रीय Airport and Colorado 's entire Front Range.
Erie 's Planning Area spans 48 square miles, extending from the north पक्ष of राज्य राजमार्ग 52 दक्षिण to राज्य राजमार्ग 7, और between us 287 on the west and Interstate 25 to the east.
Erie is approximately 35 मिनट्स इससे डेनवर अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र, 25 मिनट्स to डेनवर and 20 minutes from Boulder.
the फलक of trustees serves as the विधान और शासी देह of the Town of Erie and is responsible for establishing Town policies and goals.
The Board has the authority to adopt laws, ordinances and resolutions as needed to conduct the कारोबार of the कस्बा, और by अध्यादेश may डालें into अनुबंध or intergovernmental समझौतों to furnish, receive services or to provide for cooperative service delivery.
Appointed by and serving at the pleasure of the Board of Trustees, the Town Administrator is the मुख्य ऑपरेटिंग और प्रशासनिक अधिकारी of the कस्बा और is जिम्मेदार लिये providing पेशेवर नेतृत्व in the प्रशासन and execution of policies and objectives formulated by the Board.
The मिशन of the erie पुलिस विभाग is to communicate और कार्य साथ the जातियाँ to maintain a safe environment, prevent crime and enforce the law, while protecting the rights of all.
Erie Municipal Airport ( EIK ) is owned and operated by the Town of Erie and is strategically located in the denver-boulder महानगर क्षेत्रफल on कोलोराडो Highway 7, a little over three miles west of Interstate 25.
The main runway is कंक्रीट प्रशस्त और 4,700 फीट long.
The is a home वीडियो खेल कंसोल उत्पादित by सोनी Computer Entertainment.
It is the successor to the प्लेस्टेशन 2, as भाग of the प्लेस्टेशन श्रेणी.
The PlayStation 3 competes साथ microsoft 's एक्सबॉक्स 360 और निन्टेंडो 's वी as भाग of the seventh generation of video game consoles.
it थी पहला released on नवम्बर 11, 2006, in Japan, with international markets following shortly thereafter.
The कंसोल थी पहला officially announced at E3 2005.
Originally set for a वसन्त 2006 रिलीज तिथि, it थी विलम्बित अनेक टाइम्स जबतक finally hitting stores at the end of the year.
It was the first and फिलहाल तभी कंसोल to उपयोग blu-ray डिस्क as इसके प्राथमिक storage medium.
Major features of the console include इसके एकीकृत ऑनलाइन गेमिंग सेवा, the प्लेस्टेशन संजाल, और इसके कनेक्टिविटी साथ the प्लेस्टेशन पोर्टेबल और प्लेस्टेशन Vita, In September 2009 the updated PlayStation 3 Slim, was released.
This Slim is lighter और thinner than the असली संस्करण, हालांकि it lacks प्लेस्टेशन 2 पीछे संगतता ( removed on later original models ), but notably featured a re-designed logo and marketing design.
As of November 4, 2012, 70 लाख प्लेस्टेशन 3s have महरूम sold worldwide.
Its successor, PlayStation 4, is नियत लिये a q4 2013 रिलीज.
Salvador Domingo Felipe Jacinto Dalí i Domènech, 1st marqués de dalí de pubol ( may 11, 1904january 23, 1989 ), ज्ञात as साल्वाडोर dalí ( ), was a prominent Spanish surrealist painter born in Figueres, Spain.
Dalí was a skilled draftsman, बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये the striking and bizarre images in his surrealist work.
His painterly skills are often attributed to the influence of पुनर्जागरण मास्टर्स.
उसके best-known कार्य, The Persistence of Memory, was completed in 1931.
dalí 's expansive कलाकारी रंगमंडल शामिल फिल्मी, sculpture, and photography, in collaboration with a range of artists in a variety of media.
Dalí attributed his `` love of everything that is gilded and excessive, my passion for luxury and my love of oriental clothes '' to a self-styled `` Arab lineage '', claiming कि उसके पूर्वजो यहूद descended from the Moors.
Dalí was highly imaginative, और भी enjoyed indulging in असामान्य and grandiose behavior.
His eccentric manner and attention-grabbing public actions sometimes खींचा अधिक ध्यान than उसके कलाकृति, to the dismay of those जो आयोजित उसके work in high esteem, and to the irritation of his critics.

The humanities are academic disciplines that study इंसान संस्कृति, using विधि कि हैं primarily विश्लेषणात्मक, नाजुक, or सट्टे, और having a significant ऐतिहासिक तत्व, as distinguished from the mainly empirical approaches of the natural sciences.
The humanities include ancient and modern languages, literature, दर्शनशास्त्र, धर्म, और विज़ुअल और performing कला such as music and theatre.
The humanities that are also regarded as social sciences include इतिहास, मानवशास्त्र, क्षेत्रफल अध्ययन, संचार अध्ययन, सांस्कृतिक अध्ययन, law, economics and linguistics.
Scholars working in the मानवता are sometimes described as `` humanists ''.
However, that term also describes the philosophical स्थिति of मानवतावाद, जिससे कुछ `` antihumanist `` scholars in the humanities reject.
Some द्वितीयक स्कूलों प्रस्ताव मानवता वर्ग, प्रायः consisting of English literature, global studies, and art.
Human disciplines like history, cultural anthropology and मनोविश्लेषण पढ़ाई विषय matters to जिससे the प्रायोगिक विधि करता not apply, and they have access instead to the comparative method and comparative research.
The 2005 ब्लू रूम क्रिसमस Tree
The श्वेत हाउस क्रिसमस पेड़, भी ज्ञात as the ब्लू रूम क्रिसमस पेड़, is the आधिकारिक अंदर Christmas tree at the residence of the President of the United States, the White House.
The first indoor Christmas tree was installed in the White House sometime in the 19th century ( there are varying claims as to the सटीक साल ) और चूंकि 1961 the पेड़ रै था a प्रसंग मोटिफ at the discretion of the पहला महिला of the United States.
The President of the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका ( potus ) is the head of state and head of government of the United States.
The president leads the executive branch of the संघीय सरकारी और is the commander-in-chief of the United States Armed Forces.
Article II of the U.S. Constitution vests the executive power of the United States in the president and charges him with the execution of federal law, alongside the जिम्मेदारी of appointing संघीय कार्यपालिका, राजनयिक, नियामक, और न्यायिक अधिकारियों, और concluding treaties साथ विदेशी शक्तियां, साथ the सलाह और सहमति of the सीनेट.
The president is further सशक्त to ग्रान्ट संघीय pardons और reprieves, और to convene and adjourn either or both houses of Congress under extraordinary circumstances.
Since the founding of the United States, the power of the president and the federal government have grown substantially और प्रत्येक आधुनिक अध्यक्ष, despite possessing no औपचारिक विधान शक्तियां परे हस्ताक्षर or vetoing congressionally passed बिल्स, is largely responsible for dictating the legislative agenda of his party and the foreign and domestic policy of the United States.
The अध्यक्ष is अक्सर described as the most powerful person in the world.
The president is indirectly elected by the people through the Electoral College to a four-year पद, और is एक of तभी दो nationally निर्वाचित संघीय अधिकारियों, the अन्य being the Vice President of the United States.
The Twenty-second Amendment, adopted in 1951, prohibits anyone इससे कभी होने निर्वाचित to the प्रेसिडेंसी for a third full term.
It also prohibits a person from being elected to the presidency अधिक than एकबार if कि व्यक्ति previously था परोसा as अध्यक्ष, or एक्टिंग अध्यक्ष, लिये अधिक than two years of another person 's term as president.
In all, 43 individuals have परोसा 55 four-year terms.
On जनवरी 20, 2009, बराक ओबामा became the 44th and current president.
On November 6, 2012, he was re-elected और is अनुसूचित to serve जबतक जनवरी 20, 2017.
Senses are physiological capacities of जीवों कि provide आंकड़ा लिये perception.
The senses and their operation, classification, and theory are overlapping topics studied by a variety of फ़ील्ड, सबसे notably neuroscience, संज्ञानात्मक मनोविज्ञान ( or संज्ञानात्मक विज्ञान ), और दर्शनशास्त्र of perception.
The nervous system has a specific sensory system or अंग, समर्पित to प्रत्येक भाव.
Humans have a multitude of होश.
Sight ( ophthalmoception ), सुनना ( audioception ), स्वाद ( gustaoception ), smell ( olfacoception or olfacception ), and touch ( tactioception ) are the five traditionally recognized.
While the ability to detect other stimuli beyond those governed by the traditional senses exists, including temperature ( thermoception ), kinesthetic sense ( proprioception ), pain ( nociception ), संतुलन ( equilibrioception ), त्वरण ( kinesthesioception ), और विभिन्न आतंरिक stimuli ( e.g. the अलग chemoreceptors लिये detecting नमक और कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड एकाग्रता in the रक्त ), तभी a छोटी क्रमांक of ये can safely be classified as separate senses in and of themselves.
What constitutes a sense is a पदार्थ of कुछ बहस, अग्रणी to कठिनाइयों in धमक what exactly a sense is.
Animals also have receptors to भाव the संसार around उन्हें, साथ डिग्री of काबिलियत varying greatly between species.
Humans have a comparatively weak sense of महकते, जबकि कुछ पशु may कमी एक or अधिक of the परंपरागत five senses.
Some animals may also सेवन और interpret संवेदी stimuli in very different ways.
Some प्रजाति of पशु हैं समर्थ to भाव the संसार in a रास्ता कि इंसानो can नहीं, साथ कुछ प्रजाति समर्थ to sense electrical and magnetic fields, and detect water pressure and currents.
Spiders ( order Araneae ) are air-breathing arthropods that have आठ टाँगे और chelicerae साथ fangs कि inject venom.
They are the largest order of arachnids और रैंक सातवाँ in कुल प्रजाति विविधता among सब अन्य समूह of organisms.
Spiders are found worldwide on प्रत्येक महाद्वीप मगर लिये अंटार्कटिक, और have become established in nearly every habitat with the exception of air and sea colonization.
As of 2008, at least 43,678 spider species, and 109 families have been recorded by taxonomists ; however, there has been confusion within the scientific जातियाँ as to कैसा सब ये परिवारों चाहिए be वर्गीकृत, as evidenced by the over 20 अलग classifications कि have been proposed since 1900.
Anatomically, spiders differ from other arthropods in that the usual body segments are fused into two tagmata, the cephalothorax और उदर, और joined by a छोटी, बेलनाकार pedicel.
नापसंद कीट, मकड़ियों do not have antennae.
In all मगर the सबसे आदिम समूह, the mesothelae, मकड़ियों have the सबसे centralized बेचैन प्रणालियों of सब arthropods, as सब उनके ganglia are fused into one mass in the cephalothorax.
Unlike सबसे arthropods, मकड़ियों have no extensor मांसपेशियां in their limbs and instead extend them by hydraulic pressure.
Their abdomens bear appendages that have been modified into spinnerets कि extrude रेशा इससे up to छह प्रकार of रेशा ग्रंथियों भीतर उनके abdomen.
Spider webs vary widely in आकार, आकार और the राशि of sticky thread used.
It now appears that the spiral orb web may be एक of the earliest फ़ॉर्म, और मकड़ियों कि उपज उलझे cobwebs हैं अधिक abundant and diverse than orb-web spiders.
Spider-like arachnids with silk-producing spigots appeared in the devonian काल परिचय, लकिन ये पशु जाहिर lacked spinnerets.
True मकड़ियों have महरूम मिला in carboniferous रॉक्स इससे, और हैं बहुत समान to the most primitive surviving order, the Mesothelae.
The main groups of modern spiders, mygalomorphae और araneomorphae, पहला appeared in the Triassic period, before.
A herbivorous species, Bagheera kiplingi, was described in 2008, but all other known species are predators, ज़्यादातर preying on कीट और on अन्य spiders, although a few large species also take birds and lizards.
Spiders use a wide range of strategies to capture prey : trapping it in स्टिकी webs, lassoing it साथ स्टिकी bolas, mimicking the prey to avoid detection, or running it down.
Most detect prey mainly by sensing vibrations, but the active hunters have अधि दृष्टि, और hunters of the genus portia दिखाएँ लक्षण of प्रज्ञा in उनके choice of tactics and ability to develop new ones.
Spiders ' guts are too narrow to take solids, and they liquidize their food by flooding it साथ digestive एंजाइमों और पीस it साथ the bases of उनके pedipalps, as वे do not have true jaws.
Male मकड़ियों पहचानो themselves by a किस्में of जटिल प्रेमालाप संस्कार to avoid being eaten by the females.
Males of most species survive a few matings, सीमित mainly by their short life spans.
Females weave रेशा egg-cases, प्रत्येक of जिससे may contain hundreds of eggs.
Females of many species care for उनके यंग, लिये उदाहरण by carrying उन्हें around or by sharing food with them.
A minority of species are social, भवन सांप्रदायिक webs कि may हाउस anywhere from a few to 50,000 individuals.
Social behavior ranges from precarious toleration, as in the विधवा मकड़ियों, to co-operative शिकार और food-sharing.
Although most spiders live for at most two years, tarantulas and other mygalomorph मकड़ियों can सजीव up to 25 सालो in captivity.
While the venom of a few प्रजाति is खतरनाक to इंसानो, scientists are now researching the use of spider venom in medicine and as non-polluting pesticides.
Spider silk provides a combination of lightness, strength and लोच कि is श्रेष्ठ to कि of सिंथेटिक सामग्री, और मकड़ी रेशा जीनों have महरूम inserted into स्तनधारियों और plants to see if these can be used as silk factories.
As a result of their चौड़ी दायरा of व्यवहार, मकड़ियों have become आम प्रतीकों in आर्ट और mythology symbolizing various combinations of patience, cruelty and creative powers.
Grey 's Anatomy is an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न चिकित्सा नाटक कि premiered on the अमरीकी प्रसारण Company ( ABC ), as a mid-season replacement on March 27, 2005.
The series has aired nine सीज़न, और focuses on the fictional जीवनदान of सर्जिकल interns और residents as they gradually evolve into seasoned doctors, while trying to maintain personal lives.
The show 's premise originated with Shonda Rhimes, who serves as an executive निर्माता, साथ साथ बेट्सी beers, चिह्नित गॉर्डन, Krista Vernoff, Rob Corn, Mark Wilding, and Allan Heinberg.
The series was created to be racially विविध, utilizing a color-blind ढलाई technique.
It is primarily filmed in लॉस एंजिल्स, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
The series ' protagonist is Dr. Meredith Grey ( Ellen Pompeo ), जो originally is स्वीकृत into the रेसिडेंसी कार्यक्रम at the fictional सिएटल Grace Hospital.
Meredith is assigned to work under Dr. Miranda Bailey ( Chandra Wilson ), साथ साथ dr. क्रिस्टीना यांग ( सैंड्रा oh ), dr. जार्ज o'malley ( T. R. नाईट ), dr. izzie स्टीवंस ( Katherine Heigl ), and Dr. Alex Karev ( Justin Chambers ).
Following O'Malley 's death and Stevens ' departure, the hospital 's merger with Mercy West brings in Dr. Jackson Avery ( जेसी विलियम्स ) और dr. अप्रैल kepner ( सारा खींचा ), in the sixth season.
The surgical wing is primarily पर्यवेक्षित by dr. रिचर्ड webber ( जेम्स pickens, jr. ), जो is आखिरकार replaced by dr. Derek Shepherd ( Patrick Dempsey ), and later Dr. Owen Hunt ( Kevin McKidd ).
Dr. Preston Burke ( Isaiah Washington ) departs at the निष्कर्ष of the तीसरा ऋतु, और is replaced by dr. एरिका hahn ( ब्रुक स्मिथ ), जो पत्ते the दिखाएँ दौरान the fifth season, and later Dr. Teddy Altman ( Kim Raver ), who departs at the end of the eighth season.
Introduced in the second season is Dr. Addison मोंटगोमरी ( केट वाल्श ), जो पत्ते the दिखाएँ at the समाप्त of the तीसरा ऋतु, in order to launch her own spin-off medical drama Private Practice.
Dr. Callie Torres ( Sara Ramirez ) and Dr. Mark Sloan ( Eric Dane ) भी डालें the दिखाएँ in the दूसरी ऋतु, जबकि the latter मरता in the प्रीमियर of the ninth season.
Meredith 's half-sister, Dr. Lexie धूसर ( chyler leigh ), appears इससे ऋतु तीन और मरता at the end of season eight.
Dr. Arizona Robbins ( Jessica Capshaw ) is दिए श्रेणी नियमित औकात at the शुरूआत of the sixth season.
Grey 's anatomy is the highest-rated नाटक in the key 18–49 demographic.
Previously among the overall top-ten rated shows in the संयुक्त राज्य, धूसर 's anatomy रै महरूम खूब प्राप्त by critics.
Considered an impact on संस्कृति, the श्रेणी रै प्राप्त numerous पुरस्कार, और रै भी महरूम included in various critics ' top ten lists.
The show has उत्पादित अनेक specials, as खूब as distributed all seasons to DVD, and released a collection of merchandise.
In 2012, Grey 's Anatomy was नामित the fifth-highest आय कमाई show, in terms of advertising per half-hour.
On May 11, 2012, the series was नवीनीकृत लिये a नवीं ऋतु, जिससे premiered on सितंबर 27, 2012.
Schizophrenia ( or ) is a दिमागी विकार characterized by a विश्लेषण of विचार प्रक्रियाओं and by a deficit of typical emotional responses.
Common symptoms include auditory मति, paranoid or विचित्र delusions, or disorganized वाक और thinking, and it is accompanied by significant social or occupational dysfunction.
The onset of symptoms typically occurs in young adulthood, साथ a वैश्विक आजीवन व्यापकता of about 0.3–0.7 %.
Diagnosis is आधारित on observed बर्ताव और the patient 's reported experiences.
आनुवंशिकी, जल्दी पर्यावरण, neurobiology, और मनोवैज्ञानिक और सोशल प्रक्रियाओं appear to be महत्वपूर्ण contributory कारकों ; some recreational and prescription drugs appear to cause or worsen symptoms.
Current research is केन्द्रित on the भूमिका of neurobiology, हालांकि no सिंगल isolated organic cause has been found.
The many possible combinations of लक्षण have triggered बहस about whether the diagnosis represents a single disorder or a number of discrete syndromes.
Despite the etymology of the term from the Greek roots skhizein ( σχίζειν, `` to split '' ) and phrēn, phren- ( φρήν, φρεν- ; `` दिमाग '' ), schizophrenia करता नहीं imply a `` विभाजित व्यक्तित्व '', or `` अनेक व्यक्तित्व विकार '' ( जिससे is ज्ञात ये दिनों as dissociative पहचान विकार ) —a कंडीशन साथ जिससे it is often confused in public perception.
Rather, the term means a `` splitting of mental कृत्यों '', क्युकी of the symptomatic प्रस्तुतीकरण of the illness.
The mainstay of उपचार is antipsychotic दवा, जिससे primarily दबा dopamine ( and sometimes serotonin ) receptor activity.
मनोचिकित्सा और वोकेशनल और सोशल rehabilitation are also important in treatment.
In more serious cases—where वहीँ is रिस्क to स्वः और others— involuntary hospitalization may be जरुरी, हालांकि hospital stays are now shorter and less frequent than they once were.
The disorder is thought mainly to affect cognition, लकिन it भी प्रायः contributes to दीर्घकालिक problems with behavior and emotion.
People with schizophrenia हैं संभावित to have अतिरिक्त ( comorbid ) शर्तें, सहित प्रमुख अवसाद और चिंता विकार ; the lifetime occurrence of substance use disorder is almost 50 %.
Social problems, such as long-term बेरोजगारी, गरीबी, और homelessness are common.
The average life expectancy of people with the disorder is 12 to 15 years less than those बगैर, the परिणाम of increased शारीरिक स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं और a उच्चतर आत्महत्या रेट ( about 5 % ).
Paul Leslie Snider ( April 15, 1951–August 14, 1980 ) थी the estranged husband और मैनेजर of प्लेबॉय मॉडल डोरोथी stratten, जिसको he murdered पहले killing himself the same day.
the एपिक of gilgamesh, an एपिक कविता इससे मेसोपोटामिया, is amongst the earliest surviving works of literature.
the साहित्यिक इतिहास of gilgamesh begins साथ पाँच स्वतंत्र sumerian कविताएं about 'Bilgamesh ' ( Sumerian for Gilgamesh ), king of Uruk.
Four of these were प्रयुक्त as सोर्स सामग्री लिये a combined epic in Akkadian.
This first combined epic, known as the `` बूढ़ा babylonian '' संस्करण, तिथियाँ to the 18th सदी bc और is titled बाद इसके incipit, shūtur eli sharrī ( `` Surpassing All Other Kings '' ).
Only a few fragments of it have survived.
The later `` Standard Babylonian '' version dates from the 13th to the 10th सदियां bc और bears the incipit शा naqba īmuru ( `` he जो Saw the Deep '' ).
Fragments of approximately two thirds of इस longer, twelve-tablet संस्करण have महरूम recovered.
Some of the best copies यहूद खोजा in the पुस्तकालयों तबाह of the 7th-century BC Assyrian king Ashurbanipal.
The story centers on a friendship between gilgamesh और enkidu.
Enkidu is a wild man निर्मित by the देवताओं as gilgamesh 's बराबर to distract him from oppressing the people of Uruk.
Together, they यात्रा to the देवदार पहाड़ to शिकस्त Humbaba, its monstrous guardian.
Later they kill the Bull of Heaven, which the देवी इश्तार भेजना to सजा gilgamesh लिये spurning उसके अग्रिम.
As a punishment लिये ये क्रियाएँ, the देवताओं वाक्य Enkidu to death.
The second half of the epic focuses on gilgamesh 's तकलीफ at enkidu 's मौत, और his quest for immortality.
in अनुक्रम to सीख the रहस्य of eternal life, Gilgamesh undertakes a long and perilous journey.
He learns that `` The life that you हैं seeking तुम होगा never ढूँढें.
When the gods created man they allotted to him मौत, लकिन जीवन वे retained in उनके अपना keeping. ''
This quote was originally attributed to siduri in the बूढ़ा babylonian version of the epic, and then attributed to the immortal flood hero Utnapishtim in the Akkadian version of the epic.
Nevertheless, gilgamesh 's कीर्ति जिया on बाद उसके मौत, क्युकी of उसके ग्रेट भवन प्रोजेक्ट, and his account of what Utnapishtim told him happened during the flood.
The story has been translated into many different भाषाएं, और gilgamesh रै since become adapted in works of popular fiction.
A eukaryote ( or ) is an organism जिनकी कोशिकाएं contain जटिल structures enclosed within membranes.
eukaryotes may अधिक formally be referred to as the taxon Eukarya or Eukaryota.
The defining membrane-bound structure that sets eukaryotic cells apart इससे prokaryotic कोशिकाएं is the केंद्रक, or नाभिकीय लिफाफा, भीतर जिससे the genetic material is carried.
The presence of a nucleus gives eukaryotes their name, which comes from the यूनानी ( eu, `` शुभ '' ) और ( karyon, `` नट '' or `` कर्नेल '' ).
Most eukaryotic कोशिकाएं भी contain अन्य membrane-bound organelles such as mitochondria, chloroplasts and the Golgi apparatus.
All large complex organisms हैं eukaryotes, सहित पशु, पौधे and fungi.
The group भी शामिल अनेक unicellular organisms.
कोशिका प्रभाग in eukaryotes is different from that in organisms without a nucleus ( Prokaryote ).
It involves separating the duplicated chromosomes, through आंदोलनों निर्देशित by microtubules.
वहीँ हैं दो प्रकार of division processes.
In mitosis, one कोशिका divides to उपज दो genetically identical cells.
In meiosis, which is required in sexual जनन, एक द्विगुणित कोशिका ( having दो उदाहरण of प्रत्येक chromosome, एक इससे प्रत्येक जनक ) undergoes recombination of प्रत्येक जोड़ी of parental गुणसूत्रों, और तब two stages of cell division, resulting in four haploid cells ( gametes ).
Each gamete has just one complement of गुणसूत्रों, प्रत्येक a अद्वितीय मिक्सर of the सम्बन्धित pair of parental chromosomes.
eukaryota appears to be monophyletic, and so makes up one of the three domains of life.
The two other domains, Bacteria and Archaea, are prokaryotes और have none of the above features.
Eukaryotes represent a tiny minority of all living things ; even in a इंसान देह वहीँ हैं 10 टाइम्स अधिक microbes than human cells.
However, due to their much larger size their collective worldwide बायोमास is अनुमानित at परिचय बराबर to कि of prokaryotes.
They are माना to have पहला विकसित लगभग 1.6–2.1 billion years ago.
The use of Internet services or software with Internet access to defraud पीड़ितों or to वरना लो लाभ of उन्हें, लिये उदाहरण by चोरी निजी सूचना, which can even lead to identity theft.
a बहुत आम रूप of अंतरजाल fraud is the distribution of rogue security software.
Internet services can be used to present fraudulent solicitations to prospective victims, to conduct fraudulent transactions, or to transmit the proceeds of धोखाधड़ी to वित्तीय संस्थानों or to अन्य कनेक्ट साथ the scheme.
Internet fraud can occur in chat कक्ष, ईमेल, संदेश फलक, or on वेबसाइटों.
The International सुरक्षा सहायता फ़ोर्स ( isaf ) is a नाटो -led सुरक्षा मिशन in अफगानिस्तान कि थी स्थापित by the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सुरक्षा Council in December 2001 by Resolution 1386, as envisaged by the Bonn Agreement.
Its main purpose is to ट्रैन the अफगान नेशनल सुरक्षा शक्तियां ( ansf ) और assist अफगानिस्तान in पुनर्निर्माण कुंजी सरकारी institutions but is also engaged in the 2001-present war with insurgent groups.
ISAF was initially charged with securing काबुल और surrounding क्षेत्रों इससे the तालिबान, al qaeda और factional warlords, so as to allow लिये the स्थापना of the Afghan Transitional Administration headed by Hamid Karzai.
In October 2003, the UN Security Council प्राधिकृत the विस्तार of the isaf मिशन throughout अफगानिस्तान, और isaf subsequently विस्तारित the mission in four main stages over the whole of the country.
From 2006 to 2011, ISAF had been involved in increasingly अधिक intensive कॉम्बैट परिचालन in दक्षिणी और पूर्वी अफगानिस्तान.
troop योगदानकर्ता शामिल इससे the संयुक्त राज्य, संयुक्त किंगडम, NATO member states and a number of other countries.
The intensity of the कॉम्बैट faced by contributing राष्ट्र varies greatly, साथ the संयुक्त States, United Kingdom, and Canada sustaining the majority of casualties in intensive combat operations, with other contributors sustaining significantly less.
As of जल्दी 2010, वहीँ यहूद at तनिक 700 सैन्य bases inside Afghanistan but more were expected to be built in the coming years.
About 400 of ये यहूद प्रयुक्त by american‐led NATO forces and 300 by ANSF.
Cocaine ( benzoylmethylecgonine ) ( INN ) is a crystalline tropane एल्कलॉएड कि is प्राप्त इससे the पत्ते of the कोका संयंत्र.
The नाम आता इससे `` कोका '' and the alkaloid suffix -ine, forming cocaine.
It is a stimulant, an appetite suppressant, और a topical anesthetic.
Biologically, cocaine acts as a serotonin–norepinephrine–dopamine reuptake inhibitor, भी ज्ञात as a ट्रिपल reuptake inhibitor ( TRI ).
It is addictive क्युकी of इसके प्रभाव on the mesolimbic reward pathway.
Unlike most molecules, cocaine has pockets with दोनो ऊँची hydrophilic और lipophilic दक्षता, violating the नियम of hydrophilic-lipophilic balance.
This causes it to cross the blood–brain अवरोध दूर बेहतर than अन्य psychoactive रसायन और may भी induce blood-brain barrier breakdown.
It is illegal to possess, produce, or वितरित कोका लिये non-medicinal और non-government-sanctioned उद्देश्य in लगभग प्रत्येक country.

The tri-tip is a cut of beef इससे the नीचे sirloin primal काटें.
It is a small triangular मांसपेशी, प्रायः 1.5 to 2.5 पाउंड. ( 675 to 1,150g ) per side of beef.
The scientific name of this muscle is tensor fasciae latae, inserted in the fascia lata, the संयोजी ऊतक covering the quadriceps femoris, भी पुकारा quadriceps extensor, a group of four muscles which in turn insert in the patella, or knee cap of the animal.
Willmar is a city in, and the काउंटी seat of, Kandiyohi County, Minnesota, United States.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 19,610 at the 2010 census.
Willmar has been assigned ZIP code 56201 by the संयुक्त राज्य डाक Service.

The Speaker of the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि ( or स्पीकर of the हाउस ) is the presiding officer of the chamber.
The office was established in 1789 by Article I, Section 2 of the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान, जिससे राज्य in भाग, `` the हाउस of Representatives shall chuse their Speaker... ''
The current स्पीकर is जॉन boehner, a रिपब्लिकन जो represents Ohio 's 8th congressional district.
The Constitution does not require that the स्पीकर be a सदस्य of कॉंग्रेस, लकिन no non-member रै कभी महरूम निर्वाचित to the office.
The Speaker is second in the United States presidential line of succession, बाद the वाइस अध्यक्ष और ahead of the अध्यक्ष pro tempore of the U.S. Senate.
Unlike some Westminster system parliaments, in which the office of Speaker is considered non-partisan, in the United राज्य the स्पीकर of the हाउस is a नेतृत्व स्थिति और the office-holder actively works to नियत the बहुमत पार्टी 's विधान agenda.
The Speaker usually करता नहीं personally preside over debates, बजाय delegating the duty to members of the House from the majority party.
Aside from duties relating to heading the House and the बहुमत राजनैतिक पार्टी, the स्पीकर भी performs प्रशासनिक और प्रक्रियात्मक functions, and represents his or her Congressional district.
A सायकिल फ़्रेम is the प्रमुख घटक of a bicycle, on to which wheels and other components are fitted.
the आधुनिक और सबसे आम फ़्रेम डिज़ाइन लिये an कतरा सायकिल is आधारित on the safety bicycle, and consists of two triangles, a main triangle and a paired rear triangle.
This is ज्ञात as the diamond frame.
Frames are required to be strong, stiff और लाइट, जिससे वे do by combining अलग सामग्री and shapes.
`` Simple gravity pendulum '' model assumes no घर्षण or एयर प्रतिरोध.
An exemplar एनिमेशन of a pendulum showing the velocity and acceleration vectors
A pendulum is a वज़न निलंबित इससे a so कि it can swing freely.
When a लोलक is विस्थापित बगलों इससे इसके resting संतुलन स्थिति, it is विषय to a restoring फ़ोर्स due to gravity that will accelerate it back toward the equilibrium position.
When released, the restoring force combined with the लोलक 's द्रव्यमान कल्याणकारी it to oscillate परिचय the संतुलन स्थिति, सुहाने back and forth.
the समय लिये एक पूरा साईकिल, a left swing and a right swing, is called the period.
A pendulum swings साथ a विशिष्ट काल जिससे depends ( mainly ) on its length.
From its discovery around 1602 by Galileo Galilei the regular motion of pendulums थी प्रयुक्त लिये timekeeping, और थी the संसार 's सबसे सटीक timekeeping प्रौद्योगिकी जबतक the 1930s.
Pendulums are used to regulate pendulum clocks, and are used in scientific यंत्र ऐसे as accelerometers और seismometers.
Historically they were used as gravimeters to माप the त्वरण of गम्भीरता in geophysical surveys, and even as a standard of length.
The word 'pendulum ' is नई लैटिन, इससे the लैटिन pendulus, meaning 'hanging '.
The simple gravity pendulum is an idealized गणितीय मॉडल of a pendulum.
This is a weight ( or bob ) on the end of a massless cord निलंबित इससे a, बगैर घर्षण.
When दिए an आरंभिक धक्का, it होगा swing back and forth at a constant amplitude.
Real pendulums are विषय to घर्षण और एयर खीचें, so the आयाम of their swings declines.
The First बैटल of सांड चलाएं, भी ज्ञात as पहला manassas ( the नाम प्रयुक्त by confederate forces ), was fought on July 21, 1861, in Prince William County, Virginia, near the city of Manassas.
It थी the पहला प्रमुख जमीन बैटल of the American Civil War.
Just months after the start of the war at Fort Sumter, the Northern public clamored for a march against the Confederate capital of रिचमंड, वर्जिनिया, जिससे वे अपेक्षित to लाओ an जल्दी समाप्त to the rebellion.
Yielding to political pressure, Brig. Gen. Irvin McDowell led his unseasoned संघ फौज आरपार सांड चलाएं विरूद्ध the बराबर अनुभवहीन confederate Army of Brig. Gen. P. G. T. Beauregard camped near Manassas Junction.
McDowell 's ambitious plan for a surprise flank attack on the Confederate left was poorly executed by his अधिकारियों और मेन ; nevertheless, the confederates, जो था महरूम नियोजन to आक्रमण the संघ बाएँ पार्श्व, मिला themselves at an initial disadvantage.
Confederate सुदृढीकरण अंतर्गत ब्रिगेडियर. gen. जोसेफ E. Johnston arrived from the Shenandoah Valley by railroad and the course of the battle quickly changed.
A brigade of Virginians under a relatively unknown कर्नल इससे the वर्जिनिया सैन्य संस्थान, थामस J. जैक्सन, stood उनके मैदान और जैक्सन प्राप्त उसके प्रसिद्ध उपनाम, `` stonewall जैक्सन ''.
The Confederates then launched a strong counterattack, and as the Union troops began withdrawing अंतर्गत आग, अनेक panicked और it turned into a rout as McDowell 's men frantically ran without order in the direction of Washington, D.C.
Both armies were sobered by the fierce fighting and many हताहत, और एहसास the युद्ध थी going to be much longer और bloodier than either had anticipated.

Weather is the state of the atmosphere, to the degree that it is hot or ठंडा, गीला or शुष्क, शांत or stormy, clear or cloudy.
सबसे मौसम phenomena occur in the troposphere, just below the stratosphere.
Weather generally refers to day-to-day temperature and precipitation activity, whereas जलवायु is the पद लिये the औसत वायुमंडलीय शर्तें over longer periods of time.
When used without योग्यता, `` मौसम '' is समझा to be the weather of Earth.
Weather is चलित by एयर दबाव ( तापमान और नमी ) differences between one place and another.
These pressure and तापमान मतभेद can occur due to the सूर्य कोण at कोई particular spot, which varies by latitude from the tropics.
The दमदार तापमान कंट्रास्ट between ध्रुवीय and tropical air gives rise to the jet stream.
मौसम प्रणालियों in the mid-latitudes, ऐसे as extratropical cyclones, are caused by instabilities of the jet stream flow.
क्युकी the धरती 's अक्ष is tilted सापेक्ष to इसके कक्षीय प्लेन, sunlight is incident at different angles at different times of the year.
On Earth 's surface, temperatures usually range ±40 °c ( −40 °f to 100 °f ) annually.
Over thousands of सालो, परिवर्तन in धरती 's कक्षा affect the राशि और वितरण of सौर उर्जा प्राप्त by the Earth and influence long-term climate and global climate change.
Surface temperature मतभेद in फेरे कारण दबाव मतभेद.
Higher altitudes हैं कूलर than निम्नतर altitudes due to differences in compressional heating.
मौसम forecasting is the अनुप्रयोग of विज्ञान और प्रौद्योगिकी to भविष्यवाणी the state of the atmosphere for a future time and a given location.
The atmosphere is a chaotic system, so small changes to one भाग of the प्रणाली can grow to have विशाल प्रभाव on the प्रणाली as a whole.
Human attempts to control the weather have occurred throughout इंसान इतिहास, और वहीँ is प्रमाण कि इंसान कार्यकलाप ऐसे as agriculture and industry has inadvertently modified weather patterns.
Studying how the मौसम works on अन्य ग्रह रै महरूम सहायक in समझना how weather works on Earth.
A famous landmark in the Solar System, Jupiter 's Great Red Spot, is an anticyclonic तूफ़ान ज्ञात to have existed लिये at तनिक 300 years.
However, मौसम is नहीं सीमित to planetary bodies.
A स्टार 's किरीट is constantly होने खोया to स्पेस, creating what is essentially a very thin atmosphere throughout the Solar System.
The गति of द्रव्यमान ejected इससे the सूर्य is ज्ञात as the solar wind.
कैटी पेरी is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter from Santa Barbara, California.
She signed with कैपिटल रिकॉर्ड.
Perry has released three studio albums, including her डेब्यू ईसाई प्रयत्न कैटी Hudson, One of the Boys, and Teenage Dream.
Perry 's mainstream career was kicked बंद साथ the विशाल चार्ट कामयाबी of उसके डेब्यू सिंगल `` i चूमा a लड़की ``.
दौरान उसके करियर, पेरी रै महरूम मनोनीत for numerous major music awards, primarily for Teenage Dream and One of the Boys.
The following is a सूची of sovereign राज्य और territories where English is an official language or language of government.
In 2012, there were 88 राज्य in कुल ( 60 sovereign राज्य and 28 non-sovereign states ).
In many countries English is the प्रबल भाषा, लकिन करता नहीं have official status.
In Australia, अंग्रेज़ी is बोला by the विशाल बहुमत of the जनसांख्यिकी and is the only language used in government institutions, but Australia does not have an official language.
The case is the same in the United Kingdom and the United States, though many states और regions भीतर the u.S. do have अंग्रेज़ी as an आधिकारिक language.
English is the dominant language of New जीलैंड और an आधिकारिक भाषा of कनाडा ( साथ साथ फ्रेंच ), इण्डिया ( साथ साथ हिंदी और अनेक अन्य भाषाएं ), Ireland ( along with Irish ), and the Philippines ( along with Tagalog ).
अंग्रेज़ी is the एकमात्र आधिकारिक भाषा of the Commonwealth of Nations and the Commonwealth Games.
English is एक of the आधिकारिक भाषाएं of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र, the European Union and the International Olympic Committee.
Many of these countries are current or former colonies or dependencies of the संयुक्त किंगडम ( देखिए भी अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य ), or of the संयुक्त राज्य, itself a पूर्व उपनिवेश of the uk.
Notable exceptions include Rwanda, which was a former Belgian उपनिवेश और इरित्रिया, जिससे थी an इतालवी उपनिवेश जहाँ the British Empire spanned its control only in World War II and shortly after ( 1941-1952 ).
इण्डिया 's भाषाई चित्र is complex.
According to the Constitution of India, `` Hindi in the Devanagari script '' is the official language of the union ; and English the 'subsidiary official language ' ; however, English is mandated for the authoritative ग्रन्थ of सब संघीय कानून और परम् अदालत निर्णय और ( साथ साथ हिंदी ) is एक of the दो भाषाएं of the Indian Parliament.
English is used लगभग exclusively लिये उच्चतर शिक्षा, business and science.
Courses in बहुमत of the स्कूलों हैं सिखाया exclusively in English.
अंग्रेज़ी is extensively प्रयुक्त लिये प्रशासनिक purposes in India.
India is the second-largest english-speaking देश in the world by number of speakers, after the United States.
As such, many consider अंग्रेज़ी to be the de facto official language of India.
See आधिकारिक भाषाएं of India.
The linguistic makeup of पाकिस्तानी is similarly complex.
While the national language is उर्दू, अंग्रेज़ी is an आधिकारिक भाषा और प्रयुक्त in कारोबार, government and law.
English is a अनिवार्य भाषा in schools.
सब स्कूल पाठ्यक्रम are taught in English.
Pakistan is the 9th largest english-speaking country in the world by population.
Southern Cone (, ) is a geographic region रचित of the southernmost क्षेत्रों of दक्षिण अमेरिका, दक्षिण of the Tropic of Capricorn.
Although geographically this includes Southern and part of Southeast ( São Paulo ) of ब्राज़ील, in शर्तें of राजनैतिक भूगोल the दक्षिणी कोन रै traditionally comprised अर्जेंटीना, चिली, पैराग्वे, और उरुग्वे.
In the narrowest sense, it only covers Argentina, चिली और उरुग्वे, bounded on the उत्तर by the राज्य of ब्राज़ील, पैराग्वे, बोलीविया और पेरू, on the वेस्ट by the प्रशांत समंदर, and south to the junction between the Pacific and Atlantic Oceans, which it is the closest continental area of Antarctica ( 1000 km ).
High life expectancy, the highest Human Development अनुक्रमणिका of लैटिन अमेरिका, ऊँची मानक of जीना, significant भागीदारी in the वैश्विक बाज़ार और the उभरते economy of its members make the Southern Cone the most prosperous macro-region in South America.
For multi-event एथलेटिक प्रतियोगिताओं देखिए track और फ़ील्ड प्रतियोगिताओं, section `` Meetings ''.
Meetings हैं sometimes held around conference tables.
In a meeting, two or more लोगों आइये साथ to discuss एक or अधिक topics, often in a formal setting.
An official game in baseball, also sometimes called a विनियमन खेल, is a खेल कि रै progressed परे the पाइंट at जिससे it can be माना पूरा if necessary.
This is लगभग the halfway पाइंट of the game.
In the case of inclement weather, कोई खेल जिससे रै पहुँचे इस पाइंट may be रोका और shortened as needed, साथ the परिणाम होने final, and all records and statistics counted.
A game which has नहीं पहुँचे इस पाइंट पहले होने रोका is either माना a निलंबित खेल ( to be जारी at a बाद date from the point of stoppage ), or is simply canceled and replayed from the start.
( This depends on the नियम of प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत league. )
In either case, no आंकडे हैं गिने जबतक the खेल becomes official.
Since most professional baseball games are nine innings long, the fifth inning is प्रयुक्त as the दहलीज लिये an official game.
If the visiting team is अग्रणी, or the खेल is tied, the end of the fifth inning marks this point.
If the home team ( which bats last ) is already ahead in the score, and theoretically would not need its half of the fifth inning, then 41⁄2 पारी ( i.e., the मध्य of the पांचवां ) is माना an official game.
The game is भी माना आधिकारिक if the घर टोली स्कोर to लो the सीसे in the नीचे of the पांचवां inning, चूंकि the game would end immediately if the same thing happened in the ninth.
In nearly all cases, the `` official game '' औकात is प्रयुक्त to determine whether a बरसात जाँच होगा be सम्मानित for fans holding tickets.
If a game is started but करता नहीं पहुँचें the पाइंट of बनने आधिकारिक, प्रशंसक हैं हकदार to a नई टिकट लिये the make-up game or ( in most cases ) any other available game of their choice.
If a खेल is halted बाद it becomes आधिकारिक, the खेल is बस shortened and no rain check is given.
The `` official game '' statistic प्राप्त कुछ ध्यान दौरान the 1995 ऋतु, जब कैलोरी ripken, Jr. was approaching the record for consecutive games played, previously held by Lou Gehrig.
Large numbers were hung on the side of the b & o गोदाम at oriole पार्क at camden गज to दिखाएँ the क्रमांक of games in Ripken 's streak.
Each day, a new क्रमांक थी unfurled दौरान the पांचवां inning बाद प्रत्येक खेल था become official ( since the statistic would not have counted if the game had been stopped before that point ).
A similar अभ्यास रै महरूम प्रयुक्त to गिनती bas toward the demolition of अनेक स्टेडियम ( सहित दिग्गजों स्टेडियम in फिलाडेल्फिया in 2003, Busch Memorial Stadium in St. Louis in 2005, and the original Yankee Stadium and Shea Stadium in New York City in 2008 ) ; as each game became official, the team would unveil a new ( lower ) number showing the number of games left to be played in the stadium.
a टेलीफोन क्रमांक or फोन क्रमांक is a अनुक्रम of अंक प्रयुक्त to कॉल इससे one telephone line to another in a public switched telephone network.
When telephone numbers were invented, they were short — as few as एक, दो or तीन अंक — और यहूद दिए orally to a switchboard operator.
As phone systems have grown और interconnected to encompass the संसार, टेलीफोन संख्याएँ have become longer.
In addition to telephones, they now access other devices, such as कंप्यूटर और फैक्स मशीने.
The क्रमांक contains the सूचना जरुरी to पहचानो uniquely the intended endpoint for the telephone call.
Each such endpoint must have a अद्वितीय क्रमांक भीतर the पब्लिक switched टेलीफोन network.
Most countries use fixed length numbers ( for normal lines at least ) and इसलिए the क्रमांक of endpoints determines the जरुरी लंबाई of the telephone number.
It is also possible for each subscriber to have a set of shorter संख्याएँ लिये the endpoints most often used.
ये `` आशुलिपि '' or `` गति कॉलिंग '' संख्याएँ are automatically translated to unique telephone numbers before the call can be connected.
Some special services have their own short numbers ( e.g., 1-1-9, 9-1-1, 0-0-0, 9-9-9, 1-1-1, and 1-1-2 being the Emergency Services numbers for China, Japan, South Korea, Taiwan and श्री लंका ; कनाडा और the संयुक्त राज्य ; ऑस्ट्रेलिया ; the संयुक्त किंगडम, आयरलैंड, दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी, कैंडल, सऊदी अरब, the संयुक्त अरब अमीरात, मोरक्को, मकाओ, बहरीन, क़तर, बांग्लादेश, बोत्सवाना, घाना, Kenya, Hong Kong, Malaysia, Mauritius, Singapore, Zimbabwe, Trinidad, Tobago ; New Zealand ; Kuwait and the European Union, respectively. )
Many systems also allow calls within a लोकल क्षेत्रफल to be बना बगैर डायलिंग the लोकल area code.
For example, a phone number in North America will start with तीन संख्याएँ ( ऐसे as 661 ), जिससे is the क्षेत्रफल कोड, followed by सात अंक विभाजित into sections of three and four ( such as 550-1212 ), which is the local number.
Some areas now have mandatory ten-digit डायलिंग in प्लेस, भी लिये लोकल काल्स.
Most telephone networks आज ( अपवाद होने निजी intercom और सुरक्षित फोन संजाल ) हैं interconnected in the international telephone network, where the format of telephone numbers is standardized by ITU-T in the recommendation E.164.
This specifies कि the संपूर्ण क्रमांक चाहिए be 15 अंक or shorter, and begin with a country prefix.
For most countries, this is followed by an area code or नगर कोड और the सदस्य क्रमांक, जिससे might consist of the कोड लिये a particular telephone exchange.
ITU-T recommendation E.123 describes how to represent an अंतरराष्ट्रीय टेलीफोन क्रमांक in लिखने or छपाई, starting with a plus sign ( `` + '' ) and the country code.
जब कॉलिंग an अंतरराष्ट्रीय क्रमांक इससे a फिक्स्ड लकीर फोन, the + जरूर be replaced साथ the international call prefix chosen by the country the call is being made from.
Some मोबाईल फोन allow the + to be entered directly.
The format and allocation of local phone numbers are controlled by each nation 's संबंधित सरकारी, either सीधे or by प्रायोजित संगठन ( ऐसे as nanpa overseen by NeuStar Inc. ).
Before a telephone call is कनेक्ट, the टेलीफोन क्रमांक जरूर be dialed by the calling party or Caller.
The called party might have equipment that presents कॉलर id पहले the कॉल is answered.
A संग्रहण एजेंसी is a कारोबार कि pursues भुगतान of debts owed by individuals or businesses.
Most collection agencies operate as एजेंटों of लेनदारों और collect debts लिये a शुल्क or percentage of the total amount owed.
There हैं अनेक प्रकार of संग्रहण agencies.
First-party agencies are oftentimes subsidiaries of the असली कम्पनी the debt is owed to.
Third-party agencies are separate companies contracted by a कम्पनी to collect debts on उनके निमित्त for a fee.
Debt buyers purchase the debt at a प्रतिशत of इसके मान, तब attempt to collect it.
Each country has its own नियम और regulations regarding them.
कैनबिस पुष्प साथ दृश्य trichomes
Cannabis, also known as मारिजुआना ( इससे the मैक्सिकन स्पेनी marihuana ), और by अन्य names, is a तैयारी of the कैनबिस plant intended for use as a psychoactive drug and as medicine.
Pharmacologically, the principal psychoactive constituent of कैनबिस is tetrahydrocannabinol ( thc ) ; it is एक of 483 ज्ञात यौगिकों in the संयंत्र, सहित at तनिक 84 other cannabinoids, such as cannabidiol ( CBD ), cannabinol ( CBN ), tetrahydrocannabivarin ( THCV ).
and cannabigerol ( cbg ).
This is a list of American football quarterbacks who have started for the Washington Redskins, as well as its पूर्ववर्तियों the बोस्टन braves ( 1932 ) और बोस्टन redskins ( 1933 – 1936 ), in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल League ( NFL ).
The Washington Redskins franchise was originally संस्थापित in बोस्टन, मैसाचुसेट्स as the बोस्टन braves, नामित after the local baseball franchise.
The name was changed the following साल to the redskins.
In 1937, the franchise moved to वॉशिंगटन, d.c.
Of the 49 redskins starting quarterbacks, दो have महरूम inducted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame : Sammy Baugh and Sonny Jurgensen.
