1st Special Forces operational detachment-delta ( 1st sfod-d ), popularly ज्ञात as डेल्टा फ़ोर्स, is एक of the संयुक्त राज्य ' four secretive tier-one counter-terrorism and Special Mission Units.
It was formerly सूचीबद्ध as the कॉम्बैट अनुप्रयोग समूह by the विभाग of Defense but has since been officially re-designated the Army Compartmented Elements ( ACE ).
While 1st SFOD-D is administratively समर्थित by usasoc, it falls under the operational control of the Joint Special Operations Command.
Delta Force and its नेवी बंटवारा, the नवल खास warfare विकास समूह, हैं the United States military 's primary counter-terrorism units.
Delta Force 's primary tasks are counter-terrorism, direct action, and नेशनल हस्तक्षेप परिचालन, हालांकि it is an अत्यधिक बहुमुखी समूह capable of conducting many types of covert missions, including, but not limited to, hostage rescues and raids.
The सेंट्रल प्रज्ञा एजेंसी 's अत्यधिक गुपचुप खास क्रियाएँ प्रभाग ( उदास ) और अधिक specifically इसके elite खास Operations Group ( SOG ) often works with – and recruits – operators from Delta Force.
Alpha decay is one example type of radioactive decay, in जिससे an परमाणु केंद्रक emits an अल्फा कण, और thereby परिणत ( or 'क्षयs ' ) into an atom with a mass number 4 less and atomic number 2 less.
अनेक अन्य प्रकार of decays are possible.
रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय, भी ज्ञात as नाभिकीय क्षय or radioactivity, is the process by which a nucleus of an unstable atom loses energy by emitting particles of ionizing radiation.
A material that spontaneously emits this kind of radiation — which शामिल the उत्सर्जन of ऊर्जावान अल्फा अणु, बीटा अणु, and gamma rays — is considered radioactive.
वहीँ हैं अनेक अलग प्रकार of रेडियोसक्रिय decay ( see table below ).
A decay, or loss of energy, results when an atom with one type of nucleus, called the parent radionuclide, transforms to an atom साथ a केंद्रक in a अलग राज्य, or to a अलग केंद्रक containing अलग संख्याएँ of protons and neutrons.
Either of ये उत्पाद is नामित the daughter nuclide.
In some decays the parent and daughter are different chemical elements, and thus the क्षय प्रक्रम परिणाम in नाभिकीय transmutation ( सृष्टि of an atom of a new element ).
The first decay प्रक्रियाओं to be खोजा यहूद अल्फा क्षय, बीटा decay, and gamma decay.
Alpha decay occurs when the केंद्रक ejects an अल्फा कण ( हीलियम केंद्रक ).
This is the most आम प्रक्रम of emitting nucleons, लकिन in rarer प्रकार of decays, nuclei can eject protons, or specific nuclei of other elements ( in the process called cluster decay ).
बीटा क्षय occurs जब the केंद्रक emits an इलेक्ट्रॉन or positron और a प्रकार of न्यूट्रिनो, in a process that changes a proton to a neutron or the other way around.
the केंद्रक may कैप्चर an orbiting electron, converting a proton into a neutron ( electron capture ).
All of ये प्रक्रियाओं परिणाम in nuclear transmutation.
By contrast, there exist radioactive क्षय प्रक्रियाओं कि do नहीं परिणाम in transmutation.
The energy of an excited nucleus may be उत्सर्जित as a गामा रे in गामा क्षय, or प्रयुक्त to eject an orbital electron by interaction with the excited nucleus in a process called internal conversion.
radioisotopes occasionally emit neutrons, और इस परिणाम in a change in an element from one isotope to another.
One type of radioactive decay results in products which are नहीं पारिभाषित, लकिन appear in a दायरा of `` pieces '' of the original nucleus.
This decay is पुकारा spontaneous fission.
This decay happens when a large unstable nucleus spontaneously splits into two ( और occasionally तीन ) छोटी बेटी nuclei, और प्रायः emits गामा किरणें, neutrons, or अन्य अणु as a consequence.
Radioactive decay is a stochastic ( i.e., random ) process at the स्तर of सिंगल अणु, in कि, according to क्वांटम सिद्धान्त, it is नामुमकिन to भविष्यवाणी जब a particular atom will decay.
However, the मौका कि a दिए अणु होगा क्षय is constant over time.
For a large number of atoms, the decay rate for the collection is computable इससे the measured क्षय स्थिरांक of the न्यूक्लाइड ( or equivalently इससे the half-lifes ).
Waxing is a form of semi-permanent hair removal which removes the hair from the root.
New hair will not grow back in the previously waxed area लिये दो to आठ सप्ताह, हालांकि कुछ लोगों होगा प्रारंभ to देखिए regrowth in तभी a सप्ताह.
Almost any area of the देह can be waxed, सहित eyebrows, फेस, बिकिनी क्षेत्रफल, legs, arms, back, abdomen and feet.
There हैं अनेक प्रकार of वैक्सिंग उपयुक्त लिये removing unwanted hair.
Strip waxing is संपन्नता by spreading a मोम thinly over the skin.
A cloth or paper strip is तब दबाया on the शीर्ष and ripped off the direction of hair growth.
This removes the मोम साथ with the hair.
Strip wax can also be बना at घर using नीबू रस, water, sugar and honey.
Hot waxing utilizes Hot मोम ( as opposed to स्ट्रिप wax ).
In this case, the मोम is लागू somewhat thickly and with no cloth or paper strips.
The wax then hardens when it cools, thus allowing the आसान हटाना by a चिकित्सक बगैर the सहायता of cloths.
This waxing method is बहुत फायदेमंद to लोगों जो have संवेदनशील skin.
Wall पेंटिंग ( 1st सदी ad ) इससे Pompeii depicting a multigenerational banquet
Ancient Roman culture existed throughout the लगभग 1200-year इतिहास of the civilization of Ancient Rome.
The term refers to the culture of the Roman Republic, बाद the रोमन साम्राज्य, जिससे, at इसके शिखर, covered an क्षेत्रफल इससे lowland स्कॉटलैंड and Morocco to the Euphrates.
Life in ancient Rome revolved around the नगर of रोम, इसके famed सात पहाड़ियाँ, और इसके स्मारकीय structures ऐसे as the Flavian Amphitheatre ( now called the Colosseum ), the Forum of Trajan, and the Pantheon.
The city also had several theaters, gymnasiums, and many taverns, baths, और brothels.
Throughout the territory under प्राचीन रोम 's कंट्रोल, आवासीय वास्तुकला ranged इससे बहुत modest घरों to country villas, and in the capital city of Rome, there were imperial residences on the elegant Palatine Hill, from which the word palace is derived.
The vast majority of the population lived in the city center, packed into insulae ( अपार्टमेंट ब्लॉक ).
The city of Rome was the largest megalopolis of that time, साथ a जनसांख्यिकी कि may खूब have exceeded एक लाख लोगों, with a high end estimate of 3.6 million and a low end estimate of 450,000.
Historical estimates indicate that around 30 percent of the population under the city 's jurisdiction lived in innumerable शहरी centers, साथ जनसांख्यिकी of at तनिक 10,000 और अनेक सैन्य settlements, a बहुत ऊँची रेट of शहरी by pre-industrial standards.
The most urbanized part of the Empire was Italy, which had an estimated rate of शहरी of 32 %, the वही रेट of शहरी of England in 1800.
Most Roman towns and शहरों था a फ़ोरम, मंदिरों और the वही प्रकार of buildings, on a smaller scale, as found in Rome.
The large urban population required an endless supply of food which was a complex logistical task, including acquiring, transporting, storing और वितरण of खाना लिये रोम और अन्य शहरी centers.
Italian farms supplied vegetables and fruits, लकिन मछली और मांस यहूद luxuries.
Aqueducts were built to bring water to urban centers and wine and oil were imported from hispania, gaul और अफ़्रीकी.
There was a very large amount of commerce between the प्रांतों of the रोमन साम्राज्य, चूंकि इसके परिवहन प्रौद्योगिकी was very efficient.
The average costs of हस्तांतरण और the प्रौद्योगिकी यहूद comparable साथ 18th-century Europe.
The later city of Rome did not fill the space within its प्राचीन aurelian दीवारें जबतक बाद 1870.
अस्सी प्रतिशत of the जनसांख्यिकी अंतर्गत the क्षेत्राधिकार of प्राचीन Rome lived in the countryside in settlements with less than 10 thousand inhabitants.
Landlords generally resided in शहरों and their estates were left in the care of farm managers.
The plight of rural slaves was generally बदतर than उनके counterparts working in शहरी aristocratic households.
To stimulate a higher labor उत्पादकता सबसे जमींदार freed a विशाल क्रमांक of स्लेव और अनेक प्राप्त wages.
कुछ रिकॉर्ड indicate कि `` as अनेक as 42 people lived in one small farm hut in Egypt, while six families owned a single olive tree. ''.
Such a rural environment continued to induce migration of population to urban centers जबतक the जल्दी 2nd सदी, जब the शहरी जनसांख्यिकी रोका growing और प्रारंभ to decline.
Starting in the मध्य of the 2nd सदी bc, निजी यूनानी संस्कृति थी increasingly in ascendancy, in spite of tirades against the `` softening '' effects of Hellenized culture from the conservative moralists.
By the time of augustus, संस्कारी यूनानी household स्लेव सिखाया the रोमन यंग ( sometimes भी the लड़कियों ) ; chefs, decorators, secretaries, doctors, and hairdressers—all came from the Greek East.
Greek sculptures adorned hellenistic लैंडस्केप बागवानी on the palatine or in the विला, or यहूद imitated in Roman sculpture yards by Greek slaves.
The Roman cuisine preserved in the cookery किताबे ascribed to Apicius is essentially Greek.
Roman writers disdained लैटिन लिये a संस्कारी Greek style.
Only in law और शासन थी the तिरछा प्रकृति of Rome 's accretive culture supreme.
Against this human पृष्ठभूमि, दोनो the शहरी और ग्रामीण सेटिंग, एक of history 's most influential civilizations took shape, leaving behind a cultural legacy that survives in part today.
James Joseph `` डफी '' waldorf, jr. ( born अगस्त 20, 1962 ) is an अमरीकी professional golfer.

Glass production involves two main methods – the float glass process, which produces चादर कांच, और glassblowing जिससे produces बोतलों and other containers.
A season is a subdivision of the साल, चिह्नित by परिवर्तन in मौसम, ecology, and hours of daylight.
Seasons result from the वार्षिक क्रान्ति of the धरती around the सूर्य और the झुकाव of the धरती 's axis relative to the plane of revolution.
In शीतोष्ण और ध्रुवीय regions, the सीज़न हैं चिह्नित by परिवर्तन in the तीव्रता of धूप कि पहुँच the Earth 's surface, variations of which may cause animals to go into hibernation or to migrate, and plants to be dormant.
दौरान may, जून और जुलाई, the उत्तरी गोलार्ध is exposed to more direct sunlight because the hemisphere faces the sun.
The same is true of the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध in नवम्बर, December and January.
It is the tilt of the धरती कि कल्याणकारी the सूर्य to be उच्चतर in the आसमान during the summer months which increases the solar flux.
However, due to seasonal lag, June, July and अगस्त हैं the hottest महीने in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध और दिसम्बर, जनवरी and February are the hottest months in the southern hemisphere.
In temperate and subpolar regions, generally चार पंचांग -आधारd सीज़न ( साथ उनके adjectives ) हैं पहचाना : वसन्त ( vernal ), गर्मियाँ ( estival ), पतझड़ ( autumnal ) and winter ( hibernal ).
However, ecologists mostly use a छह ऋतु मॉडल लिये शीतोष्ण जलवायु regions कि शामिल pre-spring ( prevernal ) and late summer ( serotinal ) as distinct seasons along with the traditional four.
Hot regions have two or three seasons ; the rainy ( or wet, or मानसून ) ऋतु और the शुष्क ऋतु, और in कुछ tropical areas, a cool or mild season.
In some parts of the world, special `` seasons '' are loosely defined आधारित on महत्वपूर्ण कार्यक्रम ऐसे as a hurricane season, tornado season or a wildfire season.
The six ecological सीज़न
The four calendar seasons, चित्रित in an प्राचीन रोमन mosaic from Tunisia
The Battle of फोर्ट sumter ( अप्रैल 12–14, 1861 ) थी the बमबारी और आत्मसमर्पण of फोर्ट sumter, near Charleston, South Carolina, that started the American Civil War.
Following declarations of secession by seven दक्षिणी राज्य, दक्षिण कैरोलिना मांगे कि the u.S. फौज लापरवाही इसके सुविधाएं in चार्ल्सटन Harbor.
On December 26, 1860, U.S. प्रमुख रॉबर्ट एंडरसन surreptitiously स्थानांतरित उसके छोटी कमांड इससे the indefensible फोर्ट moultrie on सुलीवान 's द्वीप to Fort Sumter, a substantial fortress controlling the entrance of Charleston Harbor.
An attempt by U.S. President James Buchanan to reinforce and resupply Anderson, using the unarmed merchant ship स्टार of the वेस्ट, विफल जब it थी fired upon by shore बैटरी on January 9, 1861.
South Carolina authorities then seized all Federal प्रॉपर्टी in the चार्ल्सटन क्षेत्रफल, मगर लिये Fort Sumter.
दौरान the जल्दी महीने of 1861, the हालात around फोर्ट sumter increasingly began to resemble a siege.
In March, Brig. Gen. P. G. T. Beauregard, the पहला सामान्य अधिकारी of the newly formed confederate राज्य of अमेरिका, थी लगाई in कमांड of Confederate forces in Charleston.
Beauregard energetically निर्देशित the strengthening of बैटरी around Charleston harbor aimed at Fort Sumter.
Conditions in the फोर्ट grew dire as the संघ सैनिको rushed to पूरा the installation of additional guns.
Anderson was short of मेन, खाना, और supplies.
The resupply of फोर्ट sumter became the पहला संकट of the administration of President Abraham Lincoln.
He notified the Governor of दक्षिण कैरोलिना, फ्रांसिस W. pickens, कि he थी sending सप्लाई जहाजों, जिससे resulted in an ultimatum इससे the Confederate government : evacuate Fort Sumter immediately.
Major Anderson refused to आत्मसमर्पण.
Beginning at 4:30 a.m. on अप्रैल 12, the confederates bombarded the फोर्ट from artillery batteries surrounding the harbor.
Although the Union garrison returned fire, they were significantly outgunned and, बाद 34 घंटों, प्रमुख एंडरसन सहमत to evacuate.
There was no loss of life on either side as a direct result of this engagement, हालांकि a गन विस्फोट दौरान the आत्मसमर्पण ceremonies on अप्रैल 14 caused two Union deaths.
Following the battle, there was widespread support इससे दोनो उत्तर और दक्षिण लिये further सैन्य कार्रवाई.
Lincoln 's immediate call for 75,000 स्वयंसेवक to दबाने the विद्रोह resulted in an अतिरिक्त four southern slave states also declaring their secession and joining the Confederacy.
the सिविल युद्ध had begun.
3G, short for third Generation, is the तीसरा पीढी of मोबाईल दूरसंचार technology.
3G telecommunication networks support services that provide an सूचना ट्रांसफ़र रेट of at तनिक 200 kbit/s.
However, many services advertised as 3G provide higher speed than the न्यूनतम तकनीकी आवश्यकताएँ लिये a 3g service.
Recent 3G releases, often denoted 3.5g और 3.75g, भी provide मोबाईल ब्रॉडबैंड अभिगम of अनेक mbit/s to स्मार्टफ़ोन और मोबाईल modems in laptop computers.
3G finds application in wireless आवाज़ telephony, मोबाईल अंतरजाल अभिगम, फिक्स्ड बेतार अंतरजाल access, video calls and mobile TV.
`` Mazel Tov ! '' लिखा on a wine glass tag
Traditionally, after the groom breaks the कांच, the अतिथि चिल्लाओ `` mazel tov ! ``.
A birthday cake, iced साथ the शब्द `` מזל טוב '' ( mazal tov ), as is प्रायः किया in इसराईल.
Here the phrase is लिखा in यहूदी cursive.
`` mazel tov '' or `` mazal tov '' ( यहूदी / यहूदी : `` מזל טוב '', Hebrew : `` mazal tov '' ; Yiddish : `` mazel tov '' ; lit.
`` शुभ लक '' ) is a phrase प्रयुक्त to एक्स्प्रेस बधाई लिये a प्रसन्न and significant occasion or event.
Hepatitis C is an infectious बीमारी affecting primarily the जिगर, caused by the hepatitis C virus ( HCV ).
The infection is often asymptomatic, but chronic infection can lead to scarring of the जिगर और ultimately to cirrhosis, जिससे is generally apparent बाद अनेक years.
In some cases, those with cirrhosis will go on to develop liver failure, जिगर कर्कट or life-threatening esophageal और gastric varices.
HCV is spread primarily by blood-to-blood सम्पर्क संबद्ध साथ intravenous ड्रग use, poorly sterilized medical equipment and transfusions.
An अनुमानित 130–200 लाख लोगों worldwide are infected with.
The existence of ( originally `` non- a non- b hepatitis '' ) थी postulated in the 1970s and proven in 1989.
only infects इंसानो और chimpanzees.
The virus persists in the जिगर in परिचय 85 % of those infected.
This persistent infection can be treated with medication : the मानक चिकित्सा is a संयोजन of peginterferon और ribavirin, साथ either boceprevir or telaprevir added in some cases.
Overall, 50–80 % of लोगों treated are cured.
Those who develop cirrhosis or liver कर्कट may आवश्यकता a जिगर प्रत्यारोपण.
is the अग्रणी कारण of जिगर प्रत्यारोपण, हालांकि the वायरस प्रायः recurs after transplantation.
No vaccine विरूद्ध is available.
A flexible spending account ( FSA ), also known as a flexible spending arrangement, is एक of a क्रमांक of tax-advantaged वित्तीय खाते कि can be नियत up through a कैफेटेरिया योजना of an नियोक्ता in the United States.
An FSA allows an कर्मचारी to नियत aside a portion of आय to अदा लिये योग्य expenses as established in the cafeteria plan, most commonly for medical expenses but often for dependent care or other expenses.
Money deducted इससे an कर्मचारी 's अदा into an fsa is नहीं विषय to payroll taxes, resulting in substantial payroll tax savings.
एक significant disadvantage to using an fsa is कि funds not used by the end of the plan year are lost to the employee, known as the `` use it or lose it '' rule.
The most common type of flexible spending account, the medical expense FSA ( also medical FSA or स्वास्थ्य fsa ), is समान to a स्वास्थ्य बचत खाता ( hsa ) or a स्वास्थ्य reimbursement खाता ( hra ).
However, while HSAs and HRAs हैं लगभग exclusively प्रयुक्त as components of a उपभोक्ता चलित स्वास्थ्य परवाह योजना, चिकित्सा fsas हैं commonly offered साथ more traditional health plans as well.
In जोड, निधि in a स्वास्थ्य बचत खाता हैं नहीं lost when the plan year is over, unlike funds in an FSA.
Paper फ़ॉर्म or an fsa डेबिट कार्ड, भी ज्ञात as a flexcard, may be used to access the account funds.
Tennessee ( ) ( ) is a u.S. राज्य स्तिथ in the southeastern United States.
Tennessee is the 36th सबसे extensive और the 17th most populous of the 50 United States.
Tennessee is bordered by Kentucky and Virginia to the उत्तर, उत्तर कैरोलिना to the ईस्ट, जॉर्जिया, अलबामा, और मिसिसिपी to the south, and Arkansas and Missouri to the west.
The Appalachian Mountains dominate the eastern भाग of the राज्य, और the मिसिसिपी नदी फ़ॉर्म the राज्य 's western border.
Tennessee 's पूंजी और दूसरी largest नगर is नैशविले, which has a population of 609,644.
Memphis is the राज्य 's largest नगर, साथ a population of 652,050.
The state of Tennessee is rooted in the Watauga Association, a 1772 frontier pact generally regarded as the पहला संवैधानिक सरकारी वेस्ट of the appalachians.
What is now Tennessee was initially भाग of उत्तर कैरोलिना, और बाद भाग of the Southwest Territory.
टेनेसी थी admitted to the Union as the 16th state on June 1, 1796.
Tennessee was the last state to leave the Union and join the Confederacy at the outbreak of the u.S. सिविल युद्ध in 1861, और the पहला राज्य to be readmitted to the Union at the end of the war.
Tennessee furnished more soldiers for the confederate फौज than कोई अन्य राज्य, and more soldiers for the Union Army than any other Southern state.
In the 20th सदी, टेनेसी transitioned इससे an कृषिक अर्थव्यवस्था to a more diversified economy, aided at times by federal entities such as the Tennessee Valley Authority.
In the early 1940s, the city of Oak Ridge was स्थापित to हाउस the मैनहटन प्रोजेक्ट 's यूरेनियम संवर्धन सुविधाएं, helping to build the world 's first atomic bomb.
Tennessee has played a नाजुक भूमिका in the विकास of अनेक फ़ॉर्म of अमरीकी लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक, including rock and roll, blues, country, and rockabilly.
Beale Street in मेम्फिस is माना by अनेक to be the जन्मस्थान of the ब्लूज़, साथ संगीतकारों such as W.C. Handy performing in its clubs as early as 1909.
Memphis was also home to Sun Records, where musicians such as Elvis Presley, Isaac हेज़, जॉनी नकदी, कार्ल perkins, जेरी ली लुईस, रॉय orbison, और चार्ली समृद्ध began उनके रिकॉर्डिंग करियर, और जहाँ चट्टान and roll took shape in the 1950s.
The 1927 Victor recording sessions in Bristol generally mark the शुरूआत of the देश म्यूज़िक विधा और the वृद्धि of the ग्रैंड ओले opry in the 1930s helped make Nashville the center of the country music recording industry.
Three bricks and mortar museums recognize Tennessee 's भूमिका in nurturing विभिन्न फ़ॉर्म of लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक : the मेम्फिस चट्टान n ' आत्मा संग्रहालय, the देश म्यूज़िक हॉल of Fame and Museum in Nashville, and the International Rock-A-Billy Museum in Jackson.
In addition, the Rockabilly Hall of Fame, an online site recognizing the विकास of rockabilly in जिससे टेनेसी निभाई a crucial role, is based in Nashville.
Tennessee 's major industries शामिल कृषि, निर्माण, and tourism.
मुर्गीपालन, soybeans, और चौपायों हैं the राज्य 's प्राथमिक agricultural उत्पाद, and major manufacturing exports include chemicals, transportation equipment, and electrical equipment.
The Great Smoky Mountains National Park, the nation 's most visited नेशनल पार्क, is headquartered in the पूर्वी भाग of the राज्य, और a section of the Appalachian Trail roughly follows the Tennessee-North Carolina border.
Other major tourist attractions include the टेनेसी एक्वेरियम in चट्टानूगा, the sunsphere in knoxville, dollywood in कबूतर forge, the पार्थेनन, the देश Music Hall of Fame and Museum, and Ryman Auditorium in Nashville, and Elvis Presley 's Graceland residence and tomb in Memphis.
One डिज़ाइन रूपांतर of a मुर्गा ring.
A cock ring is a ring that can be placed around a man 's शिश्न, प्रायः at the आधार, primarily to slow the प्रवाह of रक्त इससे the वीर्यपात penile ऊतक, यूँ maintaining an स्तंभन for a much longer period of time.
मुर्गा बजती can be worn around बस the शिश्न or दोनो the शिश्न और scrotum, or just the scrotum alone, though this is usually called a testicle cuff.
Rings can be made of a variety of different सामग्री, सबसे commonly चमड़े, रबर, or silicone, though nylon and metal are also used either as the main component or part of the closure.
The term मुर्गा रिंग is sometimes प्रयुक्त as a पर्याय लिये a प्रिंस अल्बर्ट piercing, a piercing of the penis that is usually, though not always, a metal ring.
When used in cases of erectile dysfunction वे हैं ज्ञात by विभिन्न names ऐसे as `` erection ring '' and `` tension ring ''.
The headquarters of Major League Baseball at 245 पार्क एवेन्यू, midtown Manhattan, New York City, USA.
Major League Baseball ( MLB ) is a professional baseball league, consisting of टीमों कि खेल in the नेशनल लीग and the American League.
Dating to 1876 and 1901 respectively, the two leagues merged in 2000 into a सिंगल संगठन led by the कमिश्नर of बेसबॉल, after 100 years as separate legal entities.
MLB constitutes एक of the प्रमुख पेशेवर sports leagues of the United States and Canada.
it is रचित of 30 टीमों — 29 in the United States and one in Canada.
Teams in MLB खेल 162 खेल प्रत्येक ऋतु over छह months ( April through September ).
Five teams in each league advance to a four-round postseason टूर्नामेंट कि culminates in the World Series, a best-of-seven-games championship series between the two league champions which dates to 1903.
The organization oversees अनेक minor-league बेसबॉल लीग जिससे operate about 240 teams affiliated with the major-league clubs.
With the अंतरराष्ट्रीय बेसबॉल संघ, the लीग भी manages the international World Baseball Classic tournament.
MLB has the highest season attendance of कोई खेल लीग in the संसार साथ nearly 75 लाख spectators in 2012.
डेलावेयर ( ) is a u.S. राज्य स्तिथ on the अटलांटिक Coast in the Mid-Atlantic region of the United States.
it is bordered to the दक्षिण और वेस्ट by मेरीलैंड, to the northeast by New Jersey, and to the north by Pennsylvania.
The state takes its name from Thomas वेस्ट, 3rd सामन्त de la warr, an अंग्रेज़ी nobleman और वर्जिनिया 's पहला colonial governor, after whom what is now called Cape Henlopen was originally named.
Delaware is located in the northeastern portion of the Delmarva Peninsula and is the second smallest, the छठे तनिक populous, लकिन the छठे सबसे densely आबादी of the पचास संयुक्त States.
डेलावेयर is विभाजित into तीन counties.
From north to south, these तीन काउंटी हैं नई किला, केंट, and Sussex.
While the southern two counties have historically महरूम predominantly agricultural, नई किला County has been more industrialized.
Before its coastline was explored by europeans in the 16th सदी, डेलावेयर थी inhabited by अनेक समूह of देशी अमेरिकी, including the Lenape in the north and Nanticoke in the south.
It was initially colonized by डच व्यापारियों at zwaanendael, स्तिथ निकट the उपस्थित town of Lewes, in 1631.
Delaware was one of the 13 colonies participating in the American क्रान्ति और on दिसम्बर 7, 1787, became the पहला राज्य to ratify the संविधान of the संयुक्त राज्य, thereby becoming known as The First State.
उर्जा परिवर्तन in Energy Systems Language
Energy transformation or energy conversion is the process of बदलना एक रूप of उर्जा to another.
In physics, the term energy describes the capacity to उपज निश्चित परिवर्तन भीतर a प्रणाली, बगैर लिहाज़ to सीमाएं in transformation imposed by Entropy.
Changes in total energy of प्रणालियों can तभी be संपन्नता by adding or subtracting उर्जा इससे उन्हें, as उर्जा is a quantity which is conserved, according to the first law of thermodynamics.
According to special relativity, changes in the energy of systems will also coincide with changes in the system 's द्रव्यमान, और the कुल राशि of द्रव्यमान of a प्रणाली is a माप of its energy.
Energy in a system may be transformed so that it resides in a अलग राज्य, or a अलग प्रकार of energy.
Energy in अनेक राज्य may be प्रयुक्त to do अनेक varieties of physical work.
Energy may be प्रयुक्त in प्राकृतिक प्रक्रियाओं or मशीने, or else to provide some service to society ( such as heat, light, or motion ).
For example, an internal combustion engine converts the potential chemical energy in gasoline and ऑक्सीजन into ऊष्मा, जिससे is तब रूपांतरित into the propulsive उर्जा ( गतिज उर्जा कि चालें a vehicle ).
A solar कोशिका converts सौर विकिरण into विद्युत उर्जा कि can then be used to light a bulb or power a computer.
The generic name for a यंत्र जिससे converts उर्जा इससे एक रूप to another, is a transducer.
In सामान्य, सबसे प्रकार of उर्जा, सहेजें लिये थर्मल उर्जा, may be converted efficiently to any other kind of energy.
Sometimes this occurs with an efficiency of essentially 100 %, ऐसे as जब संभावित उर्जा is परिवर्तित to गतिज उर्जा as an ऑब्जेक्ट falls in vacuum, or when it orbits nearer or farther from another object, in space.
Conversion of other types of energies to ऊष्मा may भी occurs साथ nearly पूर्ण दक्षता ( अनेक प्रकार of friction do this ).
Exceptions for perfect conversion efficiency ( even for पृथक प्रणालियों ) occur जब उर्जा रै already महरूम partly वितरित among अनेक उपलब्धियाँ क्वांटम राज्य लिये a संग्रहण of अणु, जिससे हैं freely allowed to explore any state of momentum and position ( phase space ).
In such circumstances, a measure called Entropy, or evening-out of उर्जा वितरण in ऐसे राज्य, dictates कि भविष्य राज्य of the system must be of at least equal evenness in energy distribution.
( There is no way, taking the universe as a whole, to collect उर्जा into कम राज्य, एकबार it रै स्प्रेड to them ).
A consequence of this requirement is that there are limitations to the दक्षता साथ जिससे थर्मल उर्जा can be परिवर्तित to अन्य kinds of उर्जा, चूंकि थर्मल उर्जा in संतुलन at a दिए temperature already represents the maximal evening-out of energy between all possible states.
Such energy is sometimes माना `` degraded उर्जा, '' क्युकी it is नहीं entirely usable.
The second law of thermodynamics is a way of stating that, for this reason, thermal energy in a system may be converted to other kinds of energy with efficiencies approaching 100 %, तभी if the एन्ट्रॉपी ( even-ness or विकार ) of the ब्रह्मांड is increased by अन्य अर्थात्, to compensate लिये the घटी in entropy associated with the disappearance of the thermal energy and its entropy content.
Otherwise, only a part of thermal energy may be converted to other kinds of energy ( and thus, useful work ), since the शेष of the ऊष्मा जरूर be सुरक्षित to be transferred to a थर्मल टंकी at a निम्नतर तापमान, in ऐसे a रास्ता कि the increase in Entropy for this process more than compensates for the entropy decrease associated with transformation of the rest of the heat into other types of energy.
The National Hockey League ( NHL ; ) is an `` unincorporated not-for-profit association '' जिससे operates a प्रमुख पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी लीग of 30 franchised सदस्य क्लब, of जिससे सात हैं फिलहाल स्तिथ in Canada and 23 in the United States.
Headquartered in New York City, the NHL is widely considered to be the प्रीमियर पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी लीग in the संसार, और एक of the प्रमुख पेशेवर खेल लीग in the United States and Canada.
The Stanley Cup, the oldest professional sports trophy in North America, is awarded annually to the लीग playoff चैंपियन at the समाप्त of each season.
The league was organized on November 26, 1917, in मॉन्ट्रियल, क्यूबेक, कनाडा, बाद the बर्खास्तगी of परिचालन of इसके पूर्ववर्ती संगठन, the नेशनल हॉकी संघ ( NHA ), which had been founded in 1909.
It प्रारंभ साथ चार टीमों और, through a श्रेणी of expansions, contractions, and relocations, the league is now composed of 30 active franchises.
The nation to which the name of the league originally referred was Canada, although the लीग रै अभी महरूम binational चूंकि 1924 जब it विस्तारित into the United States.
After a labour dispute that led to the cancellation of the entire 2004–05 season, the लीग resumed खेल अंतर्गत a नई सामूहिक bargaining अनुबंध कि शामिल a सैलरी cap.
In 2009, the एनएचएल enjoyed रिकार्ड highs in शर्तें of sponsorships, attendance, and television audiences.
The NHL draws many highly skilled players from all over the संसार और फिलहाल रै खिलाड़ी इससे about 20 different countries.
Although Canadians have historically constituted the majority of the players in the एनएचएल, over the पास्ट चार प्लस दशकों the percentages of us and European players have increased both because of the NHL 's continued expansion from six to thirty clubs since 1967, and the increased availability of highly skilled European players.
This is the पूरा सूची of the ratified और unratified amendments to the United States Constitution which received the approval of the United States Congress.
Twenty-seven amendments have been ratified since the original signing of the संविधान, the पहला टेन of जिससे हैं ज्ञात collectively as the Bill of Rights.
The procedure for amending the United States संविधान is governed by आलेख v of the original text.
There have been many other proposals for amendments to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान introduced in कॉंग्रेस, लकिन नहीं सुपुर्द to the states.
Before an amendment can take effect, it must be proposed to the states by a two-thirds vote of both houses of Congress or by a convention ( known as an Article V convention ) called by two-thirds of the राज्य, और ratified by three-fourths of the राज्य or by three-fourths of प्रथाओं thereof, the विधि of अनुसमर्थन होने determined by Congress at the time of proposal.
To date, no convention for proposing amendments has been called by the राज्य, और तभी once—in 1933 लिये the अनुसमर्थन of the twenty-first amendment —has the convention method of ratification been employed.
FMR LLC ( Fidelity Management and Research ) or वफ़ादारी निवेश is an अमरीकी बहुराष्ट्रीय वित्तीय सेवाएं corporation.
It is one of the largest परस्पर निधि और वित्तीय सेवाएं समूह in the world.
It was founded in 1946 और serves उत्तर American investors.
Fidelity Ventures is इसके venture पूंजी भुजा.
Fidelity International Limited ( FIL ), थी an अंतरराष्ट्रीय संबद्ध संस्थापित in 1969, serving most countries in the rest of the world.
In September 2011, FIL थी rebranded as 'fidelity Worldwide Investment '.
Fidelity Investments manages a large family of mutual funds, provides fund वितरण और निवेश सलाह सेवाएं, as खूब as providing छूट brokerage सेवाएं, रिटायरमेंट सेवाएं, माल प्रबन्धन, प्रतिभूति निष्पादन और क्लीयरेंस, life insurance and a number of other services.
जून 2006 थी the छठे month of that year.

Sociology is the scientific study of human society and its origins, विकास, संगठन, और संस्थानों.
It is a social science which uses various methods of empirical investigation and critical analysis to develop a body of knowledge about इंसान सोशल कार्यकलाप, structures, and functions.
A goal for many sociologists is to conduct research which may be लागू सीधे to सोशल नीति और welfare, जबकि अन्य फ़ोकस primarily on शोधन the theoretical understanding of social processes.
Subject matter ranges from the micro level of individual agency and बातचीत to the मैक्रो स्तर of प्रणालियों और the सोशल ढांचा.
The traditional focuses of sociology include social stratification, social class, culture, race and ethnicity, लिंग और कामुकता, सोशल गतिशीलता, धर्म, secularization, विधि, and deviance.
As all spheres of human activity are affected by the interplay between social structure and individual agency, sociology has gradually expanded its focus to further subjects, such as health, medical, सैन्य और penal संस्थानों, the अंतरजाल, पर्यावरणीय समाजशास्त्र, राजनैतिक अर्थव्यवस्था और the भूमिका of सोशल कार्यकलाप in the विकास of वैज्ञानिक knowledge.
The range of social scientific विधि रै भी विस्तारित.
Social researchers चित्रण upon a किस्में of गुणात्मक and quantitative techniques.
The linguistic और सांस्कृतिक turns of the mid-twentieth सदी led to increasingly interpretative, hermeneutic, and philosophic approaches to the analysis of society.
Conversely, हाल दशकों have देखी the वृद्धि of नई analytically, mathematically और computationally कठोर techniques, such as agent-based modelling and social network analysis.
Sociology should not be confused with various general social अध्ययन पाठ्यक्रम जिससे भालू छोटी संबंध to समाजशास्त्रीय theory or social science research methodology.
Thunder is the sound caused by बिजली.
depending on the प्रकृति of the बिजली और अलहदा of the श्रोता, थंडर can range from a sharp, loud crack to a long, low rumble ( brontide ).
The sudden increase in दबाव और तापमान इससे बिजली produces रैपिड विस्तार of the air surrounding and within a bolt of lightning.
In turn, this expansion of air creates a सोनिक शॉक वेव, समान to a सोनिक boom, which produces the sound of thunder, often referred to as a clap, crack, or peal of thunder.
the अलहदा of the बिजली can be गणना by the श्रोता based on the time interval from when the lightning is seen to when the sound is heard.
Palma (,, ), in full Palma de Mallorca, is the प्रमुख नगर और बंदरगाहों on the द्वीप of majorca ( mallorca ) और capital city of the autonomous community of the Balearic Islands in Spain.
The names Ciutat de Mallorca ( City of Majorca ) and Ciutat ( City ) were used before the War of the स्पेनी उत्तराधिकार और हैं स्टिल used by people in Majorca.
However, the आधिकारिक नाम थी mallorca, the वही as the island.
It is situated on the दक्षिण coast of the द्वीप on the Bay of Palma.
As of the 2009 जनसांख्यिकी, the जनसांख्यिकी of the नगर of पालमा उचित थी 401,270, और the population of the entire urban area was 517,285, ranking as the twelfth largest urban area of Spain.
Almost half of the कुल जनसांख्यिकी of Majorca live in Palma.
The Cabrera Archipelago, हालांकि widely अलग इससे पालमा उचित, is administratively considered part of the municipality.
Its airport, Son Sant जोन, serves over 22 लाख यात्री each year.
The Marivent Palace was offered by the नगर to the तब प्रिंस जुआन Carlos I of Spain.
The royals have since खर्च उनके गर्मियाँ छुट्टियाँ in पालमा.

For other उपयोग, देखिए लूथर ( बहुविकल्पी ).
Alexander Joseph `` Lex '' Luthor is a fictional अक्षर, a supervillain appearing in comic books published by DC Comics.
Luthor is the archenemy of Superman, और as a high-status supervillain, रै भी आइये into विरोध साथ बैटमैन और other superheroes in the DC Universe.
निर्मित by जेरी siegel और जो shuster, the अक्षर पहला appeared in Action Comics # 23 ( April 1940 ).
Luthor is वर्णित as `` a power-mad, दुष्ट वैज्ञानिक '' of high intelligence and incredible technological prowess.
Luthor 's goals typically बीच on हत्या सुपरमैन, the foremost बाधा to achieving the villain 's megalomaniacal goals.
Despite periodically wearing a powered exoskeleton, Luthor has traditionally lacked superpowers or a डुअल पहचान.
The अक्षर थी originally चित्रित as a mad वैज्ञानिक जो, in the vein of pulp novels, wreaks havoc on the world with his futuristic weaponry.
In his earliest दिखावे, luthor is दिखाया साथ a पूरा head of red hair.
Despite this, the अक्षर बाद became hairless as the result of an artist 's mistake.
A 1960 story by Jerry Siegel expanded upon Luthor 's origin and motivations, revealing him to be a childhood friend of सुपरमैन 's जो खोया उसके बाल जब a आग नष्ट उसके laboratory ; Luthor vowed revenge.
Following the 1985 limited series Crisis on Infinite Earths, the character was re-imagined as a machiavellian उद्योगपति और white-collar दण्ड, भी briefly serving as President of the United States.
In recent years, various writers have revived luthor 's mad वैज्ञानिक persona इससे the 1940s.
The character was ranked as the 8th महानतम विलेन by जादूगर on its 100 Greatest Villains of All Time list.
IGN 's list of the Top 100 Comic किताब खलनायक of सब समय क्रमित Luthor as # 4.
Luthor is also described as a `` megavillain '' by comic book critic पीटर sanderson, एक of a few genre-crossing खलनायक जिनकी adventures लो प्लेस `` in a संसार in जिससे the ordinary कानून of प्रकृति हैं थोड़ा निलंबित '' ; वर्ण such as Professor Moriarty, Count Dracula, Hannibal Lecter, Doctor Doom, and Darth Vader, also fit this description.
Martin Luther King, Jr. Day is a संयुक्त राज्य संघीय अवकाश अंकन the जन्मदिवस of Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.
It is observed on the तीसरा सोमवार of जनवरी प्रत्येक साल, जिससे is around the समय of King 's birthday, January 15.
The floating holiday is similar to holidays set under the वर्दी सोमवार अवकाश अधिनियम, हालांकि the अधिनियम predated the स्थापना of मार्टिन Luther King, Jr. Day by 15 years.
King was the chief spokesman for nonviolent सक्रियता in the सिविल अधिकारों गति, जिससे सफलतापूर्वक protested racial discrimination in federal and state law.
The campaign for a federal holiday in King 's honor began जल्द बाद उसके हत्या in 1968.
Ronald Reagan signed the holiday into law in 1983, और it थी पहला observed on जनवरी 20, 1986.
At first, some states resisted observing the holiday as such, giving it वैकल्पिक names or combining it साथ अन्य holidays.
It was officially observed in सब 50 राज्य लिये the पहला time in 2000.
The camera phone समाधान allows तत्काल sharing of तस्वीरें.
as it 's स्वचालित और तत्काल, the उपयोक्ता करता नहीं have to use a cable or removable media to connect to a personal computer.
A camera phone is a मोबाईल फोन जिससे is समर्थ to कैप्चर still photographs ( and usually video ).
Since early in the 21st सदी the बहुमत of मोबाईल फोन in उपयोग हैं कैमरा phones.
Most camera phones हैं simpler than पृथक डिजिटल cameras.
Their usual फिक्स्ड फ़ोकस lenses और smaller sensors limit their performance in poor lighting.
Lacking a physical shutter, सबसे have a long shutter lag.
फ्लैश, जहाँ उपस्थित, is usually weak.
Optical zoom और तिपाई screws are rare.
Some also lack a USB connection, removable memory card, or अन्य रास्ता of transferring उनके तस्वीरें अधिक जल्दी than by the phone 's inherent communication feature.
Some of the more expensive camera phones have only a few of these technical disadvantages, जिससे लागू सबसे acutely in कम लाइट शर्तें और in कोई मामला have नहीं inhibited their widespread use.
Most मॉडल लाइनों improve in these regards every year or two.
Some, such as the Droid अविश्वसनीय तभी have a मेनू चुनाव to start an application program to activate the camera.
Others, such as the BlackBerry Storm 2, Droid X, मोटोरोला v980 और नोकिया 5800 भी have a पृथक कैमरा बटन लिये quickness and convenience.
Windows Phones can be विन्यस्त to operate as a कैमरा even if the phone is asleep.
Some camera phones are designed to resemble separate low-end डिजिटल कॉम्पैक्ट कैमरे in रूप और to कुछ extent in सुविधाएँ और picture quality, and are branded as both mobile phones and cameras, including certain Sony phones.
The principal advantages of camera फोन हैं लागत और compactness ; बेशक लिये a उपयोक्ता जो carries a मोबाईल फोन वैसे, the additional size and cost are negligible.
Smartphones that हैं कैमरा फोन may चलाएं मोबाईल अनुप्रयोग to add सामर्थ्य such as geotagging and image stitching.
A few high end phones can use their touch screen to direct their camera to focus on a particular object in the field of दृश्य, giving भी an अनुभवहीन उपयोक्ता a उपाधि of फ़ोकस कंट्रोल exceeded तभी by seasoned फ़ोटोग्राफ़र using manual focus.
`` Whatever Happened to the Man of कल ? '' is a 1986 कॉमिक किताब स्टोरी featuring the dc कॉमिक्स character of Superman.
Written by Alan Moore with help from long-time, और जल्द to be retiring, सुपरमैन एडिटर, जूलियस schwartz, the स्टोरी थी प्रकाशित in दो parts, beginning in Superman # 423 and ending in Action Comics # 583, both published in September 1986.
The story was drawn by long-time कलाकार रूखा swan, in उसके फाइनल प्रमुख योगदान to the सुपरमैन शीर्षक, और थी inked by जार्ज pérez in the समस्या of सुपरमैन and Kurt Schaffenberger in the issue of Action Comics.
The story was an imaginary tale which told the फाइनल स्टोरी of the चांदी आयु सुपरमैन और उसके long इतिहास, जिससे थी होने rebooted following the events of Crisis on Infinite Earths, before his modern introduction in the John Byrne series, The Man of Steel.
Moore wanted his plot to honor the long history of the अक्षर और to serve as a पूरा निष्कर्ष to उसके mythology.
The story is a frame story set टेन सालो बाद सुपरमैन थी पिछला देखी, जहाँ लोइस लेन recounts the टेल of the end of Superman 's career to a reporter from the Daily Planet.
Her story includes numerous violent attacks against Superman by उसके दुश्मनों, the पब्लिक रहस्योद्घाटन of उसके रहस्य पहचान of क्लार्क केंट और a number of deaths of those closest to him.
The story has been cited as one of the बेहतरीन कहानियां of the अक्षर of सुपरमैन, और critics and audiences frequently choose it as one of the most memorable comics ever published.
It is used as an example of how to close the long-time निरंतरता of a कॉमिक किताब अक्षर.
The story 's legacy has endured साथ समान कहानियां लिखा as tributes to it.
The title is a सन्दर्भ to एक of the nicknames of सुपरमैन as the man of कल, and was used in the title of another Superman.
The Bugatti Veyron EB 16.4 is a mid-engined grand touring car, designed and developed by the Volkswagen Group and manufactured in molsheim, फ़्रांस by bugatti ऑटोमोबाइल S.A.S.
The Super Sport version of the Veyron is the fastest street-legal उत्पादन car in the संसार, साथ a शीर्ष गति of.
The original version रै a शीर्ष गति of.
It was named Car of the दशक ( 2000–2009 ) by the बीबीसी टेलीविज़न programme Top Gear.
The मानक veyron जीती शीर्ष गियर्स बेहतरीन Car Driven All Year award in 2005.
On 6 April 2013, Bugatti set the record for the fastest roadster in the संसार साथ the veyron ग्रैंड खेल vitesse, reaching on औसत a शीर्ष गति of.
The Veyron 's chief पंक्तियां थी hartmut warkuss, और the exterior थी designed by jozef kabaň of volkswagen, साथ much of the engineering work being conducted under the guidance of engineering chief Wolfgang Schreiber.
A number of special variants have महरूम उत्पादित.
In December 2010, Bugatti began offering prospective खरीदार the क्षमता to मनपसंद exterior और इंटीरियर्स colours by using the Veyron 16.4 Configurator application on the marque 's official website.
The institution of the Eucharist has been a key theme in the depictions of the पिछला भोजन in ईसाई आर्ट, as in इस 16th-century जुआन de juanes painting.
`` At the Last Supper, on the रात्रि he थी गद्दारी, हमारी रक्षक instituted the Eucharistic sacrifice of his Body and Blood. ''
( catechism of the Catholic Church 1323 )
Eucharist in the Catholic Church refers to both the celebration of the Mass, that is, the Eucharist liturgy, और the ब्रैड और वाइन जिससे बाद the प्रतिष्ठापना हैं transubstantiated ( बदला in पदार्थ ) into the देह और रक्त of यीशु मसीह, रब और परमेश्वर, a घोषणा प्रतिपादित by the परिषद of Trent with an anathema against anyone who denied this.
Blessed Sacrament is a devotional पद प्रयुक्त in the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर to refer to the eucharistic species ( the Body and Blood of Christ ).

A छोटी स्टोरी is a ब्रैड कार्य of साहित्य, प्रायः written in narrative prose.
Emerging from earlier oral storytelling traditions in the 17th सदी, the छोटी स्टोरी रै grown to encompass a देह of work so diverse as to defy easy characterization.
At its most prototypical the short story features a small cast of named characters, and focuses on a self-contained घटना साथ the intent of evoking a `` single effect '' or mood.
In so doing, छोटी कहानियां मेक उपयोग of प्लाट, अनुनाद, और अन्य डायनेमिक components to a दूर वृहद उपाधि than is typical of an anecdote, yet to a far lesser degree than a novel.
While the छोटी स्टोरी is largely पृथक इससे the अनोखा, लेखक of दोनो generally draw from a common pool of literary techniques.
Short कहानियां have no नियत length.
In terms of word count there is no आधिकारिक demarcation between an किस्सा, a short story, and a novel.
Rather, the form 's पैरामीटर्स हैं दिए by the rhetorical और व्यावहारिक कॉन्टेक्स्ट in जिससे a दिए स्टोरी is उत्पादित और माना, so कि what constitutes a short story may differ between genres, countries, eras, and commentators.
Like the novel, the short story 's predominant shape reflects the demands of the उपलब्धियाँ बाज़ार लिये प्रकाशन, और the एवोल्यूशन of the रूप seems closely tied to the एवोल्यूशन of the publishing industry and the submission guidelines of its constituent houses.
The short story has been considered both an apprenticeship form preceding अधिक lengthy works, और a crafted रूप in इसके अपना सही, एकत्रित साथ in books of similar length, price, and distribution as novels.
Short story writers may define their works as भाग of the कलाकारी और निजी अभिव्यक्ति of the form.
They may also attempt to resist categorization by विधा and fixed form.
क्षेत्रफल कोड in Michigan
Area code 810 is the टेलीफोन क्षेत्रफल कोड सेवारत पूर्वी Michigan.
The raccoon (, Procyon lotor ), sometimes spelled racoon, also known as the आम raccoon, उत्तर अमरीकी raccoon, उत्तरी raccoon और colloquially as कून, is a medium-sized mammal native to North America.
The raccoon is the largest of the procyonid परिवार, having a body length of and a body weight of.
Its grayish coat ज़्यादातर consists of घना underfur जिससे insulates against cold weather.
Two of the raccoon 's सबसे distinctive सुविधाएँ हैं इसके अत्यधिक dexterous front paws and its facial mask, which are themes in the mythology of several Native American tribes.
Raccoons are noted for their प्रज्ञा, साथ अध्ययन प्रर्दशित कि वे हैं समर्थ to याद the solution to tasks for up to three years.
The diet of the omnivorous raccoon, which is प्रायः nocturnal, consists of परिचय 40 % invertebrates, 33 % plant foods, and 27 % vertebrates.
The original habitats of the raccoon हैं पतझड़ी और मिश्रित वनों, लकिन due to उनके adaptability वे have विस्तारित their range to mountainous areas, coastal marshes, and urban areas, where some homeowners consider them to be pests.
as a परिणाम of escapes और deliberate introductions in the mid-20th सदी, raccoons हैं अभी also distributed across the European mainland, the Caucasus region and Japan.
हालांकि previously विचार to be एकान्त, वहीँ is now evidence that raccoons engage in gender-specific social behavior.
Related females often share a common area, while unrelated males live together in groups of up to चार पशु to maintain उनके स्थितियाँ विरूद्ध विदेशी males दौरान the mating season, and other potential invaders.
Home range sizes vary anywhere इससे 3 हेक्टेयर ( 7 एकड़ ) लिये महिलाओं in शहरों to 50 km2 ( 20 sq mi ) for males in prairies.
After a gestation काल of परिचय 65 days, two to five young, known as `` kits '', are born in spring.
the kits हैं subsequently उठाया by their mother until dispersion in late fall.
Although captive raccoons have been known to live over 20 years, their average life प्रत्याशा in the जंगली is तभी 1.8 to 3.1 सालो.
In many areas, hunting और vehicular चोट हैं the दो सबसे common causes of death.
The 2010 Haiti earthquake was a catastrophic magnitude 7.0 Mw earthquake, with an उपरिकेंद्र निकट the कस्बा of léogâne ( ouest विभाग ), लगभग वेस्ट of port-au-prince, Haiti 's capital.
The भूकंप occurred at 16:53 लोकल समय ( 21:53 UTC ) on Tuesday, 12 January 2010.
By 24 January, at least 52 aftershocks measuring 4.5 or वृहद था महरूम अंकित.
An estimated तीन लाख लोगों यहूद प्रभावित by the quake.
The highest reliable death count थी अनुमानित at 220,000.
haitian सरकारी estimates were higher.
the सरकारी of हैती अनुमानित कि 250,000 निवास और 30,000 commercial buildings had collapsed or were severely damaged.
The earthquake caused प्रमुख क्षति in port-au-prince, Jacmel and other settlements in the region.
Many notable landmark buildings were significantly damaged or नष्ट, सहित the अध्यक्षीय राजमहल, the नेशनल सभा भवन, the port-au-prince Cathedral, and the main jail.
Among those मारे यहूद archbishop of Port-au-Prince Joseph Serge Miot, and opposition leader Micha Gaillard.
The headquarters of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र स्थिरीकरण मिशन in हैती ( minustah ), located in the capital, collapsed, killing many, including the Mission 's Chief, Hédi Annabi.
Many countries responded to appeals for humanitarian सहायता, pledging निधि और dispatching बचाव और medical teams, engineers and support personnel.
Communication systems, air, land, and sea transport facilities, hospitals, and electrical networks had been damaged by the earthquake, which hampered rescue and aid efforts ; भ्रम over जो थी in चार्ज, एयर ट्रैफ़िक जमघट, और समस्याएं साथ prioritisation of फ़्लाइट further जटिल early relief work.
Port-au-Prince 's morgues यहूद अभिभूत साथ tens of thousands of bodies.
ये था to be दफ्न in mass graves.
as छुटकारा tailed बंद, supplies, medical care and sanitation became priorities.
Delays in aid distribution led to angry appeals from aid workers और survivors, और लूटने और विरल हिंसा were observed.
On 22 January the United Nations noted that the emergency phase of the relief operation was आरेखण to a बंद, और on the following दिन the haitian सरकारी officially पुकारा बंद the search for survivors.
Mister Ed is a fictional talking घोड़ा, originally appearing in छोटी कहानियां by वाल्टर R. ब्रूक्स, और बाद in an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न हालात कॉमेडी उत्पादित by filmways that first aired in syndication from January 5 to July 2, 1961, and then on CBS from October 1, 1961 to February 6, 1966.
The stars of the show were Mister Ed, a palomino घोड़ा जो could `` बात '', निभाई by gelding बाँसुरी harvester और voiced by पूर्व पश्चिमी star Allan Lane ( who went uncredited for the entire length of the series ), and his owner, an eccentric and enormously klutzy, yet friendly, architect named Wilbur Post ( Alan Young ).
Much of the program 's humor stemmed इससे the फैक्ट मिस्टर ed होता speak only to Wilbur, as well as Ed 's notoriety as a troublemaker.
Other running jokes centered on Wilbur 's अक्षर होने a विशाल klutz और inadvertently causing नुक़सान to खुद or others.
According to the show 's producer, Arthur Lubin, Young was chosen as the सीसे अक्षर क्युकी he `` बस लगा जैसे the sort of guy a horse would talk to ''.
Lubin, a friend of Mae West, scored a coup by persuading the स्क्रीन प्रतीक to अतिथि स्टार in एक एपीसोड.
In the संयुक्त राज्य, reruns aired on उपनाम at नाइट from March 3, 1986, to February 1, 1993.
Sister station TV Land also reran the दिखाएँ इससे 1996–98 और again from 2003-06.
The series is currently ब्रॉडकास्ट प्रत्येक morning on इस tv, साथ साथ राजमार्ग पैट्रोल, और The Patty Duke Show.
It is also फिलहाल ब्रॉडकास्ट on hallmark फिल्म Channel.
As of January 1, 2011, the first two सीज़न of the दिखाएँ हैं उपलब्धियाँ on Hulu.
The Rapture is a term in Christian eschatology जिससे refers to the `` होने caught up '' discussed in 1 thessalonians 4:17, जब the `` dead in Christ '' and `` we who are alive and remain '' will be `` caught up in the clouds '' to meet `` the Lord in the air ''.
The पद `` rapture '' is प्रयुक्त in at least two senses.
In the pre-tribulation view, a समूह of लोगों होगा be बाएँ पीछे on धरती after another group literally leaves `` to meet the Lord in the air. ''
This is now the सबसे आम उपयोग of the पद, विशेषकर among fundamentalist Christians and in the United States.
The other, older use of the term `` Rapture '' is simply as a synonym for the final क़यामत generally, बगैर a विश्वास कि a समूह of लोगों is बाएँ पीछे on धरती लिये an extended Tribulation period after the events of 1 Thessalonians 4:17.
This distinction is important as some types of christianity never refer to `` the rapture '' in धार्मिक शिक्षा, लकिन might उपयोग the पुरानी और अधिक सामान्य भाव of the शब्द `` rapture '' in referring to what happens during the final resurrection.
There are many दृश्य among ईसाइयों regarding the समय of मसीह 's वापसी ( सहित whether it होगा occur in एक इवेंट or दो ), और विभिन्न views regarding the destination of the aerial gathering described in 1 Thessalonians 4.
Denominations such as Roman Catholics, Orthodox Christians, Lutheran Christians, and Reformed ईसाइयों मानना in a rapture तभी in the भाव of a सामान्य फाइनल क़यामत, जब मसीह returns a single time.
They do not believe that a group of people is left पीछे on धरती लिये an विस्तारित tribulation काल बाद the कार्यक्रम of 1 Thessalonians 4:17.
Pre-tribulation rapture theology was developed in the 1830s by John Nelson Darby and the plymouth brethren, और popularized in the संयुक्त राज्य in the जल्दी 20th century by the wide circulation of the Scofield Reference Bible.
Kris Nathan Humphries ( born February 6, 1985 ) is an अमरीकी पेशेवर बास्केट खिलाड़ी साथ the ब्रुकलीन Nets.
The Philistine cities of गाजा, ashdod, ashkelon, ekron, and Gath
The Philistines (,,, or ;, plištim ), pleshet or peleset, यहूद a लोगों जो as भाग of the समुद्र peoples appeared in the दक्षिणी तटीय area of Canaan at the beginning of the Iron Age ( circa 1175 BC ), most probably from the Aegean region.
According to the Bible, they ruled the पाँच city-states ( the `` philistine pentapolis '' ) of गाजा, ashkelon, Ashdod, Ekron and Gath, from Wadi Gaza in the south to the Yarqon River in the north, but with no fixed border to the east.
The बाइबल paints उन्हें as the किंगडम of Israel 's most dangerous enemy.
Originating somewhere in the Aegean, their population was around 25,000 in the 12th सदी bc, उठती to a शिखर of 30,000 in the 11th सदी bc, of जिससे the ईजियन तत्व थी नहीं अधिक than half the total, and perhaps much less.
Nothing is ज्ञात लिये निश्चित परिचय the असली भाषा or भाषाएं of the Philistines, however they were not part of the Semitic Canaanite population.
There is some limited evidence in पक्ष of the assumption कि the philistines यहूद indo-european-speakers either from Greece and/or Luwian speakers from the coast of Asia Minor.
Philistine-related words found in the बाइबल हैं नहीं सामीती, और can in कुछ मामले, साथ रिज़र्वेशन, be traced back to Proto-Indo-European roots.
By the beginning of the 1st Millennium BCE they had adopted the सामान्य canaanite भाषा of the प्रदेश.
The Armed Services Vocational Aptitude Battery ( ASVAB ) is a multiple choice test, administered by the संयुक्त राज्य सैन्य प्रवेश प्रसंस्करण कमांड, प्रयुक्त to determine qualification for enlistment in the United States armed forces.
It is often offered to American high school students when they हैं in the 10th, 11th और 12th ग्रेड, हालांकि anyone योग्य लिये enlistment may take it.
Although the test is administered by the military, it is not ( and never has been ) a आवश्यकता कि a test-taker साथ a qualifying स्कोर enlist in the हथियारबंद शक्तियां.
In financial accounting, a balance sheet or statement of financial position is a summary of the financial balances of a sole बंदोबस्त, a कारोबार साझेदारी, a निगम or अन्य कारोबार संगठन, ऐसे as an LLC or an LLP.
Assets, देनदारी और स्वामित्व इक्विटी हैं सूचीबद्ध as of a विशिष्ट date, such as the end of its financial year.
A balance चादर is प्रायः वर्णित as a `` snapshot of a company 's financial condition ''.
Of the चार मौलिक वित्तीय कथन, the संतुलन चादर is the तभी statement which applies to a single point in time of a business ' calendar year.
A मानक कम्पनी संतुलन चादर रै तीन भाग : एसेट, liabilities and ownership equity.
The main categories of assets are usually सूचीबद्ध पहला, और typically in order of liquidity.
Assets are followed by the देनदारी.
The difference between the assets and the देनदारी is ज्ञात as इक्विटी or the जाल एसेट or the जाल worth or capital of the company and according to the accounting equation, net worth must equal assets minus liabilities.
Another way to look at the same equation is कि एसेट बराबरी देनदारी प्लस मालिक 's इक्विटी.
Looking at the equation in this way shows how assets were financed : either by borrowing money ( liability ) or by using the मालिक 's धन ( मालिक 's equity ).
संतुलन चादरें हैं प्रायः प्रस्तुत साथ एसेट in one section and liabilities and net worth in the other section with the two sections `` balancing. ''
A business operating entirely in cash can measure its profits by withdrawing the संपूर्ण बैंको संतुलन at the समाप्त of the काल, प्लस कोई नकदी in hand.
However, many businesses are not paid immediately ; they build up inventories of goods और वे acquire इमारतें and equipment.
in अन्य शब्द : व्यवसायों have एसेट और so वे can not, even if they want to, immediately turn these into cash at the end of each period.
Often, these व्यवसायों owe धन to आपूर्तिकर्ता और to कर अधिकारियों, और the proprietors do not withdraw all their original capital and profits at the end of each period.
In अन्य शब्द businesses also have liabilities.
.17 Hornady Magnum Rimfire, commonly known as the.17 HMR, is a rimfire राइफल कार्ट्रिज विकसित by the ammunition कम्पनी hornady in 2002.
It descended from the.22 Magnum by necking down the.22 Magnum case to लो a.17 कैलिबर ( 4.5 mm ) गोली, और it is अधिक costly to shoot than traditional.22 caliber rimfire cartridges.
Commonly loaded with a 17 अनाज ( 1.1 g ) गोली, it can उद्धार muzzle velocities in excess of 2550 ft/s ( 775 m/s ).
The Schaumburg Flyers were a professional बेसबॉल टोली आधारित in schaumburg, इलिनोइस, in the United States.
The Flyers were to be a चार्टर सदस्य of the उत्तर अमरीकी लीग, जिससे is नहीं संबद्ध साथ प्रमुख League Baseball, however, the team folded in March 2011, before they began play in the NAL.
From the 1999 season to the 2010 ऋतु, the Flyers played their home games at Alexian Field, near the Elgin O'Hare Expressway.
The team formerly played in थंडर खाड़ी, ओंटारियो, जहाँ वे यहूद ज्ञात as the थंडर Bay Whiskey Jacks.
The team was originally a सदस्य of the उत्तरी League from 1993 to 2010.
On July 27, 2009, the flyers निभाई मेजबान to बैटल of the लिंगों ii, which pitted the Flyers against the National Pro Fastpitch Softball Champions, the Chicago Bandits.
निभाई by आधिकारिक सॉफ्टबॉल नियम, the खेल थी देखी by an overflow record crowd of 8,918, and was won by the Bandits 4-2.
In 1999, the flyers नियुक्त उनके पहला manager, Ron Kittle.
Kittle is best known for his playing days with the Chicago White Sox, and former Chicago Cubs and श्वेत sox खिलाड़ी ग्रेग hibbard was the pitching coach.
During the early years of the मताधिकार, kittle किया a श्रेणी of tv commercials to प्रचार the टोली, using the gimmick `` Ma Kittle. '' where he played both himself and his `` Ma. ''
The विज्ञापन यहूद कामयाब at sparking कुछ आरंभिक ब्याज in the टोली as the Flyers hoped to steal away fans from the nearby Kane County Cougars.
The ad mimicked the highly कामयाब converse विज्ञापन जहाँ लैरी जॉनसन स्ट्रक्चर as दोनो खुद और `` gramama. ''
At the end of the 2001 season, however, Kittle resigned इससे उसके managerial स्थिति, और जिम boynewicz थी hired to replace him.
In 2004, the flyers बना it to the उत्तरी लीग Championship Series against the St. Paul Saints.
Despite leading the five-game श्रेणी 2-1, schaumburg आखिरकार खोया the श्रेणी.
in खेल 5, flyers राहत पिचर lyle prempas अनुमत a खेल जीतना grand slam by St. Paul infielder Marc Mirizzi in the ninth inning.
The Flyers appeared in the Northern League Playoffs four times ( 1999, 2003, 2004, 2006 ) लकिन never जीती the चैंपियनशिप.
Some famous players who played for the flyers यहूद पूर्व ओकलैंड a 's outfielder ozzie canseco और पूर्व शिकागो शावक outfielder Dwight Smith.
Rachel Hannah Weisz ( / vice / ; born 7 कूच 1970 ) is an अंग्रेज़ी film and theatre actress and former fashion model.
Weisz began her acting career at Trinity Hall, कैम्ब्रिज in the जल्दी 1990s, तब प्रारंभ working in टेलीविज़न, appearing in इंस्पेक्टर मोर्स, the अंग्रेजों mini-series Scarlet and Black, and the television film Advocates II.
She made her film début in the film Death यंत्र ( 1994 ), लकिन उसके भेदन भूमिका आए in the फिल्मी कड़ी प्रतिक्रिया ( 1996 ), अग्रणी to a high-profile role as Evelyn Carnahan-O'Connell in the films The Mummy ( 1999 ) and The Mummy Returns ( 2001 ).
Other notable films featuring वाइज़ हैं दुश्मन at the गेट्स, परिचय a लड़के, constantine, the फव्वारा और the निरंतर माली, लिये जिससे she received an Academy Award, a Golden Globe and a Screen Actors ' Guild award for her supporting role as Tessa Quayle.
She has been labelled an `` English rose '' since उसके नाबालिग भूमिका in चोरी सौंदर्य ( 1996 ).
Weisz also works in theatre.
Her stage breakthrough was the 1994 पुनरुद्धार of noël कायर 's खेल डिज़ाइन लिये Living, which earned her the London Critics Circle Award for the most promising newcomer.
Weisz 's प्रदर्शन भी शामिल the 1999 donmar Warehouse production of Tennessee Williams ' Suddenly, Last Summer, and their 2009 revival of A Streetcar Named Desire.
Her portrayal of Blanche DuBois in the latter play earned her the आलोचकों ' वृत्त थिएटर Award for Best Actress.
She has recently played evanora in oz the Great and Powerful.
The American Civil War ( ACW ), also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ), was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and अनेक दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य कि घोषित उनके secession और formed the confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had its origin in the issue of slavery, विशेषकर the एक्सटेंशन of गुलामी into the पश्चिमी territories.
विदेशी शक्तियां किया not intervene.
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना, the confederacy collapsed, गुलामी थी abolished, and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential election, Republicans, led by Abraham Lincoln, opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त राज्य ' territories.
Lincoln won, but before his inauguration on March 4, 1861, seven cotton-based स्लेव राज्य formed the confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan and the आवक republicans अस्वीकृत secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address घोषित उसके प्रशासन होता नहीं initiate civil war.
Eight remaining स्लेव राज्य जारी to अस्वीकृत काल्स for secession.
Confederate forces जब्त numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A सलाम सम्मेलन विफल to find a compromise, and both sides prepared for war.
The confederates assumed कि यूरोपीय देशों यहूद so निर्भर on `` King Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, जब confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट sumter, a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina.
lincoln पुकारा लिये प्रत्येक राज्य to provide सैनिकों to retake the फोर्ट ; consequently, four more slave states joined the Confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
The Union soon controlled the border states and established a naval नाकेबंदी कि अबोध the दक्षिणी अर्थव्यवस्था.
The Eastern Theater was inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln issued the emancipation उदघोषणा, जिससे बना समाप्ति गुलामी a war goal.
To the west, by summer 1862 the संघ नष्ट the confederate नदी नेवी, तब much of उनके पश्चिमी armies, and the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, रॉबर्ट E. ली 's confederate incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western सफलताओं led to ulysses S. Grant command of all Union armies in 1864.
In the Western Theater, William T. Sherman drove ईस्ट to कैप्चर अटलांटा और marched to the समुद्र, destroying confederate अवसंरचना साथ the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the confederacy इससे सब दिशानिर्देश, और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending Confederate फौज विफल, अग्रणी to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at Appomattox Court House on April 9, 1865.
The American Civil War was one of the earliest सच्चा औद्योगिक wars.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, और mass-produced हथियार यहूद employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, खानों, shipyards, बैंको, परिवहन और खाना आपूर्तियाँ सब foreshadowed World War I.
it remains the deadliest युद्ध in अमरीकी इतिहास, resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा, और 30 प्रतिशत of सब दक्षिणी white males aged 18–40.
Potato bread is a form of bread in which potato replaces a portion of the नियमित गेहूं आटा.
It is पकाया in a किस्में of विधि, सहित by baking it on a hot griddle or pan, or in an oven.
It may be leavened or unleavened, और may have a किस्में of other ingredients baked into it.
The ratio of आलू to गेहूं आटा varies significantly इससे रेसिपी to रेसिपी, साथ some recipes having a majority of potato, and others having a majority of wheat flour.
Some recipes call for mashed आलू, साथ अन्य कॉलिंग लिये निर्जलित potato flakes.
It is available as a commercial product in many countries, साथ समान विसंगतियाँ in संघटक, कुकिंग विधि, और other variables.
The प्रशांत समय मण्डल observes मानक समय by subtracting eight hours from Coordinated Universal Time ( ).
the क्लॉक समय in इस मण्डल is आधारित on the औसत सौर समय of the 120th meridian west of the Greenwich Observatory.
During daylight छायांकन समय, its time offset is.
In the United राज्य और कनाडा, इस समय मण्डल is generically called Pacific Time ( PT ).
Specifically, it is Pacific Standard Time ( pst ) जब observing मानक समय ( शीत ), और प्रशांत daylight समय ( पीडीटी ) जब observing daylight saving time ( summer ).
सबसे of कनाडा उपयोग daylight saving time.
In Mexico the utc−8 समय मण्डल is ज्ञात as the उत्तरपश्चिम मण्डल, जिससे is synchronized with the U.S. PDT daylight saving schedule.
The largest city in the प्रशांत समय मण्डल is लॉस एंजिल्स in कैलिफ़ोर्निया इससे यूएसए ; the city 's metropolitan area is the largest in the zone.
The zone is one hour ahead of the Alaska Time मण्डल, एक घंटा पीछे the पहाड़ समय मण्डल और तीन hours behind the Eastern Time Zone.
Stereo 8, commonly known as the eight-track कार्ट्रिज, eight-track टेप, or बस eight-track, is a चुम्बकीय टेप sound recording technology.
It was लोकप्रिय in the संयुक्त राज्य इससे the mid-1960s through to the जल्दी 1980s, but was relatively unknown in many European countries.
It was, however, very popular in the संयुक्त किंगडम दौरान इस काल.
Stereo 8 was created in 1964 by a consortium led by विधेयक lear of lear जेट निगम, साथ with Ampex, Ford Motor Company, General Motors, Motorola, and RCA Victor Records ( RCA ).
it थी a further विकास of the समान stereo-pak four-track cartridge created by Earl `` Madman '' Muntz.
A later quadraphonic संस्करण of the स्वरूप थी घोषित by आरसीए in अप्रैल 1970 और first known as Quad-8, then later changed to just Q8.
Ramesses II ( 1303 BC – July or August 1213 BC ; Egyptian :, alternatively transcribed as Rameses and Ramses or ), referred to as Ramesses the Great, थी the तीसरा मिश्र pharaoh ( reigned 1279 bc – 1213 bc ) of the Nineteenth dynasty.
He is often regarded as the greatest, most celebrated, and सबसे शक्तिशाली pharaoh of the मिश्र साम्राज्य.
His successors and बाद उन्होंने पुकारा उसे the `` ग्रेट Ancestor. ''
रामेसेस ii led अनेक सैन्य रिझाने into the Levant, re-asserting Egyptian control over Canaan.
He भी led रिझाने to the दक्षिण, into नुबिया, commemorated in inscriptions at Beit el-Wali and Gerf Hussein.
at आयु चौदह, रामेसेस थी नियुक्त Prince Regent by his father Seti I.
He is believed to have taken the throne in his late teens and is known to have शासित मिश्र इससे 1279 bc to 1213 bc लिये 66 सालो और 2 महीने, according to दोनो manetho और मिश्र 's समकालीन ऐतिहासिक रिकॉर्ड.
He was once said to have lived to be 99 सालो बूढ़ा, लकिन it is अधिक संभावित कि he died in his 90th or 91st year.
If he became Pharaoh in 1279 BC as सबसे egyptologists आज मानना, he होता have assumed the सिंहासन on may 31, 1279 BC, based on his known accession date of III Shemu day 27.
Ramesses II celebrated an unprecedented 14 sed त्यौहार ( the पहला आयोजित बाद तीस सालो of a pharaoh 's शासनकाल, और तब प्रत्येक तीन सालो ) during his reign—more than any other pharaoh.
On his death, he was buried in a मकबरा in the घाटी of the किंग्स ; उसके देह थी बाद स्थानांतरित to a royal संचय जहाँ it थी खोजा in 1881, and is now on display in the Cairo Museum.
The early part of his reign was focused on building शहरों, मंदिरों और स्मारक.
He established the city of Pi-Ramesses in the Nile Delta as his new पूंजी और प्रमुख आधार लिये उसके campaigns in Syria.
This city was built on the remains of the नगर of avaris, the पूंजी of the हिक्सोस जब वे took over, and was the location of the main Temple of Set.
He is also known as ozymandias in the यूनानी स्त्रोत, इससे a लिप्यन्तरण into यूनानी of a part of Ramesses 's throne name,, `` Ra 's mighty truth, chosen of Ra ''.
The Texas रेंजरों हैं a पेशेवर बेसबॉल टोली स्तिथ in the Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex, based in Arlington, Texas.
The Rangers मताधिकार is फिलहाल a सदस्य of the Western Division of Major League Baseball 's American League.
चूंकि, the रेंजरों have निभाई in रेंजरों ballpark in Arlington in Arlington, Texas.
The team 's नाम is उधार इससे the famous law enforcement agency of the same name.
The franchise was established in 1961 by the name of the Washington Senators, an expansion team awarded to Washington, D.C., after the city 's पहला ballclub, the असली वॉशिंगटन सीनेटरों, स्थानांतरित to मिनेसोटा और became the Twins.
After the season, the new Senators moved to Arlington, टेक्सास, और debuted as the रेंजरों the following spring.
The टेक्सास रेंजरों बेसबॉल क्लबों रै बना छह दिखावे in the एमएलबी postseason, सब following प्रभाग championships, in 1996, 1998, 1999, 2010, 2011 and 2012.
In 2010, the Rangers उन्नत पास्ट the प्रभाग श्रेणी लिये the पहला समय, defeating the Tampa Bay Rays.
Texas then brought home their first अमरीकी लीग pennant बाद धड़कन the नई यॉर्क यांकीज़ in six games.
In the 2010 World Series, the मताधिकार 's पहला, the रेंजरों गिरी to the सैन फ्रांसिस्को Giants in five games.
Their lone विजय बना उन्हें the पहला टेक्सास टोली to जीत a संसार श्रेणी खेल, the ह्यूस्टन एस्टर्स having been swept in their 2005 World Series appearance.
They repeated as American League champions the following year, then खोया the 2011 संसार श्रेणी to the st. लुई कार्डिनल्स in सात खेल.
Gaius Julius Caesar (, July 100 BC – 15 March 44 BC ) was a Roman सामान्य, statesman, कौंसुल और notable लेखक of Latin prose.
He played a नाजुक भूमिका in the कार्यक्रम कि led to the निधन of the Roman Republic and the rise of the Roman Empire.
In 60 BC, Caesar, Crassus and Pompey formed a political गठबंधन कि थी to dominate रोमन राजनीती for several years.
Their attempts to amass power through populist tactics were opposed by the रूढ़िवादी elite भीतर the रोमन सीनेट, among उन्हें केटो the younger साथ the frequent support of Cicero.
सीज़र 's conquest of gaul, समाप्त by 51 bc, extended Rome 's territory to the English Channel and the Rhine.
सीज़र became the पहला रोमन सामान्य to क्रॉस दोनो जब he निर्मित a bridge across the Rhine and conducted the first invasion of Britain.
These achievements granted him unmatched military power and threatened to ग्रहण the खड़ा of pompey, जो had realigned himself with the Senate after the death of Crassus in 53 BC.
With the Gallic युद्धों concluded, the सीनेट ordered सीज़र to lay bas उसके military command and return to Rome.
Caesar refused, और चिह्नित उसके defiance in 49 bc by क्रासिंग the Rubicon with a legion, leaving his province and illegally entering Roman territory under arms.
सिविल युद्ध resulted, इससे जिससे he emerged as the unrivaled leader of Rome.
After assuming control of government, सीज़र began a कार्यक्रम of सोशल और सरकारी reforms, सहित the सृष्टि of the Julian calendar.
He centralised the अफसरशाही of the गणतंत्र और थी आखिरकार proclaimed `` dictator in perpetuity ''.
But the underlying political विरोध था नहीं महरूम resolved, और on the ides of कूच ( 15 कूच ) 44 bc, सीज़र was assassinated by a group of senators led by Marcus Junius Brutus.
A new श्रेणी of सिविल युद्धों broke आउट, और the संवैधानिक सरकारी of the Republic was never restored.
Caesar 's अपनाया वारिस octavian, बाद ज्ञात as augustus, rose to sole power, and the era of the Roman Empire began.
Much of सीज़र 's जीवन is ज्ञात इससे उसके अपना खाते of उसके सैन्य अभियान, and from other contemporary sources, mainly the letters and speeches of Cicero and the historical writings of Sallust.
The later biographies of सीज़र by suetonius and Plutarch are also major sources.
Caesar is deemed to be one of the महानतम सैन्य कमांडरों of इतिहास.
