There are hundreds of भाषाएं बोला in सीरियल.
the प्रमुख भाषाएं हैं योरूबा, हौसा, Igbo, Edo, Fulfulde, Kanuri, and Ibibio.
The official language of Nigeria, English, the former colonial भाषा, थी चुनी to सुकर the सांस्कृतिक और भाषाई unity of the country.
English, however, remains an exclusive preserve of the country 's शहरी elite, और is नहीं widely बोला in ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों, जिससे comprise तीन quarters of the देशों जनसांख्यिकी.
Nigeria 's भाषाई विविधता is a microcosm of अफ़्रीकी as a पूरे, encompassing three major African languages families : Afroasiatic, Nilo-Saharan, and Niger–Congo.
Nigeria also has several as-yet unclassified languages, such as Cen tuum, जिससे may represent a relic of an भी वृहद विविधता prior to the स्प्रेड of the current language families.
Daucus carota ( common names include wild carrot, ( UK ) bird 's nest, bishop 's lace, and Queen ऐनी 's फीता ( उत्तर अमेरिका ) ) is a flowering संयंत्र in the परिवार apiaceae, देशी to शीतोष्ण regions of Europe, southwest Asia and naturalised to North America and Australia.
domesticated गाजर हैं cultivars of a subspecies, Daucus carota subsp. sativus.
In the United States, the title of federal judge usually means a judge appointed by the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य और पुष्टि by the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट pursuant to the नियुक्ति clause in आलेख ii of the संयुक्त States Constitution.
In addition to the Supreme Court of the United States, whose existence और कुछ पहलुओं of जिनकी क्षेत्राधिकार हैं परे the संवैधानिक शक्ति of कॉंग्रेस to alter, अधिनियमों of कॉंग्रेस have स्थापित 13 न्यायालयों of appeals ( भी पुकारा `` सर्किट न्यायालयों '' ) with appellate jurisdiction over different regions of the United States, and 94 United States district courts.
Every judge appointed to such a court may be categorized as a संघीय न्यायधीश ; ऐसे स्थितियाँ शामिल the मुख्य इंसाफ और संबद्ध justices of the परम् अदालत, सर्किट न्यायाधीशों of the courts of appeals, and district judges of the United States district courts.
All of these judges described thus far are referred to sometimes as `` Article III judges '' because they exercise the judicial power vested in the न्यायिक शाखा of the संघीय सरकारी by आलेख iii of the u.S. संविधान.
In addition, judges of the Court of अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार कसरत न्यायिक शक्ति pursuant to Article III.
Other judges serving in the federal courts, including magistrate judges and bankruptcy judges, हैं भी sometimes referred to as `` संघीय न्यायाधीशों '' ; however, वे हैं neither नियुक्त by the अध्यक्ष nor confirmed by the Senate, and their power derives from Article I instead.
See आलेख i और आलेख III tribunals.
Nelly Kim Furtado ( born दिसम्बर 2, 1978 ) is a कनाडाई सिंगर, songwriter और अभिनेत्री.
She has sold 20 million एल्बम विश्वव्यापी और अधिक 20 लाख singles, bringing her total sales to over 40 million records around the world.
Furtado first gained fame with उसके डेब्यू एल्बम, वाह, नेल !
, जिससे शाखित दो कामयाब singles, `` I 'm Like a Bird `` and `` Turn Off the Light ``. ``
I 'm Like A Bird '' won a 2001 Juno Award for Single of the साल और a 2002 ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन मादा Pop Vocal Performance.
In 2003, Furtado released Folklore, which produced three international singles— `` powerless ( कह कया तुम want ) ``, `` कोशिश `` and `` Força ``.
Three सालो बाद वो released ढीला, a worldwide commercial success.
The album spawned चार number-one हिट्स : `` promiscuous ``, `` maneater ``, `` कह It Right `` and `` All Good Things ( Come to an End ) ``.
After a three-year ब्रेक, वो released उसके पहला full-length Spanish album, Mi Plan, and Furtado received a Latin Grammy for Best Female Pop Vocal Album.
In 2012, Furtado 's fourth English-language स्टुडियो एल्बम, the स्पिरिट अविनाशी थी released.
Furtado 's work has earned her numerous पुरस्कार और accolades, सहित 2 ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, 10 juno पुरस्कार, 3 muchmusic Video Awards and a star on Canada 's Walk of Fame.
Creatures of the Night is the दसवाँ स्टुडियो एल्बम by चुंबन.
It is the band 's last एल्बम लिये कासाब्लांका रिकॉर्ड, the तभी लेबल the group had ever recorded for at that point.
The album was dedicated to the memory of Casablanca संस्थापक और जल्दी चुंबन समर्थक neil bogart, जो था died of cancer during the recording sessions.
It is also the band 's last album recorded with Ace Frehley credited as an official member ( until 1998 's Psycho Circus ), and its पहला एल्बम साथ vinnie विंसेंट as the initially uncredited सीसे guitarist ( विंसेंट होता बाद be credited, लकिन not featured pictorially on the cover, of 1985 's reissue of the album ).
Touch is a crucial अर्थात् of receiving information.
This photo shows tactile markings identifying सीढ़ियाँ लिये visually impaired people.
The somatosensory प्रणाली is a विविध संवेदी प्रणाली comprising the receptors and processing centres to produce the sensory modalities such as touch, temperature, proprioception ( body position ), and nociception ( pain ).
The sensory receptors cover the skin and epithelia, skeletal मांसपेशियां, हड्डियों और joints, आतंरिक अंगों, और the cardiovascular system.
While touch is considered one of the five traditional होश, the छाप of टच is formed इससे अनेक modalities.
In medicine, the colloquial पद `` टच '' is प्रायः replaced साथ `` दैहिक होश '' to better reflect the variety of mechanisms involved.
Somatic senses are sometimes referred to as somesthetic senses, with the understanding that somesthesis includes टच, proprioception और ( depending on उपयोग ) भी haptic बोध.
The system reacts to diverse stimuli using different receptors : thermoreceptors, nociceptors, mechanoreceptors and chemoreceptors.
Transmission of सूचना इससे the receptors गुजरता via संवेदी nerves through tracts in the spinal cord and into the brain.
Processing primarily occurs in the primary somatosensory area in the parietal पालि of the दिमागी cortex.
The cortical homunculus was devised by Wilder Penfield.
At its simplest, the system works जब कार्यकलाप in a संवेदी न्यूरॉन is triggered by a विशिष्ट stimulus ऐसे as ऊष्मा ; इस सिग्नल आखिरकार passes to an area in the brain uniquely attributed to that area on the body—this allows the processed stimulus to be felt at the correct location.
The point-to-point मानचित्रण of the देह सतहों in the दिमाग is called a homunculus and is essential in the creation of a body image.
This brain-surface ( `` cortical '' ) मैप is नहीं अपरिवर्तनीय, however.
Dramatic shifts can occur in जवाब to stroke or injury.
Magnolia is a विशाल genus of परिचय 210 flowering संयंत्र प्रजाति in the subfamily Magnolioideae of the family Magnoliaceae.
It is named बाद फ्रेंच वनस्पतिशास्त्री Pierre Magnol.
magnolia is an प्राचीन genus.
Appearing before bees did, the पुष्प विकसित to प्रोत्साहित परागण by beetles.
To avoid damage from pollinating beetles, the carpels of magnolia पुष्प हैं अत्यधिक मुश्किल.
Fossilised specimens of magnolia acuminata have महरूम मिला डेटिंग to 20 लाख सालो पहले, और of plants identifiably belonging to the Magnoliaceae dating to 95 million years ago.
Another aspect of Magnolias that is considered to represent an ancestral state is that the flower कली is enclosed in a bract बल्कि than in sepals ; the perianth भाग हैं undifferentiated और पुकारा tepals बल्कि than distinct sepals and petals.
Magnolia shares the tepal characteristic with several other flowering पौधे निकट the आधार of the flowering संयंत्र lineage ऐसे as amborella और nymphaea ( as खूब as साथ अनेक अधिक recently निकला plants such as Lilium ).
The natural range of magnolia प्रजाति is a disjunct वितरण, साथ a प्रमुख केन्द्र in ईस्ट और southeast Asia and a secondary centre in eastern North America, Central America, the West Indies, and some species in South America.

`` White Christmas '' is an इरविंग बर्लिन सोंग reminiscing परिचय an old-fashioned Christmas setting.
According to the Guinness Book of World Records, the version sung by Bing crosby is the best-selling सिंगल of सब समय, साथ अनुमानित sales in excess of 50 million copies worldwide.
खाते vary as to जब और जहाँ Berlin wrote the song.
One story is that he wrote it in 1940, in warm La Quinta, California, while staying at the La Quinta Hotel, a frequent Hollywood रिट्रीट भी favored by writer-producer फ़्रैंक capra, हालांकि the एरिज़ोना biltmore भी दावा the सोंग was written there.
He प्रायः ठहरे up सब रात्रि लिखने — he बताई उसके सचिव, `` Grab your pen and take down this song.
I just wrote the best song I 've ever written — heck, I बस लिखा the बेहतरीन सोंग कि anybody 's कभी लिखा ! ''
cross-country स्कीइंग ( or xc स्कीइंग ) is a रूप of स्की touring in जिससे participants propel themselves across snow-covered terrain using skis and poles.
The activity is popular in अनेक स्थान साथ विशाल snowfields, primarily Northern Europe, Canada, and Alaska.
Cross-country skiing is part of the Nordic skiing sport family, which includes ski jumping, Nordic combined ( cross-country स्कीइंग और स्की कूद ), biathlon ( स्कीइंग और राइफल marksmanship ) और ski-orienteering ( which includes map navigation along snow trails and tracks ).
Cross-country skiing is the modern स्टाइल of स्कीइंग कि सबसे resembles प्रागैतिहासिक स्कीइंग, particularly when done in the backcountry.
It is भी सम्बन्धित to telemark skiing.
A use tax in United States is complementary to sales tax which अर्थात्, if तुम ख़रीदे a taxable product/services बगैर paying कोई बिक्री कर to विक्रेता, you owe use tax.
You must self assess use tax and pay it directly to the state where the उत्पाद यहूद खपत or सेवाएं यहूद rendered.
Use tax typically is a tax on खपत लकिन if तुम ख़रीदे an मद ( बगैर paying sales tax ) and store it in your warehouse initially, use tax applies to that location where goods were stored.
Later on when the final consumption takes place at some other location, you are required to pay the अवकल of कर रेट to the क्षेत्राधिकार of परम प्लेस of खपत.
This really means that you do n't have to अदा दोनो बिक्री कर as खूब as Use Tax on one transaction.
It is only one or the other that you are जरूरी to अदा on खरीदें of taxable products/services.
If vendor does n't चार्ज कोई बिक्री कर on इसके चालान तब it is the दायित्व of the buyer to self assess Use tax and pay it to the appropriate Jurisdication.
Use Tax is generally चार्ज at the वही कर रेट of बिक्री Tax but in some states the tax rate is different.
उपयोग कर is भी termed as `` खपत Tax '' or `` Consumer Use Tax ''.
A use tax is a प्रकार of excise कर levied in the संयुक्त States by numerous state governments.
It is assessed upon tangible personal property purchased by a resident of the assessing राज्य लिये उपयोग, भंडार, or खपत in कि राज्य ( नहीं लिये पुनर्विक्रय ), regardless of जहाँ the खरीदें took place.
If a resident of a राज्य makes a खरीदें भीतर उसके घर राज्य, पूरा बिक्री कर is paid at the time of the transaction.
The use tax applies when a निवासी of the assessing राज्य purchases an item that is not subject to his home state 's sales tax.
Usually, this is due to out-of-state purchases, as well as ordering items through the मेल, by फोन, or over the अंतरजाल इससे अन्य राज्य.
The use कर is typically assessed at the वही रेट as the बिक्री कर कि होता have महरूम owed ( if any ) had the same goods been purchased in the state of residence.
For example, a resident of Massachusetts, with a 6.25 % `` sales and use tax '' on certain goods और सेवाएं, purchases non-exempt goods or सेवाएं in नई हैम्पशायर for use, storage or other consumption in Massachusetts.
Under New Hampshire law, the New Hampshire vendor collects no बिक्री कर on the goods, लकिन the मैसाचुसेट्स purchaser/user जरूर स्टिल अदा 6.25 % of the sales price directly to the Department of Revenue in Massachusetts as a use tax.
If the same goods are purchased in a US state that does collect sales tax for such goods at time of purchase, whatever taxes were paid by the purchaser to that state can be deducted ( as a कर क्रेडिट ) इससे the 6.25 % owed लिये subsequent उपयोग, भंडार or consumption in Massachusetts.
With few exceptions, no state 's vendors will charge the native state 's बिक्री कर on goods shipped आउट of राज्य, अर्थ सब goods ordered इससे out-of-state हैं essentially फ़्री of sales tax.
The क्रेता is इसलिए जरूरी to घोषित और pay the use tax to his home state on these ordered goods.
The assessing jurisdiction may make the use कर देय annually, लकिन कुछ राज्य आवश्यकता a monthly payment.
For example, where a Vermont resident has not paid at least 6 % sales tax on property brought in for use in the state, Vermont law requires filing a tax return ( Form SU-452 and भुगतान ) by the 20th दिन of the माह following non-exempt purchases to avoid a $ 50 लेट शुल्क, a 5 % दंड प्रति माह, to a maximum of 25 %, plus statutory interest on the unpaid tax and penalties.
Typical exemptions include purchases by charitable non-profit संगठन or सरकारी एजेंसियों, purchases लिये पुनर्विक्रय in कॉमर्स, और purchases via `` casual sales '' by individuals not in the ordinary course of business.
भी नोट कि वहीँ हैं हज़ारों of कर jurisdictions in the U.S. and many have ever-changing lists of specific types of goods and services that are not taxable.
As an illustration of the complexities : a 2006 Massachusetts law requires payment of tax on `` pre-written '' ( नहीं कस्टम ) तन्त्र खरीदा और डाउनलोड over the अंतरजाल लिये संस्थापना और उपयोग in Massachusetts, regardless of where it originates.
However, the actual उपयोग of the वही तन्त्र डाउनलोड by a मैसाचुसेट्स निवासी to a सर्वर in another राज्य remains a non-taxed `` service ''.
In contrast, अरकंसास generally करता नहीं कर anything वितरित over the अंतरजाल ( ऐसे as डाउनलोड तन्त्र or music ), except VoIP which is specifically defined as taxable `` telecommunications services ''.
Software ( pre-written or custom ) `` delivered thru a tangible medium '' ( i.e., on disk ) in Arkansas is taxable even if ordered ऑनलाइन, मगर `` कस्टम तन्त्र लिये a particular ग्राहक '' जिससे is non-taxable `` प्रोग्रामिंग सेवाएं '' even if delivered on a disk.
In most cases, this complexity is part of the underlying sales tax laws ; but while a brick-and-mortar स्टोर रै to सौदे साथ तभी the बिक्री कर कानून of इसके अपना स्थान, रिमोट विक्रेता have to सौदे साथ the उपयोग कर कानून of अनेक jurisdictions—up to प्रत्येक us राज्य और मोहल्ले that assesses them, if the company has a presence or `` nexus '' in every state ( as large `` brick-and-mortar '' sellers like Wal-Mart and Best Buy do ).
In medicine, pulmonary hypertension ( PH ) is an बढ़ाएँ of रक्त दबाव in the pulmonary धमनी, pulmonary रग, or pulmonary capillaries, साथ known as the lung vasculature, leading to shortness of breath, dizziness, fainting, and other symptoms, all of which are exacerbated by exertion.
pulmonary hypertension can be a कठोर बीमारी साथ a markedly decreased exercise tolerance and heart failure.
It was first पहचाना by dr. अर्नस्ट von Romberg in 1891.
According to the most recent वर्गीकरण, it can be एक of पाँच अलग प्रकार : arterial, venous, hypoxic, thromboembolic or miscellaneous.

Sanuk, a division of Deckers बाहरी निगम, is a जूते ब्रांड आधारित in Southern California.
Sanuk, the Thai word for fun, was founded by Southern California native Jeff Kelley जब he प्रारंभ बनाना चप्पल आउट of indoor-outdoor carpet.
The first product created was green carpeted and हकदार the `` फर रियल '' बाद एक दूकान मालिक asked if the novelty sandal was `` For Real. ''
The Fur Real पहला became a runaway hit through बुटीक stores and not the intended surf shops.
The novelty act was followed up by a चन्दन लपेटा in तार जाल, a तेंदुआ छपाई संस्करण, और शैलियाँ बना out of a poncho material in a variety of colors.
Sanuk has grown to शामिल स्टाइल विकल्प लिये मेन, महिलाओं और युवावस्था और is वितरित आरपार the संयुक्त States and in over 50 countries throughout Europe, Asia, South America and Australia.
Sanuk centers itself around a positive जीवनशैली वकालत the स्लोगन, `` मुस्कान, pass it on ! ``.
In computer विज्ञान, सरणी प्रोग्रामिंग भाषाएं ( भी ज्ञात as वेक्टर or multidimensional भाषाएं ) generalize परिचालन on scalars to apply transparently to vectors, matrices, and higher dimensional arrays.
Array programming primitives concisely एक्स्प्रेस व्यापक विचार about data manipulation.
The level of conciseness can be dramatic in certain मामले : it is नहीं uncommon to ढूँढें सरणी प्रोग्रामिंग भाषा one-liners that require more than a couple of pages of Java code.
APL, designed by Ken Iverson, was the first प्रोग्रामिंग भाषा to provide सरणी प्रोग्रामिंग capabilities.
The mnemonic APL refers to the title of his seminal किताब `` a प्रोग्रामिंग भाषा '' और नहीं to arrays प्रति se. Iverson 's contribution to rigor and clarity was probably more important than the simple extension of dimensions to functions.
In the United राज्य an annuity अनुबंध is निर्मित जब an insured पार्टी, प्रायः an व्यक्तिगत, pays a जीवन बीमे company a single premium that will later be distributed back to the insured party over time.
Annuity contracts traditionally provide a guaranteed distribution of आय over समय, ऐसे as via फिक्स्ड भुगतान, जबतक the मौत of the व्यक्ति or व्यक्तियों नामित in the अनुबंध or जबतक a final date, whichever comes first.
However, the majority of आधुनिक annuity ग्राहक उपयोग annuities तभी to accumulate निधि फ़्री of income and capital gains taxes and to later take lump-sum withdrawals without using the guaranteed-income-for-life feature.
अध्यक्ष बराक Obama.
Barack Obama साथ उसके पहला परम् अदालत nominee, Sonia Sotomayor.
Following is a list of सब संयुक्त राज्य संघीय न्यायाधीशों नियुक्त by अध्यक्ष Barack Obama during his presidency.
As of April 30, 2013, 187 Obama nominees to आलेख iii judgeships have महरूम पुष्टि by the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट, namely दो justices to the Supreme Court of the United States, 35 judges to the United States courts of appeals and 150 judges to the United States district courts.
25 further nominations हैं फिलहाल प्रतीक्षारत Senate action.
There are currently 16 vacancies on the United States Courts of Appeals, 67 vacancies on the United States district courts and 22 additional federal judiciary vacancies that हैं anticipated to occur पहले the समाप्त of ओबामा 's second term.
Obama has not made कोई recess नियुक्ति to the federal courts.
ओबामा रै बना दो nominations to the संयुक्त राज्य Court of International Trade, an Article III tribunal.
Obama also designated sitting judge Emily C. Hewitt of the United States अदालत of संघीय दावा, an आलेख i अदालत, to be मुख्य न्यायधीश of that court.

मैक्सिको रै परिचय 1,834 एयरपोर्ट, रैंकिंग 2nd in क्रमांक of airports in North America, and 3rd in the world.
Only major National और अंतरराष्ट्रीय एयरपोर्ट are shown.
Agency debt also known as an Agency bond is a security, प्रायः a बंध, जारी by a u.S. government-sponsored agency.
The offerings of these agencies are backed but not guaranteed by the US सरकारी चूंकि the एजेंसियों हैं निजी entities.
Some prominent issuers of these securities are Student Loan Marketing Association ( Sallie Mae ), Federal National Mortgage Association ( fannie mae ) और संघीय घर ऋण बंधक निगम ( फ्रेडी Mac ).
Agency securities are usually exempt इससे राज्य और लोकल कर, लकिन नहीं संघीय कर.
Agency debt is भी पुकारा an एजेंसी सुरक्षा.
the susquehanna भाप इलेक्ट्रिक Station, a boiling water reactor.
The reactors are located inside the rectangular containment इमारतें towards the सामने of the cooling towers.
तीन nuclear-powered अमरीकी warships, ( शीर्ष to नीचे ) नाभिकीय cruisers uss bainbridge और uss Long Beach with USS Enterprise the first nuclear-powered aircraft carrier in 1964.
Crew members are spelling out Einstein 's mass-energy equivalence सूत्र E = mc2 on the flight deck.
The Russian nuclear-powered हिमभंजक ns yamal on a 1994 संयुक्त expedition with the NSF.
Nuclear power is the उपयोग of sustained नाभिकीय परिवर्द्धन to generate heat and electricity.
Nuclear power plants provided about 5.7 % of the world 's energy और 13 % of the संसार 's विद्युत, in 2012.
In 2013, the IAEA report that there are 437 operational नाभिकीय शक्ति रिएक्टरों ( हालांकि नहीं सब हैं producing electricity ), in 31 countries.
In जोड, वहीँ हैं लगभग 140 नवल vessels using nuclear propulsion in operation, powered by some 180 reactors.
There is an ongoing बहस परिचय the उपयोग of नाभिकीय energy.
Proponents, such as the World Nuclear Association, the IAEA and पर्यावरणविद लिये नाभिकीय उर्जा contend कि नाभिकीय शक्ति is a चिरस्थायी उर्जा सोर्स that reduces carbon emissions.
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों, ऐसे as ग्रीनपीस अंतरराष्ट्रीय और nirs, मानना कि नाभिकीय power poses many threats to people and the environment.
Nuclear power plant accidents include the Chernobyl disaster ( 1986 ), फुकुशिमा daiichi नाभिकीय विपत्ति ( 2011 ), और the Three Mile Island accident ( 1979 ).
There have also been some nuclear-powered पनडुब्बी mishaps.
Research into सुरक्षा सुधार is continuing और नाभिकीय संलयन, believed to be safer, may be used in the future.
As of 2012, according to the IAEA, विश्वव्यापी वहीँ यहूद 68 सिविल नाभिकीय शक्ति reactors under construction in 15 countries.
In the us the पंक्तियां of लगभग हाफ इसके रिएक्टरों have been extended to 60 years, and plans to build another dozen are under serious consideration.
However, Japan 's 2011 Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster prompted a rethink of nuclear उर्जा नीति in अनेक देशों.
Germany decided to close सब इसके रिएक्टरों by 2022, और Italy has banned nuclear power.
Following Fukushima, the International Energy Agency halved इसके अनुमान of अतिरिक्त नाभिकीय generating क्षमता to be built by 2035.
Photograph of the बर्लिन वॉल लिया इससे the West side.
The Wall was built in 1961 to prevent ईस्ट germans इससे fleeing from Communism.
It was an iconic symbol of the Cold युद्ध और इसके पतन in 1989 चिह्नित the समाप्त of the War.
The Cold War, often दिनाँक इससे 1947 to 1991, थी a sustained राज्य of राजनैतिक और सैन्य टेंशन between powers in the Western Bloc, dominated by the United States with NATO among its allies, and powers in the Eastern Bloc, dominated by the Soviet Union along with the Warsaw Pact.
This began after the success of their temporary wartime alliance against Nazi जर्मनी, leaving the ussr और the us as दो superpowers साथ profound आर्थिक और राजनैतिक मतभेद.
A neutral faction arose with the Non-Aligned Movement founded by Egypt, India, and यूगोस्लाविया ; इस गुट अस्वीकृत संघ साथ either the us-led वेस्ट or the soviet-led East.
The Cold War was so named because the दो प्रमुख powers—each possessing नाभिकीय हथियार और thereby threatened साथ परस्पर assured destruction —never met in direct military combat.
Instead, in their संघर्ष लिये वैश्विक influence वे सगाई in जारी मनोवैज्ञानिक warfare and in regular indirect confrontations through proxy wars.
Cycles of relative calm would be followed by high टेंशन, जिससे could have led to world war.
The tensest times were during the Berlin Blockade ( 1948–1949 ), the Korean War ( 1950–1953 ), the Suez Crisis ( 1956 ), the बर्लिन संकट of 1961, the क्यूबन मिसाइल संकट ( 1962 ), the वियतनाम युद्ध ( 1959–1975 ), the योम kippur युद्ध ( 1973 ), the सोवियत युद्ध in अफगानिस्तान ( 1979–1989 ), the सोवियत downing of Korean Air Lines Flight 007 ( 1983 ), and the `` Able Archer '' NATO military exercises ( 1983 ).
The conflict was expressed through military coalitions, strategic conventional force deployments, extensive aid to client states, espionage, massive propaganda campaigns, conventional and nuclear arms races, appeals to न्यूट्रल राष्ट्र, फंसने at खेल कार्यक्रम ( in particular the ओलंपिक ), और technological प्रतियोगिताओं such as the Space Race.
The US and USSR became involved in political and military विरोध in the तीसरा संसार देशों of लैटिन अमेरिका, अफ़्रीकी, the मध्य ईस्ट, and Southeast Asia.
To alleviate the risk of a potential nuclear युद्ध, दोनो पहलू sought राहत of राजनैतिक तनाव through détente in the 1970s.
In the 1980s, the United States increased diplomatic, military, and economic pressures on the सोवियत संघ, at a समय जब the कम्युनिस्ट राज्य was already suffering from economic stagnation.
In the mid-1980s, the new Soviet President Mikhail Gorbachev introduced the liberalizing reforms of perestroika ( `` reorganization '', 1987 ) और ग्लास्नोस्त ( `` openness '', ca. 1985 ).
Pressures for national independence grew stronger in पूर्वी यूरोपीय, विशेषकर Poland.
They पहुँचे a तोड़कर पाइंट जब गोर्बाचेव refused to उपयोग Soviet troops to support the faltering government of East Germany in late 1989.
Within weeks all the satellite states broke free from Moscow in a शांतिपूर्ण वेव of revolutions ( वहीँ थी कुछ violence in Romania ).
The pressures escalated inside the Soviet Union, where Communism गिरी और the ussr थी formally dissolved in लेट 1991.
The United States remained as the संसार 's तभी महाशक्ति.
The Cold War and its events have left a significant legacy, and it is often referred to in लोकप्रिय संस्कृति, विशेषकर in मीडिया featuring विषयवस्तु of espionage and the threat of nuclear warfare.
Pikes Peak State पार्क is a राज्य पार्क of आयोवा, यूएसए, featuring a bluff निहार the Upper Mississippi River opposite the confluence of the Wisconsin River.
The park is संचालित by the आयोवा विभाग of Natural Resources.
It is nearly a हजार एकड़ ( 4 km2 ) in extent.
the निकटतम नगर is McGregor, Iowa.
Iowa Highway 76 लगभग defines इसके उत्तरी boundary.
It gets इसके नाम इससे the आयोवा अवतार of pikes शिखर, a विशेषकर ऊँची पाइंट निहार the gorge of the Upper Mississippi, and like Pikes Peak in Colorado, is named for Zebulon Pike.
वहीँ हैं चढ़ाई trails, campgrounds and RV facilities.
Mountain bikes are permitted in निश्चित portions of the park.
Aside from recreational development, the land in the पार्क थी never साफ और to a विशाल extent remains as it was before the advent of white settlement.
It is part of a larger complex of parks, reserves and refuges which include Effigy Mounds National स्मारक, the विभिन्न components of the पीला नदी राज्य वन, the विशाल अपर मिसिसिपी नदी नेशनल वन्यजीव और मछली शरण और much छोटी, much less well known Driftless Area National Wildlife Refuge.
The Northeast Iowa Legacy Trail System is undergoing development, और होगा कनेक्ट तत्व of ये साइट.
Zac Brown Band is an American country/folk band आधारित in अटलांटा, जॉर्जिया.
The lineup consists of Zac Brown ( lead vocals, guitar ), Jimmy De Martini ( fiddle, vocals ), John Driskell Hopkins ( bass गिटार, vocals ), coy bowles ( गिटार, keyboards ), क्रिस fryar ( ड्रम ), मिट्टी कुक ( गिटार, keyboards, mandolin, steel guitar, vocals ), and Daniel de los Reyes ( percussion ).
the बैंड रै toured throughout the संयुक्त राज्य, सहित a slot on the 2009 and 2010 Bonnaroo Music Festival.
They have also recorded five studio albums, and charted nine Number One singles on the Billboard country charts : `` मुर्गा fried ``, `` toes ``, `` राजमार्ग 20 सवारी ``, `` फ़्री ``, `` as वो 's चलना दूर ``, `` colder मौसम ``, `` घुटना गहन ``, `` रखना me in दिमाग ``, और `` अलविदा in उसके आँखें `` in जोड to the singles `` Whatever It Is `` and `` No Hurry ``, which peaked at number 2 on the same chart.
Talk radio is a radio format containing चर्चा परिचय topical issues.
Most shows are regularly hosted by a single व्यक्तिगत, और प्रायः विशेषता साक्षात्कार साथ a क्रमांक of different guests.
बात रेडियो typically शामिल an तत्व of श्रोता भागीदारी, प्रायः by प्रसारण सजीव बातचीत between the host and listeners who `` call in '' ( usually via telephone ) to the show.
Listener contributions हैं प्रायः screened by a दिखाएँ 's निर्माता ( s ) in अनुक्रम to अधिकतम audience interest and, in the case of commercial talk radio, attract advertisers.
Generally, the shows are व्यवस्थित into खण्ड, प्रत्येक अलग by a ठहराना लिये विज्ञापन ; however, in पब्लिक or non-commercial radio, music is sometimes played in place of commercials to separate the program segments.
Variations of talk रेडियो शामिल रूढ़िवादी talk, hot talk, liberal talk and sports talk.
While talk radio has historically been associated with AM/FM, starting around 2005 the प्रौद्योगिकी लिये internet-based talk-radio shows became लागत प्रभावी in the form of podcasts.
Now, it is possible लिये an व्यक्तिगत to उपयोग a किस्में of सेवाएं to मेजबान an internet-based talk-radio दिखाएँ बगैर carriage by a traditional radio station.
In addition TV programming from talk and news outlets such as बीबीसी, सीएनएन, ब्लूमबर्ग और फॉक्स हैं अभी प्रायः उपलब्धियाँ expanding the world of talk radio further.
Talk radio listening is now enjoyed not only on radios, but a wide variety of other devices and services including pcs using itunes, स्टेशन निर्देशिका ऐसे as tunein, दिखाएँ निर्देशिका स्मार्टफ़ोन साथ ऐप्स ऐसे as stitcher.
Hippa is a genus of decapod crustaceans in the परिवार hippidae, containing the following species:
hippa adactyla Fabricius, 1787
hippa admirabilis ( Thallwitz, 1892 )
Hippa alcimede ( de man, 1902 )
Hippa australis hale, 1927
Hippa carcineutes holthuis & मैनिंग, 1970
Hippa celaeno ( de man, 1896 )
Hippa granulatus ( borradaile, 1904 )
Hippa hirtipes ( दाना, 1852 )
hippa इंडिका haig, मुरुगन & Balakrishnan Nair, 1986
hippa marmorata ( Hombron & Jacquinot, 1846 )
hippa ovalis ( A. milne-edwards, 1862 )
Hippa picta ( heller, 1861 )
Hippa strigillata ( stimpson, 1860 )
Hippa testudinaria ( herbst, 1791 )
Hippa truncatifrons ( Miers, 1878 )
It is closely related to the genus Emerita, और प्रजाति have प्रायः महरूम transferred between the दो genera.
Jakarta ( ), officially known as the Special Capital प्रदेश of जकार्ता ( ), is the पूंजी and largest city of Indonesia.
Located on the northwest coast of Java, Jakarta is the country 's economic, cultural and राजनैतिक केन्द्र, और साथ a जनसांख्यिकी of 10,187,595 as of नवम्बर 2011, it is the सबसे populous नगर in Indonesia and in Southeast Asia, and is the thirteenth most populated city in the world.
The official metropolitan area, known as Jabodetabek ( a name formed by combining the initial syllables of जकार्ता, bogor, depok, tangerang और bekasi ), is the दूसरी largest in the संसार, yet the metropolis 's suburbs still continue beyond it.
Jakarta is listed as a global city in the 2008 वैश्वीकरण और संसार शहरों पढ़ाई समूह और संजाल ( gawc ) research.
and रै an क्षेत्रफल of.
This area has population of खूब over 28 लाख, बनाना it एक of the संसार 's largest conurbations in terms of number of inhabitants.
In 2011, Jakarta ranked 17th among the संसार 's 200 largest शहरों, a जम्प इससे इसके 2007 ranking of 171.
जकार्ता रै grown अधिक rapidly than Kuala Lumpur, Beijing and Bangkok.
Established in the चौथी सदी, the नगर became an महत्वपूर्ण trading port for the Kingdom of Sunda.
It was the de facto capital of the Dutch East Indies ( when it was known as Batavia ) and has continued as the capital of Indonesia since the देश 's स्वतंत्रता थी घोषित in 1945.
the नगर is the सीट of the ASEAN Secretariat.
Jakarta is served by the Soekarno–Hatta International Airport, Halim Perdanakusuma International Airport, और tanjung priok harbour ; it is कनेक्ट by अनेक intercity और commuter railways, and served by several bus lines running on reserved busways.

Air conditioning is the process of altering the गुण of एयर ( primarily तापमान और आर्द्रता ) to अधिक favourable conditions.
More generally, air conditioning can refer to any form of technological कूलिंग, हीटिंग, वेंटिलेशन, or कीटाणुशोधन कि modifies the condition of air.
An air conditioner ( often referred to as air con, AC or A/C, and not to be confused with the abbreviation for प्रत्यावर्ती वर्तमान ) is a प्रमुख or घर appliance, प्रणाली, or यांत्रिकी designed to बदलें the एयर तापमान और आर्द्रता भीतर an क्षेत्रफल ( प्रयुक्त लिये cooling and sometimes heating depending on the air properties at a given time ).
The cooling is typically done using a सरल प्रशीतन साईकिल, लकिन sometimes वाष्पीकरण is प्रयुक्त, commonly लिये सुकून cooling in buildings and motor vehicles.
In construction, a complete प्रणाली of हीटिंग, वेंटिलेशन और एयर कंडीशनिंग is referred to as `` HVAC ``.

DC Talk ( styled as dc बात ), is a ग्रैमी -winning Christian rap trio.
The group थी formed in lynchburg, वर्जिनिया in 1987 by टोबी McKeehan, Michael Tait, and Kevin Max Smith.
They have released five major studio albums साथ : dc बात ( 1989 ), nu थांग ( 1990 ), फ़्री at पिछला ( 1992 ), यीशु freak ( 1995 ), और Supernatural ( 1998 ).
In 2002, the Encyclopedia of Contemporary Christian Music called dc बात `` the सबसे लोकप्रिय overtly ईसाई अधिनियम of सब समय. ''
In 2000, the group released an EP titled Solo which contained दो सोलो गीतों इससे प्रत्येक member.
Since कि समय, dc बात रै महरूम on an indefinite hiatus, and the three band members have each led solo careers.
They have performed और अंकित व्यक्तिगत गीतों साथ several times during the 2000s, although the group never officially reunited or disbanded.
The group 's musical style evolved significantly throughout उनके career.
Their first two रिलीज, dc बात और nu थांग, were of the hip hop genre.
DC Talk 's third album, Free at पिछला, भी मुख्यतः took influence इससे the हिप हॉप स्टाइल, हालांकि उनके म्यूज़िक began taking on a rock sound.
The trio 's last two एल्बम, यीशु freak और अलौकिक, were predominantly pop rock.
The Bible is a compilation of many shorter books लिखा at अलग टाइम्स और बाद समवेत into the biblical canon.
All but the shortest of these books have been विभाजित into अध्याय, generally a पेज or so in लंबाई, since the early 13th century.
Since the mid-16th सदी, प्रत्येक अध्याय रै महरूम further विभाजित into `` verses '' of a few short lines or sentences.
Sometimes a sentence spans more than one verse, as in the मामला of, और sometimes वहीँ is अधिक than एक वाक्य in a single verse, as in the case of.
As the chapter and verse divisions were not part of the असली ग्रन्थ, वे रूप भाग of the paratext of the बाइबल.
The Jewish divisions of the Hebrew text differ at विभिन्न अंक इससे those प्रयुक्त by Christians.
For instance, in Jewish tradition, the ascriptions to many Psalms are regarded as स्वतंत्र आयतें, बनाना 116 अधिक आयतें, whereas the स्थापित ईसाई अभ्यास is to गिनती और क्रमांक प्रत्येक psalm ascription together with the first verse following it.
Some chapter divisions also occur in different places, e.g. in यहूदी bibles is गिने as in ईसाई translations.
An index ( plural : indexes ) is a list of words or वाक्यांश ( 'headings ' ) और संबद्ध संकेतक ( 'लोकेटरs ' ) to where useful material relating to that heading can be found in a document.
In a परंपरागत back-of-the-book अनुक्रमणिका the headings होगा शामिल names of people, places and events, and concepts selected by a person as being relevant and of interest to a possible reader of the book.
The संकेतक हैं typically page numbers, paragraph numbers or section numbers.
In a library catalog the words are authors, titles, विषय headings, etc., और the pointers are call numbers.
Internet search engines, such as Google, and full text searching help provide access to information but are not as चयनात्मक as an अनुक्रमणिका, as वे provide non-relevant कड़ी, और may मिस प्रासंगिक सूचना if it is नहीं phrased in exactly the way they expect.
In United States financial regulation, a suspicious activity report ( or SAR ) is a report made by a financial institution to the Financial Crimes Enforcement Network ( FinCEN ), an एजेंसी of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of the राजकोष, regarding संदिग्ध or potentially संदिग्ध कार्यकलाप.
फेसबुक on the ad-tech 2010
Facebook is an online social networking service, whose name stems from the colloquial name for the book given to students at the start of the अकादमिक साल by कुछ विश्वविद्यालयों administrations in the संयुक्त राज्य to सहायता विद्यार्थी मिलेंगी to जान प्रत्येक other.
It was founded in February 2004 by Mark Zuckerberg with his college roommates और fellow हार्वर्ड विश्वविद्यालयों विद्यार्थी एडुआर्डो saverin, एंड्रयू mccollum, Dustin Moskovitz and Chris Hughes.
The website 's membership was initially limited by the founders to Harvard students, लकिन थी विस्तारित to अन्य कॉलेजों in the बोस्टन क्षेत्रफल, the आइवी लीग, और स्टैनफोर्ड विश्वविद्यालयों.
It धीरे added support लिये विद्यार्थी at विभिन्न अन्य विश्वविद्यालयों पहले खोलने to high school students, and eventually to anyone aged 13 and over.
फेसबुक अभी allows कोई उपयोक्ता जो घोषित themselves to be at least 13 years old to become registered users of the site.
Users must register before using the site, after which they may create a personal प्रोफ़ाइल, add अन्य उपयोक्ता as मित्रों, and exchange messages, including automatic notifications when they update their profile.
Additionally, users may जुड़ें common-interest उपयोक्ता समूह, व्यवस्थित by कार्यस्थल, स्कूल or कॉलेज, or अन्य characteristics, and categorize their friends into lists such as `` People From Work '' or `` Close Friends ''.
As of सितंबर 2012, फेसबुक has over one billion active users.
According to a May 2011 Consumer Reports survey, वहीँ हैं 7.5 लाख children अंतर्गत 13 साथ खाते और 5 लाख अंतर्गत 10, violating the site 's terms of service.
In May 2005, Accel partners invested $ 12.7 लाख in फेसबुक, और जिम breyer added $ 1 million of his own money to the pot.
A January 2009 Compete.com study क्रमित फेसबुक as the सबसे प्रयुक्त सोशल networking service by worldwide monthly active users.
Entertainment Weekly included the site on its end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' सूची, saying, `` कैसा on धरती किया we stalk हमारी exes, remember our co-workers ' birthdays, bug our friends, and play a rousing game of Scrabulous before Facebook ? ''
Critics, such as Facebook detox, राज्य कि फेसबुक रै turned into a नेशनल obsession in the संयुक्त राज्य, resulting in vast amounts of time lost and encouraging narcissism.
quantcast estimates फेसबुक रै 138.9 million monthly unique U.S. visitors in May 2011.
According to Social Media आज, in अप्रैल 2010 an अनुमानित 41.6 % ( 129.5 लाख ) of the u.S. population had a Facebook account.
Nevertheless, Facebook 's मार्केट विकास प्रारंभ to स्टाल in कुछ regions, साथ the साईट खोने 7 million active users in the United States and Canada in May 2011.
Facebook आखिरकार दायर लिये an आरंभिक पब्लिक offering on February 1, 2012, and was headquartered in Menlo Park, California.
Facebook Inc. began selling stock to the पब्लिक और व्यापार on the नैस्डैक on May 18, 2012.
सल्फोनेमाइड कार्यात्मक group
hydrochlorothiazide is a sulfonamide and a thiazide.
furosemide is a सल्फोनेमाइड, but not a thiazide.
Sulfonamide or sulphonamide is the basis of अनेक समूह of drugs.
The असली जीवाणुरोधी sulfonamides ( sometimes पुकारा sulfa दवाएँ or sulpha drugs ) are synthetic antimicrobial agents that contain the sulfonamide group.
Some sulfonamides are also devoid of जीवाणुरोधी कार्यकलाप, e.g., the anticonvulsant sultiame.
The sulfonylureas और thiazide diuretics हैं नए ड्रग समूह आधारित on the antibacterial sulfonamides.
Sulfa allergies are common, hence medications containing sulfonamides हैं विहित carefully.
It is important to make a distinction between sulfa drugs and other sulfur-containing drugs and additives, such as sulfates और sulfites, जिससे हैं chemically unrelated to the सल्फोनेमाइड समूह, और do नहीं कारण the वही hypersensitivity प्रतिक्रियाएँ देखी in the sulfonamides.
इस is a सूची of वर्ण इससे George Lopez.
Domestic geese ( Anser आंसर domesticus or आंसर cygnoides ) हैं domesticated धूसर geese ( either ग्रेलैग geese or swan geese ) रखा as मुर्गीपालन लिये their meat, eggs, and down feathers since ancient times.
30 Seconds to Mars is an अमरीकी चट्टान band from Los Angeles, formed in 1998.
Since 2007, the band has consisted of actor Jared Leto ( lead vocals, rhythm guitar, songwriter ), शैनन leto ( ड्रम, percussion ) और tomo miličević ( lead guitar, keyboards ).
Following the departure of Matt Wachter ( now of Angels & Airwaves ) in 2007, Tim Kelleher became the bassist लिये the समूह, performing सजीव तभी साथ दोनो jared और miličević रिकॉर्डिंग बास लिये स्टुडियो रिकार्डिंग, while Braxton Olita ( keyboards ) was added to the touring lineup in 2009.
Previously, the समूह भी प्रदर्शित guitarists solon bixler ( अभी of ग्रेट Northern ) and Kevin Drake ( now of Polaroid Kiss ).
To date, 30 Seconds to Mars have released three studio albums – 30 Seconds to Mars ( 2002 ), A Beautiful Lie ( 2005 ), This Is War ( 2009 ) and three extended plays – एओएल सत्र अंडरकवर ( 2007 ), to the किनारे of the धरती ( 2008 ), and MTV Unplugged : 30 Seconds to Mars ( 2011 ).
30 Seconds to Mars ' music has been associated mostly with neo-prog, progressive metal and post-grunge, but वे have भी शामिल भावनाएं, screamo, स्पेस चट्टान और synthrock into their music.
They have been compared to गुलाबी floyd ( जो यहूद an influence on उनके कार्य ) और औजार क्युकी of उनके उपयोग of philosophical and spiritual lyrics, concept albums and their use of experimental music.
A Christmas Story is a 1983 American Christmas comedy film based on the छोटी कहानियां और semi-fictional उपाख्यानों of लेखक और raconteur जां गड़रिये, आधारित on उसके किताब in परमेश्वर we Trust, All Others Pay Cash, with some elements derived from Wanda Hickey 's Night of Golden Memories.
It was directed by bob क्लार्क.
The film has since become a holiday classic और is दिखाया numerous टाइम्स on टेलीविज़न दौरान the Christmas season on the network TBS, often in a 24-hour marathon.
In 2012, the film was selected for preservation in the National फिल्मी रजिस्ट्री by the पुस्तकालयों of कॉंग्रेस लिये होने `` culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant ''.

The building थी initially a rowing क्लबों और was later converted into the restaurant.
Joe 's Crab Shack is an अमरीकी कड़ी of beach-themed seafood कैज़ुअल डाइनिंग रेस्तरां owned by Ignite Restaurant Group.
Founded in Houston, Texas, the restaurant अभी operates स्थितियाँ सब आरपार the United States of America.

The New York Passenger Ship Terminal ( also known as the लक्ज़री लाइनर पंक्ति or मैनहटन क्रूज टर्मिनल or नई यॉर्क क्रूज Terminal ) is a terminal for ocean-going passenger ships on Manhattan 's west side.
The terminal consists of उत्तर नदी पियर 88, 90, 92 और 94 on the हडसन नदी between West 46th and West 54th Street.
( As a general नियम, बांध संख्याएँ in मैनहटन can be संकल्पित by adding 40 to the corresponding cross-street. )
जहाजों अभी डॉक at पियर 88, 90 and 92.
Pier 94 on the उत्तर पक्ष is now used for exhibition space.
Pier 86, once used by United States Lines, is अभी घर to the uss intrepid.
In 2003, the terminal संभाला 900,000 यात्री.
The city is forecasting कि 1.5 लाख होगा उपयोग the टर्मिनल by 2017.
The पियर हैं long and apart.
They were first completed in 1935 to replace the चेल्सी पियर as the नगर 's लक्ज़री लाइनर टर्मिनल.
The new terminal was built to handle बडे जहाजों कि था outgrown the Chelsea Piers.
The piers were renovated in 1970 और हैं फिलहाल undergoing another $ 150 million renovation.
The renovated plans call for it to हैंडल तीन विशाल ships at a time.
In doing renovations, the नगर is also considering decommissioning Pier 92.
Logo of the नई यॉर्क क्रूज Terminal.For
decades the terminal was the तभी ocean-going यात्री टर्मिनल in New York harbor.
With an upsurge in cruise जलयान ट्रैफ़िक और the टर्मिनल 's क्षमता to हैंडल comfortably तभी तीन विशाल जहाजों at a समय, दो नई terminals have खोली in the हार्बर — the केप स्वतंत्रता क्रूज बंदरगाहों खोली in 2004 in Bayonne, New Jersey ( used by Royal Caribbean Cruise Line, Celebrity Cruises and Azamara Cruises ), and the Brooklyn Cruise Terminal ( used by the Queen Mary 2 and other ships of the Carnival Corporation cruise brands ) opened in 2006 in Brooklyn, New York.
The West Side Highway takes a small jog east from the piers to below West 42nd Street because when the terminal was निर्मित जमीन था to be लिया दूर इससे मैनहटन to allow for longer piers.
The US Army Corps of Engineers, who control the waterfront dimension, होता नहीं extend the pierhead लकीर दूर into the नदी, so the नगर विस्तारित the बांध by cutting away at the land.
The city earlier did this for the Chelsea Piers ; however in चेल्सी तभी लैंडफिल थी लिया away.
At the यात्री टर्मिनल वास्तविक Manhattan schist was taken away.

Many major passenger ships have docked there, सहित the rms महारानी मरियम 2 और स्वतंत्रता of the Seas, before the Brooklyn and Bayonne terminals opened.

The city will spend $ 4 million to renovate and upgrade the cruise टर्मिनल to accommodate the ship.

Christian right is a term used in the United States to describe right-wing ईसाई राजनैतिक समूह कि हैं characterized by उनके दमदार support of socially conservative policies.
Christian conservatives principally seek to apply their understanding of the teachings of christianity to राजनीती और पब्लिक नीति by proclaiming the मान of those teachings and/or by seeking to use those teachings to influence law and public policy.
In the U.S., the ईसाई सही is an अनौपचारिक गठबन्धन formed around a कोर of धर्मान्तरण protestants कि draws `` support इससे politically conservative Catholics, Jews, Mormons, and occasionally secularists '' who share their goals.
The movement has its roots in अमरीकी राजनीती going वापस as दूर the 1940s and has been especially influential since the 1970s.
Their influence draws, in part, from grassroots सक्रियता as खूब as उनके फ़ोकस on social issues and ability to motivate the electorate around those issues.
The Christian right is notable today for advancing socially conservative positions on issues including school दुआ, स्टेम कोशिका शोध, समलैंगिकता, निरोधक, गर्भपात, and pornography.
Although the Christian right is usually associated with the U.S., the गति रै महरूम a कुंजी फ़ैक्टर in the राजनीती of कनाडा, the नीदरलैंड्स, उत्तरी आयरलैंड और ऑस्ट्रेलिया, among others.
Far East Movement ( stylized as Far★East Movement or abbreviated fm ) is an अमरीकी hip hop band quartet based in Los Angeles.
The group formed in 2003 and consists of kev nish ( केविन nishimura ), prohgress ( जेम्स roh ), j-splif ( Jae Choung ), and DJ Virman ( Virman Coquia ).
दूर ईस्ट गति 's पहला अर्जी to कीर्ति थी उनके सोंग `` गोलाकार गोलाकार '' प्रदर्शित in the हॉलीवुड फिल्म, the तेज़ and the Furious : Tokyo Drift, and its subsequent soundtrack, video game and DVD.
Since `` Round Round '', the group has been featured on various network shows including,, Entourage, गपशप लड़की, और finishing the खेल ( a प्रदर्शित film at Sundance 2007 ).
Their single `` Like a g6 `` hit क्रमांक एक on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 Chart and on iTunes as well in late October 2010.
Far East Movement also has the distinction of being the पहला asian-american समूह to earn a # 1 hit on the बिलबोर्ड Hot 100 in the United States.
LR44 is the IEC designation for an alkaline 1.5 volt button cell, commonly used in small LED flashlights, डिजिटल thermometers, calculators, calipers, घड़ियाँ, clocks, toys and laser pointers.
lr44 क्षारीय cell
The battery nomenclature is defined by the International Electrotechnical आयोग ( आईईसी ) in इसके 60086-3 मानक ( प्राथमिक बैटरी, भाग 3 देखें बैटरी ).
The letter L indicates the electrochemical प्रणाली प्रयुक्त ; a जस्ता ऋणात्मक एलेक्ट्रोड, मैंगनीज dioxide depolarizer and positive electrode, and an alkaline electrolyte.
R44 indicates a round cell 11.4±0.2 mm diameter and 5.2±0.2 mm height as defined by the IEC standard 60086.
Manufacturers have their own part numbers for आईईसी प्रकार lr44 बैटरी including:
LR44, LR44G, lr44gd, lr44h
lr1154, l1154, l1154c, l1154f, L1154G, L1154H
6135-99-792-8475 ( NSN )
1166a
AG13, A613, ag14, ag-14, g13a, g13-a
157, 303, 357
A76, GDA76, gp76a, gpa7, gpa75, gpa76, GPS76A,
1128MP, 208-904, A-76, CA18, CA19, CR44, D76A, KA, ka76, ms76h, px76a, px675a, rpx675, rw82, sb-f9, V13GA
4.5-volt, D, C, AA, AAA, AAAA, a23, 9-volt, cr2032 और LR44 batteries
Other प्रकार of बैटरी हैं or were made in the R44 size.
formerly, पारा बैटरी यहूद बना as बटन cells ( types MR44 and NR44 ).
Zinc-air batteries प्रकार pr44 आवश्यकता एयर to work.
Silver-oxide बैटरी प्रकार sr44 may provide अतिरिक्त क्षमता compared to lr44 प्रकार लकिन have slightly different voltage characteristics.
Performance of a यंत्र meant to उपयोग a silver-oxide बैटरी may be degraded with substitution of LR44 types.
Manufacturer 's संख्याएँ लिये चांदी ऑक्साइड r44 आकार कोशिकाएं include:
sr44/sr44w/sr44sw
