Hurricane Katrina was the deadliest और सबसे destructive अटलांटिक hurricane of the 2005 अटलांटिक hurricane season.
It was the costliest natural विपत्ति, as खूब as एक of the पाँच deadliest hurricanes, in the इतिहास of the United States.
Among recorded अटलांटिक hurricanes, it थी the छठे strongest overall.
At least 1,833 people died in the hurricane and subsequent floods, बनाना it the deadliest u.S. hurricane चूंकि the 1928 okeechobee hurricane ; कुल प्रॉपर्टी क्षति थी estimated at $ 81 billion ( 2005 USD ), nearly triple the damage brought by Hurricane Andrew in 1992.
Hurricane Katrina formed over the Bahamas on August 23, 2005 और crossed दक्षिणी फ्लोरिडा as a मॉडरेट श्रेणी 1 hurricane, causing कुछ मौतों और बाढ़ वहीँ पहले strengthening rapidly in the Gulf of Mexico.
The hurricane strengthened to a श्रेणी 5 hurricane over the गरम गल्फ जल, लकिन weakened पहले बनाना इसके दूसरी landfall as a श्रेणी 3 hurricane on the morning of Monday, August 29 in southeast Louisiana.
It caused कठोर विनाश साथ the गल्फ coast इससे सेंट्रल फ्लोरिडा to Texas, much of it due to the storm surge.
The most significant number of deaths occurred in New Orleans, louisiana, जिससे flooded as the तटबन्ध प्रणाली catastrophically failed, in many cases hours after the storm had moved inland.
आखिरकार 80 % of the नगर और विशाल tracts of neighboring parishes became flooded, and the floodwaters lingered for weeks.
However, the worst property damage occurred in coastal areas, ऐसे as सब मिसिसिपी beachfront कस्बों, जिससे यहूद flooded over 90 % in घंटों, as नौकाएँ और कसीनो barges rammed इमारतें, pushing cars and houses inland, with waters reaching 6–12 miles ( 10–19 km ) from the beach.
The hurricane surge protection failures in New ऑरलियन्स हैं माना the worst सिविल अभियान्त्रिकी विपत्ति in u.S. इतिहास और prompted a lawsuit against the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers ( USACE ), the designers and builders of the levee system as mandated by the Flood Control Act of 1965.
Responsibility for the failures and flooding was laid squarely on the फौज corps in जनवरी 2008 by न्यायधीश stanwood डुवल, u.S. ज़िला अदालत, लकिन the संघीय एजेंसी could नहीं be held financially liable due to sovereign immunity in the Flood Control Act of 1928.
There was also an investigation of the responses from federal, राज्य और लोकल सरकारें, resulting in the इस्तीफा of संघीय आपात प्रबन्धन एजेंसी ( fema ) निदेशक Michael D. Brown, and of New Orleans Police Department ( NOPD ) Superintendent Eddie Compass.
Several agencies including the United States Coast Guard ( USCG ), नेशनल hurricane बीच ( nhc ), और नेशनल मौसम सेवा ( NWS ) were commended for their actions.
They provided accurate hurricane weather ट्रैकिंग forecasts साथ sufficient सीसे time.
Even the सबसे insistent appeals इससे नेशनल, राज्य और लोकल पब्लिक officials to residents to evacuate before the storm did not warn that the levees could breach and fail.
U.S. कर्ज़ इससे 1940 to 2011.
Red lines indicate the `` debt held by the public '' और ब्लैक लाइनों indicate the कुल नेशनल कर्ज़ or सकल पब्लिक debt.
the अंतर is the `` intragovernmental कर्ज़, '' which includes obligations to government programs such as Social Security.
stated as a सूत्र, नेशनल कर्ज़ = Debt held by the Public + Intragovernmental Debt.
the दूसरी फलक shows the दो कर्ज़ आंकड़े as a प्रतिशत of U.S. GDP ( dollar value of U.S. economic production for that year ).
The top panel is deflated so प्रत्येक साल is in 2010 dollars.
The United States public कर्ज़ is the धन उधार by the संघीय सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य through the issuing of securities by the Treasury and other federal government agencies.
US public debt consists of दो घटकs:
Debt held by the public includes Treasury securities held by investors बाहर the संघीय सरकारी, सहित कि आयोजित by individuals, corporations, the संघीय आरक्षित System and foreign, state and local governments.
Debt held by government accounts or intragovernmental कर्ज़ शामिल non-marketable राजकोष प्रतिभूति आयोजित in खाते administered by the संघीय government that are owed to program beneficiaries, such as the Social Security Trust Fund.
Debt held by सरकारी खाते represents the संचयी surpluses, including interest earnings, of these accounts that have been invested in Treasury securities.
Public debt increases or decreases as a परिणाम of the सालाना एकीकृत बजट deficit or surplus.
The federal government budget deficit or surplus is the अंतर between सरकारी रसीदें और बिता, ignoring intra-governmental transfers.
However, some spending that is excluded from the deficit ( supplemental appropriations ) also adds to the debt.
Historically, the us पब्लिक कर्ज़ as a share of जीडीपी increased दौरान युद्धों and recessions, and subsequently declined.
For example, debt held by the public as a share of जीडीपी peaked बस बाद संसार युद्ध ii ( 113 % of जीडीपी in 1945 ), लकिन तब गिरी over the following 30 years.
In recent decades, however, large budget deficits and the resulting increases in कर्ज़ have led to चिंता परिचय the long-term स्थिरता of the संघीय government 's fiscal policies.
on 2 अप्रैल 2013, कर्ज़ आयोजित by the पब्लिक थी लगभग $ 11.959 trillion or about 75 % of GDP.
intragovernmental holdings stood at $ 4.846 खरब, giving a संयुक्त total public debt of $ 16.805 trillion.
As of January 2013, $ 5.6 trillion or approximately 47 % of the debt held by the public was owned by foreign investors, the largest of जिससे यहूद the लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन और जापानी at बस over $ 1.1 trillion each.
in बास्केट, an assist is attributed to a खिलाड़ी जो गुजरता the बॉल to a teammate in a रास्ता that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was `` assisting '' in the basket.
वहीँ is कुछ निर्णय शामिल in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.
An assist can be scored for the passer even if the player who receives the pass makes a बास्केट बाद dribbling the ball.
However, the असली परिभाषा of an assist किया नहीं शामिल ऐसे परिस्थितियों, so the तुलना of assist statistics across eras is a complex matter.
Only the pass directly before the score may be counted as an assist, so no अधिक than एक assist can be अंकित प्रति field goal ( unlike in other sports, such as ice hockey ).
A pass that leads to a shooting foul and scoring by free throws does not count as an assist in the NBA, but does in FIBA play ( तभी एक assist is awarded प्रति नियत of फ़्री throws in जिससे at तनिक एक free throw is made ).
Point guards tend to मिलेंगी the सबसे assists प्रति खेल ( apg ), as their role is primarily that of a passer and ballhandler.
Centers tend to get fewer assists, but centers साथ शुभ मंजिल उपस्थिति और अदालत vision can dominate a team by assisting.
Being inside the कुंजी, the बीच प्रायः रै the बेहतरीन कोण और the बेहतरीन स्थिति लिये `` बर्तन '' और अन्य छोटी passes in the scoring area.
Center Wilt चेम्बरलेन led the एनबीए in assists in 1968.
A strong center with inside-scoring prowess, ऐसे as पूर्व एनबीए बीच hakeem olajuwon, can भी be an प्रभावी assistor क्युकी the defense 's double-teaming tends to open up offense in the form of shooters.
The NBA single-game assist रिकार्ड is 30, आयोजित by स्कॉट skiles of the ऑरलैंडो जादू विरूद्ध the Denver Nuggets, on December 30, 1990.
The NBA record for most career assists is आयोजित by जॉन स्टॉकटन साथ 15,806.
The मिल or mille ( ) ( sometimes mil in the uk, जब discussing प्रॉपर्टी taxes in the United States, or previously in Cyprus and Malta ) is a now-abstract unit of currency used sometimes in accounting.
In the United States, it is a notional ईकाई समतुल्य to of a संयुक्त राज्य dollar ( a tenth of a cent ).
In the United Kingdom it थी प्रस्तावित दौरान the दशकों of चर्चा on the decimalization of the pound as a division of the pound sterling.
Several other मुद्राएँ प्रयुक्त the मिल, such as the Maltese lira.
The पद आता इससे the लैटिन `` millesimum '', meaning `` thousandth part ''.
The Greco-Persian Wars ( also often called the Persian Wars ) were a series of विरोध between the हख़ामनी साम्राज्य of फारस और city-states of the हैलेनिक संसार कि प्रारंभ in 499 BC and lasted until 449 BC.
The collision between the fractious political world of the Greeks and the enormous empire of the फारसियों began जब सायरस the ग्रेट conquered ionia in 547 BC.
struggling to नियम the independent-minded शहरों of Ionia, the Persians appointed tyrants to rule each of them.
This होता prove to be the सोर्स of much ट्रबल for the Greeks and Persians alike.
In 499 BC, the then tyrant of Miletus, Aristagoras, embarked on an expedition to जीतें the द्वीप of naxos, साथ पारसी support ; however, the expedition थी a क़हर और, pre-empting उसके dismissal, Aristagoras incited all of Hellenic Asia Minor into rebellion against the Persians.
This was the beginning of the आयोनियन विद्रोह, जिससे होता पिछला जबतक 493 bc, progressively drawing more regions of Asia Minor into the conflict.
Aristagoras secured military support from Athens and Eretria, and in 498 BC ये शक्तियां helped to कैप्चर और बर्न the पारसी क्षेत्रीय capital of Sardis.
The Persian king दारा the ग्रेट vowed to have बदला on एथेंस और Eretria for this act.
the विद्रोह जारी, साथ the दो sides effectively stalemated throughout 497–495 BC.
In 494 BC, the फारसियों regrouped, और attacked the epicentre of the revolt in Miletus.
At the Battle of Lade, the Ionians suffered a निर्णायक शिकस्त, और the विद्रोह collapsed, साथ the final members being stamped out the following year.
Seeking to secure his empire from further revolts and from the interference of the mainland Greeks, Darius embarked on a योजना to जीतें यूनानियों और to सजा एथेंस और eretria for burning Sardis.
The first Persian invasion of Greece began in 492 bc, साथ the पारसी सामान्य mardonius conquering thrace और macedon पहले अनेक mishaps forced an early end to the campaign.
In 490 BC a second फ़ोर्स थी भेजा to यूनानियों, इस समय आरपार the ईजियन समुद्र, अंतर्गत the कमांड of Datis and Artaphernes.
This expedition subjugated the cyclades, पहले besieging, capturing and razing Eretria.
However, while en route to attack Athens, the Persian force थी decisively पराजित by the athenians at the Battle of Marathon, ending Persian efforts for the time being.
Darius then began to plan to complete the conquest of यूनानियों, लकिन died in 486 bc और जिम्मेदारी लिये the conquest passed to his son Xerxes I.
In 480 BC, Xerxes personally led the second पारसी आक्रमण of यूनानियों साथ एक of the largest ancient armies ever assembled.
Victory over the 'allied ' यूनानी राज्य ( led by Sparta and Athens ) at the Battle of Thermopylae allowed the Persians to torch Athens and overrun most of Greece.
However, while seeking to destroy the संयुक्त यूनानी बेड़े, the फारसियों suffered a severe defeat at the Battle of Salamis.
The following साल, the confederated यूनानियों गई on the offensive, defeating the Persian army at the Battle of Plataea, and ending the invasion of Greece.
The allied Greeks followed up उनके कामयाबी by destroying the बाकी of the पारसी बेड़े at the Battle of Mycale, before expelling Persian garrisons from Sestos ( 479 BC ) and Byzantium ( 478 BC ).
The actions of the सामान्य pausanias at the घेरा of byzantium alienated अनेक of the यूनानी राज्य इससे the spartans, and the anti-Persian alliance was therefore reconstituted around Athenian leadership, as the so-called Delian League.
The Delian League continued to campaign against फारस लिये the अगला तीन दशकों, शुरूआत साथ the expulsion of the remaining Persian garrisons from Europe.
At the Battle of the eurymedon in 466 bc, the लीग जीती a double victory that finally secured freedom for the cities of Ionia.
However, the League 's भागीदारी in an मिश्र विद्रोह ( इससे 460–454 BC ) resulted in a disastrous defeat, and further campaigning was suspended.
A fleet was sent to Cyprus in 451 bc, लकिन हासिल छोटी, और जब it withdrew the Greco-Persian Wars drew to a quiet end.
Some historical स्त्रोत सुझाएँ the समाप्त of hostilities थी चिह्नित by a peace treaty between Athens and Persia, the so-called Peace of Callias.
Hooverville निकट पोर्टलैंड, Oregon
A `` Hooverville '' is the popular name for shanty कस्बों निर्मित by बेघर लोगों दौरान the ग्रेट अवसाद.
They were named after Herbert Hoover, who was President of the संयुक्त राज्य दौरान the onset of the अवसाद और widely blamed for it.
The term was coined by Charles Michelson, publicity मुख्य of the लोकतांत्रिक National Committee.
Matthew Michael Hasselbeck ( born September 25, 1975 ) is an American football क्वार्टरबैक लिये the इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ).
He was drafted in the छठे गोलाकार of the 1998 एनएफएल ड्राफ्ट by the Green Bay Packers.
After a season on the practice squad and दो सीज़न बैकिंग up ब्रेट favre, he थी traded to the Seattle Seahawks in 2001.
Hasselbeck gained the starting role in 2003, and led सिएटल to छह playoff दिखावे और a सुपर कटोरी रूप ; he थी चयनित to three Pro Bowls and an All-Pro selection.
Following टेन सीज़न साथ the सीहॉक्स, hasselbeck joined the Tennessee Titans in 2011.
Hasselbeck then signed a contract with the इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस in 2013 कम than 24 घंटों बाद being released by the Tennessee Titans.
ICT is inevitably related to the कंप्यूटर संजाल.
Information and Communications Technology or ( ICT ), is often used as an extended synonym for information technology ( it ), लकिन is a अधिक विशिष्ट पद कि तनावों the भूमिका of एकीकृत संचार और the संयोजन of दूरसंचार ( टेलीफोन लाइनों और बेतार सिग्नल ), कंप्यूटर as खूब as necessary enterprise software, middleware, storage, and audio-visual systems, which enable users to access, store, transmit, and manipulate information.
The phrase ICT had been used by academic researchers since the 1980s, but it became popular after it was used in a रपट to the uk सरकारी by डेनिस stevenson in 1997 और in the संशोधित नेशनल curriculum लिये इंग्लैण्ड, Wales and Northern Ireland in 2000.
The term ICT is अभी भी प्रयुक्त to refer to the अभिसरण of audio-visual और टेलीफोन संजाल साथ कंप्यूटर संजाल through a सिंगल cabling or link system.
There are large economic incentives ( huge cost savings due to elimination of the telephone network ) to merge the audio-visual, building प्रबन्धन और टेलीफोन संजाल साथ the कंप्यूटर संजाल प्रणाली using a सिंगल एकीकृत प्रणाली of cabling, सिग्नल वितरण and management.
The term infocommunications is प्रयुक्त in कुछ मामले as a shorter रूप of information and communication ( s ) technology.
In fact infocommunications is the विस्तार of दूरसंचार साथ सूचना processing and content handling functions on a common digital technology base.
For a comparison of ये और अन्य शर्तें, देखिए.
For ICT विकास अनुक्रमणिका around the world, see.
This is a सूची of वर्ण इससे George Lopez.
A schematic प्रस्तुतीकरण of the प्लम खीर मॉडल of the अणु ; in thomson 's गणितीय model the `` corpuscles '' ( or modern electrons ) were arranged non-randomly, in rotating rings
The current model of the sub-atomic ढांचा involves a dense nucleus surrounded by a probabilistic `` cloud '' of electrons
The plum pudding model of the atom by J. J. Thomson, who discovered the electron in 1897, थी प्रस्तावित in 1904 पहले the डिस्कवरी of the परमाणु केंद्रक in order to add the electron to the atomic model.
In this model, the अणु is रचित of electrons ( जिससे thomson स्टिल पुकारा `` corpuscles '', हालांकि G. J. stoney था प्रस्तावित कि अणु of विद्युत be पुकारा electrons in 1894 ) surrounded by a soup of positive charge to balance the electrons ' negative charges, like negatively charged `` plums `` surrounded by positively charged `` pudding ``.
The electrons ( as we know them today ) were thought to be positioned throughout the atom, but with many structures possible for positioning अनेक electrons, विशेषकर घूर्णन बजती of electrons ( see below ).
Instead of a soup, the atom was also sometimes said to have था a `` बादल '' of धनात्मक चार्ज.
With this model, Thomson abandoned उसके पहले `` nebular अणु '' परिकल्पना in जिससे the अणु थी रचित of immaterial vortices.
Now, at least part of the atom was to be रचित of thomson 's particulate ऋणात्मक corpuscles, हालांकि the rest of the positively charged part of the atom remained somewhat nebulous and ill-defined.
The 1904 Thomson model was disproved by the 1909 gold foil experiment of hans geiger और अर्नेस्ट मार्सडेन.
This was interpreted by अर्नेस्ट रदरफोर्ड in 1911
to imply a very small nucleus of the atom containing a very ऊँची धनात्मक चार्ज ( in the मामला of सुनहरा, पर्याप्त to संतुलन परिचय 100 electrons ), thus leading to the Rutherford model of the atom.
Although gold has an atomic number of 79, immediately after Rutherford 's paper appeared in 1911 Antonius वैन डेन broek बना the सहज सुझाव कि परमाणु क्रमांक is nuclear charge.
The matter जरूरी प्रयोग to decide.
Henry Moseley 's work showed experimentally in 1913 ( see Moseley 's law ) that the effective nuclear charge was बहुत बंद to the परमाणु क्रमांक ( moseley मिला तभी एक ईकाई अंतर ), और moseley संदर्भित तभी the papers of वैन den Broek and Rutherford.
This work culminated in the solar-system-like ( but quantum-limited ) Bohr model of the atom in the same year, in जिससे a केंद्रक containing an परमाणु क्रमांक of धनात्मक चार्ज is घिरी by an बराबर क्रमांक of electrons in कक्षीय shells.
Bohr had also प्रेरित moseley 's कार्य.
Thomson 's model was compared ( though not by Thomson ) to a British मिठाई पुकारा प्लम खीर, hence the नाम.
Thomson 's paper was प्रकाशित in the कूच 1904 संस्करण of the Philosophical Magazine, the leading British science journal of the day.
In thomson 's दृश्य :... the अणु of the तत्व consist of a क्रमांक of negatively electrified corpuscles enclosed in a sphere of uniform positive electrification,...
in इस मॉडल, the electrons यहूद फ़्री to घूर्णन within the blob or cloud of positive substance.
These orbits were stabilized in the model by the fact that when an electron moved farther from the बीच of the धनात्मक बादल, it लगा a larger जाल धनात्मक inward फ़ोर्स, क्युकी वहीँ was more material of opposite charge, inside its orbit ( see Gauss 's law ).
In Thomson 's model, electrons were free to घूर्णन in बजती जिससे यहूद further stabilized by interactions between the electrons, और spectra यहूद to be accounted for by energy differences of different ring orbits.
Thomson attempted to make his model account for कुछ of the प्रमुख spectral लाइनों ज्ञात लिये कुछ तत्व, but was not notably successful at this.
Still, Thomson 's model ( along with a similar Saturnian ring model for atomic electrons, also put forward in 1904 by nagaoka बाद जेम्स क्लर्क मैक्सवेल 's मॉडल of शनि 's बजती ), यहूद पहले harbingers of the later and more successful solar-system-like Bohr model of the atom.
Typical स्ट्रिप of बेकन.
Bacon is a cured मांस prepared इससे a pig.
It is first cured using large quantities of salt, either in a brine or in a शुष्क पैकिंग ; the परिणाम is भैस बेकन ( भी ज्ञात as ग्रीन बेकन ).
Fresh bacon may then be further सूखी लिये सप्ताह or महीने in ठंडा एयर, or it may be boiled or smoked.
Fresh and dried bacon is typically पकाया पहले eating.
Boiled bacon is ready to eat, as is कुछ स्मोक्ड बेकन, लकिन may be पकाया further पहले खाने.
Bacon is prepared इससे अनेक अलग कटौती of meat.
It is usually made from side and back cuts of pork, except in the United States, where it is almost always prepared इससे पोर्क पेट ( typically referred to as `` streaky '', `` वसीय '', or `` अमरीकी स्टाइल '' बाहर of the US and Canada ).
The side काटें रै अधिक मांस और कम मोटे than the belly.
Bacon may be prepared from either of two पृथक वापस कटौती : fatback, जिससे is almost pure fat, and pork loin, which is very lean.
bacon-cured पोर्क loin is known as back bacon.
Uncooked पोर्क पेट बेकन स्ट्रिप्स.
Bacon may be eaten smoked, boiled, fried, baked, or ग्रील्ड, or प्रयुक्त as a नाबालिग संघटक to flavor dishes.
Bacon is also used for barding और larding roasts, विशेषकर खेल, e.g. venison, pheasant.
The word is derived from the Old High जर्मनी bacho, अर्थ `` buttock '', `` हैम '' or `` पक्ष of बेकन '', and cognate with the Old French bacon.
In continental Europe, this part of the pig is usually not smoked like bacon is in the संयुक्त राज्य ; it is प्रयुक्त primarily in घन ( lardons ) as a कुकिंग संघटक, valued both as a source of fat and for its flavor.
In Italy, this is called pancetta and is प्रायः पकाया in छोटी घन or परोसा uncooked और thinly sliced as भाग of an antipasto.
Meat from other animals, such as beef, lamb, chicken, goat, or turkey, may भी be काटें, cured, or वरना prepared to resemble bacon, and may even be referred to as `` bacon ''.
Such use is आम in क्षेत्रों साथ significant Jewish and Muslim populations.
The USDA defines bacon as `` the cured belly of a swine carcass '' ; अन्य कटौती और विशेषताएँ जरूर be separately योग्य ( e.g., `` smoked pork loin bacon '' ).
लिये सुरक्षा, बेकन जरूर be treated to prevent trichinosis, caused by Trichinella, a parasitic roundworm which can be destroyed by heating, freezing, drying, or smoking.
Bacon is विशिष्ट इससे नमक पोर्क और हैम by मतभेद in the brine ( or dry packing ).
Bacon brine has added curing ingredients, most notably sodium nitrite, and occasionally sodium nitrate or potassium नाइट्रेट ( साल्टपीटर ) ; सोडियम ascorbate or erythorbate हैं added to accelerate curing और stabilize color.
Flavorings such as brown sugar or maple are प्रयुक्त लिये कुछ उत्पाद.
If used, sodium polyphosphates हैं added to improve sliceability और reduce spattering जब the bacon is pan fried.
आज, a brine लिये हैम, लकिन not bacon, includes a large amount of sugar.
historically, `` हैम '' और `` बेकन '' referred to अलग कटौती of मांस कि were brined or packed identically, often together in the same barrel.
The Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 ( ERISA ) (, संहिताबद्ध in भाग at ) is a संघीय विधि जिससे establishes न्यूनतम मानकों लिये पेंशन plans in private industry and provides for extensive rules on the federal income tax effects of transactions associated with employee benefit plans.
erisa थी enacted to protect the रूचि of कर्मचारी लाभ plan participants and their beneficiaries by:
Requiring the disclosure of financial and अन्य सूचना concerning the योजना to beneficiaries ;
Establishing standards of conduct लिये योजना fiduciaries ;
Providing for उचित remedies और अभिगम to the federal courts.
ERISA is sometimes used to refer to the full body of laws regulating कर्मचारी लाभ योजनाएँ, जिससे हैं मिला mainly in the Internal Revenue Code and ERISA itself.
Responsibility लिये the निर्वचन और प्रवर्तन of erisa is विभाजित among the विभाग of मजदूर, the विभाग of the राजकोष ( विशेषकर the Internal Revenue Service ), and the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation.
Illegal immigration to the United States is the act of foreign nationals प्रवेश the संयुक्त राज्य, बगैर सरकारी अनुमति और in उल्लंघन of संयुक्त राज्य राष्ट्रीयता विधि, or रहकर परे the termination date of a visa, also in violation of the law.
A warning sign at the international boundary between the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा in पाइंट Roberts, Washington.
A much अलग दृष्टिकोण at the u.s.-mexico किनारा निकट El Paso, Texas
The undocumented immigrant population of the United States in 2008 was estimated by the बीच लिये आव्रजन अध्ययन to be परिचय 11 लाख लोगों, bas इससे 12.5 लाख people in 2007.
Other estimates range इससे 7 to 20 लाख.
According to a 2005 Pew Hispanic Center report, 56 % of undocumented आप्रवासियों यहूद इससे मैक्सिको ; 22 % यहूद इससे अन्य लैटिन अमरीकी देशों ; 13 % यहूद इससे एशिया ; 6 % यहूद इससे यूरोपीय and Canada ; and 3 % were from Africa and the rest of the world.
Alvin Independent School District is a स्कूल ज़िला आधारित in एल्विन, Texas ( USA ).
Alvin ISD is a large suburban स्कूल ज़िला दक्षिण of ह्यूस्टन in the समुदायों of एल्विन, manvel, pearland, hillcrest, Rosharon, Iowa Colony, Liverpool, and Amsterdam.
AISD serves Pearland नगर 's rapidly growing पश्चिमी portion of the नगर सहित the new large master-planned communities of Shadow Creek Ranch, South Fork, and Southern Trails.
Alvin ISD कवर of land.
In human anatomy, the ulnar nerve is a nerve जिससे रनों निकट the ulna bone.
The ulnar collateral ligament of elbow संयुक्त is in संबंध साथ the ulnar तंत्रिका.
The nerve is the largest unprotected nerve in the human देह ( अर्थ unprotected by मांसपेशी or bone ), so injury is common.
This nerve is directly connected to the छोटी उंगली, और the सटा हाफ of the रिंग उंगली, supplying the palmar पक्ष of ये उंगलियाँ, सहित दोनो सामने और वापस of the tips, perhaps as far back as the fingernail beds.
One method of injuring the nerve is to स्ट्राइक the medial epicondyle of the humerus इससे posteriorly, or inferiorly with the elbow flexed.
The ulnar nerve is trapped between the अस्थि और the overlying स्किन at this point.
This is commonly referred to as bumping one 's `` funny bone ''.
This name is thought to be a pun, आधारित on the ध्वनि प्रतिरूप between the नाम of the bone of the upper arm, the `` humerus `` and the word `` humorous ``.
alternatively, according to the ऑक्सफोर्ड अंग्रेज़ी शब्दकोष it may refer to `` the peculiar sensation experienced when it is struck ''.
Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, shortened Hogwarts, is a fictional अंग्रेजों स्कूल of जादू लिये विद्यार्थी aged ग्यारह to अठारह, और is the प्राथमिक सेटिंग लिये the पहला छह किताबे in j.K. Rowling 's Harry Potter series.
Rowling has suggested that she may have inadvertently taken the name from the hogwort plant ( Croton capitatus ), जिससे वो था देखी at kew gardens कुछ समय पहले लिखने the श्रेणी, हालांकि the names `` the हॉग्वार्ट्स '' और `` hoggwart '' appear in the 1954 Nigel Molesworth book How To Be Topp by Geoffrey Willans.
Hogwarts school was voted as the 36th बेहतरीन स्कॉटिश शैक्षणिक स्थापना in a 2008 ऑनलाइन ranking, outranking Edinburgh 's Loretto School.
According to a director of the Independent Schools Network rankings, it थी added to the स्कूलों लिस्टिंग `` for fun '' and was then voted on.
The U.S. subprime mortgage crisis थी a नियत of कार्यक्रम और शर्तें कि led to a वित्तीय crisis and subsequent recession that began in 2008.
It was characterized by a वृद्धि in subprime बंधक delinquencies और foreclosures, और the resulting decline of securities backed by said mortgages.
Several major financial institutions collapsed in सितंबर 2008, साथ significant disruption in the प्रवाह of क्रेडिट to व्यवसायों और consumers and the onset of a severe global recession.
There यहूद अनेक कल्याणकारी of the संकट, साथ टीकाकारों assigning अलग स्तर of दोष to वित्तीय institutions, regulators, credit agencies, government housing policies, and consumers, among others.
A proximate कारण थी the rise in subprime lending.
The percentage of lower-quality subprime mortgages originated during a given year rose from the ऐतिहासिक 8 % or निम्नतर दायरा to लगभग 20 % इससे 2004 to 2006, साथ much उच्चतर ratios in कुछ भाग of the U.S.
A high percentage of ये subprime mortgages, over 90 % in 2006 for example, were adjustable-rate mortgages.
These two changes were part of a broader trend of lowered lending मानकों और higher-risk mortgage products.
Further, U.S. households had become increasingly ऋणी, साथ the अनुपात of कर्ज़ to डिस्पोजेबल निजी आय rising from 77 % in 1990 to 127 % at the end of 2007, much of this increase mortgage-related.
When U.S. home prices declined steeply after peaking in mid-2006, borrowers ' क्षमता to पुनर्वित्त their loans became more difficult.
As adjustable-rate mortgages began to रीसेट at उच्चतर ब्याज rates ( causing higher monthly payments ), mortgage delinquencies soared.
Securities backed with mortgages, सहित subprime mortgages, widely आयोजित by वित्तीय firms globally, lost most of their value.
Global investors also drastically reduced purchases of mortgage-backed कर्ज़ और अन्य प्रतिभूति as भाग of a मनाही in the क्षमता और willingness of the private financial system to support lending.
Concerns about the soundness of U.S. credit और वित्तीय बाज़ार led to tightening क्रेडिट around the संसार और slowing economic growth in the U.S. and Europe.
The crisis had severe, long-lasting consequences लिये the U.S. and European economies.
The U.S. entered a deep recession, with nearly 9 million jobs lost during 2008 और 2009, roughly 6 % of the workforce.
u.S. आवास कीमतें गिरी nearly 30 % on औसत और the U.S. stock market fell approximately 50 % by early 2009.
As of early 2013, the U.S. stock market had recovered to its pre-crisis शिखर लकिन आवास कीमतें remained निकट उनके कम पाइंट और unemployment remained elevated.
Economic growth remained नीचे pre-crisis levels.
Europe also continued to struggle साथ इसके अपना आर्थिक crisis.
कार्ल जंग in 1910.
Myers and Briggs extrapolated उनके mbti सिद्धान्त इससे जंग 's writings in his book Psychological Types.
The Myers-Briggs Type Indicator ( MBTI ) assessment is a psychometric प्रश्नावली designed to माप मनोवैज्ञानिक वरीयताओं in कैसा लोगों perceive the world and make decisions.
These preferences were extrapolated इससे the typological theories प्रस्तावित by कार्ल गुस्ताव जंग और first published in his 1921 book Psychological Types ( English edition, 1923 ).
Jung theorized that there are four principal मनोवैज्ञानिक कृत्यों by जिससे we अनुभव the संसार : सनसनी, intuition, feeling, and thinking.
One of ये चार कृत्यों is प्रबल सबसे of the time.
The असली डेवलपर of the व्यक्तित्व inventory यहूद katharine कुक briggs और उसके बेटी, इसाबेल Briggs Myers ; these two, having studied extensively the work of Jung, turned their interest of human behavior into a devotion of turning the theory of psychological types to practical use.
They began बनाना the indicator दौरान संसार युद्ध ii, believing कि a ज्ञान of व्यक्तित्व preferences would help women who were entering the industrial workforce for the first time to identify the sort of war-time jobs that would be `` most comfortable and effective ''.
The initial प्रश्नावली grew into the myers-briggs प्रकार indicator, which was first published in 1962.
The MBTI focuses on normal populations and emphasizes the मान of naturally occurring मतभेद.
Robert Kaplan and Dennis Saccuzzo believe `` the underlying assumption of the mbti is कि we सब have विशिष्ट वरीयताओं in the रास्ता we construe हमारी अनुभवों, and these preferences underlie our interests, needs, values, and motivation '' ( p. 499 ).
`` Judas '' is a सोंग by अमरीकी रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार Lady Gaga, from her second studio album Born This Way ( 2011 ).
It was released by Interscope Records on अप्रैल 15, 2011, चार दिनों ahead of इसके अनुसूचित रिलीज.
Written and produced by Lady Gaga और redone, `` यहूदा '' is a नृत्य और इलेक्ट्रो हाउस सोंग परिचय a स्त्री in love with a man who betrayed her.
It embodies the incidents कि have haunted गागा in the पास्ट, और इसके core meaning refers to the negative parts of her life that she ca n't escape.
Gaga has further explained that the song थी भी परिचय honoring एक 's भीतरी अंधेरा in order to bring oneself into the light.
The artwork for the सिंगल थी designed by Gaga in Microsoft Word.
In spite of a polarizing impact on several religious groups, the song was generally well received by critics, जो likened the सोंग to `` ख़राब रोमांस `` साथ कुछ noting it चाहिए have महरूम the एल्बम 's lead single.
The song रै a समान ध्वनि to गागा 's पिछला redone-produced ट्रैक्स, सहित `` Poker Face ``, `` LoveGame ``, `` Bad Romance '', and `` Alejandro ``.
It contains तीन पृथक hooks और a house -influenced break down.
Gaga explained that the lines spoken during the breakdown talk about her as परे मोचन, regarding the परंपरागत दृश्य of कया a woman should be.
`` Judas '' initially had a दमदार बिक्री खोलने, लकिन थी कम कामयाब commercially in comparison to Gaga 's previous singles.
The song reached the top ten of the charts in सबसे प्रमुख म्यूज़िक बाज़ार, और भी पहुँचे the शीर्ष of the चार्ट in South Korea.
A म्यूज़िक वीडियो लिये the सोंग was filmed in April 2011, co-directed by Gaga and Laurieann Gibson and co-starring Norman Reedus.
It has a biblical कथानक जहाँ reedus निभाई Judas Iscariot and Gaga played Mary Magdalene.
The video portrays उन्हें as आधुनिक दिन प्रचारकों going to जेरूसलम.
It included the Biblical story of Judas betraying यीशु, और ended साथ गागा as magdalene getting stoned to death.
Before its release, the Catholic League condemned गागा लिये the कथित उपयोग of धार्मिक imagery और उसके भूमिका in the video.
However, आलोचकों generally praised the वीडियो, not finding any offensive content.
The video was मनोनीत लिये दो पुरस्कार at the 2011 एमटीवी Video Music Awards.
Gaga has performed `` Judas '' on a number of television shows, including the ग्राहम नॉर्टन दिखाएँ, शनिवार रात्रि सजीव, शुभ morning americas `` गर्मियाँ कॉन्सर्ट श्रेणी '', the French X Factor as well as on The Ellen DeGeneres Show.
Marvin Gaye ( April 2, 1939April 1, 1984 ), born Marvin pentz gay, jr., थी an अमरीकी singer-songwriter and musician.
Gaye helped to shape the ध्वनि of motown रिकॉर्ड in the 1960s साथ a स्ट्रिंग of हिट्स सहित `` How Sweet It Is ( To Be Loved By You ) `` and `` I Heard It Through the Grapevine `` and duet recordings with Mary Wells and Tammi Terrell, later earning the titles `` Prince of Motown '' and `` Prince of Soul ''.
During the 1970s, Gaye recorded the concept albums What 's Going On and Let 's Get It On and became among the पहला कलाकारों in motown to ब्रेक दूर इससे the बागडोर of इसके उत्पादन company.
Gaye 's later recordings बहकावे अनेक r & b subgenres ऐसे as quiet storm and neo-soul.
Following a period in Europe under a tax exile in the early 1980s, Gaye released the 1982 ग्रैमी award-winning hit `` यौन healing `` और the मध्यरात्रि Love album.
Since उसके मौत in 1984, gaye रै महरूम मरणोपरांत सम्मानित by अनेक संस्थानों, सहित the Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award and the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame.
The Academy Award for Best Picture is one of the Academy Awards of Merit presented annually by the अकादमी of गति चित्र कला और sciences ( ampas ) to निर्माता working in the गति चित्र उद्योग और is the तभी श्रेणी in जिससे प्रत्येक सदस्य is eligible to nominate for.
Best Picture is considered the most important of the Academy Awards, as it represents सब the directing, एक्टिंग, म्यूज़िक composing, लिखने, संपादन और अन्य प्रयत्न put forth into a film.
Consequently, Best Picture is the final award and the निष्कर्ष of the सालाना अकादमी पुरस्कार ceremony.
The Grand Staircase columns at the dolby थिएटर in लॉस एंजिल्स, जहाँ the अकादमी पुरस्कार ceremonies have महरूम आयोजित चूंकि 2002, showcase every film that has won the Best Picture title since the award 's inception 85 years ago.
Heavy Rain is an interactive drama action-adventure वीडियो खेल निर्मित by फ्रेंच डेवलपर quantic सपना exclusively लिये the PlayStation 3.
The game is written and निर्देशित by quantic सपना 's संस्थापक and CEO David Cage.
Heavy rains स्टोरी is a नाटकीय थ्रिलर modelled बाद फिल्मी noir, featuring चार protagonists शामिल साथ the रहस्य of the Origami Killer, a serial killer who uses extended periods of rainfall to drown his victims.
Ethan Mars is trying to save his son from being the अगला शिकार, जबकि investigative पत्रकार Madison Paige, FBI profiler Norman Jayden, and private detective Scott Shelby are each trying to track down clues to the Origami Killer 's identity.
The player interacts with the game by performing actions highlighted on screen related to motions on the controller, और in कुछ मामले, performing a श्रेणी of जल्दी समय कार्यक्रम दौरान fast-paced कार्रवाई sequences.
The player 's decisions और क्रियाएँ दौरान the खेल होगा affect the narrative.
The main characters can be मारे, और निश्चित क्रियाएँ may सीसे to अलग scenes and endings.
A playable डेमो थी released on 11 फ़रवरी 2010.
The demo was released prior to this date लिये लोगों जो took भाग in a चार दिन चुनौती on 5 फ़रवरी 2010.
A patch to allow use of the PlayStation मूव नियंत्रक to खेल the खेल was released in September 2010.
Heavy Rain was critically acclaimed और रै बेची over दो लाख नक़ल.
It won 2010 's Game of the Year from CNN and Gaming संघ, और बेहतरीन ps3 खेल of 2010 by GameSpy and IGN.
A modified version of the game was released titled Heavy Rain Edition modifiée exclusively in फ़्रांस, aimed towards a younger दर्शक.
In 2010, the खेल थी शामिल in the किताब 1001 वीडियो खेल You Must Play Before You Die.
Total superannuation industry liabilities : सदस्यों निधि और reserves ( a $ लाखो ) चूंकि 1988.
Annual total superannuation उद्योग एसेट growth 1996-2005.
Superannuation in Australia refers to the arrangements which लोगों मेक in ऑस्ट्रेलिया to have निधि उपलब्धियाँ लिये उन्हें in रिटायरमेंट.
In Australia, superannuation arrangements are government-supported और प्रोत्साहित, और न्यूनतम प्रावधानों हैं अनिवार्य for employees.
For example, नियोक्ता हैं जरूरी to अदा a proportion of an कर्मचारी 's salaries और मजदूरी ( फिलहाल 9 % ) into a superannuation fund, but people are encouraged to put aside additional funds into superannuation.
The न्यूनतम दायित्व जरूरी by नियोक्ता is नियत to बढ़ाएँ to 12 % धीरे stepping annually from 2013 to 2020.
An individual can withdraw funds out of a superannuation fund when the person meets one of the conditions of रिलीज contained in अनुसूची 1 of the superannuation उद्योग ( पर्यवेक्षण ) Regulations 1994.

चुनावी कॉलेज मैप प्रर्दशित the results of the 2012 U.S. presidential election.
President Barack Obama ( D - IL ) won the लोकप्रिय vote in 26 राज्य और the ज़िला of कोलंबिया ( denoted in blue ) to capture 332 electoral votes.
Former Governor Mitt Romney ( R - MA ) जीती the लोकप्रिय vote in 24 राज्य ( denoted in रेड ) to कैप्चर 206 चुनावी votes.
Cartogram representation of the Electoral College vote लिये the 2012 चुनाव, साथ प्रत्येक वर्गाकार representing एक electoral vote.
The United States Electoral College is the institution that officially elects the अध्यक्ष और वाइस अध्यक्ष of the United States every four years.
The President and Vice President are not निर्वाचित सीधे by the मतदाता.
Instead, they are elected by `` निर्वाचक '' जो हैं चुनी by लोकप्रिय vote on a state-by-state basis.
Electors are apportioned to each राज्य और the ज़िला of कोलंबिया, लकिन नहीं to territorial possessions of the United States, such as Puerto Rico and Guam.
The number of electors in each state is equal to the number of members of कॉंग्रेस to जिससे the राज्य is entitled.
The twenty-third amendment रै सदा resulted in the District of Columbia having three electors.
There are 538 electors, based on there being 435 प्रतिनिधि और 100 सीनेटरों, प्लस the तीन निर्वाचक इससे the District of Columbia.
Electors are pledged to particular अध्यक्षीय और वाइस अध्यक्षीय candidates, though unpledged electors are possible.
In all states, मगर maine और नेब्रास्का, निर्वाचक हैं निर्वाचित on a `` winner-take-all '' basis.
कि is, सब निर्वाचक pledged to the अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी जो विन्स the सबसे votes in a state become electors for that state.
Maine and Nebraska use the `` congressional district method '', selecting one elector भीतर प्रत्येक congressional ज़िला by लोकप्रिय vote और selecting the बाकी दो निर्वाचक by a राज्यव्यापी popular vote.
Although no elector is required by federal law to honor a pledge, वहीँ have तभी महरूम बहुत few अवसरों जब an elector voted contrary to a pledge.
The Twelfth Amendment specifies how a President and वाइस अध्यक्ष हैं निर्वाचित और requires प्रत्येक elector to डाल एक vote लिये अध्यक्ष और another vote for Vice President.
Critics argue that the Electoral College is inherently undemocratic and gives झूले राज्य अनुपातहीन influence in electing the अध्यक्ष और Vice President.
The Electoral College gives a numeric advantage in the election of the president to the छोटी राज्य, as the न्यूनतम क्रमांक of निर्वाचक लिये the छोटी राज्य is तीन compared to one for the election of representatives.
On the other हाथ, the winner-take-all method of voting favors the larger states.
a क्रमांक of संवैधानिक amendments have महरूम प्रस्तावित seeking to alter the Electoral College or replace it with a direct popular vote.
Barack Hussein Obama II ( ; born अगस्त 4, 1961 ) is the 44th और वर्तमान अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States, the first African American to hold the office.
Born in Honolulu, Hawaii, Obama is a graduate of Columbia विश्वविद्यालयों और हार्वर्ड विधि स्कूल, जहाँ he थी अध्यक्ष of the हार्वर्ड Law Review.
He was a जातियाँ आयोजक in शिकागो before earning his law degree.
He worked as a सिविल अधिकारों attorney in शिकागो और सिखाया संवैधानिक विधि at the University of Chicago Law School from 1992 to 2004.
He परोसा तीन शर्तें representing the 13th ज़िला in the इलिनोइस सीनेट इससे 1997 to 2004, running unsuccessfully for the United States House of Representatives in 2000.
In 2004, Obama received national attention during his campaign to represent Illinois in the United States Senate with his विजय in the कूच लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी प्राथमिक, उसके keynote पता at the लोकतांत्रिक नेशनल सम्मेलन in जुलाई, और उसके चुनाव to the सीनेट in November.
He began his presidential अभियान in 2007, और in 2008, बाद a बंद प्राथमिक अभियान विरूद्ध हिलेरी rodham Clinton, he won sufficient delegates in the Democratic Party primaries to receive the presidential nomination.
He then defeated Republican nominee John मैक्केन in the सामान्य चुनाव, और थी उदघाटन as अध्यक्ष on जनवरी 20, 2009.
Nine months बाद, ओबामा थी नामित the 2009 नोबेल Peace Prize laureate.
He was re-elected president in November 2012, defeating Republican nominee mitt romney, और थी sworn in लिये a दूसरी पद on जनवरी 20, 2013.
Early in his first term in office, Obama signed into law economic stimulus legislation in response to the Great Recession in the रूप of the अमरीकी रिकवरी और reinvestment अधिनियम of 2009 और the कर राहत, बेरोजगारी बीमे reauthorization, और जॉब सृष्टि Act of 2010.
Other major domestic initiatives in his presidency include the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, often referred to as `` obamacare '' ; the dodd–frank वॉल गली सुधार और उपभोक्ता सुरक्षा अधिनियम ; the do n't पूछो, do n't बताना repeal अधिनियम of 2010 ; the बजट कंट्रोल Act of 2011 ; and the American Taxpayer Relief Act of 2012.
In May 2012, he became the पहला बैठे u.S. अध्यक्ष to सरेआम support same-sex विवाह और in 2013 उसके प्रशासन दायर briefs जिससे urged the Supreme Court to rule in favor of same-sex couples in two high-profile cases.
In foreign policy, Obama ended U.S. military involvement in the Iraq War, increased troop levels in Afghanistan, signed the New प्रारंभ बाहें कंट्रोल सन्धि साथ रूस, ordered u.S. सैन्य भागीदारी in लीबिया, और ordered the सैन्य आपरेशन कि resulted in the death of Osama bin Laden.
The होंडा cbr1100xx सुपर blackbird थी a होंडा मोटरसाइकिल made from 1996 to 2007.
The bike was विकसित to चुनौती the कावासाकी निंजा zx-11 as the संसार 's तीव्रतम उत्पादन मोटरसाइकिल, and Honda succeeded with a top speed of.
Two years later the title passed to the suzuki hayabusa, जिससे पहुँचे.
the blackbird is नामित बाद the लॉकहीड sr-71, also a speed record holder.

Sample दृश्य of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक health record
An electronic health record ( EHR ) is an evolving अवधारणा पारिभाषित as a व्यवस्थित संग्रहण of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य सूचना about individual patients or populations.
It is a record in digital format that is theoretically सक्षम of होने साझा आरपार अलग स्वास्थ्य care settings.
In some cases this sharing can occur by way of network-connected enterprise-wide सूचना प्रणालियों और अन्य सूचना संजाल or exchanges.
ehrs may शामिल a दायरा of आंकड़ा, सहित जनसांख्यिकी, चिकित्सा history, medication and allergies, immunization status, laboratory test results, radiology images, vital signs, personal stats like age and weight, and billing information.
The मेरिनर up on the mast in a storm.
एक of the wood-engraved illustrations by Gustave Doré.
The Rime of the Ancient मेरिनर ( originally the rime of the ancyent marinere ) is the longest प्रमुख कविता by the अंग्रेज़ी poet Samuel Taylor Coleridge, written in 1797–98 and published in 1798 in the first edition of Lyrical Ballads.
Modern editions use a later संशोधित संस्करण मुद्रित in 1817 कि featured a gloss.
Along with other poems in गीतात्मक ballads, it थी a सिग्नल शिफ़्ट to आधुनिक काव्य and the beginning of British Romantic literature.
A proxy auto-config ( PAC ) file defines how web browsers और अन्य उपयोक्ता एजेंटों can automatically चुनें the appropriate proxy server ( access method ) for fetching a given URL.
A PAC file contains a जावास्क्रिप्ट फलन “findproxyforurl ( url, host ) ”.
This function returns a स्ट्रिंग साथ एक or अधिक अभिगम विधि विशेषताएँ.
These specifications कारण the उपयोक्ता एजेंट to उपयोग a particular proxy server or to connect directly.
Multiple specifications provide a fall-back जब a प्रॉक्सी fails to respond.
the ब्राउजर fetches इस pac संचिका पहले requesting other URLs.
The URL of the PAC file is either विन्यस्त हस्तचालित or संकल्पित automatically by the वेब प्रॉक्सी autodiscovery Protocol.
Zendaya Coleman ( born September 1, 1996 ), ज्ञात mononymously as zendaya, is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री, singer and dancer.
she stars on the डिज़्नी चैनल sitcom Shake It Up as Rocky Blue.
She रै स्ट्रक्चर in दो films और निभाई एक of the lead roles in the film Frenemies as Halley Brandon.
She voiced Fern in the pixie खोखला खेल.
She appeared in शुभ लक चार्ली as रॉकी ब्लू और in a Good Luck Charlie and Shake It Up crossover title Charlie Shake It Up.
She appeared on PrankStars as herself in the episode `` चलना the शरारत '' और on a.n.t. फार्म as sequoia जोन्स in the एपीसोड `` Creative ConsultANT. ''
Zendaya is भी a संगीतकार.
She signed a deal with Hollywood Records on August 8, 2012 and started recording songs for उसके डेब्यू एल्बम on अगस्त 12, 2012.
She released a single from an independent label called `` Swag It Out `` और another सिंगल साथ बेला thorne पुकारा `` देखें me, '' जिससे is प्रदर्शित on the ब्रेक It Down album.
On March 20, 2012, Zendaya and Bella Thorne released an album साथ पुकारा शेक it up : सजीव 2 नृत्य, प्रत्येक have उनके अपना सोंग on it, साथ साथ a mash-up of both songs together as one.
On August 21, 2012, Zendaya and Bella thorne released an ep पुकारा शेक it up : बना In Japan.
Zendaya has a Christmas song called `` Shake Santa Shake, '' which is on the डिज़्नी चैनल अवकाश प्लेलिस्ट cd, जिससे थी released on अक्तूबर 2, 2012.
On March 5, 2013 the third Shake It Up soundtrack was released, entitled I < 3 Dance ; on it, Zendaya has दो गीतों साथ बेला - `` संक्रामक प्रेम '' और `` इस is my नृत्य मंजिल '' - as well as one solo song, `` Beat of My Drum. ''
This is a list of airports in पेन्सिलवेनिया ( a u.S. राज्य ), grouped by type and sorted by location.
It contains all public-use और सैन्य एयरपोर्ट in the state.
Some private-use and former airports may be included where notable, such as airports that यहूद previously public-use, those साथ वाणिज्यिक enplanements अंकित by the faa or एयरपोर्ट आबंटित an iata विमानक्षेत्र code.
iOS ( previously iPhone OS ) is a mobile operating system developed and distributed by Apple Inc. Originally released in 2007 लिये the iphone और ipod टच प्लेटफ़ॉर्म, it रै महरूम विस्तारित to support अन्य ठहराना डिवाइस ऐसे as the iPad and Apple TV.
Unlike Microsoft 's Windows Phone and Google 's Android, Apple does not अनुज्ञा आईओएस लिये संस्थापना on non-apple हार्डवेयर.
, Apple 's App Store contained more than 700,000 iOS अनुप्रयोग, जिससे have collectively महरूम डाउनलोड अधिक than 30 billion times.
It had a 21 % share of the स्मार्टफोन मोबाईल operating system units shipped in the fourth quarter of 2012, behind only Google 's Android.
In June 2012, it accounted for 65 % of mobile वेब आंकड़ा खपत ( सहित उपयोग on दोनो the ipod टच and the iPad ).
At the half of 2012, वहीँ यहूद 410 लाख डिवाइस activated.
According to the special मीडिया इवेंट आयोजित by ठहराना on सितंबर 12, 2012, 400 million devices have been sold through June 2012.
The user interface of iOS is based on the अवधारणा of सीधा हेरफेर, using multi-touch gestures.
Interface control elements consist of sliders, switches, and buttons.
Interaction with the OS includes gestures such as swipe, tap, pinch, and reverse pinch, all of which have specific परिभाषाएं भीतर the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of the आईओएस ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली and its multi-touch interface.
Internal accelerometers are used by some applications to respond to shaking the device ( one common result is the undo command ) or घूर्णन it in तीन आयाम ( एक आम परिणाम is switching इससे पोर्ट्रेट to landscape mode ).
आईओएस is निकला इससे os x, with which it shares the Darwin foundation.
iOS is Apple 's mobile version of the OS X operating system प्रयुक्त on ठहराना कंप्यूटर.
In iOS, there are चार abstraction परतों : the कोर os परत, the Core Services layer, the Media layer, and the Cocoa Touch layer.
The current version of the operating system ( iOS 6.1.3 ) dedicates 1-1.5 GB of the device 's flash मेमोरी लिये the प्रणाली विभाजन, using roughly 800 mb of कि विभाजन ( varying by मॉडल ) लिये आईओएस itself.
iOS currently runs on iPhone, ipad, ipod टच and Apple TV.

A spoiler is an ऑटोमोटिव aerodynamic यंत्र जिनकी intended डिज़ाइन फलन is to 'spoil ' प्रतिकूल एयर गति आरपार a body of a vehicle in motion, usually described as turbulence or drag.
Spoilers on the front of a vehicle are often called air dams, because in addition to directing air प्रवाह वे भी reduce the राशि of एयर बहती underneath the vehicle which generally reduces aerodynamic lift and drag.
Spoilers are often fitted to race and high-performance sports cars, हालांकि वे have become आम on यात्री वाहनों as well.
Some spoilers are added to cars primarily for styling purposes and have either little aerodynamic लाभ or भी मेक the वायुगतिकी बदतर.
Spoilers for cars are often incorrectly उलझन साथ, or the पद प्रयुक्त interchangeably with, wings.
Automotive विंग्स हैं डिवाइस जिनकी intended डिज़ाइन is to generate downforce as एयर गुजरता around them, not simply disrupt existing airflow patterns.
Mario, who serves as Nintendo 's mascot, is a fictional अक्षर निर्मित by खेल पंक्तियां शिगेरू miyamoto and voiced by Charles Martinet.
This is a list of video games where the अक्षर मारियो plays a भाग, either as the समर्थक, विपक्षी, supporting अक्षर, as भाग of an ensemble cast, as a cameo, or in a game within a game.
it करता नहीं शामिल सरल सन्दर्भ to the अक्षर, such as the portraits of Mario found in The Legend of Zelda : A Link to the Past.
The year indicated is the year the game was first released, सबसे commonly in जापानी ; खेल यहूद sometimes released सालो बाद in अन्य regions of the world.
The list includes पोर्ट, remakes और compilations.
It does n't शामिल कोई आभासी कंसोल re-releases.
`` Man of Constant Sorrow '' ( also known as `` I Am A Man of Constant Sorrow '' ) is a traditional American folk song first अंकित by लंड burnett, a partially अँधा fiddler इससे केंटकी.
The song was originally recorded by Burnett as `` विदाई सोंग '' मुद्रित in a रिचर्ड burnett songbook, circa 1913.
An early संस्करण थी अंकित by Emry Arthur in 1928 ( Vocalion Vo 5208 ).
Public interest in the song was renewed after the रिलीज of the 2000 फिल्मी o bhai, जहाँ आर्ट thou ?
, as it plays a सेंट्रल भूमिका in the film 's plot.
The song was also शामिल in the फिल्मी 's अत्यधिक कामयाब, multiple-platinum selling soundtrack.

The volt ( symbol : V ) is the si निकला ईकाई लिये इलेक्ट्रिक संभावित ( वोल्टेज ), इलेक्ट्रिक potential difference, and electromotive force.
The volt is named in honor of the Italian physicist alessandro volta ( 1745–1827 ), जो invented the वोल्टायिक pile, possibly the first chemical battery.
A plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo assassination and steps of Gavrilo Princip ( image taken in 1987, पहले कदम यहूद removed in 1992 and plaque changed from Cyrillic to Latin script )
A प्लैक commemorating the स्थान of the Sarajevo assassination ( image taken in 2009 )
On 28 June 1914, Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, heir presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian throne, and his wife, Sophie, Duchess of Hohenberg, यहूद शॉट मुर्दे in साराजेवो, by gavrilo princip, एक of a समूह of छह बोस्नियाई serb हत्यारे समन्वित by डेनियल Ilić.
The political objective of the assassination was to break बंद austria-hungary 's south-slav प्रांतों so वे could be combined into a Greater Serbia or a Yugoslavia.
The assassins ' motives यहूद सतत साथ the गति that later became known as Young Bosnia.
Serbian military officers stood पीछे the आक्रमण.
At the top of these Serbian military षड्यंत्रकारियों थी मुख्य of सर्बियाई सैन्य प्रज्ञा dragutin dimitrijević, उसके righthand man Major Vojislav Tankosić, and Masterspy Rade Malobabić.
Major Tankosić armed the हत्यारे साथ बम और pistols and trained them.
The assassins were given access to the same clandestine tunnel of safe-houses and एजेंटों कि rade malobabić प्रयुक्त लिये the घुसपैठ of weapons and operatives into Austria-Hungary.
The हत्यारे, the कुंजी सदस्यों of the clandestine टनल, और the कुंजी सर्बियाई सैन्य conspirators who were still alive were arrested, tried, convicted and punished.
Those who were गिरफ्तार in बोस्निया यहूद आजमाया in साराजेवो in October 1914.
The other conspirators were arrested and tried before a Serbian kangaroo court on the French-controlled salonika सामने in 1916–1917 on unrelated गलत आरोप ; सर्बिया चलाया three of the top military conspirators.
Much of कया is ज्ञात परिचय the assassinations comes from these two trials and related records.
Assignment of responsibility for the bombing and murders of 28 June is highly controversial because the आक्रमण led to the outbreak of संसार युद्ध i एक माह बाद.
Mission San Juan Capistrano was a Spanish mission in दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया, स्तिथ in present-day सैन Juan Capistrano.
It थी संस्थापित on सब संतो ' दिन नवम्बर 1, 1776, by Spanish Catholics of the Franciscan Order.
Named for giovanni da capistrano, a 15th सदी theologian और `` योद्धा पुजारी '' जो resided in the abruzzo प्रदेश of इटली, सैन जुआन Capistrano has the distinction of being home to the oldest building in California still in use, a chapel built in 1782.
Known alternately as `` सेरा 's चैपल '' और `` पिता सेरा 's गिरिजाघर, '' it is the तभी extant structure where it has been documented that the padre Junipero Serra celebrated mass.
One of the best known of the Alta कैलिफ़ोर्निया मिशन ( और एक of the few मिशन to have दरअसल महरूम संस्थापित twice—others being Mission San Gabriel Arcángel and Mission La Purísima Concepción ).
The site was originally consecrated on अक्तूबर 30, 1775, by पिता fermín lasuén, लकिन was quickly abandoned due to unrest among the indigenous population in San Diego.
The success of the उपनिवेश is evident in its historical records.
Prior to the arrival of the missionaries, कुछ 550 natives यहूद बिखरे throughout the लोकल क्षेत्रफल.
By 1790, the number of परिवर्तित ईसाइयों था grown to 700, और बस छह सालो बाद nearly 1,000 `` neophytes `` ( recent converts ) lived in or around the Mission compound.
1,649 baptisms were conducted that year alone, out of the total 4,639 souls परिवर्तित between 1776 और 1847.
More than 2,000 former inhabitants ( mostly Juaneño Indians ) are buried in unmarked क़ब्रों in the मिशन 's कब्रिस्तान ( campo santo ).
The remains of Father ( later Monsignor ) St. John O'Sullivan, who recognized the property 's historic value and working tirelessly to conserve and rebuild its structures, are buried at the entrance to the कब्रिस्तान on the वेस्ट पक्ष of the प्रॉपर्टी, और a प्रतिमा उठाया in उसके सम्मान स्टैंड at the सिर of the क्रिप्ट.
The surviving chapel also serves as the final resting place of three padres who passed on while serving at the Mission : Fathers José barona, विसेंट fustér, और विसेंट पास्कुआल oliva हैं सब entombed beneath the अभयारण्य floor.
The Criolla or `` Mission grape, '' was first planted at सैन जुआन capistrano in 1779 ; in 1783, the पहला वाइन उत्पादित in alta कैलिफ़ोर्निया emerged from the Mission 's winery.
The Mission entered a long period of क्रमिक मनाही बाद secularization in 1833.
Numerous प्रयत्न यहूद बना over the सालो to restore the Mission to its former glory, but none met with great success until the arrival of Father O'Sullivan in 1910.
Restoration efforts continue, और `` सेरा 's चैपल '' is स्टिल प्रयुक्त लिये धार्मिक services.
About half-a-million विज़िटर, सहित 80,000 स्कूल children, come to the Mission each year.
And while the ruins of `` The Great Stone Church '' ( which was all but leveled by an 1812 earthquake ) are a renowned architectural wonder, the Mission is शायद बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये the सालाना `` वापसी of the Swallows '' which is traditionally observed every March 19 ( Saint Joseph 's Day ).
Mission San Juan Capistrano has served as a पसंदीदा विषय लिये अनेक notable कलाकारों, और रै महरूम immortalized in साहित्य and on film numerous times, perhaps more than any other mission.
In 1984, a आधुनिक गिरिजाघर जटिल थी constructed बस उत्तर और वेस्ट of the मिशन compound and is now known as Mission Basilica San Juan Capistrano.
Today, the mission compound serves as a संग्रहालय, साथ the सेरा चैपल भीतर the यौगिक सेवारत as a chapel for the mission parish.
Better Off मुर्दे is a 1985 अमरीकी टीन रोमांटिक कॉमेडी फिल्मी अभिनीत जॉन Cusack and written and directed by Savage Steve Holland.
It tells the story of high school student लेन myer जो is suicidal बाद उसके गर्लफ्रेंड breaks up with him.
Mercedes-Benz Superdome ( originally Louisiana Superdome and commonly the superdome ) is a खेल और प्रदर्शनी स्टेडियम, स्तिथ in the सेंट्रल Business District of New Orleans, Louisiana, USA.
Plans were drawn up in 1967, by the नई ऑरलियन्स modernist architectural firm of Curtis and Davis.
Its steel फ़्रेम कवर a expanse.
Its dome is made of a lamella multi-ringed फ़्रेम और रै a व्यास of, making it the largest fixed domed structure in the world.
It is home to the NFL 's New Orleans Saints, the NCAA 's Division I-A Tulane Green Wave football team ( the largest football स्टेडियम in सम्मेलन यूएसए ), the राज्य फार्म bayou क्लासिक, the r+l वाहक नई ऑरलियन्स कटोरी, the allstate शुगर कटोरी और, प्रत्येक चौथी year, the BCS National Championship Game.
Because of the size and स्थान in एक of the प्रमुख पर्यटक गंतव्यों in the United States, the Superdome routinely makes the `` short list '' of candidates being considered for major sporting events, such as the Super Bowl and the Final Four.
In 2005, the Superdome gained international ध्यान of a अलग प्रकार जब it housed हज़ारों of लोगों seeking आश्रय from Hurricane Katrina.
The building suffered extensive क्षति as a परिणाम of the तूफ़ान, और थी closed for many months afterward.
On October 3, 2011, it was announced that German automaker mercedes-benz खरीदा नामकरण अधिकारों to the stadium.
The new नाम took effect on October 23, 2011.
It is the third stadium that has naming rights from Mercedes-Benz ( and first in the United States ), बाद the mercedes-benz एरिना, the stadium of Bundesliga club VfB Stuttgart, in Stuttgart, Germany and the Mercedes-Benz Arena in Shanghai, China.
लॉबी of जम्बो हाउस
Giraffe on the savannah at जम्बो House
Disney 's Animal Kingdom Lodge is an african-themed डीलक्स रिज़ॉर्ट at the वॉल्ट डिज़्नी World Resort.
It opened on अप्रैल 16, 2001.
The resort is owned and operated by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी पार्क and Resorts.
Disney 's एनिमल किंगडम आवास is स्तिथ in the एनिमल किंगडम Resort Area, adjacent to Disney 's Animal Kingdom.
It gives अतिथि the अवसर to दृश्य चरने वन्यजीव बाहर उनके कक्ष और पब्लिक क्षेत्रों in the रिज़ॉर्ट भीतर निकटता of the पशु, conveying the feeling of being in an African savanna.
The People 's Party, also known as the `` Populists '', was a short-lived राजनैतिक पार्टी in the संयुक्त राज्य स्थापित in 1891 दौरान the populist गति ( संयुक्त राज्य, 19th सदी ).
It was most important in 1892-96, और तब rapidly धुंधली दूर.
Based among poor, white cotton farmers in the South ( especially North Carolina, अलबामा, और टेक्सास ) और hard-pressed गेहूं किसानो in the मैदान राज्य ( विशेषकर कान्सास और नेब्रास्का ), it represented a कट्टरपंथी crusading रूप of agrarianism और hostility to banks, railroads, and elites generally.
It sometimes formed coalitions with labor संघ, और in 1896 the डेमोक्रेट endorsed उनके अध्यक्षीय nominee, William Jennings Bryan.
The terms `` populist '' and `` populism `` हैं commonly प्रयुक्त लिये anti-elitist appeals in विपक्ष to स्थापित रूचि और mainstream parties.
भाषाई मैप of सीरियल, कैमरून, and Benin.
चिह्न in अंग्रेज़ी, बाहर the University of Lagos
There are सैंकड़ों of भाषाएं बोला in Nigeria.
The major languages are Yoruba, हौसा, इग्बो, ईदो, fulfulde, कनूरी, and Ibibio.
The official language of Nigeria, English, the former colonial भाषा, थी चुनी to सुकर the सांस्कृतिक and linguistic unity of the country.
English, however, remains an exclusive preserve of the country 's शहरी elite, और is नहीं widely बोला in ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों, जिससे comprise तीन quarters of the countries population.
Nigeria 's linguistic diversity is a microcosm of Africa as a पूरे, encompassing तीन प्रमुख अफ़्रीकी भाषाएं परिवारों : afroasiatic, Nilo-Saharan, and Niger–Congo.
Nigeria also has अनेक as-yet unclassified भाषाएं, ऐसे as cen tuum, जिससे may represent a relic of an even greater diversity prior to the spread of the current language families.
A series of events led to the आक्रमण on पर्ल हार्बर.
War between Japan and the United States had been a possibility that each nation 's सैन्य शक्तियां नियोजित लिये चूंकि the 1920s, हालांकि रियल टेंशन किया नहीं शुरू जबतक the 1931 आक्रमण of Manchuria by Japan.
Over the अगला दशक, जापानी विस्तारित धीरे into चीन, leading to all out war between the two in 1937.
In 1940 जापानी invaded फ्रेंच इंडोचायना in an प्रयत्न to embargo सब imports into चीन, including war supplies purchased from the U.S.
This move prompted the United States to embargo all oil exports, leading the Imperial Japanese Navy to estimate कि it था कम than दो सालो of बंकर आयल बाकी और to support the मौजूदा योजनाएँ to seize आयल संसाधन in the Dutch East Indies.
Planning had been underway for some time on an attack on the `` Southern संसाधन क्षेत्रफल '' to add it to the वृहद ईस्ट एशिया co-prosperity गोला कि जापानी envisioned in the Pacific.
The Philippine islands, at that समय an अमरीकी territory, यहूद भी a जापानी target.
The जापानी सैन्य concluded कि an आक्रमण of the Philippines would provoke an American military response.
Rather than seize and fortify the islands, and wait for the अपरिहार्य us counterattack, जापानी 's सैन्य नेताओ बजाय decided on the pre-emptive पर्ल हार्बर आक्रमण, which they assumed would negate the American forces needed for the liberation and reconquest of the islands.
Planning for the attack had begun in बहुत जल्दी 1941, by admiral isoroku यामामोटो.
He finally won assent from the नवल ऊँची कमांड by, among अन्य बाते, threatening to resign.
The attack was approved in the summer at an इम्पीरियल सम्मेलन and again at a second Conference in the fall.
simultaneously over the साल, पायलटों were trained, and ships prepared for its execution.
Authority for the attack was granted at the second इम्पीरियल सम्मेलन if a राजनयिक परिणाम संतोषजनक to Japan was not reached.
बाद फाइनल स्वीकृति by सम्राट हिरोहितो the अनुक्रम to attack was issued at the beginning of December.
A common दफ्तर stapler
A आम स्कूल stapler
A stapler is a mechanical device that joins sheets of paper or similar material by ड्राइविंग a पतला मेटल स्टेपल through the चादरें और फोल्डिंग the ends.
Staplers are widely used in सरकारी, कारोबार, कार्यालयों, घरों and schools.
The word `` stapler '' can दरअसल refer to a क्रमांक of अलग devices of varying uses.
in जोड to joining पेपर चादरें साथ, staplers can भी be प्रयुक्त in a surgical setting to join tissue together with surgical staples to close a surgical wound ( much in the same way as stitches or sutures ).
Typically, most staplers हैं प्रयुक्त to जुड़ें अनेक चादरें of paper.
Paper staplers आइये in दो पृथक प्रकार : हस्तचालित और electric.
Manual staplers are सामान्यतः hand-held, हालांकि मॉडल that are used while set on a desk or other surface are not uncommon.
इलेक्ट्रिक staplers मौजूद in a variety of different designs and models.
Their primary operating फलन is to जुड़ें विशाल संख्याएँ of पेपर चादरें साथ in rapid succession.
Some electric staplers can जुड़ें up to 20 चादरें at a समय.
Swallowing, known scientifically as deglutition, is the process in the इंसान or एनिमल देह कि makes कुछ pass इससे the मुँह, to the pharynx, and into the esophagus, while shutting the epiglottis.
If this fails and the object goes through the trachea, then choking or pulmonary aspiration can occur.
In the इंसान देह it is नियंत्रित by the swallowing reflex.
Thaddeus Stevens ( April 4, 1792 – August 11, 1868 ), of पेन्सिलवेनिया, थी a नेता of the कट्टरपंथी रिपब्लिकन गुट of the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी and a fierce opponent of slavery.
He was one of the most influential सदस्यों in the इतिहास of Congress.
As chairman of the powerful House Ways and Means Committee, Stevens, a witty, व्यंग्यात्मक स्पीकर और flamboyant पार्टी नेता, वर्चस्व the हाउस इससे 1861 जबतक उसके मौत.
He wrote much of the वित्तीय विधान कि सशुल्क लिये the American Civil War.
Stevens and Senator Charles Sumner were the प्रधान नेताओ of the कट्टरपंथी republicans दौरान the युद्ध और Reconstruction era.
Scholarly views of Stevens have swung sharply चूंकि उसके मौत as interpretations of पुनर्निर्माण have changed.
Historians of the Dunning School ( 1890s–1940s ) आयोजित स्टीवंस जिम्मेदार लिये demanding हर्ष उपचार of the श्वेत दक्षिण और violating अमरीकी परंपराओं of republicanism, depicting Stevens as a villain for his advocacy of harsh measures in the South such as disfranchising all ex-Confederates.
This highly ऋणात्मक characterization held sway into the 1950s.
The rise of the neo-abolitionist school in the 1950s led to a दमदार धनात्मक सराहना of स्टीवंस ' कार्य on सिविल rights for Freedmen.
A recent biographer characterizes him as, `` The Great Commoner, savior of free public education in Pennsylvania, national Republican leader in the struggles against slavery in the United राज्य और intrepid mainstay of the attempt to सुरक्षित जातिगत इंसाफ लिये the freedmen दौरान पुनर्निर्माण, the तभी सदस्य of the हाउस of Representatives ever to have been known as the 'dictator ' of Congress. ''
Overview of the अनुवाद of eukaryotic messenger RNA
Diagram showing the translation of mRNA and the संश्लेषण of प्रोटीन by a राइबोसोम
In molecular biology and genetics, अनुवाद is the प्रक्रम through जिससे सेल्यूलर ribosomes manufacture proteins.
It is part of the प्रक्रम of जीन expression.
in अनुवाद, मेसेंजर rna ( mrna ) उत्पादित by ट्रांसक्रिप्शन is decoded by the राइबोसोम to उपज a विशिष्ट अमीनो एसिड कड़ी, or polypeptide, that will later fold into an active protein.
In bacteria, अनुवाद occurs in the कोशिका 's कोशिकाद्रव्य, जहाँ the विशाल and small subunits of the ribosome are located, and bind to the mRNA.
In eukaryotes, अनुवाद occurs आरपार the झिल्ली of the endoplasmic reticulum in a process called vectorial synthesis.
The ribosome facilitates decoding by inducing the बाइंडिंग of trnas साथ पूरक anticodon sequences to कि of the mRNA.
The tRNAs carry specific amino acids कि हैं chained साथ into a polypeptide as the mrna गुजरता through और is `` पढ़ा '' by the ribosome in a fashion reminiscent to that of a stock ticker and ticker tape.
In many instances, the entire ribosome/mRNA complex binds to the बाहरी झिल्ली of the अशिष्ट endoplasmic reticulum और रिलीज the nascent प्रोटीन polypeptide inside for later vesicle transport and secretion outside of the cell.
Many types of transcribed rna, ऐसे as ट्रांसफ़र rna, ribosomal rna, और छोटी नाभिकीय RNA, do not undergo translation into proteins.
Translation proceeds in four phases : दीक्षा, elongation, translocation और termination ( सब describing the विकास of the अमीनो acid chain, or polypeptide that is the product of translation ).
Amino acids are brought to ribosomes और समवेत into प्रोटीन.
In activation, the correct अमीनो एसिड is covalently बंधुआ to the correct transfer RNA ( tRNA ).
The amino acid is joined by इसके carboxyl समूह to the 3 ' oh of the trna by an ester bond.
When the tRNA has an अमीनो एसिड linked to it, it is termed `` charged ''.
Initiation involves the छोटी subunit of the राइबोसोम बाइंडिंग to the 5 ' end of mRNA with the help of initiation factors ( IF ).
Termination of the polypeptide happens जब the a साईट of the ribosome faces a stop codon ( UAA, UAG, or UGA ).
No tRNA can recognize or bind to इस codon.
बजाय, the रोकें codon induces the बाइंडिंग of a रिलीज फ़ैक्टर प्रोटीन कि prompts the disassembly of the entire ribosome/mRNA complex.
A number of antibiotics act by inhibiting translation ; these include anisomycin, cycloheximide, chloramphenicol, tetracycline, streptomycin, erythromycin, और puromycin, among अन्य.
Prokaryotic ribosomes have a different structure from that of eukaryotic ribosomes, and thus एंटीबायोटिक can specifically निशाना बैक्टीरियल infections बगैर कोई detriment to a eukaryotic host 's cells.
A मल्टीमीडिया संदेश on a mobile phone.
Multimedia Messaging सेवा ( mms ) is a मानक रास्ता to भेजें संदेश कि शामिल मल्टीमीडिया सामग्री to and from mobile phones.
It extends the core SMS ( Short Message Service ) capability that allowed exchange of text संदेश तभी up to 160 वर्ण in लंबाई.
The सबसे लोकप्रिय उपयोग is to भेजें छायाचित्र इससे camera-equipped handsets, हालांकि it is also popular as a method of delivering news and entertainment content including videos, pictures, text pages and ringtones.
The standard is developed by the Open Mobile Alliance ( ओमो ), हालांकि दौरान विकास it थी भाग of the 3gpp and WAP groups.
Smallpox was an संक्रामक बीमारी अद्वितीय to इंसानो, caused by either of दो वायरस विसंगतियाँ, Variola major and Variola minor.
The disease is also known by the Latin names Variola or variola वीरा, निकला इससे varius ( `` spotted '' ) or varus ( `` pimple '' ).
The disease was originally ज्ञात in अंग्रेज़ी as the `` चेचक '' or `` रेड प्लेग '' ; the पद `` smallpox '' थी पहला प्रयुक्त in ब्रिटेन in the 15th सदी to distinguish variola from the `` great pox '' ( syphilis ).
The last naturally occurring case of smallpox ( variola नाबालिग ) थी diagnosed on 26 October 1977.
Smallpox स्थानीयकृत in छोटी रक्त बरतन of the स्किन and in the mouth and throat.
In the स्किन it resulted in a characteristic maculopapular rash and, later, raised fluid-filled blisters.
V. major produces a more गंभीर बीमारी और रै an overall mortality rate of 30–35 %.
V. minor causes a milder form of disease ( also known as alastrim, cottonpox, milkpox, whitepox, और क्यूबन खुजली ) जिससे मारता परिचय 1 % of इसके victims.
long-term जटिलताओं of V. प्रमुख संक्रमण शामिल characteristic scars, commonly on the face, which occur in 65–85 % of survivors.
Blindness resulting from corneal ulceration और scarring, और limb deformities due to गठिया and osteomyelitis are less common complications, seen in about 2–5 % of cases.
Smallpox is believed to have उभरा in human populations about 10,000 BC.
The earliest physical evidence of it is संभवतः the pustular खाज on the mummified देह of Pharaoh Ramses V of Egypt.
The disease killed an estimated 400,000 europeans annually दौरान the closing सालो of the 18th सदी ( सहित five reigning monarchs ), and was responsible for a third of all blindness.
Of all those infected, 20–60 % —and over 80 % of संक्रमित children—died इससे the disease.
Smallpox was responsible for an अनुमानित 300–500 लाख मौतों दौरान the 20th century.
As recently as 1967, the संसार स्वास्थ्य संगठन ( जो ) अनुमानित कि 15 लाख people contracted the disease and that two million died in that year.
After vaccination campaigns throughout the 19th and 20th सदियां, the जो certified the eradication of smallpox in 1979.
Smallpox is one of two infectious diseases to have been eradicated, the अन्य होने rinderpest, जिससे थी घोषित eradicated in 2011.
`` I Want to Hold अपना हाथ '' is a सोंग by the अंग्रेज़ी चट्टान band the Beatles.
Written by John Lennon and Paul McCartney, and अंकित in अक्तूबर 1963, it थी the पहला बीटल्स रिकार्ड to be बना using four-track equipment.
With advance orders exceeding one million copies in the United Kingdom, `` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' would ordinarily have gone straight to the top of the British record charts on its day of release ( 29 November 1963 ) had it not been अवरोधित by the समूह 's पहला लाख विक्रेता `` वो loves तुम ``, the बीटल्स ' पिछला uk सिंगल, जिससे थी having a resurgent वर्तनी in the शीर्ष स्थिति following तीव्र मीडिया कवरेज of the group.
Taking two weeks to dislodge its predecessor, `` I want to थाम अपना हाथ '' ठहरे at क्रमांक एक लिये पाँच सप्ताह और remained in the UK top fifty for twenty-one weeks in total.
It was also the group 's first अमरीकी क्रमांक एक, प्रवेश the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 चार्ट on 18 जनवरी 1964 at number forty-five and starting the British invasion of the American music industry.
By 1 February it held the number one spot — for seven weeks — before being replaced by `` She Loves You '', a रिवर्स परिदृश्य of कया था occurred in ब्रिटेन, और remained in the us चार्ट लिये a कुल of fifteen weeks.
`` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' became the बीटल्स ' best-selling सिंगल विश्वव्यापी.
A gasser was a type of hot rod originating on the dragstrips of the संयुक्त राज्य in the लेट 1950s और जारी जबतक the जल्दी 1970s.
Gassers were based on production models from the 1930s to mid-1960s, which have been stripped of extraneous वज़न और jacked up using a ट्रक बीम धुरी to provide बेहतर वज़न वितरण on त्वरण ( बीम axles हैं भी हल्का than an स्वतंत्र सामने बर्खास्तगी ), though a raised stock front suspension is common as well.
Common weight reduction techniques शामिल fiberglass देह panels, stripped इंटीरियर्स and plexiglass windows ( sometimes color tinted ).
Because they were primarily built for racing, these cars typically had the engine swapped to a larger or अधिक शक्तिशाली एक, the मौजूदा भण्डार इंजन परिवर्धित ( प्रायः heavily ) or both.
It was very common to fit a Roots supercharger और mechanical ईंधन इंजेक्शन, ऐसे as एक इससे algon, Hilborn, or Crower.
With form being dictated by function, their appearance is often very top heavy and ungainly, largely due to सामने ends होने उठाया उच्चतर than भण्डार, to assist in the weight transfer during rapid acceleration ( racing ).
Having their exhaust pipes exit through the front fender well is a आम characteristic of gassers, as is having लाशें चित्रित in flamboyant metalflakes, मोती, और कैंडी finishes complemented by lettering in wild fonts.
the नाम arose क्युकी वे competed in a गैसोलीन -fueled drag racing class, rather than one using methanol or nitromethane.
The gasser is the पूर्ववर्ती of the modern Funny Car.

Electrocardiography ( ECG or EKG from ) is a transthoracic ( आरपार the वक्ष or छाती ) निर्वचन of the विद्युत कार्यकलाप of the heart over a period of time, as detected by electrodes attached to the surface of the skin and recorded by a device external to the body.
The recording produced by this noninvasive procedure is termed an electrocardiogram ( भी ECG or EKG ).
An ECG is used to measure the rate and regularity of heartbeats, as खूब as the आकार और स्थिति of the कक्षों, the उपस्थिति of कोई क्षति to the heart, and the effects of drugs or devices used to regulate the heart, such as a pacemaker.
Most ECGs हैं performed लिये निदान or शोध उद्देश्य on इंसान दिल, लकिन may भी be performed on animals, usually for diagnosis of heart abnormalities or research.
Donald John Trump, Sr. ( born जून 14, 1946 ) is an अमरीकी कारोबार महारथी, टेलीविज़न personality and author.
He is the chairman and president of The Trump संगठन और the संस्थापक of ट्रम्प entertainment रिसॉर्ट.
Trump 's extravagant lifestyle, outspoken manner, और भूमिका on the एनबीसी वास्तविकता दिखाएँ the प्रशिक्षु have made him a well-known celebrity who was No. 14 on the 2012 Forbes Celebrity 100 list.
Trump is the son of Fred ट्रम्प, a धनवान नई यॉर्क नगर real-estate डेवलपर.
He worked for his father 's firm, Elizabeth Trump & Son, while उपस्थित the व्हार्टन स्कूल of the विश्वविद्यालयों of पेन्सिलवेनिया, और in 1968 officially joined the company.
He was दिए कंट्रोल of the कम्पनी in 1971 and renamed it The Trump Organization.
In 2010, Trump expressed an ब्याज in बनने a प्रत्याशी लिये अध्यक्ष of the United States in the 2012 election, though in May 2011, he announced he would not be a candidate.
In December 2011, Trump was suggested as a possible vice अध्यक्षीय चयन by मिशेल bachmann, if वो यहूद to जीत the रिपब्लिकन nomination.
`` A Change Is Gon na Come '' is a 1964 single by R & B singer-songwriter Sam Cooke, लिखा और पहला अंकित in 1963 and released under the RCA Victor label shortly after his death in late 1964.
Though only a modest hit लिये cooke in comparison with his previous singles, the song came to exemplify the 1960s ' Civil Rights Movement.
The song has gained in लोकप्रियता और नाजुक acclaim in the decades since its release, and is # 12 on Rolling Stone 's 500 Greatest Songs of All Time.
