Geothermal energy is thermal उर्जा उत्पन्न और भंडारित in the Earth.
Thermal उर्जा is the उर्जा कि determines the temperature of matter.
The Geothermal energy of the Earth 's crust originates from the असली गठन of the ग्रह ( 20 % ) और इससे रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय of minerals ( 80 % ).
the geothermal अनुपात, जिससे is the अंतर in तापमान between the core of the planet and its surface, drives a continuous conduction of thermal energy in the form of heat from the core to the surface.
The क्रियाशील geothermal originates इससे the यूनानी जड़ें γη ( ge ), meaning earth, and θερμος ( thermos ), meaning hot.
At the core of the Earth, thermal energy is निर्मित by रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय और temperatures may पहुँचें over 5000 °C ( 9,000 °F ).
Heat conducts from the core to surrounding कूलर चट्टान.
The high temperature and pressure cause some rock to melt, बनाना मैग्मा संवहन upward चूंकि it is हल्का than the solid rock.
The magma heats चट्टान और जल in the क्रस्ट, sometimes up to 370 °C ( 700 °F ).
From hot springs, geothermal उर्जा रै महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये स्नान चूंकि paleolithic टाइम्स और लिये स्पेस हीटिंग चूंकि ancient Roman times, but it is now better known for electricity generation.
Worldwide, परिचय 10,715 megawatts ( mw ) of geothermal power is online in 24 countries.
an अतिरिक्त 28 gigawatts of सीधा geothermal हीटिंग क्षमता is संस्थापित for district heating, space heating, spas, industrial processes, desalination and agricultural applications.
Geothermal power is cost effective, reliable, sustainable, and environmentally दोस्ताना, लकिन रै historically महरूम सीमित to क्षेत्रों निकट tectonic थाली सीमाएँ.
Recent technological advances have dramatically expanded the range and size of viable resources, विशेषकर लिये अनुप्रयोग ऐसे as घर हीटिंग, खोलने a संभावित लिये widespread exploitation.
Geothermal wells release greenhouse gases trapped deep भीतर the धरती, but these emissions are much lower per energy unit than those of fossil fuels.
As a result, geothermal शक्ति रै the संभावित to सहायता mitigate global warming if widely deployed in place of fossil fuels.
The Earth 's geothermal संसाधन हैं theoretically अधिक than पर्याप्त to सप्लाई मानवता 's उर्जा needs, but only a very small fraction may be profitably exploited.
Drilling and खोजी लिये गहन संसाधन is बहुत महंगी.
Forecasts for the future of geothermal शक्ति निर्भर on assumptions परिचय प्रौद्योगिकी, उर्जा कीमतें, subsidies, and interest rates.
Pilot programs like EWEB 's ग्राहक ऑप्ट in ग्रीन शक्ति कार्यक्रम दिखाएँ कि ग्राहक होता be willing to pay a little more for a renewable energy source like geothermal.
But as a परिणाम of सरकारी assisted शोध और उद्योग अनुभव, the cost of generating geothermal power has decreased by 25 % over the past two decades.
In 2001, geothermal उर्जा लागत between दो और टेन सेंट per kwh.
Ownership of प्रॉपर्टी may be निजी, सामूहिक, or आम और the प्रॉपर्टी may be objects, land/real estate, or intellectual property.
Determining ownership in law involves determining who has certain अधिकारों और कर्तव्य over the प्रॉपर्टी.
These rights and duties, sometimes called a 'bundle of अधिकारों ', can be अलग and held by different parties.
The question of ownership reaches back to the ancient philosophers, प्लेटो और अरस्तू, जो आयोजित अलग राय on the subject.
Plato ( 428/427 BC – 348/347 BC ) thought निजी प्रॉपर्टी निर्मित divisive inequalities, जबकि अरस्तू ( 384 bc – 322 bc ) विचार निजी प्रॉपर्टी सक्रिय लोगों to receive the full benefit of their labor.
Private property can circumvent what is now referred to as the “ त्रासदी of the कॉमन्स ” प्रॉब्लम, जहाँ लोगों tend to रुसवा आम प्रॉपर्टी more than they do private property.
Given a short-sighted owner, however, a private property system can make these tragedies worse—for उदाहरण, a निजी मालिक of a टुकड़ा of oil-rich प्रॉपर्टी, depending on उसके worldview, might be अधिक दिलचस्पी in short-term वित्तीय लाभ than वृद्धिशील उपयोग साथ an eye toward other 's concerns ( e.g., those of future generations, the disenfranchised, etc. ).
While Aristotle justified the existence of private ownership, he बाएँ खोलें सवाल of ( 1 ) कैसा to allocate प्रॉपर्टी between कया is निजी और आम और ( 2 ) how to allocate the private property within society.
Over the millennia, and across cultures what can be प्रॉपर्टी और कैसा it is regarded culturally have varied widely.
Ownership is the basis for many other concepts that form the foundations of ancient and आधुनिक समाजों ऐसे as धन, व्यापार, कर्ज़, दिवालियापन, the criminality of चोरी, और निजी vs. पब्लिक प्रॉपर्टी.
Ownership is the key भवन ब्लाक in the विकास of the पूंजीवादी socio-economic system.
Adam Smith stated कि एक of the पवित्र कानून of justice was to guard a person 's property and possessions.
The process and mechanics of स्वामित्व हैं fairly जटिल : एक can लाभ, ट्रांसफ़र और lose ownership of property in a number of ways.
To acquire प्रॉपर्टी एक can खरीदें it साथ धन, व्यापार it लिये अन्य प्रॉपर्टी, प्राप्त it as a gift, steal it, find it, make, it or homestead it.
One can transfer or lose ownership of property by selling it for money, exchanging it for other property, giving it as a gift, being robbed of it, it, or having it stripped इससे एक 's स्वामित्व through विधिक अर्थात् ऐसे as eviction, foreclosure, seizure, or taking.
Ownership is self-propagating in that the owner of कोई प्रॉपर्टी होगा भी अपना the आर्थिक लाभ of that property.
`` What 's My Name ? '' is a song अंकित by barbadian रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार रिहाना, लिये उसके पांचवां studio album Loud ( 2010 ).
Featuring guest vocals from Canadian rapper Drake, the song was released as the दूसरी सिंगल इससे लाउड on अक्तूबर 29, 2010 through डेफ Jam Recordings.
The R & B song was produced by the Norwegian production duo StarGate, and was लिखा by the duo साथ साथ ester डीन, traci hale, और ड्रेक.
Lyrically, it incorporates विषयवस्तु of यौन मैथुन और रोमांस.
Music critics gave the song positive reviews, citing it some of Rihanna 's best vocal work to date ; there was a praise regarding इसके रोमांटिक प्रकृति, as खूब as इसके यौन टोन.
`` What 's My Name ? '' was a commercial success and topped the US Billboard Hot 100 chart, giving रिहाना उसके तीसरा number-one सिंगल in 2010, as खूब as उसके आठवीं overall on the चार्ट.
The song भी अव्वल the चार्ट in हंगेरियाई और the संयुक्त किंगडम और पहुँचे the शीर्ष पाँच in कनाडा, Ireland, New Zealand, Norway and Slovakia.
The song received a नामांकन at the 54th ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन Rap/Sung Collaboration.
An accompanying म्यूज़िक वीडियो, निर्देशित by फिलिप andelman, portrays a रोमांटिक एनकाउंटर between रिहाना और ड्रेक in a grocery store along with romantic scenes between the pair and Rihanna walking through Manhattan 's Lower East Side.
`` What 's My Name ? '' was promoted with live performances across both पहलू of the अटलांटिक, सहित शनिवार रात्रि सजीव in अमेरिका और the श्रेणी सात finale of the x फ़ैक्टर in the United Kingdom.
The latter performance resulted in an investigation इससे the देश 's मीडिया नियामक, ofcom, लिये the raunchy nature of Rihanna 's outfit.
A mathematical निरंतर is a खास क्रमांक, प्रायः a real number, that is `` significantly interesting in some way ''.
स्थिरांक उठता in अनेक अलग क्षेत्रों of गणित, with constants such as e ( mathematical constant ) | and pi| occurring in such diverse contexts as geometry, number theory and calculus.
What it means लिये a निरंतर to उठता `` naturally '', और कया makes a निरंतर `` दिलचस्प '', is ultimately a पदार्थ of स्वाद, और कुछ गणितीय constants are notable more for historical reasons than for their intrinsic mathematical interest.
The more popular constants have been studied throughout the आयु और computed to अनेक decimal places.
All mathematical constants are definable numbers and usually are also computable संख्याएँ ( chaitin 's निरंतर होने a significant exception ).
Elections to the United राज्य सीनेट यहूद आयोजित on नवम्बर 2, 2010, for 37 of the United States Senate 's 100 seats.
( A special election on January 19, 2010 in मैसाचुसेट्स थी आयोजित पहले in the year. )
thirty-four of the सीटे यहूद लिये six-year शर्तें to the सीनेट 's `` class three '', and three were special elections for shorter terms.
Of the 37 elections, 19 featured लाज़िम डेमोक्रेट ( 7 of जिसको रिटायर्ड or यहूद पराजित in the प्राथमिक ) और 18 featured incumbent Republicans ( eight of whom retired or were defeated in the primary ).
After the पिछला चुनावों ( in 2008 ), the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट थी रचित of 58 डेमोक्रेट, 40 Republicans, and 2 independents who caucus with the Democrats.
Republicans won four seats held by retiring डेमोक्रेट और republicans पराजित दो लाज़िम डेमोक्रेट.
This was the largest number of Republicans gains since the 1994 elections and also the first समय चूंकि कि चुनाव कि republicans सफलतापूर्वक defended सब of their own seats.
This was the चौथी लगातार चुनाव of `` क्लास 3 '' सीनेटरों जहाँ डेमोक्रेट have विफल to लाभ सीटे और the तीसरा consecutive mid-term election held in a president 's first term where Republicans have picked-up seats.
Despite these Republican wins, however, the Democrats retained a majority of the सीनेट साथ 51 सीटे प्लस 2 independents जो caucus साथ उन्हें, compared to the 47 Republicans.
A संक्रांति is an खगोलीय इवेंट कि occurs twice प्रत्येक साल as the सूर्य पहुँच इसके उच्चतम or न्यूनतम excursion relative to the celestial equator on the celestial sphere.
As a result, on the day of the solstice, the Sun appears to have पहुँचे इसके उच्चतम or न्यूनतम सालाना ऊँचाई in the आसमान ऊपर the horizon at local solar noon.
The word solstice is derived from the Latin sol ( sun ) and sistere ( to stand still ), क्युकी at the solstices, the सूर्य स्टैंड स्टिल in उतार ; कि is, the मौसमी गति of the सूर्य 's पाथ ( as seen from Earth ) comes to a stop before reversing direction.
The solstices, together with the equinoxes, are कनेक्ट साथ the सीज़न.
In many cultures the solstices चिह्नित either the शुरूआत or the midpoint of winter and summer.
The पद संक्रांति can भी be प्रयुक्त in a broader भाव, as the date ( day ) when this occurs.
The day of the संक्रांति is either the longest दिन of the साल ( in गर्मियाँ ) or the shortest day of the year ( in winter ) for any place outside of the tropics.
Jerry ली लुईस ( born सितंबर 29, 1935 ) is an अमरीकी चट्टान and roll and country music singer-songwriter and pianist.
He is known by the nickname `` The Killer '' and is प्रायः viewed as “rock & फेंकें 's पहला ग्रेट wild man”.
An early pioneer of rock and roll music, in 1956 लुईस बना उसके पहला रिकार्डिंग at सूर्य Records.
`` Crazy बाहें `` बेची 300,000 नक़ल in the दक्षिण, लकिन it थी उसके 1957 hit `` पूरे lotta Shakin ' Going On `` that shot Lewis to fame worldwide.
Lewis followed इस in कि वही साल जब he अंकित गीतों ऐसे as `` Great Balls of Fire ``, `` Breathless `` and `` High School Confidential ``.
Lewis sold more records than एल्विस प्रेस्ली at इस time.
However, Lewis ' rock 'n ' फेंकें करियर faltered in the वेक of his marriage to his young cousin.
He had little success in the charts following the scandal और उसके लोकप्रियता जल्दी धुंधली.
His सजीव प्रदर्शन शुल्क plummeted from $ 10,000 per night to $ 250.
in the meantime he थी संकल्पित to gain back some of his popularity.
During the early 60’s he किया n't have much चार्ट कामयाबी साथ few अपवाद such as `` What 'd I Say ``.
His live प्रदर्शन at इस समय यहूद increasingly wild and energetic.
His album Live at the Star क्लबों, हैम्बर्ग इससे 1964 is प्रायः regarded by अनेक म्यूज़िक पत्रकारों और fans as one of the wildest and greatest rock and roll concert albums ever.
After recording गीतों ऐसे as `` i 'm on आग '' लिये अनेक सालो साथ छोटी कामयाबी, in 1968 लुईस बना a परिवर्तन into country music and had hits with songs such as `` Another Place, Another Time ''.
This reignited उसके करियर और throughout the late '60s and '70s he regularly topped the country-western charts.
His # 1 country hits included `` To Make Love Sweeter For You ``, `` There Must Be More to Love than इस ``, `` होता तुम लो another मौका on Me `` and `` Me And Bobby McGee ``.
Lewis 's successes continued throughout the decade and he embraced his rock 'n ' roll past with songs ऐसे as a कवर of the बिग bopper 's `` chantilly फीता `` and `` Rockin ' My Life Away ``.
In the 21st century Lewis continues to दौरे to ऑडियंस around the संसार and still releases new albums.
One such album, titled पिछला man खड़ा, is उसके बेहतरीन selling to तिथि at over a million copies sold worldwide.
This was followed by औसत बूढ़ा man जिससे रै प्राप्त कुछ of the best sales of Lewis’s career.
Lewis has had a दर्जन सुनहरा रिकॉर्ड in दोनो चट्टान और देश, जीती अनेक ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, including a Lifetime Achievement Award.
Lewis was inducted into the चट्टान और फेंकें हॉल of कीर्ति in 1986, और उसके pioneering contribution to the genre has been recognized by the Rockabilly Hall of Fame.
In 1989, his life was chronicled in the फिल्म ग्रेट गेंदें of आग, अभिनीत Dennis Quaid.
In 2003, Rolling Stone Magazine listed his box set All Killer, No फिलर : the anthology क्रमांक 242 on उनके सूची of `` 500 महानतम एल्बम of all time ``.
In 2004, they ranked him number 24 on उनके सूची of the 100 महानतम Artists of All Time.
Lewis is the last surviving member of Sun Records ' लाख डालर quartet और the क्लास of '55 एल्बम, जिससे भी शामिल जॉनी नकदी, कार्ल perkins, Roy Orbison and Elvis Presley.
Henry लुई स्टीफंस, बेनाम watercolor ( 1863 ) of a man पढना a newspaper with headline `` Presidential Proclamation / Slavery ''.
The Emancipation Proclamation was an order issued to all segments of the कार्यपालिका शाखा ( सहित the फौज और नेवी ) of the संयुक्त राज्य by अध्यक्ष Abraham Lincoln on January 1, 1863, during the American Civil War.
It was based on the president 's constitutional authority as कमांडर in मुख्य of the हथियारबंद शक्तियां ; it थी नहीं a विधि passed by Congress.
It proclaimed all those enslaved in confederate territory to be forever फ़्री, और ordered the फौज ( और सब खण्ड of the कार्यपालिका शाखा ) to दावत as free all those enslaved in ten states that were still in rebellion, thus applying to 3.1 million of the 4 million slaves in the U.S.
The Proclamation could not be enforced in क्षेत्रों स्टिल अंतर्गत विद्रोह, लकिन as the फौज took कंट्रोल of confederate regions, the स्लेव in those regions were emancipated rather than returned to their masters.
From 20,000 to 50,000 former slaves in regions where rebellion had already been subdued were तत्काल emancipated, और over 3 लाख अधिक यहूद emancipated as the संघ army advanced.
The Proclamation did not apply to the पाँच स्लेव राज्य कि यहूद नहीं in विद्रोह, nor to सबसे regions already नियंत्रित by the संघ army ; emancipation there would come after separate state actions and/or the December 1865 ratification of the Thirteenth Amendment, which made slavery illegal everywhere in the U.S.
The Proclamation did not compensate the owners, did not itself outlaw slavery, और किया नहीं मेक the ex-slaves ( पुकारा freedmen ) नागरिकों.
It made the eradication of गुलामी an सुस्पष्ट युद्ध लक्ष्य, in addition to the goal of reuniting the Union.
On September 22, 1862, Lincoln had issued a preliminary proclamation that he would order the emancipation of all slaves in any state of the Confederate States of अमेरिका कि किया नहीं वापसी to संघ कंट्रोल by जनवरी 1, 1863.
None returned, and the order, signed and issued January 1, 1863, took प्रभाव मगर in स्थितियाँ जहाँ the संघ था already ज़्यादातर regained कंट्रोल.
The Proclamation outraged white Southerners who envisioned a race war, angered some उत्तरी डेमोक्रेट, सक्रिय anti-slavery शक्तियां, और weakened शक्तियां in यूरोपीय कि चाही to intervene to help the Confederacy.
It also lifted the आत्माओं of अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी दोनो in the दक्षिणी और उत्तरी राज्य, और led to अनेक slaves escaping their masters and running behind Union lines in order to have their emancipation enforced.
Sucker Punch is a 2011 अमरीकी काल्पनिक कार्रवाई फिल्मी निर्देशित by Zack Snyder and co-written by him and Steve Shibuya.
it is स्नाइडर 's पहला फिल्मी based on an original script.
The film stars Emily ब्राउनिंग, abbie cornish, जेना malone, वैनेसा हजेंस, Jamie Chung, and Carla Gugino.
The storyline follows the fantasies of a young स्त्री जो is वचनबद्ध to a दिमागी संस्था, as वो makes a योजना to एस्केप the hospital before suffering a lobotomy.
The film was released in both conventional और imax थिएटर in the संयुक्त राज्य at मध्यरात्रि on March 25, 2011.
It प्राप्त generally ऋणात्मक समीक्षाएँ इससे critics, but was a moderate box office success.

Haselblad 503cw साथ ixpress v96c डिजिटल वापस, an उदाहरण of a professional digital camera system
A digital camera ( or digicam ) is a कैमरा कि takes वीडियो or स्टिल छायाचित्र by रिकॉर्डिंग images on an electronic image sensor.
Most cameras sold today are digital, and digital cameras are incorporated into अनेक डिवाइस ranging इससे गुस्से और मोबाईल फोन ( पुकारा कैमरा फोन ) to vehicles.
Digital and film cameras share an ऑप्टिकल प्रणाली, typically using a लेंस साथ a variable diaphragm to focus light onto an image pickup device.
The diaphragm and shutter admit the सही राशि of लाइट to the imager, बस as साथ फिल्मी लकिन the image pickup device is electronic rather than chemical.
However, unlike film cameras, digital cameras can प्रदर्शक बिंब on a स्क्रीन तत्काल बाद होने अंकित, और स्टोर और हटाएँ बिंब इससे मेमोरी.
Many डिजिटल कैमरे can also record moving video with sound.
Some digital cameras can क्रॉप और सिलाई तस्वीरें और perform अन्य elementary image editing.

Multiple web servers may be used लिये a ऊँची ट्रैफ़िक जालस्थल, यहाँ चार सूर्य आग x4200 servers are installed together
Web server can refer to either the हार्डवेयर ( the कंप्यूटर ) or the तन्त्र ( the कंप्यूटर अनुप्रयोग ) कि helps to उद्धार web content that can be accessed through the Internet.
The most common use of web servers is to मेजबान वेबसाइटों, लकिन वहीँ हैं अन्य उपयोग ऐसे as गेमिंग, आंकड़ा भंडार or कार्यशील enterprise applications.
The American Red Cross ( ARC ), also known as the American National रेड क्रॉस, is a humanitarian संगठन कि provides आपात सहायता, विपत्ति राहत और education inside the United States.
it is the designated u.S. संबद्ध of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies.
Today, in addition to domestic disaster relief, the American Red Cross offers services in five other areas : community services that सहायता the मोहताज ; संचार सेवाएं और सुकून लिये सैन्य सदस्यों और उनके परिवार सदस्यों ; the संग्रहण, प्रसंस्करण और वितरण of रक्त और रक्त उत्पाद ; शैक्षणिक कार्यक्रम on preparedness, स्वास्थ्य, और सुरक्षा ; and international relief and development programs.
Issued a corporate charter by the United States Congress under Title 36 of the United States Code, Section 3001, the American National रेड क्रॉस is governed by स्वयंसेवक और समर्थित by जातियाँ दान, आय इससे स्वास्थ्य और सुरक्षा प्रशिक्षण और products, and income from blood products.
The American Red Cross is headquartered in वॉशिंगटन, D.C.
The Chairman of the फलक of राज्यपालों, सेवारत उसके दूसरी three-year term, is Bonnie McElveen-Hunter.
The वर्तमान अध्यक्ष और मुख्य कार्यपालिका Officer is Gail J. McGovern.

A rooster crowing ( साथ ऑडियो )
सही
A rooster ( भी पुकारा a cockerel or मुर्गा ) is a male gallinaceous bird.
It usually refers to a पुरूष मुर्गा ( gallus gallus ).
Immature male chickens कम than एक साल बूढ़ा are called cockerels.
The term `` rooster '' originates in the संयुक्त राज्य, और the पद is widely प्रयुक्त throughout उत्तर अमेरिका, as well as Australia and New Zealand.
In the United किंगडम और आयरलैंड the पुरानी पद `` cockerel '' is अधिक commonly used.
`` Cock '' is in general use as the name for a पुरूष of अन्य प्रजाति of बर्ड, for example `` Cock sparrow ''.
`` Roosting '' is the कार्रवाई of perching aloft to नींद at night, and is done by both sexes.
The rooster is polygamous, लकिन can नहीं गार्ड अनेक nests of eggs at once.
He guards the general area where his मुर्गियां हैं nesting, और होगा आक्रमण अन्य roosters कि enter his territory.
During the daytime, he usually sits on a ऊँची पर्च, प्रायः 3–5 फीट off the ground to serve as a lookout for his flock.
He will sound a distinctive alarm call if परभक्षी हैं आसपास.
The Pokémon व्यापार कार्ड खेल ( पोकीमॉन tcg ) is a collectible कार्ड खेल आधारित on the Pokémon video game series, first published in October 1996 by Media Factory in Japan.
In the US, it थी initially प्रकाशित by wizards of the coast, the कम्पनी that produces, in December 1998.
Nintendo took over प्रकाशन in June 2003.
It is one of Nintendo 's last बाकी दमदार कड़ी to इसके विरासत as a playing card company.
Land Rover is a अंग्रेजों car निर्माता साथ इसके मुख्यालय in gaydon, warwickshire, संयुक्त किंगडम which specialises in four-wheel-drive vehicles.
It is part of the जैगुआर जमीन रोवर समूह, a subsidiary of tata मोटर्स of India.
It is the second oldest four-wheel-drive car ब्रांड in the world ( after Jeep ).
The Land Rover name was originally used by the रोवर कम्पनी लिये एक विशिष्ट गाडी मॉडल, नामित बस the जमीन रोवर, launched by Rover in 1948.
Over the following years it विकसित into a marque encompassing a दायरा of four-wheel-drive मॉडल, सहित the Defender, Discovery, Freelander, Range Rover, Range Rover Sport and Range Rover Evoque.
जमीन रोवर्स हैं फिलहाल समवेत in the कम्पनी 's halewood और solihull plants, with research and development taking place at JLR 's Gaydon and Whitley engineering centres.
Land Rover sold 194,000 वाहनों विश्वव्यापी in 2009.
Although the brand originates from the original 1948 मॉडल, जमीन रोवर as a कम्पनी रै तभी existed चूंकि 1978.
Prior to this, it was a product line of the Rover Company which was subsequently absorbed into the rover-triumph प्रभाग of the अंग्रेजों leyland मोटर निगम ( bl ) following leyland मोटर निगम ’s कब्ज़ा of Rover in 1967.
The ongoing commercial success of the original Land Rover series models, और latterly the दायरा रोवर in the 1970s in the midst of bl’s खूब प्रलेखित कारोबार परेशानियों prompted the स्थापना of a पृथक जमीन रोवर कम्पनी लकिन स्टिल अंतर्गत the bl umbrella, remaining part of the subsequent Rover Group in 1988, under the ownership of British Aerospace after the remains of British Leyland were broken up and privatised.
in 1994 रोवर समूह plc was acquired by BMW.
In 2000, रोवर समूह थी broken-up by bmw and Land Rover was sold to Ford Motor Company, becoming part of its Premier Automotive Group.
In 2006 Ford purchased the Rover ब्रांड इससे bmw लिये around £6 लाख.
This reunited the रोवर और जमीन रोवर ब्रांड्स लिये the पहला समय चूंकि 2000 when the Rover group was broken up by BMW.
In June 2008, Ford sold both जमीन रोवर और जैगुआर गाड़ियाँ to Tata Motors.
This sale also included the dormant रोवर brand
The cover of the first DVD संकलन released by aniplex of the नई Captain Shūsuke Amagai arc
The ninth season of the Bleach anime श्रेणी is नामित.
The series is based on tite kubo 's manga साथ same name.
The episodes are directed by Noriyuki Abe and produced by tv टोकियो, dentsu, और Studio Pierrot.
The episodes ' plot focuses on the introduction of a new Soul Reaper captain, Shūsuke Amagai, and the mystery surrounding the kasumiōji गोत्र, एक of the परिवारों कि constitute the धामों of Soul Society.
the ऋतु began airing on अप्रैल 23, 2008 in जापानी on TV Tokyo and ended on October 7, 2008.
The English adaptation of the Bleach anime is licensed by Viz Media, and this चाप began airing on अगस्त 28, 2010 on कार्टून Network 's Adult Swim, and finished on January 29, 2011.
Five DVD compilations, each containing four episodes of the season, have been released by aniplex ; the पहला dvd संकलन थी released on नवम्बर 26, 2008 and the fifth on March 25, 2009.
A DVD box will be published by Viz मीडिया on दिसम्बर 13, 2011.
The episodes use तीन टुकड़े of थीम म्यूज़िक : एक खोलने theme and two closing themes.
The खोलने थीम is `` Chu-Bura `` by Kelun.
The first closing theme is `` नारंगी '' by lil'b, प्रयुक्त लिये एपीसोड 168 to 179, और the दूसरी closing theme is `` Gallop '' by pe'zmoku, used for the remainder of the episodes.
The regulation of prostitution in the United States is not among the enumerated powers of the federal government ; Under the Tenth Amendment to the United States संविधान, it is इसलिए exclusively the डोमेन of the राज्य to परमिट, prohibit, or वरना विनियमित वाणिज्यिक sex, मगर insofar as Congress may regulate it as part of interstate commerce with laws like the Mann Act.
In most states, prostitution is considered a misdemeanor in the category of public अनुक्रम अपराधों, a अपराधों कि disrupts the अनुक्रम of a community.
It was at एक समय माना to be a vagrancy crime.
Currently, Nevada is the only state to allow brothel prostitution, the शर्तें of जिससे हैं stipulated in the नेवाडा संशोधित statutes.
Only 8 counties फिलहाल contain क्रियाशील brothels.
All forms of prostitution are illegal in Clark County ( which contains the Las vegas–paradise महानगर क्षेत्रफल ), washoe काउंटी ( जिससे contains रेनो ), कार्सन City, Douglas County, and Lincoln County.
The other counties theoretically allow वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति, लकिन कुछ of ये काउंटी फिलहाल have no active brothels.
Street prostitution, `` pandering, '' और जीना बंद of the proceeds of a वेश्या remain illegal under Nevada law, as elsewhere in the country.
As with other countries, prostitution in the United States can be divided into three व्यापक श्रेणी : गली वेश्यावृति, वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति, और अनुरक्षण prostitution.
The East Coast of the United States, also known as the पूर्वी seaboard or the अटलांटिक seaboard और commonly shortened to ईस्ट coast, refers to the easternmost coast of the United States along the Atlantic Ocean.
The states which have shoreline on the East Coast are, from north to south, the U.S. states of Maine, New Hampshire, मैसाचुसेट्स, rhode द्वीप, कनेक्टिकट, नई यॉर्क, नई जर्सी, डेलावेयर, मेरीलैंड, वर्जिनिया, उत्तर कैरोलिना, दक्षिण कैरोलिना, जॉर्जिया, and Florida.
Richard Milhous Nixon ( January 9, 1913 – April 22, 1994 ) थी the 37th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, सेवारत इससे 1969 to 1974, जब he became the only president to resign the office.
Nixon had previously परोसा as a रिपब्लिकन u.S. प्रतिनिधि और सीनेटर इससे कैलिफ़ोर्निया और as the 36th वाइस President of the United States from 1953 to 1961.
Nixon was born in yorba लिंडा, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
He graduated from Whittier कॉलेज in 1934 और ड्यूक विश्वविद्यालयों स्कूल of विधि in 1937, returning to California to practice law.
He and his wife, पैट निक्सन, स्थानांतरित to वॉशिंगटन to कार्य for the federal government in 1942.
He subsequently served in the संयुक्त राज्य नेवी दौरान संसार युद्ध ii.
Nixon was elected in California to the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि in 1946 और to the Senate in 1950.
His pursuit of the Alger Hiss case established his reputation as a leading anti-communist, और elevated उसे to नेशनल prominence.
He was the running mate of Dwight D. आइज़नहावर, the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी अध्यक्षीय nominee in the 1952 election.
Nixon served for eight सालो as वाइस अध्यक्ष.
He waged an unsuccessful अध्यक्षीय अभियान in 1960, narrowly खोने to जॉन F. Kennedy, and lost a race for Governor of California in 1962.
In 1968, he ran again for the प्रेसिडेंसी और was elected.
Although Nixon initially escalated America 's involvement in the Vietnam War, he subsequently ended u.S. भागीदारी in 1973.
Nixon 's विज़िट to the लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन in 1972 खोली राजनयिक संबंध between the दो राष्ट्र, and he initiated détente and the Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty with the Soviet Union the same year.
Domestically, his administration generally embraced नीतियों कि transferred शक्ति इससे वॉशिंगटन to the states.
Among other things, he शुभारम्भ पहलों to लड़ो कर्कट and illegal drugs, imposed wage and price controls, enforced desegregation of some Southern schools, and established the Environmental Protection Agency.
Though he presided over the चंद्र अवतरण शुरूआत साथ अपोलो 11, he scaled back manned space exploration.
He was re-elected by a भूस्खलन in 1972.
Nixon 's second term saw an Arab oil embargo, the इस्तीफा of उसके वाइस अध्यक्ष, spiro agnew, और a continuing श्रेणी of खुलासे परिचय the Watergate scandal and other misconduct by members of the administration.
The scandal escalated, costing Nixon much of his political support, and on August 9, 1974, he resigned in the face of almost certain महाभियोग और हटाना इससे दफ्तर.
After his resignation, he controversially प्राप्त a pardon जारी by his successor, Gerald Ford.
In रिटायरमेंट, निक्सन 's कार्य as an elder statesman, authoring अनेक books and undertaking many foreign trips, helped to rehabilitate his public image.
he suffered a debilitating स्ट्रोक on अप्रैल 18, 1994, and died four days later at the age of 81.
sertraline hydrochloride ( व्यापार names zoloft, lustral ) is an antidepressant of the selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) class.
It थी introduced to the मार्केट by Pfizer in 1991.
Sertraline is primarily prescribed for major depressive disorder in वयस्क outpatients as खूब as obsessive–compulsive, दहशत, and social anxiety disorders in both adults and children.
In 2011, it was the second-most prescribed antidepressant on the u.S. खुदरा market, with 37,208,000 prescriptions.
The efficacy of sertraline for depression is similar to that of पुरानी tricyclic antidepressants, लकिन इसके पक्ष प्रभाव हैं much less pronounced.
मतभेद साथ नए antidepressants हैं subtler और also mostly confined to side effects.
प्रमाण suggests कि sertraline may work better than fluoxetine ( Prozac ) for some subtypes of depression.
उपचार of दहशत विकार साथ sertraline results in a significant decrease of the number of panic attacks and in improved quality of life.
For obsessive-compulsive disorder, sertraline is not as प्रभावी as संज्ञानात्मक behavioral चिकित्सा ; the बेहतरीन परिणाम have महरूम हासिल by combining these two treatments.
Although approved for social phobia and posttraumatic stress विकार, sertraline लीड to तभी modest सुधार in ये conditions.
Sertraline also alleviates the symptoms of premenstrual dysphoric disorder and can be प्रयुक्त in sub-therapeutic doses or intermittently लिये its treatment.
Sertraline shares the common side effects and contraindications of other SSRIs, with high rates of nausea, diarrhea, insomnia, and यौन पक्ष प्रभाव ; however, it करता नहीं कारण वज़न लाभ, और इसके प्रभाव on दोनो संज्ञान और vigilance are relatively mild.
In pregnant women taking sertraline, the drug was present in significant concentrations in fetal रक्त, और थी भी संबद्ध साथ a उच्चतर रेट of विभिन्न जनम दोषों.
Similarly to other antidepressants, the use of sertraline for अवसाद may be संबद्ध साथ a उच्चतर रेट of suicidality.
The Five Heartbeats is a 1991 musical नाटक फिल्मी निर्देशित by रॉबर्ट टाउनसेंड, जो co-wrote the स्क्रिप्ट साथ keenan Ivory Wayans.
Distributed by 20th Century Fox, the film 's main cast includes Townsend, Michael Wright, Leon रॉबिन्सन, हैरी J. lennix, tico कुएं, हेरोल्ड निकोलस of the Nicholas Brothers, and Diahann Carroll.
The plot of the film ( which is loosely based on the lives of several कलाकारों : the dells, the temptations, चार टॉप, विल्सन पिकेट, जेम्स भूरा, फ्रेंकी lymon, sam cooke और अन्य ) फ़ॉलो the तीन दशक करियर of the R & B vocal group The Five Heartbeats.
the फिल्मी depicts the वृद्धि और पतन of a motown प्रेरित आत्मा अधिनियम through the eyes of the film 's main protagonist, Donald `` Duck '' Matthews ( portrayed by Townsend ), who serves as a narrator throughout the film.
However, a majority of the cinema is presented in a लगातार समय लकीर as opposed to परंपरागत फ्लैश backs.
The film includes a significant राशि of असली म्यूज़िक conceived by विभिन्न कलाकारों लिये the फिल्मी 's साउंडट्रैक, सहित singles ऐसे as `` a दिल Is a House for Love ``, `` We Have n't Finished Yet '', and `` Nothing But Love ''.
The film थी released to सबसे उत्तर अमरीकी ऑडियंस कूच 29, 1991 however it थी नहीं बना उपलब्धियाँ to audiences in other continents until 2002 when a DVD was released prior to another DVD release in 2006 for the film 's 15th anniversary.
The फिल्म प्राप्त मिश्रित समीक्षाएँ from critics.
सचिवालय ( कूच 30, 1970 – अक्तूबर 4, 1989 ) was an American Thoroughbred racehorse that in 1973 became the first U.S. Triple Crown champion in 25 years.
He नियत रेस रिकॉर्ड in सब तीन कार्यक्रम in the श्रेणी — the Kentucky Derby ( 1:59.4 ), the Preakness Stakes ( 1:53 ), and the Belmont Stakes ( 2:24 ) — records that still stand today.
he is माना to be एक of the greatest Thoroughbreds of all time.
In 1999, ESPN ranked Secretariat the 35th best athlete of the 20th सदी, the उच्चतम रैंकिंग racehorse on the सूची url_http.
He क्रमित दूसरी पीछे man o ' युद्ध in the blood-horse 's सूची of the Top 100 U.S. Racehorses of the 20th Century.
Secretariat थी sired by बिंदास शासक आउट of Somethingroyal, by Princequillo.
he थी foaled at the मर्ग in Caroline County, Virginia.
Like his famous predecessor Man o ' War, Secretariat थी a विशाल शाहबलूत टट्टू और थी given the same nickname, `` Big Red. ''
Secretariat 's grandsire, nasrullah, is भी the great-great-grandsire of 1977 Triple Crown winner Seattle Slew.
Owned by Penny Chenery, he थी प्रशिक्षित by lucien laurin और मुख्यतः ridden by कनाडाई jockey Ron Turcotte, along with apprentice jockey Paul Feliciano ( first two races ), and veteran Eddie Maple ( last race ).
He raced in chenery 's मर्ग stable 's ब्लू और white checkered colors and his groom was Eddie Sweat.
Secretariat stood approximately tall, और weighed, साथ a 75-inch girth, in उसके रेसिंग प्रधान.
A ठेठ 12 v, 40 ah lead-acid car battery
An automotive battery is a type of rechargeable बैटरी कि आपूर्तियाँ इलेक्ट्रिक उर्जा to an automobile.
Usually this refers to an SLI battery ( starting, lighting, प्रज्वलन ) to शक्ति the प्रारंभ मोटर, the लाइट्स, and the ignition system of a vehicle’s engine.
Automotive SLI batteries are usually lead-acid type, and are made of six गैल्वानी कोशिकाएं in श्रेणी to provide a 12 volt system.
Each cell provides 2.1 volts for a total of 12.6 वोल्ट at पूरा चार्ज.
Heavy vehicles such as highway trucks or tractors, often equipped with diesel engines, may have दो बैटरी in श्रेणी लिये a 24 वोल्ट प्रणाली, or may have समानांतर स्ट्रिंग्स of batteries.
Lead-acid batteries are made up of plates of lead and separate plates of lead dioxide, which are submerged into an electrolyte समाधान of परिचय 38 % sulfuric एसिड and 62 % water.
This causes a chemical reaction that रिलीज electrons, allowing उन्हें to प्रवाह through conductors to produce electricity.
As the battery discharges, the acid of the electrolyte प्रतिक्रियाएँ साथ the सामग्री of the प्लेटों, changing their surface to lead sulfate.
When the battery is recharged, the chemical प्रतिक्रिया is reversed : the सीसे सल्फेट reforms into lead dioxide and lead.
With the plates लौटी to उनके असली कंडीशन, the process may now be repeated.
Battery recycling of automotive batteries reduces the need for resources required for manufacture of new बैटरी, diverts विषाक्त सीसे इससे landfills, और रोकता रिस्क of improper निपटान.
Full-time employment is employment in which a person works a न्यूनतम क्रमांक of घंटों पारिभाषित as ऐसे by his/her नियोक्ता.
Full-time employment often comes साथ लाभ कि हैं नहीं typically offered to part-time, अस्थाई, or flexible workers, such as annual leave, sickleave, and health insurance.
full-time कार्य हैं प्रायः माना careers.
They generally अदा अधिक than part-time jobs, and usually carry more hours per week.
The Fair Labor Standards Act ( FLSA ) does not define full-time नियुक्ति or part-time नियुक्ति.
This is a matter generally to be संकल्पित by the नियोक्ता ( us विभाग of मजदूर ).
The definition by नियोक्ता can vary और is generally प्रकाशित in a company 's Employee Handbook.
Companies commonly require from 30–35 or 40 hours per week to be पारिभाषित as full-time और इसलिए योग्य लिये लाभ.
Full-Time status varies between company and is often based on the शिफ़्ट the कर्मचारी जरूर कार्य दौरान प्रत्येक work week.
The `` standard '' work week consists of five eight-hour दिनों, commonly परोसा between 9:00am to 5:00PM totaling 40 hours.
जबकि a four-day सप्ताह generally consists of चार ten-hour days ; it may also consist of as little as nine hours for a total of a 36 hour work week.
Twelve-hour shifts हैं प्रायः तीन दिनों प्रति सप्ताह, जबतक the कम्पनी रै the intention of paying out the employee overtime.
Overtime is legally paid out anytime an कर्मचारी works अधिक than 40 घंटों per week.
The विधिक न्यूनतम लिये ओवरटाइम starts at Base Pay + One-Half.
The increased भुगतान is माना to compensate थोड़ा लिये the increased fatigue which a person experiences on such long shifts.
Shifts can also be very irregular, as in खुदरा, लकिन हैं स्टिल full-time if the required number of hours is reached.
There are some situations where a व्यक्ति जो needs full-time कार्य is dropped to part-time, जिससे is sometimes a form of constructive dismissal to avoid paying unemployment benefits to a laid-off worker.
Seahorse is the शीर्षक दिए to 54 प्रजाति of समुद्री मछली in the genus Hippocampus.
`` Hippocampus '' comes from the प्राचीन यूनानी hippos अर्थ `` घोड़ा '' और kampos अर्थ `` sea monster ''.
The नियंत्रित substances अधिनियम ( सीएसए ) थी enacted into विधि by the कॉंग्रेस of the संयुक्त राज्य as शीर्षक II of the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970.
The CSA is the federal U.S. drug policy under which the manufacture, importation, कब्ज़ा, उपयोग और वितरण of निश्चित substances is regulated.
The Act also परोसा as the नेशनल implementing विधान लिये the Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs.
The legislation created five Schedules ( classifications ), साथ varying योग्यता लिये a पदार्थ to be included in each.
Two federal agencies, the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug Administration, determine which substances are added to or removed from the various schedules, though the statute passed by Congress created the initial लिस्टिंग, और कॉंग्रेस रै sometimes अनुसूचित अन्य substances through विधान ऐसे as the hillory J. farias और सामन्था reid date-rape रोकथाम अधिनियम of 2000, जिससे लगाई गामा hydroxybutyrate in अनुसूची i. वर्गीकरण निर्णय हैं जरूरी to be बना on मापदण्ड सहित संभावित for abuse ( an undefined term ), currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States, and international treaties.
माया numerals
Maya numerals हैं a vigesimal ( आधार - बीस ) numeral प्रणाली used by the Pre-Columbian Maya civilization.
The numerals हैं बना up of तीन प्रतीकों ; शून्य ( शेल shape ), one ( a dot ) and five ( a bar ).
For example, thirteen is written as three dots in a आड़ा पंक्ति ऊपर दो आड़ा लाइनों stacked above each other.
Lyndon baines जॉनसन ( अगस्त 27, 1908 – जनवरी 22, 1973 ), प्रायः referred to as lbj, थी the 36th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1963–1969 ), a position he assumed after his service as the 37th Vice President of the United States ( 1961–1963 ).
He is one of only four people who served in all four निर्वाचित संघीय कार्यालयों of the संयुक्त राज्य : प्रतिनिधि, सीनेटर, Vice President, and President.
Johnson, a Democrat from Texas, served as a United States Representative from 1937–1949 और as a सीनेटर इससे 1949–1961, सहित छह सालो as संयुक्त राज्य Senate Majority Leader, two as Senate Minority Leader and two as Senate Majority Whip.
बाद campaigning unsuccessfully लिये the लोकतांत्रिक nomination in 1960, Johnson was asked by John F. Kennedy to be his running mate for the 1960 presidential election.
Johnson succeeded to the presidency following the assassination of John F. Kennedy on November 22, 1963, completed Kennedy 's पद और थी निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष in उसके अपना सही, जीतना by a विशाल हाशिया over बैरी goldwater in the 1964 election.
Johnson was greatly supported by the Democratic Party and as President, he was responsible for designing the `` ग्रेट समाज `` विधान कि शामिल कानून कि upheld सिविल अधिकारों, पब्लिक प्रसारण, medicare, medicaid, पर्यावरणीय सुरक्षा, सहायता to शिक्षा, and his `` War on Poverty. ''
Johnson was renowned for his domineering व्यक्तित्व और the `` जॉनसन उपचार, '' उसके coercion of शक्तिशाली politicians in order to advance legislation.
Meanwhile, Johnson escalated American involvement in the Vietnam War, from 16,000 American advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 कॉम्बैट सैनिकों in जल्दी 1968, as अमरीकी हताहत soared और the सलाम प्रक्रम bogged down.
The involvement stimulated a विशाल एंग्री antiwar गति आधारित विशेषकर on विश्वविद्यालयों campuses in the U.S. and abroad.
Summer riots broke out in most major cities after 1965, and crime दरों soared, as उसके प्रतिद्वंद्वियों उठाया मांगे लिये `` विधि और अनुक्रम '' नीतियों.
The Democratic Party split in multiple feuding factions, and after Johnson did poorly in the 1968 New हैम्पशायर प्राथमिक, he ended उसके बोली लिये reelection.
Republican रिचर्ड निक्सन थी निर्वाचित to सफल him.
Historians argue that Johnson 's presidency marked the peak of modern liberalism in the संयुक्त राज्य बाद the नई सौदे era.
Johnson is ranked favorably by कुछ इतिहासकारों क्युकी of उसके domestic policies.
Progesterone also known as P4 ( pregn-4-ene-3,20-dione ) is a c-21 स्टेरॉयड हार्मोन शामिल in the मादा menstrual cycle, pregnancy ( supports gestation ) and embryogenesis of humans and other species.
Progesterone belongs to a class of hormones पुकारा progestogens, और is the प्रमुख naturally occurring human progestogen.
Big Bird is a protagonist of the children 's टेलीविज़न दिखाएँ तिल गली.
Officially performed by Caroll Spinney since 1969, he is an eight-foot two-inch ( 249 cm ) लम्बा उज्जवल primrose-yellow bird.
He can रोलर स्केट, बर्फ स्केट, नृत्य, गाओ, लिखें poetry, draw and even ride a unicycle.
But despite this wide सरणी of talents, he is prone to बारंबार misunderstandings, on एक अवसर भी गायन the वर्णमाला as एक बिग long word ( from the song called `` ABC-DEF-GHI, '' pronounced `` ab-keddef-gajihkel-monop-quristuv-wixyz '' ), pondering what it could ever mean.
He जीवनदान in a विशाल घोंसला पीछे the 123 तिल Street brownstone and has a teddy bear named Radar.
Webtrends is a निजी कम्पनी headquartered in Portland, Oregon, United States.
It provides web, social, and mobile analytics और अन्य तन्त्र समाधान सम्बन्धित to marketing intelligence.

The Second Crusade ( 1145–1149 ) was the दूसरी प्रमुख crusade शुभारम्भ from Europe.
The दूसरी crusade थी प्रारंभ in जवाब to the पतन of the County of Edessa the previous year to the forces of Zengi.
The county had been founded during the पहला crusade ( 1096–1099 ) by Baldwin of Boulogne in 1098.
While it was the first जेहादी राज्य to be संस्थापित, it was also the first to fall.
The Second Crusade थी घोषित by पोप यूजीन iii, और थी the पहला of the क्रूसेड to be led by European kings, namely Louis VII of France and Conrad III of Germany, with help from a number of other European nobles.
The armies of the दो किंग्स marched separately across Europe.
After crossing Byzantine territory into आनातोलिया, दोनो सेना यहूद separately पराजित by the seljuq turks.
The main Western Christian source, odo of deuil, और syriac ईसाई स्त्रोत अर्जी कि the बीज़ान्टिन सम्राट मैनुएल i comnenus secretly hindered the crusaders ' प्रगति, particularly in Anatolia where he is alleged to have deliberately ordered Turks to attack them.
Louis and Conrad and the remnants of their सेना पहुँचे जेरूसलम और, in 1148, participated in an ill-advised आक्रमण on Damascus.
The crusade in the east was a विफलता लिये the crusaders और a ग्रेट विजय लिये the Muslims.
It would ultimately have a key influence on the fall of Jerusalem और दे वृद्धि to the तीसरा crusade at the end of the 12th century.
The only success of the Second Crusade came to a संयुक्त फ़ोर्स of 13,000 फ्लेमिश, frisian, नॉर्मन, अंग्रेज़ी, Scottish, and German crusaders in 1147.
Travelling from England, by ship, to the Holy Land, the army stopped and helped the छोटी ( 7,000 ) पुर्तगाली फौज in the कैप्चर of लिस्बन, expelling इसके Moorish occupants.
Wal-Mart Stores, Inc. ( ), branded as Walmart, is an American multinational खुदरा निगम कि रनों जंजीरों of large discount department stores and warehouse stores.
The company is the world 's third largest public निगम, according to the सौभाग्य वैश्विक 500 सूची in 2012, the biggest private employer in the world with over two million employees, and is the largest retailer in the world.
Walmart remains a family-owned कारोबार, as the कम्पनी is नियंत्रित by the वाल्टन परिवार, जो own a 48 percent stake in Walmart.
It is also one of the संसार 's सबसे मूल्यवान companies.
The company was founded by Sam Walton in 1962, incorporated on अक्तूबर 31, 1969, और सरेआम traded on the New York Stock Exchange in 1972.
It is headquartered in bentonville, Arkansas.
walmart is भी the largest किराना retailer in the United States.
In 2009, it generated 51 percent of its US $ 258 अरब बिक्री in the u.S. from grocery business.
It also owns and operates the sam 's क्लबों खुदरा warehouses in North America.
By 1988, Wal-Mart was the most profitable retailer in the us, और by नवम्बर 1990, it outsold k-mart.
By 1991 it outsold सियर्स in खुदरा, बनाना it अमेरिका 's largest retailer, a distinction it still holds.
Walmart रै 8,500 स्टोर्स in 15 countries, under 55 different names.
The company operates under the walmart नाम in the संयुक्त राज्य, सहित the 50 states and Puerto Rico.
It operates in मैक्सिको as walmex, in the संयुक्त किंगडम as asda, in जापानी as Seiyu, and in India as Best Price.
It रै wholly स्वामित्व परिचालन in Argentina, Brazil, and Canada.
Walmart 's investments outside North America have had mixed results : its operations in the United Kingdom, South America, and China are अत्यधिक कामयाब, whereas ventures in जर्मनी and South Korea were unsuccessful.
Robert William Gary Moore ( 4 अप्रैल 1952 – 6 फ़रवरी 2011 ), थी a उत्तरी आयरिश musician, most widely recognised as a singer and guitarist.
In a career dating back to the 1960s, Moore played with artists including फिल lynott और ब्रायन downey दौरान उसके किशोर, अग्रणी उसे to सदस्यताएँ with the Irish bands Skid Row and Thin Lizzy on three separate occasions.
Moore shared the stage with such blues and rock luminaries as b.b. किंग, अल्बर्ट किंग, कोलोसियम II, George Harrison and Greg Lake, as well as having a successful solo career.
He guested on a number of albums अंकित by ऊँची प्रोफ़ाइल संगीतकारों, सहित a कैमियो रूप playing the lead guitar solo on `` She 's My Baby `` from Traveling Wilburys Vol. 3.
An उदाहरण of rack mounted servers
A web होस्टिंग सेवा is a प्रकार of अंतरजाल होस्टिंग सेवा that allows individuals and organizations to make their website accessible via the World Wide Web.
Web hosts are companies that provide space on a server owned or leased for use by क्लाइंट, as खूब as providing अंतरजाल कनेक्टिविटी, typically in a data center.
Web hosts can also provide data बीच स्पेस और कनेक्टिविटी to the अंतरजाल लिये अन्य सर्वर स्तिथ in उनके आंकड़ा center, called colocation, also known as Housing in Latin America or France.
The पैमाना of वेब होस्टिंग सेवाएं varies greatly.
The most basic is web page and small-scale file hosting, जहाँ फाइलें can be अपलोड via संचिका ट्रांसफ़र प्रोटोकॉल ( एफटीपी ) or a वेब इंटरफ़ेस.
The files are प्रायः वितरित to the वेब `` as is '' or साथ minimal processing.
Many Internet service providers ( ISPs ) प्रस्ताव इस सेवा फ़्री to सदस्य.
Individuals and organizations may also obtain वेब पेज होस्टिंग इससे वैकल्पिक service providers.
Personal web site hosting is typically फ़्री, advertisement-sponsored, or inexpensive.
Business web site hosting often has a higher व्यय depending upon the आकार और प्रकार of the website.
Single page hosting is generally sufficient लिये निजी वेब पृष्ठों.
A complex site calls for a more comprehensive पैकेज कि provides डेटाबेस support और अनुप्रयोग विकास प्लेटफ़ॉर्म ( e.g. पीएचपी, जावा, माणिक्य on Rails, ColdFusion, or ASP.NET ).
These facilities allow customers to write or स्थापना स्क्रिप्ट लिये अनुप्रयोग जैसे forums और सामग्री management.
Also, Secure Sockets परत ( एसएसएल ) is typically used for e-commerce.
The host may also provide an interface or कंट्रोल फलक लिये मैनेजिंग the वेब सर्वर और installing स्क्रिप्ट, as well as other modules and service applications like e-mail.
Some hosts specialize in निश्चित तन्त्र or सेवाएं ( e.g. e-commerce ), जिससे हैं commonly प्रयुक्त by larger companies that outsource network infrastructure.
Obstetrics ( from the Latin obstare, `` to stand by '' ) is the चिकित्सा specialty dealing साथ the परवाह of सब महिलाओं 's reproductive tracts and their children during pregnancy ( prenatal period ), childbirth and the postnatal period.
Many obstetricians are also gynecologists, अर्थ वे perform in दोनो specialties.
In the संयुक्त राज्य, ये physicians हैं commonly referred to as OB/GYNs.
The Wright brothers, Orville ( August 19, 1871 – January 30, 1948 ) and Wilbur ( April 16, 1867 – May 30, 1912 ), were two American brothers, inventors, and aviation pioneers who were credited with inventing and building the world 's पहला कामयाब वायुयान और बनाना the पहला नियंत्रित, संचालित और sustained heavier-than-air इंसान उड़ान, on दिसम्बर 17, 1903.
इससे 1905 to 1907, the भाइयो विकसित उनके flying machine into the first practical fixed-wing aircraft.
Although not the first to build and fly प्रायोगिक वायुयान, the राइट भाइयो यहूद the पहला to इफ़तेरा वायुयान नियंत्रण that made fixed-wing powered flight possible.
The brothers ' fundamental breakthrough was their invention of three-axis control, which सक्रिय the पायलट to steer the वायुयान effectively और to maintain इसके संतुलन.
This method became standard and remains मानक on fixed-wing वायुयान of सब kinds.
From the beginning of their aeronautical कार्य, the राइट भाइयो केन्द्रित on विकासशील a विश्वसनीय विधि of पायलट कंट्रोल as the कुंजी to solving `` the flying problem ''.
This approach differed significantly इससे अन्य experimenters of the समय जो put more emphasis on developing powerful engines.
Using a small homebuilt wind tunnel, the Wrights also collected more accurate data than any before, enabling them to डिज़ाइन और निर्माण विंग्स और propellers कि यहूद अधिक कुशल than कोई पहले.
Their first U.S. patent, 821,393, did not claim invention of a flying यंत्र, लकिन बल्कि, the आविष्कार of a प्रणाली of aerodynamic कंट्रोल कि manipulated a उड़ती machine 's surfaces.
They gained the mechanical skills अनिवार्य लिये उनके कामयाबी by working लिये सालो in उनके shop with printing presses, bicycles, motors, and other machinery.
Their work with bicycles in particular influenced their belief that an unstable vehicle like a उड़ती यंत्र could be नियंत्रित और संतुलित साथ अभ्यास.
From 1900 until their first powered flights in late 1903, they conducted extensive glider परीक्षण कि भी विकसित उनके skills as pilots.
Their bicycle shop employee Charlie Taylor became an important part of the टोली, भवन उनके पहला वायुयान इंजन in बंद सहयोग साथ the brothers.
The Wright brothers ' status as inventors of the वायुयान रै महरूम विषय to counter-claims by various parties.
Much controversy persists over the many स्पर्धा दावा of जल्दी aviators.
अमेरिका 's अगला शीर्ष मॉडल, साईकिल 12 is the बारहवीं साईकिल of America 's Next Top Model and the sixth season to air on The CW network.
It premiered on कूच 4, 2009.

the साईकिल 's promotional song is Lady Gaga 's `` The Fame ''.
