a 100,000 अनुबंध with CoverGirl cosmetics.
The first half of the cycle took place in नई यॉर्क नगर, चलती the दिखाएँ वापस इससे लॉस Angeles last season.
The international destination लिये इस साईकिल is são पाउलो, ब्राज़ील, the श्रेणी first visit to South America.
The number of girls was reduced to 13, the पहला समय चूंकि साईकिल 9, बाद होने कायम at 14 in the last two cycles.
This was the last time paulina porizkova participated as न्यायधीश.
The winner was 20-year-old teyona एंडरसन इससे woodstown, नई Jersey.
This season averaged 4.35 लाख दर्शक प्रति एपीसोड.
Exxon Mobil Corporation, or exxonmobil, is an अमरीकी बहुराष्ट्रीय आयल और गैस निगम headquartered in Irving, Texas, United States.
It is a सीधा वंशज of जॉन D. rockefeller 's मानक Oil company, and was formed on November 30, 1999, by the merger of Exxon and Mobil.
It is संबद्ध साथ इम्पीरियल Oil which operates in Canada.
ExxonMobil is the world 's largest company by revenue and in 2013, became the largest सरेआम traded company by market capitalization in the world.
The company is क्रमित # 5 globally in फोर्ब्स Global 2000 list in 2013.
Exxon Mobil 's reserves were 72 अरब oil-equivalent barrels at the समाप्त of 2007 और, at तब ( 2007 ) दरों of उत्पादन, are expected to last over 14 years.
With 37 oil refineries in 21 countries constituting a combined daily refining capacity of, Exxon Mobil is the largest refiner in the world, a title that was also संबद्ध साथ मानक आयल चूंकि इसके incorporation in 1870.
ExxonMobil is the largest of the संसार 's supermajors साथ रोज़ उत्पादन of 3.921 million BOE ( barrels of oil equivalent ).
In 2008, this was approximately 3 % of world उत्पादन, जिससे is कम than अनेक of the largest state-owned पेट्रोलियम companies.
When ranked by oil और गैस reserves it is 14th in the world with less than 1 % of the total.
A 2012 article in The Daily Telegraph says that ExxonMobil has `` grown into एक of the planet’s सबसे hated corporations, समर्थ to determine अमरीकी विदेशी नीति और the भाग्य of संपूर्ण राष्ट्र ''.
In terms of its environmental रिकार्ड, exxonmobil increasingly drills in terrains leased to उन्हें by dictatorships, such as those in Chad and Equatorial Guinea.
Lee Raymond, the corporation’s chief executive until 2005, was `` notoriously sceptical about जलवायु बदलें और disliked सरकारी हस्तक्षेप at कोई स्तर ''.
The company was widely criticized for its slow जवाब to सफ़ाई इसके 1989 valdez आयल spill in Alaska.
इस आलेख is परिचय the Globe Theatre of Shakespeare.
लिये the आधुनिक पुनर्निर्माण in लंदन, see Shakespeare 's Globe.
For other uses, see ग्लोब थिएटर ( बहुविकल्पी ).
the ग्लोब थिएटर थी a थिएटर in London associated with William Shakespeare.
It was built in 1599 by Shakespeare 's playing company, the Lord Chamberlain 's Men, on land owned by Thomas Brend and inherited by उसके बेटे, निकोलस brend और पोता सर मैथ्यू brend, and was destroyed by fire on 29 June 1613.
A दूसरी ग्लोब थिएटर थी निर्मित on the वही साईट by जून 1614 और closed in 1642.
A modern reconstruction of the ग्लोब, नामित `` शेक्सपियर 's ग्लोब ``, खोली in 1997 लगभग from the site of the original theatre.
It 's a Wonderful Life is a 1946 American Christmas drama film produced and directed by Frank Capra, based on the short स्टोरी `` the महानतम तोहफा ``, जिससे फिलिप वैन doren stern लिखा in 1939 और privately प्रकाशित in 1945.
The film is considered one of the most loved films in अमरीकी सिनेमा और रै become परंपरागत देखने दौरान the क्रिसमस season, alongside popular classics such as Charles Dickens ' A Christmas Carol.
The film stars James Stewart as George Bailey, a man who has given up his सपनो in अनुक्रम to सहायता अन्य और जिनकी निकट आत्महत्या on क्रिसमस संध्या brings परिचय the हस्तक्षेप of उसके संरक्षक देवदूत, क्लेरेंस odbody ( हेनरी Travers ).
Clarence shows George all the lives he has touched and how different life in his community of bedford जलप्रपात होता be था he never been born.
Despite initially performing poorly at the box office due to high production costs and stiff प्रतियोगिता at the समय of इसके रिलीज, the फिल्मी रै आइये to be regarded as a क्लासिक और is a स्टेपल of क्रिसमस टेलीविज़न around the world.
Theatrically, the film 's break-even point was actually $ 6.3 लाख, लगभग twice the उत्पादन लागत, a फिगर it never came close to achieving in its initial release.
An appraisal in 2006 reported : `` हालांकि it थी नहीं the पूरा बक्सा दफ्तर विफलता कि आज everyone मानता... it थी initially a major disappointment and confirmed, at least to the studios, that Capra was no longer capable of turning out the populist features that made his films the must-see, money-making events they once were. ''
the फिल्मी थी मनोनीत लिये पाँच ऑस्कर और रै महरूम पहचाना by the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान as एक of the 100 बेहतरीन अमरीकी films कभी बना, रखकर क्रमांक 11 on इसके आरंभिक 1998 greatest movie list, and would also place number one on its list of the most inspirational American films of all time.
Data गोदाम अवलोकन
In कम्प्यूटिंग, a आंकड़ा गोदाम or enterprise data warehouse ( DW, DWH, or EDW ) is a database used for reporting and data analysis.
It is a central repository of data which is निर्मित by integrating आंकड़ा इससे एक or अधिक disparate स्त्रोत.
Data warehouses store current as खूब as ऐतिहासिक आंकड़ा और हैं प्रयुक्त लिये बनाना चर्चित रिपोर्ट्स लिये वरिष्ठ प्रबन्धन reporting such as annual and quarterly comparisons.
The data stored in the warehouse are uploaded from the operational प्रणालियों ( ऐसे as विपणन, बिक्री etc., shown in the figure to the right ).
The data may pass through an operational data store for additional परिचालन पहले वे हैं प्रयुक्त in the dw लिये रिपोर्टिंग.
The typical ETL -based data warehouse uses स्टेजिंग, आंकड़ा संयोजन, और अभिगम परतों to house its key functions.
The staging परत or स्टेजिंग डेटाबेस स्टोर्स कच्चा आंकड़ा निकाली इससे प्रत्येक of the disparate source data systems.
The integration layer integrates the disparate आंकड़ा सेट by transforming the आंकड़ा इससे the स्टेजिंग परत प्रायः storing this transformed data in an operational data store ( ODS ) database.
The integrated data are then moved to yet another database, often called the data warehouse डेटाबेस, जहाँ the आंकड़ा is arranged into hierarchical समूह प्रायः पुकारा आयाम और into तथ्य और कुल facts.
The combination of facts और आयाम is sometimes पुकारा a स्टार schema.
The access layer helps उपयोक्ता retrieve data.
A data warehouse constructed from an integrated data source systems does नहीं आवश्यकता etl, स्टेजिंग databases, or operational data store databases.
The एकीकृत आंकड़ा सोर्स प्रणालियों may be considered to be a part of a distributed operational data store layer.
Data federation methods or data आभासीकरण विधि may be प्रयुक्त to अभिगम the वितरित एकीकृत सोर्स आंकड़ा प्रणालियों to consolidate and aggregate data directly into the data warehouse database tables.
Unlike the etl-based आंकड़ा गोदाम, the एकीकृत सोर्स आंकड़ा प्रणालियों और the data warehouse are all integrated since there is no transformation of dimensional or reference data.
This integrated data warehouse architecture supports the ड्रिल bas इससे the कुल आंकड़ा of the आंकड़ा गोदाम to the transactional आंकड़ा of the एकीकृत source data systems.
Data warehouses can be subdivided into आंकड़ा marts.
Data marts store subsets of data from a warehouse.
This definition of the आंकड़ा गोदाम focuses on data storage.
The main source of the data is cleaned, transformed, cataloged और बना उपलब्धियाँ लिये उपयोग by प्रबंधक और अन्य कारोबार पेशेवर लिये आंकड़ा खनन, ऑनलाइन विश्लेषणात्मक प्रसंस्करण, market research and decision support ( Marakas & O'Brien 2009 ).
However, the means to retrieve and analyze data, to extract, transform and load data, and to मैनेज the आंकड़ा शब्दकोष हैं भी माना अनिवार्य components of a आंकड़ा warehousing प्रणाली.
Many references to data warehousing उपयोग इस broader context.
Thus, an expanded definition for data warehousing शामिल कारोबार प्रज्ञा टूल्स, टूल्स to निकालें, रूपांतरण और लोड आंकड़ा into the repository, और टूल्स to मैनेज and retrieve metadata.
Portland स्टोन पाषाण on the आइल of Portland, England
An abandoned निर्माण कुल पाषाण निकट एडिलेड, South Australia
A पाषाण is a प्रकार of open-pit mine from which rock or minerals are extracted.
खदानों हैं generally प्रयुक्त लिये extracting भवन सामग्री, ऐसे as आयाम stone, construction aggregate, riprap, sand, and gravel.
They are often collocated साथ कंक्रीट और डामर पौधे due to the requirement for large amounts of aggregate in those materials.
Open mines that उपज खनिज हैं typically referred to as खोलें pit mines.
The word पाषाण can शामिल भूमिगत quarrying for stone, such as Bath stone.
Mormons ( ) are a धार्मिक और सांस्कृतिक समूह सम्बन्धित to mormonism, the प्रिंसिपल शाखा of the latter Day Saint movement of Restorationist Christianity, which began with the visions of Joseph Smith in upstate New York during the 1820s.
बाद स्मिथ 's मौत in 1844 the mormons followed ब्रिघम Young to what would become the Utah Territory.
Today Mormons are understood to be सदस्यों of the गिरिजाघर of यीशु मसीह of latter-day Saints ( LDS Church ).
Some mormons हैं भी either independent or non-practicing.
The center of Mormon cultural influence is in Utah, and North America has more mormons than कोई अन्य महाद्वीप, हालांकि the बहुमत of mormons सजीव बाहर the संयुक्त States.
Mormons have विकसित a दमदार भाव of communality कि तना from their doctrine and history.
During the 19th सदी mormon converts tended to एकत्रित to a सेंट्रल भौगोलिक स्थान, और between 1852 और 1890 a अल्पसंख्यक of Mormons openly practiced plural marriage, a form of religious polygamy.
Mormons dedicate large amounts of time and resources to सेवारत in उनके गिरिजाघर, और अनेक यंग mormons चुनें to serve a full-time proselytizing mission.
Mormons have a स्वास्थ्य कोड कि eschews alcoholic पेय, तम्बाकू, कॉफी, tea, and other addictive substances.
They tend to be very family-oriented, and have strong connections across generations and with extended परिवार, परावर्तक of उनके विश्वास कि परिवारों can be sealed साथ beyond death and throughout eternity.
Mormons also have a strict law of chastity, requiring abstention इससे यौन संबंध बाहर of विवाह और सख्त fidelity within marriage.
Mormons self-identify as Christian, though कुछ of उनके मान्यताओं differ इससे मुख्यधारा christianity.
Mormons मानना in the बाइबल, as खूब as अन्य किताबे of scripture, ऐसे as the Book of Mormon.
They have a अद्वितीय दृश्य of cosmology, और मानना that all people are spirit-children of God.
Mormons believe that returning to God requires following the उदाहरण of यीशु मसीह, और accepting उसके प्रायश्चित through ordinances such as baptism.
They believe that Christ 's church was लौटी through जोसेफ स्मिथ, और is हिदायत by जीना नबियों और रसूलों.
Central to Mormon आस्था is the विश्वास कि परमेश्वर बोलती to his children and answers their prayers.
In financial accounting, एसेट हैं आर्थिक संसाधन.
Anything tangible or intangible that is सक्षम of होने स्वामित्व or नियंत्रित to उपज मान और कि is आयोजित to have positive economic value is considered an asset.
Simply stated, assets represent value of ownership कि can be परिवर्तित into नकदी ( हालांकि नकदी itself is also considered an asset ).
The balance sheet of a कड़ रिकॉर्ड the monetaryJ.
G. Siegel, N. Dauber & J. K. Shim, `` The Vest Pocket CPA '', Wiley, 2005.There are different methods of assessing the मौद्रिक मान of the एसेट अंकित on the संतुलन चादर.
In some मामले, the ऐतिहासिक लागत is प्रयुक्त ; ऐसे कि the मान of the एसेट जब it was bought in the past is used as the monetary value.
In other उदाहरण, the उपस्थित मेला मार्केट मान of the एसेट is used to determine the value shown on the balance sheet.
value of the assets स्वामित्व by the कड़.
It is money and other valuables belonging to an व्यक्तिगत or कारोबार.
Two major asset वर्ग हैं ठोस एसेट and intangible assets.
Tangible assets contain various subclasses, including वर्तमान एसेट और फिक्स्ड assets.J.
Downes, J.E. Goodman, `` Dictionary of Finance & Investment Terms '', Baron 's Financial Guides, 2003 Current assets include inventory, while fixed assets include such items as buildings and equipment.J. Downes, J.E. गुडमैन, `` शब्दकोष of वित्त & निवेश शर्तें '', सामन्त 's वित्तीय मार्गदर्शिका, 2003 ; और J. G. siegel, N. dauber & J. K. shim, `` the बनियान जेब CPA '', Wiley, 2005.
Intangible assets are nonphysical resources and rights that have a मान to the कड़ क्युकी वे दे the कड़ कुछ दयालु of लाभ in the market place.
Examples of intangible assets are goodwill, copyrights, trademarks, patents and computer programs, and वित्तीय एसेट, सहित ऐसे वस्तुएं as खाते receivable, bonds और stocks.
A न्यूरॉन ( or ; भी ज्ञात as a neurone or nerve cell ) is an electrically excitable cell that processes and transmits information through electrical and chemical signals.
A chemical signal occurs via a synapse, a specialized कनेक्शन साथ अन्य कोशिकाएं.
Neurons connect to each अन्य to रूप neural संजाल.
Neurons are the core components of the nervous system, जिससे शामिल the दिमाग, स्पाइनल cord, and peripheral ganglia.
A number of specialized types of neurons exist : sensory neurons respond to touch, ध्वनि, लाइट और numerous अन्य stimuli affecting कोशिकाएं of the संवेदी अंगों कि तब भेजें सिग्नल to the spinal cord and brain.
Motor neurons प्राप्त सिग्नल इससे the दिमाग और स्पाइनल cord, कारण मांसपेशी contractions, and affect glands.
interneurons कनेक्ट न्यूरॉन्स to अन्य न्यूरॉन्स भीतर the same region of the brain or spinal cord.
A typical neuron possesses a cell body ( प्रायः पुकारा the सोम ), dendrites, और an axon.
Dendrites are thin structures कि उठता इससे the कोशिका देह, प्रायः extending लिये सैंकड़ों of micrometres and branching multiple times, giving rise to a complex `` dendritic tree ''.
An axon is a special cellular extension that arises from the cell body at a साईट पुकारा the axon उभरकर और ट्रेवल्स लिये a अलहदा, as दूर as 1 मीटर in इंसानो or even more in other species.
The cell body of a neuron frequently gives वृद्धि to अनेक dendrites, लकिन never to अधिक than एक axon, हालांकि the axon may branch hundreds of times before it terminates.
At the majority of synapses, सिग्नल हैं भेजा इससे the axon of एक न्यूरॉन to a dendrite of another.
There are, however, many exceptions to these rules : neurons that lack dendrites, neurons that have no axon, synapses कि कनेक्ट an axon to another axon or a dendrite to another dendrite, etc.
All neurons are electrically excitable, maintaining voltage gradients across their membranes by means of metabolically driven ion पंपों, जिससे combine साथ आयन चैनल्स अंतःस्थापित in the झिल्ली to generate intracellular-versus-extracellular विशेषज्ञता मतभेद of ions ऐसे as सोडियम, पोटैशियम, chloride, और कैल्सियम.
Changes in the cross-membrane वोल्टेज can alter the फलन of voltage-dependent ion channels.
If the voltage परिवर्तन by a विशाल पर्याप्त राशि, an all-or-none electrochemical पल्स पुकारा an action potential is generated, which travels rapidly along the cell 's axon, and activates synaptic connections with other cells when it arrives.
न्यूरॉन्स do नहीं undergo cell division.
In सबसे मामले, न्यूरॉन्स हैं उत्पन्न by खास प्रकार of stem cells.
astrocytes, a प्रकार of glial कोशिका, have भी महरूम observed to फेरे into न्यूरॉन्स by virtue of the stem cell characteristic pluripotency.
In humans, neurogenesis largely ceases दौरान adulthood—but in दो दिमाग क्षेत्रों, the हिप्पोकैम्पस and olfactory bulb, there is strong evidence for generation of substantial numbers of new neurons.
Super Bowl XLIII was an American फ़ुटबॉल खेल between the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( afc ) चैंपियन पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स और the National Football Conference ( NFC ) champion Arizona Cardinals to decide the National Football League ( NFL ) champion for the 2008 season.
The Steelers पराजित the कार्डिनल्स by the score of 27–23.
The game was played on February 1, 2009, at रेमंड जेम्स स्टेडियम in tampa, Florida.
With this win, the Steelers became the पहला टोली to जीत छह Super Bowls.
Pittsburgh, who finished the regular season with a 12–4 record, also won their second Super Bowl in चार सालो बाद जीतना सुपर कटोरी xl at the समाप्त of the 2005 ऋतु.
the कार्डिनल्स डाला the खेल seeking उनके पहला एनएफएल शीर्षक since 1947, the longest championship drought in the league.
The club became an unexpected winner during the regular season, compiling a 9–7 रिकार्ड, और the playoffs साथ the सहायता of सिर कोच केन whisenhunt, जो थी the स्टीलर्स ' अप्रिय समन्वयक in सुपर कटोरी xl, और the re-emergence of quarterback Kurt Warner, who was the Super Bowl MVP in Super Bowl XXXIV with his former team, St. Louis Rams.
Pittsburgh jumped to a 17–7 मध्यांतर सीसे, aided by linebacker जेम्स हैरिसन 's Super Bowl record 100-yard interception return for a touchdown.
Trailing 20–7 at the start of the fourth क्वार्टर, एरिज़ोना scored 16 अनुत्तरित अंक, सहित wide receiver Larry Fitzgerald 's 64-yard touchdown reception, to take the lead with 2:37 remaining in the game.
But the स्टीलर्स marched 78 गज to स्कोर on चौड़ी receiver santonio holmes ' 6-yard game-winning touchdown catch with 35 seconds left.
Holmes, who caught nine passes for 131 yards and a touchdown, सहित चार receptions लिये 73 गज on कि फाइनल game-winning ड्राइव, was named Super Bowl MVP.
He became the sixth wide receiver to win the पुरस्कार, और भी थी the तीसरा पिट्सबर्ग receiver to जीत the पुरस्कार, following Lynn Swann and Hines Ward.
Despite the global financial crisis and limited amount of ancillary festivities that are normally held before the game, the NBC television network ब्रॉडकास्ट आकर्षित an औसत u.S. दर्शक of 98.7 लाख दर्शक, बनाना it the सबसे देखी सुपर कटोरी in इतिहास to that point.
A diagram of the electromagnetic वर्णक्रम, प्रर्दशित विभिन्न गुण आरपार the range of frequencies and wavelengths
The electromagnetic वर्णक्रम is the दायरा of सब संभावित बारंबारता of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक radiation.
The `` electromagnetic वर्णक्रम '' of an ऑब्जेक्ट रै a अलग अर्थ, और is instead the characteristic distribution of electromagnetic radiation emitted or absorbed by that particular object.
The electromagnetic spectrum extends from below the low frequencies used for modern radio संचार to गामा विकिरण at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) समाप्त, thereby covering wavelengths इससे हज़ारों of किलोमीटर bas to a भिन्न of the आकार of an atom.
The limit for long wavelengths is the size of the universe itself, while it is thought that the short wavelength सीमा is in the vicinity of the प्लांक लंबाई, हालांकि in principle the वर्णक्रम is अनन्त और निरन्तर.
Most parts of the electromagnetic spectrum are used in science for spectroscopic and other probing interactions, as तरीके to पढ़ाई और characterize पदार्थ.
In addition, radiation from various parts of the spectrum has found many other उपयोग लिये संचार और निर्माण ( देखिए इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण लिये अधिक applications ).
लेजेंड
Marchantia, a liverwort
Bryophyte is a traditional name used to refer to all embryophytes ( जमीन पौधे ) कि do नहीं have सच्चा vascular ऊतक और are therefore called ' non-vascular plants '.
Some bryophytes do have specialized tissues for the transport of water ; however since ये do नहीं contain lignin, वे हैं नहीं माना to be सच्चा vascular ऊतक.
Currently bryophytes are thought not to be a natural or monophyletic group ; however the name is convenient and remains in उपयोग as a सामूहिक पद लिये mosses, hornworts, और liverworts.
Bryophytes produce enclosed reproductive structures ( gametangia और sporangia ), लकिन वे उपज neither पुष्प nor seeds, reproducing via spores.
The term bryophyte comes from यूनानी βρύον, bryon, `` tree-moss, oyster-green '' + φυτόν - phyton `` plant ''.
A bank is a वित्तीय संस्था और a वित्तीय intermediary कि स्वीकृत जमा और चैनल्स those deposits into lending activities, either directly by loaning or indirectly through capital markets.
A bank is the connection between customers that have पूंजी deficits और ग्राहक साथ पूंजी surpluses.
due to उनके influence भीतर a वित्तीय प्रणाली and an economy, banks are generally highly regulated in most countries.
Most banks operate under a system ज्ञात as fractional आरक्षित बैंकिंग जहाँ वे थाम तभी a small reserve of the funds deposited and lend out the rest for profit.
They are generally subject to minimum capital requirements जिससे हैं आधारित on an अंतरराष्ट्रीय नियत of पूंजी मानकों, ज्ञात as the Basel Accords.
The oldest bank still in existence is Monte देई paschi di सियेना, headquartered in सियेना, इटली, जिससे रै महरूम ऑपरेटिंग लगातार since 1472.
It is followed by berenberg बैंको of हैम्बर्ग ( 1590 ) और sveriges Riksbank of Sweden ( 1668 ).
बैंकिंग in इसके आधुनिक भाव विकसित in समृद्ध शहरों of Renaissance Italy, such as Florence, Venice and Genoa.
In the history of banking, a क्रमांक of बैंकिंग dynasties —among उन्हें notably medici, fugger, welser, Berenberg, Baring and Rothschild —have played a central role over many centuries.
The Xbox is a video game कंसोल manufactured by microsoft.
It was released on November 15, 2001 in North America, February 22, 2002 in जापानी, और कूच 14, 2002 in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और Europe.
It थी microsoft 's पहला foray into the gaming console market.
As part of the sixth-generation of gaming, the एक्सबॉक्स competed साथ सोनी 's प्लेस्टेशन 2, sega 's dreamcast ( जिससे रोका अमरीकी बिक्री before the Xbox went on sale ), and Nintendo 's GameCube.
The Xbox थी the पहला कंसोल offered by an अमरीकी company after the Atari Jaguar stopped sales in 1996.
The integrated Xbox Live service launched in November 2002 अनुमत खिलाड़ी to खेल खेल ऑनलाइन साथ a ब्रॉडबैंड connection.
It first competed with Dreamcast 's online service लकिन बाद primarily competed साथ प्लेस्टेशन 2 's online service.
Although these two हैं फ़्री जबकि एक्सबॉक्स सजीव जरूरी a सब्सक्रिप्शन, as खूब as broadband-only कनेक्शन जिससे थी नहीं completely adopted yet, Xbox Live was a success due to better servers, features such as a buddy list, and milestone titles like Halo 2 released in November 2004, which is the best-selling Xbox video game and was by far the most popular online game for years.
Xbox 's successor, the एक्सबॉक्स 360, was launched in November 2005.
The Xbox was discontinued in लेट 2005 in जापानी जहाँ बिक्री were poor.
It was discontinued in लेट 2006 in यूरोपीय और early 2007 in North America.
The last Xbox game in Europe was Tony हॉक 's प्रोजेक्ट 8 released in नवम्बर 2006, और the पिछला खेल in उत्तर अमेरिका was Madden NFL 09 released in August 2008.
support लिये out-of-warranty एक्सबॉक्स consoles थी discontinued on March 2, 2009, stating that any in-warranty repair now needed will not be undertaken.
Xbox अभिगम to एक्सबॉक्स सजीव थी रोका on April 15, 2010.
The Gospel According to John ( Greek τὸ κατὰ ἰωάννην εὐαγγέλιον ), commonly referred to as the इन्जील of जॉन or बस जॉन और प्रायः referred to in नई वसीयत स्कॉलरशिप as the Fourth Gospel, is an account of the public ministry of Jesus.
It begins with the witness and affirmation by John the बैपटिस्ट और concludes साथ the मौत, दफ़न, क़यामत, और post-resurrection दिखावे of Jesus.
This खाता is चौथी of the canonical gospels, बाद the synoptics Matthew, Mark and Luke.
states that the book गर्भाशयी इससे the गवाही of the ' शिष्य whom Jesus loved. '
Along with Peter, the unnamed disciple is especially close to यीशु, और early-church परंपरा पहचाना उसे as जॉन the apostle, एक of यीशु ' Twelve Apostles.
The gospel is closely related in style and content to the three surviving Epistles of John such that commentators treat the four किताबे साथ, yet, according to सबसे आधुनिक विद्वानों, जॉन was not the author of any of these books.
Recent Christian Scripture scholarship more और अधिक रै लगाई जॉन भीतर a first-century यहूदी context.
Raymond E. Brown किया pioneering कार्य to ट्रेस the development of the tradition from which the gospel arose.
The discourses seem to be concerned with the actual issues of the church-and-synagogue बहस at the time when the Gospel was written.
It is notable that, in the gospel, the community still appears to define itself primarily विरूद्ध judaism, बल्कि than as भाग of a wider Christian church.
Though christianity प्रारंभ as a गति भीतर Judaism, gradually Christians and Jews became bitterly opposed.
John presents a `` higher '' Christology than the synoptics, अर्थ कि it describes यीशु as the अवतार of the दैवी लोगो through जिसको सब बाते यहूद बना, as the object of veneration, and more explicitly as God incarnate.
Only in John does Jesus talk at लंबाई परिचय खुद और उसके दैवी भूमिका, प्रायः साझा with the disciples only.
Against the synoptics, John focuses largely on अलग चमत्कार ( सहित resurrecting lazarus ), given as signs meant to engender faith.
synoptic तत्व ऐसे as parables and exorcisms are not found in John.
It presents a realized eschatology in which मोक्ष is already उपस्थित लिये the आस्तिक.
The plagues of मिश्र ( ), भी पुकारा the टेन plagues ( ) or the biblical plagues, यहूद टेन calamities कि, according to the biblical Book of Exodus, Israel 's God, Yahweh, inflicted upon Egypt to persuade Pharaoh to release the ill-treated Israelites from slavery.
Pharaoh capitulated बाद the दसवाँ प्लेग, triggering the Exodus of the Jewish people.
The plagues were designed to कंट्रास्ट the शक्ति of yahweh साथ the impotence of Egypt 's various gods.
Some commentators have associated अनेक of the plagues साथ निर्णय on विशिष्ट देवताओं संबद्ध साथ the Nile, fertility and natural phenomena.
The plagues of Egypt are also उल्लेखित in the कुरान ( 7,133–136 ).
According to the किताब of exodus, परमेश्वर proclaims कि सब the देवताओं of मिश्र will be judged through the tenth and final plague:
John Martin 's painting of the प्लेग of hail और आग ( 1823 ).
A role-playing game ( RPG और sometimes roleplaying खेल ) is a खेल in जिससे खिलाड़ी assume the roles of characters in a fictional setting.
Players लो जिम्मेदारी लिये एक्टिंग आउट ये भूमिकाएँ भीतर a कथा, either through शाब्दिक एक्टिंग or through a process of structured decision-making or character development.
Actions taken within many खेल सफल or असफल according to a formal system of rules and guidelines.
There are अनेक फ़ॉर्म of आरपीजी.
The original form, sometimes called the tabletop RPG, is conducted through discussion, whereas in सजीव कार्रवाई role-playing खेल ( larp ) खिलाड़ी physically perform उनके वर्ण ' क्रियाएँ.
In both of these forms, an arranger called a game master ( GM ) usually decides on the rules and सेटिंग to be प्रयुक्त और अधिनियमों as रेफरी, जबकि प्रत्येक of the अन्य खिलाड़ी plays the भूमिका of a single character.
Several varieties of RPG also exist in इलेक्ट्रॉनिक मीडिया, ऐसे as multi-player text-based muds और उनके graphics-based successors, massively multiplayer online role-playing games ( MMORPGs ).
Role-playing games also include single-player offline role-playing video games in which players control a अक्षर or टोली जो undertake quests, और may शामिल सामर्थ्य कि अग्रिम using सांख्यिकीय यांत्रिकी.
These games often share settings and नियम साथ tabletop rpgs, लकिन emphasize अक्षर उन्नति अधिक than collaborative storytelling.
Despite this variety of forms, कुछ खेल फ़ॉर्म ऐसे as व्यापार कार्ड खेल और wargames कि हैं सम्बन्धित to role-playing games may not be included.
role-playing कार्यकलाप may sometimes be present in such games, but it is not the primary focus.
The term is also sometimes used to describe roleplay simulation games and exercises used in teaching, प्रशिक्षण, और अकादमिक शोध.
The American Civil War ( ACW ), also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ), was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और अनेक दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य कि घोषित उनके secession और formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had its origin in the issue of slavery, especially the एक्सटेंशन of गुलामी into the पश्चिमी territories.
Foreign powers किया नहीं intervene.
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 सैनिको मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना, the Confederacy collapsed, slavery was abolished, and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential चुनाव, republicans, led by अब्राहम lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories.
lincoln जीती, लकिन पहले उसके उद्घाटन on कूच 4, 1861, seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक republicans rejected secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his प्रशासन होता नहीं initiate सिविल युद्ध.
Eight remaining slave states जारी to अस्वीकृत काल्स लिये secession.
Confederate forces जब्त numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace Conference failed to ढूँढें a सुलह, और दोनो पहलू prepared for war.
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so निर्भर on `` किंग कपास `` कि वे होता intervene ; none किया और none पहचाना the new Confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, when confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट sumter, a कुंजी फोर्ट आयोजित by Union troops in South Carolina.
Lincoln called for each state to provide सैनिकों to retake the फोर्ट ; नतीजतन, चार अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined the Confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
The Union soon controlled the border states and established a नवल नाकेबंदी कि अबोध the southern economy.
The Eastern Theater थी inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट at the बैटल of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln issued the Emancipation उदघोषणा, जिससे बना समाप्ति गुलामी a war goal.
To the west, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy, then much of उनके पश्चिमी सेना, और the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, Robert E. ली 's confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western successes led to ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड of all Union armies in 1864.
In the Western Theater, William T. शरमन drove ईस्ट to कैप्चर अटलांटा और marched to the sea, destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all दिशानिर्देश, और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the overland अभियान towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending confederate फौज विफल, अग्रणी to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at Appomattox Court House on April 9, 1865.
the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध थी one of the earliest true industrial wars.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, और mass-produced हथियार यहूद employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian factories, mines, shipyards, बैंको, परिवहन और खाना आपूर्तियाँ सब foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest war in American इतिहास, resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको and an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
इतिहासकार जॉन huddleston estimates the मौत टोल at टेन प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 years old, and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40.
The definition of the संसार 's व्यस्ततम विमानक्षेत्र रै महरूम निर्दिष्ट by the एयरपोर्ट परिषद International in Geneva, Switzerland.
The ACI defines और उपायों the following three types of airport traffic:
Passenger traffic : total यात्री emplaned और deplaned, यात्री in transit counted once
Cargo traffic : loaded and मोड भाड़ा और मेल in मीट्रिक टन
Traffic movements : landings and take-offs of वायुयान
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war centred in यूरोपीय कि began on 28 जुलाई 1914 और lasted जबतक 11 November 1918.
It was predominantly called the संसार युद्ध or the ग्रेट युद्ध इससे इसके occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of World War II in 1939, and the First World War or World War I thereafter.
It involved all the world 's great powers, which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple Entente of the United Kingdom, France and Russia ) and the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the ट्रिपल गठबंधन of जर्मनी, austria-hungary और इटली ; लकिन, as austria–hungary था लिया the अप्रिय विरूद्ध the अनुबंध, इटली किया नहीं डालें into the युद्ध ).
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the war : Italy, Japan और the संयुक्त राज्य joined the allies, और the उस्मानी साम्राज्य और बुल्गारिया the सेंट्रल Powers.
Ultimately, more than 70 million सैन्य कर्मियों, सहित 60 लाख europeans, were mobilised in one of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 million combatants were killed, largely because of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of हथियार बगैर सम्बन्धित सुधार in protection or mobility.
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history, subsequently paving the way for various राजनैतिक परिवर्तन, ऐसे as revolutions in अनेक of the राष्ट्र शामिल.
One of the long-term कल्याणकारी of the युद्ध थी the पुनरुत्थान of साम्राज्यवाद in the foreign policies of the great powers of Europe.
More immediately, the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary, on 28 जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered a राजनयिक संकट जब austria-hungary subsequently वितरित an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the previous decades were invoked.
Within weeks, the प्रमुख शक्तियां यहूद at युद्ध और, via उनके colonies, the विरोध जल्द स्प्रेड around the world.
On 28 July, the austro-hungarians fired the पहला गोलियाँ of the युद्ध as तैयारी for the invasion of Serbia.
While the Russians mobilised, the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the रास्ता to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli लिये ब्रिटेन 's घोषणा of युद्ध विरूद्ध Germany.
After the जर्मनी कूच on पेरिस थी brought to a halt—the so-called चमत्कार of the marne —the पश्चिमी सामने settled into a static battle of attrition with a trench line that changed little until 1917.
On the Eastern Front, the रूसी फौज थी कामयाब against the Austro-Hungarians, but was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans.
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the war, opening up fronts in the काकेशस, मेसोपोटामिया और the sinai.
Italy और बुल्गारिया गई to war in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
In Russia, the त्सार 's सरकारी collapsed in कूच 1917 और a subsequent क्रान्ति in नवम्बर brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers.
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front, the allies drove वापस the germans in a श्रेणी of कामयाब offensives और अमरीकी शक्तियां began entering the trenches.
Germany, which था इसके अपना ट्रबल साथ क्रांतिकारियों, agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The war ended in विजय लिये the allies.
कार्यक्रम on the घर fronts यहूद as उग्र as on the बैटल fronts, as the participants tried to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to fight a total war.
By the end of the war, four major इम्पीरियल powers—the जर्मनी, रूसी, austro-hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist.
The successor states of the former two खोया a ग्रेट राशि of territory, जबकि the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The map of सेंट्रल यूरोपीय थी redrawn into अनेक smaller states.
The League of राष्ट्र थी formed in the आशा of preventing another such conflict.
The European nationalism शाखित by the युद्ध और the ब्रेकअप of empires, the परखना of जर्मनी 's शिकस्त और समस्याएं with the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II.
The Deepwater Horizon oil spill ( also referred to as the BP oil spill, the BP oil disaster, the Gulf of Mexico oil spill, and the Macondo blowout ) was an oil spill in the गल्फ of मैक्सिको on the bp -operated macondo prospect, माना the largest आकस्मिक marine oil spill in the history of the petroleum industry, estimated to be between 8 % and 31 % larger in volume than the earlier Ixtoc I oil spill.
Following the explosion and sinking of the deepwater क्षितिज आयल रिग, जिससे claimed 11 जीवनदान, a sea-floor आयल gusher flowed unabated लिये 87 days, until it was capped on 15 July 2010.
The total discharge is अनुमानित at.
A massive response ensued to protect beaches, wetlands and estuaries from the spreading oil utilizing skimmer ships, floating booms, controlled burns and of corexit आयल dispersant.
After several failed efforts to contain the प्रवाह, the खूब थी घोषित sealed on 19 September 2010.
Some reports indicate the खूब साईट continues to leak.
Due to the months-long spill, along with adverse effects from the response and cleanup activities, extensive damage to marine and वन्यजीव habitats, फ़िशिंग और पर्यटन उद्योग, और इंसान स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं have जारी through 2013.three सालो बाद the spill, तारकोल balls could still be found on the Mississippi coast.
Numerous investigations छान the कल्याणकारी of the explosion and record-setting spill.
Notably, the U.S. government 's September 2011 रपट pointed to defective सीमेंट on the खूब, faulting ज़्यादातर BP, but also well operator Transocean and contractor Halliburton.
Earlier in 2011, a White House commission likewise blamed BP and its partners for a series of cost-cutting decisions and an insufficient safety system, but also concluded कि the spill resulted इससे `` प्रणालीगत '' रूट कल्याणकारी और `` अनुपस्थित significant सुधार in दोनो उद्योग practices और government policies, might well recur ''.
In नवम्बर 2012, bp और the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of इंसाफ settled federal criminal charges with BP pleading guilty to 11 counts of manslaughter, two misdemeanors, and a felony count of lying to Congress.
BP also agreed to four years of सरकारी निगरानी of इसके सुरक्षा practices और आचार, और the पर्यावरणीय सुरक्षा एजेंसी announced that BP would be temporarily banned from new contracts with the US government.
BP and the Department of Justice agreed to a record-setting $ 4.525 billion in fines and other payments but further विधिक कार्यवाही नहीं अपेक्षित to conclude जबतक 2014 हैं जारी to determine payouts और जुर्माना अंतर्गत the साफ जल अधिनियम और the प्राकृतिक संसाधन क्षति मूल्यांकन.
As of February 2013, criminal and civil settlements और भुगतान to a विश्वास निधि था लागत the कम्पनी $ 42.2 billion.
`` जहाँ the गलियों have no नाम '' is a song by rock band U2.
It is the opening track from their 1987 एल्बम the जोशुआ पेड़ और थी released as the album 's third single in August 1987.
The song 's hook is a repeating guitar arpeggio using a विलंब प्रभाव, निभाई दौरान the song 's introduction and again at the end.
Lead vocalist Bono wrote the lyrics in response to the notion that it is possible to पहचानो a व्यक्ति 's धर्म और आय आधारित on the गली on जिससे they lived, particularly in Belfast.
During the band 's कठिनाइयों रिकॉर्डिंग the सोंग, निर्माता ब्रायन eno माना erasing the सोंग 's tapes to have them start from scratch.
`` Where the Streets Have No Name '' was praised by critics और became a वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी, peaking at क्रमांक तेरह in the us, क्रमांक चौदह in कनाडा, क्रमांक टेन in the नीदरलैंड्स, and number four in the United Kingdom.
The song has become one of the बैंड 's सबसे लोकप्रिय गीतों और रै remained a स्टेपल of उनके सजीव अधिनियम चूंकि the song debuted in 1987 on The Joshua Tree Tour.
The song was notably performed on a Los Angeles rooftop for the filming of its music video, which won a Grammy पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन प्रदर्शन म्यूज़िक वीडियो.recently the सोंग रै महरूम प्रयुक्त by the एनएफएल 's बाल्टीमोर ravens as their entrance song in Super Bowl XLVII
Thomas Jeffrey `` Tom '' Hanks ( born जुलाई 9, 1956 ) is an अमरीकी कर्ता, निर्माता, writer, and director.
Hanks is ज्ञात लिये उसके भूमिकाएँ in अपोलो 13, Big, That Thing You Do !
, The Green Mile, You 've Got Mail, Sleepless in Seattle, Charlie Wilson 's युद्ध, कैच me if तुम can, फॉरेस्ट गंप, डाल Away, A League of Their Own, The Da Vinci Code, Angels & Demons, as well as animated films like the Toy Story film series, The Polar Express, and The Simpsons Movie.
He has earned and been nominated for numerous awards during his career, including winning a Golden Globe for Best Actor and an Academy Award for Best Actor for his role in Philadelphia and a Golden Globe, an Academy पुरस्कार, a स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड पुरस्कार, और a लोगों 's चुनाव पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता लिये उसके भूमिका in फॉरेस्ट गंप, और कमाई the स्टेनली kubrick britannia पुरस्कार लिये excellence in फिल्मी इससे the baftas in 2004.
Hanks is also known for his collaboration with फिल्मी निदेशक स्टीवन स्पिलबर्ग on छायांकन निजी रयान और the mini-series बैंड of भाइयो, which launched Hanks also as a successful director, producer and writer.
As of 2012, Hanks ' films have grossed over $ 4.2 अरब at the संयुक्त राज्य बक्सा दफ्तर अलोन, और over $ 8.5 billion worldwide making him the highest all-time box office star.
The Cape is an American सुपरहीरो नाटक श्रेणी.
It premiered on NBC during the 2010–2011 television season as a mid-season replacement beginning साथ a two-hour पायलट एपीसोड on संडे, जनवरी 9, 2011 at 9 pm पूर्वी और प्रशांत समय.
An encore निभाई on सोमवार, जनवरी 10, साथ follow-up एपीसोड continuing on सोमवार evenings in the 9 pm timeslot beginning on January 17.
NBC subsequently cut the total क्रमांक of एपीसोड to be aired इससे 13 to 10 as a परिणाम of low ratings.
On कूच 2, 2011, एनबीसी घोषित कि the श्रेणी finale होता तभी be aired on the network 's website.
Halley 's Comet or Comet Halley ( or ), officially designated 1p/halley, is the best-known of the short-period धूमकेतुओं और is दृश्य इससे धरती प्रत्येक 75–76 years.
Halley is the only short-period comet that is clearly दृश्य to the नग्न नजर इससे धरती, और यूँ the तभी naked-eye comet that might appear twice in a human lifetime.
Other naked-eye comets may be उज्जवल और अधिक spectacular, but will appear only once in thousands of years.
Halley 's returns to the inner Solar System have been observed और अंकित by खगोलशास्त्रियों चूंकि at least 240 BCE.
Clear records of the comet 's appearances यहूद बना by चाइनीज, babylonian, और मध्यकालीन यूरोपीय chroniclers, लकिन यहूद not recognized as reappearances of the same object at the time.
The comet 's periodicity was first determined in 1705 by अंग्रेज़ी astronomer edmond हैली, बाद जिसको it is अभी नामित.
Halley 's Comet last appeared in the inner Solar प्रणाली in 1986 और होगा अगला appear in mid-2061.
During its 1986 apparition, Halley became the first comet to be observed in detail by spacecraft, providing the पहला observational आंकड़ा on the ढांचा of a धूमकेतु केंद्रक and the mechanism of coma and tail formation.
These observations समर्थित a क्रमांक of longstanding hypotheses परिचय धूमकेतु निर्माण, विशेषकर फ्रेड whipple 's `` गंदा स्नोबॉल '' मॉडल, जिससे correctly predicted that Halley would be composed of a mixture of volatile ices – such as water, carbon dioxide and ammonia – and dust.
The missions also provided data which substantially reformed and reconfigured these ideas ; for उदाहरण it is अभी समझा कि हैली 's सतह is largely composed of dusty, non-volatile materials, and that only a small portion of it is icy.
The following is a list of the most populous incorporated स्थान of the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका.
As defined by the United States Census Bureau, an `` incorporated प्लेस `` शामिल a किस्में of designations, सहित नगर, कस्बा, गाँव, बरो, और नगरपालिका.
A few exceptional Census Designated स्थान ( cdps ) हैं भी शामिल in the जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो 's listing of incorporated places.
Consolidated city-counties represent a पृथक प्रकार of सरकारी कि includes the entire population of a county, or county equivalent.
Some संचित city-counties, however, शामिल अनेक incorporated places.
इस सूची presents तभी कि portion ( or `` संतुलन '' ) of ऐसे संचित city-counties कि are not a part of another incorporated place.
Note that this list refers only to the population of individual municipalities within their defined हद, जिससे करता नहीं शामिल अन्य municipalities or unincorporated suburban क्षेत्रों within urban agglomerations.
A different ranking is evident जब considering u.S. महानगर क्षेत्रफल populations.
The Mayflower was the ship that in 1620 transported 102 English Pilgrims, सहित a कोर समूह of separatists, to नई इंग्लैण्ड.
Their story is one of travail and survival in a हर्ष नई संसार पर्यावरण.
A New Zealand forward ( in श्वेत ) takes a शॉट on लक्ष्य विरूद्ध Cameroon in the 2011 FIFA U-20 World Cup.
Forwards, also known as strikers, हैं the खिलाड़ी on a टोली in संघ फ़ुटबॉल जो खेल निकटतम to the opposing टोली 's लक्ष्य, और हैं इसलिए principally responsible for scoring goals.
This very advanced position and its limited defensive responsibilities mean forwards normally score अधिक लक्ष्य than अन्य खिलाड़ी.
इस स्थिति requires प्रज्ञा, speed, and power, both of execution and of thought, to perform the role well.
Modern team formations प्रायः शामिल एक to three forwards ; two is the most common.
Coaches typically field one striker who plays in an उन्नत स्थिति ( the केन्द्र आगे ), और another attacking आगे जो plays somewhat deeper and assists in making goals as well as scoring ( the second striker ).
It should be noted that inside forwards develop इससे attacking midfield स्थितियाँ और hence are naturally midfielders.
Barcelona FC star लियोनेल मेस्सी is a ठेठ attacking मिडफील्डर देखी as a आगे due to his shot accuracy.
A California domestic partnership is a legal संबंध उपलब्धियाँ to same-sex युगल, and to certain opposite-sex couples in which at least one party is at least 18 years of age.
It affords the couple `` the same rights, protections, और लाभ, और... the same responsibilities, obligations, and duties under law... '' as married spouses.
Enacted in 1999, the domestic partnership रजिस्ट्री थी the पहला of इसके दयालु in the संयुक्त राज्य निर्मित by a legislature without court intervention.
Initially, domestic partnerships enjoyed बहुत few privileges—principally बस hospital-visitation rights and the right to be claimed as a next of kin of the estate of a deceased partner.
The legislature has since विस्तारित the पैमाना of कैलिफ़ोर्निया घरेलू partnerships to शामिल सब of the अधिकारों and responsibilities common to marriage.
As such, California domestic partnerships हैं functionally समतुल्य to civil unions offered in several other states.
Although the program enjoys व्यापक support in कैलिफ़ोर्निया, it रै been the source of some controversy.
Groups opposed to the recognition of same-sex families have challenged the विस्तार of घरेलू partnerships in अदालत.
Conversely, advocates of same-sex marriage contend कि anything कम than पूरा विवाह अधिकारों विस्तारित to same-sex partners is analogous to the `` separate but equal '' racial laws of the Jim Crow era.
Mark A. Jackson ( born April 1, 1965 ) is an American basketball कोच, और पूर्व खिलाड़ी जो is the वर्तमान सिर कोच of the सुनहरी राज्य योद्धाओं of the NBA.
A point guard from St. John 's University, he निभाई लिये the नई यॉर्क knicks, इंडियाना पेसर्स, लॉस एंजिल्स क्लिपर्स, डेनवर टेंडर्स, Toronto Raptors, Utah Jazz and Houston Rockets in the NBA in a career spanning from 1987 to 2004.
Jackson has also worked as a कमेंटेटर लिये ईएसपीएन और एबीसी alongside उसके पूर्व coach Jeff Van Gundy and play-by-play man Mike Breen.
He was previously an एनबीए विश्लेषक लिये the यस संजाल 's New Jersey Nets games.
South Africa has eleven official भाषाएं : अफ्रीकी, अंग्रेज़ी, ndebele, उत्तरी sotho, sotho, swazi, tswana, Tsonga, Venda, Xhosa and Zulu.
Fewer than two percent of South africans बोलो a पहला भाषा अन्य than an official one.
Most South Africans can बोलो अधिक than एक language.
Dutch and English were the first official भाषाएं of दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी इससे 1910 to 1925.
Afrikaans was added as a भाग of डच in 1925.
Dutch was replaced by Afrikaans when South Africa became a republic in 1961, and Dutch was dropped in 1983, so between 1983 और 1994, दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी था दो आधिकारिक भाषाएं : अंग्रेज़ी और अफ्रीकी.
The English version of the South African constitution refers to the languages by the names in those languages : isiZulu, isiXhosa, Afrikaans, Sepedi ( referring to Northern Sotho ), Setswana, English, Sesotho ( referring to दक्षिणी sotho ), xitsonga, siswati, tshivenda और isindebele ( referring to दक्षिणी ndebele ).
In South Africa, Southern Ndebele is known simply as Ndebele, as most अध्यक्षों of उत्तरी ndebele सजीव in ज़िम्बाब्वे.
The 1993 संस्करण of the संविधान referred to उत्तरी sotho as sesotho sa Leboa, but the 1996 version referred to the language as Sepedi.
Different सरकारी विभाग और आधिकारिक bodies use different terms to denote Northern Sotho.
The main language of government is English even if दक्षिण africans प्रायः लो अभिमान in using indigenous languages for any purpose.
Afrikaans also features prominently in कॉमर्स साथ साथ अंग्रेज़ी as the भाषाएं साथ the उच्चतम number of fluent speakers are Afrikaans and English.
In terms of linguistic classification, the official languages शामिल दो west-germanic भाषाएं ( अंग्रेज़ी और अफ्रीकी ) और नौ bantu भाषाएं.
Four of these are Nguni भाषाएं ( ज़ुलू, ख़ोसा, स्वाति और ndebele ) और तीन हैं sotho–tswana भाषाएं ( उत्तरी sotho, दक्षिणी Sotho and Tswana ).
सोंगा is a tswa–ronga language.
South अफ़्रीकी चिह्न भाषा is a पृथक हालांकि incompletely उभरा national standard language which also subsumes a cluster of semi-standardised dialects.
एल्युमिनियम नाइट्रेट is a नमक of एल्युमिनियम और नाइट्रिक एसिड, मौजूदा सामान्यतः as a crystalline हाइड्रेट, most commonly as aluminium nitrate nonahydrate, Al ( NO3 ) 3·9H2O.
The New York Jets are a professional football team headquartered in florham पार्क, नई जर्सी, representing the New York metropolitan area.
The टोली is a सदस्य of the पूर्वी प्रभाग of the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( afc ) in the National Football League ( NFL ).
In a अद्वितीय व्यवस्था लिये the लीग, the jets share metlife Stadium in East Rutherford, New Jersey with the New York Giants.
The franchise is legally और corporately पंजीकृत as New York Jets, LLC.
The team was founded in 1959 as the टाइटन्स of नई यॉर्क, an असली सदस्य of the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल लीग ; later, the franchise joined the NFL in the AFL–NFL merger.
The टोली began to खेल in 1960 at the Polo Grounds.
Under new ownership, the current name was अपनाया in 1963 और the मताधिकार थी relocated to shea स्टेडियम in 1964 और तब to the Meadowlands Sports Complex in 1984.
The Jets advanced to the playoffs for the first time in 1968 and went on to compete in Super Bowl iii जहाँ वे पराजित the बाल्टीमोर कोल्टस, बनने the पहला afl टोली to शिकस्त an एनएफएल क्लबों in an AFL-NFL World Championship Game.
Since 1968, the jets have appeared in the playoffs तेरह टाइम्स, और in the afc चैंपियनशिप खेल चार times, most recently losing to the Pittsburgh Steelers in 2010.
However, the Jets have never returned to the Super Bowl, making them one of three NFL teams to win उनके लोन सुपर कटोरी रूप, साथ साथ the नई ऑरलियन्स संतो और tampa खाड़ी buccaneers.
the टोली 's प्रशिक्षण सुविधा, अटलांटिक स्वास्थ्य jets Training Center, which opened in 2008, is located in Florham Park.
The team currently holds their annual training camp sessions on the campus of the State University of New York at cortland in cortland, नई यॉर्क जबकि पकड़कर occasional सत्र at the florham Park complex.
psilocybe semilanceata
Psilocybin mushrooms, also known as psychedelic mushrooms, हैं fungi कि contain psychoactive indole alkaloids.
There are multiple colloquial शर्तें लिये psilocybin मशरूम, the सबसे आम being shrooms and magic mushrooms.
Biological genera containing psilocybin mushrooms include Agrocybe, Conocybe, copelandia, galerina, gerronema, gymnopilus, hypholoma, inocybe, mycena, panaeolus, pluteus, और Psilocybe.
There are approximately 190 species of psilocybin mushrooms and सबसे of उन्हें पतन in the genus psilocybe.
Psilocybin mushrooms have likely been used since प्रागैतिहासिक टाइम्स और may have been depicted in rock art.
Many cultures have प्रयुक्त ये मशरूम in धार्मिक rites.
In modern पश्चिमी समाज वे हैं प्रयुक्त recreationally लिये their psychedelic effects.
Recent अध्ययन किया at इम्पीरियल कॉलेज लंदन और जॉन्स हॉपकिंस स्कूल of आयुर्विज्ञान conclude कि जब प्रयुक्त properly, psilocybin acts as an anti-depressant as suggested by fMRI brain scans.
Alaska ( ) is a राज्य in the संयुक्त राज्य, situated in the उत्तरपश्चिम extremity of the उत्तर अमरीकी महाद्वीप, साथ the अंतरराष्ट्रीय boundary साथ कनाडा to the ईस्ट, the Arctic Ocean to the north, and the Pacific Ocean to the west and south, with Russia further west across the Bering Strait.
Alaska is the largest राज्य in the संयुक्त राज्य by क्षेत्रफल, the 4th तनिक populous और the least densely populated of the 50 United States.
Approximately half of Alaska 's 731,449 residents live within the anchorage महानगर क्षेत्रफल.
Alaska 's अर्थव्यवस्था is वर्चस्व by the आयल, प्राकृतिक गैस, and fishing industries ; it has these resources in abundance.
Alaska was purchased from Russia on March 30, 1867, for $ 7.2 लाख ( $ समायोजित लिये महंगाई ) at लगभग two cents per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ).
The जमीन गई through अनेक प्रशासनिक परिवर्तन पहले बनने an व्यवस्थित ( or incorporated ) territory on May 11, 1912, and the 49th state of the U.S. on January 3, 1959.
the नाम `` अलास्का '' ( аляска ) थी already introduced in the रूसी औपनिवेशिक काल, जब it थी प्रयुक्त तभी लिये the प्रायद्वीप और is derived from the Aleut alaxsxaq, meaning `` the mainland '' or, more literally, `` the object towards which the action of the sea is directed ''.
It is also known as Alyeska, the `` great जमीन '', an aleut शब्द निकला इससे the वही root.
The 101 फ्रेंच विभाग हैं विभाजित into 342 arrondissements, which may be translated into English as districts.
The पूंजी of an arrondissement/district is called a subprefecture.
When an arrondissement contains the प्रीफ़ेक्चर ( पूंजी ) of the विभाग, कि प्रीफ़ेक्चर is the पूंजी of the arrondissement, acting both as a prefecture and as a subprefecture.
Arrondissements are further विभाजित into cantons and communes.
The vagina ( from Latin vāgīna, literally `` sheath '' or `` scabbard `` ) is a tubular ट्रैक्ट जिससे is a sex अंग और रै दो प्रमुख कृत्यों ; sexual intercourse and childbirth.
In humans, this passage leads from the opening of the vulva to the uterus ( गर्भ ), लकिन the vaginal ट्रैक्ट ends at the ग्रीवा.
Unlike men, who have only one genital orifice, महिलाओं have दो, the urethra और the vagina.
The vaginal opening is much larger than the urethral खोलने, और दोनो उद्घाटन are protected by the labia.
The inner mould of the योनि रै a foldy बनावट जिससे can बनाएँ घर्षण लिये the penis during intercourse.
During arousal, the योनि gets नम to सुकर the प्रवेश of the penis.
The Latinate plural `` vaginae '' is rarely प्रयुक्त in English.
Colloquially, the word vagina is प्रायः प्रयुक्त to refer to the भग or to the female genitals in general.
However, by इसके शब्दकोष और anatomical परिभाषाएं, योनि refers exclusively to the specific internal structure.
The Cincinnati Reds are a Major League Baseball टोली आधारित in सिनसिनाटी, ओहियो.
They are सदस्यों of the नेशनल League Central Division.
Established in 1881 as an स्वतंत्र क्लबों, the टोली became a चार्टर सदस्य of the अमरीकी संघ in 1882, and joined the National League in 1890.
The club traditionally traces इसके उत्पत्ति to बेसबॉल 's first openly professional team in 1869.
the लाल have जीती पाँच संसार श्रेणी शीर्षक, एक अमरीकी Association pennant, nine National League pennants and ten division titles.
The Reds played in the नेशनल लीग वेस्ट between 1969 और 1993 और have been in the National League Central since 1994.
Since 2003, the लाल have निभाई at ग्रेट अमरीकी बॉल पार्क, निर्मित अगला to their home from 1970 to 2002, Riverfront Stadium.
bob castellini रै स्वामित्व the Cincinnati Reds since 2006.
a शरारत बदबू bomb.
A stink बमबारी is a यंत्र designed to बनाएँ an unpleasant smell.
They दायरा in प्रभावकारिता इससे सरल pranks to सैन्य ग्रेड malodorants or riot control chemical agents.
The Guinness Book of रिकॉर्ड सूचियाँ दो smelliest substances.
One is `` US Government Standard बाथरूम malodor '' ; a मिश्रण of आठ रसायन साथ a stench resembling human feces, only much stronger, designed to test the efficacy of deodorizers and air fresheners.
Another one, `` Who me ? ``, is a mixture of five sulfur-containing रसायन और खुश्बू जैसे rotting खाना और carcasses.
The adage `` A चित्र is लायक a हजार शब्द '' refers to the ख़्याल कि a complex idea can be conveyed with just a single still image.
It also aptly characterizes एक of the प्रमुख goals of visualization, namely making it possible to absorb large amounts of data quickly.
The अभिव्यक्ति `` उपयोग a picture.
It 's worth a हजार शब्द. '' appears in a 1911 समाचारपत्र आलेख quoting newspaper editor Arthur Brisbane discussing journalism and publicity.
1913 समाचारपत्र advertisement
A similar phrase, `` One Look Is Worth A Thousand Words '', appears in a 1913 समाचारपत्र विज्ञापन लिये the piqua स्वचालित सप्लाई House of Piqua, Ohio.
An early use of the exact phrase appears in an 1918 समाचारपत्र विज्ञापन लिये the सैन अंतोनियो लाइट जिससे says : एक of the स्वदेश 's Greatest Editors Says : One Picture is Worth a Thousand Words The San Antonio Light 's Pictorial Magazine of the War Exemplifies the truth of the above statement -- judging from the warm reception it has received at the hands of the Sunday Light readers.
It is believed by some that the modern use of the phrase stems from an article by Fred R. Barnard in the advertising trade journal मुद्रक ' स्याही, promoting the उपयोग of बिंब in विज्ञापन कि appeared on the पहलू of streetcars.
The December 8, 1921 issue carries an ad हकदार, `` एक dekh is लायक a हजार Words. ''
Another ad by Barnard appears in the March 10, 1927 समस्या साथ the phrase `` एक चित्र लायक टेन हजार शब्द, '' जहाँ it is labeled a Chinese proverb ( 一圖勝萬言 ).
The Home Book of Proverbs, Maxims, and Familiar Phrases quotes बर्नार्ड as saying he पुकारा it `` a चाइनीज कहावत, so कि लोगों होता लो it seriously. ''
Soon after, the proverb would become popularly attributed to कन्फ्यूशियस.
The discussion of `` एक चित्र लायक हजार शब्द '' बनाम `` एक चित्र लायक टेन हजार शब्द '' wan येन I hua and 10.000 miles worth 10.000 books is cited in Information graphics where the concept of many in different disciplines and cultures.
A चित्र is लायक a thousand words
Despite this आधुनिक उत्पत्ति of the लोकप्रिय phrase, the sentiment has been expressed by earlier writers.
For example the Russian writer Ivan Turgenev wrote ( in Fathers और बेटे in 1862 ), `` a चित्र shows me at a glance कया it takes दर्जनों of pages of a book to expound. ''
Computer programmer and author Fred Brooks makes an विपरीत बयान regarding प्रोग्रामिंग in the mythical man-month : `` दिखाएँ me अपना flowcharts और conceal your tables, and I shall continue to be mystified.
Show me your टेबल, और i won’t प्रायः need अपना flowcharts ; they’ll be obvious. ''
The phrase has also been spoofed by John McCarthy, the प्रसिद्ध कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक, to मेक the विपरीत पाइंट : `` As the Chinese say, 1001 words is worth more than a picture. ''
A season is a subdivision of the साल, चिह्नित by परिवर्तन in मौसम, पारिस्थितिकी, और घंटों of daylight.
Seasons result from the yearly क्रान्ति of the धरती around the सूर्य और the झुकाव of the धरती 's अक्ष सापेक्ष to the plane of revolution.
In temperate and polar regions, the seasons are marked by changes in the तीव्रता of धूप कि पहुँच the धरती 's सतह, विसंगतियाँ of which may cause animals to go into hibernation or to migrate, and plants to be dormant.
During May, June and July, the northern hemisphere is उजागर to अधिक सीधा धूप क्युकी the गोलार्ध चेहरों the sun.
The same is सच्चा of the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध in November, December and January.
It is the tilt of the Earth that causes the सूर्य to be उच्चतर in the आसमान दौरान the गर्मियाँ महीने जिससे increases the solar flux.
However, due to seasonal lag, June, July and August are the hottest महीने in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध और दिसम्बर, जनवरी और फ़रवरी हैं the hottest महीने in the दक्षिणी hemisphere.
In शीतोष्ण और subpolar regions, generally चार पंचांग -आधारd सीज़न ( with their adjectives ) are recognized : spring ( vernal ), summer ( estival ), autumn ( autumnal ) and winter ( hibernal ).
However, ecologists mostly उपयोग a छह ऋतु मॉडल लिये शीतोष्ण जलवायु regions कि शामिल pre-spring ( prevernal ) और लेट गर्मियाँ ( serotinal ) as distinct seasons along with the traditional four.
Hot regions have दो or तीन सीज़न ; the बरसात ( or गीला, or मानसून ) season and the dry season, and in some tropical areas, a cool or mild season.
In some parts of the world, special `` seasons '' are loosely पारिभाषित आधारित on महत्वपूर्ण events such as a hurricane season, tornado season or a wildfire season.
The six ecological सीज़न
The four पंचांग सीज़न, चित्रित in an प्राचीन Roman mosaic from Tunisia
डच निर्यात in 2006
At the time of लिखने the नीदरलैंड्स is the 17th largest economy of the world.
( see : List of देशों by जीडीपी ( नाममात्र ) )
GDP per capita is roughly $ 42,000 which puts it in the top 10 of richest nations in the world ( देखिए : सूची of देशों by जीडीपी ( ppp ) per capita ).
Between 1996 and 2000 annual economic growth ( GDP ) averaged over 4 %, खूब ऊपर the यूरोपीय average.
विकास slowed considerably in 2001-05 as भाग of the वैश्विक economic slowdown.
2006 और 2007 however दिखाया आर्थिक growth of 3.4 % and 3.9 %.
The Dutch अर्थव्यवस्था थी hit considerably by the जारी वैश्विक वित्तीय crisis and the ensuing European debt crisis.
Several banks went bankrupt, and a number of अन्य था to प्राप्त सरकारी aid.
in 2009 the अर्थव्यवस्था अस्वीकृत with 3.5 %, followed by two years of mild growth.
The Dutch economy is फिलहाल in a मंदी again, साथ an आर्थिक मनाही of 0.5 % in 2012.
Inflation is at 3.2 % in फ़रवरी 2013.
Unemployment has been relatively low compared to अन्य eu राष्ट्र लिये दशकों लकिन बाद mid-2012 it रै देखी a fast increase and in February 2013 it has hit 7.7 %.
The Netherlands managed to maintain its AAA दरजा at तनिक जबतक कूच 2013 according to the three major credit rating agencies.
Historically, the डच introduced और invented the भण्डार मार्केट by the merchandise व्यापार through Dutch West India Company.
The Netherlands is a founding member of the European Union, the oecd और the संसार व्यापार संगठन.
Loyal to the खेल is the दसवाँ स्टुडियो एल्बम और छठे studio album by Tupac Shakur.
It contains remixes of previously unreleased music अंकित by shakur पहले उसके मौत in 1996.

The original फलक of the दृश्य ; मेरेडिथ vieira, स्टार जोन्स, डिब्बी matenopoulos and Barbara Walters in 1997.
The View is an American talk दिखाएँ ब्रॉडकास्ट on एबीसी कि debuted in 1997 as part of the network 's daytime programming block.
Created by Barbara Walters and Bill Geddie, who both also serve as the दिखाएँ 's कार्यपालिका निर्माता, the कार्यक्रम सुविधाएँ a फलक of women as co-hosts.
Along with Walters, the वर्तमान फलक शामिल whoopi गोल्डबर्ग, जो serves as the मॉडरेटर, Joy Behar, Elisabeth Hasselbeck, and Sherri Shepherd.
International संस्करण of the कार्यक्रम हैं aired in several countries.
As of the 2012–13 season, its 16th, The View is the fourth-longest running नेशनल दिन बात दिखाएँ in इतिहास, behind The Phil Donahue Show ( 29 ), the variously-named Live !
programs ( 25 ), and The ओपरा विनफ्रे दिखाएँ ( 25 ).
Prunus virginiana, commonly called bitter-berry, chokecherry, Virginia bird cherry and western chokecherry ( also black chokecherry for P. virginiana var. demissa ), is a प्रजाति of बर्ड चेरी ( prunus subgenus padus ) देशी to उत्तर अमेरिका ; the प्राकृतिक ऐतिहासिक दायरा of P. virginiana शामिल सबसे of the महाद्वीप, except for the far north and far south.
Los Angeles International Airport is the primary airport serving the Greater Los Angeles Area, the second-most आबादी महानगर क्षेत्रफल in the संयुक्त राज्य.
It is most often referred to by its IATA विमानक्षेत्र कोड lax, साथ the अक्षर सुनाया individually.
LAX is located in southwestern Los Angeles along the Pacific coast in the पड़ोस of westchester, इससे the शहर कोर और is the प्राथमिक विमानक्षेत्र of लॉस एंजिल्स संसार Airports ( LAWA ), an agency of the Los Angeles city government formerly known as the Department of Airports.
In 2011, LAX was the sixth busiest airport in the world after Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport, Beijing Capital International विमानक्षेत्र, लंदन हीथ्रो विमानक्षेत्र, शिकागो o'hare अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र, और टोकियो haneda अंतरराष्ट्रीय Airport with 61,862,052 passengers.
The airport holds the claim for `` the world 's busiest उत्पत्ति और गंतव्य ( o & d ) विमानक्षेत्र '' in 2011 कि involves non-connecting passenger traffic.
It is also the only airport to rank among the शीर्ष पाँच u.S. एयरपोर्ट लिये दोनो यात्री और cargo traffic.
LAX is the busiest airport in the Greater Los Angeles Area, but other airports including Bob आशा विमानक्षेत्र, जॉन वेन विमानक्षेत्र, long बीच विमानक्षेत्र, la/ontario अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र, और ताड़ स्रोतों अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र भी serve the प्रदेश.
LAX is also the busiest airport in California and the West Coast of the United राज्य in शर्तें of उड़ान परिचालन, यात्री ट्रैफ़िक और एयर कार्गो कार्यकलाप, अग्रणी it to be referred to as the `` Gateway to the Pacific Rim ``.
Peyton Williams Manning ( born March 24, 1976 ) is an American फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक लिये the डेनवर broncos of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( NFL ).
He played लिये the इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस for 14 seasons from 1998 to 2011.
He is the son of former NFL क्वार्टरबैक आर्ची मैनिंग और an elder bhai of नई यॉर्क दिग्गज quarterback Eli Manning.
Manning played कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल लिये the विश्वविद्यालयों of टेनेसी, अग्रणी the Volunteers to the 1997 SEC Championship in his senior season.
However, No. 3 Tennessee खोया to the no. 2 नेब्रास्का cornhuskers 42-17 in the नारंगी Bowl giving Nebraska and Tom Osborne their 3rd national championship in 4 years.
He was chosen by the Indianapolis Colts with the first overall चुनें in the 1998 एनएफएल ड्राफ्ट.
From 1998 to 2010, he led the कोल्टस to आठ ( सात afc दक्षिण और एक afc ईस्ट ) प्रभाग championships, two AFC championships, and to a Super Bowl championship ( Super Bowl XLI ).
He रै जीती a रिकार्ड चार लीग सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी पुरस्कार, थी the सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी of सुपर कटोरी xli, रै महरूम नामित to बारह प्रो प्याले, रै बारह 4,000-yard passing seasons, and is the Indianapolis Colts ' all-time leader in passing yards ( 54,828 ) and touchdown passes ( 399 ).
In 2009, he was named the best player in the NFL and Fox खेल साथ साथ खेल illustrated नामित उसे the एनएफएल खिलाड़ी of the decade of the 2000s.
In May 2011, he underwent neck surgery to alleviate neck pain and arm weakness he dealt with दौरान the पिछला few सीज़न पहले हस्ताक्षर a five-year, $ 90 लाख अनुबंध एक्सटेंशन with the Colts in July 2011.
Manning had hoped to play in the 2011 season, but in सितंबर 2011, he underwent a much अधिक गंभीर second surgery : a level one cervical fusion procedure.
Manning had never missed an NFL game in his career, but was मजबूर to मिस the संपूर्ण 2011 season.
He was released by the Colts on March 7, 2012, and after an almost two-week period where he visited with and worked आउट लिये अनेक एनएफएल टीमों, he हस्ताक्षरित साथ the डेनवर broncos on कूच 20, 2012.
Manning 's pre-snap दिनचर्या रै अर्जित उसे the उपनाम, `` the शेरिफ '' and is one of the most recognizable and parodied in the NFL.
The Indianapolis Colts ' almost exclusive use of the hurry-up ठोकर led to मैनिंग using an सरणी of इशारों and verbal commands to call the play at the line of scrimmage rather than in the huddle.
The America Tower of the अमरीकी सामान्य बीच, the headquarters of Baker Hughes
बेकर ह्यूजेस is एक of the संसार 's largest oilfield services companies.
It operates in over 90 countries, providing the oil and gas industry साथ उत्पाद और सेवाएं लिये खुदाई, गठन मूल्यांकन, पूर्णता, उत्पादन और टंकी परामर्श.
Baker Hughes has its headquarters in the America Tower in the अमरीकी सामान्य बीच in neartown, Houston.
Baker Hughes Incorporated was formed जब बेकर अंतरराष्ट्रीय और ह्यूजेस औजार कम्पनी merged in 1987.
Baker ह्यूजेस operates विश्वव्यापी साथ प्रमुख कार्यालयों in लिवरपूल, United Kingdom ; Singapore ; Dubai ; a research and maintenance facility in Celle, Germany ; Lafayette, Louisiana ; Houston, Texas ; Pescara, Italy ; and Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
The company is administered broadly in two बांटती : the पूर्वी गोलार्ध साथ पाँच regions ( यूरोपीय, अफ़्रीकी, the मध्य ईस्ट, एशिया प्रशांत और russia/caspian ) और the पश्चिमी गोलार्ध साथ four regions ( Canada, US Land, US Gulf, and Latin America ).
Each of these regions is subdivided into markets.
The United States one- cent coin, commonly known as a पैनी, is a ईकाई of करेंसी equaling एक one-hundredth of a United States dollar.
the cent 's symbol is ¢.
इसके obverse रै प्रदर्शित the प्रोफ़ाइल of अध्यक्ष अब्राहम Lincoln since 1909, the centennial of his birth.
From 1959 ( the sesquicentennial of lincoln 's जनम ) to 2008, the रिवर्स प्रदर्शित the Lincoln Memorial.
Four different reverse designs in 2009 सम्मानित lincoln 's 200th जन्मदिवस और a new, permanent reverse – the Union Shield – was introduced in 2010.
The सिक्का is 0.75 इंच ( 19.05 mm ) in व्यास और 0.061 inches ( 1.55 mm ) in thickness.
The U.S. Mint 's official name for a पैनी is `` '' और the u.S. राजकोष 's आधिकारिक नाम is `` एक cent piece ''.
The colloquial term penny derives from the British coin of the वही नाम, the pre-decimal संस्करण of जिससे था a similar value.
In American English, pennies is the plural form, other plural forms pence and pee ( मानक उपयोग in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी ) हैं नहीं प्रयुक्त.
As of 2012, it लागत the u.S. मिंट 2.00 सेंट to मेक a cent because of the cost of materials and production.
इस फिगर शामिल the mint’s फिक्स्ड components for distribution and fabrication, estimated at $ 13 million in FY 2011.
It also includes Mint overhead आबंटित to the पैनी, जिससे थी $ 17.7 लाख for 2011.
Fixed costs and overhead would have to be absorbed by other circulating सिक्के बगैर the पैनी.
The loss in profitability due to producing the एक cent सिक्का in the संयुक्त राज्य लिये the साल of 2012 was $ 58,000,000.
इस थी a पतला घटी इससे 2011, the साल पहले, जिससे had a production loss of $ 60,200,000.
or more specifically, are ornamental varieties of domesticated common carp ( Cyprinus carpio ) कि हैं रखा लिये सजावटी उद्देश्य in बाहरी कोई तालाबों or water gardens.
Koi varieties are विशिष्ट by coloration, patterning, and scalation.
Some of the प्रमुख रंगों हैं श्वेत, ब्लैक, red, yellow, blue, and cream.
The सबसे लोकप्रिय श्रेणी of कोई is the gosanke, जिससे is बना up of the Kohaku, Taisho Sanshoku, and Showa Sanshoku varieties.
The American Federation of Government कर्मचारी ( afge ) is an अमरीकी मजदूर संघ representing over 650,000 employees of the federal government, about 5,000 employees of the District of Columbia, and a few hundred private sector employees, mostly in and around federal facilities.
AFGE is the largest union for civilian, non- डाक संघीय कर्मचारी और the largest संघ लिये ज़िला of कोलंबिया कर्मचारी जो report directly to the mayor ( i.e., outside of D.C. public schools ).
it is संबद्ध with the AFL-CIO.

ग्रीन : a spore tetrad.
Blue : A spore bearing a trilete चिह्नित – the -shaped scar.
