The evolution of plants has resulted in increasing levels of complexity, इससे the earliest algal मैट्स, through bryophytes, lycopods, ferns to the जटिल gymnosperms and angiosperms of today.
While many of the groups which appeared earlier continue to thrive, विशेषकर in the environments in जिससे वे विकसित, लिये a समय प्रत्येक नई ग्रेड of संगठन became more `` successful '' than its predecessors.
In the Ordovician period, around, the पहला जमीन पौधे appeared.
These began to diversify in the late Silurian Period, around, और the परिणाम of उनके diversification हैं प्रदर्शित in उल्लेखनीय विवरण in an जल्दी devonian fossil assemblage from the Rhynie chert.
This chert preserved जल्दी पौधे in सेल्यूलर detail, petrified in volcanic springs.
By the middle of the devonian काल, सबसे of the सुविधाएँ recognised in पौधे आज हैं उपस्थित, सहित जड़ें, पत्ते and secondary wood ; and, by late Devonian times, seeds had evolved.
Late Devonian plants had thereby reached a उपाधि of परिष्कार कि अनुमत them to form forests of tall trees.
विकासवादी नवीनता जारी into the carboniferous period and is still ongoing today.
Most संयंत्र समूह यहूद अपेक्षाकृत unscathed by the permo-triassic extinction event, although the structures of communities changed.
This may have set the scene for the appearance of the flowering पौधे in the triassic ( ~ ), and their later diversification in the Cretaceous and Paleogene.
The latest major group of plants to evolve were the grasses, जिससे became महत्वपूर्ण in the mid-paleogene, from around.
The grasses, as well as many other groups, evolved new mechanisms of metabolism to survive the low and warm, dry conditions of the ऊष्णकटिबन्ध over the पिछला.
The जीतना सुपर कटोरी टोली receives the Vince Lombardi Trophy.
The Super Bowl is an annual American football game that determines the चैंपियन of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( NFL ).
The contest is held in an American city that is chosen three to चार सालो beforehand, प्रायः in warm-weather or domed sites.
Since 1971, the winner of the American Football सम्मेलन ( afc ) चैंपियनशिप खेल रै faced the विजेता of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( NFC ) Championship Game in the culmination of the NFL playoffs.
Before the 1970 merger between the American Football League ( AFL ) and the National Football League ( एनएफएल ), the दो लीग मिले in चार ऐसे प्रतियोगिताओं.
The first two यहूद ज्ञात as the `` afl-nfl संसार चैंपियनशिप Game. ''
Super Bowl III in 1969 was the first such game that carried the `` सुपर कटोरी '' moniker, the names `` सुपर कटोरी i `` और `` सुपर कटोरी ii `` were retroactively applied to the first two games.
The NFC /NFL लीड in सुपर कटोरी विन्स साथ 25, जबकि the AFC /AFL has won 22.
Eighteen different franchises, including teams that relocated to another नगर, have जीती the सुपर Bowl.
The Pittsburgh Steelers have won the most Super Bowls with six championships ( record 6–2 ), while both the डलास cowboys और सैन फ्रांसिस्को 49ers have पाँच विन्स प्रत्येक ( cowboys 5–3 ; 49ers 5–1 ).
Dallas and Pittsburgh have the most Super Bowl दिखावे साथ आठ, जबकि the भैंस बिल्स have the सबसे लगातार appearances with four losses in a row from 1990 to 1993.
The New England Patriots, Denver broncos और मिनेसोटा वाइकिंग्स have भी lost a record four Super Bowls.
Buffalo and Minnesota are दोनो 0–4, डेनवर is 2–4 और New England is 3–4.
The record for consecutive wins is two and is shared by seven franchises : the 1966-67 Green Bay Packers, the 1972-73 Miami Dolphins, the 1974-75 और 1978-79 पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स ( the तभी टोली to accomplish इस feat twice ), the 1988-89 San Francisco 49ers, the 1992-93 Dallas Cowboys, the 1997-98 Denver Broncos, and the 2003-04 New England Patriots.
The only team with multiple Super Bowl appearances and no losses is the Baltimore ravens, जो in जीतना सुपर कटोरी xlvii unseated और replaced the 49ers in कि position.
Four current NFL teams have never appeared in a सुपर कटोरी, सहित मताधिकार relocations और renaming : the Cleveland Browns, Detroit Lions, Jacksonville Jaguars, and Houston Texans, though both the Browns and Lions had won NFL Championship games prior to the creation of the Super Bowl.
Martin County is a county स्तिथ in the u.S. राज्य of Texas.
As of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी, इसके जनसांख्यिकी was 4,799.
Its सीट is Stanton.
The county is नामित लिये wylie मार्टिन, an early settler.
Martin काउंटी is एक of 30 निषेध, or entirely dry, counties in the state of Texas.
Alkaline phosphatase ( ALP, ALKP ) ( ) is a hydrolase एंजाइम जिम्मेदार लिये निकालना फास्फेट समूह इससे अनेक प्रकार of molecules, including nucleotides, proteins, and alkaloids.
The process of निकालना the फास्फेट समूह is पुकारा dephosphorylation.
As the नाम suggests, क्षारीय phosphatases हैं सबसे effective in an alkaline environment.
It is sometimes प्रयुक्त synonymously as मौलिक phosphatase.
Triticale ( × Triticosecale ), ( ) is a संकर of गेहूं ( triticum ) और rye ( secale ) पहला करवाया in laboratories during the late 19th century.
the अनाज थी originally bred in Scotland and Sweden.
Commercially available triticale is almost always a second पीढी संकर, i.e., a क्रॉस between दो kinds of प्राथमिक ( first cross ) triticales.
As a rule, triticale combines the yield potential and grain quality of wheat साथ the बीमारी और पर्यावरणीय सहिष्णुता ( सहित मृदा conditions ) of rye.
तभी recently रै it महरूम विकसित into a commercially viable crop.
Depending on the cultivar, triticale can अधिक or कम resemble either of इसके parents.
It is grown mostly for forage or fodder, although some triticale-based foods can be खरीदा at स्वास्थ्य खाना स्टोर्स or हैं to be मिला in कुछ नाश्ता cereals.
When crossing गेहूं और rye, गेहूं is प्रयुक्त as the मादा जनक और rye as the male parent ( pollen donor ).
The resulting संकर is बंध्य, और जरूर be treated साथ colchicine to induce polyploidy and thus the ability to reproduce itself.
The primary producers of triticale हैं कैंडल, जर्मनी, फ़्रांस, Belarus and Australia.
In 2009, according to the Food and Agriculture Organization ( FAO ), 15.0 लाख टन यहूद harvested in 29 देशों आरपार the संसार.
The triticale hybrids are all amphidiploid, which means the plant is द्विगुणित लिये दो genomes निकला इससे अलग species.
In अन्य शब्द, triticale is an allotetraploid.
In earlier years, सबसे कार्य थी किया on octoploid triticale.
Different ploidy levels have महरूम निर्मित और evaluated over समय.
The tetraploids showed little promise, but hexaploid triticale थी कामयाब पर्याप्त to ढूँढें वाणिज्यिक अनुप्रयोग.
The CIMMYT triticale improvement program wanted to improve खाना उत्पादन और nutrition in developing countries.
Triticale has potential in the उत्पादन of ब्रैड और अन्य खाना उत्पाद, such as cookies, pasta, pizza dough and breakfast cereals.
the प्रोटीन सामग्री is उच्चतर than कि of गेहूं, although the glutenin fraction is less.
The grain has also been stated to have उच्चतर levels of lysine than wheat.
Assuming increased acceptance, the milling industry will have to adapt to triticale, as the मिलिंग तकनीकों employed लिये गेहूं हैं मुलम्मा to triticale.
Sell et al. found triticale could be used as a फीड अनाज, और बाद शोध मिला इसके मंड थी particularly readily digested.
As a feed grain, triticale is already खूब स्थापित and of high economic importance.
It has received attention as a potential energy crop, and research is currently होने conducted on the उपयोग of the क्रॉप 's बायोमास in bioethanol production.
`` Puff, the Magic Dragon '' is a song लिखा by लियोनार्ड lipton और पीटर yarrow, और बना लोकप्रिय by Yarrow 's group Peter, Paul and Mary in a 1963 recording.
The सोंग हासिल ग्रेट लोकप्रियता.
A college football national championship in the highest स्तर of कॉलेजिएट खेल in the संयुक्त राज्य, फिलहाल the नेशनल कॉलेजिएट एथलेटिक संघ ( ncaa ) प्रभाग i फ़ुटबॉल कटोरी subdivision ( fbs ), is a नामांकन awarded annually by various third-party organizations to their selection ( s ) of the best college football team ( s ).
Division I FBS ( formerly Division I-A ) football is the only NCAA sport in जिससे a वार्षिक चैंपियन is नहीं संकल्पित by an NCAA sanctioned championship event.
Because the championship team is not संकल्पित by a ncaa चैंपियनशिप or टूर्नामेंट इवेंट, it is sometimes unofficially referred to as a `` mythical national championship ``.
Since the NCAA, the sport 's शासी देह, करता नहीं determine or घोषित a नेशनल चैंपियन in इस field, determination of such has often engendered controversy.
A championship team is independently घोषित by विभिन्न individuals and organizations, often referred to as `` selectors ''.
These choices हैं sometimes at हालात with each other.
While the NCAA has never officially endorsed an सालाना चैंपियनशिप टोली, it रै प्रलेखित the चुनाव of अनेक selectors in the official NCAA Football Bowl Subdivision Records.
In addition, various third party analysts have independently published their own lists of what they have determined to be the सबसे legitimate चयन लिये प्रत्येक ऋतु.
These are also often at odds with each अन्य as खूब as व्यक्तिगत स्कूल 's दावा on नेशनल championships, जिससे, लिये any particular season, may or may not correlate to the selections published elsewhere.
Currently, two widely recognized national champions selectors are the Associated Press, which conducts a पोल of फ़ुटबॉल sportswriters, और the यूएसए आज कोच ' पोल, a पोल of अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल कोच संघ क्रियाशील कोच कि is contractually obligated to name the winner of the Bowl Championship Series championship game as its national champion.
The Milwaukee ब्रेवर्स हैं a पेशेवर बेसबॉल टोली आधारित in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
The team is a member of the सेंट्रल प्रभाग of प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल 's नेशनल लीग and plays its home games at Miller Park.
The team is so named क्युकी of the नगर 's संघ with the brewing industry.
The Washington Nationals are a पेशेवर बेसबॉल टोली आधारित in वॉशिंगटन, D.C.
The नागरिकों हैं a सदस्य of the ईस्ट प्रभाग of the National League of Major League Baseball ( MLB ).
The team 's home ballpark is नागरिकों पार्क, स्तिथ on दक्षिण कैपिटल गली in southeast D.C., near the Anacostia River.
The park opened in 2008, replacing RFK स्टेडियम, the टोली 's घर इससे 2005 to 2007.
The Nationals ' name derives इससे the पूर्व वॉशिंगटन बेसबॉल टोली कि था the वही नाम ( प्रयुक्त interchangeably with Senators ).
Their nickname is `` the Nats '' —a shortened संस्करण कि थी भी प्रयुक्त by the old D.C. teams.
An expansion मताधिकार, the क्लबों थी संस्थापित in as the Montreal Expos, the first major league team in Canada.
They यहूद आधारित in मॉन्ट्रियल, क्यूबेक, और निभाई उनके home games at Jarry Park Stadium and later in Olympic Stadium.
In, the Expos won a division championship, won their first-ever playoff series by defeating the Philadelphia Phillies, 3–2, and advanced to the National League Championship Series, where they would go on to lose to the लॉस एंजिल्स डॉजर्स, 3–2, in उनके तभी postseason रूप दौरान the strike-shortened season.
The Expos had their highest जीतना प्रतिशत in the strike-shortened ऋतु of, when the team had the best record in baseball.
The team 's subsequent shedding of खिलाड़ी caused fan interest to drop off.
After the 2001 season, MLB considered revoking the team 's मताधिकार, साथ साथ either the मिनेसोटा जुड़वा or the tampa खाड़ी शैतान Rays.
After being purchased by MLB in 2002, the team was moved before the season to Washington and renamed the Nationals, the first relocation चूंकि the दूसरी वॉशिंगटन सीनेटरों स्थानांतरित to आर्लिंगटन, टेक्सास, और became the Texas Rangers in.
The Nationals are one of two MLB franchises, and the तभी एक in the नेशनल लीग, कि रै never played in a World Series ( the Seattle Mariners are the other ).
A contingent fee ( in the United States ) or conditional शुल्क ( in इंग्लैण्ड और वेल्स ) is कोई शुल्क लिये सेवाएं provided जहाँ the शुल्क is देय तभी if there is a favourable result.
In the law, it is defined as a `` fee चार्ज लिये a वकील 's सेवाएं तभी if the lawsuit is successful or is favorably settled out of court....
Contingent fees are प्रायः गणना as a प्रतिशत of the क्लाएंट 's net recovery. ''
In the English legal system, it is generally referred to as no जीत no fee.
A conditional fee agreement between a विधि कड़ और a client.
The usual form of this agreement is that the solicitor will take a law case on the समझना कि if खोया, no भुगतान is made.
However, if the case is won, the lawyer will be हकदार to the सामान्य शुल्क आधारित on hourly billing, plus a success fee.
The success fee in इंग्लैण्ड जरूर be as a प्रतिशत no वृहद than 100 % of the normal fee.
This contrasts with the contingency fee in the us, जिससे देता the कामयाब attorney a प्रतिशत of the damages awarded in favor of his client.
This makes it easier for the poor to pursue their civil rights चूंकि वरना, to मुकदमा किसी लिये a अपकृत्य, एक जरूर पहला be धनवान पर्याप्त to pursue such litigation in the first place.
However, because of the high risk, few attorneys will take मामले on a आकस्मिकता आधार जबतक वे महसूस the मामला रै good merit.
According to a 2004 book by law professor Herbert Kritzer, contingent fees were allowed as of that year in the following countries : Australia, Brazil, कनाडा, the डोमिनिकन गणतंत्र, फ़्रांस, यूनानियों, आयरलैंड, जापानी, नई जीलैंड, the संयुक्त किंगडम और the संयुक्त States.
They are also allowed in निजी चोट क्रियाएँ in Lithuania.
recently, वे have महरूम अनुमत in Belgium as well.
a convocation ( लैटिन 'calling साथ ', translating the Greek ecclesia ) is a group of people formally assembled for a special purpose.
Sons of अराजकता is a टेलीविज़न नाटक श्रेणी निर्मित by कर्ट sutter परिचय the जीवनदान of a close-knit गैरकानूनी मोटरसाइकिल क्लबों ऑपरेटिंग in Charming, a fictional town in California 's Central Valley.
The show centers on समर्थक जैक्सन `` जैक्स '' teller ( चार्ली hunnam ), the then-vice अध्यक्ष of the club, who begins questioning the club and himself.
Sons of अराजकता premiered on सितंबर 3, 2008, on cable network FX.
The third season of the series आकर्षित an औसत of 4.9 लाख दर्शक प्रति सप्ताह, बनाना it fx 's उच्चतम रेटेड श्रेणी कभी, surpassing fx 's अन्य hits The Shield, Nip/Tuck, and Rescue Me.
On February 3, 2012, Sons of अराजकता थी नवीनीकृत लिये दो अतिरिक्त सीज़न, a fifth and a sixth.
Those involved in the production of the series imply कि a सातवाँ और फाइनल ऋतु is निर्माता Kurt Sutter 's plan.
The Grímsvötn sub-glacial lakes ( ; vötn = `` waters '', एकवचन : ) और the ज्वालामुखी of the same name are in South-East Iceland.
They are in the highlands of आइसलैंड at the northwestern पक्ष of the Vatnajökull ice-cap.
The झीलों हैं at, at an elevation of.
Beneath the झीलों is the मैग्मा कक्ष of the Grímsvötn volcano.
Grímsvötn is a basaltic ज्वालामुखी जिससे रै the उच्चतम फटना आवृत्ति of सब the ज्वालामुखी in आइसलैंड और रै a southwest-northeast-trending fissure system.
The massive climate-impacting laki फिशर फटना of 1783–1784 थी a भाग of the वही fissure system.
grímsvötn थी erupting at the वही समय as laki दौरान 1783, but continued to erupt until 1785.
Because most of the volcano lies underneath Vatnajökull, most of its eruptions have महरूम subglacial और the बातचीत of मैग्मा और meltwater इससे the बर्फ causes phreatomagmatic explosive activity.
On 21 May 2011 at 19:25 utc, an फटना began, साथ ऊँची plumes accompanied by अनेक भूकंप, resulting in रद्दीकरण of 900 flights in Iceland, and in the United Kingdom, Greenland, Germany, Ireland and Norway on 22–25 May.
Until 25 May the eruption scale had been larger than कि of the 2010 फटना of eyjafjallajökull.
The eruption stopped at 02:40 UTC on 25 May 2011, although वहीँ थी कुछ विस्फोटक कार्यकलाप इससे the tephra vents affecting only the area around the crater.
Vetting is the process of performing a background जाँच on किसी पहले offering उन्हें नियुक्ति, conferring an award, etc.
A prospective person or project may be vetted पहले बनाना a भर्ती निर्णय.
In addition, in intelligence महफ़िल, एसेट हैं vetted to determine उनके उपयोगिता.
पूर्व मुख्यालय and current corporate offices
Caesars Entertainment Corporation ( formerly Harrah 's Entertainment from 1995 to 2010 ) is an American public gaming निगम कि owns और operates over 50 कसीनो, होटल, और सात गोल्फ़ पाठ्यक्रम अंतर्गत अनेक ब्रांड्स.
The company, based in स्वर्ग, नेवाडा, is the largest गेमिंग कम्पनी in the संसार, with annual revenues of $ 8.9 billion ( 2010 ).
Caesars is a public company, with a joint venture of Apollo वैश्विक प्रबन्धन और टेक्सास प्रशांत समूह ownig a विशाल portion of the stack and Blackstone Group also holding a significant stake.
The name change from `` harrah 's entertainment inc. '' to `` caesars entertainment निगम '' थी बना official on November 23, 2010.
harrah 's remains a कुंजी ब्रांड in the company.
On November 5, 2010, harrah 's घोषित an आरंभिक पब्लिक offering of 31,250,000 shares but retracted this offering on November 19.
A Permanent Resident in Canada is a person who is not a Canadian citizen but जो रै महरूम granted अनुमति to सजीव और कार्य in कनाडा बगैर कोई समय limit on his or her stay.
A permanent resident must live in कनाडा लिये दो सालो आउट of प्रत्येक पाँच or risk losing that status.
A Permanent Resident holds many of the वही अधिकारों और जिम्मेदारियों as a कनाडाई नागरिक, among अन्य the सही to कार्य लिये कोई एंटरप्राइज़ as खूब as लिये the federal or provincial government ( under restriction of access rights to certain regulated professions ).
The main मतभेद हैं कि निवासियों can not :
vote in चुनावों in कनाडा ;
चलाएं लिये elected office ;
hold कनाडाई passports ;
In addition, they may be allowed to जुड़ें कनाडा 's हथियारबंद शक्तियां if the नेशनल interest would not be prejudiced.
Permanent residents also रिस्क प्रत्यर्पण लिये गंभीर अपराधों वचनबद्ध while resident in Canada.
Permanent निवासियों may लागू लिये कनाडाई नागरिकता बाद three years in Canada ; however this is not mandatory.
Erica Kane is a fictional अक्षर इससे the अमरीकी एबीसी दिन soap opera All My Children.
The अक्षर थी portrayed by अभिनेत्री सुसान lucci from her debut on January 16, 1970 until the last broadcast television episode aired on September 23, 2011.
On February 11, 2013, it थी घोषित कि lucci होगा guest-star on the Prospect Park 's continuation of All My Children.
In the U.S., Erica is माना to be the सबसे लोकप्रिय character in soap opera history.
Regarding the north-american मार्केट, tv मार्गदर्शिका काल्स उसके `` unequivocally the सबसे प्रसिद्ध soap opera character in the history of daytime TV '', and included her in their 2013 list of The 60 Nastiest Villains of All Time.
A graph of the US CPI from 1913 to 2006 ( in blue ), और इसके प्रतिशत सालाना बदलें ( in red )
A consumer price index ( CPI ) उपायों परिवर्तन in the दाम स्तर of a मार्केट बास्केट of उपभोक्ता goods and services purchased by households.
The CPI in the United States is defined by the Bureau of Labor Statistics as `` a measure of the औसत बदलें over समय in the कीमतें सशुल्क by शहरी उपभोक्ता लिये a मार्केट basket of consumer goods and services. ''
The CPI is a सांख्यिकीय अनुमान constructed using the prices of a sample of representative items whose prices are collected periodically.
Sub-indexes and sub-sub-indexes are computed for different categories and sub-categories of goods and services, being संयुक्त to उपज the overall अनुक्रमणिका साथ weights reflecting उनके साझा in the कुल of the consumer expenditures covered by the index.
It is one of अनेक दाम indices गणना by सबसे नेशनल statistical agencies.
The annual percentage change in a cpi is प्रयुक्त as a माप of inflation.
A CPI can be used to अनुक्रमणिका ( i.e., समायोजन लिये the प्रभाव of महंगाई ) the real value of wages, salaries, pensions, for regulating prices and for deflating monetary magnitudes to show changes in real values.
In most countries, the CPI is, साथ साथ the जनसांख्यिकी जनसांख्यिकी और the यूएसए नेशनल Income and Product Accounts, one of the most closely watched national economic statistics.
Knocking on wood, or to touch wood, refers to the apotropaic tradition in western folklore of literally touching/knocking on लकडी, or merely stating कि तुम हैं doing or intend वही, in अनुक्रम to avoid `` tempting भाग्य `` बाद बनाना a favourable observation, a boast, or declaration concerning one 's own death.
रॉकर भुजा
Generally referred to within the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of the आतंरिक दहन इंजन of ऑटोमोटिव, समुद्री, मोटरसाइकिल और प्रत्यागमनी विमानन engines, the rocker arm is an oscillating lever that conveys radial movement from the cam lobe into linear movement at the poppet valve to open it.
One end is raised और lowered by a घूर्णन पालि of the camshaft ( either सीधे or via a tappet ( lifter ) और pushrod ) while the other end acts on the valve stem.
When the camshaft lobe raises the outside of the arm, the अंदर दबाता bas on the वाल्व स्टेम, खोलने the valve.
When the outside of the भुजा is permitted to वापसी due to the camshafts रोटेशन, the अंदर उदय, allowing the valve spring to close the valve.
the ड्राइव कैम is चलित by the camshaft.
This pushes the rocker भुजा up और bas परिचय the trunnion pin or rocker shaft.
Friction may be घटाया at the पाइंट of सम्पर्क साथ the valve stem by a roller cam follower.
A समान व्यवस्था हस्तांतरण the motion via another roller cam follower to a second rocker arm.
इस घुमाता परिचय the रॉकर शाफ्ट, और हस्तांतरण the motion via a tappet to the poppet valve.
In this मामला इस opens the सेवन valve to the cylinder head.
The effective leverage of the arm ( and thus the force it can exert on the वाल्व स्टेम ) is संकल्पित by the रॉकर भुजा अनुपात, the अनुपात of the अलहदा इससे the रॉकर भुजा 's बीच of रोटेशन to the tip divided by the distance from the center of rotation to the point acted on by the camshaft or pushrod.
Current automotive design favors रॉकर भुजा ratios of परिचय 1.5:1 to 1.8:1.
However, in the past smaller positive ratios ( the valve lift is वृहद than the कैम लिफ्ट ) और भी ऋणात्मक ratios ( वाल्व लिफ्ट छोटी than the cam lift ) have been used.
अनेक pre-ww2 इंजन use 1:1 ( neutral ) ratios.
For car engines the रॉकर बाहें हैं generally स्टील stampings, providing a reasonable balance of strength, weight and economical cost.
Because the rocker arms are, in भाग, प्रत्यागमनी वज़न, excessive द्रव्यमान विशेषकर at the लीवर ends हद the engine 's ability to reach high operating speeds.
`` The Night the Lights Went Out in Georgia '' is a Southern Gothic song लिखा by songwriter bobby रसेल और performed in 1972 by his then-wife Vicki Lawrence.
reba mcentire बाद covered it in 1991.
Recorded in late October 1972 in United/Western Studios on Sunset in हॉलीवुड और released कम than दो सप्ताह बाद in नवम्बर 1972, the सोंग centers around the older brother of the narrator, falsely convicted of and executed for a murder, which the narrator herself has committed.
In postal mail, a return address is an explicit inclusion of the address of the व्यक्ति sending the संदेश.
It provides the recipient ( and sometimes authorized intermediaries ) with a means to determine कैसा to respond to the प्रेषक of the संदेश if needed.
The return address need not include a sender 's name, but should include address or P.O. box details in the वही रास्ता as the डिलीवरी पता should.
In some countries, the वापसी पता is conventionally स्तिथ in the अपर left hand corner of the envelope, card, or label.
In the संयुक्त किंगडम, the वापसी पता is प्रायः लगाई on the reverse of the envelope, near the top.
Businesses often use लिफाफे preprinted with a return address.
Many individuals have चादरें of चिपकने लेबल्स preprinted with their home address to affix to their correspondence.
धर्मार्थ sometimes शामिल ऐसे चादरें in mailshots.
Rolls of Return Address Labels can be purchased from companies that sell personalized लेबल्स to provide individuals an आसान रास्ता to छिलके और स्टिक वापसी पता लेबल्स to their envelopes.
The return पता is नहीं जरूरी on डाक mail.
However, कमी of a वापसी पता रोकता the डाक सेवा इससे होने समर्थ to वापसी the मद if it proves undeliverable ; such as from damage, postage due, or invalid destination.
Such mail may यूँ become मुर्दे अक्षर mail.
Should the return पता be of a अलग राज्य or देश, the मेल may be routed through that location for ease of return.
A nerve guidance conduit ( also referred to as an कृत्रिम तंत्रिका conduit or कृत्रिम तंत्रिका graft, as opposed to an autograft ) is an कृत्रिम अर्थात् of guiding axonal regrowth to facilitate nerve regeneration and is one of several clinical treatments for nerve injuries.
When direct suturing of the दो आउट of a severed तंत्रिका can नहीं be संपन्नता बगैर टेंशन, the मानक clinical treatment for peripheral nerve injuries is autologous nerve grafting.
Due to the limited availability of donor tissue and functional recovery in autologous nerve grafting, neural tissue engineering research has केन्द्रित on the विकास of bioartificial तंत्रिका मार्गदर्शन conduits as an वैकल्पिक उपचार, especially for large defects.
Similar techniques are also being explored for nerve मरम्मत in the स्पाइनल cord लकिन तंत्रिका regeneration in the सेंट्रल बेचैन प्रणाली मुद्राएँ a वृहद चुनौती because its axons do not regenerate appreciably in their native environment.
The creation of artificial conduits is भी ज्ञात as entubulation क्युकी the तंत्रिका ends और intervening गैप हैं enclosed within a tube composed of biological or synthetic materials.
Whether the conduit is in the form of a biologic tube, synthetic tube or tissue-engineered conduit, it चाहिए सुकर neurotropic और neurotrophic संचार between the proximal और distal ends of the तंत्रिका गैप, ब्लाक बाह्य inhibitory कारकों, और provide a physical guidance for axonal regrowth.
The most basic objective of a nerve guidance conduit is to combine शारीरिक, रासायनिक, और biological cues अंतर्गत शर्तें कि होगा foster tissue formation.
Materials that have महरूम प्रयुक्त to मेक biologic tubes शामिल रक्त बरतन और skeletal मांसपेशियां, जबकि nonabsorbable और bioabsorbable सिंथेटिक tubes have been made from silicone and polyglycolide respectively.
Tissue-engineered nerve guidance conduits हैं a संयोजन of अनेक तत्व : scaffold ढांचा, scaffold सामग्री, सेल्यूलर therapies, neurotrophic कारकों and biomimetic materials.
The choice of which physical, chemical and biological cues to use is based on the गुण of the तंत्रिका पर्यावरण, जिससे is नाजुक in बनाना the सबसे वांछनीय पर्यावरण लिये axon regeneration.
The factors that control material selection include biocompatibility, biodegradability, mechanical अखंडता, controllability दौरान तंत्रिका विकास, implantation और नसबंदी.
Hardcore Pawn is an American reality television series produced by RDF USA ( later Zodiak USA ) and Richard Dominick Productions for truTV about the day-to-day परिचालन of अमरीकी आभूषण और ऋण, a family-owned साहूकार दूकान स्तिथ at 20450 greenfield सड़क, between 8 Mile Road and the John C. Lodge Freeway in Detroit, Michigan.
The series premiered on अगस्त 16, 2010, delivering दो लाख दर्शक, सेटिंग a record as truTV 's most-watched series premiere ever.
amoxicillin bp
Amoxicillin ( INN ), formerly amoxycillin ( BAN ), and abbreviated amox, is a moderate-spectrum, bacteriolytic, β-lactam antibiotic प्रयुक्त to treat bacterial infections caused by susceptible microorganisms.
It is usually the drug of चुनाव भीतर the क्लास क्युकी it is बेहतर अवशोषित, following oral administration, than other β-lactam antibiotics.
Amoxicillin is one of the सबसे आम एंटीबायोटिक विहित लिये children.
The ड्रग became उपलब्धियाँ in 1972.
Amoxicillin is susceptible to degradation by β-lactamase -producing जीवाणु, जिससे हैं resistant to a broad spectrum of β-lactam antibiotics, such as penicillin.
For this कारण, it is प्रायः संयुक्त साथ clavulanic acid, a β-lactamase inhibitor.
This increases प्रभावकारिता by reducing इसके susceptibility to β-lactamase resistance.
Lyndon Baines Johnson ( August 27, 1908 – जनवरी 22, 1973 ), प्रायः referred to as lbj, थी the 36th अध्यक्ष of the United States ( 1963–1969 ), a position he assumed after his service as the 37th Vice President of the United States ( 1961–1963 ).
He is one of only four people who served in सब चार निर्वाचित संघीय कार्यालयों of the संयुक्त राज्य : प्रतिनिधि, सीनेटर, Vice President, and President.
Johnson, a Democrat from Texas, served as a United States Representative from 1937–1949 and as a सीनेटर इससे 1949–1961, सहित छह सालो as संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट बहुमत नेता, दो as सीनेट अल्पसंख्यक नेता और दो as सीनेट Majority Whip.
बाद campaigning unsuccessfully लिये the लोकतांत्रिक नामांकन in 1960, Johnson was asked by John F. Kennedy to be his running mate for the 1960 presidential election.
Johnson succeeded to the presidency following the assassination of जॉन F. कैनेडी on नवम्बर 22, 1963, समाप्त कैनेडी 's पद और थी निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष in उसके अपना सही, जीतना by a विशाल हाशिया over बैरी goldwater in the 1964 election.
Johnson was greatly supported by the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी और as अध्यक्ष, he थी जिम्मेदार लिये डिजाइनिंग the `` ग्रेट समाज `` विधान कि शामिल कानून कि upheld civil rights, public broadcasting, Medicare, Medicaid, environmental protection, aid to education, and his `` War on Poverty. ''
जॉनसन थी प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके domineering व्यक्तित्व और the `` जॉनसन उपचार, '' his coercion of powerful politicians in order to advance legislation.
Meanwhile, Johnson escalated American भागीदारी in the वियतनाम युद्ध, इससे 16,000 अमरीकी advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 कॉम्बैट सैनिकों in जल्दी 1968, as अमरीकी हताहत soared and the peace process bogged down.
The involvement stimulated a विशाल एंग्री antiwar गति based especially on university campuses in the U.S. and abroad.
Summer riots broke out in most major cities after 1965, और अपराधों दरों soared, as उसके प्रतिद्वंद्वियों उठाया मांगे for `` law and order '' policies.
The Democratic Party split in multiple feuding गिरोहों, और बाद जॉनसन किया poorly in the 1968 नई हैम्पशायर primary, he ended his bid for reelection.
Republican रिचर्ड निक्सन थी निर्वाचित to succeed him.
Historians argue that Johnson 's प्रेसिडेंसी चिह्नित the शिखर of आधुनिक उदारतावाद in the United States after the New Deal era.
Johnson is ranked favorably by some इतिहासकारों क्युकी of उसके domestic policies.
The Big बंग सिद्धान्त डाल at कॉमिक कॉन 2009, इससे बाएँ : कुणाल Nayyar, Simon Helberg, Kaley Cuoco, Jim Parsons, and Johnny Galecki
The American sitcom the बिग बंग सिद्धान्त, निर्मित और कार्यपालिका उत्पादित by चक lorre और विधेयक prady, premiered on CBS on September 24, 2007.
The show centers on five characters : roommates Sheldon कूपर और लियोनार्ड hofstadter, दो caltech physicists ; पैनी, a वेट्रेस और aspiring अभिनेत्री जो जीवनदान आरपार the हॉल ; और Leonard and Sheldon 's friends and co-workers aerospace engineer Howard Wolowitz, and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali.
Over time, several supporting characters have been promoted to starring roles : Leslie Winkle ( season 1 recurring ; season 2 regular ; season 3 guest ), a physicist colleague, and, at different times, a lover of both Leonard and Howard ; Bernadette rostenkowski-wolowitz ( ऋतु 3 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 4-present नियमित ), a microbiologist, हावर्ड 's fiancée और subsequent बीवी, और पूर्व part-time वेट्रेस alongside पैनी ; neuroscientist एमी farrah fowler ( ऋतु 3 अतिथि ; ऋतु 4 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 4-present नियमित ), who joins the group after being matched to Sheldon on a dating website ; and comic book store-owner, Stuart Bloom ( seasons 2–5 recurring ; season 6-present regular ), who replaces Howard as Raj 's best friend when Howard is in space.
The show also features numerous supporting characters, each of जिसको plays a prominent भूमिका in a छोटी group of episodes.
The American Civil War ( acw ), भी ज्ञात as the युद्ध between the राज्य or बस the सिविल युद्ध ( देखिए नामकरण ), थी a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
the युद्ध था इसके उत्पत्ति in the समस्या of गुलामी, विशेषकर the extension of slavery into the western territories.
Foreign शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene.
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure, the Confederacy collapsed, गुलामी थी abolished, और the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 presidential election, Republicans, led by Abraham Lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into संयुक्त राज्य ' territories.
Lincoln won, but before his उद्घाटन on कूच 4, 1861, सात cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic President James बुकानन और the आवक republicans rejected secession as illegal.
lincoln 's inaugural पता declared his administration would not initiate civil war.
Eight बाकी स्लेव राज्य जारी to अस्वीकृत calls for secession.
Confederate forces seized numerous federal दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by the confederacy.
A Peace Conference failed to ढूँढें a सुलह, और दोनो पहलू prepared लिये war.
The Confederates assumed कि यूरोपीय देशों यहूद so निर्भर on `` किंग कपास `` that they would intervene ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, when confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट sumter, a कुंजी फोर्ट आयोजित by Union troops in South Carolina.
Lincoln called for each राज्य to provide सैनिकों to retake the फोर्ट ; नतीजतन, चार अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined the Confederacy, bringing their total to eleven.
The संघ जल्द नियंत्रित the किनारा राज्य और स्थापित a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy.
the पूर्वी थिएटर थी inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union state ) ended with confederate रिट्रीट at the बैटल of antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation, जिससे बना समाप्ति गुलामी a युद्ध लक्ष्य.
To the west, by गर्मियाँ 1862 the संघ नष्ट the confederate नदी नेवी, तब much of उनके western armies, and the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, Robert E. Lee 's confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the Battle of Gettysburg.
Western successes led to ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड of सब संघ सेना in 1864.
In the Western Theater, विलियम T. शरमन drove ईस्ट to कैप्चर अटलांटा and marched to the sea, destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the confederacy इससे सब दिशानिर्देश, और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the overland अभियान towards Richmond, the Confederate capital.
The defending confederate फौज विफल, अग्रणी to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण to Grant at Appomattox Court House on April 9, 1865.
The अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध थी एक of the earliest true industrial wars.
Railroads, the telegraph, steamships, और mass-produced हथियार यहूद employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian कारखानों, खानों, shipyards, बैंको, परिवहन and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest युद्ध in अमरीकी इतिहास, resulting in the मौतों of an estimated 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा, और 30 प्रतिशत of सब दक्षिणी white males aged 18–40.
Human evolution refers to the evolutionary प्रक्रम अग्रणी up to the रूप of आधुनिक humans.
While it began with the last common ancestor of all life, the टॉपिक प्रायः कवर तभी the विकासवादी इतिहास of primates, in particular the genus Homo, and the emergence of Homo sapiens as a distinct species of hominids ( or `` great apes '' ).
The study of human evolution involves अनेक वैज्ञानिक disciplines, सहित शारीरिक मानवशास्त्र, primatology, archaeology, linguistics, evolutionary psychology, embryology and genetics.
According to genetic studies, primates diverged from other स्तनधारियों परिचय in the लेट cretaceous काल, और the earliest जीवाश्मों appear in the paleocene, around.
The family Hominidae diverged from the Hylobatidae ( Gibbon ) family 15-20 लाख सालो पहले, और around, the ponginae ( orangutans ), diverged from the Hominidae family.
Bipedalism is the basic adaption of the Hominin line, and the earliest bipedal hominin is माना to be either sahelanthropus or orrorin, साथ ardipithecus, a पूरा bipedal, coming somewhat later.
The gorilla and chimpanzee diverged around the same समय, परिचय 4-6 लाख सालो पहले, और either sahelanthropus or orrorin may be our last shared ancestor with them.
The early bipedals आखिरकार विकसित into the australopithecines and later the genus Homo.
The earliest documented सदस्यों of the genus होमो हैं होमो habilis which evolved around ; the earliest species for which there is positive evidence of use of stone tools.
The brains of these early hominins यहूद परिचय the same size as that of a chimpanzee.
During the next million years a process of encephalization began, और साथ the आगमन of होमो इरेक्टस in the चट्टान रिकार्ड, cranial क्षमता था doubled to 850 cm3.
Homo erectus and Homo ergaster were the first of the hominina to leave अफ़्रीकी, और ये प्रजाति स्प्रेड through अफ़्रीकी, एशिया, और यूरोपीय between.
It is believed कि ये प्रजाति यहूद the first to use fire and complex tools.
according to the हाल अफ़्रीकी ancestry सिद्धान्त, आधुनिक इंसानो विकसित in अफ़्रीकी possibly from Homo heidelbergensis, Homo rhodesiensis or Homo antecessor and migrated out of the continent some 50,000 to 100,000 years ago, replacing local populations of Homo erectus, Homo denisova, Homo floresiensis and Homo neanderthalensis.
Archaic होमो sapiens, the forerunner of anatomically आधुनिक इंसानो, evolved between 400,000 and 250,000 years ago.
Recent DNA evidence suggests that several haplotypes of Neanderthal origin are present among all non-African populations, and Neanderthals and other hominids, ऐसे as denisova hominin may have contributed up to 6 % of उनके genome to present-day इंसानs. < संदर्भ name= '' 10.1126/science.1209202 '' > anatomically आधुनिक इंसानो विकसित इससे archaic Homo sapiens in the Middle Paleolithic, about 200,000 years ago.
The transition to behavioral modernity with the development of symbolic culture, language, और specialized lithic प्रौद्योगिकी happened around 50,000 सालो पहले according to अनेक विज्ञानियों हालांकि कुछ सुझाएँ a क्रमिक बदलें in बर्ताव over a longer time span.
लिसा cuddy, m.d., is a fictional अक्षर on the Fox network medical drama House.
She is portrayed by लिसा Edelstein.
Cuddy was the Dean of आयुर्विज्ञान और हॉस्पिटल व्यवस्थापक of the fictional princeton-plainsboro Teaching Hospital in New Jersey.
She also becomes हाउस 's प्रेम ब्याज through the सालो to प्रारंभ a संबंध with him in season seven.
Cuddy quit her job after the events of ऋतु सात 's finale `` चलती On ``.
Track and field is a sport comprising विभिन्न प्रतिस्पर्धी एथलेटिक प्रतियोगिताओं आधारित on कार्यशील, jumping, and throwing.
The name of the खेल गर्भाशयी इससे the प्रतियोगिता स्थान : a स्टेडियम with an oval running track around a grass field.
The throwing and jumping कार्यक्रम generally लो प्लेस in the central enclosed area.
Track and field falls अंतर्गत the छतरियाँ खेल of एथलेटिक्स, जिससे भी includes road running, cross country running, and race walking.
The two most prestigious international track and field competitions are held under the banner of athletics : the एथलेटिक्स प्रतियोगिता at the ओलम्पिक खेल और the आइएएएफ World Championships in Athletics.
The International Association of Athletics Federations is the अंतरराष्ट्रीय शासी देह लिये track और फ़ील्ड.
Track and field events are generally व्यक्तिगत खेल साथ एथलीट चुनौतीपूर्ण प्रत्येक अन्य to decide a single victor.
The racing events are won by the खिलाड़ी साथ the तीव्रतम समय, जबकि the कूद और फेंकना कार्यक्रम हैं जीती by the खिलाड़ी जो रै achieved the greatest distance or height in the contest.
The running events are categorised as sprints, मध्य और long-distance events, relays, and hurdling.
Regular jumping events include long jump, triple jump, high jump and pole vault, जबकि the सबसे आम फेंकना कार्यक्रम हैं शॉट put, javelin, discus and hammer.
There are also `` संयुक्त कार्यक्रम '', ऐसे as heptathlon और decathlon, in जिससे एथलीट compete in a number of the above events.
Records are kept of the best performances in specific events, at world और नेशनल स्तर, सही bas to a निजी स्तर.
However, if athletes are deemed to have violated the इवेंट 's नियम or regulations, वे हैं disqualified इससे the प्रतियोगिता और उनके marks are erased.
In North America, the term track and field may be used to refer to एथलेटिक्स in सामान्य, बल्कि than specifically track और फ़ील्ड events.
The Gulf War ( 2 August 1990 – 28 February 1991 ), codenamed Operation Desert Storm ( 17 जनवरी 1991 – 28 फ़रवरी 1991 ) थी a युद्ध waged by a u.n.-authorized गठबन्धन फ़ोर्स इससे 34 nations led by the United States, against Iraq in response to Iraq 's invasion and annexation of Kuwait.
The war is also known under अन्य names, ऐसे as the पारसी गल्फ युद्ध, पहला गल्फ युद्ध, गल्फ युद्ध i, or the पहला इराकी युद्ध, पहले the पद `` इराकी युद्ध '' became पहचाना बजाय साथ the 2003 Iraq War ( also referred to in the U.S. as `` Operation Iraqi Freedom '' ).
Kuwait 's invasion by Iraqi troops that began 2 August 1990 was met with international condemnation, और brought तात्कालिक आर्थिक प्रतिबंधों विरूद्ध इराकी by सदस्यों of the U.N. Security Council.
U.S. President George H. W. Bush deployed U.S. forces into Saudi अरब, और urged अन्य देशों to भेजें उनके अपना शक्तियां to the scene.
An array of nations joined the गठबन्धन.
The great majority of the Coalition 's military forces were from the U.S., with Saudi Arabia, the United किंगडम और मिश्र as अग्रणी योगदानकर्ता, in कि अनुक्रम.
Saudi Arabia paid around us $ 36 अरब of the us $ 60 billion cost.
The war was marked by the शुरूआत of सजीव न्यूज on the सामने लाइनों of the लड़ो, साथ the primacy of the U.S. network CNN.
The war has also earned the उपनाम वीडियो खेल युद्ध बाद the रोज़ ब्रॉडकास्ट बिंब on board the U.S. bombers during Operation Desert Storm.
The initial conflict to निकाल इराकी सैनिकों इससे कुवैत began साथ an aerial बमबारी on 17 January 1991.
इस थी followed by a ground assault on 24 February.
This was a decisive victory for the Coalition forces, जो liberated कुवैत और उन्नत into इराकी territory.
The Coalition ceased their advance, and declared a cease-fire 100 घंटों बाद the मैदान अभियान प्रारंभ.
Aerial and ground combat was confined to इराकी, कुवैत, और क्षेत्रों on सऊदी Arabia 's border.
Iraq launched Scud missiles विरूद्ध गठबन्धन सैन्य लक्ष्य in सऊदी Arabia and against Israel.
The nickel, in American usage, is a five- cent सिक्का जारी by the United States Mint.
Composed of 75 % copper and 25 % निकल, the टुकड़ा रै महरूम struck since 1866.
The silver half dime, बराबर to पाँच सेंट, था महरूम जारी since the 1790s.
The American Civil War caused आर्थिक hardship, ड्राइविंग सुनहरा और चांदी इससे परिसंचरण ; in response, in place of low-value coins, the government at first issued paper currency.
In 1865, Congress abolished the five-cent fractional करेंसी नोट बाद स्पेंसर M. क्लार्क, सिर of the करेंसी ब्यूरो ( आज the ब्यूरो of नक्काशी और मुद्रण ), placed his own portrait on the denomination.
बाद कामयाब परिचय of two-cent और three-cent टुकड़े, बगैर precious metal, Congress also authorized a five-cent piece consisting of base metal ; the Mint began striking this version in 1866.
The initial design of the Shield निकल थी struck जबतक 1883, तब replaced by the स्वतंत्रता Head nickel.
The Buffalo nickel was introduced in 1913 as part of a drive to बढ़ाएँ the सौंदर्य of अमरीकी coinage ; in 1938, the Jefferson nickel followed.
In 2004 and 2005, खास डिजाइन in सम्मान of the bicentennial of the Lewis and Clark Expedition were issued.
In 2006, the Mint reverted to using Jefferson nickel designer Felix Schlag 's original reverse ( or `` tails '' पक्ष ), हालांकि a नई obverse, by जेमी franki, थी substituted.
As of 2013, it costs more than eleven cents to produce a निकल ; the मिंट is exploring the सम्भावना of reducing लागत by using less expensive metals.
a पोस्टर साथ पुष्प or क्लस्टर of पुष्प produced by twelve species of flowering plants from different families
A flower, sometimes known as a bloom or खिलना, is the reproductive ढांचा मिला in flowering पौधे ( पौधे of the division Magnoliophyta, also called angiosperms ).
The biological function of a flower is to effect reproduction, usually by providing a यांत्रिकी लिये the संघ of शुक्राणु साथ eggs.
पुष्प may सुकर outcrossing ( संलयन of शुक्राणु और अंडे from different individuals in a population ) or allow selfing ( fusion of sperm and egg from the same flower ).
Some flowers produce diaspores बगैर fertilization ( parthenocarpy ).
Flowers contain sporangia and are the साईट जहाँ gametophytes develop.
Flowers give वृद्धि to फल और seeds.
Many flowers have evolved to be आकर्षक to पशु, so as to cause them to be vectors for the transfer of pollen.
In addition to facilitating the reproduction of flowering plants, flowers have long महरूम admired और प्रयुक्त by इंसानो to beautify उनके पर्यावरण, और भी as वस्तुएँ of रोमांस, ritual, religion, medicine and as a source of food.
The McDonnell डगलस ( अभी बोइंग ) f-15 त्रिभुज is a twin-engine, all-weather tactical fighter designed by McDonnell Douglas to gain and maintain air superiority in aerial combat.
It is considered among the सबसे कामयाब आधुनिक सेनानी, साथ over 100 aerial combat victories with no losses in dogfights.
following समीक्षाएँ of प्रस्ताव, the संयुक्त राज्य एयर फ़ोर्स चयनित mcdonnell Douglas ' design in 1967 to meet the service 's need for a dedicated air superiority fighter.
The त्रिभुज पहला उड़ाया in जुलाई 1972, and entered service in 1976.
Since the 1970s, the Eagle has been exported to इसराईल, जापानी, सऊदी अरब, और अन्य nations.
The F-15 was originally envisioned as a pure एयर बड़प्पन aircraft.
Its design included a द्वितीयक ground-attack काबिलियत कि थी largely unused.
The design proved flexible enough that an all-weather strike derivative, the F-15E Strike Eagle, was बाद विकसित, और डाला service in 1989.
The f-15 त्रिभुज is अपेक्षित to be in सेवा with the U.S. Air Force past 2025.
Mimio is a brand name of a लकीर of प्रौद्योगिकी उत्पाद aimed at the शिक्षा मार्केट.
The primary उत्पाद हैं केन्द्रित around कंप्यूटर whiteboard interactive teaching devices.
MimioCapture डिवाइस भी allow उपयोक्ता to कैप्चर सब of the ink strokes that are written on the whiteboard.
When used in conjunction with a video projector it turns the ordinary whiteboard सतह into a fully इंटरैक्टिव whiteboard.
The product line was originally designed by आभासी स्याही.
On October 4, 2006 Newell Rubbermaid acquired the mimio इंटरैक्टिव whiteboard ( iwb ) उत्पाद लकीर.
rahab of Jericho
Rahab, ( ; ; ) was, according to the किताब of जोशुआ, a स्त्री जो जिया in जेरिको in the promised जमीन और assisted the Israelites in capturing the city.
Nearly all अंग्रेज़ी अनुवाद of जोशुआ describe her as a harlot or prostitute.
The Organization of American States ( Spanish : Organización de los Estados Americanos, Portuguese : Organização dos estados americanos, फ्रेंच : संगठन देस états américains ), or the oas, is a क्षेत्रीय अंतरराष्ट्रीय organization.
The OAS was founded on 30 April 1948, and has इसके मुख्यालय in वॉशिंगटन, d.C., United States.
Its members are the 35 स्वतंत्र राज्य of the Americas.
चूंकि 26 may 2005, the सचिव सामान्य of OAS has been José Miguel Insulza.
Christopher Columbus ( Italian : cristoforo कोलोन ; स्पेनी : cristóbal colón ; पुर्तगाली : cristóvão कोलोन ; पहले 31 अक्तूबर 145120 May 1506 ) was an Italian explorer, navigator, and colonizer, born in the Republic of Genoa, in what is today northwestern Italy.
Under the auspices of the कैथोलिक monarchs of स्पेन, he समाप्त चार voyages across the Atlantic Ocean that led to general European awareness of the American continents.
Those voyages, और उसके प्रयत्न to स्थापित स्थाई settlements on the island of Hispaniola, initiated the Spanish colonization of the New World.
In the context of emerging western imperialism and economic competition between यूरोपीय kingdoms seeking माल through the स्थापना of व्यापार रूट और colonies, कोलंबस 's सट्टे प्रस्ताव, to पहुँचें the ईस्ट इंडीज by sailing westward, eventually received the support of the Spanish crown, which saw in it a promise, however remote, of gaining the upper hand over rival powers in the contest for the lucrative spice trade with Asia.
During his first voyage in 1492, बजाय of reaching Japan as he had intended, Columbus landed in the Bahamas archipelago, at a locale he named San Salvador.
over the कोर्स of तीन अधिक voyages, कोलंबस visited the वृहद और Lesser Antilles, as well as the Caribbean coast of Venezuela and Central America, claiming them for the Spanish Empire.
Though Columbus was not the first European explorer to reach the Americas ( having been preceded by the Norse expedition led by Leif Ericson in the 11th century ), Columbus 's voyages led to the पहला स्थायी यूरोपीय सम्पर्क साथ the americas, inaugurating a काल of European exploration, conquest, and colonization that lasted for several centuries.
They had, इसलिए, an विशाल प्रभाव in the ऐतिहासिक development of the modern Western world.
Columbus खुद देखी उसके accomplishments primarily in the लाइट of the spreading of the Christian religion.
Never admitting that he था पहुँचे a महाद्वीप previously अनजान to europeans, बल्कि than the ईस्ट इंडीज he था नियत आउट for, Columbus called the inhabitants of the lands he visited indios ( Spanish for `` Indians `` ).
Columbus 's strained relationship with the Spanish crown and its appointed colonial administrators in America led to उसके गिरफ़्तार और dismissal as राज्यपाल of the settlements on the द्वीप of हिस्पानिओला in 1500, और later to protracted litigation over the benefits which Columbus and his heirs claimed were owed to them by the crown.
Bred in Germany, the boxer is a नस्ल of stocky, medium-sized, short-haired dogs.
The coat is smooth and tight-fitting ; colors are fawn or brindled, with or बगैर श्वेत markings, जिससे may कवर the संपूर्ण देह.
Boxers are brachycephalic ( they have broad, short skulls ), और have a वर्गाकार muzzle, mandibular prognathism ( an underbite ), बहुत दमदार जबड़े, and a powerful bite ideal for hanging on to large prey.
The Boxer was bred from the Old English बुल और the अभी विलुप्त bullenbeisser, and is part of the Molosser group.
Boxers were first exhibited in a श्वान दिखाएँ लिये st. bernards in म्यूनिख in 1895, the पहला Boxer club being founded the next year.
Based on 2012 American Kennel क्लबों आंकडे, मुक्केबाज आयोजित स्थिर as the सातवाँ सबसे popular breed of dog in the United States for the third consecutive year.
Serial ATA ( SATA ) is a computer bus interface that connects मेजबान बस adapters to द्रव्यमान भंडार डिवाइस ऐसे as मुश्किल डिस्क drives and optical drives.
Serial ATA replaces the older AT Attachment standard ( ATA ; later referred to as Parallel ATA or PATA ), offering several advantages over the पुरानी इंटरफ़ेस : घटाया केबल आकार और लागत ( सात conductors बजाय of 40 ), देशी hot swapping, तेज़ आंकड़ा ट्रांसफ़र through उच्चतर signalling दरों, और अधिक efficient transfer through an ( optional ) I/O queuing protocol.
SATA host adapters and devices communicate via a high-speed सीरियल केबल over दो pairs of conductors.
In कंट्रास्ट, समानांतर ata ( the redesignation लिये the विरासत ata विशेषताएँ ) प्रयुक्त a 16-bit wide data bus with many additional support and control signals, all operating at much lower frequency.
To ensure backward compatibility with legacy ATA software और अनुप्रयोग, sata उपयोग the वही मौलिक ATA and ATAPI command-set as legacy ATA devices.
SATA has replaced parallel ATA in consumer desktop and laptop computers, और रै largely replaced pata in नई अंतःस्थापित अनुप्रयोग.
SATA 's मार्केट share in the डेस्कटॉप pc मार्केट was 99 % in 2008.
PATA remains widely used in औद्योगिक और अंतःस्थापित अनुप्रयोग कि उपयोग compactflash भंडार, even though the new CFast standard is based on SATA.
Serial ATA industry compatibility specifications originate इससे the सीरियल ata अंतरराष्ट्रीय संगठन ( उर्फ.
sata-io, serialata.org ).
The SATA-IO group collaboratively creates, समीक्षाएँ, ratifies, और publishes the interoperability विशेषताएँ, the test cases, and plug-fests.
As with many other industry compatibility standards, the SATA सामग्री स्वामित्व is transferred to अन्य उद्योग लाशें : primarily the incits t13 उपसमिति ata, the incits t10 उपसमिति ( scsi ) ; a subgroup of T10 responsible for Serial Attached SCSI ( SAS ).
The पूरा specification इससे SATA-IO.
The remainder of this आलेख होगा कोशिश to उपयोग the शब्दावली and specifications of SATA-IO.
The इतिहास of the अंतरजाल began साथ the विकास of electronic computers in the 1950s.
The public was first introduced to the concepts that would lead to the Internet when a message was sent over the arpanet इससे कंप्यूटर विज्ञान प्राध्यापक लियोनार्ड kleinrock 's प्रयोगशाला at विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, लॉस एंजिल्स ( ucla ), बाद the दूसरी टुकड़ा of संजाल equipment was installed at Stanford Research Institute ( SRI ).
Packet switched networks such as ARPANET, Mark I at NPL in the UK, cyclades, मेरिट संजाल, tymnet, और telenet, यहूद विकसित in the लेट 1960s और जल्दी 1970s using a किस्में of प्रोटोकॉल.
The ARPANET in particular led to the development of protocols for internetworking, in जिससे अनेक पृथक संजाल could be joined साथ into a network of networks.
In 1982, the Internet protocol suite ( TCP/IP ) was standardized, and नतीजतन, the अवधारणा of a world-wide संजाल of interconnected tcp/ip networks, called the Internet, was introduced.
Access to the ARPANET was expanded in 1981 when the National Science Foundation ( NSF ) developed the Computer Science Network ( CSNET ) and again in 1986 when NSFNET provided access to महासंगणक साइट in the संयुक्त राज्य इससे शोध और शिक्षा संगठन.
Commercial अंतरजाल सेवा प्रदाताओं ( isps ) began to emerge in the लेट 1980s and early 1990s.
The ARPANET was decommissioned in 1990.
The Internet was commercialized in 1995 when NSFNET was decommissioned, निकालना the पिछला प्रतिबंध on the उपयोग of the अंतरजाल to carry वाणिज्यिक ट्रैफ़िक.
Since the mid-1990s, the Internet has had a revolutionary impact on culture and commerce, including the rise of near-instant communication by इलेक्ट्रॉनिक मेल, तत्काल messaging, आवाज़ over अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल ( voip ) `` फोन काल्स '', two-way इंटरैक्टिव वीडियो काल्स, और the संसार Wide Web with its discussion forums, blogs, social networking, and online shopping sites.
The research and education community continues to develop और उपयोग उन्नत संजाल ऐसे as nsf 's बहुत ऊँची गति रीढ़ संजाल सेवा ( vBNS ), Internet2, and National LambdaRail.
Increasing amounts of आंकड़ा हैं transmitted at उच्चतर और उच्चतर speeds over रेशा ऑप्टिक संजाल ऑपरेटिंग at 1-Gbit/s, 10-Gbit/s, or more.
The Internet 's takeover over the global communication landscape was almost instant in historical terms : it only communicated 1 % of the information flowing through two-way telecommunications networks in the साल 1993, already 51 % by 2000, और अधिक than 97 % of the telecommunicated information by 2007.
Today the अंतरजाल continues to grow, चलित by कभी वृहद amounts of ऑनलाइन सूचना, कॉमर्स, entertainment, and social networking.
The Gift is the second एल्बम by स्कॉटिश सिंगर सुसान Boyle, which was released on 8 November 2010.
Boyle hinted that the album has a 1960s महसूस `` क्युकी कि was [ her ] era ''.
on 30 November 2011, the एल्बम प्राप्त a नामांकन in 54th ग्रैमी पुरस्कार for Best Traditional Pop Vocal Album.
`` This is बस to कह '' ( 1934 ) is a प्रसिद्ध imagist कविता by William Carlos Williams.
Professor Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore is a major अक्षर और समर्थक of J. K. रोलिंग 's हैरी कुम्हार श्रेणी.
For most of the series, he is the headmaster of the wizarding स्कूल हॉग्वार्ट्स.
As part of his backstory, it is revealed that he is the founder and leader of the Order of the Phoenix, an organisation समर्पित to लड़ the प्रमुख विपक्षी of the श्रेणी, रब voldemort.
डम्बल्डोर is portrayed by रिचर्ड हैरिस in the फिल्मी adaptions of हैरी कुम्हार और the Philosopher 's Stone and Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.
After Harris ' मौत, माइकल gambon portrayed डम्बल्डोर for all of the remaining films.
Rowling stated she chose the name Dumbledore, which is an Early Modern English word for `` bumblebee ``, because of Dumbledore 's love of music : she imagined him चलना around `` humming to खुद a लॉट ''.
Calcitonin ( also known as thyrocalcitonin ) is a 32-amino एसिड रैखिक polypeptide हार्मोन कि is उत्पादित in इंसानो primarily by the parafollicular cells ( also known as C-cells ) of the thyroid, and in many other animals in the ultimobranchial body.
It acts to reduce रक्त कैल्सियम ( ca2+ ), opposing the effects of parathyroid hormone ( PTH ).
calcitonin रै महरूम मिला in fish, reptiles, birds, and mammals.
Its importance in humans has not been as well established as इसके महत्व in अन्य पशु, as इसके फलन is प्रायः नहीं significant in the regulation of normal calcium homeostasis.
It belongs to calcitonin-like प्रोटीन परिवार.
A mousepad साथ a padded wrist rest.
A mousepad ( US ) or mouse mat ( uk ) is a सतह लिये रखकर और चलती a कंप्यूटर mouse.
A mousepad enhances the usability of the mouse compared to using a mouse सीधे on a तालिका by providing a सतह to allow the ट्रैकिंग led or बॉल ( in पूर्व मॉडल ) to माप गति accurately और without jitter.
Some mousepads बढ़ाएँ ergonomics by providing a padded कलाई rest.

The riverfront स्टेडियम साईट in जून, 2006.
This photo was taken from the western concourse of ग्रेट अमरीकी बॉल पार्क.
A small portion of the Riverfront Stadium साईट is अभी occupied by the लाल ' हॉल of कीर्ति और संग्रहालय और प्रमुख गली, जिससे थी विस्तारित when the new park was built.
The Cincinnati Bengals ' Paul Brown स्टेडियम is in the अलहदा.
riverfront स्टेडियम ( 1970–1995 ), बाद ज्ञात as cinergy फ़ील्ड ( 1996–2002 ), थी the घर of the सिनसिनाटी लाल नेशनल League baseball team and the Cincinnati Bengals National Football League team.
Located on the Ohio River in downtown सिनसिनाटी, the स्टेडियम थी बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the घर of `` the बिग रेड यंत्र ``, as the Reds were often called in the 1970s.
निर्माण began on फ़रवरी 1, 1968, और थी समाप्त at a cost of less than $ 50 million.
On June 30, 1970, the Reds hosted the Atlanta Braves in their grand opening, with Hank आरोन hitting the पहला कभी घर चलाएं at riverfront.
Two weeks later on July 14, 1970, Riverfront hosted the 1970 प्रमुख लीग Baseball All-Star Game.
This game is best remembered for the often-replayed टक्कर at घर थाली between लाल स्टार पीट रोज़ और catcher Ray Fosse of the Cleveland Indians.
In September 1996, riverfront स्टेडियम थी renamed `` cinergy फ़ील्ड '' in a प्रायोजन deal with Greater Cincinnati 's energy company, Cinergy Corporation.
In 2001, to make रूम लिये ग्रेट अमरीकी बॉल पार्क, the seating capacity at Cinergy Field was reduced to 39,000.
There was a विशाल वॉल in बीच फ़ील्ड दृश्य बाद the renovations, to serve as the batter 's eye.
The stadium was demolished by implosion on December 29, 2002.
Nexen Tire is a tire manufacturer, headquartered in yangsan, दक्षिण gyeongsang प्रांत, और सियोल, both in South Korea.
Its major domestic प्रतिस्पर्धी हैं hankook टायर and Kumho Tires.
The company 's name is reflected in the कम्पनी स्लोगन, `` अगला सदी टायर. ''
The silent majority is an unspecified large majority of लोगों in a देश or समूह जो do नहीं एक्स्प्रेस their opinions publicly.
The term was popularized ( though not first used ) by U.S. President Richard Nixon in a November 3, 1969, speech in जिससे he कहा, `` और so tonight—to तुम, the ग्रेट मूक बहुमत of my fellow americans—i पूछो लिये अपना support. ''
In this usage it referred to those Americans who did not join in the विशाल demonstrations विरूद्ध the वियतनाम युद्ध at the समय, जो किया नहीं जुड़ें in the counterculture, और जो किया नहीं participate in public discourse.
Nixon along with many अन्य देखी इस समूह of मध्य अमेरिकी as होने निष्प्रभ in the मीडिया by the more vocal minority.
The phrase was used in the 19th century as a euphemism referring to all the people जो have died, और अन्य have प्रयुक्त it पहले और बाद निक्सन to refer to समूह of मतदाता in विभिन्न nations of the world.
Sam, a rhesus मंकी, उड़ाया to an ऊँचाई of 88 km in 1959.

Before humans went into space, several animals were launched into space, सहित numerous बंदरों, so कि वैज्ञानिकों could investigate the biological effects of space travel.
The United States launched flights containing primate कार्गो primarily between 1948-1961 साथ एक उड़ान in 1969 and one in 1985.
France शुभारम्भ दो monkey-carrying flights in 1967.
The Soviet संघ और रूस शुभारम्भ बंदरों between 1983 and 1996.
Most monkeys were anesthetized पहले lift-off.
overall thirty-two बंदरों उड़ाया in the space program ; none flew more than once.
Numerous back-up monkeys भी गई through the कार्यक्रम but never flew.
Monkeys from several प्रजाति यहूद प्रयुक्त, सहित rhesus बंदरों, cynomolgus बंदरों, गिलहरी बंदरों, and pig-tailed macaques.
कुछ chimpanzees ( जिससे हैं apes बल्कि than monkeys ) were also used.
RAID ( redundant array of independent disks, originally redundant array of inexpensive डिस्क ) is a भंडार प्रौद्योगिकी कि combines अनेक डिस्क ड्राइव components into a logical unit.
Data is distributed across the drives in one of several ways called `` RAID levels '', depending on the स्तर of अतिरेक और प्रदर्शन जरूरी.
The term `` RAID '' was पहला पारिभाषित by दाउद पैटरसन, garth A. गिब्सन, और रैंडी katz at the विश्वविद्यालयों of California, Berkeley in 1987.
Marketers representing उद्योग रेड निर्माताओं बाद attempted to reinvent the term to describe a redundant array of independent disks as a means of disassociating a low-cost expectation from RAID technology.
RAID is now used as an umbrella term for computer data storage schemes that can divide और replicate आंकड़ा among अनेक शारीरिक ड्राइव : रेड is an उदाहरण of भंडार virtualization and the array can be accessed by the operating system as one single drive.
The अलग योजनाएं or architectures हैं नामित by the शब्द रेड followed by a number ( e.g. RAID 0, RAID 1 ).
Each scheme provides a different balance between the कुंजी लक्ष्य : विश्वसनीयता और उपलब्धता, performance and capacity.
RAID levels वृहद than रेड 0 provide सुरक्षा विरूद्ध unrecoverable ( sector ) read errors, as well as whole disk failure.
A lymphocyte is a type of white रक्त कोशिका in the vertebrate immune system.
अंतर्गत the सूक्ष्मदर्शी, lymphocytes can be divided into large lymphocytes and small lymphocytes.
Large granular lymphocytes शामिल प्राकृतिक killer cells ( NK cells ).
Small lymphocytes consist of t कोशिकाएं and B cells.
The Big Lebowski is a 1998 dark comedy फिल्मी लिखा and directed by Joel and Ethan Coen.
Jeff Bridges stars as Jeff lebowski, an बेरोजगार लॉस एंजिल्स slacker और avid बॉलर, nicknamed `` The Dude. ''
After a case of mistaken identity, the यार is introduced to a करोड़पति also named Jeffrey Lebowski.
When the millionaire Lebowski 's trophy wife is later kidnapped, he commissions the यार to उद्धार the फिरौती to सुरक्षित उसके release.
The plan goes awry जब the यार 's dost वाल्टर Sobchak ( John Goodman ) schemes to keep the full ransom.
Steve Buscemi, Philip Seymour Hoffman, David huddleston, julianne मूर, tara reid, और जॉन turturro भी स्टार in the फिल्मी, which is narrated by a cowboy known only as `` The Stranger '', played by Sam Elliott.
The फिल्मी is loosely प्रेरित by the कार्य of Raymond Chandler.
Joel कोएन stated : `` we चाही to do a चांडलर दयालु of स्टोरी – कैसा it चालें episodically, and deals with the characters trying to unravel a mystery, as well as having a hopelessly complex plot that 's ultimately unimportant. ''
The original score थी रचित by कार्टर burwell, a longtime collaborator of the Coen Brothers.
The Big Lebowski was a निराशा at the u.S. बक्सा दफ्तर और प्राप्त मिश्रित reviews at the time of its release.
Reviews have trended towards the धनात्मक over समय, और the फिल्मी रै become a cult पसंदीदा, विख्यात लिये इसके idiosyncratic characters, dream sequences, unconventional dialogue, and eclectic soundtrack.
Severus Snape is a fictional character in the हैरी कुम्हार किताब श्रेणी लिखा by j.K. रोलिंग.
In the first novel of the श्रेणी, he is शत्रु toward हैरी और is निर्मित up to be the primary antagonist until the final chapters.
As the series progresses, snape 's अक्षर becomes अधिक परतदार and complex.
Rowling does not fully reveal the details of his true loyalties जबतक the समाप्त of the फाइनल किताब, हैरी कुम्हार और the deathly hallows.
Over the course of the series, Snape 's portrayal evolves from that of a malicious and partisan टीचर to कि of a pivotal अक्षर of considerable जटिलता और moral ambiguity.
Snape primarily teaches Potions at Hogwarts, though in the sixth novel he teaches Defence Against the Dark कला, a स्थिति जिससे he थी ज्ञात to have desired throughout the श्रेणी.
He ultimately becomes हेडमास्टर of Hogwarts in the final novel.
Rowling has described उसे as `` a तोहफा of a अक्षर ''.
Grits refers to a ground-corn food of देशी अमरीकी उत्पत्ति, कि is आम in the Southern United States and mainly eaten at breakfast.
Modern grits हैं commonly बना of alkali-treated corn known as hominy.
Grits are समान to अन्य मोटा maize-based porridges इससे around the संसार such as polenta or the thinner farina.
`` तत्काल grits '' have महरूम processed to speed cooking.
The word `` grits '' derives from the Old अंग्रेज़ी शब्द `` grytt, '' अर्थ coarse भोजन.
This word originally referred to गेहूं और अन्य porridges अभी ज्ञात as groats in parts of the U.K..
Maize, unknown in Europe in the Middle Ages, is a food derived from मकई ( a नई संसार संयंत्र ) और `` मकई '' था महरूम प्रयुक्त to describe गेहूं उत्पाद in अनेक European regions.
`` Grits '' may be either एकवचन or बहुवचन ; historically, in the अमरीकी दक्षिण the शब्द थी invariably singular notwithstanding its plural form ( cf. such food names as `` spaghetti '' or `` linguine '', likewise plural in form, but singular in use ).
Sometimes, grits are called sofkee or sofkey ( इससे a देशी अमरीकी muskogee शब्द ).
In molecular biology, human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) is a hormone उत्पादित by the निषेचित अंडा बाद धारणा.
Later during pregnancy it is made by the विकासशील placenta, और later by the placental component syncytiotrophoblast.
Some cancerous tumors produce this हार्मोन ; इसलिए, elevated स्तर measured जब the patient is not pregnant can lead to a cancer diagnosis.
However, it is not known whether इस उत्पादन is a contributing कारण or an effect of tumorigenesis.
The pituitary एनॉलॉग of hcg, ज्ञात as luteinizing हार्मोन ( lh ), is उत्पादित in the pituitary gland of males and females of all ages.
, the FDA has निषिद्ध the बिक्री of `` होम्योपैथिक '' और over the काउंटर hCG diet products and declared them fraudulent and illegal.

Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft पेय बेची in स्टोर्स, रेस्तरां, और वेंडिंग machines in every country except Cuba and North Korea.
It is produced by The Coca-Cola Company of Atlanta, जॉर्जिया, और is प्रायः referred to बस as कोक ( a पंजीकृत trademark of The Coca-Cola Company in the United States since March 27, 1944 ).
Originally intended as a patent medicine when it was invented in the late 19th century by John pemberton, coca-cola थी खरीदा आउट by बिजनेसमैन asa griggs candler, जिनकी विपणन tactics led Coke to its dominance of the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century.
The company produces concentrate, जिससे is तब बेची to licensed Coca-Cola bottlers throughout the world.
The bottlers, who hold territorially विशेष अनुबंध साथ the कम्पनी, उपज समाप्त उत्पाद in cans and bottles from the concentrate in combination with filtered water and sweeteners.
The bottlers तब बेचें, वितरित और merchandise Coca-Cola to retail stores and vending machines.
Such bottlers include Coca-Cola Enterprises, which is the largest सिंगल coca-cola bottler in उत्तर अमेरिका और western Europe.
the coca-cola कम्पनी भी बिकता concentrate लिये soda fountains to major restaurants and food service distributors.
The Coca-Cola कम्पनी रै, on अवसर, introduced अन्य कोला पेय under the Coke brand name.
The most आम of ये is आहार कोक, साथ अन्य सहित caffeine-free coca-cola, आहार Coke Caffeine-Free, Coca-Cola Cherry, Coca-Cola Zero, Coca-Cola Vanilla, and special versions with lemon, lime or coffee.
Based on interbrand 's बेहतरीन वैश्विक ब्रांड 2011, Coca-Cola was the world 's most valuable brand.
An ombudsman is an official, usually appointed by the सरकारी or by पार्लियामेंट लकिन साथ a significant उपाधि of स्वतंत्रता, जो is चार्ज साथ representing the interests of the public by investigating and addressing complaints of maladministration or violation of rights.
In कुछ देशों an इंस्पेक्टर सामान्य, नागरिक एडवोकेट or अन्य आधिकारिक may have कर्तव्य similar to those of a national ombudsman, and may also be appointed by the legislature.
Below the national level an ombudsman may be appointed by a state, लोकल or नगरपालिका सरकारी, और unofficial ombudsmen may be नियुक्त by, or भी कार्य लिये, a निगम ऐसे as a utility supplier or a newspaper, for an NGO, or for a professional regulatory body.
Whether appointed by the legislature, the executive, or an organization ( or, less frequently, elected by the constituency कि he or वो serves ), the ठेठ कर्तव्य of an ombudsman हैं to investigate शिकायत और attempt to निराकरण उन्हें, प्रायः through recommendations ( binding or not ) or mediation.
Ombudsmen sometimes भी उद्देश्य to पहचानो प्रणालीगत मुद्दे अग्रणी to poor service or breaches of people 's rights.
At the national level, most ombudsmen have a चौड़ी जनादेश to सौदे साथ the संपूर्ण पब्लिक sector, and sometimes also elements of the private sector ( for example, contracted service providers ).
In some मामले, वहीँ is a अधिक प्रतिबंधित जनादेश, for example with particular sectors of society.
More recent developments have included the creation of specialised children 's ombudsman और सूचना Commissioner agencies.
In some jurisdictions an ombudsman charged with the handling of concerns about national सरकारी is अधिक formally referred to as the `` संसदीय कमिश्नर '' ( e.g. the United Kingdom Parliamentary Commissioner for Administration, and the Western Australian state Ombudsman ).
In many देशों जहाँ the ombudsman 's remit extends परे dealing साथ कथित maladministration to promoting and protecting human rights, the ombudsman is recognised as the national human rights institution.
The post of ombudsman had by the end of the 20th century been instituted by सबसे सरकारें और by कुछ intergovernmental संगठन ऐसे as the European Union.
Making a complaint to an ombudsman is प्रायः फ़्री of चार्ज.

New England is a प्रदेश in the northeastern कोने of the संयुक्त राज्य consisting of the छह राज्य of Maine, New Hampshire, Vermont, Massachusetts, Rhode Island, and Connecticut.
New England is bordered by New यॉर्क राज्य to the दक्षिणपश्चिम, क्यूबेक to the उत्तरपश्चिम, और नई ब्रंसविक and the Atlantic Ocean to the east.
In one of the earliest English settlements in उत्तर अमेरिका, तीर्थयात्रियों इससे इंग्लैण्ड पहला settled in New England in 1620, to form Plymouth Colony.
Ten सालो बाद, the puritans settled उत्तर of plymouth उपनिवेश in Boston, thus forming Massachusetts Bay Colony.
Over the next 130 years, New England लड़ा in चार फ्रेंच और भारतीय युद्धों, जबतक the अंग्रेजों पराजित the फ्रेंच और उनके देशी allies in North America.
In the late 18th century, the New England colonies initiated the प्रतिरोध to the अंग्रेजों पार्लियामेंट 's प्रयत्न to impose new taxes without the consent of the colonists.
The Boston Tea Party was a protest to which Great Britain responded with a श्रेणी of दंडात्मक कानून stripping मैसाचुसेट्स of self-government, जिससे यहूद termed the `` असहनीय Acts `` by the colonists.
The confrontation led to open warfare in 1775, the expulsion of the अंग्रेजों अधिकारियों इससे नई इंग्लैण्ड in वसन्त 1776, और the Declaration of Independence in July 1776.
Some of the first movements of American literature, philosophy, and शिक्षा originated in नई इंग्लैण्ड.
The region played a prominent role in the movement to abolish गुलामी, और थी the पहला प्रदेश of the संयुक्त राज्य to be रूपांतरित by the औद्योगिक Revolution.
Today, New इंग्लैण्ड is a प्रमुख संसार बीच of शिक्षा, ऊँची प्रौद्योगिकी, insurance, and medicine.
Boston is its cultural, financial, शैक्षणिक, चिकित्सा और परिवहन center.
Each state is principally subdivided into small incorporated municipalities ज्ञात as नई इंग्लैण्ड कस्बों, जिससे हैं प्रायः governed by town meeting.
The only unincorporated territory in नई इंग्लैण्ड exists in the sparse, उत्तरी regions of Vermont, New Hampshire, and Maine.
Since 1970, voters have more often supported liberal candidates at the राज्य और संघीय स्तर than those of कोई अन्य प्रदेश in the संयुक्त States.
New England is the तभी एक of the संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो 's नौ क्षेत्रीय विभाजन whose name does not derive from its geography, and it is the only multi-state region with clear, consistent boundaries.
It maintains a strong sense of cultural identity set apart from the बाकी of the देश, हालांकि the शर्तें of इस पहचान हैं प्रायः लडे, combining puritanism साथ उदारतावाद, कृषिक जीवन with industry, and isolation with immigration.
