is an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न श्रेणी कि combines the medical drama and action-adventure genres.
It was उत्पादित by चिह्नित सात सीमित और वितरित by Universal Studios.
It debuted as a midseason बदलना on जनवरी 15, 1972, on एनबीसी, replacing the two short-lived series The Partners and The Good Life, and ran until September 3, 1977, with six additional two-hour television films during the following two years.
आपात !
was created and produced by Jack Webb and Robert A. Cinader, both of whom यहूद भी जिम्मेदार लिये the पुलिस dramas adam-12 और Dragnet.
The Eastern Time Zone ( ET ) encompasses 17 u.S. राज्य in the पूर्वी भाग of the संलग्न संयुक्त राज्य, parts of Canada and three countries in South America.
Places that use पूर्वी मानक समय ( est ) जब observing मानक समय ( autumn/winter ) हैं 5 घंटों पीछे Coordinated Universal Time ( ).
Eastern Daylight Time ( EDT ), when observing daylight छायांकन समय ( spring/summer ) is 4 घंटों पीछे Coordinated Universal Time ( ).
In the उत्तरी भाग of the समय मण्डल, दौरान the दूसरी संडे in कूच, at 2:00 a.m. EST, clocks are advanced to 3:00 a.m. EDT leaving a one hour `` gap. ''
During the first Sunday in नवम्बर, at 2:00 a.m. edt, घड़ियाँ हैं स्थानांतरित वापस to 1:00 a.m. est, यूँ `` duplicating '' one hour.
Southern parts of the मण्डल ( पनामा और the caribbean ) do not observe daylight saving.
Standard रूप of the आवधिक table.
The colors represent different श्रेणी of तत्व समझाया below.
The periodic table is a tabular display of the chemical elements, organized on the आधार of उनके परमाणु संख्याएँ, इलेक्ट्रॉन configurations, और recurring chemical properties.
Elements are presented in अनुक्रम of increasing परमाणु क्रमांक ( number of protons ).
The standard form of table comprises an 18 × 7 grid or प्रमुख देह of तत्व, positioned ऊपर a छोटी दोगुना row of elements.
The table can also be deconstructed into चार आयताकार ब्लॉक : the s-block to the बाएँ, the p-block to the right, the d-block in the middle, and the f-block below that.
The rows of the table are called periods ; the columns of the s-, d-, and p-blocks हैं पुकारा समूह, साथ कुछ of ये having names ऐसे as the हैलोजन्स or the noble gases.
Since, by definition, a periodic तालिका incorporates पुनरावर्ती रुझान, कोई ऐसे तालिका can be प्रयुक्त to derive संबंध between the गुण of the elements and predict the properties of new, yet to be discovered or synthesized, elements.
As a result, a periodic table—whether in the standard form or some other variant—provides a useful फ्रेमवर्क लिये analyzing रासायनिक बर्ताव, और ऐसे टेबल हैं widely प्रयुक्त in रसायन and other sciences.
Although precursors exist, dmitri mendeleev is generally credited साथ the प्रकाशन, in 1869, of the first widely recognized periodic table.
He developed his तालिका to illustrate आवधिक रुझान in the properties of the then-known elements.
Mendeleev also predicted some properties of then-unknown तत्व कि होता be अपेक्षित to भरण गैप in इस तालिका.
Most of his पूर्वानुमान यहूद proved सही जब the elements in question were subsequently discovered.
mendeleev 's आवधिक तालिका रै चूंकि महरूम विस्तारित और refined with the discovery or synthesis of further new elements and the development of new theoretical models to explain chemical behavior.
All elements from परमाणु संख्याएँ 1 ( हाइड्रोजन ) to 118 ( ununoctium ) have महरूम discovered or synthesized.
The elements from 1 to 98 ( californium ) have महरूम मिला to मौजूद naturally, हालांकि कुछ हैं मिला तभी in ट्रेस amounts और यहूद initially discovered by synthesis in laboratories.
the तत्व बाद 98 have तभी महरूम synthesized in laboratories.
Production of elements beyond ununoctium is being pursued, with the question of how the periodic table may need to be परिवर्धित to accommodate कोई ऐसे परिवर्धन होने a पदार्थ of जारी बहस.
Numerous synthetic radionuclides of naturally occurring तत्व have भी महरूम उत्पादित in laboratories.
Minecraft is a sandbox indie game originally created by Swedish programmer Markus `` पायदान '' persson और बाद विकसित और प्रकाशित by Mojang.
It was publicly released for the PC on May 17, 2009, as a developmental alpha version and, after क्रमिक अद्यतन, थी प्रकाशित as a पूरा रिलीज संस्करण on नवम्बर 18, 2011.
A version for Android was released a month earlier on अक्तूबर 7, और an आईओएस संस्करण थी released on नवम्बर 17, 2011.
On May 9, 2012, the खेल थी released on एक्सबॉक्स 360 as an Xbox Live Arcade game, co-developed by 4J Studios.
सब संस्करण of minecraft receive periodic updates.
The creative and building aspects of Minecraft allow players to build constructions out of textured घन in a 3d procedurally उत्पन्न संसार.
Other क्रियाएँ in the खेल शामिल खोजी, महफ़िल resources, crafting and combat.
Gameplay in its commercial release has two principal modes : survival, which requires players to acquire संसाधन और maintain उनके स्वास्थ्य और भूख ; और रचनात्मक, जहाँ खिलाड़ी have an असीमित सप्लाई of संसाधन, the क्षमता to मक्खी, and no health or hunger.
A third gameplay mode named hardcore is the same as survival, differing only in difficulty ; it is set to hardest सेटिंग और respawning is निष्क्रिय, forcing खिलाड़ी to हटाएँ उनके worlds upon death.
Minecraft received five awards from the 2011 Game Developers Conference : it was awarded the Innovation Award, Best Downloadable Game Award, and the Best Debut Game Award from the Game डेवलपर चुनाव पुरस्कार ; और the दर्शक पुरस्कार, as खूब as the seumas McNally Grand Prize, from the Independent Games Festival in 2011.
In 2012, minecraft थी awarded a सुनहरी Joystick Award in the category Best Downloadable Game.
As of April 8, 2013, the खेल रै बेची over 10 लाख नक़ल on PC and as of January 22, 2013, over 20 million copies across all platforms.
The Dark नाईट is a 2008 british-american सुपरहीरो फिल्मी निर्देशित, produced, and co-written by Christopher Nolan.
Based on the DC Comics अक्षर बैटमैन, the फिल्मी is the दूसरी भाग of नोलन 's बैटमैन फिल्मी series and a sequel to 2005 's Batman Begins.
Christian Bale reprises the lead role of Bruce wayne/batman, साथ a returning डाल of माइकल caine as अल्फ्रेड pennyworth, Gary Oldman as James Gordon and Morgan Freeman as Lucius Fox.
The film introduces the character of Harvey Dent ( Aaron Eckhart ), Gotham 's newly निर्वाचित ज़िला attorney और the consort of ब्रूस वेन 's बाल्यकाल dost रेचल dawes ( मैगी जिलएनहॉल ), जो joins बैटमैन और the पुलिस in combating the new rising threat of a criminal mastermind calling himself `` The Joker `` ( Heath Ledger ).
Nolan 's inspiration for the फिल्मी थी the जोकर 's कॉमिक किताब डेब्यू in 1940, the 1988 graphic novel, and the 1996 series, which retold Two-Face 's origin.
The nickname `` the Dark Knight '' was first applied to Batman in बैटमैन no. 1 ( 1940 ), in a स्टोरी लिखा by Bill Finger.
The Dark Knight was filmed primarily in Chicago, as well as in several other locations in the संयुक्त राज्य, the संयुक्त किंगडम, और हांग काँग.
Nolan used an IMAX camera to film some sequences, सहित the जोकर 's पहला appearance in the film.
On January 22, 2008, some months after he had completed filming on The Dark Knight and six months before the film 's release, झाड़ लेजर died इससे a विषाक्त संयोजन of नुस्खा दवाएँ, अग्रणी to तीव्र attention from the press and movie-going public.
Warner Bros. had initially created a viral marketing campaign for The Dark Knight, विकासशील promotional वेबसाइटों और trailers highlighting स्क्रीन गोलियाँ of लेजर as the Joker, but after Ledger 's death, the studio refocused its promotional campaign.
The Dark Knight was released on जुलाई 16, 2008 in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, on जुलाई 18, 2008 in उत्तर अमेरिका, and on July 24, 2008 in the United Kingdom.
Considered one of the बेहतरीन films of the 2000s और एक of the बेहतरीन सुपरहीरो films कभी बना, the film received highly positive reviews and set numerous records during its theatrical run.
With over $ 1 billion in revenue worldwide, it is the 14th-highest-grossing फिल्मी of सब समय, unadjusted for inflation.
The film प्राप्त आठ अकादमी पुरस्कार nominations ; it जीती the पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन ध्वनि संपादन और लेजर थी posthumously awarded Best Supporting Actor.
The अंधेरा नाईट उदय, the फाइनल part of the trilogy, was released on July 20, 2012.
The timeline of रेडियो सूचियाँ भीतर the इतिहास of रेडियो, the प्रौद्योगिकी और कार्यक्रम कि produced instruments that use radio waves and activities that people undertook.
बाद, the इतिहास is वर्चस्व by programming and contents, which is closer to general history.
The सिडनी ओपेरा हाउस is a multi-venue performing arts centre in New South Wales, Australia.
It was conceived and largely निर्मित by डैनिश वास्तु jørn utzon, opening in 1973 after a long gestation that began with his competition-winning design in 1957.
Joseph Cahill 's New South Wales सरकारी दिया the go-ahead लिये कार्य to begin in 1958.
The government 's bold decision to चुनें utzon 's डिज़ाइन is प्रायः overshadowed by the scandal that followed.
It is on Bennelong Point in सिडनी harbour, बंद to the सिडनी harbour Bridge.
It sits at the northeastern tip of the Sydney central business district ( the CBD ), घिरी on तीन पहलू by the harbour ( सिडनी कोव और फार्म कोव ) और अंतर्देशीय by the royal botanic Gardens.
Contrary to its name, it घरों अनेक प्रदर्शन venues.
It is among the busiest performing arts centres in the संसार, होस्टिंग over 1,500 प्रदर्शन प्रत्येक साल attended by some 1.2 million people.
It provides a venue for many performing-arts companies, including the four key resident companies Opera Australia, The Australian Ballet, the Sydney Theatre Company and the सिडनी सिंफनी ऑर्केस्ट्रा, और presents a चौड़ी दायरा of प्रोडक्शन्स on इसके अपना खाता.
It is also one of the most popular visitor आकर्षण in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, साथ अधिक than सात लाख लोगों visiting प्रत्येक year, 300,000 of whom take a guided tour.
It is administered by the सिडनी ओपेरा हाउस विश्वास, अंतर्गत the New South Wales Ministry of the Arts.
On 28 June 2007, it थी बना a युनेस्को संसार विरासत Site.
It is one of the 20th century 's most distinctive buildings और एक of the सबसे प्रसिद्ध performing कला केंद्रों in the world.
A आलेख of देह द्रव्यमान अनुक्रमणिका as a फलन of देह द्रव्यमान and body height is shown above.
The dashed lines represent subdivisions भीतर a major class.
For instance the `` Underweight '' classification is further divided into `` कठोर '', `` मॉडरेट '', और `` mild '' subclasses.
The body mass index ( BMI ), or Quetelet index, is a measure for इंसान देह आकार आधारित on an व्यक्तिगत 's वज़न और height.
It was devised between 1830 और 1850 by the belgian बहुश्रुत adolphe quetelet दौरान the course of developing `` social physics ''.
Body द्रव्यमान अनुक्रमणिका is पारिभाषित as the व्यक्तिगत 's body mass divided by the square of their height.
The formulae universally used in आयुर्विज्ञान उपज a ईकाई of माप of kg/m2.
BMI can also be determined using a BMI chart, which displays BMI as a function of weight ( आड़ा अक्ष ) और ऊँचाई ( लंबवत अक्ष ) using रुपरेखा लाइनों लिये अलग मान of बीएमआई or रंगों लिये अलग BMI categories.
† The factor for UK/US units is more precisely 703.06957964, but कि स्तर of परिशुद्धता is नहीं सार्थक लिये इस गणना.
To work from stone and pounds पहला गुणा the स्टोन by 14 तब add the पाउंड to दे the पूरे द्रव्यमान in pounds ; to work from feet and inches first multiply the feet by 12 then add the inches to give the whole height in inches.
Thomas Paine ( January 29, 1737 ( NS February 9, 1737 ) – जून 8, 1809 ) थी an english-american राजनैतिक activist, author, political theorist and revolutionary.
As the लेखक of दो अत्यधिक influential pamphlets at the प्रारंभ of the अमरीकी क्रान्ति, he प्रेरित the Patriots in 1776 to declare independence from Britain.
His ideas reflected आत्मज्ञान era बयानबाजी of transnational human rights.
He has महरूम पुकारा `` a corsetmaker by व्यापार, a पत्रकार by व्यवसायिक, and a propagandist by inclination. ''
Born in Thetford, England, in the county of Norfolk, Paine emigrated to the British American colonies in 1774 साथ the सहायता of बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन और he arrived in समय to participate in the American Revolution.
His principal contributions were the powerful, widely read pamphlet Common Sense ( 1776 ), the all-time best-selling American book that advocated colonial America 's independence from the Kingdom of Great ब्रिटेन, और the अमरीकी संकट ( 1776–83 ), a pro-revolutionary pamphlet series.
Common Sense was so influential that John Adams said, `` Without the कलम of the लेखक of आम भाव, the तलवार of वॉशिंगटन होता have been raised in vain.”
Paine lived in France for most of the 1790s, becoming deeply शामिल in the फ्रेंच क्रान्ति.
He wrote the अधिकारों of man ( 1791 ), in भाग a रक्षा of the फ्रेंच क्रान्ति against its critics.
His attacks on British writer Edmund Burke led to a विचारण और conviction in absentia in 1792 लिये the अपराधों of seditious libel.
In 1792, despite नहीं होने समर्थ to बोलो फ्रेंच, he थी निर्वाचित to the French National Convention.
The girondists regarded उसे as an ally.
Consequently, the Montagnards, विशेषकर robespierre, regarded उसे as an दुश्मन.
In दिसम्बर 1793, he थी गिरफ्तार और imprisoned in Paris, then released in 1794.
He became notorious because of The Age of Reason ( 1793–94 ), उसके किताब कि अधिवक्ताओं देववाद, promotes कारण और freethinking, and argues against institutionalized religion in general and Christian doctrine in particular.
He also wrote the pamphlet Agrarian इंसाफ ( 1795 ), discussing the origins of प्रॉपर्टी, और introduced the concept of a guaranteed minimum income.
In 1802, he लौटे to अमेरिका जहाँ he died on June 8, 1809.
Only six लोगों attended उसके अंत्येष्टि as he था महरूम ostracized for his ridicule of Christianity.
Clinical trials are sets of tests in medical research and drug development that generate safety and efficacy data ( or more specifically, information about प्रतिकूल ड्रग प्रतिक्रियाएँ और प्रतिकूल प्रभाव of अन्य उपचार ) लिये स्वास्थ्य interventions ( e.g., drugs, diagnostics, devices, therapy protocols ).
They are conducted only after satisfactory information has been gathered on the विशेषता of the गैर नैदानिक सुरक्षा, और स्वास्थ्य authority/ethics कमेटी स्वीकृति is granted in the country where approval of the drug or device is sought.
previously, अनेक उभरते देशों किया नहीं आवश्यकता लोकल trials for product approvals.
Now, though उभरते countries still accept data from U.S./Europe, they also require some local trials.
Depending on the type of product and the stage of its development, जांचकर्ताओं initially enroll स्वयंसेवक and/or मरीजों into छोटी पायलट अध्ययन, और subsequently conduct larger scale studies in patients that often compare the new product with others already approved for the affliction of interest.
As positive safety and efficacy आंकड़ा हैं gathered, the क्रमांक of patients is typically increased.
Clinical trials can vary in आकार, और can involve a सिंगल शोध एंटिटी in one country or many such entities in multiple countries.
A full series of trials may incur sizable costs, and the burden of paying for all the जरुरी लोगों और सेवाएं is प्रायः borne by the प्रायोजक, जिससे may be a सरकारी organization or a pharmaceutical, biotechnology or medical device company.
When the diversity of required support roles exceeds the resources of the sponsor, a clinical trial is प्रबंधित by an outsourced संगी, ऐसे as a अनुबंध शोध संगठन or a नैदानिक ट्रायल unit in the academic sector.
The Green Bay Packers are an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल टोली आधारित in ग्रीन Bay, Wisconsin.
They are members of the उत्तर प्रभाग of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( nfc ) in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल League ( NFL ).
ग्रीन खाड़ी is the third-oldest मताधिकार in the एनएफएल, having been organized and playing in 1919.
the पैकर्स हैं the तभी non-profit, community-owned प्रमुख league professional sports team in the United States.
The Packers are the last vestige of `` small town teams '' कि यहूद एकबार आम in the एनएफएल दौरान the 1920s and 1930s.
Founded in 1919 by Earl `` Curly '' Lambeau ( hence the name Lambeau Field on which the team plays ) and George Whitney Calhoun, the ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स can ट्रेस उनके lineage to अन्य semi-professional टीमों in Green Bay dating back to 1896.
In 1919 and 1920 the Packers competed as a semi-professional फ़ुटबॉल टोली विरूद्ध clubs from around Wisconsin and the Midwest.
They joined the American Professional Football Association ( apfa ) in 1921, the forerunner to कया is ज्ञात आज as the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( NFL ).
Although Green Bay is the last NFL `` small town '' team, its local fan base and media extends into आसपास मिल्वौकी ; the टोली भी निभाई चयनित घर games there between 1933 and 1994.
The Green Bay Packers have won 13 league championships ( more than any other team in the NFL ), including nine NFL championships prior to the Super Bowl era और चार सुपर कटोरी victories —in 1967 ( सुपर कटोरी i ), 1968 ( सुपर कटोरी ii ), 1997 ( सुपर कटोरी XXXI ) and 2011 ( Super Bowl XLV ).
The Packers have long-standing, bitter rivalries with their NFC North ( formerly the NFC Central ) प्रतिद्वंद्वियों, the शिकागो bears, मिनेसोटा वाइकिंग्स और the डेट्रॉयट शेर.
The Bears-Packers rivalry is one of the oldest rivalries in NFL इतिहास, डेटिंग वापस to 1921.
Ethanol fuel is ethanol ( ethyl दारू ), the वही प्रकार of दारू मिला in alcoholic beverages.
It is most often used as a motor fuel, मुख्यतः as a biofuel योगात्मक for gasoline.
World ethanol उत्पादन लिये हस्तांतरण ईंधन tripled between 2000 और 2007 इससे 17 अरब to more than 52 billion liters.
From 2007 to 2008, the share of ethanol in global गैसोलीन प्रकार ईंधन उपयोग increased इससे 3.7 % to 5.4 %.
In 2011 worldwide ethanol fuel उत्पादन पहुँचे 22.36 अरब u.S. द्रव गैलन ( bg ) ( 84.6 अरब liters ), साथ the संयुक्त राज्य as the शीर्ष निर्माता साथ 13.9 bg ( 52.6 अरब liters ), accounting for 62.2 % of global production, followed by Brazil with 5.6 bg ( 21.1 billion liters ).
इथेनॉल ईंधन रै a `` गैसोलीन गैलन equivalency `` ( gge ) मान of, जिससे अर्थात् 1.5 gallons of ethanol produce the energy of one gallon of gasoline.
Ethanol fuel is widely used in Brazil and in the United States, और साथ दोनो देशों यहूद जिम्मेदार लिये 87.1 % of the world 's ethanol fuel production in 2011.
Most गाड़ियाँ on the सड़क आज in the u.S. can चलाएं on मिश्रणों of up to 10 % इथेनॉल, and ethanol represented 10 % of the U.S. gasoline fuel supply derived from domestic sources in 2011.
Since 1976 the ब्राज़ीलियाई सरकारी रै बना it अनिवार्य to मिश्रण इथेनॉल with gasoline, and since 2007 the legal blend is around 25 % ethanol and 75 % gasoline ( E25 ).
By December 2011 Brazil had a fleet of 14.8 million flex-fuel automobiles and light trucks और 1.5 लाख flex-fuel मोटरसाइकिल कि regularly उपयोग neat इथेनॉल ईंधन ( ज्ञात as e100 ).
Bioethanol is a रूप of बेदर्दी उर्जा कि can be उत्पादित इससे agricultural feedstocks.
It can be made from very आम फसलों ऐसे as शुगर cane, आलू, manioc and corn.
There has been considerable debate परिचय कैसा उपयोगी bioethanol होगा be in replacing gasoline.
Concerns परिचय इसके उत्पादन और उपयोग सुनाना to increased खाना कीमतें due to the विशाल राशि of arable land required for crops, as well as the energy and pollution balance of the whole cycle of ethanol production, especially from corn.
Recent developments with cellulosic ethanol उत्पादन और व्यावसायीकरण may allay कुछ of ये चिंताएं.
Cellulosic इथेनॉल offers वादा क्युकी cellulose मछली, a प्रमुख and universal component in plant cells walls, can be used to produce ethanol.
according to the अंतरराष्ट्रीय उर्जा एजेंसी, cellulosic इथेनॉल could allow इथेनॉल fuels to play a much bigger role in the future than previously thought.

A plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo assassination and steps of Gavrilo Princip ( image लिया in 1987, पहले कदम यहूद removed in 1992 और प्लैक बदला इससे cyrillic to लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट )
A plaque commemorating the स्थान of the साराजेवो assassination ( image taken in 2009 )
On 28 June 1914, Archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड of ऑस्ट्रिया, वारिस presumptive to the austro-hungarian सिंहासन, और उसके बीवी, सोफी, duchess of hohenberg, यहूद शॉट मुर्दे in साराजेवो, by Gavrilo Princip, one of a group of six Bosnian Serb assassins coordinated by Danilo Ilić.
The political objective of the assassination was to break off Austria-Hungary 's south-slav प्रांतों so वे could be संयुक्त into a वृहद सर्बिया or a यूगोस्लाविया.
The हत्यारे ' motives यहूद सतत साथ the गति that later became known as Young Bosnia.
Serbian सैन्य अधिकारियों stood पीछे the attack.
At the top of these Serbian military conspirators was Chief of Serbian सैन्य प्रज्ञा dragutin dimitrijević, उसके righthand man प्रमुख vojislav tankosić, और masterspy Rade Malobabić.
Major Tankosić armed the हत्यारे साथ बम और pistols और प्रशिक्षित them.
The assassins were given access to the वही clandestine टनल of safe-houses और एजेंटों कि rade malobabić प्रयुक्त लिये the घुसपैठ of weapons and operatives into Austria-Hungary.
The assassins, the key members of the clandestine tunnel, and the key सर्बियाई सैन्य षड्यंत्रकारियों जो यहूद स्टिल alive were arrested, tried, convicted and punished.
Those who were arrested in Bosnia यहूद आजमाया in साराजेवो in अक्तूबर 1914.
The other conspirators were arrested and tried before a Serbian kangaroo court on the french-controlled salonika सामने in 1916–1917 on unrelated गलत आरोप ; सर्बिया चलाया three of the top military conspirators.
Much of what is known about the assassinations आता इससे ये दो ट्रायल और सम्बन्धित रिकॉर्ड.
Assignment of responsibility for the bombing और हत्याएं of 28 जून is अत्यधिक विवादास्पद क्युकी the attack led to the outbreak of World War I one month later.
Renée Kathleen zellweger ( born अप्रैल 25, 1969 ) is an American actress and producer.
Zellweger first gained widespread attention for her role in the film Jerry Maguire ( 1996 ), and subsequently received two nominations लिये the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री लिये उसके भूमिकाएँ as ब्रिजेट जोन्स in the कॉमेडी ब्रिजेट जोन्स 's डायरी ( 2001 ), and as Roxie Hart in the musical Chicago ( 2002 ).
She won the Academy Award for Best Supporting अभिनेत्री लिये उसके प्रदर्शन in the नाटक ठंडा पहाड़ ( 2003 ).
She has won an अकादमी पुरस्कार, तीन सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार, तीन स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड पुरस्कार, और a bafta पुरस्कार ; थी नामित hasty खीर 's स्त्री of the Year in 2009 ; and established herself as one of the highest-paid Hollywood actresses as of 2007.
The ossicles ( also called auditory ossicles ) हैं the तीन smallest हड्डियों in the human body, the malleus, the incus and the stapes.
They are contained within the मध्य कान स्पेस और serve to संचारण ध्वनि इससे the air to the fluid-filled labyrinth ( cochlea ).
The absence of the auditory ossicles होता constitute a moderate-to-severe hearing loss.
The term `` ossicles '' वस्तुतः अर्थात् `` छोटा हड्डियों '' और commonly refers to the auditory ossicles, though the term may refer to any small bone throughout the body.
The New Covenant ( Hebrew • • — Greek • • diatheke kaine ) is a biblical निर्वचन originally निकला इससे a phrase in the Book of Jeremiah, in the Hebrew Scriptures.
It is often thought of as an eschatological मुक्तिदाता आयु or संसार to आइये और is सम्बन्धित to the biblical अवधारणा of the Kingdom of God.
Generally, Christians believe that the New Covenant थी instituted at the पिछला भोजन as भाग of the eucharist, जिससे in the इन्जील of John includes the New Commandment.
There are several Christian eschatologies that further define the New Covenant, as an example an inaugurated eschatology defines and describes the New Covenant as an ongoing relationship between Christian believers and God that will be in full fruition after the Second coming of मसीह ; कि is, it होगा नहीं तभी be in पूरा फलीभूत in believing दिल, लकिन in the भविष्य बाह्य संसार as well.
The connection between the Blood of Christ and the New Covenant is seen in most modern English translations of the New Testament with the saying : `` this कप कि is poured आउट लिये तुम is the नई वचन in my blood ''.
ईसाइयों मानना कि यीशु is the मध्यस्थ of the नई वचन, and that the Blood of Christ shed at his crucifixion is the required blood of the covenant.
As with all covenants between परमेश्वर और man वर्णित in the बाइबल, the नई Covenant is considered `` a bond in blood sovereignly administered by God. ''
it रै महरूम theorized कि the नई वचन is the विधि of Christ as spoken during his Sermon on the Mount.
The following List of people pardoned or granted clemency by the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य दस्तावेज़ the सबसे prominent मामले of प्रत्येक प्रेसिडेंसी.
As granted by the Constitution ( Article II, Section 2, Clause 1 ), Presidents have the शक्ति to ग्रान्ट दया in एक or अधिक of the following तरीके : the क्षमता to ग्रान्ट a पूरा pardon, to भ्रमण a वाक्य, or to rescind a fine.
U.S. राष्ट्रपतियों have no शक्ति to ग्रान्ट दया लिये अपराधों prosecuted under state law.
As to the अंतर between a pardon और a commutation:
A pardon is an कार्यपालिका order vacating a conviction.
A commutation is the mitigation of the sentence of someone currently serving a वाक्य लिये a अपराधों pursuant to a conviction, बगैर vacating the conviction itself.
लगभग 20,000 pardons और clemencies were issued by U.S. presidents in the 20th century alone.
The records of acts of clemency were पब्लिक जबतक 1934.
In 1981 the Office of the pardon attorney थी created and records from President H. W. Bush forward are now listed.
इस सूची शामिल pardons and commutations.
Tampa ( ) is a city in the u.S. राज्य of फ्लोरिडा.
It serves as the county seat for Hillsborough County और is स्तिथ on the वेस्ट coast of फ्लोरिडा, on tampa खाड़ी निकट the Gulf of Mexico.
The population of tampa in 2011 थी 346,037.
The current location of Tampa was once inhabited by स्वदेशी peoples of the सुरक्षा हार्बर संस्कृति, सबसे notably the Tocobaga and the Pohoy, who lived along the shores of Tampa Bay.
It was briefly explored by Spanish explorers in the early 16th सदी, लकिन वहीँ यहूद no स्थाई अमरीकी or यूरोपीय settlements भीतर आज 's city limits until after the United States had acquired Florida from Spain in 1819.
In 1824, the United States Army established a frontier outpost पुकारा फोर्ट ब्रुक at the मुँह of the hillsborough नदी, निकट the साईट of आज 's Tampa Convention Center.
The first civilian residents were pioneers जो settled निकट the फोर्ट लिये सुरक्षा इससे the nearby Seminole population.
The town grew slowly until the 1880s, when railroad links, the डिस्कवरी of फास्फेट, और the आगमन of the सिगार उद्योग jump-started tampa 's विकास और helped it to grow into an important city by the early 1900s.
Today, Tampa is a part of the महानगर क्षेत्रफल सबसे commonly referred to as the tampa Bay Area.
For U.S. Census purposes, Tampa is भाग of the tampa-st. petersburg-clearwater, Florida Metropolitan Statistical Area.
The four-county area is composed of roughly 2.7 million residents, making it the second largest metropolitan statistical area ( MSA ) in the राज्य, और the चौथी largest in the southeastern संयुक्त राज्य, पीछे मियामी, वॉशिंगटन, d.C., and Atlanta.
The Greater Tampa Bay क्षेत्रफल रै बस over 4 लाख निवासियों और generally includes the Tampa and Sarasota metro areas.
The tampa खाड़ी साझेदारी और u.S. जनसांख्यिकी आंकड़ा दिखाया an औसत सालाना विकास of 2.47 percent, or a gain of approximately 97,000 residents per year.
Between 2000 and 2006, the वृहद tampa खाड़ी मार्केट अनुभवी a संयुक्त विकास रेट of 14.8 प्रतिशत, growing from 3.4 million to 3.9 million and hitting the 4 million people mark on April 1, 2007.
A 2012 estimate shows the Tampa Bay area population to have 4,310,524 लोगों और a 2017 प्रक्षेप of 4,536,854 लोगों.
Tampa has a number of खेल टीमों, ऐसे as the tampa खाड़ी buccaneers of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग, the tampa खाड़ी बिजली of the नेशनल हॉकी लीग, and the Tampa Bay Storm of the Arena Football League.
The Tampa Bay Rays in Major League Baseball and the tampa खाड़ी rowdies of the उत्तर अमरीकी सॉकर लीग खेल उनके घर खेल in neighboring st. पीटर्सबर्ग, Florida.
In 2008, tampa थी क्रमित as the 5th बेहतरीन बाहरी city by Forbes.
A 2004 survey by the NYU newspaper Washington Square न्यूज क्रमित tampa as a शीर्ष नगर लिये `` twenty-somethings. ''
tampa is अभी क्रमित as a `` गामा '' संसार नगर by Loughborough University.
According to Loughborough, Tampa ranks alongside अन्य संसार शहरों ऐसे as फीनिक्स, Santo Domingo, and Osaka.
In recent years Tampa has seen a notable upsurge in high-market माँग इससे उपभोक्ता, signaling अधिक माल concentrated in the area.
Tampa hosted the 2012 रिपब्लिकन नेशनल Convention.
The शेवरलेट cavalier थी a कॉम्पैक्ट ऑटोमोबाइल उत्पादित इससे 1982 to 2005 by General Motors.
निर्मित on the कम्पनी 's j मंच, the cavalier produced the highest sales in 1984.
AT & T Mobility LLC branded and referred to as AT & T ( formerly Cingular Wireless LLC ), is a wholly स्वामित्व subsidiary of at & t inc. कि provides बेतार सेवाएं to 107 लाख सदस्य in the संयुक्त राज्य, including Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands.
at & t गतिशीलता is the दूसरी largest बेतार दूरसंचार प्रदाता in the United States and Puerto Rico, behind Verizon Wireless, which serves 115.78 million customers as of the fourth quarter of 2012.
AT & t गतिशीलता is headquartered in the lenox पार्क area of DeKalb Co. Georgia, just outside Atlanta.
Originally Cingular Wireless LLC from 2000 to 2007, a joint venture between SBC संचार और bellsouth, the कम्पनी acquired the बूढ़ा at & t बेतार in 2004 ; sbc बाद acquired the असली at & t और re-branded as `` AT & T ''.
Cingular became wholly owned by AT & T in दिसम्बर 2006 as a परिणाम of at & t 's अधिग्रहण of BellSouth.
In January 2007, cingular पुष्टि it होता re-brand itself अंतर्गत the AT & T name.
Although the legal corporate name change occurred immediately, for both regulatory and brand-awareness कारण दोनो ब्रांड्स यहूद प्रयुक्त in the कम्पनी 's साइनेज और विज्ञापन during a transition period.
The transition concluded in लेट जून, बस prior to the rollout of the Apple iPhone.
On March 20, 2011, at & t गतिशीलता घोषित इसके इरादे to acquire T-Mobile USA from Deutsche Telekom for $ 39 billion.
If it had received government and regulatory approval, AT & T would have था अधिक than 130 लाख सदस्य.
However, the U.S. Department of Justice, the Federal Communications Commission, and AT & T Mobility 's प्रतिस्पर्धी ( ऐसे as स्प्रिंट nextel ) opposed the मूव on the grounds कि it होता reduce प्रतियोगिता in the cellular communications market.
In December 2011, in the face of both सरकारी और फैली उपभोक्ता विपक्ष, at & t withdrew उनके प्रस्ताव to पूरा the merger.
Martin Luther King, Jr. ( January 15, 1929 – April 4, 1968 ) थी an अमरीकी clergyman, activist, और नेता in the african-american सिविल अधिकारों Movement.
He is best known for his role in the उन्नति of सिविल अधिकारों using nonviolent सिविल disobedience.
King has become a नेशनल प्रतीक in the इतिहास of American progressivism.
A Baptist minister, किंग became a सिविल अधिकारों activist जल्दी in his career.
He led the 1955 मोंटगोमरी बस बहिष्कार और helped मिला the दक्षिणी ईसाई नेतृत्व सम्मेलन ( sclc ) in 1957, serving as its first president.
With the SCLC, King led an unsuccessful struggle against पृथक्करण in albany, जॉर्जिया, in 1962, और व्यवस्थित nonviolent विरोध in बर्मिंघम, Alabama, that attracted national attention following television news coverage of the brutal police response.
किंग भी helped to व्यवस्थित the 1963 कूच on वॉशिंगटन, जहाँ he delivered his `` I Have a Dream `` speech.
वहीँ, he स्थापित उसके प्रतिष्ठा as one of the greatest orators in American history.
He also established his reputation as a radical, and became an object of the संघीय ब्यूरो of छानबीन 's COINTELPRO for the rest of his life.
FBI agents investigated him लिये संभावित कम्युनिस्ट ties, अंकित उसके extramarital liaisons और reported on उन्हें to सरकारी officials, और on one occasion, mailed King a threatening anonymous letter that he interpreted as an attempt to make him commit suicide.
On October 14, 1964, King received the Nobel सलाम पुरस्कार लिये combating जातिगत असमानता through nonviolence.
In 1965, he and the SCLC helped to organize the Selma to मोंटगोमरी marches और the following साल, he took the गति north to Chicago.
In the फाइनल सालो of उसके जीवन, किंग विस्तारित उसके फ़ोकस to शामिल गरीबी और the वियतनाम युद्ध, alienating many of his liberal allies with a 1967 speech titled `` Beyond Vietnam ''.
King was planning a national occupation of वॉशिंगटन, d.C., पुकारा the ग़रीब लोगों 's अभियान.
King was assassinated on अप्रैल 4, 1968, in मेम्फिस, Tennessee.
His death was followed by दंगे in many U.S. cities.
Allegations that James Earl Ray, the man convicted of killing King, had been framed or acted in कॉन्सर्ट साथ सरकारी एजेंटों persisted लिये दशकों बाद the शूटिंग, और the जूरी of a 1999 सिविल trial found Loyd Jowers to be complicit in a conspiracy against King.
King was awarded the अध्यक्षीय पदक of स्वतंत्रता और the congressional सुनहरा पदक posthumously.
Martin Luther King, Jr. Day was स्थापित as a u.S. संघीय अवकाश in 1986.
Hundreds of streets in the U.S. have महरूम renamed in उसके सम्मान.
A memorial statue on the नेशनल मॉल थी खोली to the public in 2011.
The tiger ( पेंथेरा tigris ) is the largest बिल्ली प्रजाति, reaching a total body length of up to and weighing up to.
It is the third largest land carnivore ( पीछे तभी the ध्रुवीय भालू और the भूरा bear ).
Its सबसे recognizable विशेषता is a पैटर्न of अंधेरा लंबवत धारियाँ on reddish-orange fur with a lighter underside.
It has exceptionally stout teeth, and the canines are the longest among living felids with a क्राउन ऊँचाई of as much as or भी.
In zoos, टाइगर्स have जिया लिये 20 to 26 सालो, जिससे also seems to be their longevity in the wild.
They are territorial and generally solitary but social पशु, प्रायः requiring विशाल संलग्न क्षेत्रों of आवास कि support their prey requirements.
This, coupled with the fact that they are स्वदेशी to कुछ of the अधिक densely आबादी स्थान on धरती, रै caused significant conflicts with humans.
टाइगर्स एकबार ranged widely आरपार Asia, from Turkey in the west to the eastern coast of Russia.
Over the past 100 years, they have lost 93 % of their ऐतिहासिक दायरा, और have महरूम extirpated इससे दक्षिणपश्चिम और सेंट्रल एशिया, इससे the आइलैंड्स of Java and Bali, and from large areas of Southeast and Eastern Asia.
Today, they range from the siberian ताइगा to खोलें grasslands और तीव्र mangrove swamps.
The remaining six tiger subspecies have महरूम वर्गीकृत as endangered by IUCN.
The global population in the wild is estimated to number between 3,062 and 3,948 individuals, bas इससे around 100,000 at the प्रारंभ of the 20th सदी, साथ most remaining populations occurring in small pockets isolated from each other.
Major reasons for जनसांख्यिकी मनाही शामिल habitat destruction, habitat fragmentation and poaching.
The extent of area occupied by tigers is अनुमानित at कम than, a 41 % decline from the area estimated in the mid-1990s.
Tigers are among the most recognisable and popular of the संसार 's charismatic megafauna.
They have featured prominently in प्राचीन mythology और लोकगीत, और continue to be चित्रित in modern films and literature.
टाइगर्स appear on अनेक ध्वज, coats of बाहें, और as mascots for sporting teams.
The Bengal tiger is the नेशनल एनिमल of दोनो इण्डिया और बांग्लादेश.
The simplified आतंरिक ढांचा of a हरितलवक
Overview of the Calvin साईकिल और कार्बन fixation
The light-independent प्रतिक्रियाएँ of photosynthesis हैं रासायनिक reactions that convert carbon dioxide and other compounds into glucose.
These reactions occur in the stroma, the fluid-filled क्षेत्रफल of a हरितलवक outside of the thylakoid membranes.
ये प्रतिक्रियाएँ लो the light-dependent reactions and perform further chemical processes on them.
There are three phases to the light-independent प्रतिक्रियाएँ, collectively पुकारा the calvin साईकिल : कार्बन fixation, reduction reactions, and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration.
Despite its नाम, इस प्रक्रम occurs तभी when light is available.
Plants do not carry आउट the calvin cycle by night.
They, बजाय, रिलीज sucrose into the फ्लोएम from their starch reserves.
This process happens when light is available independent of the kind of photosynthesis ( C3 carbon fixation, C4 carbon fixation, and Crassulacean Acid चयापचय ) ; कैम पौधे स्टोर malic एसिड in उनके vacuoles प्रत्येक रात्रि और रिलीज it by दिन in अनुक्रम to मेक इस प्रक्रम work.
A linen handkerchief with pulled लड़ी कढ़ाई around the किनारे
Linen cloth बरामद इससे qumran गुफा 1 निकट the Dead Sea.
लिनेन ( ) is a वस्त्र बना from the fibers of the flax plant, Linum usitatissimum.
Linen is labor-intensive to manufacture, but when it is made into garments, it is valued लिये इसके असाधारण शीतलता and freshness in hot weather.
The word `` linen '' is of West Germanic origin and cognates with the Latin name for the flax संयंत्र linum, और the पहले यूनानी λινόν ( linon ).
This word history रै दिए वृद्धि to a क्रमांक of अन्य शर्तें in अंग्रेज़ी, the सबसे notable of जिससे is the English word line, derived from the use of a linen ( flax ) thread to determine a straight line.
Textiles in a linen weave texture, even when made of cotton, hemp और अन्य non-flax मछली हैं भी loosely referred to as `` लिनेन ''.
Such fabrics generally have उनके अपना विशिष्ट names अन्य than linen ; for example, fine cotton yarn in a linen-style weave is called Madapolam.
The collective term `` linens `` is स्टिल प्रायः प्रयुक्त generically to describe a क्लास of woven और भी knitted bed, bath, table and kitchen textiles.
The name linens is retained because traditionally, लिनेन थी प्रयुक्त लिये अनेक of ये items.
In the past, the शब्द `` linens '' थी भी प्रयुक्त to औसत lightweight undergarments ऐसे as शर्ट, chemises, waistshirts, lingerie ( a शब्द भी cognate with linen ), and detachable shirt collars and cuffs, which were historically made almost exclusively out of linen.
The inside cloth layer of fine कम्पोजिट कपडे garments ( as लिये उदाहरण jackets ) थी traditionally बना of लिनेन, और इस is the उत्पत्ति of the word lining.
Linen textiles appear to be some of the oldest in the संसार : उनके इतिहास goes वापस अनेक thousands of years.
Fragments of straw, seeds, fibers, yarns, and various types of fabrics जिससे तिथि वापस to परिचय 8000 bc have been found in Swiss lake dwellings.
Dyed flax fibers found in a prehistoric cave in Georgia सुझाएँ the उपयोग of woven लिनेन fabrics from wild flax may date back even earlier to 36,000 BP.
Linen was sometimes used as करेंसी in प्राचीन मिश्र.
Egyptian mummies were wrapped in linen because it was seen as a symbol of light और पवित्रता, और as a प्रदर्शक of माल.
Some of these fabrics, woven from hand spun yarns, were very fine लिये उनके दिन, लकिन हैं coarse compared to आधुनिक लिनेन.
Today, linen is प्रायः an महंगी वस्त्र, and is produced in relatively small quantities.
It has a long `` staple '' ( individual fiber लंबाई ) सापेक्ष to कपास और other natural fibers.
Many products are made of linen : aprons, bags, तौलिये ( swimmers, नहाना, बीच, देह और धो तौलिये ), napkins, bed linens, linen tablecloths, runners, chair covers, and men 's & women 's wear.
The FIFA World Cup, often simply the World Cup, is an अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ फ़ुटबॉल प्रतियोगिता लडे by the वरिष्ठ मेन 's नेशनल टीमों of the सदस्यों of fédération internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ), the sport 's global governing body.
The championship has been awarded every four years since the inaugural टूर्नामेंट in 1930, मगर in 1942 और 1946 जब it थी नहीं held because of the Second World War.
The वर्तमान champions हैं स्पेन, जो won the 2010 tournament.
The current format of the टूर्नामेंट involves 32 टीमों स्पर्धा लिये the शीर्षक at venues भीतर the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ) over a period of about a month ; this phase is often called the World Cup Finals.
A qualification phase, which फिलहाल takes प्लेस over the preceding तीन सालो, is प्रयुक्त to determine जिससे टीमों qualify लिये the tournament together with the host nation ( s ).
The 19 World Cup tournaments have महरूम जीती by आठ अलग नेशनल टीमों.
Brazil have won five times, और वे हैं the तभी टोली to have निभाई in प्रत्येक tournament.
The other World Cup winners are Italy, with four titles ; Germany, with three titles ; अर्जेंटीना और inaugural विजेता उरुग्वे, साथ दो शीर्षक प्रत्येक ; और इंग्लैण्ड, फ़्रांस, and Spain, with one title each.
The World Cup is the world 's most widely viewed sporting इवेंट ; an अनुमानित 715.1 लाख लोगों देखी the फाइनल मैच of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany.
The अगला तीन संसार cups होगा be hosted by ब्राज़ील in 2014, Russia in 2018, and Qatar in 2022.
The is an विस्तार यंत्र लिये the वी रिमोट वीडियो खेल नियंत्रक लिये the वी that allows it to more accurately capture complex motion.
According to Nintendo, the sensor in the device supplements the accelerometer and Sensor Bar capabilities of the Wii रिमोट to enable क्रियाएँ to be rendered identically on the स्क्रीन in रियल समय.
the वी 's successor कंसोल, the वी U, supports the Wii MotionPlus and its peripherals in games where use of its touchscreen-built-in primary controller is not necessary.
Majulah Singapura ( onward सिंगापुर ) is the national anthem of Singapore.
Composed by Zubir Said in 1958 as a theme song for official कृत्यों of the नगर परिषद of सिंगापुर, the सोंग थी चयनित in 1959 as the द्वीप 's anthem when it attained self-government.
Upon full स्वतंत्रता in 1965, majulah singapura थी formally adopted as Singapore 's national anthem.
By law the anthem may only be sung with its original Malay गीत, हालांकि वहीँ मौजूद प्राधिकृत अनुवाद of the गीत of the anthem in Singapore 's three other official languages : English, Mandarin and Tamil.
Originally composed in the key of G major, in 2001 the national anthem was officially relaunched in the निम्नतर कुंजी of f प्रमुख as इस थी कहा to allow लिये a `` grander और अधिक प्रेरणादायी arrangement ''.
The national anthem is regularly performed or सुंग in स्कूलों और हथियारबंद शक्तियां शिविरों at ceremonies आयोजित at the शुरूआत and/or the समाप्त of प्रत्येक दिन, दौरान जिससे the national flag is also raised and lowered and the national pledge is taken.
singaporeans हैं विशेषकर प्रोत्साहित to गाओ the नेशनल गान on अवसरों of नेशनल जश्न or नेशनल significance such as at the National Day Parade, at National Day observance ceremonies conducted by educational institutions and government departments, and at sporting events at which Singapore teams are participating.
An expedition 's shipwrights भवन a brigantine, 1541.
Shipbuilding is the निर्माण of जहाजों और फ्लोटिंग बरतन.
It सामान्यतः takes प्लेस in a specialized facility known as a shipyard.
Shipbuilders, also called shipwrights, follow a specialized occupation कि traces इसके जड़ें to पहले अंकित history.
Shipbuilding and ship repairs, both commercial and सैन्य, हैं referred to as `` नवल अभियान्त्रिकी ''.
The निर्माण of नौकाएँ is a समान कार्यकलाप पुकारा boat building.
the dismantling of जहाजों is called ship breaking.
Wakonda is a town in Clay काउंटी, दक्षिण डकोटा, संयुक्त राज्य.
The population थी 321 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
The following is a list of the most populous incorporated स्थान of the संयुक्त States of America.
As defined by the संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो, an `` incorporated प्लेस `` शामिल a variety of designations, including city, town, village, borough, and municipality.
A few exceptional Census Designated Places ( CDPs ) are also included in the जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो 's लिस्टिंग of incorporated places.
संचित city-counties represent a पृथक प्रकार of government that includes the entire population of a county, or county equivalent.
Some consolidated city-counties, however, शामिल अनेक incorporated places.
This list presents तभी कि portion ( or `` संतुलन '' ) of such consolidated city-counties that are not a part of another incorporated place.
Note that this list refers only to the population of individual municipalities within their defined limits, which does not शामिल अन्य municipalities or unincorporated suburban क्षेत्रों भीतर शहरी agglomerations.
A different ranking is evident जब considering u.S. महानगर क्षेत्रफल populations.

Nintendo DS storage devices are devices used to store a licensed developer 's work-in-progress बिंब, homebrew वीडियो खेल और डाउनलोड वाणिज्यिक खेल ( चूंकि the निन्टेंडो DS is not sold with a rewritable storage medium ).
licensed डेवलपर, however, can use a blue Intelligent Systems Nitro Emulator box to flash cards.
These डिवाइस हैं भी ज्ञात as `` flashcarts '' or `` flashcards ''.
There are two main classes of flashcarts : older devices जिससे अनुरूप in slot-2 ( the खेल लड़के अग्रिम खेल पाक स्लॉट ) और नए डिवाइस कि fit in Slot-1 ( the DS Game Card slot ).
Slot-2 ( or first-generation ) devices have been historically cheaper due to economies of scale ( inherited from their उपयोग साथ खेल लड़के अग्रिम ), लकिन आवश्यकता a booting औजार in slot-1 in अनुक्रम to उपयोग the touch screen and other DS features.
Second-generation devices ( those जिससे तभी उपयोग slot-1 ) do नहीं कार्य साथ gba homebrew, लकिन became कम महंगी and easier to use, rivaling many Slot-2 devices in price.
First-generation डिवाइस शामिल gba फ्लैश कारतूस, GBAMP CF, SuperCard, and M3.
second-generation डिवाइस include R4 Revolution, CycloDS, G6 Real and DS-X.
The storage device either contains फ्लैश मेमोरी or a slot for a memory card to store homebrew.
Storage devices with a memory-card slot usually have अधिक भंडार क्षमता than flash-memory devices.
Although flash-memory capacity is usually measured in megabits ( Mb ), memory-card capacity is प्रायः measured in मेगाबाइट ( mb ) ( जहाँ 8 mb is 1 MB ).
Storage-device brands differ in their support लिये homebrew ; ds और खेल लड़के अग्रिम roms ; खास सुविधाएँ ( ऐसे as ability to play media files ) ; physical size and cost.
Strictly बोलना, a भंडार यंत्र is नहीं जरुरी लिये ds साथ flashme संस्थापित because homebrew can be sent to the DS using WMB.
However, this is not an easily-portable method क्युकी the ds needs to be भीतर दायरा of a उपयुक्त wi-fi card.
are American लोगों of जापानी heritage.
Japanese Americans have historically been among the three largest एशियाई अमरीकी समुदायों, लकिन in हाल दशकों, it रै become the छठे largest समूह at roughly 1,304,286, including those of mixed-race or mixed-ethnicity.
In the 2010 census, the largest Japanese American communities were found in California with 272,528, Hawaii with 185,502, नई यॉर्क साथ 37,780, वॉशिंगटन साथ 35,008, and Illinois with 17,542.
Southern कैलिफ़ोर्निया रै the largest japanese-american जनसांख्यिकी in North America.

This is a व्यापक लिस्टिंग जिससे हाइलाइट significant उपलब्धियाँ और milestones based upon Billboard magazine 's singles charts, most notably the Billboard Hot 100.
This list spans from the issue dated January 1, 1955 to उपस्थित.
The Billboard Hot 100 began with the issue dated August 4, 1958, and is currently the मानक लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक चार्ट in the संयुक्त राज्य.
Prior to the सृष्टि of the hot 100, बिलबोर्ड प्रकाशित चार singles चार्ट : `` बेहतरीन विक्रेता in स्टोर्स '', `` सबसे निभाई by Jockeys '', `` Most Played in Jukeboxes '' and `` The Top 100 ''.
These चार्ट, जिससे ranged इससे 20 to 100 स्लॉट, were phased out at different times between 1957 and 1958.
Though technically not part of the hot 100 चार्ट इतिहास, उनके आंकड़ा is शामिल लिये कम्प्यूटेशनल उद्देश्य, and to avoid unenlightening or misleading characterizations.
All items listed below are from the Hot 100 era, unless वरना विख्यात ( pre-hot 100 charts ).
V is an American science fiction television series कि भागा लिये दो सीज़न on एबीसी, इससे नवम्बर 3, 2009 to March 15, 2011.
A remake of the 1983 miniseries created by Kenneth Johnson, the new series chronicles the arrival on धरती of a technologically उन्नत एलियन प्रजाति जिससे ostensibly आता in सलाम, लकिन दरअसल रै sinister motives.
V stars Morena Baccarin, Lourdes Benedicto, Morris Chestnut, Joel Gretsch, Logan Huffman, Charles Mesure, एलिज़ाबेथ मिशेल, लौरा vandervoort और स्कॉट भेड़िया, और थी कार्यपालिका उत्पादित by स्कॉट rosenbaum, यवेस simoneau, स्कॉट Peters, and Jace Hall.
The series was produced by The Scott Peters Company, HDFilms and warner भाईs. टेलीविज़न.
Geocaching is an outdoor recreational activity, in which the participants use a Global Positioning System ( GPS ) receiver or mobile device and other navigational techniques to hide and तलाश containers, पुकारा `` geocaches '' or `` caches '', anywhere in the world.
A typical cache is a small waterproof container containing a logbook where the geocacher enters the तिथि वे मिला it और लक्षण it साथ उनके established code name.
After signing into the log, the cache must be placed back exactly जहाँ the व्यक्ति found it.
Larger containers such as plastic storage containers ( Tupperware or समान ) or ammunition बाक्स can भी contain वस्तुएं लिये व्यापार, प्रायः खिलौने or trinkets of छोटी मान.
Geocaching shares many aspects with benchmarking, trigpointing, orienteering, treasure-hunting, letterboxing, and waymarking.
Boogie Down Productions was a hip hop group that was originally रचित of krs-one, d-nice, और dj स्कॉट la Rock.
DJ Scott La Rock थी murdered on अगस्त 27, 1987, महीने बाद the रिलीज of BDP 's debut album, Criminal Minded.
The नाम of the समूह, बोगी bas, गर्भाशयी इससे a उपनाम लिये the दक्षिण bronx section of The Bronx, one of the five boroughs of New York City.
The group pioneered the fusion of dancehall reggae and hip hop music and their debut LP Criminal minded contained फ़्रैंक descriptions of जीवन in the दक्षिण bronx of the लेट 1980s thus setting the stage for what would eventually become gangsta rap.
A municipal bond is a बंध जारी by a लोकल government, or their agencies.
Potential issuers of municipal bonds include states, cities, counties, redevelopment agencies, special-purpose districts, school जिले, पब्लिक यूटिलिटी जिले, सरेआम स्वामित्व एयरपोर्ट और seaports, और कोई अन्य governmental entity ( or group of governments ) at or below the state level.
नगरपालिका bonds may be सामान्य दायित्वों of the issuer or secured by specified revenues.
In the United States, interest income received by holders of municipal bonds is often exempt from the federal income tax and from the income tax of the राज्य in जिससे वे हैं जारी, हालांकि नगरपालिका bonds जारी लिये निश्चित उद्देश्य may नहीं be tax exempt.
Unlike new issue stocks that are brought to मार्केट साथ दाम प्रतिबंध जबतक the सौदे is बेची, municipal bonds are free to trade at any time once they are purchased by the investor.
पेशेवर व्यापारियों regularly trade and retrade the same bonds several times a week.
`` Gim me Some Lovin ' '' is a song written by स्टीव winwood, स्पेंसर डेविस और muff winwood, और originally performed by the स्पेंसर Davis Group.
The basic riff of the song was उधार इससे the होमर बैंको सोंग `` ( ai n't कि ) a लॉट of प्रेम '', written by Banks and Willie Dean `` Deanie '' Parker.
`` Gim me Some Lovin ' '' was a UK # 2 in the पतझड़ of 1966 और a us # 7.
The song is ranked # 247 on the रोलिंग स्टोन पत्रिका 's सूची of The 500 Greatest Songs of All Time.
The version issued in the UK ( and probably most of Europe ) is different from that issued in the us on the संयुक्त कलाकारों लेबल, होने धीमा, और lacking the बैकिंग vocals और `` सजीव sounding '' प्रदर्शन मिला on the us single.
( The US version has more often been used on reissue cds, भी those coming इससे Europe. )
The single features the sound of the हैमंड b-3 अंग.
The Internet Movie Database ( IMDb ) is an online database of सूचना सम्बन्धित to films, टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम, और वीडियो खेल.
This शामिल अभिनेताओं, उत्पादन क्रू कर्मियों, और fictional वर्ण प्रदर्शित in these three visual entertainment media.
It is एक of the सबसे लोकप्रिय ऑनलाइन entertainment गंतव्यों, with over 100 million unique users each month and a solid and rapidly growing mobile presence.
IMDb was launched on October 17, 1990, and in 1998 थी acquired by amazon.com.
As of April 27, 2013, IMDb had 2,503,783 titles ( includes एपीसोड ) और 5,192,493 personalities in इसके डेटाबेस, as खूब as 43 million registered users.
the जालस्थल रै an Alexa rank of 48.
Fibre चैनल मेजबान बस एडाप्टर ( 64-bit PCI-X card )
SCSI मेजबान बस एडाप्टर ( 16-bit ISA card )
In computer hardware, a मेजबान नियंत्रक, मेजबान एडाप्टर, or मेजबान बस एडाप्टर ( hba ) connects a host system ( the computer ) to other network and storage devices.
The terms are primarily प्रयुक्त to refer to डिवाइस लिये connecting scsi, fibre Channel and eSATA devices.
However, devices लिये connecting to आईडीई, ईथरनेट, firewire, USB and other systems may also be called host adapters.
Recently, the advent of iSCSI and Fibre Channel over Ethernet रै brought परिचय ईथरनेट hbas, जिससे हैं अलग इससे Ethernet NICs in that they include TCP Offload Engines.
There are also converged HBAs that support both Ethernet and Fibre चैनल पुकारा converged संजाल adapters ( CNAs ).
cashmere स्कार्फ
Modern men 's cashmere sweaters लिये बिक्री.
cashmere ऊन, प्रायः बस ज्ञात as cashmere, is a fiber obtained from Cashmere goats and other types of goat.
The word cashmere derives from an बूढ़ा स्पेलिंग of काश्मीर.
cashmere is ठीक in बनावट, strong, light, and soft.
Garments made from it provide बेहतरीन इन्सुलेशन.
In the संयुक्त राज्य, अंतर्गत the u.s. ऊन उत्पाद labeling अधिनियम of 1939, as amended, ( 15 Uction 68b ( a ) ( 6 ) ), states that a wool or textile product may not be labeled as containing cashmere unless:
such wool product is the fine ( dehaired ) undercoat fibers produced by a cashmere बकरी ( capra hircus laniger ) ;
the average diameter of the fiber of such wool उत्पाद करता नहीं exceed 19 माइक्रोन ; और
such wool product करता नहीं contain अधिक than 3 प्रतिशत ( by वज़न ) of cashmere fibers with average diameters that exceed 30 microns.
The average रेशा व्यास may be विषय to a गुणांक of विभिन्नता around the mean that shall not exceed 24 percent.
Jennifer convertibles inc. is the मालिक और licensor of sofabed और चमड़े specialty retail stores in the United States, with stores located throughout the Eastern seaboard, in the Midwest, on the West Coast and in the Southwest.
The company was founded in 1975 and is आधारित in woodbury, New York.
On July 19, 2010, the company announced that it had filed for bankruptcy as a consequence of `` substantial losses ''.
According to Furniture Today the company was number 48 among furniture रिटेलर साथ us $ 114 लाख in बिक्री लिये the साल ending August 29, 2009.
It subsequently emerged from Chapter 11 under the कंट्रोल of इसके प्रमुख प्रदायक, the haining mengnu समूह.
Egg roll is a term used for अनेक अलग भोजन around the संसार.
2__egg_roll __ किस्में of अंडा रोल्स हैं मिला in मेनलैंड चीन, अनेक chinese-speaking regions of Asia, and Chinese immigrant communities around the world.
Egg rolls as referred to in China.
In Guangdong and Hong Kong, egg roll प्रायः refers to बिस्किट roll.
इस is a प्रकार of biscuit.
The ingredient शामिल अंडा, आटा और sugar.
Egg roll also is a dish in Canton और हांग काँग, इस is प्रायः बना with vegetable.
Within China egg rolls are eaten predominantly in the southeast और हैं नहीं as commonly consumed in the north and western parts of China.
In American Chinese cuisine, an egg फेंकें is a savory डिश typically परोसा as an appetizer.
It is usually stuffed with chicken, pork or shrimp, गोभी, गाजर, टमाटर, सेम sprouts और अन्य सब्जियां, and then deep fried.
This variety of the egg roll is बहुत आम और लोकप्रिय, आरपार भी क्षेत्रीय varieties of American Chinese food, and is often included as part of a `` combination platter ''.
in मॉन्ट्रियल, कनाडा, open-ended eggrolls are a Jewish-Chinese fusion dish.
They can be either kosher certified or merely कोषेर स्टाइल.
Pain and suffering is the legal term for the physical and emotional stress caused from an चोट ( देखिए भी पीड़ा और कष्ट ).
Some damages that might be अंतर्गत इस श्रेणी होता be : aches, अस्थाई और स्थाई सीमाएं on कार्यकलाप, संभावित shortening of life, depression or scarring.
When filing a lawsuit as a result of an चोट, it is आम लिये किसी to तलाश धन दोनो in मुआवजे लिये वास्तविक धन कि is lost and for the pain and stress associated with virtually any injury.
In a suit, pain and suffering is part of the `` general damages '' section of the claimant 's claim, or, alternatively, it is an element of `` compensatory '' non-economic damages that allows रिकवरी लिये the दिमागी anguish and/or शारीरिक पीड़ा endured by the claimant as a परिणाम of चोट लिये जिससे the अभियोक्ता seeks redress.
Apart from money damages awarded in trial, money damages are भी दिए informally बाहर the न्यायिक प्रणाली in mediations, मध्यस्थता ( दोनो of जिससे may be court annexed or non litigated claims ) as well as in routine insurance settlements.
Individual claimants or those represented by वकील प्रायः उपस्थित मांगे to insurers to settle for money.
These demand for bodily injury compensation monies प्रायः नियत आउट क्षतिपूर्ति कि हैं similarly प्रयुक्त in the court litigated pleadings.
मांगे हैं प्रायः लिखा summaries of a claimant 's medical care and the facts which resulted in the injury.
नमूना of a medallion signature guarantee stampIn
the United राज्य और कनाडा, a medallion हस्ताक्षर गारंटी is a खास signature guarantee for the transfer of securities.
It is a guarantee by the transferring financial institution that the हस्ताक्षर is वास्तविक और the वित्तीय संस्था स्वीकृत देयता for any forgery.
Signature guarantees protect शेयरधारकों by preventing अनधिकृत हस्तांतरण और possible investor losses.
They also limit the देयता of the ट्रांसफ़र एजेंट जो स्वीकृत the certificates.
Different institutions have different policies as to what type of identification they require to provide the गारंटी और whether वे चार्ज a शुल्क लिये ऐसे सेवा ( प्रायः नाममात्र if कोई ).
Most institutions होगा नहीं गारंटी a हस्ताक्षर of किसी who has not already been their customer.
A medallion signature guarantee is नहीं the वही as an acknowledgment by a नोटरी पब्लिक, in the भाव कि a `` हस्ताक्षर गारंटी '' is a प्रमाणन by the संस्था कि the हस्ताक्षर is प्रामाणिक, और an acknowledgment is a certification by a notary public attesting that the signer signed a document voluntarily.
Some banks may no longer provide इस सेवा, however, many still do as well as other financial institutions such as a Savings and Loans and Credit Unions.
At their sole discretion, ये संस्थानों may स्टिल decline to provide the Medallion Signature Guarantees.
When US citizens are abroad, some financial संस्थानों may accept संयुक्त राज्य दूतावास seals, in प्लेस of the Medallion Signature Guarantee Stamp.
Pacific Electric Railway streetcars stacked at a junkyard on टर्मिनल द्वीप, लॉस एंजिल्स काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, कूच 1956
The General Motors streetcar conspiracy ( भी ज्ञात as the ग्रेट अमरीकी स्ट्रीटकार कांड ) refers to दोषारोपण और convictions in संबंध to a कार्यक्रम by सामान्य मोटर्स ( GM ) and other companies who purchased and then dismantled streetcar and electric train systems in many American cities.
Between 1936 and 1950, National City Lines and Pacific City Lines —with investment from GM, Firestone Tire, Standard Oil of California, Phillips Petroleum, Mack Trucks, and the संघीय अभियान्त्रिकी corporation—bought over 100 इलेक्ट्रिक surface-traction प्रणालियों in 45 शहरों सहित बाल्टीमोर, न्यूर्क, लॉस एंजिल्स, नई यॉर्क नगर, ओकलैंड और सैन डिएगो और परिवर्तित उन्हें into बस operation.
Several of the companies involved were convicted in 1949 of conspiracy to monopolize interstate commerce but यहूद acquitted of conspiring to monopolize the ownership of these companies.
Some suggest that this program played a key role in the decline of public transit in cities across the United States ; notably एडविन J. quinby, जो पहला खींचा ध्यान to the कार्यक्रम in 1946, और तब ब्रैडफोर्ड C. snell, an anti-trust attorney लिये the संयुक्त राज्य Senate whose controversial 1974 testimony to a Senate inquiry brought the issue to national awareness.
Both Quinby and Snell argued that the deliberate विनाश of streetcars थी भाग of a larger रणनीति to धक्का the संयुक्त राज्य into automobile dependency.
Others say that independent economic factors brought परिचय परिवर्तन in the पारगमन प्रणाली, सहित the ग्रेट अवसाद, the पब्लिक यूटिलिटी पकड़कर कम्पनी अधिनियम of 1935, मजदूर अशांति, मार्केट शक्तियां, rapidly increasing traffic congestion, urban sprawl, taxation policies that favored private vehicle ownership, and general enthusiasm for the automobile.
एक लेखक on the विषय रै सुझाया कि snell और अन्य गिरी into simplistic षड्यंत्र सिद्धान्त सोच, bordering on paranoid delusions saying `` Clearly, GM waged a war on electric traction.
It was indeed an all out उत्पीड़न, लकिन by no अर्थात् the सिंगल reason for the failure of rapid transit.
Also, it is just as clear that actions और inactions by सरकारी contributed significantly to the elimination of electric traction. ''
Only a small handful of U.S. cities have surviving effective rail-based urban transport प्रणालियों आधारित on streetcars or trams, सहित न्यूर्क, फिलाडेल्फिया, सैन फ्रांसिस्को, पिट्सबर्ग, and Boston ; others are re-introducing them.
The स्टोरी रै महरूम छान अनेक टाइम्स in छपाई, फिल्मी और अन्य मीडिया, notably in Who Framed Roger Rabbit, Taken for a Ride and The End of Suburbia.

American colonial architecture includes several building design styles associated with the colonial period of the संयुक्त राज्य, सहित पहला काल अंग्रेज़ी ( late-medieval ), फ्रेंच औपनिवेशिक, स्पेनी औपनिवेशिक, डच Colonial and Georgian.
These styles are associated with the houses, churches और सरकारी इमारतें of the काल इससे परिचय 1600 through the 19th century.
`` In the Mood '' is a big band era # 1 hit अंकित by अमरीकी bandleader Glenn Miller.
It topped the चार्ट in 1940 in the u.S. और एक साल later was featured in the movie Sun Valley Serenade.
In 1999, National Public रेडियो ( npr ) शामिल the 1939 ग्लेन मिलर रिकॉर्डिंग on आरसीए bluebird on the npr 100, the सूची of `` The 100 most important American musical works of the 20th century ''.

The NEPTUNE Canada project is the world’s first regional-scale भाटे समंदर वेधशाला कि plugs सीधे into the Internet.
Since December 2009, it has allowed people to `` surf '' the seafloor while ocean scientists चलाएं deep-water प्रयोग इससे लैब्स और universities around the world.
Along with its सिस्टर प्रोजेक्ट, शुक्र, वरुण offers a unique approach to ocean science.
Traditionally, ocean scientists have relied on infrequent ship cruises or space-based satellites to carry आउट उनके शोध, जबकि the वरुण project uses a remotely operated crawler.
A gramophone record, commonly ज्ञात as a फोनोग्राफ रिकार्ड ( in अमरीकी अंग्रेज़ी ), विनाइल रिकार्ड ( in सन्दर्भ to विनाइल, the सामग्री सबसे commonly प्रयुक्त बाद परिचय 1950 ), or colloquially, `` a record '', is an analog sound storage medium consisting of a flat disc with an inscribed, modulated spiral groove.
The groove usually starts near the periphery और ends निकट the बीच of the डिस्क.
Phonograph records are generally described by their diameter in inches ( 12-inch, 10-inch, 7-inch, etc. ), the rotational speed at which they are played ( `` 33 rpm ``, `` 78 '', `` 45 '', etc. ), उनके समय क्षमता ( `` long playing '' ), उनके reproductive सटीकता, or `` वफ़ादारी `` ( `` ऊँची वफ़ादारी '', `` orthophonic '', `` full-range '', इत्यादि. ), और the क्रमांक of चैनल्स of ऑडियो provided ( `` मोनो ``, `` स्टीरियो ``, `` quadraphonic ``, etc. ).
Phonograph records were the primary medium used for म्यूज़िक जनन लिये सबसे of the 20th सदी, replacing the फोनोग्राफ cylinder, with which it had co-existed, by the 1920s.
By the late 1980s, डिजिटल मीडिया था gained a larger मार्केट share, और the vinyl record left the mainstream in 1991.
They continue to be manufactured and बेची in the 21st सदी.
In 2008, nearly 2.9 million units shipped, the most in कोई साल चूंकि 1998 और the स्वरूप रै जारी to धीरे regain popularity.
They are especially used by DJs and audiophiles लिये अनेक प्रकार of म्यूज़िक.
As of 2013, विनाइल रिकॉर्ड continue to be प्रयुक्त for distribution.

Grasslands are areas where the vegetation is dominated by grasses ( Poaceae ), however sedge ( cyperaceae ) और फटाफट ( juncaceae ) परिवारों can भी be मिला.
Grasslands occur naturally on all महाद्वीपों मगर अंटार्कटिक.
In temperate latitudes, ऐसे as northwestern यूरोपीय और the ग्रेट मैदान और कैलिफ़ोर्निया in उत्तर अमेरिका, देशी grasslands हैं वर्चस्व by बारहमासी गुच्छा ग्रास प्रजाति, whereas in warmer climates annual species form a greater component of the vegetation.
Grasslands are found in most ecoregions of the धरती.
For example there are five terrestrial ecoregion classifications ( subdivisions ) of the शीतोष्ण grasslands, savannas, और shrublands बायोम ( ' ecosystem ' ), जिससे is एक of आठ terrestrial ecozones of the Earth 's surface.
Henna ( Lawsonia inermis, also called henna tree ) or Hina is a flowering plant, the एकमात्र प्रजाति in the genus lawsonia in the परिवार lythraceae.
The English name `` henna '' comes from the अरबी ( ala-lc : ḥinnāʾ / सुनाया ) or colloquially, loosely pronounced.
The name is also used for dye preparations निकला इससे the संयंत्र, और लिये the आर्ट of अस्थाई tattooing based on those dyes.
Henna has been used since antiquity to dye skin, बाल, और fingernails, as खूब as fabrics सहित रेशा, wool and leather.
Additionally, the name is misused for अन्य स्किन और बाल dyes, ऐसे as ब्लैक हिना or न्यूट्रल हिना, जिससे are not derived from the plant.
A thin film is a layer of सामग्री ranging इससे भिन्नों of a nanometer ( monolayer ) to several micrometers in thickness.
Electronic semiconductor devices and ऑप्टिकल coatings हैं the प्रमुख अनुप्रयोग benefiting from thin-film construction.
A familiar application of thin films is the household mirror, which typically रै a पतला मेटल कोटिंग on the वापस of a चादर of कांच to form a reflective interface.
The process of silvering थी एकबार commonly प्रयुक्त to produce mirrors.
A very-thin-film कोटिंग ( कम than a nanometer मोटा ) is प्रयुक्त to produce two-way mirrors.
The performance of optical coatings ( e.g. antireflective, or ar, coatings ) हैं typically उन्नत जब the thin-film कोटिंग consists of multiple layers having varying thicknesses and refractive indices.
Similarly, a periodic structure of प्रत्यावर्ती पतला films of अलग सामग्री may collectively रूप a so-called superlattice which exploits the phenomenon of quantum confinement by restricting electronic phenomena to two-dimensions.
Work is होने किया साथ ferromagnetic and ferroelectric thin films for use as computer memory.
It is also होने लागू to दवाएँ, via thin-film drug delivery.
Thin-films are used to उपज thin-film बैटरी.
Thin films are also used in dye-sensitized सौर cells.
Ceramic thin films हैं in चौड़ी use.
The relatively high hardness and inertness of ceramic materials make this type of thin coating of ब्याज लिये सुरक्षा of substrate सामग्री विरूद्ध संक्षारण, oxidation and wear.
In particular, the उपयोग of ऐसे coatings on कटिंग टूल्स can extend the life of these items by several orders of magnitude.
Research is being done on a new class of thin-film अकार्बनिक ऑक्साइड सामग्री, पुकारा amorphous heavy-metal cation multicomponent आक्साइड, which could be used to make transparent transistors that are inexpensive, stable, and environmentally benign.
Gears of War is a military science fiction third-person शूटर वीडियो खेल विकसित by एपिक खेल and published by Microsoft Game Studios.
It was initially released as an exclusive title for the Xbox 360 in November 2005 in North America, Australia, and सबसे of यूरोपीय और शामिल a `` सीमित कलेक्टर 's संस्करण '' साथ added सामग्री और an आर्ट किताब titled नष्ट सौंदर्य कि विस्तृत much of the खेल 's back-story.
Despite the initial statements of Xbox 360 exclusivity, a Microsoft Windows version of the game was developed in conjunction with People Can Fly and released a year later, featuring नई सामग्री सहित अतिरिक्त अभियान स्तर, a नई एकाधिक खेल विधि, और खेल लिये Windows Live functionality.
The game focuses on the troops of Delta Squad as they wield a desperate, last-ditch attempt to save the remaining human निवासियों of the fictional ग्रह sera इससे a अथक और seemingly अजेय subterranean दुश्मन known as the Locust Horde.
The player assumes the role of मार्कस fenix ( लकिन can भी खेल as डोमिनिक सैंटियागो ), a पूर्व कैदी and war-hardened soldier.
The game is based on the उपयोग of कवर और रणनीतिक आग लिये the खिलाड़ी to अग्रिम through the scenarios ; a second player can play cooperatively through the main campaign to assist.
The game also सुविधाएँ अनेक ऑनलाइन एकाधिक खेल modes for up to eight players.
Gears of War sold over तीन लाख नक़ल in बस टेन सप्ताह और थी the fastest-selling वीडियो game of 2005 as well as the second-most played game over Xbox Live during.
It currently stands as the 5th best selling एक्सबॉक्स 360 खेल of सब समय.
The खेल रै चूंकि बेची over पाँच million copies by September 2008.
The game was well received by आलोचकों, जो praised इसके gameplay और विस्तृत visuals, और it जीती several `` Game of the Year '' awards in 2006.
The success of the game has led to the development of the Gears of War franchise, including the 2008 sequel Gears of War 2 and its follow-up, Gears of War 3, which was released on September 20, 2011, बाद having initially महरूम नियत to have महरूम released on अप्रैल 5, 2011, the तिथि upon जिससे एपिक खेल ' चट्टान bleszinski थी a अतिथि on Late Night with Jimmy Fallon.
adaptations to किताबे, कॉमिक्स, as खूब as a विशेषता film are to be expected.
A Tree Grows in Brooklyn is a 1943 अनोखा लिखा by बेट्टी स्मिथ.
The story focuses on an irish-american परिवार in williamsburg, Brooklyn, New York City.
The novel is set in the first और दूसरी दशकों of the 20th century.
The book was an immense कामयाबी.
The main metaphor of the किताब is the हार्डी पेड़ of स्वर्ग, देशी to चीन और ताईवान, अभी माना हृदयरोग, and common in the vacant lots of New York City.
World map साथ the intertropical मण्डल highlighted in red.
Tropical climate zones of the Earth where all बारह महीने have औसत temperatures ऊपर 18 °c ( 64 °f ).
The tropics is a region of the धरती surrounding the Equator.
It is limited in latitude by the Tropic of Cancer in the northern hemisphere at approximately N and the Tropic of मकर in the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध at s ; ये latitudes correspond to the अक्षीय झुकाव of the धरती.
The tropics are भी referred to as the तीव्र मण्डल और the torrid zone ( see geographical zone ).
The tropics include all the areas on the Earth where the Sun reaches a point सीधे ओवरहेड at तनिक एकबार दौरान the सौर year.
The tropics are distinguished from the other climatic and biomatic regions of धरती, the मध्य latitudes और the ध्रुवीय regions on either side of the equatorial zone.
