`` What You Need '' is an episode of the अमरीकी टेलीविज़न anthology श्रेणी The Twilight Zone.
It is based on the छोटी स्टोरी of the वही नाम by Lewis Padgett ( Henry Kuttner and C. L. Moore ).
PlayhouseSquare, in the Cleveland Theater District in downtown Cleveland, Ohio, is the second-largest थिएटर जटिल in the संयुक्त राज्य, दूसरी तभी to नई यॉर्क City 's Lincoln Center ).
Constructed in a span of 19 months in the जल्दी 1920s, the थिएटर यहूद subsequently closed down, but were revived through a grassroots effort.
Their renovation and reopening helped usher in a new era of शहर पुनरोद्धार in क्लीवलैंड, और थी पुकारा `` एक of the top ten successes in Cleveland history. ''
The ड्राइवर और यात्री सामने airbags, after having been deployed, in a British Peugeot 306 car.
An एयरबैग is a गाडी safety device.
It is an occupant restraint system consisting of a लचीली कपड़ा लिफाफा or cushion designed to inflate rapidly दौरान an automobile collision.
Its purpose is to cushion occupants दौरान a क्रैश और provide सुरक्षा to उनके लाशें जब they strike interior objects such as the steering wheel or a window.
Modern वाहनों may contain अनेक एयरबैग मौड्यूल in विभिन्न पक्ष और frontal स्थितियाँ of the यात्री seating स्थितियाँ, और सेंसर may तैनात एक or more airbags in an impact zone at variable rates based on the type, angle and severity of impact ; the airbag is designed to only inflate in moderate to severe frontal crashes.
Airbags are normally designed साथ the इरादे of supplementing the सुरक्षा of an occupant who is correctly restrained with a seatbelt.
Most डिजाइन हैं inflated through pyrotechnic means and can only be operated once.
Newer side-impact एयरबैग मौड्यूल consist of संपीडित एयर सिलेंडर कि हैं triggered in the event of a side impact vehicle impact.
The first वाणिज्यिक डिजाइन यहूद introduced in यात्री ऑटोमोबाइल दौरान the 1970s with limited success.
Broad commercial adoption of airbags occurred in many markets during the late 1980s and early 1990s with a ड्राइवर एयरबैग, और a सामने यात्री एयरबैग as खूब on कुछ cars ; and many modern vehicles now include four or more units.
IRS tax forms are used for taxpayers and tax-exempt संगठन to रपट वित्तीय सूचना to the आतंरिक आय सेवा ( IRS ) of the United States.
They are used to report आय, गणना कर to be सशुल्क to the संघीय सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य, और ज़ाहिर other information as required by the Internal Revenue Code ( IRC ).
वहीँ हैं over 800 विभिन्न forms and schedules.
The best-known of these is रूप 1040 प्रयुक्त by individuals.
In the United States, driver 's licenses are issued by each individual state ( including Washington, D.C. and territories ), बल्कि than the संघीय सरकारी क्युकी of the राजनैतिक अवधारणा of संघवाद.
Drivers are normally required to obtain a license from their state of residence and all states recognize each अन्य 's पंक्तियां लिये अस्थाई विज़िटर विषय to सामान्य आयु आवश्यकताएँ.
A state may also suspend an individual 's ड्राइविंग विशेषाधिकार भीतर इसके सीमायें लिये ट्रैफ़िक violations.
Many states share a common system of license classes, with some exceptions, और वाणिज्यिक अनुज्ञा वर्ग हैं मानकीकृत by संघीय विनियमन at 49 CFR part 383.
China रै महरूम the सोर्स of अनेक आविष्कारों, सहित the चार ग्रेट आविष्कारों : papermaking, the compass, gunpowder, and printing ( both woodblock and movable type ).
The list below contains ये और अन्य आविष्कारों.
The Chinese invented technologies involving mechanics, hydraulics, और गणित लागू to horology, metallurgy, खगोलशास्त्र, agriculture, engineering, music theory, craftsmanship, nautics, and warfare.
By the Warring States Period ( 403–221 bc ), वे था उन्नत metallurgic प्रौद्योगिकी, सहित the blast furnace and cupola furnace, while the finery forge and puddling process were known by the Han Dynasty ( 202 BC – AD 220 ).
A sophisticated economic system in चीन दिया जनम to आविष्कारों ऐसे as पेपर धन during the Song Dynasty ( 960–1279 ).
The invention of gunpowder by the 10th सदी led to an सरणी of आविष्कारों ऐसे as the आग तलवार, जमीन मेरा, नवल मेरा, हाथ तोपों, exploding गोलों, multistage rocket, and rocket bombs with aerodynamic wings and explosive payloads.
With the navigational aid of the 11th-century compass and ability to steer at ऊँची समुद्र साथ the 1st-century sternpost अरित्र, premodern चाइनीज sailors sailed as दूर as ईस्ट अफ़्रीकी और Egypt.
In water-powered clockworks, the premodern Chinese had used the escapement यांत्रिकी चूंकि the 8th सदी और the अंतहीन power-transmitting कड़ी ड्राइव in the 11th सदी.
They also बना विशाल mechanical कठपुतली थिएटर चलित by waterwheels and carriage wheels and wine-serving automatons driven by paddle wheel boats.
The contemporaneous Peiligang and Pengtoushan cultures represent the oldest पाषाणकालीन संस्कृतियों of चीन और यहूद formed around 7000 BC.
Some of the first inventions of Neolithic, prehistoric China include semilunar and rectangular stone knives, stone hoes and spades, the cultivation of millet, rice and the soybean, the refinement of sericulture, the भवन of rammed धरती structures साथ लाइम -plastered हाउस floors, the सृष्टि of the कुम्हार 's व्हील, the सृष्टि of pottery साथ cord-mat-basket डिजाइन, the creation of pottery tripods and pottery steamers, and the development of ceremonial vessels and scapulimancy for purposes of divination.
Francesca Bray argues that the domestication of the ox and buffalo during the Longshan culture ( c. 3000–c. 2000 BC ) period, the absence of Longshan-era irrigation or high-yield crops, पूरा प्रमाण of longshan cultivation of dry-land खाद्यान्न फसलों जिससे दिया ऊँची yields `` तभी जब the मृदा थी carefully cultivated, '' सुझाएँ कि the हल थी ज्ञात at तनिक by the longshan संस्कृति period and explains the high agricultural production yields which allowed the rise of Chinese civilization during the Shang Dynasty ( c. 1600–c. 1050 BC ).
With later inventions ऐसे as the multiple-tube बीज ड्रिल और भारी moldboard iron plow, China 's agricultural output could sustain a much larger population.
For the purposes of this list, inventions are regarded as technological firsts developed in चीन, और as ऐसे करता नहीं शामिल विदेशी technologies जिससे the चाइनीज acquired through सम्पर्क, ऐसे as the पवनचक्की इससे the मध्य ईस्ट or the दूरदर्शी इससे Early modern Europe.
It also does not include technologies developed elsewhere and later invented separately by the चाइनीज, ऐसे as the ओडोमीटर and chain pump.
Scientific, mathematic or प्राकृतिक discoveries, परिवर्तन in नाबालिग अवधारणाओं of डिज़ाइन or स्टाइल और कलाकारी innovations can not be regarded as inventions and do not appear on the list.
Gross domestic product in 2011 US dollars per capita, adjusted for inflation and purchasing power parity ( log scale ) from 1860 to 2011, साथ जनसांख्यिकी ( डिस्क क्षेत्रफल ) लिये the us ( पीला ), uk ( नारंगी ), जापानी ( रेड ), चीन ( रेड ), और इण्डिया ( blue ).
Globalization ( or globalisation—see स्पेलिंग मतभेद ) is the प्रक्रम of अंतरराष्ट्रीय संयोजन arising from the interchange of world views, products, ideas, and other aspects of culture.
Put in simple terms, वैश्वीकरण refers to प्रक्रियाओं कि प्रचार world-wide exchanges of national and cultural resources.
Advances in परिवहन और दूरसंचार अवसंरचना, सहित the वृद्धि of the अंतरजाल, हैं प्रमुख factors in globalization, generating further interdependence of economic and cultural activities.
हालांकि अनेक विद्वानों प्लेस the origins of वैश्वीकरण in आधुनिक टाइम्स, अन्य ट्रेस इसके इतिहास long पहले the European age of discovery and voyages to the New World.
Some even trace the origins to the तीसरा मिलेनियम BCE.
Since the beginning of the 20th century, the pace of वैश्वीकरण रै intensified at a रैपिड रेट, विशेषकर दौरान the पोस्ट ठंडा युद्ध era.
The term वैश्वीकरण रै महरूम in increasing उपयोग चूंकि the mid-1980s and especially since the mid-1990s.
In 2000, the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मौद्रिक निधि ( imf ) पहचाना चार मौलिक पहलुओं of globalization : trade and transactions, capital and investment movements, migration and movement of people and the dissemination of knowledge.
Further, environmental चुनौतियां ऐसे as जलवायु बदलें, cross-boundary जल और एयर प्रदूषण, and over-fishing of the ocean are linked with globalization.
Globalizing प्रक्रियाओं affect और हैं प्रभावित by कारोबार और कार्य संगठन, economics, socio-cultural resources, and the natural environment.
The Replacements is a 2000 American खेल कॉमेडी फिल्मी निर्देशित by हावर्ड Deutch.
It stars कियानू रीव्स, जीन hackman, और Brooke Langton.
An American Airlines aircraft takes off इससे dallas/fort लायक अंतरराष्ट्रीय Airport.
This विमानक्षेत्र is the एयरलाइन 's largest hub.
American Airlines flies to 79 domestic destinations and 78 अंतरराष्ट्रीय गंतव्यों in 48 countries.
( as of दिसम्बर 2012 )
The list includes the city, country, the codes of the International Air हस्तांतरण संघ ( iata विमानक्षेत्र कोड ) और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय सिविल विमानन Organization ( ICAO airport code ), and the airport 's name, with the airline 's hubs, focus cities and seasonal destinations marked.
The list also contains destinations no longer served by the एयरलाइन, जिससे हैं चिह्नित as terminated destinations.
It does not include destinations served for American Airlines by its regional affiliates American त्रिभुज एयरलाइंस, कार्यपालिका एयरलाइंस, और americanconnection.
`` Day-O ( The Banana Boat Song ) '' is a traditional Jamaican mento folk song, the best-known संस्करण of जिससे थी सुंग by हैरी belafonte और an वैकल्पिक संस्करण interspersed साथ another Jamaican folksong, Hill and Gully Rider, by Dame Shirley Bassey.
Despite the song 's mento influences, `` day-o ( the banana नाव सोंग ) '' is widely ज्ञात as an उदाहरण of कैलिप्सो music.
It is a work song, from the पाइंट of दृश्य of डॉक मजदूर working the night shift loading bananas onto ships.
Daylight has come, the shift is over and वे want उनके कार्य to be गिने up so कि वे can go home.
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war केंद्रित in यूरोपीय कि began on 28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918.
It was predominantly called the World War or the ग्रेट युद्ध इससे इसके occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of संसार युद्ध ii in 1939, और the First World War or World War I thereafter.
It involved all the world 's great powers, which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the allies ( आधारित on the ट्रिपल entente of the संयुक्त किंगडम, फ़्रांस और रूस ) और the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany, Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but, as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement, Italy did not enter into the war ).
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the war : Italy, Japan and the संयुक्त राज्य joined the allies, और the उस्मानी साम्राज्य और बुल्गारिया the Central Powers.
Ultimately, अधिक than 70 लाख सैन्य कर्मियों, सहित 60 लाख europeans, यहूद mobilised in one of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 million combatants were killed, largely because of technological advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of हथियार बगैर सम्बन्धित सुधार in सुरक्षा or गतिशीलता.
It was the fifth- deadliest विरोध in संसार इतिहास, subsequently paving the रास्ता लिये विभिन्न राजनैतिक परिवर्तन, such as revolutions in many of the nations involved.
One of the long-term causes of the war was the पुनरुत्थान of साम्राज्यवाद in the विदेशी नीतियों of the great powers of Europe.
More immediately, the हत्या of archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड of ऑस्ट्रिया, the वारिस to the सिंहासन of austria-hungary, on 28 जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the previous decades were invoked.
Within weeks, the major powers were at war and, via उनके colonies, the विरोध जल्द स्प्रेड around the संसार.
On 28 July, the Austro-Hungarians fired the first shots of the युद्ध as तैयारी लिये the आक्रमण of सर्बिया.
While the Russians mobilised, the Germans invaded neutral बेल्जियम और ध्वज on the रास्ता to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli लिये ब्रिटेन 's घोषणा of युद्ध against Germany.
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the marne —the पश्चिमी सामने settled into a स्थिर बैटल of अपघर्षण साथ a गर्त लकीर कि बदला छोटी until 1917.
On the Eastern Front, the Russian army was कामयाब विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians, लकिन थी रोका in इसके आक्रमण of ईस्ट prussia by the Germans.
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the युद्ध, खोलने up fronts in the काकेशस, Mesopotamia and the Sinai.
Italy and Bulgaria went to युद्ध in 1915 और रोमानिया in 1916.
In Russia, the त्सार 's सरकारी collapsed in कूच 1917 और a subsequent क्रान्ति in November brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers.
After a 1918 German offensive along the पश्चिमी सामने, the allies drove वापस the germans in a श्रेणी of कामयाब offensives and American forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, which had its own trouble साथ क्रांतिकारियों, सहमत to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
the युद्ध ended in victory for the Allies.
कार्यक्रम on the घर fronts यहूद as उग्र as on the battle fronts, as the participants tried to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to fight a total war.
By the समाप्त of the युद्ध, चार प्रमुख इम्पीरियल powers—the German, Russian, Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist.
The successor states of the former दो खोया a ग्रेट राशि of territory, जबकि the latter two were dismantled entirely.
the मैप of सेंट्रल यूरोपीय थी redrawn into several smaller states.
The League of Nations was formed in the आशा of preventing another such conflict.
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires, the repercussions of Germany 's defeat and problems with the सन्धि of versailles हैं सहमत to be कारकों contributing to संसार War II.
Nurse Jackie is an American श्रेणी कि premiered on जून 8, 2009, on showtime, फिल्म सेंट्रल और The Movie Network.
The series stars Edie Falco as the title character जैकी peyton, an आपात विभाग नर्स at सब संतो ' हॉस्पिटल in New York City.
For जैकी, `` प्रत्येक दिन is a ऊँची तार अधिनियम of juggling मरीजों, doctors, fellow nurses and her own indiscretions. ''
Keeping Up with the kardashians ( प्रायः referred to बस as the kardashians ) is an अमरीकी वास्तविकता television series that premiered on October 14, 2007, on E !.
it फ़ॉलो the जीवनदान of the kardashian/jenner family, including sisters Kourtney, Kim, and Khloé Kardashian.
The series ' कामयाबी रै led to the spin-offs कोर्टनी और किम लो New York, Khloé & Lamar, Kourtney and Khloé Take Miami, and Kourtney and Kim Take Miami.
Afghanistan ( ; ; ), officially the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan, is a landlocked sovereign राज्य forming भाग of दक्षिण एशिया, सेंट्रल एशिया, और to कुछ extent पश्चिमी एशिया.
It has a population of around 30 million inhabiting an area of approximately, बनाना it the 42nd सबसे populous और 41st largest स्वदेश in the संसार.
It is bordered by पाकिस्तानी in the दक्षिण और the ईस्ट, इरान in the वेस्ट, तुर्कमेनिस्तान, Uzbekistan and Tajikistan in the north, and China in the far northeast.
Afghanistan has महरूम an प्राचीन फोकल पाइंट of the रेशा Road and human migration.
Archaeologists have found evidence of इंसान habitation इससे as दूर वापस as the मध्य paleolithic.
Urban सभ्यता may have begun in the क्षेत्रफल as जल्दी as 3,000 to 2,000 BCE.
बैठे at an महत्वपूर्ण geostrategic स्थान कि connects the मध्य ईस्ट संस्कृति साथ सेंट्रल एशिया और the Indian subcontinent, the land has been home to various peoples through the ages and witnessed many military campaigns, notably by Alexander the Great, Genghis Khan, and in modern era Western forces.
The land also served as a source from which the Greco-Bactrians, Kushans, Hephthalites, saffarids, ghaznavids, ghorids, khiljis, timurids, मुगलों, durranis, और others have risen to form major empires.
The political history of the modern state of अफगानिस्तान begins in 1709, जब the hotaki राजवंश थी established in Kandahar followed by Ahmad Shah Durrani 's rise to power in 1747.
In the late 19th century, Afghanistan became a बफ़र राज्य in the `` ग्रेट खेल `` between the अंग्रेजों और Russian empires.
Following the 1919 Anglo-Afghan War, King अमानुल्ला began a यूरोपीय स्टाइल modernization of the देश but was stopped by the ultra-conservatives.
During the Cold War, बाद the वापसी of the अंग्रेजों इससे neighboring इण्डिया in 1947, the संयुक्त राज्य और the सोवियत संघ began spreading influences in Afghanistan, which led to a bloody war between the US-backed mujahideen forces and the Soviet-backed Afghan government in which over a million Afghans lost their lives.
This was followed by the 1990s civil war, the rise and fall of the extremist तालिबान सरकारी और the 2001–present war.
In December 2001, the United Nations Security Council authorized the creation of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय सुरक्षा सहायता फ़ोर्स ( isaf ) to सहायता maintain सुरक्षा in अफगानिस्तान and assist the Karzai administration.
Three decades of war made अफगानिस्तान एक of the संसार 's सबसे खतरनाक देशों, सहित the largest producer of refugees and asylum seekers.
While the international community is rebuilding war-torn Afghanistan, terrorist groups such as the Haqqani Network and Hezbi Islami are actively involved in a देशभर तालिबान -led उग्रवाद, जिससे शामिल सैंकड़ों of assassinations और आत्महत्या हमले.
according to the संयुक्त राष्ट्र, the insurgents यहूद जिम्मेदार for 80 % of civilian casualties in 2011 and 2012.
The American Civil War ( ACW ), भी ज्ञात as the युद्ध between the राज्य or बस the सिविल युद्ध ( देखिए नामकरण ), थी a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ).
The war had its origin in the issue of गुलामी, विशेषकर the एक्सटेंशन of गुलामी into the पश्चिमी territories.
विदेशी शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene.
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 सैनिको मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना, the confederacy collapsed, गुलामी was abolished, and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began.
In the 1860 अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, republicans, led by अब्राहम lincoln, opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories.
lincoln जीती, लकिन पहले उसके उद्घाटन on कूच 4, 1861, सात cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy.
Outgoing Democratic अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक republicans अस्वीकृत secession as illegal.
Lincoln 's inaugural पता घोषित उसके प्रशासन होता not initiate civil war.
Eight बाकी स्लेव राज्य जारी to अस्वीकृत calls for secession.
Confederate forces seized numerous federal forts भीतर territory claimed by the Confederacy.
A Peace Conference विफल to ढूँढें a सुलह, और both sides prepared for war.
The confederates assumed कि यूरोपीय देशों यहूद so निर्भर on `` किंग कपास `` that they would intervene ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America.
Hostilities began on April 12, 1861, when Confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट sumter, a कुंजी फोर्ट आयोजित by संघ सैनिकों in South Carolina.
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the fort ; नतीजतन, चार अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined the confederacy, bringing उनके कुल to eleven.
The Union soon controlled the किनारा राज्य और स्थापित a नवल नाकेबंदी कि अबोध the southern economy.
The Eastern थिएटर थी inconclusive in 1861–62.
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट at the बैटल of Antietam, dissuading British intervention.
Lincoln issued the Emancipation उदघोषणा, जिससे बना समाप्ति slavery a war goal.
To the west, by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate नदी नेवी, तब much of उनके पश्चिमी सेना, और the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy in two at the Mississippi River.
In 1863, Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the बैटल of gettysburg.
Western successes led to Ulysses S. Grant कमांड of सब संघ सेना in 1864.
In the Western Theater, William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the समुद्र, destroying confederate अवसंरचना along the way.
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions, and could afford to fight लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the overland अभियान towards रिचमंड, the confederate पूंजी.
The defending Confederate army failed, अग्रणी to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at appomattox अदालत हाउस on April 9, 1865.
The अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध थी एक of the earliest true industrial wars.
Railroads, the टेलीग्राफ, steamships, और mass-produced weapons were employed extensively.
The mobilization of civilian कारखानों, खानों, shipyards, बैंको, परिवहन और food supplies all foreshadowed World War I.
It remains the deadliest युद्ध in अमरीकी इतिहास, resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined number of civilian casualties.
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा, और 30 प्रतिशत of सब दक्षिणी श्वेत males aged 18–40.
Cost of goods बेची ( cogs ) refer to the inventory लागत of those goods a कारोबार has sold during a particular period.
Costs are संबद्ध साथ particular goods using एक of अनेक formulas, सहित विशिष्ट पहचान, first-in first-out ( FIFO ), or average cost.
Costs include all costs of purchase, costs of conversion and other लागत incurred in bringing the inventories to उनके उपस्थित स्थान और कंडीशन.
लागत of goods बना by the कारोबार शामिल material, labor, and allocated overhead.
The costs of those goods not yet sold are deferred as लागत of inventory जबतक the inventory is बेची or written down in value.

A confectionery store ( more commonly referred to as a sweet shop in the संयुक्त किंगडम, a कैंडी स्टोर in the उत्तर अमेरिका, or a lolly दूकान in ऑस्ट्रेलिया ) sells confectionery and is usually targeted to children.
Most confectionery stores are भर साथ an assortment of मिठाई दूर larger than a पंसारी or convenience store could accommodate.
वे प्रायः प्रस्ताव a चयन of बूढ़ा fashioned treats, and sweets from different countries.
Very often unchanged in लेआउट चूंकि उनके inception, confectioneries हैं ज्ञात for their warming and nostalgic feel.
The village of pateley सेतु दावा to have the oldest confectionery store in England.
The oldest मीठी दूकान in इंग्लैण्ड, in the गाँव of Pateley Bridge
Oklahoma ( ) ( Pawnee : Uukuhuúwa, Cayuga : gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a राज्य स्तिथ in वेस्ट दक्षिण Central United States.
Oklahoma is the 20th most extensive और the 28th सबसे populous of the 50 संयुक्त राज्य.
The state 's name is निकला इससे the choctaw शब्द okla और humma, meaning `` red people '', and it is known informally by its nickname, The Sooner State.
Formed by the combination of Oklahoma Territory and भारतीय territory on नवम्बर 16, 1907, ओक्लाहोमा was the 46th state to enter the union.
इसके निवासियों हैं ज्ञात as oklahomans or, informally `` okies '', and its capital and largest city is Oklahoma City.
A major producer of natural gas, oil, and कृषि, ओक्लाहोमा relies on an आर्थिक आधार of विमानन, उर्जा, दूरसंचार, and biotechnology.
It has one of the तीव्रतम growing economies in the स्वदेश, रैंकिंग among the शीर्ष states in per capita income growth and gross domestic product growth.
Oklahoma City and Tulsa serve as Oklahoma 's प्राथमिक आर्थिक anchors, साथ nearly दो तिहाई of oklahomans जीना भीतर उनके महानगर statistical areas.
With small mountain ranges, prairie, mesas, and पूर्वी वनों, सबसे of ओक्लाहोमा झूठ in the ग्रेट मैदान और the u.s. आंतरिक Highlands —a region especially prone to severe weather.
In addition to having a prevalence of English, German, Scottish, Irish and Native American ancestry, more than 25 देशी अमरीकी भाषाएं हैं बोला in Oklahoma, second only to California.
Oklahoma is located on a confluence of three major American cultural regions and historically परोसा as a रूट लिये चौपायों ड्राइव, a गंतव्य लिये southern settlers, and a government-sanctioned territory for Native Americans.

A tire ( or tyre ) is a ring-shaped covering कि fits around a व्हील 's rim to protect it and enable better vehicle performance.
Most tires, such as those for automobiles and bicycles, provide traction between the vehicle and the road while providing a लचीली cushion कि absorbs शॉक.
The materials of modern pneumatic tires are synthetic rubber, natural rubber, fabric and wire, along साथ कार्बन ब्लैक और अन्य रासायनिक compounds.
They consist of a tread और a body.
The tread provides कर्षण जबकि the देह provides containment for a quantity of compressed air.
Before rubber was developed, the first versions of टायर यहूद बस bands of मेटल कि fitted around लकड़ी पहियों to prevent wear and tear.
Early रबर टायर यहूद ठोस ( नहीं न्यूमेटिक ).
Today, the majority of tires are pneumatic inflatable structures, comprising a doughnut-shaped देह of रस्सियाँ और wires encased in रबर और generally filled with compressed air to form an inflatable cushion.
Pneumatic tires are used on many प्रकार of वाहनों, सहित गाड़ियाँ, साइकिल, मोटरसाइकिल, trucks, earthmovers, and aircraft.
Metal tires are still used on locomotives और railcars, और ठोस रबर ( or अन्य पॉलिमर ) टायर हैं स्टिल प्रयुक्त in various non-automotive applications, such as some casters, carts, lawnmowers, and wheelbarrows.
Dr. Joseph Warren ( June 11, 1741 – June 17, 1775 ) was an American doctor who played a अग्रणी भूमिका in अमरीकी patriot संगठन in बोस्टन in जल्दी दिनों of the अमरीकी क्रान्ति, आखिरकार सेवारत as अध्यक्ष of the क्रांतिकारी मैसाचुसेट्स Provincial Congress.
Warren आयोजिक पॉल आदर और विलियम dawes on अप्रैल 18, 1775, to छोड़ बोस्टन और spread the alarm that the British garrison in Boston was setting out to raid the town of Concord and arrest rebel leaders John Hancock and Samuel Adams.
Warren participated in the next day 's Battles of Lexington and Concord, जिससे हैं commonly माना to be the खोलने engagements of the American Revolutionary War.
Warren था महरूम commissioned a प्रमुख सामान्य in the उपनिवेश 's मिलिशिया shortly before the June 17, 1775 Battle of Bunker Hill.
Rather than exercising his rank, Warren served in the battle as a private सिपाही, और थी मारे in कॉम्बैट जब अंग्रेजों सैनिकों stormed the redoubt atop Breed 's Hill.
His death, immortalized in John Trumbull 's पेंटिंग, the मौत of सामान्य वारेन at the बैटल of बंकर 's हिल, जून 17, 1775, जस्ती the विद्रोही शक्तियां, और he has been memorialized in many place names in the United States.
STM image of self-assembled supramolecular जंजीरों of the सशुल्क semiconductor Quinacridone on Graphite.
An organic सेमीकंडक्टर is an सशुल्क सामग्री साथ सेमीकंडक्टर गुण, कि is, with an electrical conductivity between that of insulators and that of metals.
Single molecules, short chain ( oligomers ) और सशुल्क polymers can be semiconductive.
Semiconducting small अणुओं ( खुशबूदार hydrocarbons ) शामिल the polycyclic खुशबूदार compounds pentacene, anthracene, and rubrene.
Polymeric सशुल्क semiconductors शामिल बहु ( 3-hexylthiophene ), बहु ( p-phenylene vinylene ), as well as polyacetylene and its derivatives.
There are दो प्रमुख अतिव्यापी वर्ग of सशुल्क semiconductors.
These are organic charge-transfer complexes and various linear-backbone conductive polymers निकला इससे polyacetylene.
रैखिक रीढ़ सशुल्क semiconductors शामिल polyacetylene itself and its derivatives polypyrrole, and polyaniline.
At least locally, charge-transfer देवालय प्रायः प्रदर्शनी समान conduction mechanisms to inorganic semiconductors.
Such mechanisms उठता इससे the उपस्थिति of छेद और इलेक्ट्रॉन conduction layers separated by a band gap.
While such classic mechanisms are important locally, as with inorganic amorphous semiconductors, tunnelling, localized states, गतिशीलता गैप, और phonon -assisted hopping भी significantly योगदान to conduction, विशेषकर in polyacetylenes.
Like अकार्बनिक semiconductors, सशुल्क semiconductors can be doped.
Organic semiconductors susceptible to doping ऐसे as polyaniline ( ormecon ) और हैं भी ज्ञात as organic metals.
Typical current carriers in सशुल्क semiconductors हैं छेद और electrons in π-bonds.
Almost all सशुल्क solids हैं insulators.
But when their constituent molecules have π-conjugate प्रणालियों, electrons can मूव via π-electron बादल overlaps, especially by hopping, tunnelling and related mechanisms.
Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons and phthalocyanine नमक crystals हैं उदाहरण of इस प्रकार of सशुल्क semiconductor.
Mainly due to कम गतिशीलता, भी unpaired electrons may be stable in charge-transfer complexes.
Such unpaired electrons can फलन as current carriers.
This type of सेमीकंडक्टर is भी प्राप्त by pairing an इलेक्ट्रॉन दाता अणु with an electron acceptor molecule.
Female ejaculation is the expulsion of fluid by human females from the paraurethral नलिकाएं through और around the female urethra during or before an orgasm.
It is also known colloquially as gushing or squirting, although these are considered to be अलग phenomena in कुछ शोध publications.
The exact source and nature of the fluid continue to be a topic of debate among medical पेशेवर, जिससे is भी सम्बन्धित to संदेह over the existence of the G-Spot.
The FIFA Women 's World Cup is an अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ फ़ुटबॉल प्रतियोगिता लडे by the वरिष्ठ महिलाओं 's नेशनल टीमों of the सदस्यों of fédération internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ), the sport 's global governing body.
The championship has been awarded प्रत्येक चार सालो चूंकि the inaugural टूर्नामेंट in 1991.
जापानी जीती the 2011 टूर्नामेंट in a penalty shootout.
The current format of the tournament involves 16 teams competing for the title at venues भीतर the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ) over a काल of परिचय तीन सप्ताह ; – इस phase is प्रायः पुकारा the संसार Cup Finals.
A qualification phase, which फिलहाल takes प्लेस over the preceding तीन सालो, is प्रयुक्त to determine जिससे टीमों qualify लिये the टूर्नामेंट together with the host nation ( s ).
The FIFA Women 's World Cup is recognized as the most important International प्रतियोगिता in महिलाओं 's फ़ुटबॉल और is निभाई amongst महिलाओं 's नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल टीमों of the सदस्य states of FIFA, the sport 's global governing body.
The first महिलाओं 's संसार कप टूर्नामेंट, नामित the महिलाओं 's संसार चैंपियनशिप, थी आयोजित in 1991, sixty-one years after the men 's first FIFA World Cup tournament in 1930.
The six World Cup tournaments have महरूम जीती by चार अलग national teams.
The next World कप होगा be hosted by कनाडा in 2015.

'Son of man ' is the अनुवाद of विभिन्न यहूदी और यूनानी वाक्यांश used in both the Hebrew Bible and the New Testament.
It has diverse meanings, ranging इससे a सामान्य इंसान होने to a prophesied eternal, divine ruler.
The Hebrew अभिव्यक्ति `` बेटे of man '' ( בן–אדם i.e. ben-'adam ) appears one hundred and seven times in the Hebrew Bible.
इस is the सबसे आम यहूदी निर्माण for the singular but is used mostly in Ezekiel ( 93 times ) and 14 times elsewhere.
In thirty two cases the phrase appears in intermediate plural form `` बेटे of मेन '', i.e. इंसान beings.
As generally interpreted by Jews, it denotes humankind generally.
In the Koine Greek of the New Testament, `` the son of man '' is invariably प्रयुक्त as `` ὁ υἱὸς τοὺ ἀνθρώπου '' with a definite article.
The use of the definite article in `` the son of man '' in the ईसाई gospels is अनोखा, और पहले इसके उपयोग वहीँ, no रिकॉर्ड of इसके उपयोग in कोई of the surviving Greek documents of antiquity exist.
Geza Vermes has stated कि `` the बेटे of man '' in the ईसाई gospels is unrelated to Hebrew Bible usages.
In Christian usage, unlike the Son of God title, which has been an essential element of ईसाई creeds चूंकि the अपोस्टोलिक आयु, the उदघोषणा of `` यीशु as the बेटे of man '' रै never महरूम an article of faith in Christianity.
The निर्वचन of the उपयोग of `` the बेटे of man '' in the नई वसीयत रै remained चुनौतीपूर्ण और बाद 150 years of debate no consensus on the issue has emerged among scholars.
निपुण of foxhounds लीड the फ़ील्ड इससे powderham किला in देवों, इंग्लैण्ड, with the hounds in front.
Fox hunting is an activity involving the tracking, chase, and sometimes killing of a fox, traditionally a red fox, by प्रशिक्षित foxhounds or अन्य सैंट hounds, और a समूह of निहत्थे अनुसरणकर्ता led by a निपुण of foxhounds, जो follow the hounds on foot or on horseback.
Fox शिकार originated in the रूप practised जबतक recently in the संयुक्त किंगडम in the 16th century, but is practised all over the world, including in Australia, Canada, France, Ireland, Italy and the United States.
In Australia, the term also refers to the शिकार of foxes with firearms similar to spotlighting or deer hunting.
In much of the world hunting in general is understood to relate to any game animals or weapons ( e.g., deer hunting with धनुष और तीर ) ; in ब्रिटेन और आयरलैंड, `` शिकार '' बगैर योग्यता implies फॉक्स शिकार ( or अन्य फ़ॉर्म of शिकार साथ हाउंडs- beagling, स्टैग hunting, mink hunting, drag hunting or hunting the clean boot ) as described here.
The sport is controversial, particularly in the uk, जहाँ it थी बैन in स्कॉटलैंड in 2002, और in इंग्लैण्ड और वेल्स in नवम्बर 2004 ( विधि enforced from February 2005 ), though shooting foxes as vermin remained legal.
Proponents of fox hunting view it as an important part of rural culture and useful for reasons of conservation and pest कंट्रोल, जबकि प्रतिद्वंद्वियों argue कि it is बेदर्द और अनावश्यक.
Tobacco advertising is the advertising of tobacco products or use ( typically सिगरेट धूम्रपान ) by the तम्बाकू industry through a variety of media including sponsorship, particularly of sporting events.
It is अभी एक of the सबसे highly regulated forms of marketing.
Some or all forms of tobacco विज्ञापन हैं banned in many countries.
Bally Technologies, Inc. is a निर्माता of स्लॉट मशीने और अन्य गेमिंग प्रौद्योगिकी आधारित in Las Vegas, Nevada.
The company was संस्थापित in 1968 as उन्नत पेटेंट Technology.
It eventually changed its name to Alliance गेमिंग और acquired, in 1996, बल्ली गेमिंग अंतरराष्ट्रीय, a former division of Bally Manufacturing.
In 2006, the entire company अपनाया the बल्ली नाम, a ट्रेडमार्क that originated in 1932 by the Bally Manufacturing Corporation.
Gustave doré 's engravings illustrated the दैवी कॉमेडी ( 1861–1868 ) ; here, Dante is lost in Canto 1 of the Inferno.
Inferno ( Italian for `` Hell `` ) is the पहला भाग of दांते एलीगियरी 's 14th-century एपिक कविता Divine Comedy.
It is followed by purgatorio और Paradiso.
It is an allegory telling of the journey of Dante through नरक, हिदायत by the रोमन कवि Virgil.
In the poem, Hell is चित्रित as नौ वृत्त of कष्ट स्तिथ भीतर the Earth.
Allegorically, the Divine Comedy represents the यात्रा of the आत्मा towards परमेश्वर, साथ the inferno describing the recognition and rejection of sin.
Smirnoff is a ब्रांड of वोदका स्वामित्व और उत्पादित by the British company Diageo.
The Smirnoff brand began with a vodka distillery संस्थापित in मास्को by pyotr arsenievich smirnov ( 1831–1898 ).
It is अभी वितरित in 130 countries.
It is उत्पादित in अनेक देशों सहित इण्डिया, आयरलैंड, Italy, the United Kingdom and the United States.
Smirnoff products include vodka, flavoured वोदका, और malt पेय.
In March 2006, diageo उत्तर अमेरिका claimed कि स्मरनॉफ वोदका थी the best-selling distilled spirit brand in the world.
Big भूरा ( foaled अप्रैल 10, 2005 in केंटकी ) is a रिटायर्ड चैंपियन American Thoroughbred racehorse and winner of the 2008 Kentucky Derby and 2008 Preakness Stakes.
Bred by Dr. गेरी B. नैप 's monticule खेतो in lexington, Kentucky, he won his first five race starts.
He was sired by Grade III विजेता boundary, a बेटे of उत्तर अमरीकी चैंपियन sire danzig, a son of Northern Dancer.
Big Brown 's dam was Mien, भी a पोती of उत्तरी नर्तकी through उसके sire, Nureyev.
The Serenity Prayer is the common name for an originally बेनाम दुआ by the अमरीकी theologian Reinhold Niebuhr ( 1892–1971 ).
It has been adopted by Alcoholics बेनाम और अन्य twelve-step कार्यक्रम.
The best-known रूप is : परमेश्वर, ग्रान्ट me the serenity to accept the things I can not change,
The हिम्मत to बदलें the things I can,
And अक्ल to जान the difference.
The Declaration and Resolves of the First Continental Congress ( also known as the Declaration of Colonial Rights, or the Declaration of Rights ), was a statement adopted by the पहला महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस on अक्तूबर 14, 1774, in जवाब to the असहनीय Acts passed by the British Parliament.
The Declaration outlined औपनिवेशिक आपत्ति to the असहनीय अधिनियमों, सूचीबद्ध a औपनिवेशिक bill of rights, and provided a detailed list of grievances.
It थी समान to the घोषणा of अधिकारों and Grievances, passed by the Stamp Act Congress a decade earlier.
The Declaration concluded with an outline of Congress 's plans : to enter into a boycott of British trade ( the महाद्वीपीय संघ ) जबतक उनके grievances यहूद redressed, to publish addresses to the people of Great Britain and British America, and to send a petition to the King.
पल्स दबाव is the दबाव that is felt when feeling the pulse.
Measured in millimeters of mercury ( mmHg ), the pressure difference between the systolic and diastolic pressures is the दबाव बदलें to बनाएँ the पल्स, जिससे is the पल्स दबाव.
If resting blood pressure is ( systolic/diastolic ) 120/80 millimeters of पारा ( mmhg ), pulse pressure is 40.
The Hills is a reality television series which originally aired on एमटीवी इससे may 31, 2006 जबतक जुलाई 13, 2010.
The दिखाएँ उपयोग a वास्तविकता टेलीविज़न स्वरूप, following the निजी जीवनदान of अनेक यंग वयस्कों जीना in लॉस एंजिल्स, California, but tends towards a narrative format more commonly found in scripted genres such as soap operas.
The series originally followed the personal life of पूर्व लगुना बीच स्टार लॉरेन कोनराड और उसके मित्रों ' नई जीवनदान in लॉस एंजिल्स.
After five seasons, Conrad left the series and was replaced by another former लगुना बीच स्टार, kristin cavallari, शुरूआत in the दूसरी हाफ of the पांचवां season.
The श्रेणी concluded at the end of the sixth season.
Entertainment साप्ताहिक क्रमित the पहाड़ियाँ 82nd on उनके सूची of `` The 100 Best Shows of the Last 25 Years, '' stating that the series was a `` New Classic. ''
एओएल tv पुकारा it TV 's Biggest Guilty Pleasure.
The series premiered in syndication in the fall of 2009 alongside लगुना बीच : the रियल नारंगी County.
In poker, bad beat is a subjective term for a hand in जिससे a खिलाड़ी साथ कया appear to be दमदार ताश nevertheless loses.
It most often occurs where one player bets the clearly stronger हाथ और उनके प्रतिद्वन्दी makes a ग़रीब कॉल कि आखिरकार `` हिट्स '' और wins.
There is no सर्वसम्मति among पोकर खिलाड़ी as to कया exactly constitutes a bad beat and often players will disagree about whether a particular hand was a bad beat.
The goldfish ( Carassius auratus auratus ) is a freshwater मछली in the परिवार cyprinidae of अनुक्रम cypriniformes.
It was one of the earliest fish to be domesticated, और is एक of the सबसे commonly रखा एक्वेरियम fish.
A relatively small member of the carp family ( which also includes the koi carp and the crucian carp ), the goldfish is a domesticated संस्करण of a less-colorful कार्प ( carassius auratus ) देशी to east Asia.
It was first domesticated in China more than a हजार सालो पहले, और अनेक पृथक breeds have चूंकि been developed.
Goldfish breeds vary greatly in size, body shape, fin configuration and coloration ( various combinations of white, पीला, नारंगी, रेड, भूरा, and black are known ).
uncooked rouladen
Rouladen ( or Rinderroulade, singular : roulade ) is a जर्मनी मांस roulade प्रायः consisting of बेकन, प्याज, सरसों और pickles wrapped in thinly sliced beef which is then cooked.
In कुछ देशों, the roulade is भी ज्ञात as `` बीफ ज़ैतून ''.
Beef or veal is used as meat though some food scholars tend to believe that the original संस्करण थी संभवतः venison or पोर्क, और पोर्क is स्टिल popular in some areas.
The beef rouladen as we know उन्हें आज have become लोकप्रिय over the last century.
the काटें is प्रायः topside beef or silverside since this is the cheaper cut.
The more महंगी संस्करण होता be the round steak, also known as rump steak.
The meat is cut into विशाल, पतला स्लाइस.
The filling is a mixture of smoked and cooked pork belly, chopped onions and chopped pickles ( gurken ) which is at टाइम्स varied by adding minced मांस, सॉसेज मांस, pine nuts and mustard.
The मिश्रण varies from region to region.
Rouladen are traditionally परोसा लिये dinner.
Red वाइन is प्रायः served with this dish.
Typical eukaryotic कोशिका.
Cellular respiration is the set of the metabolic प्रतिक्रियाएँ और प्रक्रियाओं कि लो प्लेस in the कोशिकाएं of जीवों to बदलें biochemical उर्जा इससे nutrients into एडीनोसिन triphosphate ( ATP ), and then release waste products.
The reactions involved in respiration are catabolic reactions, which break विशाल अणुओं into छोटी ones, releasing उर्जा in the प्रक्रम as कमजोर so-called `` high-energy '' bonds हैं replaced by stronger bonds in the products.
Respiration is one of the कुंजी तरीके a कोशिका gains उपयोगी उर्जा to fuel cellular activity.
सेल्यूलर श्वसन is माना an exothermic redox reaction.
The overall reaction is broken into many smaller ones when it occurs in the देह, सबसे of जिससे हैं रेडॉक्स प्रतिक्रियाएँ themselves.
Although technically, cellular श्वसन is a दहन प्रतिक्रिया, it clearly करता नहीं resemble एक when it occurs in a living cell.
This अंतर is क्युकी it occurs in many separate steps.
While the overall reaction is a combustion reaction, no single प्रतिक्रिया कि comprises it is a दहन reaction.
Nutrients that are commonly प्रयुक्त by एनिमल और संयंत्र कोशिकाएं in श्वसन शामिल शुगर, अमीनो acids and fatty acids, and a common oxidizing agent ( electron acceptor ) is molecular oxygen ( O2 ).
The energy stored in ATP ( its third phosphate group is weakly bonded to the rest of the molecule and is cheaply broken allowing stronger bonds to form, thereby transferring energy for use by the cell ) can then be used to drive processes requiring energy, including biosynthesis, locomotion or transportation of अणुओं आरपार कोशिका झिल्लियों.
Countries by 2011 जीडीपी ( नाममात्र ) according to the CIA World Factbook.
This article includes a list of countries in the world sorted by उनके सकल घरेलू उत्पाद ( जीडीपी ), the मार्केट मान of सब फाइनल goods and services from a nation in a given year.
The GDP dollar estimates प्रस्तुत यहाँ हैं गणना at मार्केट or सरकारी official exchange rates.
Several economies which are not माना to be देशों ( संसार, the eu, and some dependent territories ) are included in the lists because they appear in the sources.
These economies are नहीं क्रमित in the चार्ट यहाँ, लकिन are listed where applicable.
The figures presented here do not take into account differences in the cost of living in different countries, and the परिणाम can vary greatly इससे एक साल to another आधारित on fluctuations in the एक्सचेंज दरों of the देश 's currency.
Such fluctuations may बदलें a देश 's रैंकिंग इससे एक साल to the अगला, भी हालांकि वे often make little or no difference to the standard of living of its population.
Therefore ये आंकड़े चाहिए be प्रयुक्त with caution.
कुछ countries/regions may have citizens which are on average wealthy.
These countries/regions could appear in इस सूची as having a small GDP.
This होता be क्युकी the country/region सूचीबद्ध रै a छोटी जनसांख्यिकी, and therefore small total economy ; the GDP is calculated as the population times the wealth per capita.
Comparisons of national wealth are also frequently बना on the आधार of खरीदना शक्ति पैरिटी ( ppp ), to समायोजन लिये मतभेद in the cost of living in different countries.
( See List of countries by जीडीपी ( ppp ) )
PPP largely removes the exchange rate problem, but has its own drawbacks ; it does not प्रतिबिंबित the मान of आर्थिक आउटपुट in अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार, और it भी requires more estimation than nominal GDP.
On the whole, PPP per capita आंकड़े हैं अधिक narrowly spread than nominal GDP per capita figures.
The first list शामिल आंकड़ा compiled by the संयुक्त Nations Statistics Division for 2011.
The second list largely includes data ( अनुमान ) compiled by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मौद्रिक Fund for 2012.
The third list shows the World Bank 's mostly 2011 estimates, and the fourth list शामिल ज़्यादातर 2012 estimates इससे the सीआईए संसार factbook.
Lapping is a machining process, in जिससे दो सतहों हैं मला साथ साथ an अक्खड़ between उन्हें, by हाथ movement or by way of a machine.
This can लो दो फ़ॉर्म.
The first type of lapping ( traditionally called grinding ), typically involves rubbing a भंगुर सामग्री ऐसे as कांच विरूद्ध a सतह ऐसे as आयरन or कांच itself ( भी ज्ञात as the `` गोद '' or पीस औजार ) with an abrasive such as aluminum oxide, jeweller 's rouge, optician 's rouge, emery, silicon carbide, diamond, etc., in between them.
This produces microscopic conchoidal fractures as the अक्खड़ रोल्स परिचय between the दो सतहों and removes material from both.
The other form of lapping involves a softer सामग्री ऐसे as पिच or a सिरेमिक लिये the lap, which is `` charged '' with the abrasive.
The lap is then प्रयुक्त to काटें a harder material—the workpiece.
The abrasive embeds within the softer सामग्री जिससे holds it और permits it to स्कोर across and cut the harder material.
Taken to a महीन सीमा, इस होगा उपज a polished सतह ऐसे as साथ a पॉलिशिंग cloth on an ऑटोमोबाइल, or a polishing cloth or polishing pitch upon glass or steel.
Taken to the ultimate limit, with the aid of सटीक interferometry और specialized पॉलिशिंग मशीने or skilled हाथ पॉलिशिंग, lensmakers can produce surfaces that are flat to better than 30 nanometers.
This is one twentieth of the wavelength of light इससे the commonly प्रयुक्त 632.8 nm हीलियम नियॉन लेज़र लाइट source.
Surfaces this flat can be molecularly bonded ( optically contacted ) by bringing उन्हें साथ अंतर्गत the right conditions.
( This is not the same as the wringing प्रभाव of जोहानसन ब्लॉक, although it is similar ).
The term `` America 's टोली '' is a लोकप्रिय उपनाम in the संयुक्त States that refers to the Dallas Cowboys in the National Football League.
The nickname originated with the team 's 1978 highlight film, where the narrator opens साथ the following परिचय : the पद is पहचाना और प्रायः used by media outlets, including ESPN, Yahoo !, HBO Sports, and Sports Illustrated.
My Babysitter 's a Vampire ( French : Ma gardienne est un पिशाच ) is a 2011 कनाडाई टेलीविज़न श्रेणी, आधारित on the television film of the same name.
In Canada, the series premiered in French on télétoon on फ़रवरी 28, 2011, in अंग्रेज़ी on teletoon on March 14, 2011, and on Disney Channel in the United States on June 27, 2011.
The show was created by भैस tv, creators of 6teen और Total Drama.
The show follows ethan मॉर्गन ( मैथ्यू नाईट ), जो, in the टेलीविज़न फिल्मी, learns that his babysitter Sarah ( Vanessa Morgan ) is a vampire.
In the फिल्मी, he learns he is समर्थ to have visions और उसके best friend Benny Weir ( Atticus Mitchell ) is a spellmaster.
The series follows the three as वे लो on अलौकिक शक्तियां और have adventures, साथ occasional सहायता इससे fellow vampires Rory ( Cameron Kennedy ) and Erica ( Kate Todd ), while dealing with the troubles of regular high school life.
A second season was confirmed to प्रारंभ उत्पादन in सितंबर 2011 और it पहला premiered on डिज़्नी चैनल on June 29, 2012, it premiered on Teletoon September 6, 2012.
Télétoon started featuring season 2 sneak-peak एपीसोड on अक्तूबर 28, 2012 और premiered it on January 10, 2013

A pickup truck or pick-up, प्रायः बस referred to as a पिकअप, is a लाइट मोटर गाडी with an open-top, rear cargo area ( bed ).
In North America, the term pickup is used for light trucks with a lighter duty chassis and factory built, integrated bed, as खूब as लिये coupé यूटिलिटी वाहनों, प्रायः आधारित on a निजी car chassis, लकिन भी प्रायः on a special dedicated chassi for such use.
Some countries have their own terms similar to pickup, such as ute in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और नई जीलैंड, or bakkie in दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी.
Large pickup trucks are somewhat rare in Europe, where vans and लाइट lorries हैं commonly प्रयुक्त for similar roles.
The President of the United States of America ( POTUS ) is the सिर of राज्य और सिर of government of the United States.
The president लीड the कार्यपालिका शाखा of the संघीय सरकारी and is the commander-in-chief of the United States Armed Forces.
Article II of the u.S. संविधान vests the कार्यपालिका शक्ति of the संयुक्त राज्य in the अध्यक्ष और आरोप उसे साथ the निष्पादन of संघीय विधि, alongside the जिम्मेदारी of appointing federal executive, diplomatic, regulatory, and judicial officers, and concluding treaties with foreign powers, with the advice and consent of the Senate.
The president is further सशक्त to ग्रान्ट संघीय pardons और reprieves, और to convene और adjourn either or both houses of Congress under extraordinary circumstances.
Since the founding of the United States, the power of the president and the federal government have grown substantially और प्रत्येक आधुनिक अध्यक्ष, despite possessing no औपचारिक विधान शक्तियां परे हस्ताक्षर or vetoing congressionally passed बिल्स, is largely responsible for dictating the legislative agenda of his party and the foreign and domestic policy of the United States.
the अध्यक्ष is अक्सर वर्णित as the most powerful person in the world.
The president is indirectly elected by the people through the Electoral College to a four-year term, and is one of only दो nationally निर्वाचित संघीय अधिकारियों, the अन्य होने the वाइस अध्यक्ष of the United States.
The Twenty-second Amendment, अपनाया in 1951, prohibits anyone इससे कभी होने निर्वाचित to the presidency for a third full term.
It also prohibits a person from being elected to the presidency more than एकबार if कि व्यक्ति previously था परोसा as अध्यक्ष, or एक्टिंग अध्यक्ष, लिये more than two years of another person 's term as president.
In सब, 43 individuals have परोसा 55 four-year terms.
On January 20, 2009, Barack Obama became the 44th और वर्तमान अध्यक्ष.
On November 6, 2012, he was re-elected and is scheduled to serve जबतक जनवरी 20, 2017.
Bottled खनिज जल
Bottled water is drinking water ( e.g., well water, distilled water, Mineral जल, or वसन्त जल ) packaged in plastic or glass water bottles.
Bottled जल may be कार्बोनेटेड or not.
आकार दायरा इससे छोटी सिंगल सेवारत bottles to large carboys for water coolers.
Map of the प्रमुख नदियाँ, झीलों, और टंकी in India
Map showing rivers और बाढ़ prone क्षेत्रों in India
Rivers of India play an महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in the lives of the Indian people.
The river systems provide irrigation, potable water, cheap transportation, विद्युत, और the livelihoods लिये a विशाल क्रमांक of लोगों all over the country and to rural areas.
This easily explains क्यों nearly all the major cities of India are located by the banks of rivers.
the नदियाँ भी have an महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in हिन्दू mythology और are considered holy by all Hindus in the country.
Seven major rivers along with their numerous tributaries मेक up the नदी प्रणाली of India.
Most of the rivers pour their waters into the Bay of Bengal ; however, some of the rivers whose courses take उन्हें through the पश्चिमी भाग of the देश और towards the ईस्ट of the राज्य of Himachal Pradesh empty into the Arabian Sea.
Parts of Ladakh, northern parts of the aravlli दायरा और the arid भाग of the Thar Desert have inland drainage.
Dr.Francis Buchanan surveyed the courses of the नदियाँ of इण्डिया साथ साथ उनके tributaries और शाखाओं in 1810-11 ad और प्रस्तुत a minute account of it.
The shifting of the पाठ्यक्रम और bed over the centuries is very remarkable.
Many of the channels उल्लेखित in कि सर्वेक्षण have अभी become मुर्दे, सूखी or even extinct.
All major नदियाँ of इण्डिया originate इससे one of the three main watersheds :
the हिमालय और the काराकोरम ranges
विंध्य और satpura सीमाएँ और Chotanagpur plateau in central India
Sahyadri or पश्चिमी ghats in पश्चिमी India
The Bretton Woods system of monetary management स्थापित the नियम लिये वाणिज्यिक और वित्तीय संबंध among the संसार 's प्रमुख औद्योगिक राज्य in the mid-20th century.
The Bretton Woods system was the first example of a fully negotiated मौद्रिक अनुक्रम intended to govern मौद्रिक संबंध among स्वतंत्र nation-states.
Preparing to rebuild the अंतरराष्ट्रीय आर्थिक प्रणाली as संसार युद्ध ii थी स्टिल raging, 730 delegates इससे सब 44 अलाइड राष्ट्र gathered at the Mount Washington Hotel in Bretton Woods, New Hampshire, United States, for the United Nations Monetary and Financial Conference.
The delegates deliberated दौरान 1–22 जुलाई 1944, और हस्ताक्षरित the अनुबंध on its final day.
Setting up a system of rules, institutions, and procedures to regulate the international मौद्रिक प्रणाली, the planners at bretton वुड्स स्थापित the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मौद्रिक निधि ( imf ) और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय बैंको लिये पुनर्निर्माण और विकास ( IBRD ), which today is part of the World Bank Group.
These organizations became operational in 1945 after a sufficient क्रमांक of देशों था ratified the agreement.
The chief features of the bretton वुड्स प्रणाली यहूद an दायित्व लिये प्रत्येक देश to अपनाना a monetary policy that maintained the exchange rate by tying its currency to the U.S. dollar and the ability of the IMF to bridge temporary imbalances of payments.
On 15 August 1971, the United States unilaterally terminated convertibility of the us $ to सुनहरा.
This brought the bretton वुड्स प्रणाली to an समाप्त and saw the dollar become fiat currency.
This action, referred to as the Nixon shock, created the situation in which the United States dollar became a reserve करेंसी प्रयुक्त by many states.
At the वही समय, अनेक फिक्स्ड मुद्राएँ ( such as GBP, for example ), also became free floating.
Ducati मोटर पकड़कर s.p.A. is an इतालवी कम्पनी that designs and manufactures motorcycles.
headquartered in बोलोग्ना, इटली, डुकाटी is स्वामित्व by Audi through its Italian subsidiary Lamborghini.
A credit score is a numerical expression based on a सांख्यिकीय विश्लेषण of a व्यक्ति 's क्रेडिट files, to represent the creditworthiness of that person.
A credit score is primarily based on credit report सूचना typically sourced इससे क्रेडिट bureaus.
lenders, ऐसे as बैंको और क्रेडिट कार्ड कंपनियाँ, उपयोग क्रेडिट स्कोर to evaluate the संभावित risk posed by lending money to consumers and to mitigate losses due to bad debt.
lenders उपयोग क्रेडिट स्कोर to determine जो qualifies for a loan, at what interest rate, and what credit limits.
Lenders also use क्रेडिट स्कोर to determine जिससे ग्राहक are likely to bring in the most revenue.
The use of credit or पहचान स्कोरिंग prior to authorizing अभिगम or granting क्रेडिट is an क्रियान्वयन of a trusted system.
क्रेडिट स्कोरिंग is not limited to banks.
Other संगठन, ऐसे as मोबाईल फोन कंपनियाँ, insurance companies, landlords, and government departments employ the same techniques.
Credit scoring also has a lot of overlap साथ आंकड़ा खनन, जिससे उपयोग अनेक समान techniques.
These techniques combine हज़ारों of कारकों लकिन they are more or less similar or the same.
The seven SI base units and the interdependency of उनके परिभाषाएं : लिये उदाहरण, to निकालें the परिभाषा of the मीटर इससे the गति of लाइट, the definition of the second must be known while the ampere and candela are both dependent on the definition of energy which in turn is defined in terms of length, mass and time.
The International System of Units ( SI ) defines seven इकाई of माप as a मौलिक नियत इससे जिससे सब अन्य si इकाई are derived.
These SI आधार इकाई और उनके physical quantities are:
metre for लंबाई ( us अंग्रेज़ी : meter )
kilogram for द्रव्यमान ( नोट : not the gram )
दूसरी लिये time
ampere लिये इलेक्ट्रिक current
केल्विन लिये temperature
candela लिये चमकदार intensity
mole for the राशि of substance.
The SI base quantities form a set of mutually independent आयाम as जरूरी by आयामी विश्लेषण commonly employed in विज्ञान and technology.
However, in a given realization of these units वे may खूब be interdependent, i.e. पारिभाषित in terms of each other.
the names of si इकाई हैं लिखा in लोअरकेस वर्ण ( the 'degree Celsius ' meets this rule, as 'degree ' is the unit, and 'Celsius ' is a modifier ).
The symbols of इकाई हैं लिखा in लोअरकेस ( e.g. मीटर रै the प्रतीक m ), मगर कि प्रतीकों लिये इकाई नामित बाद persons are written with an initial capital letter ( e.g., the hertz has the uppercase symbol Hz ).
Many other units, such as the litre ( us अंग्रेज़ी : लीनियर ), हैं formally नहीं भाग of the si, लकिन हैं स्वीकृत लिये उपयोग साथ SI.
स्मारक canyon
Colorado National Monument ( locally referred to as The स्मारक ) is a भाग of the नेशनल पार्क सेवा निकट the city of Grand Junction, Colorado.
Spectacular canyons cut गहन into sandstone और भी granite–gneiss–schist rock formations, in some areas.
This is an area of desert land high on the कोलोराडो पठार, साथ पिनियन और juniper forests on the plateau.
The park hosts a wide range of wildlife, including red-tailed hawks and golden eagles, ravens, jays, मरुस्थल bighorn शीप, और coyotes.
Activities include hiking, horseback सवारी, सड़क bicycling, और दर्शनीय ड्राइव ; a आगंतुक बीच on the west side contains a natural history museum and gift shop.
There हैं भव्य दृश्य इससे trails और the रिम चट्टान Drive, which winds along the plateau.
Nearby are the Book Cliffs, और the largest flat-topped पहाड़ in the world, the Grand Mesa.
Its feature attraction is Monument Canyon, which रनों the चौडाई of the पार्क, और शामिल चट्टान formations ऐसे as स्वतंत्रता स्मारक, the चुंबन Couple, and Coke Ovens.
The monument includes 20,500 acres ( 32 वर्गाकार मील ), much of जिससे रै महरूम अनुशंसित to Congress for designation as wilderness.
left to right : Utility Uniform, Blue Dress वर्दी, सेवा वर्दी, और संध्या Dress uniforms
The वर्दी of the संयुक्त राज्य समुद्री corps serve to फर्क Marines from members of other services.
Among current uniforms in the United States Armed शक्तियां, the marines ' वर्दी have महरूम in सेवा the longest.
The Marine Dress Blue uniform रै, साथ few परिवर्तन, महरूम worn in essentially its current form since the 19th century.
North American telephone area कोड 419 और 567 serve the उत्तरपश्चिम quadrant of the U.S. state of Ohio.
The largest city served by ये क्षेत्रफल कोड is टोलेडो ( और इसके उपनगरों of हॉलैंड, maumee, northwood, ऑरेगॉन, ओटावा पहाड़ियाँ, perrysburg, rossford, Sylvania, Swanton, Waterville, and Whitehouse ).
Other शहरों परोसा by ये क्षेत्रफल कोड शामिल एडीए, ashland, bellevue, bluffton, बोलिंग ग्रीन, ब्रायन, bucyrus, celina, क्लाइड, crestline, defiance, delphos, Edison, Erastus, Findlay, Fostoria, Fremont, Galion, Kenton, Lima, Mansfield, Mount Gilead, Napoleon, Norwalk, Oak Harbor, Port Clinton, Sandusky, Shelby, St. Marys, Tiffin, Upper Sandusky, Van Wert, Wapakoneta, Wauseon, Willard.
Other areas served include the Lake Erie Islands north of बंदरगाहों क्लिंटन और वेस्ट of Sandusky.
The main area code, 419, was created as one of the original area codes in October 1947 ; the ओवरले क्षेत्रफल कोड 567 थी निर्मित on जनवरी 1, 2002.
Despite the उपस्थिति of टोलेडो, the राज्य 's fourth-largest नगर, 419 was the last of Ohio 's original four area codes to have been split or overlaid.
Mickey Leroy Gilley ( born कूच 9, 1936 ) is an अमरीकी country music singer and musician.
Although he started out singing straight-up देश और पश्चिमी सामग्री in the 1970s, he स्थानांतरित towards a अधिक पॉप -friendly ध्वनि in the 1980s, bringing उसे further कामयाबी on नहीं बस the country charts, but the pop charts as well.
Among his biggest hits हैं `` रूम पूरा of गुलाब, '' `` do n't the लड़कियों सब मिलेंगी prettier at closing समय, '' और the रीमेक of the Soul hit `` Stand by Me ``.
He is also the cousin of जेरी ली लुईस, कार्ल mcvoy, Jim Gilley and Jimmy Swaggart.
According to the Federal विमानन प्रशासन, gilley is a licensed पायलट, जो holds an यंत्र दरजा साथ वाणिज्यिक पायलट privileges for multi-engine airplanes, as well as private pilot privileges for single engine aircraft.
The September 11 attacks ( also referred to as September 11, September 11th, or 9/11 ) were a series of four coordinated terrorist attacks launched by the इस्लामी आतंकवादी समूह al-qaeda upon the संयुक्त राज्य in नई यॉर्क नगर और the वॉशिंगटन, d.C. क्षेत्रफल on सितंबर 11, 2001.
Four passenger airliners were hijacked by 19 al-qaeda आतंकवादी so वे could be flown into buildings in suicide attacks.
Two of those planes, अमरीकी एयरलाइंस उड़ान 11 और संयुक्त एयरलाइंस Flight 175, were crashed into the North and South towers, respectively, of the World Trade Center complex in New York City.
Within two hours, both towers collapsed with debris and the resulting fires causing partial or पूरा पतन of सब अन्य इमारतें in the wtc जटिल, as खूब as प्रमुख क्षति to ten other large surrounding structures.
A third plane, American एयरलाइंस उड़ान 77, थी क्रैश into the प्रस्तुतीकरण ( the मुख्यालय of the United States Department of Defense ), leading to a partial collapse in its western side.
The fourth plane, United Airlines Flight 93, was targeted at the संयुक्त राज्य कैपिटल in वॉशिंगटन, d.C., लकिन क्रैश into a फ़ील्ड निकट shanksville, पेन्सिलवेनिया, after its passengers tried to overcome the hijackers.
In total, almost 3,000 people died in the attacks, including the 227 civilians and 19 hijackers सवार the चार planes.
suspicion जल्दी गिरी on al-Qaeda.
Although the group 's leader, Osama bin Laden, initially अस्वीकृत कोई भागीदारी, in 2004 he claimed जिम्मेदारी लिये the हमले.
al-qaeda और बिन लादेन cited u.S. support of इसराईल, the presence of U.S. troops in Saudi Arabia, and sanctions against Iraq as motives for the attacks.
The United States responded to the attacks by launching the War on Terror and invading अफगानिस्तान to depose the तालिबान, जिससे था harbored al-qaeda.
Many countries strengthened उनके anti-terrorism विधान and expanded law enforcement powers.
Having evaded capture for सालो, बिन लादेन थी स्तिथ और मारे by U.S. forces in May 2011.
The destruction of the Twin मीनारें और अन्य गुण caused गंभीर क्षति to the अर्थव्यवस्था of Lower Manhattan and had a significant effect on global markets.
Cleanup of the संसार व्यापार बीच साईट थी समाप्त in may 2002, और the प्रस्तुतीकरण was repaired within a year.
numerous memorials have महरूम constructed, सहित the नेशनल सितंबर 11 मेमोरियल & संग्रहालय in नई York, the Pentagon Memorial, and the Flight 93 National Memorial in Pennsylvania.
After a lengthy delay, the One World Trade Center is अपेक्षित to be समाप्त at मैदान शून्य in New York City in 2013.
Finding Nemo is a 2003 American computer-animated comedy-drama adventure film लिखा और निर्देशित by एंड्रयू stanton, released by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी तस्वीरें, और the पांचवां फिल्मी उत्पादित by पिक्चर्स एनिमेशन Studios.
It tells the story of the over-protective clownfish named Marlin ( Albert Brooks ) who, along with a regal tang नामित dory ( एलेन degeneres ), खोज लिये उसके abducted बेटे nemo ( सिकंदर gould ) सब the way to Sydney Harbour.
Along the रास्ता, marlin learns to लो risks and let Nemo take care of himself.
It is Pixar 's first film to be released in cinemas in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध गर्मियाँ.
The फिल्मी थी re-released लिये the पहला समय in 3d on सितंबर 14, 2012, and it was released on Blu-ray on December 4, 2012.
A sequel, ढूंढना dory, is फिलहाल in विकास, set to be released on November 25, 2015.
The film received universal critical acclaim and won the Academy Award for Best Animated विशेषता, और थी मनोनीत in तीन अधिक श्रेणी सहित Best Original Screenplay.
It was the second highest-grossing फिल्मी of 2003, कमाई a कुल of $ 921 लाख विश्वव्यापी.
Finding Nemo is also the best-selling DVD of all time, with over 40 लाख नक़ल बेची as of 2006, और थी the highest-grossing g-rated फिल्मी of सब समय पहले Pixar 's own Toy Story 3 overtook it.
It is also the 23rd highest-grossing film of all time, as खूब as the 3rd highest-grossing एनिमेटेड film.
In 2008, the American Film संस्थान नामित it the दसवाँ महानतम एनिमेटेड फिल्मी कभी बना दौरान their Top 10.

This season also features special अतिथि दिखावे by विभिन्न म्यूज़िक हस्तियाँ सहित जस्टिन बीबर, the ब्लैक eyed मटर, Katy Perry, Kesha, Nicki Minaj, and Kanye West.

In the season finale, I aM me थी घोषित the विजेता of ऋतु 6 और प्राप्त the $ 100,000 ( USD ) prize.
In the United States, Social Security refers to the Old-Age, Survivors, and विकलांगता बीमे ( oasdi ) संघीय program.
The original Social Security Act ( 1935 ) और the वर्तमान संस्करण of the अधिनियम, as amended, encompass अनेक सोशल welfare और सोशल insurance programs.
Social Security is primarily funded through dedicated payroll कर पुकारा संघीय बीमे योगदान अधिनियम कर ( fica ).
Tax deposits are formally entrusted to the Federal old-age और survivors बीमे विश्वास निधि, the संघीय विकलांगता बीमे विश्वास निधि, the Federal Hospital Insurance Trust Fund, or the Federal Supplementary Medical Insurance Trust Fund which comprise the Social Security Trust Fund.
Upward redistribution of income is responsible लिये परिचय 43 % of the प्रक्षिप्त सोशल सुरक्षा shortfall over the next 75 years.
According to economist Martin Feldstein, the combined spending for all social insurance programs in 2003 constituted 37 % of सरकारी व्यय और 7 % of the सकल घरेलू उत्पाद.
सोशल सुरक्षा is फिलहाल अनुमानित to keep roughly 40 percent of all Americans age 65 or older out of poverty.
The Social Security प्रशासन is headquartered in woodlawn, मेरीलैंड, just west of Baltimore.
The alcohol by आवाज़ दिखाया on a bottle of absinthe.
Alcohol by volume ( abbreviated as ABV, abv, or alc/vol ) is a standard measure of कैसा much दारू ( इथेनॉल ) is contained in an alcoholic पेय ( expressed as a प्रतिशत of कुल volume ).
The ABV standard is प्रयुक्त विश्वव्यापी.
In कुछ देशों, दारू by आवाज़ is referred to as degrees Gay-Lussac ( after the French chemist Joseph Louis Gay-Lussac ).
