Charles जॉन huffam डिकेंस ( ; 7 फ़रवरी 1812 – 9 जून 1870 ) was an English writer and social critic.
He created some of the world 's सबसे यादगार fictional वर्ण और is generally regarded as the greatest novelist of the Victorian period.
During his life, his works enjoyed unprecedented कीर्ति, और by the बीसवीं सदी उसके साहित्यिक प्रतिभाशाली थी broadly acknowledged by critics and scholars.
His novels and short stories continue to be widely लोकप्रिय.
Born in Portsmouth, England, Dickens left school to कार्य in a फैक्टरी बाद उसके पिता थी thrown into debtors ' prison.
Although he had छोटी औपचारिक शिक्षा, उसके जल्दी impoverishment drove him to succeed.
Over his करियर he संपादित a साप्ताहिक जर्नल लिये 20 सालो, लिखा 15 novels, 5 novellas और सैंकड़ों of short stories and non-fiction articles, lectured and performed extensively, was an indefatigable letter writer, and campaigned vigorously for children 's rights, education, and other social reforms.
Dickens sprang to fame with the 1836 सीरियल प्रकाशन of the pickwick papers.
Within a few years he had become an international literary celebrity, famous for his humour, व्यंग्य, और keen अवलोकन of अक्षर and society.
His novels, most published in monthly or weekly किश्तों, pioneered the सीरियल प्रकाशन of कथा fiction, जिससे became the dominant Victorian mode for novel publication.
The instalment format allowed Dickens to evaluate his audience 's प्रतिक्रिया, और he प्रायः परिवर्धित उसके प्लाट और अक्षर विकास आधारित on ऐसे प्रतिक्रिया.
For example, when his wife 's chiropodist expressed तकलीफ at the रास्ता मिस mowcher in दाउद कॉपरफील्ड लगा to प्रतिबिंबित उसके disabilities, Dickens went on to improve the character with positive lineaments.
Fagin in ओलिवर ट्विस्ट जाहिर mirrors the प्रसिद्ध बाड़ ikey सुलेमान ; उसके कैरीकेचर of leigh हंट in the फिगर of Mr Skimpole in Bleak House was likewise toned down on advice from some of his friends, as they read episodes.
In the same novel, both Lawrence boythorne और मूनी the beadle हैं drawn इससे रियल जीवन – boythorne इससे वाल्टर Savage Landor and Mooney from 'Looney ', a beadle at Salisbury Square.
His plots were carefully constructed, and Dickens often wove in तत्व इससे topical कार्यक्रम into उसके कहानियां.
Masses of the illiterate poor chipped in ha'pennies to have each new monthly episode पढ़ा to उन्हें, खोलने up और प्रेरणादायी a नई क्लास of पाठक.
Dickens was regarded as the साहित्यिक colossus of his age.
His 1843 novella, A Christmas Carol, is one of the most influential works कभी लिखा, और it remains लोकप्रिय और continues to inspire adaptations in प्रत्येक artistic genre.
His creative genius has been praised by fellow writers—from Leo Tolstoy to G. K. Chesterton and जार्ज ऑरवेल —for इसके यथार्थवाद, कॉमेडी, गद्य स्टाइल, अद्वितीय characterisations, और social criticism.
On the other hand Oscar Wilde, Henry James and Virginia Woolf complained of a कमी of मनोवैज्ञानिक गहराई, ढीला लिखने, और a रग of saccharine sentimentalism.
Martin Luther King and other civil rights नेताओ in सामने of the प्रतिमा of अब्राहम Lincoln, August 28, 1963
The civil rights movement was a श्रेणी of विश्वव्यापी राजनैतिक आंदोलनों लिये समता पहले the विधि that peaked in the 1960s.
In many situations it took the form of campaigns of सिविल प्रतिरोध aimed at achieving बदलें by nonviolent फ़ॉर्म of resistance.
In some situations it थी accompanied, or followed, by सिविल अशांति and armed rebellion.
The process was long and tenuous in many countries, and many of these movements did not fully achieve उनके लक्ष्य हालांकि, the प्रयत्न of ये आंदोलनों किया सीसे to सुधार in the legal rights of previously oppressed groups of people.
The main aim of the सिविल अधिकारों गति शामिल, और शामिल, ensuring कि the अधिकारों of all people are equally protected by the law, including the rights of minorities.
Civil rights movements ranging इससे the वैश्विक lgbt अधिकारों गति to the वैश्विक महिलाओं 's अधिकारों गति to विभिन्न जातिगत अल्पसंख्यक rights movements around the world continue.
The 2010 FIFA World Cup was the 19th FIFA संसार कप, the संसार चैंपियनशिप लिये मेन 's national association football teams.
It took place in दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी इससे 11 जून to 11 July 2010.
The bidding process for hosting the tournament finals was open only to अफ़्रीकी राष्ट्र ; in 2004, the अंतरराष्ट्रीय फ़ुटबॉल संघ, फीफा, चयनित दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी over मिश्र और Morocco to become the first African nation to host the finals.
The matches were played in ten stadiums in nine host cities around the देश, साथ the फाइनल निभाई at the सॉकर नगर स्टेडियम in दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी 's largest city, Johannesburg.
Thirty-two teams were selected लिये भागीदारी via a विश्वव्यापी योग्यता tournament that began in August 2007.
In the first round of the tournament finals, the teams competed in round-robin समूह of चार टीमों लिये अंक, साथ the शीर्ष दो टीमों in each group proceeding.
These sixteen teams advanced to the knockout stage, where तीन rounds of खेल decided जिससे टीमों होता participate in the final.
In the final, Spain, the European champions, defeated third-time finalists the नीदरलैंड्स 1–0 बाद अतिरिक्त समय, साथ आन्द्रेस iniesta 's लक्ष्य in the 116th मिनट giving स्पेन उनके पहला संसार शीर्षक, becoming the eighth nation to win the tournament, and the first European nation to win the tournament outside its home continent.
Host nation South Africa, 2006 world champions Italy और 2006 runners-up फ़्रांस यहूद सब eliminated in the पहला गोलाकार of the tournament.
It was the first time that the hosts were eliminated in the पहला गोलाकार.
New Zealand with their three draws were the only अपराजित टोली in the टूर्नामेंट, लकिन यहूद भी eliminated in the पहला गोलाकार.
the mcmuffin is a परिवार of नाश्ता सैंडविच in विभिन्न आकार और configurations, sold by the fast-food restaurant chain McDonald 's.
The Egg McMuffin is the signature breakfast sandwich ; it was invented by the late मैकडोनाल्ड 's वाल हर्ब पीटरसन in the लेट 1960s और थी introduced देशभर in 1972.
John Lennon was an English संगीतकार जो gained विश्वव्यापी कीर्ति as एक of the संस्थापकों of the बीटल्स, for his subsequent solo career, and for his political activism and pacifism.
He was shot by Mark David Chapman at the entrance of the भवन जहाँ he जिया, the डकोटा, in नई यॉर्क नगर on 8 दिसम्बर 1980.
Lennon had बस लौटे इससे रिकार्ड संयंत्र स्टुडियो साथ उसके बीवी, Yoko Ono.
Lennon was pronounced dead on arrival at St. Luke's-Roosevelt Hospital Center, where it was stated कि nobody could have जिया लिये अधिक than a few मिनट्स बाद sustaining ऐसे injuries.
Shortly after लोकल न्यूज स्टेशन reported लेनन 's मौत, crowds gathered at Roosevelt Hospital and in front of the Dakota.
Lennon was cremated on 10 December 1980 at the Ferncliff Cemetery in Hartsdale, New York ; the ashes यहूद दिए to ओनो, जो chose नहीं to थाम a अंत्येष्टि लिये him.
The first report of Lennon 's death to a U.S. national दर्शक थी घोषित by हावर्ड cosell, on एबीसी 's सोमवार Night Football.
New Orleans ( or, locally or ; ) is a major United राज्य बंदरगाहों और the largest नगर और महानगर area in the state of Louisiana.
The जनसांख्यिकी of the नगर थी 343,829 as of the 2010 U.S. Census.
The New Orleans metropolitan area ( New Orleans–Metairie–Kenner Metropolitan Statistical Area ) had a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,167,764 in 2010 और थी the 46th largest in the संयुक्त States.
the नई orleans–metairie–bogalusa संयुक्त सांख्यिकीय Area, a larger trading area, had a 2010 population of 1,214,932.
The city is named बाद orléans, a नगर स्तिथ on the loire नदी in केन्द्र, फ़्रांस, और is खूब ज्ञात लिये इसके distinct French Creole architecture, as well as its cross-cultural and multilingual heritage.
New Orleans is also famous for its cuisine, music ( particularly as the जन्मस्थान of जैज़ ), और इसके सालाना जश्न और त्यौहार, सबसे notably Mardi Gras.
The city is प्रायः referred to as the `` सबसे unique '' in America.
New Orleans is located in southeastern louisiana, straddling the Mississippi River.
The city और ऑरलियन्स मोहल्ला ( ) are.
The city and parish हैं bounded by the parishes of st. tammany to the north, St. Bernard to the east, Plaquemines to the south and Jefferson to the south and west.
Lake pontchartrain, भाग of जिससे is included in the city limits, lies to the north and Lake Borgne lies to the east.
The संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्षीय चुनाव of 1968 थी the 46th quadrennial presidential election, held on Tuesday, November 5, 1968.
The Republican nominee, former vice-president रिचर्ड निक्सन, जीती the चुनाव over the Democratic nominee, incumbent Vice-President Hubert Humphrey.
Nixon ran on a अभियान कि promised to restore विधि और अनुक्रम to the स्वदेश 's cities, torn by riots and crime.
Analysts have argued the election of 1968 is a realigning election as it permanently disrupted the नई सौदे गठबन्धन कि था वर्चस्व अध्यक्षीय राजनीती लिये 36 years.
Coming four years after Democrat Lyndon B. Johnson won in a historic landslide, the election saw the लाज़िम अध्यक्ष मजबूर आउट of the रेस और a रिपब्लिकन निर्वाचित for the first time in twelve years.
It was a wrenching national experience, conducted during a year of violence that included the assassination of civil rights leader Martin Luther King, Jr., and subsequent race riots across the nation, the assasination of Democratic presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy, widespread opposition to the Vietnam युद्ध आरपार विश्वविद्यालयों campuses, और हिंसक confrontations between पुलिस और anti-war प्रदर्शनकारियों at the 1968 Democratic National Convention as the Democratic party split again and again.
The election featured the strongest तीसरा पार्टी प्रयत्न चूंकि 1912 by पूर्व अलबामा राज्यपाल George Wallace, a Democrat.
Because Wallace 's campaign opposed federal intervention in the South to end school पृथक्करण, he carried the गहन दक्षिण और भागा खूब in जातीय औद्योगिक जिले in the North.
This was the last election in जिससे नई यॉर्क था the सबसे मत in the चुनावी college ( 43 votes ).
After the 1970 census, कैलिफ़ोर्निया gained the सबसे चुनावी मत और रै remained the सबसे populous state since then.
This is the latest election where a presidential ticket won बगैर carrying the वाइस अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी 's home state.
Karak ( ; also known as Garak, Garrak, and Gorg ) is a village in Gamasiyab ग्रामीण ज़िला, in the सेंट्रल District of Nahavand County, Hamadan Province, Iran.
At the 2006 जनसांख्यिकी, इसके जनसांख्यिकी थी 294, in 65 families.
Kurt 's हस्ताक्षर
Kurt Donald Cobain ( February 20, 1967 – April 5, 1994 ) थी an अमरीकी संगीतकार और कलाकार, बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the सीसे सिंगर, guitarist और प्राथमिक songwriter of the grunge band Nirvana.
Cobain formed Nirvana with Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen, Washington in 1985 and established it as भाग of the सिएटल म्यूज़िक झाँकी, having इसके डेब्यू एल्बम ब्लीच released on the स्वतंत्र record label Sub Pop in 1989.
After signing with major label DGC Records, the band found भेदन कामयाबी साथ `` खुश्बू जैसे Teen Spirit `` from its second album Nevermind ( 1991 ).
Following the success of Nevermind, Nirvana was labeled `` the फ्लैगशिप बैंड '' of पीढी X, and Cobain hailed as `` the spokesman of a generation ''.
Cobain, however, was often uncomfortable and frustrated, believing his message and artistic दृष्टि to have महरूम misinterpreted by the पब्लिक, साथ उसके निजी issues often subject to media attention.
He challenged निर्वाण 's दर्शक साथ इसके फाइनल स्टुडियो album In Utero ( 1993 ).
During the last years of his life, Cobain struggled साथ हेरोइन व्यसन, बीमारी और अवसाद.
He also had difficulty coping साथ उसके कीर्ति और पब्लिक चित्र, और the पेशेवर और lifelong निजी pressures surrounding himself and his wife, musician Courtney Love.
On April 8, 1994, Cobain was found dead at his home in Seattle, the शिकार of कया थी officially शासित a आत्महत्या by a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the head.
The हालातों of उसके मौत at आयु 27 have become a topic of public fascination and debate.
Since उनके डेब्यू, निर्वाण, साथ कोबेन as a songwriter, रै बेची over 25 लाख albums in the U.S., and over 50 million worldwide.
A millwright is a craftsman or tradesman सगाई साथ the construction and maintenance of machinery.
More generally in the English speaking world, early millwrights यहूद विशेषज्ञ बढ़ई जो erected मशीने प्रयुक्त in कृषि, food processing and processing lumber and paper.
In the early part of the Industrial Revolution, उनके कौशल यहूद दबाया into सेवा भवन the earliest powered textile mills.
Modern millwrights work with steel and other materials in addition to wood and must often combine the skills of अनेक skilled ट्रेड in अनुक्रम to सफलतापूर्वक fabricate औद्योगिक मशीनरी or to इकट्ठे मशीने इससे pre-fabricated parts.
The modern millwright must also be able to पढ़ा blueprints और अन्य schematics to aid him in the construction of complex systems.
Millwrights are frequently unionized, with around 45 % unionized in the us, हालांकि अनुभवी millwrights प्रायः नियत themselves up as स्वतंत्र contractors.
The Adjustment ब्यूरो is a 2011 अमरीकी रोमांटिक कार्रवाई थ्रिलर film loosely based on the Philip K. Dick short story, `` Adjustment Team ``.
The film was written and निर्देशित by जार्ज nolfi और सितारों Matt Damon and Emily Blunt.
the डाल भी शामिल एंथोनी mackie, जॉन slattery, Michael Kelly, and Terence Stamp.
The score was composed by Thomas Newman, with two songs by रिचर्ड ashcroft ( `` भविष्य 's उज्जवल '' लिये the खोलने अनुक्रम ; `` हैं तुम तैयार ? '' लिये the closing credits ).
सोडियम azide is the अकार्बनिक compound with the formula NaN3.
इस colorless नमक is the gas-forming घटक in many car airbag systems.
It is used लिये the तैयारी of other azide compounds.
it is an ionic पदार्थ, is अत्यधिक घुलनशील in water, and is very acutely toxic.
Double rainbow and supernumerary rainbows on the अंदर of the प्राथमिक चाप.
The छाया of the फ़ोटोग्राफ़र 's सिर on the नीचे marks the centre of the rainbow circle ( antisolar point ).
A rainbow is an ऑप्टिकल और meteorological घटना कि is caused by प्रतिबिंब of लाइट in water droplets in the Earth 's atmosphere, resulting in a spectrum of light appearing in the sky.
It takes the form of a multicoloured चाप.
Rainbows caused by sunlight always appear in the खण्ड of आसमान सीधे opposite the sun.
In a `` primary rainbow '', the arc shows रेड on the बाहरी भाग और बैंगनी on the inner side.
इस रेनबो is caused by लाइट होने refracted जबकि प्रवेश a droplet of water, then reflected inside on the back of the droplet and refracted again when leaving it.
In a double rainbow, a second arc is seen outside the प्राथमिक चाप, और रै the अनुक्रम of इसके रंग reversed, red facing toward the other one, in both rainbows.
This second rainbow is caused by light reflecting twice अंदर जल droplets.
The Conservative Party, officially the Conservative and Unionist Party and colloquially referred to as the Tory Party or the Tories, is a centre-right political पार्टी in the संयुक्त किंगडम कि espouses the तत्त्वज्ञान of conservatism and British unionism.
it is the largest political party in the United Kingdom, being the largest single party in the हाउस of कॉमन्स साथ 303 mps, the largest पार्टी in लोकल सरकारी साथ 9,391 पार्षदों, और the largest अंग्रेजों पार्टी in the यूरोपीय पार्लियामेंट साथ 25 meps.
It governs in coalition with the उदार डेमोक्रेट, साथ पार्टी नेता दाउद cameron as प्रधान मंत्री.
The रूढ़िवादी पार्टी थी संस्थापित in 1834, और थी एक of दो प्रबल पार्टियों in the 19th century, along with the Liberal Party.
It बदला इसके नाम to the रूढ़िवादी और यूनियनिस्ट पार्टी in 1912 बाद merging with the Liberal Unionist Party, although that name is rarely used and it is generally referred to as simply the Conservative Party.
In the 1920s, the उदार vote greatly diminished and the Labour Party became the Conservatives ' main rivals.
रूढ़िवादी प्रधान मंत्रियों led सरकारें लिये 57 सालो of the 20th century, including Winston Churchill ( 1940–45, 1951–55 ) and Margaret Thatcher ( 1979–90 ).
Thatcher 's tenure led to wide-ranging economic उदारीकरण और देखी the conservatives become the सबसे eurosceptic of the three major parties.
The party was returned to government in coalition, having failed to win a majority, in 2010 अंतर्गत the अधिक `` उदार '' नेतृत्व of दाउद Cameron.
In the European Parliament, the Conservatives are the largest British party with 25 MEPs, who sit with the soft eurosceptic यूरोपीय conservatives और reformists ( ecr ) संसदीय समूह, जबकि the पार्टी itself is a सदस्य of the गठबंधन of European Conservatives and Reformists ( AECR ) Europarty.
They are the third-largest party in the स्कॉटिश पार्लियामेंट और second-largest in the वेल्श Assembly.
They were formally allied to the Ulster Unionist पार्टी ( uup ) as भाग of the ulster conservatives और unionists व्यवस्था, साथ the uup फिलहाल participating in the five-party Northern Ireland Executive.
Destiny 's Child was an American R & B girl group whose final, and perhaps सबसे recognizable, line-up comprised बेयोंस नॉलेस, केली rowland और Michelle Williams.
Formed in 1990 in Houston, Texas, Destiny 's चाइल्ड सदस्यों began उनके musical endeavors as लड़की 's टीमे comprising, among others, Knowles, Rowland, LaTavia Roberson and LeToya Luckett.
After सालो of सीमित कामयाबी, वे were signed to Columbia Records as Destiny 's Child.
Destiny 's Child was launched into mainstream मान्यता following the रिलीज of उनके best-selling दूसरी एल्बम, the लिखने 's on the वॉल, जिससे contained the number-one singles `` Bills, Bills, Bills `` and `` Say My Name ``.
despite नाजुक और वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी, the समूह थी plagued by आतंरिक विरोध और विधिक turmoil, as roberson और luckett attempted to split from the group 's manager Mathew Knowles, citing favoritism of Knowles and Rowland, his daughter and niece, respectively.
Both Roberson and Luckett were soon replaced with विलियम्स और farrah फ्रैंकलिन ; however, in 2000, Franklin was dismissed, leaving them as a trio.
Their third album, उत्तरजीवी, जिससे contains विषयवस्तु the पब्लिक interpreted as a चैनल to the समूह 's अनुभव, contains the विश्वव्यापी हिट्स `` Independent Women ``, `` Survivor `` and `` Bootylicious ``.
In 2002, they announced a hiatus and re-united दो सालो बाद लिये the रिलीज of उनके चौथी स्टुडियो album, Destiny Fulfilled ( 2004 ).
Destiny 's Child has sold more than 50 लाख रिकॉर्ड worldwide to date.
Billboard magazine ranks the group as one of the महानतम musical trios of सब समय, the नवीं सबसे कामयाब artist/band of the 2000s, और लगाई the group 68th in its All-Time Hot 100 Artists list in 2008.
The centers लिये बीमारी कंट्रोल और रोकथाम ( सीडीसी ) is a संयुक्त राज्य संघीय एजेंसी अंतर्गत the Department of Health and Human Services headquartered in Druid Hills, unincorporated DeKalb County, Georgia, in Greater Atlanta.
It works to protect public स्वास्थ्य और सुरक्षा by providing सूचना to बढ़ाएँ स्वास्थ्य निर्णय, और it promotes स्वास्थ्य through partnerships with state health departments and other organizations.
The CDC focus national attention on developing and applying disease prevention and control ( especially infectious diseases and foodborne pathogens and other microbial infections ), environmental स्वास्थ्य, occupational सुरक्षा और स्वास्थ्य, स्वास्थ्य प्रमोशन, चोट रोकथाम और शिक्षा क्रियाएँ designed to improve the health of the people of the United States.
The CDC is the United States ' national public स्वास्थ्य संस्थान और is a founding सदस्य of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ of नेशनल Public Health Institutes.
Earthquake prediction `` is usually defined as the specification of the time, स्थान, और परिमाण of a भविष्य भूकंप भीतर stated हद '', और विशेषकर of `` the अगला दमदार भूकंप to occur in a region. ''
This can be विशिष्ट इससे भूकंप forecasting, जिससे is the probabilistic मूल्यांकन of सामान्य भूकंप जोखिम, सहित the आवृत्ति and magnitude of damaging earthquakes, in a given area over periods of years or decades.
This can be further distinguished from real-time भूकंप चेतावनी प्रणालियों, जिससे, upon डिटेक्शन of a कठोर भूकंप, can provide neighboring regions a few seconds warning of potentially significant shaking.
To be useful, an earthquake prediction must be precise enough to warrant the लागत of increased एहतियात, सहित disruption of ordinary क्रियाएँ और कॉमर्स, और सामयिक पर्याप्त कि तैयारी can be made.
Predictions must also be विश्वसनीय, as गलत सचेतक और रद्द सचेतक हैं नहीं तभी economically costly, लकिन seriously undermine confidence in, and thereby the effectiveness of, any kind of warning.
With over 7,000 earthquakes around the world each year with a परिमाण of 4.0 or वृहद, नगण्य कामयाबी in भूकंप भविष्यवाणी is easily प्राप्त using sufficiently broad parameters of time, location, or magnitude.
However, such नगण्य `` कामयाब पूर्वानुमान '' are not useful.
Major earthquakes are often followed by reports that they were predicted, or at least anticipated, but no अर्जी of a कामयाब भविष्यवाणी of a प्रमुख भूकंप has survived close inquiry.
In the 1970s there was intense optimism amongst वैज्ञानिकों कि कुछ विधि of predicting भूकंप might be मिला, but by the 1990s continuing failure led many scientists to question whether it was even possible.
While many scientists still hold that, given enough resources, prediction might be possible, many others maintain कि भूकंप भविष्यवाणी is inherently impossible.
Deborah Ann `` Debby '' Ryan ( born may 13, 1993 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री, singer, musician, songwriter and record producer.
Ryan is best known for starring as Bailey पिकेट in the डिज़्नी चैनल असली श्रेणी the सुइट Life on Deck.
in 2008, the सुइट जीवन on डेक क्रमित as tv 's शीर्ष श्रेणी among बच्चे 6-11 and the No. 2 scripted series among tweens 9-14.
Ryan started acting in पेशेवर थिएटर at the आयु of सात ; in 2007 वो appeared in the बार्नी & Friends straight-to-DVD film Barney : Let 's Go to the Firehouse and then was discovered in a nationwide search by Disney.
She is also known for appearing in the 2008 विशेषता फिल्मी the longshots as एडिथ.
In 2009, she guest स्ट्रक्चर in an एपीसोड of wizards of waverly प्लेस in Wizards on Deck with Hannah Montana as Bailey Pickett along with her other cast mates from The Suite Life on Deck.
Then, in 2010, वो स्ट्रक्चर in the फिल्मी 16 बधाइयां, जिससे थी the सबसे देखी केबल program on the day of its premiere on the Disney Channel.
16 Wishes introduced Ryan to new audiences ; the फिल्म प्राप्त ऊँची viewership in the adults demographic ( 18-34 ).
Soon after that, रयान स्ट्रक्चर in the स्वतंत्र नाट्य फिल्मी, What If..., which premiered on August 20, 2010.
Ryan also starred in the new Disney Channel असली फिल्म, रेडियो विद्रोही, जहाँ वो portrays the भूमिका of tara एडम्स, a shy 17-year-old girl who adopts the radio personality, Radio Rebel.
Released फ़रवरी 17, 2012.
Ryan सितारों in the titular भूमिका in the डिज़्नी Channel Original Series, Jessie.
Stührling Tourbillon गति ( ).
In horology, a tourbillon ( ; `` whirlwind '' ) is an addition to the mechanics of a watch escapement.
Developed around 1795 by the French-Swiss घड़ीसाज़ abraham-louis breguet इससे an पहले विचार by the अंग्रेज़ी chronometer maker John Arnold, a tourbillon aims to counter the effects of gravity by mounting the escapement and balance wheel in a rotating cage, to negate the effect of gravity when the timepiece ( thus the escapement ) is stuck in a certain position.
Originally an attempt to improve accuracy, tourbillons are still included in some महंगी आधुनिक घड़ियाँ as a विलक्षणता और demonstration of watchmaking virtuosity.
The यांत्रिकी is प्रायः उजागर on the watch 's face to show it off.
The Windows Installer ( previously known as Microsoft Installer ) is a software component used for the संस्थापना, मेंटेनेंस, और हटाना of तन्त्र on आधुनिक Microsoft Windows systems.
The installation सूचना, और प्रायः the फाइलें themselves, हैं packaged in संस्थापना पैकेज, loosely रिलेशनल databases structured as COM Structured Storages and commonly known as `` MSI files '', from their default file extension.
Windows Installer contains significant changes इससे इसके पूर्ववर्ती, सेटअप API.
New features include a GUI framework and automatic generation of the uninstallation अनुक्रम.
Windows Installer is positioned as an alternative to stand-alone executable installer frameworks ऐसे as पुरानी संस्करण of installshield और NSIS.
Microsoft encourages third parties to use Windows Installer as the आधार लिये संस्थापना frameworks, so कि वे synchronize correctly साथ अन्य installers और रखना the आतंरिक database of installed products consistent.
Important features such as rollback और versioning निर्भर on a सतत आतंरिक database for reliable operation.
furthermore, खिड़कियाँ installer facilitates the principle of least privilege by performing software installations by proxy for unprivileged users.
Four Loko is a line of alcoholic beverages, originally marketed as उर्जा पेय, बेची by phusion प्रोजेक्ट of शिकागो, Illinois.
phusion operates as पेय Four Brewing Company.
Four Loko, the company 's most popular पेय, debuted in the संयुक्त राज्य market in 2005.
It is now sold in 48 states, and in Canada, the बहामा, बोलीविया, होंडुरास, और यूरोपीय.
The name `` Four '' is derived from the original उर्जा पेय 's चार प्रमुख संघटक : दारू, कैफीन, taurine, और guarana.
Four branded products have been the object of विधिक, नैतिक, और स्वास्थ्य चिंताएं सम्बन्धित to the कम्पनी allegedly विपणन उन्हें to the underaged and the purported danger of combining alcohol and caffeine.
After the beverage was banned in several राज्य, a उत्पाद reintroduction in दिसम्बर 2010 removed कैफीन, taurine, और guarana as ingredients, and the malt beverage is no longer marketed as an energy drink.
The neck of a guitar showing the nut ( in the पृष्ठभूमि, coloured श्वेत ) और पहला चार metal frets.
A fret is a raised element on the गर्दन of a stringed यंत्र.
Frets usually extend across the पूरा चौडाई of the गर्दन.
On most modern पश्चिमी fretted यंत्र, frets are metal strips inserted into the fingerboard.
on कुछ ऐतिहासिक यंत्र और non-European instruments, frets are made of pieces of string tied around the neck.
Frets divide the neck into फिक्स्ड खण्ड at intervals सम्बन्धित to a musical framework.
On instruments ऐसे as guitars, प्रत्येक fret represents एक semitone in the standard western system where one octave is divided into twelve semitones.
Fret is often used as a verb, meaning simply `` to दबायें bas the स्ट्रिंग पीछे a fret. ''
Fretting often refers to the frets and/or their system of placement.
There was consumption of दारू दोनो दौरान और बाद prohibition.
The 18th Amendment prohibited the production, distribution and sale of alcoholic पेय in the संयुक्त राज्य और थी widely supported by the American public when it went into effect in 1920.
The temperance movement had popularized the belief कि दारू थी the प्रमुख कारण of सबसे निजी और सोशल समस्याएं और निषेध थी देखी as the solution to the nation 's poverty, crime, violence, and other ills.
Upon ratification of the amendment, the famous evangelist बिली संडे कहा कि `` the slums will soon be only a memory.
We will फेरे हमारी जेलों into कारखानों और हमारी jails into storehouses and corncribs. ''
( Compare Christianity and दारू. )
चूंकि दारू थी to be बैन और चूंकि it थी देखी as the कारण of सबसे, if not all, crime, some communities sold their jails.
The nation was highly optimistic and the leading prohibitionist in the United States Congress confidently asserted that `` There is as much मौका of repealing the eighteenth amendment as वहीँ is लिये a हमिंगबर्ड to मक्खी to the ग्रह मंगल साथ the Washington Monument tied to its tail.”
The metre ( meter in American English ), ( SI unit symbol : m ; si आयाम प्रतीक : l ), is the आधारभूत ईकाई of लंबाई in the International System of Units ( SI ).
Originally intended to be one ten-millionth of the distance from the Earth 's equator to the उत्तर ध्रुव ( at समुद्र स्तर ), इसके परिभाषा रै महरूम periodically refined to reflect growing knowledge of metrology.
चूंकि 1983, it रै महरूम पारिभाषित as `` the लंबाई of the पाथ travelled by light in vacuum during a time interval of 1/299,792,458 of a second. ''
Geologists exploring jurassic sedimentary रॉक्स in makhtesh gadol, Negev Desert, Israel

A geologist is a scientist who studies the solid and liquid matter that constitutes the धरती as खूब as the प्रक्रियाओं और इतिहास कि रै तराशा it.
Geologists प्रायः engage in अध्ययन geology.
Geologists, studying more of an applied science than a सैद्धांतिक एक, जरूर दृष्टिकोण भूविज्ञान using भौतिकी, रसायन और biology as well as other sciences.
Geologists, compared to scientists engaged in other fields, are generally more exposed to the outdoors than staying in laboratories ; हालांकि कुछ geologists prefer to perform सबसे of उनके अध्ययन in the lab.
Geologists are engaged in exploration for mining कंपनियाँ in ढूंढें of धातुओं, oils, और अन्य धरती संसाधन.
They are also in the forefront of natural जोखिमों और आपदाओं चेतावनी और शमन, अध्ययन भूकंप, volcanic कार्यकलाप, tsunamis, मौसम तूफ़ान, and the like ; their studies are used to warn the general public of the occurrence of these events.
Currently, geologists हैं भी सगाई in the चर्चा of जलवायु बदलें, as वे पढ़ाई the history and evidence for this Earth process.
Below is a व्यापक ड्रिल और tap आकार चार्ट लिये सब drills, इम्पीरियल और metric, and taps up to 36.5 mm.
Modern vacuum tubes, ज़्यादातर miniature स्टाइल
In electronics, a vacuum tube, electron tube ( in North America ), तापायनिक वाल्व, ट्यूब, or वाल्व is a यंत्र controlling इलेक्ट्रिक वर्तमान through a vacuum in a sealed container.
The container is often thin transparent glass in a roughly बेलनाकार आकार.
The simplest vacuum tube, the डायोड, is essentially an incandescent लाइट बल्ब साथ an added एलेक्ट्रोड inside.
When the bulb 's filament is heated white-hot, electrons हैं `` boiled '' बंद इसके surface and into the vacuum inside the bulb.
If the एलेक्ट्रोड -- पुकारा a `` थाली '' or `` धनाग्र '' -- is बना अधिक धनात्मक than the hot फिलामेंट, a direct current flows through the vacuum to the electrode ( a demonstration of the Edison effect ).
As the current only flows in one direction, it makes it संभावित to बदलें an प्रत्यावर्ती वर्तमान लागू to the फिलामेंट to direct current.
The परिचय of a तीसरा एलेक्ट्रोड, a grid between the filament and the plate, yields another function.
A voltage लागू to the ग्रिड नियंत्रण the वर्तमान बहती from the filament to the plate.
यूँ, it allows the यंत्र to be used as an electronic amplifier.
Vacuum tubes are thus used लिये rectification, प्रवर्धन, switching, or समान प्रसंस्करण or creation of electrical signals.
The vast बहुमत of आधुनिक दिन tubes consist of a sealed संग्राहक with a vacuum inside, and essentially rely on thermionic emission of electrons from a hot filament or a cathode heated by the filament.
कुछ अपवाद to इस हैं dealt with in the section about gas-filled tubes below.
Vacuum tubes were critical to the development of electronic technology, which drove the expansion and commercialization of radio broadcasting, television, radar, sound reinforcement, sound recording और जनन, विशाल टेलीफोन संजाल, एनालॉग और डिजिटल कंप्यूटर, और औद्योगिक प्रक्रम कंट्रोल.
Although some applications had counterparts using earlier technologies such as the spark gap ट्रांसमीटर or mechanical कंप्यूटर, it थी the आविष्कार of the वैक्यूम ट्यूब साथ तीन electrodes ( पुकारा a ट्रायोड ) और इसके काबिलियत of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक amplification that made these technologies widespread and practical.
In most applications, solid-state डिवाइस ऐसे as transistors और अन्य सेमीकंडक्टर devices have replaced tubes.
solid-state डिवाइस पिछला longer और हैं छोटी, more efficient, more reliable, and cheaper than tubes.
Tubes can be fragile, sometimes generate significant unwanted heat, and can take many seconds—many minutes in critical applications—after powering on to गरम to a तापमान जहाँ वे perform भीतर operational सहिष्णुता.
However, tubes still find uses where solid-state डिवाइस have नहीं महरूम विकसित, हैं अव्यवहारिक, or जहाँ a ट्यूब रै श्रेष्ठ प्रदर्शन, as with some devices in professional audio and high-power radio transmitters.
Tubes are स्टिल उत्पादित लिये ऐसे अनुप्रयोग.
Tubes are less likely than semiconductor devices to be नष्ट by the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक पल्स उत्पादित by नाभिकीय विस्फोट and geomagnetic storms produced by giant solar flares.
Skittles is a brand of fruit-flavoured मिठाई, फिलहाल उत्पादित और marketed by the wm. Wrigley Jr. Company, a division of Mars, Inc.
They have मुश्किल शुगर शेल जिससे carry the letter S.
The inside is mainly शुगर, मकई सिरप, और hydrogenated ताड़ कर्नेल आयल साथ with fruit juice, citric acid, and natural and artificial flavours.
The confectionery रै महरूम बेची in a किस्में of फ्लेवर संग्रहण, such as Tropical and Wild Berry.
Sir Winston Leonard Spencer-Churchill, ( 30 November 1874 – 24 January 1965 ) was a अंग्रेजों राजनेता जो थी the प्रधान मंत्री of the संयुक्त Kingdom from 1940 to 1945 and again from 1951 to 1955.
Widely regarded as one of the greatest wartime leaders of the 20th century, चर्चिल थी भी an अधिकारी in the अंग्रेजों फौज, a इतिहासकार, a writer, and an artist.
He is the only British Prime Minister in history to have प्राप्त the नोबेल पुरस्कार in साहित्य, और थी भी the पहला व्यक्ति to be बना an मानद Citizen of the United States.
Churchill was born into an वैभवशाली परिवार as the grandson of the 7th Duke of Marlborough.
His father, Lord Randolph Churchill, was a charismatic राजनेता जो परोसा as चांसलर of the exchequer ; उसके mother, Jennie Jerome, was an American socialite.
As a young फौज अधिकारी, he देखी कार्रवाई in अंग्रेजों इण्डिया, The Sudan, and the Second Boer War.
He gained कीर्ति as a युद्ध correspondent और wrote books about his campaigns.
At the forefront of politics for fifty सालो, he आयोजित अनेक राजनैतिक और कैबिनेट positions.
Before the First World War, he served as अध्यक्ष of the फलक of व्यापार, घर सचिव, and First Lord of the Admiralty as part of the Asquith Liberal government.
During the war, he continued as First Lord of the admiralty जबतक the विनाशकारी gallipoli Campaign caused his departure from government.
He तब briefly resumed क्रियाशील फौज सेवा on the पश्चिमी सामने as कमांडर of the 6th Battalion of the Royal Scots Fusiliers.
He returned to सरकारी as मंत्री of munitions, सचिव of State for War, and Secretary of State for Air.
After the War, Churchill served as Chancellor of the Exchequer in the Conservative ( Baldwin ) government of 1924–29, controversially returning the पाउंड स्टर्लिंग in 1925 to the सुनहरा मानक at इसके pre-war पैरिटी, a मूव widely देखी as बनाना deflationary दबाव on the uk अर्थव्यवस्था.
Also controversial was his विपक्ष to increased घर नियम लिये इण्डिया और उसके प्रतिरोध to the 1936 abdication of Edward VIII.
Out of office and नीतियां `` in the wilderness '' दौरान the 1930s, चर्चिल took the सीसे in warning about Nazi Germany and in campaigning for rearmament.
On the outbreak of the Second World War, he was again नियुक्त पहला रब of the admiralty.
following the इस्तीफा of नेविली चेम्बरलेन on 10 May 1940, Churchill became Prime Minister.
His वफ़ादार refusal to consider शिकस्त, आत्मसमर्पण, or a सुलह सलाम helped inspire अंग्रेजों प्रतिरोध, विशेषकर दौरान the difficult early days of the War when Britain stood alone among European countries in its active opposition to Adolf Hitler.
चर्चिल थी विशेषकर विख्यात लिये his speeches and radio broadcasts, which helped inspire the British people.
He led Britain as Prime Minister जबतक विजय over नाजी जर्मनी had been secured.
After the Conservative Party lost the 1945 election, he became Leader of the विपक्ष to the श्रमिक ( attlee ) सरकारी.
After winning the 1951 election, he again became प्रधान मंत्री, पहले retiring in 1955.
Upon his death, Elizabeth II granted उसे the इज्ज़त of a राज्य अंत्येष्टि, जिससे देखी एक of the largest assemblies of world statesmen in history.
Named the महानतम briton of सब समय in a 2002 पोल, Churchill is widely regarded as being among the most influential people in British history.

The Ford Focus is a compact car ( c-segment in यूरोपीय ) manufactured by the घाट मोटर कम्पनी since 1998.
Ford began sales of the Focus to Europe in July 1998 और in उत्तर अमेरिका दौरान 1999 लिये the 2000 मॉडल साल.
In Europe, South America, North America and South Africa, the फ़ोकस replaced the विभिन्न संस्करण of the घाट अनुरक्षण sold in those markets.
In Asia and Australasia, it replaced the घाट लेज़र.
As of the first half of 2012, the फ़ोकस surpassed the टोयोटा कोरोला to become the world 's best selling automobile nameplate.
The Focus has been considered one of the 50 महानतम गाड़ियाँ of the पास्ट पचास सालो by अंग्रेजों magazine CAR.
an आगर थाली -- an उदाहरण of a bacterial growth medium.
Specifically, it is a streak plate ; the नारंगी लाइनों और dots are formed by bacterial colonies.
A growth medium or संस्कृति मीडियम is a द्रव or gel designed to support the विकास of microorganisms or cells, or small plants like the moss Physcomitrella patens.
There are अलग प्रकार of मीडिया लिये growing different types of cells.
There are two major types of growth media : those used for cell संस्कृति, जिससे उपयोग विशिष्ट कोशिका प्रकार निकला इससे पौधे or पशु, और microbiological संस्कृति, जिससे हैं प्रयुक्त लिये growing microorganisms, such as bacteria or yeast.
The most common growth media for microorganisms are nutrient broths and आगर प्लेटों ; specialized मीडिया हैं sometimes जरूरी लिये microorganism and cell culture growth.
Some organisms, termed सुकुमार जीवों, आवश्यकता specialized environments due to complex nutritional requirements.
Viruses, for उदाहरण, हैं obligate intracellular परजीवी और आवश्यकता a growth medium containing living cells.
A talent agent, or booking agent, is a person who finds jobs for actors, लेखक, फिल्मी निर्देशकों, संगीतकारों, मॉडल, निर्माता, professional athletes, writers and other people in various entertainment businesses.
An agent also defends, supports and promotes the ब्याज of his/her क्लाइंट.
Agents can not produce उनके अपना shows due to विरोध of interest.
A talent agent must be परिचित साथ उनके क्लाइंट.
An agent has to know what kind of work the client can and can not do in अनुक्रम to मैच उन्हें साथ विभिन्न jobs.
Having an एजेंट is नहीं जरूरी, लकिन करता सहायता the कलाकार in getting jobs.
in अनेक मामले ढलाई निर्देशकों, or अन्य व्यवसायों, go to talent agencies to find artists they are looking for.
The agent is paid a percentage of the स्टार 's आय ( typically 10 % ).
एजेंटों sometimes होगा be referred to as `` 10 percenters. ''
There are different regulations that govern different types of agents कि हैं स्थापित by कलाकार 's संघ और the विधिक क्षेत्राधिकार in जिससे the एजेंट operates.
There are भी पेशेवर संगठन कि अनुज्ञा talent agencies.
Since the decline in viewership in theaters, from the 1950s to 1960s, इस caused a स्मारकीय शिफ़्ट in कैसा studios होता उपज films and thus reducing the cost of exclusive and expensive actors.
Actors and अभिनेत्रियों यहूद working for the studios but were not owned by one major studio entity and so were able to work on within their time and with other studios.
Because of इस, एजेंटों यहूद अभी देखी as a necessity instead of an option.
Agents now became third parties that negotiated between studios और क्लाइंट, इस बनाना उनके सेवाएं imperative between each party.
Since talent agencies are working with lucrative contracts, all talent agencies must be licensed under special sections of the कैलिफ़ोर्निया मजदूर कोड, जिससे काल्स an एजेंट a `` व्यक्ति or निगम जो engages in the occupation of procuring, offering, होनहार, or attempting to procure employment for artist or artists. ''
Mars has two known moons, phobos और deimos, जिससे हैं विचार to be captured क्षुद्रग्रह.
Both satellites were discovered in 1877 by Asaph Hall and are named after the characters phobos ( panic/fear ) और deimos ( terror/dread ) जो, in यूनानी mythology, accompanied उनके पिता एरीस, god of war, into battle.
एरीस थी ज्ञात as मंगल to the Romans.
It is possible that Mars may have moons छोटी than 50 - 100 मीटर और a धूल रिंग between phobos और Deimos may be present but none have been discovered.
In विधि प्रवर्तन parlance, the पद हत्या किताब refers to the case file of a murder investigation.
Typically, murder books include crime scene photographs and sketches, पोस्टमार्टम और forensic रिपोर्ट्स, transcripts of जांचकर्ताओं ' टीप और witness interviews.
The murder book encapsulates the complete paper trail of a murder investigation, from the time the murder is पहला reported through the गिरफ़्तार of a suspect.
Law enforcement agencies typically guard murder books carefully, and it is unusual for civilians to be given आज़ाद अभिगम to ये kinds of रिकॉर्ड, विशेषकर for unsolved cases.

Melon balls are balls of melon made using a melon baller that varies from around 1 centimeter to 3 सेंटीमीटर ( परिचय 3/8 inch to 1 inch ).
They हैं generally प्रयुक्त in फल salad.
A ksa, or ज्ञान, कौशल, और abilities, is a श्रेणी of कथा कथन कि are required when applying to United States Federal government job openings.
KSAs are used to determine, साथ साथ resumes, who the best applicants are when several candidates qualify for a job.
The knowledge, skills and abilities ( KSAs ) जरुरी लिये the कामयाब प्रदर्शन of a स्थिति हैं contained on प्रत्येक जॉब रिक्ति announcement.
In 2009 the Office of Personal Management asked federal agencies to रोकें requiring जॉब आवेदकों to भरण आउट the questionnaires, to be phased out within a year.
KSAs are brief and focused essays परिचय एक 's करियर और शैक्षणिक पृष्ठभूमि कि presumably qualify one to perform the duties of the position being applied for.
A knowledge, skills, and abilities ( KSA ) is a concise निबन्ध परिचय एक 's हुनर और विशेषज्ञता और सम्बन्धित अनुभवों ( कार्य, education, volunteer ) and accomplishments.
A series of KSA statements are usually required when applying लिये सबसे संघीय सरकारी और कुछ राज्य और नगर government jobs.
KSAs are used as a yardstick to assess the capabilities of a prospective आवेदक in शर्तें of संभावित क्षमता to perform the कर्तव्य of the job.
Most government hiring officials dekh लिये a छोटी, कुरकुरे और साफ ksa कि emphasizes परिणाम or accomplishments obtained in previous work.
KSA कथन हैं भी ज्ञात as Evaluation Factors.
Other एजेंसियों sometimes कॉल उन्हें `` दरजा कारकों '', `` विशेषता रैंकिंग कारकों '', `` Knowledge, Abilities, skills and Other Characteristics '', or `` Job Elements ''.
The नाम can be बस a नाम लकिन often it influences content and length of the essay.
Every agency रै इसके अपना regulations लकिन सबसे of the समय the each KSA factor should be 1/2 to 11⁄2 pages long.
The below definitions हैं पारिभाषित by the u.S. दफ्तर of Personnel Management :
Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities ( KSAs ) - The attributes required to perform a job and are generally demonstrated through qualifying सेवा, शिक्षा, or training.
Knowledge - Is a देह of सूचना लागू सीधे to the performance of a function.
Skill - Is an observable competence to perform a सीखे psychomotor act.
Ability - Is competence to perform an observable behavior or a बर्ताव कि परिणाम in an observable product.
The scoring of KSA essays is आधारित on a स्केल of इससे एक to 100.
Job applicants must score ऊपर 70 to be माना for the position.
High scores are निकला through answering the ksa सवाल as specifically as संभावित, providing उदाहरण इससे पिछला नियुक्ति or training that clearly demonstrate you meet the qualifications.
When applying to federal सरकारी स्थितियाँ, a संघीय पुनरारंभ is प्रायः जरूरी in addition to KSA statements.

Love Always is the debut album of American R & b duo k-ci & जोजो, released on जून 17, 1997, by MCA Records.
It was recorded at विभिन्न studios in नई यॉर्क और the लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल in 1996 और 1997.
It was produced by JoJo and several others, सहित devante झूले, जेम्स mtume, और Jeff Redd.
The duo यहूद originally a भाग of Jodeci before this album.
The album peaked at sixth on the US बिलबोर्ड 200 और भी appeared on अंतरराष्ट्रीय charts.
The single `` All My Life `` charted number one in अनेक देशों, और सब चार of the एल्बम 's singles peaked ऊपर the शीर्ष 25 in the us hot R & B/Hip-Hop Songs and the New Zealand Top 40 Singles.
Love Always was received favorably by आलोचकों, जो praised the भाइयो ' गायन ability and the production.
The album has been certified three times platinum by the Recording Industry संघ of अमेरिका ( riaa ) और सुनहरा by म्यूज़िक Canada and IFPI Sweden.
As of June 1999 it had sold 2.9 लाख नक़ल in the संयुक्त राज्य.
A variable-rate mortgage, adjustable-rate बंधक ( भुजा ), or ट्रैकर बंधक is a बंधक ऋण साथ the ब्याज रेट on the नोट periodically adjusted based on an index which reflects the cost to the lender of borrowing on the credit markets.
The loan may be offered at the lender 's मानक परिवर्तनीय चूहाe/ आधार rate.
There may be a direct and legally-defined link to the underlying index, but where the lender offers no विशिष्ट कड़ी to the underlying मार्केट or अनुक्रमणिका the रेट can be changed at the lender 's discretion.
The term `` variable-rate mortgage '' is most common outside the संयुक्त राज्य, whilst in the संयुक्त राज्य, `` adjustable-rate बंधक '' is सबसे common, and implies a mortgage regulated by the Federal government, with caps on charges.
in अनेक देशों, समायोज्य रेट mortgages हैं the norm, और in such places, may simply be referred to as mortgages.
Among the most common indices are the rates on 1-year constant-maturity राजकोष ( cmt ) प्रतिभूति, the लागत of निधि Index ( COFI ), and the London Interbank Offered Rate ( LIBOR ).
A few lenders उपयोग उनके अपना लागत of निधि as an अनुक्रमणिका, rather than using other indices.
इस is किया to ensure a स्थिर हाशिया लिये the lender, whose own cost of funding will usually be related to the index.
Consequently, payments made by the borrower may change over time with the बदलना ब्याज रेट ( alternatively, the पद of the ऋण may बदलें ).
This is distinct from the ग्रैजुएट भुगतान बंधक, जिससे offers बदलना भुगतान amounts but a fixed interest rate.
Other forms of mortgage loan include the interest only बंधक, the फिक्स्ड रेट बंधक, the ऋणात्मक amortization mortgage, and the balloon payment mortgage.
Adjustable rates transfer part of the ब्याज रेट रिस्क इससे the lender to the borrower.
They can be used where unpredictable interest दरों मेक फिक्स्ड रेट लोन मुश्किल to obtain.
The borrower benefits if the interest rate जलप्रपात लकिन loses if the ब्याज रेट increases.
The borrower लाभ इससे घटाया मार्जिन to the underlying cost of borrowing compared to fixed or capped rate mortgages.
The assassination of Robert Francis `` Bobby '' Kennedy, a United States Senator and brother of assassinated अध्यक्ष जॉन fitzgerald `` जोकर '' कैनेडी, took प्लेस shortly after midnight on June 5, 1968, in Los Angeles, California, during the campaign season for the United States Presidential election, 1968.
After winning the कैलिफ़ोर्निया और दक्षिण डकोटा प्राथमिक चुनावों लिये the लोकतांत्रिक nomination for President of the United States, Kennedy was shot as he walked through the kitchen of the Ambassador Hotel and died in the Good Samaritan Hospital twenty-six hours later.
Sirhan Sirhan, a 24-year-old Palestinian / Jordanian अप्रवासी, थी convicted of कैनेडी 's murder and is serving a life sentence for the crime.
Sirhan 's lawyers have released कथन claiming प्रमाण कि he थी framed.
The shooting was recorded on audio tape by a freelance समाचारपत्र रिपोर्टर, और the aftermath थी captured on film.
Kennedy 's body lay in repose at St. Patrick 's गिरजाघर in नई यॉर्क लिये दो दिनों पहले a अंत्येष्टि द्रव्यमान थी आयोजित on June 8.
उसके देह थी interred निकट उसके bhai John at Arlington National Cemetery.
His death prompted the सुरक्षा of अध्यक्षीय उम्मीदवार by the संयुक्त States Secret Service.
ह्यूबर्ट humphrey गई on to जीत the लोकतांत्रिक नामांकन for the presidency, but ultimately narrowly lost the election to Richard Nixon.
As with his brother Jack 's death, Bobby 's assassination and the हालातों surrounding it have शाखित a किस्में of षड्यंत्र theories.
As of 2013 Kennedy remains one of only two sitting United States सीनेटरों to be assassinated ( the अन्य होने Huey Long ).
The Modern Age of Comic Books is an informal name for the काल in the इतिहास of मुख्यधारा अमरीकी कॉमिक किताबे generally माना to last from the mid-1980s until present day.
In this period, comic book characters generally became darker और अधिक psychologically जटिल, creators became better-known और क्रियाशील in बदलना the industry, independent comics flourished, and larger publishing houses became more commercialized.
An alternate name for this period is the Dark Age of कॉमिक किताबे, due to the लोकप्रियता और कलाकारी influence of grim titles, such as and Watchmen.
When Harry Met सैली... is a 1989 अमरीकी रोमांटिक comedy film written by Nora Ephron and directed by Rob Reiner.
It stars Billy Crystal as हैरी और मेग रयान as Sally.
the स्टोरी फ़ॉलो the शीर्षक वर्ण from the time they meet just before sharing a cross-country drive, through twelve years or so of chance encounters in New York City.
the फिल्मी उठाता the सवाल `` can मेन और महिलाओं कभी बस be मित्रों ? '' और अग्रिम अनेक विचार परिचय संबंध कि became household concepts, such as those of the `` '' girlfriend and the `` transitional person ''.
The origins of the film came इससे reiner 's वापसी to सिंगल जीवन बाद a divorce.
An interview Ephron conducted साथ reiner provided the basis for Harry.
Sally was based on ephron और कुछ of उसके मित्रों.
Crystal came on board and made his own योगदान to the पटकथा, बनाना हैरी funnier.
Ephron supplied the structure of the film साथ much of the संवाद आधारित on the real-life दोस्ती between Reiner and Crystal.
The साउंडट्रैक consists of मानकों performed by हैरी Connick, Jr., with a big band and orchestra arranged by Marc Shaiman.
Connick won उसके पहला ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन Jazz Male Vocal Performance.
Columbia Pictures released the film using the `` platform '' technique, which involved opening it in a few select cities, letting धनात्मक शब्द of मुँह generate ब्याज, और तब धीरे expanding वितरण over subsequent weeks.
When हैरी मिले सैली... grossed a कुल of US $ 92.8 million in North America.
Ephron received a British अकादमी फिल्मी पुरस्कार, an ऑस्कर नामांकन, और a लेखक गिल्ड of अमेरिका Award nomination for her screenplay.
The film is ranked 23rd on AFI 's 100 Years... 100 हंसते सूची of the शीर्ष कॉमेडी films in अमरीकी सिनेमा और क्रमांक 60 on Bravo 's `` 100 Funniest Movies ''.
In जल्दी 2004, the फिल्मी थी adapted लिये the stage in a production starring Luke Perry and Alyson Hannigan.

Hamburger हेल्पर is a लकीर of packaged खाना उत्पाद primarily consisting of boxed pasta bundled with a packet or packets of powdered sauce or seasonings.
The contents of each box हैं संयुक्त साथ browned मैदान बीफ, जल और मिल्क to create a complete dish.
The product लकीर भी सुविधाएँ उत्पाद साथ अन्य starches ऐसे as rice or potatoes instead of pasta.
it is बना by सामान्य Mills.
Although the classic boxed Hamburger Helper उत्पाद तभी सप्लाई the मंड मद और the सॉस पैकेट्स, कुछ varieties of the product include ground beef.
These include a frozen food line, which features some of the brand 's classic किस्में in a पूरा भोजन kit रूप, साथ frozen मैदान बीफ और frozen सॉस packaged separately from the noodles in the same bag.
There is also an `` instant '' version of Hamburger Helper containing निर्जलित मांस, नूडल्स और seasonings in a छोटी थैली, requiring तभी water to be added.
The Hamburger Helper mascot is the `` Helping Hand '', an anthropomorphic animated, four fingered left-hand दस्ताने, जिससे appears in the उत्पाद 's टेलीविज़न commercials and on the packages.

It is the only dwarf ग्रह in the क्षुद्रग्रह बेल्ट.

A dwarf planet is a planetary-mass ऑब्जेक्ट कि is neither a ग्रह nor a satellite.
More explicitly, the International Astronomical Union ( IAU ) defines a dwarf planet as a celestial देह in सीधा कक्षा of the सूर्य कि is विशाल पर्याप्त लिये इसके आकार to be नियंत्रित by gravitation, लकिन कि नापसंद a ग्रह has not cleared its orbital region of other objects.
The term dwarf planet was adopted in 2006 as part of a three-way categorization of bodies orbiting the Sun, brought about by an बढ़ाएँ in discoveries of trans-neptunian वस्तुएँ कि rivaled प्लूटो in आकार, और आखिरकार precipitated by the डिस्कवरी of an even more massive object, Eris.
This classification states that bodies large enough to have cleared the neighbourhood of their orbit are defined as planets, while those that हैं नहीं विशाल पर्याप्त to be rounded by उनके अपना गम्भीरता हैं पारिभाषित as छोटी सौर प्रणाली bodies.
Dwarf ग्रह आइये in between.
The exclusion of dwarf planets from the roster of planets by the IAU has been both praised and criticized ; it was said to be the `` right decision '' by Mike Brown, who discovered और अन्य नई बौना ग्रह, लकिन रै महरूम अस्वीकृत by एलन stern, जो था coined the पद बौना ग्रह in 1990.
The IAU currently recognizes five dwarf planets in the सौर प्रणाली :, Pluto,,, and.
However, only दो of ये लाशें, ceres और प्लूटो, have महरूम observed in पर्याप्त detail to demonstrate that they fit the definition.
Eris has been स्वीकृत as a बौना ग्रह क्युकी it is अधिक massive than Pluto.
The IAU subsequently decided कि बेनाम trans-neptunian वस्तुएँ साथ an निरपेक्ष परिमाण उज्जवल than +1 ( और hence a व्यास of ≥838 km assuming a geometric albedo of ≤1 ) are to be named under the assumption that they are dwarf planets.
The only two such वस्तुएँ ज्ञात at the समय, माकेमाके और हउमेया, गई through इस नामकरण कार्यविधि and were declared to be dwarf planets.
It is suspected कि another सौ or so ज्ञात वस्तुएँ in the Solar System are dwarf planets.
Estimates are that up to 200 dwarf planets may be found when the संपूर्ण प्रदेश ज्ञात as the kuiper बेल्ट is छान, और कि the क्रमांक may exceed 10,000 जब वस्तुएँ scattered outside the Kuiper belt are considered.
Individual astronomers recognize several of these, and in August 2011 Mike Brown published a list of 390 candidate objects, ranging इससे `` nearly निश्चित '' to `` संभावित '' dwarf planets. '
भूरा identifies नौ ज्ञात वस्तुएँ – the पाँच स्वीकृत by the iau प्लस,,, और – as `` वस्तुतः निश्चित '', with another two dozen highly likely, and there are probably a hundred or so such objects in total.
The classification of bodies in other planetary systems with the विशेषताएँ of बौना ग्रह रै नहीं महरूम addressed.
A debit कार्ड ( भी ज्ञात as a बैंको कार्ड or जाँच कार्ड ) is a प्लास्टिक भुगतान card that provides the cardholder electronic access to his or her bank account ( s ) at a financial institution.
Some cards have a stored value with which a payment is made, while most relay a message to the cardholder 's bank to withdraw निधि इससे a payee 's designated बैंको खाता.
The card, where accepted, can be प्रयुक्त बजाय of नकदी जब बनाना purchases.
In कुछ मामले, the प्राथमिक खाता क्रमांक is आबंटित exclusively for use on the Internet and there is no physical card.
In many countries, the use of debit cards has become so widespread that their volume has overtaken or entirely replaced cheques और, in कुछ उदाहरण, cash transactions.
The development of debit cards, unlike credit cards and charge cards, has generally been देश विशिष्ट resulting in a क्रमांक of अलग प्रणालियों around the संसार, जिससे यहूद often incompatible.
Since the mid-2000s, a number of initiatives have अनुमत डेबिट ताश जारी in एक देश to be प्रयुक्त in अन्य देशों और अनुमत उनके उपयोग for internet and phone purchases.
Unlike credit and charge cards, payments using a debit card are immediately transferred from the cardholder 's designated बैंको खाता, बजाय of उन्हें paying the धन वापस at a बाद तिथि.
Debit cards usually also allow for instant withdrawal of नकदी, एक्टिंग as the एटीएम कार्ड लिये withdrawing नकदी.
Merchants may also offer cashback facilities to ग्राहक, जहाँ a ग्राहक can withdraw cash along with their purchase.
Francois Henri `` Jack '' LaLanne ( September 26, 1914 - January 23, 2011 ) was an American fitness, exercise, and nutritional expert and प्रेरक स्पीकर जो is sometimes पुकारा `` the गॉडफादर of फ़िटनेस '' और the `` पहला फ़िटनेस सुपरहीरो. ''
He वर्णित खुद as होने a `` sugarholic '' और a `` जंक food junkie '' until he was 15.
He also had behavioral समस्याएं, लकिन `` turned उसके जीवन around '' बाद सुनना to a पब्लिक लेक्चर by Paul Bragg, a well-known nutrition speaker.
During his career, he came to believe that the country 's overall health depended on the स्वास्थ्य of इसके जनसांख्यिकी, लिखने that `` physical culture and nutrition — is the salvation of America. ''
दशकों पहले स्वास्थ्य और फ़िटनेस began होने प्रचारित by हस्तियाँ जैसे जेन फोंडा और रिचर्ड सीमन्स, lalanne थी already widely recognized for publicly preaching the health benefits of regular exercise and a good diet.
He published numerous books on fitness and hosted a fitness टेलीविज़न दिखाएँ between 1953 और 1985.
As early as 1936, at age 21, he opened one of the nation 's first fitness gyms in Oakland, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, जिससे became a प्रोटोटाइप लिये दर्जनों of समान gyms using his name.
One of his 1950s टेलीविज़न कसरत कार्यक्रम थी aimed toward महिलाओं, whom he also encouraged to join his health clubs.
he invented a क्रमांक of कसरत machines, including leg-extension and pulley devices.
Besides producing his own श्रेणी of वीडियो, he coached the बुजुर्ग और निष्क्रिय नहीं to forgo कसरत, believing it would enable them to enhance their strength.
LaLanne also gained मान्यता लिये उसके कामयाबी as a bodybuilder, as well as for his prodigious feats of strength.
Arnold Schwarzenegger once stated, `` That Jack LaLanne 's an animal !, '' after lalanne, at 54, ताल a 21-year-old श्वार्ज़नेगर `` badly '' in an informal contest.
On the occasion of LaLanne 's death, Schwarzenegger credited LaLanne for being `` an apostle for fitness '' by प्रेरणादायी `` अरबों सब over the संसार to सजीव healthier जीवनदान, '' और, as राज्यपाल of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, था पहले लगाई उसे on his Governor 's Council on Physical Fitness.
Steve Reeves credited LaLanne as his प्रेरणा to निर्माण उसके muscular physique जबकि keeping a slim waist.
He was inducted to the कैलिफ़ोर्निया हॉल of कीर्ति और रै a स्टार on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
Air forces of most of the देशों उपयोग प्रणाली समान to Armies.
However, the RAF and the air forces of many Commonwealth देशों, or those formerly अंतर्गत a अंग्रेजों influence, उपयोग a अलग नियत of बाँधने loosely आधारित on नवल समतुल्यता ; लेफ्टिनेंट, कमांडर, कप्तान and Commodore are prefixed for air force use with Flight, Wing, Group and Air, respectively ( the first three being the units that they used to command ).
Penélope Cruz sánchez ( ; born अप्रैल 28, 1974 ) is a Spanish actress.
Signed by an agent at age 15, वो बना उसके एक्टिंग डेब्यू at 16 on टेलीविज़न और उसके विशेषता फिल्मी डेब्यू the following year in Jamón, jamón ( 1992 ), to critical acclaim.
Her subsequent भूमिकाएँ in the 1990s और 2000s शामिल खोलें अपना आँखें ( 1997 ), The Hi-Lo Country ( 1999 ), The Girl of Your Dreams ( 2000 ) and Woman on Top ( 2000 ).
Cruz हासिल मान्यता लिये उसके सीसे भूमिकाएँ in the 2001 films Vanilla Sky and Blow.
She has since built a successful career, appearing in films from a चौड़ी दायरा of जाति, सहित the कॉमेडी waking up in रेनो ( 2002 ), the थ्रिलर gothika ( 2003 ), the क्रिसमस फिल्म नोएल ( 2004 ), और the कार्रवाई एडवेंचर Sahara ( 2005 ).
She has received critical acclaim for her roles in Volver ( 2006 ) and Nine ( 2009 ) receiving सुनहरी ग्लोब और Academy Award nominations for each.
She won the Academy Award लिये बेहतरीन supporting अभिनेत्री in 2008 for Vicky Cristina Barcelona.
She was the पहला स्पेनी अभिनेत्री in इतिहास to प्राप्त an अकादमी Award and the first Spanish actress to receive a star at the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
Cruz has modeled for कंपनियाँ ऐसे as आम, ralph Lauren and L'Oréal.
Penélope and her younger sister Mónica Cruz have designed वस्तुएं लिये Mango.
She has donated दोनो उसके समय और धन to charities.
Cruz has volunteered in युगांडा और इण्डिया, जहाँ वो खर्च एक सप्ताह working लिये माँ टेरेसा ; वो दान her salary from ' to help fund the late nun 's mission.
A wax sculpture of Cruz होगा be लगाई in a प्रीमियर स्पॉट in the grevin मोम संग्रहालय in Paris.
File Explorer, previously ज्ञात as खिड़कियाँ एक्सप्लोरर, is a संचिका मैनेजर अनुप्रयोग और भी a navigation tool that is included with releases of the Microsoft Windows operating system from Windows 95 onwards.
It provides a graphical user इंटरफ़ेस लिये accessing the file systems.
It is also the component of the operating system that presents अनेक उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस वस्तुएं on the मॉनिटर ऐसे as the taskbar और डेस्कटॉप.
Controlling the computer is possible without Windows Explorer running ( for उदाहरण, the संचिका | चलाएं कमांड in कार्य मैनेजर on nt-derived संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ होगा फलन without it, as will commands typed in a command prompt window ).
Located in the c : \खिड़कीs निर्देशिका, it is sometimes referred to as the खिड़कियाँ शेल, explorer.exe, or simply “Explorer”.
the परवाह bears हैं वर्ण निर्मित by अमरीकी Greetings in 1981 for use on greeting cards.
The original artwork for the cards was चित्रित by कलाकार एलेना kucharik.
In 1983, Kenner turned the परवाह bears into plush teddy bears.
The Care Bears appeared in their own TV specials called The Care Bears in the Land बगैर जज्बात ( 1983 ) और the परवाह bears बैटल the फ्रीज Machine ( 1984 ).
They also had their own television series from 1985 to 1988, in addition to three feature films : The Care bears फिल्म ( 1985 ), परवाह bears फिल्म ii : a नई पीढी ( 1986 ), और the परवाह bears एडवेंचर in वंडरलैंड ( 1987 ).
Each Care Bear आता in a अलग रंग और रै a specialized तमगा on इसके पेट that represents its duty and personality.
This insignia थी ज्ञात as उनके `` tummy symbol. ''
However, the movie Care Bears : oopsy करता it ! renamed उन्हें `` पेट बैज ''.
Adding to the परवाह भालू परिवार हैं the `` परवाह भालू cousins '', जिससे विशेषता a शेर, rabbit, penguin, raccoon, and other such animals created in the same style as the teddy bears.
In 2002, the bears were reintroduced साथ नई खिलौने.
Made by Play-Along खिलौने, the नई खिलौने offered सुविधाएँ ऐसे as illuminated bellies upon touch, aerobic bears, and glow-in-the-dark bears.
As part of this comeback, the Bears have appeared in दो computer-animated फिल्मों : परवाह bears : यात्रा to joke-a-lot ( 2004 ) and The Care Bears ' Big Wish Movie ( 2005 ).
In 2007, the मताधिकार मनाये इसके 25th वर्षगांठ ; another relaunch took प्लेस, as well as the release of Care Bears : Oopsy Does It !.
In mid-2011, ag घोषित a पुनरुद्धार tv एनिमेटेड श्रेणी titled `` Care Bears : Welcome to Care-a-Lot ``.
The premiere of the series utilizes `` 30 सालो of देखभाल ''.
It premiered on The Hub on June 2, 2012.
As of 2013, Care Bears merchandise is स्टिल होने marketed.
During 2008 and 2009, Canada 's Cookie Jar समूह और फ़्रांस 's moonscoop समूह attempted to acquire the मताधिकार from AGC, with no apparent success.
Interstate 70 ( I-70 ) is an Interstate Highway in the United राज्य कि रनों इससे अंतरराज्यीय 15 निकट कोव फोर्ट, यूटा, to a पार्क और सवारी निकट बाल्टीमोर, Maryland.
It was the पहला अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग प्रोजेक्ट in the United States.
I-70 approximately traces the पाथ of u.S. रूट 40 ( और भी the बूढ़ा नेशनल सड़क ) ईस्ट of the Rocky Mountains.
West of the rockies, the रूट of i-70 was derived from multiple sources.
i-70 is the पांचवां longest अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग, after I-90, I-80, I-40, and I-10.
The construction of I-70 in Colorado and Utah is considered an engineering marvel as the route passes through the आइज़नहावर टनल, glenwood canyon, and the San Rafael Swell.
The Eisenhower Tunnel is the highest point along the अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग प्रणाली साथ an उन्नयन of.
The sections of the अंतरराज्यीय in मिसौरी और कान्सास have रखी अर्जी to be the पहला अंतरराज्यीय in the United States.
Though disputed, the Federal Highway Administration has claimed the खण्ड of i-70 through glenwood canyon, समाप्त in 1992, थी the पिछला टुकड़ा of the अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग प्रणाली, as originally planned, to open to traffic.
Photo of 1999 कुल eclipse
As seen from the Earth, a solar eclipse occurs when the Moon passes between the सूर्य और धरती, और the चंद्रमा fully or partially ब्लॉक ( `` occults `` ) the Sun.
This can happen तभी at नई चंद्रमा, जब the सूर्य और the चंद्रमा हैं in संयोजन as seen from Earth in an alignment referred to as syzygy.
In a total eclipse, the disk of the सूर्य is fully obscured by the Moon.
In partial and annular eclipses तभी भाग of the Sun is obscured.
If the Moon were in a perfectly circular orbit, a little closer to the Earth, and in the same कक्षीय प्लेन, वहीँ होता be कुल सौर eclipses प्रत्येक सिंगल month.
however, the चंद्रमा 's कक्षा is inclined ( tilted ) at more than 5 degrees to Earth 's orbit around the Sun ( see ecliptic ) so its shadow at new moon usually misses Earth.
Earth 's orbit is पुकारा the ecliptic प्लेन as the चंद्रमा 's कक्षा जरूर क्रॉस इस प्लेन in अनुक्रम लिये an ग्रहण ( दोनो सौर as खूब as lunar ) to occur.
In addition, the Moon 's वास्तविक कक्षा is अंडाकार, प्रायः लेने it दूर पर्याप्त दूर इससे धरती that its apparent size is not large enough to block the Sun totally.
The orbital planes cross each year at a line of nodes resulting in at तनिक दो, और up to पाँच, सौर eclipses occurring प्रत्येक year ; no more than two of which can be total eclipses.
However, total solar eclipses are rare at any particular स्थान क्युकी totality exists तभी साथ a सीमित पाथ on धरती 's सतह traced by the Moon 's shadow or umbra.
An eclipse is a प्राकृतिक घटना.
Nevertheless, in some ancient and modern cultures, solar eclipses have महरूम attributed to अलौकिक कल्याणकारी or regarded as ख़राब omens.
A total solar eclipse can be frightening to लोगों जो हैं बेखबर of इसके खगोलीय स्पष्टीकरण, as the सूर्य seems to disappear during the day and the sky darkens in a matter of minutes.
Because it is खतरनाक to dekh सीधे at the सूर्य, observers चाहिए उपयोग खास नजर सुरक्षा or अप्रत्यक्ष देखने तकनीकों जब देखने a partial eclipse, or the partial phases of a total eclipse.
It is safe to दृश्य the कुल phase of a कुल सौर ग्रहण साथ the unaided eye and without protection, however.
People referred to as eclipse chasers or umbraphiles होगा सफर to रिमोट स्थितियाँ to observe or witness predicted central solar eclipses.
A political party ( from, Genitive partis, `` भाग '', `` portion '' ) is a राजनैतिक संगठन कि typically seeks to influence, or entirely कंट्रोल, सरकारी नीति, प्रायः by nominating candidates with aligned political views and trying to seat them in political office.
Parties participate in चुनावी अभियान और शैक्षणिक outreach or protest actions.
Parties often espouse an ideology or दृष्टि, expressed in a पार्टी कार्यक्रम, bolstered by a लिखा मंच with specific goals, forming a coalition among disparate interests.
The mango is a fleshy stone fruit belonging to the genus Mangifera, consisting of numerous तीव्र fruiting पेड़ in the flowering संयंत्र परिवार Anacardiaceae.
The mango is देशी to दक्षिण एशिया, इससे जहाँ it रै महरूम वितरित worldwide to become one of the most cultivated fruits in the tropics.
While other Mangifera species ( e.g. horse mango, M. foetida ) हैं भी grown on a अधिक स्थानीयकृत आधार, mangifera इंडिका – the 'common आम ' or 'इण्डियाn mango ' – is the only mango tree commonly cultivated in many tropical and subtropical regions.
It is the national fruit of India, पाकिस्तानी और फिलीपीन.
In several cultures, its fruit and leaves are ritually used as पुष्पक सजावट at विवाह, पब्लिक जश्न और धार्मिक ceremonies.
Gill Arnette Byrd, < ref name > एचटीटीपी : //www.pro-football-reference.com/players/b/byrdgi00.htm ( born February 20, 1961 in San Francisco, California ) is a former professional American football player.
He थी a दो समय प्रो कटोरी cornerback in 1991 और 1992 लिये the सैन Diego Chargers after graduating from San Jose State University.
Byrd was inducted into the chargers Hall of Fame in 1998.
He was an All-City running back and defensive back at Lowell High स्कूल ( सैन फ्रांसिस्को ), helping to सीसे the कार्डिनल्स to the नगर चैंपियनशिप in उसके senior season of 1978.
World मैप प्रर्दशित the tropic of Cancer
The Tropic of Cancer, also referred to as the उत्तरी tropic, is the वृत्त of अक्षांश on the धरती कि marks the सबसे northerly स्थिति at जिससे the सूर्य may appear सीधे overhead at its zenith.
This event occurs एकबार प्रति साल, at the समय of the जून संक्रांति, जब the उत्तरी Hemisphere is tilted toward the Sun to its maximum extent.
It currently ( Year 2013 ) lies at 23° 26′ 15.143′′ उत्तर of the equator.
Its Southern Hemisphere counterpart, marking the most southerly स्थिति at जिससे the सूर्य may appear सीधे ओवरहेड, is the tropic of मकर.
These ऊष्णकटिबन्ध हैं दो of the पाँच प्रमुख उपाधि उपायों or प्रमुख वृत्त of अक्षांश कि चिह्नित मानचित्र of the Earth, besides the Arctic and Antarctic Circles and the Equator.
The positions of these वृत्त of अक्षांश ( अन्य than the equator ) हैं लिखवाई by the झुकाव of the Earth 's axis of rotation relative to the plane of its orbit.
DVD-Video is a consumer video स्वरूप प्रयुक्त to स्टोर डिजिटल वीडियो on dvd discs, and is currently the dominant consumer video format in Asia, North America, Europe, and Australia.
Discs using the dvd-video specification आवश्यकता a dvd ड्राइव और an h.262/mpeg-2 भाग 2 decoder ( e.g., a DVD player, or a computer DVD drive with a software DVD player ).
वाणिज्यिक dvd फिल्मों हैं एनकोडेड using a combination of H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 compressed video and audio of varying formats ( often multi-channel formats as described below ).
typically, the आंकड़ा रेट लिये dvd फिल्मों सीमाएँ इससे 3 mbit/s to 9.5 mbit/s, and the bit rate is usually adaptive.
it थी पहला available for retail around 1997.
The DVD-Video specification was created by DVD Forum and can be प्राप्त इससे dvd format/logo Licensing Corporation for a fee of $ 5,000.
The specification is not सरेआम उपलब्धियाँ, क्युकी every subscriber must sign a non-disclosure agreement.
Certain information in the DVD Book is मालिकाना और गोपनीय.
In computing and specifically Internet, a leech is one who benefits, usually deliberately, from others ' information or प्रयत्न लकिन करता नहीं प्रस्ताव anything in वापसी, or makes तभी टोकन offerings in an attempt to avoid being called a leech.
In economics, this type of behavior is called `` फ़्री सवारी '' और is संबद्ध साथ the free rider problem.
Depending on context, leeching does not necessarily refer to illegal उपयोग of कंप्यूटर संसाधन, लकिन प्रायः बजाय to लालची उपयोग according to तहज़ीब : to wit, using too much of what is freely given without contributing a reasonable amount back to the community that provides it.
The name derives from the leech, an animal that sucks रक्त और तब कोशिशें to छोड़ unnoticed.
Other शर्तें हैं प्रयुक्त, ऐसे as `` freeloader '', but leech is the most common.
