The United States Postal Service ( USPS ), also known as the Post Office and U.S. Mail, is an स्वतंत्र एजेंसी of the संयुक्त राज्य संघीय सरकारी जिम्मेदार लिये providing डाक service in the United States.
It is one of the few सरकारी एजेंसियों explicitly authorized by the United States Constitution.
The USPS traces its roots to 1775 दौरान the दूसरी महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस, जहाँ बेंजामिन Franklin was appointed the first postmaster general.
The cabinet-level Post Office विभाग थी निर्मित in 1792 इससे फ्रैंकलिन 's आपरेशन और रूपांतरित into इसके वर्तमान form in 1971 under the Postal Reorganization Act.
The USPS employs over 574,000 मजदूर और operates over 260,000 vehicles.
The USPS is the ऑपरेटर of the largest गाडी fleet in the world.
The USPS is legally obligated to serve सब अमेरिकी, regardless of भूगोल, at uniform price and quality.
The USPS has exclusive access to letter boxes marked `` U.S. Mail '' and personal letterboxes in the संयुक्त राज्य, लकिन स्टिल competes विरूद्ध निजी पैकेज डिलीवरी services, such as UPS and FedEx.
The USPS has not directly प्राप्त taxpayer-dollars चूंकि the जल्दी 1980s साथ the नाबालिग एक्सेप्शन of subsidies for costs associated with the disabled and overseas voters.
Since the 2006 all-time peak mail आवाज़, बाद जिससे कॉंग्रेस passed the डाक जवाबदेही और enhancement अधिनियम ``, ( जिससे mandated $ 5.5 अरब प्रति साल to be सशुल्क into an खाता to pre-fund retiree health-care, 75 years into the future, a requirement unique among organizations and businesses in the U.S. ), revenue dropped sharply due to recession-influenced declining mail volume, prompting the postal service to look to other sources of revenue while cutting costs to reduce its budget deficit.
Washington, D.C. has been the पूंजी of the संयुक्त States since 1800.
Eight other cities have परोसा as the बैठक प्लेस लिये कॉंग्रेस और हैं इसलिए considered to have once been the capital of the United States.
In addition, each of the 50 U.S. राज्य और the पाँच प्रिंसिपल territories of the United States maintains its own capital.
राजकुमारी काटें डायमंड नियत in a ring
The Princess cut is the second सबसे लोकप्रिय काटें आकार लिये ईंट, अगला to a गोलाकार brilliant.
The face-up आकार of the राजकुमारी काटें is वर्गाकार or आयताकार और the profile or side-on shape is similar to that of an inverted pyramid with four beveled sides.
The princess cut is a relatively new डायमंड काटें, having महरूम निर्मित in the 1960s.
It has gained in popularity in recent years as a more distinctive alternative to the more लोकप्रिय गोलाकार शानदार काटें, in जिससे the शीर्ष of डायमंड, पुकारा the क्राउन, is काटें साथ a गोलाकार face-up shape and the bottom, called the pavilion, is shaped similar to a cone.
A princess cut with the same width as the diameter of a round brilliant will तौल अधिक as it रै चार किनारे जिससे होता वरना have महरूम काटें बंद और rounded to रूप a round brilliant.
The princess काटें is sometimes referred to as a square modified brilliant.
However, while displaying the वही ऊँची उपाधि of brilliance, इसके faceting style is unique and completely different from that of a round brilliant.
the राजकुमारी काटें था इसके origins in the जल्दी `` फ्रेंच '' काटें, having a step-modified `` double-french '' or `` क्रॉस '' काटें crown and a series of unique, chevron-shaped facets in the pavilion which combine to give a distinct cross-shaped reflection when the stone is viewed directly through the table.
Effectively, the Princess cut combines the high degree of light return of a गोलाकार शानदार काटें साथ a distinctive वर्गाकार or आयताकार आकार.
The square राजकुमारी काटें डायमंड is प्रायः थोड़ा सस्ता than गोलाकार शानदार काटें ईंट of the वही कैरेट वज़न क्युकी it retains about 80 % of the rough diamond, as opposed to the round brilliant which retains only about 50 % of the rough.
The ability to retain more क्रिस्टल वज़न makes इस आकार लोकप्रिय amongst diamond cutters.
Accredited Gem appraisers ( आगा ) और अमरीकी gem समाज प्रयोगशाला ( agsl ) और यूरोपीय gem laboratories-usa ( egl-usa ) are currently the only labs that grade the Princess cut for cut.
There is no universal definition of what measurements मेक an आदर्श राजकुमारी काटें डायमंड और अनेक डायमंड निर्माताओं मार्केट आदर्श ईंट with differing facet patterns and angles as `` ideal cut ''.
In contrast to the AGSL, AGA, and EGL-USA the Gemological Institute of America ( GIA ) has stated that there is not enough industry consensus or empirical data to specify cut grading standards for राजकुमारी काटें ईंट और to do so is at the रिस्क of उपभोक्ता जो may be धोखे by ईंट accompanied by निर्गुण आदर्श or बेहतरीन काटें ग्रेड.
The name `` Princess Cut '' थी originally प्रयुक्त in कनेक्शन साथ another डायमंड काटें, वरना ज्ञात as the `` Profile '' cut, designed by Arpad Nagy, a London cutter, in 1961.
The same name was later used and made popular by Ygal Perlman, Betzalel ambar, और इसराईल itzkowitz in इसराईल in 1979.
A similar cut with only 49 facets, as opposed to the original 58 facets of the princess cut, was later branded the `` quadrillion '' और initially वितरित by ambar ईंट in Los Angeles.
Three years of optical research yielded a वर्गाकार स्टोन साथ faceting समान to that of a round brilliant cut diamond.
A तुलना
The number of chevrons can affect the overall आउटलुक of a राजकुमारी cut diamond.
This can प्रायः be संकल्पित by the wire diagram that is plotted in diamond grading reports.
By adding more chevrons on the pavilion side of the डायमंड, the व्यक्तिगत facets of the डायमंड होगा अभी be टूटा bas into छोटी facets.
as a परिणाम, it can दे a राजकुमारी cut diamond a `` crushed ice '' look.
Vice versa, when a princess cut diamond has lesser chevrons, it tends to दे the डायमंड a चंकी outlook due to broader facets.
The घरेलू श्वान ( canis lupus familiaris ) is a subspecies of the धूसर wolf ( Canis lupus ), a member of the Canidae family of the mammalian order Carnivora.
The term `` घरेलू श्वान '' is generally प्रयुक्त लिये दोनो domesticated and feral varieties.
The dog has been the first animal to be domesticated and has been the सबसे widely रखा working, शिकार, और पालतु एनिमल in इंसान इतिहास.
The word `` dog '' may also mean the male of a canine प्रजाति, as opposed to the शब्द `` कुतिया '' लिये the female of the species.
MtDNA evidence shows an evolutionary split between the modern dog 's lineage and the modern wolf 's lineage around 100,000 सालो पहले लकिन,, the oldest चट्टान नमूनों genetically linked to the आधुनिक श्वान 's lineage तिथि to लगभग 33,000-36,000 सालो पहले.
Dogs ' value to early human hunter-gatherers led to उन्हें जल्दी बनने सर्वव्यापी आरपार संसार cultures.
Dogs perform many roles for people, such as hunting, herding, pulling loads, सुरक्षा, assisting पुलिस और सैन्य, companionship, और, more recently, aiding handicapped individuals.
This impact on human society has given उन्हें the उपनाम `` man 's बेहतरीन dost '' in the पश्चिमी संसार.
In some cultures, dogs हैं भी a सोर्स of मांस.
In 2001, वहीँ यहूद अनुमानित to be 400 लाख dogs in the world.
Most breeds of dogs are at most a few hundred years old, having been artificially चयनित लिये particular morphologies and behaviors by people for specific functional roles.
Through this selective breeding, the dog has developed into hundreds of varied breeds, and shows more behavioral और morphological विभिन्नता than कोई other land mammal.
For example, height measured to the withers सीमाएँ इससे in the चिहुआहुआ to परिचय in the आयरिश wolfhound ; रंग varies इससे श्वेत through grays ( प्रायः पुकारा `` ब्लू '' ) to ब्लैक, और भूरा इससे लाइट ( तन ) to अंधेरा ( `` red '' or `` chocolate '' ) in a wide variation of patterns ; coats can be short or long, coarse-haired to wool-like, straight, curly, or smooth.
It is common for most breeds to शेड इस coat.
Diagram of a transmission इलेक्ट्रॉन सूक्ष्मदर्शी
A 1973 Siemens electron microscope, musée देस कला et métiers, Paris
An electron सूक्ष्मदर्शी ( em ) is a प्रकार of सूक्ष्मदर्शी कि उपयोग an इलेक्ट्रॉन बीम to illuminate a specimen and produce a magnified image.
An EM has greater resolving शक्ति than a लाइट सूक्ष्मदर्शी और can खुलासा the ढांचा of छोटी वस्तुएँ क्युकी electrons have wavelengths about 100,000 times shorter than visible light photons.
They can achieve better than 50 pm रेज़ोल्यूशन और magnifications of up to परिचय 10,000,000x whereas ordinary, non-confocal लाइट microscopes हैं सीमित by विवर्तन to about 200 nm resolution and useful magnifications below 2000x.
The electron microscope uses electrostatic और इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक lenses to कंट्रोल the इलेक्ट्रॉन beam and focus it to form an image.
These electron optical lenses हैं analogous to the कांच lenses of a light optical microscope.
Electron microscopes are used to investigate the ultrastructure of a wide range of biological और अकार्बनिक नमूनों सहित microorganisms, कोशिकाएं, विशाल अणुओं, biopsy नमूने, धातुओं, और crystals.
industrially, the इलेक्ट्रॉन सूक्ष्मदर्शी is प्रायः प्रयुक्त for quality control and failure analysis.
Modern electron microscopes उपज इलेक्ट्रॉन micrographs, using specialized डिजिटल कैमरे or frame grabbers to capture the image.
Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen is a chain of fried मुर्गा तेज़ खाना रेस्तरां संस्थापित in 1972 in New Orleans, Louisiana.
Often referred to as Popeyes and sometimes as Popeyes Chicken & बिस्कुट or popeyes मुर्गा & seafood, it थी acquired by sandy स्रोतों, जॉर्जिया -आधारd afc उद्यमों, originally America 's Favorite Chicken Company, in 1993.
According to a company press release dated June 29, 2007, Popeyes is the second-largest `` quick-service chicken restaurant group, measured by number of units '', with more than 1,800 रेस्तरां in अधिक than 40 राज्य और the ज़िला of कोलंबिया, और over 22 देशों विश्वव्यापी सहित तुर्कों, उत्तरी साइप्रस, बहरीन, चीन, हांग काँग, इराकी, इंडोनेशिया, जॉर्डन, Kuwait, United Arab Emirates, Japan, Malaysia, Saudi Arabia, South Korea, Singapore, Canada, Jamaica, Guyana, Suriname, Mexico, Trinidad, Puerto Rico, Honduras, Vietnam, Panama, Peru, and Costa Rica.
About thirty स्थितियाँ हैं company-owned, the बाकी franchised.
The leg press is a weight training exercise in which the individual pushes a वज़न or प्रतिरोध दूर इससे उन्हें using उनके टाँगे.
the पद लेग दबायें भी refers to the apparatus used to perform this exercise.
The leg press can be used to evaluate an खिलाड़ी 's overall निम्नतर देह शक्ति ( from knee joint to hip ).
Using the तिर्यक sled-type लेग दबायें यंत्र.
There are two प्रमुख प्रकार of लेग press:
The diagonal or लंबवत 'sled ' प्रकार लेग दबायें.
Weight disks ( plates ) हैं संलग्न सीधे to the sled, जिससे is mounted on rails.
The user sits below the sled और pushes it upward साथ their feet.
These machines normally include समायोज्य सुरक्षा कोष्ठक कि prevent the user from being trapped under the weight.
The 'cable ' type leg press, or 'seated leg press ', commonly मिला on multigyms.
The उपयोक्ता sits कतरा और pushes आगे साथ उनके फीट onto a plate that is attached to the weight stack by means of a long steel cable.
Wendy विलियम्स शिकारी ( born वेन्डी जोन विलियम्स ; जुलाई 18, 1964 ) is an American media personality, actress and author.
वो होस्ट a syndicated टेलीविज़न talk show, The Wendy Williams Show.
Prior to television, Williams was a `` shock jockette `` on अनेक रेडियो shows.
Williams has gained सुर्खी लिये उसके on-air spats with celebrities.
She was the विषय of the 2006 vh1 वास्तविकता tv श्रेणी पुकारा the वेन्डी Williams Experience which broadcast events surrounding her radio show.
She has written an आत्मकथा और अनेक अन्य किताबे, and has created a product line called Adorn by Wendy Williams.
Patrick Henry `` Treason '' speech before the House of burgesses in an 1851 पेंटिंग by पीटर F. rothermel
`` Give me liberty, or दे me मौत ! '' is a quotation attributed to पैट्रिक Henry from a speech he made to the Virginia Convention.
On that day, at St. John 's Church in रिचमंड, वर्जिनिया, और is credited साथ having swung the संतुलन in convincing the वर्जिनिया हाउस of burgesses to pass a resolution delivering the Virginia troops to the Revolutionary War.
Among the delegates to the सम्मेलन यहूद भविष्य us Presidents Thomas Jefferson and George Washington.
Newfoundland and labrador (, locally ) is the easternmost province of Canada.
Situated in the country 's Atlantic प्रदेश, it incorporates the द्वीप of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और मेनलैंड Labrador to the northwest, with a combined area of.
In 2011, the प्रांत 's जनसांख्यिकी थी 514,536.
Approximately 92 percent of the province 's population lives on the Island of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड ( सहित इसके संबद्ध छोटी आइलैंड्स ), of जिससे अधिक than half live on the Avalon Peninsula.
The प्रांत is कनाडा 's सबसे linguistically homogenous, साथ 97.6 % of निवासियों रिपोर्टिंग अंग्रेज़ी ( न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड English ) as their mother tongue in the 2006 census ;.
Historically, Newfoundland was also home to unique किस्में of फ्रेंच, और आयरिश, as खूब as the now-extinct beothuk language.
In Labrador, local dialects of innu-aimun और inuktitut हैं also spoken.
न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और labrador 's पूंजी और largest नगर, st. John 's, is Canada 's 20th-largest Census Metropolitan Area, and is home to almost 40 percent of the province 's population.
St. John 's is the seat of government, home to the House of Assembly of Newfoundland and labrador और the उच्चतम अदालत in the क्षेत्राधिकार, the न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और labrador Court of Appeal.
A former colony and dominion of the United Kingdom, Newfoundland and Labrador became the दसवाँ प्रांत to डालें the कनाडाई कनफेडरेशन on कूच 31, 1949, as Newfoundland.
on दिसम्बर 6, 2001, an amendment थी बना to the संविधान of कनाडा to change the province 's official name to Newfoundland and Labrador.
In day-to-day conversation, however, canadians generally स्टिल refer to the प्रांत itself as न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और to the region on the Canadian mainland as Labrador.
थियोडोर `` t.r. ''
Roosevelt, Jr. ( ; October 27, 1858—January 6, 1919 ) थी the 26th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1901–1909 ).
He is noted for his exuberant personality, range of interests and उपलब्धियाँ, और उसके नेतृत्व of the प्रगतिशील गति, as खूब as उसके `` काउंटी `` persona and robust masculinity.
He was a leader of the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी और संस्थापक of the पहला अवतार of the short-lived प्रगतिशील ( `` Bull Moose '' ) Party of 1912.
Before becoming President, he held offices at the नगर, राज्य, और संघीय स्तर.
रूज़वेल्ट 's उपलब्धियाँ as a naturalist, एक्सप्लोरर, शिकारी, author, and soldier are as much a part of his fame as any office he held as a politician.
Roosevelt was 42 years old when sworn in as President of the संयुक्त राज्य in 1901, बनाना उसे the youngest अध्यक्ष कभी ; he ताल आउट the youngest निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष, John F. Kennedy, by only one year.
रूज़वेल्ट थी भी the पहला of तभी तीन sitting presidents to have won the Nobel Peace Prize.
The Teddy bear is नामित बाद उसे, despite उसके अवमानना लिये होने पुकारा `` Teddy ''.
Born into a wealthy family in New York City, Roosevelt was a sickly चाइल्ड जो suffered इससे दमा और ठहरे at home studying natural history.
To overcome उसके शारीरिक कमज़ोरी, he embraced a strenuous life.
Home-schooled, he became an eager छात्र of प्रकृति.
He attended हार्वर्ड विश्वविद्यालयों, जहाँ he पढ़ाई जीवविज्ञान, boxed and developed an interest in naval affairs.
In 1881, one year out of Harvard, he was elected to the New York State सभा, जहाँ he became a नेता of the सुधार गुट of उसके रिपब्लिकन पार्टी ( the `` GOP '' ).
His The Naval War of 1812 ( 1882 ) स्थापित उसके पेशेवर प्रतिष्ठा as a गंभीर historian ; he wrote numerous books on hunting, the outdoors, and current political issues, as well as frontier history.
In 1884, his first wife and उसके माँ died on the same day.
He temporarily बाएँ राजनीती और गई to the frontier, बनने a rancher in the `` Badlands '' in the Dakotas.
Returning to New York City, he ran for mayor in 1886, finishing third with 60,000 votes.
He later gained fame by लेने vigorous चार्ज of the नगर पुलिस.
at the नेशनल स्तर, he थी a leader in civil service reform.
The Spanish–American War broke out in 1898 while रूज़वेल्ट थी, effectively, कार्यशील the विभाग of the Navy.
He promptly resigned और formed the अशिष्ट राइडर्स – a स्वयंसेवी प्यादे regiment that fought in Cuba.
The war नायिका थी निर्वाचित राज्यपाल in 1898 और in 1900 was nominated for vice president.
He successfully energized the GOP base as a highly visible campaigner to reelect अध्यक्ष विलियम mckinley on a मंच of ऊँची tariffs, the सुनहरा मानक, imperialism, prosperity at home and victory abroad.
In 1901, President William mckinley थी assassinated और रूज़वेल्ट became President.
He attempted to move the Republican Party ( GOP ) toward प्रगतिवाद, सहित विश्वास busting और increased regulation of businesses.
Roosevelt became the first person elected to a term in his own right in 1904 after having ascended to the Presidency ( from the Vice-Presidency ) upon the मौत of उसके पूर्ववर्ती, जीतना the largest प्रतिशत of the लोकप्रिय vote चूंकि the uncontested election of 1820.
Roosevelt coined the phrase `` Square Deal `` to describe उसके घरेलू कार्यसूची, emphasizing कि the औसत नागरिक would get a fair share under his policies.
As an outdoorsman and naturalist, he प्रचारित the संरक्षण गति.
On the world stage, Roosevelt 's policies were characterized by उसके स्लोगन, `` बोलो softly और carry a big stick ``.
A cousin is a relative with whom a person shares one or more common पूर्वज ( s ) ( अन्य than a जनक, child/descendant, सहोदर, child/descendant of a सहोदर, or sibling of a parent/ancestor ).
however in आम parlance, `` cousin '' normally specifically means `` first cousin ''.
Systems of `` degrees '' and `` removals '' हैं प्रयुक्त in the english-speaking संसार to describe the सटीक संबंध between दो cousins ( in the व्यापक भाव ) and the ancestor they have in common.
Various governmental entities have established systems for legal use that can more precisely specify kinships with common ancestors existing any number of पीढियां in the पास्ट, हालांकि आम उपयोग प्रायः eliminates the degrees and removals and refers to people with common ancestry as simply `` distant cousins '' or `` relatives ''.
Webster is an अमरीकी हालात कॉमेडी कि aired on एबीसी इससे सितंबर 16, 1983 जबतक may 8, 1987, and in first-run syndication from September 21, 1987 until March 10, 1989.
The series was निर्मित by stu चांदी.
The show stars Emmanuel Lewis in the title role as a young boy who, after losing his parents, is अपनाया by उसके एनएफएल -pro गॉडफादर, portrayed by एलेक्स karras, और उसके नई socialite बीवी, निभाई by Susan Clark.
The focus was largely on how this impulsively शादीशुदा युगल था to समायोजन to उनके नई जीवनदान और अचानक parenthood, but it was the congenial Webster himself who drove much of the plot.
The series was produced by Georgian Bay Ltd., emmanuel लुईस entertainment उद्यमों, inc. ( 1986-1989 ) and Paramount Television.
Like NBC 's earlier hit Diff'rent स्ट्रोक्स, वेबस्टर प्रदर्शित a यंग african-american लड़के अपनाया by a श्वेत परिवार.
Three प्रकार of कोशिका division
Cell division is the process by जिससे a जनक कोशिका divides into दो or more daughter cells.
Cell division usually occurs as भाग of a larger कोशिका साईकिल.
In eukaryotes, there are two distinct type of cell division : a vegetative division, whereby each daughter cell is genetically एकसमान to the जनक कोशिका ( समसूत्रण ), और a reductive कोशिका प्रभाग, whereby the क्रमांक of गुणसूत्रों in the बेटी cells is reduced by half, to produce haploid gametes ( meiosis ).
Both of these cell division cycles are required in sexually reproducing जीवों at कुछ पाइंट in उनके जीवन साईकिल, और दोनो हैं believed to be उपस्थित in the पिछला eukaryotic आम पूर्वज prokaryotes भी undergo a vegetative cell division known as binary fission, where their genetic material is segregated equally into two daughter cells.
All cell divisions, regardless of सजीव, हैं preceded by a सिंगल round of DNA replication.
For simple unicellular organisms such as the amoeba, एक कोशिका प्रभाग is समतुल्य to जनन – an संपूर्ण new organism is created.
On a larger scale, mitotic कोशिका प्रभाग can बनाएँ progeny इससे बहुकोशिकीय organisms, such as plants that grow from cuttings.
Cell प्रभाग भी enables sexually reproducing जीवों to develop इससे the one-celled zygote, which itself was produced by cell division from gametes.
And after growth, कोशिका प्रभाग allows लिये continual निर्माण and repair of the organism.
A human being 's body अनुभवों परिचय 10,000 खरब कोशिका विभाजन in a lifetime.
Cell प्रभाग रै महरूम modeled by परिमित subdivision rules.
The primary concern of कोशिका प्रभाग is the मेंटेनेंस of the असली cell 's genome.
Before division can occur, the genomic information that is stored in गुणसूत्रों जरूर be replicated, और the duplicated genome must be separated cleanly between cells.
A great deal of cellular infrastructure is involved in keeping genomic सूचना सतत between `` generations ''.

हावर्ड जोन्स ( born जॉन हावर्ड जोन्स, 23 February 1955, Southampton, Hampshire, England ) is a British musician, singer and songwriter.
According to the Guinness Book of British Hit Singles & Albums, `` Jones is an accomplished singer-songwriter who was a नियमित चार्ट आगंतुक in the mid-1980s साथ उसके brand of synthpop.
Jones, who थी बराबर लोकप्रिय in the u.S., appeared at Live Aid ``.
Allmusic journalist, स्टीफन थामस erlewine adds, `` जोन्स थी one of the defining figures of mid-1980s synthpop.
His music merged the technology intensive sound of नई वेव साथ the cheery आशावाद of hippies और लेट 1960s pop.
Jones racked up a स्ट्रिंग of हिट्स in the मिड और लेट 1980s, before he retreated into being a cult figure in the 1990s ''.
The International Isle of Man tt ( पर्यटक ट्रॉफी ) रेस is a मोटरसाइकिल रेसिंग इवेंट held on the Isle of Man and was for many years the most prestigious motorcycle race in the world.
The event was part of the FIM Motorcycle Grand Prix World Championship during the period 1949–1976 पहले होने transferred to the संयुक्त किंगडम बाद सुरक्षा चिंताएं और चलाएं by the fim as the अंग्रेजों ग्रैंड Prix for the 1977 season.
The Isle of Man TT Races became part of the TT Formula 1 चैंपियनशिप इससे 1977 to 1990 to बचाना the इवेंट 's रेसिंग औकात.
From 1989 the racing has been विकसित by the आइल of man विभाग of पर्यटन as the Isle of Man TT Festival.
The race is run in a time-trial स्वरूप on पब्लिक सड़कें बंद लिये रेसिंग by the प्रावधानों of an Act of Tynwald ( the parliament of the Isle of Man ).
The first race was held on Tuesday 28 May 1907 और थी पुकारा the अंतरराष्ट्रीय Auto-Cycle Tourist Trophy.
The event was संगठित by the auto-cycle क्लबों over 10 गोद of the st जॉन 's छोटी कोर्स of 15 मील 1,470 गज for road-legal touring motorcycles with exhaust silencers, saddles, pedals and mud-guards.
The winner of the single-cylinder class, and overall winner of the first event in 1907, was Charlie collier सवारी a matchless मोटरसाइकिल in a समय of 4 घंटों, 8 मिनट्स और 8 सेकेंड at an औसत race speed of 38.21 mph.
The winner of the twin-cylinder class was Rem fowler सवारी a peugeot एंजिन नॉर्टन in a समय of 4 घंटों 21 मिनट्स और 52 सेकेंड at an average race speed of 36.21 mph.
The trophy प्रस्तुत to चार्ली collier as the विजेता of the 1907 आइल of man TT Race, was donated by the Marquis de Mouzilly St. Mars.
It featured a stylised version of Olympic God Hermes by Giovanni Da Bologna as a चांदी figurine astride a winged व्हील.
The trophy was similar in design to the 18 carat gold Montague Trophy presented to John Napier ( Arrol-Johnston ) as the inaugural winner of the आइल of man पर्यटक ट्रॉफी car रेस in 1905 अभी ज्ञात as the RAC Tourist Trophy.
the बिल्ले de mouzilly st. मंगल Trophy is now presented annually to the winner of the Isle of Man Senior TT Motor-Cycle Race.
The 2007 Isle of Man TT was the Centenary event which ran between 26 May and 8 June 2007 and featured a special Re-enactment of the 1907 आइल of man tt रेस आयोजित on the गाँव ग्रीन अगला to Tynwald Hill in St John 's on Monday 28 May 2007.
The vintage parade of 100 classic motorcycles for the centenary re-enactment on the असली st जॉन 's छोटी कोर्स थी flagged दूर by former World Motor-Cycle Champion Geoff Duke.
The first of the participants to be flagged away was the recently restored twin-cylinder peugeot-norton ridden by rem fowler दौरान the पहला आइल of man tt रेस in 1907.
Also participating in the 2007 Re-enactment was TT रेस प्रतिस्पर्धी guy मार्टिन सवारी a 1938 triumph बाघ 100 500 cc और अन्य पूर्व TT competitors including Alan Cathcart, Sammy Miller, Nick Jefferies and Mick Grant also completed the Re-enactment lap.

Unemployment ( or joblessness ) occurs जब लोगों हैं बगैर कार्य and actively seeking work.
The unemployment rate is a measure of the prevalence of unemployment और it is गणना as a प्रतिशत by dividing the क्रमांक of unemployed individuals by all individuals currently in the labor force.
दौरान अवधि of मंदी, an अर्थव्यवस्था usually experiences a relatively high unemployment rate.
According to International Labour Organization report, more than 197 million people globally are आउट of कार्य or 6 % of the संसार 's workforce यहूद बगैर a जॉब in 2012.
There remains considerable सैद्धांतिक बहस regarding the कल्याणकारी, consequences and solutions for unemployment.
Classical economics, New classical अर्थशास्त्र, और the आस्ट्रिया स्कूल of अर्थशास्त्र argue कि मार्केट mechanisms हैं reliable means of resolving unemployment.
These theories argue विरूद्ध interventions imposed on the मजदूर मार्केट इससे the बाहर, ऐसे as unionization, minimum wage laws, taxes, and other regulations that they claim discourage the hiring of workers.
Keynesian अर्थशास्त्र emphasizes the cyclical प्रकृति of बेरोजगारी और अनुशंसा सरकारी interventions in the economy that it claims will reduce unemployment during recessions.
This theory focuses on तूल झटके कि एकाएक reduce aggregate demand for goods and services and thus reduce demand for workers.
keynesian मॉडल सुझाएँ सरकारी interventions designed to बढ़ाएँ demand for workers ; these can include financial stimuli, publicly funded job creation, and expansionist monetary policies.
in जोड to ये व्यापक theories of बेरोजगारी, वहीँ हैं a few categorizations of unemployment that are used to more precisely model the effects of unemployment within the economic system.
The main types of unemployment include structural unemployment which focuses on structural problems in the economy और inefficiencies अंतर्निहित in श्रमिक बाज़ार, सहित a बेमेल between the सप्लाई और माँग of laborers साथ जरुरी कौशल सेट.
Structural arguments emphasize कल्याणकारी और समाधान सम्बन्धित to विघटनकारी technologies and globalization.
Discussions of frictional unemployment focus on voluntary निर्णय to कार्य आधारित on प्रत्येक individuals ' valuation of उनके अपना कार्य और how that compares to current wage rates plus the time and effort required to find a job.
Causes and solutions for frictional unemployment प्रायः पता जॉब प्रविष्टि दहलीज और wage rates.
behavioral अर्थशास्त्रियों हाइलाइट व्यक्तिगत biases in निर्णय बनाना, और प्रायः involve समस्याएं और solutions concerning sticky wages and efficiency wages.
Collectivism is any philosophic, political, religious, economic, or social outlook that emphasizes the interdependence of प्रत्येक इंसान होने in a समाज or सभ्यता.
Collectivism is a basic cultural element that exists as the reverse of व्यक्तिगत in इंसान प्रकृति ( in the वही रास्ता ऊँची कॉन्टेक्स्ट संस्कृति exists as the reverse of low context culture ).
collectivist orientations तनाव the महत्व of मिलाप भीतर सोशल समूह ( ऐसे as an `` in-group '', in what specific context it is defined ) and in some cases, the priority of group goals over individual goals.
collectivists प्रायः फ़ोकस on जातियाँ, society, nation or country.
It has been used as an element in many different and diverse types of government and political, economic and educational philosophies throughout history and most human समाजों in अभ्यास contain तत्व of दोनो व्यक्तिगत और collectivism.
Some examples of collectivist संस्कृतियों शामिल India and Japan.
Collectivism can be विभाजित into आड़ा collectivism and vertical collectivism.
Horizontal collectivism तनावों सामूहिक decision-making among equal individuals, and is thus usually based on decentralization and egalitarianism.
Vertical collectivism is based on hierarchical structures of power और on moral और सांस्कृतिक conformity, और is इसलिए आधारित on centralization and hierarchy.
A सहकारी एंटरप्राइज़ होता be an उदाहरण of आड़ा collectivism, whereas a military hierarchy would be an example of vertical collectivism.
Acute disseminated encephalomyelitis ( adem ) is an immune mediated disease of the brain.
It usually occurs following a वाइरल संक्रमण लकिन may appear following टीकाकरण, बैक्टीरियल or parasitic infection, or even appear spontaneously.
As it involves autoimmune demyelination, it is similar to अनेक काठिन्य, और is माना भाग of the अनेक काठिन्य borderline diseases.
The incidence rate is about 8 प्रति 1,000,000 लोगों per year.
हालांकि it occurs in सब आयु, सबसे reported मामले हैं in children and adolescents, with the average age around 5 to 8 years old.
The mortality rate may be as high as 5 %, full recovery is seen in 50 to 75 % of cases, while up to 70 to 90 % रिकवर साथ कुछ नाबालिग अवशेष disability.
The औसत समय to रिकवर is one to six months.
ADEM produces multiple inflammatory lesions in the brain and spinal cord, विशेषकर in the white matter.
Usually these are found in the subcortical and central white matter and cortical gray-white junction of both cerebral hemispheres, cerebellum, brainstem, and spinal cord, लकिन periventricular श्वेत पदार्थ और धूसर पदार्थ of the cortex, thalami और basal ganglia may भी be involved.
When the रोगी पीड़ित अधिक than एक demyelinating एपीसोड, it is पुकारा तूल disseminated encephalomyelitis or multiphasic disseminated encephalomyelitis ( MDEM ).
The stomach is a muscular, hollow, dilated part of the digestion system which कृत्यों as an महत्वपूर्ण अंग of the digestive ट्रैक्ट in कुछ animals, including vertebrates, echinoderms, insects ( mid-gut ), and molluscs.
It is शामिल in the दूसरी phase of digestion, following mastication ( chewing ).
The stomach is स्तिथ between the esophagus and the small intestine.
It secretes protein-digesting enzymes called protease and strong acids to aid in food digestion, ( भेजा to it via esophageal peristalsis ) through चिकना muscular contortions ( पुकारा segmentation ) before sending partially digested food ( chyme ) to the small intestines.
The word stomach is निकला इससे the लैटिन stomachus जिससे is निकला इससे the यूनानी word stomachos ( στόμαχος ), ultimately from stoma ( ), `` mouth ''.
The words gastro- और gastric ( अर्थ सम्बन्धित to the पेट ) हैं both derived from the Greek word gaster ( ).

A woodie is a car body style, विशेषकर a स्टेशन वैगन, जहाँ the पश्च bodywork is constructed of wood framework with infill panels of wood or painted metal.
After the demise of actual wood construction, निर्माताओं प्रयुक्त अनुकरण woodgrain चादर vinyl—sometimes augmented साथ three-dimensional, अनुकरण framework—to recall wood construction.
In 2008, wood construction was जगाई abstractly on the घाट फ्लेक्स साथ a श्रेणी of side and rear horizontal grooves.
A pearl is a hard object produced within the soft tissue ( specifically the mantle ) of a जीना shelled mollusc.
Just like the shell of a clam, a pearl is made up of कैल्सियम कार्बोनेट in मिनट crystalline रूप, which has been deposited in concentric layers.
The ideal pearl is perfectly round and चिकना, लकिन अनेक अन्य आकार of मोती ( बरॉक pearls ) occur.
The finest quality natural pearls have been highly valued as रत्नों और वस्तुएँ of सौंदर्य लिये अनेक सदियां, और क्युकी of इस, the शब्द पर्ल has become a metaphor for something very rare, fine, admirable, and valuable.
The most valuable pearls occur अनायास in the जंगली, लकिन वे हैं अत्यधिक rare.
These wild pearls are referred to as प्राकृतिक मोती.
Cultured or farmed pearls from pearl oysters and freshwater mussels मेक up the बहुमत of those कि हैं फिलहाल sold.
Imitation pearls are also widely sold in inexpensive jewelry, लकिन the विशेषता of उनके iridescence is प्रायः बहुत ग़रीब, और प्रायः, कृत्रिम मोती हैं easily distinguished from genuine pearls.
मोती have महरूम harvested और cultivated primarily लिये उपयोग in आभूषण, लकिन in the past they were also stitched onto lavish clothing.
Pearls have also been crushed and used in कॉस्मेटिक्स, दवाइयाँ, और in पेंट formulations.
Whether wild or संस्कारी, gem विशेषता मोती हैं लगभग always nacreous and, as is the interior of the shell that produces them.
However, almost all species of shelled molluscs हैं सक्षम of producing मोती ( formally referred to as `` calcareous concretions '' by some sources ) of lesser shine or less spherical shape.
Although these may also be legitimately referred to as `` pearls '' by gemological labs and also अंतर्गत u.S. संघीय व्यापार आयोग नियम, और हैं formed in the वही रास्ता, सबसे of उन्हें have no मान, मगर as curiosities.
Bing ( known previously as सजीव ढूंढें, खिड़कियाँ सजीव ढूंढें, और एमएसएन ढूंढें ) is a वेब search engine ( advertised as a `` decision engine `` ) from Microsoft.
Bing was unveiled by Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer on May 28, 2009 at the सब बाते डिजिटल सम्मेलन in सैन डिएगो लिये रिलीज on जून 1.
notable परिवर्तन शामिल the लिस्टिंग of ढूंढें suggestions while queries are entered and a list of related searches ( called `` Explore pane '' ) based on semantic technology from Powerset which Microsoft purchased in 2008.
On July 29, 2009, Microsoft और याहू ! घोषित a सौदे in जिससे bing होता शक्ति Yahoo ! Search.
All Yahoo ! Search global customers and partners are अपेक्षित to have बना the परिवर्तन by early 2012.
In October 2011, Bing announced it was working on new back-end ढूंढें अवसंरचना, साथ the लक्ष्य of delivering तेज़ और थोड़ा अधिक प्रासंगिक search results for users.
Known as `` Tiger '', the new index-serving technology has been incorporated into bing globally, चूंकि अगस्त 2011.
In May 2012, Bing announced another redesign of its ढूंढें इंजन कि शामिल `` साइडबार '', a सोशल विशेषता that searches users ' social networks for information relevant to the search query.

In American फ़ुटबॉल, प्रत्येक टोली रै ग्यारह खिलाड़ी on the field at one time.
The specific role that a player takes on the फ़ील्ड is पुकारा उनके स्थिति.
Under the modern rules of अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल, टीमों हैं अनुमत असीमित subsititutions, कि is teams may change any number of players after any play.
This has resulted in the development of three `` platoons '' of players, the offense ( the टोली साथ the बॉल, जो is trying to स्कोर ), the रक्षा ( the टोली trying to prevent the अन्य टोली इससे स्कोरिंग, और to लो the बॉल इससे उन्हें ), और the खास टीमों ( who play in kicking situations ).
Within those platoons, विभिन्न विशिष्ट स्थितियाँ मौजूद depending on what the player 's main job is.
The Irish people ( or na hÉireannaigh ; Ulster-Scots : airish fowk ) हैं an जातीय समूह जो originate in Ireland, an island in northwestern Europe.
Ireland has been populated for around 9,000 years ( according to पुरातत्व अध्ययन, देखिए प्रागैतिहासिक आयरलैंड ).
The Irish people 's earliest ancestors are recorded in महापुरूष – वे हैं claimed to be descended इससे समूह ऐसे as the nemedians, Fomorians, Fir Bolg, Tuatha Dé Danann and the Milesians.
Lebor Gabála Érenn, a book of Irish mythology tells कि milesians यहूद स्काइथियन वंशजों.
The main groups that interacted with the Irish in the मध्य आयु शामिल the picts, स्कॉट्स, and the Vikings.
Due to this contact, icelanders हैं विख्यात लिये having some Irish descent.
The Anglo-Norman invasion of the High Middle Ages, the English plantations and the subsequent अंग्रेज़ी नियम of the देश introduced the normans और फ्लेमिश into Ireland.
वेल्श, picts, bretons, और छोटी पार्टियों of Gauls and even Anglo-Saxons are known in Ireland from much earlier times.
There have been many notable आयरिश लोगों throughout इतिहास.
The 6th century Irish monk and missionary Columbanus is regarded as one of the `` fathers of यूरोपीय '', followed by kilian of würzburg and Vergilius of Salzburg.
The scientist रॉबर्ट बॉयल is माना the `` father of chemistry ``.
Famous Irish explorers शामिल Brendan the Navigator, Robert McClure, Ernest Shackleton and Tom Crean.
By some accounts, the first European child born in North America had Irish descent on both sides ; and an irishman थी the पहला यूरोपीय to नियत पैर on American soil in Columbus ' expedition of 1492.
There are descendants of Irish people जीना in अनेक पश्चिमी देशों, विशेषकर in english-speaking countries.
Historically, emigration has been caused by राजनीती, अकाल और आर्थिक issues.
An estimated 50 to 80 million people are descendants of Irish people, primarily in the United Kingdom, the United States, Australia, Canada and Iceland ; वहीँ हैं भी छोटी संख्याएँ in अर्जेंटीना, चिली, मैक्सिको, जमैका, बारबाडोस, दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी, New Zealand, France, Germany and Brazil.
The largest number of descendants of Irish लोगों सजीव in the संयुक्त राज्य.
The number of people living in ऑस्ट्रेलिया जो हैं of आयरिश descent is उच्चतर, as a प्रतिशत of कुल जनसांख्यिकी, than that of any other country.
Approximately forty percent of the उपनिवेश जनसांख्यिकी of आइसलैंड आए इससे आयरलैंड or स्कॉटलैंड.
The very first निवासियों of आइसलैंड were Irish.
The Hubble Space Telescope ( HST ) is a space telescope that थी carried into कक्षा by a स्पेस शटल in 1990 and remains in operation.
A aperture telescope in कम धरती कक्षा, हबल 's चार प्रमुख यंत्र observe in the near ultraviolet, visible, and near infrared.
The telescope is named बाद the astronomer एडविन Hubble.
Hubble 's orbit outside the distortion of धरती 's माहौल allows it to लो अत्यधिक sharp images with almost no background light.
Hubble 's गहन फ़ील्ड have महरूम कुछ of the सबसे विस्तृत visible-light images ever, allowing a deep view into space and time.
Many Hubble observations have led to सफलताएँ in astrophysics, ऐसे as accurately determining the rate of expansion of the universe.
Although not the first space telescope, Hubble is one of the largest and most बहुमुखी, और is खूब ज्ञात as दोनो a vital शोध औजार और a पब्लिक संबंध बून लिये खगोलशास्त्र.
The HST was built by the United States space agency NASA, with contributions from the European स्पेस एजेंसी, और is संचालित by the स्पेस दूरदर्शी विज्ञान Institute.
The HST is one of NASA 's Great observatories, साथ साथ the कॉम्पटन गामा रे वेधशाला, the चन्द्रा x-ray Observatory, and the Spitzer Space Telescope.
स्पेस telescopes यहूद proposed as early as 1923.
Hubble was funded in the 1970s, साथ a प्रस्तावित लॉन्च in 1983, लकिन the प्रोजेक्ट थी घिरा by तकनीकी देरी, budget problems, and the Challenger disaster.
When finally launched in 1990, scientists found कि the प्रमुख दर्पण था महरूम मैदान incorrectly, compromising the telescope 's capabilities.
The दूरदर्शी थी लौटी to इसके intended quality by a servicing mission in 1993.
Hubble is the only telescope designed to be सर्विस in स्पेस by astronauts.
Between 1993 and 2002, four missions repaired, upgraded, और replaced प्रणालियों on the दूरदर्शी ; a पांचवां मिशन थी रद्द on safety grounds following the Columbia disaster.
However, after spirited public discussion, NASA व्यवस्थापक माइक griffin स्वीकृत एक फाइनल सर्विसिंग मिशन, समाप्त in 2009 by Space Shuttle Atlantis.
The telescope is now expected to फलन जबतक at तनिक 2013.
Its scientific successor, the James Webb Space Telescope ( JWST ), is to be शुभारम्भ in 2018 or संभवतः बाद.
Anti-inflammatory refers to the प्रॉपर्टी of a पदार्थ or उपचार that reduces inflammation.
anti-inflammatory दवाएँ मेक up परिचय हाफ of analgesics, remedying pain by reducing inflammation as opposed to opioids, which affect the central nervous system.
The Tonight Show is a US late-night talk show that has aired on एनबीसी चूंकि 1954.
It is the longest फिलहाल कार्यशील regularly अनुसूचित entertainment कार्यक्रम in the US and the third longest-running show on NBC after Meet the Press and Today.
The Tonight Show was hosted by Steve Allen ( 1954–1957 ), Jack Paar ( 1957–1962 ), Johnny Carson ( 1962–1992 ), jay लीनो ( 1992–2009, 2010–present ), and Conan O'Brien ( 2009–2010 ).
Several guest hosts also appeared, particularly दौरान the paar और कार्सन eras.
The longest-serving मेजबान to तिथि थी जॉनी कार्सन, who hosted The Tonight Show Starring Johnny Carson for 30 seasons from the fall of 1962 through the spring of 1992.
The current host of the show is Jay Leno, who had previously hosted the दिखाएँ इससे 1992 to 2009 और began उसके दूसरी कार्यकाल on March 1, 2010.
On April 3, 2013, एनबीसी घोषित jimmy fallon होता become the new host of The Tonight Show.
The Tonight Show साथ jimmy fallon होगा प्रीमियर फ़रवरी 24, 2014, the दिन बाद the closing ceremonies of the 2014 Winter Olympics.
ss एंड्रिया Doria.
Pronounced was an ocean liner for the Italian Line ( Società di navigazione Italia ) home ported in जेनोआ, इटली, सबसे प्रसिद्ध लिये इसके डूब in 1956, जब 52 लोगों died ( 51 इससे तात्कालिक impact ).
Named after the 16th-century Genoese admiral Andrea Doria, the ship had a सकल पंजीकरण tonnage of 29,100 और a क्षमता of परिचय 1,200 passengers and 500 crew.
For a country attempting to rebuild इसके अर्थव्यवस्था और प्रतिष्ठा बाद संसार युद्ध ii, Andrea Doria was an icon of Italian national pride.
of सब इटली 's जहाजों at the समय, एंड्रिया डोरिया थी the largest, fastest and supposedly safest.
Launched on 16 June 1951, the जलयान undertook इसके maiden voyage on 14 January 1953.
On 25 जुलाई 1956, जबकि the एंड्रिया डोरिया थी approaching the coast of nantucket, मैसाचुसेट्स, bound for New York City, the eastbound of the Swedish American Line collided with it in what became one of history 's most infamous maritime disasters.
Struck in the side, the top-heavy Andrea Doria immediately प्रारंभ to सूची severely to स्टारबोर्ड, जिससे बाएँ हाफ of इसके lifeboats unusable.
The consequent shortage of lifeboats might have resulted in significant loss of life, but the दक्षता of the जलयान 's तकनीकी डिज़ाइन अनुमत it to रहो afloat लिये over 11 घंटों बाद the ramming.
The good behavior of the crew, सुधार in संचार और the रैपिड जवाब of अन्य जहाजों averted a disaster similar in scale to that of the in 1912.
1,660 passengers and crew were बचाया और बच, जबकि 46 लोगों died as a consequence of the collision.
the evacuated लक्ज़री लाइनर capsized और sank the following morning.
This accident remains the worst मेरीटाइम विपत्ति to occur in संयुक्त States waters since the sinking of the in 1915.
The incident and its aftermath यहूद heavily covered by the news media.
While the rescue efforts were both कामयाब और commendable, the कारण of the टक्कर साथ the स्टॉकहोम और the घाटा of एंड्रिया डोरिया उत्पन्न much interest in the media and many lawsuits.
Largely because of an out-of-court settlement agreement between the दो शिपिंग कंपनियाँ दौरान hearings तत्काल बाद the विपत्ति, no determination of the cause ( s ) was ever formally published.
Although greater blame appeared initially to fall on the Italian liner, अधिक हाल discoveries have indicated कि a misreading of रडार on the स्वीडिश जलयान may have initiated the collision course, leading to errors on both ships.
Andrea Doria was the last major transatlantic यात्री पोत to डूबना पहले aircraft became the preferred method of travel.
डायलिसिस tubing
Dialysis tubing is a type of semi- or partially permeable membrane tubing बना इससे regenerated cellulose or cellophane.
It can be used for diffusion with solutes or परासरण if प्रयुक्त साथ जल तभी.
Osmosis is when water गुजरता through a semi-permeable layer to reach equilibrium.
diffusion, on the अन्य हाथ, allows the movement of molecules from high concentration to low concentration.
It will only allow molecules to pass through a semi-permeable झिल्ली or परत if the अणु is छोटी पर्याप्त to fit through the membrane or a membrane 's pore.
This usually results with the effects of diffusion through a झिल्ली तभी वाकई affects छोटी अणुओं, और almost never larger molecules.
Dialysis tubing is used in clinical हालातों to ensure a filtered प्रवाह of अणुओं, preventing the प्रवाह of larger solute molecules.
Small molecules can be `` washed '' out of a solution which is उत्तेजित through the tubing into a solvent, प्रायः जल, जिससे surrounds it and in which they can be flushed away.
In demonstrations of semi-permeable membranes, a solution containing several types of molecules, usually glucose and starch, is placed into a semi-permeable डायलिसिस थैला, ऐसे as a cellulose झिल्ली साथ छिद्र, और the थैला is sealed साथ a knot or elastic band.
The sealed डायलिसिस थैला is लगाई in a संग्राहक of a different solution, or water.
अणुओं छोटी पर्याप्त to pass through the tubing ( जल, लवण, monosaccharides, और अन्य छोटी अणुओं ) tend to मूव into or out of the dialysis bag in the direction of decreasing concentration, therefore displaying diffusion.
Larger molecules ( such as proteins, or polysaccharides ) कि have आयाम significantly वृहद than the pore diameter are retained inside the dialysis bag.
The water and smaller solutes in a hypotonic solution ( a solution that has a lesser solute concentration than the solution it is referenced to ) will cross a semi-permeable membrane, like dialysis tubing, into a hypertonic solution ( a solution that has a उच्चतर solute विशेषज्ञता than the समाधान it is संदर्भित to ) in an attempt to पहुँचें संतुलन, जहाँ the solute विशेषज्ञता of प्रत्येक समाधान is in संतुलन.
पारा प्रयोगशाला thermometer
A थर्मामीटर ( इससे the यूनानी, thermos, अर्थ `` hot '' और μἐτρον, metron, `` measure '' ) is a device that measures temperature or temperature gradient using a variety of different principles.
A thermometer has two important elements : the temperature sensor ( e.g. the bulb on a mercury-in-glass थर्मामीटर ) in जिससे कुछ शारीरिक बदलें occurs साथ तापमान, प्लस कुछ अर्थात् of converting इस शारीरिक बदलें into a numerical मान ( e.g. the visible scale that is marked on a mercury-in-glass thermometer ).
There are many types and many uses लिये thermometers, as विस्तृत नीचे in sections of this article.
Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs is a 1937 अमरीकी एनिमेटेड musical काल्पनिक फिल्मी उत्पादित by Walt Disney and released by RKO Radio Pictures.
Based on the German fairy tale by the Brothers Grimm, it is the first full-length cel एनिमेटेड विशेषता फिल्मी और the earliest in the वॉल्ट डिज़्नी एनिमेटेड क्लासिक series.
The story was adapted by storyboard artists डोरोथी ऐन रिक्त, रिचर्ड creedon, मेरिल de मारिस, ओटो englander, अर्ल hurd, लंड rickard, टेड सियर्स and Webb Smith.
David Hand was the supervising director, while William cottrell, विल्फ्रेड जैक्सन, लैरी morey, perce pearce, और बेन sharpsteen निर्देशित the film 's individual sequences.
Snow White premiered at the Carthay Circle Theatre on December 21, 1937, followed by a nationwide release on February 4, 1938, and with international earnings of $ 8 million during its आरंभिक रिलीज briefly assumed the रिकार्ड of उच्चतम grossing ध्वनि फिल्मी at the समय.
The popularity of the film रै led to it होने re-released theatrically अनेक टाइम्स, जबतक इसके घर वीडियो release in the 1990s.
Adjusted for inflation, it is one of the शीर्ष टेन performers at the North American box office.
At the 11th Academy Awards, Walt डिज़्नी थी awarded an मानद ऑस्कर, and the film was nominated for Best Musical Score.
It was added to the United States National Film Registry in 1989 and is क्रमित in the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान 's सूची of the 100 greatest American films, who also named the film as the greatest American animated film of all time in 2008.
Disney 's take on the fairy tale has had a big cultural impact, resulting in a popular theme पार्क आकर्षण, a वीडियो खेल, और a ब्रॉडवे musical.
Childbirth, labour, delivery, birth, partus, or parturition is the culmination of a गर्भावस्था काल साथ the expulsion of एक or अधिक नवजात infants from a woman 's uterus.
The process of normal childbirth is categorized in three stages of श्रमिक : the shortening और dilation of the ग्रीवा, descent और जनम of the infant, and birth of the placenta.
In many cases and with increasing frequency, childbirth is achieved through प्रेरण of मजदूर or caesarean खण्ड, जिससे is the हटाना of the neonate through a सर्जिकल incision in the उदर, बल्कि than through vaginal birth.
Childbirth by C-Sections increased 50 % in the U.S. from 1996 to 2006, और comprise nearly 32 % of births in the U.S. and Canada.
With respect to induced labor, अधिक than 22 % of महिलाओं undergo प्रेरण of श्रमिक in the United States.
Medical professional policy makers ढूँढें कि induced births और elective cesarean can be नुकसानदेह to the भ्रूण और neonate as खूब as नुकसानदेह or बगैर लाभ to the mother, and have established strict guidelines for non-medically indicated induced births and elective cesarean before 39 weeks.
Viva La Bam was an MTV & Viva show which followed Bam Margera और उसके क्रू as वे undertook चुनौतियां, performed स्टंट और traveled the संसार.
The show भागा लिये 5 सीज़न between 2003 and 2005.
Flushed Away is a 2006 british/american कंप्यूटर एनिमेटेड कार्रवाई / एडवेंचर कॉमेडी film directed by David Bowers and Sam Fell.
It was made in the partnership between Aardman Animations and ड्रीमवर्क्स एनिमेशन, और is aardman 's पहला completely computer-animated feature as opposed to the usual stop-motion.
The film stars the voice talents of Hugh जैकमैन, केट विंसलेट, एंडी serkis, विधेयक nighy, Ian McKellen, Shane Richie and Jean Reno.
The story was by Sam Fell, Peter Lord, Dick Clement, और इयान la frenais, और the पटकथा थी लिखा by लंड Clement, Ian La Frenais, Christopher Lloyd, Joe Keenan, and William Davies.
The film was released in US on 3 November 2006, और in uk on दिसम्बर 1 2006, और थी वितरित by सर्वोपरि तस्वीरें, मगर लिये स्विट्ज़रलैंड, स्पेन, and the Netherlands, which were handled by Universal Pictures.
The अटलांटा braves हैं a पेशेवर baseball team based in Atlanta.
The Braves are a member of the Eastern Division of Major League बेसबॉल 's नेशनल लीग.
The braves have निभाई in Turner Field since 1997.
The `` braves '' नाम, जिससे थी पहला प्रयुक्त in 1912, originates from a term for a Native American warrior.
They are nicknamed `` the Bravos '', and often referred to as `` America 's Team `` in सन्दर्भ to the टोली 's खेल होने ब्रॉडकास्ट on the nationally उपलब्धियाँ tbs इससे the 1970s जबतक 2007, gaining a wide fanbase.
From 1991 to 2005 the Braves were one of the most successful franchises in बेसबॉल, जीतना प्रभाग शीर्षक an unprecedented 14 लगातार टाइम्स in कि काल ( omitting the strike-shortened 1994 season in which there were no official division champions ).
the braves जीती the nl वेस्ट 1991–93 और the nl ईस्ट 1995–2005, और लौटे to the playoffs as the National League Wild Card in 2010.
The Braves advanced to the संसार श्रेणी पाँच टाइम्स in the 1990s, जीतना the title in 1995.
Since their debut in the National League in 1876, the franchise has won 16 divisional titles, 17 नेशनल लीग pennants, as खूब as तीन संसार श्रेणी championships—in 1914 as the बोस्टन braves, in 1957 as the Milwaukee Braves, and in 1995 in Atlanta.
The Braves are the only एमएलबी मताधिकार to have जीती the संसार श्रेणी in three different home cities.
The club is one of the National League 's two remaining charter franchises ( the other होने the शिकागो शावक ) और थी संस्थापित in बोस्टन, मैसाचुसेट्स, in 1871 as the बोस्टन रेड Stockings ( not to be confused with the American League 's Boston Red Sox ).
They are considered `` the oldest लगातार playing टोली in प्रमुख उत्तर अमरीकी खेल. ''
There is an argument as to who is actually older because although the Cubs are a full season `` older '' ( formed as the Chicago श्वेत stockings in 1870 ) शिकागो खोया दो सीज़न to the ग्रेट शिकागो आग, यूँ the braves have निभाई अधिक लगातार सीज़न.
After various name changes ( such as the Boston Beaneaters ), the team operated as the बोस्टन braves लिये सबसे of the पहला half of the 20th century.
In 1953, the team moved to Milwaukee, Wisconsin and became the मिल्वौकी braves, followed by the मूव to Atlanta in 1966.
The team 's tenure in Atlanta is famous for Hank Aaron breaking Babe Ruth 's career घर चलाएं रिकार्ड in 1974, हालांकि the बहुमत of आरोन 's घर runs were hit while the team was in Milwaukee.
उसके रिकार्ड stood जबतक 2007, जब San Francisco left fielder Barry Bonds broke the record.

A leaf is an organ of a vascular संयंत्र, as पारिभाषित in वनस्पति terms, and in particular in plant morphology.
Foliage is a द्रव्यमान संज्ञा कि refers to पत्ते as a feature of plants.
Typically a leaf is a thin, flattened organ borne above ground and specialized for photosynthesis, but many types of leaves are adapted in ways almost unrecognisable in those terms : some are not flat ( for example many succulent leaves और conifers ), कुछ हैं नहीं ऊपर मैदान ( ऐसे as बल्ब तराजू ), और कुछ हैं बगैर प्रमुख photosynthetic function ( consider for example cataphylls, spines, and cotyledons ).
Conversely, many structures of non-vascular पौधे, or भी of कुछ lichens, जिससे हैं नहीं पौधे at सब ( in the sense of being members of the kingdom Plantae ), do look and function much like leaves.
Furthermore, several structures मिला in vascular पौधे dekh जैसे पत्ते लकिन हैं नहीं दरअसल पत्ते ; वे differ from leaves in their structures and origins.
Examples शामिल phyllodes, cladodes, और phylloclades.

Our Gang ( भी ज्ञात as the छोटी दुष्टों or एचएएल रोच 's दुष्टों ) हैं a श्रेणी of अमरीकी कॉमेडी छोटी films about a group of poor neighborhood children and their adventures.
Created by comedy producer Hal Roach, the series is noted for showing children behaving in a अपेक्षाकृत प्राकृतिक रास्ता, as रोच और असली निदेशक रॉबर्ट F. mcgowan worked to फिल्मी the unaffected, कच्चा nuances apparent in regular children rather than have them imitate adult acting styles.
In addition, Our Gang notably put boys, girls, whites and blacks together in a group as equals, something that `` broke नई मैदान, '' according to फिल्मी इतिहासकार Leonard Maltin.
Such a thing had never been done before in cinema but रै चूंकि महरूम दोहराया बाद the कामयाबी of हमारी गिरोह.
The first production at the Roach studio in 1922 थी a श्रेणी of मूक short subjects.
When Roach changed distributors from Pathé to metro-goldwyn-mayer ( mgm ) in 1927, और परिवर्तित the श्रेणी to ध्वनि in 1929, the श्रेणी took off even further.
Production continued at the रोच स्टुडियो जबतक 1938, जब the श्रेणी थी बेची to mgm, जो then continued producing the comedies until 1944.
The Our Gang series includes a कुल of 220 शॉर्ट्स और एक विशेषता फिल्मी, सामान्य spanky, featuring over forty-one child actors.
As MGM retained the rights to the Our Gang ट्रेडमार्क following उनके खरीदें of the उत्पादन अधिकारों, the 80 roach-produced `` टॉकीज़ '' यहूद syndicated for television under the title The Little Rascals beginning in 1955.
Both Roach 's The Little Rascals package ( now owned by CBS Television Distribution ) and MGM 's Our Gang package ( now owned by Warner Bros. entertainment ) have चूंकि remained in अनुप्रयोग, साथ आवधिक नई प्रोडक्शन्स आधारित on the शॉर्ट्स surfacing over the सालो, सहित a 1994 Little Rascals feature film released by Universal Pictures.
Zacharias Janssen ( also zacharias जानसन or sacharias जानसन ) ( b.1580-88, d.pre-1632 to 1638 ) was a Dutch spectacle-maker from Middelburg associated with the invention of the first optical telescope.
Janssen is sometimes also credited for inventing the पहला truly यौगिक सूक्ष्मदर्शी.
However, the origin of the सूक्ष्मदर्शी, बस जैसे the उत्पत्ति of the telescope, is a matter of debate.
Lake tahoe ( ; washo : dáʔaw ) is a विशाल freshwater lake in the Sierra Nevada of the United States.
At a surface elevation of, it is located along the किनारा between कैलिफ़ोर्निया और नेवाडा, west of Carson City.
Lake Tahoe is the largest अल्पाइन झील in उत्तर अमेरिका.
Its depth is, making it the United राज्य 's second-deepest ( the deepest is crater झील in ऑरेगॉन, होने deeper, at ).
Additionally, झील tahoe is सूचीबद्ध as the 26th largest lake by volume in the world at.
The lake was formed परिचय 2 लाख सालो पहले और is a भाग of the झील tahoe जलाशय साथ the modern lake being shaped during the ice ages.
it is ज्ञात लिये the स्पष्टता of इसके जल और the परिदृश्य of surrounding mountains on all sides.
The area surrounding the lake is also referred to as झील tahoe, or बस tahoe.
Lake Tahoe is a प्रमुख पर्यटक आकर्षण in दोनो नेवाडा and California.
it is घर to a क्रमांक of स्की रिसॉर्ट, गर्मियाँ बाहरी recreation, and tourist attractions.
Snow and skiing are a significant part of the क्षेत्रफल 's अर्थव्यवस्था और प्रतिष्ठा.
Mountain and झील नजारा हैं आकर्षण throughout the year.
The नेवाडा पक्ष भी includes large casinos.
Highways provide year-round access from Reno, कार्सन नगर, और sacramento.

The Twenty-seventh Amendment ( amendment xxvii ) prohibits कोई विधि कि increases or decreases the सैलरी of members of the Congress from taking effect until the start of the next set of terms of office for Representatives.
It is the सबसे हाल amendment to the United States Constitution.
It was सुपुर्द to the राज्य लिये अनुसमर्थन in 1789 and was adopted in 1992.
“First they came... ” is a famous statement and provocative poem attributed to पादरी मार्टिन niemöller ( 1892–1984 ) परिचय the सुस्ती of जर्मनी intellectuals following the nazis ' वृद्धि to power and the subsequent purging of their chosen targets, group after group.
वहीँ is कुछ असहमति over the सटीक wording of the quotation और जब it थी निर्मित ; the content of the quotation may have been presented differently by Niemöller on different occasions.

The Four Thirds system is a standard created by Olympus and Kodak for डिजिटल single-lens reflex कैमरा ( dslr ) डिज़ाइन और development. < संदर्भ name='DPReview.com 2001-02-13 ' >
The system provides a standard that, with digital cameras and lenses उपलब्धियाँ इससे अनेक निर्माताओं, allows लिये the इंटरचेंज of lenses और लाशें इससे different manufacturers.
seems to कवर the मानक.
Proponents describe it as an खोलें मानक, लकिन कंपनियाँ may तभी उपयोग it अंतर्गत a non-disclosure agreement.
Unlike older slr प्रणालियों, चार तिहाई रै महरूम designed इससे the ground up to be entirely digital.
Many lenses are extensively computerized, to the पाइंट कि ओलम्पस offers firmware updates for many of them.
Lens design has been tailored to the आवश्यकताएँ of डिजिटल सेंसर, most notably through telecentric designs.
The size of the सेंसर is significantly छोटी than लिये सबसे dslrs और इस implies कि lenses, especially telephoto lenses, can be smaller.
For example, a Four Thirds lens with a 300 mm फोकल लंबाई होता कवर परिचय the वही कोण of दृश्य as a 600 mm फोकल लंबाई lens for the 35 mm film standard, and is correspondingly more compact.
Thus, the Four Thirds System रै क्रॉप फ़ैक्टर ( फोकल लंबाई गुणक ) of परिचय 2, और जबकि इस enables longer फोकल लंबाई for greater magnification, it does n't aid the manufacture of wide angle lenses.
The image sensor format, generally intermediate between those of larger SLRs and छोटी कॉम्पैक्ट कैमरे, generally देता स्तर of लागत, प्रदर्शन और convenience इंटरमीडिएट between those two classes.
HVAC systems use ventilation air ducts installed throughout a भवन to सप्लाई conditioned एयर to a रूम through आउटलेट vents, पुकारा diffusers ; and ducts to remove air through return-air grilles.
HVAC ( heating, वेंटिलेशन, और एयर कंडीशनिंग ) is the प्रौद्योगिकी of indoor and automotive environmental comfort.
HVAC system design is a subdiscipline of mechanical engineering, आधारित on the सिद्धान्त of ऊष्मागतिकी, द्रव यांत्रिकी, और ऊष्मा ट्रांसफ़र.
Refrigeration is sometimes added to the field 's abbreviation as HVAC & R or HVACR, or ventilating is dropped as in hacr ( ऐसे as the नामांकन of hacr-rated सर्किट ब्रेकर्स ).
HVAC is important in the design of medium to large industrial and office buildings such as skyscrapers and in marine environments ऐसे as एक्वैरियम, जहाँ सुरक्षित और स्वस्थ भवन शर्तें हैं regulated साथ आदर to तापमान और आर्द्रता, using fresh air from outdoors.
Ventilation on the downdraught system, by impulsion, or the 'plenum ' principle, applied to schoolrooms ( 1899 )
Heating, ventilating, and air कंडीशनिंग is आधारित on आविष्कारों और discoveries बना by निकोलय lvov, माइकल फैराडे, Willis Carrier, Reuben Trane, James Joule, William Rankine, Sadi Carnot, and many others.
The invention of the components of HVAC systems went hand-in-hand with the industrial revolution, and new methods of modernization, higher efficiency, and system कंट्रोल हैं constantly introduced by कंपनियाँ और आविष्कारक विश्वव्यापी.
The three central functions of heating, ventilating, and air-conditioning are interrelated, especially with the need to provide thermal सुकून और स्वीकार्य अंदर एयर विशेषता भीतर उचित संस्थापना, आपरेशन, और मेंटेनेंस लागत.
HVAC systems can provide ventilation, reduce air infiltration, and maintain दबाव संबंध between spaces.
The अर्थात् of एयर डिलीवरी और हटाना from spaces is known as room air distribution.
The starting point in carrying out an estimate both for cooling and हीटिंग depends on the exterior जलवायु और आंतरिक निर्दिष्ट conditions.
However पहले लेने up the ऊष्मा लोड गणना, it is जरुरी to ढूँढें भैस एयर requirements for each area in detail, as pressurization is an important consideration.
In modern buildings the design, installation, and control systems of these functions are एकीकृत into एक or अधिक hvac प्रणालियों.
For very small इमारतें, ठेकेदारों सामान्यतः क्षमता इंजीनियर और select HVAC systems and equipment.
For larger buildings, building services designers and इंजीनियर्स, ऐसे as mechanical, architectural, or भवन सेवाएं इंजीनियर्स analyze, डिज़ाइन, and specify the HVAC systems, and specialty mechanical contractors fabricate and commission them.
Building permits and code-compliance inspections of the संस्थापना are normally required for all sizes of buildings.
The HVAC industry is a worldwide एंटरप्राइज़, साथ भूमिकाएँ सहित आपरेशन और मेंटेनेंस, प्रणाली डिज़ाइन और निर्माण, equipment manufacturing and sales, and in education and research.
The HVAC industry was historically regulated by the manufacturers of HVAC equipment, but regulating and standards organizations ऐसे as hardi, ashrae, smacna, एसीसीए, वर्दी mechanical कोड, अंतरराष्ट्रीय mechanical कोड, और amca have been established to support the industry and encourage high standards and achievement.
Royal Navy Commander James Bond, CMG, rnvr, is a fictional अक्षर created by British journalist and novelist Ian Fleming in 1953.
He is the protagonist of the James Bond series of novels, films, कॉमिक्स और वीडियो खेल.
Fleming wrote twelve Bond novels and two छोटी स्टोरी संग्रहण पहले उसके मौत, हालांकि the पिछला दो books— the man with the Golden Gun and Octopussy and The Living Daylights —were published posthumously.
The Bond character is a Secret Service agent, code number 007, residing in लंदन लकिन क्रियाशील internationally.
Bond was a composite character who was based on a number of commandos whom फ्लेमिंग knew दौरान उसके सेवा in the नवल प्रज्ञा प्रभाग दौरान संसार युद्ध ii, to जिसको फ्लेमिंग added उसके अपना स्टाइल और a क्रमांक of उसके अपना tastes ; Bond 's name was appropriated from American ornithologist James Bond.
Bond has a number of character traits जिससे चलाएं throughout the किताबे, सहित an enjoyment of गाड़ियाँ, a प्रेम of food and drink, and an average intake of sixty custom-made cigarettes a day.
Since Fleming 's death in 1964, वहीँ have महरूम अन्य authorised लेखक of बंध सामग्री, सहित जॉन गार्डनर, जो लिखा चौदह novels और दो novelizations and Raymond Benson, who wrote six novels, three novelizations and three short stories.
There have भी महरूम तीन लेखक जो लिखा एक किताब प्रत्येक, Kingsley Amis ( writing as Robert Markham ), Sebastian Faulks and Jeffery Deaver.
Additionally a series of novels based on Bond 's youth— यंग बंध —was लिखा by चार्ली higson.
As spin-offs from the literary works, there was a television adaptation of the first novel, कसीनो royale, in जिससे बंध थी निभाई as an American agent.
A comic strip series also भागा in the रोज़ एक्स्प्रेस newspaper.
There have also been twenty-five Bond films ; सात अभिनेताओं have निभाई बंध in ये films.
`` Nature Boy '' is a सोंग by ईडन ahbez, published in 1947.
The song tells a fantasy of a `` strange enchanted boy... who wandered very far '' only to learn that `` the महानतम बात... थी बस to प्रेम and be loved in return ''.
Nat किंग कोल 's 1948 रिकॉर्डिंग of the सोंग थी a प्रमुख hit and `` Nature Boy '' has since become a pop and jazz standard, with dozens of major artists interpreting the song.
Louisiana ( or ;, ; Louisiana Creole : léta de la lwizyàn ) is a राज्य स्तिथ in the दक्षिणी प्रदेश of the United States of America.
Louisiana is the 31st most extensive and the 25th सबसे populous of the 50 संयुक्त States.
Its capital is Baton Rouge and largest नगर is New Orleans.
Louisiana is the only state in the u.S. साथ राजनैतिक subdivisions termed parishes, which are local government 's equivalent to counties.
The largest मोहल्ला by जनसांख्यिकी is ईस्ट baton रूज मोहल्ला, and the largest by land area is Cameron Parish.
Much of the state 's lands were formed from sediment washed down the Mississippi River, leaving विशाल deltas और विशाल क्षेत्रों of तटीय दलदल और मग्न.
These contain a समृद्ध दक्षिणी biota ; ठेठ उदाहरण शामिल birds such as ibis and egrets.
There are also many species of पेड़ मेंढक, और मछली ऐसे as sturgeon and paddlefish.
In more elevated areas, fire is a natural प्रक्रम in the लैंडस्केप, और रै उत्पादित extensive क्षेत्रों of longleaf pine forest and wet savannas.
These support an exceptional विशाल क्रमांक of संयंत्र प्रजाति, सहित many species of orchids and carnivorous plants.
Some Louisiana urban environments have a multicultural, multilingual विरासत, होने so strongly बहकावे by an जिसमें of 18th-century फ्रेंच, स्पेनी, Native American ( Indian ) and African cultures that they are considered to be somewhat exceptional in the U.S.
Before the American purchase of the territory, the वर्तमान louisiana राज्य था महरूम दोनो a Spanish and French colony.
In addition, the pattern of development included importing numerous अफ़्रीकी स्लेव in the 18th सदी, साथ अनेक इससे the वही प्रदेश of वेस्ट अफ़्रीकी, यूँ concentrating their culture.
In the post-Civil War environment, anglo-americans increased the दबाव लिये anglicization, और in 1915, English was made the only official language of the state.
Women 's rights are the अधिकारों और entitlements claimed लिये महिलाओं और girls of many societies worldwide.
In some places these rights are institutionalized or supported by law, local custom, और आचरण, whereas in अन्य वे may be उपेक्षित or suppressed.
They differ from broader notions of human अधिकारों through दावा of an अंतर्निहित ऐतिहासिक और परंपरागत पूर्वाग्रह विरूद्ध the कसरत of अधिकारों by women and girls in favour of men and boys.
Issues commonly associated with notions of women 's rights include, though are not limited to, the right : to bodily integrity and स्वायत्तता ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to थाम पब्लिक दफ्तर ; to कार्य ; to मेला मजदूरी or बराबर अदा ; to अपना प्रॉपर्टी ; to शिक्षा ; to serve in the सैन्य or be conscripted ; to डालें into विधिक अनुबंध ; और to have वैवाहिक, parental और धार्मिक अधिकारों.
The laws of science or scientific laws are statements that describe, भविष्यवाणी, और शायद बताइये क्यों, a दायरा of phenomena व्यवहार as वे appear to in nature.
The term `` law '' has diverse usage in many cases : approximate, सटीक, व्यापक or सीमित theories, in सब प्राकृतिक वैज्ञानिक disciplines ( भौतिकी, रसायन, जीवविज्ञान, geology, astronomy etc. ).
An analogous पद लिये a वैज्ञानिक विधि is a principle.
वैज्ञानिक laws:
summarize a large collection of तथ्य संकल्पित by प्रयोग into a single statement,
can usually be formulated mathematically as one or several statements or equation, or at तनिक stated in a सिंगल वाक्य, so कि it can be प्रयुक्त to भविष्यवाणी the निष्कर्ष of an प्रयोग, दिए the आरंभिक, boundary, और अन्य शारीरिक conditions of the processes which take place,
are strongly समर्थित by अनुभवजन्य प्रमाण - वे हैं वैज्ञानिक knowledge that experiments have repeatedly verified ( and never falsified ).
Their accuracy does not change when new theories हैं worked आउट, लकिन बल्कि the पैमाना of अनुप्रयोग, चूंकि the समीकरण ( if कोई ) representing the law does not change.
As with other scientific knowledge, they do not have absolute certainty जैसे गणितीय theorems or पहचान, और it is सदा संभावित लिये a विधि to be overturned by future observations.
are often quoted as a आधारभूत controlling influence बल्कि than a description of observed facts.
I.e. `` the laws of motion आवश्यकता कि ''
Laws differ इससे hypotheses और postulates, जिससे हैं प्रस्तावित दौरान the scientific process before and during validation by experiment and observation.
These are not laws since they have not been सत्यापित to the वही उपाधि और may नहीं be fear सामान्य, although they may lead to the formulation of laws.
A law is a more solidified and formal बयान, आसुत इससे दोहराया experiment.
Although the concepts of a law or principle in nature is borderline to philosophy, and presents the depth to which mathematics can describe nature, scientific कानून हैं माना इससे a वैज्ञानिक परिप्रेक्ष्य और follow the वैज्ञानिक विधि ; वे `` serve उनके purpose '' बल्कि than `` questioning reality '' ( philosophical ) or `` statements of logical absolution '' ( mathematical ).
For example, whether a law `` refers to वास्तविकता '' is a philosophical समस्या, बल्कि than scientific.
Fundamentally, all वैज्ञानिक कानून follow इससे भौतिकी, कानून जिससे occur in अन्य sciences ultimately follow from physical laws.
Often, from mathematically fundamental viewpoints, सार्वभौमिक स्थिरांक emerge इससे वैज्ञानिक कानून.
The लॉन्च of the प्लेस्टेशन 3 into the जापानी मार्केट on 10 नवम्बर 2006 marked the second major seventh generation entertainment system to be released.
The system was released सात दिनों बाद on 17 नवम्बर in the United States.
Introduction into other world markets was delayed by a shortage of diodes for use in the Blu-ray disc player ; the यंत्र थी शुभारम्भ in यूरोपीय और अन्य संसार बाज़ार in the first half of 2007.
Lauren Fenmore Baldwin ( formerly Williams और grainger ) is a fictional अक्षर इससे the सीबीएस साबुन operas the Young and the Restless and The Bold and the Beautiful, portrayed by Tracey E. Bregman.
She made her debut during the episode airing on जनवरी 21, 1983.
In 1992, Bregman began बनाना विरल दिखावे on the बिंदास और the Beautiful, later resulting in the character migrating there fully in 1995.
Following a guest appearance in 2000, bregman लौटे to the यंग और the बेचैन on अगस्त 24, 2001, remaining on recurring status.
In 2013, it थी घोषित कि bregman had been placed on contract.
Much of Lauren 's history has revolved around her romances with पॉल विलियम्स, स्कॉट grainger, sr., और माइकल baldwin among अनेक अन्य causing a fierce फंसने साथ traci Abbott Connolly.
Lauren is also famous for her long, violent rivalry साथ शीला कार्टर.
The 2010 एनबीए फाइनल थी the नेशनल Basketball Association ( NBA ) championship series for the 2009–10 season.
The best-of-seven playoff was contested between the Los Angeles Lakers, champions of the पश्चिमी सम्मेलन और defending एनबीए champions, और the बोस्टन सेल्टिक्स, champions of the Eastern Conference.
The Lakers defeated the Celtics, four games to तीन, to जीत the मताधिकार 's 16th NBA championship.
The 64th edition of the championship series was played between जून 3 और जून 17, थी ब्रॉडकास्ट on एबीसी, और थी देखी by an average of 18.1 million people.
The सेल्टिक्स अर्जित उनके berth into the playoffs by winning the Atlantic Division.
The Lakers won the प्रशांत प्रभाग to earn उनके berth.
The सेल्टिक्स पहुँचे the एनबीए फाइनल by defeating the मियामी ऊष्मा in the best-of-seven पूर्वी सम्मेलन पहला गोलाकार, the Cleveland Cavaliers in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference Semifinals, and defending Eastern conference champion Orlando Magic in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference Finals.
The Lakers reached the NBA Finals by defeating the Oklahoma City Thunder in the best-of-seven पश्चिमी सम्मेलन पहला गोलाकार, the यूटा जैज़ in the best-of-seven पश्चिमी सम्मेलन semifinals, और the फीनिक्स सन्स in the best-of-seven Western Conference Finals.
The NBA Finals were scheduled in the Major League Baseball World Series 2–3–2 seven game format, with the Lakers possessing home-court advantage as a बदला लिये finishing साथ बेहतर नियमित ऋतु रिकार्ड than the सेल्टिक्स.
Repeated baskets from starters Kobe Bryant, Pau Gasol, and Ron Artest brought the लेकर्स बंद to विजय in Game 1.
A record breaking performance from Ray Allen 's आठ three-point baskets ensured the सेल्टिक्स a खेल 2 triumph.
Derek Fisher ’s 11 अंक in the चौथी क्वार्टर helped the लेकर्स win Game 3.
The Celtics won Game 4 ; it किया n't ठेस कि वे netted an बेहतरीन प्रदर्शन in baskets by the team’s reserves, जबकि पॉल पियर्स led the टोली to a Game 5 win with 27 points on 57 % shooting from the floor.
The Lakers avoided elimination by जीतना a निर्णायक खेल 6 साथ 24 points contributed by their bench.
Although they trailed the Celtics by 13 points early in the third quarter, the Lakers rallied and won उनके दूसरी लगातार चैंपियनशिप by लेने over an रोमांचक खेल 7 aided by लेट योगदान on offense by Pau Gasol and Artest and rebounding.
Bryant was named Most मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी of the फाइनल लिये his second consecutive trophy.
This was the first NBA Finals to go the full seven games since and only the fourth चूंकि the एनबीए फाइनल लौटे to a 2–3–2 स्वरूप in.
The Laker franchise has 16 एनबीए championships ( पाँच in मिनियापोलिस, 11 in लॉस एंजिल्स ) trailing the सेल्टिक्स ' seventeen championships.
The NBA Finals used the `` World Series '' Format in 1949 Minneapolis Lakers defeated the Washington Capitols 4 games to 2 ; in 1953 Minneapolis पराजित the नई यॉर्क knicks 4 खेल to 1 ; in 1954 मिनियापोलिस पराजित the syracuse नागरिकों 4 खेल to 3 ; और in 1955 syracuse नागरिकों पराजित the Fort Wayne Pistons 4 games to 3.
The एनबीए होता वापसी to the 2–2–1–1–1 National Hockey League seven game series format until 1985.
Black pepper ( Piper nigrum ) is a flowering बेल in the परिवार piperaceae, cultivated लिये इसके फल, जिससे is usually dried and used as a spice and seasoning.
The fruit, known as a peppercorn जब सूखी, is लगभग in व्यास, dark red when fully mature, and, like all drupes, contains a single seed.
Peppercorns, and the मैदान pepper निकला इससे उन्हें, may be वर्णित बस as pepper, or more precisely as black pepper ( cooked and dried unripe fruit ), green pepper ( dried unripe fruit ) and white pepper ( dried ripe seeds ).
Black pepper is native to south India, and is extensively cultivated वहीँ और elsewhere in tropical regions.
Currently Vietnam is the world 's largest निर्माता और निर्यातक of pepper, producing 34 % of the संसार 's पाइपर nigrum crop as of 2008.
Dried ground pepper has been used since antiquity लिये दोनो इसके फ्लेवर और as a आयुर्विज्ञान.
ब्लैक pepper is the संसार 's most traded spice.
It is one of the most common मसाले added to यूरोपीय भोजन और its descendants.
The spiciness of black pepper is due to the रासायनिक piperine, नहीं to be उलझन with the capsaicin that gives fleshy peppers theirs.
It is in the आधुनिक संसार, प्रायः युग्म with salt.
In cardiovascular physiology, ejection fraction ( EF ) represents the volumetric भिन्न of रक्त उत्तेजित आउट of the ventricle ( दिल ) साथ प्रत्येक दिल ताल or cardiac cycle.
It can be applied to either the right ventricle which ejects via the pulmonary वाल्व into the pulmonary परिसंचरण or the left ventricle which ejects via the aortic valve into the systemic circulation.
Imaging of the physiology of the mammalian heart is the आर्ट कि allows सार्थक गणितीय अभिव्यक्ति defining EF.
Noninvasive cardiac imaging has become a विश्वव्यापी यूटिलिटी enabling पढ़ाई of हृदय प्रदर्शन reproducibly and inexpensively.
Simplified, ejection भिन्न is a गणितीय उत्पाद allowed by cardiac imaging.
As a mathematical term, Ejection Fraction is an एक्सटेंशन of the कार्य of एडाल्फ फिक in हृदय आउटपुट.
Dedicated technology such as Echocardiography, Computed Tomography, Magnetic Resonance Imaging and MUGA scanning have definitively अनुमत clinically प्रासंगिक गणित regarding ischemia, जन्मजात दिल Disease and Heart Failure.
The prosecutor is the chief legal representative of the अभियोजन in देशों साथ either the आम law adversarial system, or the civil law inquisitorial system.
The prosecution is the legal पार्टी जिम्मेदार लिये पेश the मामला in a दण्ड विचारण विरूद्ध an individual accused of breaking the law.

स्ट्रॉबेरी shortcake may also refer to:
