Abū al-Qāsim muḥammad इब्न ʿabd allāh इब्न ʿabd al-muṭṭalib इब्न hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 जून 632 ), भी transliterated as मुहम्मद ( ), was a religious, political, and military leader from Mecca who unified Arabia into a single religious polity under Islam.
He is believed by मुसलमान और bahá'ís to be a messenger and prophet of God.
मुहम्मद is लगभग universally माना by Muslims as the last prophet sent by God for mankind.
Non-Muslims regard मुहम्मद as the संस्थापक of islam.
Muslims consider him to be the restorer of an अनछुए असली monotheistic आस्था of Adam, Noah, Abraham, Moses, Jesus, and other prophets.
Born in about 570 CE in the arabian नगर of मक्का, he थी अनाथ at an early age and brought up under the care of his uncle Abu Talib.
He later worked mostly as a व्यापारी, as खूब as a गड़रिये, और थी पहला married by age 25.
होने in the आदत of periodically retreating to a गुफा in the surrounding kyu for several nights of seclusion and prayer, he later reported that it was there, at age 40, that he received his first revelation from God.
Three years after this event Muhammad started preaching these revelations सरेआम, proclaiming कि `` परमेश्वर is एक ``, कि पूरा `` आत्मसमर्पण '' to उसे ( lit.
islām ) is the only way ( dīn ) acceptable to God, and that he himself was a prophet and मेसेंजर of परमेश्वर, in the वही रग as अन्य इस्लामी नबियों.
Muhammad gained few followers early on, and was met with hostility from कुछ meccan जनजातियों ; he और उसके अनुसरणकर्ता यहूद treated harshly.
To escape persecution, Muhammad sent some of his followers to अबीसीनिया पहले he और उसके अनुसरणकर्ता in मक्का migrated to मदीना ( तब ज्ञात as yathrib ) in the साल 622.
This event, the हिज्र, marks the शुरूआत of the इस्लामी पंचांग, which is also known as the Hijri Calendar.
In Medina, Muhammad united the जनजातियों अंतर्गत the संविधान of Medina.
After eight years of fighting with the meccan जनजातियों, उसके अनुसरणकर्ता, जो by तब था grown to 10,000, took कंट्रोल of मक्का in the largely peaceful Conquest of Mecca.
He destroyed the pagan idols in the city and then sent his followers out to destroy सब of the बाकी pagan मंदिरों in पूर्वी Arabia.
In 632, a few महीने बाद returning to मदीना इससे the Farewell Pilgrimage, Muhammad fell ill and died.
By the समय of उसके मौत, सबसे of the arabian प्रायद्वीप था परिवर्तित to Islam, and he had united Arabia into a single Muslim religious polity.
The revelations ( or ayah, lit.
`` Signs [ of God ] '' ) — which Muhammad reported receiving until his death – form the आयतें of the कुरान, regarded by मुसलमान as the `` शब्द of परमेश्वर '' and around which the religion is based.
Besides the Quran, Muhammad 's life ( sira ) and परंपराओं ( सुन्नत ) हैं भी upheld by मुसलमान as the स्त्रोत of sharia law.
They discuss Muhammad and other prophets of Islam साथ reverence, adding the phrase सलाम be upon him whenever their names are mentioned.
While conceptions of Muhammad in medieval Christendom and premodern टाइम्स यहूद largely ऋणात्मक, appraisals in modern history have been far less so.
The Great किताबे ( दूसरी edition )
Great Books of the Western World is a series of books originally प्रकाशित in the संयुक्त राज्य in 1952 by ब्रिटैनिका विश्वकोष inc. to उपस्थित the Great Books in a single package of 54 volumes.
The series is now in its second edition and contains 60 आयतन.
the असली सम्पादक of the श्रेणी chose तीन मापदण्ड for inclusion : a book must be relevant to contemporary issues, and not only important in its historical context ; it must reward rereading ; and it must be a part of `` the great conversation about the great ideas, '' relevant to at least 25 of the 102 great ideas identified by the editors.
Books were not चुनी on the आधार of जातीय or सांस्कृतिक inclusiveness, ऐतिहासिक influence, or the editors ' agreement with the views expressed.
`` Cocaine '' is a song written and recorded by JJ Cale in 1976, लकिन भी ज्ञात as a कवर संस्करण अंकित by eric Clapton.
Allmusic calls the latter `` among [ Clapton 's ] most enduringly लोकप्रिय हिट्स '' और टीप कि `` भी लिये an कलाकार जैसे क्लैप्टन साथ a विशाल देह of high-quality work, 'Cocaine ' ranks among his best. ''
Glyn Johns, who had previously worked with The Who, Led Zeppelin और the रोलिंग पत्थरों, उत्पादित the क्लैप्टन रिकॉर्डिंग, जिससे थी released on क्लैप्टन 's 1977 album Slowhand and as a single in 1980.
The live version of `` Cocaine '', from the Just One Night album अंकित in टोकियो, charted on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 as the b-side of `` तुलसा Time ``, which was a No. 30 hit in 1980. ``
Cocaine '' was one of several of cale 's गीतों अंकित by क्लैप्टन, सहित `` बाद मध्यरात्रि `` और `` Travelin ' Light ''.
The attack on Pearl Harbor ( called Hawaii Operation or Operation AI by the Japanese Imperial General मुख्यालय ( आपरेशन z in नियोजन ) और the बैटल of पर्ल हार्बर ) थी a आश्चर्य सैन्य स्ट्राइक conducted by the इम्पीरियल जापानी नेवी against the United States naval base at Pearl Harbor, Hawaii, on the morning of December 7, 1941 ( December 8 in Japan ).
From the standpoint of the defenders, the आक्रमण commenced at 7:48 a.m. Hawaiian Time.
The attack was intended as a preventive action in order to keep the U.S. Pacific Fleet from दखल साथ सैन्य क्रियाएँ the साम्राज्य of जापानी थी नियोजन in southeast एशिया विरूद्ध विदेशी territories of the United Kingdom, the Netherlands, and the United States.
The base was attacked by 353 Japanese सेनानी, बमवर्षक और torpedo planes in दो लहरें, शुभारम्भ इससे छह वायुयान carriers.
सब आठ u.S. नेवी battleships यहूद damaged, with four being sunk.
Two of these were later raised, and with the बाकी चार repaired, छह battleships लौटे to service later in the war.
The जापानी भी sank or क्षतिग्रस्त तीन cruisers, three destroyers, an anti-aircraft training ship, and one minelayer.
188 U.S. वायुयान यहूद नष्ट ; 2,402 अमेरिकी were killed and 1,282 wounded.
Important base installations such as the power station, shipyard, maintenance, and fuel और torpedo भंडार सुविधाएं, as खूब as the पनडुब्बी पियर और मुख्यालय भवन ( भी घर of the प्रज्ञा section ) were not attacked.
Japanese losses were light : 29 aircraft and five midget submarines lost, and 65 servicemen मारे or wounded.
One Japanese नाविक थी captured.
The attack came as a profound शॉक to the अमरीकी लोगों और led सीधे to the अमरीकी entry into World War II in both the Pacific and European theaters.
The following दिन ( दिसम्बर 8 ), the संयुक्त States declared war on Japan.
Domestic support for non-interventionism, जिससे था been strong, disappeared.
Clandestine support of ब्रिटेन ( लिये उदाहरण the Neutrality Patrol ) was replaced by active alliance.
Subsequent operations by the U.S. prompted Germany and इटली to घोषित युद्ध on the u.S. on दिसम्बर 11, जिससे was reciprocated by the U.S. the same day.
There were numerous ऐतिहासिक precedents for unannounced military action by Japan.
However, the lack of any formal warning, particularly while negotiations were still जाहिर जारी, led अध्यक्ष फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट to proclaim दिसम्बर 7, 1941, `` a date which will live in infamy ``.
Project Runway Season 2 was the second season of ब्रावो 's कामयाब प्रोजेक्ट रनवे, a वास्तविकता प्रतियोगिता for fashion designers.

In numismatics, a खच्चर is a सिक्का or पदक minted साथ obverse and reverse designs not normally seen on the same piece.
These can be जानबूझकर or उत्पादित by error.
This प्रकार of गलती is अत्यधिक sought बाद, और उदाहरण can fetch steep prices from collectors.
The earliest mules हैं मिला among ancient Greek and Roman coins.
Opinion is divided between those who think that they are accidental, the result of an गलत संयोजन of a नई die साथ एक कि था officially महरूम withdrawn इससे उपयोग, or the कार्य of coiners working साथ मरता चुराया इससे an आधिकारिक मिंट, शायद at a समय जब एक of them should have been destroyed.
The name गर्भाशयी इससे the खच्चर, the संकर औलाद of a घोड़ा और a गधा, due to such a coin having two sides intended for different coins, much as a mule has parents of two different species.
This page documents the tornadoes और बवंडर outbreaks of 2010.
The बहुमत of tornadoes रूप in the u.S., लकिन वे can occur लगभग anywhere under the right conditions.
A lesser number occur बाहर the u.S., सबसे notably in भाग of neighboring दक्षिणी कनाडा during the Northern Hemisphere 's summer season, but are also known in South America, Europe, Asia, and Australia.
There were 1,531 tornadoes reported in the संयुक्त राज्य in 2010 ( of which at least 1,266 were confirmed ), with 45 confirmed fatalities.
Elsewhere in the संसार, 11 लोगों यहूद मारे in tornadoes, छह in अर्जेंटीना, तीन in the Bahamas, one in Bangladesh, and one in Germany.
The year was near average for tornadoes despite an extremely quiet early वसन्त काल, however ऐसे बदला बाद a विशाल upswing starting in लेट अप्रैल और a busy late spring and summer period.
The autumn महीने यहूद थोड़ा ऊपर average.
A lymphocyte is a type of श्वेत रक्त कोशिका in the vertebrate immune system.
Under the microscope, lymphocytes can be विभाजित into विशाल lymphocytes और छोटी lymphocytes.
Large granular lymphocytes शामिल प्राकृतिक killer cells ( NK cells ).
Small lymphocytes consist of t कोशिकाएं और b कोशिकाएं.
Windows PowerShell is Microsoft 's task automation framework, consisting of a command-line शेल और संबद्ध एनक्रिप्शन भाषा निर्मित on.neT फ्रेमवर्क.
PowerShell provides full access to com और wmi, enabling प्रशासकों to perform administrative tasks on both local and remote Windows systems.
In PowerShell, प्रशासनिक कार्य हैं generally performed by cmdlets ( सुनाया command-lets ), जिससे are specialized.NET classes implementing a particular operation.
Sets of cmdlets may be combined together in scripts, executables ( which are स्टैंडअलोन अनुप्रयोग ), or by instantiating नियमित.neT वर्ग ( or wmi/com वस्तुएँ ).
These work by accessing data in different data stores, like the filesystem or रजिस्ट्री, जिससे हैं बना उपलब्धियाँ to the powershell runtime via Windows PowerShell providers.
Windows PowerShell also provides a hosting API with which the खिड़कियाँ powershell runtime can be अंतःस्थापित अंदर other applications.
These applications can then use खिड़कियाँ powershell कार्यक्षमता to implement certain operations, including those exposed via the graphical interface.
This capability रै महरूम प्रयुक्त by microsoft एक्सचेंज सर्वर 2007 to expose इसके प्रबन्धन कार्यक्षमता as PowerShell cmdlets and providers and implement the graphical management tools as PowerShell hosts which invoke the necessary cmdlets.
Other Microsoft applications including microsoft एसक्यूएल सर्वर 2008 भी expose उनके प्रबन्धन interface via PowerShell cmdlets.
With PowerShell, graphical interface-based प्रबन्धन अनुप्रयोग on खिड़कियाँ हैं परतदार on शीर्ष of खिड़कियाँ powershell.
A PowerShell scripting इंटरफ़ेस लिये खिड़कियाँ उत्पाद is mandated by the Common Engineering Criteria.
Windows PowerShell शामिल इसके अपना extensive, console-based help, similar to man pages in Unix shells, via the Get-Help cmdlet.
Mary Poppins is a 1964 musical फिल्मी अभिनीत जूली एंड्रयूज, लंड Van Dyke, David Tomlinson, and Glynis Johns, produced by Walt Disney, and based on the Mary Poppins books series by P. L. Travers.
The film was directed by Robert stevenson और लिखा by विधेयक वाल्श और डॉन dagradi, साथ गीतों by the शरमन भाइयो.
It was shot at Walt Disney studios in burbank, कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
Julie Andrews won the Academy Award for Best Actress for her performance as Mary poppins और the फिल्मी भी जीती ऑस्कर लिये बेहतरीन फिल्मी संपादन, असली म्यूज़िक स्कोर, बेहतरीन सोंग लिये `` chim chim Cher-ee '' and Best Visual Effects, and received a total of 13 nominations.
A story arc is an extended or continuing storyline in episodic storytelling मीडिया ऐसे as टेलीविज़न, कॉमिक किताबे, comic strips, boardgames, video games, and in some cases, films.
On a टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम, लिये उदाहरण, the story would unfold over many episodes.
In television, the use of the स्टोरी चाप is much अधिक आम in dramas than in comedies, especially in soap operas.
Webcomics are more likely to use story arcs than newspaper comics, as सबसे वेब कॉमिक्स have पठनीय अभिलेख ऑनलाइन कि a newcomer to the स्ट्रिप can पढ़ा in अनुक्रम to understand what is going on.
Although story arcs have existed for decades, the पद `` स्टोरी चाप '' थी coined in 1988 in संबंध to the टेलीविज़न श्रेणी wiseguy, और थी जल्दी adapted लिये अन्य उपयोग.
Many American comic book series are अभी लिखा in चार or six-issue arcs, भीतर a continuing series.
Short story arcs are easier to package as trade paperbacks लिये पुनर्विक्रय, और अधिक accessible to the कैज़ुअल रीडर than the never-ending निरंतरता that once characterised comics.
Black Friday is the day following थैंक्सगिविंग दिन in the संयुक्त राज्य, often regarded as the beginning of the Christmas shopping season.
In recent years, most major रिटेलर have खोली अत्यधिक जल्दी और offered promotional बिक्री to लात बंद the अवकाश shopping season, similar to Boxing Day sales in many Commonwealth Nations.
Black Friday is not an आधिकारिक पब्लिक अवकाश as ऐसे, लकिन अनेक non-retail कर्मचारी और स्कूलों have दोनो थैंक्सगिविंग और the day after off, followed by a weekend, thereby increasing the number of potential shoppers.
It has routinely been the busiest shopping day of the year since 2005, although news reports, which at कि समय यहूद inaccurate, have वर्णित it as the व्यस्ततम shopping day of the year for a much longer period of time.
The day 's name originated in Philadelphia, where it originally was used to describe the heavy and disruptive pedestrian और गाडी ट्रैफ़िक जिससे होता occur on the दिन बाद Thanksgiving.
Use of the पद प्रारंभ पहले 1961 और began to see broader use outside Philadelphia around 1975.
Later an वैकल्पिक स्पष्टीकरण began to be offered : कि `` ब्लैक शुक्रवार '' indicates the पाइंट at which retailers begin to turn a profit, or are `` ''.
For many years, it was common for retailers to खोलें at 6:00 a.m., लकिन in the लेट 2000s अनेक था crept to 5:00 or even 4:00.
This was taken to a new extreme in 2011, when several retailers ( सहित निशाना, kohl 's, macy 's, बेहतरीन ख़रीदे, और bealls ) opened at midnight for the first time.
In 2012, Walmart and several other retailers announced that they would open most of their stores at 8:00 p.m. on Thanksgiving Day ( except in states where खोलने on थैंक्सगिविंग is निषिद्ध due to ब्लू कानून, ऐसे as मैसाचुसेट्स जहाँ वे स्टिल खोली around मध्यरात्रि ), prompting काल्स लिये a walkout among some workers.
Black Friday shopping is known for attracting आक्रामक crowds, साथ सालाना रिपोर्ट्स of assaults, shootings, और throngs of लोगों trampling on other shoppers in an attempt to get the best deal on a product before supplies run out.
The परिवार कि preys is a 2008 अमरीकी फिल्म नाटक लिखा, produced, and directed by Tyler Perry.
The screenplay focuses on two families, one धनवान और the अन्य working क्लास, जिनकी जीवनदान हैं intertwined in दोनो प्रेम और business.
the फिल्म is the दूसरी of चार in जिससे पेरी 's signature character, Madea, does not make an appearance.
It is also the second perry-directed फिल्मी ( alongside पापा 's छोटी लड़कियों ) कि is नहीं आधारित on any of the filmmaker 's stage plays.
Net 10, Net 15, Net 30 and Net 60 ( also Net 10 days, et al ) are forms of trade credit which specify that the net amount ( the total outstanding on the invoice ) is expected to be सशुल्क in पूरा और प्राप्त by the विक्रेता भीतर 10, 15, 30 or 60 दिनों बाद the goods हैं dispatched or सेवा is समाप्त.
Net 30 or Net 60 शर्तें हैं प्रायः coupled साथ a क्रेडिट लिये early payment.
The word net in this भाव अर्थात् `` कुल बाद सब छूट. ''
It originally derives from the Latin nitere ( to shine ) and nitidus ( सुरुचिपूर्ण, trim ), और अधिक recently इससे the फ्रेंच जाल ( शार्प, neat, clean ).

The British West इंडीज यहूद the आइलैंड्स in और around the caribbean that were part of the British Empire.
In 1912, the British West Indies were divided into eight colonies : the बहामा, बारबाडोस, अंग्रेजों guiana, अंग्रेजों होंडुरास, जमैका ( साथ इसके dependencies the Turks and Caicos Islands and the Cayman Islands ), Trinidad and Tobago, the Windward Islands and the Leeward Islands.
Between 1958 and 1962, all of the island territories except the British Virgin Islands, the Bahamas, अंग्रेजों होंडुरास और अंग्रेजों guiana यहूद संगठित into the वेस्ट इंडीज संघ.
It was hoped that the Federation would become स्वतंत्र as a सिंगल स्वदेश, लकिन it था सीमित शक्तियां, अनेक व्यावहारिक problems, and a lack of popular support.
Consequently, the वेस्ट इंडीज संघ थी dissolved.
Most of the territories, including all the larger ones, are now independent as separate countries, with membership to many international forums such as the Organization of American States, the Association of Caribbean States, the संसार व्यापार संगठन, the संयुक्त राष्ट्र, the caribbean जातियाँ, the राष्ट्रमंडल of राष्ट्र और the caribbean विकास बैंको among others.
The शेष हैं अंग्रेजों विदेशी territories.
All the former nations of the British West Indies, except the Commonwealth of डोमिनिकन, गुयाना और त्रिनिदाद और टोबैगो, हैं राष्ट्रमंडल Realms.
The term is still used for British Overseas territories in the caribbean, such as the Cayman Islands.

`` What a Wonderful संसार '' is a सोंग लिखा by bob thiele ( as `` George Douglas '' ) and George David Weiss.
It was first अंकित by लुई आर्मस्ट्रांग और released as a single in 1967.
Thiele and वेइस यहूद दोनो prominent in the म्यूज़िक संसार ( thiele as a producer and Weiss as a composer/performer ).
आर्मस्ट्रांग 's रिकॉर्डिंग was inducted in the Grammy Hall of Fame in 1999.
The publishing for this सोंग is नियंत्रित by मेमोरी लेन म्यूज़िक समूह, कार्लिन म्यूज़िक corp., and Bug Music, Inc.
Inauguration Day 2009 on the वेस्ट कदम of the u.S. Capitol.
अध्यक्ष जार्ज W. बुश और पहला महिला लौरा बुश lead the inaugural parade down Pennsylvania Avenue to the White House, 2005
The inauguration of the president of the United States is a ceremonial इवेंट अंकन the शुरुआत of a नई four-year पद of a president of the United States.
The day a अध्यक्षीय उद्घाटन occurs is ज्ञात as `` उद्घाटन दिन '' और occurs on January 20 ( or 21st if the 20th is a Sunday ).
( Prior to the Twentieth amendment, the तिथि थी कूच 4, the दिन of the साल on जिससे the संविधान of the संयुक्त राज्य पहला took प्रभाव in 1789 ; the पिछला उद्घाटन to take place on the older date was Franklin D. Roosevelt 's first one on March 4, 1933. )
The most recent public अध्यक्षीय उद्घाटन रस्म, the swearing in of अध्यक्ष बराक ओबामा to शुरू उसके दूसरी four-year term in office, took place on Monday, January 21, 2013.
The only inauguration element mandated by the United States Constitution is that the president make an oath or affirmation पहले कि व्यक्ति can `` डालें on the निष्पादन '' of the दफ्तर of the presidency.
However, over the years, various traditions have arisen that have विस्तारित the उद्घाटन इससे a सरल oath-taking रस्म to a day-long इवेंट, सहित parades, speeches, and balls.
From the presidency of Andrew Jackson through कि of jimmy कार्टर, the प्राथमिक उद्घाटन दिन रस्म took place on the Capitol 's East Portico.
Since the 1981 inauguration of Ronald reagan, the रस्म रै महरूम आयोजित at the कैपिटल 's West Front.
The inaugurations of William Howard Taft in 1909 और reagan in 1985 यहूद स्थानांतरित indoors at the कैपिटल due to ठंडा weather.
The War of 1812 and World War II caused two inaugurations to be आयोजित at अन्य स्थितियाँ in Washington, D.C.
When George Washington was inaugurated, the oath was administered by रॉबर्ट livingston, चांसलर of नई यॉर्क राज्य, in 1789, और by विलियम Cushing, Associate Justice of the Supreme Court, in 1793.
Since Chief Justice Oliver Ellsworth swore in President John Adams, no chief justice has missed an उद्घाटन दिन.
When Inauguration Day has fallen on a संडे, the मुख्य इंसाफ रै administered the शपथ to the अध्यक्ष on the Sunday privately and then again the next day publicly.
When a new अध्यक्ष takes over mid-term due to the मौत or इस्तीफा of a अध्यक्ष, the शपथ of दफ्तर is administered लकिन औपचारिक, public inauguration events have not been held.
Stefani Joanne एंजेलीना germanotta ( ; born कूच 28, 1986 ), ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम महिला गागा, is an अमरीकी singer, songwriter, record producer, dancer, activist, businesswoman, fashion designer, actress and philanthropist.
Born and raised in New York City, she primarily studied at the कान्वेंट of the पवित्र दिल और briefly attended नई यॉर्क विश्वविद्यालयों 's tisch स्कूल of the Arts before withdrawing to focus on her musical career.
She soon began performing in the चट्टान म्यूज़िक scene of Manhattan 's Lower East Side.
By the end of 2007, record executive and producer Vincent Herbert signed her to उसके लेबल streamline रिकॉर्ड, an imprint of Interscope Records.
Initially working as a songwriter at Interscope Records, her vocal abilities captured the ध्यान of रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार एकॉन, जो भी हस्ताक्षरित उसके to Kon Live Distribution, his own label under Interscope.
Lady Gaga came to prominence as a रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार following the रिलीज of उसके डेब्यू एल्बम, the कीर्ति ( 2008 ), जिससे थी a नाजुक और वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी कि अव्वल चार्ट around the world and included the international number-one singles `` Just Dance `` and `` Poker Face ``.
After embarking on the The Fame Ball Tour, she followed the album with The Fame दानव ( 2009 ), जिससे शाखित the विश्वव्यापी hit singles `` ख़राब रोमांस ``, `` Telephone ``, and `` Alejandro ``.
The Fame Monsters success allowed her to embark on the eighteen-month long Monster Ball Tour, which later became एक of the highest-grossing कॉन्सर्ट टुर of all time.
Her most recent album, Born This Way ( 2011 ), topped the charts of most major markets and generated more अंतरराष्ट्रीय chart-topping singles, सहित `` born इस रास्ता ``, `` यहूदा ``, और `` the किनारे of महिमा ``.
Influenced by Britney Spears, David Bowie, Michael जैक्सन, मैडोना, और महारानी, महिला गागा is पहचाना लिये उसके flamboyant, विविध और outré योगदान to the music industry through her fashion, performances and music videos.
as of अक्तूबर 2011, वो रै बेची an अनुमानित 23 लाख एल्बम और 64 लाख singles worldwide and her singles are some of the best-selling worldwide.
Her achievements include five Grammy Awards and 13 एमटीवी वीडियो म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार.
Lady Gaga has consecutively appeared on Billboard magazine 's Artists of the Year ( scoring the definitive title in 2010 ), ranked fourth in VH1 's list of 100 महानतम महिलाओं in म्यूज़िक, is the छठे बेहतरीन selling डिजिटल singles कलाकार in us according to riaa, is regularly लगाई on सूचियाँ रचित by Forbes magazine and was named one of the most influential people in the world by Time magazine.
Besides her musical career, वो involves herself साथ humanitarian कल्याणकारी and LGBT activism.
mckethan स्टेडियम घर of Gator baseball
A चित्र of the 1924 Baseball team
The Florida Gators बेसबॉल टोली represents the विश्वविद्यालयों of फ्लोरिडा in the sport of baseball.
The Florida gators compete in प्रभाग i of the नेशनल कॉलेजिएट एथलेटिक्स Association ( NCAA ), and the Eastern Division of the Southeastern Conference ( SEC ).
They play their home games in Alfred A. McKethan Stadium on the university 's gainesville, फ्लोरिडा कैम्पस, और हैं फिलहाल led by सिर कोच केविन O'Sullivan.
In the ninety-eight season history of the Gators baseball कार्यक्रम, the टोली रै जीती बारह सेक championships और रै appeared in आठ कॉलेज संसार श्रेणी tournaments.

A political campaign is an organized effort which seeks to influence the निर्णय बनाना प्रक्रम भीतर a विशिष्ट समूह.
In democracies, political अभियान प्रायः refer to चुनावी अभियान, wherein representatives are chosen or referendums are decided.
In modern politics, the most high profile political campaigns are focused on candidates for सिर of राज्य or सिर of सरकारी, प्रायः a अध्यक्ष or Prime Minister.
Elizabeth Cady Stanton और उसके बेटी, harriot
Elizabeth Cady Stanton ( November 12, 1815 – October 26, 1902 ) थी an अमरीकी सोशल activist, abolitionist, और अग्रणी फिगर of the जल्दी महिलाओं 's rights movement.
Her Declaration of Sentiments, presented at the first women 's rights convention held in 1848 in Seneca Falls, New York, is often credited with initiating the पहला व्यवस्थित महिलाओं 's अधिकारों और महिलाओं 's suffrage आंदोलनों in the संयुक्त States.
Before Stanton narrowed her राजनैतिक फ़ोकस लगभग exclusively to महिलाओं 's अधिकारों, वो थी an क्रियाशील abolitionist together with her husband, Henry Brewster Stanton and cousin, Gerrit Smith.
Unlike many of those involved in the women 's अधिकारों गति, stanton addressed विभिन्न मुद्दे pertaining to महिलाओं परे मतदान rights.
Her concerns included women 's parental and custody rights, प्रॉपर्टी अधिकारों, नियुक्ति और आय अधिकारों, तलाक, the economic health of the family, and birth control.
She was also an outspoken supporter of the 19th-century temperance movement.
After the American Civil War, Stanton 's commitment to female suffrage caused a schism in the women 's अधिकारों गति जब वो, साथ साथ सुसान B. एंथोनी, अस्वीकृत to support ड्योढ़ी of the fourteenth और पंद्रहवीं amendments to the संयुक्त States Constitution.
She opposed giving added विधिक सुरक्षा और मतदान अधिकारों to African American men while women, black and white, were denied those same rights.
Her position on this issue, together with उसके विचार on व्यवस्थित christianity और महिलाओं 's मुद्दे परे मतदान अधिकारों, led to the गठन of दो पृथक महिलाओं 's अधिकारों संगठन कि यहूद आखिरकार rejoined, with Stanton as president of the joint organization, approximately twenty years after her break from the original women 's suffrage movement.
Stanton died in 1902 having authored both The स्त्री 's बाइबल और उसके आत्मकथा, साथ साथ अनेक आलेख और pamphlets concerning female suffrage and women 's rights.

the स्टोरी चिंताएं eliza doolittle, a काकनी पुष्प लड़की जो takes speech lessons from professor Henry Higgins, a phoneticist, so that she may pass as a well-born lady.
The musical 's 1956 Broadway production was a hit, setting what थी तब the रिकार्ड लिये the longest चलाएं of कोई प्रमुख musical थिएटर production in history.
It was followed by a hit लंदन उत्पादन, a popular film version, and numerous revivals.
It has महरूम पुकारा `` the perfect musical ''.
Deregulation is the अधिनियम or प्रक्रम of निकालना or reducing state regulations.
It is therefore opposite of regulation, which refers to the process of the सरकारी regulating निश्चित क्रियाएँ.

They क्रमांक around 50 million.

Ethnicity or ethnic group is a socially defined category आधारित on आम संस्कृति or राष्ट्रीयता.
Ethnicity can, but does not have to, शामिल आम ancestry, रूप, भोजन, ड्रेसिंग स्टाइल, heritage, history, language or dialect, religion, symbols, traditions, or other cultural factor.
Ethnic identity is constantly reinforced through आम विशेषताएँ जिससे नियत the समूह apart from other groups.

Solar energy, radiant light and heat from the सूर्य, रै महरूम harnessed by इंसानो चूंकि प्राचीन times using a range of ever-evolving technologies.
Solar energy technologies include solar heating, solar photovoltaics, सौर थर्मल विद्युत, सौर वास्तुकला और कृत्रिम photosynthesis, जिससे can मेक considerable contributions to solving some of the most urgent energy problems the world now faces.
Solar technologies are broadly characterized as either passive सौर or क्रियाशील सौर depending on the way they capture, convert and distribute solar energy.
क्रियाशील सौर तकनीकों शामिल the उपयोग of photovoltaic panels and solar thermal collectors to harness the energy.
Passive solar techniques include orienting a building to the सूर्य, selecting सामग्री साथ अनुकूल थर्मल द्रव्यमान or लाइट dispersing गुण, और डिजाइनिंग spaces that naturally circulate air.
In 2011, the International Energy Agency said that `` the विकास of सस्ती, inexhaustible और साफ सौर उर्जा technologies होगा have विशाल longer-term benefits.
It will increase countries’ energy security through reliance on an indigenous, inexhaustible और ज़्यादातर import-independent संसाधन, बढ़ाएँ स्थिरता, reduce प्रदूषण, निम्नतर the लागत of mitigating जलवायु बदलें, and keep fossil fuel prices lower than otherwise.
These लाभ हैं वैश्विक.
Hence the additional costs of the incentives for early deployment चाहिए be माना सीखना निवेश ; they must be wisely spent and need to be widely shared ''.
The classical Latin alphabet or Roman alphabet evolved इससे a पश्चिमी किस्में of the यूनानी वर्णमाला पुकारा the cumaean वर्णमाला, जिससे थी adopted and modified by the Etruscans who ruled early Rome.
The etruscan वर्णमाला थी in फेरे अपनाया और further परिवर्धित by the ancient Romans to write the Latin language.
During the Middle आयु, the लैटिन वर्णमाला थी adapted to रोमांस भाषाएं, direct descendants of Latin, as well as to Celtic, Germanic, Baltic, and some Slavic languages.
With the age of colonialism and ईसाई इंजीलवाद, the लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट थी स्प्रेड विदेशी, और लागू to स्वदेशी American, Australian, Austronesian, Austroasiatic, and African languages.
More recently, linguists have also tended to prefer the Latin script or the International Phonetic Alphabet ( itself largely आधारित on लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट ) जब transcribing or बनाना लिखा मानकों लिये non-european भाषाएं, such as the African reference alphabet.
The term Latin alphabet may refer to either the alphabet used to write Latin ( as described in this आलेख ), or अन्य alphabets आधारित on the लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट, जिससे is the मौलिक नियत of अक्षर आम to the various alphabets descended from the classical Latin one, such as the English alphabet.
These latin-derived alphabets may छोड़ें अक्षर, जैसे the rotokas वर्णमाला, or add new letters, like the Danish and Norwegian alphabet.
Letter आकार have बदला over the centuries, including the creation for Medieval Latin of lower case forms which did not exist in the Classical period.
The assassination of संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्ष अब्राहम lincoln took place on Good Friday, April 14, 1865, as the American Civil War was drawing to a close.
The assassination occurred पाँच दिनों बाद the कमांडर of the confederate फौज of उत्तरी वर्जिनिया, सामान्य रॉबर्ट E. Lee, surrendered to Lieutenant General Ulysses S. Grant and the Union Army of the Potomac.
Lincoln was the पहला अमरीकी अध्यक्ष to be assassinated, हालांकि an unsuccessful attempt था महरूम made on Andrew Jackson 30 years before in 1835.
The हत्या थी नियोजित और carried आउट by the well-known स्टेज कर्ता जॉन wilkes बूथ, as भाग of a larger conspiracy in a bid to revive the Confederate cause.
Booth 's co-conspirators were लुईस पावेल और दाउद herold, जो यहूद आबंटित to मार सचिव of राज्य विलियम H. Seward, and George Atzerodt who was to kill Vice President Andrew Johnson.
By simultaneously eliminating the top three people in the प्रशासन, बूथ और उसके co-conspirators hoped to sever the continuity of the United States government.
Lincoln was shot while watching the खेल हमारी अमरीकी cousin साथ उसके बीवी मरियम टॉड lincoln at घाट 's थिएटर in वॉशिंगटन, D.C. on the night of April 14, 1865.
He died जल्दी the अगला morning.
The rest of the conspirators ' plot failed ; Powell only प्रबंधित to घाव seward, जबकि atzerodt, जॉनसन 's would-be हत्यारे, lost his nerve and fled Washington.

Plug-in ( computing ), a piece of software which enhances another software अनुप्रयोग और प्रायः can नहीं be चलाएं independently
ब्राउजर एक्सटेंशन, जिससे modifies the इंटरफ़ेस and/or behavior of web browsers

Video game accessory, a piece of hardware used in संयोजन साथ a वीडियो game console for playing video games
क्लबों स्तर seating is a खास खण्ड of seating in modern sports stadiums.
The Club स्तर is प्रायः स्तिथ towards the मध्य of the stage of seating sections, above the lower deck but below the upper deck.
They are usually right next to the Luxury Boxes, either right above, सही नीचे, or sandwiched between दो स्तर of लक्ज़री बाक्स.
Club Level seating is माना as उच्चतर क्लास than बैठे anywhere else in the arena, but lower class compared to the Luxury Boxes.
Unlike the Luxury Boxes, most club levels do not रैप entirely around the एरिना.
Some club levels stop at a certain point, giving way to an विस्तार of the मेज़ानाइन, जबकि अन्य दे रास्ता to lower class Luxury Boxes ( such as `` Party Suites '' ).
A notable एक्सेप्शन to इस is अमीरात स्टेडियम in London, which has a complete tier of club seating.
Club Levels allow fans अनेक स्तर of entertainment.
Club Level seating is open to the elements, as opposed to the entirely enclosed luxury boxes, जिससे देता अधिक of an बाहरी छाप at roofless और open-roof स्टेडियम and arenas.
Club Level seating is normally bought on a अनुबंध आधार to allow लिये अधिकतम लाभ on the part of the stadium.
The Club स्तर provides प्रशंसक साथ खास अभिगम to an अंदर part of the arena exclusive to fans with special tickets.
ये क्षेत्रों हैं एयर conditioned और allow access to special restaurants, merchandise stands, and lounge areas of the stadium that are not otherwise available.
Concession stands and vendors on the Club Level also often offer different menus than in other stands to दे अधिक of a खास महसूस to the क्लबों.
These areas हैं बंद बंद to the बाकी of the स्टेडियम, और वे usually can only be accessed through the exclusive, private club entrances.
Sophia Loren ( ; born Sofia Villani scicolone ; 20 सितंबर 1934 ) is an इतालवी actress.
Loren is widely पहचाना as इटली 's सबसे प्रसिद्ध and honored actress.
She was the first actress of the talkie era to जीत an अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये a non-english-speaking प्रदर्शन, लिये उसके portrayal of cesira in Vittorio De Sica 's Two Women.
Her other awards include a Grammy पुरस्कार, पाँच खास सुनहरी ग्लोब्स, a bafta पुरस्कार and a Laurel Award.
In 1995 she received the सेसिल B. demille पुरस्कार लिये आजीवन उपलब्धियाँ, एक of many such awards.
Her films include : Houseboat ( 1958 ), El Cid ( 1961 ), Yesterday, आज और कल ( 1963 ), विवाह italian-style ( 1964 ), और a खास Day ( 1977 ).
In बाद सालो वो रै appeared in अमरीकी blockbusters ऐसे as Grumpier Old Men ( 1995 ), and Nine ( 2009 ).
In 1994 she starred in Robert Altman 's Prêt-à-Porter, which earned her a सुनहरी ग्लोब नामांकन the वही साल.
She has also achieved critical and वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी in tv फिल्मों ऐसे as Courage ( 1986 ).

Incidence of suicide is underreported due to दोनो धार्मिक और सोशल pressures, और संभवतः completely unreported in some areas.
Nevertheless, from reported मामले, निश्चित रुझान are apparent.
Since the data is skewed, comparing आत्महत्या दरों between राष्ट्र is statistically unsound.
The trends themselves हैं नहीं the cause, but may be indicative of a root cause.

It has about 13 लाख बेतार users.

हॉस्पिटल आपात कोड हैं प्रयुक्त in अस्पताल विश्वव्यापी to alert staff to various emergencies.
The use of codes is intended to convey essential information जल्दी और साथ minimal गलतफहमी to स्टाफ, जबकि preventing तनाव और panic among visitors to the hospital.
These codes may be posted on placards throughout the hospital, or मुद्रित on कर्मचारी पहचान बैज लिये तैयार सन्दर्भ.
Back of a hospital ID बैज प्रर्दशित विपत्ति codes.
Hospital emergency codes may denote अलग कार्यक्रम at अलग अस्पताल, सहित nearby ones.
Because many physicians work at अधिक than एक सुविधा, इस may सीसे to भ्रम in emergencies, so uniform systems have been proposed.
The route of the eifel जलसेतु, साथ इसके औसत slope.
The Eifel Aqueduct थी एक of the longest aqueducts of the रोमन साम्राज्य.
The aqueduct, constructed in ad 80, carried जल कुछ इससे the hilly eifel प्रदेश of what is now Germany to the ancient city of Colonia Claudia Ara Agrippinensium ( present-day Cologne ).
If the auxiliary spurs to अतिरिक्त स्रोतों हैं शामिल, the length was.
The construction थी लगभग entirely नीचे मैदान, और the प्रवाह of the जल was produced entirely by gravity.
A few bridges, including one up to in लंबाई, यहूद needed to pass over घाटियों.
Unlike some of the other famous Roman aqueducts, the eifel जलसेतु थी specifically designed to minimize the above-ground portion to protect it from damage and freezing.
In chemistry, a disulfide bond ( Br.E. disulphide बंध ) is a covalent बंध, प्रायः निकला by the coupling of two thiol groups.
The linkage is भी पुकारा an SS-bond or disulfide bridge.
The overall कनेक्टिविटी is इसलिए R-S-S-R.
The शब्दावली is widely प्रयुक्त in biochemistry.
In formal terms, the कनेक्शन is a persulfide, in सादृश्य to इसके congener, परऑक्साइड ( r-o-o-r ), लकिन इस शब्दावली is अस्पष्ट and is no longer used ( except in reference to R-S-S-H or H-S-S-H compounds ).
Formal depiction of disulfide बंध गठन as an ऑक्सीकरण.

Religion in the United किंगडम और in the देशों कि preceded it, रै महरूम वर्चस्व, for over 1,400 years, by various forms of Christianity.
According to some surveys, a majority of citizens still identify साथ christianity, हालांकि नियमित गिरिजाघर उपस्थिति रै गिरे dramatically चूंकि the मध्य of the 20th सदी, और आव्रजन और जनसांख्यिकी बदलें have contributed to the growth of other faiths.
Religious affiliations of UK citizens हैं अंकित by नियमित सर्वेक्षण, the चार प्रमुख ones होने the uk जनसांख्यिकी, the Labour Force Survey, the British Social Attitudes survey and the European Social Survey.
According to the 2001 UK census, christianity is the प्रमुख धर्म, followed by islam, हिंदुत्व, sikhism, Judaism and Buddhism in terms of number of adherents.
This, and the relatively large number of individuals with nominal or no religious संबद्धों रै led टीकाकारों to variously describe the संयुक्त किंगडम as a multi-faith, secularised, or post-Christian society.
The United Kingdom was formed by the union of previously independent देशों इससे 1707, और नतीजतन सबसे of the largest religious groups do not have UK-wide organisational structures.
While some groups have separate structures for the individual countries of the संयुक्त किंगडम, अन्य may have a सिंगल ढांचा covering England and Wales or Great Britain.
Similarly, due to the relatively recent creation of Northern Ireland in 1921, सबसे प्रमुख धार्मिक समूह in उत्तरी आयरलैंड are organised on an all-Ireland basis.
The 1967 Newark riots were a major civil disturbance that occurred in the नगर of न्यूर्क, नई जर्सी between July 12 and July 17, 1967.
The six days of rioting, लूटने, और विनाश बाएँ 26 dead and hundreds injured.
In संयुक्त राज्य कॉलेज एथलेटिक्स, redshirt is a विलंब or बर्खास्तगी of an खिलाड़ी 's participation in order to lengthen his or her period of eligibility.
Typically, a student 's athletic eligibility in a given sport is four seasons, a number derived from the four years of academic classes that are सामान्यतः जरूरी to obtain a स्नातक 's उपाधि at an अमरीकी कॉलेज or university.
however, a छात्र खिलाड़ी may be offered the अवसर to redshirt लिये up to दो सालो, जिससे allows the athlete to spread those four years of eligibility over five, or sometimes six years.
In a redshirt year, a student athlete may attend classes at the college or university, अभ्यास साथ an एथलेटिक टोली, और पोशाक लिये खेल लकिन he or वो may नहीं compete दौरान the game.
Using this mechanism, a student athlete has up to पाँच अकादमिक सालो to उपयोग the चार सालो of पात्रता, यूँ बनने a fifth-year वरिष्ठ.
The term is प्रयुक्त as a क्रिया, संज्ञा, and adjective.
For example, a कोच may चुनें to redshirt a खिलाड़ी जो is तब referred to as a redshirt freshman or simply a redshirt.
the विपरीत of इस is a `` true freshman. ''
World War I ( WWI ) was a वैश्विक युद्ध केंद्रित in यूरोपीय कि began on 28 July 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918.
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great War from इसके occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of संसार युद्ध ii in 1939, और the पहला World War or World War I thereafter.
It involved all the world 's great powers, which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple entente of the संयुक्त किंगडम, फ़्रांस और रूस ) और the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the ट्रिपल गठबंधन of जर्मनी, austria-hungary और इटली ; लकिन, as austria–hungary था लिया the offensive against the agreement, Italy did not enter into the war ).
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the war : Italy, Japan and the United राज्य joined the allies, और the उस्मानी साम्राज्य और बुल्गारिया the सेंट्रल शक्तियां.
Ultimately, more than 70 million military कर्मियों, सहित 60 लाख europeans, यहूद mobilised in एक of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 million combatants were killed, largely because of technological advancements that led to विशाल increases in the lethality of हथियार बगैर सम्बन्धित सुधार in सुरक्षा or mobility.
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history, subsequently paving the रास्ता लिये विभिन्न राजनैतिक परिवर्तन, ऐसे as revolutions in अनेक of the nations involved.
One of the long-term causes of the war was the पुनरुत्थान of साम्राज्यवाद in the विदेशी नीतियों of the ग्रेट powers of Europe.
More immediately, the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, the heir to the throne of austria-hungary, on 28 जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered a राजनयिक संकट जब austria-hungary subsequently वितरित an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the previous decades were invoked.
Within weeks, the major powers were at war and, via their colonies, the conflict जल्द स्प्रेड around the संसार.
On 28 July, the austro-hungarians fired the पहला गोलियाँ of the war as preparation for the invasion of Serbia.
While the Russians mobilised, the germans invaded न्यूट्रल बेल्जियम और ध्वज on the रास्ता to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany.
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called चमत्कार of the marne —the पश्चिमी सामने settled into a स्थिर बैटल of अपघर्षण with a trench line that changed little until 1917.
On the Eastern Front, the Russian army was successful against the austro-hungarians, लकिन थी रोका in इसके आक्रमण of ईस्ट prussia by the Germans.
In November the Ottoman साम्राज्य joined the युद्ध, खोलने up fronts in the काकेशस, मेसोपोटामिया and the Sinai.
Italy and Bulgaria went to war in 1915 और रोमानिया in 1916.
in रूस, the त्सार 's सरकारी collapsed in कूच 1917 और a subsequent revolution in November brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers.
After a 1918 जर्मनी अप्रिय साथ the पश्चिमी सामने, the allies drove वापस the germans in a श्रेणी of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, which had its अपना ट्रबल साथ क्रांतिकारियों, सहमत to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The war ended in विजय लिये the Allies.
Events on the home fronts were as उग्र as on the बैटल fronts, as the भागीदार आजमाया to mobilize उनके जनशक्ति और economic resources to fight a total war.
By the end of the war, चार प्रमुख इम्पीरियल powers—the जर्मनी, रूसी, austro-hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist.
The successor राज्य of the पूर्व दो खोया a ग्रेट राशि of territory, while the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The मैप of सेंट्रल यूरोपीय थी redrawn into several smaller states.
The League of Nations थी formed in the आशा of preventing another such conflict.
The European nationalism spawned by the युद्ध और the ब्रेकअप of empires, the परखना of जर्मनी 's defeat and problems with the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II.
Map of countries that घोषित themselves to be समाजवादी राज्य अंतर्गत the marxist–leninist or माओवादी परिभाषा - कि is to say, `` Communist states '' - between 1979 and 1983.
This period चिह्नित the महानतम territorial extent of Communist states.
A communist राज्य is a राज्य जहाँ the अर्थात् of उत्पादन are collectively owned by the society.
It has a form of government characterized by single-party rule or dominant-party rule of a communist party ( referred as तानाशाही of the proletariat by इसके proponents ) और a professed allegiance to a Leninist or Marxist–Leninist ideology as the guiding principle of the state.
Technically, `` communist state '' is a contradictio in terminis as a कम्युनिस्ट समाज as पारिभाषित by दोनो माक्र्सवादी और anarcho-communists is in principle stateless.
From this perspective, the term Marxist-Leninist राज्य is अधिक उचित.
Historically, a `` communist state '' referred to a system where public ownership of all or most means of production by the Communist party -run state is deemed necessary to further the interests of the working class ; today, a कम्युनिस्ट राज्य can भी, लिये उदाहरण, refer to समकालीन चीन और वियतनाम, जहाँ a कम्युनिस्ट party-run राज्य exists alongside a मिश्रित economy.
according to marxist–leninists, the राज्य is a औजार in the हैंड्स of the ruling class, which in a socialist society is the working class, so a socialist state is, according to Leninists, a state of the working class.
In practice, communist states do नहीं दरअसल refer to themselves as ऐसे.
They do this not to disguise the fact that the सत्ताधारी पार्टी is कम्युनिस्ट, लकिन बल्कि क्युकी वे do नहीं consider themselves to be a communist society at present.
Instead, they constitutionally identify themselves as समाजवादी राज्य or मजदूर ' states.
The primary goal of these states, which also explains उनके आधिकारिक नाम, is to मार्गदर्शिका उनके संबंधित देशों in the प्रक्रम of भवन समाजवादी, ultimately leading to communism.
Communist states may have several legal political parties, but the communist party is usually granted a special or dominant role in government, प्रायः by statute or अंतर्गत the संविधान.
Consequently, the institutions of the state and of the communist party become intimately entwined, ऐसे as in the विकास of parallel institutions.
In the 20th century, most कम्युनिस्ट राज्य अपनाया नियोजित economies.
However, there were exceptions : The Soviet Union during the 1920s and late 1980s and यूगोस्लाविया बाद संसार युद्ध ii अनुमत सीमित बाज़ार और a उपाधि of कार्यकर्ता self-management, जबकि चीन, वियतनाम और लाओस introduced far-reaching market reforms after the 1980s.
In the 21st century, China and वियतनाम have अनुमत a मिश्रित अर्थव्यवस्था to develop.
The fundamental अवधारणाओं of कम्युनिस्ट राज्य प्रायः diverge इससे the असली socio-economic ideologies from which they develop.
As a result, many adherents of ये विचारधाराओं प्रायः oppose the राजनैतिक systems commonly associated with these states.
For example, dissenting communists such as Trotskyists were often opposed to the communist राज्य of the 20th सदी, claiming either कि वे था nothing to do साथ `` रियल '' साम्यवादी or कि the विचारधारा of ऐसे राज्य था पहुँचे a पाइंट of अटल भ्रष्टाचार.
Michael Fred Phelps II ( born June 30, 1985 ) is a retired American तैराक और the सबसे सजा ओलंपियन of सब समय, साथ a total of 22 medals.
Phelps भी holds the all-time रिकॉर्ड लिये ओलम्पिक सुनहरा medals ( 18, दोगुना the दूसरी उच्चतम record holders ), Olympic gold medals in individual events ( 11 ), and Olympic medals in individual events for a male ( 13 ).
In winning eight gold medals at the 2008 Beijing Games, Phelps took the record for the सबसे first-place finishes at कोई सिंगल ओलम्पिक Games.
Five of those victories यहूद in व्यक्तिगत कार्यक्रम, tying the single Games record.
In the 2012 Summer Olympics in लंदन, फेल्प्स जीती चार golds और दो चांदी medals, बनाना उसे the सबसे कामयाब खिलाड़ी of the Games for the third Olympics in a row.
Phelps is the long course world recordholder in the 100-meter butterfly, 200-meter तितली और 400-meter व्यक्तिगत medley as खूब as the पूर्व long कोर्स संसार recordholder in the 200-meter freestyle and 200-meter individual medley.
He has won a कुल of 71 medals in प्रमुख अंतरराष्ट्रीय long-course प्रतियोगिता, 57 सुनहरा, 11 silver, and three bronze spanning the Olympics, the World, and the Pan Pacific Championships.
Phelps 's international titles and record-breaking प्रदर्शन have अर्जित उसे the संसार तैराक of the साल पुरस्कार सात टाइम्स और American Swimmer of the Year Award nine times as well as the FINA Swimmer of the Year Award in 2012.
His unprecedented Olympic कामयाबी in 2008 अर्जित फेल्प्स खेल illustrated magazine 's Sportsman of the Year award.
After the 2008 Summer Olympics, Phelps प्रारंभ the माइकल फेल्प्स न्यास, जिससे focuses on growing the खेल of swimming and promoting healthier lifestyles.
He expects to do further work with उसके न्यास बाद the 2012 ओलंपिक, जिससे he has said will be his last.
Lenovo Group Limited ( ) is a चाइनीज बहुराष्ट्रीय कंप्यूटर हार्डवेयर और इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स कम्पनी साथ इसके मुख्यालय in बीजिंग, चीन and Morrisville, North Carolina and its registered office in Hong Kong, China.
Its products शामिल निजी कंप्यूटर, टैब्लेट कंप्यूटर, मोबाईल फोन, workstations, सर्वर, इलेक्ट्रॉनिक storage devices, IT management software and smart televisions.
Lenovo is the संसार 's second-largest pc विक्रेता by 2012 unit sales.
It markets the थिंकपैड लकीर of कोपी कंप्यूटर and the ThinkCentre line of desktops.
Lenovo रै परिचालन in अधिक than 60 देशों and sells its products in around 160 countries.
Lenovo was founded in Beijing in 1984 and incorporated in हांग काँग in 1988 अंतर्गत इसके पिछला नाम, लेजेंड.
Lenovo is listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the हैंग सेंग china-affiliated Corporations Index.
Slug is a आम नाम लिये an जाहिर shell-less terrestrial gastropod mollusk.
The word `` slug '' is also often used as part of the आम नाम of कोई gastropod mollusc कि रै no शेल, रै a बहुत घटाया शेल, or has only a small internal shell.
( This is in contrast to the common name `` snail ``, which is applied to gastropods that have a नतीजे शेल कि is विशाल पर्याप्त कि the नरम भाग of the animal can retract fully into it. )
Slugs exist on land and in the sea, and there is भी एक genus of freshwater slugs, acochlidium.
The unadorned word `` slug '' is however applied primarily to land slugs, whereas slugs इससे the समुद्र or इससे freshwater हैं प्रायः referred to as `` समुद्र slugs `` और `` freshwater slugs ''.
Land gastropods with a shell that is नहीं काफी vestigial, लकिन is too छोटी to retract into ( like many in the family Urocyclidae ), are known as semislugs.
The various taxonomic families of slugs form part of अनेक काफी अलग विकासवादी lineages जिससे also include snails.
Thus, for example, the various परिवारों of जमीन slugs हैं नहीं बहुत closely सम्बन्धित to एक another, despite a superficial similarity in the overall body form.
The shell-less condition has arisen अनेक टाइम्स independently दौरान the विकासवादी पास्ट, और यूँ the श्रेणी `` slug '' is emphatically a polyphyletic one.
Slugs, जैसे सब अन्य gastropods, undergo torsion ( a 180° twisting of the internal organs ) during development.
Internally, slug anatomy clearly shows the effects of this rotation, but externally the लाशें of जमीन slugs appear to be अधिक or कम सममित, मगर लिये the positioning of the pneumostome, which is on one side of the animal, normally the right hand side.
The soft, slimy bodies of slugs are prone to desiccation, so land-living slugs are confined to नम environments और जरूर रिट्रीट to नम छुपाना स्थान जब the मौसम is dry.
The subsequent सूचना in इस आलेख applies to land slugs.
is a Latin word that means `` यूँ '' or, in लिखने, `` it was thus in the source material ''.

sic, cluj, a कम्यून in Romania

`` ( sic ) '', a song by अमरीकी बैंड slipknot on the album Slipknot

SiC, Silicon carbide, a semiconducting सामग्री, भी प्रयुक्त to मेक धातुकर्म tools

San Isidro Club, an अर्जेंटाइन रग्बी union club

second-in-command in the field of aviation
sistema interconectado सेंट्रल power grid in Chile
Sociedade Independente de comunicação ( sic ), a टेलीविज़न चैनल in पुर्तगाल

Segmented Integer काउंटर विधि, a विधि of आपरेशन in cryptography
Sepang International Circuit, a high-end racetrack कि होस्ट the मलेशियाई round of Formula 1
शंघाई अंतरराष्ट्रीय सर्किट, a मोटर racing venue in Shanghai, China
Simplified instructional computer, a hypothetical कंप्यूटर प्रयुक्त in प्रणालियों प्रोग्रामिंग
SIC ( Sons Idées Couleurs ), an जल्दी twentieth-century आर्ट पत्रिका उत्पादित by French author Pierre Albert-Birot
Southeastern Illinois College, a दो साल जूनियर कॉलेज in harrisburg, इलिनोइस, United States
Specific inductive capacity, abbreviated to sic, जिससे is अधिक commonly ज्ञात as the सापेक्ष विद्युतशीलता or the dielectric constant
St Ignatius ' कॉलेज, riverview, a जेसुइट स्कूल in Sydney, Australia
Imperial मानक of नेपोलियन I
नेपोलियन बोनापार्ट (, ; 15 अगस्त 1769 – 5 may 1821 ) थी a फ्रेंच सैन्य और राजनैतिक नेता जो रोज़ to prominence during the latter stages of the French Revolution and its associated wars in Europe.
As नेपोलियन i, he थी सम्राट of the French from 1804 to 1815.
His legal reform, the Napoleonic Code, has been a major influence on many civil विधि jurisdictions विश्वव्यापी, लकिन he is बेहतरीन remembered लिये उसके भूमिका in the युद्धों led विरूद्ध फ़्रांस by a श्रेणी of coalitions, the so-called Napoleonic Wars.
He established आधिपत्य over सबसे of महाद्वीपीय यूरोपीय और sought to स्प्रेड the आदर्शों of the फ्रेंच क्रान्ति, जबकि consolidating an इम्पीरियल monarchy which restored aspects of the deposed Ancien Régime.
Due to his success in these wars, often against numerically superior enemies, he is generally regarded as एक of the महानतम सैन्य कमांडरों of सब समय, और उसके अभियान हैं पढ़ाई at सैन्य academies worldwide.
Napoleon थी born at ajaccio in corsica in a परिवार of प्रतिष्ठित इतालवी ancestry which had settled Corsica in the 16th century.
he प्रशिक्षित as an तोपखाने officer in mainland France.
he रोज़ to prominence अंतर्गत the फ्रेंच पहला गणतंत्र और led कामयाब अभियान विरूद्ध the पहला and Second Coalitions arrayed against France.
He led a successful आक्रमण of the इतालवी प्रायद्वीप.
In 1799, he मंचन a तख्तापलट d'état और संस्थापित खुद as पहला कौंसुल ; पाँच सालो later the French Senate proclaimed him emperor, following a plebiscite in his favour.
In the first decade of the 19th century, the फ्रेंच साम्राज्य अंतर्गत नेपोलियन सगाई in a श्रेणी of conflicts—the napoleonic युद्धों —that शामिल प्रत्येक major European power.
After a streak of victories, France secured a dominant स्थिति in महाद्वीपीय यूरोपीय, और नेपोलियन कायम the फ्रेंच गोला of influence through the formation of extensive alliances and the appointment of friends and family members to rule other European countries as French client states.
The प्रायद्वीपीय युद्ध और 1812 फ्रेंच आक्रमण of रूस marked turning points in Napoleon 's fortunes.
His Grande Armée was badly damaged in the campaign और never fully बरामद.
In 1813, the Sixth Coalition defeated his शक्तियां at लिपजिग ; the following साल the गठबन्धन invaded फ़्रांस, मजबूर नेपोलियन to abdicate and exiled him to the island of Elba.
Less than a साल बाद, he फरार एल्बा और लौटे to power, but was defeated at the Battle of Waterloo in June 1815.
Napoleon spent the पिछला छह सालो of उसके जीवन in confinement by the British on the island of Saint Helena.
An autopsy concluded he died of पेट कर्कट, लकिन वहीँ रै महरूम कुछ बहस about the cause of his death, as some scholars have speculated that he was a victim of arsenic poisoning.
This is a कालानुक्रमिक लिस्टिंग of the संयुक्त States Senators from Pennsylvania.
United राज्य सीनेटरों हैं popularly निर्वाचित, for a six-year term, beginning January 3.
Elections are आयोजित the पहला मंगलवार बाद November 1.
Before 1914, they were chosen by the Pennsylvania General सभा, और पहले 1935, उनके शर्तें began March 4.
The South Africa national rugby संघ टोली ( ज्ञात as the springboks ) represents दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी in rugby union.
They compete in the सालाना रग्बी चैंपियनशिप, साथ साथ southern-hemisphere counterparts Argentina, Australia and New Zealand.
They have जीती इस चैंपियनशिप on three occasions in sixteen years.
They are currently ranked second in the संसार by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय रग्बी फलक, और यहूद नामित 2008 संसार टोली of the साल at the Laureus World Sports Awards.
Although South Africa was instrumental in the creation of the Rugby World Cup प्रतियोगिता, the springboks किया नहीं compete in the पहला दो संसार cups in 1987 और 1991 क्युकी of anti-apartheid sporting boycotts of South Africa.
The team made its World Cup debut in 1995, when the newly लोकतांत्रिक दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी hosted the टूर्नामेंट.
The Springboks then defeated the सब अश्वेतों 15–12 in the फाइनल, जिससे is अभी remembered as one of the greatest moments in South Africa 's sporting history, and a watershed moment in the post-Apartheid nation-building process.
South Africa regained their title as champions 12 सालो बाद, जब वे पराजित इंग्लैण्ड 15–6 in the 2007 फाइनल.
As a result of the 2007 World कप टूर्नामेंट the springboks यहूद प्रचारित to पहला प्लेस in the आईआरबी संसार rankings, a स्थिति they held until July the following year when New Zealand regained the top spot.
The Springboks play in ग्रीन और सुनहरा jerseys, और उनके प्रतीक हैं the Springbok and the Protea.
The side has been playing अंतरराष्ट्रीय रग्बी चूंकि 1891, जब a अंग्रेजों isles पक्ष toured the स्वदेश, playing South Africa in their first Test on 30 July.
South Africa was coached by Jake White, who led the Boks to the 2007 World Cup title, announcing उसके इस्तीफा effectively इससे the end of 2007.
His replacement 's ( Peter de Villiers ) अनुबंध समाप्त in 2011, following a 11–9 शिकस्त to ऑस्ट्रेलिया in the रग्बी संसार Cup quarter-final, who then stated he would not be signing a new deal.
the पिछला कप्तान थी जॉन smit, जो पहले he रिटायर्ड in 2011 निभाई hooker for most of his career, although he has also been a prop, mainly in 2008 and 2009.
Due to Smit being unavailable for the November 2010 Tests after surgery, lock विक्टर matfield took smit 's प्लेस as कप्तान लिये कि दौरे.
The वर्तमान कप्तान is जां de Villiers.
The Battle of Gettysburg (, with an sound ), was लड़ा जुलाई 1–3, 1863, in और around the कस्बा of Gettysburg, Pennsylvania.
It was the battle साथ the largest क्रमांक of हताहत in the अमरीकी Civil War and is often described as the war 's turning point.
Union Maj. Gen. जार्ज गॉर्डन meade 's फौज of the potomac पराजित हमले by confederate gen. रॉबर्ट E. Lee 's Army of Northern Virginia, ending Lee 's invasion of the North.
After his success at Chancellorsville in Virginia in may 1863, ली led उसके फौज through the shenandoah घाटी to शुरू उसके दूसरी आक्रमण of the north—the gettysburg Campaign.
With his army in high spirits, Lee intended to शिफ़्ट the फ़ोकस of the गर्मियाँ अभियान इससे war-ravaged उत्तरी वर्जिनिया और hoped to influence उत्तरी राजनेता to दे up उनके अभियोजन of the war by penetrating as far as Harrisburg, Pennsylvania, or even Philadelphia.
Prodded by President Abraham Lincoln, maj. gen. जोसेफ वेश्या स्थानांतरित उसके फौज in pursuit, लकिन थी सुकून बस तीन days before the battle and replaced by Meade.
Elements of the two armies initially collided at Gettysburg on July 1, 1863, as Lee तत्काल concentrated उसके शक्तियां वहीँ, उसके उद्देश्य होने to engage the संघ फौज और destroy it.
Low ridges to the northwest of town यहूद defended initially by a संघ प्यादे प्रभाग अंतर्गत ब्रिगेडियर. gen. जॉन buford, and soon reinforced with two corps of Union infantry.
However, दो विशाल confederate corps फहरा उन्हें इससे the उत्तरपश्चिम और उत्तर, collapsing the hastily विकसित संघ लाइनों, sending the defenders retreating through the streets of town to the hills just to the south.
On the second day of बैटल, सबसे of both armies had assembled.
The Union line was laid out in a रक्षात्मक गठन resembling a fishhook.
In the late afternoon of जुलाई 2, ली शुभारम्भ a भारी उत्पीड़न on the संघ left flank, and fierce fighting raged at Little Round Top, the Wheatfield, Devil 's Den, and the Peach Orchard.
On the Union right, demonstrations escalated into full-scale assaults on culp 's Hill and Cemetery Hill.
All across the battlefield, despite significant नुकसान, the संघ defenders आयोजित उनके lines.
On the third day of battle, July 3, fighting resumed on Culp 's Hill, and cavalry battles raged to the east and south, but the main event was a dramatic infantry उत्पीड़न by 12,500 confederates विरूद्ध the बीच of the संघ लकीर on कब्रिस्तान लकीरें, ज्ञात as पिकेट 's Charge.
The charge थी repulsed by संघ राइफल और artillery fire, at great losses to the Confederate army.
Lee led his army on a torturous रिट्रीट वापस to वर्जिनिया.
Between 46,000 और 51,000 सैनिको इससे दोनो सेना were casualties in the three-day battle.
That November, अध्यक्ष lincoln प्रयुक्त the समर्पण रस्म लिये the gettysburg नेशनल Cemetery to honor the fallen Union soldiers and redefine the purpose of the war in his historic Gettysburg Address.
An academic discipline, or field of study, is a branch of ज्ञान कि is सिखाया और शोधकार्य at the कॉलेज or university level.
Disciplines are defined ( in part ), and recognized by the academic journals in which research is प्रकाशित, और the सीखे समाजों और अकादमिक विभाग or faculties to जिससे उनके practitioners belong.
However, वहीँ exists no औपचारिक मापदण्ड लिये जब शैक्षणिक कार्यक्रम and scholarly journals form an academic discipline.
A huge difference exists between, on the one hand, well established disciplines that exist in almost all universities all over the संसार, have a long इतिहास, और have a खूब स्थापित नियत of जर्नल्स और सम्मेलनों, और, on the अन्य हाथ, सुझाव for new fields supported only by few universities and publications.
Fields of study usually have several sub-disciplines or branches, और the distinguishing लाइनों between ये are often both arbitrary and ambiguous.
PHP is a server-side एनक्रिप्शन भाषा designed लिये वेब विकास but also used as a general-purpose programming language.
PHP is now installed on more than 244 लाख वेबसाइटों और 2.1 लाख वेब सर्वर.
Originally created by Rasmus Lerdorf in 1995, the reference implementation of पीएचपी is अभी उत्पादित by the पीएचपी Group.
While PHP originally stood for Personal Home Page, it अभी स्टैंड लिये पीएचपी : हाइपरटेक्स्ट preprocessor, a recursive एक्रोनिम.
पीएचपी कोड is interpreted by a वेब सर्वर साथ a पीएचपी प्रोसेसर मोड्यूल जिससे generates the resulting वेब पेज : पीएचपी कमांड can be embedded directly into an HTML source document rather than calling an external file to process data.
It has also evolved to include a command-line interface capability और can be प्रयुक्त in स्टैंडअलोन आलेखीय applications.
PHP is free तन्त्र released अंतर्गत the पीएचपी अनुज्ञा, जिससे is असंगत साथ the ग्नू सामान्य पब्लिक अनुज्ञा ( जीपीएल ) due to restrictions on the usage of the term PHP.
PHP can be तैनात on सबसे वेब सर्वर और भी as a स्टैंडअलोन शेल on लगभग every operating system and platform, free of charge.
John Fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy ( May 29, 1917 – November 22, 1963 ), often referred to by his initials JFK, was the 35th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, सेवारत इससे 1961 until his death in 1963.
After military सेवा as कमांडर of the मोटर torpedo नौकाएँ pt-109 और pt-59 दौरान संसार युद्ध ii in the South Pacific, Kennedy represented Massachusetts ' 11th congressional district in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1947 to 1953 as a Democrat.
Thereafter, he served in the u.S. सीनेट इससे 1953 जबतक 1960.
कैनेडी पराजित वाइस अध्यक्ष और रिपब्लिकन प्रत्याशी Richard Nixon in the 1960 U.S. presidential election.
At 43 years of age, he is the youngest to have been elected to the office, the second-youngest President ( after Theodore Roosevelt ), and the पहला व्यक्ति born in the 20th सदी to serve as president.
A Catholic, Kennedy is the तभी non- प्रोटोस्टेंट अध्यक्ष, और is the तभी president to have won a Pulitzer Prize.
Events दौरान उसके प्रेसिडेंसी शामिल the खाड़ी of सूअर आक्रमण, the क्यूबन मिसाइल संकट, the भवन of the Berlin Wall, the Space Race, the African-American Civil Rights Movement, and early stages of the Vietnam War.
Therein, Kennedy increased the number of सैन्य advisers, खास आपरेशन शक्तियां, and helicopters in an effort to curb the spread of communism in South East Asia.
The Kennedy administration adopted the policy of the रणनीतिक हैमलेट कार्यक्रम जिससे थी implemented by the South Vietnamese government.
It involved certain forced relocation, गाँव internment, और पृथक्करण of ग्रामीण दक्षिण वियतनामी from the northern and southern communist insurgents.
Kennedy was assassinated on नवम्बर 22, 1963 in डलास, टेक्सास.
Lee Harvey Oswald was charged with the crime, but he was shot and killed by Jack माणिक्य दो दिनों बाद, पहले a विचारण could take place.
The FBI and the Warren आयोग officially concluded कि ओसवाल्ड थी the लोन assassin.
however, the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस चुनें कमेटी on assassinations ( hsca ) concluded कि those investigations were flawed and that Kennedy was probably assassinated as the result of a conspiracy.
However, ABC News in their छानबीन, the कैनेडी हत्या : परे षड्यंत्र, confirmed the findings of the Warren Commission ; having concluded Oswald acted alone.
Kennedy 's controversial Department of Defense TFX fighter bomber कार्यक्रम led to a congressional investigation that lasted from 1963 to 1970.
चूंकि the 1960s सूचना concerning कैनेडी 's private life has come to light.
Details of Kennedy 's health problems in which he struggled have become बेहतर ज्ञात, विशेषकर चूंकि the 1990s.
Although initially kept secret from the general पब्लिक, रिपोर्ट्स of कैनेडी 's philandering have garnered much press.
Kennedy ranks highly in पब्लिक राय दरजा of u.S. presidents.
`` Stand by me '' is a सोंग originally performed by बेन E. किंग और लिखा by किंग, जेरी leiber, और माइक stoller, inspired by the spiritual `` Lord Stand by Me, '' plus two lines rooted in Psalms 46:2–3.
There have महरूम over 400 अंकित versions of the song.
A political cartoon इससे an 1894 पक पत्रिका by इलस्ट्रेटर S.D. Ehrhart, shows a farm woman labeled `` Democratic Party '' sheltering from a tornado of political change.
A रूपक is a फिगर of वाक कि describes a विषय by asserting that it is, on some point of comparison, the same as another otherwise unrelated object.
Metaphor is a type of analogy and is closely related to other rhetorical figures of वाक कि achieve उनके प्रभाव via संघ, comparison or resemblance including allegory, hyperbole, and simile.
In simpler terms, a metaphor compares दो वस्तुएँ or बाते बगैर using the शब्द `` like '' or `` as ''.
One of the most prominent उदाहरण of a रूपक in अंग्रेज़ी साहित्य is the All the world 's a stage monologue from As You Like It :
सब the संसार 's a stage,
And all the men and women merely खिलाड़ी ;
They have उनके exits और उनके entrances ; — William Shakespeare, As You Like It, 2/7
This उद्धरण is a रूपक क्युकी the world is not literally a stage.
By figuratively asserting कि the संसार is a स्टेज, शेक्सपियर उपयोग the अंक of तुलना between the संसार और a स्टेज to convey an समझना about the mechanics of the world and the lives of the people within it.

printmaking is the प्रक्रम of बनाना artworks by printing, normally on paper.
Printmaking normally covers only the process of बनाना prints साथ an तत्व of मौलिकता, बल्कि than बस होने a फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक reproduction of a painting.
Except in the case of monotyping, the process is सक्षम of producing multiples of the वही टुकड़ा, which is called a print.
Each print produced is not माना a `` नक़ल '' लकिन बल्कि is माना an `` original ''.
This is because typically each print varies to an extent due to variables intrinsic to the printmaking process, and also because the imagery of a print is typically नहीं बस a जनन of another कार्य लकिन बल्कि is प्रायः a अद्वितीय चित्र designed इससे the start to be expressed in a particular printmaking technique.
a छपाई may be ज्ञात as an impression.
Printmaking ( other than monotyping ) is नहीं चुनी तभी लिये इसके क्षमता to उपज अनेक impressions, लकिन बल्कि लिये the अद्वितीय qualities that each of the printmaking processes lends itself to.
prints हैं निर्मित by transferring स्याही इससे a मेट्रिक्स or through a prepared screen to a sheet of paper or other material.
Common types of matrices शामिल : मेटल प्लेटों, प्रायः तांबे or जस्ता, or पॉलिमर प्लेटों लिये नक्काशी or etching ; स्टोन, एल्यूमिनियम, or polymer for lithography ; blocks of wood for woodcuts and wood engravings ; and linoleum for linocuts.
Screens made of silk or synthetic fabrics हैं प्रयुक्त लिये the screenprinting प्रक्रम.
Other types of मेट्रिक्स substrates और सम्बन्धित processes are discussed below.
Multiple impressions मुद्रित इससे the वही matrix form an edition.
Since the late 19th century, artists have generally हस्ताक्षरित व्यक्तिगत impressions इससे an संस्करण और प्रायः number the impressions to form a limited edition.
Prints may also be printed in book form, such as illustrated किताबे or कलाकार 's किताबे.
Il Divo is an English multinational operatic pop vocal समूह निर्मित by म्यूज़िक मैनेजर, कार्यपालिका, और वास्तविकता tv स्टार साइमन Cowell.
Formed in the संयुक्त किंगडम, वे हैं भी हस्ताक्षरित to cowell 's record label, Syco Music.
Il Divo is a group of four male singers : French pop singer Sébastien Izambard, Spanish baritone Carlos Marín, अमरीकी टेनर दाउद मिलर, और स्विस tenor Urs Bühler.
To date, they have बेची अधिक than 26 लाख albums worldwide.
Su-15, one of the प्रिंसिपल सोवियत एयर रक्षा interceptors in the 1970s and 1980s
An interceptor aircraft ( or simply interceptor ) is a type of fighter aircraft designed specifically to prevent मिशन of दुश्मन वायुयान, विशेषकर बमवर्षक और reconnaissance वायुयान, और नष्ट उन्हें, relying usually on great speed and powerful armament.
Being used since the First World War, after the late 1960s, interceptors became less important due to shifting इससे बमवर्षक to इंटरकांटिनेंटल बैलिस्टिक मिसाइलें ( icbms ) लिये नाभिकीय warfare.
A Vietnamese American ( ) is an अमरीकी of वियतनामी descent.
They make up about half of all overseas Vietnamese ( Người việt hải ngoại ) और हैं the fourth-largest एशियाई American group.
Mass Vietnamese immigration to the United States started after 1975, after the समाप्त of the वियतनाम युद्ध.
Early immigrants were refugee boat लोगों fleeing persecution or poverty.
Forced to flee from their homeland and प्रायः thrust into ग़रीब शहरी पड़ोस, ये newcomers have nevertheless managed to establish strong communities in a short amount of time.
More than sixty प्रतिशत of वियतनामी अमेरिकी reside in the राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, Texas, Washington, Florida, and Virginia.
