Adolf Hitler वचनबद्ध आत्महत्या by gunshot on 30 अप्रैल 1945 in his Führerbunker in Berlin.
His wife Eva ( née Braun ) वचनबद्ध आत्महत्या साथ उसे by ingesting cyanide.
That afternoon, in accordance with Hitler 's prior instructions, उनके remains यहूद carried up the सीढ़ियाँ through the बंकर 's आपात निकास, doused in पेट्रोल और नियत alight in the Reich Chancellery garden outside the bunker.
the सोवियत अभिलेख रिकार्ड कि उनके जले remains यहूद बरामद और interred in successive locations until 1970 when they were again exhumed, cremated and the ashes scattered.
खाते differ as to the कारण of मौत ; एक कि he died by ज़हर only and another that he died by a self-inflicted gunshot, while biting down on a cyanide capsule.
Contemporary historians have rejected these accounts as being either Soviet प्रचार or an attempted सुलह in अनुक्रम to reconcile the अलग conclusions.
One eye-witness recorded that the body showed signs of having महरूम शॉट through the मुँह, लकिन इस रै महरूम सिद्ध unlikely.
There is also controversy regarding the authenticity of कपाल और jaw fragments which were recovered.
In 2009, DNA tests were performed on a कपाल सोवियत officials had long believed to be Hitler 's.
The tests revealed that the skull was actually कि of a स्त्री कम than 40 सालो बूढ़ा.
स्थान of मिसौरी
The alcohol laws of Missouri are among the तनिक restrictive and most lax and permissive in the United States.
Missouri is known throughout the Midwest for its largely laissez-faire दृष्टिकोण to दारू विनियमन, in शार्प कंट्रास्ट to the बहुत सख्त दारू कानून of some of its neighbors, like Kansas and Oklahoma.
Necrotizing fasciitis ( or ) or NF, commonly known as flesh-eating बीमारी or flesh-eating जीवाणु सिंड्रोम, is a विरल संक्रमण of the deeper layers of skin and subcutaneous tissues, easily spreading across the fascial plane within the subcutaneous tissue.
Necrotizing fasciitis is quickly progressing, having greater risk of developing in the immunocompromised due to शर्तें जैसे मधुमेह, कर्कट, इत्यादि.
It is a severe बीमारी of अचानक onset और is प्रायः treated तत्काल with high doses of intravenous antibiotics.
Type I describes a polymicrobial संक्रमण, whereas प्रकार ii describes a monomicrobial infection.
Many प्रकार of जीवाणु can कारण necrotizing fasciitis ( e.g., समूह a streptococcus ( Streptococcus pyogenes ), Staphylococcus aureus, Clostridium perfringens, Bacteroides fragilis, Aeromonas hydrophila ).
Such infections are more संभावित to occur in लोगों साथ compromised प्रतिरक्षा प्रणालियों.
Historically, Group A streptococcus बना up सबसे मामले of Type II infections.
However, since as early as 2001, another serious form of monomicrobial necrotizing fasciitis रै महरूम observed साथ increasing आवृत्ति, caused by methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus ( MRSA ).
Some published case reports have implied a possible link between use of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory दवाएँ और nf, हालांकि the प्रमाण of the कड़ी थी कहा to be कमजोर क्युकी of a छोटी क्रमांक of मामला मरीजों और it थी unclear whether the दवाएँ बस नकाबपोश the symptoms of a secondary infection or were a cause per se.
World War II ( WWII or WW2 ), also known as the दूसरी संसार युद्ध, थी a वैश्विक युद्ध कि lasted इससे 1939 to 1945.
It शामिल the विशाल बहुमत of the संसार 's राष्ट्र —including सब of the ग्रेट powers —eventually forming two opposing military alliances : the Allies and the Axis.
It was the most widespread war in history, with more than 100 million people serving in सैन्य इकाई इससे over 30 अलग countries.
In a state of `` total war ``, the major participants placed their entire economic, industrial, and वैज्ञानिक सामर्थ्य at the सेवा of the युद्ध प्रयत्न, erasing the भेद between civilian and military resources.
Marked by mass deaths of civilians, including the holocaust और the तभी उपयोग of नाभिकीय हथियार in warfare, it resulted in 50 million to over 75 million fatalities.
These मौतों मेक संसार युद्ध ii by दूर the deadliest conflict in human history.
The Empire of Japan aimed to dominate East Asia and was already at war with the Republic of China in 1937, but the world युद्ध is generally कहा to have begun on 1 सितंबर 1939 साथ the आक्रमण of कैंडल by जर्मनी और subsequent घोषणाओं of war on Germany by France and Britain.
From late 1939 to early 1941, in a series of अभियान और treaties, जर्मनी formed the अक्ष गठबंधन with Italy, conquering or subduing much of continental Europe.
Following the Molotov–Ribbentrop Pact, Germany and the Soviet संघ partitioned और annexed territories between themselves of their European neighbours, including Poland.
The United Kingdom और the अन्य सदस्यों of the अंग्रेजों राष्ट्रमंडल यहूद the तभी प्रमुख अलाइड शक्तियां continuing the लड़ो विरूद्ध the अक्ष, with battles taking place in North Africa as well as the long-running Battle of the Atlantic.
In June 1941, the European Axis launched an invasion of the Soviet Union, giving a start to the largest land theatre of war in history, which tied bas the प्रमुख भाग of the अक्ष ' सैन्य शक्तियां लिये the बाकी of the war.
In December 1941, Japan joined the अक्ष, attacked the संयुक्त राज्य और यूरोपीय territories in the प्रशांत Ocean, and quickly conquered much of the Western Pacific.
The Axis advance was stopped in 1942, after Japan lost a series of naval battles and यूरोपीय अक्ष सैनिकों यहूद पराजित in उत्तर अफ़्रीकी और, decisively, at Stalingrad.
in 1943, साथ a श्रेणी of जर्मनी defeats in पूर्वी यूरोपीय, the अलाइड आक्रमण of इटली, और अमरीकी victories in the Pacific, the Axis lost the initiative and undertook strategic retreat on all fronts.
In 1944, the Western Allies invaded France, जबकि the सोवियत संघ regained सब of इसके territorial नुकसान और invaded Germany and its allies.
दौरान 1944 और 1945 the संयुक्त राज्य पराजित the Japanese Navy and captured key Western Pacific islands.
The war in Europe ended साथ the कैप्चर of बर्लिन by सोवियत और पॉलिश सैनिकों और the subsequent German unconditional surrender on 8 May 1945.
Following the Potsdam घोषणा by the allies on 26 जुलाई 1945, the संयुक्त राज्य dropped परमाणु बम on the Japanese cities of Hiroshima on 6 August, and Nagasaki on 9 August.
With an invasion of the Japanese archipelago imminent, and the सोवियत संघ having घोषित युद्ध on जापानी by आक्रमणकारी मंचूरिया, जापानी surrendered on 15 अगस्त 1945, समाप्ति the युद्ध in एशिया और cementing the total victory of the Allies over the Axis.
World War II altered the राजनैतिक संरेखण and social structure of the world.
The United Nations ( UN ) was स्थापित to फोस्टर अंतरराष्ट्रीय cooperation and prevent future conflicts.
The great powers that were the victors of the war—the United States, the Soviet Union, China, the संयुक्त किंगडम, और france—became the स्थाई सदस्यों of the संयुक्त Nations Security Council.
The Soviet Union and the United States emerged as rival superpowers, सेटिंग the स्टेज लिये the ठंडा युद्ध, जिससे lasted लिये the next 46 years.
Meanwhile, the influence of European great powers started to decline, जबकि the decolonisation of एशिया और अफ़्रीकी began.
Most countries जिनकी उद्योग था महरूम क्षतिग्रस्त स्थानांतरित towards economic recovery.
राजनैतिक संयोजन, विशेषकर in यूरोपीय, उभरा as an प्रयत्न to stabilise postwar relations and fight more effectively in the Cold War.
A limited liability company ( LLC ) is a flexible form of एंटरप्राइज़ कि मिश्रणों तत्व of साझेदारी और कॉरपोरेट structures.
Note than an LLC is not a corporation, और कॉलिंग an llc a निगम is technically गलत.
An LLC is a legal form of company that provides limited देयता to इसके स्वामी in the विशाल बहुमत of संयुक्त राज्य jurisdictions.
LLCs do not need to be व्यवस्थित for profit.
पाँच k-cups
The inside of a used k-cup, साथ the शीर्ष foil और the प्रयुक्त कॉफी grounds removed.
This shows the फिल्टर अंदर the k-cup.
K-Cup portion packs are used with Keurig or अन्य सिंगल कप brewing प्रणालियों to काढ़ा a कप of कॉफी, चाय, or hot chocolate.
Each k-cup is a प्लास्टिक संग्राहक with a coffee filter inside.
Ground coffee beans are packed in the K-Cup and sealed air-tight साथ a संयोजन प्लास्टिक और foil lid.
When the K-Cup is placed in a Keurig brewer, the brewer punctures the foil ढक्कन और the नीचे of the K-Cup and forces hot water under pressure through the K-Cup and into a mug.
Keurig licenses its K-Cup technology to कॉफी roasters और चाय makers ऐसे as ग्रीन पहाड़ कॉफी roasters, diedrich/ ग्लोरिया जीन्स, टिमोथी 's संसार कॉफी, वैन houtte, हिरण कॉफी, celestial seasonings, Bigelow Tea Company, Twinings, Tully 's, Coffee People and Newman 's Own.
Keurig 's patents on the original K-Cup डिज़ाइन समाप्त in सितंबर 2012.
Keurig holds at least one additional, still-active us पेटेंट और another पेटेंट अनुप्रयोग, detailing improvements that have subsequently been incorporated in their K-Cup design.
Electa जेब chronograph ( ca. 1890s ) manufactured by the gallet देखें कम्पनी in La Chaux-de-Fonds, Switzerland.
Gallet MultiChron Astronomic ( ca. 1959 ) —complex mechanical chronograph with 12 hour recoding सामर्थ्य, स्वचालित दिन, तिथि, माह, और चंद्रमा phase प्रदर्शक
A modern Seiko quartz wristwatch using the chronograph फलन ( movement 7T92 ).
Citizen Atessa Eco-Drive atv53-3023 analog-digital chronograph साथ 4 क्षेत्रफल रेडियो नियंत्रित reception ( North America, Europe, China, Japan ).
A chronograph is a विशिष्ट प्रकार of देखें that is used as a stopwatch combined with a display watch.
A मौलिक chronograph रै an स्वतंत्र स्वीप दूसरी हाथ ; it can be started, stopped, and returned to zero by successive pressure on the stem.
Louis Moinet invented the chronograph in 1816
Conventional PCI ( PCI is an initialism formed from Peripheral घटक इंटरकनेक्ट, भाग of the पीसीआई लोकल बस मानक और प्रायः shortened to बस पीसीआई ) is a लोकल कंप्यूटर बस लिये attaching hardware devices in a computer.
The PCI bus supports the functions मिला on a प्रोसेसर बस, लकिन in a मानकीकृत स्वरूप कि is स्वतंत्र of any particular processor.
Devices connected to the bus appear to the processor to be connected सीधे to the प्रोसेसर बस, और हैं आबंटित पता in the processor 's address space.
Attached devices can take either the form of an एकीकृत सर्किट fitted onto the मदरबोर्ड itself, पुकारा a planar device in the PCI specification, or an expansion card that fits into a slot.
The PCI Local Bus was first implemented in ibm pc compatibles, जहाँ it विस्थापित the संयोजन of isa प्लस one VESA Local Bus as the bus configuration.
It has subsequently been अपनाया लिये अन्य कंप्यूटर प्रकार.
पीसीआई और pci-x हैं होने replaced by पीसीआई एक्स्प्रेस, लकिन, सबसे motherboards are still made with one or more PCI slots, which are sufficient for many uses.
The PCI specification covers the शारीरिक आकार of the बस ( सहित the आकार और अंतरण of the सर्किट फलक किनारे विद्युत सम्पर्क ), electrical characteristics, bus timing, and protocols.
The specification can be खरीदा इससे the पीसीआई खास ब्याज Group ( PCI-SIG ).
Typical PCI cards used in PCs include : network cards, sound ताश, modems, अतिरिक्त ports such as USB or serial, TV tuner cards and disk controllers.
PCI video cards replaced ISA and VESA cards, until growing बैंडविड्थ आवश्यकताएँ outgrew the सामर्थ्य of पीसीआई ; the preferred interface for video cards became AGP, and then PCI Express.
PCI video cards remain available for use with बूढ़ा pcs बगैर अगप or पीसीआई एक्स्प्रेस slots.
Many devices previously provided on PCI विस्तार ताश हैं अभी commonly एकीकृत onto motherboards or उपलब्धियाँ in सार्वभौमिक सीरियल बस और पीसीआई Express versions.
Michael Whitaker Smith ( born अक्तूबर 7, 1957 ) is an अमरीकी contemporary Christian musician, who has charted primarily in the contemporary Christian and occasionally in the mainstream charts.
His biggest success in mainstream music was in 1991 जब `` प्लेस in इस संसार '' hit no. 6 on the बिलबोर्ड Hot 100.
Smith is a three-time ग्रैमी पुरस्कार विजेता, और रै अर्जित 40 Dove Awards.
Over the course of his career, he बेची अधिक than 13 लाख एल्बम और अंकित 29 no. 1 hit गीतों, चौदह gold albums, and five platinum albums.
Smith is an American Music Award recipient ; he was also named एक of लोगों पत्रिका 's `` सबसे खूबसूरत लोगों ''.
An अमरीकी पोस्टर इससे the संसार युद्ध ii -era कि थी प्रयुक्त to inform लोगों परिचय what they should do if they suspect sabotage.
Sabotage is a deliberate कार्रवाई aimed at weakening another एंटिटी through subversion, obstruction, disruption, or destruction.
In a कार्यस्थल सेटिंग, तोड़फोड़ is the सचेत वापसी of efficiency generally directed at causing some change in workplace conditions.
One who engages in तोड़फोड़ is a saboteur.
As a rule, saboteurs कोशिश to छिपाते उनके पहचान because of the consequences of their actions.
For example, whereas an environmental pressure group might be प्रसन्न to be पहचाना साथ an अधिनियम of तोड़फोड़, it होता नहीं want the व्यक्तिगत पहचान of the perpetrators known.
Patrick Henry कॉलेज ( phc ) is a निजी, स्वतंत्र कॉलेज साथ an धर्मान्तरण ईसाई आधार कि focuses on शिक्षण classical liberal arts and government, located in Purcellville, Virginia, United States.
Patrick Henry is ज्ञात लिये इसके conservative evangelical Christian focus.
As of April 17, 2007, the college was accredited by the transnational संघ of ईसाई कॉलेजों और स्कूलों, a नेशनल faith-related accrediting संगठन पहचाना by the Department of Education and the Council for Higher Education Accreditation.
The school was founded with the help of the Home School Legal Defense Association, and now serves as the मुख्यालय लिये the संगठन, साथ जिससे it is still closely connected.
The history of टेलीविज़न comprises the कार्य of numerous इंजीनियर्स और आविष्कारक in अनेक countries over many decades.
The earliest proposal was in 1908, in a paper by A. A. campbell-swinton और postulated the उपयोग of cathode rays.
The first practical demonstrations of टेलीविज़न, however, यहूद विकसित using electromechanical विधि to स्कैन, संचारण, and reproduce an image.
As electronic camera and display tubes were perfected, electromechanical टेलीविज़न दिया रास्ता to all-electronic प्रणालियों in nearly all applications.

A सिनेमा in ऑस्ट्रेलिया
A typical मल्टीप्लेक्स ( एएमसी सैर 16 in वुडलैंड Hills, Los Angeles, U.S. )
A movie theater ( also called a सिनेमा, फिल्म हाउस, फिल्मी हाउस, फिल्मी थिएटर or चित्र हाउस ) is a स्थान, प्रायः a भवन, for viewing films.
Most but not all movie theaters are commercial परिचालन केटरिंग to the सामान्य पब्लिक, who attend by purchasing a ticket.
The फिल्म is प्रक्षिप्त साथ a फिल्म प्रोजेक्टर onto a विशाल प्रक्षेप स्क्रीन at the front of the auditorium.
Most फिल्म थिएटर हैं अभी equipped लिये डिजिटल सिनेमा प्रक्षेप, निकालना the need to create and transport a physical film print.

A motorcycle club is a group of individuals whose प्राथमिक ब्याज और क्रियाएँ involve मोटरसाइकिल.
Lyme disease, Lyme borreliosis is an संक्रामक बीमारी caused by at तनिक तीन प्रजाति of जीवाणु belonging to the genus Borrelia.
Borrelia burgdorferi sensu stricto is the main cause of Lyme disease in उत्तर अमेरिका, whereas borrelia afzelii और borrelia garinii कारण सबसे यूरोपीय cases.
The disease is named after the towns of Lyme and Old lyme, कनेक्टिकट, यूएसए, जहाँ a क्रमांक of मामले यहूद पहचाना in 1975.
Although Allen Steere realized that Lyme disease was a tick-borne disease in 1978, the cause of the बीमारी remained a रहस्य जबतक 1981, जब B. burgdorferi थी पहचाना by Willy Burgdorfer.
Lyme disease is the most आम tick-borne बीमारी in the उत्तरी Hemisphere.
borrelia is transmitted to इंसानो by the काटना of संक्रमित ticks belonging to a few species of the genus Ixodes ( `` hard ticks '' ).
Early symptoms may include ज्वर, सिरदर्द, थकान, अवसाद, और a characteristic circular skin rash called erythema migrans ( EM ).
Left untreated, later लक्षण may involve the joints, दिल, and central nervous system.
In most cases, the infection and its symptoms हैं eliminated by एंटीबायोटिक, विशेषकर if the illness is treated early.
Delayed or inadequate treatment can lead to more गंभीर लक्षण, जिससे can be disabling और difficult to treat.

Penis ( plural penises or penes ) is a general term for the organs with which male and hermaphrodite पशु introduce शुक्राणु into receptive महिलाओं दौरान copulation.
Such organs occur in many animals, both vertebrate and invertebrate, but males do not bear a penis in every animal species, and in those प्रजाति in जिससे the पुरूष करता भालू a so-called शिश्न, the penes in the विभिन्न प्रजाति are not necessarily homologous.
For example, the penis of a mammal is at most analogous to the शिश्न of a पुरूष कीट or barnacle.
The term penis applies to many reproductive intromittent organs, but not to all ; for उदाहरण the intromittent अंग of सबसे cephalopoda is the hectocotylus, a specialised भुजा, और पुरूष मकड़ियों use their pedipalps.
In most species of animals in which there is an organ that might reasonably be described as a penis, it has no major function other than intromission, or at तनिक conveying the शुक्राणु to the मादा, लकिन in the placental स्तनधारियों the शिश्न bears the distal भाग of the urethra, जिससे discharges दोनो मूत्र दौरान urination और वीर्य दौरान copulation as the occasion requires.
कलाकारों और रंगमंडल ( a & r ) is the प्रभाग of a रिकार्ड label or music publishing company that is responsible for talent scouting and overseeing the artistic development of recording artists and/or songwriters.
It also acts as a liaison between कलाकारों और the रिकार्ड लेबल or प्रकाशन कम्पनी ; प्रत्येक कार्यकलाप involving कलाकारों to the पाइंट of एल्बम रिलीज is generally considered under the purview of, and responsibility of, A & R.
A furlong is a measure of distance in इम्पीरियल इकाई और u.S. प्रथागत इकाई बराबर to one-eighth of a मील, equivalent to 220 yards, 660 feet, 40 rods, or 10 chains.
The exact value of the furlong varies थोड़ा among english-speaking countries.
Five furlongs are approximately 1 किलोमीटर ( 1.0058 km is a करीब सन्निकटन ).
Since the original definition of the metre was one-quarter of one ten-millionth of the circumference of the Earth ( along the great circle coincident साथ the मध्याह्न of देशांतर गुजर through पेरिस ), the परिधि of the धरती is परिचय 40,000 km or about 200,000 furlongs.
CR2032 लिथियम बटन cell battery
लिथियम 9 वोल्ट, aa, & AAA sizes
Lithium batteries हैं डिस्पोजेबल ( प्राथमिक ) बैटरी कि have लिथियम मेटल or lithium compounds as an anode.
They stand apart from other बैटरी in उनके ऊँची चार्ज density ( long life ) and high cost per unit.
Depending on the design and chemical compounds used, lithium cells can produce voltages इससे 1.5 v ( comparable to a zinc–carbon or क्षारीय बैटरी ) to परिचय 3.7 V. लिथियम बैटरी हैं widely प्रयुक्त in उत्पाद ऐसे as पोर्टेबल consumer electronic devices.
रेमंड `` रे '' चार्ल्स जोकर lamontagne ( ; born June 18, 1973 ) is an American singer-songwriter.
LaMontagne has released four studio एल्बम, ट्रबल, तक the सूर्य turns ब्लैक, गपशप in the अनाज and God Willin ' & the Creek Do n't Rise.
He was born in New हैम्पशायर और थी प्रेरित to बनाएँ म्यूज़िक बाद सुनना an album by Stephen Stills.
Critics have compared LaMontagne 's music to that of the बैंड, वैन मॉरिसन, उपनाम ड्रेक, and Tim Buckley.
He lives in Massachusetts साथ उसके बीवी और दो children.

Facebook on the ad-tech 2010
Facebook is an online social networking service, whose name stems from the colloquial नाम लिये the किताब दिए to विद्यार्थी at the प्रारंभ of the अकादमिक साल by कुछ विश्वविद्यालयों administrations in the संयुक्त राज्य to help students get to know each other.
It was संस्थापित in फ़रवरी 2004 by चिह्नित zuckerberg साथ उसके कॉलेज roommates और fellow हार्वर्ड विश्वविद्यालयों विद्यार्थी एडुआर्डो saverin, Andrew McCollum, Dustin Moskovitz and Chris Hughes.
The website 's membership was initially सीमित by the संस्थापकों to हार्वर्ड विद्यार्थी, लकिन थी विस्तारित to अन्य कॉलेजों in the बोस्टन क्षेत्रफल, the आइवी लीग, और Stanford University.
It gradually added support for students at various other विश्वविद्यालयों पहले खोलने to ऊँची स्कूल विद्यार्थी, और आखिरकार to anyone aged 13 and over.
Facebook now allows any users who घोषित themselves to be at तनिक 13 सालो बूढ़ा to become पंजीकृत users of the site.
Users must register before using the site, after which they may create a personal profile, add other उपयोक्ता as मित्रों, और एक्सचेंज संदेश, सहित स्वचालित सूचनाएं जब वे अद्यतन उनके profile.
Additionally, users may join common-interest उपयोक्ता समूह, व्यवस्थित by कार्यस्थल, स्कूल or कॉलेज, or other characteristics, and categorize their friends into lists such as `` People From Work '' or `` Close Friends ''.
As of September 2012, Facebook has over one अरब क्रियाशील उपयोक्ता.
According to a May 2011 Consumer Reports सर्वेक्षण, वहीँ हैं 7.5 लाख children अंतर्गत 13 साथ खाते और 5 लाख अंतर्गत 10, violating the site 's terms of service.
In May 2005, Accel partners invested $ 12.7 लाख in फेसबुक, और जिम breyer added $ 1 लाख of his own money to the pot.
A January 2009 compete.com पढ़ाई क्रमित फेसबुक as the सबसे प्रयुक्त सोशल networking service by worldwide monthly active users.
Entertainment Weekly included the site on its end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' list, saying, `` How on धरती किया we stalk हमारी exes, याद हमारी co-workers ' जन्मदिन, कीड़ा हमारी मित्रों, और खेल a rousing खेल of scrabulous before Facebook ? ''
Critics, such as Facebook Detox, state that Facebook has turned into a नेशनल obsession in the संयुक्त राज्य, resulting in विशाल amounts of time lost and encouraging narcissism.
Quantcast estimates फेसबुक रै 138.9 लाख मासिक अद्वितीय u.S. विज़िटर in May 2011.
according to सोशल मीडिया आज, in अप्रैल 2010 an अनुमानित 41.6 % ( 129.5 million ) of the U.S. population had a Facebook account.
Nevertheless, Facebook 's market growth प्रारंभ to स्टाल in कुछ regions, साथ the साईट खोने 7 लाख क्रियाशील users in the United States and Canada in May 2011.
फेसबुक आखिरकार दायर लिये an आरंभिक पब्लिक offering on फ़रवरी 1, 2012, and was headquartered in Menlo Park, California.
Facebook Inc. began selling stock to the पब्लिक और व्यापार on the नैस्डैक on May 18, 2012.
Erwin Johannes Eugen Rommel ( 15 नवम्बर 1891 – 14 अक्तूबर 1944 ), popularly ज्ञात as The Desert Fox ( Wüstenfuchs, ), was a German Field Marshal of World War II.
He earned the respect of both his अपना सैनिकों और the दुश्मनों he लड़ा.
Rommel was a highly decorated officer in World War I and was awarded the डालना le mérite लिये उसके कारनामे on the इतालवी front.
In World War II, he further distinguished himself as the कमांडर of the 7th panzer प्रभाग दौरान the 1940 आक्रमण of फ़्रांस.
His leadership of German and Italian forces in the North African campaign established him as one of the most able कमांडरों of the युद्ध, और अर्जित उसे the appellation of the मरुस्थल फॉक्स.
He is regarded as one of the सबसे skilled कमांडरों of मरुस्थल warfare in the conflict.
He later commanded the German forces opposing the अलाइड cross-channel आक्रमण in normandy.
His assignments never took उसे to the पूर्वी सामने.
ख़बरों is regarded as having महरूम a दयालु and professional officer.
His afrika कोर्प्स थी never अभियुक्त of युद्ध अपराधों, और सैनिको captured during his Africa campaign were reported to have been treated humanely.
Orders to kill यहूदी सैनिको, नागरिकों और captured commandos were ignored.
Late in the war, Rommel was linked to the षड्यंत्र to assassinate एडोल्फ हिटलर.
Since Rommel was a नेशनल नायिका, हिटलर desired to eliminate him quietly.
He forced Rommel to commit suicide with a cyanide pill, in return for assurances that Rommel 's परिवार होता नहीं be persecuted following उसके death.

The seven gifts of the Holy Spirit is an enumeration of seven spiritual gifts originating with patristic लेखक, बाद elaborated by पाँच बौद्धिक virtues और चार अन्य groups of ethical characteristics.
They are : wisdom, understanding, wonder and awe ( fear of the रब ), counsel, ज्ञान, fortitude, and piety ( reverence ).
The Earth Day Flag, the नवीनतम प्रस्ताव of जॉन mcconnell लिये a flag of Earth Day
Earth Day is an annual event, मनाये on अप्रैल 22, on जिससे कार्यक्रम हैं आयोजित विश्वव्यापी to demonstrate support for environmental protection.
It was first celebrated in 1970, and is अभी समन्वित globally by the धरती दिन संजाल, और मनाये in more than 192 countries each year.
In 1969 at a युनेस्को सम्मेलन in सैन फ्रांसिस्को, the date proposed was March 21, 1970, the first day of spring in the northern hemisphere.
This day of nature 's equipoise was बाद मंजूर in a उदघोषणा हस्ताक्षरित by Secretary General U Thant at the United Nations.
A month later a पृथक धरती दिन थी संस्थापित by संयुक्त राज्य सीनेटर gaylord नेल्सन as an पर्यावरणीय teach-in first held on April 22, 1970.
नेल्सन थी बाद awarded the अध्यक्षीय Medal of Freedom Award in recognition of his work.
While this अप्रैल 22 धरती दिन थी केन्द्रित on the संयुक्त राज्य, an संगठन शुभारम्भ by डेनिस हेज़, who was the original national coordinator in 1970, took it international in 1990 and organized events in 141 nations.
Numerous समुदायों celebrate धरती सप्ताह, an संपूर्ण सप्ताह of क्रियाएँ focused on environmental issues.
Iodine is a chemical तत्व साथ प्रतीक i और परमाणु number 53.
The name is from Greek ioeidēs, अर्थ बैंगनी or जामुनी, due to the color of elemental iodine vapor.
Iodine and its यौगिकों हैं primarily प्रयुक्त in पोषण, और industrially in the production of acetic acid and certain polymers.
Iodine 's relatively high atomic number, low toxicity, and ease of अनुलग्नक to सशुल्क यौगिकों have बना it a भाग of अनेक x-ray contrast materials in modern medicine.
आयोडीन रै तभी एक stable isotope.
a क्रमांक of आयोडीन radioisotopes are also used in medical applications.
Iodine is found on Earth mainly as the highly water-soluble iodide आयन, i−, जिससे concentrates it in महासागर और brine pools.
Like the अन्य हैलोजन्स, फ़्री आयोडीन occurs मुख्यतः as a diatomic अणु i2, और तब तभी momentarily बाद being oxidized from iodide by an oxidant like free oxygen.
In the universe और on धरती, आयोडीन 's ऊँची परमाणु number makes it a relatively rare element.
However, इसके उपस्थिति in समंदर जल has given it a role in biology.
It is the heaviest अनिवार्य तत्व utilized widely by जीवन in biological कृत्यों ( तभी टंगस्टन, employed in enzymes by a few species of bacteria, is heavier ).
Iodine 's rarity in many soils, due to आरंभिक कम प्रचुरता as a crust-element, और भी leaching of घुलनशील आयोडाइड by rainwater, रै led to many deficiency problems in land animals and inland human populations.
Iodine deficiency affects परिचय दो अरब लोगों और is the अग्रणी preventable cause of intellectual disabilities.
Iodine is required by higher पशु, जिससे उपयोग it to synthesize थायराइड हार्मोन, which contain the element.
क्युकी of इस फलन, radioisotopes of आयोडीन हैं concentrated in the थायराइड gland along with nonradioactive iodine.
If inhaled, the radioisotope iodine-131, which has a high fission उत्पाद उपज, concentrates in the थायराइड, but is easily remedied with potassium iodide treatment.
Lobbying ( also lobby ) is the act of attempting to influence निर्णय बना by officials in the सरकारी, सबसे प्रायः legislators or members of regulatory agencies.
Lobbying is done by many different types of लोगों और व्यवस्थित समूह, सहित individuals in the निजी सेक्टर, corporations, fellow legislators or government officials, or advocacy groups ( interest groups ).
Lobbyists may be among a legislator 's constituencies, अर्थ a वोटर or bloc of मतदाता भीतर उसके or उसके चुनावी ज़िला, or नहीं ; वे may engage in lobbying as a business, or not.
Professional lobbyists are people whose business is trying to influence विधान on निमित्त of a समूह or व्यक्तिगत जो hires उन्हें.
Individuals and nonprofit organizations can भी लॉबी as an अधिनियम of स्वयंसेवा or as a छोटी भाग of उनके सामान्य जॉब ( लिये उदाहरण, a CEO meeting with a representative about a project important to his/her company, or an activist meeting with his/her legislator in an unpaid capacity ).
Governments often define and विनियमित व्यवस्थित समूह lobbying कि रै become influential.
The आचार और नैतिकता of lobbying are.
Lobbying is often spoken of with contempt, when the implication is that लोगों साथ अत्यधिक socioeconomic शक्ति हैं corrupting the विधि ( टेढ़ी it दूर from fairness ) in order to serve their own conflict of interest.
But another side of lobbying is making sure that others ' interests are duly defended विरूद्ध अन्य ' भ्रष्टाचार, or भी बस बनाना यकीनन कि minority interests are fairly defended against mere tyranny of the majority.
For example, a medical association, or a trade association of health insurance companies, may lobby a legislature in order to counteract the influence of tobacco कंपनियाँ, in जिससे मामला the lobbying होता be viewed by सबसे लोगों as जायज ( विधिवत defending विरूद्ध अन्य ' भ्रष्टाचार ).
The difficulty in drawing objective lines between which lobbyists are `` good lobbyists '' and जिससे ones हैं `` ख़राब ones '' is compounded by the cleverness साथ जिससे lobbyists or उनके clients can argue that their own lobbying is of the `` good '' kind.
At heart, the effort to influence विधान is a power struggle.
As in other forms of power struggle, such as war or law प्रवर्तन, motives दायरा इससे to self-defense to लड़ लिये इंसाफ, और the dividing लकीर between predation और इंसाफ is विषय to rationalization.
Sunshine of अपना प्रेम गिटार रिफ
मलाई यहूद a 1960s अंग्रेजों चट्टान supergroup consisting of bassist/vocalist Jack Bruce, guitarist/vocalist Eric Clapton, and drummer Ginger Baker.
Their sound was characterised by a संकर of ब्लूज़ चट्टान, मुश्किल चट्टान और साइकेडेलिक चट्टान, combining the psychedelia-themed गीत, eric क्लैप्टन 's ब्लूज़ गिटार playing and vocals, Jack Bruce 's voice and prominent bass playing and Ginger Baker 's jazz -influenced drumming.
The group 's तीसरा एल्बम, पहियों of आग, थी the संसार 's पहला platinum-selling double album.
Cream are widely regarded as होने the संसार 's पहला कामयाब supergroup.
In their करियर, वे बेची over 15 लाख albums worldwide.
Cream 's music included songs based on परंपरागत ब्लूज़ ऐसे as `` क्रॉसरोड्स `` और `` spoonful ``, और आधुनिक ब्लूज़ ऐसे as `` Born Under a Bad Sign ``, as well as more eccentric songs such as `` Strange Brew ``, `` Tales of Brave Ulysses `` and `` Toad ``.
Cream 's biggest hits were `` I Feel Free `` ( UK, क्रमांक 11 ), `` सनशाइन of अपना प्रेम `` ( us, क्रमांक 5 ), `` श्वेत रूम `` ( us, number 6 ), `` Crossroads '' ( US, number 28 ), and `` Badge `` ( UK, number 18 ).
Cream made a significant impact on the popular music of the समय, और, साथ साथ जिमि हेंड्रिक्स, और टेरी कठ of Chicago, popularised the use of the wah-wah pedal.
They provided a heavy yet technically निपुण musical थीम कि foreshadowed और बहकावे the emergence of अंग्रेजों bands such as The Jeff Beck Group in the late 1960s.
the बैंड 's सजीव प्रदर्शन बहकावे progressive rock acts such as Rush.
Cream were inducted into the चट्टान और फेंकें हॉल of Fame in 1993.
They were शामिल in दोनो रोलिंग स्टोन और vh1 's सूचियाँ of the `` 100 महानतम Artists of All Time ''.
They were also क्रमित क्रमांक 16 on vh1 's `` 100 महानतम Artists of Hard Rock ''.
Hairspray is a 1988 comedy film लिखा और निर्देशित by जॉन waters, और अभिनीत ricki झील, सन्नी बोनो, डिब्बी Harry, Michael St. Gerard, Shawn Thompson, Colleen Fitzpatrick, Jerry Stiller, and in his last film role, Divine.
Hairspray was a dramatic प्रस्थान इससे waters ' पहले works, साथ a much broader intended audience.
In fact, hairsprays pg is the mildest दरजा a waters फिल्मी रै प्राप्त ; most of his previous films were rated X by the MPAA.
Set in 1962 Baltimore, Maryland, the film revolves around self-proclaimed `` pleasantly plump '' किशोरावस्था ट्रेसी turnblad as वो pursues स्टारडम as a नर्तकी on a लोकल tv दिखाएँ और rallies against racial segregation.
Hairspray थी तभी a मॉडरेट कामयाबी upon इसके आरंभिक नाट्य release, earning a modest gross of $ 8 million.
However, it प्रबंधित to आकर्षित a larger दर्शक on घर वीडियो in the early 1990s and became a cult classic.
Most critics praised the film, although some were displeased साथ the overall campiness.
In 2002, the film was adapted into a Broadway musical of the same name, which जीती आठ टोनी पुरस्कार, सहित बेहतरीन musical in 2003.
A second फिल्मी संस्करण of hairspray, an अनुकूलन of the स्टेज musical, थी भी released by नई लकीर Cinema in 2007, which included many changes of scripted items from the original.
The film भी बाँधने # 444 on साम्राज्य पत्रिका 's 2008 list of the 500 greatest movies of all time.
a ईसाई denomination is an identifiable धार्मिक देह अंतर्गत a आम नाम, structure, and doctrine within Christianity.
Some groups शामिल do नहीं consider themselves a denomination ( e.g., the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर considers itself the one true church and the Apostolic See, and as pre-denominational ).
Some groups viewed by non-adherents as denominational actively resist being called a denomination and do not have any औपचारिक denominational ढांचा, प्राधिकार, or record-keeping परे the लोकल सभा ; अनेक समूह भीतर Restoration Movement fall into this category.
Some groups are large ( e.g. Catholics, Lutherans, Anglicans or Baptists ), जबकि अन्य हैं बस a few छोटी चर्च, और in सबसे मामले the सापेक्ष आकार is नहीं evident in this list.
Modern movements such as Fundamentalist Christianity, Pietism, Evangelicalism, Pentecostalism and the Holiness movement sometimes क्रॉस denominational लाइनों, or in कुछ मामले बनाएँ नई denominations आउट of दो or अधिक continuing समूह, ( as is the मामला for many United and uniting churches, for example ).
Such subtleties and complexities हैं नहीं clearly depicted here.
Major विभाजन भीतर christianity.
Note : This is not a पूरा सूची, लकिन aims to provide a comprehensible अवलोकन of the diversity among denominations of Christianity.
As there are reported to be approximately 41,000 Christian denominations, many of which can not be verified to be significant, only those denominations with Wikipedia आलेख होगा be सूचीबद्ध in अनुक्रम to ensure कि सब प्रविष्टियां on इस सूची हैं notable and verifiable.
Between denominations, theologians, and comparative religionists there are considerable disagreements about which groups can be properly पुकारा ईसाई, मतभिन्नता arising primarily इससे doctrinal मतभेद between groups.
For the purpose of simplicity, this list is intended to प्रतिबिंबित the self-understanding of प्रत्येक denomination.
Explanations of अलग राय concerning उनके औकात as ईसाई denominations can be found at their respective articles.
There is no official recognition in सबसे भाग of the संसार लिये धार्मिक लाशें, और वहीँ is no official clearinghouse which could determine the status or respectability of religious bodies.
Often there is considerable disagreement between various churches about whether other चर्च चाहिए be labeled साथ pejorative शर्तें ऐसे as `` cult '', or परिचय whether this or that group enjoys some measure of respectability.
Such considerations often vary from place to place, where one religious group may enjoy majority status in एक प्रदेश, लकिन be widely regarded as a `` खतरनाक cult '' in another भाग of the world.
Inclusion on this list does not indicate कोई निर्णय परिचय the आकार, महत्व, or character of a group or its members.
1804 map of `` louisiana ``, edged on the वेस्ट by the Rocky Mountains.
The louisiana खरीदें ( `` बिक्री of louisiana '' ) थी the acquisition by the United States of America in 1803 of of France 's claim to the territory of Louisiana.
The U.S. paid 50 million francs ( $ 11,250,000 ) प्लस रद्दीकरण of debts लायक 18 लाख francs ( $ 3,750,000 ), लिये a कुल sum of 15 million dollars ( less than 3 cents per acre ) for the Louisiana territory ( $ million in dollars, less than 42 cents per acre ).
The Louisiana territory encompassed सब or भाग of 15 present U.S. states and two Canadian provinces.
The land purchased contained all of present-day अरकंसास, मिसौरी, आयोवा, ओक्लाहोमा, कान्सास, और नेब्रास्का ; भाग of मिनेसोटा कि यहूद वेस्ट of the मिसिसिपी नदी ; सबसे of उत्तर डकोटा ; सबसे of दक्षिण डकोटा ; northeastern नई मैक्सिको ; उत्तरी टेक्सास ; the portions of Montana, Wyoming, and Colorado east of the Continental Divide ; Louisiana west of the Mississippi River, including the city of New Orleans ; and small portions of land that would eventually become part of the Canadian provinces of Alberta and Saskatchewan.
France controlled this vast area from 1699 until 1762, the साल it दिया the territory to इसके ally Spain.
Under नेपोलियन बोनापार्ट, फ़्रांस took वापस the territory in 1800 in the hope of building an empire in North America.
A slave revolt in Haiti and an impending युद्ध साथ ब्रिटेन, however, led फ़्रांस to लापरवाही ये योजनाएँ और बेचें the संपूर्ण territory to the United States, who had originally intended only to seek the purchase of New Orleans and its adjacent lands.
The purchase of the territory of Louisiana took place during the प्रेसिडेंसी of थामस जेफरसन.
At the समय, the खरीदें faced घरेलू विपक्ष because it was thought to be unconstitutional.
Although he सहमत कि the u.S. संविधान किया नहीं contain प्रावधानों लिये acquiring territory, जेफरसन decided to go ahead with the purchase anyway in order to remove France 's presence in the region and to protect both U.S. trade access to the port of New Orleans and free passage on the Mississippi River.
Ceremony at Place d'Armes, New Orleans marking transfer of Louisiana to the United States, 10 कूच 1804, as चित्रित by thure de Thulstrup.
`` Cool Jerk '' is a लोकप्रिय सोंग लिखा by डोनाल्ड storball और originally performed by The Capitols.
Released in 1966, it reached no. 2 on the अमरीकी r & b चार्ट और no. 7 on the pop chart.
The backing track for this song was actually अंकित ( secretly ) by the motown हाउस बैंड the दुर्गंध Brothers.
Per one of the Funk भाइयो, the सोंग थी originally to be called `` Pimp Jerk. ''
इस थी लिया इससे watching पड़ोस pimps, who would dance in the clubs, but were too `` cool '' to do the jerk like regular folks.
Their version was subsequently नामित `` the Pimp Jerk. ''
The producer was afraid that a song with the word pimp in the title होता be बैन or नहीं प्राप्त much धनात्मक ध्यान, और था the शीर्षक बदला to इसके वर्तमान form.
The Go-Go 's, टॉड rundgren, बिग ट्रबल, इंसान यौन जवाब, The La De Da 's, The Creation, and The Coasters have covered the song.
Todd Rundgren did his version in an odd time हस्ताक्षर ( 7/4 ), giving an obviously jerky महसूस to the सोंग.
The Go-Go 's covered the song for their 1982 album अवकाश और बाद re-recorded it लिये उनके 1990 एल्बम Greatest.
In the feature film Home Alone 2 : Lost in New York, Uncle Frank ( gerry bamman ) गाती `` कूल झटका '' in the बरसात.
A संस्करण of the सोंग साथ अलग गीत ( `` Do the Cool Whip '' ) is used in Cool Whip commercials.
A recording of `` Cool Jerk '' by Ricardo Ray is featured in the विशेषता फिल्मी donnie brasco ( 1997 ).
The song features in the film Standing in the साए of motown, performed by the दुर्गंध भाइयो साथ lead vocals by Bootsy Collins.
The सोंग is सुना briefly in the एनिमेटेड विशेषता, मेडागास्कर 3 : Europe 's Most Wanted.

A league is a unit of लंबाई ( or, rarely, क्षेत्रफल ).
It was long common in यूरोपीय और लैटिन अमेरिका, लकिन it is no longer an official unit in any nation.
The लीग originally referred to the अलहदा a person could walk in an hour.
Since the Middle Ages, many मान have महरूम निर्दिष्ट in अनेक countries.
In the context of nautical distances, the 3 mile ( 4.8 km ) distance corresponds to how far an observer of औसत ऊँचाई ( 5'9 '' or 1.78 m ) can देखिए जब खड़ा at समुद्र स्तर.
Thus, a ship traveling one `` league '' has reached कया थी previously the farthest visible distance on the horizon.
The lack of a historical and वैश्विक मानक लिये the सटीक माप of a `` लीग '' can be accounted लिये by the परिवर्तनीय उन्नयन of the observer ( i.e., sightings from a ship 's deck vs. masthead ).
The Irish state came into being in 1922 as the आयरिश फ़्री राज्य, a डोमिनियन of the अंग्रेजों राष्ट्रमंडल, having seceded इससे the संयुक्त किंगडम under the Anglo-Irish Treaty.
It comprises 26 of आयरलैंड 's 32 काउंटी.
Since 1949 it has existed as the गणतंत्र of आयरलैंड.
From its foundation, the Irish Free राज्य थी embroiled in a सिविल युद्ध between राष्ट्रवादियों supporting the Treaty and opponents who supported a republic.
The pro-Treaty side, संगठित as cumann na ngaedheal उभरा विजयी इससे the conflict and won subsequent elections.
They formed the सरकारी of the राज्य जबतक 1932, जब वे शांतिपूर्वक हात over शक्ति to the anti-treaty faction in Fianna Fáil, who defeated them in an election.
The Irish state, despite इसके हिंसक beginnings, has remained a liberal democracy throughout its existence.
A new constitution in 1937 removed many of the links with Britain established under the Treaty and Ireland 's neutrality in the दूसरी संसार युद्ध demonstrated इसके स्वतंत्रता in विदेशी नीति matters इससे Britain.
In 1948 Ireland formally left the British राष्ट्रमंडल और अपनाया the शीर्षक of `` गणतंत्र ''.
In the economic गोला, the आयरिश राज्य रै था a mixed performance.
On independence, it थी एक of the wealthier देशों in Europe per head of population.
However it also inherited from British rule the समस्याएं of बेरोजगारी, करणों, uneven भौगोलिक विकास और कमी of a native industrial base.
For much of its history, the state struggled to rectify these problems.
Particular peaks of emigration were recorded during the लेट 1930s, 1950s और 1980s, जब the Irish economy recorded little growth.
In the 1930s, fianna fáil सरकारें attempted to create Irish domestic industries using subsidies and protective tarifs.
In the late 1950s, these policies were dropped in favour of फ़्री व्यापार साथ चयनित देशों और प्रोत्साहित of foreign investment with low taxes.
This was expanded when Ireland entered the यूरोपीय आर्थिक जातियाँ in 1972.
In the 1990s and 2000s, आयरलैंड अनुभवी an आर्थिक बूम ज्ञात as the सेल्टिक बाघ, in जिससे the देश 's GDP surpassed many of its European neighbours.
Immigration also surpassed करणों, bringing the राज्य 's जनसांख्यिकी up to over 4 million.
However, since 2008, Ireland रै अनुभवी a कठोर संकट in the बैंकिंग सेक्टर and with sovereign debt.
The resultant economic slump has deepened the प्रभाव of the संसार मंदी on Ireland.
इससे 1937 to 1998, the आयरिश संविधान शामिल a claim on Northern Ireland as a part of the national territory.
However, the state also opposed and used its security forces against those armed groups - प्रधानतया the अस्थायी आयरिश रिपब्लिकन फौज, जो आजमाया to unite Ireland by force.
This occurred in the 1950s, throughout the 1970s and 1980s और रै जारी on a घटाया स्केल.
Irish governments meanwhile tried to broker an agreement to the conflict ज्ञात as the परेशानियों भीतर उत्तरी आयरलैंड इससे 1968 to the लेट 1990s.
The British सरकारी officially recognised the सही of the आयरिश सरकारी to be a पार्टी to the Northern negotiations in the Anglo-Irish Agreement of 1985.
In 1998, as part of the Good शुक्रवार अनुबंध, the आयरिश संविधान थी altered by referendum to हटाएँ the territorial अर्जी to उत्तरी आयरलैंड and instead extend the right of Irish citizenship to all the people of the island should they wish to have it.
जॉन क्विंसी एडम्स ( जुलाई 11, 1767february 23, 1848 ) was the sixth President of the United States ( 1825–1829 ).
He served as American diplomat, सीनेटर, और congressional representative.
He was a member of the federalist, democratic-republican, नेशनल रिपब्लिकन, and later Anti-Masonic and Whig parties.
Adams was the बेटे of पूर्व अध्यक्ष जॉन एडम्स और अबीगैल एडम्स.
As a diplomat, Adams played an important role in negotiating many international treaties, most notably the सन्धि of ghent, जिससे ended the युद्ध of 1812.
As Secretary of State, he negotiated with the United Kingdom over America 's northern border साथ कनाडा, negotiated साथ स्पेन the annexation of फ्लोरिडा, and authored the Monroe Doctrine.
Historians agree he was one of the greatest diplomats and secretaries of राज्य in अमरीकी history.
As president, he sought to modernize the अमरीकी अर्थव्यवस्था और प्रचारित शिक्षा.
Adams enacted a part of his agenda और सशुल्क बंद much of the नेशनल debt.
He was stymied by a कॉंग्रेस नियंत्रित by उसके दुश्मनों, and his lack of patronage networks helped politicians eager to undercut him.
He lost उसके 1828 बोली लिये re-election to एंड्रयू Jackson.
In doing so, he became the first अध्यक्ष चूंकि उसके पिता to serve a सिंगल पद.
Adams is best known as a diplomat who shaped America 's विदेशी नीति in लकीर साथ उसके ardently nationalist commitment to America 's republican values.
More recently Howe ( 2007 ) portrayed एडम्स as the exemplar और moral leader in an era of modernization.
During Adams ' आजीवन, technological नवप्रवर्तनों और नई अर्थात् of संचार स्प्रेड messages of religious revival, social reform, and party politics.
Goods, money, and people traveled अधिक rapidly और efficiently than ever before.
Adams was elected a U.S. प्रतिनिधि इससे मैसाचुसेट्स बाद leaving दफ्तर, सेवारत लिये the पिछला 17 सालो of उसके जीवन साथ far greater acclamation than he had achieved as president.
He is, so far, the तभी अध्यक्ष बाद निर्वाचित to the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि ( though John Tyler was elected to the House of Representatives of the Confederate States just before his death in 1862 ).
Animated by his growing revulsion against slavery, एडम्स became a अग्रणी प्रतिद्वन्दी of the स्लेव शक्ति.
He predicted that if a सिविल युद्ध यहूद to ब्रेक out, the president could abolish slavery by using his war powers.
Adams भी पूर्वानुमानित the संघ 's विच्छेद over the गुलामी समस्या, लकिन कहा that if the South became independent there would be a series of bloody slave revolts.
खिड़कियाँ अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर 9 ( ie9 ) is a version of the Internet Explorer web browser from Microsoft.
It was released to the पब्लिक on कूच 14, 2011.
Microsoft has released Internet Explorer 9 as a major out-of-band version that is not tied to the release अनुसूची of कोई particular संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ, नापसंद पिछला संस्करण.
It is the first version since Internet Explorer 2 to not be bundled with a Windows ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली, हालांकि कुछ oems have संस्थापित it साथ खिड़कियाँ 7 on उनके pcs, as खूब as नई Windows 7 laptops.
The system requirements for Internet Explorer 9 are Windows 7, Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows Vista सेवा पैक 2 or खिड़कियाँ सर्वर 2008 sp2 साथ the मंच अद्यतन.
Windows XP and पहले हैं नहीं समर्थित.
Internet Explorer 9 is the पिछला संस्करण of अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर to be समर्थित on खिड़कियाँ Vista.
Both IA-32 और x64 builds are available.
Internet Explorer 9 supports several CSS 3 गुण, अंतःस्थापित आईसीसी v2 or v4 रंग प्रोफ़ाइल support via खिड़कियाँ रंग System, and has improved JavaScript performance.
It is the last of the पाँच प्रमुख वेब browsers to implement support लिये Scalable Vector Graphics ( SVG ).
It also features hardware-accelerated graphics rendering using Direct2D, hardware-accelerated text rendering using directwrite, hardware-accelerated वीडियो रेंडरिंग using मीडिया न्यास, इमेजिंग support provided by Windows Imaging Component, and high fidelity printing powered by the XML Paper Specification ( XPS ) print pipeline.
Internet Explorer 9 also supports the html5 वीडियो और ऑडियो टैग और the वेब Open Font Format.
Alka-Seltzer is an effervescent antacid और पीड़ा reliever पहला marketed by the Dr. Miles Medicine Company.
It was developed by मौरिस treener, सिर केमिस्ट at मील, in Elkhart, Indiana.
Alka-Seltzer is marketed for relief of minor aches, pains, सूजन, ज्वर, सिरदर्द, heartburn, खट्टा पेट, अपच, और hangovers, while neutralizing excess stomach acid.
It was शुभारम्भ in 1931.
A spin-off of alka-seltzer बना to relieve जुकाम और फ्लू, alka-seltzer Plus, was later introduced.
A short-lived antacid non-aspirin variant, alka-mints, थी introduced in 1994 और discontinued in 1997.
Alka-Seltzer is currently owned by Bayer schering फार्मा ag, जर्मनी.
The name `` Alka-Seltzer '' has been extended to incorporate an entire line of medications sold over the काउंटर और लिया by अर्थात् of rapidly dissolving टैबलेट कि रूप a कार्बोनेटेड समाधान in जल.
चेरी अलका seltzer प्लस टैब्लेट dissolving in water

A stalactite (, ; इससे the यूनानी stalasso, ( σταλάσσω ), `` to drip '', and meaning `` that which drips '' ) is a type of speleothem ( secondary mineral ) that hangs from the ceiling of limestone caves.
It is a प्रकार of dripstone.
The corresponding गठन on the मंजिल of the गुफा is ज्ञात as a stalagmite.
Degree abbreviations are used as an alternative way to specify an academic degree बजाय of स्पेलिंग आउट the शीर्षक in पूरा, ऐसे as in सन्दर्भ किताबे like Who 's Who and on business cards.
अनेक डिग्री have अधिक than one abbreviation.
In the UK, it is not generally the custom to punctuate abbreviations for डिग्री साथ पूरा stops ( e.g. `` बीएससी '' बल्कि than `` b.sc. ``.
Race is a classification system used to categorize humans into विशाल और पृथक populations or समूह by anatomical, सांस्कृतिक, जातीय, जेनेटिक, geographical, historical, linguistic, religious, or social affiliation.
First प्रयुक्त to denote नेशनल संबद्धों, the term began to be used to relate to physical traits in the 17th century.
In the early 20th century the term थी प्रायः प्रयुक्त, in a taxonomic भाव, to denote genetically differentiated human populations defined by phenotype.
While biologists sometimes use the concept of race to make distinctions among fuzzy sets of traits, others in the scientific community suggest that the idea of race often is used in a naive or simplistic way, i.e. कि among इंसानो, रेस रै no taxonomic significance : सब जीना इंसानो belong to the वही प्रजाति, होमो sapiens और subspecies, होमो sapiens sapiens.
सोशल conceptions और groupings of दौड़ vary over time, involving folk taxonomies
that define of individuals आधारित on आभास traits.
वैज्ञानिकों consider biological essentialism obsolete, and generally discourage racial explanations for collective differentiation in both physical and behavioral traits.
Since the second half of the 20th सदी the एसोसिएशन of रेस साथ the विचारधाराओं और theories कि grew out of the work of 19th-century anthropologists and physiologists has led to the use of the word race itself becoming problematic.
Although still used in general contexts, it is now often replaced by अन्य शब्द जिससे हैं कम अस्पष्ट और emotionally चार्ज, ऐसे as populations, people ( s ), ethnic groups or communities depending on context.
Lucy Stone ( August 13, 1818 – October 19, 1893 ) was a prominent American abolitionist और suffragist, और a गायन एडवोकेट और आयोजक promoting अधिकारों for women.
In 1847, Stone became the first स्त्री इससे मैसाचुसेट्स to earn a कॉलेज degree.
She spoke out for महिलाओं 's अधिकारों और विरूद्ध गुलामी at a समय जब women were discouraged and prevented from public speaking.
Stone थी the पहला अंकित अमरीकी स्त्री to retain उसके own last name after marriage.
Stone 's organizational activities for the कारण of महिलाओं 's अधिकारों yielded ठोस gains in the difficult political environment of the 19th century.
Stone helped initiate the first National Women 's अधिकारों सम्मेलन और वो समर्थित और sustained it annually साथ साथ a क्रमांक of other local, state and regional activist conventions.
Stone spoke in सामने of a क्रमांक of विधान लाशें to प्रचार laws giving more rights to women.
She assisted in establishing the Woman 's National Loyal League to help pass the Thirteenth Amendment and thereby abolish slavery, after जिससे वो helped रूप the largest समूह of like-minded महिलाओं 's अधिकारों reformers, the नीतियां मॉडरेट अमरीकी स्त्री suffrage संघ, जिससे worked लिये दशकों at the राज्य स्तर in एहसान of महिलाओं 's right to vote.
Stone wrote extensively about a wide range of women 's अधिकारों, प्रकाशन और distributing भाषणों by herself और अन्य, और सम्मेलन proceedings.
In the long-running and influential स्त्री 's जर्नल, a साप्ताहिक periodical कि वो स्थापित और प्रचारित, Stone aired both her own and differing views about women 's rights.
Called `` the orator '' और `` the morning स्टार of the स्त्री 's अधिकारों गति '', स्टोन वितरित a वाक जिससे sparked सुसान B. एंथोनी to take up the cause of women 's suffrage.
Elizabeth Cady Stanton wrote that `` Lucy Stone was the पहला व्यक्ति by जिसको the दिल of the अमरीकी पब्लिक थी deeply stirred on the woman question. ''
Together, Anthony, Stanton, और स्टोन have महरूम पुकारा the 19th सदी `` triumvirate `` of women 's suffrage and feminism.
In finance, a बंध is an यंत्र of indebtedness of the बंध issuer to the holders.
It is a debt security, under which the issuer owes the holders a debt and, depending on the terms of the बंध, is obliged to अदा उन्हें ब्याज ( the कूपन ) or to repay the प्रिंसिपल at a बाद date, termed the maturity.
Interest is usually देय at फिक्स्ड intervals ( semiannual, सालाना, sometimes monthly ).
Very often the बंध is परक्राम्य, i.e. the स्वामित्व of the instrument can be transferred in the secondary market.
Thus a bond is a form of loan or IOU : the holder of the bond is the lender ( creditor ), the जारीकर्ता of the बंध is the borrower ( debtor ), और the coupon is the interest.
Bonds provide the borrower with external funds to finance long-term निवेश, or, in the मामला of सरकारी bonds, to वित्त current expenditure.
Certificates of deposit ( CDs ) or short term commercial paper are माना to be धन मार्केट यंत्र और नहीं bonds : the प्रमुख अंतर is in the लंबाई of the term of the instrument.
Bonds and stocks are both securities, but the major difference between the two is that ( capital ) stockholders have an इक्विटी हिस्सेदारी in the कम्पनी ( i.e. वे हैं स्वामी ), whereas bondholders have a creditor हिस्सेदारी in the company ( i.e. they are lenders ).
another अंतर is कि bonds प्रायः have a पारिभाषित पद, or परिपक्वता, after which the bond is redeemed, whereas stocks may be outstanding indefinitely.
An exception is an irredeemable बंध, ऐसे as consols, जिससे is a perpetuity, i.e. a bond with no maturity.

This model can be found अंदर the मीनार.

A scale model is a physical मॉडल, a प्रतिनिधित्व or नक़ल of an ऑब्जेक्ट कि is larger or छोटी than the वास्तविक आकार of the ऑब्जेक्ट, which seeks to maintain the relative proportions ( the scale factor ) of the physical size of the original object.
Very often the scale model is used as a मार्गदर्शिका to बनाना the ऑब्जेक्ट in पूरा आकार.
स्केल मॉडल हैं निर्मित or collected for many reasons.
The Zune HD was a पोर्टेबल मीडिया खिलाड़ी in the zune उत्पाद family released on September 15, 2009 by Microsoft.
It was a direct प्रतिस्पर्धी साथ the ठहराना ipod और iphone series of mobile devices.
It was initially released in 16 और 32 GB capacities.
A 64 GB version was released on अप्रैल 9, 2010.
It utilized a touchscreen interface for navigation and included wi-fi लिये तुल्यकालन, अभिगम to the zune मार्केटप्लेस और वेब ब्राउज़िंग.
The Zune hd utilized the nvidia tegra apx 2600 चिप, allowing it to खेल 720p वीडियो through the optional HDMI Zune dock on a high-definition television.
Otherwise, सामग्री होता be scaled bas to 480x272 पिक्सेल on the player 's OLED touchscreen.
Old sparky, the इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी प्रयुक्त at Sing Sing prison
Execution by electrocution, प्रायः performed using an इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी, is an निष्पादन विधि originating in the संयुक्त राज्य in जिससे the condemned व्यक्ति is strapped to a विशेषकर built wooden chair and electrocuted through electrodes placed on the body.
This execution method was created by employees of Thomas Edison during the War of Currents, and has been used only in the United States and, for a period of several decades, in the Philippines ( इसके पहला उपयोग वहीँ in 1924 अंतर्गत अमरीकी occupation, last in 1976 ).
Historically, once the condemned person was संलग्न to the कुर्सी, विभिन्न चक्र ( differing in वोल्टेज और अवधि ) of प्रत्यावर्ती current would be passed through the individual 's body, in order to cause fatal damage to the internal organs ( including the brain ).
The first jolt of electric current was designed to कारण तात्कालिक unconsciousness और दिमाग मौत ; the दूसरी एक was designed to cause fatal damage to the vital organs.
Death was frequently caused by विद्युत overstimulation of the heart.
हालांकि in the संयुक्त राज्य the इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी रै become a प्रतीक of the मौत penalty, its use is in decline due to the rise of lethal injection, which is widely believed to be a more humane method of execution.
Although some states still maintain electrocution as a विधि of निष्पादन, आज it is तभी कायम as a द्वितीयक विधि कि may be चुनी over lethal इंजेक्शन at the निवेदन of the prisoner.
As of 2010, electrocution is an वैकल्पिक रूप of execution in Alabama, Florida, South Carolina and Virginia.
They allow the prisoner to चुनें lethal इंजेक्शन as an वैकल्पिक विधि.
In the states of Kentucky and Tennessee, the electric chair has महरूम रिटायर्ड मगर लिये those जिनकी पूंजी अपराधों यहूद वचनबद्ध prior to legislated तिथियाँ in 1998 ( Kentucky : March 31, 1998 ; Tennessee : December 31, 1998 ) and who chose electrocution.
In both states, inmates who do not choose electrocution or inmates जो वचनबद्ध उनके अपराधों बाद the designated तिथि हैं मारे by lethal injection.
The इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी is an वैकल्पिक रूप of निष्पादन स्वीकृत लिये संभावित उपयोग in अरकंसास और ओक्लाहोमा if अन्य फ़ॉर्म of निष्पादन हैं मिला unconstitutional in the state at the time of execution.
it is the एकमात्र विधि of निष्पादन in वर्मांट, जहाँ treason is the only capital crime.
On February 8, 2008, the Nebraska Supreme Court determined that execution by electric chair थी a `` बेदर्द और असामान्य दंड '' अंतर्गत the राज्य 's संविधान.
This brought executions of this type to an end in Nebraska, the only remaining राज्य to retain electrocution as इसके एकमात्र विधि of निष्पादन लिये murder.
The Maryland हाउस of delegates is the निम्नतर हाउस of the General Assembly, the state legislature of the American State of Maryland, and is composed of 141 Delegates elected from 47 districts.
The House of Delegates Chamber is located in the मेरीलैंड राज्य हाउस ( राज्य कैपिटल ) on State Circle in Annapolis, which is the state capital.
The State House also houses the Maryland State Senate Chamber and the offices of the राज्यपाल और लेफ्टिनेंट राज्यपाल of the राज्य of मेरीलैंड.
Each Delegate has offices in annapolis, in the आसपास कैस्पर R. टेलर, jr. हाउस दफ्तर Building.
The Liberation of Paris ( also known as the Battle for Paris ) took प्लेस दौरान संसार युद्ध ii इससे 19 अगस्त 1944 जबतक the आत्मसमर्पण of the occupying जर्मनी गैरीसन on 25 August.
The Liberation of पेरिस प्रारंभ साथ an uprising by the फ्रेंच प्रतिरोध against the German garrison.
On 24 August, the French Forces of the Interior ( Forces françaises de l'intérieur, ffi ) प्राप्त सुदृढीकरण इससे the फ़्री फ्रेंच फौज of मुक्ति and from the U.S. Third Army under General Patton.
The capital region of France had been governed by Nazi Germany since the signing of the Second Compiègne Armistice in June 1940, when the German Army occupied northern और westernmost फ़्रांस, और जब the कठपुतली शासन of vichy फ़्रांस थी स्थापित in the कस्बा of vichy in सेंट्रल France.
This battle marked the liberation of Paris और the निर्वासन of the vichy सरकारी to sigmaringen in Germany.
However, there was still much heavy fighting to be done before France was liberated, including the campaign in southern France during August-September ( in provence और extending into the southwestern प्रदेश of the vosges kyu ), साथ the german-held seaports of पश्चिमी फ़्रांस ( ऐसे as at brest और dunkirk ), in Alsace and Lorraine in eastern France, and in northeastern France, such as along the Rhine and Moder Rivers.
The German Army और ss लड़ा doggedly in ये areas for the remainder of 1944 and into 1945.
`` Feelin ' Alright ? '' also known as `` Feeling Alright '' is a सोंग लिखा by डेव मेसन of the English rock band Traffic from their eponymous 1968 album, Traffic.
The song was also a hit single for several performers : Joe Cocker ( 1969, # 69, recharted in 1972, us # 33 ), mongo santamaría ( 1969, # 95 ) और ग्रैंड दुर्गंध रेलरोड ( 1971, US # 54 ).
It has also been recorded by Three Dog रात्रि ( 1969 ), the 5th आयाम ( 1970 ), लू राल्स, फ्रेडी किंग, पॉल weller, lulu, chairmen of the फलक ( 1970 ), विरल धरती, the इलेक्ट्रिक Concept Orchestra, Mother 's Finest ( 1973 ), The Ohio Players ( 1971 ), Diana Ross with the Jackson 5 ( 1971 ), Maceo Parker, Gladys Knight & the Pips, Widespread Panic and The Black Crowes.
A Steel Drum version by Trinidad Oil Company was reissued on the dancefloor जैज़ संकलन ब्लू रस 2.
It was also featured in the 2000 फिल्मी duets, सुंग by huey Lewis.
Both the original and the Joe Cocker कवर यहूद प्रदर्शित in the फिल्म उड़ान, अभिनीत डेंज़ल Washington.
Devon Werkheiser ( born March 8,1991 ) is an अमरीकी कर्ता, आवाज़ कर्ता, सिंगर, songwriter और संगीतकार, बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उसके अभिनीत भूमिका as ned bigby on the निकलोडियन sitcom Ned 's Declassified School Survival Guide and for his role in the 2007 TV Movie Shredderman Rules, as the lead character Nolan Byrd.
Werkheiser also played Peter Parkes in the चौथी और फाइनल ऋतु of the ABC Family show Greek.
Sample view of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य record based on images
Sample view of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य रिकार्ड
An electronic health रिकार्ड ( ehr ) is an evolving अवधारणा पारिभाषित as a systematic collection of electronic health information about individual patients or populations.
It is a record in digital स्वरूप कि is theoretically सक्षम of होने shared across different health care settings.
In some cases this sharing can occur by way of network-connected enterprise-wide सूचना प्रणालियों और अन्य information networks or exchanges.
EHRs may include a range of data, including demographics, medical इतिहास, दवा और allergies, immunization औकात, प्रयोगशाला परीक्षण परिणाम, radiology images, vital signs, personal stats like age and weight, and billing information.
Loan origination is the process by which a borrower applies लिये a नई ऋण, और a lender प्रक्रियाओं कि अनुप्रयोग.
Origination generally includes all the steps from taking a loan अनुप्रयोग up to disbursal of निधि ( or घटती the application ).
Loan servicing covers everything बाद disbursing the निधि जबतक the ऋण is fully paid off.
Loan origination is a specialized संस्करण of नई खाता खोलने लिये financial services organizations.
Certain people and संगठन specialize in ऋण origination.
बंधक brokers और अन्य बंधक originator companies serve as a prominent example.
There हैं अनेक अलग types of loans.
For more information on loan types, see the ऋण और उपभोक्ता lending articles.
Steps involved in originating a ऋण vary by ऋण प्रकार, विभिन्न kinds of loan risk, regulator, lender policy, and other factors.
Top left : The Tennessee घाटी प्राधिकार, भाग of the नई सौदे, होने signed into law in 1933.
Top right : Franklin Delano रूज़वेल्ट, जो थी जिम्मेदार लिये पहलों and programs collectively known as the New Deal.
नीचे : a पब्लिक भित्ति इससे एक of the artists employed by the New Deal.
The नई सौदे थी a श्रेणी of आर्थिक कार्यक्रम enacted in the United States between 1933 and 1936.
They involved presidential executive orders or laws passed by Congress दौरान the पहला पद of अध्यक्ष फ्रैंकलिन D. Roosevelt.
The कार्यक्रम यहूद in जवाब to the ग्रेट अवसाद, और केन्द्रित on what historians call the `` 3 Rs '' : Relief, Recovery, and Reform.
That is Relief for the unemployed and poor ; रिकवरी of the अर्थव्यवस्था to सामान्य स्तर ; और सुधार of the वित्तीय प्रणाली to prevent a repeat depression.
The New Deal produced a political realignment, making the Democratic Party the majority ( as well as the party that held the White House for seven out of nine Presidential terms इससे 1933 to 1969 ), साथ इसके आधार in उदार विचार, the श्वेत दक्षिण, परंपरागत डेमोक्रेट, big city machines, and the newly empowered labor unions and ethnic minorities.
The republicans यहूद विभाजित, साथ conservatives opposing the संपूर्ण नई सौदे as an दुश्मन of कारोबार and growth, and liberals accepting some of it and promising to make it more efficient.
The realignment crystallized into the नई सौदे गठबन्धन कि वर्चस्व सबसे अध्यक्षीय चुनावों into the 1960s, while the opposition Conservative Coalition largely controlled Congress from 1937 to 1963.
By 1936 the पद `` उदार '' typically थी प्रयुक्त लिये समर्थक of the New Deal, and `` conservative `` for its opponents.
From 1934 to 1938, Roosevelt was assisted in his endeavours by a “pro-spender” बहुमत in कॉंग्रेस ( drawn इससे two-party, प्रतिस्पर्धी, non-machine, प्रगतिशील, and Left party districts ).
As noted by Alexander Hicks, “Roosevelt, backed by rare, non-Southern Democrat majorities — 270 non-southern डेमोक्रेट प्रतिनिधि और 71 non-southern डेमोक्रेट सीनेटरों — spelled दूसरी नई सौदे reform.”
Many historians distinguish between a `` First New Deal '' ( 1933–34 ) and a `` दूसरी नई सौदे '' ( 1935–38 ), साथ the दूसरी एक अधिक liberal and more controversial.
The `` First New सौदे '' ( 1933–34 ) dealt साथ विविध समूह, इससे बैंकिंग और railroads to industry and farming, all of which demanded help for economic survival.
The Federal Emergency Relief Administration, for instance, provided $ 500 million लिये राहत परिचालन by राज्य और शहरों, जबकि the short-lived cwa ( सिविल works प्रशासन ) दिया बस्तियों धन to operate make-work projects in 1933-34.
The `` Second New Deal `` in 1935–38 included the वेगनर अधिनियम to प्रचार मजदूर संघ, the works प्रगति प्रशासन ( wpa ) राहत कार्यक्रम ( जिससे बना the संघीय सरकारी by far the largest single employer in the nation ), the Social Security Act, and new programs to aid tenant farmers and migrant workers.
The final major items of New Deal legislation were the creation of the United States आवास प्राधिकार और फार्म सुरक्षा प्रशासन, दोनो in 1937, और the मेला मजदूर मानकों अधिनियम of 1938, जिससे नियत अधिकतम घंटों और न्यूनतम मजदूरी for most categories of workers.
The economic downturn of 1937–38, and the bitter split between the afl और cio मजदूर संघ led to प्रमुख रिपब्लिकन gains in Congress in 1938.
Conservative Republicans and डेमोक्रेट in कॉंग्रेस joined in the informal Conservative Coalition.
By 1942–43 they shut down relief programs ऐसे as the wpa और ccc और अवरोधित major liberal proposals.
रूज़वेल्ट खुद turned उसके ध्यान to the युद्ध प्रयत्न, and won reelection in 1940 and 1944.
The Supreme Court declared the National Recovery Administration ( NRA ) और the पहला संस्करण of the agricultural समायोजन अधिनियम ( aaa ) असंवैधानिक, however the AAA was rewritten and then upheld.
As the first Republican president elected after FDR, Dwight D. आइज़नहावर ( 1953–61 ) बाएँ the नई सौदे largely intact, even expanding it in some areas.
In the 1960s, Lyndon B. Johnson 's Great Society used the New Deal as inspiration for a नाटकीय विस्तार of उदार कार्यक्रम, जिससे रिपब्लिकन रिचर्ड M. निक्सन generally retained.
After 1974, however, the कॉल लिये deregulation of the economy gained bipartisan support.
The New Deal regulation of banking ( glass–steagall अधिनियम ) थी निलंबित in the 1990s.
Many New Deal programs remain active, साथ कुछ स्टिल ऑपरेटिंग अंतर्गत the असली names, सहित the संघीय जमा बीमे निगम ( FDIC ), the Federal Crop Insurance Corporation ( FCIC ), the Federal Housing Administration ( FHA ), and the Tennessee Valley Authority ( TVA ).
The largest कार्यक्रम स्टिल in अस्तित्व आज हैं the सोशल सुरक्षा प्रणाली and the Securities and Exchange Commission ( SEC ).
A woman ( ), pl : महिलाओं ( ) is a मादा इंसान.
The term स्त्री is प्रायः सुरक्षित लिये an वयस्क, साथ the term girl being the usual term for a female child or adolescent.
However, the term woman is भी sometimes प्रयुक्त to पहचानो a मादा इंसान, regardless of आयु, as in वाक्यांश such as `` Women 's rights ``.
Women are typically capable of giving जनम, हालांकि पुरानी महिलाओं जो have गए through रजोनिवृत्ति और some intersex women can not.
`` I Do n't Want to Miss a Thing '' is a song performed by अमरीकी चट्टान बैंड एरोस्मिथ लिये the 1998 फिल्मी armageddon.
Written by Diane Warren, the सोंग debuted at क्रमांक एक on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 ( the पहला # 1 for the band after 28 years together ).
the सोंग ठहरे at क्रमांक एक लिये four weeks from September 5 to September 26, 1998.
The song भी ठहरे at क्रमांक 1 लिये अनेक weeks in several other countries.
In the UK, the song peaked at number four, बनने एरोस्मिथ 's उच्चतम charting सोंग in the uk, जहाँ it थी the 17th best-selling सिंगल of 1998, and has sold over a million copies.
Although not used by the majority of the world 's countries, daylight छायांकन समय is आम in the पश्चिमी world.
Daylight saving time ( DST ) —also गर्मियाँ समय in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी — is the अभ्यास of advancing घड़ियाँ दौरान the lighter months so that evenings have more daylight and mornings have less.
Typically clocks are adjusted forward एक घंटा निकट the प्रारंभ of वसन्त और हैं समायोजित पिछड़ा in autumn.
The modern idea of daylight saving was first proposed in 1895 by जार्ज vernon हडसन और it थी पहला implemented दौरान the पहला संसार War.
Many countries have used it at विभिन्न टाइम्स चूंकि then.
Much of the संयुक्त राज्य प्रयुक्त dst in the 1950s और 1960s, और dst उपयोग विस्तारित following the 1970s energy crisis and has been widely used in North America and Europe since then.
The अभ्यास रै महरूम दोनो praised and criticized.
Adding daylight to evenings benefits retailing, sports, and other क्रियाएँ कि exploit धूप बाद working घंटों, लकिन can कारण समस्याएं लिये evening entertainment and other occupations tied to the sun.
Although an early लक्ष्य of dst थी to reduce संध्या उपयोग of incandescent lighting ( formerly a प्राथमिक उपयोग of विद्युत ), आधुनिक हीटिंग और cooling usage patterns differ greatly, and research about how DST currently affects energy use is limited or contradictory.
DST क्लॉक शिफ्ट उपस्थित अन्य challenges.
They complicate timekeeping, और can disrupt बैठक, सफर, बिलिंग, रिकार्ड keeping, medical devices, heavy equipment, and sleep patterns.
Software can प्रायः समायोजन कंप्यूटर घड़ियाँ automatically, लकिन इस can be सीमित और error-prone, particularly when DST dates are changed.
