Montargis is a कम्यून in the loiret विभाग in north-central France on the Loing river.
The town is located about south of Paris और ईस्ट of orléans in the Gâtinais.
Montargis is the दूसरी largest नगर in the Loiret, after Orléans.
It is near a विशाल वन, और contains light industry and farming, including saffron.
Due to its numerous canals और पुलों, montargis sometimes बिल्स itself as the `` Venice of the Gâtinais. ''
Though quite modern, it retains a मध्यकालीन आकर्षण in इसके शहर area.
In computer storage, a logical ईकाई क्रमांक, or lun, is a क्रमांक प्रयुक्त to पहचानो a logical unit, which is a device addressed by the SCSI protocol or protocols which encapsulate SCSI, such as Fibre Channel or iSCSI.
A LUN may be used with any यंत्र जिससे supports read/write परिचालन, ऐसे as a टेप ड्राइव, लकिन is सबसे often used to refer to a logical disk as created on a SAN.
Though not technically correct, the पद `` lun '' is प्रायः भी प्रयुक्त to refer to the logical disk itself.
The इन्जील according to चिह्नित (,, to euangelion kata markon ), commonly shortened to the Gospel of Mark or simply Mark, is the second book of the New Testament.
This canonical account of the life of Jesus of Nazareth is एक of the तीन synoptic gospels.
It was विचार to be an निचोड़, जिससे accounts for its place as the second gospel in the Bible.
however, सबसे समकालीन विद्वानों अभी लिहाज़ it as the earliest of the canonical gospels ( c 70 ).
That Mark was used as a source for the other synoptic gospels Gospel of मैथ्यू और इन्जील of ल्यूक is widely आयोजित by अनेक, हालांकि नहीं all, New Testament scholars.
The Gospel of Mark narrates the Ministry of यीशु इससे उसके बपतिस्मा by जॉन the बैपटिस्ट to his death and resurrection.
It focuses विशेषकर on the पिछला सप्ताह of उसके जीवन ( अध्याय 11–16 ) in Jerusalem.
Its swift narrative portrays यीशु as a वीर man of कार्रवाई, an exorcist, healer and miracle worker.
An important theme of Mark is the मुक्तिदाता रहस्य.
Jesus silences the demoniacs he heals, कोशिशें unsuccessfully to रखना उसके मुक्तिदाता पहचान रहस्य, और conceals his message with parables.
Meanwhile, the disciples fail to understand both the implication of the चमत्कार of यीशु और the अर्थ of the बाते he predicts परिचय उसके arrest, death and resurrection.
Most scholars believe that the original text of the gospel ends at Mark 16:8 with the discovery of Jesus ' empty tomb and that the following खाता of उसके क़यामत appearances is a later addition.
According to परंपरा और कुछ जल्दी गिरिजाघर लेखक, the author is Mark the Evangelist, the companion of the apostle Peter.
The gospel, however, appears to rely on अनेक underlying स्त्रोत, varying in रूप और in धर्मशास्त्र, जिससे tells against the tradition that the gospel was based on Peter 's preaching.
The text is a compilation which may include eye-witness खाते as खूब as ज्ञात अपोस्टोलिक preachings, और pre-existing लिखा records that do not exist today but can be confirmed from 2nd-century commentators.
Some of the stories in the इन्जील may have महरूम transmitted orally पहले होने लिखा down.
Various elements within the gospel suggest that the author wrote in सीरियाई or फिलिस्तीन for a non-Jewish Christian community.
The Lord of the Rings is an epic high fantasy अनोखा लिखा by अंग्रेज़ी भाषाशास्त्री और विश्वविद्यालयों of Oxford professor J. R. R. Tolkien.
The story began as a sequel to Tolkien 's 1937 children 's fantasy novel The Hobbit, but आखिरकार विकसित into a much larger work.
It was लिखा in चरण between 1937 और 1949, much of it during World War II.
It is the second best-selling अनोखा कभी लिखा, साथ over 150 लाख नक़ल sold.
The title of the novel refers to the स्टोरी 's प्रमुख विपक्षी, the अंधेरा रब sauron, जो था in an पहले आयु निर्मित the एक रिंग to rule the other Rings of Power as the ultimate weapon in his campaign to conquer and rule all of Middle-earth.
From quiet beginnings in the Shire, a Hobbit land not unlike the English countryside, the story ranges across north-west Middle-earth, following the course of the War of the Ring through the eyes of its characters, notably the hobbits frodo baggins, samwise `` sam '' gamgee, meriadoc `` मैरी '' brandybuck और peregrin `` pippin '' took, लकिन भी the hobbits ' मुख्य allies and travelling companions : Aragorn, a Human Ranger ; Boromir, a man from Gondor ; Gimli, a Dwarf warrior ; Legolas, an Elven prince ; and Gandalf, a Wizard.
The work was initially intended by tolkien to be एक आवाज़ of a two-volume नियत, with the other being The Silmarillion, but this idea was dismissed by his publisher.
It was decided for economic reasons to प्रकाशित the रब of the बजती as तीन आयतन over the कोर्स of a साल इससे 29 जुलाई 1954 to 20 अक्तूबर 1955, यूँ बनाना the now familiar Lord of the Rings trilogy.
The three volumes were entitled The Fellowship of the Ring, the दो मीनारें, और the वापसी of the किंग.
Structurally, the novel is divided internally into six books, two per volume, with several appendices of पृष्ठभूमि सामग्री शामिल at the समाप्त of the तीसरा आवाज़.
The Lord of the Rings has since been reprinted numerous टाइम्स और अनूदित into many languages.
Tolkien 's work रै महरूम the विषय of extensive विश्लेषण of its themes and origins.
Although a major work in itself, the story was only the last movement of a larger epic tolkien था worked on चूंकि 1917, in a प्रक्रम he वर्णित as mythopoeia.
Influences on this पहले कार्य, और on the स्टोरी of the रब of the बजती, शामिल philology, mythology, धर्म और the लेखक 's distaste for the effects of industrialization, as well as earlier fantasy works and Tolkien 's experiences in World War I.
The Lord of the Rings in its turn is considered to have था a ग्रेट प्रभाव on आधुनिक काल्पनिक ; the प्रभाव of tolkien 's works is ऐसे कि the उपयोग of the शब्द `` tolkienian '' और `` tolkienesque '' have been recorded in the Oxford English Dictionary.
The enduring popularity of The Lord of the Rings has led to numerous सन्दर्भ in लोकप्रिय संस्कृति, the founding of अनेक समाजों by प्रशंसक of tolkien 's works, और the प्रकाशन of अनेक books about Tolkien and his works.
The Lord of the Rings has inspired, and continues to inspire, कलाकृति, म्यूज़िक, films और टेलीविज़न, वीडियो खेल, और subsequent literature.
award-winning adaptations of the रब of the बजती have been made for radio, theatre, and film.
The following is an एपीसोड सूची लिये the Nickelodeon sitcom Drake & Josh.
The series debuted on जनवरी 11, 2004.
A TV film मैरी क्रिसमस, ड्रेक & जोश थी made apart from the regular series on December 5, 2008.
वहीँ हैं a कुल of 60 एपीसोड यहूद उत्पादित spanning four seasons.
Drake Bell, जोश पेक, और मिरांडा cosgrove यहूद the only actors to appear in all 60 episodes.
The San Francisco 49ers conduct training camp at the टोली 's मुख्यालय और अभ्यास सुविधा in सांता Clara, California in August 2010.
The offense is wearing red jerseys साथ the एक्सेप्शन of क्वार्टरबैक एलेक्स स्मिथ, जो is in a ब्लैक जर्सी ; the defense in white.
In the National Football League, प्रशिक्षण शिविर refers to the समय पहले the season commences.
During this time, teams will sometimes congregate at an बाहर स्थान, usually a university, to conduct training camp for at least the first few weeks.
This is समान to बेसबॉल 's spring training.
प्रशिक्षण शिविर is प्रयुक्त in अनेक different ways.
New players and कोच उपयोग it to acclimate themselves to new teammates and systems.
For younger players, it serves as a period of evaluation ; लिये दिग्गजों, it is समय to गोलाकार वापस into form.
प्रशिक्षण शिविर is विभाजित into several different components.
The पहला is scrimmages.
These are pseudo-games जहाँ टीमों चलाएं nearly पूरा खेल ' लायक of plays.
Sometimes, two अभ्यास सत्र हैं आयोजित on the same day.
This concept is referred to as two-a-days.
Other parts of training camp include drills, बैठक साथ कोच और अन्य खिलाड़ी at एक 's स्थिति, वज़न प्रशिक्षण, and pre-season games.
The latter half of training शिविर लीड सीधे into the प्रदर्शनी season.
With NFL प्रशिक्षण शिविरों starting in late-july, the biggest concern has been dehydration.
In 2001, Minnesota Vikings player Korey stringer died of a चिकित्सा कंडीशन आधारित इससे dehydration and heatstroke.
The death of Stringer prompted the NFL to बदलें उनके प्रशिक्षण policies.
At each practice, every team जरूर have the टोली डॉक्टर और प्रशिक्षकों on the फ़ील्ड ; additionally, an ambulance must be present during practices.
With NFL training camps beginning in late जुलाई, कठोर मौसम can affect अभ्यास और प्रदर्शनी games.
In 2002, a क्लीवलैंड भूरा प्रदर्शनी खेल ended due to बिजली निकट क्लीवलैंड Browns Stadium, and severe storms have been known to disrupt training camps.
Fans are often able to visit their favorite team 's training camp to कैच an जल्दी dekh at the खिलाड़ी ; प्रवेश to practices is प्रायः फ़्री or substantially कम महंगी than a खेल टिकट, बनाना training camp trips a popular option for fans who can not attend many games due to financial or other reasons.
NFL teams often बेचें कलाकृतियां और concessions at शिविर साइट साथ साथ offering क्रियाएँ and events to make training camp a more fan-friendly experience.
In computing, a file system ( or filesystem ) is a प्रकार of आंकड़ा स्टोर जिससे can be used to store, retrieve and update a set of files.
The term could refer to the अमूर्त आंकड़ा structures प्रयुक्त to define फाइलें, or to the actual software or firmware components that implement the abstract ideas.
Some file systems are used on local data storage devices ; अन्य provide संचिका अभिगम via a संजाल प्रोटोकॉल ( e.g. NFS, SMB, or 9P clients ).
Some file systems are `` virtual '', in that the `` files '' supplied हैं computed on निवेदन ( e.g. procfs ) or हैं merely a मानचित्रण into a different file system used as a backing store.
The संचिका प्रणाली manages अभिगम to दोनो the सामग्री of files and the metadata about those files.
It is responsible for arranging storage स्पेस ; विश्वसनीयता, दक्षता, और ट्यूनिंग साथ लिहाज़ to the शारीरिक भंडार medium are important design considerations.
William Howard Taft ( September 15, 1857 – कूच 8, 1930 ) थी the 27th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1909–1913 ) and later the tenth Chief Justice of the United States ( 1921–1930 ).
He is the only person to have served in दोनो of ये कार्यालयों.
Before बनने अध्यक्ष, taft, a रिपब्लिकन, थी चयनित to serve on the Superior Court of Cincinnati in 1887.
In 1890, Taft was appointed Solicitor General of the संयुक्त राज्य और in 1891 a न्यायधीश on the संयुक्त राज्य अदालत of appeals लिये the Sixth Circuit.
In 1900, अध्यक्ष विलियम mckinley नियुक्त taft Governor-General of the Philippines.
In 1904, अध्यक्ष थियोडोर रूज़वेल्ट नियुक्त taft सचिव of युद्ध in an प्रयत्न to दूल्हे Taft, then his close political ally, into his handpicked presidential successor.
Taft assumed a prominent role in problem solving, assuming on कुछ अवसरों the भूमिका of एक्टिंग सचिव of राज्य, जबकि घटती दोहराया offers इससे रूज़वेल्ट to serve on the Supreme Court.
Riding a wave of popular support for fellow रिपब्लिकन रूज़वेल्ट, taft जीती an आसान विजय in उसके 1908 bid for the presidency.
In his only term, Taft 's domestic agenda emphasized trust-busting, civil service सुधार, strengthening the अंतरराज्यीय कॉमर्स आयोग, improving the performance of the postal service, and passage of the Sixteenth Amendment.
Abroad, taft sought to further the आर्थिक विकास of राष्ट्र in लैटिन अमेरिका और एशिया through `` डालर Diplomacy ``, and showed decisiveness and restraint in response to revolution in Mexico.
The task-oriented Taft was oblivious to the political ramifications of his decisions, often alienated his own key constituencies, और थी overwhelmingly पराजित in उसके बोली लिये a दूसरी पद in the अध्यक्षीय चुनाव of 1912.
In surveys of presidential scholars, Taft is usually क्रमित निकट the मध्य of सूचियाँ of सब अमरीकी Presidents.
After leaving office, Taft spent his time in academia, मध्यस्थता, और the ढूंढें लिये संसार सलाम through उसके self-founded लीग to Enforce Peace.
In 1921, after the पहला संसार युद्ध, अध्यक्ष वारेन G. हार्डिंग नियुक्त taft मुख्य इंसाफ of the United States.
Taft परोसा in इस क्षमता जबतक shortly पहले his death in 1930.
The Ten Commandments is a 1956 epic film produced and directed by Cecil B. DeMille that dramatized the biblical story of the Exodus, in which the hebrew-born मूसा, an अपनाया मिश्र प्रिंस, becomes the deliverer of the यहूदी स्लेव.
It starred Charlton Heston in the lead role, Yul Brynner as his adoptive bhai, pharaoh rameses ii, ऐनी बैक्सटर as nefretiri, एडवर्ड G. रॉबिन्सन as dathan, yvonne de कार्लो as sephora, Debra Paget as Lilia, and John Derek as Joshua.
The supporting cast includes Sir Cedric Hardwicke as Pharaoh Seti I, नीना foch as bithiah, मार्था स्कॉट as yoshebel, जूडिथ एंडरसन as memnet, विंसेंट दाम as baka, और जॉन carradine as Aaron.
The film was released by सर्वोपरि तस्वीरें in vistavision on अक्तूबर 5, 1956.
The Ten Commandments, जिससे demille narrated, थी the पिछला film that he directed.
He was set to direct the 1958 remake of उसके 1938 फिल्मी the buccaneer, लकिन उसके फाइनल बीमारी मजबूर उसे to relinquish the directing chores to his son-in-law, actor Anthony Quinn.
DeMille had also planned to film the life of Lord Baden Powell, the founder of the स्काउट गति, साथ दाउद niven ; इस प्रोजेक्ट थी never realized.
The Ten आयतें is a आंशिक remake of DeMille 's 1923 silent film.
Some of the cast and crew of the 1956 version worked on the असली.
It has since महरूम remade as a टेलीविज़न miniseries broadcast in April 2006.
The Ten Commandments is one of the सबसे financially कामयाब films कभी made, grossing over $ 65 million at the U.S. box office.
Adjusting for महंगाई, इस makes it the छठे highest-grossing फिल्मी domestically, साथ an समायोजित total of $ 1,025,730,000 in 2012.
The box दफ्तर जालस्थल `` the संख्याएँ '' सूचियाँ the घरेलू gross at $ 80 million.
In 1999, The Ten Commandments was selected for संरक्षण in the संयुक्त राज्य नेशनल फिल्मी रजिस्ट्री by the Library of Congress as being `` culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant ''.
In June 2008, the American Film Institute नाज़िल इसके `` टेन शीर्ष टेन `` —the बेहतरीन टेन films in टेन अमरीकी फिल्मी genres—after polling over 1,500 people from the creative community.
The Ten आयतें थी सूचीबद्ध as the दसवाँ बेहतरीन फिल्मी in the epic genre.
The film received seven Academy Award nominations including Best चित्र, और जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन विज़ुअल प्रभाव.
चार्ल्टन हेस्टन थी मनोनीत लिये a सुनहरी ग्लोब Award for Best Motion Picture Actor in the drama category.
Yul Brynner won the National Board of Review Award लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता लिये उसके भूमिका as rameses, साथ साथ उसके अन्य भूमिकाएँ in the किंग and I and Anastasia.
louisville (, or ) is a प्रमुख नगर और the largest नगर in the U.S. state of Kentucky and the county seat of Jefferson County.
Since 2003, the city 's borders have महरूम साथ those of the काउंटी because of a city-county merger.
The city 's total consolidated population at the 2010 census was 741,096 ( Louisville 's balance total, 602,011, excludes semi-autonomous कस्बों और is the जनसांख्यिकी सूचीबद्ध in सबसे स्त्रोत और नेशनल rankings ).
As of 2010, the Louisville metropolitan area ( एमएसए ) था a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,307,647 रैंकिंग 42nd nationally.
The metro area includes Louisville-Jefferson County and 12 surrounding काउंटी, आठ in केंटकी और चार in दक्षिणी इंडियाना ( see Geography below ).
The Louisville Combined Statistical Area, having a population of 1,451,564, शामिल the एमएसए, hardin काउंटी और larue काउंटी in केंटकी, और स्कॉट County, Indiana.
An important internal shipping port in the 19th सदी, louisville आज is बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the स्थान of the केंटकी डर्बी, the पहला of three annual thoroughbred horse races making up the Triple Crown.
A typical experimental सेटअप लिये an aldol प्रतिक्रिया.
Both flasks are submerged in a dry ice/acetone कूलिंग नहाना ( −78 °c ) the तापमान of which is being monitored by a thermocouple ( the wire on the left ).
A कूलिंग नहाना, in प्रयोगशाला रसायन ( प्रायः लकिन नहीं सदा सशुल्क रसायन ) अभ्यास, is a liquid mixture which is used to maintain low temperatures, typically between 13 °C and −196 °C.
These low temperatures are used to collect liquids after distillation, to remove solvents using a रोटरी evaporator, or to perform a रासायनिक प्रतिक्रिया below room temperature ( see : kinetic control ).
Cooling baths are generally one of two types : ( a ) a ठंडा द्रव ( विशेषकर द्रव नाइट्रोजन, जल, or भी एयर ) — लकिन सबसे commonly the पद refers to ( b ) a मिश्रण of 3 components : ( 1 ) a कूलिंग एजेंट ( ऐसे as शुष्क बर्फ or जल बर्फ ) ; ( b ) a द्रव 'कैरीr ' ( such as liquid water, ethylene glycol, acetone, etc. ), which transfers heat between the bath and the vessel ; ; and ( c ) an additive to depress the melting-point of the solid/liquid system.
( A familiar example of this is the use of an ice/rock-salt मिश्रण to फ्रीज बर्फ मलाई.
The phase-change of ice into liquid water requires energy, 'pulling ' ऊष्मा इससे the प्रणाली.
adding नमक lowers the अस्थायी at जिससे इस happens, meaning more energy has to be absorbed from the environment in order to melt the ice.
This effectively makes the ice 'colder ' — it जरूर 'pull ' अधिक ऊष्मा इससे इसके पर्यावरण to become liquid. )
Eating disorders are conditions defined by असामान्य खाने आदतें कि may involve either अपर्याप्त or excessive खाना intake to the detriment of an individual 's physical and mental health.
Bulimia nervosa and anorexia nervosa are the most आम विशिष्ट फ़ॉर्म in the संयुक्त Kingdom.
Other प्रकार of खाने विकार शामिल binge खाने disorder and eating disorder not otherwise specified.
Bulimia nervosa is a विकार characterized by binge खाने and purging.
Purging can include self-induce vomiting, over-exercising, and the उपयोग of diuretics, enemas, और laxatives.
Anorexia nervosa is characterized by चरम खाना प्रतिबंध to the पाइंट of self-starvation and excessive weight loss.
Though primarily thought of as affecting महिलाओं ( an अनुमानित 5–10 लाख होने प्रभावित in the u.K. ), खाने विकार affect males as well.
An estimated 10 – 15 % of लोगों साथ खाने विकार हैं males ( Gorgan, 1999 ).
( an estimated 1 लाख u.K. males होने प्रभावित ).
Although eating disorders are increasing all over the world among both men and women, there is evidence to suggest that it is महिलाओं in the पश्चिमी संसार जो हैं at the उच्चतम रिस्क of विकासशील उन्हें और the उपाधि of westernization increases the risk.
Nearly half of all अमेरिकी personally जान किसी साथ an eating disorder.
The skill to comprehend the सेंट्रल प्रक्रियाओं of भूख रै increased tremendously चूंकि लेप्टिन थी खोजा, और the कौशल to observe the functions of the brain as well.
Interactions between motivational, homeostatic and self-regulatory control processes are involved in खाने आचरण, जिससे is a कुंजी घटक in खाने विकार.
The precise cause of eating disorders is not entirely understood, लकिन वहीँ is प्रमाण कि it may be linked to अन्य चिकित्सा शर्तें और परिस्थितियों.
Cultural idealization of thinness and youthfulness have contributed to खाने विकार affecting diverse populations.
One study showed that girls with ADHD have a वृहद मौका of getting an खाने विकार than those not affected by ADHD.
Another study suggested that women with PTSD, especially due to sexually related आघात, हैं अधिक संभावित to develop एनोरेक्सिया नर्वोज़ा.
One पढ़ाई दिखाया कि फोस्टर लड़कियों हैं more likely to develop bulimia nervosa.
Some think that पीर दबाव और idealized body-types देखी in the media are also a significant factor.
Some research show that for certain people there are genetic reasons why they may be prone to विकासशील an खाने disorder.
Recent studies have found evidence a सहसंबंध between मरीजों साथ bulimia nervosa and substance use disorders.
In addition, anxiety विकार और व्यक्तित्व विकार हैं आम आवृत्ति with clients of eating disorders.
While proper treatment can be highly effective for many suffering from specific types of eating disorders, the consequences of eating disorders can be severe, including death ( whether from सीधा चिकित्सा प्रभाव of अशांत खाने आदतें or इससे comorbid शर्तें ऐसे as suicidal सोच ).
Slavery in the संयुक्त राज्य existed इससे the जल्दी सालो of the औपनिवेशिक काल ; it थी firmly स्थापित by the time the United States sought independence from Great Britain in 1776.
however, by 1804, सब राज्य उत्तर of the मेसन और डिक्सन लकीर था either abolished गुलामी outright or passed laws for the gradual abolition of slavery.
in 1787 कॉंग्रेस निषिद्ध slavery in the Northwest Territory.
But slavery gained new life in the South with the cotton उद्योग बाद 1800, और विस्तारित into the Southwest.
The स्वदेश थी polarized into स्लेव और फ़्री राज्य साथ the mason-dixon लकीर, जिससे separated Pennsylvania and Maryland.
The United States and Great Britain both prohibited the international slave trade in 1808, but the domestic trade, with sales to the Deep South, विस्तारित dramatically, और अनेक captives यहूद shipped by the coastwise स्लेव व्यापार.
पहले the 1840s, the दक्षिण थी vigorously defending slavery and its expansion into the territories.
In the North some abolitionists denounced it as गुनाहगार, और numerous anti-slavery शक्तियां अस्वीकृत it as हानिकारक to the rights of free men.
After failed compromises and Abraham Lincoln 's election, in 1861 ग्यारह स्लेव राज्य broke दूर to रूप the Confederate States of America, leading to the American Civil War.
The federal सरकारी in 1862 बना abolition of slavery a war goal.
In January 1863 President Lincoln freed slaves in the confederacy through the emancipation Proclamation.
After the war, the Thirteenth Amendment, effective December 1865, abolished slavery throughout the संपूर्ण संयुक्त राज्य, सहित the किनारा राज्य और the Indian territories.
From the 16th to the 19th सदियां, an अनुमानित 12 लाख africans were shipped as slaves to the Americas.
See गुलामी in the Americas.
The great majority went to the sugar बागानों of the वेस्ट इंडीज or ब्राज़ील, where mortality was high.
परिचय 645,000 यहूद brought to what is now the United States.
By the 1860 United States Census, the स्लेव जनसांख्यिकी in the American South had grown to four million.
Of सब 1,515,605 परिवारों in the 15 स्लेव राज्य, nearly 400,000 held slaves ( roughly one in four ), amounting to 8 % of all American families.
While some slaves worked as house servants and urban artisans, the great majority worked on plantations or विशाल खेतो, cultivating lucrative नकदी फसलों, ऐसे as राइस, तम्बाकू, sugar and, after 1800, chiefly cotton.
By 1860 most slaves were held in the Deep South, जहाँ वे परोसा in work-gangs ; two-thirds worked in cotton.
In small operations, they worked साथ उनके स्वामी.
In large बागानों they were directed by white paid overseers.
Under the system that became chattel slavery ( ownership of a human being, and of his/her descendants ), a racial element was fundamental : slaves यहूद अश्वेतों of अफ़्रीकी descent और स्वामित्व, लगभग universally, by whites of यूरोपीय descent.
In the 17th century, Virginia, followed by other southern colonies, enacted विधि कि children of स्लेव माताओं यहूद born into slavery.
Slaves could gain freedom only by running away ( जिससे थी मुश्किल और illegal to do ), or by manumission by स्वामी, जिससे थी regulated by states, and became increasingly difficult or prohibited.
In the earliest era of chattel slavery, the colonies also organized work by a प्रणाली of बंधुआ मजदूर ज्ञात as indentured servitude.
This typically lasted for several सालो लिये दोनो ग़रीब europeans और africans alike, to अदा off the costs of transport to the colonies.
They contracted for such arrangements क्युकी of ग़रीब economies in उनके घर countries.
Between 1680 and 1700, as fewer europeans migrated to the colonies, planters began to import more Africans as slaves.
recognizing the महत्व of गुलामी, the हाउस of burgesses in वर्जिनिया enacted a नई स्लेव code in 1705 ; it combined a variety of legislation and added new provisions enforcing white supremacy in the law.
schematic क्रॉस खण्ड of भाग of leaf, xylem shown as red circles at figure 8.
Xylem is one of the two types of transport tissue in vascular पौधे ( फ्लोएम is the अन्य ).
The word xylem is derived from the Greek word ξύλον ( xylon ), अर्थ `` लकडी '' ; the best-known जाइलम ऊतक is wood, though it is found throughout the plant.
Its basic function is to transport water, लकिन it भी transports कुछ nutrients through the plant.
इस क्लॉक प्रतिनिधित्व shows कुछ of the major units of geological time and definitive events of Earth history.
The Hadean eon represents the time before fossil record of life on धरती ; इसके अपर boundary is अभी regarded as 4.0 ga ( अरब years ago ).
Other subdivisions प्रतिबिंबित the एवोल्यूशन of जीवन ; the archean और proterozoic हैं दोनो eons, the palaeozoic, Mesozoic and Cenozoic are eras of the Phanerozoic eon.
The two million year Quaternary काल, the समय of recognizable इंसानो, is too small to be visible at this scale.
The geologic time scale is a system of chronological measurement that relates stratigraphy to समय, और is प्रयुक्त by geologists, paleontologists, और अन्य धरती वैज्ञानिकों to describe the समय और संबंध between events that have occurred throughout Earth 's history.
The table of geologic time spans presented here agrees with the तिथियाँ और नामकरण नियत forth by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय आयोग on Stratigraphy standard color codes of the International Commission on Stratigraphy.
प्रमाण इससे radiometric डेटिंग indicates कि the Earth is about 4.54 billion years old.
The geology or गहन समय of धरती 's पास्ट रै महरूम व्यवस्थित into various units according to events which took place in each period.
Different spans of time on the GTS are usually delimited by परिवर्तन in the संयोजन of strata जिससे correspond to उन्हें, indicating major geological or paleontological events, such as mass extinctions.
For example, the boundary between the cretaceous काल और the paleogene काल is पारिभाषित by the cretaceous–paleogene extinction event, which marked the demise of the dinosaurs and many other groups of life.
Older time spans which predate the विश्वसनीय चट्टान रिकार्ड ( पहले the proterozoic Eon ) are defined by absolute age.
The ti-82 is a graphing परिपथ made by Texas Instruments.
The ti-82 थी designed in 1993 as a stripped down, more user friendly version of the TI-85, and as a replacement for the TI-81.
It was the direct पूर्ववर्ती of the ti-83.
It साझा साथ the ti-85 a 6 mhz zilog Z80 microprocessor.
Like the TI-81, the TI-82 features a 96x64 pixel display, and the core विशेषता नियत of the ti-81 साथ अनेक नई सुविधाएँ.
The cast of characters of the किंग of Fighters XI.
The King of Fighters fighting game series, produced by SNK Playmore, includes a wide डाल of वर्ण, कुछ of जिससे हैं लिया इससे अन्य snk खेल.
the स्टोरी takes प्लेस in a fictional ब्रह्मांड in which an annual series of 3-on-3 or 4-on-4 fighting tournaments are held.
The first game in the series introduces the initial main character of the series, Kyo Kusanagi, a young Japanese fighter who is the वारिस to a शक्तिशाली समूह of martial कलाकारों having pyrokinetic abilities.
Kyo fights against the kusanagi गोत्र 's दुश्मनों, उसके प्रतिद्वंद्वी iori Yagami, and the god Orochi and its human followers, among others.
The first four games in the series revolve about these fights, while The King of Fighters '99 introduces a new story चाप, घूमती around k ', a यंग man जो seeks to नष्ट the रहस्यमय nests संगठन क्युकी वे kidnapped उसे at an जल्दी आयु और stripped उसे of उसके पास्ट यादें, so that they could force him to be a fighter under their control.
In The King of Fighters 2003, a नई अक्षर नामित राख crimson enters the टूर्नामेंट, to चोरी the powers of the clans who sealed the Orochi in the past for an unknown reason.
A new group of antagonists, known as Those From the Past, also appears in the श्रेणी ; वे want to obtain orochi 's शक्ति लिये the purpose of giving it to उनके अनजान निपुण.
the प्लाट और the वर्ण came from the Yamata no Orochi legend.
There are also अनेक वर्ण in the खेल कि हैं parodies or homages to अनेक लोकप्रिय anime, manga, and films.
Merchandise based on the characters has also been released, सहित कार्रवाई आंकड़े और keychains.
The characters have garnered praise from several video खेल publications लिये the विशेषता of उनके डिजाइन और movesets.
Comments focused on the lack of improvements in some of the characters, लकिन added कि the रोस्टर is greatly विविध.
व्हेल युद्धों is a साप्ताहिक अमरीकी documentary-style वास्तविकता टेलीविज़न श्रेणी that premiered on November 7, 2008 on the Animal Planet cable channel.
The program follows Paul Watson, founder of the Sea Shepherd Conservation Society, as he and the crew aboard उनके विभिन्न बरतन harass जापानी whalers बंद the coast of अंटार्कटिक.
On January 5, 2013, एनिमल ग्रह नवीनीकृत the series for a sixth season.
The Harpy Eagle ( Harpia harpyja ) is a neotropical प्रजाति of eagle.
It is sometimes known as the American Harpy Eagle to distinguish it from the पापुआई त्रिभुज जिससे is sometimes ज्ञात as the नई गिनी harpy Eagle or Papuan Harpy Eagle.
It is the largest and most शक्तिशाली रैप्टर मिला in the americas, और among the largest extant प्रजाति of ईगल्स in the world.
It usually inhabits tropical lowland rainforests in the अपर ( emergent ) canopy परत.
विनाश of इसके प्राकृतिक आवास रै देखी it vanish इससे अनेक भाग of its former range, and it is nearly extirpated in Central America.
Biological classification, or scientific classification in biology, is a method of scientific taxonomy प्रयुक्त to समूह और categorize जीवों into समूह ऐसे as genus or species.
These groups are known as taxa ( एकवचन : taxon ).
Modern biological classification has its root in the work of Carolus लीनियस, जो grouped प्रजाति according to साझा शारीरिक characteristics.
These groupings have since been revised to improve consistency with the darwinian principle of आम descent.
With the introduction of the cladistic method in the late 20th सदी, phylogenetic taxonomy in जिससे जीवों हैं grouped आधारित purely on inferred विकासवादी relatedness, ignoring morphological similarity, has become common in some areas of biology.
Molecular phylogenetics, which uses DNA sequences as data, रै भी चलित अनेक हाल revisions और is likely to continue doing so.
Biological classification belongs to the science of biological systematics.

John Winston Ono Lennon, ( born John Winston Lennon ; 9 October 1940 – 8 December 1980 ) was an English musician, singer and songwriter who rose to worldwide fame as a founder member of the बीटल्स, एक of the सबसे commercially कामयाब और critically acclaimed अधिनियमों in the इतिहास of लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक.
With Paul McCartney, he formed one of the most मनाये songwriting partnerships of the 20th century.
Born and raised in Liverpool, as a teenager Lennon became शामिल in the skiffle craze ; his first band, the Quarrymen, evolved into the Beatles in 1960.
As the group disintegrated towards the समाप्त of the दशक, लेनन embarked on a सोलो करियर कि उत्पादित the critically acclaimed albums John Lennon/Plastic Ono Band and Imagine, and iconic songs such as `` Give Peace a Chance `` and `` Imagine ``.
After his marriage to Yoko Ono in 1969, he बदला उसके नाम to जॉन ओनो लेनन.
Lennon disengaged खुद इससे the म्यूज़िक कारोबार in 1975 to devote समय to उठाने his infant son Sean, but re-emerged with Ono in 1980 with the new album Double Fantasy.
He was murdered three सप्ताह बाद इसके रिलीज.
Lennon revealed a rebellious nature और acerbic wit in उसके म्यूज़िक, लिखने, drawings, on फिल्मी and in interviews.
Controversial through his राजनैतिक और सलाम सक्रियता, he स्थानांतरित to नई यॉर्क नगर in 1971, जहाँ उसके आलोचना of the वियतनाम युद्ध resulted in a lengthy attempt by रिचर्ड निक्सन 's प्रशासन to deport him, while some of his songs were adopted as anthems by the anti-war movement.
As of 2012, Lennon 's solo album sales in the United States exceed 14 लाख इकाई, और as लेखक, co-writer or यजमान, he is जिम्मेदार लिये 25 number-one singles on the US Hot 100 chart.
In 2002, a BBC poll on the 100 महानतम britons voted उसे आठवीं, और in 2008, रोलिंग स्टोन क्रमित him the fifth-greatest singer of all time.
He was posthumously inducted into the songwriters हॉल of कीर्ति in 1987 और into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1994.
प्रतिमा of rip वैन winkle in irvington, नई यॉर्क, नहीं दूर इससे `` Sunnyside ``, the home of Washington Irving
`` Rip Van Winkle '' is a short स्टोरी by अमरीकी लेखक वॉशिंगटन इरविंग प्रकाशित in 1819, as खूब as the नाम of the story 's fictional protagonist.
Written while Irving was living in Birmingham, इंग्लैण्ड, it थी भाग of a संग्रहण हकदार The Sketch Book of Geoffrey Crayon.
Although the story is set in New York 's Catskill Mountains, इरविंग बाद admitted, `` जब i लिखा the स्टोरी, I had never been on the Catskills. ''
Throughout the fifty-five साल इतिहास of the ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, अनेक significant रिकॉर्ड have been set.
This page only includes the प्रतिस्पर्धी पुरस्कार जीती by विभिन्न artists.
This does not include the various special awards कि हैं प्रस्तुत by the नेशनल अकादमी of रिकॉर्डिंग कला और sciences ऐसे as आजीवन उपलब्धि Awards, Trustees Awards, Technical Awards or Legend Awards.
the पेज however करता शामिल अन्य non-performance सम्बन्धित grammys ( ज्ञात as the शिल्प & Production Fields ) that may have been presented to the artist ( s ).
Pee-wee Herman is a कॉमिक fictional अक्षर निर्मित और portrayed by अमरीकी comedian Paul Reubens.
he is बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उसके दो टेलीविज़न series and film series during the 1980s.
The childlike pee-wee herman अक्षर विकसित as a स्टेज अधिनियम कि quickly led to an HBO special in 1981.
As the stage performance gained further popularity, Reubens took the character to motion picture with Pee-wee 's बिग एडवेंचर in 1985, toning bas the वयस्क innuendo लिये the अपील of children.
इस प्रशस्त the रास्ता लिये pee-wee 's playhouse, an एमी पुरस्कार winning children 's series that ran on CBS from 1986-1991.
Another फिल्मी, बिग शीर्ष pee-wee, थी released in 1988.
Due to negative media attention following a कांड in 1991, reubens decided to shelve उसके alter अहंकार दौरान the 1990s, and then gradually resurrected it during the following decade.
It was at that time that Reubens addressed plans to लिखें a नई pee-wee फिल्मी, pee-wee 's playhouse : the फिल्म.
In June 2007, reubens appeared as pee-wee herman लिये the पहला time since 1991 at Spike TV 's Guys ' Choice Awards.
That '70s Show is an American television period sitcom that centers on the lives of a group of teenage friends living in the fictional suburban कस्बा of पाइंट प्लेस, विस्कॉन्सिन, इससे may 17, 1976, to दिसम्बर 31, 1979.
It debuted on the Fox television network, first airing on August 23, 1998, running for eight लगातार सीज़न, और concluding साथ the 200th एपीसोड on may 18, 2006.
The main teenage डाल सदस्यों यहूद topher अनुग्रह, mila kunis, Ashton Kutcher, Danny Masterson, Laura Prepon, and Wilmer Valderrama.
The main adult cast members were Debra Jo Rupp, kurtwood स्मिथ, डॉन स्टार्क और, दौरान the पहला तीन सीज़न, Tanya Roberts.
Kansas ( ) is a U.S. राज्य स्तिथ in the midwestern United States.
It is named बाद the कान्सास नदी जिससे बहती through it, which in turn was named after the Kansa Native American tribe, which inhabited the area.
The tribe 's name ( natively kką : ze ) is often said to mean `` people of the wind '' or `` लोगों of the दक्षिण हवा, '' हालांकि इस थी संभवतः नहीं the पद 's original meaning.
Residents of कान्सास हैं पुकारा `` Kansans. ''
For thousands of years what is now कान्सास थी घर to numerous और diverse Native American tribes.
Tribes in the पूर्वी भाग of the राज्य generally lived in villages along the river valleys.
Tribes in the Western भाग of the राज्य यहूद सेमi- nomadic और hunted विशाल herds of bison.
Kansas was first settled by European Americans in the 1830s, but the pace of उपनिवेश त्वरित in the 1850s, in the midst of राजनैतिक युद्धों over the slavery issue.
When officially opened to उपनिवेश by the u.S. सरकारी in 1854, abolitionist free-staters इससे नई इंग्लैण्ड और pro-slavery settlers इससे neighboring मिसौरी rushed to the territory to determine if Kansas would become a free state or a slave state.
यूँ, the क्षेत्रफल थी a hotbed of हिंसा और अराजकता in इसके जल्दी दिनों as these forces collided, and was known as Bleeding Kansas.
the abolitionists आखिरकार prevailed और on January 29, 1861, Kansas entered the Union as a free state.
After the Civil War, the population of कान्सास grew rapidly, जब लहरें of आप्रवासियों turned the prairie into farmland.
Today, Kansas is one of the most productive agricultural राज्य, producing ऊँची yields of गेहूं, ज्वार और sunflowers.
Kansas is the 15th most extensive and the 33rd सबसे populous of the 50 United States.
Psychology is an अकादमिक और लागू अनुशासन that involves the scientific study of mental functions and behaviors.
मनोविज्ञान रै the तात्कालिक लक्ष्य of समझना individuals और समूह by दोनो establishing general principles and researching specific cases, and by many accounts it ultimately aims to benefit society.
In this field, a professional or शोधकर्ता is पुकारा a मनोवैज्ञानिक और can be वर्गीकृत as a सोशल, behavioral, or cognitive scientist.
Psychologists attempt to understand the भूमिका of दिमागी कृत्यों in व्यक्तिगत और सोशल बर्ताव, जबकि भी exploring the physiological और neurobiological processes that underlie certain cognitive functions and behaviors.
psychologists explore अवधारणाओं ऐसे as बोध, संज्ञान, ध्यान, जज्बात, phenomenology, प्रेरणा, दिमाग functioning, personality, behavior, and interpersonal relationships.
psychologists of विविध धारियाँ भी consider the unconscious mind.
psychologists employ अनुभवजन्य विधि to infer causal and correlational relationships between psychosocial variables.
In addition, or in opposition, to employing empirical and deductive methods, some—especially clinical and counseling psychologists—at टाइम्स rely upon सांकेतिक निर्वचन और अन्य आगमनात्मक तकनीकों.
Psychology has been described as a `` hub science '', with मनोवैज्ञानिक निष्कर्षों linking to शोध और perspectives इससे the सोशल sciences, प्राकृतिक sciences, आयुर्विज्ञान, and the humanities, such as philosophy.
While psychological knowledge is often applied to the मूल्यांकन और उपचार of दिमागी स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं, it is भी निर्देशित towards understanding and solving problems in many different spheres of human activity.
the बहुमत of psychologists हैं शामिल in some kind of therapeutic role, practicing in clinical, counseling, or school settings.
Many do scientific research on a wide range of topics related to mental processes and बर्ताव, और typically कार्य in विश्वविद्यालयों मनोविज्ञान विभाग or सिखा in अन्य अकादमिक जमावट ( e.g., medical schools, hospitals ).
Some are employed in औद्योगिक और organizational जमावट, or in अन्य क्षेत्रों ऐसे as इंसान विकास and aging, sports, health, and the media, as well as in forensic investigation and other aspects of law.
Thomas Jefferson ( अप्रैल 13, 1743 ( अप्रैल 2, 1743 o.S. ) – जुलाई 4, 1826 ) थी an अमरीकी founding पिता, the principal author of the Declaration of Independence ( 1776 ) and the third President of the United States ( 1801–1809 ).
At the beginning of the American Revolution, he served in the महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस, representing वर्जिनिया और तब परोसा as a wartime राज्यपाल of वर्जिनिया ( 1779–1781 ).
Just after the war ended, इससे mid-1784 जेफरसन परोसा as a राजनयिक, stationed in Paris.
In May 1785, he became the United राज्य मंत्री to फ़्रांस.
जेफरसन थी the पहला संयुक्त राज्य सचिव of राज्य ( 1790–1793 ) सेवारत under President George Washington.
साथ उसके बंद dost जेम्स मैडिसन he व्यवस्थित the Democratic-Republican Party, and subsequently resigned from Washington 's cabinet.
निर्वाचित वाइस अध्यक्ष in 1796, जब he आए in दूसरी to जॉन एडम्स of the federalists, जेफरसन opposed Adams and with Madison secretly wrote the Kentucky and Virginia Resolutions, which attempted to nullify the Alien and Sedition Acts.
निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष in कया जेफरसन पुकारा the क्रान्ति of 1800, he oversaw the खरीदें of the विशाल Louisiana Territory from France ( 1803 ), and sent the Lewis and Clark Expedition ( 1804–1806 ) to explore the new west.
His second term was beset with troubles at home, ऐसे as the विफल देशद्रोह विचारण of उसके पूर्व वाइस अध्यक्ष आरोन Burr.
साथ escalating ट्रबल साथ ब्रिटेन जो थी चुनौतीपूर्ण अमरीकी neutrality and threatening shipping at sea, he tried economic warfare with his embargo laws which only damaged American trade.
In 1803, अध्यक्ष जेफरसन initiated a प्रक्रम of भारतीय जनजातीय हटाना और relocation to the louisiana territory वेस्ट of the मिसिसिपी River, in order to open lands for eventual American settlers.
A leader in the Enlightenment, जेफरसन थी a बहुश्रुत जो spoke पाँच भाषाएं धड़ल्ले और थी deeply दिलचस्पी in विज्ञान, invention, architecture, religion and philosophy, interests that led him to the founding of the University of Virginia after his presidency.
He designed his own विशाल mansion on a 5,000 एकड़ वृक्षारोपण निकट charlottesville, Virginia, which he named Monticello.
While not a notable orator, Jefferson was a skilled लेखक और corresponded साथ अनेक influential people in America and Europe throughout his adult life.
Though Jefferson owned many slaves, he opposed the संस्था सब उसके जीवन और नतीजतन treated और took परवाह of उन्हें very well and expected them to work no more than free farmers.
Since 1802 historians and अन्य have महरूम विभाजित over the विवाद of whether जेफरसन थी the पिता of one or more children belonging to Sally Hemings, a slave at Monticello. ''
Historians are also in असहमति साथ कैसा much जेफरसन थी वचनबद्ध to the anti-slavery cause.
In 1807, अध्यक्ष जेफरसन हस्ताक्षरित into विधि a विधेयक कि बैन the importation of slaves into the United States.
After Martha Jefferson, his wife of eleven years, died in 1782, Jefferson remained a विधुर लिये the बाकी of उसके जीवन ; उनके विवाह उत्पादित छह children, of जिसको दो बच to adulthood.
Though जेफरसन रै महरूम criticized by अनेक आधुनिक दिन विद्वानों over the समस्या of गुलामी, he remains rated as one of the greatest U.S. presidents.
`` Sun City '' is a 1985 protest song written by स्टीवन वैन zandt, उत्पादित by वैन zandt और आर्थर बेकर और अंकित by कलाकारों संयुक्त Against Apartheid to convey opposition to the South African policy of apartheid.
The primary means of that opposition is to declare that all the artists involved would refuse any and all offers to perform at Sun City, a रिज़ॉर्ट जिससे थी स्तिथ in bantustan of bophuthatswana, एक of a क्रमांक of internationally unrecognized supposed `` independent '' states created by the South African government to forcibly relocate its black population.

This is a list of एनबीए खिलाड़ी साथ सबसे championships won as a player.
The नेशनल बास्केट संघ ( एनबीए ) is a major professional basketball league in North America.
It was founded in 1946 as the बास्केट संघ of America ( BAA ).
The league adopted its current name at the प्रारंभ of the जब it merged with the National Basketball League ( NBL ).
The NBA Finals is the चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी लिये the एनबीए और the निष्कर्ष of the sport 's postseason.
the जीतना टोली of the श्रेणी receives the Larry O'Brien Championship Trophy.
खिलाड़ी इससे the जीतना टोली प्रायः प्राप्त चैंपियनशिप rings from the team honoring their contribution.
However, in some rare occasion, the teams opted to gave other commemorative वस्तुएं, ऐसे as कलाई घड़ियाँ, बजाय of बजती.
The number of championships जीती by एनबीए सुपरस्टार is प्रायः used as a measurement of their greatness.
Boston Celtics center Bill Russell holds the record for the most NBA championships won साथ 11 शीर्षक दौरान उसके 13-year playing career.
He won his first championship साथ the बोस्टन सेल्टिक्स in उसके rookie year.
Afterwards, he गई on to जीत 10 championships in the अगला 12 years, including eight consecutive championships from 1959 to 1966.
He won the last two championships in 1968 और 1969 as player-coach.
रसेल 's teammate, sam जोन्स, won 10 championships from 1959 to 1969, the second most in NBA history.

Horry won seven championships with the Houston Rockets, the Los Angeles Lakers and the San Antonio Spurs, जबकि salley जीती चार championships साथ the डेट्रॉयट पिस्टन्स, the Bulls and the Lakers.

Accuracy indicates proximity of measurement परिणाम to the सच्चा मान, परिशुद्धता to the repeatability, or reproducibility of the measurement
In the fields of science, engineering, industry, and statistics, the accuracy of a मापन प्रणाली is the उपाधि of निकटता of माप of a मात्रा to कि मात्रा 's वास्तविक ( सच्चा ) value.
the परिशुद्धता of a मापन प्रणाली, भी पुकारा reproducibility or repeatability, is the उपाधि to जिससे repeated measurements under unchanged conditions show the same results.
Although the two words reproducibility and repeatability can be synonymous in colloquial उपयोग, वे हैं deliberately contrasted in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of the scientific method.
A मापन प्रणाली can be सटीक लकिन नहीं precise, precise but not accurate, neither, or both.
For example, if an experiment contains a systematic error, then increasing the sample size generally increases परिशुद्धता लकिन करता नहीं improve सटीकता.
The result would be a सतत yet inaccurate स्ट्रिंग of परिणाम from the flawed experiment.
Eliminating the व्यवस्थित गलती improves सटीकता लकिन करता not change precision.
A measurement system is designated मान्य if it is दोनो सटीक और precise.
Related terms include bias ( non- random or निर्देशित प्रभाव caused by a फ़ैक्टर or कारकों unrelated to the स्वतंत्र variable ) and error ( random variability ).
The terminology is भी लागू to अप्रत्यक्ष measurements—that is, मान प्राप्त by a computational procedure from observed data.
In addition to सटीकता और परिशुद्धता, माप may भी have a मापन रेज़ोल्यूशन, जिससे is the smallest बदलें in the underlying physical quantity that produces a response in the measurement.
In the case of full reproducibility, such as when rounding a number to a representable floating point number, the शब्द परिशुद्धता रै a अर्थ नहीं सम्बन्धित to reproducibility.
For example, in the IEEE 754-2008 मानक it अर्थात् the क्रमांक of बिट्स in the significand, so it is प्रयुक्त as a measure for the relative accuracy with which an arbitrary number can be represented.
बकवास in इसके शाब्दिक अर्थ refers to the act of sexual intercourse.
It is an English word that is often used as a profanity, either to denote तिरस्कार or as an intensifier.
The origin of the शब्द is अस्पष्ट.
It is प्रायः माना to be पहला attested to around 1475, but it may be considerably older.
In modern usage, fuck और इसके डेरिवेटिव ( ऐसे as कमीने और fucking ) can be प्रयुक्त in the position of a noun, a verb, an adjective or an adverb.
There are many आम वाक्यांश जिससे मेक use of the word, as well as a number of compounds incorporating it, such as motherfucker.
एनिमेटेड, color-coded मैप प्रर्दशित the various continents and regions.
Depending on the convention और मॉडल, कुछ महाद्वीपों may be संचित or subdivided : लिये उदाहरण, यूरेशिया is सबसे प्रायः subdivided into Europe and Asia ( red shades ), while North and South America are sometimes recognized as one American continent ( green shades ).
A continent is one of अनेक बहुत विशाल landmasses on धरती.
They are generally identified by convention rather than any strict criteria, साथ up to सात regions commonly regarded as continents—they हैं ( इससे largest in आकार to smallest ) : Asia, Africa, North America, South America, Antarctica, Europe, and Australia.
In geology, महाद्वीपों हैं वर्णित by अर्थात् of tectonic plates.
Plate विवर्तनिकी is the प्रक्रम और पढ़ाई of the गति, टक्कर and division of continents, earlier known as continental drift.

Community property is a marital property regime that originated in civil law jurisdictions और is अभी भी मिला in कुछ common law jurisdictions.
The states of the United States that recognize community property are primarily in the West ; it was inherited from Mexico 's ganancial community प्रणाली, जिससे itself थी inherited इससे स्पेनी विधि ( a रोमन -derived civil law system ) and ultimately from the Visigoths.
While under Spanish rule Louisiana adopted the ganancial community प्रणाली of acquests और gains, जिससे replaced the परंपरागत फ्रेंच जातियाँ of movables and acquests in its civil law system.
Map of the संयुक्त राज्य साथ जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी states highlighted in red.
In addition to the highlighted states, Alaska is a separate प्रॉपर्टी राज्य कि permits युगल to ऑप्ट into a जातियाँ property arrangement.
In a community property jurisdiction, most property acquired during the marriage ( except for gifts or inheritances ) —the जातियाँ, or communio bonorum—is स्वामित्व jointly by दोनो spouses और is विभाजित upon तलाक, annulment or मौत.
Joint ownership is automatically presumed by law in the absence of specific प्रमाण कि होता पाइंट to a contrary निष्कर्ष लिये a particular टुकड़ा of प्रॉपर्टी.
Division of community property may take place by मद, by splitting सब items or by value.
In some jurisdictions, such as California, a 50/50 division of community property is सख्ती mandated by statute, अर्थ कि the फ़ोकस तब शिफ्ट to whether particular वस्तुएं हैं to be classified as community or separate property.
In other jurisdictions, such as Texas, a divorce court may डिक्री an `` निष्पक्ष वितरण `` of जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी, जिससे may परिणाम in an unequal division of such.
In non-community प्रॉपर्टी राज्य property may be divided by equitable distribution.
Generally speaking, the property that each partner brings into the विवाह or receives by तोहफा, bequest or मक्कारी during marriage is called separate property ( i.e., not community property ).
See प्रभाग of property.
Division of जातियाँ debts may नहीं be the वही as division of community property.
For example, in California, community property is जरूरी to be विभाजित `` बराबर '' जबकि जातियाँ कर्ज़ is required to be divided `` equitably ''.
Property that is owned by one spouse before the विवाह is the पृथक प्रॉपर्टी of कि जीवनसाथी, जबतक the property is `` transmuted '' into community property.
The नियम लिये इस vary इससे jurisdiction to jurisdiction.

The विवाह of प्रिंस विलियम, ड्यूक of कैम्ब्रिज, और कैथरीन मिडलटन took place on 29 April 2011 at Westminster Abbey in London.
The groom, Prince William, Duke of Cambridge, is the eldest son of Charles, प्रिंस of वेल्स, और is दूसरी in the लकीर of उत्तराधिकार to the अंग्रेजों सिंहासन और the तख्तों of पंद्रह अन्य राष्ट्रमंडल realms.
The bride, Catherine `` Kate '' Middleton is the eldest of three children of माइकल और carole मिडलटन of bucklebury, बर्कशायर.
The Dean of Westminster, John Hall, presided at the service ; the Archbishop of canterbury, rowan विलियम्स, conducted the विवाह ; रिचर्ड chartres, the बिशप of London, preached the sermon ; and a reading was given by the bride 's brother, James.
William 's best man was his brother, Prince हैरी, जबकि the बहू 's सिस्टर, पिप्पा, was maid of honour.
The ceremony was attended by the बहू 's और दूल्हे 's परिवारों, as खूब as many foreign royals, diplomats, and the couple 's chosen personal guests.
After the ceremony, the couple बना the परंपरागत रूप on the balcony of Buckingham Palace.
As Prince William was नहीं the वारिस apparent to the सिंहासन, the विवाह थी नहीं a पूरा राज्य अवसर और अनेक विवरण were left to the couple to decide, such as much of the guest list of about 1,900.
Prince विलियम और केट मिडलटन met in 2001.
Their engagement on 20 October 2010 थी घोषित on 16 नवम्बर 2010.
The build-up to the wedding and the occasion itself attracted much मीडिया ध्यान, होने compared in अनेक तरीके साथ the 1981 marriage of William 's parents.
The occasion was a public अवकाश in the संयुक्त किंगडम और प्रदर्शित अनेक ceremonial aspects, including use of the state carriages and roles for the Foot Guards and Household Cavalry.
Events यहूद आयोजित around the राष्ट्रमंडल to चिह्नित the विवाह ; संगठनों और होटल आयोजित कार्यक्रम आरपार कनाडा, over 5,000 गली पार्टियों यहूद आयोजित throughout the United Kingdom, and one million people lined the route between Westminster Abbey and Buckingham Palace.

A hand ( med. / lat. : manus, pl. manūs ) is a prehensile, multi- fingered extremity स्तिथ at the समाप्त of an भुजा or forelimb of primates और इंसानो, chimpanzees, बंदरों, और lemurs.
A few other vertebrates such as the koala ( which has two opposable thumbs on each `` hand '' and फिंगरप्रिंट remarkably समान to इंसान फिंगरप्रिंट ) हैं प्रायः वर्णित as having either `` हैंड्स '' or `` paws '' on their front limbs.
Hands are the main structures लिये physically manipulating the पर्यावरण, प्रयुक्त लिये दोनो सकल मोटर कौशल ( such as grasping a large object ) and fine motor skills ( such as picking up a small pebble ).
The fingertips contain some of the densest क्षेत्रों of तंत्रिका endings on the देह, हैं the richest सोर्स of tactile प्रतिक्रिया, और have the महानतम positioning काबिलियत of the body ; thus the sense of touch is intimately associated with hands.
Like other paired organs ( eyes, feet, टाँगे ), प्रत्येक हाथ is dominantly नियंत्रित by the opposing दिमाग गोलार्ध, so कि handedness, or the preferred hand choice for single-handed activities such as writing with a pencil, reflects individual brain functioning.
Some evolutionary anatomists use the term hand to refer to the appendage of digits on the forelimb more generally — for example, in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of whether the तीन अंक of the बर्ड हाथ शामिल the वही समजात घाटा of दो अंक as in the डायनासोर हाथ.
The human hand has 27 bones, not including the sesamoid हड्डियों जिससे क्रमांक varies between लोगों.
14 of जिससे हैं the phalanges ( proximal, intermediate and distal ) of the fingers.
The metacarpals हैं the हड्डियों कि connects the fingers and the wrist.
Each human hand has 5 metacarpals और 8 carpal हड्डियों.

the चिह्नित in the top-left of the प्रदर्शक indicates that the time is 4:00pm, not 4:00am.
A 1969 रेडियो सचेतक क्लॉक ( सोनी digimatic 8FC-59W ) with an early mechanical-digital display.
A digital clock is a type of क्लॉक कि प्रदर्शक the समय डिजिटली, i.e. in numerals or अन्य प्रतीकों, as opposed to an एनालॉग क्लॉक, जहाँ the समय is indicated by the positions of rotating hands.
Digital clocks are often संबद्ध साथ इलेक्ट्रॉनिक ड्राइव, लकिन the `` डिजिटल '' description refers only to the display, not to the drive mechanism.
( Both analog and digital clocks can be driven either mechanically or electronically, लकिन `` घटीयंत्र '' mechanisms with digital displays are rare. )
The biggest digital clock is the Lichtzeitpegel ( `` Light Time Level '' ) on the television मीनार rheinturm düsseldorf, जर्मनी.

Family Guy is an American एनिमेटेड sitcom कि सुविधाएँ पाँच प्रमुख आवाज़ अभिनेताओं, and numerous regular cast and recurring guest stars.
the प्रिंसिपल आवाज़ डाल consists of दिखाएँ निर्माता सेठ macfarlane, एलेक्स Borstein, Seth Green, Mila Kunis ( who replaced Lacey Chabert after the first season ) and Mike Henry and now, the new actor Beau Osborne.
Recurring voice actors include Patrick Warburton, Adam West, John G. Brennan, Nicole Sullivan and Jennifer tilly, और repeat अतिथि सितारों शामिल फिलिस diller, चार्ल्स durning, फटाफट limbaugh, और Phil LaMarr.

The five sets of the board game Monopoly depicted here show the evolution of the game 's कलाकृति और डिजाइन in the संयुक्त राज्य इससे 1935–2005.
The history of the फलक खेल एकाधिकार can be traced वापस to the early 20th century.
the earliest ज्ञात डिज़ाइन थी by the अमरीकी, एलिज़ाबेथ magie, patented in 1904 but existing as early as 1902.
Magie 's original intent was to publish a board game to illustrate an economic principle, namely the georgist अवधारणा of a सिंगल जमीन value tax.
a श्रेणी of फलक खेल यहूद विकसित इससे 1906 through the 1930s कि शामिल the buying and selling of land and the development of that land.
By 1934, a फलक खेल था महरूम निर्मित much जैसे the संस्करण of एकाधिकार बेची by पार्कर भाइयो और इसके सम्बन्धित companies through the rest of the 20th century, and into the 21st.
अनेक लोगों, ज़्यादातर in the midwestern संयुक्त राज्य and near the East Coast, contributed to the game 's design and evolution.
By the 1970s, the idea that the game had been created solely by Charles Darrow had become popular folklore ; it was printed in the game 's instructions for अनेक सालो, in a 1974 किताब devoted to एकाधिकार, और थी cited in a सामान्य book about toys even as recently as 2007.
Even a guide to family games published for Reader 's Digest in 2003 तभी दिया क्रेडिट to darrow और एलिज़ाबेथ magie, erroneously stating कि magie 's असली खेल थी निर्मित in the 1800s, and not acknowledging any of the game 's development between Magie 's creation of the game, and the eventual publication by Parker Brothers.
Also in the 1970s, Professor Ralph Anspach, जो था खुद प्रकाशित a फलक खेल intended to illustrate the सिद्धान्त of दोनो monopolies और विश्वास busting, लड़ा Parker Brothers and its then parent company, General Mills, over the trademarks of the Monopoly board game.
Through the research of Anspach and others, much of the जल्दी इतिहास of the खेल थी `` rediscovered ''.
anspach confronted maxine ब्रैडी, लेखक of the 1974 किताब the एकाधिकार किताब : Strategy and Tactics of the World 's Most Popular Game over the actual history of the game on Barry Farber 's New York City talk show in 1975.
Because of the lengthy अदालत प्रक्रम, सहित appeals, the विधिक औकात of पार्कर भाइयो ' trademarks on the game was not settled until 1985.
The game 's name remains a registered ट्रेडमार्क of पार्कर भाइयो, as do इसके specific design elements.
At the conclusion of the court case, the game 's logo and graphic design elements became part of a larger Monopoly brand, licensed by पार्कर भाइयो ' जनक कंपनियाँ onto a किस्में of वस्तुएं through the उपस्थित day.
Despite the `` rediscovery '' of the board game 's early history in the 1970s और 1980s, और अनेक किताबे और जर्नल आलेख on the विषय, हास्ब्रो ( पार्कर भाइयो ' current parent company ) did not acknowledge any of the game 's history before Charles Darrow on its official Monopoly website as recently as June 2012.
Nor did Hasbro acknowledge anyone other than darrow in सामग्री प्रकाशित or प्रायोजित by उन्हें, at least as recently as 2006.
International tournaments, पहला आयोजित in the जल्दी 1970s, continue to the उपस्थित, साथ the अगला world championship likely scheduled for 2013.
Starting in 1985, a new generation of spin-off फलक खेल और कार्ड खेल appeared on both sides of the Atlantic Ocean.
In 1989, the first of many video खेल और कंप्यूटर खेल संस्करण थी प्रकाशित.
Since 1994, अनेक आधिकारिक विसंगतियाँ of the खेल, आधारित on स्थितियाँ अन्य than अटलांटिक नगर, नई जर्सी ( the official U.S. setting ) or London ( the official Commonwealth setting, excepting Canada ), have been published by Hasbro or its licensees.
In 2008, Hasbro permanently changed the color scheme and some of the gameplay of the मानक u.s. संस्करण of the खेल to मैच the uk संस्करण, हालांकि the u.S. मानक संस्करण maintains the Atlantic City property names.
Hasbro also modified the official logo to give the `` Mr. एकाधिकार '' अक्षर a 3-d computer-generated dekh, जिससे रै चूंकि महरूम अपनाया by licensees USAopoly, Winning Moves and Winning Solutions.
And Hasbro has also been including the Speed Die, introduced in 2006 's एकाधिकार : the आचमन संस्करण by जीतना चालें खेल, in संस्करण उत्पादित सीधे by हास्ब्रो ( ऐसे as the 2009 चैंपियनशिप Edition ).
in बेसबॉल, a बलिदान मक्खी is a batted बॉल कि satisfies four criteria:
There are कम than दो outs जब the ball is hit.
The ball is hit to the आउटफील्ड ( मेला or बेईमानी ), or to infield foul territory.
The batter is put out because an outfielder ( or an infielder running in the outfield, or foul territory ) catches the बॉल on the मक्खी ( alternatively if the बैटर होता have महरूम आउट if नहीं for an error or if the outfielder drops the ball and another runner is put out ).
A runner who is already on आधार स्कोर on the play.
It is called a `` बलिदान '' मक्खी क्युकी the बैटर presumably intends to cause a teammate to score a run, while sacrificing his own ability to do so.
मिनेसोटा ( ) is a u.S. राज्य स्तिथ in the Midwestern United States.
मिनेसोटा थी carved आउट of the पूर्वी हाफ of the मिनेसोटा territory and admitted to the Union as the 32nd state on May 11, 1858.
Known as the `` Land of 10,000 Lakes '', the राज्य 's नाम आता इससे a डकोटा शब्द लिये `` sky-tinted water ''.
those waters, साथ साथ वनों, पार्क, और wilderness क्षेत्रों, प्रस्ताव निवासियों and tourists a variety of outdoor recreational opportunities.
Minnesota is the 12th सबसे extensive और the 21st most populous of the U.S. states.
Nearly 60 % of its residents live in the Minneapolis–Saint पॉल महानगर क्षेत्रफल ( ज्ञात as the `` जुड़वा शहरों '' ), the बीच of परिवहन, कारोबार, उद्योग, शिक्षा, government and home to an internationally known arts community.
The remainder of the state consists of western prairies now given over to intensive agriculture ; deciduous forests in the southeast, now cleared, farmed and settled ; और the कम आबादी उत्तर वुड्स, प्रयुक्त लिये खनन, forestry, and recreation.
Minnesota is known for its अपेक्षाकृत मिश्रित सोशल और राजनैतिक orientations, और रै a high rate of civic participation and voter turnout.
मिनेसोटा बाँधने among the healthiest states, and has a highly literate population.
The large majority of निवासियों हैं of scandinavian और German descent.
The राज्य is ज्ञात as a बीच of scandinavian American culture.
Ethnic diversity रै increased in हाल decades.
Substantial influxes of Asian, African, and Latin American immigrants have joined the वंशजों of यूरोपीय settlers और the असली देशी अमरीकी निवासियों.
Grants are non-repayable funds by one पार्टी ( ग्रान्ट makers ), प्रायः a सरकारी विभाग, निगम, न्यास or विश्वास, to a, often ( but not always ) a nonprofit entity, educational institution, business or an individual.
In order to receive a grant, some form of `` Grant Writing '' प्रायः referred to as either a प्रस्ताव or an application is usually required.
Most grants हैं बना to निधि a विशिष्ट प्रोजेक्ट और आवश्यकता कुछ स्तर of compliance and reporting.
the ग्रान्ट लिखने प्रक्रम involves an आवेदक submitting a प्रस्ताव ( or सबमिशन ) to a संभावित funder, either on the applicant 's own initiative or in response to a Request for Proposal from the funder.
Other grants can be given to individuals, such as victims of प्राकृतिक आपदाओं or individuals जो तलाश to खोलें a छोटी कारोबार.
Sometimes ग्रान्ट makers आवश्यकता ग्रान्ट जरुरतमंदों to have कुछ रूप of tax-exempt status, be a registered nonprofit organization or a local government.
For example, tiered funding for a freeway are very विशाल अनुदान negotiated at सरकारी नीति स्तर.
However smaller grants may be provided by a सरकारी agency ( e.g. municipal government ).
Project-related funding involving governments, कारोबार, समुदायों, और individuals is प्रायः arranged by application either in writing or online.
Naturally occurring cobalt ( Co ) is composed of 1 stable isotope, 59Co. 28 radioisotopes have been characterized with the most stable होने 60co साथ a half-life of 5.2714 सालो, 57co साथ a half-life of 271.79 दिनों, 56co साथ a half-life of 77.27 days, and 58Co with a half-life of 70.86 days.
All of the remaining radioactive isotopes have half-lives कि हैं कम than 18 घंटों और the बहुमत of ये have half-lives that are less than 1 second.
This element also has 11 मेटा राज्य, सब of जिससे have half-lives कम than 15 minutes.
The isotopes of cobalt दायरा in परमाणु वज़न इससे 47co to 75co.
The primary decay mode for isotopes with atomic mass unit values less than that of the most abundant stable isotope, 59Co, is electron capture and the primary विधि of क्षय लिये those of वृहद than 59 परमाणु द्रव्यमान इकाई is beta decay.
The primary decay उत्पाद पहले 59co हैं आयरन isotopes और the प्राथमिक उत्पाद after are nickel isotopes.

जो स्थानांतरित My Cheese ?
An Amazing Way to Deal with Change in Your Work and in Your Life, published in 1998, is a प्रेरक किताब by स्पेंसर जॉनसन लिखा in the स्टाइल of a मिसाल or कारोबार fable.
It describes change in one 's work and जीवन, और चार ठेठ प्रतिक्रियाएँ to कहा बदलें by दो चूहे and two `` littlepeople '', during their hunt for cheese.
A New यॉर्क टाइम्स कारोबार बेस्टसेलर चूंकि release, Who Moved My Cheese ?
remained on the सूची लिये लगभग पाँच सालो और खर्च over 200 सप्ताह on प्रकाशक साप्ताहिक 's hardcover nonfiction list.
It has बेची अधिक than 26 लाख नक़ल विश्वव्यापी in 37 भाषाएं and remains to be one of the best-selling business books.
निकिता sergeyevich khrushchev ( – सितंबर 11, 1971 ) led the Soviet Union during part of the Cold War.
he परोसा as पहला सचिव of the कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी of the सोवियत संघ इससे 1953 to 1964, और as अध्यक्ष of the Council of Ministers, or Premier, from 1958 to 1964.
Khrushchev was responsible for the partial de-Stalinization of the Soviet Union, for backing the progress of the early Soviet स्पेस कार्यक्रम, और लिये अनेक अपेक्षाकृत उदार reforms in क्षेत्रों of घरेलू policy.
khrushchev 's पार्टी सहयोगियों removed him from power in 1964, replacing him with Leonid Brezhnev as First Secretary and Alexei Kosygin as Premier.
khrushchev थी born in the रूसी गाँव of kalinovka in 1894, बंद to the present-day border between Russia and Ukraine.
He was employed as a metalworker in उसके युवावस्था, और दौरान the रूसी सिविल War was a political commissar.
With the help of Lazar Kaganovich, he worked उसके रास्ता up the सोवियत hierarchy.
He supported Joseph स्टालिन 's purges, और स्वीकृत हज़ारों of arrests.
In 1939, Stalin sent him to govern युक्त, और he जारी the purges there.
During what was known in the Soviet Union as the Great patriotic युद्ध ( पूर्वी सामने of संसार युद्ध ii ), khrushchev थी again a commissar, serving as an intermediary between Stalin and his generals.
Khrushchev was present at the bloody रक्षा of stalingrad, a फैक्ट he took ग्रेट अभिमान in throughout his life.
बाद the युद्ध, he लौटे to युक्त पहले होने recalled to Moscow as one of Stalin 's close advisers.
In the power struggle triggered by Stalin 's death in 1953, khrushchev, बाद अनेक सालो, उभरा विजयी.
On February 25, 1956, at the 20th Party Congress, he वितरित the `` रहस्य वाक, '' denouncing स्टालिन 's purges और ushering in a less repressive era in the Soviet Union.
His domestic policies, aimed at bettering the lives of ordinary citizens, were प्रायः अप्रभावी, विशेषकर in the क्षेत्रफल of कृषि.
उम्मीद आखिरकार to rely on मिसाइलें for national defense, Khrushchev ordered major cuts in conventional forces.
Despite the cuts, Khrushchev 's rule saw the tensest years of the ठंडा युद्ध, culminating in the क्यूबन मिसाइल संकट.
Some of Khrushchev 's policies were seen as erratic, particularly by his emerging rivals, जो चुपचाप रोज़ in शक्ति और अपदस्थ उसे in अक्तूबर 1964.
He किया नहीं suffer the घातक भाग्य of कुछ पिछला losers of सोवियत शक्ति struggles, लकिन थी pensioned off with an apartment in Moscow and a dacha in the countryside.
His lengthy memoirs were smuggled to the West और प्रकाशित in भाग in 1970.
Khrushchev died in 1971 of दिल बीमारी.
Upper gastrointestinal ( gi ) bleeding refers to hemorrhage in the upper gastrointestinal tract.
The anatomic cut-off for upper GI bleeding is the ligament of treitz, जिससे connects the चौथी portion of the duodenum to the diaphragm near the splenic flexure of the colon.
Upper GI bleeds are considered medical emergencies, and आवश्यकता प्रवेश to हॉस्पिटल लिये तात्कालिक निदान and management.
Due to अग्रिम in medications और endoscopy, upper GI hemorrhage is now usually treated without surgery.
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100, based on UN 2010 projections ( रेड, नारंगी, ग्रीन ) और us जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो ऐतिहासिक estimates ( black ).
वास्तविक अंकित जनसांख्यिकी figures are in blue.
according to the उच्चतम अनुमान, the संसार जनसांख्यिकी may वृद्धि to 16 अरब by 2100 ; according to the lowest estimate, it may decline to 6 billion.
The world जनसांख्यिकी is the कुल क्रमांक of जीना humans on Earth.
As of today, it is अनुमानित to क्रमांक अरब by the संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी Bureau ( USCB ).
the uscb estimates कि the संसार population exceeded 7 billion on March 12, 2012.
According to a separate estimate by the संयुक्त राष्ट्र जनसांख्यिकी निधि, it reached this milestone on October 31, 2011.
The world population has experienced continuous growth since the समाप्त of the ग्रेट अकाल और the ब्लैक मौत in 1350, जब it stood at around 370 million.
The highest rates of growth – global population increases above 1.8 % प्रति साल – यहूद देखी briefly दौरान the 1950s, और लिये a longer काल दौरान the 1960s and 1970s.
The growth rate peaked at 2.2 % in 1963, और था declined to 1.1 % by 2011.
Total annual births were highest in the late 1980s at about 138 लाख, और हैं अभी अपेक्षित to remain essentially निरंतर at उनके 2011 स्तर of 134 लाख, जबकि deaths number 56 million per year, and are expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040.
Current projections show a continued increase in population in the near future ( but a steady decline in the जनसांख्यिकी विकास रेट ), साथ the वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी अपेक्षित to पहुँचें between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050.
Various longer-term estimates भविष्यवाणी further विकास, stagnation, or even overall decline in the global population by 2150.
Some analysts have questioned the sustainability of further world population growth, citing the growing pressures on the पर्यावरण, वैश्विक खाना आपूर्तियाँ, और उर्जा संसाधन.
Philips Lumileds lighting कम्पनी is the निर्माता of a चौड़ी दायरा of high-power/high-efficiency light-emitting diodes ( LEDs ).
It is a अभी a fully स्वामित्व प्रभाग of Philips Lighting.
Knuckle mnemonic लिये the क्रमांक of दिनों in प्रत्येक माह of the Gregorian Calendar.
Each projecting knuckle represents a 31-day month.
A mnemonic (, साथ a मूक `` m '' ), or mnemonic device, is any learning technique that aids information retention.
Mnemonics aim to translate information into a form that the इंसान दिमाग can retain बेहतर than इसके असली form.
Even the process of applying इस परिवर्तन might already सहायता the ट्रांसफ़र of information to long-term memory.
Commonly encountered mnemonics are often for lists and in auditory form, such as short poems, acronyms, or यादगार वाक्यांश, लकिन mnemonics can भी be लिये other types of information and in visual or kinesthetic forms.
Their use is based on the observation that the human mind more easily remembers spatial, personal, surprising, शारीरिक, यौन, humorous, or वरना 'relatable ' सूचना, बल्कि than अधिक अमूर्त or impersonal फ़ॉर्म of सूचना.
The word mnemonic is निकला इससे the प्राचीन यूनानी शब्द μνημονικός ( mnēmonikos ), अर्थ `` of मेमोरी '' और is सम्बन्धित to mnemosyne ( `` remembrance '' ), the name of the goddess of memory in Greek mythology.
Both of these शब्द हैं निकला इससे μνήμη ( mnēmē ), `` remembrance, memory ''.
mnemonics in प्राचीनता यहूद सबसे प्रायः माना in the context of what is today known as the Art of memory.
Ancient Greeks and Romans distinguished between दो प्रकार of मेमोरी : the 'natural ' मेमोरी और the 'artificial ' मेमोरी.
The former is inborn, और is the एक कि everyone उपयोग automatically and without thinking.
The artificial memory in contrast has to be trained and developed through the सीखना और practicing of a किस्में of mnemonic तकनीकों.
Mnemonic systems are खास तकनीकों or रणनीति consciously प्रयुक्त to improve मेमोरी, it helps employ सूचना already stored in long-term memory to make memorization an easier task.
President बुश हस्ताक्षर the no चाइल्ड बाएँ पीछे अधिनियम at Hamilton H.S. in Hamilton, Ohio.
The No Child Left Behind Act of 2001 ( nclb ) is a संयुक्त राज्य अधिनियम of कॉंग्रेस कि is a reauthorization of the elementary और द्वितीयक Education Act, which included Title I, the government 's flagship aid program for disadvantaged students.
nclb supports standards-based शिक्षा सुधार आधारित on the आधार कि सेटिंग high standards and establishing measurable goals can improve individual outcomes in education.
The Act requires राज्य to develop आकलन in मौलिक कौशल.
States must give ये आकलन to सब विद्यार्थी at चुनें ग्रेड स्तर in order to receive federal school funding.
The Act does not assert a national achievement मानक ; मानकों हैं नियत by प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत राज्य.
NCLB विस्तारित the संघीय भूमिका in पब्लिक शिक्षा through सालाना परीक्षण, annual academic progress, report cards, teacher qualifications, and funding changes.
The bill passed in the U.S. Congress साथ bipartisan support.

A pickup truck or pick-up, often simply referred to as a पिकअप, is a लाइट मोटर गाडी साथ an open-top, पश्च cargo area ( bed ).
In North America, the term pickup is used for light trucks with a lighter duty chassis and फैक्टरी निर्मित, एकीकृत bed, as खूब as लिये coupé यूटिलिटी वाहनों, प्रायः आधारित on a निजी car chassis, लकिन भी प्रायः on a special dedicated chassi for such use.
Some countries have their own terms similar to pickup, such as ute in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और नई जीलैंड, or bakkie in South Africa.
Large pickup trucks हैं somewhat विरल in यूरोपीय, जहाँ वैन और light lorries are commonly used for similar roles.
This 15th-century depiction of शारलेमेन और पोप एड्रियन i shows a well-bred medieval horse with arched neck, refined head and elegant gait.
Horses in the Middle Ages differed in size, निर्माण और नस्ल इससे the आधुनिक घोड़ा, and were, on average, smaller.
They were also more central to society than their modern counterparts, होने अनिवार्य लिये युद्ध, कृषि, और हस्तांतरण.
Consequently, specific types of horse विकसित, अनेक of जिससे have no आधुनिक equivalent.
While an understanding of modern horse breeds and equestrianism is vital for any analysis of the medieval horse, researchers also need to consider वृत्तचित्र ( दोनो लिखा और सचित्र ) और पुरातत्व प्रमाण.
Horses in the Middle Ages were rarely differentiated by नस्ल, लकिन बल्कि by use.
This led them to be described, for example, as `` chargers `` ( war horses ), `` palfreys `` ( सवारी घोड़े ), कार्ट घोड़े or packhorses.
Reference is also given to their place of origin, ऐसे as `` स्पेनी घोड़े, '' लकिन whether इस referred to one breed or several is unknown.
Another difficulty arising दौरान कोई पढ़ाई of मध्यकालीन दस्तावेज़ or साहित्य is the लचीलापन of the मध्यकालीन भाषाएं, जहाँ अनेक words can be used for one thing ( or, conversely, several objects are referred to by one word ).
Words such as ' courser ' and 'charger ' are used interchangeably ( even भीतर एक दस्तावेज़ ), और जहाँ एक एपिक may बोलो disparagingly of a rouncey, another praises its skill and swiftness.
Significant technological अग्रिम in घुड़सवार उपकरण, प्रायः introduced इससे अन्य संस्कृतियों, allowed for significant changes in both warfare and agriculture.
In particular, improved designs for the solid-treed saddle as well as the arrival of the रकाब, नाल और घोड़ा कॉलर यहूद significant अग्रिम in मध्यकालीन समाज.
नतीजतन, the assumptions और theories विकसित by इतिहासकारों हैं नहीं निर्णायक, और बहस स्टिल rages on अनेक मुद्दे, ऐसे as the breeding or size of the horse, and a number of sources must be consulted in order to understand the breadth of the subject.
The Music Man is a musical साथ किताब, म्यूज़िक, और गीत by मेरेडिथ willson, आधारित on a story by Willson and Franklin Lacey.
The plot concerns con man Harold Hill, who poses as a boys ' band आयोजक और नेता और बिकता बैंड यंत्र और वर्दी to भोली townsfolk पहले skipping town with the cash.
in नदी नगर, आयोवा, prim लाइब्रेरियन और पियानो टीचर marian paroo sees through उसे, but when Hill helps her younger brother overcome his fear of social interactions due to his lisp, Marian begins to fall in love with Harold.
Harold, in turn गिरना लिये marian, risks being caught to win her.
In 1957, the show became a hit on Broadway, winning five Tony Awards, सहित बेहतरीन musical, और कार्यशील लिये 1,375 performances.
The डाल एल्बम जीती the पहला ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये `` बेहतरीन Original Cast Album '' and was number one on the Billboard charts for 245 weeks.
The show 's success led to revivals और a लोकप्रिय 1962 फिल्मी अनुकूलन and a 2003 television remake.
It frequently is उत्पादित by दोनो पेशेवर और amateur थिएटर companies.
निरीक्षक 's wheel
A surveyor 's wheel, also called a clickwheel, hodometer, waywiser, trundle व्हील, measuring व्हील, or perambulator is a यंत्र लिये measuring distance.
