A desert is a landscape or region of जमीन कि is बहुत शुष्क क्युकी of कम वर्षा amounts ( वर्षण ), often has little coverage by plants, and in which streams dry up unless they are supplied by water from outside areas.
Deserts can भी be वर्णित as क्षेत्रों जहाँ अधिक जल is खोया by evapotranspiration than falls as precipitation.
Desert plants must have special adaptations to जीवित साथ इस छोटी जल.
Deserts generally receive less than 25 cm of बरसात ( वर्षण ) प्रत्येक साल.
semideserts or steppes हैं regions जिससे receive between and.
In the Köppen climate classification system, रेगिस्तान हैं classed as bwh ( hot मरुस्थल ) or BWk ( temperate desert ).
In the Thornthwaite climate classification system, deserts होता be वर्गीकृत as arid megathermal climates.
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war केंद्रित in यूरोपीय कि began on 28 जुलाई 1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918.
It was predominantly called the संसार युद्ध or the ग्रेट युद्ध इससे इसके occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of World War II in 1939, and the First World War or World War I thereafter.
It involved all the world 's great शक्तियां, जिससे यहूद समवेत in दो opposing alliances : the allies ( आधारित on the ट्रिपल entente of the संयुक्त किंगडम, France and Russia ) and the Central Powers ( originally the Triple Alliance of Germany, Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but, as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement, Italy did not enter into the war ).
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more nations entered the war : Italy, Japan and the United States joined the allies, और the उस्मानी साम्राज्य and Bulgaria the Central Powers.
Ultimately, more than 70 million सैन्य कर्मियों, सहित 60 लाख europeans, यहूद mobilised in एक of the largest wars in history.
More than 9 million combatants were killed, largely because of technological advancements that led to विशाल increases in the lethality of हथियार बगैर सम्बन्धित सुधार in सुरक्षा or गतिशीलता.
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history, subsequently paving the रास्ता लिये विभिन्न राजनैतिक परिवर्तन, ऐसे as revolutions in many of the nations involved.
One of the long-term causes of the युद्ध थी the पुनरुत्थान of साम्राज्यवाद in the विदेशी नीतियों of the ग्रेट powers of Europe.
More immediately, the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria, the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary, on 28 June 1914 by यूगोस्लाव राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered a राजनयिक crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia.
Several alliances formed over the पिछला दशकों were invoked.
Within weeks, the प्रमुख शक्तियां यहूद at युद्ध और, via उनके colonies, the conflict soon spread around the world.
On 28 July, the austro-hungarians fired the पहला गोलियाँ of the युद्ध as तैयारी लिये the invasion of Serbia.
While the Russians mobilised, the Germans invaded न्यूट्रल बेल्जियम और ध्वज on the रास्ता to फ़्रांस, providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany.
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a स्थिर बैटल of अपघर्षण साथ a गर्त लकीर कि बदला little until 1917.
On the Eastern Front, the रूसी फौज थी कामयाब विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians, लकिन थी रोका in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans.
In November the Ottoman साम्राज्य joined the युद्ध, खोलने up fronts in the Caucasus, Mesopotamia and the Sinai.
इटली और बुल्गारिया गई to युद्ध in 1915 and Romania in 1916.
In Russia, the tsar 's सरकारी collapsed in कूच 1917 और a subsequent क्रान्ति in नवम्बर brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers.
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front, the Allies drove वापस the germans in a श्रेणी of कामयाब offensives and American forces began entering the trenches.
Germany, which had its own ट्रबल साथ क्रांतिकारियों, agreed to an armistice on 11 November 1918.
The war ended in विजय for the Allies.
Events on the home fronts यहूद as उग्र as on the बैटल fronts, as the participants tried to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to fight a total war.
By the end of the war, चार प्रमुख इम्पीरियल powers—the जर्मनी, Russian, Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist.
The successor राज्य of the पूर्व दो खोया a ग्रेट राशि of territory, while the latter two were dismantled entirely.
The map of central Europe was redrawn into अनेक छोटी राज्य.
The League of Nations was formed in the hope of preventing another ऐसे विरोध.
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the ब्रेकअप of empires, the परखना of जर्मनी 's शिकस्त और समस्याएं साथ the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II.
`` Girls Just Want to Have Fun '' is a 1979 सोंग originally लिखा by रॉबर्ट जोखिम और बना प्रसिद्ध by singer Cyndi Lauper.
It was the पहला प्रमुख सिंगल released by Lauper as a solo artist and the lead-off single from her debut album She 's So Unusual.
Lauper’s version gained recognition as a feminist गान और प्रचारित by an award-winning video.
it रै महरूम covered on either an album or in live concert by over 30 other artists.
The single was Lauper 's breakthrough hit, reaching # 2 on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 और बनने a विश्वव्यापी hit throughout late 1983 and early 1984.
It remains one of Lauper 's signature songs and was a widely लोकप्रिय सोंग दौरान the era of इसके रिलीज, the 1980s.
The `` Rolling Stone & MTV : '100 Greatest Pop Songs ' : 1-50 '', `` Rolling स्टोन : `` the 100 शीर्ष म्यूज़िक वीडियो '' '' और the `` VH1 : 100 Greatest Videos '' lists ranked the song at # 22, # 39 and # 45, respectively.
The song received a Grammy Award nomination for रिकार्ड of the साल और बेहतरीन मादा पॉप गायन Performance.
View of defibrillator एलेक्ट्रोड स्थिति और placement.
Defibrillation is a common treatment for life-threatening cardiac dysrhythmias, ventricular fibrillation, और pulseless ventricular tachycardia.
Defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic खुराक of विद्युत उर्जा to the affected heart with a device called a defibrillator.
This depolarizes a critical mass of the heart muscle, terminates the dysrhythmia, and allows सामान्य sinus लय to be reestablished by the देह 's प्राकृतिक pacemaker, in the sinoatrial node of the heart.
Defibrillators can be external, transvenous, or implanted, depending on the प्रकार of device used or needed.
Some external units, known as स्वचालित बाह्य defibrillators ( aeds ), automate the निदान of treatable rhythms, meaning that lay responders or bystanders are able to use them successfully with little, or in some cases no training at all.
The Cato Institute is an American libertarian सोचो टैंक headquartered in Washington, D.C.
It was founded as the चार्ल्स koch न्यास in 1974 by मरे rothbard, ed क्रेन और चार्ल्स koch, chairman of the board and chief executive officer of the conglomerate Koch Industries, Inc..
In जुलाई 1976, the नाम थी बदला to the Cato Institute.
According to the 2011 Global Go To Think Tank अनुक्रमणिका, केटो is the 6th सबसे influential us आधारित सोचो टैंक, रैंकिंग 3rd in आर्थिक नीति and 2nd in Social Policy.
The Institute 's stated mission is `` to increase the समझना of पब्लिक नीतियों आधारित on the सिद्धान्त of सीमित सरकारी, फ़्री markets, individual liberty, and peace.
The Institute will use the most effective means to originate, advocate, प्रचार, और disseminate लागू नीति प्रस्ताव कि बनाएँ फ़्री, खोलें, and civil societies in the United States and throughout the world. ''
Cato scholars were critical of George W. Bush 's Republican प्रशासन ( 2001–2009 ) on अनेक मुद्दे, सहित the इराकी युद्ध, सिविल लिबर्टीज, शिक्षा, agriculture, energy policy, and excessive government spending.
On other issues, they supported Bush प्रशासन पहलों, सबसे notably स्वास्थ्य परवाह, Social Security, global warming, tax policy, and immigration.
During the 2008 U.S. अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, केटो विद्वानों criticized दोनो major-party उम्मीदवार, John McCain and Barack Obama.
Cato has criticized President Obama 's stances on policy मुद्दे चूंकि उसके उद्घाटन, ऐसे as फिस्कल stimulus, healthcare सुधार, विदेशी नीति, and the War on Drugs, while supporting his stance on the repeal of Do n't Ask, Do n't Tell and liberal immigration policy.
Dracula is an 1897 Gothic हॉरर अनोखा by आयरिश लेखक ब्राम स्टोकर.
Famous for introducing the अक्षर of the पिशाच गिनती ड्रैकुला, the अनोखा tells the स्टोरी of ड्रैकुला 's attempt to relocate from Transylvania to England, and the battle between Dracula and a small group of men and women led by Professor Abraham Van Helsing.
Dracula has been assigned to many literary genres सहित पिशाच साहित्य, हॉरर fiction, the गोथिक अनोखा और आक्रमण literature.
The novel touches on themes such as the भूमिका of महिलाओं in विक्टोरियन संस्कृति, यौन प्रथाओं, immigration, colonialism, and post-colonialism.
Although Stoker did not invent the vampire, he defined its modern form, and the novel has spawned numerous नाट्य, फिल्मी और टेलीविज़न interpretations.
Quidditch is a competitive sport in the wizarding संसार of the हैरी कुम्हार ब्रह्मांड, और is इससे the श्रेणी of children 's novels and movies.
It is an extremely rough but very लोकप्रिय semi-contact खेल, निभाई by wizards और witches.
Matches are played between दो टीमों of सात खिलाड़ी सवारी उड़ती broomsticks, using चार गेंदें and six elevated ring-shaped goals, three on each side of the Quidditch pitch ( field ).
In the Harry Potter universe, Quidditch holds a fervent following समान to the स्थिति कि संघ football holds as a globally popular sport.
The खेल is स्मारकीय throughout the wizarding world.
Harry plays an महत्वपूर्ण स्थिति लिये उसके हाउस टोली at हॉग्वार्ट्स : he is the seeker and becomes the captain in his sixth year there.
Regional and international competitions are उल्लेखित throughout the श्रेणी.
In Goblet of Fire, Quidditch at Hogwarts is cancelled for the Tri-Wizard टूर्नामेंट, लकिन हैरी और the weasleys attend the quidditch संसार कप.
In addition, Harry uses his Quidditch skills to capture a golden egg from a dragon called the Hungarian Horntail ( in the first task of the Tri-Wizard Tournament ), to capture a flying key in पारस 's स्टोन, और on दो कुंजी अवसरों in deathly hallows — getting थाम of ravenclaw 's diadem, और दौरान the फाइनल लड़ो साथ voldemort — the `` unerring कौशल of the seeker '' is उपयोगी to him in snatching the Elder Wand out of the air.
Harry Potter has owned दो broomsticks, the nimbus 2000 और the firebolt, दोनो of जिससे are destroyed by the series ' end.
The game has been अपनाया in the रियल संसार in the रूप of Muggle Quidditch.
The United States Congress is the bicameral legislature of the संघीय सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य consisting of दो घरों : the निम्नतर हाउस ज्ञात as the House of Representatives and the upper house known as the Senate.
Congress meets in the कैपिटल in Washington, D.C.
दोनो प्रतिनिधि और सीनेटरों are chosen through direct election.
Congress has a कुल of 535 मतदान सदस्यों : 435 members in the House of Representatives and 100 members in the Senate.
Members of the House of Representatives serve two-year शर्तें representing the लोगों of a ज़िला.
Congressional districts are apportioned to states by population using the United States Census results, each state in the संघ having at तनिक एक प्रतिनिधि in the हाउस of Representatives.
Regardless of population, प्रत्येक of the 50 राज्य रै दो सीनेटरों ; the 100 सीनेटरों each serve a six-year term.
The terms are staggered so every two years approximately one-third of the सीनेट is up लिये चुनाव.
Each staggered group of one-third of the सीनेटरों हैं पुकारा 'classes '.
No राज्य of the संयुक्त राज्य has two senators from the same class.
Most incumbents seek re-election, और उनके ऐतिहासिक likelihood of जीतना subsequent elections exceeds 90 percent.
In August 2012, a gallup पोल reported कि congress’s approval rating amongst Americans was at 10 %, matching a 38-year low reached in November 2011.
`` A Little More Country Than That '' is the title of a सोंग लिखा by जॉय + रोरी 's रोरी ली feek, व्यान varble, और डॉन poythress, and recorded by American country artist Easton Corbin.
It थी released in अगस्त 2009 as कोर्बिन 's डेब्यू single and is included on his self-titled debut album.
In April 2010, the song reached Number One on the country music charts, making Corbin the पहला पुरूष सोलो कलाकार in सात सालो to भेजें a डेब्यू single to Number One.
It has महरूम certified सुनहरा by the RIAA.
The ब्लैकबेरी is a लकीर of बेतार हैंडहेल्ड डिवाइस और सेवाएं designed and marketed by Research In Motion Limited ( RIM ) operating as BlackBerry.
The first BlackBerry device, an email pager, थी released in 1999 ; the सबसे हाल ब्लैकबेरी डिवाइस, the z10 और q10, यहूद घोषित on January 30, 2013.
The user interface varies by मॉडल ; सबसे विशेषता a शारीरिक क्वर्टी कुंजीपटल, जबकि नए पीढियां have relied on a multi-touch screen and virtual keyboard.
A BlackBerry can shoot video, take photos, खेल म्यूज़िक, और perform ऑनलाइन कृत्यों ऐसे as web-browsing और emailing.
They can also send and receive push ईमेल और तत्काल संदेश जबकि maintaining a ऊँची स्तर of सुरक्षा through on-device message encryption, and are designed to function as personal digital assistants.
BlackBerry devices support a large variety of instant messaging सुविधाएँ, साथ the सबसे लोकप्रिय होने the proprietary BlackBerry Messenger service.
The ब्लैकबेरी playbook is a टैब्लेट कंप्यूटर offered by the company.
The 100 millionth BlackBerry स्मार्टफोन थी shipped in जून क्वार्टर of 2010 और the 200 millionth smartphone was shipped in September quarter of 2012.
BlackBerry accounts for 3 % of mobile device sales worldwide in 2011, making its निर्माता the छठे सबसे लोकप्रिय यंत्र मेकर ( 25 % of मोबाईल device sales are smartphones ).
The consumer BlackBerry Internet सेवा is उपलब्धियाँ in 91 देशों विश्वव्यापी on over 500 मोबाईल service operators using various mobile technologies.
As of September 2012, there were eighty लाख सदस्य विश्वव्यापी to ब्लैकबेरी.
In 2011 the Caribbean and Latin America had the उच्चतम penetrations of ब्लैकबेरी स्मार्टफ़ोन विश्वव्यापी, साथ up to परिचय 45 per cent in the region having a RIM device.
ब्लैकबेरी, iphone, एंड्रॉइड, और खिड़कियाँ फोन are considered the four major smartphone brands.
BlackBerry is widely referred to as `` CrackBerry '' in the United राज्य, जिससे alludes to इसके excessive उपयोग by इसके स्वामी और is a reference to the addictiveness of crack cocaine.
Use of the term CrackBerry became so widespread that in November 2006 Webster 's नई संसार कॉलेज शब्दकोष नामित `` crackberry '' the `` नई शब्द of the साल. ''
an उदाहरण of a माँग वक्र shifting.
The shift इससे d1 to d2 अर्थात् an बढ़ाएँ in माँग with consequences for the other variables
In economics, the माँग वक्र is the आलेख depicting the संबंध between the दाम of a निश्चित कमोडिटी and the amount of it that consumers are willing and able to purchase at that given price.
It is a ग्राफिक प्रतिनिधित्व of a माँग schedule.
The demand curve for all उपभोक्ता साथ फ़ॉलो इससे the माँग वक्र of प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत उपभोक्ता : the individual demands at each price are added together.
Demand curves are used to estimate behaviors in competitive markets, and are often combined with supply वक्र to अनुमान the संतुलन दाम ( the दाम at जिससे विक्रेता साथ हैं willing to बेचें the वही राशि as खरीदार साथ हैं willing to ख़रीदे, भी ज्ञात as मार्केट clearing दाम ) and the equilibrium quantity ( the amount of that good or service that will be produced and bought without surplus/excess supply or shortage/excess demand ) of that market.
In a monopolistic market, the demand curve facing the monopolist is बस the मार्केट माँग वक्र.
historia
by nikolaos gysis ( 1892 )
History ( from Greek - historia, meaning `` inquiry, knowledge acquired by छानबीन '' ) is an छतरियाँ पद कि relates to पास्ट कार्यक्रम as खूब as the डिस्कवरी, संग्रहण, संगठन, and presentation of information about these events.
The term includes cosmic, geologic, and organic history, लकिन is प्रायः generically implied to औसत इंसान इतिहास.
Scholars who write about इतिहास हैं पुकारा इतिहासकारों.
History can also refer to the academic discipline which uses a narrative to examine and analyse a अनुक्रम of पास्ट कार्यक्रम, और objectively determine the पैटर्न of कारण और प्रभाव कि determine उन्हें.
Historians sometimes debate the nature of इतिहास और इसके उपयोगिता by discussing the पढ़ाई of the अनुशासन as an समाप्त in itself and as a way of providing `` perspective '' on the problems of the present.
Stories common to a particular culture, but not supported by external sources ( such as the tales surrounding King Arthur ) are usually classified as cultural heritage or legends, because they do नहीं support the `` disinterested छानबीन '' जरूरी of the अनुशासन of history.
Events occurring prior to लिखा रिकार्ड हैं माना prehistory.
Herodotus, a 5th century B.C. Greek historian is considered within the पश्चिमी परंपरा to be the `` पिता of इतिहास '', और, साथ साथ उसके समकालीन thucydides, helped रूप the foundations for the modern study of human history.
Their work continues to be पढ़ा आज और the divide between the culture-focused हिरोडोटस और the military-focused thucydides remains a point of contention or approach in modern historical writing.
In the Eastern tradition, a state वृत्तान्त the वसन्त और पतझड़ annals थी ज्ञात to be compiled इससे as जल्दी as 722 bce हालांकि तभी 2nd century BCE texts survived.
Ancient influences have helped spawn variant interpretations of the प्रकृति of इतिहास जिससे have विकसित over the सदियां and continue to change today.
The modern study of history is wide-ranging, and includes the study of विशिष्ट regions और the पढ़ाई of निश्चित topical or thematical तत्व of ऐतिहासिक छानबीन.
Often history is taught as part of primary and secondary education, and the academic study of history is a प्रमुख अनुशासन in विश्वविद्यालयों अध्ययन.
Malcolm X ( ; May 19, 1925February 21, 1965 ), born Malcolm छोटी और भी ज्ञात as el-hajj malik el-shabazz ( ), थी an african-american मुस्लिम मंत्री and human rights activist.
to उसके admirers, he थी a साहसी एडवोकेट लिये the अधिकारों of अश्वेतों, a man जो indicted white America in the harshest terms for its crimes against black Americans.
Detractors अभियुक्त उसे of उपदेश जातिवाद, ब्लैक सर्वोच्चता, and violence.
He has been पुकारा एक of the महानतम और सबसे influential African Americans in history.
Malcolm X 's father died—killed by white supremacists, it was rumored—when he थी यंग, और at तनिक एक of उसके uncles थी lynched.
When he was 13, his माँ थी लगाई in a दिमागी हॉस्पिटल, और he was placed in a series of foster homes.
In 1946, at age 20, he गई to थाना लिये breaking and entering.
In prison, Malcolm X became a member of the Nation of Islam ; बाद उसके पैरोल in 1952, he जल्दी रोज़ to become एक of इसके leaders.
For a dozen years, Malcolm X was the public face of the विवादास्पद समूह, लकिन मोहभंग साथ स्वदेश of Islam head Elijah Muhammad led him to leave the Nation in March 1964.
After a period of travel in Africa and the Middle East, he returned to the United States, where he founded मुस्लिम मस्जिदे, inc. और the संगठन of afro-american एकता.
In February 1965, less than a year बाद leaving the स्वदेश of islam, he थी assassinated by three members of the group.
Malcolm X 's expressed beliefs बदला substantially over time.
As a प्रवक्ता लिये the स्वदेश of islam he सिखाया ब्लैक सर्वोच्चता और advocated separation of black and white Americans —in contrast to the civil rights movement 's emphasis on integration.
After breaking with the Nation of islam in 1964—saying of उसके संघ साथ it, `` i किया अनेक things as a [ Black ] Muslim that I 'm sorry for now.
I was a zombie then... pointed in a certain दिशा और बताई to कूच '' —and बनने a सुन्नी मुस्लिम, he disavowed जातिवाद और expressed willingness to कार्य साथ सिविल अधिकारों नेताओ, he continued to emphasize Pan-Africanism, black self-determination, and self-defense.
Henry Merritt `` Hank '' Paulson, Jr. ( born March 28, 1946 ) is an American banker who परोसा as the 74th संयुक्त राज्य सचिव of the राजकोष.
He had served as the अध्यक्ष और मुख्य कार्यपालिका अधिकारी of गोल्डमैन sachs, और is अभी अध्यक्ष of the paulson संस्थान, जिससे he संस्थापित in 2011 to promote sustainable economic growth and a cleaner environment around the world, with an initial focus on the United States and China.
A virtual machine ( vm ) is a तन्त्र implemented abstraction of the underlying hardware, which is presented to the application layer of the system.
Virtual machines may be based on specifications of a काल्पनिक कंप्यूटर or emulate the कंप्यूटर वास्तुकला और कृत्यों of a real world computer.
Spiders ( order Araneae ) are air-breathing arthropods कि have आठ टाँगे and chelicerae with fangs that inject venom.
They are the largest अनुक्रम of arachnids और रैंक सातवाँ in कुल species diversity among all other groups of organisms.
मकड़ियों हैं मिला विश्वव्यापी on प्रत्येक महाद्वीप मगर लिये अंटार्कटिक, और have become established in nearly every habitat with the exception of air and sea colonization.
As of 2008, at least 43,678 मकड़ी प्रजाति, और 109 परिवारों have महरूम अंकित by taxonomists ; however, वहीँ रै महरूम भ्रम भीतर the वैज्ञानिक जातियाँ as to कैसा सब ये परिवारों should be classified, as evidenced by the over 20 different classifications that have been proposed since 1900.
Anatomically, spiders differ इससे अन्य arthropods in कि the usual देह खण्ड हैं fused into दो tagmata, the cephalothorax और उदर, and joined by a small, cylindrical pedicel.
Unlike कीट, मकड़ियों do not have antennae.
In सब मगर the सबसे आदिम समूह, the mesothelae, मकड़ियों have the most centralized nervous systems of all arthropods, as all their ganglia are fused into one mass in the cephalothorax.
Unlike सबसे arthropods, मकड़ियों have no extensor मांसपेशियां in their limbs and instead extend them by hydraulic pressure.
Their abdomens bear appendages कि have महरूम परिवर्धित into spinnerets कि extrude रेशा from up to six types of silk glands within their abdomen.
Spider webs vary widely in size, shape and the राशि of स्टिकी लड़ी प्रयुक्त.
It now appears that the spiral orb web may be one of the earliest forms, और मकड़ियों कि उपज उलझे cobwebs हैं अधिक abundant और विविध than orb-web spiders.
Spider-like arachnids with silk-producing spigots appeared in the devonian काल परिचय, लकिन these animals apparently lacked spinnerets.
True spiders have महरूम मिला in carboniferous रॉक्स इससे, और हैं बहुत समान to the most primitive surviving order, the Mesothelae.
The main groups of modern spiders, mygalomorphae और araneomorphae, पहला appeared in the triassic काल, before.
A herbivorous प्रजाति, bagheera kiplingi, थी वर्णित in 2008, लकिन सब अन्य ज्ञात species are predators, mostly preying on insects and on other spiders, although a few large species also take birds and lizards.
Spiders use a wide range of strategies to capture prey : trapping it in स्टिकी webs, lassoing it साथ स्टिकी bolas, mimicking the शिकार to avoid detection, or running it down.
Most detect prey mainly by sensing vibrations, but the क्रियाशील hunters have अधि दृष्टि, और hunters of the genus portia दिखाएँ लक्षण of प्रज्ञा in उनके choice of tactics and ability to develop new ones.
Spiders ' guts are too narrow to take solids, and they liquidize उनके खाना by बाढ़ it साथ digestive एंजाइमों और पीस it साथ the bases of उनके pedipalps, as they do not have true jaws.
Male spiders identify themselves by a किस्में of जटिल प्रेमालाप संस्कार to avoid होने खाया by the females.
Males of most प्रजाति जीवित a few matings, सीमित मुख्यतः by उनके short life spans.
Females weave silk egg-cases, प्रत्येक of जिससे may contain सैंकड़ों of eggs.
महिलाओं of अनेक प्रजाति परवाह लिये their young, for example by carrying them around or by sharing food with them.
A minority of प्रजाति हैं सोशल, भवन सांप्रदायिक webs कि may हाउस anywhere from a few to 50,000 individuals.
Social behavior ranges from precarious toleration, as in the विधवा मकड़ियों, to co-operative hunting and food-sharing.
Although most spiders live लिये at सबसे दो सालो, tarantulas and other mygalomorph spiders can live up to 25 years in captivity.
While the venom of a few प्रजाति is खतरनाक to इंसानो, वैज्ञानिकों हैं अभी researching the उपयोग of spider venom in medicine and as non-polluting pesticides.
Spider silk provides a combination of lightness, strength and elasticity that is श्रेष्ठ to कि of सिंथेटिक सामग्री, और मकड़ी रेशा जीनों have been inserted into mammals and plants to see if these can be used as silk factories.
As a result of their wide range of behaviors, spiders have become common symbols in art and mythology symbolizing विभिन्न combinations of सब्र, क्रूरता और रचनात्मक powers.

Portrayed by लौरा prepon, डोना is the प्रेम ब्याज to Eric Forman.

Household income is a measure commonly प्रयुक्त by the संयुक्त राज्य सरकारी और निजी संस्थानों.
प्रत्येक household is measured by the आय of every resident over the age of 15.
Income includes wages and salaries, unemployment insurance, disability payments, child support भुगतान प्राप्त, नियमित rental रसीदें, as खूब as कोई निजी कारोबार, निवेश, or अन्य kinds of आय प्राप्त routinely.
While inflation-adjusted ( `` real '' ) household income had महरूम increasing लगभग प्रत्येक साल इससे 1945 to 1999, it रै चूंकि महरूम चपटा और भी decreased recently.
U.S. median household आय गिरी इससे $ 51,144 in 2010 to $ 50,502 in 2011.
Extreme poverty in the United States, meaning households living on less than $ 2 per day before government benefits, doubled इससे 1996 to 1.5 लाख households in 2011, सहित 2.8 लाख children.
The residents of the household do not have to be सम्बन्धित to the सिर of the household लिये उनके आय to be माना भाग of the household 's income.
As households tend to share a similar economic context, the उपयोग of household आय remains among the सबसे widely स्वीकृत उपायों of आय.
That the size of a household is not commonly taken into account in such measures may distort any विश्लेषण of fluctuations भीतर or among the household आय श्रेणी, और may रेंडर सीधा comparisons between quintiles difficult or even impossible.
A registered एजेंट, भी ज्ञात as a निवासी एजेंट or statutory एजेंट, in संयुक्त राज्य कारोबार law, is a business or individual designated to receive service of process ( SOP ) when a business entity is a party in a legal action such as a lawsuit or summons.
The registered agent 's address may also be where the state will भेजें the कागजी लिये the वार्षिक नवीकरण of the business entity 's charter.
The पंजीकृत एजेंट लिये a कारोबार एंटिटी may be an व्यक्तिगत सदस्य of the कम्पनी, or ( more often ) a third party, such as the organization 's lawyer or a service company.
Failure to properly maintain a पंजीकृत एजेंट can affect a company negatively.

`` Life, Liberty, and the pursuit of सुख '' is a well-known phrase in the United States Declaration of Independence.
The phrase is meant to exemplify the `` unalienable rights '' with which all human beings हैं endowed by उनके निर्माता लिये उनके सुरक्षा of जिससे वे संस्थान सरकारें.
Fencing, is typically divided into Olympic fencing, शास्त्रीय तलवारबाजी और ऐतिहासिक fencing,.
The sport of fencing ( commonly पुकारा ओलम्पिक तलवारबाजी or प्रतिस्पर्धी तलवारबाजी ) is divided into three weapon categories : foil, sabre and épée.
Classical fencing uses the same three weapons, लकिन approaches fencing as a martial art.
Competitive Fencing is one of five sports which has been featured at every one of the आधुनिक ओलम्पिक खेल, the अन्य चार होने एथलेटिक्स, साइकिलिंग, तैराकी, and Gymnastics.
The quadriceps femoris ( Latin for `` four-headed मांसपेशी of the femur `` ), भी पुकारा बस the quadriceps, quadriceps extensor, quads, is a large muscle group that includes the four prevailing muscles on the front of the thigh.
It is the great extensor muscle of the घुटना, forming a विशाल मांसल द्रव्यमान जिससे कवर the front and sides of the femur.
the उचित लैटिन बहुवचन रूप of the adjective quadriceps would be quadricipites.
In आधुनिक अंग्रेज़ी उपयोग, quadriceps is used in both singular and plural.
the एकवचन रूप quadricep, produced by hypercorrection, is frequently used.
RMS Titanic was a British passenger liner that sank in the उत्तर अटलांटिक समंदर on 15 अप्रैल 1912 बाद colliding साथ an हिमशैल दौरान her maiden voyage from Southampton, UK to New York City, US.
The sinking of Titanic caused the deaths of 1,502 people in one of the deadliest peacetime मेरीटाइम आपदाओं in आधुनिक history.
The RMS टाइटैनिक थी the largest जलयान afloat at the time of her maiden voyage.
She was the second of three Olympic class ocean liners operated by the श्वेत स्टार लकीर, और वो थी निर्मित by the harland और wolff shipyard in Belfast with Thomas Andrews, who perished with the ship, as her naval architect.
On her maiden voyage, वो carried 2,224 passengers and crew.
Under the command of Edward Smith, her passengers included some of the wealthiest people in the world, as खूब as सैंकड़ों of emigrants इससे ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और आयरलैंड, scandinavia और elsewhere throughout यूरोपीय seeking a नई life in North America.
The ship was designed to be the last word in comfort और लक्ज़री, साथ an on-board gymnasium, तैराकी पूल, पुस्तकालयों, high-class restaurants and opulent cabins.
She also had a शक्तिशाली बेतार टेलीग्राफ provided for the convenience of passengers as well as for operational use.
Though she had advanced safety features such as watertight compartments and remotely activated watertight द्वार, वो lacked पर्याप्त lifeboats to accommodate सब of those सवार.
Because of outdated maritime safety regulations, she carried only enough lifeboats for 1,178 people—slightly अधिक than हाफ of the क्रमांक यात्राएं on the maiden voyage, और one-third उसके कुल यात्री और crew capacity.
After leaving Southampton on 10 अप्रैल 1912, टाइटैनिक पुकारा at cherbourg in फ़्रांस और queenstown ( अभी cobh ) in आयरलैंड before heading westwards towards New York.
On 14 April 1912, four days into the crossing and about 375 मील ( 600 km ) दक्षिण of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड, वो hit an हिमशैल at 11:40 pm जलयान 's time.
The glancing collision caused Titanics hull plates to buckle inwards along her starboard side and opened five of her sixteen watertight compartments to the समुद्र ; the जलयान धीरे भर with water.
Meanwhile, passengers और कुछ क्रू सदस्यों यहूद evacuated in lifeboats, many of which were launched only partly loaded.
A disproportionate number of men were left aboard because of a `` women और children पहला `` प्रोटोकॉल followed by कुछ of the अधिकारियों लदान the lifeboats.
By 2:20 AM, she broke अलावा और foundered, साथ खूब over एक हजार people still aboard.
बस अंतर्गत दो घंटों बाद the टाइटैनिक foundered, the cunard लाइनर rms Carpathia arrived on the scene of the sinking, where she brought aboard an estimated 705 survivors.
The disaster was greeted साथ विश्वव्यापी शॉक और आक्रोश at the विशाल घाटा of life and the regulatory and operational failures that had led to it.
Public inquiries in ब्रिटेन और the संयुक्त राज्य led to major improvements in maritime safety.
One of their most important legacies was the स्थापना in 1914 of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय सम्मेलन लिये the सुरक्षा of जीवन at समुद्र ( SOLAS ), which still governs maritime safety today.
Additionally, several new wireless regulations यहूद passed around the संसार in an प्रयत्न to सीख इससे the अनेक missteps in wireless communications -- -which could have saved many more passengers.
Many of the survivors खोया सब of उनके धन और possessions और यहूद बाएँ अक्षम ; अनेक परिवारों, विशेषकर those of क्रू सदस्यों from Southampton, lost their primary bread-winners.
They were helped by an outpouring of public sympathy and charitable donations.
Some of the male survivors were accused of cowardice for leaving the जलयान जबकि लोगों यहूद स्टिल on फलक ; the श्वेत स्टार लकीर 's अध्यक्ष, J. ब्रूस Ismay, faced social ostracism for the rest of his life.
The wreck of the Titanic remains on the seabed, split in two and धीरे disintegrating at a गहराई of.
Since its discovery in 1985, हज़ारों of artefacts have महरूम बरामद and put on display at museums around the world.
Titanic has become one of the most famous ships in history, her मेमोरी रखा जिंदा by numerous किताबे, लोक गीतों, films, दर्शाती, और memorials.
The human leg is the entire lower extremity or limb of the human body, including the foot, जांघ और भी the हिप or gluteal प्रदेश ; however, the precise परिभाषा in human anatomy refers only to the section of the lower limb extending from the knee to the ankle.
Legs are used for standing, चलना, कूद, कार्यशील, kicking, और समान क्रियाएँ, और constitute a significant portion of a person 's mass.
This article is about the demographic features of the जनसांख्यिकी of तुर्कों, सहित जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व, नस्ल, शिक्षा स्तर, स्वास्थ्य of the populace, economic status, religious affiliations and other aspects of the population.
As of 2010, the population of Turkey is estimated to be 73.7 million with a विकास रेट of 1.21 % प्रति annum ( 2009 figure ).
The population is relatively young with 26.6 % गिरना in the 0-14 आयु कोष्ठक.
According to the OECD/World Bank population statistics in तुर्कों the जनसांख्यिकी विकास इससे 1990 to 2008 थी 16 million or 29 %.

A full-size car is a विपणन पद प्रयुक्त in उत्तर अमेरिका लिये an automobile larger than a mid-size car.
In the United राज्य, the epa उपयोग the पद `` विशाल car '' to denote full-size cars.
Joel Grey ( born April 11, 1932 ) is an American stage and screen कर्ता, सिंगर, और नर्तकी, ज्ञात लिये उसके भूमिका as the निपुण of ceremonies in दोनो the stage and film adaptation of the Kander & Ebb musical Cabaret.

in 1973, the जादूगर in the musical Wicked.

James Madison, Jr. ( March 16, 1751 ( O.S. कूच 5 ) – जून 28, 1836 ) थी an अमरीकी statesman और राजनैतिक theorist, the चौथी अध्यक्ष of the United States ( 1809–1817 ).
He is hailed as the “Father of the Constitution” for being इंस्ट्रूमेंटल in the drafting of the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान और as the कुंजी चैंपियन and author of the United States Bill of Rights.
He served as a politician much of उसके वयस्क जीवन.
After the संविधान था महरूम drafted, मैडिसन became one of the leaders in the movement to ratify it.
उसके सहयोग साथ सिकंदर हैमिल्टन और John Jay produced the Federalist Papers ( 1788 ).
Circulated only in New York at the time, they होता बाद be माना among the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण polemics in support of the Constitution.
He was also a delegate to the Virginia constitutional ratifying convention, और थी इंस्ट्रूमेंटल to the कामयाब अनुसमर्थन प्रयत्न in Virginia.
Like most of his contemporaries, मैडिसन बदला उसके राजनैतिक views during his life.
During the drafting and ratification of the constitution, he favored a दमदार नेशनल सरकारी, though later he grew to favor stronger state governments, before settling between the two extremes late in his life.
In 1789, Madison became a नेता in the नई हाउस of प्रतिनिधि, drafting many basic laws.
He is notable for drafting the first ten amendments to the संविधान, और यूँ is ज्ञात as the `` पिता of the विधेयक of Rights ``.
Madison worked closely साथ अध्यक्ष जार्ज वॉशिंगटन to organize the new federal government.
Breaking with हैमिल्टन और कया became the federalist पार्टी in 1791, मैडिसन और थामस जेफरसन organized what they called the Republican Party ( later called by historians the Democratic-Republican Party )
As Jefferson’s Secretary of State ( 1801–1809 ), मैडिसन पर्यवेक्षित the louisiana खरीदें, जिससे doubled the nation’s size.
After his election to the प्रेसिडेंसी, he presided over नवीनीकृत समृद्धि लिये अनेक years.
As अध्यक्ष ( 1809–17 ), बाद the विफलता of राजनयिक protests and a trade embargo against Great Britain, he led the nation into the War of 1812.
He थी responding to अंग्रेजों encroachments on अमरीकी सम्मान और अधिकारों ; in जोड, he चाही to समाप्त the influence of the British among their Indian allies, whose resistance blocked United States settlement in the Midwest around the Great Lakes.
Madison found the war to be an administrative nightmare, as the United States had neither a दमदार फौज nor वित्तीय प्रणाली ; as a परिणाम, he afterward समर्थित a stronger नेशनल सरकारी और a दमदार military, as well as the national bank, which he had long opposed.
Like other Virginia statesmen in the slave society, he was a slaveholder who inherited his plantation known as montpelier, और स्वामित्व सैंकड़ों of स्लेव दौरान his lifetime to cultivate tobacco and other crops.
Madison supported the three-fifths compromise that allowed three-fifths of the enumerated जनसांख्यिकी of स्लेव to be counted for representation.
`` Roman 's Revenge '' is a सोंग performed by अमरीकी rapper निकी minaj इससे उसके डेब्यू स्टुडियो album Pink Friday.

It थी released exclusively on अक्तूबर 30, 2010 through the US iTunes Store, as a promotional release preceding the album 's release.
The song initiated a feud between Lil ' Kim and Minaj, where many people felt the song was directed at लील ' किम और regarded around उसके जज्बात towards minaj 's वृद्धि to कीर्ति.
the सोंग सन्दर्भ minaj 's alter-ego, Roman Zolanski, and Eminem 's alter-ego, Slim Shady.
The song garnered very positive reviews from आलोचकों, सबसे of जिससे praised the सोंग as a stand-out track on the album.

हाइड्रोलिक द्रव being poured.
Hydraulic fluids, also called hydraulic liquids, हैं the मीडियम by जिससे शक्ति is transferred in हाइड्रोलिक मशीनरी.
Common hydraulic fluids हैं आधारित on खनिज आयल or water.
Examples of equipment that might use hydraulic fluids include excavators and backhoes, हाइड्रोलिक brakes, शक्ति परिचालन प्रणालियों, ट्रांसमिशन, कचरा trucks, aircraft flight control systems, lifts, and industrial machinery.
Hydraulic systems like the ones उल्लेखित ऊपर होगा कार्य सबसे efficiently if the हाइड्रोलिक fluid used has no compressibility
Mahindra ट्रैक्टर
Mahindra Tractors, the farm equipment division of Mahindra & Mahindra, builds और स्त्रोत tractors कि हैं बेची विश्वव्यापी across six continents.
Mahindra is भी among the top three tractor manufacturers in the world.
Mahindra has a huge consumer base in India, China and अमेरिका और a growing आधार in Australia.
The company builds more tractors in इण्डिया than कोई अन्य निर्माता, और रै the क्षमता to build 150,000 tractors a year.
In 1963, M & M formed a संयुक्त venture साथ अंतरराष्ट्रीय harvester to manufacture tractors carrying the Mahindra nameplate for the Indian market.
Armed with engineering, tooling and निर्माण know-how gained इससे इस संबंध, M & M developed its first tractor, the B-275.
Mahindra Tractors with sales of nearly 85,000 units annually is एक of the largest ट्रैक्टर कंपनियाँ in the संसार, और is क्रमांक एक in बिक्री in इण्डिया - the largest tractor market in the world.
To expand into the growing tractor market in China, महिंद्रा acquired बहुमत हिस्सेदारी in jiangling.
To raise awareness about Mahindra in the us, महिंद्रा यूएसए घोषित इसके नई प्रायोजन in the nascar देशभर श्रेणी साथ r3 मोटरस्पोर्ट, जिससे is participating with a # 23 Mahindra Tractors Chevrolet.
the car होगा be चलित by रॉबर्ट Richardson, Jr. Mahindra USA, Inc. announced a 17-race primary and 18-race associate sponsorship for the 2009 NASCAR Nationwide Series.
With this sponsorship, महिंद्रा थी the पहला भारतीय कम्पनी to प्रायोजक a car in NASCAR.
In 2008, Mahindra was a sponsor of the McDonald मोटरस्पोर्ट टोली जिससे भागा the # 81 car in the NASCAR Nationwide Series.
The POWER6 is a microprocessor विकसित by ibm कि implemented the Power ISA v.2.03.
When it became available in systems in 2007, it succeeded the शक्ति5+ as ibm 's फ्लैगशिप Power microprocessor.
It is part of the eCLipz project, said to have a लक्ष्य of converging ibm 's सर्वर hardware where practical ( hence `` ipz '' in the acronym : iSeries, pSeries, and zSeries ).
The American middle class is a social class in the संयुक्त राज्य.
While the concept is typically ambiguous in popular opinion and common language उपयोग, समकालीन सोशल वैज्ञानिकों have put आगे अनेक, अधिक or less congruent, theories on the American middle class.
Depending on class model used, the middle क्लास may constitute anywhere इससे 25 % to 66 % of households.
एक of the पहला प्रमुख अध्ययन of the मध्य क्लास in अमेरिका थी श्वेत कॉलर : The American Middle Classes, published in 1951 by sociologist C. Wright Wright_Mills Mills Wright_Mills.
Later sociologists such as Dennis गिल्बर्ट of हैमिल्टन कॉलेज commonly divide the middle class into two sub-groups.
Constituting roughly 15 % to 20 % of households is the अपर or पेशेवर middle class consisting of highly educated, salaried professionals and managers.
Constituting roughly one third of households is the निम्नतर मध्य क्लास consisting ज़्यादातर of semi-professionals, skilled कारीगरों और lower-level management.
Middle-class persons commonly have a comfortable standard of living, significant आर्थिक सुरक्षा, considerable कार्य स्वायत्तता और rely on उनके विशेषज्ञता to sustain themselves.
सदस्यों of the मध्य क्लास belong to diverse groups which overlap with each other.
Overall, middle-class व्यक्तियों, विशेषकर upper-middle-class individuals, हैं characterized by conceptualizing, creating and consulting.
Thus, कॉलेज शिक्षा is एक of the प्रमुख indicators of middle-class status.
Largely attributed to the nature of middle-class occupations, middle class values tend to emphasize स्वतंत्रता, adherence to मूलभूत मानकों, valuing नवीनता और respecting non-conformity.
Politically more active than other demographics, college educated मध्य क्लास पेशेवर हैं विभाजित between the दो प्रमुख पार्टियों.
Income varies considerably इससे निकट the national median to well in excess of $ 100,000.
Household income figures, however, do not always reflect class status and standard of जीना, as वे हैं largely बहकावे by the क्रमांक of आय earners और असफल to recognize household size.
It is therefore possible for a large, dual-earner, lower middle class household to out-earn a छोटी, one-earner, अपर middle class household.
The middle classes are very influential, as वे encompass the बहुमत of मतदाता, लेखक, शिक्षक, journalists, and editors.
Most societal trends in the us originate भीतर the मध्य classes.
The following is a सूची of शनिवार रात्रि सजीव डाल members, past and present.
The cast members of Saturday Night Live were originally referred to as the `` नहीं तैयार लिये प्रधान समय Players ''.

Ruins from the 1906 San फ्रांसिस्को भूकंप, remembered as एक of the worst प्राकृतिक disasters in United States history
A disaster is a natural or man-made ( or technological ) जोखिम resulting in an इवेंट of substantial extent causing significant physical damage or destruction, loss of life, or drastic change to the environment.
A विपत्ति can be ostensively पारिभाषित as कोई tragic इवेंट stemming from events such as earthquakes, floods, catastrophic accidents, fires, or explosions.
It is a घटना कि can कारण क्षति to जीवन और प्रॉपर्टी और नष्ट the economic, social and cultural life of people.
In contemporary academia, आपदाओं हैं देखी as the consequence of inappropriately managed risk.
These risks are the product of a संयोजन of दोनो hazard/s और vulnerability.
Hazards that strike in areas with कम vulnerability होगा never become आपदाओं, as is the case in uninhabited regions.
Developing countries suffer the greatest costs when a disaster hits – more than 95 percent of all deaths caused by आपदाओं occur in विकासशील देशों, और नुकसान due to प्राकृतिक आपदाओं हैं 20 टाइम्स वृहद ( as a percentage of GDP ) in developing countries than in industrialized countries.
In कम्प्यूटिंग, booting ( भी ज्ञात as booting up ) is the आरंभिक नियत of परिचालन कि a computer system performs when electrical power to the CPU is switched on.
The process begins when a computer is turned on लिये the पहला समय or is re-energized बाद होने turned बंद, and ends when the computer is ready to perform its normal operations.
On modern general purpose computers, this can take tens of seconds and typically involves performing a power-on self-test, locating and initializing परिधीय डिवाइस, और तब ढूंढना, लदान और starting an operating system.
Many कंप्यूटर प्रणालियों भी allow ये परिचालन to be initiated by a तन्त्र कमांड without cycling power, in what is known as a soft reboot, though some of the initial operations might be skipped on a soft reboot.
A boot loader is a computer program that loads the main operating system or runtime environment लिये the कंप्यूटर बाद पूर्णता of the self-tests.
The computer term boot is short for bootstrap or बूटस्ट्रैप लोड और गर्भाशयी इससे the phrase to pull oneself up by one 's bootstraps.
The usage calls attention to the requirement that, if most software is loaded onto a computer by अन्य तन्त्र already कार्यशील on the कंप्यूटर, कुछ यांत्रिकी जरूर मौजूद to load initial software onto the computer.
Early computers used a किस्में of ad-hoc विधि to मिलेंगी a छोटी program into memory to solve this problem.
The आविष्कार of एकीकृत सर्किट read-only मेमोरी ( rom ) of विभिन्न प्रकार हल इस विरोधाभास by allowing कंप्यूटर to be shipped with a start up program that could not be erased.
Growth in the capacity of ROM has allowed ever more विस्तृत प्रारंभ up प्रक्रियाओं to be implemented.
On general purpose computers, the boot process begins साथ the निष्पादन of an आरंभिक कार्यक्रम भंडारित in बूट roms or read in another fashion.
In some older computers, the initial कार्यक्रम might have महरूम the अनुप्रयोग to चलाएं, if no ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली was used, or the operating system.
In other computers, the initial program is a boot loader that may then load into random-access memory ( RAM ), from nonvolatile secondary storage ( such as a hard disk drive ) or, in some older computers, from a medium such as punched cards, punched tape, or चुम्बकीय टेप in पुरानी कंप्यूटर, the शब्दकोष कोड of an ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली or runtime पर्यावरण और तब चलाएँ it.
If the boot loader is limited in its size and capabilities, it may, बजाय, लोड a larger और अधिक सक्षम द्वितीयक बूट लोडर, जिससे होता तब लोड the ऑपरेटिंग system or runtime environment.
Some embedded systems do not require a noticeable boot sequence to शुरू कामकाज और जब turned on may बस चलाएं operational programs that are stored in ROM.
Firebird is an open source SQL रिलेशनल डेटाबेस प्रबन्धन प्रणाली कि रनों on लिनक्स, Windows, and a variety of Unix.
The database forked इससे borland 's खोलें सोर्स संस्करण of interbase in 2000, but since Firebird 1.5 the code has been largely rewritten.
Outsourcing is the contracting out of an internal कारोबार प्रक्रम to a third-party संगठन.
The practice of contracting a business process आउट to a तीसरा पार्टी बल्कि than स्टॉफ it internally is आम in the modern economy.
The term `` outsourcing '' became popular in the संयुक्त राज्य निकट the फेरे of the 21st सदी.
Outsourcing sometimes involves transferring कर्मचारी और एसेट इससे एक firm to another, but not always.
The definition of outsourcing includes both foreign and domestic contracting, and sometimes includes offshoring, जिससे अर्थात् relocating a कारोबार फलन to another country.
Financial savings from lower अंतरराष्ट्रीय मजदूर दरों is a big motivation for outsourcing/offshoring.
The विपरीत of आउटसोर्सिंग is पुकारा insourcing, जिससे entails bringing प्रक्रियाओं संभाला by third-party firms in-house, and is sometimes accomplished via vertical integration.
However, a business can provide a contract service to another कारोबार बगैर necessarily insourcing that business process.
Human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) is a lentivirus ( slowly replicating retrovirus ) that causes acquired immunodeficiency सिंड्रोम ( एड्स ), a कंडीशन in इंसानो in जिससे प्रगतिशील विफलता of the immune system allows life-threatening opportunistic infections and cancers to thrive.
संक्रमण साथ hiv occurs by the ट्रांसफ़र of रक्त, semen, vaginal fluid, pre-ejaculate, or breast milk.
भीतर ये bodily fluids, hiv is उपस्थित as दोनो फ़्री virus particles and virus within infected immune cells.
hiv infects vital कोशिकाएं in the इंसान प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली ऐसे as हेल्पर T cells ( specifically CD4 + T cells ), macrophages, and dendritic cells.
HIV infection leads to low levels of CD4+ T cells through a number of mechanisms including : apoptosis of uninfected bystander cells, direct वाइरल हत्या of संक्रमित कोशिकाएं, और हत्या of संक्रमित cd4+ t कोशिकाएं by cd8 cytotoxic lymphocytes that recognize infected cells.
When CD4+ T cell numbers decline below a नाजुक स्तर, cell-mediated प्रतिरक्षण is खोया, और the देह becomes progressively more susceptible to opportunistic infections.
The firepole in a आग station in Toronto
A fireman 's pole ( also called a स्लाइडिंग ध्रुव or firepole ) is a लकड़ी ध्रुव or a मेटल ट्यूब or पाइप संस्थापित between floors in आग स्टेशन, allowing firefighters responding to an alarm to quickly descend to the ground floor faster than by using a standard staircase.
The device was invented in the 1870s by दाउद kenyon, in शिकागो, इलिनोइस, हालांकि it is प्रायः incorrectly credited to the Boston Fire Department.
Mary Poppins is the title अक्षर of a series of children 's books written by P. L. Travers.
Throughout the Mary Poppins series, which lasted इससे 1934 to 1988, मरियम shepard थी the इलस्ट्रेटर और acted as a second author.
The books centre on a जादुई अंग्रेज़ी नैनी, Mary Poppins.
She is blown by the East wind to Number Seventeen Cherry Tree Lane, लंदन, और into the बैंको ' household to care for their children.
Encounters साथ चिमनी sweeps, दुकानदारों और विभिन्न adventures follow until Mary Poppins abruptly leaves, i.e., `` pops-out ''.
the adventures लो प्लेस over a total of eight books.
However, तभी the पहला तीन किताबे feature Mary Poppins arriving and leaving.
The later five books recount previously unrecorded adventures इससे उसके असली three visits.
As P. L. Travers explains in her introduction to Mary poppins in the पार्क, `` वो can नहीं forever arrive and depart. ''
The books were adapted in 1964 into a musical डिज़्नी फिल्मी अभिनीत जूली एंड्रयूज and Dick Van Dyke.
In 2004, डिज़्नी नाट्य उत्पादित a स्टेज musical adaptation in the West End theatre.
the स्टेज musical थी transferred to ब्रॉडवे in 2006 where it ran until its closing on March 3, 2013.
it रै महरूम अत्यधिक कामयाब, as was the 1964 film.
The Last Song is a 2010 American coming of आयु टीन रोमांटिक नाटक फिल्मी विकसित alongside Nicholas Sparks ' novel by the same name.
The film was directed by Julie Anne रॉबिन्सन in उसके विशेषता फिल्मी directorial डेब्यू और co-written by Sparks and Jeff Van Wie.
The Last Song stars Miley Cyrus, Liam Hemsworth, and Greg Kinnear and follows a troubled teenager as she reconnects साथ उसके estranged पिता और जलप्रपात in प्रेम दौरान a गर्मियाँ in a शांत दक्षिणी United States beach town.
The film is distributed by touchstone तस्वीरें.
स्पार्क्स थी approached to लिखें दोनो the फिल्मी 's screenplay and the novel.
Sparks completed the screenplay in January 2009, prior to the पूर्णता of the अनोखा, बनाना the पिछला सोंग उसके पहला स्क्रिप्ट to be optioned for film.
The setting, originally in North Carolina like the अनोखा, स्थानांतरित to जॉर्जिया बाद the राज्य था campaigned लिये महीने to मेजबान production.
Upon शुरूआत उत्पादन in tybee द्वीप, जॉर्जिया और आसपास Savannah, The Last Song became the first movie to be both shot and set in Tybee Island.
Filming lasted from June 15 to अगस्त 18, 2009 साथ much of it occurring on the island 's beach and pier.
The Last Song was originally scheduled for wide release on जनवरी 8, 2010, लकिन थी स्थगित to कूच 31, 2010.
लिखा simlish
simlish is a fictional भाषा प्रदर्शित in ea खेल ' Sim series of games.
It debuted in simcopter, और रै महरूम विशेषकर prominent in The Sims, The Sims 2 and The Sims 3.
The Sims development team निर्मित the अद्वितीय simlish भाषा by experimenting साथ fractured Ukrainian, French, Latin, Finnish, English, Fijian, Cebuano, and Tagalog.
Simlish can also be heard in SimCity 4, simcity समाजों और simcity 2013, लकिन far less frequently.
Civilized जीव in spore can भी be taught to speak Simlish.
It is also प्रदर्शित to an extent in firaxis खेल ' सिड Meier 's SimGolf.
Designer Will Wright was सचेत of the need लिये संवाद in the खेल, लकिन विचार कि using a रियल भाषा होता मेक it ध्वनि too दोहराए और होता also be too costly to hire translators for world languages.
Initially, inspired by the देशी अमरीकी कोड talkers of संसार युद्ध ii, सीम निर्माता होगा राइट और भाषा विशेषज्ञ मार्क gimbel suggested experimenting with the Navajo language to create Simlish.
However, they ultimately decided that Simlish worked best as a `` language '' made up of gibberish words that could n't be अनूदित, so कि इसके अर्थ होता be बाएँ खोलें to the कल्पना of the player.
Wright later commented that using `` nonsense भाषा '' turned आउट to be the सही विकास चुनाव, as लोगों यहूद सक्षम of imagining it अधिक realistically than a कंप्यूटर could simulate a real one.
The actual sound of Simlish was created improvisationally by आवाज़ अभिनेताओं स्टीफन kearin और gerri lawlor.
An example of Ultrasonic Testing ( UT ) on blade roots of a V2500 iae वायुयान इंजन.
Step 1 : The UT probe is लगाई on the रूट of the ब्लेड to be inspected साथ the सहायता of a special borescope tool ( video probe ).
कदम 2 : यंत्र settings are input.
Step 3 : The probe is scanned over the ब्लेड root.
In this case, an indication ( peak in the data ) through the रेड लकीर ( or फाटक ) indicates a शुभ ब्लेड ; an indication to the left of that range indicates a crack.
principle of ultrasonic testing.
बाएँ : a जांच भेजना a ध्वनि वेव into a test material.
There are two indications, one from the initial पल्स of the जांच, और the दूसरी due to the वापस वॉल echo.
सही : a defect creates a तीसरा indication और simultaneously reduces the amplitude of the back wall indication.
The depth of the defect is संकल्पित by the अनुपात D/E
In ultrasonic testing ( UT ), very short ultrasonic pulse-waves with center frequencies ranging from 0.1-15 MHz और occasionally up to 50 mhz हैं शुभारम्भ into सामग्री to detect आतंरिक खामियां or to characterize materials.
A common example is ultrasonic thickness measurement, which परीक्षण the मोटाई of the परीक्षण ऑब्जेक्ट, लिये उदाहरण, to मॉनिटर pipework corrosion.
Ultrasonic testing is often performed on steel and other metals and alloys, though it can भी be प्रयुक्त on कंक्रीट, लकडी और composites, albeit with less resolution.
It is a form of non-destructive testing used in अनेक उद्योग सहित aerospace, automotive and other transportation sectors.
The vas deferens ( plural : vasa deferentia ), also called ductus deferens ( Latin : `` carrying-away vessel '' ; plural : ductus deferentes ), is भाग of the पुरूष anatomy of अनेक vertebrates ; वे हस्तांतरण शुक्राणु इससे the epididymis in पुट of ejaculation.
Vascular ischemia of the toes साथ characteristic cyanosis.
In medicine, ischemia, also spelled as ischaemia or ischæmia, ( ; from Greek language ισχαιμία, ischaimía ; isch- root denoting a restriction or thinning or to make or grow thin/lean, haema रक्त ) is a प्रतिबंध in रक्त सप्लाई to ऊतकों, causing a shortage of ऑक्सीजन और ग्लूकोज needed लिये सेल्यूलर चयापचय ( to रखना ऊतक जिंदा ).
Ischemia is generally caused by problems साथ रक्त बरतन, साथ resultant damage to or dysfunction of tissue.
it भी अर्थात् लोकल रक्ताल्पता in a दिए भाग of a देह sometimes resulting from congestion ( such as vasoconstriction, thrombosis or embolism ).
bas सिंड्रोम ( ds ) or bas 's सिंड्रोम, भी ज्ञात as trisomy 21, is a जेनेटिक विकार caused by the presence of all or part of a third copy of chromosome 21.
Down syndrome is the सबसे आम chromosome तबदीली in humans.
It is typically संबद्ध साथ a विलंब in संज्ञानात्मक क्षमता ( दिमागी retardation, or MR ) and physical growth, and a particular set of facial characteristics.
The average IQ of young adults with Down syndrome is around 50, whereas यंग वयस्कों बगैर the कंडीशन typically have an IQ of 100.
( MR रै historically महरूम पारिभाषित as an IQ below 70. )
A large proportion of individuals साथ bas सिंड्रोम have a severe degree of intellectual disability.
Down syndrome is नामित बाद जॉन langdon bas, the अंग्रेजों चिकित्सक who described the syndrome in 1866.
The condition was clinically वर्णित पहले by जां etienne dominique Esquirol in 1838 and Edouard Seguin in 1844.
Down syndrome was पहचाना as a chromosome 21 trisomy by dr. Jérôme Lejeune in 1959.
Down syndrome can be पहचाना in a baby at जनम or पहले जनम by prenatal screening.
pregnancies साथ इस निदान are often terminated.
The सीडीसी estimates कि परिचय एक of प्रत्येक 691 शिशु born in the United States each year is born with Down syndrome.
Many children साथ bas सिंड्रोम हैं शिक्षित in नियमित स्कूल वर्ग जबकि अन्य require specialised educational facilities.
Some children ग्रैजुएट इससे ऊँची स्कूल, और, in the us, वहीँ हैं increasing opportunities for participating in post-secondary education.
शिक्षा और उचित परवाह रै been shown to improve quality of life significantly.
Many adults with Down Syndrome are able to work at paid employment in the community, while अन्य आवश्यकता a अधिक sheltered कार्य पर्यावरण.
Hot flashes ( also known as hot flushes, or night sweats if they happen at रात्रि ) हैं a लक्षण जिससे may have अनेक अन्य कल्याणकारी, लकिन जिससे is प्रायः caused by the बदलना हार्मोन स्तर कि are characteristic of menopause.
The servicemen 's readjustment अधिनियम of 1944 ( p.l. 78-346, 58 स्टेट. 284m ), ज्ञात informally as the g.i. विधेयक, थी a विधि कि provided a range of benefits for returning World War II veterans ( commonly referred to as G.I.s ).
Benefits included low-cost mortgages, low-interest loans to start a कारोबार or फार्म, नकदी भुगतान of ट्यूशन और जीना खर्च to attend कॉलेज, ऊँची स्कूल or vocational education, as well as one year of unemployment compensation.
It was available to every veteran जो था महरूम on क्रियाशील ड्यूटी दौरान the युद्ध सालो लिये at तनिक नब्बे दिनों and had not been dishonorably discharged ; combat was not required.
By the end of the program in 1956, roughly 2.2 लाख दिग्गजों था प्रयुक्त the g.i. विधेयक शिक्षा लाभ in अनुक्रम to attend कॉलेजों or विश्वविद्यालयों, और an additional 6.6 million used these benefits for some kind of training program.
Since the असली 1944 विधि, the पद रै आइये to शामिल अन्य दिग्गज benefit programs created to assist veterans of subsequent wars as well as peacetime service.
Historians and economists consider the G.I. Bill a major political success—especially in contrast to the treatments of World युद्ध i veterans—and a प्रमुख योगदान to अमेरिका 's भण्डार of इंसान पूंजी कि sped long-term आर्थिक growth.
the वाटरगेट कांड थी a राजनैतिक कांड कि occurred in the संयुक्त राज्य in the 1970s as a result of the June 17, 1972 break-in at the Democratic National Committee headquarters at the Watergate office complex in Washington, D.C., and the Nixon administration 's attempted cover-up of its involvement.
The scandal eventually led to the resignation of Richard Nixon, the President of the संयुक्त राज्य, on अगस्त 9, 1974 — the तभी इस्तीफा of a U.S. President.
The scandal also resulted in the indictment, trial, conviction, और incarceration of forty-three व्यक्तियों, दर्जनों of जिसको यहूद निक्सन 's top administration officials.
The affair began with the arrest of पाँच मेन लिये तोड़कर और प्रवेश into the लोकतांत्रिक नेशनल कमेटी ( dnc ) मुख्यालय at the Watergate complex on June 17, 1972.
The Federal ब्यूरो of छानबीन ( एफबीआई ) कनेक्ट नकदी मिला on the burglars to a slush निधि प्रयुक्त by the कमेटी लिये the re-election of the अध्यक्ष, the official organization of Nixon 's campaign.
In July 1973, as evidence mounted against the अध्यक्ष 's स्टाफ, सहित गवाही provided by पूर्व स्टाफ सदस्यों in an छानबीन conducted by the सीनेट वाटरगेट Committee, it was revealed that President Nixon had a tape-recording system in his offices and he had recorded many conversations.
Recordings from these tapes implicated the अध्यक्ष, revealing he था attempted to कवर up the questionable ( and illegal ) goings-on that had taken place during his administration, both before and after the break-in.
After a protracted series of bitter court battles, the U.S. Supreme Court unanimously ruled that the अध्यक्ष था to हाथ over the टेपों to सरकारी जांचकर्ताओं ; he ultimately complied.
Facing near-certain महाभियोग in the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि और a strong possibility of a conviction in the Senate, Nixon resigned the presidency on August 9, 1974.
His successor, Gerald घाट, तब जारी a pardon to him.
Elizabeth Imogene Webber ( formerly lansing और स्पेंसर ) is a fictional अक्षर on the ABC Daytime soap opera General Hospital.
एलिज़ाबेथ is the पोती of dr. स्टीव हार्डी ( जॉन beradino ), one of the originating core characters of the series.
Rebecca Herbst originated the character on August 1, 1997 और रै महरूम the तभी अनुबंध अभिनेत्री to play the role.
Elizabeth is part of two supercouple pairings, Lucky स्पेंसर और एलिज़ाबेथ webber और जेसन मॉर्गन और Elizabeth Webber.
The United States presidency of रोनाल्ड reagan, भी ज्ञात as the reagan प्रशासन, थी a रिपब्लिकन प्रशासन headed by Ronald Reagan from January 20, 1981, to January 20, 1989.
Domestically, the administration favored reducing government कार्यक्रम और introduced the largest across-the-board tax cuts in American history.
The economic policies enacted in 1981, known as `` Reaganomics ``, were an उदाहरण of supply-side अर्थशास्त्र.
Reagan aimed to प्रोत्साहित उद्यमिता और सीमा the विकास of सोशल बिता, as खूब as the reduction of regulation and inflation.
Economic growth saw a दमदार रिकवरी in the 1980s, helping reagan to win a landslide re-election.
The national debt increased significantly, however.
Regarding foreign नीति, the प्रशासन थी steadfastly anti-communist, कॉलिंग the Soviet Union an `` evil empire `` and ending 1970s détente.
Reagan accelerated the massive buildup of the military started by his predecessor, including an आक्रमण of हरा, the पहला प्रमुख विदेशी कार्रवाई by u.S. सैनिकों चूंकि the समाप्त of the Vietnam War.
The `` Reagan Doctrine `` controversially granted aid to paramilitary forces seeking to फेकने कम्युनिस्ट सरकारें, विशेषकर in war-torn सेंट्रल अमेरिका और Afghanistan.
Reagan also promoted new technologies ऐसे as मिसाइल रक्षा प्रणालियों in अनुक्रम to confront the Soviets and their allies.
in कूटनीति, reagan forged a दमदार गठबंधन साथ uk प्रधान मंत्री मार्गरेट थैचर, और he मिले साथ सोवियत General Secretary Mikhail Gorbachev four times, aiming to shrink the superpowers ' nuclear arsenals.
Reagan 's presidency has महरूम termed the `` reagan क्रान्ति '', or the आयु of reagan in मान्यता of the राजनैतिक realignment both within and beyond the U.S. in favor of his brand of conservatism and his faith in free markets.
The Reagan administration worked toward the पतन of सोवियत साम्यवादी, और it किया पतन बस as he left office.
Victory in the Cold War led to a unipolar संसार साथ the u.S. as the संसार 's sole superpower.
While the damaging Iran-Contra affair engulfed several Reagan aides during his second term, Reagan himself left office with a 63 प्रतिशत स्वीकृति दरजा, एक of the उच्चतर स्वीकृति दरजा of departing presidents.
After years of unstinting praise from the right, and unrelenting criticism from the left, historian David Henry finds that by 2009 a सर्वसम्मति था उभरा among विद्वानों कि reagan revived कोसा और turned the स्वदेश to the सही by demonstrating a `` pragmatic कोसा '' कि प्रचारित ideology within the constraints imposed by the divided political system.
Furthermore, says Henry, the consensus viewpoint agrees कि he revived आस्था in the प्रेसिडेंसी और अमरीकी self-confidence, and contributed critically to ending the Cold War.

Mortality rate is a measure of the number of deaths ( in सामान्य, or due to a विशिष्ट कारण ) in a population.
Scaled to the आकार of कि जनसांख्यिकी, प्रति unit of time.
Mortality rate is typically expressed in इकाई of मौतों प्रति 1000 individuals प्रति साल ; यूँ, a मृत्यु रेट of 9.5 ( आउट of 1000 ) in a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,000 होता mean 9.5 deaths per year in that entire population, or 0.95 % out of the total.
It is distinct from morbidity rate, which refers to the क्रमांक of individuals in ग़रीब स्वास्थ्य दौरान a दिए समय काल ( the व्यापकता rate ) or the number of newly appearing cases of the disease per unit of time ( incidence rate ).
The term `` mortality `` is also sometimes inappropriately used to refer to the number of deaths among a नियत of diagnosed हॉस्पिटल मामले लिये a बीमारी or चोट, बल्कि than लिये the सामान्य जनसांख्यिकी of a country or ethnic group.
This disease mortality statistic is more precisely referred to as `` मामला fatality रेट `` ( cfr ).
एक distinguishes:
The crude death rate, the कुल क्रमांक of मौतों प्रति साल per 1000 people.
the crude death rate for the whole world is about 8.37 per 1000 per साल according to the वर्तमान सीआईए संसार factbook.
The perinatal mortality rate, the योग of neonatal मौतों और fetal मौतों ( stillbirths ) per 1000 births.
The maternal mortality ratio, the number of मातृ मौतों प्रति 100,000 live births in same time period.
The maternal mortality rate, the number of maternal deaths per 1,000 महिलाओं of reproductive आयु in the जनसांख्यिकी ( generally पारिभाषित as 15–44 years of age ).
The शिशु मृत्यु रेट, the क्रमांक of मौतों of children less than 1 year old per 1000 live births.
The child mortality rate, the number of मौतों of children कम than 5 सालो बूढ़ा प्रति 1000 सजीव births.
The standardised mortality ratio ( SMR ) - This represents a proportional तुलना to the संख्याएँ of मौतों कि होता have महरूम अपेक्षित if the जनसांख्यिकी had been of a standard composition in terms of age, gender, etc.
The age-specific mortality rate ( ASMR ) - This refers to the total क्रमांक of मौतों प्रति साल प्रति 1000 लोगों of a दिए आयु ( e.g. आयु 62 last birthday ).
In regard to the or failure of चिकित्सा उपचार or प्रक्रियाओं, one would also distinguish:
The early mortality rate, the कुल क्रमांक of मौतों in the जल्दी चरण of an जारी उपचार, or in the period immediately following an treatment.
The late mortality rate, the total number of deaths in the लेट चरण of an जारी उपचार, or a significant लंबाई of समय बाद an अधि treatment.
Note that the crude death rate as defined above and लागू to a पूरे जनसांख्यिकी can दे a भ्रामक छाप.
The crude मौत रेट depends on the आयु ( और लिंग ) specific mortality rates and the age ( and gender ) distribution of the population.
The number of deaths per 1000 people can be higher for विकसित राष्ट्र than in less-developed देशों, despite जीवन प्रत्याशा होने उच्चतर in विकसित countries due to standards of health being better.
This happens because developed countries typically have a completely different population age वितरण, साथ a much उच्चतर proportion of पुरानी लोगों, due to दोनो निम्नतर हाल जनम दरों और निम्नतर मृत्यु rates.
A more complete picture of mortality is given by a जीवन तालिका जिससे shows the मृत्यु रेट separately for each age.
A life table is necessary to दे a शुभ अनुमान of life expectancy.
An otoacoustic emission ( OAE ) is a sound which is उत्पन्न इससे भीतर the inner ear.
Having been predicted by थामस सुनहरा in 1948, इसके अस्तित्व थी पहला demonstrated experimentally by दाउद kemp in 1978 और otoacoustic emissions have since been shown to arise by a number of different cellular mechanisms within the inner ear.
Studies have shown that OAEs disappear after the inner ear has been क्षतिग्रस्त, so oaes हैं प्रायः प्रयुक्त in the प्रयोगशाला और the क्लिनिक as a measure of inner ear health.
broadly बोलना, वहीँ हैं दो प्रकार of otoacoustic emissions : spontaneous otoacoustic emissions ( soaes ), जिससे can occur बगैर external stimulation, and evoked otoacoustic emissions ( EOAEs ), which require an evoking stimulus.
Hurricane Tomas was the उन्नीसवीं नामित तूफ़ान और twelfth hurricane of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season.
Tomas developed from a tropical wave ईस्ट of the windward आइलैंड्स on अक्तूबर 29.
Quickly intensifying into a hurricane, it स्थानांतरित through the windward आइलैंड्स and passed very near Saint Lucia.
After reaching Category 2 status on the Saffir-Simpson scale, Tomas जल्दी weakened to a तीव्र तूफ़ान in the सेंट्रल caribbean समुद्र, due to strong wind shear and dry air.
Tomas later regained hurricane औकात as it reorganized निकट the windward ड्योढ़ी.
Throughout the hurricane 's पाथ, 71 लोगों हैं ज्ञात to have महरूम killed, 14 of whom were in Saint Lucia.
Monetary नुकसान throughout the windward आइलैंड्स यहूद अनुमानित at US $ 588 million, mainly in Saint Lucia.
In the wake of the storm in Haiti, बाढ़ intensified an जारी हैजा outbreak indirectly causing more fatalities.
According to a report released in December 2010, 55 people यहूद मारे in क्यूबा और hispanola, हालांकि the वितरण of ये fatalities are unknown.
Overall damage इससे the तूफ़ान थी at तनिक $ 741 million.
Victoria Jackson ( born August 2, 1959 ) is an American comedian, actress, satirist, singer and internet ब्लॉगर बेहतरीन ज्ञात as a डाल सदस्य of the एनबीसी टेलीविज़न स्केच कॉमेडी श्रेणी शनिवार रात्रि सजीव ( एसएनएल ) इससे 1986 to 1992.
She has received attention as a vocal आलोचक of अध्यक्ष बराक ओबामा, और is an क्रियाशील भागीदार in the Tea Party movement.
Postmodern literature is साहित्य characterized by भारी रिलायंस on तकनीकों जैसे fragmentation, विरोधाभास, और questionable narrators, और is प्रायः ( हालांकि नहीं exclusively ) defined as a style or trend which emerged in the post–World War II era.
Postmodern works are seen as a reaction against आत्मज्ञान सोच और modernist approaches to साहित्य.
Postmodern literature, जैसे postmodernism as a पूरे, tends to resist परिभाषा or classification as a `` movement ''.
Indeed, the convergence of postmodern literature with various modes of critical theory, particularly reader-response and deconstructionist approaches, and the subversions of the अव्यक्त अनुबंध between लेखक, टेक्स्ट और रीडर by जिससे इसके works हैं प्रायः characterised, have led to pre-modern fictions ऐसे as cervantes ' डॉन quixote ( 1605,1615 ) और laurence sterne 's eighteenth-century satire Tristram Shandy being retrospectively inducted into the fold.
While there is little consensus on the precise characteristics, scope, and महत्व of postmodern साहित्य, as is प्रायः the मामला साथ कलाकारी आंदोलनों, postmodern साहित्य is commonly पारिभाषित in relation to a precursor.
लिये उदाहरण, a postmodern साहित्यिक कार्य tends नहीं to conclude साथ the neatly tied-up ending as is often found in modernist literature, but often parodies it.
Postmodern authors tend to celebrate मौका over शिल्प, और further employ metafiction to undermine the writer 's authority.
Another characteristic of postmodern literature is the questioning of distinctions between ऊँची और कम संस्कृति through the उपयोग of pastiche, the संयोजन of विषय और जाति नहीं previously deemed fit for literature.
Enigma is an electronic musical project founded in जर्मनी by माइकल cretu, दाउद fairstein और फ़्रैंक पीटरसन in 1990.
The romanian-born cretu conceived the पहेली प्रोजेक्ट जबकि working in जर्मनी, लकिन आधारित उसके रिकॉर्डिंग स्टुडियो a.r.t. studios in ibiza, स्पेन, from the early 1990s until May 2009, where he has recorded all of Enigma 's studio releases to date.
Cretu is both the composer और the निर्माता of the project.
His former wife, pop singer Sandra, often provided vocals on पहेली tracks.
Jens Gad co-arranged and निभाई गिटार on तीन of the पहेली albums.
Peter कॉर्नेलियस भी contributed to Enigma during the 1990s.
Seven studio albums have been produced अंतर्गत the नाम of the project.
Scooby-Doo is an American animated cartoon franchise, comprising अनेक एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न श्रेणी उत्पादित इससे 1969 to the उपस्थित day.
The असली श्रेणी, scooby-doo, जहाँ हैं You !
, थी निर्मित लिये hanna-barbera प्रोडक्शन्स by writers Joe Ruby and Ken Spears in 1969.
This Saturday morning cartoon series featured four teenagers— Fred Jones, daphne ब्लेक, velma dinkley, और norville `` shaggy '' रोजर्स — और उनके talking भूरा ग्रेट डेन श्वान नामित scooby-doo, जो solve रहस्यों involving माना अलौकिक जीव through a series of antics and missteps.
Following the कामयाबी of the असली श्रेणी, hanna-barbera और इसके successor warner ब्रदर्स. एनिमेशन have उत्पादित numerous follow-up और spin-off एनिमेटेड श्रेणी और अनेक सम्बन्धित works, सहित टेलीविज़न specials and telefilms, a line of direct-to-video films, and two Warner Bros. –produced theatrical feature films.
Some versions of Scooby-Doo feature different variations on the दिखाएँ 's अलौकिक थीम, और शामिल वर्ण ऐसे as स्कूबी 's cousin Scooby-Dum and nephew Scrappy-Doo in addition to or instead of some of the original characters.
Scooby-Doo was originally ब्रॉडकास्ट on सीबीएस इससे 1969 to 1976, जब it moved to ABC.
एबीसी aired the दिखाएँ जबतक canceling it in 1986, और प्रस्तुत a spin-off featuring the characters as children, A Pup Named Scooby-Doo, from 1988 until 1991.
Two new scooby-doo श्रेणी, कया 's नई, Scooby-Doo ?
