Mystery Incorporated, aired on कार्टून संजाल इससे 2010 to 2013.
Repeats of the various Scooby-Doo series are broadcast अक्सर on कार्टून संजाल और boomerang in the संयुक्त राज्य and other countries.
Call of Duty is a first-person and third-person शूटर computer/ वीडियो खेल मताधिकार.
The series began on the PC, and later विस्तारित to consoles और handhelds.
Several spin-off खेल have भी महरूम released.
The earlier games in the series हैं नियत primarily in संसार युद्ध ii, इस शामिल : कॉल of ड्यूटी, Call of Duty 2, and Call of Duty 3.
Beginning with Modern Warfare, which is set in modern times, the श्रेणी रै shifted फ़ोकस दूर इससे संसार युद्ध II.
Call of ड्यूटी 4 : आधुनिक warfare ( released नवम्बर 2007 ) was followed by Call of Duty : World at War and Call of Duty : Modern Warfare 2.
Black Ops ( released November 2010 ) takes place in the ठंडा युद्ध, जबकि आधुनिक warfare 3 ( released नवम्बर 2011 ) takes place in the near-future setting.
Black Ops 2 ( released नवम्बर 13, 2012 ) takes place in the year 2025.
The Call of Duty games are published and owned by एक्टिविजन साथ aspyr मीडिया प्रकाशन it लिये ठहराना os x.
While the studio Infinity Ward primarily स्टिल develops उन्हें, treyarch रै भी विकसित अनेक of the शीर्षक साथ the release of the studios ' games interlaced with each other.
Some games have been developed by Gray Matter Interactive, Spark Unlimited, Amaze entertainment, n-space, विद्रोह developments, ideaworks खेल स्टुडियो, sledgehammer Games and nStigate Games.
The games use a variety of engines, including the id तकनीक 3, the treyarch ngl, और the iw 5.0.
Other products in the franchise include a line of action figures designed by Plan-B Toys, a कार्ड खेल निर्मित by अपर डेक, और a कॉमिक किताब mini-series प्रकाशित by WildStorm.
As of नवम्बर 11, 2011, the कॉल of ड्यूटी श्रेणी have बेची over 100 million copies.
As of March 31, 2012 there are 40 million monthly active खिलाड़ी आरपार सब of the कॉल of ड्यूटी शीर्षक, साथ 10 लाख कॉल of Duty : Elite users and 2 million paying annual members.
over 1.6 अरब घंटों of ऑनलाइन gameplay have महरूम logged Modern Warfare 3 since its 2011 release.
The estate tax in the United States is a tax imposed on the transfer of the `` taxable estate `` of a deceased person, whether such प्रॉपर्टी is transferred via a होगा, according to the राज्य कानून of intestacy or वरना बना as an घटना of the death of the owner, such as a transfer of property from an intestate estate or trust, or the payment of certain life insurance benefits or financial account sums to beneficiaries.
The estate tax is one part of the Unified Gift and एस्टेट कर प्रणाली in the संयुक्त राज्य.
The other part of the system, the gift कर, imposes a कर on हस्तांतरण of प्रॉपर्टी दौरान a व्यक्ति 's जीवन ; the तोहफा कर रोकता avoidance of the estate tax should a person want to give away his/her estate.
In addition to the federal government, many states also impose an एस्टेट कर, साथ the राज्य संस्करण पुकारा either an एस्टेट tax or an inheritance tax.
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों of the एस्टेट tax call it the `` death tax ''.
If an asset is left to a जीवनसाथी or a federally पहचाना दान, the कर usually does not apply.
In addition, up to $ 5,250,000 can be given by an individual, पहले and/or upon उनके मौत, बगैर रूष्ट संघीय तोहफा or एस्टेट कर.
Gavin McGregor Rossdale ( born 30 October 1967 ) is an अंग्रेज़ी कर्ता और संगीतकार, ज्ञात as the सीसे सिंगर and rhythm guitarist of the rock band Bush.
Following Bush 's separation in 2002, जिससे lasted लिये आठ सालो, he थी the सीसे सिंगर और guitarist लिये संस्थान, and later began a solo career.
When performing सोलो, गेविन plays गीतों इससे his extensive musical libraries.
rossdale रै महरूम क्रमित in the शीर्ष 100 भारी Metal Vocalists by Hit Parader ( # 75 ).
raffaello sanzio da urbino ( अप्रैल 6 or कूच 28, 1483 – April 6, 1520 ), better known simply as Raphael, was an Italian painter and architect of the High Renaissance.
His work is admired for its clarity of form and ease of composition and लिये इसके विज़ुअल उपलब्धि of the neoplatonic आदर्श of इंसान grandeur.
Together with Michelangelo and Leonardo da Vinci, he forms the परंपरागत ट्रिनिटी of ग्रेट मास्टर्स of कि काल.
Raphael was enormously productive, running an unusually large कार्यशाला, और despite उसके मौत at 37, a विशाल देह of उसके कार्य remains.
Many of उसके works हैं मिला in the वेटिकन राजमहल, जहाँ the frescoed Raphael Rooms were the central, and the largest, work of his career.
The बेहतरीन ज्ञात कार्य is the स्कूल of Athens in the Vatican Stanza della Segnatura.
After his early years in रोम much of उसके कार्य थी self-designed, लकिन लिये the सबसे भाग चलाया by the कार्यशाला from his drawings, with considerable loss of quality.
He was extremely influential in his lifetime, though outside Rome his work was ज़्यादातर ज्ञात इससे उसके collaborative printmaking.
After his death, the influence of उसके ग्रेट प्रतिद्वंद्वी michelangelo थी अधिक फैली जबतक the 18th और 19th centuries, when Raphael 's more serene and harmonious qualities were again regarded as the highest models.
His career falls naturally into three phases and three styles, first described by Giorgio Vasari : his early years in Umbria, then a period of about four years ( from 1504–1508 ) absorbing the artistic परंपराओं of फ्लोरेंस, followed by उसके पिछला hectic और triumphant बारह सालो in रोम, working लिये दो popes और उनके close associates.
Julia Fiona रॉबर्ट्स ( born अक्तूबर 28, 1967 ) is an American actress.
She became a Hollywood star after headlining the romantic comedy pretty स्त्री ( 1990 ), जिससे grossed $ 464 लाख worldwide.
After receiving Golden Globe Awards and Academy Award nominations for Steel Magnolias ( 1989 ) और pretty स्त्री, वो जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री लिये उसके प्रदर्शन in Erin Brockovich ( 2000 ).
Her films The Pelican Brief ( 1993 ), My Best Friend 's Wedding ( 1997 ), Mystic Pizza ( 1988 ), Notting Hill ( 1999 ), Runaway Bride ( 1999 ), Ocean 's Eleven ( 2001 ), Ocean 's Twelve ( 2004 ), Charlie Wilson 's War ( 2007 ), Valentine 's दिन ( 2010 ), खा दुवा प्रेम ( 2010 ), और दर्पण दर्पण ( 2012 ) have collectively brought बक्सा दफ्तर रसीदें of over $ 2.6 अरब, बनाना उसके एक of the सबसे कामयाब अभिनेत्रियों in terms of box office receipts.
Roberts had become one of the highest-paid actresses in the संसार, टॉपिंग the हॉलीवुड पत्रकारों annual `` power list '' of top-earning female stars from 2005 to 2006.
Her fee for 1990 's pretty स्त्री थी $ 300,000 ; in 2003, वो was paid an unprecedented $ 25 million for her role in Mona Lisa Smile ( 2003 ).
As of 2010, Roberts 's जाल लायक थी अनुमानित to be $ 140 million.
Roberts has been named एक of लोगों पत्रिका 's `` 50 सबसे खूबसूरत लोगों in the World '' eleven times, tied with Halle Berry.
In 2011, वो थी नामित एक of the `` 100 hottest Women of All-Time '' by Men 's Health.
In 2001, Ladies Home Journal ranked her as the 11th सबसे शक्तिशाली स्त्री in the United States.
Mark Elliot Zuckerberg ( born May 14, 1984 ) is an अमरीकी कंप्यूटर प्रोग्रामर और Internet entrepreneur.
He is best ज्ञात as एक of पाँच co-founders of the social networking website Facebook.
As of April 2013, zuckerberg is the अध्यक्ष और मुख्य कार्यपालिका of फेसबुक, inc. और in 2013 उसके निजी माल थी estimated to be US $ 13.3 billion.
Together with his college roommates and fellow हार्वर्ड विश्वविद्यालयों विद्यार्थी एडुआर्डो saverin, एंड्रयू mccollum, डस्टिन moskovitz और Chris Hughes, Zuckerberg launched Facebook from Harvard 's dormitory rooms.
The group then introduced Facebook onto other campuses देशभर और स्थानांतरित to पालो आल्टो, California, United States ( U.S. ) shortly afterwards.
In 2007, at the age of twenty-three years, zuckerberg became a अरबपति as a परिणाम of फेसबुक और the क्रमांक of फेसबुक users worldwide reached a total of one billion in 2012.
Zuckerberg was involved in various legal disputes that यहूद initiated by अन्य in the समूह, जो claimed a share of the कम्पनी आधारित upon their involvement during the development phase of Facebook.
Since 2010, Zuckerberg has been named among the 100 wealthiest और सबसे influential लोगों in the संसार by समय पत्रिका as a भाग of its Person of the Year accolade.
Zuckerberg was played by कर्ता जेसी eisenberg in the 2010 हॉलीवुड film The Social Network in which the rise of Facebook is portrayed.
The mayflower थी the जलयान कि in 1620 transported 102 अंग्रेज़ी Pilgrims, including a core group of Separatists, to New England.
Their story is one of travail और अस्तित्व in a हर्ष नई संसार environment.

Committee of Ways and Means is the chief tax -writing कमेटी of the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of Representatives.
Members of the Ways and अर्थात् कमेटी हैं नहीं अनुमत to serve on कोई अन्य हाउस समितियों जबतक वे लागू for a waiver from their party 's congressional leadership.
The Committee has jurisdiction over all कराधान, tariffs और अन्य revenue-raising उपायों, as खूब as a क्रमांक of other programs including:
सोशल सुरक्षा
बेरोजगारी लाभ
medicare
प्रवर्तन of चाइल्ड support laws
Temporary Assistance for Needy Families, a संघीय welfare program
Foster परवाह और अपनाना programs
The U.S. Constitution requires that all bills regarding कराधान जरूर originate in the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि.
चूंकि हाउस कार्यविधि is कि सब बिल्स regarding कराधान जरूर go through this committee, the committee is very influential, as is its Senate counterpart, the U.S. Senate Committee on Finance.
The तरीके और अर्थात् कमेटी in the 111th कॉंग्रेस थी chaired by चार्ली Rangel, who had taken a leave of absence as chairman until House ethics violations were resolved.
however, उसके छोड़ of अनुपस्थिति as अध्यक्ष was ruled to be a resignation.
Pete Stark resigned as acting chairman, so Sander Levin आयोजित कि स्थिति जबतक the प्रारंभ of the 112th Congress.
Dave Camp became the committee कुर्सी लिये the 112th कॉंग्रेस, बाद the republicans जीती कंट्रोल of the House in the 2010 election.
The blue whale ( Balaenoptera musculus ) is a marine mammal belonging to the suborder of baleen whales ( पुकारा mysticeti ).
At in length and or more in वज़न, it is the largest ज्ञात एनिमल to have ever existed.
Long and slender, the ब्लू व्हेल 's देह can be विभिन्न shades of bluish-grey dorsally and somewhat lighter underneath.
There are at least three distinct subspecies : B. m. musculus of the North Atlantic and North Pacific, B. m. intermedia of the दक्षिणी समंदर और B. m. brevicauda ( भी ज्ञात as the सानो ब्लू व्हेल ) found in the Indian Ocean and South Pacific Ocean.
B. m. इंडिका, मिला in the भारतीय समंदर, may be another subspecies.
As साथ अन्य baleen whales, इसके आहार consists लगभग exclusively of small crustaceans known as krill.
Blue whales were abundant in nearly all the oceans on धरती जबतक the शुरूआत of the बीसवीं century.
For over a सदी, वे यहूद hunted लगभग to extinction by whalers until protected by the international community in 1966.
A 2002 रपट अनुमानित वहीँ यहूद 5,000 to 12,000 blue whales worldwide, located in at least five groups.
More recent research into the सानो subspecies suggests इस may be an underestimate.
Before whaling, the largest population was in the Antarctic, क्रमांकन लगभग 239,000 ( दायरा 202,000 to 311,000 ).
There remain only much smaller ( around 2,000 ) concentrations in प्रत्येक of the पूर्वी उत्तर प्रशांत, अंटार्कटिक, and Indian Ocean groups.
वहीँ हैं दो अधिक समूह in the उत्तर अटलांटिक, और at least two in the Southern Hemisphere.
The globe artichoke ( Cynara cardunculus var. scolymus ) is a किस्में of a प्रजाति of thistle cultivated as a food.
The edible matter is buds कि रूप भीतर the पुष्प heads पहले the पुष्प come into bloom.
The buds go away or change to a coarse, मुश्किल खाद्य रूप जब the पुष्प blooms.
The uncultivated or wild किस्में of the प्रजाति is पुकारा a cardoon.
It is a perennial संयंत्र देशी to the भूमध्यसागरीय region.
The United States one hundred-dollar विधेयक ( $ 100 ) is a denomination of United States currency.
u.S. statesman, आविष्कारक, और राजनयिक Benjamin Franklin is currently featured on the obverse of the bill.
On the रिवर्स of the banknote is an image of Independence Hall.
The $ 100 bill is the largest denomination कि रै महरूम मुद्रित चूंकि जुलाई 13, 1969, जब the denominations of $ 500, $ 1,000, $ 5,000, and $ 10,000 were retired.
The Bureau of Engraving and मुद्रण says the औसत जीवन of a $ 100 विधेयक in परिसंचरण is 90 महीने ( 7.5 years ) before it is replaced due to wear and tear.
The bills are also commonly referred to as `` Benjamins '', in सन्दर्भ to the उपयोग of बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन 's पोर्ट्रेट on the denomination, or `` c-notes '', based on the Roman numeral for 100.
The bill is one of दो denominations मुद्रित आज कि करता नहीं विशेषता a अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ; the other is the $ 10 bill, featuring Alexander Hamilton.
The time on the clock of Independence Hall on the reverse, according to the U.S. Bureau of नक्काशी और मुद्रण, shows लगभग 4:10.
One hundred hundred-dollar बिल्स हैं वितरित by संघीय आरक्षित Banks in mustard-colored straps ( $ 10,000 ).
The Series 2009 $ 100 bill redesign was unveiled on April 21, 2010, and was to be जारी to the पब्लिक on फ़रवरी 11, 2011, लकिन उत्पादन थी shut bas in दिसम्बर 2010 क्युकी as अनेक as 30 % यहूद अनुपयोगी due to a manufacturing flaw.
A vertical क्रीज in the पेपर reveals a रिक्त स्पेस on the विधेयक when pulled out.
In their बदलना, और continuing the ऊँची माँग of इस denomination, the श्रेणी 2006a थी शुभारम्भ retaining the previous design ( 1996-generation ).
on अप्रैल 24, 2013, the संघीय Reserve announced the new $ 100 bill would enter circulation on October 8, 2013.

miniature इससे the Paris Psalter.
David ( ; आईएसओ 259-3 dawid ; ' ; दमदार 's : daveed ) according to the यहूदी बाइबल, थी the second king of the United Kingdom of Israel, and according to the New Testament Gospels of Matthew and Luke, an ancestor of Jesus.
उसके जीवन is conventionally दिनाँक to c. 1040–970 bce, उसके शासनकाल over Judah c. 1010–1002 BCE, and his reign over the United Kingdom of Israel c. 1002–970 BCE.
The Books of Samuel, 1 Kings, और 1 क्रॉनिकल्स हैं the तभी स्त्रोत of सूचना on दाउद, हालांकि the tel डान stele ( दिनाँक c. 850–835 bce ) contains the phrase ( bytdwd ), read as `` House of David '', which most scholars take as confirmation of the existence in the mid-9th century BCE of a Judean royal dynasty called the House of David.
He is depicted as a righteous king, although not without faults, as well as an acclaimed योद्धा, संगीतकार, और कवि, traditionally credited लिये composing many of the psalms contained in the Book of Psalms.
David is सेंट्रल to यहूदी, ईसाई, और Islamic doctrine and culture.
Biblical tradition maintains कि a सीधा वंशज of David will be the Messiah.
In Islam he is considered to be a नबी और the किंग of a nation.
Kathmandu ( ; ) is the capital और largest शहरी agglomerate of Nepal.
The agglomerate consists of Kathmandu Metropolitan City at its कोर, और इसके सिस्टर cities Patan, Kirtipur, Thimi, and Bhaktapur.
It भी शामिल the recently पहचाना शहरी क्षेत्रों of Shankhapur, Karyabinayak, and Champapur.
Banepa, Dhulikhel, और panauti हैं उपग्रह शहरी क्षेत्रों of काठमांडू located just outside the Kathmandu valley.
Kathmandu is also known informally as `` ktm '' or the `` tri-city ''.
According to a census conducted in 2011, काठमांडू metropolis अलोन रै 975,453 निवासियों ; और the agglomerate has a population of more than 2.5 million inhabitants.
The metropolitan city area is and has a population घनत्व of 19,250 प्रति km2.
The city stands at an elevation of लगभग in the bowl-shaped Kathmandu Valley of central Nepal.
It is surrounded by four प्रमुख kyu : shivapuri, Phulchoki, Nagarjun, and Chandragiri.
Kathmandu Valley is part of three districts ( Kathmandu, Lalitpur, and Bhaktapur ), has the highest population density in the country, और is घर to परिचय a बारहवीं of नेपाल 's population.
During rana और शाह eras, the नाम `` नेपाल '' referred तभी to the काठमांडू Valley ; it was what people who lived outside the valley called it.
During this period, British इतिहासकारों पुकारा the valley itself `` Nepal Proper ''.
Today, Kathmandu is not only the capital of the Federal लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र of नेपाल, लकिन भी the मुख्यालय of the Central Development Region of Nepal.
The Central Region comprises तीन zones : bagmati, narayani, and Janakpur.
Kathmandu is स्तिथ in the Bagmati Zone.
काठमांडू is the गेटवे to tourism in Nepal.
It is भी the तंत्रिका बीच of the country 's economy.
It has the most advanced infrastructure of कोई शहरी क्षेत्रफल in नेपाल, और इसके अर्थव्यवस्था is केन्द्रित on पर्यटन, which accounted for 3.8 % of Nepal 's GDP in 1995–96.
( Tourism in Kathmandu declined thereafter during a काल of राजनैतिक अशांति, लकिन चूंकि तब has improved. )
The city has a rich history, spanning nearly 2000 सालो, as inferred इससे inscriptions found in the valley.
Religious and cultural festivities form a प्रमुख भाग of the जीवनदान of लोगों residing in Kathmandu.
Most of Kathmandu 's लोगों follow हिंदुत्व और अनेक others follow Buddhism.
वहीँ हैं लोगों of अन्य धार्मिक मान्यताओं as well, giving Kathmandu a cosmopolitan culture.
नेपाली is the सबसे commonly बोला language in the city.
Nepal Bhasa is the स्वदेशी भाषा बोला by the Newar people.
हिंदी is widely समझा और अंग्रेज़ी is समझा by Kathmandu 's educated residents.
The city 's साक्षरता रेट is 98 %.
काठमांडू 's सिस्टर शहरों ( ललितपुर patan ) और भक्तपुर हैं अभिन्न to काठमांडू 's सांस्कृतिक विरासत, पर्यटन industry, and economy ; therefore UNESCO 's World Heritage Site lists all three cities ' monuments and attractions together under one heading, `` Kathmandu Valley- UNESCO World Heritage Site ``.
Field हॉकी, प्रायः referred to बस as हॉकी, is a टोली खेल of the हॉकी परिवार जिससे is निभाई between two teams of eleven players with hockey sticks and a hard, solid plastic ball.
At the turn of the 21st century, the game is played globally, with particular लोकप्रियता throughout यूरोपीय, एशिया, महासागरीय, और दक्षिण अमेरिका – in जोड to being the national sport of Pakistan and India.
The term `` field hockey '' is used primarily in Canada, the संयुक्त राज्य, और अन्य regions of the संसार जहाँ the खेल of ice hockey is more popular.
दौरान खेल, लक्ष्य keepers हैं the तभी खिलाड़ी जो हैं अनुमत to टच the बॉल साथ कोई भाग of उनके देह ( साथ the एक्सेप्शन of a खिलाड़ी 's hand considered 'part of the stick ' ), with this only applying within the shooting circle ( also known as the D, or shooting arc, or just the circle ), while field players play the ball with the flat side of their stick.
The team that scores the most goals by the समाप्त of the मैच विन्स.
If the score is tied at the end of the game, either a चित्रण is घोषित or the खेल goes into अतिरिक्त समय and/or a दंड गोलीबारी, depending on the competition 's format.
The governing body of hockey is the अंतरराष्ट्रीय हॉकी संघ ( fih ), साथ मेन और महिलाओं होने represented internationally in competitions including the Olympic games, Commonwealth games, Hockey World Cup, Champions Trophy and Junior Hockey World Cup, with many countries running extensive junior, senior, and masters ' club competitions.
the fih is भी जिम्मेदार लिये organising the हॉकी Rules Board and developing the rules for the sport.
A popular variant of field hockey is indoor हॉकी, जिससे differs in a क्रमांक of respects जबकि embodying the primary principles of hockey.
Indoor hockey is a 6-a-side रूपांतर, साथ a फ़ील्ड जिससे is घटाया to लगभग 40m × 20m.
With many of the rules remaining the same, including रुकावट और फीट, वहीँ हैं अनेक कुंजी विसंगतियाँ - खिलाड़ी may नहीं उठाएँ the बॉल जबतक शूटिंग on लक्ष्य, खिलाड़ी may नहीं hit the बॉल ( बजाय utilising pushes to transfer the ball ), and the sidelines are replaced with solid barriers which the ball will rebound off.
Ethan `` Cane '' Ashby ( né एटकिन्सन ) is a fictional अक्षर इससे the अमरीकी CBS soap opera The Young and the Restless.
He is portrayed by Australian actor Daniel Goddard, who originally auditioned for Brad Snyder on As the World Turns but थी अनुशंसित लिये a भूमिका on the यंग और the बेचैन instead.
The role was to be portrayed as an American, but Goddard 's ऑस्ट्रेलियाई descent बहकावे the अक्षर 's पृष्ठभूमि.
Former head writer Lynn Marie Latham introduced him during the episode airing on January 12, 2007 as an ऑस्ट्रेलियाई बारटेंडर in ढूंढें of उसके परिवार, a डेब्यू that received a mixed response.
Latham created Cane as the son of Phillip Chancellor II ( Donnelly rhodes ) और jill फोस्टर एबॉट ( जेस वाल्टन ) लकिन the अक्षर 's पृष्ठभूमि थी rewritten by मरिया एरिना घंटी in 2009, reestablishing उसे as the son of Colin and Genevieve Atkinson ( Tristan Rogers and Genie Francis ).
हालांकि characterized as `` रहस्यमय '', cane is `` वफ़ादार और समर्पित '', while Goddard described the character as a `` typical Australian, working-class kind of guy ''.
He was the first member of the Atkinson family to appear on the श्रेणी, followed by उसके अभिभावक और identical twin brother.
जल्द बाद उसके डेब्यू, he became a leading character, a decision praised by viewers and critics.
the अक्षर रै महरूम शामिल साथ एम्बर मूर ( adrienne frantz ), क्लो मिशेल ( एलिज़ाबेथ hendrickson ) and most notably Lily Winters ( Christel Khalil ), a romance that garnered significant fan attention.
In 2009, Cane and Lily were married ; Global BC would बाद कॉल लिली the प्रेम of cane 's जीवन.
The pair had two children, चार्ली और mattie ashby.
In 2011, the actor was fired, और cane थी शॉट to मौत onscreen.
However, Goddard was rehired soon after viewers campaigned for his return, revealing कि cane 's एकसमान जुड़वा bhai थी in फैक्ट the man who died.
This sacrificed his marriage to Lily, but the युगल यहूद remarried on वेलेंटाइन 's दिन in 2012.
गोडार्ड रै महरूम widely acclaimed लिये उसके portrayal ; canyon News said that he portrays the character honestly, and is `` always dependable, on fire and exciting ''.
John Christopher `` Johnny '' Depp ii ( born जून 9, 1963 ) is an अमरीकी कर्ता, film producer, and musician.
He has won the सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार और स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड पुरस्कार for Best Actor.
Depp रोज़ to prominence on the 1980s टेलीविज़न series 21 Jump Street, becoming a teen idol.
Dissatisfied with that status, Depp turned to film for more challenging roles ; he played the title character of the acclaimed Edward Scissorhands ( 1990 ) and later found box office success in films ऐसे as sleepy खोखला ( 1999 ), चार्ली और the चॉकलेट फैक्टरी ( 2005 ), ऐलिस in वंडरलैंड ( 2010 ), Rango ( 2011 ) and the Pirates of the Caribbean film series ( 2003–present ).
He has collaborated with निदेशक और dost टिम बर्टन in आठ films ; the सबसे हाल होने अंधेरा Shadows ( 2012 ).
Depp has gained acclaim for his portrayals of such people as Ed Wood in Ed Wood, Joseph D. Pistone in Donnie Brasco, Hunter S. Thompson in Fear and loathing in लास वेगास, जार्ज जंग in उड़ा, और the बैंको डाकू जॉन dillinger in Michael Mann 's Public Enemies.
Films featuring डेप have grossed over $ 3.1 अरब at the United States box office and over $ 7.6 billion worldwide.
He has been nominated for top awards many times, winning the Best Actor Awards from the Golden –_Motion_Picture_Musical_or_Comedy Globes –_motion_picture_musical_or_comedy लिये स्वीनी टॉड : the राक्षस नाई of बेड़े गली और इससे the स्क्रीन Actors Guild for Pirates of the Caribbean : The Curse of the Black Pearl.
He also has garnered a sex प्रतीक औकात in अमरीकी सिनेमा, होने twice नामित as the `` Sexiest Man Alive `` by People magazine in 2003 and 2009.
He has been listed in the 2012 गिनीज किताब of संसार रिकॉर्ड as the highest paid actor, with $ 75 million.
The World Wide वेब ( abbreviated as www or w3, commonly ज्ञात as the वेब ), is a system of interlinked hypertext documents accessed via the Internet.
With a web browser, one can view web pages that may contain text, images, videos, और अन्य मल्टीमीडिया, और navigate between उन्हें via hyperlinks.
Using concepts from his earlier हाइपरटेक्स्ट प्रणालियों जैसे enquire, अंग्रेजों इंजीनियर, कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक और at कि समय कर्मचारी of the cern, सर टिम berners-lee, अभी निदेशक of the संसार Wide Web Consortium ( W3C ), wrote a proposal in March 1989 for what would eventually become the World Wide Web.
At CERN, a European research organisation near Geneva straddling the border between फ़्रांस और स्विट्ज़रलैंड, berners-lee और belgian कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक रॉबर्ट cailliau प्रस्तावित in 1990 to उपयोग हाइपरटेक्स्ट `` to link and access information of various kinds as a web of nodes in which the user can browse at will '', and they publicly introduced the project in December of the same year.
Mark Travis John Sanchez ( born नवम्बर 11, 1986 ) is an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक for the New York Jets of the National Football League ( NFL ).
He was drafted in the first round of the 2009 NFL Draft as the fifth overall चयन by the jets और the दूसरी क्वार्टरबैक taken overall.
He played college football at the विश्वविद्यालयों of दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया ( यूएससी ).
Sanchez grew up in a well-disciplined और athletic family.
In the eighth ग्रेड, he began to खेल फ़ुटबॉल और सीख the intricacies of the quarterback position, training with his father, Nick.
A well-regarded prospect, Sanchez committed to दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया following उसके कामयाब ऊँची स्कूल करियर in जिससे he led उसके टोली to a चैंपियनशिप title during his final season.
At USC, Sanchez थी relegated as the बैकअप क्वार्टरबैक दौरान उसके पहला तीन सालो हालांकि he रोज़ to prominence due to his brief appearances on the field in 2007 due to injuries suffered by starting quarterback John David Booty.
Sanchez also became लोकप्रिय भीतर the जातियाँ due to his Mexican-American heritage.
Named the starter in 2008, Sanchez led यूएससी to a 12–1 रिकार्ड और जीती the रोज़ कटोरी विरूद्ध penn राज्य लिये जिससे Sanchez was awarded the Most Valuable Player award for his performance on offense.
Although many considered him too अनुभवहीन, सांचेज़ घोषित उसके इरादे to enter the 2009 NFL Draft.
He was selected by the Jets बाद वे traded up साथ the क्लीवलैंड Browns, and was named the starting quarterback prior to the start of the season.
Despite a subpar performance, Sanchez led the Jets to the AFC चैंपियनशिप खेल, a खोने प्रयत्न to the इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस, बनने the चौथी रुकी क्वार्टरबैक in एनएफएल इतिहास to win his first playoff game and the second to win two playoff games.
In his second season, Sanchez continued to develop and led the Jets to the playoffs and the team 's second consecutive afc चैंपियनशिप खेल जहाँ वे narrowly खोया to the पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स, 24–19.
With the win over the New England Patriots the week prior, Sanchez tied four other quarterbacks लिये the दूसरी सबसे post-season सड़क victories by a क्वार्टरबैक in एनएफएल इतिहास.
In leading the Jets to two लगातार सम्मेलन championships, सांचेज़ joined क्वार्टरबैक बेन roethlisberger as the तभी दो quarterbacks in NFL history to reach the conference championship in their first two seasons in the league.
The next two seasons would be a regression लिये दोनो the टोली और सांचेज़ as वे विफल to reach the playoffs.
Fans and media critics called for a struggling सांचेज़ to be benched.
He eventually was replaced towards the समाप्त of the 2012 ऋतु with Greg McElroy.
Paul Avery ( April 2, 1934December 10, 2000 ) was an अमरीकी पुलिस रिपोर्टर, बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उसके कहानियां on the infamous serial killer known as the Zodiac, and later for his work on the Patricia Hearst kidnapping.
A small submersible ac sump पंप साथ a गार्डन नली connector
A sump pump is a pump प्रयुक्त to हटाएँ जल कि रै संचित in a जल collecting sump जलाशय, commonly found in the basement of homes.
The water may enter via the perimeter drains of a basement waterproofing प्रणाली, funneling into the जलाशय or क्युकी of बरसात or प्राकृतिक मैदान जल, if the तहखाने is नीचे the water table level.
Sump pumps are used where basement बाढ़ happens regularly और to उपाय dampness जहाँ the जल तालिका is above the foundation of a home.
Sump pumps send water away from a house to any place where it is no longer problematic, such as a नगरपालिका तूफ़ान नाली or a शुष्क well.
Pumps may discharge to the sanitary सीवर in पुरानी installations.
एकबार माना स्वीकार्य, इस अभ्यास may अभी violate the plumbing कोड or municipal bylaws, because it can overwhelm the municipal sewage treatment system.
Municipalities urge homeowners to disconnect and reroute sump pump निर्वहन दूर इससे sanitary sewers.
Fines may be imposed for noncompliance.
Many homeowners have inherited उनके sump पंप configurations और do नहीं एहसास that the pump discharges to the sewer.
If the discharge is fed to a laundry डूबना in the तहखाने, it 's संभावित going to the सीवर.
Usually hardwired into a घर 's विद्युत system, sump pumps may have a battery backup.
The home 's pressurized water supply powers some pumps, eliminating the need for electricity at the expense of using potable जल, potentially बनाना उन्हें अधिक महंगी to operate than विद्युत पंपों और बनाना an additional water disposal problem.
Since a sump basin may overflow if not constantly pumped, a बैकअप प्रणाली is महत्वपूर्ण लिये मामले जब the प्रमुख शक्ति is आउट लिये prolonged अवधि of समय, as during a severe storm.
There are generally two प्रकार of sump पंपों — pedestal and submersible.
The pedestal pump 's motor is mounted above the sump, जहाँ it is अधिक easily सर्विस, लकिन is भी more conspicuous.
The पंप impeller is चलित by a long, लंबवत एक्सटेंशन शाफ्ट और the impeller is in a scroll housing in the base of the pump.
The submersible pump is entirely mounted अंदर the sump, और is विशेषकर sealed to prevent विद्युत छोटी circuits.
Sump pump systems are भी utilized in औद्योगिक और वाणिज्यिक अनुप्रयोग to कंट्रोल जल तालिका -related problems in surface soil.
An artesian aquifer or periodic ऊँची जल तालिका हालात can कारण the मैदान to become unstable due to water saturation.
As long as the pump कृत्यों, the सतह मृदा होगा remain stable.
These sumps are typically ten feet in गहराई or अधिक ; lined साथ corrugated मेटल पाइप कि contains perforations or नाली holes throughout.
They may include electronic control systems with visual और audible सचेतक और हैं प्रायः covered to prevent debris and animals from falling in.
Bleeding Kansas, Bloody Kansas or the Border War, was a series of violent political confrontations involving anti-slavery Free-Staters and pro-slavery `` Border ruffian `` तत्व, कि took प्लेस in the कान्सास territory और the neighboring कस्बों of मिसौरी between 1854 and 1861.
At the heart of the conflict was the question of whether Kansas होता डालें the संघ as a फ़्री राज्य or slave state.
As such, Bleeding Kansas was a proxy war between northerners और southerners over the समस्या of गुलामी in the संयुक्त States.
The term `` bleeding कान्सास '' थी coined by होरेस greeley of the नई यॉर्क ट्रिब्यून ; the events it encompasses directly presaged the American Civil War.
Congress had long struggled to संतुलन the रूचि of pro-slavery forces and anti-slavery forces.
The events later known as Bleeding Kansas were नियत into गति by the kansas–nebraska अधिनियम of 1854, जिससे nullified the मिसौरी Compromise and instead implemented the concept of popular sovereignty.
An ostensibly democratic idea, popular sovereignty stated that the निवासियों of प्रत्येक territory or राज्य चाहिए decide whether it होता be a फ़्री or स्लेव state ; however, this resulted in immigration en masse to Kansas by activists from both sides.
At one point, Kansas had two पृथक सरकारें, प्रत्येक साथ इसके अपना संविधान, हालांकि तभी one was federally recognized.
On January 29, 1861, Kansas was admitted to the Union as a free state, less than तीन महीने पहले the बैटल of फोर्ट sumter जिससे began the सिविल युद्ध.
Benzene is an सशुल्क रासायनिक यौगिक साथ the molecular formula C6 H|Hydrogen|H6.
Its molecule is composed of 6 carbon अणु joined in a रिंग, साथ 1 हाइड्रोजन अणु संलग्न to each carbon atom.
Because its molecules contain only carbon and हाइड्रोजन अणु, बेंजीन is classed as a हाइड्रोकार्बन.
Benzene is a प्राकृतिक constituent of crude आयल, and is one of the most basic petrochemicals.
बेंजीन is an खुशबूदार हाइड्रोकार्बन और the दूसरी [ n ] - annulene ( [ 6 ] -annulene ), a cyclic hydrocarbon with a continuous pi bond.
It is sometimes abbreviated ph –h. बेंजीन is a colorless और अत्यधिक ज्वलनशील liquid with a sweet smell.
It is मुख्यतः प्रयुक्त as a precursor to भारी रसायन, ऐसे as ethylbenzene और cumene, which are produced on a billion kilogram scale.
क्युकी it रै a ऊँची ऑक्टेन क्रमांक, it is an महत्वपूर्ण घटक of gasoline, composing a few percent of its mass.
Most non-industrial अनुप्रयोग have महरूम सीमित by बेंजीन 's carcinogenicity.
Giovanni Virginio Schiaparelli ( ; 14 March 1835 – 4 जुलाई 1910 ) थी an इतालवी astronomer and science historian.
Wii homebrew refers to the reuse of निन्टेंडो 's वी खेल कंसोल to चलाएं तन्त्र that has not been authorized by Nintendo.
It achieves इस by defeating the वी 's नक़ल protection and code signing measures.
In अधिक सामान्य शर्तें, वी homebrew refers to the उपयोग of the वी 's हार्डवेयर, accessories और तन्त्र for purposes outside those intended by the manufacturer.
Original efforts focused on using the Wii Remote as a pointing यंत्र on अन्य ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों, or कार्यशील web-based खेल in the built-in web browser.
Subsequent developments in games exploits, such as the `` Twilight hack ``, `` Bannerbomb '' and its later अवतार `` letterbomb '', `` तोड़ स्टेक '', `` इंडियाना pwns '', `` yu-gi-owned '', `` bathaxx '', और `` वापसी of the jodi '', बना installing the `` Homebrew Channel `` possible.
Hadley ( right ) discussing the 2006 israel-lebanon संकट साथ Bush and Rice.
Stephen John Hadley ( born February 13, 1947 ) was the 21st U.S. Assistant to the President लिये नेशनल सुरक्षा अफेयर्स ( commonly referred as नेशनल सुरक्षा सलाहकार ), सेवारत अंतर्गत President George W. Bush.
Take identical growing पौधे और दे उर्वरक to half of them.
If there are differences between the निषेचित संयंत्र समूह और the unfertilized `` कंट्रोल '' समूह, these differences may be due to the fertilizer.
A scientific कंट्रोल is an प्रयोग or अवलोकन designed to minimize the प्रभाव of variables other than the single independent variable.
This increases the reliability of the results, often through a तुलना between कंट्रोल माप और the अन्य measurements.
Scientific controls हैं a भाग of the वैज्ञानिक विधि.
For example, during drug testing, scientists होगा कोशिश to कंट्रोल दो समूह to रखना उन्हें as एकसमान as संभावित, तब allow एक group to try the drug.
Another example might be testing plant fertilizer by giving it to only half the plants in a गार्डन : the पौधे कि प्राप्त no उर्वरक हैं the कंट्रोल समूह, क्युकी वे स्थापित the बेसलाइन स्तर of विकास कि the fertilizer-treated पौधे will be compared against.
Without a control group, the प्रयोग can नहीं determine whether the fertilizer-treated पौधे grow अधिक than they would have if untreated.
Ideally, all variables in an प्रयोग होगा be नियंत्रित ( accounted लिये by the control measurements ) and none will be uncontrolled.
In such an experiment, if all the controls work as expected, it is possible to conclude that the experiment is working as intended and कि the परिणाम of the प्रयोग हैं due to the प्रभाव of the variable being tested.
That is, scientific controls allow an investigator to मेक a अर्जी जैसे `` दो परिस्थितियों यहूद एकसमान जबतक फ़ैक्टर x occurred.
Since factor X is the only अंतर between the दो परिस्थितियों, the नई निष्कर्ष was caused by factor X. ''

John एडम्स ( अक्तूबर 30, 1735 ( o.s. अक्तूबर 19, 1735 ) – जुलाई 4, 1826 ) थी the दूसरी अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States ( 1797–1801 ), having earlier served as the first vice president of the United States.
An American Founding पिता, he थी a statesman, राजनयिक, और a अग्रणी एडवोकेट of American independence from Great Britain.
Well शिक्षित, he थी an आत्मज्ञान राजनैतिक theorist जो प्रचारित republicanism और लिखा prolifically about his often seminal ideas, both in published works and in letters to his wife and key adviser Abigail as well as to other Founding Fathers.
एडम्स आए to prominence in the early stages of the American Revolution.
A वकील और पब्लिक फिगर in बोस्टन, as a प्रतिनिधि इससे मैसाचुसेट्स to the Continental Congress, he played a leading role in persuading Congress to declare independence.
He assisted Thomas Jefferson in drafting the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता in 1776, और थी इसके प्राथमिक advocate in the Congress.
Later, as a diplomat in Europe, he helped negotiate the eventual peace treaty with Great Britain, and was responsible for obtaining vital सरकारी लोन इससे एम्सटर्डम बैंकर्स.
A political theorist and historian, Adams largely wrote the मैसाचुसेट्स संविधान in 1780, जिससे साथ साथ उसके पहले विचार on सरकारी, influenced American political thought.
One of his greatest roles was as a judge of character : in 1775, he मनोनीत जार्ज वॉशिंगटन to be commander-in-chief, और 25 सालो later nominated John Marshall to be Chief Justice of the United States.
एडम्स ' क्रांतिकारी श्रेय secured उसे दो शर्तें as जार्ज वॉशिंगटन 's वाइस president and his own election in 1796 as the second president.
During his one term, he encountered ferocious हमले by the jeffersonian republicans, as खूब as the प्रबल faction in his own Federalist Party led by his bitter enemy Alexander Hamilton.
Adams signed the विवादास्पद एलियन और राजद्रोह अधिनियमों, और निर्मित up the फौज और नेवी विशेषकर in the फेस of an undeclared naval war ( called the `` Quasi-War `` ) with France, 1798–1800.
the प्रमुख accomplishment of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी थी उसके शांतिपूर्ण resolution of the conflict in the face of Hamilton 's opposition.
In 1800, एडम्स थी पराजित लिये re-election by Thomas Jefferson and retired to Massachusetts.
He later resumed उसके दोस्ती साथ Jefferson.
He and his wife, अबीगैल एडम्स, संस्थापित an संपन्नता परिवार लकीर of राजनेता, राजनयिकों, और historians now referred to as the Adams political family.
Adams थी the पिता of जॉन क्विंसी एडम्स, the sixth President of the United States.
His achievements have received greater recognition in modern टाइम्स, हालांकि उसके योगदान यहूद नहीं initially as celebrated as those of other Founders.
Adams was the first U.S. president to reside in the building that आखिरकार became ज्ञात as the श्वेत हाउस.
a वाट भाप engine.
The steam engine, fuelled primarily by कोयले, propelled the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति in ग्रेट Britain and the world.
the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति थी the परिवर्तन to नई निर्माण प्रक्रियाओं कि occurred in the period from about 1760 to some time between 1820 and 1840.
This transition included going from hand उत्पादन विधि to मशीने, नई रासायनिक निर्माण और आयरन उत्पादन प्रक्रियाओं, improved efficiency of water power, the increasing use of steam power and development of machine tools.
the परिवर्तन भी शामिल the change from wood and other bio-fuels to coal.
The Industrial क्रान्ति began in ब्रिटेन और भीतर a few दशकों स्प्रेड to Western Europe and the United States.
The Industrial क्रान्ति marks a प्रमुख turning पाइंट in इतिहास ; almost every aspect of daily life was influenced in some way.
Most notably, average income and population began to प्रदर्शनी unprecedented sustained growth.
In the words of Nobel Prize winner Robert E. Lucas, Jr., `` For the first time in history, the living मानकों of the masses of ordinary लोगों have begun to undergo sustained विकास... nothing remotely जैसे इस आर्थिक बर्ताव is mentioned by the classical economists, even as a theoretical possibility. ''
William Bell स्कॉट आयरन और कोयले, 1855-60
the काल of समय covered by the औद्योगिक Revolution varies with different historians.
Eric Hobsbawm held कि it 'broke आउट ' in ब्रिटेन in the 1780s और थी नहीं fully felt until the 1830s or 1840s, while T. S. Ashton held that it occurred roughly between 1760 and 1830.
Some 20th-century इतिहासकारों ऐसे as जॉन clapham और निकोलस crafts have argued कि the process of economic and social change took place gradually and the term revolution is a misnomer.
This is still a subject of बहस among इतिहासकारों.
GDP per capita थी broadly stable पहले the औद्योगिक Revolution and the emergence of the modern capitalist economy.
The Industrial Revolution began an era of per-capita आर्थिक विकास in पूंजीवादी economies.
Economic इतिहासकारों हैं in अनुबंध कि the onset of the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति is the सबसे important event in the history of humanity since the domestication of animals and plants.
The First औद्योगिक क्रान्ति विकसित into the दूसरी औद्योगिक क्रान्ति in the परिवर्तन सालो between 1840 और 1870, जब technological और आर्थिक progress gained momentum with the increasing adoption of steam-powered boats, ships and railways, the large scale manufacture of machine tools and the increasing use of steam powered factories.

This list बाँधने u.S. शहरों by जमीन क्षेत्रफल ( not including bodies of water ).
Total areas ( including water ) are also given, but note that, when क्रमित by कुल क्षेत्रफल, a क्रमांक of तटीय शहरों appear disproportionately `` larger ''.
San Francisco is an extreme example ; water makes up nearly 80 % of इसके कुल क्षेत्रफल of 232 वर्गाकार मील ( 601 km2 ).
Note also that in many cases a city may be geographically large primarily क्युकी इसके नगरपालिका सरकारी रै मिलाया साथ the government of the surrounding county.
In some cases the county no longer exists, जबकि in अन्य the व्यवस्था रै formed a संचित city–county ( or city- borough in Alaska, or city- parish in Louisiana ).
These are shown in bold in the list नीचे ( लकिन नहीं सब उदाहरण may be indicated ).
** These are स्वतंत्र शहरों, अर्थ वे are not a part of any county.
The विशाल आंत ( or bowel, कोलन ) is the पिछला part of the digestive system in vertebrate animals.
Its function is to अवशोषित जल इससे the बाकी indigestible खाना पदार्थ, और तब to pass useless waste material from the body.
This आलेख is primarily परिचय the इंसान आंत, though the information about its processes are directly applicable to most mammals.
The large intestine consists of the cecum, मलाशय और गुदा कनाल.
it starts in the सही iliac प्रदेश of the pelvis, just at or below the right waist, where it is joined to the bottom end of the small intestine.
From here it continues up the abdomen, तब आरपार the चौडाई of the abdominal गुहा, और तब it turns bas, continuing to its endpoint at the anus.
The large आंत is परिचय long, जिससे is परिचय one-fifth of the पूरे length of the intestinal canal.
In Terminologia Anatomica the large intestine शामिल the cecum, कोलन, मलाशय, और anal canal.
However, some स्त्रोत exclude the गुदा canal.
The Green Bay Packers are an American फ़ुटबॉल टोली आधारित in ग्रीन खाड़ी, विस्कॉन्सिन.
They are members of the North Division of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( nfc ) in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल League ( NFL ).
Green Bay is the third-oldest मताधिकार in the NFL, having been organized and playing in 1919.
The Packers are the only non-profit, community-owned प्रमुख लीग पेशेवर sports team in the United States.
The Packers are the last vestige of `` small town टीमों '' कि यहूद एकबार आम in the एनएफएल during the 1920s and 1930s.
संस्थापित in 1919 by अर्ल `` घुंघराले '' lambeau ( hence the नाम lambeau फ़ील्ड on जिससे the टोली plays ) and George Whitney Calhoun, the Green Bay Packers can trace their lineage to other semi-professional teams in Green Bay dating back to 1896.
In 1919 and 1920 the Packers competed as a semi-professional football team against क्लब इससे around विस्कॉन्सिन और the मिडवेस्ट.
They joined the American Professional Football Association ( APFA ) in 1921, the forerunner to कया is ज्ञात आज as the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( NFL ).
हालांकि ग्रीन खाड़ी is the पिछला एनएफएल `` छोटी कस्बा '' टोली, इसके लोकल fan base and media extends into nearby Milwaukee ; the team also played selected home games there between 1933 and 1994.
The Green Bay Packers have won 13 league championships ( more than any other team in the NFL ), including nine NFL championships prior to the सुपर कटोरी era और चार सुपर कटोरी victories —in 1967 ( सुपर कटोरी i ), 1968 ( सुपर कटोरी ii ), 1997 ( Super Bowl XXXI ) and 2011 ( Super Bowl XLV ).
the पैकर्स have long-standing, कड़वा rivalries साथ उनके nfc उत्तर ( formerly the nfc सेंट्रल ) प्रतिद्वंद्वियों, the Chicago Bears, Minnesota Vikings and the Detroit Lions.
The bears-packers फंसने is एक of the oldest rivalries in NFL history, dating back to 1921.
The San Fernando Valley ( locally known as `` the घाटी '' ) is an urbanized घाटी स्तिथ in the लॉस एंजिल्स महानगर area of southern California, United States, defined by the mountains of the Transverse Ranges circling it.
Home to 1.76 million people, it lies north of the larger और अधिक populous लॉस एंजिल्स जलाशय.
Nearly two thirds of the Valley 's जमीन क्षेत्रफल is भाग of the नगर of Los Angeles.
The other incorporated शहरों in the घाटी हैं ग्लेनडेल, Burbank, San Fernando, Hidden Hills and Calabasas.

The exterior of the current संसार of coca-cola at Pemberton Place.
The संसार of coca-cola, is a स्थाई exhibition featuring the history of The Coca-Cola Company.
Its well-known विज्ञापन as खूब as a मेजबान of entertainment क्षेत्रों और आकर्षण, और is स्तिथ in अटलांटा, जॉर्जिया ( where the company 's headquarters are located ) at Pemberton Place ( named in honor of John Pemberton, the inventor of Coca-Cola ).

It opened to the public on May 24, 2007, relocating इससे और replacing the असली प्रदर्शनी.
Pretties is a 2005 विज्ञान fiction अनोखा और the दूसरी किताब of the uglies त्रयी written by Scott Westerfeld.
It is set in a future dystopian world in which everyone is turned `` pretty '' by चरम कॉस्मेटिक सर्जरी upon reaching आयु 16.
It tells the story of किशोरावस्था टैली youngblood जो विद्रोहियों against society 's enforced conformity.
Susan Leigh vaughan स्मिथ ( born सितंबर 26, 1971 ) is an अमरीकी woman sentenced to life in prison for murdering her children.
Born in संघ, दक्षिण कैरोलिना, और a पूर्व छात्र of the विश्वविद्यालयों of दक्षिण कैरोलिना संघ, वो थी convicted on जुलाई 22, 1995 लिये murdering उसके दो sons, 3-year-old Michael Daniel Smith, born October 10, 1991, and 14-month-old Alexander Tyler Smith, born August 5, 1993.
The case gained worldwide attention shortly after it developed, due to her claiming कि a ब्लैक man चुराया उसके car और kidnapped her sons.
She later claimed कि वो suffered इससे दिमागी स्वास्थ्य issues that impaired her judgment.
According to the दक्षिण कैरोलिना विभाग of corrections, स्मिथ होगा be योग्य लिये parole on November 4, 2024, after serving a minimum of thirty years.
She is incarcerated at दक्षिण कैरोलिना 's leath correctional Institution, near Greenwood.
Mount McKinley ( also ज्ञात as denali लिया इससे the इनुइट koyukon athabaskan भाषा अर्थ `` the ग्रेट एक '' ) is the highest mountain peak in the United States and in North America with a summit elevation of above sea level.
At some, the आधार to शिखर वृद्धि is माना the largest of any mountain situated entirely above sea level.
Measured by topographic prominence, it is the तीसरा सबसे prominent शिखर बाद माउंट एवरेस्ट and Aconcagua.
Located in the अलास्का दायरा in the आंतरिक of us राज्य of अलास्का, it is the centerpiece of Denali National Park and Preserve.
The first European to document sighting the पहाड़ थी जार्ज वैंकूवर in 1794.
In 1903, जेम्स wickersham अंकित the पहला attempt at climbing McKinley which was unsuccessful.
In 1906, Frederick Cook claimed the पहला ascent जिससे was later proven to be false.
The first verifiable ascent to mckinley 's समिट थी हासिल on जून 7, 1913 by चढना हडसन stuck, Harry Karstens, Walter Harper, and Robert Tatum.
In 1951, ब्रैडफोर्ड washburn pioneered the वेस्ट buttress रूट माना to be the safest and easiest route and therefore the most popular currently in use.
the होंडा s600 is an ऑटोमोबाइल manufactured by Honda.
It was शुभारम्भ in March 1964.
Available as a roadster – bearing strong प्रतिरूप to the होंडा s500 – और as a fastback coupé – introduced in कूच 1965 – the s600 थी the पहला होंडा उपलब्धियाँ in two trim levels.
During its production run up to 1966, the मॉडल स्टाइलिंग होता remain pretty much the वही, साथ the सबसे notable परिवर्तन coming to the front grille, bumper, and headlights.
Powered by a DOHC, water-cooled, four-cylinder inline engine with four carburetors, the इंजन क्षमता थी increased to 606 cc इससे the s500 's 531 cc.
The इंजन उत्पादित at 8,500 आरपीएम और had a top speed of.
With the convertible weighing in at mere, the अतिरिक्त चादर मेटल of the कूप तभी added to the overall weight.
Suspension was independent with sealed रोलर कड़ी ड्राइव to प्रत्येक पश्च व्हील.
The S600 थी the पहला द्रव्यमान marketed होंडा car.
First offered तभी in right-hand ड्राइव, it जल्द became उपलब्धियाँ in left-hand drive to appeal to export markets.
There were a few pre-production s500s manufactured in बाएँ हाथ ड्राइव, two or three even being shown in some early sales brochures.
Both the S600 roadster and coupé were उपलब्धियाँ in मानक trim और a खास, upgraded पैकेज पुकारा the sm600 जिससे शामिल, among अन्य items, special paint colors, exclusive badging, a standard radio and speaker, a special antenna in the passenger side sun visor, standard reversing lights, a standard cigarette lighter, a standard heater, better cushioned seats, and a detachable seat track for quick removal of the passenger seat.
Honda built 3,912 roadsters in 1964, with उत्पादन चढ़ाई to 7,261 convertibles और 1,519 coupes in 1965.
Production dropped off in 1966 ( as they were shifting to the S800 ) साथ तभी 111 roadsters और 281 coupes, giving tallies of 11,284 convertibles और 1,800 coupes for the 3 year span.
Everybody Hates Chris is an American television period sitcom that depicts the teenage अनुभवों of हास्य क्रिस चट्टान ( जो is भी the narrator ) जबकि growing up in the bedford-stuyvesant neighborhood of Brooklyn, New York.
The show is set between 1983 and 1987 ; however, चट्टान खुद थी a किशोरावस्था between 1978 and 1983.
चट्टान grew up साथ a लड़के नामित केनी montero, जिसको he रै प्रायः referred to as the inspiration for a lot of the episodes.
In many interviews, Rock has described Kenny as the कारण he मिला into कॉमेडी in the पहला प्लेस.
the दिखाएँ 's शीर्षक parodies the CBS sitcom Everybody Loves Raymond.
Rock stated : `` Everybody loves रेमंड लकिन everybody hates क्रिस ! ``.
The show 's lead actors are टायलर जेम्स विलियम्स, टेरी क्रू, tichina अर्नाल्ड, tequan रिचमंड, imani Hakim, and Vincent Martella.
In Fall 2008, the The CW moved Everybody hates क्रिस और the खेल to the शुक्रवार रात्रि मौत slot.
The fourth season of the series premiered शुक्रवार, अक्तूबर 3, 2008, at 8:00PM Eastern/7:00PM Central.
On May 21, 2009, the cw घोषित that it had cancelled Everybody Hates Chris.
Prior to this, executive producer Chris Rock announced that the end of season 4 matched up साथ उसके अपना past—dropping आउट of ऊँची स्कूल to become a comedian—and that it was time to end the show.
Pleural effusion is excess fluid that accumulates between the दो pleural परतों, the fluid-filled स्पेस that surrounds the lungs.
Excessive amounts of such fluid can impair श्वास by limiting the विस्तार of the फेफड़े दौरान ventilation.
Beowulf ( ; in Old अंग्रेज़ी or ) is the conventional शीर्षक of an बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी वीर एपिक कविता consisting of 3182 alliterative long lines, set in Scandinavia, commonly cited as one of the most important works of Anglo-Saxon literature.
It survives in a सिंगल पाण्डुलिपि ज्ञात as the Nowell Codex.
Its composition by an बेनाम anglo-saxon कवि is दिनाँक between the 8th and the early 11th century.
In 1731, the manuscript was badly क्षतिग्रस्त by a आग कि swept through a भवन आवास a संग्रहण of Medieval manuscripts assembled by Sir Robert Bruce Cotton.
The poem fell into obscurity for decades, and its existence did not become widely known again जबतक it थी मुद्रित in 1815 in an संस्करण prepared by the icelandic-danish विद्वान Grímur Jónsson Thorkelin.
In the poem, Beowulf, a hero of the Geats in Scandinavia, comes to the help of Hroðgar, the किंग of the danes, जिनकी मीड हॉल ( in heorot ) रै महरूम अंतर्गत attack by a monster known as Grendel.
After Beowulf जानबूझ उसे, grendel 's माँ हमले the हॉल and is then also defeated.
Victorious, Beowulf goes home to geatland in स्वीडन और बाद becomes king of the Geats.
After a period of fifty years has passed, Beowulf defeats a dragon, लकिन is fatally wounded in the battle.
After उसके मौत, उसके सेवकों दफनाने उसे in a tumulus, a burial mound, in Geatland.
Shem Ham और japheth by James Tissot 1904.
Shem ( ; Sēm ; Arabic : Sām ; Ge'ez : ሴም, sēm ; `` renown ; समृद्धि ; नाम '' ) थी एक of the बेटे of नूह in the यहूदी बाइबल as well as in Islamic literature.
He is most popularly regarded as the ज्येष्ठ बेटे, हालांकि कुछ परंपराओं regard him as the second son.
Genesis 10:21 refers to सापेक्ष आयु of shem और उसके bhai japheth, लकिन साथ sufficient ambiguity to have yielded different translations.
The verse is translated in the KJV as `` Unto shem भी, the पिता of सब the children of eber, the brother of Japheth the elder, even to him were children born. ``.
However, the New American Standard Bible gives, `` भी to shem, the पिता of सब the children of eber, और the पुरानी bhai of japheth, children were born. ''
Genesis 11:10 records that Shem was still 100 years old at the birth of Arphaxad, ( but nearly 101 - see Chronology note, ) two years after the बाढ़, बनाना उसे मुश्किल 99 at the समय the बाढ़ began ; और कि he जिया लिये another 500 सालो बाद this, making his age at death 600 years.
The children of shem यहूद ईलम, Asshur, Arphaxad, Lud, and Aram, in addition to daughters.
Abraham, the patriarch of the hebrews और arabs, थी एक of the वंशजों of Arphaxad.
Islamic literature describes Shem as एक of the believing बेटे of Noah.
Some sources even पहचानो shem as a नबी in उसके अपना right and that he was the next prophet after his father.
In one Muslim लेजेंड, shem थी एक of the लोगों कि परमेश्वर बना यीशु resurrect as a sign to the Children of Israel.
The 1st century historian Flavius Josephus, among many others, recounted the परंपरा कि ये पाँच बेटे यहूद the progenitors of the राष्ट्र of ईलम, assyria, chaldea, लीडिया, और सीरियाई, क्रमशः.
Semitic is still a commonly used term for the Semitic languages, as a subset of the afro-asiatic भाषाएं, denoting the आम भाषाई विरासत of अरबी, aramaic, अक्कादी, ethiopic, Hebrew and Phoenician languages.
According to some Jewish traditions ( e.g., B. Talmud Nedarim 32b ; Genesis Rabbah 46:7 ; Genesis Rabbah 56:10 ; Leviticus Rabbah 25:6 ; Numbers Rabbah 4:8. ), Shem is believed to have been Melchizedek, King of सलेम जिसको अब्राहम is अंकित to have मिले बाद the बैटल of the चार kings.
In a few of the many extra-biblical स्त्रोत कि describe उसे, shem is भी credited with killing Nimrod, son of Cush.
Shem is उल्लेखित in उत्पत्ति 5:32, 6:10 ; 7:13 ; 9:18,23,26-27 ; 10 ; 11:10 ; also in 1 Chronicles 1:4.
Geographic identifications of Flavius Josephus, c. 100 AD ; Japheth 's sons दिखाया in रेड, हैम 's बेटे in ब्लू, shem 's sons in green.
Go Daddy or Go Daddy Group Inc. is a privately आयोजित कम्पनी कि is primarily an अंतरजाल डोमेन रजिस्ट्रार और वेब होस्टिंग company.
Go Daddy समूह inc. दायर लिये an ipo in 2006, लकिन बाद रद्द it, due to `` market uncertainties ''.
In addition to domain पंजीकरण और होस्टिंग go पापा भी बिकता e-business related software and services.
On June 24, 2011, The Wall Street Journal reported that private-equity firms KKR and Silver Lake साझेदार, साथ साथ a तीसरा निवेशकों, यहूद nearing a सौदे to ख़रीदे the कम्पनी लिये between $ 2–2.5 billion.

Andorra ( ;, ), officially the Principality of अंडोरा ( ), भी पुकारा the principality of the घाटियों of अंडोरा, ( ), is a landlocked microstate in Southwestern Europe, located in the eastern Pyrenees mountains and bordered by Spain and France.
it is the छठे smallest स्वदेश in Europe, having an area of and an estimated population of 85,000 in 2012.
Its capital, Andorra la Vella, is the highest capital city in यूरोपीय, at an उन्नयन of ऊपर समुद्र स्तर.
The official भाषा is कैटलन, हालांकि स्पेनी, पुर्तगाली, and French are also commonly spoken.
Created under a चार्टर in 988, the उपस्थित Principality was formed in 1278.
It is known as a principality as it is a साम्राज्य headed by दो co-princes – the बिशप of Urgell and the President of France.
Andorra is a prosperous country mainly because of its tourism उद्योग, जिससे सेवाएं an अनुमानित 10.2 लाख visitors annually, and also because of its status as a tax haven.
It is not a member of the European संघ, लकिन the यूरोपियन is the de facto currency.
The people of Andorra have the 4th उच्चतम इंसान जीवन प्रत्याशा in the संसार — 82 सालो at birth.
The George Washington University ( GW, GWU, or George Washington ) is a व्यापक निजी, coeducational शोध विश्वविद्यालयों स्तिथ in Washington, D.C..
It awards प्रमाणपत्र, स्नातक डिग्री, मास्टर्स डिग्री, and PhDs across several dozen disciplines.
The university was chartered by an Act of Congress on फ़रवरी 9, 1821 as the columbian कॉलेज in the District of Columbia.

In 2007, she gained notoriety as the subject of a sex tape that subsequently resulted in a court awarding उसके $ 5 लाख ; बाद in कि वही साल, वो और उसके परिवार रोज़ to prominence with their E !
reality television series Keeping Up with the kardashians, और इसके subsequent spin-offs, सहित कोर्टनी और किम लो नई यॉर्क और Kourtney and Kim Take Miami.
In 2010, कार्दशियन थी the highest-earning reality star, with estimated earnings of $ 6 million.
साथ बहनों कोर्टनी और khloé, कार्दशियन co-owns the fashion boutique chain D-A-S-H.
She has been शामिल in the उत्पादन of several lines of clothing and fragrances.
In August 2011, कार्दशियन शादीशुदा बास्केट खिलाड़ी क्रिस Humphries in a widely publicized ceremony.
That October, Kardashian दायर लिये तलाक following 72 दिनों of marriage.
The move garnered significant backlash इससे the मीडिया, जो labeled it a `` publicity stunt ''.
After 536 days, Kardashian और humphries पहुँचे an अघोषित उपनिवेश at the Los Angeles Superior Court, finalizing the divorce in April 2013.

Oahu ( ) or Oahu, known as `` the महफ़िल प्लेस '', is the तीसरा largest of the हवाई आइलैंड्स और the most populous of the islands in the U.S. state of Hawaii.
The state capital, Honolulu, is on oahu 's southeast coast.
Including small close-in offshore islands such as Ford Island and the islands in Kaneohe Bay और बंद the पूर्वी ( windward ) coast, it रै a कुल जमीन क्षेत्रफल of, making it the 20th largest island in the United States.
In the महानतम आयाम, इस volcanic island is long and across.
The लंबाई of the shoreline is.
The island is the result of two पृथक शील्ड ज्वालामुखी : waianae और koolau, साथ a व्यापक `` valley '' or saddle ( the central Oahu Plain ) between them.
The highest point is mt. ka'ala in the waianae दायरा, उठती to above sea level.
The base currency of the United States is the u.S. डालर, और is मुद्रित on बिल्स in denominations of $ 1, $ 2, $ 5, $ 10, $ 20, $ 50, and $ 100.
At one समय, however, u.S. करेंसी included five larger denominations.
Notes in the denominations of $ 500, $ 1,000, $ 5,000, and $ 10,000 यहूद मुद्रित लिये सामान्य उपयोग, और a $ 100,000 नोट थी मुद्रित लिये certain internal transactions.
British Honduras was a अंग्रेजों उपनिवेश in सेंट्रल America.
In 1981, the उपनिवेश gained पूरा स्वतंत्रता, and is now the independent nation of Belize.
First colonised by Spaniards in the 17th सदी, the territory on the ईस्ट coast of सेंट्रल अमेरिका, दक्षिण of मैक्सिको, became a अंग्रेजों क्राउन colony in 1862.
In 1964, it became a self-governing colony.
Belize became fully स्वतंत्र इससे the संयुक्त Kingdom in 1981.
Belize was the last continental कब्ज़ा of the संयुक्त किंगडम in the americas.
Spelt, also known as dinkel wheat, or hulled गेहूं, is an प्राचीन प्रजाति of गेहूं from the fifth millennium BC.
Spelt was an important staple in parts of Europe from the Bronze Age to medieval times ; it now survives as a relict क्रॉप in सेंट्रल यूरोपीय और उत्तरी स्पेन और रै मिला a नई मार्केट as a health food.
Spelt is sometimes माना a subspecies of the closely सम्बन्धित प्रजाति आम गेहूं ( T. aestivum ), in which case its botanical name is considered to be Triticum aestivum subsp. spelta.
It is a hexaploid गेहूं, जिससे अर्थात् it रै छह sets of chromosomes.
Sherlock Holmes ( or ) is a fictional detective निर्मित by लेखक और चिकित्सक सर आर्थर Conan Doyle.
A London-based `` परामर्श जासूस '' जिनकी abilities किनारा on the fantastic, holmes is प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके कुटिल लॉजिकल तर्क, his ability to adopt almost any disguise, and his use of forensic science skills to solve difficult cases.
holmes, जो पहला appeared in प्रकाशन in 1887, was featured in four novels and 56 short stories.
The first novel, A Study in Scarlet, appeared in Beeton 's क्रिसमस सालाना in 1887 और the दूसरी, The Sign of the Four, in Lippincott 's Monthly Magazine in 1890.
The character grew tremendously in popularity साथ the पहला श्रेणी of छोटी कहानियां in the strand पत्रिका, शुरूआत साथ a कांड in Bohemia in 1891 ; further series of short stories and two novels published in serial form appeared between then and 1927.
the कहानियां कवर a काल from around 1880 up to 1914.
All but four stories are narrated by Holmes 's friend and biographer, Dr. John H. Watson ; two are narrated by Holmes himself ( `` The Blanched Soldier `` और `` the शेर 's माने `` ) और दो अन्य हैं लिखा in the तीसरा व्यक्ति ( `` the mazarin स्टोन `` और `` उसके पिछला धनुष `` ).
In two stories ( `` The Musgrave अनुष्ठान `` और `` the ग्लोरिया स्कॉट `` ), holmes tells वाटसन the प्रमुख स्टोरी इससे उसके यादें, जबकि वाटसन becomes the narrator of the frame story.
The first and fourth novels, A Study in स्कारलेट और the Valley of Fear, each include a long interval of omniscient narration recounting events unknown to either Holmes or Watson.
The संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि is एक of the दो घरों of the United States Congress ( a bicameral legislature ).
It is अक्सर referred to as the House.
The other हाउस is the Senate.
The composition and शक्तियां of the हाउस हैं स्थापित in Article One of the United States Constitution.
The major power of the हाउस is to pass संघीय विधान कि affects the संपूर्ण देश हालांकि इसके बिल्स जरूर भी be passed by the सीनेट और further agreed to by the U.S. President before becoming law ( unless both the House and Senate re-pass the legislation with a two-thirds majority in each chamber ).
The House has several exclusive powers : the power to initiate आय बिल्स, to impeach officials, और to elect the u.S. अध्यक्ष in मामला वहीँ is no बहुमत in the Electoral College.
Each U.S. राज्य is represented in the हाउस in proportion to इसके जनसांख्यिकी लकिन is हकदार to at least one representative.
the सबसे populous राज्य, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, currently has 53 representatives.
the कुल क्रमांक of मतदान representatives is fixed by law at 435.
प्रत्येक प्रतिनिधि serves for a two-year term.
The Speaker of the United States House of Representatives, who presides over the chamber, is elected by the members of the हाउस, और is इसलिए traditionally the नेता of the हाउस लोकतांत्रिक caucus or the हाउस रिपब्लिकन सम्मेलन, whichever party has more voting members.
The House meets in the दक्षिण wing of the संयुक्त States Capitol.
Jell-O is a brand name belonging to U.S.-based Kraft Foods for a number of gelatin desserts, सहित फल gels, puddings और no-bake मलाई pies.
The brand 's popularity has led to it होने प्रयुक्त as a जेनेरिक पद लिये जिलेटिन मिठाई across the U.S. and Canada.
Kennywood is an amusement park located in वेस्ट mifflin, पेन्सिलवेनिया, a suburb of Pittsburgh.
The park first opened in 1898 as a `` trolley park '' आकर्षण at the समाप्त of the mellon परिवार 's monongahela गली रेल.
The park was purchased in 1906 by F. W. Henninger और एंड्रयू mcswigan और यूँ began the kennywood entertainment कम्पनी कि रै remained a closely आयोजित family business for over 100 years.
This traditional amusement park still has structures and rides dating वापस to इसके खोलने और the जल्दी 1900s.
Along with Rye Playland Park, it is one of only two मनोरंजन पार्क सूचीबद्ध in the नेशनल Register of Historic Places.
Kennywood is owned by Kennywood Entertainment Company, which until December 2007 was a closely आयोजित परिवार कारोबार स्वामित्व by the henninger और mcswigan families.
Kennywood entertainment is अभी संचालित by california-based राजमहल entertainment, a subsidiary of parques reunidos, an international amusement park company based in Madrid, Spain.
Parque Reunidos is in फेरे a subsidiary of candover निवेश, an investment fund based in the UK.
A Social Security card issued by the रेलरोड रिटायरमेंट फलक in 1943 to a अभी मृतक व्यक्ति.
In the United States, a Social सुरक्षा क्रमांक ( ssn ) is a nine-digit number issued to U.S. citizens, permanent residents, and temporary ( working ) residents under section 205 ( c ) ( 2 ) of the Social Security Act, codified as.
The number is जारी to an व्यक्तिगत by the सोशल सुरक्षा प्रशासन, an independent agency of the United States government.
Its primary purpose is to track individuals for Social Security purposes.
A Social Security number may be obtained by applying on Form ss-5, `` अनुप्रयोग लिये a सोशल सुरक्षा Number Card ''.
Minimalism describes movements in various forms of art and design, especially visual art and music, where the work is set out to expose the essence or पहचान of a विषय through eliminating सब non-essential फ़ॉर्म, सुविधाएँ or concepts.
minimalism is कोई डिज़ाइन or स्टाइल in जिससे the simplest and fewest elements are used to create the maximum effect.
As a specific गति in the कला it is पहचाना साथ developments in post–world War II Western Art, most strongly with American visual arts in the 1960s and early 1970s.
Prominent artists associated with इस गति शामिल डोनाल्ड judd, जॉन mccracken, agnes Martin, Dan Flavin, Robert Morris, Anne Truitt, and Frank Stella.
It is rooted in the reductive aspects of Modernism, और is प्रायः interpreted as a प्रतिक्रिया विरूद्ध अमूर्त अभिव्यंजनावाद और a सेतु to postminimal आर्ट practices.
The terms have विस्तारित to encompass a गति in म्यूज़िक जिससे सुविधाएँ repetition और iteration, as in the रचनाएं of la मोंटे यंग, टेरी Riley, Steve Reich, Philip Glass, and John Adams.
अल्पतम रचनाएं हैं sometimes ज्ञात as प्रणालियों music.
The term `` minimalist '' is often applied colloquially to designate anything that is spare or stripped to its essentials.
It has also been used to describe the plays and novels of सैमुएल beckett, the films of रॉबर्ट bresson, the कहानियां of रेमंड carver, और भी the ऑटोमोबाइल designs of Colin Chapman.
the शब्द थी पहला प्रयुक्त in अंग्रेज़ी in the जल्दी 20th सदी to describe the Mensheviks.
In chemistry and physics, Dalton 's law ( also called डाल्टन 's विधि of आंशिक pressures ) राज्य कि the कुल दबाव exerted by the mixture of non-reactive gases is equal to the sum of the partial pressures of individual gases.
This empirical law was observed by जॉन डाल्टन in 1801 और is सम्बन्धित to the ideal gas laws.
Mathematically, the दबाव of a मिश्रण of गैसों can be defined as the summation

It is assumed कि the गैसों do नहीं प्रतिक्रिया with each other
where is the mole fraction of the i-th component in the कुल मिश्रण of n components.

where is the विशेषज्ञता of the i-th घटक expressed in ppm.
Dalton 's law is नहीं exactly followed by real gases.
those deviations हैं considerably large at high pressures.
In such conditions, the आवाज़ occupied by the अणुओं can become significant compared to the free space between them.
In particular, the short average distances between अणुओं उठाता the तीव्रता of intermolecular शक्तियां between गैस अणुओं पर्याप्त to substantially बदलें the दबाव exerted by them.
Neither of those effects are माना by the आदर्श गैस मॉडल.
This is a list of the largest United States colleges and universities by नामांकन लिये कॉलेजों और विश्वविद्यालयों in the संयुक्त States.
What this सूची शामिलs:
Colleges and विश्वविद्यालयों भीतर the संयुक्त States
विश्वविद्यालयों प्रणालियों if the प्रणाली is चलाएं अंतर्गत a single administration
Enrollment is the योग of the headcount of undergraduate and graduate students
Enrollment is counted by the Integrated post-secondary शिक्षा प्रणाली भीतर the u.S. विभाग of Education.
नामांकन is the 12-month unduplicated headcount, indicating the number of unique students who attended the university during the year.
What this सूची करता not include:
Any indication of how many of the enrolled विद्यार्थी हैं पूरा or भाग समय ( e.g., कुछ विश्वविद्यालयों may have a ऊँची नामांकन, लकिन have सबसे विद्यार्थी enrolled in only a single class )
