`` Right Round '' is a सोंग performed by अमरीकी rapper flo rida, released as the सीसे सिंगल इससे उसके second studio album, R.O.O.T.S. ( 2009 ).
the सोंग सुविधाएँ अतिथि vocals from Kesha.
It थी released to रेडियो on 27 January 2009 and was digitally released on 10 February by Poe Boy Entertainment and Atlantic Records.
The song lyrically speaks of Flo Rida 's net ball referee enthusiasm, while adapting the कोरस of the 1984 मुर्दे or जिंदा सोंग `` तुम स्पिन me गोलाकार ( जैसे a रिकार्ड ) `` in its hook.
According to one of the song 's लेखक, the कोरस refers to मौखिक sex.
Kesha contributed guest vocals to the सोंग, लकिन in the संयुक्त States, during the run atop the chart, Kesha was uncredited.
The song प्राप्त ज़्यादातर ऋणात्मक समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों, जो claimed it was kitsch and misogynistic.
However, it was a वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी, reaching the शीर्ष टेन of the charts in nineteen countries worldwide.
In the United States, it became Flo Rida 's second number-one single और broke the रिकार्ड लिये first-week बिक्री जब it was released to digital retailers.
The single 's accompanying म्यूज़िक वीडियो थी निर्देशित by मैल्कम जोन्स and nominated for an MTV Video Music Award.
The song रै महरूम प्रयुक्त in अनेक फिल्मों, ऐसे as The Hangover, The Ugly Truth and the Telugu movie Pilla Zamindar.
In the movie पिच पूर्ण, the सोंग is performed by the a cappella समूह the Treblemakers.
the मुख्य इंसाफ of the संयुक्त राज्य is the सिर of the संयुक्त राज्य संघीय अदालत प्रणाली ( the judicial branch of the federal government of the United States ) and the chief judge of the Supreme Court of the United States.
The Chief Justice is one of nine Supreme Court justices ; the other eight are the संबद्ध justices of the परम् अदालत of the संयुक्त राज्य.
From 1789 until 1866, the दफ्तर थी ज्ञात as the मुख्य इंसाफ of the Supreme Court.
The मुख्य इंसाफ is the उच्चतम न्यायिक अधिकारी in the देश, और अधिनियमों as a मुख्य प्रशासनिक अधिकारी लिये the संघीय न्यायालयों और as सिर of the Judicial Conference of the United States appoints the director of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts.
The मुख्य इंसाफ भी serves as a spokesperson for the judicial branch.
The Chief Justice leads the कारोबार of the परम् अदालत.
he presides over मौखिक वितर्क before the court.
When the court renders an opinion, the मुख्य justice—when in the majority—decides who writes the court 's opinion.
the मुख्य इंसाफ भी रै significant agenda-setting power over the court 's meetings.
in the मामला of an महाभियोग of a अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, जिससे रै occurred twice, the Chief Justice presides over the trial in the Senate.
In modern tradition, the Chief Justice has the ceremonial duty of administering the शपथ of दफ्तर of the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States.
the पहला मुख्य इंसाफ was John Jay.
The 17th and current Chief Justice is जॉन G. रॉबर्ट्स, Jr.
हिरण निकट prudhoe Bay, 1973
prudhoe खाड़ी आयल फ़ील्ड is a विशाल आयल फ़ील्ड on Alaska 's North Slope.
It is the largest आयल फ़ील्ड in दोनो the संयुक्त राज्य और in उत्तर America, covering and originally containing approximately of oil.
The amount of recoverable oil in the फ़ील्ड is अधिक than दोगुना कि of the अगला largest फ़ील्ड in the United States, the East Texas oil field.
The field is operated by bp ; साझेदार हैं exxonmobil and ConocoPhillips Alaska.
Labor unions are legally recognized as प्रतिनिधि of मजदूर in अनेक उद्योग in the संयुक्त राज्य.
उनके कार्यकलाप आज centers on सामूहिक bargaining over मजदूरी, लाभ, और working शर्तें लिये उनके सदस्यता, and on representing their members in disputes with management over violations of contract provisions.
Larger unions also typically engage in lobbying क्रियाएँ और electioneering at the state and federal level.
Most unions in America are aligned with one of two larger umbrella संगठन : the afl-cio निर्मित in 1955, और the बदलें to जीत संघ जिससे विभाजित from the AFL-CIO in 2005.
Both एडवोकेट नीतियों और विधान on निमित्त of मजदूर in the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा, and take an active role in politics.
The AFL-CIO is especially चिंतित साथ वैश्विक व्यापार issues.
In 2010, the percentage of workers belonging to a union in the United States ( or total labor union `` घनत्व '' ) थी 11.4 %, compared to 18.4 % in जर्मनी, 27.5 % in कनाडा, और 70 % in फिनलैंड.
Union सदस्यता in the निजी सेक्टर रै गिरे अंतर्गत 7 % — स्तर not seen since 1932.
संघ allege कि employer-incited opposition has contributed to this decline in membership.
The most prominent unions हैं among पब्लिक सेक्टर कर्मचारी ऐसे as teachers and police.
Members of संघ हैं disproportionately पुरानी, पुरूष और निवासियों of the Northeast, the Midwest, and California.
Union मजदूर औसत 10-30 % उच्चतर अदा than non-union in अमेरिका after controlling for individual, job, and labor market characteristics.
Although much छोटी compared to उनके शिखर सदस्यता in the 1950s, अमरीकी संघ remain a prominent राजनैतिक फ़ैक्टर, both through mobilization of their own memberships and through coalitions with like-minded activist organizations around issues such as immigrant rights, trade policy, health care, and living wage campaigns.
To fight alleged employer anti-union कार्यक्रम, संघ हैं फिलहाल वकालत नई `` कार्ड जाँच `` संघीय legislation that would require employers to bargain with a union if more than 50 % of workers signed forms, or `` cards, '' stating they wish to be represented by that union.
The current कार्यविधि involves प्रतीक्षारत 45 to 90 दिनों लिये a federally supervised secret-ballot employee referendum on the subject.
The economist Joseph Stiglitz has asserted that, `` Strong unions have helped to reduce inequality, whereas weaker unions have made it easier for CEOs, sometimes working साथ मार्केट शक्तियां कि वे have helped आकार, to बढ़ाएँ it. ''
The decline in unionization चूंकि wwii in the संयुक्त राज्य रै महरूम संबद्ध with a pronounced rise in income and wealth inequality.
A Christian lacroix फ़ैशन boutique
A boutique is a small shopping outlet, विशेषकर एक कि specializes in elite और फैशनेबल वस्तुएं ऐसे as कपडे and jewelry.
The word is French लिये `` दूकान '', via लैटिन इससे यूनानी ἀποθήκη ( apothēkē ), `` storehouse ''.
The term entered into रोज अंग्रेज़ी उपयोग in the लेट 1960s जब, लिये a ब्रैड period, London was the centre of the fashion trade.
Carnaby Street and the Kings Road were the focus of much मीडिया ध्यान as घर to the सबसे फैशनेबल boutiques of the era.
Now the East of London has been regenerated और अधिक boutiques पॉप up in फैशनेबल क्षेत्रों, ऐसे as मीनार सेतु Road.
It can also refer to a specialised कड़ ऐसे as a boutique investment bank or boutique law firm.
The word is often used to describe a प्रॉपर्टी in the स्वतंत्र खण्ड of the होटल मार्केट ( ऐसे as the rockwell in लंदन ) in अनुक्रम to फर्क themselves इससे larger chains ( such as Hilton Hotels ).
In such cases the establishments aim to convey the विचार कि the आपरेशन is elite and highly specialised.
In the strictest sense of the word, boutiques would be one-of-a-kind लकिन अधिक generally बोलना, कुछ जंजीरों can be referred to as boutiques if वे specialize in particular styles.
Recently, the term `` boutique '' has प्रारंभ होने लागू to normally-mass-market वस्तुएं कि हैं either niche or उत्पादित in intentionally small numbers at very high prices.
This may be referred to as बुटीक manufacturing.
For उदाहरण, पहले the रिलीज of the वी, a समय पत्रिका आलेख सुझाया कि निन्टेंडो could become a `` boutique video-game company '', producing games for niche audiences, rather than trying to compete directly with Microsoft and Sony.
In the traditional luxury- watch industry Scalfaro International is considered as the precursor in निर्माण और बिक्री of bespoke watches.
The Swiss company uses a highly लचीली बुटीक निर्माण साईट, जिससे allows producing छोटी श्रेणी or even unique timepieces.
Although some boutiques specialise in hand-made वस्तुएं और अन्य truly one-of-a-kind वस्तुएं, अन्य simply produce t-shirts, stickers, and other fashion accessories in artificially small runs and sell them at unusually high prices.
In the early 1990s Selena प्रारंभ निर्माण उसके अपना लकीर of महिलाओं 's clothing.
Opening two boutiques labeled as `` सेलिना इत्यादि. बुटीक & सैलून '' One located in Corpus Christi and one located in San Antonio, Texas.
One थी due to खोलें in monterrey, Mexico, in 1995 but due to her death it was not opened.
Around 1999 the San Antonio location बंद और the कॉर्पस christi स्थान was closed in 2009.
In late 1990s some European retail traders विकसित the विचार of tailoring a दूकान towards a जीवनशैली थीम, in the रूप of `` अवधारणा stores '', which specialised in cross-selling without using separate departments.
One of the first concept stores was 10 Corso Como in Milan, इटली followed by colette in पेरिस और quartier 206 in Berlin.
Several well-known American chains such as Urban Outfitters, D-A-S-H, and The Gap, ऑस्ट्रेलियाई कड़ी billabong और, हालांकि कम आम, रब & टेलर adapted to the concept store trend after 2000.
Navy Federal Credit Union ( or Navy Federal ) is a credit संघ headquartered in वियना, वर्जिनिया, चार्टर्ड और regulated अंतर्गत the प्राधिकार of the National Credit Union Administration ( NCUA ) of the U.S. federal government.
Navy Federal is the largest natural member ( or retail ) क्रेडिट संघ in the संसार, दोनो in एसेट आकार और in membership.
As of सितंबर 2012, नेवी संघीय था over $ 50 अरब usd in एसेट, and over 4 million members.
Stevland Hardaway Morris ( born May 13, 1950 as Stevland Hardaway Judkins ), known by his stage name Stevie Wonder, is an American singer, songwriter, और multi-instrumentalist, a चाइल्ड prodigy जो विकसित into एक of the सबसे रचनात्मक musical आंकड़े of the late 20th century.
Blind since shortly after birth, Wonder signed with Motown 's Tamla label at the age of eleven, और continues to perform और रिकार्ड लिये motown to this day.
Among Wonder 's best known works are singles ऐसे as `` अंधविश्वास ``, `` सर ड्यूक ``, `` तुम हैं the सनशाइन of My Life `` and `` I Just Called to Say I Love You ``.
Well known albums also शामिल talking किताब, innervisions और गीतों in the कुंजी of जीवन.
He has recorded more than thirty U.S. top ten hits और प्राप्त twenty-two ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, the सबसे कभी awarded to a male solo artist.
Wonder is भी विख्यात लिये उसके कार्य as an activist लिये राजनैतिक कल्याणकारी, सहित उसके 1980 अभियान to मेक मार्टिन Luther King, Jr. 's birthday a holiday in the United States.
In 2009, अचरज थी नामित a संयुक्त राष्ट्र मेसेंजर of Peace.
In 2008, Billboard magazine released a list of the Hot 100 all-time शीर्ष कलाकारों to celebrate the us singles चार्ट 's पचासवें वर्षगांठ, साथ अचरज at क्रमांक five.
By popular vote, Stevie was inducted into The SoulMusic Hall of कीर्ति at soulmusic.com in दिसम्बर 2012.
Psychosis ( from the Greek ψυχή `` psyche '', for mind/soul, and -ωσις `` -ओएसआईs '', लिये असामान्य कंडीशन or derangement ) refers to an असामान्य कंडीशन of the mind, and is a generic psychiatric term for a mental state often described as involving a `` loss of contact with reality ``.
People suffering इससे मनस्ताप हैं वर्णित as psychotic.
Psychosis is given to the more severe forms of psychiatric disorder, during which hallucinations and delusions, सकल उत्तेजना or बेहोशी और impaired insight may occur.
The term `` psychosis '' is very broad and can औसत anything इससे अपेक्षाकृत सामान्य aberrant अनुभवों through to the जटिल और catatonic expressions of schizophrenia and bipolar type 1 disorder.
Moreover a wide किस्में of सेंट्रल बेचैन प्रणाली रोगों, इससे both external substances and internal physiologic illness, can produce symptoms of psychosis.
This led many professionals to say that psychosis is नहीं विशिष्ट पर्याप्त as a निदान term.
Despite this, `` psychosis '' is generally दिए to noticeable deficits in सामान्य बर्ताव ( ऋणात्मक लक्षण ) और अधिक commonly to विविध प्रकार of मति or delusional beliefs ( e.g. grandiosity, delusions of persecution ).
Someone exhibiting बहुत स्पष्ट लक्षण may be वर्णित as `` frankly psychotic '', whereas एक exhibiting बहुत subtle signs could be classified in the category of an `` attenuated psychotic risk syndrome ''.
An excess in dopaminergic signalling is traditionally linked to the positive symptoms of psychosis, especially those of schizophrenia.
This is thought to occur through a यांत्रिकी of aberrant salience of पर्यावरणीय stimuli.
Many antipsychotic drugs accordingly target the dopamine system ; meta-analyses of placebo-controlled ट्रायल of ये दवाएँ, however, दिखाएँ either no significant अंतर between ड्रग और placebo, or a बहुत छोटी प्रभाव आकार, suggesting कि the pathophysiology of psychosis is much more complex than an overactive dopamine system.
People experiencing psychosis may प्रदर्शनी कुछ व्यक्तित्व परिवर्तन और विचार विकार.
Depending on its severity, this may be accompanied by unusual or bizarre behavior, as well as परेशानी साथ सोशल बातचीत और पुतलियों in carrying आउट रोज़ जीवन क्रियाएँ.
General Grievous is a fictional अक्षर in the स्टार Wars universe.
A recurring antagonist, he is the Supreme Commander of the Confederacy of Independent प्रणालियों, a राजनैतिक गुट of ग्रहीय प्रणालियों waging युद्ध on the गांगेय Republic.
Trained in all seven forms of lightsaber combat by गिनती dooku, he is a निष्ठुर और शक्तिशाली योद्धा devoted to Jedi 's destruction during the Clone Wars.
His acts of wanton aggression and high Jedi body गिनती होता संकेत the आकाशगंगा to दे उसे the उपनाम the knightslayer.
Though the notorious Jedi slayer was the होने in the आकाशगंगा दौरान the क्लोन युद्धों जो था मारे the सबसे जेडी in सिंगल कॉम्बैट, he किया not hesitate to flee from battles he knew he would lose.
Statistics खेल an महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in summarizing बेसबॉल प्रदर्शन and evaluating players in the sport.
Since the flow of a baseball game has natural breaks to it, and normally players अधिनियम individually बल्कि than performing in क्लस्टर, the खेल lends itself to आसान record-keeping and statistics.
आंकडे have महरूम रखा लिये पेशेवर बेसबॉल चूंकि the सृष्टि of the नेशनल League and American League, now part of Major League Baseball.
Many आंकडे हैं भी उपलब्धियाँ इससे बाहर of प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल, इससे लीग ऐसे as the नेशनल Association of Professional Base Ball Players and the Negro Leagues.
dorothea lange 's migrant माँ depicts अक्षम मटर pickers in कैलिफ़ोर्निया, centering on फ्लोरेंस Owens Thompson, age 32, a mother of seven children, in Nipomo, California, March 1936.
USA annual real GDP from 1910–60, साथ the सालो of the ग्रेट अवसाद ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
The unemployment rate in the US 1910–1960, साथ the सालो of the ग्रेट अवसाद ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted.
The Great Depression was a severe worldwide economic अवसाद in the दशक preceding संसार War II.
The timing of the Great अवसाद varied आरपार राष्ट्र, लकिन in most countries it started in 1930 and lasted until the late 1930s or middle 1940s.
It थी the longest, सबसे फैली, और deepest अवसाद of the 20th century.
In the 21st सदी, the ग्रेट अवसाद is commonly used as an example of how far the world 's economy can decline.
The अवसाद originated in the u.S., बाद the पतन in भण्डार prices that began around September 4, 1929, and became worldwide news with the stock market crash of October 29, 1929 ( known as Black Tuesday ).
The Great अवसाद था विनाशकारी effects in countries rich and poor.
Personal income, tax revenue, profits and prices dropped, जबकि अंतरराष्ट्रीय trade plunged by more than 50 %.
Unemployment in the u.S. रोज़ to 25 %, और in some countries rose as high as 33 %.
Cities all around the संसार यहूद hit मुश्किल, विशेषकर those निर्भर on heavy industry.
Construction थी वस्तुतः halted in many countries.
Farming and rural areas suffered as क्रॉप कीमतें गिरी by लगभग 60 %.
Facing plummeting demand with few alternate sources of कार्य, क्षेत्रों निर्भर on प्राथमिक सेक्टर उद्योग ऐसे as cash cropping, mining and logging suffered the most.
कुछ economies प्रारंभ to रिकवर by the mid-1930s.
In many देशों, the ऋणात्मक प्रभाव of the ग्रेट अवसाद lasted जबतक the end of World War II.
A premature ventricular contraction ( PVC ), also known as a premature ventricular complex, ventricular premature contraction ( or जटिल or देवालय ) ( vpc ), ventricular असामयिक ताल ( vpb ), or ventricular extrasystole ( ves ), is a अपेक्षाकृत आम इवेंट जहाँ the heartbeat is initiated by Purkinje fibres in the ventricles rather than by the sinoatrial node, the normal heartbeat initiator.
The electrical events of the heart detected by the electrocardiogram allow a पीवीसी to be easily distinguished from a normal heart beat.
A PVC may be perceived as a `` skipped beat `` or लगा as palpitations in the छाती.
In a normal heartbeat, the ventricles अनुबंध बाद the atria have helped to भरण उन्हें by contracting ; in इस रास्ता the ventricles can pump a maximized amount of blood both to the lungs and to the rest of the body.
In a PVC, the ventricles contract first and before the atria have optimally भर the ventricles साथ रक्त, जिससे अर्थात् कि परिसंचरण is inefficient.
However, सिंगल ताल पीवीसी arrhythmias do नहीं usually pose a danger and can be asymptomatic in healthy individuals.
William Gary Busey ( born जून 29, 1944 ), बेहतर ज्ञात as गेरी busey, is an अमरीकी film and stage actor, and artist.
He has appeared in a किस्में of films, सहित lethal हथियार, पाइंट ब्रेक, और अंतर्गत घेरा, as खूब as guest appearances on Gunsmoke, Walker, Texas Ranger, Law & Order, and Entourage.
He was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Actor in 1978 लिये उसके भूमिका in the दोस्त होली Story.
The Anti-Counterfeiting Trade Agreement ( ACTA ), is a multinational treaty for the purpose of establishing अंतरराष्ट्रीय मानकों लिये बौद्धिक प्रॉपर्टी rights enforcement.
The agreement aims to establish an अंतरराष्ट्रीय विधिक फ्रेमवर्क लिये लक्ष्यीकरण नकली goods, जेनेरिक दवाइयाँ और कापीराइट infringement on the अंतरजाल, और होता create a new governing body outside existing forums, such as the World Trade Organization, the World Intellectual Property Organization, or the United Nations.
The अनुबंध थी हस्ताक्षरित in अक्तूबर 2011 by ऑस्ट्रेलिया, कनाडा, Japan, Morocco, New Zealand, Singapore, South Korea, and the United States.
In 2012, Mexico, the European संघ और 22 देशों जिससे हैं सदस्य राज्य of the European Union signed as well.
One signatory ( Japan ) has ratified ( formally approved ) the agreement, which होता आइये into फ़ोर्स in देशों कि ratified it बाद ratification by six countries.
Supporters have described the agreement as a जवाब to `` the बढ़ाएँ in वैश्विक व्यापार of नकली goods और pirated कापीराइट सुरक्षित works ''.
Trades Unions representing workers in the music, film और tv उद्योग और विशाल बौद्धिक property-based संगठन ऐसे as the गति चित्र संघ of अमेरिका और फार्मास्युटिकल Research and Manufacturers of America were active in the treaty 's development.
Opponents say the convention adversely affects fundamental rights including स्वतंत्रता of अभिव्यक्ति and privacy.
ACTA has also been criticised by Doctors Without Borders for endangering अभिगम to दवाइयाँ in विकासशील countries.
The secret nature of negotiations has excluded civil society groups, developing countries and the general public from the अनुबंध 's negotiation प्रक्रम और it रै महरूम वर्णित as नीति laundering by आलोचकों सहित the Electronic Frontier Foundation and the Entertainment Consumers Association.
The signature of the EU and many of its member राज्य resulted in the इस्तीफा in विरोध of the यूरोपीय पार्लियामेंट 's नियुक्त chief investigator, rapporteur Kader Arif, as well as widespread protests across Europe.
In 2012 the newly-appointed rapporteur, British MEP David Martin, recommended against the treaty, stating : `` The intended लाभ of इस अंतरराष्ट्रीय अनुबंध हैं दूर outweighed by the संभावित खतरे to civil liberties ''.
On 4 July 2012, the European Parliament rejected the agreement in plenary session, साथ 478 मतदान विरूद्ध the सन्धि, 39 in पक्ष और 165 meps abstaining.
faw semi-trailer truck in China
ट्रैक्टर साथ पक्ष डम्प ट्रेलर semi-trailer
A ट्रैक्टर साथ an auto-transport semi-trailer.
Semi-trailer truck with स्लीपर पीछे the cab.
A semi-trailer truck is an articulated vehicle that consists of a towing engine, known as a tractor in the संयुक्त राज्य और ट्रक in अनेक अन्य स्थान, संलग्न to एक or अधिक semi-trailers to carry freight.
It is also known as a transport in Canada, prime mover in Australia, सेमी, tractor-trailer, ट्रक और ट्रेलर, ट्रांसफ़र ट्रक, 18-wheeler, mack ट्रक, बिग रिग in the संयुक्त राज्य, or artic, short for articulated lorry, in Britain and Ireland.
A semi-trailer does not trail completely behind the towing गाडी, लकिन is संलग्न at a पाइंट कि is बस आगे of the rear-most धुरी of the towing unit.
इस is किया so कि a भिन्न of the वज़न of the trailer is carried by the prime mover.
This व्यवस्था अर्थात् कि दोनो ट्रैक्टर और semi-trailer होगा have a distinctly different design than a rigid truck and trailer.
The पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स हैं a पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल टोली based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
The team currently belongs to the North Division of the American Football Conference ( afc ) in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( NFL ).
Founded in, the स्टीलर्स हैं the oldest franchise in the AFC.
Pittsburgh has won अधिक सुपर कटोरी शीर्षक ( छह ), जीती अधिक afc चैंपियनशिप खेल ( आठ ) और निभाई in ( पंद्रह ) और hosted अधिक ( ग्यारह ) conference championship games than any other AFC or NFC team.
The स्टीलर्स share the रिकार्ड लिये सबसे सुपर कटोरी दिखावे with the Dallas Cowboys ( eight ).
The Steelers won उनके सबसे हाल चैंपियनशिप, सुपर कटोरी xliii, on February 1, 2009.
The Steelers were founded as the पिट्सबर्ग pirates on जुलाई 8, 1933, by आर्ट रूनी, लेने इसके असली नाम इससे the baseball team of the same name, as was common practice for NFL teams to do at the time.
The स्वामित्व of the स्टीलर्स रै remained within the Rooney family since its founding.
The वर्तमान मालिक is आर्ट 's बेटे, डान रूनी, जो रै दिए much कंट्रोल of the franchise to his son Art Rooney II.
Long one of the NFL 's flagship teams, the स्टीलर्स आनंद a विशाल, फैली fanbase nicknamed steeler स्वदेश.
The Steelers currently play their home games at Heinz फ़ील्ड on पिट्सबर्ग 's उत्तर पक्ष in the उत्तर shore पड़ोस, which also hosts the University of Pittsburgh Panthers.
Built in 2001, the stadium replaced Three नदियाँ स्टेडियम जिससे hosted the स्टीलर्स लिये 31 seasons.
Prior to Three Rivers, the Steelers had निभाई उनके खेल in pitt Stadium and Forbes Field.
Three different kinds of गेहूं और rye आटा
Flour is a powder which is made by पीस खाद्यान्न दाने, or अन्य बीज or roots ( like Cassava ).
it is the प्रमुख संघटक of ब्रैड, जिससे is a स्टेपल खाना लिये अनेक संस्कृतियों, बनाना the उपलब्धता of adequate supplies of flour a major economic and political issue at various times throughout history.
Wheat flour is one of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण भोजन in यूरोपीय, उत्तर अमरीकी, मध्य पूर्वी, भारतीय और उत्तर अफ़्रीकी संस्कृतियों, और is the धमक ingredient in most of their styles of breads and pastries.
While wheat is the most common base for flour, corn flour has महरूम महत्वपूर्ण in mesoamerican भोजन चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स, और remains a स्टेपल throughout the americas.
Rye flour is an महत्वपूर्ण constituent of ब्रैड in much of central Europe, and rice can also be used in flour, though this is relatively uncommon.
Heart rate is the number of heartbeats per ईकाई of समय, typically expressed as बीट्स per minute ( bpm ).
Heart rate can vary as the body 's need to absorb oxygen and excrete कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड परिवर्तन, ऐसे as दौरान शारीरिक कसरत, नींद, बीमारी, or as a परिणाम of ingesting drugs :
Central nervous system stimulants such as amphetamines बढ़ाएँ दिल रेट.
Central nervous system depressants or sedatives decreases the दिल रेट ( अलावा इससे कुछ विशेषकर अजीब ones साथ बराबर अजीब प्रभाव, such as ketamine which can cause - amongst many other things - stimulant-like effects such as tachycardia ).
There are अनेक तरीके in जिससे the दिल रेट speeds up or slows down.
Most involve stimulant-like endorphins and hormones being released in the दिमाग, अनेक of जिससे हैं those that are 'forced'/'enticed ' out by the ingestion and processing of drugs.
Due to individuals having a निरंतर रक्त आवाज़, एक of the physiological तरीके to उद्धार अधिक ऑक्सीजन to an organ is to increase heart rate to permit blood to pass by the organ more often.
Normal resting दिल दरों दायरा इससे 60-100 bpm.
Bradycardia is defined as a resting दिल रेट नीचे 60 bpm.
However, दिल दरों इससे 50 to 60 bpm हैं common among healthy people and do not necessarily require special attention.
Tachycardia is defined as a resting heart rate above 100 bpm, though persistent rest rates between 80-100 bpm, mainly if they are present दौरान नींद, may be लक्षण of हाइपरथाइरॉयडिज़्म or रक्ताल्पता ( see below ).

A carriage is a wheeled vehicle for लोगों, प्रायः horse-drawn ; litters ( palanquins ) और सेडान chairs are excluded, since they are wheelless vehicles.
The carriage is विशेषकर designed लिये निजी यात्री use and for comfort or elegance, though some are also used to transport goods.
It may be light, smart और तेज़ or भारी, विशाल और आरामदायक.
Carriages normally have बर्खास्तगी using पत्ता स्रोतों, अंडाकार स्रोतों ( in the 19th century ) or leather strapping.
A public passenger vehicle होता नहीं प्रायः be पुकारा a carriage – terms for such include stagecoach, charabanc and omnibus.
Working vehicles such as the ( four-wheeled ) wagon and ( two-wheeled ) cart share important parts of the history of the carriage, as is the तेज़ ( two-wheeled ) chariot.
The 2004 Indian Ocean earthquake was an undersea megathrust earthquake that occurred at 00:58:53 UTC on संडे, 26 दिसम्बर 2004, साथ an epicentre बंद the वेस्ट coast of Sumatra, Indonesia.
The quake itself is known by the वैज्ञानिक जातियाँ as the sumatra–andaman earthquake.
The resulting tsunami was given various names, including the 2004 भारतीय समंदर सुनामी, दक्षिण एशियाई सुनामी, इंडोनेशियाई सुनामी, और the मुक्केबाज़ी दिन tsunami.
The earthquake was caused by subduction and triggered a series of विनाशकारी tsunamis साथ the coasts of सबसे landmasses bordering the भारतीय समंदर, हत्या over 230,000 लोगों in चौदह देशों, और inundating coastal communities with waves up to high.
It was one of the deadliest प्राकृतिक आपदाओं in recorded history.
इंडोनेशिया थी the hardest-hit देश, followed by श्री लंका, India, and Thailand.
साथ a परिमाण of mw 9.1–9.3, it is the तीसरा largest earthquake ever recorded on a seismograph.
The earthquake had the longest अवधि of faulting कभी observed, between 8.3 and 10 minutes.
It caused the संपूर्ण ग्रह to हिलना as much as and triggered other earthquakes as far away as Alaska.
इसके epicentre थी between simeulue और मेनलैंड Indonesia.
The plight of the affected people and countries prompted a विश्वव्यापी humanitarian response.
In all, the worldwide community donated more than $ 14 अरब ( 2004 us $ ) in humanitarian aid.

Geothermal energy is थर्मल उर्जा उत्पन्न और भंडारित in the धरती.
Thermal energy is the उर्जा कि determines the temperature of matter.
The Geothermal energy of the धरती 's क्रस्ट originates इससे the असली गठन of the ग्रह ( 20 % ) and from radioactive decay of minerals ( 80 % ).
The geothermal gradient, which is the difference in temperature between the core of the planet and its surface, drives a निरन्तर conduction of थर्मल उर्जा in the रूप of ऊष्मा इससे the कोर to the surface.
The adjective geothermal originates इससे the यूनानी जड़ें γη ( ge ), meaning earth, and θερμος ( thermos ), meaning hot.
At the core of the धरती, थर्मल उर्जा is निर्मित by रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय and temperatures may reach over 5000 °C ( 9,000 °F ).
Heat conducts from the कोर to surrounding कूलर rock.
The high तापमान और दबाव कारण कुछ चट्टान to melt, creating magma convection upward since it is lighter than the solid rock.
The magma heats चट्टान और जल in the क्रस्ट, sometimes up to 370 °C ( 700 °F ).
From hot springs, geothermal उर्जा रै महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये स्नान चूंकि paleolithic टाइम्स और लिये स्पेस हीटिंग since ancient Roman times, but it is now better known for electricity generation.
Worldwide, about 10,715 megawatts ( mw ) of geothermal शक्ति is online in 24 countries.
An अतिरिक्त 28 gigawatts of सीधा geothermal हीटिंग क्षमता is संस्थापित लिये ज़िला हीटिंग, space heating, spas, industrial processes, desalination and agricultural applications.
Geothermal power is cost effective, reliable, चिरस्थायी, और environmentally दोस्ताना, लकिन रै historically महरूम सीमित to क्षेत्रों निकट tectonic थाली boundaries.
Recent technological अग्रिम have dramatically विस्तारित the दायरा और आकार of सुगठित संसाधन, विशेषकर for applications such as home heating, opening a potential for widespread exploitation.
Geothermal wells release ग्रीनहाउस गैसों फंस गहन भीतर the धरती, लकिन ये emissions हैं much निम्नतर प्रति उर्जा ईकाई than those of fossil fuels.
As a result, geothermal power has the potential to help mitigate global वार्मिंग if widely तैनात in प्लेस of चट्टान fuels.
The Earth 's geothermal संसाधन हैं theoretically अधिक than पर्याप्त to सप्लाई मानवता 's उर्जा needs, लकिन only a very small fraction may be profitably exploited.
Drilling and खोजी लिये गहन संसाधन is very expensive.
Forecasts for the future of geothermal शक्ति निर्भर on assumptions परिचय प्रौद्योगिकी, उर्जा prices, subsidies, and interest rates.
Pilot programs like EWEB 's customer opt in ग्रीन शक्ति कार्यक्रम दिखाएँ कि ग्राहक होता be willing to अदा a छोटी अधिक लिये a बेदर्दी energy source like geothermal.
But as a result of government assisted शोध और उद्योग अनुभव, the लागत of generating geothermal power has decreased by 25 % over the past two decades.
in 2001, geothermal energy cost between two and ten cents per kwh.
The term cubic foot is an इम्पीरियल और us प्रथागत ( non- मीट्रिक ) ईकाई of आवाज़, प्रयुक्त in the संयुक्त राज्य and the United Kingdom.
It is defined as the आवाज़ of a घन साथ पहलू of एक पैर ( 0.3048 m ) in length.
To गणना घन फीट गुणा length X width X height.
Hồ Chí Minh ( Northern Vietnamese pronunciation :, Southern Vietnamese pronunciation : ) ; 19 may 1890 – 2 सितंबर 1969 ), born nguyễn sinh cung और भी ज्ञात as nguyễn tất thành और nguyễn ái quốc, थी a वियतनामी कम्युनिस्ट क्रांतिकारी नेता जो थी प्रधान मंत्री ( 1945–1955 ) and president ( 1945–1969 ) of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam ( North Vietnam ).
He was a key figure in the foundation of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam in 1945, as खूब as the people’s फौज of वियतनाम ( pavn ) और the Việt Cộng ( NLF or VC ) during the Vietnam War.
he led the việt मिन्ह स्वतंत्रता गति इससे 1941 onward, establishing the कम्युनिस्ट -नियमd लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र of वियतनाम in 1945 and defeating the French Union in 1954 at the battle of Điện Biên Phủ.
He officially stepped down from शक्ति in 1955 due to स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं, लकिन remained a अत्यधिक दृश्य figurehead और प्रेरणा लिये those Vietnamese fighting for his cause—a united, communist Vietnam—until his death.
बाद the युद्ध, साइगॉन, पूंजी of the Republic of Vietnam, was renamed Hồ Chí Minh City.
All Roads Lead Home is a विशेषता फिल्मी released on सितंबर 26, 2008.
Directed by Dennis Fallon, it stars Peter Boyle, Patton Oswalt, Jason लंदन, vivien cardone, वैनेसा शाखा, पीटर कायोटी, स्टीफन मिल्टन, और Allan Kayser.
the फिल्म थी फिल्माया in and around Kansas City, Missouri.
The फिल्म बना इसके संसार प्रीमियर जनवरी 27 at the Santa Barbara International Film Festival.
The film has also recently been in several फिल्मी त्यौहार, और रै प्राप्त ख़राब समीक्षाएँ.
Peter Boyle died पहले the फिल्म 's रिलीज.
It was the last movie he appeared in.
Sales taxes in the United States are taxes placed on the sale or lease of goods और सेवाएं in the संयुक्त राज्य.
While no national general sales tax exists, the federal सरकारी levies अनेक नेशनल चयनात्मक बिक्री कर on the sale or lease of particular goods and services.
Furthermore, forty-five राज्य, the ज़िला of कोलंबिया, और गुआम थोपने सामान्य बिक्री कर कि लागू to the बिक्री or पट्टे of सबसे goods और कुछ सेवाएं, और राज्य भी may levy selective sales taxes on the sale or lease of particular goods or services.
States may also delegate to लोकल सरकारें the प्राधिकार to थोपने अतिरिक्त सामान्य or selective sales taxes.
Sales कर is गणना by multiplying the खरीदें price by the applicable tax rate.
Tax rates vary widely by क्षेत्राधिकार और दायरा from less than 1 % to over 10 %.
Sales tax is एकत्रित by the विक्रेता at the time of sale.
Use tax is self assessed by a buyer who has नहीं सशुल्क बिक्री कर on a taxable खरीदें.
Unlike the value added tax, a sales tax is imposed only एकबार, at the खुदरा स्तर.
However, in मामले जहाँ वस्तुएं हैं बेची at खुदरा अधिक than एकबार, ऐसे as प्रयुक्त गाड़ियाँ, the sales tax can be charged on the same item indefinitely.
The definition of खुदरा बिक्री और कया goods और सेवाएं are taxable vary among the states.
Nearly all jurisdictions provide numerous श्रेणी of goods और सेवाएं कि हैं exempt from sales tax, or taxed at reduced rates.
The खरीदें of goods लिये further manufacture or for resale is uniformly exempt from sales tax.
Most jurisdictions exempt food sold in grocery stores, नुस्खा medications, और अनेक agricultural आपूर्तियाँ.
Sales taxes, including those imposed by local सरकारें, हैं generally administered at the state level.
States imposing sales कर आवश्यकता खुदरा विक्रेता to collect कर इससे ग्राहक, file returns, and remit the tax to the state.
प्रक्रियात्मक नियम vary widely.
Sellers generally जरूर collect कर इससे in-state purchasers जबतक the purchaser provides an exemption certificate.
Most states allow or आवश्यकता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक remittance.
A central processing unit ( CPU ), also referred to as a central processor unit, is the hardware within a computer that carries out the instructions of a computer program by performing the मौलिक अंकगणितीय, लॉजिकल, और input/output परिचालन of the system.
The term has been in use in the कंप्यूटर उद्योग at तनिक चूंकि the early 1960s.
The रूप, डिज़ाइन, और क्रियान्वयन of CPUs have changed over the course of their history, but their fundamental operation remains much the same.
A कंप्यूटर can have अधिक than एक cpu ; this is called multiprocessing.
Some integrated circuits ( ICs ) can contain multiple cpu on a सिंगल चिप ; those ics हैं पुकारा multi-core processors.
Two typical components of a CPU are the arithmetic logic unit ( ALU ), which performs arithmetic and लॉजिकल परिचालन, और the कंट्रोल ईकाई ( cu ), जिससे extracts instructions from memory and decodes and executes them, calling on the ALU when necessary.
Not all computational systems rely on a सेंट्रल प्रसंस्करण ईकाई.
An array processor or वेक्टर प्रोसेसर रै अनेक समानांतर कम्प्यूटिंग तत्व, with no one unit considered the `` center ''.
In the distributed computing model, problems are solved by a वितरित interconnected नियत of processors.
RFID chip next to a अनाज of राइस.
This chip contains a radio-frequency electromagnetic field coil that modulates an external magnetic field to transfer a coded पहचान क्रमांक जब queried by a reader device.
This small type is incorporated in consumer products, और implanted in पालतु, for identification purposes.
Radio-frequency identification ( RFID ) is the wireless non-contact use of radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ील्ड to ट्रांसफ़र आंकड़ा, लिये the उद्देश्य of automatically identifying और tracking tags attached to objects.
The tags contain electronically भंडारित सूचना.
Some tags are powered and read at short ranges ( a few meters ) via चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड ( इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक प्रेरण ).
Others use a local power source such as a battery, or else have no बैटरी लकिन collect उर्जा इससे the interrogating em फ़ील्ड, और तब अधिनियम as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or UHF radio waves ( i.e., electromagnetic radiation at high frequencies ).
Battery powered tags may operate at सैंकड़ों of meters.
Unlike a bar code, the tag does not necessarily need to be within line of sight of the reader, और may be अंतःस्थापित in the tracked ऑब्जेक्ट.
RFID tags are used in अनेक उद्योग.
An RFID tag attached to an automobile दौरान उत्पादन can be प्रयुक्त to track इसके प्रगति through the assembly line.
दवाएँ can be tracked through warehouses.
Livestock and pets may have टैग injected, allowing धनात्मक पहचान of the animal.
Since RFID tags can be attached to clothing, possessions, or भी implanted भीतर लोगों, the सम्भावना of पढना personally-linked सूचना without consent has raised privacy concerns.
Overtime is the राशि of समय किसी works beyond normal working hours.
Normal hours may be संकल्पित in अनेक ways:
by custom ( कया is माना स्वस्थ or उचित by society ),
by practices of a दिए व्यापार or profession,
by legislation,
by agreement between employers और मजदूर or उनके प्रतिनिधि.
Most nations have ओवरटाइम मजदूर कानून designed to dissuade or prevent employers from forcing their employees to work excessively long hours.
These laws may लो into खाता अन्य considerations than the humanitarian, such as preserving the health of workers so that they may continue to be productive, or increasing the overall level of employment in the economy.
One आम दृष्टिकोण to regulating ओवरटाइम is to आवश्यकता नियोक्ता to अदा मजदूर at a higher hourly rate for overtime work.
कंपनियाँ may चुनें to अदा मजदूर उच्चतर ओवरटाइम अदा भी if not obliged to do so by law, particularly if they believe that they face a backward bending supply curve of labour.
Overtime pay rates can cause workers to कार्य longer घंटों than वे होता at a flat hourly rate.
Overtime laws, attitudes toward overtime and घंटों of कार्य vary greatly इससे देश to देश और between different economic sectors.
Visualization of कड़ी between पृष्ठों on a विक using a force-directed layout.
force-directed आलेख आरेखण algorithms हैं a class of algorithms for drawing graphs in an aesthetically pleasing way.
Their purpose is to स्थिति the नोड of a आलेख in two-dimensional or three-dimensional स्पेस so कि सब the किनारे हैं of अधिक or कम बराबर लंबाई और वहीँ हैं as few क्रासिंग किनारे as संभावित, by assigning शक्तियां among the नियत of किनारे और the नियत of nodes, based on their relative positions, and then using these forces either to simulate the motion of the edges and nodes or to minimize their energy.
While graph drawing can be a difficult problem, force-directed algorithms, होने शारीरिक simulations, प्रायः आवश्यकता no खास ज्ञान परिचय graph theory such as planarity.
Purchasing power ( sometimes retroactively called adjusted for महंगाई ) is the राशि of goods or सेवाएं कि can be खरीदा साथ a ईकाई of करेंसी.
For example, if you had taken one dollar to a store in the 1950s, तुम होता have महरूम समर्थ to ख़रीदे a वृहद क्रमांक of वस्तुएं than you would today, indicating that you would have had a greater purchasing power in the 1950s.
Currency can be either a कमोडिटी धन, जैसे सुनहरा or चांदी, or fiat करेंसी, or free-floating market-valued currency like US dollars.
As Adam Smith noted, having money gives one the ability to `` command '' others ' मजदूर, so खरीदना शक्ति to कुछ extent is शक्ति over अन्य लोगों, to the extent that they are willing to trade their labor or goods for money or currency.
if एक 's मौद्रिक आय stays the वही, लकिन the price level increases, the purchasing power of that income falls.
Inflation does not always imply falling purchasing power of one 's धन आय चूंकि it may वृद्धि तेज़ than the दाम स्तर.
A higher real income means a higher खरीदना शक्ति चूंकि रियल आय refers to the आय समायोजित लिये inflation.
For a price index, its value in the base year is usually सामान्यीकृत to a मान of 100.
The purchasing power of a unit of करेंसी, कह a डालर, in a दिए साल, expressed in डॉलर of the आधार साल, is 100/P, where P is the price index in that year.
So, by definition the खरीदना शक्ति of a डालर decreases as the price level rises.

where in this case i is an assumed भविष्य सालाना महंगाई rate.
शिक्षा in दक्षिण कोरियाई is viewed as being crucial for success and competition is consequently very heated and fierce.
A central administration oversees the process for the education of children इससे किंडरगार्टन to the तीसरा और final year of high school.
Mathematics, science, Korean, English, and सोशल अध्ययन हैं generally माना to be the सबसे important subjects.
Normally physical education is not considered important as it is not recognised, by the generally अकादमिक elitist दक्षिण कोरियाई populace, as शिक्षा और इसलिए अनेक स्कूलों lack high-quality gymnasiums and varsity athletics.
South Korea was the first country in the संसार to provide high-speed अंतरजाल अभिगम to सब प्राथमिक, जूनियर, and high schools.
Although दक्षिण कोरियाई विद्यार्थी प्रायः रैंक अत्यधिक on अंतरराष्ट्रीय तुलनात्मक आकलन जब compared to students of most Western education systems, the South Korean education system is criticised for emphasising too much upon passive learning and memorisation.
The South Korean education प्रणाली is बल्कि notably सख्त और overly संरचित as compared to its counterparts in most Western societies.
Also, the prevalence of non-school for-profit private institutes such as academies or cram-schools ( Hagwon [ 학원 ] ), which too emphasise on passive memorisation, as opposed to conceptual समझना, in विद्यार्थी हैं criticised as a प्रमुख सोशल प्रॉब्लम.
The My Lai Massacre (, ;,, or ) was the Vietnam War mass murder of between 347 and 504 unarmed civilians in South Vietnam on March 16, 1968, by United States Army soldiers of `` Charlie '' Company of 1st Battalion, 20th infantry रेजीमेंट, 11th ब्रिगेड of the americal Division.
Victims included women, men, children, और infants.
Some of the women were gang-raped and their bodies were later मिला to be mutilated और अनेक महिलाओं यहूद allegedly raped prior to the killings.
While 26 U.S. soldiers were initially चार्ज साथ दण्ड offenses लिये उनके क्रियाएँ at mỹ lai, तभी दूसरी लेफ्टिनेंट William Calley, a platoon leader in Charlie Company, was convicted.
मिला अपराधी of हत्या 22 ग्रामीणों, he थी originally दिए a जीवन sentence, but only served three and a half years under house arrest.
The massacre took प्लेस in the hamlets of my lai और my khe of Son My village.
The event is also known as the Son my नरसंहार, विशेषकर in the वियतनामी राज्य media.
The U.S. सैन्य codeword लिये the `` Viet Cong stronghold '' was `` Pinkville ''.
The incident prompted वैश्विक आक्रोश जब it became पब्लिक ज्ञान in 1969.
The massacre also increased domestic विपक्ष to the u.S. भागीदारी in the वियतनाम War.
Three U.S. servicemen who had tried to halt the massacre and protect the wounded यहूद initially denounced by अनेक u.s. कांग्रेसियों as traitors.
They received hate मेल और मौत खतरे और मिला mutilated पशु on their doorsteps.
The three were later widely praised और सजा by the फौज for their heroic actions.
The hijackers in the September 11 attacks were 19 मेन संबद्ध साथ al-qaeda, और 15 of the 19 were citizens of Saudi Arabia.
Others were इससे मिश्र, लेबनान, और the UAE.
The hijackers यहूद व्यवस्थित into चार टीमों, प्रत्येक led by a pilot-trained hijacker with four `` muscle hijackers '' who were trained to help subdue the pilots, passengers, and crew.
The first hijackers to arrive in the United States यहूद खालिद al-mihdhar और nawaf al-hazmi, जो settled in the San Diego area in January 2000.
They यहूद followed by तीन hijacker-pilots, मोहम्मद atta, marwan al-shehhi, and Ziad Jarrah early in the summer of 2000 to undertake flight training in south Florida.
The fourth hijacker-pilot, hani hanjour, arrived in सैन डिएगो in दिसम्बर 2000.
The rest of the `` मांसपेशी hijackers '' arrived in the वसन्त and early summer of 2001, just months before the September 11 attacks.
Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʿAbd Allāh ibn ʿAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 जून 632 ), भी transliterated as मुहम्मद ( ), थी a धार्मिक, राजनैतिक, और military leader from Mecca who unified Arabia into a single religious polity under Islam.
he is believed by मुसलमान और bahá'ís to be a messenger and prophet of God.
Muhammad is almost universally माना by मुसलमान as the पिछला नबी भेजा by God for mankind.
non-muslims लिहाज़ मुहम्मद as the founder of Islam.
Muslims consider him to be the restorer of an अनछुए असली monotheistic आस्था of आदम, नूह, अब्राहम, Moses, Jesus, and other prophets.
Born in about 570 ce in the arabian नगर of मक्का, he थी अनाथ at an जल्दी age and brought up under the care of his uncle Abu Talib.
He later worked mostly as a व्यापारी, as खूब as a गड़रिये, and was first married by age 25.
Being in the habit of periodically retreating to a गुफा in the surrounding kyu लिये अनेक nights of seclusion and prayer, he later reported that it was there, at age 40, that he received his first revelation from God.
Three years after this इवेंट मुहम्मद प्रारंभ उपदेश ये खुलासे सरेआम, proclaiming that `` God is One ``, that complete `` surrender '' to Him ( lit.
islām ) is the तभी रास्ता ( dīn ) स्वीकार्य to परमेश्वर, और that he himself was a prophet and messenger of God, in the same vein as other Islamic prophets.
Muhammad gained few followers early on, and was met with hostility इससे कुछ meccan जनजातियों ; he और उसके अनुसरणकर्ता यहूद treated harshly.
To escape persecution, Muhammad sent some of his followers to अबीसीनिया पहले he और उसके अनुसरणकर्ता in मक्का migrated to मदीना ( तब ज्ञात as yathrib ) in the year 622.
This event, the Hijra, marks the beginning of the Islamic पंचांग, जिससे is भी ज्ञात as the Hijri Calendar.
In Medina, Muhammad united the जनजातियों अंतर्गत the संविधान of Medina.
After eight years of लड़ साथ the meccan जनजातियों, उसके अनुसरणकर्ता, जो by तब था grown to 10,000, took कंट्रोल of Mecca in the largely peaceful Conquest of Mecca.
He destroyed the pagan idols in the city and then sent his अनुसरणकर्ता आउट to नष्ट सब of the बाकी pagan temples in Eastern Arabia.
In 632, a few months after returning to मदीना इससे the विदाई यात्राएं, मुहम्मद गिरी बीमार and died.
By the time of his death, most of the Arabian Peninsula had converted to Islam, और he था संयुक्त अरब into a सिंगल मुस्लिम धार्मिक polity.
The खुलासे ( or ayah, lit.
`` Signs [ of God ] '' ) — जिससे मुहम्मद reported receiving जबतक उसके मौत – रूप the आयतें of the कुरान, regarded by Muslims as the `` Word of God '' and around which the religion is based.
Besides the Quran, Muhammad 's जीवन ( सिरा ) और परंपराओं ( सुन्नत ) हैं भी upheld by मुसलमान as the स्त्रोत of sharia law.
They discuss Muhammad and other prophets of Islam with reverence, adding the phrase सलाम be upon उसे whenever उनके names are mentioned.
While conceptions of Muhammad in medieval Christendom and premodern times were largely ऋणात्मक, appraisals in आधुनिक इतिहास have महरूम far less so.
This is a सूची of टेबल of the सत्यापित oldest लोगों in the world in ordinal rank, such as oldest person or oldest man.
In these tables, a supercentenarian is माना 'verified ' if उसके or उसके अर्जी रै महरूम validated by an अंतरराष्ट्रीय देह that specifically deals in longevity research, such as the Gerontology Research Group ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records.
The longest unambiguously प्रलेखित इंसान जीवनकाल is कि of jeanne calment of France ( 1875–1997 ), who died at age 122 years, 164 days.
She met Vincent van Gogh when वो थी 12 or 13.
इस led to न्यूज मीडिया ध्यान in 1985, after Calment turned 110.
Subsequent investigation found दस्तावेज़ीकरण लिये calment 's आयु, परे कोई उचित सवाल, in the रिकॉर्ड of उसके native city, Arles, France.
More evidence of Calment 's lifespan has been produced than for कोई अन्य supercentenarian ; उसके मामला serves as an archetype in the methodology for verifying the ages of the world 's oldest people.
The longest undisputed जीवनकाल लिये पुरूष supercentenarians is कि of Jiroemon Kimura, who currently lives in Japan and is age as of.
Since the death of 115-year old Dina manfredini of the संयुक्त राज्य, on 17 दिसम्बर 2012, किमुरा, born 19 अप्रैल 1897, is the oldest जीना व्यक्ति in the world whose age can be documented.
He has also been the oldest जीना man चूंकि the मौत of 114-year old Walter Breuning on 14 April 2011.
Since the death of 115-year old Koto Okubo of Japan on 12 January 2013, the oldest living स्त्री रै महरूम -year-old misao okawa, भी इससे जापानी, born on 5 कूच 1898.
This is a समयरेखा of the african-american Civil Rights Movement.
the सिविल अधिकारों गति थी a स्वतंत्रता संघर्ष by African Americans in the 1950s and 1960s to gain equality.
The goals of the movement were freedom from discrimination, equal अवसर in नियुक्ति, शिक्षा और आवास, the right to vote and equal access to public facilities.
Heavy metal ( often referred to as metal ) is a genre of rock music that विकसित in the लेट 1960s और जल्दी 1970s, largely in the United Kingdom and in the United States.
With roots in blues rock and psychedelic rock, the bands that created heavy metal विकसित a मोटा, विशाल ध्वनि, characterized by अत्यधिक प्रवर्धित distortion, extended guitar solos, emphatic beats, and overall loudness.
Heavy metal lyrics and performance styles are generally संबद्ध साथ मर्दानगी and machismo.
The first heavy metal bands such as Led Zeppelin, Deep Purple and Black Sabbath attracted large audiences, though they were often derided by आलोचकों, a औकात आम throughout the इतिहास of the genre.
In the mid-1970s Judas Priest helped spur the genre 's evolution by discarding much of its blues influence ; motörhead introduced a पंक चट्टान sensibility और an increasing जोर on speed.
Bands in the New Wave of British Heavy Metal such as Iron maiden followed in a समान रग.
पहले the समाप्त of the दशक, भारी metal fans became known as `` metalheads `` or `` headbangers ``.
During the 1980s, glam मेटल became a वाणिज्यिक फ़ोर्स साथ समूह जैसे mötley Crüe and Poison.
Underground scenes produced an array of more extreme, aggressive styles : thrash metal broke into the mainstream with bands ऐसे as मेटालिका, मेगाडेथ, slayer, और एंथ्रेक्स, जबकि अन्य शैलियाँ of the सबसे चरम subgenres of metal like death metal and black metal remain subcultural phenomena.
Since the mid-1990s, popular styles such as nu metal, which often incorporates elements of grunge and hip hop ; and metalcore, जिससे मिश्रणों चरम मेटल साथ हार्डकोर पंक, have further विस्तारित the परिभाषा of the genre.
The far-right ( also known as the चरम सही ) refers to the highest degree of rightism in right-wing politics.
Far right politics involves support of strong or पूरा सोशल पदानुक्रम in समाज, और supports सर्वोच्चता of निश्चित individuals or समूह deemed to be innately श्रेष्ठ or preferable who are to be more valued than those deemed to be innately inferior or undesirable.
The far right 's वकालत of supremacism is आधारित on कया इसके adherents perceive as innate characteristics of people that can not be changed.
This stands as a point of अंतर साथ the centre-right 's आरोपण of behaviours, ऐसे as आलस्य or decadence, as the primary sources of social inequalities.
The centre right—unlike the दूर right—claims कि लोगों can समाप्त उनके behavioural हीनता through changing their habits and choices.
The original far right, which emerged in France after the फ्रेंच क्रान्ति, refused to accept the फ्रेंच गणतंत्र और समर्थित a counter-revolution to restore the French monarchy and aristocracy.
The far सही is commonly संबद्ध साथ व्यक्तियों or समूह जो थाम extreme nationalist, xenophobic, racist, religious fundamentalist or reactionary views.
The most extreme-right आंदोलनों have धड़ा दमन और नरसंहार विरूद्ध समूह of people on the basis of their alleged inferiority.
Thomas Hobbes of Malmesbury ( 5 April 1588 – 4 दिसम्बर 1679 ), in कुछ पुरानी ग्रन्थ थामस हाब्स of malmsbury, थी an अंग्रेज़ी philosopher, best known today for his work on political philosophy.
His 1651 book Leviathan established the foundation for most of पश्चिमी राजनैतिक दर्शनशास्त्र इससे the परिप्रेक्ष्य of सोशल contract theory.
Hobbes was a champion of absolutism for the sovereign, but he also developed some of the fundamentals of European liberal thought : the सही of the व्यक्तिगत ; the प्राकृतिक समता of सब मेन ; the कृत्रिम अक्षर of the राजनैतिक अनुक्रम ( जिससे led to the बाद भेद between सिविल समाज और the राज्य ) ; the दृश्य कि सब legitimate राजनैतिक शक्ति जरूर be `` representative '' and based on the consent of the people ; and a liberal interpretation of law which leaves people free to do whatever the law does not explicitly forbid.
He was one of the founders of आधुनिक राजनैतिक philosophy.
His understanding of humans as being matter and motion, obeying the वही शारीरिक कानून as अन्य पदार्थ और गति, remains influential ; और उसके खाता of इंसान प्रकृति as self-interested सहयोग, और of राजनैतिक communities as being based upon a `` social contract `` remains one of the major topics of political philosophy.
In addition to political दर्शनशास्त्र, hobbes भी contributed to a विविध सरणी of अन्य फ़ील्ड, including history, geometry, the physics of gases, theology, ethics, and general philosophy.
Emotional intelligence ( EI ) is the ability to identify, assess, and control the भाव of oneself, of अन्य, and of groups.
It can be विभाजित into क्षमता ei और trait EI.
Ability EI is usually measured using maximum performance परीक्षण और रै stronger संबंध साथ परंपरागत प्रज्ञा, whereas trait EI is usually measured using self-report questionnaires and has stronger relationships with personality.
Criticisms have centered on whether EI is a real प्रज्ञा और whether it रै वृद्धिशील वैध over iq और the बिग पाँच personality traits.
Heredity is the गुजर of traits to औलाद इससे its parents or ancestor.
This is the process by जिससे an औलाद कोशिका or सजीव acquires or becomes predisposed to the characteristics of its parent cell or organism.
Through heredity, variations exhibited by individuals can accumulate और कारण कुछ प्रजाति to evolve.
The study of आनुवंशिकता in जीवविज्ञान is पुकारा आनुवंशिकी, जिससे शामिल the फ़ील्ड of epigenetics.
For United States व्यक्तिगत आय कर, समायोजित सकल आय ( AGI ) is total gross income minus specific reductions.
Taxable income is adjusted gross income minus भत्तों लिये निजी छूटों और itemized deductions.
For most व्यक्तिगत कर उद्देश्य, agi is अधिक प्रासंगिक than gross income.
Gross income is sales price of goods or प्रॉपर्टी, ऋण लागत of the प्रॉपर्टी बेची, प्लस अन्य income.
It includes wages, interest, dividends, कारोबार आय, rental आय, and all other types of income.
Adjusted सकल आय is सकल आय कम deductions इससे a कारोबार or rental activity and 21 other specific items.
Several deductions ( e.g. medical खर्च और विविध itemized deductions ) हैं सीमित आधारित on a percentage of AGI.
Certain phase outs, including those of निम्नतर कर दरों और itemized deductions, are based on levels of AGI.
अनेक राज्य आधार राज्य आय tax on AGI with certain deductions.

the बैंड performed the सोंग on the लेट दिखाएँ साथ दाउद लेटरमैन, the tonight Show with Jay Leno, Later With Jools Holland, and Last Call with Carson Daly.
The song is a playable track on चट्टान बैंड 2 और गिटार नायिका : संसार Tour.

This version was featured on their demo cd ( जिससे प्रदर्शित जल्दी संस्करण of four tracks ).
A telephone prefix is the first set of digits of a telephone number ; in the North अमरीकी क्रमांकन योजना देशों ( देश कोड 1 ), it is the पहला तीन अंक of a seven-digit फोन number.
In other countries both the prefix and the क्रमांक may have अलग lengths.
It shows जिससे एक्सचेंज the बाकी संख्याएँ refer to.
A full telephone number is usually made up of देश कोड ( जरूरी लिये अंतरराष्ट्रीय काल्स तभी ), क्षेत्रफल कोड ( जरूरी लिये काल्स between टेलीफोन areas ), prefix, and subscriber number.
Some places सीमित निश्चित prefixes to फैक्स संख्याएँ or कोशिका फोन तभी ; in अन्य स्थान such dedicated prefixes are not used.
As telephone technology advanced, the precise significance of the उपसर्ग became धुंधला in अनेक स्थान ; 485 in लंदन, uk, थी एकबार the gulliver एक्सचेंज, लकिन अभी 44207485xxxx is बस माना एक of many number blocks served by the CLKEN Kentish Town exchange ; 4420770703xx is another.
Metformin ( bp, सुनाया, ; originally बेची as glucophage ) is an oral antidiabetic drug in the biguanide class.
It is the first-line drug of choice for the treatment of type 2 मधुमेह, in particular, in overweight और मोटे लोगों और those साथ सामान्य गुर्दा फलन.
Its use in gestational मधुमेह रै महरूम सीमित by सुरक्षा चिंताएं.
It is also used in the treatment of polycystic ovary सिंड्रोम, और रै महरूम investigated लिये अन्य रोगों जहाँ insulin resistance may be an important factor.
Metformin works by suppressing ग्लूकोज उत्पादन by the liver.
Metformin is the तभी antidiabetic ड्रग कि रै महरूम conclusively दिखाया to prevent the cardiovascular complications of diabetes.
It helps reduce LDL cholesterol and triglyceride levels, and is नहीं संबद्ध साथ वज़न gain.
, metformin is एक of तभी दो मौखिक antidiabetics in the World Health Organization Model List of Essential Medicines ( the other being glibenclamide ).
When prescribed appropriately, metformin कल्याणकारी few प्रतिकूल प्रभाव ( the सबसे आम is gastrointestinal upset ) and is associated with a low risk of hypoglycemia.
Lactic acidosis ( a buildup of lactate in the blood ) can be a serious concern in overdose and when it is prescribed to लोगों साथ contraindications, लकिन वरना, वहीँ is no significant risk.
First synthesized and found to reduce रक्त शुगर in the 1920s, metformin थी forgotten लिये the अगला दो दशकों as research shifted to insulin and other antidiabetic drugs.
Interest in metformin was rekindled in the late 1940s after several reports that it could reduce रक्त शुगर स्तर in लोगों, और in 1957, फ्रेंच चिकित्सक Jean Sterne published the first clinical trial of metformin as a treatment for diabetes.
It was introduced to the संयुक्त किंगडम in 1958, कनाडा in 1972, और the United States in 1995.
Metformin is now believed to be the most widely prescribed antidiabetic drug in the world ; in the United States alone, more than 48 लाख prescriptions यहूद भर in 2010 लिये इसके जेनेरिक formulations.
The Mount Rushmore National Memorial is a मूर्तिकला carved into the ग्रेनाइट फेस of माउंट rushmore निकट keystone, दक्षिण डकोटा, in the संयुक्त States.
Sculpted by Danish-American Gutzon Borglum and his son, Lincoln Borglum, Mount Rushmore features sculptures of the heads of चार संयुक्त राज्य राष्ट्रपतियों : जार्ज वॉशिंगटन, थामस Jefferson, Theodore Roosevelt and Abraham Lincoln.
The entire memorial कवर और is ऊपर समुद्र level.
The tallest mountain in the प्रदेश is harney शिखर ( ).
South Dakota historian Doane Robinson is credited with conceiving the विचार of नक्काशी the likenesses of प्रसिद्ध people into the Black Hills region of South Dakota in order to promote tourism in the region.
Robinson 's आरंभिक विचार थी to sculpt the needles ; however, gutzon borglum अस्वीकृत the needles साईट क्युकी of the ग़रीब विशेषता of the granite and strong opposition from environmentalists and Native American groups.
They settled on the माउंट rushmore स्थान, जिससे भी रै the लाभ of facing southeast for maximum sun exposure.
Robinson wanted it to feature पश्चिमी नायक जैसे लुईस और क्लार्क, रेड बादल और भैंस विधेयक कोड़ी लकिन borglum decided the मूर्तिकला चाहिए have a अधिक national focus, and chose the four presidents whose likenesses would be carved into the mountain.
After securing federal funding, निर्माण on the मेमोरियल began in 1927, और the राष्ट्रपतियों ' चेहरों यहूद समाप्त between 1934 and 1939.
Upon gutzon borglum 's मौत in कूच 1941, उसके बेटे lincoln Borglum took over construction.
Although the initial concept called for each president to be depicted from सिर to कमर, कमी of funding मजबूर निर्माण to समाप्त in late October 1941.
The u.S. नेशनल पार्क सेवा took कंट्रोल of the मेमोरियल in 1933, जबकि it थी स्टिल under construction, and has managed the memorial to the present day.
it attracts nearly three million people annually.

A shirt, dress shirt, button-front, button-front कमीज़, or button-up कमीज़ is a परिधान साथ a कॉलर, a full-length खोलने at the front from the collar to the hem, and sleeves with cuffs.
Shirts are predominantly used by men, since women प्रायः पहनें blouses.
The front opening is fastened using बटन or studs, और the cuffs बंद साथ बटन or cuff links.
Shirts are normally made from woven cloth, and are often accompanied by a jacket and tie, for उदाहरण साथ a सूट or formalwear, लकिन शर्ट हैं भी worn more casually.
In अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी, पोशाक कमीज़ अर्थात् specifically the अधिक औपचारिक evening garment worn with black- or white- tie, also discussed below.
Some of these औपचारिक शर्ट have stiff fronts और detachable collars attached with collar studs.
The term `` button-down '' ( which refers a type of shirt which has a collar fastened down by buttons ) is sometimes used in error to लागू to सब शर्ट ( साथ or बगैर buttoned bas छल्लों ), होने प्रयुक्त as a पर्याय लिये `` button-up '' or `` button-front ''.
Administrative Professionals Day ( also known as Secretaries Day or Admin Day ) is an unofficial secular holiday observed in अनेक देशों to recognize the कार्य of secretaries, प्रशासनिक assistants, receptionists, और अन्य प्रशासनिक support professionals.
In North अमेरिका, it is मनाये on the बुधवार of the पिछला पूरा week of April ( April 24 in 2013 ).
in फ़्रांस it is मनाये on the third Thursday in April ( April 18 in 2013 ).
In ऑस्ट्रेलिया it is मनाये on the first Friday in May

Nicolas Poussin ( ; 15 June 1594 – 19 नवम्बर 1665 ) थी the अग्रणी चित्रकार of the शास्त्रीय फ्रेंच बरॉक स्टाइल, हालांकि he spent most of his working life in Rome.
His work is characterized by स्पष्टता, लॉजिक, और अनुक्रम, और favors line over color.
Until the 20th century he remained a प्रमुख प्रेरणा लिये ऐसे classically उन्मुख कलाकारों as Jacques-Louis David, Jean-Auguste-Dominique Ingres and Paul Cézanne.
He worked in Rome for a circle of leading collectors there and elsewhere, except for a short काल जब कार्डिनल रिचलू ordered उसे वापस to फ़्रांस to serve as पहला Painter to the King.
Most of his works हैं इतिहास paintings of धार्मिक or पौराणिक विषय that very often have a large landscape element.
Jackie Keith Whitley ( July 1, 1954Stambler, Irwin, and Grelun Landon ( 2000 ). - Country Music : The Encyclopedia. - New York : St. Martin 's Press. - p.533. - ISBN 978-0-312-26487-1.—Carlin, Richard ( 2003 ). - Country Music : A Biographical Dictionary. - New York : Routledge - p.427. - isbn 978-0-415-93802-0.—larkin, कोलिन ( 1995 ). - the गिनीज ज्ञानकोष of लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक. - नई यॉर्क : स्टॉकटन दबायें - p.4462. - isbn 978-0-85112-662-3.—stanton, स्कॉट ( 2003 ). - the tombstone पर्यटक : संगीतकारों. - नई यॉर्क : जेब किताबे. - p.395. - isbn 978-0-7434-6330-0.—hicks, जोकर. - `` सिंगर कैथ whitley 's मेमोरी जिंदा through गीतों, प्रेम in घर कस्बा ''. - the केंटकी पोस्ट. - सितंबर 25, 1991.— '' Country Music Star Keith Whitley Dead at 33 ''. - Lexington Herald-Leader. - May 10, 1989.——Hurst, Jack. - `` Whitley 's Last Days ''. - Chicago Tribune. - May 14, 1989.— '' Alcohol Kills Country Singer Keith Whitley ''. - United Press International. - ( c/o The San Francisco Chronicle ). - May 10, 1989. — May 9, 1989 ), known professionally as Keith Whitley, was an American country music singer.
Whitley 's brief career in mainstream country music lasted from 1984 until his death in 1989, but he continues to influence an संपूर्ण पीढी of गायकों और songwriters.
He charted 19 singles on the Billboard देश चार्ट, सहित पाँच लगातार क्रमांक ones : `` do n't बंद अपना आँखें ``, `` जब तुम Say Nothing at All ``, `` I 'm No Stranger to the Rain ``, `` I Wonder Do You Think of Me `` and `` It Ai n't Nothin ' `` ( the last two posthumously ).
statute of ग्रैंड duchy of Lithuania, written in Polish
A statute is a formal लिखा enactment of a विधान authority that governs a state, city, or county.
typically, statutes कमांड or prohibit something, or declare policy.
The word is often used to distinguish law बना by विधान लाशें इससे मामला विधि, decided by न्यायालयों, और regulations issued by government agencies.
Statutes हैं sometimes referred to as legislation or `` black letter law. ''
As a source of law, statutes हैं माना प्राथमिक authority ( as opposed to secondary authority ).
Ideally all statutes must be in harmony with the आधारभूत विधि of the जमीन ( संवैधानिक ).
इस शब्द is प्रयुक्त in contradistinction to the common law.
statutes acquire उनके फ़ोर्स इससे the समय of उनके passage, however unless otherwise provided.
Statutes are of अनेक kinds ; namely, Public or private.
declaratory or remedial.
अस्थाई or perpetual.
A temporary statute is एक जिससे is सीमित in इसके अवधि at the time of its enactment.
It continues in force until the time of its limitation has expired, जबतक sooner repealed.
A perpetual statute is one for the फिराकर of जिससे वहीँ is no सीमित समय, हालांकि it may नहीं be expressly declared to be so.
If, however, a statute which did नहीं itself contain कोई limitation is to be governed by another जिससे is अस्थाई तभी, the पूर्व will also be temporary and dependent upon the existence of the latter.
Before a statute becomes law in some countries, it must be सहमत upon by the उच्चतम कार्यपालिका in the सरकारी, और आखिरकार published as part of a code.
In many countries, statutes हैं व्यवस्थित in topical इंतजाम ( or `` संहिताबद्ध '' ) भीतर publications called codes, such as the United States Code.
In many nations statutory law is विशिष्ट इससे और अधीनस्थ to संवैधानिक law.
the बाह्य iliac धमनियों हैं दो प्रमुख धमनियों जिससे bifurcate off the common iliac arteries anterior to the sacroiliac joint of the pelvis.
They proceed anterior and अवर साथ the medial किनारा of the psoas major muscles.
They exit the pelvic girdle posterior and inferior to the inguinal ligament परिचय एक तीसरा laterally इससे the प्रविष्ट पाइंट of the वंक्षण स्नायु on the pubic tubercle at which point they are referred to as the femoral arteries.
The external iliac artery is usually the धमनी प्रयुक्त to संलग्न the renal धमनी to the प्राप्तकर्ता of a kidney transplant.
Steam is a digital distribution, digital rights management, एकाधिक और संचार मंच विकसित by Valve Corporation.
It is used to distribute games and related media online, from small independent developers to larger तन्त्र घरों ; in अक्तूबर 2012, वाल्व विस्तारित the सेवा to शामिल non-gaming तन्त्र.
Steam provides the user with संस्थापना और स्वचालित प्रबन्धन of तन्त्र आरपार अनेक कंप्यूटर, community features such as friends lists and groups, cloud saving, and in-game voice and chat functionality.
The software provides a freely available application programming interface, Steamworks, that डेवलपर can लो लाभ of to integrate अनेक of भाप 's कृत्यों भीतर उनके तन्त्र उत्पाद, सहित नक़ल सुरक्षा, नेटवर्किंग और matchmaking, in-game उपलब्धियाँ और micro-transactions, and support for user-created content through Steam Workshop.
Though initially विकसित लिये उपयोग on microsoft खिड़कियाँ, the क्लाएंट रै विस्तारित to शामिल os x और लिनक्स संस्करण, और क्लाइंट साथ सीमित कार्यक्षमता on the प्लेस्टेशन 3 console and for both iOS and Android mobile devices.
In जोड to होने a सेंट्रल हब लिये गेमिंग तन्त्र, वाल्व रै निर्मित a संस्करण of Steam with altered functionality to be used in schools for educational software, including a modified version of Portal 2 for teaching science and critical thinking lessons.
, there are nearly 2000 खेल उपलब्धियाँ through भाप, और 54 लाख active user accounts.
As of January 2013, Steam has seen over 6.6 लाख संयुक्त खिलाड़ी.
Steam has an estimated 50–70 % share of the डिजिटल वितरण मार्केट for video games.
The Steam logo is a stylised left-side fly-crank और लाठी इससे the walschaerts वाल्व गियर of a steam locomotive.
Jerry Lewis ( born March 16, 1926 ) is an American comedian, actor, सिंगर, फिल्मी निर्माता, screenwriter और फिल्मी director.
He is known for his slapstick ह्यूमर in फिल्मी, टेलीविज़न, stage and radio.
He was originally paired up with Dean मार्टिन in 1946, forming the famed कॉमेडी team of Martin and Lewis.
In जोड to the duo 's लोकप्रिय nightclub कार्य, वे स्ट्रक्चर in a successful series of comedy films for Paramount Pictures.
Lewis is also known for his charity fund-raising telethons और स्थिति as नेशनल अध्यक्ष लिये the Muscular Dystrophy Association ( MDA ).
Lewis has won several awards for आजीवन उपलब्धियाँ इससे the अमरीकी कॉमेडी पुरस्कार, लॉस एंजिल्स फिल्मी आलोचकों संघ, और वेनिस फिल्मी पर्व, और he रै दो stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
In 2005, he received the Governors Award of the Academy of टेलीविज़न कला & sciences फलक of राज्यपालों, जिससे is the highest Emmy Award presented.
On फ़रवरी 22, 2009, the अकादमी of गति चित्र Arts and Sciences awarded Lewis the Jean Hersholt Humanitarian Award.
The Rhine ( ; ; ) is a European river that runs from the Swiss canton of Grisons in the southeastern स्विस ऐल्प्स through जर्मनी और आखिरकार बहती into the उत्तर समुद्र coast in the नीदरलैंड्स और is the बारहवीं longest नदी in यूरोपीय, at परिचय, साथ an average discharge of more than.
The Rhine and the Danube formed सबसे of the उत्तरी अंतर्देशीय frontier of the रोमन साम्राज्य और, चूंकि those दिनों, the राइन has been a vital and navigable waterway carrying trade and goods deep inland.
It has also served as a defensive feature और रै महरूम the आधार लिये क्षेत्रीय और international borders.
The many castles and prehistoric fortifications along the राइन गवाही to इसके महत्व as a जलमार्ग.
River traffic could be रोका at ये स्थितियाँ, प्रायः लिये the purpose of collecting tolls, by the state that controlled that portion of the river.
श्री ( सिंहली )
Sri ( Devanagari : श्री, IAST ; Śrī ), also transliterated as Sree or Shri or Shree is a word of Sanskrit origin, used in the Indian उपमहाद्वीप as विनम्र रूप of पता समतुल्य to the अंग्रेज़ी `` mr. '' in लिखा और बोला भाषा, or as a शीर्षक of veneration लिये deities ( प्रायः translated as `` Holy '' ).
Design of complex structures like the अंतरराष्ट्रीय स्पेस स्टेशन needs in-depth समझना of Structural Analysis.
Civil अभियान्त्रिकी is a पेशेवर अभियान्त्रिकी अनुशासन कि सौदे साथ the डिज़ाइन, निर्माण, और मेंटेनेंस of the शारीरिक and naturally built environment, including works like roads, bridges, canals, dams, and buildings.
Civil engineering is the oldest engineering discipline after सैन्य अभियान्त्रिकी, और it थी पारिभाषित to फर्क non-military अभियान्त्रिकी from military engineering.
It is traditionally broken into several sub-disciplines including environmental engineering, geotechnical engineering, geophysics, geodesy, control engineering, structural engineering, biomechanics, nanotechnology, परिवहन अभियान्त्रिकी, धरती विज्ञान, वायुमंडलीय sciences, forensic अभियान्त्रिकी, नगरपालिका or शहरी अभियान्त्रिकी, जल संसाधन अभियान्त्रिकी, materials engineering, coastal engineering, surveying, and construction engineering.
Civil engineering takes place on all levels : in the public सेक्टर इससे नगरपालिका through to नेशनल सरकारें, और in the निजी सेक्टर इससे व्यक्तिगत homeowners through to international companies.

Katherine Dunham ( June 22, 1909 – May 21, 2006 ) was an अमरीकी नर्तकी, कोरियोग्राफर, लेखक, educator, and social activist.
Dunham had एक of the सबसे कामयाब नृत्य करियर in अमरीकी और यूरोपीय थिएटर of the 20th century, and directed her own dance company for many years.
She has been called the `` matriarch और महारानी माँ of ब्लैक dance ''.
During her heyday in the 1940s and 1950s, dunham थी प्रसिद्ध throughout यूरोपीय और लैटिन अमेरिका और थी widely लोकप्रिय in the संयुक्त राज्य, जहाँ the Washington Post called her `` dancer Katherine the Great ''.
For almost thirty years she maintained the Katherine Dunham Dance Company, the only self-supported अमरीकी ब्लैक नृत्य troupe at कि समय, और over उसके long करियर वो choreographed अधिक than नब्बे individual dances.
Dunham was an innovator in african-american आधुनिक नृत्य as well as a leader in the field of dance anthropology, or ethnochoreology.
sphagnum is a genus of between 1510 और 3500 species of mosses, commonly called peat moss due to its prevalence in wet habitats where it contributes to the formation of peat bogs and mires.
Sphagnum accumulations can स्टोर जल, चूंकि दोनो जीना और मुर्दे पौधे can hold large quantities of water inside their cells ; plants may hold from 16-26 times as much water as their dry weight depending on the species.
The खाली कोशिकाएं सहायता retain जल in drier conditions.
Hence, as sphagnum moss grows, it can slowly spread into drier शर्तें, forming larger peatlands, दोनो उठाया bogs और blanket bogs.
These peat accumulations then provide habitat for a wide array of peatland plants, सहित sedges और ericaceous shrubs, as खूब as orchids और मांसाहारी plants.
Sphagnum and the peat formed from it do not decay readily because of the phenolic यौगिकों अंतःस्थापित in the मॉस 's कोशिका walls.
In addition, bogs, like all wetlands, develop अवायवीय मृदा शर्तें, जिससे produces धीमा अवायवीय क्षय rather than aerobic microbial action.
Peat moss can भी acidify इसके परिवेश by लेने up cations, such as calcium and magnesium, and releasing hydrogen ions.
अंतर्गत the सही शर्तें, peat can accumulate to a depth of many meters.
Different species of Sphagnum have different सहिष्णुता हद लिये बाढ़ और ph, so कोई एक peatland may have a क्रमांक of different Sphagnum species.
Individual peat मॉस पौधे consist of a प्रमुख स्टेम, साथ tightly arranged क्लस्टर of शाखा fascicles usually consisting of two or three spreading branches and two to four hanging branches.
the शीर्ष of the संयंत्र, or capitulum, has compact clusters of young branches.
Along the stem are scattered leaves of various shapes, नामित स्टेम पत्ते ; the आकार varies according to species.
the पत्ते consist of दो kinds of कोशिकाएं ; छोटी, ग्रीन, जीना कोशिकाएं ( chlorophyllose cells ), and large, clear, structural, dead cells ( hyaline cells ).
The latter have the विशाल water-holding capacity.
