The first aptis संस्करण of the Network Card.
This was used from the start of the APTIS era in 1986/1987 until well into the 1990s, as स्टॉक्स था to be प्रयुक्त up despite the परिचय of the new-look orange-banded version in 1991.
the परिचय of the weekday न्यूनतम किराया कंडीशन in 2002 resulted in a minor change : the red `` R '' shows that this is the `` Revised '' version of the railcard.
This version is स्टिल in उपयोग as of 2007.
The Network Railcard is a discount card introduced in 1986 by अंग्रेजों रेल, upon the सृष्टि of उनके संजाल southeast area around London, England.
The card is intended to प्रोत्साहित अवकाश सफर by रेल by offering छूट लिये adults and accompanying children on a wide range of off-peak fares.
The range of discounts available, and the price of the card, have varied चूंकि कि समय, लकिन the कार्ड रै सदा been valid for a year 's unlimited use.
It can be purchased by any person aged 16 or over from any staffed National Rail station or Rail Appointed Travel Agent, by completing an अनुप्रयोग रूप - no फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक पहचान or अन्य दस्तावेज़ीकरण is needed to ख़रीदे or उपयोग the कार्ड.
It is one of a number of concessionary किराया योजनाएं उपलब्धियाँ on the British railway system.
The United Nations ( UN ; French : संगठन देस राष्ट्र unies, onu ) is the संसार 's largest, foremost, और सबसे prominent अंतरराष्ट्रीय संगठन.
The stated aims of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र शामिल promoting और facilitating सहयोग in अंतरराष्ट्रीय विधि, अंतरराष्ट्रीय सुरक्षा, आर्थिक development, social progress, human rights, civil rights, civil liberties, political freedoms, democracy, and the achievement of lasting world peace.
The UN was founded in 1945 after World War II to बदलें the लीग of राष्ट्र, to रोकें युद्धों between देशों, and to provide a platform for dialogue.
It contains अनेक subsidiary संगठन to carry out its missions.
At its founding, the un था 51 सदस्य राज्य ; as of 2011, there are 193.
From its offices around the world, the UN and its specialized agencies decide on सत्य और प्रशासनिक मुद्दे in नियमित बैठक held throughout the year.
The organization has six principal organs : the General Assembly ( the main deliberative assembly ) ; the Security Council ( for deciding certain resolutions for peace and security ) ; the आर्थिक और सोशल परिषद ( लिये assisting in promoting अंतरराष्ट्रीय आर्थिक और सोशल सहयोग और विकास ) ; the सचिवालय ( लिये providing अध्ययन, information, and facilities needed by the UN ) ; the International Court of Justice ( the primary judicial organ ) ; and the United Nations Trusteeship Council ( which is currently inactive ).
Other prominent UN System एजेंसियों शामिल the संसार स्वास्थ्य संगठन ( जो ), the संसार खाना कार्यक्रम ( WFP ) and United Nations Children 's Fund ( UNICEF ).
The UN 's most prominent position is that of the office of Secretary-General which रै महरूम आयोजित by बैन ki-moon of दक्षिण कोरियाई since 2007.
The संयुक्त राष्ट्र मुख्यालय resides in अंतरराष्ट्रीय territory in New York City, with further main offices at Geneva, Nairobi, and Vienna.
The organization is financed इससे assessed और voluntary योगदान इससे इसके सदस्य राज्य, और रै छह आधिकारिक languages : Arabic, Chinese, English, French, Russian, and Spanish.
South Beach, also nicknamed SoBe, is a neighborhood in the city of मियामी बीच, फ्लोरिडा, संयुक्त राज्य, स्तिथ due ईस्ट of मियामी नगर उचित between Biscayne Bay and the Atlantic Ocean.
The area encompasses all of the barrier islands of मियामी बीच दक्षिण of भारतीय Creek.
This area was the first section of Miami Beach to be developed, starting in the 1910s, धन्यवाद to the विकास प्रयत्न of कार्ल G. फिशर, the lummus भाइयो, और जॉन S. कॉलिन्स, the latter जिनकी निर्माण of the कॉलिन्स Bridge provided the first vital land link between mainland Miami and the beaches.
The area has gone through numerous artificial and natural changes over the years, including a booming क्षेत्रीय अर्थव्यवस्था, increased पर्यटन, और the 1926 hurricane, which destroyed much of the area.
as of 2010, परिचय 39,186 residents live in South Beach.
The United States presidential election of 1960 was the 44th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, आयोजित on मंगलवार, नवम्बर 8, 1960.
The Republican Party nominated लाज़िम vice-president रिचर्ड निक्सन, जबकि the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी मनोनीत जॉन F. Kennedy, Senator from Massachusetts.
The incumbent President, Republican Dwight D. Eisenhower, was not eligible for re-election बाद सेवारत the अधिकतम दो शर्तें अनुमत by the twenty-second amendment.
Kennedy was elected with a lead of 112,827 votes, or 0.17 % of the popular vote, giving him a विजय of 303 to 219 in the चुनावी कॉलेज, the closest चूंकि 1916.
This was the पहला चुनाव in जिससे सब पचास of the वर्तमान United States participated.
A number of factors बताइये क्यों the चुनाव थी so close.
Kennedy gained चूंकि वहीँ थी an आर्थिक मंदी जिससे ठेस the लाज़िम रिपब्लिकन, और he had the advantage of 17 million more registered Democrats than Republicans.
Furthermore, the new votes that Kennedy gained among catholics लगभग neutralized the नई मत निक्सन gained among Protestants.
Kennedy 's campaigning कौशल decisively outmatched Nixon 's.
In the end, Nixon 's जोर on उसके अनुभव carried छोटी वज़न, और he wasted उर्जा by campaigning in all 50 states instead of concentrating on the swing states.
Kennedy used his large, well-funded campaign organization to win the nomination, सुरक्षित समर्थन, और, साथ the सहायता of the पिछला of the big-city bosses, to get out the vote in the big cities.
He relied on running mate Lyndon B. Johnson to hold the South and प्रयुक्त टेलीविज़न effectively.
This election is notable as being the first time in U.S. history that two sitting U.S. Senators ( Kennedy and Johnson ) were elected as president and vice-president, a घटना कि रै महरूम दोहराया एकबार, by बराक ओबामा और जो बिडेन in 2008 ( in दोनो मामले, the अध्यक्ष थी the younger, more junior senator ).
A poster for a c. 1884 अमरीकी उत्पादन of मैकबेथ, अभिनीत थामस W. Keene.
चित्रित, काउंटर clockwise इससे top-left, हैं : मैकबेथ और banquo meet the witches ; just after the murder of Duncan ; Banquo 's ghost ; Macbeth duels Macduff ; and Macbeth.
Macbeth is a खेल लिखा by विलियम शेक्सपियर.
It is माना एक of उसके darkest and most powerful tragedies.
Set in Scotland, the play dramatizes the corroding psychological and political effects produced जब इसके समर्थक, the स्कॉटिश रब मैकबेथ, chooses दुष्ट as the रास्ता to fulfill उसके ambition for power.
He commits regicide to become king and तब furthers उसके moral descent साथ a शासनकाल of murderous आतंक to रहो in शक्ति, eventually plunging the country into civil war.
In the end, he loses everything that gives meaning and purpose to उसके जीवन पहले खोने उसके जीवन itself.
The play is believed to have महरूम लिखा between 1603 and 1607, and is most commonly dated 1606.
The earliest खाता of a प्रदर्शन of कया थी संभवतः शेक्सपियर 's play is April 1611, when Simon Forman recorded seeing such a play at the Globe Theatre.
It was first प्रकाशित in the folio of 1623, संभवतः from a prompt book.
It was most likely written दौरान the शासनकाल of जेम्स i, जो था महरूम जेम्स vi of स्कॉटलैंड पहले he succeeded to the English throne in 1603.
James was a patron of Shakespeare’s acting company, and of सब the plays शेक्सपियर लिखा दौरान james’s शासनकाल, मैकबेथ सबसे clearly reflects the playwright’s संबंध साथ the sovereign.
Macbeth is Shakespeare’s shortest tragedy, and tells the story of a brave Scottish general named Macbeth who receives a prophecy इससे a तिकड़ी of witches कि एक दिन he होगा become किंग of स्कॉटलैंड.
Consumed by ambition and spurred to action by his बीवी, मैकबेथ हत्याएं किंग डंकन और takes the सिंहासन for himself.
His reign is racked with guilt and paranoia, and he soon becomes a tyrannical ruler as he is मजबूर to कमिट अधिक और अधिक हत्याएं to protect खुद इससे enmity and suspicion.
The bloodbath swiftly takes मैकबेथ और महिला मैकबेथ into realms of arrogance, madness, and death.
Shakespeare 's source for the tragedy is the account of King Macbeth of Scotland, Macduff, and Duncan in Holinshed 's Chronicles ( 1587 ), a history of England, स्कॉटलैंड और आयरलैंड परिचित to शेक्सपियर और उसके contemporaries, हालांकि the कार्यक्रम in the खेल differ extensively from the history of the real Macbeth.
In the backstage संसार of थिएटर, कुछ मानना कि the खेल is शापित, और होगा नहीं mention its title aloud, referring to it instead as `` the Scottish play ``.
Over the course of many सदियां, the खेल रै आकर्षित कुछ of the most renowned actors to the roles of Macbeth and Lady Macbeth.
It has been adapted to film, television, opera, novels, कॉमिक किताबे, और अन्य मीडिया.
The मिल्टन hershey स्कूल is a निजी परोपकारी ( pre-k through 12 ) boarding school in Hershey, Pennsylvania.
Originally named the Hershey Industrial School, the institution was founded and वित्तपोषित by चॉकलेट उद्योगपति मिल्टन snavely hershey और his wife, Catherine Sweeney Hershey.
The school was originally स्थापित लिये impoverished, स्वस्थ, Caucasian, male orphans, while today it serves students of various backgrounds.
The Milton Hershey School Trust, which funds the school, owns controlling interest in The Hershey कम्पनी और owns the hershey entertainment और रिसॉर्ट कम्पनी ( herco ) जिससे oversees अनेक of the area hotels along with a theme park called Hersheypark.
With over six अरब डॉलर in एसेट, the मिल्टन hershey स्कूल is one of the wealthiest schools in the world.
The school is overseen by a फलक of Managers.
The स्कूल फिलहाल serves 1,818 विद्यार्थी, and plans to grow to 2,100 students by 2013.
A member of CORE : Coalition for Residential Education, it is the largest आवासीय शिक्षा कार्यक्रम in the us.
epub may refer to:
epub, a फ़्री और खोलें e-book standard
Electronic आलेख, आलेख in scholarly जर्नल्स or मैगज़ीन कि can be accessed via electronic transmission
The Controlled Substances Act ( सीएसए ) थी enacted into विधि by the कॉंग्रेस of the संयुक्त राज्य as शीर्षक II of the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970.
The CSA is the संघीय u.S. ड्रग नीति अंतर्गत जिससे the manufacture, importation, possession, use and distribution of certain substances is regulated.
The Act भी परोसा as the नेशनल implementing legislation for the Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs.
The विधान निर्मित पाँच schedules ( classifications ), साथ varying qualifications for a substance to be included in each.
Two federal agencies, the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug Administration, determine which substances are added to or removed from the various schedules, though the statute passed by Congress created the initial लिस्टिंग, और कॉंग्रेस रै sometimes अनुसूचित अन्य substances through विधान ऐसे as the hillory J. farias और सामन्था reid date-rape रोकथाम अधिनियम of 2000, जिससे लगाई गामा hydroxybutyrate in अनुसूची i. वर्गीकरण निर्णय हैं जरूरी to be बना on मापदण्ड सहित संभावित लिये गाली ( an अपरिभाषित term ), currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States, and international treaties.
Second-language acquisition or second-language सीखना is the प्रक्रम by जिससे लोगों learn a second language.
Second-language acquisition ( often abbreviated to sla ) भी refers to the वैज्ञानिक अनुशासन devoted to studying that process.
Second language refers to any language learned in जोड to a व्यक्ति 's पहला भाषा ; हालांकि the अवधारणा is नामित second-language अधिग्रहण, it can also incorporate the learning of third, fourth, or subsequent languages.
second-language अधिग्रहण refers to what learners do ; it does not refer to practices in language teaching.
The अकादमिक अनुशासन of second-language अधिग्रहण is a subdiscipline of applied linguistics.
It is broad-based and अपेक्षाकृत नई.
As well as the various शाखाओं of भाषाविज्ञान, second-language अधिग्रहण is भी closely सम्बन्धित to psychology, cognitive psychology, and education.
To separate the academic discipline from the learning process itself, the terms second-language acquisition research, second-language अध्ययन, और second-language अधिग्रहण studies are also used.
sla शोध began as an interdisciplinary फ़ील्ड, और क्युकी of this it is difficult to identify a precise starting date.
However, it does appear to have developed a ग्रेट सौदे चूंकि the mid-1960s.
The term acquisition was originally used to emphasize the अवचेतन प्रकृति of the सीखना प्रक्रम, लकिन in हाल सालो सीखना और अधिग्रहण have become largely synonymous.
Second-language अधिग्रहण can चरितार्थ विरासत भाषा सीखना, लकिन it करता not usually incorporate bilingualism.
Most SLA शोधकर्ताओं देखिए bilingualism as होने the समाप्त परिणाम of सीखना a भाषा, नहीं the प्रक्रम itself, and see the term as referring to native-like fluency.
लेखक in फ़ील्ड ऐसे as शिक्षा और मनोविज्ञान, however, प्रायः उपयोग bilingualism loosely to refer to all forms of multilingualism.
Second-language acquisition is also not to be contrasted with the acquisition of a foreign language ; बल्कि, the सीखना of दूसरी भाषाएं और the सीखना of विदेशी भाषाएं involve the वही आधारभूत processes in different situations..
There has been much debate about exactly how भाषा is सीखे, और अनेक मुद्दे हैं स्टिल unresolved.
There are many theories of second-language acquisition, but none हैं स्वीकृत as a पूरा स्पष्टीकरण by सब sla शोधकर्ताओं.
Due to the interdisciplinary प्रकृति of the फ़ील्ड of second-language अधिग्रहण, इस is नहीं expected to happen in the foreseeable future.
Forbes list of अरबपतियों is an सालाना रैंकिंग of the संसार 's wealthiest people, compiled and published by Forbes, an American national business magazine.
The total net worth of each individual on the सूची is अनुमानित, in संयुक्त राज्य डॉलर, आधारित on उनके एसेट और accounting for debt.
The list only represents each person 's valuation on a सिंगल दिन, due to रोज़ fluctuations among exchange rates and stock valuations.
The संयुक्त राज्य रहस्य सेवा is a u.S. संघीय विधि प्रवर्तन एजेंसी कि is भाग of the United States Department of Homeland Security.
The sworn members are विभाजित among the खास एजेंटों और the Uniformed Division.
Until March 1, 2003, the Service was part of the United States विभाग of the राजकोष.
The U.S. Secret सेवा रै दो पृथक areas of responsibility:
Financial Crimes, covering missions such as prevention and investigation of counterfeiting of U.S. currency and U.S. treasury प्रतिभूति, और छानबीन of major fraud.
Protection, which entails ensuring the सुरक्षा of वर्तमान और पूर्व नेशनल नेताओ और उनके परिवारों, ऐसे as the अध्यक्ष, पास्ट राष्ट्रपतियों, वाइस राष्ट्रपतियों, अध्यक्षीय उम्मीदवार, visiting heads of राज्य, और foreign embassies ( per an agreement with the U.S. State Department 's Bureau of Diplomatic Security ( DS ) Office of Foreign Missions ( OFM ), etc. )
The Secret Service 's initial responsibility was to investigate counterfeiting of u.S. करेंसी, जिससे थी अनियंत्रित following the u.S. सिविल War.
The agency then evolved into the संयुक्त राज्य ' पहला घरेलू प्रज्ञा and counterintelligence agency.
Many of the agency 's missions were later लिया over by subsequent एजेंसियों ऐसे as the संघीय ब्यूरो of छानबीन ( एफबीआई ), ब्यूरो of दारू, तम्बाकू, firearms और विस्फोटक ( ATF ), Immigration and Customs Enforcement ( ICE ), and Internal Revenue Service ( IRS ).
`` Me and Bobby McGee '' is a सोंग लिखा by क्रिस kristofferson और फ्रेड फोस्टर, originally performed by Roger Miller.
Others performed the song later, including Kristofferson himself, and Janis Joplin who topped the U.S. singles chart with the सोंग in 1971 बाद उसके मौत, बनाना the सोंग the दूसरी posthumous number-one सिंगल in u.S. चार्ट इतिहास after `` ( Sittin ' On ) The Dock of the Bay `` by Otis Redding.
Franklin Delano Roosevelt ( or ; January 30, 1882 – April 12, 1945 ), also known by his initials, FDR, was the 32nd President of the United States ( 1933–1945 ) and a सेंट्रल फिगर in संसार कार्यक्रम दौरान the mid-20th सदी, अग्रणी the United States during a time of worldwide economic depression and total war.
A dominant leader of the Democratic Party and the only American president elected to more than two terms, he built a New Deal Coalition that realigned अमरीकी राजनीती बाद 1932, as उसके घरेलू नीतियों पारिभाषित अमरीकी उदारतावाद लिये the मध्य third of the 20th century.
With the bouncy popular song `` Happy Days Are यहाँ again `` as उसके अभियान थीम, fdr पराजित लाज़िम रिपब्लिकन Herbert Hoover in November 1932, at the depth of the Great Depression.
Energized by his personal victory over polio, FDR 's unfailing आशावाद और सक्रियता contributed to a नवीकरण of the नेशनल spirit.
He worked closely with British Prime Minister Winston Churchill and Soviet General Secretary Joseph Stalin in leading the Allies against जर्मनी और जापानी in संसार युद्ध ii, और restoring समृद्धि to the nation 's economy.
In his first hundred days in office, which began March 4, 1933, Roosevelt spearheaded major legislation and issued a profusion of executive orders that instituted the New Deal —a variety of programs designed to उपज राहत ( सरकारी कार्य लिये the बेरोजगार ), रिकवरी ( आर्थिक विकास ), और सुधार ( through regulation of Wall Street, banks and transportation ).
The economy improved rapidly from 1933 to 1937, लकिन तब relapsed into a गहन मंदी.
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937 prevented his packing the Supreme Court or passing any considerable विधान ; it abolished अनेक of the राहत कार्यक्रम जब बेरोजगारी diminished दौरान संसार युद्ध ii.
Most of the regulations on business were ended about 1975–85, except for the regulation of Wall गली by the प्रतिभूति और एक्सचेंज आयोग, जिससे स्टिल exists.
Along with several smaller programs, major surviving programs include the संघीय जमा बीमे निगम, जिससे थी निर्मित in 1933, और सोशल सुरक्षा, जिससे कॉंग्रेस passed in 1935.
As World War II loomed after 1938, with the Japanese आक्रमण of चीन और the आक्रामकता of नाजी जर्मनी, fdr दिया दमदार राजनयिक and financial support to China and Great Britain, while remaining officially neutral.
His goal was to make America the `` Arsenal of लोकतंत्र `` जिससे होता सप्लाई munitions to the Allies.
In March 1941, Roosevelt, with Congressional approval, provided Lend-Lease सहायता to the देशों लड़ विरूद्ध नाजी जर्मनी साथ ब्रिटेन.
With very strong national support, he made war on जापानी और जर्मनी बाद the जापानी आक्रमण on पर्ल हार्बर on दिसम्बर 7, 1941, कॉलिंग it a `` date which will live in infamy ``.
He supervised the mobilization of the U.S. economy to support the अलाइड युद्ध प्रयत्न.
As an active military leader, Roosevelt implemented an overall war रणनीति on दो fronts कि ended in the शिकस्त of the अक्ष शक्तियां और the विकास of the world 's first atom bomb.
In 1942 Roosevelt ordered the internment of 100,000 जापानी American civilians.
Unemployment dropped to 2 %, relief programs largely ended, and the industrial economy grew rapidly to new हाइट्स as लाखो of लोगों स्थानांतरित to नई कार्य in युद्ध centers, और 16 लाख मेन और 300,000 महिलाओं यहूद drafted or volunteered for military service.
Roosevelt dominated the American political झाँकी नहीं तभी दौरान the बारह सालो of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी, लकिन भी लिये decades afterward.
He orchestrated the realignment of मतदाता कि निर्मित the Fifth Party System.
FDR 's New सौदे गठबन्धन संयुक्त मजदूर संघ, बिग नगर मशीने, white ethnics, African Americans and rural white Southerners.
He also influenced the later creation of the United राष्ट्र और bretton वुड्स.
Roosevelt is consistently rated by scholars as one of the शीर्ष तीन u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों, साथ साथ अब्राहम lincoln और जार्ज वॉशिंगटन.
A liberal Democrat, रूज़वेल्ट पारिभाषित उसके वैचारिक स्थिति as `` a little left of center. ''
Mara Salvatrucha ( commonly abbreviated as ms, मारा, और ms-13 ) is a transnational दण्ड गिरोह that originated in Los Angeles and has spread to other parts of the United States, Canada, Mexico, and Central America.
The बहुमत of the गिरोह is ethnically रचित of Central Americans and active in urban and suburban areas.
In the U.S., the MS-13 has an especially heavy presence in Los Angeles County and the सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल in उत्तरी कैलिफ़ोर्निया ; the वॉशिंगटन, d.C. महानगर क्षेत्रों of फेयरफैक्स काउंटी, वर्जिनिया, मोंटगोमरी काउंटी, मेरीलैंड, और प्रिंस जार्ज 's County, Maryland ; Long Island, New York ; the Boston, Massachusetts area ; Charlotte, North Carolina ; and Houston, Texas.
There is also a presence of ms-13 in टोरंटो, ओंटारियो, Canada.
Members of MS distinguish themselves by tattoos covering the body and also often the face, as well as the use of उनके अपना चिह्न भाषा.
They are बदनाम लिये उनके उपयोग of हिंसा और a subcultural moral code that predominantly consists of merciless revenge and cruel retributions.
This cruelty of the distinguished सदस्यों of the `` maras '' or `` mareros '' अर्जित them a path to be recruited by the Sinaloa Cartel battling against Los Zetas in an ongoing drug war south of the United States border.
Their wide-ranging activities have drawn the attention of the FBI and Immigration and Customs Enforcement, who have initiated wide-scale छापे विरूद्ध ज्ञात और suspected गिरोह सदस्यों – netting सैंकड़ों of रखवाले आरपार the country.
Bones is an American अपराधों comedy-drama टेलीविज़न श्रेणी कि premiered on the फॉक्स संजाल in the United States on September 13, 2005.
The show is based on forensic anthropology and forensic archaeology, with प्रत्येक एपीसोड focusing on an एफबीआई मामला संचिका concerning the रहस्य पीछे इंसान remains brought by एफबीआई खास एजेंट seeley Booth ( David Boreanaz ) to the forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance `` Bones '' Brennan ( Emily Deschanel ).
The rest of the main cast includes Michaela Conlin, T. J. Thyne, Eric Millegan, Tamara टेलर, जोनाथन एडम्स, और जॉन फ्रांसिस Daley.
Created by Hart Hanson, the series is very loosely based on the life and writings of उपन्यासकार और forensic anthropologist कैथी reichs, जो भी produces the show.
Its title character, temperance ब्रेनन, is नामित बाद the समर्थक of Reichs ' crime novel series.
Conversely, Dr. Brennan writes कामयाब रहस्य novels आधारित around a fictional ( in the Bones universe ) forensic anthropologist named Kathy Reichs.
हड्डियों is a संयुक्त उत्पादन by जोसेफसन Entertainment, Far Field Productions and 20th Century Fox Television.
The series has समाप्त airing इसके आठवीं ऋतु and has been renewed for a ninth season.
Super Bowl XXV was an American football game between the American Football Conference ( AFC ) champion Buffalo Bills and the National Football Conference ( NFC ) चैंपियन नई यॉर्क दिग्गज to decide the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ) चैंपियन for the 1990 season.
The Giants defeated the Bills by the स्कोर of 20–19, जीतना उनके दूसरी ever Super Bowl.
It is the only Super कटोरी decided by एक point.
The खेल थी आयोजित at tampa स्टेडियम in Tampa, Florida, on January 27, 1991, during the height of the Gulf War.
It was thus निभाई अंतर्गत much patriotic fervor.
The proceedings included a rousing rendition of `` the star-spangled ध्वज `` by व्हिटनी ह्यूस्टन दौरान the pregame ceremonies.
The Bills and their explosive no-huddle ठोकर यहूद बनाना उनके पहला सुपर कटोरी रूप बाद finishing the नियमित ऋतु with a 13-3 record, and leading the league in total points scored with 428.
In advancing to their second Super Bowl, the Giants also posted a 13-3 नियमित ऋतु रिकार्ड, लकिन साथ a ball-control ठोकर और a रक्षा कि allowed a league low 211 points.
The game is best remembered लिये बिल्स placekicker स्कॉट नॉर्वुड 's last-second फ़ील्ड लक्ष्य attempt जिससे गई चौड़ी सही of the uprights, leading to a Giants victory, and starting a four-game losing streak in the Super Bowl for the Bills.
The Giants set a सुपर कटोरी रिकार्ड पकड़कर कब्ज़ा of the बॉल लिये 40 मिनट्स and 33 seconds.
New York also overcame a 12-3 second-quarter deficit, और बना a 75-yard touchdown ड्राइव कि खपत a सुपर Bowl record 9:29 off the clock.
Giants running back ottis एंडरसन, जो carried the बॉल 21 times for 102 yards and one touchdown, was named Super Bowl MVP.
He थी the पहला awardee to प्राप्त the newly नामित `` पीट Rozelle Trophy '' ( named for the former commissioner ).
एंडरसन भी अंकित एक रिसेप्शन for seven yards.
Malcolm X ( ; May 19, 1925February 21, 1965 ), born Malcolm Little and also ज्ञात as el-hajj malik el-shabazz ( ), was an African-American Muslim minister and human rights activist.
To his admirers, he थी a साहसी एडवोकेट लिये the अधिकारों of अश्वेतों, a man जो indicted श्वेत America in the harshest terms for its crimes against black Americans.
Detractors accused him of preaching जातिवाद, ब्लैक सर्वोच्चता, और violence.
He रै महरूम पुकारा एक of the महानतम and most influential African Americans in history.
Malcolm X 's father died—killed by श्वेत supremacists, it थी rumored—when he was young, and at least one of his uncles was lynched.
When he was 13, उसके माँ थी लगाई in a दिमागी हॉस्पिटल, and he was placed in a series of foster homes.
In 1946, at आयु 20, he गई to थाना लिये तोड़कर and entering.
In थाना, मैल्कम x became a सदस्य of the Nation of Islam ; after his parole in 1952, he quickly rose to become one of its leaders.
For a dozen years, मैल्कम x थी the पब्लिक फेस of the विवादास्पद समूह, लकिन मोहभंग with Nation of Islam head Elijah Muhammad led him to leave the Nation in March 1964.
After a काल of सफर in अफ़्रीकी और the मध्य ईस्ट, he लौटे to the संयुक्त राज्य, जहाँ he संस्थापित Muslim Mosque, Inc. and the Organization of Afro-American Unity.
In February 1965, less than a year after leaving the स्वदेश of islam, he थी assassinated by तीन सदस्यों of the समूह.
Malcolm X 's expressed मान्यताओं बदला substantially over time.
As a प्रवक्ता लिये the स्वदेश of islam he सिखाया ब्लैक सर्वोच्चता और advocated separation of black and white Americans —in contrast to the civil rights movement 's emphasis on integration.
After तोड़कर साथ the स्वदेश of islam in 1964—saying of उसके संघ with it, `` I did many things as a [ Black ] Muslim that I 'm sorry for now.
I was a zombie then... pointed in a certain direction and told to march '' —and बनने a सुन्नी मुस्लिम, he disavowed जातिवाद और expressed willingness to कार्य साथ सिविल अधिकारों नेताओ, he जारी to emphasize Pan-Africanism, black self-determination, and self-defense.
The third season of 90210, an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न श्रेणी, premiered on Monday September 13, 2010.
The CW officially renewed the show for a तीसरा ऋतु on फ़रवरी 16, 2010.
With the reveal of the networks fall 2010 schedule, वे घोषित उनके निर्णय to मूव 90210 to सोमवार नाइट्स at 8:00 pm, as a lead-in to Gossip Girl.
It premiered on सितंबर 13, 2010 और थी मिले साथ generally positive reviews from critics.
The ऋतु चयन up at the समाप्त of गर्मियाँ और focuses on the students senior year of high school.
It follows Adrianna 's वृद्धि to कीर्ति, a नई संबंध between चांदी and Navid and a confused Teddy who decides to reveal to his family and friends he is gay.
It भी सौदे साथ the aftermath of Naomi Clark 's assault.
Regular cast members for the season included Shenae Grimes, Tristan Wilds, annalynne mccord, रयान eggold, जेसिका stroup, माइकल steger, जेसिका lowndes, मैट lanter, गिलियन zinser, ट्रेवर डोनोवन and Lori Loughlin.
Rebecca Sinclair जारी उसके भूमिका as कार्यपालिका निर्माता लिये the season.
The season premiered to 1.96 million viewers and a 0.9 दरजा in the वयस्कों 18–49 जनसांख्यिकी.
Christmas-themed episode `` अवकाश दीवानगी '', hit ऋतु highs in सब कुंजी demos साथ 2.1 in The CW 's target demo of women 18–34, a 1.4 in adults 18–34 and a 1.1 in adults 18–49.
It was also the सबसे देखी एपीसोड in over a साल साथ 2.2 million viewers tuning in.
The season finale aired on may 16, 2011.
The season averaged 1.75 लाख सजीव दर्शक और a 0.9 वयस्कों 18–49 rating.
It was released on DVD in the संयुक्त राज्य on अगस्त 30, 2011.
एलिज़ाबेथ ii ( एलिज़ाबेथ एलेक्जेंड्रा मरियम ; born 21 अप्रैल 1926 ) is the संवैधानिक monarch of 16 sovereign राज्य, known as the Commonwealth realms, and their territories and dependencies, and head of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations.
She is Supreme Governor of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड और, in कुछ of उसके realms, carries the शीर्षक of Defender of the Faith as part of her full title.
On her accession on 6 February 1952, Elizabeth became Head of the Commonwealth and queen regnant of seven स्वतंत्र राष्ट्रमंडल देशों : the संयुक्त किंगडम, कनाडा, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, नई जीलैंड, दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी, पाकिस्तानी और Ceylon.
From 1956 to 1992, the क्रमांक of उसके realms varied as territories gained independence and some realms became republics.
At present, in addition to the first four aforementioned देशों, एलिज़ाबेथ is महारानी of जमैका, बारबाडोस, the बहामा, हरा, पापुआ नई गिनी, the सुलेमान आइलैंड्स, तुवालू, संत लूसिया, संत विंसेंट और the Grenadines, Belize, Antigua and Barbuda and Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Her reign of years is currently the second longest लिये a अंग्रेजों monarch ; तभी महारानी विक्टोरिया has reigned longer at over 63 years.
Elizabeth थी born in लंदन और शिक्षित privately at home.
Her father acceded to the throne as George VI in 1936 on the abdication of उसके bhai एडवर्ड viii, इससे जिससे समय वो थी the heir presumptive.
She began to undertake पब्लिक कर्तव्य दौरान the दूसरी संसार युद्ध, in which she served in the Auxiliary Territorial Service.
In 1947, she married Prince Philip, Duke of एडिनबर्ग, साथ जिसको वो रै चार children : Charles, Anne, Andrew, and Edward.
Her राजतिलक सेवा took प्लेस in 1953 and was the first to be televised.
The Queen 's many historic visits and meetings include a state visit to the Republic of आयरलैंड और reciprocal विज़िट to और इससे the Pope.
The Queen has seen major constitutional changes in her realms, ऐसे as devolution in the संयुक्त किंगडम और the patriation of the Canadian constitution.
Times of personal significance have included the births and marriages of her children, the births of her grandchildren, the investiture of the Prince of वेल्स, और the जश्न of माइलस्टोन ऐसे as उसके चांदी, सुनहरी, और डायमंड jubilees in 1977, 2002, and 2012, respectively.
Major events in the Queen 's reign have included the Troubles in उत्तरी आयरलैंड, the falklands युद्ध, युद्धों साथ Iraq and the War in Afghanistan.
There have been times of personal sorrow for her which include the death of her father at 56, the assassination of Prince Philip 's uncle, Lord Mountbatten, the breakdown of उसके children 's विवाह in 1992 ( a साल deemed उसके annus horribilis ), the मौत in 1997 of उसके पूर्व daughter-in-law, डायना, राजकुमारी of वेल्स, और the मौतों of उसके माँ और sister in 2002.
The Queen has occasionally faced कठोर दबायें आलोचना of the royal परिवार और रिपब्लिकन sentiments, but support for the monarchy and her personal popularity remain high.
The 2010 United States Senate election in फ्लोरिडा took प्लेस on नवम्बर 2, 2010 साथ साथ अन्य चुनावों to the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट in अन्य राज्य as खूब as सब चुनावों to the United States House of Representatives and various state and local elections.
Republican Marco rubio, पूर्व स्पीकर of the फ्लोरिडा हाउस of प्रतिनिधि, पराजित स्वतंत्र चार्ली crist and Democrat Kendrick Meek in a three-way race.
One term Senator Mel मार्टिनेज थी निर्वाचित in a बहुत बंद रेस against Democrat Betty Castor in 2004 with 49 % of the vote.
Martinez announced on December 2, 2008 that he would not seek re-election to the सीनेट, और होता इस्तीफा prior to the end of his term.
In August 2009, राज्यपाल चार्ली crist घोषित कि he होता नियुक्त उसके former Chief of Staff, George LeMieux, a Republican, to the Senate seat being vacated by Martinez.
Governor crist सरेआम घोषित he थी running for the seat in mid-2009.
At the time he received many रिपब्लिकन समर्थन, ऐसे as the नेशनल रिपब्लिकन senatorial कमेटी, Martinez, and the 2008 Republican presidential nominee John McCain.
His support of the American Recovery and Reinvestment अधिनियम of 2009 ठेस उसके लोकप्रियता among conservatives, और प्रत्याशी मार्को rubio surged.
In अप्रैल 2010 crist घोषित he होता बूँद आउट of the रिपब्लिकन primary and run as an independent.
The National Republican Senatorial कमेटी withdrew इसके समर्थन of crist और मांगे a refund of its campaign funds that it provided for the Crist campaign.
कांग्रेसी kendrick नम्र थी the पहला डेमोक्रेट to declare his intention to run.
Alexander Snitker was the first member of the libertarian पार्टी on the बैलट लिये senator in Florida 's history.
उपग्रह view of Doha
Doha (, ' or ', literally : `` the big tree '' ) is the पूंजी नगर of the राज्य of Qatar.
Located on the coast of the पारसी Gulf,
it had a जनसांख्यिकी of 998,651 in 2008, और is भी one of the municipalities of Qatar.
Doha is क़तर 's largest नगर, साथ over 60 % of the स्वदेश 's जनसांख्यिकी residing in दोहा or इसके surrounding suburbs, and is also the economic centre of the country.
Doha also serves as the seat of government of Qatar, which is शासित by शेख़ हमद बिन खलीफा al Thani.
Doha is घर to the शिक्षा नगर, an area devoted to research and education.
Doha was the site of the first ministerial-level बैठक of the दोहा विकास गोलाकार of संसार व्यापार संगठन negotiations.
The city of Doha held the 2006 Asian Games, जिससे थी the largest एशियाई खेल ever held.
Doha also hosted the 2011 Pan Arab Games और सबसे of the खेल at the 2011 AFC Asian Cup.
Doha hosted the UNFCCC Climate negotiations ( cop 18 ) दिसम्बर 2012 और होगा host a large number of the venues for the 2022 FIFA World Cup.
The संसार पेट्रोलियम परिषद आयोजित the 20th संसार पेट्रोलियम Conference in Doha in December 2011.
Paranasal sinuses are a group of four paired air-filled spaces that surround the nasal गुहा ( ऊर्ध्वहनु साइनस ), ऊपर the आँखें ( frontal साइनस ), between the आँखें ( ethmoid साइनस ), और पीछे the ethmoids ( sphenoid sinuses ).
The sinuses are named for the फेशियल हड्डियों in जिससे वे हैं located.
Lean manufacturing, lean enterprise, or lean production, often simply, `` Lean, '' is a उत्पादन अभ्यास कि considers the व्यय of संसाधन लिये कोई लक्ष्य अन्य than the सृष्टि of मान लिये the समाप्त ग्राहक to be wasteful, and thus a target for elimination.
Working from the perspective of the customer who consumes a उत्पाद or सेवा, `` मान '' is पारिभाषित as कोई कार्रवाई or प्रक्रम कि a ग्राहक होता be willing to pay for.
Essentially, lean is केन्द्रित on preserving मान साथ कम कार्य.
Lean निर्माण is a प्रबन्धन दर्शनशास्त्र निकला ज़्यादातर इससे the टोयोटा Production System ( TPS ) ( hence the term Toyotism is also prevalent ) and identified as `` Lean '' only in the 1990s.
TPS is renowned for its focus on reduction of the original Toyota seven wastes to improve overall ग्राहक मान, लकिन वहीँ हैं varying perspectives on कैसा this is best achieved.
The steady growth of टोयोटा, इससे a छोटी कम्पनी to the संसार 's largest automaker, रै केन्द्रित attention on how it has achieved this success.
icarly लोगो
iCarly is an अमरीकी sitcom कि airs on निकलोडियन, which premiered on September 8, 2007.
Nickelodeon promoted many episodes so far such as `` iDo '', `` iHire an Idiot '', `` ipity the nevel '', `` idate sam & फ्रेडी '', इत्यादि. as specials, despite their being regular episodes.
Every episode शीर्षक begins साथ a निम्नतर मामला i जिससे represents the internet, as in `` iCarly ''.
The show was मनोनीत लिये an एमी पुरस्कार for Outstanding Children 's Program in 2009.
The series starring Miranda Cosgrove as Carly Shay, a 13-year-old जो becomes an अंतरजाल स्टार.
The series ended on November 23, 2012 साथ the one-hour खास एपीसोड `` iGoodbye ''.
A total of 7 seasons और 109 एपीसोड यहूद ब्रॉडकास्ट.
The largest audience of the श्रेणी थी 11.2 लाख दर्शक, साथ the खास episode `` iSaved Your Life '' premiered in January 2010.
When Carly ( Miranda Cosgrove ) and her sassy best friend Sam ( Jennette McCurdy ) act funny at a school talent show ऑडिशन, tech-savvy फ्रेडी ( नाथन kress ) टेपों it और पोस्ट it ऑनलाइन without telling them.
After seeing the girls ' strong रसायन और banter, the ऑनलाइन दर्शक clamors लिये अधिक और the iCarly webcast is born.
जबकि grappling साथ ठेठ मुद्दे of किशोरावस्था, कार्ली, sam, और फ्रेडी ढूँढें आउट कि वे have भी become ऑनलाइन हस्तियाँ as their show – which features talent contests, recipes, problem-solving, and random dancing – garners international accolades.
Carly lives in Seattle, Washington with her 26-year-old brother and संरक्षक स्पेंसर ( जेरी trainor ) और produces the दिखाएँ in a makeshift third-floor studio loft in their apartment.
Their mother has never been seen or mentioned, but their father, Steven Shay ( David Chisum ), is a u.S. एयर फ़ोर्स अधिकारी temporarily stationed on a पनडुब्बी, और is प्रायः उल्लेखित लकिन is तभी देखी in व्यक्ति दौरान the श्रेणी finale episode, `` iGoodbye ''.
westlife यहूद an आयरिश लड़के बैंड which formed in 1998 and disbanded in 2012.
originally हस्ताक्षरित by साइमन cowell और managed by Louis Walsh, the group 's final line-up consisted of Nicky Byrne, Kian Egan, Mark Feehily and Shane Filan.
Brian McFadden was a सदस्य इससे 1998 जबतक उसके प्रस्थान in 2004.
Westlife sold over 50 लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी, a कुल that included studio albums, singles, video releases, and compilation albums.
The group accumulated 14 number-one singles in the United Kingdom ( the third-highest in uk इतिहास ), tying साथ चट्टान रिचर्ड और रैंकिंग just behind The Beatles and Elvis Presley.
They हासिल a कुल of 26 शीर्ष टेन singles over उनके 14-year career.
By 2010, westlife थी सूचीबद्ध in the गिनीज संसार रिकॉर्ड, as the UK 's top-selling album group of the 21st century.
They also won The Record of the Year ( the only music award based on public votes in the UK ) a record-breaking चार टाइम्स और in 2012, the आधिकारिक चार्ट कम्पनी सूचीबद्ध westlife 34th amongst the biggest-selling singles कलाकारों in British music history.
Despite their European and एशियाई कामयाबी, westlife never प्रबंधित to break into the U.S. market, achieving only one hit single in 2000 : `` Swear It Again ``.
In अक्तूबर 2011, westlife घोषित उनके इरादे to विभाजित in 2012, following उनके महानतम Hits Tour and the release of their Greatest Hits album.
The boyband 's final कॉन्सर्ट यहूद आयोजित on 22 और 23 जून 2012 at croke पार्क Stadium in Dublin.
The first farewell concert, offering 85,000 tickets, sold out in a record-breaking 5 मिनट्स और the latter screened सजीव in cinemas विश्वव्यापी.
Vitamin A is a group of nutritionally unsaturated hydrocarbons, जिससे शामिल रेटिनॉल, retinal, retinoic एसिड और अनेक provitamin a carotenoids among which beta-carotene is the most important.
Vitamin A has multiple functions, it is important लिये विकास और विकास, लिये the मेंटेनेंस of the प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली और good vision.
Vitamin A is needed by the retina of the eye in the रूप of retinal, जिससे combines साथ protein opsin to form rhodopsin the light-absorbing molecule, that is necessary for both low-light ( scotopic vision ) and color vision.
Vitamin A also functions in a very different role as an irreversibly oxidized form of retinol known as retinoic एसिड, जिससे is an महत्वपूर्ण hormone-like विकास फ़ैक्टर लिये epithelial and other cells.
in भोजन of एनिमल उत्पत्ति, the प्रमुख रूप of विटामिन a is an ester, primarily retinyl palmitate, which is converted to retinol ( chemically an alcohol ) in the small intestine.
The रेटिनॉल रूप कृत्यों as a भंडार रूप of the विटामिन, and can be converted to and from its visually active aldehyde form, retinal.
The associated acid ( retinoic acid ), a metabolite कि can be irreversibly synthesized इससे विटामिन a, रै तभी आंशिक विटामिन A activity, and does not function in the retina for the visual cycle.
Retinoic acid is used for विकास और सेल्यूलर differentiation.
All forms of vitamin A have a beta-ionone रिंग to जिससे an isoprenoid कड़ी is संलग्न, called a retinyl group.
Both संरचनात्मक सुविधाएँ हैं अनिवार्य for vitamin activity.
The orange रंजक of गाजर – beta-carotene – can be represented as दो connected retinyl groups, which are used in the body to contribute to vitamin A levels.
Alpha-carotene and gamma-carotene also have a सिंगल retinyl समूह, जिससे दे उन्हें कुछ vitamin activity.
None of the other carotenes have विटामिन कार्यकलाप.
The carotenoid beta- cryptoxanthin possesses an ionone समूह और रै vitamin activity in humans.
Vitamin A can be found in two प्रिंसिपल फ़ॉर्म in भोजन :
Retinol, the रूप of विटामिन a अवशोषित जब खाने animal food sources, is a yellow, fat-soluble substance.
Since the pure alcohol form is unstable, the विटामिन is मिला in ऊतकों in a form of retinyl ester.
It is also commercially produced and administered as esters ऐसे as retinyl acetate or palmitate.
The carotenes alpha-carotene, beta-carotene, gamma-carotene ; और the xanthophyll beta-cryptoxanthin ( सब of जिससे contain beta-ionone बजती ), लकिन no अन्य carotenoids, फलन as provitamin a in herbivores and omnivore animals, which possess the enzyme ( 15-15'-dioxygenase ) which cleaves beta-carotene in the intestinal mucosa and converts it retinol.
In general, carnivores are poor converters of ionine-containing carotenoids, and pure carnivores ऐसे as बिल्लियों और ferrets कमी 15-15'-dioxygenase और can नहीं बदलें कोई carotenoids to retinal ( resulting in none of the carotenoids होने फ़ॉर्म of विटामिन A for these species ).
Selena Marie Gomez ( born जुलाई 22, 1992 ) is an अमरीकी सिंगर and actress.
She बना उसके डेब्यू as a चाइल्ड actress in Barney & Friends.
In 2007, Gomez came to prominence as a अभिनीत डाल सदस्य in the टेलीविज़न श्रेणी wizards of Waverly Place.
She हस्ताक्षरित to हॉलीवुड रिकॉर्ड the following साल, और became the संस्थापक and lead singer of the pop band Selena Gomez & the Scene.
Their studio albums Kiss & Tell ( 2009 ), A Year Without Rain ( 2010 ), and When the Sun Goes Down ( 2011 ) were certified Gold by the रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग संघ of अमेरिका ( riaa ) और have शाखित platinum-certified singles `` naturally ``, `` Who Says ``, and `` Love You like a Love Song ``.
After the release of television films और उनके accompanying soundtracks, गोमेज़ बना उसके नाट्य फिल्मी debut in Ramona and Beezus in 2010 and starred in Monte Carlo in 2011.
Upon the निष्कर्ष of wizards of waverly प्लेस और the अंतराल of सेलिना गोमेज़ & the झाँकी in 2012, वो केन्द्रित on उसके film career, serving as a voice actress in Hotel Transylvania and starring in Spring Breakers the following year.
Her डेब्यू सोलो एल्बम is tentatively अनुसूचित to be released in summer 2013, and is preceded by its lead single `` Come & Get It ``.
Outside of her work in the entertainment industry, Gomez is involved in philanthropic क्रियाएँ through दान कार्य और विभिन्न सोशल और पर्यावरणीय कल्याणकारी.
Tracie Monique Spencer ( born July 12, 1976 ) is an अमरीकी r & b और पॉप singer-songwriter, actress, and model.
Sacramento is the capital नगर of the u.S. राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the सीट of सरकारी of Sacramento County.
It is located at the confluence of the Sacramento River and the American नदी in the उत्तरी portion of कैलिफ़ोर्निया 's expansive सेंट्रल Valley.
With an अनुमानित 2011 जनसांख्यिकी of 477,891, it is the sixth-largest नगर in कैलिफ़ोर्निया and the 35th largest city in the United States.
Sacramento is the core cultural and आर्थिक बीच of the sacramento महानगर क्षेत्रफल जिससे शामिल सात काउंटी साथ an अनुमानित 2009 population of 2,527,123.
Its metropolitan area is the fourth largest in California बाद the वृहद लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल, सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल, और the सैन डिएगो महानगर क्षेत्रफल, as well as the 25th largest in the United States.
Sacramento थी cited by समय पत्रिका as अमेरिका 's सबसे ethnically and racially integrated city in 2002.
Sacramento became a city through the प्रयत्न of the स्विस अप्रवासी जॉन sutter, sr., उसके बेटे जॉन sutter, jr., और जेम्स W. Marshall.
Sacramento grew जल्दी धन्यवाद to the सुरक्षा of sutter 's Fort, which was established by Sutter in 1839.
During the California सुनहरा फटाफट, sacramento थी a प्रमुख वितरण पाइंट, a वाणिज्यिक और agricultural बीच, और a टर्मिनस लिये वैगन रेल, stagecoaches, riverboats, the telegraph, the Pony Express, and the First Transcontinental Railroad.
California State विश्वविद्यालयों, sacramento, अधिक commonly ज्ञात as sacramento State or Sac State, is the largest local university.
It is one of the twenty-three campuses of the California State University system.
drexel विश्वविद्यालयों sacramento is located in Downtown, Sacramento.
University of the Pacific 's mcgeorge स्कूल of विधि is स्तिथ in the Oak Park neighborhood.
In addition, the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, डेविस is स्तिथ in आसपास Davis, west of the capital.
The UC Davis Medical Center, a world-renowned शोध हॉस्पिटल, is स्तिथ in the नगर of sacramento.
Memorial Day is a United राज्य संघीय अवकाश जिससे occurs प्रत्येक साल on the फाइनल Monday of May.
मेमोरियल दिन is a दिन of remembering the मेन और महिलाओं जो died जबकि serving in the United States Armed Forces.
formerly ज्ञात as सजावट दिन, it originated बाद the अमरीकी Civil War to commemorate the Union and Confederate soldiers who died in the Civil War.
By the 20th century Memorial Day had been extended to सम्मान सब अमेरिकी जो have died in सब युद्धों.
It typically marks the start of the गर्मियाँ अवकाश ऋतु, जबकि Labor Day marks its end.
Many people visit cemeteries and memorials, विशेषकर to सम्मान those जो have died in military service.
Many स्वयंसेवक प्लेस an अमरीकी ध्वज on प्रत्येक grave in national cemeteries.
By the early 20th century, Memorial Day was an occasion for more general expressions of memory, as people visited the क़ब्रों of उनके मृतक रिश्तेदारों in गिरिजाघर कब्रिस्तान, whether वे था परोसा in the सैन्य or not.
It भी became a long वीकेंड increasingly devoted to shopping, family gatherings, fireworks, trips to the beach, and national media events.
Annual Decoration Days for particular कब्रिस्तान हैं आयोजित on a संडे in लेट वसन्त or जल्दी गर्मियाँ in कुछ ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों of the American South, notably in the mountains.
In cases involving a family graveyard where रिमोट पूर्वजो as खूब as those जो यहूद मृतक अधिक recently हैं दफ्न, इस may लो on the character of an extended family reunion to which some people travel hundreds of miles.
People gather on the designated day and put पुष्प on क़ब्रों और नवीनीकृत सम्पर्क साथ kinfolk और अन्य.
There often is a religious service and a `` dinner on the ground, '' the traditional term for a potluck भोजन in जिससे लोगों प्रयुक्त to स्प्रेड the बर्तन आउट on चादरें or चौके on the grass.
It is believed that this practice began पहले the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध और यूँ may प्रतिबिंबित the रियल उत्पत्ति of the `` memorial day '' idea.
Memorial Day is not to be confused with दिग्गजों दिन ; मेमोरियल दिन is a दिन of remembering the मेन and women who died while serving, while Veterans Day celebrates the service of all U.S. military veterans, living or dead.
Mt. zion गिरिजाघर राज्य इतिहास मार्कर near Philadelphia, Mississippi.
Freedom Summer ( also known as the Mississippi Summer Project ) was a campaign in the संयुक्त राज्य शुभारम्भ in जून 1964 to attempt to पंजीकरण as अनेक अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी मतदाता as संभावित in मिसिसिपी, जिससे had historically excluded most blacks from voting.
The project also set up dozens of Freedom Schools, Freedom Houses, and community centers in छोटी कस्बों throughout मिसिसिपी to सहायता the लोकल black population.
The project was organized by the Council of Federated Organizations ( COFO ), a coalition of the Mississippi branches of the चार प्रमुख सिविल अधिकारों संगठन ( sncc, CORE, NAACP and SCLC ).
Most of the impetus, leadership, and financing for the गर्मियाँ प्रोजेक्ट आए इससे the sncc.
Robert Parris Moses, SNCC field secretary and co-director of cofo, निर्देशित the गर्मियाँ project.
Blues is the name given to both a musical form and a music genre that originated in communities of primarily the `` गहन दक्षिण `` of the संयुक्त राज्य around the समाप्त of the 19th सदी इससे spirituals, कार्य गीतों, फ़ील्ड hollers, shouts और chants, and rhymed simple narrative ballads.
The blues form, ubiquitous in jazz, rhythm and blues, and rock and roll is characterized by specific chord progressions, of जिससे the twelve-bar blues chord progression is the most common.
The blue notes that, for expressive purposes are सुंग or निभाई flattened or धीरे झुकी ( नाबालिग 3rd to major 3rd ) in relation to the pitch of the major scale, are also an important part of the sound.
The ब्लूज़ विधा is आधारित on the ब्लूज़ रूप लकिन possesses अन्य विशेषताएँ such as specific lyrics, bass lines, and instruments.
Blues can be subdivided into अनेक subgenres ranging इससे देश to शहरी ब्लूज़ that were more or less popular during different periods of the 20th century.
Best ज्ञात हैं the डेल्टा, piedmont, जम्प, and Chicago blues styles.
World War II marked the transition from ध्वनिक to इलेक्ट्रिक ब्लूज़ और the प्रगतिशील खोलने of ब्लूज़ म्यूज़िक to a wider audience, especially white listeners.
In the 1960s and 1970s, a संकर रूप पुकारा blues-rock विकसित.
The पद `` the ब्लूज़ '' refers to the `` ब्लू शैतानों '', अर्थ वेदना और उदासी ; an जल्दी उपयोग of the term in this sense is found in George Colman 's one-act farce Blue Devils ( 1798 ).
Though the use of the phrase in African-American music may be older, it has been attested to since 1912, when Hart Wand 's `` डलास ब्लूज़ `` became the पहला स्वत्वाधिकार ब्लूज़ संयोजन.
In lyrics the phrase is often used to describe a उदास मनोदशा.
A quarter dollar, commonly shortened to quarter, is a सिक्का लायक 1⁄4 of a संयुक्त राज्य डालर or 25 cents.
The quarter रै महरूम उत्पादित since 1796.
The choice of 25¢ as a denomination, as opposed to 20¢ which is more common in other parts of the world, originated with the अभ्यास of dividing स्पेनी Milled Dollars into eight wedge shaped segments ( cf. `` pieces of eight `` ).
At one time `` two bits ``, i.e. two wedges, each wedge an आठवीं, यूँ a क्वार्टर of the स्पेनी रियल, थी a आम nickname for a quarter.
Day of the Dead ( ) is a मैक्सिकन अवकाश मनाये throughout Mexico and around the world in other cultures.
The holiday focuses on gatherings of family और मित्रों to दुवा लिये और याद मित्रों और परिवार सदस्यों जो have died.
It is particularly celebrated in Mexico, where it is a नेशनल अवकाश, और सब बैंको are closed.
The celebration takes प्लेस on नवम्बर 1 और 2, in कनेक्शन साथ the Catholic holidays of All Saints ' Day and All Souls ' Day.
Traditions connected with the holiday include building private altars honoring the deceased using sugar skulls, marigolds, और the पसंदीदा भोजन और पेय of the रजि और visiting क़ब्रों with these as gifts.
They also छोड़ possessions of the मृतक.
Scholars trace the origins of the modern Mexican holiday to स्वदेशी observances डेटिंग वापस सैंकड़ों of सालो और to an एज़टेक पर्व समर्पित to the goddess Mictecacihuatl.
The holiday has spread throughout the world : In Brazil, Dia de Finados is a पब्लिक अवकाश कि अनेक brazilians celebrate by visiting कब्रिस्तान और churches.
In Spain, there are festivals and parades, and, at the समाप्त of the दिन, लोगों एकत्रित at कब्रिस्तान और दुवा लिये their dead loved ones.
Similar observances occur elsewhere in Europe, and similarly प्रसंग जश्न appear in अनेक एशियाई और अफ़्रीकी संस्कृतियों.
ANITA mk viii.
The ANITA Mark VII and ANITA Mark VIII calculators यहूद शुभारम्भ simultaneously in लेट 1961 as the संसार 's पहला all- इलेक्ट्रॉनिक desktop calculators.
designed और निर्मित by the Bell Punch Co.
in Britain, and marketed through its Sumlock Comptometer प्रभाग, वे प्रयुक्त वैक्यूम tubes और cold-cathode switching tubes in उनके logic circuits and nixie tubes for their numerical displays.
They were the first of a series of desktop and hand-held इलेक्ट्रॉनिक calculators कि the कम्पनी थी to develop और sell under the ANITA name into the mid-1970s.
George Washington ( –, 1799 ) थी the पहला अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1789–1797 ), the commander-in-chief of the महाद्वीपीय फौज during the American Revolutionary War, and one of the Founding Fathers of the United States.
He presided over the convention कि drafted the संविधान, जिससे replaced the Articles of Confederation and established the position of President.
वॉशिंगटन थी निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष as the सर्वसम्मत choice of the 69 electors in 1788, and he served two terms in office.
He oversaw the creation of a strong, well-financed नेशनल सरकारी कि कायम neutrality in the युद्धों raging in यूरोपीय, suppressed विद्रोह, and won acceptance among Americans of all types.
His leadership स्टाइल स्थापित अनेक फ़ॉर्म और संस्कार of सरकारी कि have महरूम प्रयुक्त since, such as using a cabinet system and delivering an inaugural address.
Further, the peaceful transition from his presidency to the presidency of John Adams स्थापित a परंपरा कि continues into the 21st सदी.
Washington was hailed as `` father of his country `` even during his lifetime.
Washington was born into the प्रांतीय gentry of औपनिवेशिक वर्जिनिया ; उसके धनवान planter family owned tobacco plantations and slaves.
After both his father and older brother died जब he थी यंग, वॉशिंगटन became personally और professionally संलग्न to the शक्तिशाली विलियम फेयरफैक्स, जो प्रचारित उसके career as a surveyor and soldier.
Washington quickly became a senior officer in the colonial शक्तियां दौरान the पहला चरण of the फ्रेंच और भारतीय युद्ध.
Chosen by the Second महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस in 1775 to be commander-in-chief of the महाद्वीपीय फौज in the अमरीकी Revolution, Washington managed to force the British out of Boston in 1776, but was defeated and almost captured later that year when he lost New York City.
After crossing the Delaware River in the मुर्दे of शीत, he पराजित the अंग्रेजों in दो लड़ाइयों, retook New Jersey and restored momentum to the Patriot cause.
Because of his strategy, Revolutionary forces captured two major अंग्रेजों सेना at साराटोगा in 1777 and Yorktown in 1781.
Historians laud Washington लिये उसके चयन और पर्यवेक्षण of उसके सेनापतियों, प्रोत्साहन of मनोबल और क्षमता to थाम साथ the फौज, समन्वय साथ the state governors and state militia units, relations with Congress and attention to supplies, logistics, and training.
In battle, however, वॉशिंगटन थी repeatedly outmaneuvered by British generals with larger armies.
After victory had been finalized in 1783, वॉशिंगटन resigned as commander-in-chief बल्कि than seize शक्ति, proving his opposition to dictatorship and his commitment to American republicanism.
Dissatisfied with the कमजोरियों of the आलेख of कनफेडरेशन, in 1787 वॉशिंगटन presided over the संवैधानिक सम्मेलन कि drafted the United States Constitution.
Elected unanimously as the first President of the संयुक्त राज्य in 1789, he attempted to लाओ प्रतिद्वंद्वी गिरोहों साथ to unify the nation.
He supported Alexander Hamilton 's programs to अदा बंद सब राज्य और नेशनल कर्ज़, to implement an प्रभावी कर प्रणाली और to बनाएँ a नेशनल बैंको ( despite opposition from Thomas Jefferson ).
Washington proclaimed the संयुक्त राज्य न्यूट्रल in the wars raging in Europe after 1793.
He avoided war with Great Britain and गारंटी a दशक of सलाम और लाभप्रद व्यापार by securing the jay सन्धि in 1795, despite intense opposition from the Jeffersonians.
Although never officially joining the federalist पार्टी, he समर्थित इसके programs.
Washington 's Farewell पता थी an influential प्राइमर on रिपब्लिकन पुण्य और a चेतावनी विरूद्ध partisanship, sectionalism, and involvement in foreign wars.
He retired from the presidency in 1797 and returned to his घर, माउंट vernon, और उसके घरेलू जीवन जहाँ he प्रबंधित a किस्में of उद्यमों.
He freed all his स्लेव by उसके फाइनल होगा.
वॉशिंगटन था a दृष्टि of a ग्रेट और शक्तिशाली स्वदेश that would be built on republican lines using federal power.
He sought to use the national government to preserve liberty, improve infrastructure, open the western lands, प्रचार कॉमर्स, मिला a स्थाई पूंजी, reduce क्षेत्रीय तनाव और प्रचार a स्पिरिट of American nationalism.
At his death, Washington was eulogized as `` first in war, first in सलाम, और पहला in the दिल of his countrymen '' by Henry Lee.
The Federalists made him the symbol of their party but for many years, the Jeffersonians जारी to अविश्वास उसके influence और विलम्बित भवन the वॉशिंगटन Monument.
As the leader of the first successful revolution against a colonial empire in world history, वॉशिंगटन became an अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रतीक लिये मुक्ति और राष्ट्रवाद, विशेषकर in फ़्रांस and Latin America.
Fiscal साल 2012 u.S. संघीय Spending – Cash or Budget Basis.
Fiscal Year 2012 u.S. संघीय रसीदें.
The Budget of the United States सरकारी प्रायः begins as the अध्यक्ष 's प्रस्ताव to the u.S. कॉंग्रेस जिससे अनुशंसा funding levels for the next fiscal year, beginning October 1.
However, Congress is the body required by law to pass a budget annually और to submit the बजट passed by दोनो घरों to the President for signature.
Congressional decisions are governed by rules और विधान regarding the संघीय budget process.
Budget committees set spending limits for the House and Senate समितियों और लिये appropriations subcommittees, जिससे तब स्वीकृति व्यक्तिगत appropriations बिल्स to allocate funding to various federal programs.
If Congress fails to pass an annual budget ( as has been the case since 2009 ), a series of appropriations बिल्स जरूर be passed as `` रोकें गैप '' उपायों.
After Congress approves an appropriations bill, it is sent to the President, who may चिह्न it into विधि, or may वीटो it ( as he होता a बजट जब passed by the कॉंग्रेस ).
A vetoed bill is sent वापस to कॉंग्रेस, जिससे can pass it into विधि साथ a two-thirds बहुमत in each chamber.
Congress may भी combine सब or कुछ appropriations बिल्स into an omnibus reconciliation bill.
In जोड, the अध्यक्ष may निवेदन और the कॉंग्रेस may pass supplemental appropriations bills or emergency supplemental appropriations bills.
Several government agencies provide बजट आंकड़ा और विश्लेषण.
These include the Government Accountability Office ( GAO ), Congressional Budget Office, the Office of प्रबन्धन और बजट ( omb ) और the u.S. राजकोष विभाग.
These agencies have reported कि the संघीय सरकारी is facing a series of important financing challenges.
In the short-run, tax revenues have अस्वीकृत significantly due to a कठोर मंदी और कर नीति चुनाव, जबकि expenditures have expanded for wars, unemployment insurance and other safety net spending.
In the long-run, expenditures सम्बन्धित to healthcare कार्यक्रम ऐसे as medicare और medicaid हैं प्रक्षिप्त to grow faster than the economy overall as the population matures.
New Guinea ( also, Tok Pisin : Niugini, डच : nieuw गिनी, और ; historically : पापुआ ) is the संसार 's दूसरी largest island, after Greenland, covering a land area of 786,000 km2.
Located in the southwest Pacific Ocean, it झूठ geographically to the ईस्ट of the मलय द्वीपसमूह, साथ जिससे it is sometimes शामिल as भाग of a greater Indo-Australian Archipelago.
Geologically it is a भाग of the वही tectonic plate as Australia.
When world sea levels were कम, the दो साझा shorelines ( which now lie 100 to 140 metres below sea level ), combining with lands now inundated into the tectonic continent of Sahul, also known as Greater Australia.
The two landmasses became separated when the area now ज्ञात as the टोरेस जलसन्धि flooded बाद the समाप्त of the पिछला glacial period.
Anthropologically, नई गिनी is considered part of Melanesia.
Politically, the पश्चिमी हाफ of the द्वीप comprises दो इंडोनेशियाई provinces : Papua and West Papua.
The eastern half forms the mainland of the देश of पापुआ नई गिनी.
The island has a जनसांख्यिकी of परिचय 7.5 लाख, साथ a बहुत कम जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व of only 8 inh/km2.
New Guinea is differentiated from its drier, flatter, and less fertile southern counterpart, Australia, by इसके much उच्चतर वर्षा और इसके क्रियाशील volcanic भूविज्ञान, साथ इसके उच्चतम पाइंट, puncak jaya, reaching an उन्नयन of 4,884 m ( 16,023 ft ).
Yet the two land masses share a समान एनिमल fauna, साथ marsupials, सहित wallabies और possums, and the egg-laying monotreme, the spiny anteater, or echidna.
Other than bats और कुछ दो दर्जन स्वदेशी कृंतक genera, there are no pre-human indigenous placental mammals.
Pigs, several additional species of rats, and the पूर्वज of the नई गिनी गायन Dog were introduced with human colonization.
The human presence on the island dates back at least 40,000 years to the oldest इंसान migrations आउट of अफ़्रीकी.
Research indicates that the highlands were an early and independent बीच of कृषि, साथ प्रमाण of सिंचाई going back at least 10,000 years.
Because of the time depth of its inhabitation and its highly fractured landscape, an unusually high क्रमांक of भाषाएं हैं बोला on the द्वीप, साथ कुछ 1,000 भाषाएं ( a फिगर उच्चतर than that of most continents ) having been catalogued out of an estimated world-wide pre-Columbian total of 6,000 human dialects.
Most are वर्गीकृत as पापुआई भाषाएं, a generally स्वीकृत geographical term which a minority of authors hold to be a genetic one.
A number of ऑस्ट्रोनीशियाई भाषाएं हैं बोला on the coast और on offshore islands.
In the 16th century Spanish explorers discovered the island और पुकारा it नुएवा गिनी.
In हाल इतिहास पश्चिमी नई गिनी थी included in the Dutch East Indies colony.
The Germans annexed the उत्तरी coast of the पूर्वी हाफ of the द्वीप as जर्मनी नई Guinea in their pre–World War I effort to establish themselves as a colonial power, whilst the south eastern portion was reluctantly claimed by Britain.
Following the Treaty of Versailles, the German portion थी awarded to ऑस्ट्रेलिया ( जिससे थी already शासी the अंग्रेजों अर्जी, named the Territory of Papua ) as a League of Nations mandate.
The eastern half of the द्वीप थी granted स्वतंत्रता इससे Australia as Papua New Guinea in 1975.
The western half gained independence इससे the डच in 1961, but became part of Indonesia soon afterwards in controversial circumstances.
`` The Van Buren Boys '' is the 148th episode of the sitcom seinfeld, और नाम of a fictional नई यॉर्क गली gang.
Their sign is crossing the हैंड्स, साथ एक हाथ साथ सब the उंगलियाँ 'up ' and spread out.
The other hand रै सब लकिन the अंगूठा और सूचक उंगली up, for a total of eight ( 8 ).
The gang is नामित लिये the 8th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, मार्टिन वैन buren ( who was the first president from New York ).
This was the 14th एपीसोड लिये the 8th season.
It aired on फ़रवरी 6, 1997.
bevo चिह्न
bevo थी a non-alcoholic malt पेय, or निकट बियर, brewed in the United States by the Anheuser-Busch company beginning in the early 20th century.
Bevo enjoyed its greatest success during the समय of निषेध, जब बियर, वाइन और आसुत liquors, यहूद बना illegal लिये तेरह years.
The anheuser-busch कम्पनी प्रारंभ brewing bevo जब alcoholic पेय यहूद prohibited in 1916 by the United States armed forces.
Production rose greatly with national prohibition in 1919, और bevo थी by दूर the सबसे लोकप्रिय of the अनेक `` खाद्यान्न beverages '' or `` near beers '' of the time.
At the peak of its लोकप्रियता in the जल्दी 1920s, अधिक than पाँच million cases of Bevo were sold annually.
Renard with a mug of Bevo, चित्रित in टेरा cotta on the आंतरिक walls of the Bevo building, St. Louis
लेबल्स on the बोतलों billed it as `` Bevo the Beverage ''.
The name `` Bevo '' was coined इससे the शब्द `` पेय '' और the Slavic language word for beer `` pivo '', and was pronounced `` Bee-vo ''.
Some Bevo advertising प्रदर्शित the अक्षर `` renard the फॉक्स `` ( आधारित on the समर्थक of a मध्यकालीन फ्रेंच folk-tale ), और promotional mugs with this character were manufactured.
In 1930 Anheuser-Busch built a series of boat-bodied cars in its St. लुई दुकानें पुकारा the `` bevo नौकाएँ '' which were used for promotion.
Seven are believed to have been built on pierce-arrow 8-cylinder chassis जबकि एक surviving उदाहरण was based upon 1930 Cadillac 353 V8.
Billboard advertising Bevo in trenton, नई जर्सी, 1917
A contemporary विज्ञापन पढ़ा `` कूलिंग और invigorating, Bevo the Beverage.
Order by the case from अपना पंसारी, druggist, or डीलर. ''
The paper label on the वापस of the बोतल पढ़ा `` the All-Year-Round Soft Drink.
appetizing - healthful - पौष्टिक - Refreshing.
Milk or जल may contain bacteria.
BEVO never करता. ''
bevo became भाग of the लोकप्रिय संस्कृति of the समय, और is उल्लेखित in विभिन्न popular songs and Vaudeville skits of the era.
This led to secondary slang uses of the word ; for example, in American military slang a यंग और अनुभवहीन अधिकारी थी पुकारा a `` Bevo ''.
The विश्वविद्यालयों of टेक्सास नामित इसके शुभंकर `` Bevo '', a name which has stuck to this day.
Irving Berlin included a paean to the drink, `` You Ca n't रहो up on bevo '', in उसके 1917 फौज revue, यिप यिप yaphank.
In the late 1920s smuggled बूटलेग बियर और liquor as खूब as `` homebrew ``, cut into Bevo 's marketshare.
With sales flattening to 100,000 मामले by 1929, anheuser-busch stopped production.
The Bevo Mill, st. लुई, in 2008
The Bevo building, with the Renard character prominently प्रदर्शित at the किनारे, स्टिल operates as a bottling सुविधा at their main brewery in St. Louis, Missouri.
The landmark Bevo Mill, constructed by अगस्त anheuser Busch, Sr. in 1917.
It थी बंद in 2009, लकिन it reopened in अक्तूबर 2009 under new owners.
Bevo is also mentioned in the short story `` The हत्यारे `` by अर्नेस्ट हेमिंगवे ; as खूब as in babbitt by Sinclair Lewis.
Mylanta is an over the counter medication प्रयुक्त लिये the उपचार of एसिड reflux, heartburn, और gastroesophageal reflux disease ( also known as GERD ).
foremilk और hindmilk नमूने of इंसान breast milk
A कांच of pasteurized cow milk
Milk is a white द्रव उत्पादित by the mammary ग्रंथियों of mammals.
It is the प्राथमिक सोर्स of पोषण लिये यंग स्तनधारियों before they are able to digest other types of food.
Early- lactation milk contains colostrum, which carries the माँ 's antibodies to the baby और can reduce the रिस्क of अनेक रोगों in the baby.
It also contains अनेक other nutrients.
As an agricultural उत्पाद, मिल्क is निकाली इससे स्तनधारियों and used as food for humans.
विश्वव्यापी, दुग्ध खेतो उत्पादित परिचय 730 million tonnes of milk in 2011.
India is the world 's largest निर्माता और उपभोक्ता of मिल्क, yet neither exports nor imports milk.
नई जीलैंड, the यूरोपीय संघ 's 27 सदस्य राज्य, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, and the United States are the world 's largest exporters of milk and milk products.
China and Russia हैं the संसार 's largest importers of milk and milk products.
Throughout the world, there are more than 6 अरब उपभोक्ता of मिल्क and milk products.
Over 750 लाख लोगों सजीव भीतर दुग्ध farming households.
Milk is a key contributor to improving nutrition and food सुरक्षा विशेषकर in विकासशील देशों.
Improvements in पशुधन और दुग्ध प्रौद्योगिकी प्रस्ताव significant promise in reducing poverty and malnutrition in the world.
Motorcycle speedway, usually referred to as speedway, is a मोटरसाइकिल खेल involving चार और sometimes up to छह राइडर्स स्पर्धा over चार anti-clockwise laps of an oval circuit.
Speedway motorcycles use only one gear और have no brakes और रेसिंग takes प्लेस on a चपटा ओवल track प्रायः consisting of dirt or loosely packed shale.
Competitors use this surface to slide उनके मशीने बगलों, powersliding or broadsiding into the bends.
On the straight sections of the track the मोटरसाइकिल पहुँचें speeds of up.
The exact origins of the sport are unknown but there is evidence of a type of स्पीडवे रेसिंग होने practised in the यूएसए पहले the पहला संसार युद्ध और in ऑस्ट्रेलिया in the लेट 1910s and early 1920s.
There are now both domestic and international प्रतियोगिताओं in a क्रमांक of देशों सहित the स्पीडवे संसार कप whilst the उच्चतम overall स्कोरिंग व्यक्तिगत in the Speedway Grand Prix events is pronounced the world champion.
Speedway is popular in central and northern Europe और to a lesser extent in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और उत्तर अमेरिका.
A variant of track racing, speedway is administered internationally by the fédération internationale de Motocyclisme ( FIM ).
Domestic स्पीडवे कार्यक्रम हैं regulated by fim संबद्ध नेशनल मोटर sport federations.
Vitamin D is a group of fat-soluble secosteroids responsible लिये intestinal अवशोषण of calcium and phosphate.
In humans, the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण सम्बन्धित यौगिकों of विटामिन d हैं विटामिन D2 and vitamin D3.
Cholecalciferol ( vitamin d3 ) और ergocalciferol ( विटामिन d2 ) हैं अद्वितीय as वे constitute कया we know as vitamin D and can be ingested from the diet and/or supplements.
the देह can भी synthesize विटामिन d ( इससे कोलेस्ट्रॉल ) जब सूर्य एक्सपोज़र is adequate ( hence its nickname, the `` sunshine vitamin '' ).
Although vitamin D is commonly called a vitamin, it is not दरअसल an अनिवार्य dietary विटामिन in the सख्त भाव, as it can be synthesized in adequate amounts by most mammals exposed to sunlight.
( Cats and dogs can not synthesize विटामिन d efficiently और जरूर receive it in their diet. )
An organic chemical compound ( or related set of compounds ) is only scientifically पुकारा a विटामिन जब it can नहीं be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism, and must be obtained from their diet.
However, as with other compounds commonly called vitamins, vitamin D was discovered in an effort to find the dietary substance that थी lacking in a बीमारी, namely, rickets, the बाल्यकाल रूप of osteomalacia.
Additionally, like अन्य यौगिकों पुकारा विटामिन, in the विकसित संसार विटामिन d is added to staple foods, such as milk, to avoid disease due to deficiency.
Measures of serum levels reflect endogenous synthesis from exposure to sunlight as well as सेवन इससे the आहार, और it is believed कि संश्लेषण may योगदान generally to the मेंटेनेंस of adequate serum concentrations.
The evidence indicates that the synthesis of vitamin D from sun exposure works in a feedback loop that prevents toxicity but, because of uncertainty about the cancer risk from sunlight, no सुझाव हैं जारी by the संस्थान of आयुर्विज्ञान, यूएसए, लिये the राशि of सूर्य एक्सपोज़र जरूरी to मिलें vitamin D requirements.
तदनुसार, the dietary सन्दर्भ intakes लिये विटामिन d assume कि no संश्लेषण occurs और कि सब of a व्यक्ति 's vitamin D is from their diet, although that will rarely occur in practice.
In the liver vitamin D is converted to calcidiol, which is also known as calcifediol ( INN ), 25-hydroxycholecalciferol, or 25-hydroxyvitamin D—abbreviated 25 ( oh ) d ; और जिससे is the विशिष्ट विटामिन d metabolite कि is measured in सीरम to determine a व्यक्ति 's विटामिन d औकात.
Part of the calcidiol is converted by the kidneys to calcitriol, the biologically active form of विटामिन D. calcitriol circulates as a हार्मोन in the रक्त, regulating the विशेषज्ञता of कैल्सियम और फास्फेट in the bloodstream और promoting the healthy growth and remodeling of bone.
Calcidiol is also converted to calcitriol outside of the kidneys for other purposes, such as the proliferation, differentiation और apoptosis of कोशिकाएं ; calcitriol भी affects neuromuscular function and inflammation.
Beyond its use to prevent osteomalacia or rickets, the evidence लिये अन्य स्वास्थ्य प्रभाव of विटामिन d supplementation in the सामान्य population is inconsistent.
The best प्रमाण of लाभ is लिये अस्थि health and a decrease in mortality in elderly women.
The Duramax is a General Motors डीज़ल इंजन परिवार लिये light- और मीडियम ड्यूटी ट्रक, designed by Isuzu.
The 6.6-liter Duramax is produced by DMAX, a joint venture between gm और isuzu in moraine, ओहियो.
This engine was initially installed in 2001 model year Chevy and GMC trucks and रै महरूम an विकल्प चूंकि तब in pickups, वैन, और medium-duty ट्रक.
In 2006, उत्पादन at moraine थी reportedly limited to approximately 200,000 engines per year.
On May 9, 2007, DMAX घोषित the उत्पादन of the 1,000,000th duramax v-8 डीज़ल at its Moraine facility.
