balto.
is भी a परंपरागत लिखा संक्षिप्त लिये बाल्टीमोर, Maryland.
प्रतिमा of balto in Central Park ( New York City )
Balto ( 1919 – March 14, 1933 ) थी a siberian हस्की sled श्वान जो led उसके टोली on the फाइनल लेग of the 1925 सीरम चलाएं to nome, in जिससे डिप्थीरिया antitoxin थी transported इससे anchorage, Alaska, to Nenana, Alaska, by train and then to Nome by dog sled to combat an outbreak of the disease.
The run is commemorated by the सालाना iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race.
Balto was named after the सामी एक्सप्लोरर सैमुएल balto.
Balto died at the आयु of 14.
Professor Stephen Hawking, known for being a theoretical physicist, रै appeared in अनेक works of लोकप्रिय संस्कृति.
The Nissan Maxima is a mid-size / entry-level लक्ज़री car manufactured by निसान, marketed as the `` four-door sports car ''.
The origins of the Maxima began in July 1976 as the Datsun 810, an upscale six-cylinder version of the bluebird, और थी spun into इसके अपना लकीर in 1981, having महरूम made continuously since then.
The `` Maxima '' name was applied धीरे, शुरूआत in 1981.
Most pre-2004 Maximas were built in Oppama, जापानी, जबतक the वर्तमान उत्तर अमरीकी Maximas started being assembled in Smyrna, Tennessee.
The `` Maxima '' has also महरूम लागू to cefiros और Laurels in various markets.
propolis as छत्ता sealing
Propolis is a resinous mixture that मधु मधुमक्खियों collect इससे पेड़ कलियों, sap बहती, or other botanical sources.
It is used as a sealant लिये अनावश्यक खोलें स्पेसेस in the hive.
propolis is प्रयुक्त लिये छोटी गैप ( लगभग or कम ), जबकि larger spaces are usually filled with beeswax.
Its color varies depending on इसके वनस्पति सोर्स, the most common being dark brown.
Propolis is sticky at और ऊपर रूम तापमान,.
At lower temperatures, it becomes hard and very brittle.
Steven Tyler ( born Steven Victor Tallarico ; March 26, 1948 ) is an अमरीकी सिंगर, songwriter, और multi-instrumentalist, बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the frontman और सीसे सिंगर of the बोस्टन -आधारd चट्टान बैंड एरोस्मिथ, in which he also plays the harmonica, and occasional piano and percussion.
He is known as the `` राक्षस of screamin ' '' due to उसके high screams and his wide vocal range.
He is also known for his on-stage acrobatics.
During his high-energy performances, he usually dresses in उज्जवल, रंगीन outfits साथ उसके ट्रेडमार्क स्कार्फ hanging from his microphone stand.
In the 1970s, टायलर रोज़ to prominence as the frontman of एरोस्मिथ, जिससे released such milestone hard rock albums as Toys in the Attic and Rocks.
In the late 1970s and early 1980s, Tyler था a भारी ड्रग और दारू व्यसन, और the band 's popularity waned.
He completed drug rehabilitation in 1986 and subsequently कायम गम्भीरता लिये over 20 सालो, लकिन था a पतन साथ नुस्खा painkillers in the late 2000s, for which he successfully received treatment in 2009.
After Aerosmith launched a remarkable comeback in the लेट 1980s और जल्दी 1990s साथ the एल्बम स्थाई अवकाश, पंप, और Get a Grip, Tyler became a household name and has remained a relevant rock icon.
As a result, he has since embarked on several solo endeavors including guest appearances on other artists ' music, film and TV roles ( सहित as a न्यायधीश on अमरीकी आइडल ), authoring a bestselling किताब, और सोलो कार्य ( सहित a Top 40 hit single in 2011 ).
however, he रै जारी to रिकार्ड म्यूज़िक और perform साथ एरोस्मिथ, after more than 43 years in the band.
The band 's नवीनतम एल्बम, म्यूज़िक इससे Another Dimension !
, थी released on November 6, 2012.
Tyler is included among Rolling पत्थरों 100 महानतम Singers.
He was also ranked 3rd on hit parader 's शीर्ष 100 मेटल Vocalists of All Time.
In 2001 he was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame with एरोस्मिथ, और he थी the प्रस्तुतकर्ता जब ac/dc थी inducted into the Hall of Fame in 2003.
In 2013, Tyler और उसके songwriting संगी जो पेरी होगा be प्राप्तकर्ता of the ascap संस्थापकों Award and will also be inducted into the Songwriters Hall of Fame.
The liver produces यूरिया in the urea cycle as a waste product of the digestion of protein.
Normal human वयस्क रक्त चाहिए contain between 7 to 21 mg of यूरिया नाइट्रोजन per 100 ml ( 7–21 mg/ dL ) of blood.
Individual laboratories may have different सन्दर्भ सीमाएँ, और इस is क्युकी the procedure may vary.
Wayne Fontes ( born February 2, 1940 ) is a पूर्व अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल कोच और कॉलेज और पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल खिलाड़ी who was the head coach of the NFL 's Detroit Lions from 1988 to 1996.
His 67 wins और 71 नुकसान हैं प्रत्येक the सबसे for a head coach in team history.
The Jews ( ISO 259-3 Israeli pronunciation ), also known as the Jewish people, are a nation और an ethnoreligious समूह, originating in the israelites or hebrews of the प्राचीन निकट ईस्ट.
The Jewish ethnicity, nationality, and religion हैं strongly interrelated, as judaism is the परंपरागत आस्था of the Jewish nation.
Converts to judaism, जिनकी औकात as यहूदियों भीतर the यहूदी ethnos is बराबर to those born into it, have been absorbed into the Jewish people throughout the millennia.
In Jewish tradition, Jewish ancestry is traced to the biblical patriarchs अब्राहम, Isaac and Jacob in the second millennium BCE.
The modern State of Israel was स्थापित as a यहूदी nation-state, और defines itself as such in its Basic Laws.
Its Law of वापसी अनुदान the सही of नागरिकता to any Jew who requests it.
Israel is the only country जहाँ यहूदियों हैं a बहुमत of the जनसांख्यिकी.
यहूदियों भी enjoyed राजनैतिक स्वायत्तता twice before in ancient history.
The first of these periods lasted इससे 1350 to 586 bce, और encompassed the अवधि of the न्यायाधीशों, the United Monarchy, and the Divided Monarchy of the Kingdoms of Israel and Judah, ending with the destruction of the First Temple.
The second was the period of the Hasmonean Kingdom spanning इससे 140 to 37 BCE.
Since the विनाश of the पहला टेम्पल, most Jews have lived in diaspora.
A minority in every country in which they सजीव ( मगर इसराईल ), वे have अक्सर अनुभवी persecution throughout इतिहास, resulting in a population that has fluctuated both in numbers and distribution over the centuries.
The world Jewish population reached a peak of 15 लाख prior to the दूसरी संसार युद्ध, लकिन छह लाख यहूदियों यहूद killed in the Holocaust.
Since then the population has risen again and, थी अनुमानित at 13.4 लाख by the उत्तर अमरीकी यहूदी आंकड़ा बैंको, or कम than 0.2 % of the कुल world population ( roughly one in every 514 people ).
According to this report, about 42.5 % of all Jews reside in Israel ( 5.7 million ), and 39.3 % in the संयुक्त राज्य ( 5.3 लाख ), साथ सबसे of the शेष जीना in यूरोपीय ( 1.5 million ) and Canada ( 0.4 million ).
These numbers include all those जो consider themselves यहूदियों, whether or नहीं वे हैं संबद्ध with a Jewish organization.
the कुल संसार यहूदी जनसांख्यिकी, however, is difficult to measure.
In addition to issues with census methodology, वहीँ हैं halakhic विवादों regarding जो is a jew और धर्मनिरपेक्ष, राजनैतिक, and ancestral identification factors that may affect the figure considerably.
Corpus christi बारात.
Oil on canvas by कार्ल एमिल doepler.
Corpus domini redirects यहाँ.
For other uses see कॉर्पस domini ( बहुविकल्पी )
The Feast of कॉर्पस christi ( लैटिन लिये देह of मसीह ), भी ज्ञात as कॉर्पस domini, is a लैटिन Rite liturgical solemnity celebrating the tradition and belief in the body and blood of Jesus Christ and his Real Presence in the Eucharist.
It emphasizes the joy of the institution of the Eucharist, जिससे थी observed on पावन गुरुवार in the somber माहौल of the nearness of Good Friday.
In the present Roman Missal, the feast is designated the solemnity of the सबसे पावन देह और रक्त of Christ.
It is also मनाये in कुछ anglican, लूथरन, और Old Catholic Churches that hold similar beliefs regarding the Real Presence.
The feast is liturgically मनाये on the गुरुवार बाद ट्रिनिटी संडे or, `` जहाँ the solemnity of the सबसे पावन देह और रक्त of मसीह is नहीं a पावन दिन of Obligation, it is assigned to the Sunday after the Most Holy Trinity as its proper day ''.
at the समाप्त of पावन द्रव्यमान, वहीँ is प्रायः a बारात of the धन्य Sacrament, generally displayed in a monstrance.
The procession is followed by सुनाकर of the धन्य Sacrament.
A notable Eucharistic procession is that presided over by the Pope each year in Rome, जहाँ it begins at the archbasilica of st. जॉन lateran और makes इसके रास्ता to the basilica of संत मरियम प्रमुख, where it concludes with Benediction.
C-reactive protein ( CRP ) is a प्रोटीन मिला in the रक्त, the स्तर of जिससे वृद्धि in जवाब to सूजन ( i.e. C-reactive protein is an acute-phase protein ).
Its physiological role is to bind to phosphocholine expressed on the सतह of मुर्दे or मरना कोशिकाएं ( और कुछ प्रकार of bacteria ) in order to activate the complement system via the C1Q complex.
CRP is synthesized by the liver in response to कारकों released by macrophages और मोटे कोशिकाएं ( adipocytes ).
It is a सदस्य of the pentraxin परिवार of proteins.
It is not related to c-peptide or protein C.
c-reactive प्रोटीन थी the पहला पैटर्न recognition receptor ( PRR ) to be identified.
The start of the systematic यूरोपीय colonization of the americas is typically दिनाँक to 1492, जब a स्पेनी expedition headed by Christopher Columbus sailed for India to open trade but inadvertently discovered the Americas.
European conquest, large-scale खोजी और colonization जल्द followed.
Seeing that Europe was preoccupied साथ अनेक आतंरिक युद्धों और थी धीरे recovering इससे the अनेक मौतों कि the bubonic प्लेग caused, the rapid expansion at which it grew in wealth and power was unforeseeable in the early 1400s.
The first expeditions occurred along the Caribbean coasts on the आइलैंड्स of हिस्पानिओला, प्यूर्टो रीको और क्यूबा, और बाद 1500 extended into the interiors of both North and South America.
In 1497, sailing from the उत्तर on निमित्त of इंग्लैण्ड, जॉन cabot उतरा on the उत्तर अमरीकी coast, and a year later, Columbus 's third voyage reached the South American coast.
France founded colonies in much of eastern North America, on a number of caribbean आइलैंड्स, और in दक्षिण America.
Portugal colonized ब्राज़ील.
Eventually, the entire Western Hemisphere आए अंतर्गत the कंट्रोल of यूरोपीय सरकारें, अग्रणी to profound changes to its landscape, population, and plant and animal life.
In the 19th century alone over 50 million people बाएँ यूरोपीय लिये the americas.
The post-1492 era is ज्ञात as the काल of the columbian Exchange.
Keith Richards ( born 18 December 1943 ) is an English संगीतकार, singer-songwriter और संस्थापक सदस्य of the अंग्रेज़ी चट्टान बैंड the Rolling Stones.
Rolling Stone magazine said रिचर्ड्स था निर्मित `` चट्टान 's महानतम सिंगल देह of riffs '', रैंकिंग उसे 4th on its list of 100 best guitarists.
Fourteen songs Richards wrote with the रोलिंग पत्थरों ' सीसे vocalist मिक जैगर हैं सूचीबद्ध among रोलिंग Stone magazine 's `` 500 Greatest Songs of All Time ``.
Richards ' notoriety for illicit drug use stems in part from several ड्रग busts दौरान the लेट 1960s और 1970s और उसके candour regarding उसके व्यसन to और eventual abstinence from heroin.
Testosterone is a steroid hormone from the androgen समूह और is मिला in स्तनधारियों, सरीसृपों, पक्षियों, and other vertebrates.
In mammals, testosterone is primarily secreted in the अंडकोष of males और the अंडाशय of महिलाओं, हालांकि छोटी amounts are also secreted by the adrenal glands.
It is the principal male sex हार्मोन और an anabolic स्टेरॉयड.
In men, testosterone plays a कुंजी भूमिका in the विकास of पुरूष reproductive tissues such as the testis and prostate as well as promoting secondary sexual characteristics such as increased muscle, bone mass, and the growth of body hair.
In जोड, टेस्टोस्टेरोन is अनिवार्य लिये स्वास्थ्य and well-being as well as the prevention of osteoporosis.
On average, in adult human males, the plasma विशेषज्ञता of टेस्टोस्टेरोन is परिचय 7–8 टाइम्स as ग्रेट as the विशेषज्ञता in वयस्क इंसान महिलाओं ' plasma, but as the metabolic consumption of testosterone in males is greater, the daily production is about 20 times greater in men.
महिलाओं भी हैं अधिक संवेदनशील to the hormone.
Testosterone is observed in सबसे vertebrates.
Fish make a थोड़ा अलग रूप पुकारा 11-ketotestosterone.
Its बंटवारा in कीट is ecdysone.
These सर्वव्यापी steroids सुझाएँ कि sex hormones have an ancient evolutionary history.
Cluster sampling is a sampling technique used when `` natural '' but relatively समरूप groupings हैं evident in a सांख्यिकीय जनसांख्यिकी.
It is often used in विपणन शोध.
In this technique, the total population is divided into these groups ( or clusters ) और a सरल यादृच्छिक नमूना of the समूह is selected.
Then the required सूचना is एकत्रित इससे a सरल यादृच्छिक नमूना of the तत्व भीतर प्रत्येक चयनित group.
This may be किया लिये प्रत्येक तत्व in ये समूह or a subsample of elements may be selected within each of these groups.
A common motivation for cluster sampling is to reduce the कुल क्रमांक of साक्षात्कार और लागत दिए the desired accuracy.
assuming a फिक्स्ड नमूना आकार, the तकनीक देता अधिक सटीक परिणाम जब सबसे of the विभिन्नता in the population is within the groups, not between them.
Jamestown is a town in Guilford County, North Carolina, United States, और is a उपनगरीय of the आसपास शहरों of greensboro and High Point.
The population was 3,382 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
Natalie पोर्टमैन ( born नताली Hershlag ; ; June 9, 1981 ) is an actress and model with dual American and Israeli citizenship.
Her first role was as an orphan taken in by a हिटमैन in the 1994 कार्रवाई फिल्मी, लकिन मुख्यधारा कामयाबी आए when she was cast as Padmé Amidala in the Star Wars prequel trilogy ( released in 1999, 2002 and 2005 ).
In 1999, she enrolled at Harvard विश्वविद्यालयों to पढ़ाई मनोविज्ञान जबकि स्टिल working as an actress.
She completed उसके स्नातक 's उपाधि in 2003.
in 2001, पोर्टमैन खोली in नई यॉर्क नगर 's Public Theater production of Anton Chekhov 's The Seagull.
In 2005, Portman received a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress और जीती the सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन supporting अभिनेत्री - गति चित्र लिये the drama Closer.
She won a Constellation Award for Best मादा प्रदर्शन और a शनि पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री लिये उसके starring role in V for Vendetta ( 2006 ).
She played leading roles in the historical dramas Goya 's Ghosts ( 2006 ) and The अन्य बोलिन लड़की ( 2008 ).
In may 2008, वो परोसा as the youngest सदस्य of the 61st Annual Cannes Film Festival jury.
Portman 's directorial debut, Eve, opened the 65th Venice अंतरराष्ट्रीय फिल्मी पर्व 's शॉर्ट्स प्रतियोगिता in 2008.
Portman directed a खण्ड of the सामूहिक फिल्मी नई यॉर्क, I Love You.
In 2011, पोर्टमैन जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार, the सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार, the bafta पुरस्कार, the स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड पुरस्कार, और the Independent Spirit Award for her lead performance as Nina Sayers in Black Swan.
तांबे is a रासायनिक तत्व साथ the प्रतीक Cu ( from ) and atomic number 29.
It is a ductile मेटल साथ बहुत ऊँची थर्मल और विद्युत conductivity.
Pure copper is soft and malleable ; a freshly उजागर सतह रै a reddish-orange color.
It is used as a conductor of ऊष्मा और विद्युत, a भवन सामग्री, and a constituent of various metal alloys.
The मेटल और इसके alloys have महरूम प्रयुक्त for thousands of years.
In the Roman era, copper was प्रधानतया mined on साइप्रस, hence the उत्पत्ति of the नाम of the मेटल as сyprium ( मेटल of साइप्रस ), later shortened to сuprum.
Its compounds are commonly encountered as copper ( II ) salts, which often impart blue or ग्रीन रंगों to खनिज ऐसे as azurite और फ़िरोज़ा और have been widely used historically as pigments.
Architectural structures built with copper corrode to दे ग्रीन verdigris ( or patina ).
Decorative art prominently सुविधाएँ तांबे, दोनो by itself and as part of pigments.
Copper is essential to all living organisms as a trace dietary mineral because it is a key constituent of the respiratory एंजाइम जटिल cytochrome c oxidase.
In molluscs and crustacea copper is a constituent of the blood रंजक hemocyanin, जिससे is replaced by the iron-complexed hemoglobin in fish and other vertebrates.
The main areas where copper is मिला in vertebrates हैं जिगर, muscle and bone.
In sufficient concentration, copper compounds हैं जहरीला to उच्चतर जीवों और हैं प्रयुक्त as bacteriostatic substances, fungicides, and wood preservatives.
The major professional sports leagues, or simply major leagues, in the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा हैं the उच्चतम पेशेवर प्रतियोगिताओं of टोली खेल in the दो देशों.
Although व्यक्तिगत खेल ऐसे as गोल्फ़, टेनिस, और स्वचालित रेसिंग हैं भी very popular, the term is usually limited to team sports.
The term `` major लीग '' थी पहला प्रयुक्त in 1921 in सन्दर्भ to प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल ( एमएलबी ), the शीर्ष स्तर of पेशेवर American baseball.
Today, the major northern North America professional team खेल लीग हैं प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल ( एमएलबी ), the नेशनल बास्केट संघ ( NBA ), the National Football League ( NFL ), and the National Hockey League ( NHL ).
Other notable leagues include प्रमुख लीग सॉकर ( mls ), the कनाडाई फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( cfl ), the एरिना फ़ुटबॉल लीग, प्रमुख लीग lacrosse, the National Lacrosse League and the Women 's National Basketball Association.
the एनएफएल, एमएलबी, एनबीए, और एनएचएल हैं commonly referred to as the Big Four.
प्रत्येक of ये is the richest पेशेवर club competition in its sport worldwide.
The best players can become cultural icons in both countries and elsewhere in the संसार, क्युकी the लीग आनंद a significant प्लेस in लोकप्रिय संस्कृति in the US and Canada.
the एनएफएल रै 32 टीमों, और the अन्य have 30 each.
The vast majority of major league teams are concentrated in the सबसे populous महानगर क्षेत्रों of the United States.
Baseball, football, hockey, and soccer have had professional leagues for over 100 years ; early leagues such as the National Association, ओहियो लीग, और नेशनल हॉकी संघ formed the आधार of the आधुनिक एमएलबी, एनएफएल और NHL respectively.
Soccer थी पहला professionalized in 1894, लकिन लीग suffered greatly from lack of sustainability and seldom lasted more than a decade.
Soccer 's greatest successes यहूद in the रूप of the अमरीकी सॉकर लीग ( 1921-1933 ), the असली उत्तर अमरीकी Soccer League ( 1968-1984 ), the National Professional Soccer League ( 1984-2001 ) and, currently, Major League Soccer ( 1996-present ).
Basketball is a relatively new development ; the NBA evolved from the नेशनल बास्केट लीग और इसके splinter समूह the बास्केट संघ of अमेरिका, लेने on इसके current form in 1949.
Every प्रमुख लीग averages 15,000 प्रशंसक in उपस्थिति per game or higher as of 2011.
Meridian Altitude is an खगोलीय नेविगेशन विधि of calculating an निरीक्षक 's latitude.
Earned value management ( EVM ), or Earned value project/performance प्रबन्धन ( evpm ) is a प्रोजेक्ट प्रबन्धन तकनीक लिये measuring प्रोजेक्ट performance and progress in an objective manner.
Because EVM रै the क्षमता to combine माप of :
पैमाना
अनुसूची
और cost,
in a single integrated system, Earned Value Management is able to provide accurate forecasts of प्रोजेक्ट प्रदर्शन समस्याएं, जिससे is an महत्वपूर्ण योगदान for project management.
Early EVM research showed that the areas of planning and control are significantly impacted by इसके उपयोग ; और similarly, using the methodology improves दोनो पैमाना परिभाषा as खूब as the विश्लेषण of overall project performance.
More recent research studies have shown कि the सिद्धान्त of evm हैं धनात्मक predictors of प्रोजेक्ट success.
Popularity of evm रै grown significantly in हाल सालो परे सरकारी contracting, in जिससे sector its importance continues to rise ( e.g., recent new DFAR rules ), in part because EVM can also surface in and help substantiate contract disputes.
रंगीन वसन्त garden flowers
Spring is one of the four conventional शीतोष्ण सीज़न, following शीत और preceding summer.
There are विभिन्न तकनीकी परिभाषाएं of वसन्त, लकिन लोकल usage of the term varies according to local climate, cultures and customs.
When it is वसन्त in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध, it होगा be autumn in the southern hemisphere.
At the spring equinox, days are close to 12 hours long with day लंबाई increasing as the ऋतु progresses.
Spring and `` springtime '' refer to the season, and भी to विचार of rebirth, कायाकल्प, नवीकरण, क़यामत, और regrowth, साथ त्यौहार ऐसे as Carnival, Easter and Holi being celebrated at this time.
Jamestown थी a उपनिवेश in the उपनिवेश of वर्जिनिया, the first permanent English settlement in the Americas.
Established by the Virginia Company of London as `` जेम्स फोर्ट '' on may 14, 1607 ( o.s., may 24, 1607 n.s. ), it followed several earlier failed attempts, including the Lost Colony of Roanoke.
jamestown परोसा as the पूंजी of the colony for 83 years, from 1616 until 1699.
The settlement थी स्तिथ भीतर the territory of a राजनैतिक एंटिटी ज्ञात as tsenacommacah, the राज्य of the Powhatan Confederacy, with around 14,000 native inhabitants, and specifically was in part of the subdivision known as the Paspahegh tribe.
The natives initially welcomed the colonists with dancing, feasting and tobacco ceremonies, और वे provided निर्णायक प्रावधानों और support लिये the अस्तित्व of the colonists, जो यहूद नहीं agriculturally inclined, हालांकि relations with the newcomers also soured fairly early on, leading to the total annihilation of the Paspahegh in warfare within 3 years.
Within a year of Jamestown 's founding, the वर्जिनिया कम्पनी brought पॉलिश और डच colonists to help improve the settlement.
In 1619, the पहला प्रलेखित africans यहूद brought to jamestown, हालांकि the आधुनिक धारणा of slavery in the future United States did not begin in Virginia until 1660.
जब the उपनिवेश थी subdivided into the असली आठ shires of Virginia in 1634, the town became located in the eponymous James City Shire.
The London Company 's second settlement, Bermuda, claims to be the site of the oldest town in the English New World, as St. George 's, Bermuda was officially established ( as New London ) in 1612, whereas जेम्स फोर्ट, in वर्जिनिया, थी नहीं to be परिवर्तित into जेम्स towne until 1619, and further did not survive into the present day.
In 1699, the capital was relocated from Jamestown to what is today williamsburg, बाद जिससे jamestown ceased to मौजूद as a उपनिवेश, मौजूदा आज तभी as an पुरातत्व site.
Today, jamestown is एक of तीन स्थितियाँ comprising the ऐतिहासिक त्रिभुज of औपनिवेशिक वर्जिनिया, साथ साथ Williamsburg and Yorktown, with two primary heritage sites.
Historic Jamestowne, the पुरातत्व साईट on jamestown द्वीप, is a सहकारी प्रयत्न by jamestown नेशनल ऐतिहासिक साईट ( भाग of Colonial National Historical Park ), and Preservation Virginia.
The Jamestown Settlement, a living history interpretive साईट, is संचालित by the jamestown yorktown Foundation in conjunction with the Commonwealth of Virginia.
जेम्स क्रिस्टोफर फ्रे ( born September 12, 1969 ) is an American writer.
His books A Million Little Pieces ( 2003 ) and My Friend लियोनार्ड ( 2005 ), as well as Bright Shiny Morning ( 2008 ), were bestsellers.
He was the subject of a scandal जब जांचकर्ताओं खोजा कि थाना समय और the extent of निश्चित चोटों यहूद अतिरंजित in A Million Little Pieces, a purportedly autobiographical account of the author 's struggle with addiction.
Deere & Company, most commonly known by its name John Deere, is an American corporation based in Moline, Illinois, और एक of the largest निर्माताओं of agricultural मशीनरी in the world.
In 2012, it थी सूचीबद्ध as 97th in the सौभाग्य 500 अमेरिका 's रैंकिंग and 190th in the Fortune 500 Global ranking.
Deere and Company agricultural products, sold under the John Deere name, include tractors, combine harvesters, cotton harvesters, balers, planters / seeders, sprayers, और utvs.
The company is also a manufacturer of construction equipment and वानिकी उपकरण, as खूब as a प्रदायक of डीज़ल इंजन and drivetrains ( axles, transmissions, gearboxes ) used in heavy equipment.
Additionally, John Deere manufactures उपकरण प्रयुक्त in लॉन, grounds, और turf परवाह, ऐसे as walk-behind lawn mowers, zero-turn lawn mowers, lawn tractors, and snowthrowers.
To support the कोर व्यवसायों, जॉन Deere also provides financial services and other related activities.
The company 's slogan is `` Nothing Runs Like a Deere '' and has a picture of a leaping deer as a लोगो, a शब्द खेल pun on `` nothing रनों जैसे a हिरण ''.
कार्ल westby coined the phrase `` Nothing Runs Like a Deere '' for a marketing campaign to sell snowmobiles.
The company 's उत्पाद हैं भी identifiable by इसके distinctive shade of green paint, usually augmented by yellow trim.
the संयुक्त राज्य ten-dollar विधेयक ( $ 10 ) is a denomination of United States currency.
The first U.S. Secretary of the राजकोष ( 1789–95 ), सिकंदर हैमिल्टन, is फिलहाल प्रदर्शित on the obverse of the विधेयक, जबकि the u.S. Treasury Building is featured on the reverse.
( Hamilton is one of two non-presidents प्रदर्शित on फिलहाल जारी u.S. bills.
The other is बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन, on the $ 100 bill.
Hamilton is one of only four people प्रदर्शित on u.S. पेपर करेंसी ( 1861 to the उपस्थित ) जो थी नहीं born in the महाद्वीपीय United States, as he was from the West Indies.
The others are : Albert Gallatin, Switzerland ( $ 500 1862/63 Legal Tender ) ; George Meade, Spain ( $ 1,000 1890/91 Treasury Note ) ; और रॉबर्ट मॉरिस, इंग्लैण्ड ( $ 1,000 1862/63 विधिक टेंडर ; $ 10 1878/80 चांदी प्रमाणपत्र ).
In addition, kamehameha i, appears on the 2008 हवाई राज्य quarter. )
All $ 10 बिल्स जारी आज हैं संघीय Reserve Notes.
The Bureau of नक्काशी और मुद्रण says the औसत जीवन of a $ 10 विधेयक in circulation is 18 months before it is replaced due to wear.
लगभग 6 % of सब US banknotes printed in 2009 were $ 10 bills.
Ten dollar bills are वितरित by संघीय आरक्षित बैंको in पीला straps.
The source of the face on the $ 10 bill is जॉन trumbull ’s 1805 पोर्ट्रेट of हैमिल्टन कि belongs to the पोर्ट्रेट संग्रहण of नई यॉर्क नगर Hall.
The $ 10 bill is the तभी u.S. पेपर करेंसी in परिसंचरण in जिससे the पोर्ट्रेट चेहरों to the left ( the $ 100,000 bill featured a portrait of Woodrow Wilson facing to the left, but was used only for intra-government transactions ).
Andy Samuel Griffith ( June 1, 1926 – July 3, 2012 ) was an American actor, television निर्माता, ग्रैमी पुरस्कार -winning southern-gospel सिंगर, और लेखक.
He was a Tony Award nominee for two roles, and gained prominence in the starring role in director एलिया कज़न 's फिल्मी a फेस in the भीड ( 1957 ) पहले he became बेहतर ज्ञात लिये उसके टेलीविज़न भूमिकाएँ, playing the सीसे वर्ण in the 1960–1968 situation comedy The Andy Griffith Show and in the 1986–1995 legal drama Matlock.
Theresa Penelope `` Terri '' Irwin, ( née Raines ; born जुलाई 20, 1964 ) is an ऑस्ट्रेलियाई -आधारd, अमरीकी -born naturalist, लेखक, the विधवा of ऑस्ट्रेलियाई naturalist Steve Irwin and owner of Australia Zoo at Beerwah, Queensland, Australia.
She co-starred with her husband on The Crocodile Hunter, their unconventional television nature documentary श्रेणी साथ साथ इसके spin-off श्रेणी, क्रोक फाइलें और the मगरमच्छ Hunter Diaries.
वो रै जिया in ऑस्ट्रेलिया चूंकि 1992, when she married Steve Irwin.
Andreas cellarius 's उदाहरण of the copernican प्रणाली, इससे the Harmonia Macrocosmica ( 1660 ).
Heliocentrism, or heliocentricism, is the astronomical model in which the धरती और ग्रह revolve around a अपेक्षाकृत stationary सूर्य at the center of the Solar System.
The word comes from the Greek ( helios `` सूर्य '' और kentron `` बीच '' ).
Historically, heliocentrism was opposed to geocentrism, जिससे लगाई the धरती at the बीच.
The notion that the Earth घूमती around the सूर्य था महरूम प्रस्तावित as जल्दी as the 3rd सदी bc by aristarchus of samos, लकिन aristarchus 's heliocentrism attracted little attention until Copernicus revived and elaborated it.
Lucio Russo, however, argues that this is a भ्रामक छाप resulting इससे the घाटा of वैज्ञानिक works of the Hellenistic Era.
Using indirect evidence he argues कि a heliocentric दृश्य was expounded in Hipparchus 's work on gravity.
It was not until the 16th century that a fully predictive गणितीय मॉडल of a heliocentric प्रणाली थी प्रस्तुत, by the पुनर्जागरण गणितज्ञ, astronomer, and Catholic cleric Nicolaus Copernicus of Poland, leading to the Copernican Revolution.
In the following सदी, योहानेस कॅप्लर elaborated upon और विस्तारित इस मॉडल to शामिल अंडाकार orbits, और supporting observations made using a telescope were presented by Galileo Galilei.
With the observations of विलियम हर्शेल, फ्रेडरिक bessel, और अन्य, खगोलशास्त्रियों एहसास कि the सूर्य थी नहीं the बीच of the ब्रह्मांड और by the 1920s एडविन हबल had shown that it was part of a galaxy ( the Milky Way ) that was only one of many billions.
Norah Jones ( born Geetali Norah जोन्स शंकर ; कूच 30, 1979 ) is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter, pianist, and actress.
She is the बेटी of भारतीय सितार player Ravi Shankar and Sue Jones.
She is भी anoushka शंकर 's half-sister.
In 2002, she launched her solo music career with the release of the commercially कामयाब और critically acclaimed एल्बम आइये दूर साथ me, a संलयन of देश म्यूज़िक और पॉप साथ तत्व of jazz which was certified diamond album, selling over 26 million copies.
The record earned Jones पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, सहित the एल्बम of the साल, रिकार्ड of the Year, and Best New Artist.
Her subsequent स्टुडियो एल्बम, feels जैसे घर, released in 2004, नहीं too लेट, released in 2007, the वही साल वो बना उसके फिल्मी डेब्यू in my ब्लूबेरी Nights, and her 2009 release The Fall all gained Platinum status, selling over a million copies and were generally well received by critics.
Jones ' fifth studio album, Little टूटा दिल, थी released on अप्रैल 27, 2012.
Jones has won nine Grammy Awards and was 60th on बिलबोर्ड पत्रिका 's कलाकारों of the 2000–2009 decade chart.
Throughout her career, जोन्स रै जीती numerous पुरस्कार और रै बेची more than 50 million albums worldwide.
Billboard named her the top जैज़ कलाकार of the 2000–2009 दशक.
Not to be confused with आयाम of a शारीरिक मात्रा.
For other uses, देखिए आयाम ( बहुविकल्पी ).
From left to right, the वर्गाकार, the cube, and the tesseract.
The square is bounded by 1-dimensional लाइनों, the घन by 2-dimensional क्षेत्रों, and the tesseract by 3-dimensional volumes.
A projection of the cube is given since it is viewed on a two-dimensional स्क्रीन.
The same applies to the tesseract, which additionally can तभी be दिखाया as a projection even in three-dimensional space.
A आरेख प्रर्दशित the पहला चार spatial dimensions.
In physics and mathematics, the dimension of a space or object is informally defined as the न्यूनतम क्रमांक of निर्देशांक needed to बताएँ कोई पाइंट भीतर it.
Thus a line has a आयाम of एक क्युकी तभी एक निर्देशांक is needed to बताएँ a point on it ( for example, the point at 5 on a number line ).
A surface such as a plane or the surface of a cylinder or sphere has a dimension of two because two coordinates are needed to specify a पाइंट on it ( लिये उदाहरण, to locate a पाइंट on the सतह of a गोला तुम need दोनो इसके अक्षांश and its longitude ).
The inside of a घन, a बेलन or a गोला is three-dimensional क्युकी three coordinates are needed to locate a point within these spaces.
In physical terms, dimension refers to the constituent structure of all space ( volume ) and its position in time ( perceived as a scalar dimension along the t-axis ), as well as the स्थानिक संविधान of वस्तुएँ within—structures कि correlate साथ दोनो कण और फ़ील्ड conceptions, interact according to सापेक्ष गुण of द्रव्यमान —and हैं fundamentally गणितीय in वर्णन.
These, or other axes, may be referenced to uniquely identify a point or structure in its attitude and relationship to अन्य वस्तुएँ और occurrences.
Physical theories that चरितार्थ समय, ऐसे as सामान्य आपेक्षिकता, हैं कहा to कार्य in 4-dimensional `` spacetime ``, ( defined as a Minkowski space ).
Modern theories tend to be `` higher-dimensional '' सहित क्वांटम field and string theories.
the state-space of quantum mechanics is an infinite-dimensional function space.
The अवधारणा of आयाम is नहीं प्रतिबंधित to शारीरिक objects.
High-dimensional spaces occur in mathematics and the sciences for many reasons, frequently as विन्यास स्पेसेस ऐसे as in लाग्रांजीय or हेमिल्टोनीय यांत्रिकी ; ये हैं अमूर्त स्पेसेस, स्वतंत्र of the physical space we live in.
Fontana ( ) is a city of 200,762 निवासियों in सैन bernardino काउंटी, California.
संस्थापित in 1913, it remained essentially ग्रामीण until World War II, when entrepreneur Henry J. Kaiser built a large steel mill in the area.
It is now a regional hub of the trucking industry, साथ अंतरराज्यीय 10 और राज्य रूट 210 transecting the नगर इससे ईस्ट to वेस्ट, और अंतरराज्यीय 15 गुजर diagonally through its northwestern quadrant.
It is home to the largest of the सैन bernardino काउंटी प्रणाली पुस्तकालयों, a संवर ऐतिहासिक theater, a municipal park, and the Auto Club Speedway on the site of the Kaiser Steel Mill.
Fontana also hosts the Fontana Days हाफ मैराथन और 5k चलाएं.
This race is the fastest half-marathon कोर्स in the संसार.
The U.S. 2012 Census reported कि fontana 's जनसांख्यिकी थी 200,762 in 2012, making it the second most populous city in San Bernardino county county and 14th in the state.
Cowboys Stadium is a stadium with a retractable छत in आर्लिंगटन, टेक्सास.
It serves as the घर of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल League 's Dallas Cowboys.
It replaced the partially covered Texas Stadium, which खोली in 1971, और परोसा as the cowboys ' home through the 2008 season.
It was completed on may 27, 2009.
The stadium seats 85,000, बनाना it the तीसरा largest स्टेडियम in the एनएफएल by seating capacity.
the अधिकतम क्षमता of the स्टेडियम, including standing room, is 105,000.
The Party Pass ( open areas ) sections are behind seats in प्रत्येक समाप्त मण्डल और on a श्रेणी of छह elevated प्लेटफ़ॉर्म कनेक्ट by stairways.
It has the world 's largest column-free आंतरिक और the चौथी largest ऊँची definition video screen, which hangs from 20 yard line to 20 yard line.
The facility can also be used for a variety of other activities outside of its main purpose ( professional football ) such as कॉन्सर्ट, बास्केट खेल, मुक्केबाज़ी मिलान, कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल और ऊँची स्कूल फ़ुटबॉल प्रतियोगिताओं, सॉकर मिलान, और motocross races.
Canadian historians जबतक the 1980s tended to फ़ोकस on आर्थिक इतिहास, सहित labour history.
In part this is because Canada has had far fewer राजनैतिक or सैन्य विरोध than अन्य समाजों.
इस थी विशेषकर सच्चा in the पहला half of the twentieth century when economic history was overwhelmingly dominant.
Many of the most prominent अंग्रेज़ी कनाडाई इतिहासकारों इससे इस काल यहूद economic historians, such as Harold Innis, Donald Creighton and Arthur R. M. Lower
Scholars of Canadian history were heirs to the traditions that developed in Europe and the United राज्य, लकिन frameworks कि worked खूब elsewhere often failed in Canada.
The heavily Marxist बहकावे आर्थिक इतिहास कि dominates यूरोपीय रै little relevance to most of Canadian history.
A फ़ोकस on क्लास, शहरी क्षेत्रों, और उद्योग fails to address Canada 's rural and resource based economy.
similarly, the monetarist स्कूल कि is प्रबल in the United States also has been difficult to transfer north of the border.
The study of economic history in Canada became अत्यधिक केन्द्रित on आर्थिक भूगोल, और लिये अनेक सालो the प्रबल स्कूल of विचार has been the staples thesis.
इस स्कूल of विचार bases the पढ़ाई of the कनाडाई economy on the study of natural resources.
This approach has since also become used outside of कनाडा in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और in अनेक developing nations.
Before the आगमन of europeans, the पहला राष्ट्र of कया होता become Canada had a large and vibrant trade network.
Furs, tools, decorative items, and other goods were प्रायः transported हज़ारों of किलोमीटर, ज़्यादातर by canoe throughout the many rivers and lakes of the region.
The early European history of the Canadian economy is प्रायः पढ़ाई through the स्टेपल्स लेख जिससे argues the Canadian economy developed through the exploitation of a series of staples that would be exported to Europe.
Carbon-14, 14C, or radiocarbon, is a रेडियोसक्रिय समस्थानिक of कार्बन with a nucleus containing 6 protons and 8 neutrons.
Its presence in organic materials is the आधार of the radiocarbon डेटिंग विधि pioneered by willard लिब्बी और सहयोगियों ( 1949 ) to date archaeological, geological and hydrogeological samples.
Carbon-14 was discovered on 27 February 1940, by Martin Kamen and Sam Ruben at the University of कैलिफ़ोर्निया विकिरण प्रयोगशाला in बर्कली, हालांकि इसके अस्तित्व था महरूम सुझाया by Franz Kurie in 1934.
There are three naturally occurring isotopes of carbon on Earth : 99 % of the carbon is carbon-12, 1 % is carbon-13, और carbon-14 occurs in ट्रेस amounts, i.e., बनाना up परिचय 1 भाग प्रति खरब ( 0.0000000001 % ) of the carbon in the atmosphere.
The half-life of carbon-14 is 5,730±40 years.
Carbon-14 decays into nitrogen-14 through बीटा decay.
The primary natural सोर्स of carbon-14 on धरती is लौकिक रे कार्रवाई upon नाइट्रोजन in the माहौल, and it is therefore a cosmogenic nuclide.
However, open-air nuclear testing between 1955–1980 contributed to इस पूल.
The different isotopes of कार्बन do नहीं differ appreciably in their chemical properties.
This is used in chemical and biological research, in a technique called carbon labeling : carbon-14 atoms can be used to replace nonradioactive कार्बन, in अनुक्रम to ट्रेस रासायनिक और biochemical प्रतिक्रियाएँ involving कार्बन अणु इससे कोई दिए सशुल्क यौगिक.
Lightning is a अत्यधिक दृश्य form of energy transfer
Lightning strikes are विद्युत discharges on a विशाल स्केल between the माहौल और an earth-bound object.
They mostly originate in thunderclouds और terminate on the मैदान, पुकारा Cloud to Ground ( CG ) lightning.
However, they may भी be initiated इससे a very tall grounded object and reach into the clouds.
हालांकि `` a बिजली स्ट्राइक '' is commonly प्रयुक्त to describe सब बिजली, it is बल्कि ग़लत और a misnomer, as तभी परिचय 25 % of सब बिजली कार्यक्रम विश्वव्यापी हैं cg, the विशाल बल्क of बिजली events are Intracloud ( IC ) or Cloud to Cloud ( CC ), where discharge only occurs high in the atmosphere.
The scientific name for the पूरा प्रक्रम of a सिंगल बिजली इवेंट is a और it is a बहुत जटिल, अनेक stepped interaction, which is not completely understood.
सबसे cg flashes तभी `` स्ट्राइक '' एक शारीरिक location, referred to as a termination.
The primary conducting channel, the उज्जवल coursing लाइट तुम may देखिए और कॉल a `` स्ट्राइक '', is तभी परिचय 1 इंच in व्यास, although to our eyes it looks much larger.
They are miles long, upwards of tens of miles.
And the entire फ्लैश, lasts तभी a few fractions of a second, most of which is not visible to human eyes.
थंडर is सदा उत्पादित by lightning.
Just like lightning, that deceives our eyes, usually looking larger or closer than it वाकई is, the धरती 's माहौल और हमारी दिमाग 's बोध of the बाहर संसार, ultimately determines whether it is `` heard '' or not.
Lightning can not happen in a vacuum devoid of ions, nor can थंडर occur बगैर अणुओं to vibrate.
Thunder is a physical निरपेक्ष लिये प्रत्येक single flash of lightning.
Contrary to popular belief, a बिजली स्ट्राइक itself is प्रायः नहीं जिम्मेदार लिये अनेक deaths or injuries from a single event.
It would be impossible दिए the प्राकृतिक tendencies of a फ्लैश, जबतक लोगों or पशु यहूद stacked on शीर्ष of प्रत्येक अन्य, or they were somehow arranged vertically and part of the flash channel.
When lightning ignites an उपलब्धियाँ ईंधन सोर्स और an विस्फोट occurs, it is the shock wave or fire causing the injuries, not the strike itself.
Ground Currents, भी पुकारा कदम संभावित, of an धरती termination is कया truly causes most injuries or death to humans and animals.
The near instantaneous rush of surface charges, induced by the ओवरहेड thundercloud itself, रेस to the स्ट्राइक point from hundreds to thousands of feet away during discharge.
This वर्तमान, caused दौरान प्रत्येक स्ट्रोक, takes the पाथ of तनिक प्रतिरोध, which may be ion rich human or animal legs, over poorly conducting earth.
This is why it is best to crouch, साथ फीट बंद साथ, if कभी caught in the खोलें दौरान a अंधड़.
Unfortunately, most reports do not draw a distinction between the real कारण of चोट or मौत, be it the स्ट्राइक itself, a resulting विस्फोट or आग, or usually responsible step potential.

sealing is an अध्यादेश ( अनुष्ठान ) performed in latter Day Saints temples by a person holding the sealing authority.
The purpose of इस अध्यादेश is to मुहर परिचित संबंध, बनाना संभावित the existence of family relationships throughout eternity.
LDS teachings place great महत्व on the विशिष्ट प्राधिकार जरूरी to perform these sealings.
Church doctrine teaches that this authority, called the priesthood, corresponds to कि दिए to संत पीटर in.
Sealings are typically performed as विवाह or as sealing of children to अभिभावक.
They were performed prior to the मौत of जोसेफ स्मिथ, jr. ( the प्रमुख संस्थापक of the latter Day Saint movement ), and are currently performed in The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.
Although some other denominations, ऐसे as the जातियाँ of मसीह, दृश्य sealing as an centuries of स्मिथ 's अभ्यास of बहुवचन marriage, some do still perform them.
The 2000s, pronounced `` two thousands '', थी a दशक कि began on जनवरी 1, 2000, and ended on December 31, 2009.
Globalization, which had accelerated बाद the जल्दी 1990s पतन of साम्यवादी, जारी to be a force in the 2000s.
The growth of the अंतरजाल थी एक of the प्रधान योगदानकर्ता to वैश्वीकरण दौरान the दशक, बनाना it संभावित लिये लोगों to interact साथ अन्य लोगों, एक्स्प्रेस विचार, introduce अन्य to अलग संस्कृतियों और पृष्ठभूमि, उपयोग goods and services, sell and buy online, research and learn about things, along with experiencing the world without having to leave home.
The institutions, linkages and technologies that उभरा or यहूद redefined पहले होता subsequently in इस दशक लाभ many countries, in particular China and India.
However, in other भाग of the संसार ऐसे प्रगति विफल to पता जारी struggles साथ आधुनिकता, most notably characterized by the rise of al-Qaeda and other Islamist groups.
The September 11 attacks in 2001 led to the United States, United Kingdom, Spain, Canada और अन्य राष्ट्र आक्रमणकारी अफगानिस्तान, as खूब as implementing विभिन्न anti-terrorist measures at home and abroad in what was known as the War on Terror.
The European Union saw further संयोजन और विस्तार throughout much of Europe.

The Gunfight at the O.K. Corral was a gunfight that took प्लेस at परिचय 3:00 p.m. on बुधवार, अक्तूबर 26, 1881, in tombstone, एरिज़ोना territory, और is generally regarded as the most famous gunfight in the history of the American Old West.
The gunfight, believed to have lasted तभी परिचय तीस सेकेंड, थी लड़ा between the गैरकानूनी cowboys बिली claiborne, Ike and Billy Clanton, and Tom and Frank McLaury, and the opposing town Marshal Virgil Earp and his brothers Assistant Town Marshal Morgan and temporary lawman Wyatt, aided by Doc Holliday designated as a temporary marshal by Virgil.
Ike Clanton and Billy Claiborne ran इससे the लड़ो unharmed, लकिन आइक 's bhai बिली clanton was killed, along with both McLaurys.
Lawmen Virgil और मॉर्गन earp और दस्तावेज़ हॉलिडे यहूद wounded.
Only Wyatt Earp आए through the लड़ो unharmed.
The fight has come to represent a time in American history when the frontier was open range for outlaws opposed by विधि प्रवर्तन कि थी स्प्रेड पतला over विशाल territories, leaving कुछ क्षेत्रों unprotected.
The gunfight was not well known to the American public until 1931 when author Stuart Lake published what has चूंकि महरूम संकल्पित to be a largely fictionalized जीवनी, व्याट earp : frontier मार्शल, two years after Earp 's death.
Lake retold उसके स्टोरी in a 1946 किताब कि निदेशक जॉन Ford developed into the movie My Darling Clementine.
After the movie Gunfight at the O.K. Corral was released in 1957, the गोलीबारी आए to be ज्ञात by that name.
Since तब, the विरोध रै महरूम portrayed साथ varying degrees of accuracy in numerous Western films and books.
Despite its name, the gunfight actually occurred in a सीमित लॉट छह द्वार वेस्ट of the पश्च प्रवेश to the o.k. corral on fremont गली, और also in the street.
The two opposing पार्टियों यहूद initially तभी about apart.
About तीस गोलियाँ यहूद fired in thirty seconds.
Ike Clanton filed murder charges against the Earps and Doc Holliday but they यहूद आखिरकार exonerated by a लोकल न्यायधीश बाद a 30-day प्रारंभिक hearing and then again by a local grand jury.
on दिसम्बर 28, 1881, वर्जिल earp थी maimed in an हत्या attempt by the outlaw Cowboys, and on March 18, 1882, they assassinated Morgan Earp.
The suspects furnished solid alibis, and newly appointed Deputy U.S. Marshal Wyatt Earp took matters into his own हैंड्स दौरान the earp वेंडेट्टा सवारी, ironically धड़ा by काउंटी शेरिफ जॉनी behan साथ वारंट for the Earp 's arrest.
HDMI ( high-definition मल्टीमीडिया इंटरफ़ेस ) is a कॉम्पैक्ट audio/video इंटरफ़ेस लिये transferring uncompressed वीडियो आंकड़ा और compressed/uncompressed डिजिटल ऑडियो आंकड़ा इससे a hdmi-compliant यंत्र ( `` the सोर्स यंत्र '' ) to a संगत computer monitor, video projector, digital television, or digital audio device.
HDMI is a digital replacement for मौजूदा एनालॉग वीडियो मानकों.
There are a क्रमांक of hdmi-standard केबल कनेक्टर्स उपलब्धियाँ, प्रत्येक of जिससे can be प्रयुक्त लिये कोई uncompressed tv or pc वीडियो स्वरूप, सहित मानक, उन्नत, ऊँची परिभाषा, और 3D video signals ; up to 8 channels of compressed or uncompressed digital audio ; a CEC ( Consumer Electronics Control ) connection ; and an Ethernet data connection.
HDMI implements the eia/cea-861 मानकों, जिससे define वीडियो स्वरुप और waveforms, हस्तांतरण of compressed, uncompressed, and LPCM audio, auxiliary data, and implementations of the VESA EDID.
The cec allows hdmi डिवाइस to कंट्रोल प्रत्येक अन्य जब necessary and allows the user to operate multiple devices with one remote control handset.
Because HDMI is electrically संगत साथ the cea-861 सिग्नल प्रयुक्त by डिजिटल विज़ुअल इंटरफ़ेस ( dvi ), no सिग्नल परिवर्तन is जरुरी, nor is वहीँ a घाटा of video quality when a DVI-to-HDMI adapter is used.
As an uncompressed cea-861 कनेक्शन, hdmi is स्वतंत्र of the विभिन्न डिजिटल टेलीविज़न मानकों प्रयुक्त by व्यक्तिगत डिवाइस, ऐसे as atsc और dvb, as these are encapsulations of compressed MPEG video streams ( which can be decoded and output as an uncompressed video stream on HDMI ).
Production of consumer hdmi उत्पाद प्रारंभ in लेट 2003.
In Europe either dvi-hdcp or hdmi is शामिल in the hd ready in-store labeling specification for TV sets for HDTV, formulated by EICTA with SES Astra in 2005.
HDMI began to appear on उपभोक्ता hdtv camcorders and digital still cameras in 2006.
As of January 8, 2013, which is टेन सालो बाद the रिलीज of the पहला hdmi specification, over 3 billion HDMI devices have shipped since the launch of the HDMI standard.
Bree Van de Kamp ( née Mason ; also known in the series as Bree Hodge and ब्री वेस्टन ) is a fictional अक्षर और एक of the चार protagonists on the एबीसी टेलीविज़न श्रेणी हताश Housewives.
She is played by actress Marcia Cross, who has received multiple awards and nominations लिये उसके portrayal, सहित an एमी पुरस्कार नामांकन, तीन सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार nominations, और two Screen Actors Guild Awards.
Cross 's portrayal of ब्री रै महरूम widely praised by critics and fans.
Cross originally auditioned for the role of Mary Alice Young, but series creator Marc चेरी विचार वो थी बेहतर suited लिये the भूमिका of Bree.
Dana Delany, who eventually was cast as Katherine Mayfair, was originally चुनी लिये the भूमिका लकिन turned it bas, saying it was too similar to her role in Pasadena.
Bree 's main struggle throughout the series has been her attempts to maintain a perfect जीवन despite विभिन्न बाधाएं ऐसे as widowhood, तलाक, और alcoholism hindering उसके.
She has been married three times ; to रेक्स वैन de kamp ( स्टीवन culp ), orson होज ( Kyle MacLachlan ) and Trip Weston ( Scott Bakula ).

The population was 3,167 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.

The Hangover Part II is a 2011 American कॉमेडी फिल्मी उत्पादित by legendary तस्वीरें और वितरित by Warner Bros. Pictures.
It is the sequel to 2009 's the hangover और the दूसरी फिल्मी in The Hangover franchise.
Todd Phillips directed the film in addition to co-authoring the स्क्रिप्ट साथ क्रेग mazin, and Scot Armstrong.
The फिल्मी सितारों ब्राडली कूपर, ed helms, zach galifianakis, केन jeong, जेफरी Tambor, Justin Bartha and Paul Giamatti.
the hangover भाग ii tells the स्टोरी of फिल, stu, एलन, and Doug as they travel to Thailand for Stu 's wedding.
After the bachelor party in Las Vegas, Stu takes no chances and opts for a सुरक्षित, subdued pre-wedding brunch.
However, things do नहीं go as नियोजित, resulting in another ख़राब hangover with no memories of the previous night.
Development of The Hangover Part II began in अप्रैल 2009, दो महीने पहले the hangover was released.
The principal अभिनेताओं यहूद डाल in कूच 2010 to reprise their roles from the first film.
Production began in अक्तूबर 2010, in ओंटारियो, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, पहले moving on location in Thailand.
The film was released on May 26, 2011 और, despite receiving ज़्यादातर ऋणात्मक समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों, it became the highest-grossing R-rated comedy during its theatrical run.
A third film is नियत लिये on may 24, 2013.

The English Renaissance was a cultural and artistic movement in England dating from the लेट 15th और जल्दी 16th सदियां to the जल्दी 17th सदी.
It is associated with the pan-European Renaissance कि is प्रायः regarded as शुरूआत in इटली in the late 14th century.
Like सबसे of उत्तरी यूरोपीय, इंग्लैण्ड देखी छोटी of these developments until more than a century later.
The beginning of the English Renaissance is often taken, as a convenience, to be 1485, जब the बैटल of bosworth फ़ील्ड ended the युद्धों of the गुलाब और उदघाटन the Tudor Dynasty.
Renaissance style and ideas, however, यहूद slow in penetrating इंग्लैण्ड, और the elizabethan era in the दूसरी half of the 16th century is usually regarded as the height of the English Renaissance.
Elizabeth Ann Bloomer Warren `` Betty '' Ford ( अप्रैल 8, 1918 – जुलाई 8, 2011 ), थी पहला महिला of the संयुक्त States from 1974 to 1977 during the presidency of her husband Gerald Ford.
As First Lady, she was active in social policy and निर्मित precedents as a नीतियां क्रियाशील अध्यक्षीय wife.
Throughout her husband 's term in office, she maintained high approval ratings despite विपक्ष इससे कुछ रूढ़िवादी republicans जो objected to उसके अधिक मॉडरेट और उदार स्थितियाँ on सोशल issues.
Ford was noted for raising breast cancer जागरूकता following उसके 1974 mastectomy और थी a passionate समर्थक of, और activist for, the Equal Rights Amendment ( ERA ).
Pro-choice on abortion and a leader in the Women 's गति, वो gained कीर्ति as एक of the सबसे निष्कपट पहला महिलाओं in इतिहास, commenting on प्रत्येक hot-button समस्या of the समय, सहित feminism, equal pay, the ERA, sex, drugs, abortion, and gun control.
She also raised awareness of व्यसन जब वो घोषित उसके long-running battle with alcoholism in the 1970s.
Following her White House years, she जारी to लॉबी लिये the era और remained क्रियाशील in the feminist movement.
She was the founder, and served as the first chair of the board of directors, of the Betty Ford Center for पदार्थ गाली और व्यसन और is a प्राप्तकर्ता of the congressional सुनहरा पदक ( co-presentation साथ उसके husband, जेराल्ड R. घाट, अक्तूबर 21, 1998 ) and the Presidential Medal of Freedom ( alone, presented 1991, by George H. W. Bush ).
platelet endothelial कोशिका adhesion अणु ( pecam-1 ) भी ज्ञात as क्लस्टर of differentiation 31 ( CD31 ) is a protein that in human is encoded by the PECAM1 gene found on chromosome 17.
PECAM-1 plays a कुंजी भूमिका in removing aged neutrophils from the body.

The Miss Florida USA competition is the pageant that selects the प्रतिनिधि लिये the राज्य फ्लोरिडा in the मिस यूएसए pageant.
While Florida has been successful in terms of runners-up, finalists और semi-finalists, the राज्य रै never won the Miss USA pageant, although Cheryl Patton became Miss USA after Sylvia Hitchcock won Miss Universe.
Florida 's best results were during the mid-1960s to mid-1970s.
Their most recent finalist was lissette गार्सिया जो लगाई in the शीर्ष 16 in 2011.
Two former Miss Florida Teen USA titleholders have won this प्रतियोगिता, और तीन titleholders have भी competed at Miss America.
The वर्तमान titleholder is मिशेल Aguirre of Hialeah.
Anglo-Saxon England refers to the काल of the इतिहास of the भाग of ब्रिटेन कि became ज्ञात as इंग्लैण्ड, स्थायी इससे the समाप्त of रोमन occupation and establishment of Anglo-Saxon kingdoms in the 5th century until the Norman conquest of England in 1066 by William the Conqueror.
Anglo-Saxon is a general term referring to the Germanic peoples जो आए to ब्रिटेन दौरान the 5th और 6th सदियां, including Angles, Saxons, Frisii, and Jutes.
The term also refers to the language spoken at the time in England, which is अभी पुकारा बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी, और to the संस्कृति of the era, जिससे रै long आकर्षित लोकप्रिय और scholarly ध्यान.
Until the 9th century Anglo-Saxon England was dominated by the Heptarchy, the kingdoms of नॉर्थम्ब्रिया, mercia, ईस्ट anglia, एसेक्स, केंट, ससेक्स, and Wessex.
In terms of religion the kingdoms followed Anglo-Saxon paganism दौरान the जल्दी काल, लकिन परिवर्तित to christianity during the 7th century.
Paganism had a final stronghold in a period of mercian आधिपत्य दौरान the 640s, ending with the death of Penda of Mercia in 655.
Facing the threat of Viking invasions, the House of Wessex became dominant दौरान the 9th सदी, अंतर्गत the नियम of अल्फ्रेड the Great.
During the 10th century, the individual kingdoms एकीकृत अंतर्गत the नियम of wessex into the किंगडम of इंग्लैण्ड, जिससे stood opposed to the Danelaw, the Viking kingdoms established from the 9th century in the north and east of England.
The Kingdom of England fell in the Viking invasion from Denmark in 1013 और थी शासित by the हाउस of डेनमार्क जबतक 1042, जब the Anglo-Saxon House of Wessex was restored.
The last Anglo-Saxon king, Harold godwinson, थी मारे in 1066 at the बैटल of Hastings.

Smoked salmon is a preparation of सामन, typically a fillet कि रै महरूम cured and hot or cold smoked.
Due to its moderately high price, smoked सामन is माना a delicacy.
Although the term lox is sometimes applied to स्मोक्ड सामन, वे हैं अलग उत्पाद.
View of defibrillator एलेक्ट्रोड स्थिति और placement.
defibrillation is a आम उपचार लिये life-threatening हृदय dysrhythmias, ventricular fibrillation, and pulseless ventricular tachycardia.
Defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic खुराक of विद्युत उर्जा to the प्रभावित दिल साथ a यंत्र called a defibrillator.
This depolarizes a नाजुक द्रव्यमान of the दिल मांसपेशी, terminates the dysrhythmia, और allows सामान्य sinus लय to be reestablished by the body 's natural pacemaker, in the sinoatrial node of the heart.
Defibrillators can be external, transvenous, or implanted, depending on the प्रकार of यंत्र प्रयुक्त or needed.
Some external units, known as automated external defibrillators ( AEDs ), automate the diagnosis of treatable लय, अर्थ कि lay responders or bystanders हैं समर्थ to उपयोग उन्हें सफलतापूर्वक with little, or in some cases no training at all.
Gabrielle `` Coco '' Bonheur Chanel ( August 19, 1883 – January 10, 1971 ) was a फ्रेंच फ़ैशन पंक्तियां और संस्थापक of the चैनल ब्रांड.
She was the only फ़ैशन पंक्तियां to appear on समय पत्रिका 's सूची of the 100 सबसे influential people of the 20th century.
Along with Paul Poiret, Chanel थी credited साथ liberating महिलाओं इससे the constraints of the `` corseted silhouette '' और popularizing the स्वीकृति of a sportive, casual chic as the feminine standard in the post- World War I era.
A सफल फ़ैशन निर्माता, चैनल 's influence extended beyond couture clothing.
Her design aesthetic was realized in आभूषण, हैंडबैग, और महक.
Her हस्ताक्षर सैंट, चैनल no. 5, has become an iconic product.
Chanel was known for her lifelong determination, महत्वाकांक्षा और उर्जा जिससे वो लागू to her professional and social life.
She achieved both कामयाबी as a businesswoman और सोशल prominence धन्यवाद to the connections she made through her work.
These included अनेक कलाकारों और craftspeople to whom she became a patron.
However, Chanel 's highly competitive, opportunistic personality led her to make questionable जीवन चुनाव जिससे have उत्पन्न विवाद around उसके प्रतिष्ठा, विशेषकर उसके आचरण दौरान the जर्मनी occupation of France in World War II.
Allied Mills आटा मिल on the बैंको of the Manchester Ship Canal
A gristmill ( भी : grist मिल, मकई मिल or आटा मिल ) grinds grain into flour.
The term can refer to दोनो the पीस यांत्रिकी और the building that holds it.
Romania ( ; dated spellings Roumania और rumania ; ) is a देश स्तिथ at the चौराहे of Central and Southeastern Europe, bordering on the Black Sea.
Romania shares a border with Hungary and Serbia to the west, युक्त और moldova to the पूर्वोत्तर और ईस्ट, और बुल्गारिया to the south.
At, Romania is the आठवीं largest देश of the यूरोपीय संघ by area, and has the seventh largest population of the European Union with more than 19 million people.
Its capital and biggest city is बुखारेस्ट, the 11th largest नगर in the EU.
The United Principalities emerged when the territories of moldavia और wallachia यहूद संयुक्त अंतर्गत Prince Alexander Ioan Cuza in 1859.
In 1866 Prince Karl of Hohenzollern-Sigmaringen was called to the सिंहासन as the सत्ताधारी प्रिंस of the रोमानियाई principate और in 1881 he थी आखिरकार पहनाया as किंग कैरोल i the first monarch of the Kingdom of Romania.
Independence from the उस्मानी साम्राज्य थी घोषित on 9 may 1877, and was internationally recognized the following year.
At the end of World War I, transylvania, bukovina और Bessarabia united with the Kingdom of Romania.
World War II gave cause to the rise of a military तानाशाही in रोमानिया अंतर्गत फासिस्ट सामान्य आयन antonescu, जो chose to लड़ो on the side of the Axis powers from 1941 to 1944.
बाद उसके हटाना, रोमानिया switched पहलू in 1944 and joined the Allies.
By the end of the war, some formerly Romanian northeastern territories were occupied by the सोवियत संघ, साथ रेड फौज इकाई stationed on रोमानियाई soil.
In 1947 रोमानिया forcibly became a लोगों 's गणतंत्र ( 1947-1965 ) and a member of the Warsaw Pact.
In 1965 Nicolae Ceauşescu became General Secretary of the Romanian Communist पार्टी, और the हर्ष austerity उपायों, राजनैतिक दमन, और cult of व्यक्तित्व he implemented led to the समाजवादी गणतंत्र of रोमानिया ( 1965-1989 ) बनने the सबसे Stalinist police state in the Eastern bloc.
Eventually his authoritarian सरकारी थी toppled in दिसम्बर 1989 दौरान the रोमानियाई क्रान्ति of 1989.
With the fall of the Iron Curtain, Romania began इसके परिवर्तन towards लोकतंत्र और a पूंजीवादी market economy.
After a decade of post-revolution economic problems and living-standards मनाही, extensive reforms fostered आर्थिक रिकवरी.
As of 2010, रोमानिया is an upper-middle-income country with a high human development index.
Romania joined NATO on 29 कूच 2004, और the यूरोपीय संघ on 1 जनवरी 2007.
It is also a member of the : लैटिन संघ, francophonie, osce, WTO, BSEC, United Nations, etc.
Today, Romania is a एकात्मक semi-presidential गणतंत्र, in जिससे the कार्यपालिका शाखा consists of the President and the Government.
`` Ancient '' redirects यहाँ.
For other uses, देखिए प्राचीनता ( बहुविकल्पी ).
The times before writing belong either to protohistory or to prehistory.
khafre 's पिरामिड ( 4th राजवंश ) और ग्रेट sphinx of Giza ( c. 2500 BC or perhaps earlier )
Ancient history is the study of the written पास्ट इससे the शुरूआत of अंकित इंसान इतिहास to the Early Middle Ages.
The span of recorded history is roughly 5,000 years, with Cuneiform script, the oldest खोजा रूप of सुसंगत लिखने, इससे the protoliterate काल around the 30th सदी BC.
This is the beginning of history, as opposed to प्रागितिहास, according to the परिभाषा प्रयुक्त by सबसे historians.
The term classical antiquity is often used to refer to history in the बूढ़ा संसार इससे the शुरूआत of अंकित यूनानी इतिहास in 776 BC ( First Olympiad ).
This roughly coincides with the traditional date of the founding of रोम in 753 bc, the शुरूआत of the इतिहास of प्राचीन रोम, और the beginning of the Archaic period in Ancient Greece.
Although the ending date of प्राचीन इतिहास is विवादित, कुछ पश्चिमी विद्वानों उपयोग the पतन of the पश्चिमी रोमन साम्राज्य in 476 ad, the closure of the platonic अकादमी in 529 ad, the death of the emperor Justinian I, the coming of Islam or the rise of Charlemagne as the end of ancient and Classical European history.
In India, the काल शामिल the जल्दी काल of the मध्य kingdoms, और, in चीन, the time up to the Qin Dynasty is included.
Methylcobalamin ( दिखाया ) is a रूप of विटामिन B12.
Physically it resembles the other forms of विटामिन b12, occurring as अंधेरा रेड crystals कि freely रूप cherry-colored transparent solutions in water.
Vitamin B12, vitamin B12 or विटामिन b-12, भी पुकारा cobalamin, is a water-soluble vitamin with a key role in the normal functioning of the brain and nervous system, and for the formation of blood.
it is एक of the eight B vitamins.
It is normally involved in the metabolism of प्रत्येक कोशिका of the इंसान देह, विशेषकर affecting डीएनए संश्लेषण और विनियमन, लकिन भी fatty acid synthesis and energy production.
Neither fungi, plants, nor पशु हैं सक्षम of producing vitamin B12.
Only bacteria and archaea have the enzymes required for its synthesis, हालांकि अनेक भोजन हैं a प्राकृतिक सोर्स of b12 क्युकी of बैक्टीरियल symbiosis.
The vitamin is the largest and most structurally जटिल विटामिन और can be उत्पादित industrially only through bacterial fermentation-synthesis.
Vitamin B12 consists of a क्लास of chemically सम्बन्धित यौगिकों ( vitamers ), all of which have vitamin activity.
It contains the biochemically विरल तत्व कोबाल्ट.
Biosynthesis of the basic structure of the vitamin is accomplished only by bacteria ( जिससे प्रायः उपज hydroxocobalamin ), लकिन परिवर्तन between अलग फ़ॉर्म of the vitamin can be accomplished in the human body.
A common semi-synthetic form of the vitamin, cyanocobalamin, does not occur in nature, but is produced from bacterial hydroxocobalamin और तब प्रयुक्त in अनेक दवाएँ और पूरक, और as a खाना योगात्मक, क्युकी of इसके स्थिरता and lower production cost.
In the body it is converted to the human physiological forms methylcobalamin and adenosylcobalamin, leaving behind the साइनाइड, albeit in minimal विशेषज्ञता.
More recently, hydroxocobalamin, methylcobalamin, और adenosylcobalamin can be found in more expensive pharmacological products and food supplements.
The अतिरिक्त यूटिलिटी of ये is फिलहाल debated.
Vitamin B12 was discovered from its relationship to the disease pernicious रक्ताल्पता, जिससे is an असंक्राम्य बीमारी in जिससे parietal कोशिकाएं of the stomach responsible for secreting intrinsic factor are destroyed.
Intrinsic फ़ैक्टर is निर्णायक लिये the सामान्य अवशोषण of b12, so a कमी of मूलभूत फ़ैक्टर, as seen in pernicious anemia, causes a vitamin B12 deficiency.
Many other subtler kinds of विटामिन b12 कमियां and their biochemical effects have since been elucidated.
The Roman Empire ( ) was the post- Republican period of the ancient रोमन सभ्यता, characterised by an निरंकुश रूप of सरकारी और विशाल territorial holdings around the भूमध्यसागरीय in यूरोपीय, Africa, and Asia.
The 500-year-old रोमन गणतंत्र, जिससे preceded it, था महरूम destabilized through a series of civil wars.
Several events marked the परिवर्तन इससे गणतंत्र to साम्राज्य, सहित जूलियस सीज़र 's नियुक्ति as perpetual तानाशाह ( 44 bc ) ; the बैटल of actium ( 31 BC ) ; and the granting of the honorific Augustus to Octavian by the Roman Senate ( 27 BC ).
The first two centuries of the Empire were a काल of unprecedented स्थिरता और समृद्धि ज्ञात as the pax romana ( `` Roman Peace '' ).
It reached its greatest expanse दौरान the शासनकाल of त्राजान ( 98–117 AD ).
In the 3rd century, the Empire underwent a crisis that threatened इसके अस्तित्व, लकिन थी reunified और stabilized अंतर्गत the emperors aurelian and Diocletian.
ईसाइयों रोज़ to शक्ति in the 4th सदी, during which time a system of dual rule was developed in the Latin West and Greek East.
After the collapse of central government in the West in the 5th सदी, the पूर्वी हाफ जारी as कया होता बाद be ज्ञात as the Byzantine Empire.
Because of the Empire 's vast extent and long endurance, the संस्थानों और संस्कृति of रोम था a profound और स्थायी influence on the विकास of भाषा, धर्म, वास्तुकला, दर्शनशास्त्र, विधि, और फ़ॉर्म of सरकारी in the territory it governed, particularly Europe, and by means of European expansionism throughout the modern world.
Total body surface area ( TBSA ) is an मूल्यांकन माप of burns of the skin.
In adults, the `` rule of nines '' is used to determine the कुल प्रतिशत of क्षेत्रफल burned लिये प्रत्येक प्रमुख section of the body.
in कुछ मामले, the burns may कवर अधिक than एक देह भाग, or may नहीं fully cover such a part ; in these cases, burns are measured by using the casualty 's palm as a reference point for 1 % of the body.
For children और infants, the lund-browder चार्ट is प्रयुक्त to assess the burned body surface area.
अलग percentages हैं प्रयुक्त क्युकी the अनुपात of the संयुक्त सतह क्षेत्रफल of the सिर और गर्दन to the surface area of the limbs is typically larger in children than that of an adult.
Typical मान लिये आम समूह of humans follow.
( due to rounding, values may not add to 100 %. )
World infant mortality दरों by पाँच सालो averages in 2008.
इस is a सूची of देशों by infant mortality rate.
Jonah Kirsten Sorrentino ( born June 26, 1975 ), बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम kj-52, is a ईसाई rapper from Tampa, Florida.
The `` KJ '' part of उसके नाम refers to उसके बूढ़ा रैप alias, `` किंग J. Mac, '' a name which he later described in one of his podcasts as `` horribly cheesy. ''
`` 52 '', which is pronounced `` five two '', not `` fifty-two '', is a reference to the Biblical story of Jesus feeding the multitude साथ पाँच loaves और दो मछली, जिससे is भी सुंग परिचय in उसके सोंग `` धक्का up '' इससे The Yearbook and in the `` KJ Five Two '' on It 's Pronounced 'Five Two.
He was awarded the rap/hip हॉप अंकित सोंग of the साल लिये `` never dekh दूर '' and Rap/Hip Hop Album of the Year at the GMA Dove Awards of 2007.
On July 28, 2009, KJ-52 released `` End of My Rope '', जिससे is the पहला सिंगल लिये his album Five-Two Television.
His सोंग `` डिअर पतला '' is आधारित on एमिनेम 's सोंग `` Stan `` and is a sort of personal message from KJ-52 to Eminem.
The उपाधि प्रतीक ( ° ) is a typographical प्रतीक कि is प्रयुक्त, among अन्य बाते, to represent डिग्री of चाप ( e.g. in geographic coordinate systems ), hours ( in the medical field ), or degrees of temperature.
The symbol consists of a small उठाया वृत्त, historically a zero glyph.
In युनिकोड it is एनकोडेड at.
This is a list of roots, suffixes, and prefixes प्रयुक्त in चिकित्सा शब्दावली, उनके meanings, and their etymology.
There are a few नियम जब using medical roots.
Firstly, prefixes और प्रत्यय, primarily in यूनानी, but also in Latin, have a droppable -o-.
As a general rule, this -o- almost always acts as a joint-stem to कनेक्ट दो consonantal जड़ें, e.g. arthr- + -o- + logy = arthrology.
But generally, the -o- is dropped जब connecting to a vowel-stem ; e.g. arthr- + itis = arthritis, instead of arthr-o-itis.
Secondly, medical roots generally go together according to भाषा : यूनानी prefixes go साथ यूनानी suffixes and Latin prefixes with Latin suffixes.
Although international वैज्ञानिक शब्दावली is नहीं कठोर परिचय segregating combining फ़ॉर्म of अलग languages, it is advisable when coining new words not to mix different lingual roots.
Stomach कर्कट, or gastric कर्कट, refers to cancer arising from any part of the stomach.
पेट कर्कट कल्याणकारी परिचय 800,000 deaths worldwide per year.
Prognosis is poor ( 5-year survival < 5 to 15 % ) क्युकी सबसे मरीजों उपस्थित साथ उन्नत बीमारी.
सारा lynn इवांस ( born फ़रवरी 5, 1971 ) is an American country singer and songwriter.
For her संपूर्ण करियर, वो रै महरूम हस्ताक्षरित to आरसीए रिकॉर्ड Nashville.
Evans ' डेब्यू, तीन मदारी और the सच्चाई, किया नहीं उपज a Top 40 hit on the Hot Country Songs charts.
She followed this up with No प्लेस कि दूर ( 1998 ), born to मक्खी ( 2000 ), बेचैन ( 2003 ) and Real Fine Place ( 2005 ).
No Place That Far received a gold प्रमाणन इससे the रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग संघ of America ( RIAA ), while the other three albums all were certified platinum.
These discs include the number 1 singles `` no प्लेस कि दूर ``, `` born to मक्खी ``, `` suds in the बाल्टी `` और `` a रियल ठीक प्लेस to प्रारंभ ``, प्लस the शीर्ष 10 हिट्स `` I Could Not Ask for More `` ( a cover of the Edwin McCain song ), `` I Keep Looking ``, `` Perfect `` and `` Cheatin ' ``.
Her 2007 Greatest Hits शामिल the शीर्ष 15 हिट्स `` तुम 'll सदा be My Baby `` and `` As If ``.
stronger ( 2011 ) शामिल उसके पांचवां क्रमांक 1 hit, `` A Little Bit Stronger ``, which was co-written by Hillary Scott of Lady Antebellum.
Evans has also won one award each from बिलबोर्ड, the अकादमी of देश म्यूज़िक, देश म्यूज़िक संघ, ब्रॉडकास्ट Music Incorporated ( BMI ) and a Dove Award.

This theory began in the 18th century with the goal of recognizing the सापेक्ष स्तर of civility in समाजों.

The Berlin blockade ( 24 June 1948 – 12 May 1949 ) was one of the पहला प्रमुख अंतरराष्ट्रीय crises of the ठंडा युद्ध.
During the बहुराष्ट्रीय occupation of post–world युद्ध ii जर्मनी, the सोवियत संघ blocked the Western Allies ' railway, road, and canal access to the sectors of Berlin under Allied control.
Their aim was to force the पश्चिमी शक्तियां to allow the सोवियत मण्डल to प्रारंभ supplying बर्लिन साथ खाना और ईंधन, thereby giving the Soviets practical control over the entire city.
In response, the Western Allies organized the Berlin airlift to carry आपूर्तियाँ to the लोगों in वेस्ट Berlin.
Aircrews from the United States Air Force, the British Royal Air Force, the Royal ऑस्ट्रेलियाई एयर फ़ोर्स, the royal कनाडाई एयर फ़ोर्स, the royal नई जीलैंड एयर फ़ोर्स, और the दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी एयर फ़ोर्स उड़ाया over 200,000 flights in one year, providing up to 4700 tons of daily necessities such as fuel and food to the Berliners.
By the spring of 1949, the effort was clearly succeeding and, by April, the एयरलिफ्ट थी delivering अधिक कार्गो than था previously महरूम transported into the नगर by rail.
The success of the Berlin Airlift brought शर्मिंदगी to the soviets who had refused to believe it could make a difference.
The blockade was lifted in May 1949 and resulted in the सृष्टि of दो पृथक जर्मनी राज्य.
The संघीय गणतंत्र of जर्मनी ( वेस्ट जर्मनी ) and the German Democratic Republic ( East Germany ) split up Berlin.
In remembrance of the एयरलिफ्ट, तीन एयरपोर्ट in the पूर्व पश्चिमी zones of the city served as the primary gateways to Germany for another fifty years.
