The euro sign is the currency sign used लिये the यूरोपियन, the आधिकारिक करेंसी of the Eurozone in the European Union ( EU ).
The design was presented to the पब्लिक by the यूरोपीय आयोग on 12 December 1996.
The international three-letter code ( according to आईएसओ मानक आईएसओ 4217 ) लिये the euro is EUR.
In Unicode it is एनकोडेड at.
In English, the sign precedes the मान.
in कुछ styleguides, लकिन नहीं अन्य, the euro sign is unspaced.
Mate (, ; sometimes also spelled maté ), also known as chimarrão ( ) or cimarrón ( ), is a परंपरागत दक्षिण अमरीकी infused पेय, विशेषकर in अर्जेंटीना, उरुग्वे, पैराग्वे and the southern states of Brazil and to a lesser degree in south of Chile, the Bolivian Chaco, Syria and Lebanon.
It is prepared from steeping सूखी पत्ते of yerba mate ( llex paraguariensis, known in Portuguese as erva-mate ) in hot water.
Mate is served with a metal straw from a साझा खोखला calabash करेले.
The स्ट्रॉ is पुकारा a bombilla in कुछ Latin American countries, a bomba in Portuguese, and a bombija or, more generally, a masassa ( type of straw ) in Arabic.
The straw is traditionally बना of silver.
Modern, commercially available लोभी हैं typically बना of निकल चांदी, पुकारा alpaca ; बेदाग steel, or hollow-stemmed cane.
The gourd is known as a mate or a guampa ; while in Brazil, it has the specific नाम of cuia, or भी cabaça ( the नाम लिये indigenous-influenced calabash gourds in अन्य regions of Brazil, still used for general food and drink in remote regions ).
Even if the water is supplied इससे a आधुनिक thermos, the infusion is traditionally drunk from mates or cuias.
As with other brewed herbs, yerba mate पत्ते हैं सूखी, कटा, और मैदान into a powdery mixture called yerba.
The bombilla अधिनियमों as दोनो a स्ट्रॉ and a sieve.
The submerged end is flared, with छोटी छेद or स्लॉट कि allow the brewed द्रव in, but block the chunky matter that makes up much of the mixture.
a आधुनिक bombilla डिज़ाइन उपयोग a straight tube with holes, or spring sleeve to act as a sieve.
`` tea-bag '' प्रकार infusions of mate ( mate cocido ) have महरूम on the मार्केट in अर्जेंटीना, पैराग्वे and Uruguay for many years under such trade names as `` Taragüí Vitality '' in Argentina, `` Pajarito '' and `` Kurupí '' in Paraguay, and in Brazil under the name `` Mate Leão ''.
This is considered a completely अलग drink.
It is never नशे इससे cuias or पुकारा chimarrão, nor is it associated with the gaucho/gaúcho culture.
The automotive industry is a term that covers a wide दायरा of कंपनियाँ और संगठनों शामिल in the डिज़ाइन, विकास, manufacture, विपणन, and selling of motor vehicles, towed vehicles, motorcycles and mopeds.
It is one of the संसार 's सबसे महत्वपूर्ण economic sectors by revenue.
The term automotive industry usually does not include industries समर्पित to the मेंटेनेंस of ऑटोमोबाइल following डिलीवरी to the end-user, ऐसे as मरम्मत दुकानें और motor fuel filling stations.
The term automotive was created from Greek autos ( self ), and Latin motivus ( of गति ) to represent कोई रूप of self-powered गाडी.
This term was प्रस्तावित by sae सदस्य एल्मर स्पेरी.
David माइकल `` डेव '' bautista, jr. ( born जनवरी 18, 1969 ), is an अमरीकी मिश्रित martial कलाकार, bodybuilder, कर्ता, and former professional wrestler best known for his time in World Wrestling Entertainment competing under the ring name Batista.
In WWE, he became a six-time world चैंपियन, जीतना the संसार हेवीवेट चैंपियनशिप चार times, and the WWE Championship two times.
He is the longest-reigning संसार हेवीवेट Champion in WWE history.
In addition to these championships, Batista has जीती the संसार टैग टोली चैंपियनशिप तीन टाइम्स ( twice साथ ric फ्लेयर and once with John Cena ) and the WWE Tag Team Championship once ( with Rey Mysterio ).
Batista was also the winner of the 2005 Royal Rumble match and went on to शीर्षक रेसलमेनिया 21, एक of the शीर्ष पाँच highest-grossing pay-per-view events in pro wrestling history.
After trying out at World Championship Wrestling 's Power Plant, बतिस्ता हस्ताक्षरित a अनुबंध साथ the wwf in 2000 और थी भेजा to इसके developmental territory, Ohio Valley Wrestling ( OVW ), where he won the OVW Heavyweight Championship.
In August 2012, Bautista signed a contract with क्लासिक entertainment & खेल to लड़ो in मिश्रित martial arts.
He won उसके mma डेब्यू on अक्तूबर 6, 2012, defeating Vince Lucero via TKO in the first round.
Henry T. Thomas Sampson, jr. ( born in जैक्सन, मिसिसिपी in 1934 ) is an African-American inventor.
He graduated from high school in 1951 इससे lanier ऊँची स्कूल in जैक्सन, मिसिसिपी.
He then attended Morehouse College for a couple of years before transferring to purdue विश्वविद्यालयों जहाँ he became a सदस्य of the ओमेगा psi फाई fraternity.
He received a Bachelor 's degree in विज्ञान इससे purdue विश्वविद्यालयों in 1956.
He graduated with an MS degree in engineering इससे the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, लॉस एंजिल्स in 1961.
Sampson also received his MS in Nuclear अभियान्त्रिकी इससे the विश्वविद्यालयों of इलिनोइस urbana-champaign in 1965, and his PhD in 1967.
He is the पहला अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी to earn a ph.d.in नाभिकीय अभियान्त्रिकी in the United States.
Some of his accomplishments include being a member of the United States Navy between the सालो 1962 और 1964 और कमाई an परमाणु उर्जा आयोग सम्मान between 1964 and 1967.
Later he was awarded the Black Image पुरस्कार इससे aerospace निगम in 1982.
He was awarded the Blacks in Engineering, Applied विज्ञान पुरस्कार, और पुरस्कार लिये शिक्षा, by the लॉस एंजिल्स परिषद of Black Professional Engineers in 1983.
In June 2007, Sampson was married to Laura Howzell यंग in st. थामस, u.S. वर्जिन Islands.
Young-Sampson is a professor in the College of शिक्षा at कैलिफ़ोर्निया राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों सैन bernardino.
Robert Lane Gibbs ( born March 29, 1971 ) is a वरिष्ठ अभियान adviser लिये us अध्यक्ष बराक ओबामा.
Previously, he was the 28th श्वेत हाउस दबायें Secretary.
गिब्स थी the संचार निदेशक लिये then- U.S. Senator Obama and his 2008 presidential campaign.
Gibbs, who has worked with Obama since 2004, was press secretary of John Kerry 's 2004 presidential campaign and has previously specialized in सीनेट अभियान, having परोसा as संचार निदेशक लिये the लोकतांत्रिक senatorial अभियान कमेटी and for four individual Senate campaigns, including those of Obama in 2004 and Fritz Hollings in 1998.
Gibbs was also the press सचिव of प्रतिनिधि bob Etheridge.
On November 22, 2008, गिब्स थी घोषित as the दबायें सचिव of the Obama administration.
he assumed the भूमिका of दबायें सचिव on जनवरी 20, 2009, और gave his first official briefing on January 22.
On January 5, 2011, Gibbs घोषित कि he होता छोड़ the White House to become an outside adviser to the administration.
He बाएँ on फ़रवरी 11, 2011.
On फ़रवरी 12, 2013, it थी घोषित कि गिब्स था महरूम hired as a contributor for cable-news channel MSNBC.
His first appearance थी on the वही रात्रि prior to the 2013 State Of The Union Address.
Armando Pérez ( born January 15, 1981 ), बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम pitbull, is an अमरीकी rapper, songwriter, और record producer.
His first recorded प्रदर्शन थी इससे the लील jon एल्बम किंग्स of crunk in 2002.
In 2004, he released उसके डेब्यू एल्बम titled m.i.a.m.i. ( short for Money Is A Major Issue ) under TVT Records.
Since तब, he रै released तीन अन्य एल्बम अंतर्गत the लेबल : el mariel in 2006, The Boatlift in 2007, and Planet Pit in 2011.
He released Rebelution in 2009, which included singles `` i जान तुम want me ( calle Ocho ) `` and `` Krazy ``.
The latter peaked at No. 30 on the Hot 100 and No. 11 on the Hot Rap Tracks charts जबकि `` i जान तुम want me '' peaked at no. 2 on the hot 100 और peaked भीतर the शीर्ष ten spots of charts in the UK, Canada, Italy, and the Netherlands.
The song reached No. 1 in फ़्रांस और the यूरोपीय hot 100 on the week ending August 29, 2009 according to Billboard magazine.
He later signed with Polo Grounds म्यूज़िक through सोनी म्यूज़िक और निर्मित his own label Mr. 305 Inc.
Another single from Rebelution was `` होटल रूम सेवा ``, जिससे peaked at no. 8 on the hot 100.
Rebelution went on to sell over 7.5 million विश्वव्यापी डिजिटल singles और एल्बम संयुक्त.
Nevertheless, he dropped a smash called `` दे me सबकुछ '' जिससे पहुँचे # 1 विश्वव्यापी, and featured artists Ne-yo, Nayer, and Afrojack.
He has also performed as a featured artist in the remixes of many other hit songs, like tik टोक, चीख & चिल्लाओ, lo hecho esta hecho, ख़राब, papi, ईंट, कैसा कम, tonight ( i 'm lovin ' तुम ), वीडियो फोन, Over To You Now and Bumpy Ride.
Pérez is also the host of his own Spanish-language program on the केबल चैनल mun2 titled la esquina ( स्पेनी लिये The Corner ).
In 2005 Pérez and rapper Sean 'diddy ' combs co-founded ख़राब लड़के लातीनी, a subsidiary of Combs ' Bad Boy Records label.
It primarily focuses on लैटिन हिप हॉप, लैटिन आत्मा, लैटिन पॉप और other Tropical music, and has offices in New York and Miami, Florida.
Along with co-founding it, pérez फिलहाल heads the A & R division of the label.
Pérez has become a product endorser, representing alongside ड्रेक, रिहाना, और trey songz the “so kodak” अभियान लिये the कोडक ब्रांड और embarking on a साझेदारी साथ the नरम पेय दानव dr pepper as भाग of the अभियान “ Vida 23 ” for which he recorded the song specifically featured on his album Armando.
Pitbull also announced he has become the spokesperson for voli वोदका, in जिससे he holds a बहुमत इक्विटी हिस्सेदारी, और budweiser रै चुनी pitbull to promote its Bud Light line of beer.
The commercials currently highlight Pitbull dancing और gyrating on स्टेज पकड़कर up a बोतल of कली लाइट.
pitbull रै भी खरीदा an इक्विटी stake in Miami Subs Pizza and Grill.
Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a contraction of `` All Hallows ' Evening `` ), also ज्ञात as सब hallows ' संध्या, is a वार्षिक जश्न observed in a क्रमांक of देशों on अक्तूबर 31, the संध्या of the पश्चिमी ईसाई feast of सब hallows ( or All Saints ) and the day initiating the triduum of Hallowmas.
according to अनेक विद्वानों, सब hallows ' संध्या is a christianised feast originally बहकावे by पश्चिमी European harvest festivals, and festivals of the dead with possible pagan roots, particularly the Celtic Samhain.
Other scholars maintain that it originated independently of samhain और रै solely Christian roots.
Typical festive Halloween activities include trick-or-treating ( also known as `` guising `` ), attending costume parties, carving pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns, lighting bonfires, apple bobbing, visiting haunted आकर्षण, playing pranks, telling डरावने कहानियां, और watching हॉरर films.
Freedom of speech is the political right to communicate one 's opinions and विचार using एक 's देह और प्रॉपर्टी to anyone जो is willing to receive them.
The term freedom of expression is sometimes used synonymously, लकिन शामिल कोई अधिनियम of seeking, receiving और imparting सूचना or विचार, regardless of the medium used.
In practice, the सही to स्वतंत्रता of वाक is नहीं निरपेक्ष in कोई देश और the सही is commonly विषय to सीमाएं, as साथ मानहानि, slander, obscenity, sedition ( including, for example inciting ethnic hatred ), copyright violation, revelation of information that is classified or otherwise.
The right to freedom of expression is recognized as a human right under Article 19 of the सार्वभौमिक घोषणा of इंसान अधिकारों और पहचाना in अंतरराष्ट्रीय इंसान अधिकारों विधि in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय वचन on Civil and Political Rights ( ICCPR ).
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to hold opinions without interference '' और `` everyone shall have the सही to स्वतंत्रता of अभिव्यक्ति ; इस सही shall शामिल स्वतंत्रता to तलाश, प्राप्त और impart सूचना and ideas of all kinds, regardless of frontiers, either orally, in writing or in print, in the form of art, or through any other media of his choice ''.
Article 19 goes on to say that the exercise of these rights carries `` special duties and responsibilities `` and may `` इसलिए be विषय to निश्चित प्रतिबंध '' जब जरुरी `` [ f ] or आदर of the अधिकारों or प्रतिष्ठा of अन्य '' or `` [ f ] or the सुरक्षा of नेशनल security or of public order ( order public ), or of public health or morals ''.
Freedom of speech may be legally curtailed in कुछ धार्मिक विधिक प्रणालियों और in धर्मनिरपेक्ष jurisdictions जहाँ it is मिला to कारण religious offense, such as the British Racial and Religious Hatred Act 2006.
Sydney Harbour from the air, प्रर्दशित the ओपेरा हाउस, the सीबीडी, Circular Quay, the Bridge, the Parramatta River, North Sydney and Kirribilli in the foreground
The Sydney Harbour Bridge is a steel through arch bridge across Sydney Harbour कि carries रेल, vehicular, सायकिल और पैदल ट्रैफ़िक between the सिडनी सेंट्रल कारोबार ज़िला ( CBD ) and the North Shore.
the नाटकीय दृश्य of the सेतु, the harbour, और the nearby Sydney Opera House is an iconic image of Sydney, New South Wales, and Australia.
The सेतु is nicknamed `` the coathanger '' क्युकी of its arch-based design.
Under the directions of Dr J.J.C. Bradfield of the NSW Department of पब्लिक works, the सेतु थी designed और निर्मित by अंग्रेजों कड़ Dorman Long and Co Ltd of Middlesbrough and opened in 1932.
The bridge 's design was influenced by the नरक फाटक सेतु in नई York.
It was the world 's widest long-span bridge, at 48.8 meters ( 160 feet ) wide, until construction of the नई बंदरगाहों मन सेतु in वैंकूवर.
It is also the fifth longest spanning-arch bridge in the world, and it is the tallest स्टील मेहराब सेतु, measuring इससे शीर्ष to water level.
Until 1967 the harbour सेतु थी सिडनी 's tallest structure.
The Hawaii hotspot is a volcanic हॉटस्पॉट स्तिथ निकट the namesake हवाई आइलैंड्स, in the northern Pacific Ocean.
One of the most well-known and heavily studied hotspots in the संसार, the हवाई plume is जिम्मेदार लिये the सृष्टि of the हवाई – सम्राट seamount कड़ी, an over 5,800 किलोमीटर ( 3,600 mi ) long chain of volcanoes, four of which are active, two of which are dormant, and more than 123 of which are extinct, many having since been ground beneath the waves by erosion as seamounts and atolls.
The chain extends from south of the द्वीप of हवाई to the किनारे of the aleutian गर्त, निकट the eastern edge of Russia.
While most ज्वालामुखी हैं निर्मित by geological कार्यकलाप at tectonic थाली सीमाएँ, the हवाई हॉटस्पॉट is स्तिथ दूर इससे आसपास थाली सीमाएँ ; the क्लासिक हॉटस्पॉट सिद्धान्त, पहला प्रस्तावित in 1963 by जॉन tuzo विल्सन, proposes that a single, fixed mantle plume builds volcanoes that then, cut off from their source by the movement of the Pacific Plate, become increasingly inactive and eventually erode below sea level over millions of years.
According to this theory, the nearly 60° bend separating the Emperor and Hawaiian खण्ड of the कड़ी थी caused by a अचानक शिफ़्ट in the गति of the प्रशांत Plate.
In 2003, fresh investigations of this irregularity led to the proposal of a mobile hotspot theory, suggesting that hotspots are मोबाईल, नहीं फिक्स्ड, और कि the 47 लाख साल बूढ़ा बेंड थी caused by a shift in the hotspot 's motion rather than the plate 's.
Ancient Hawaiians were the first to recognize the increasing age and weathered state of the ज्वालामुखी to the उत्तर as वे progressed on फ़िशिंग रिझाने along the islands.
The volatile state of the Hawaiian volcanoes and their निरंतर बैटल साथ the समुद्र थी a प्रमुख तत्व in हवाई mythology, embodied in Pele, the deity of volcanoes.
After the arrival of Europeans on the island, in 1880-1881 जेम्स ड्वाइट दाना निर्देशित the पहला औपचारिक geological पढ़ाई of the हॉटस्पॉट 's volcanics, confirming the संबंध long observed by the natives.
1912 marked the founding of the Hawaiian Volcano Observatory by volcanologist Thomas Jaggar, initiating निरन्तर वैज्ञानिक अवलोकन of the आइलैंड्स.
In the 1970s, a mapping project was initiated to gain अधिक सूचना परिचय the जटिल भूविज्ञान of Hawaii 's seafloor.
The hotspot has since been tomographically imaged, showing it to be चौड़ी और up to गहन, और ओलीवाइन और गार्नेट -आधारd अध्ययन have shown its magma chamber is approximately.
In its at least 85 million years of कार्यकलाप the हॉटस्पॉट रै उत्पादित an अनुमानित of rock.
the कड़ी 's रेट of बहाव रै धीरे increased over समय, causing the राशि of समय प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत ज्वालामुखी is क्रियाशील to घटी, इससे 18 लाख सालो लिये the 76 लाख साल बूढ़ा डेट्रॉयट seamount, to बस under 900,000 for the one million year-old Kohala ; on the other hand, eruptive volume has increased from per year to about.
Overall, this has caused a trend towards more active but quickly-silenced, closely spaced volcanoes—whereas volcanoes on the near side of the हॉटस्पॉट ओवरलैप प्रत्येक अन्य ( forming ऐसे superstructures as हवाई द्वीप और the प्राचीन मावी नुई ), the oldest of the Emperor seamounts are spaced as far as apart.

याचिकाएं हैं होने हस्ताक्षरित to लाओ the दिखाएँ for a fifth season.
The show airs on Treehouse TV Canada और उपनाम jr. ( formerly Noggin ).
Eddie and the Cruisers is a 1983 American film directed by Martin Davidson with the screenplay लिखा by the निदेशक और arlene डेविडसन, आधारित on the novel by P. F. Kluge.

Osteonecrosis of the jaw ( ONJ ) is a कठोर अस्थि बीमारी कि affects the maxilla and the mandible.
विभिन्न फ़ॉर्म of onj have महरूम वर्णित over the पिछला 160 सालो, and a number of causes have been suggested in the literature.
osteonecrosis of the जबड़े संबद्ध with bisphosphonate therapy, required by some cancer treatment regimens, has been identified and defined as a pathological entity since 2003.
The possible risk from lower oral doses of bisphosphonates, लिया by मरीजों to prevent or दावत ऑस्टियोपोरोसिस, remains uncertain.
Various treatment विकल्प have महरूम छान, however कठोर मामले of onj स्टिल require surgical removal of the affected bone.
A thorough इतिहास और assessement of pre-existing प्रणालीगत समस्याएं और संभावित साइट of दंत infection are required to help prevent the condition, especially if bisphosphonate therapy is considered.
The बोस्टन रेड sox हैं a पेशेवर बेसबॉल टोली आधारित in बोस्टन, मैसाचुसेट्स, and a member of Major League Baseball 's American League Eastern Division.
Founded in as एक of the अमरीकी लीग 's आठ चार्टर franchises, the Red Sox 's home ballpark has been Fenway Park since.
The `` Red Sox '' name was chosen by the team owner, John I. Taylor, around, following previous Boston टीमों कि था महरूम ज्ञात as the `` रेड stockings ``.
They have played in 11 World श्रेणी, जीतना 7.
Boston was a dominant team in the new league, defeating the पिट्सबर्ग pirates in the पहला संसार श्रेणी in और जीतना चार more championships by.
However, they then went into one of the longest championship droughts in baseball history, called by some the `` Curse of the Bambino `` after its alleged beginning with the Red sox 's बिक्री of बेब रुथ to the प्रतिद्वंद्वी यांकीज़ दो सालो बाद उनके संसार चैंपियनशिप in 1918, an 86-year wait before the team 's sixth World Championship in.
however, the टोली 's इतिहास दौरान कि काल थी hardly एक of futility, लकिन थी बल्कि punctuated साथ कुछ of the most memorable moments in World Series history, including Enos Slaughter 's `` mad dash `` in, the `` Impossible Dream `` of, Carlton Fisk 's home run in, and Bill Buckner 's error in.
Red Sox history रै भी महरूम चिह्नित by the टोली 's तीव्र फंसने साथ the नई यॉर्क यांकीज़, arguably the fiercest and most historic in North American professional sports.
The Boston Red sox हैं स्वामित्व by fenway खेल समूह, जो भी अपना Liverpool Football Club of the Premier League in England.
The Red Sox are consistently one of the शीर्ष एमएलबी टीमों in औसत सड़क उपस्थिति, जबकि the small capacity of Fenway Park prevents them from leading in overall attendance.
From May 15, 2003 to April 10, 2013, the Red Sox sold out every home game-a total of 820 games ( 794 regular ऋतु ) लिये a प्रमुख पेशेवर खेल रिकार्ड कि lasted almost a decade.
mince पाई भर साथ mincemeat
Mincemeat is a mixture of कटा सूखी फल, आसुत आत्माओं और मसाले, और sometimes बीफ suet, beef, or venison.
Originally, mincemeat सदा contained मांस.
Many आधुनिक व्यंजनों contain बीफ suet, हालांकि सब्ज़ी shortening is sometimes used in its place.
विसंगतियाँ of mincemeat हैं मिला in ऑस्ट्रेलिया, ब्रिटनी, Canada, northern Europe, Ireland, South Africa, the United Kingdom and the United States.
In some countries the term mincemeat refers to minced or मैदान meat.
Diana, Princess of Wales ( Diana frances ; née स्पेंसर ; 1 जुलाई 1961 – 31 अगस्त 1997 ) थी the पहला बीवी of चार्ल्स, प्रिंस of Wales, the eldest son and heir apparent of Queen Elizabeth II.
She was well ज्ञात लिये उसके fund-raising कार्य लिये अंतरराष्ट्रीय charities and as an eminent celebrity of the late 20th century.
Her wedding to the Prince of Wales on 29 July 1981 was held at st पॉल 's गिरजाघर और देखी by a वैश्विक टेलीविज़न दर्शक of over 750 million.
While married she bore the titles Princess of वेल्स, duchess of कॉर्नवॉल, duchess of rothesay, countess of Chester and Baroness of Renfrew.
The marriage उत्पादित दो बेटे, the princes विलियम और हैरी, जो became second and third in line to the British throne.
डायना थी born into an वैभवशाली English family with royal ancestry.
She was the fourth child of John Spencer, 8th अर्ल स्पेंसर और उसके बीवी frances, बेटी of मौरिस रोश, 4th सामन्त fermoy.
She became a पब्लिक फिगर साथ the घोषणा of her engagement.
She also received मान्यता लिये उसके दान कार्य और लिये उसके support of the International Campaign to Ban Landmines.
From 1989, she was the president of the ग्रेट ormond गली हॉस्पिटल लिये children, in जोड to दर्जनों of अन्य charities.
डायना remained the ऑब्जेक्ट of विश्वव्यापी मीडिया scrutiny दौरान और बाद उसके विवाह, which ended in divorce on 28 August 1996.
Media ध्यान और पब्लिक शोक यहूद considerable following उसके मौत in a car crash in Paris on 31 August 1997.
Argentina, officially the अर्जेंटाइन गणतंत्र ( ), is the second largest country in both South America and the Latin America region.
The country is a संघ of 23 प्रांतों और the autonomous नगर of buenos Aires, its capital and largest city.
It is the eighth -largest country in the world by land area and the largest among Spanish-speaking nations by भौगोलिक क्षेत्रफल of 2,780,400 km2 और is the चौथी by जनसांख्यिकी, साथ over 41 लाख लोगों.
अर्जेंटीना is a founding सदस्य of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र, mercosur, the संघ of दक्षिण अमरीकी राष्ट्र, the संगठन of ibero-american States, the World Bank Group and the World Trade Organization, and is one of the G-15 and G-20 major economies.
Argentina is located in South America, bordered by चिली to the वेस्ट और दक्षिण, बोलीविया और पैराग्वे to the उत्तर और Brazil and Uruguay to the northeast.
अर्जेंटीना दावा प्रभुता over भाग of अंटार्कटिक, the फ़ॉकलैंड Islands ( ) and South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands.
Argentina is the successor राज्य of the viceroyalty of the río de la प्लाटा, an overseas colony of the Spanish Empire.
Argentina declared स्वतंत्रता दौरान the अर्जेंटाइन युद्ध of स्वतंत्रता, जिससे थी followed by the Argentine Civil Wars during most of the 19th century.
The देश faced अनेक सैन्य coups और राजनैतिक अस्थिरता during the 20th century, along with periodic economic crisis that continue to this day.
A पहचाना दक्षिणी कोन शक्ति, और मध्य शक्ति, अर्जेंटीना is लैटिन अमेरिका 's third-largest अर्थव्यवस्था, with a `` very high '' rating on the Human development index.
Within Latin America, Argentina has the fifth उच्चतम नाममात्र जीडीपी प्रति capita और the उच्चतम in खरीदना power terms.
The Legatum Institute have argued that the country has a `` foundation for future growth due to इसके मार्केट आकार, स्तर of विदेशी सीधा निवेश, और प्रतिशत of high-tech निर्यात as share of कुल manufactured goods '', और it is classed by निवेशकों as middle emerging economy.
Argentina is the Latin American country with the most Nobel Prizes, for a total of पाँच, सब प्राप्त दौरान the दूसरी हाफ of the बीसवीं सदी.
the देश रै तीन नोबेल पुरस्कार in science and two of peace.
The most important aspects of science and technology in अर्जेंटीना हैं चिंतित साथ आयुर्विज्ञान, नाभिकीय भौतिकी, जैवप्रौद्योगिकी, nanotechnology, space and rocket technology and several fields related to the country 's Main Economic Activities.
The country also has the mega प्रदर्शनी बीच of विज्ञान, प्रौद्योगिकी, उद्योग और आर्ट that are Latin America 's largest.
Hickory is a city in Catawba County, with parts भी in बुर्के काउंटी और काल्डवेल काउंटी.
The नगर 's 2010 अनुमानित जनसांख्यिकी is 40,010.
hickory is the प्रिंसिपल नगर in the hickory-lenoir-morganton एमएसए, in which the population at the 2010 Census was 365,497.
Polyethylene terephthalate ( sometimes written poly ( ethylene terephthalate ) ), commonly abbreviated पालतु, पीट, or the obsolete petp or pet-p, is a thermoplastic पॉलिमर राल of the पॉलिएस्टर परिवार और is प्रयुक्त in सिंथेटिक मछली ; beverage, food and other liquid containers ; thermoforming applications ; and engineering resins often in combination with glass fiber.
The term polyethylene terephthalate is a सोर्स of भ्रम क्युकी इस पदार्थ, PET, does not contain polyethylene.
Thus, the alternate form, poly ( ethylene terephthalate ), is प्रायः प्रयुक्त in scholarly जर्नल्स लिये the खातिर of accuracy and clarity.
Depending on its processing and thermal history, polyethylene terephthalate may exist both as an amorphous ( पारदर्शी ) और as a semi-crystalline पॉलिमर.
The semicrystalline material might appear transparent ( particle size < 500 nm ) or opaque and श्वेत ( कण आकार up to a few माइक्रोन ) depending on its crystal structure and particle size.
Its monomer ( bis-β-hydroxyterephthalate ) can be synthesized by the esterification प्रतिक्रिया between terephthalic एसिड और एथिलीन ग्लाइकोल साथ जल as a byproduct, or by transesterification प्रतिक्रिया between ethylene glycol and dimethyl terephthalate with methanol as a byproduct.
बहुलकीकरण is through a polycondensation प्रतिक्रिया of the monomers ( done immediately after esterification/transesterification ) with water as the byproduct.
The majority of the world 's PET production is for synthetic fibers ( in excess of 60 % ), साथ बोतल उत्पादन हिसाब लिये around 30 % of global demand.
In the context of textile applications, PET is referred to by its common नाम, `` पॉलिएस्टर, '' whereas the एक्रोनिम `` पालतु '' is generally used in relation to packaging.
Polyester makes up परिचय 18 % of संसार पॉलिमर उत्पादन और is the third-most-produced polymer ; polyethylene ( PE ) and polypropylene ( PP ) are first and second, respectively.
PET consists of polymerized इकाई of the मोनोमर एथिलीन terephthalate, with repeating C10H8O4 units.
PET is commonly recycled, और रै the number `` 1 '' as its recycling symbol.
louisiana थी admitted to the संघ on अप्रैल 30, 1812, and elects senators to Classes 2 and Class 3.
Its current senators are Democrat Mary landrieu और रिपब्लिकन दाउद vitter.
Black pudding, blood pudding or blood sausage is a प्रकार of सॉसेज बना by कुकिंग रक्त or सूखी रक्त साथ a फिलर जबतक it is thick enough to congeal when cooled.
the डिश exists in विभिन्न संस्कृतियों इससे Asia to Europe and the Americas.
Pig, चौपायों, शीप, बतख, और बकरी रक्त can be used depending on different countries.
In Europe and the Americas, typical fillers include मांस, मोटे, suet, ब्रैड, cornmeal, मीठी आलू, प्याज, chestnuts, barley, and oatmeal.
In Spain, पुर्तगाल और एशिया, आलू is often replaced by rice.
शेयरधारक may refer to:
Stakeholder ( corporate ), a person, group, organization, सदस्य or प्रणाली जो affects or can be प्रभावित by an संगठन 's actions
Stakeholder, an एंटिटी कि can be प्रभावित by the परिणाम of कि in जिससे वे हैं कहा to be हितधारकों, i.e., that in which they have a stake.
प्रोजेक्ट शेयरधारक, a व्यक्ति, समूह or organization with an interest in a project
Stakeholder theory, a theory that identifies and मॉडल the समूह जिससे हैं stakeholders of a corporation or project
Stakeholder विश्लेषण, the प्रक्रम of identifying those affected by a project or event
Stakeholder ( law ), a third पार्टी जो temporarily holds धन or प्रॉपर्टी जबकि इसके owner is still being determined
Jack smight ( कूच 9, 1925 - सितंबर 1, 2003 ) थी an American theatre and film director.
Smight was born in Minneapolis, मिनेसोटा और गई to स्कूल साथ भविष्य कर्ता पीटर Graves.
His film credits include The Traveling Executioner, Rabbit, Run, Loving Couples, Midway, हार्पर, विमानक्षेत्र 1975, फटकार alley और the एमी पुरस्कार -winning एडी, as खूब as अनेक एपीसोड of टेलीविज़न श्रेणी ऐसे as The Twilight Zone and The Alfred Hitchcock Hour.
He also directed the 1960 ब्रॉडवे खेल the 49th cousin और रचित the music for the film adaption of Roll of Thunder Hear My Cry.
Smight died इससे कर्कट in लॉस एंजिल्स, California.
Dmitri Ivanovich Mendeleev ( ; 8 February 1834 – 2 February 1907 O.S. 27 जनवरी 1834 – 20 जनवरी 1907 ) थी a रूसी केमिस्ट and inventor.
He formulated the Periodic Law, created his own version of the periodic table of elements, and used it to सही the गुण of कुछ already खोजा तत्व और भी to भविष्यवाणी the गुण of तत्व yet to be खोजा !
Modesto ( स्पेनी लिये `` modest '' ), officially the नगर of modesto, is the काउंटी सीट और largest city of Stanislaus County, California, United States.
With a population of approximately 201,165 at the 2010 census, Modesto ranks as the 18th largest नगर in the राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया.
The Modesto Census County Division, which शामिल the शहरों of ceres और riverbank, रै a जनसांख्यिकी of 312,842 as of 2010.
Modesto is located in the central valley area of Northern California, 90 miles उत्तर of fresno, 92 मील ईस्ट of सैन फ्रांसिस्को, 68 मील दक्षिण of the राज्य पूंजी of sacramento, 66 मील वेस्ट of Yosemite National Park, and 24 miles south of Stockton.
Modesto, a 29-time Tree City USA honoree, is surrounded by समृद्ध farmland, lending to a रैंकिंग लिये the काउंटी as 6th among सब कैलिफ़ोर्निया counties in farm production.
Led by milk, almonds, chickens, walnuts, and मकई साइलेज, the काउंटी grossed nearly $ 3.1 अरब in agricultural production in 2011.
Modesto थी immortalized in the 1973 जार्ज लुकास फिल्मी American Graffiti.
The पुरस्कार जीतना फिल्मी captured the स्पिरिट of `` cruising '' और दोस्ती on 10th और 11th गलियों in 1962 and led to the revival of 1950 's nostalgia that included the TV show Happy Days and the other spin-offs.
Ron Howard, हैरिसन घाट और रिचर्ड Dreyfuss starred in the film.
The साउंडट्रैक थी a विशाल कामयाबी.
Director George Lucas is a native of modesto, graduating इससे downey ऊँची स्कूल in 1962.
The gallup-healthways well-being अनुक्रमणिका लिये 2011, जिससे साक्षात्कार 1,000 भागीदार रोज़ और asks individuals to assess उनके कार्य, finances, शारीरिक health, emotional state of mind and communities, ranked Modesto 126 out of the 190 cities surveyed.
In December 2009, Forbes ranked Modesto 48th आउट of 100 among `` बेहतरीन bang-for-the-buck शहरों ''.
In this ranking, Modesto क्रमित 8th in आवास affordability और सफर समय लकिन भी क्रमित 86th in जॉब forecast growth and 99th in foreclosures.
Independence Day, commonly known as the Fourth of जुलाई, is a संघीय अवकाश in the संयुक्त राज्य commemorating the अपनाना of the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता on July 4, 1776, declaring independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain.
Independence Day is commonly associated with आतिशबाजी, parades, barbecues, carnivals, मेलों, picnics, कॉन्सर्ट, बेसबॉल खेल, परिवार reunions, और राजनैतिक भाषणों and ceremonies, in addition to various other public and private events celebrating the history, government, and traditions of the United States.
Independence Day is the national दिन of the संयुक्त राज्य.
A gender symbol denotes the sex of an सजीव or characterizes an एजेंट by gender.
The two standard gender symbols denoting पुरूष ♂ और मादा ♀ हैं निकला इससे astrological symbols, denoting the classical planets Mars and Venus, respectively.
These symbols have been in use since the पुनर्जागरण भी denoting तत्व in alchemy, specifically the metals iron and copper.
They were first used to denote the effective gender of plants ( i.e. sex of individual in a दिए crossbreed, चूंकि सबसे पौधे हैं hermaphroditic ) by carolus लीनियस in 1751.
A leasehold estate is an ownership of a अस्थाई सही to थाम जमीन or प्रॉपर्टी in जिससे a lessee or a किरायेदार holds rights of real property by some form of title from a lessor or landlord.
Although a tenant does hold rights to real property, a leasehold एस्टेट is typically माना निजी property.
Leasehold is a form of land tenure or property tenure where one पार्टी खरीदता the सही to occupy जमीन or a भवन लिये a दिए लंबाई of समय.
As lease is a legal estate, leasehold एस्टेट can be खरीदा और बेची on the खोलें market.
A leasehold thus differs from a freehold or fee simple where the ownership of a property is purchased outright and thereafter held for an अनिर्धार्य लंबाई of समय, और भी differs इससे a tenancy जहाँ a प्रॉपर्टी is let ( rented ) on a आवधिक आधार ऐसे as साप्ताहिक or monthly.
Until the समाप्त of the पट्टे काल ( प्रायः measured in दशकों or सदियां ; a 99 साल पट्टे is काफी common ) the leaseholder has the right to remain in occupation as an assured tenant paying an agreed rent to the owner.
Terms of the agreement are contained in a पट्टे, जिससे रै तत्व of अनुबंध और प्रॉपर्टी law intertwined.
The term estate for years may occasionally be used.
This refers to a leasehold एस्टेट लिये कोई विशिष्ट काल of समय ( the word `` years '' is misleading ).
An estate लिये सालो is नहीं automatically renewed.
colloquially, `` पट्टे '' और `` पट्टे `` हैं प्रायः a formalization of a longer, विशिष्ट काल as compared साथ a `` rental '' that created a tenancy at will, terminable or renewable at the end of a short period.
Olivia ( also known as Welcome to the संसार of the सुअर ओलिविया ) is a british-american children 's एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न series produced by media company Chorion and based on Ian Falconer 's books.
It is seen on Nick Jr. in the us, मिल्कशेक !
, Nick Jr. in the uk और आयरलैंड, और डिज़्नी जूनियर in लैटिन अमेरिका और ब्राज़ील, Treehouse TV in Canada.
The show has won a चांदी अभिभावक ' चुनाव पुरस्कार लिये इसके धनात्मक स्टोरी lines and characters.
Location of Panama between प्रशांत ( नीचे ) और caribbean ( शीर्ष ), with canal at top center
The Panama Canal ( ) is a ship canal in Panama that connects the अटलांटिक समंदर ( via the caribbean समुद्र ) to the प्रशांत Ocean.
the कनाल कटौती आरपार the isthmus of Panama and is a key conduit for international maritime trade.
There are locks at each समाप्त to लिफ्ट जहाजों up to Gatun Lake ( above sea-level ).
Gatun Lake was created to reduce the राशि of कार्य जरूरी लिये the कनाल.
The current ताले हैं चौड़ी.
A third, wider लेन of ताले is होने निर्मित.
France began कार्य on the कनाल in 1881, लकिन था to रोकें क्युकी of engineering problems and high mortality due to disease.
The United States ( US ) later took over the प्रोजेक्ट और took a दशक to पूरा the कनाल in 1914, enabling जहाजों to avoid the lengthy केप सींग route around the southernmost tip of South America ( via the Drake Passage ) or to navigate the Strait of Magellan.
One of the largest and most difficult engineering projects ever undertaken, the Panama Canal shortcut बना it संभावित लिये जहाजों to सफर between the अटलांटिक और प्रशांत Oceans in half the time previously required.
The shorter, faster, safer route to the US West Coast and to nations in and along the Pacific समंदर अनुमत those स्थान to become अधिक एकीकृत साथ the संसार अर्थव्यवस्था.
During इस समय, स्वामित्व of the territory कि is now the Panama Canal was first Colombian, then French, and then American ; the United States completed the construction.
The canal was taken over in 1999 by the panamanian सरकारी, as long planned.
Annual traffic has risen इससे परिचय 1,000 जहाजों जब the कनाल खोली in 1914, to 14,702 बरतन in 2008, the latter measuring a total of 309.6 million Panama Canal/Universal Measurement System ( PC/UMS ) tons.
By 2008, more than 815,000 बरतन था passed through the कनाल, अनेक of उन्हें much larger than the original planners could have envisioned ; the largest ships that can transit the canal today are called Panamax.
The अमरीकी समाज of सिविल इंजीनियर्स रै नामित the पनामा Canal one of the seven wonders of the modern world.
Benjamin Franklin ( April 17, 1790 ) थी एक of the founding fathers of the संयुक्त States.
A noted polymath, Franklin was a leading author, printer, political theorist, politician, postmaster, वैज्ञानिक, संगीतकार, आविष्कारक, satirist, नागरिक activist, statesman, और राजनयिक.
As a scientist, he was a major figure in the American आत्मज्ञान और the इतिहास of भौतिकी लिये उसके discoveries और theories regarding electricity.
He invented the बिजली लाठी, bifocals, the फ्रैंकलिन स्टोव, a carriage odometer, and the glass 'armonica '.
He facilitated many civic संगठन, सहित a आग विभाग और a university.
Franklin earned the title of `` The First American '' for his early and indefatigable campaigning for colonial एकता ; as an लेखक और प्रवक्ता in लंदन लिये अनेक colonies, तब as the पहला संयुक्त राज्य दूत to फ़्रांस, he सरंचनाओं the उभरते American nation.
Franklin was foundational in defining the American ethos as a marriage of the practical values of thrift, मुश्किल कार्य, शिक्षा, जातियाँ स्पिरिट, self-governing संस्थानों, और विपक्ष to authoritarianism दोनो राजनैतिक and religious, with the scientific and tolerant values of the Enlightenment.
In the words of historian Henry Steele Commager, `` in a फ्रैंकलिन could be मिलाया the virtues of puritanism बगैर इसके दोषों, the illumination of the Enlightenment without its heat. ''
to वाल्टर isaacson, इस makes फ्रैंकलिन `` the most accomplished American of his age and the most influential in inventing the type of society America would become. ''
Franklin, always proud of his working class roots, became a successful newspaper एडिटर और मुद्रक in फिलाडेल्फिया, the अग्रणी नगर in the colonies.
He was also partners with William Goddard and Joseph गैलोवे the तीन of जिसको प्रकाशित the पेन्सिलवेनिया वृत्तान्त, a समाचारपत्र कि थी ज्ञात for its revolutionary sentiments and criticisms of the British monarchy in the American colonies.
He became wealthy publishing Poor Richard 's almanack और the पेन्सिलवेनिया गजट.
Franklin gained अंतरराष्ट्रीय renown as a वैज्ञानिक लिये उसके प्रसिद्ध प्रयोग in विद्युत और लिये his many inventions, especially the lightning rod.
He played a major role in establishing the विश्वविद्यालयों of पेन्सिलवेनिया और थी निर्वाचित the first president of the American Philosophical Society.
Franklin became a नेशनल नायिका in अमेरिका जब he पथप्रदर्शन the effort to have Parliament repeal the unpopular Stamp Act.
An accomplished diplomat, he was widely admired among the French as अमरीकी मंत्री to पेरिस और थी a प्रमुख फिगर in the विकास of धनात्मक franco-american relations.
For अनेक सालो he थी the अंग्रेजों postmaster लिये the colonies, which enabled him to set up the first national communications network.
He was active in community अफेयर्स, औपनिवेशिक और राज्य राजनीती, as well as national and international affairs.
From 1785 to 1788, he परोसा as governor of Pennsylvania.
toward the समाप्त of उसके जीवन, he freed उसके स्लेव और became one of the most prominent abolitionists.
His रंगीन जीवन और विरासत of वैज्ञानिक और राजनैतिक उपलब्धि, और औकात as एक of अमेरिका 's सबसे influential founding fathers, have देखी फ्रैंकलिन सम्मानित on coinage और धन ; warships ; the names of अनेक towns, counties, educational institutions, namesakes, and companies ; and more than two centuries after his death, countless cultural references.
दण्ड minds is an अमरीकी पुलिस प्रक्रियात्मक टेलीविज़न program that premiered September 22, 2005, on CBS.
The series follows a team of profilers इससे the एफबीआई 's behavioral विश्लेषण ईकाई ( bau ) आधारित in Quantico, Virginia.
The BAU is part of the FBI नेशनल बीच लिये the विश्लेषण of हिंसक Crime.
The show differs from many procedural dramas by focusing on प्रोफाइलिंग the दण्ड, rather than the crime itself.
The show is produced by The Mark Gordon Company in association with CBS Television studios ( originally सर्वोपरि संजाल टेलीविज़न तब सीबीएस सर्वोपरि संजाल टेलीविज़न ) और एबीसी studios ( originally Touchstone Television ).
CBS announced in October 2009 कि विरासत इंटरैक्टिव होता develop a video game based on the show.
The game would आवश्यकता खिलाड़ी to जाँचें अपराधों दृश्यों for clues to help solve murder mysteries.
The interactive puzzle game was released in 2012, लकिन किया नहीं feature any of the voices of the show 's cast, nor was the cast involved with the project.
On March 14, 2012, CBS renewed दण्ड minds लिये an आठवीं ऋतु, जिससे premiered on September 26, 2012.
`` Heart-Shaped Box '' is a song by the अमरीकी grunge बैंड निर्वाण, लिखा by vocalist and guitarist Kurt Cobain.
The song थी released as the पहला सिंगल इससे the समूह 's third and final studio album, In Utero, in 1993.
It was one of two songs इससे the एल्बम मिश्रित by स्कॉट litt in अनुक्रम to augment the original production by producer Steve Albini.
जबकि निर्वाण 's लेबल dgc रिकॉर्ड किया नहीं release a physical single for sale in the United States, `` Heart-Shaped Box '' received much American radio airplay, reaching number one on the Billboard Modern Rock Tracks chart.
The international release of the single reached क्रमांक पाँच on the uk singles Chart.
The song 's music वीडियो, निर्देशित by एंटोन corbijn, garnered critical plaudits.
The orbital speed of a body, generally a planet, a natural उपग्रह, an कृत्रिम उपग्रह, or a multiple star, is the speed at which it orbits around the barycenter of a system, usually around a more massive body.
It can be used to refer to either the औसत कक्षीय गति, the औसत गति as it completes an कक्षा, or instantaneous orbital speed, the speed at a particular point in its orbit.
the कक्षीय गति at कोई स्थिति in the कक्षा can be computed इससे the अलहदा to the सेंट्रल देह at कि स्थिति, और the विशिष्ट orbital energy, which is independent of position : the kinetic energy is the total energy minus the potential energy.
Brown Palace आंतरिक और अलिंद
Brown Palace Hotel is the second-oldest ऑपरेटिंग होटल in डेनवर, कोलोराडो और is एक of the first atrium-style hotel ever built.
It is अभी संचालित by कोरम होटल और Resorts.
it थी निर्मित in 1892, एक साल later than the Oxford Hotel.
It was named for its original owner, Henry C. Brown, and was designed with इसके विषम triangular आकार by वास्तु फ़्रैंक edbrooke.
The hotel is located at 321 17th st, डेनवर, co between 17th गली, ब्रॉडवे और tremont Street/Pl in downtown Denver behind the Republic Plaza.
The main entrance द्वार is on tremont गली.
DVD-Video is a consumer video format used to store digital video on DVD discs, and is फिलहाल the प्रबल उपभोक्ता वीडियो स्वरूप in एशिया, उत्तर अमेरिका, यूरोपीय, और ऑस्ट्रेलिया.
Discs using the DVD-Video specification require a DVD drive और an h.262/mpeg-2 भाग 2 डिकोडर ( e.g., a dvd खिलाड़ी, or a कंप्यूटर dvd ड्राइव साथ a software DVD player ).
Commercial DVD movies are encoded using a combination of H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 संपीडित वीडियो और ऑडियो of varying स्वरुप ( प्रायः multi-channel formats as described below ).
Typically, the data rate लिये dvd फिल्मों सीमाएँ इससे 3 mbit/s to 9.5 mbit/s, और the bit rate is usually adaptive.
It was first available लिये खुदरा around 1997.
the dvd-video specification थी निर्मित by dvd फ़ोरम और can be प्राप्त from DVD Format/Logo Licensing Corporation for a fee of $ 5,000.
The specification is not publicly उपलब्धियाँ, क्युकी प्रत्येक सदस्य जरूर चिह्न a non-disclosure agreement.
निश्चित सूचना in the dvd किताब is proprietary and confidential.
The nautical mile ( symbol M, NM or nmi ) is a unit of length that is about one minute of arc of latitude measured along कोई मध्याह्न, or परिचय एक मिनट of चाप of देशांतर at the equator.
By अंतरराष्ट्रीय अनुबंध it has been set at 1,852 metres exactly ( about 6,076 feet ).
It is a non- SI unit ( although accepted लिये उपयोग in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रणाली of इकाई by the bipm ) used especially by navigators in the shipping and aviation industries, and also in polar exploration.
It is commonly used in international law and treaties, विशेषकर regarding the हद of territorial waters.
It developed इससे the समुद्र मील और the सम्बन्धित geographical mile.
The nautical mile remains in use by sea and air navigators विश्वव्यापी क्युकी of इसके convenience when working with charts.
Most nautical charts use the मर्केटर प्रक्षेप जिनकी स्केल varies by परिचय a फ़ैक्टर of छह इससे the equator to 80° latitude, so charts covering large areas can not use a single linear scale.
the nautical मील is nearly बराबर to a मिनट of अक्षांश on a चार्ट, so a अलहदा measured with a chart divider can be roughly converted to nautical miles using the chart 's latitude scale.
Shippensburg is a borough in Cumberland और फ्रैंकलिन काउंटी in the u.S. राज्य of पेन्सिलवेनिया.
settled in 1730, shippensburg झूठ in the कम्बरलैंड Valley, 41 miles ( 66 km ) west-southwest of Harrisburg, and is part of the Harrisburg– Carlisle Metropolitan Statistical Area.
In 1900, 3,228 people lived there ; in 1910, 3,457 ; और in 1940, 5,244 लोगों lived there.
The population was 5,492 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी.
Shippensburg was incorporated as a बरो on January 21, 1819.
In the past, वहीँ यहूद फर्नीचर कारखानों, इंजन और पंप works, and other industrial works located within the town.
Shippensburg is also the home of The Beistle Company, the oldest and largest manufacturer of सजावट और पार्टी goods, जिससे बिकता इसके distinctive मधुकोश पेपर decorations worldwide.
It is भी the स्थान of pague और fegan, the oldest continuously operated hardware store in Pennsylvania.
In May 2012, वोल्वो निर्माण उपकरण began a $ 100 लाख विस्तार प्रोजेक्ट to लाओ its American headquarters to Shippensburg.
Shippensburg is also home to Shippensburg University of Pennsylvania, one of 14 विश्वविद्यालयों of the पेन्सिलवेनिया राज्य System of Higher Education.
Yearly the last full week of July, the shippensburg जातियाँ Fair is held.
Begun in 1958, the मेला बिल्स itself as Pennsylvania 's largest bi-county fair.
The fair includes agricultural exhibits, a craft show, खाना विक्रेता, और कार्निवल यात्राएँ amongst अन्य बाते.
Every summer on the last Saturday of August, Shippensburg holds the मकई पर्व, an इवेंट कि brings क्षेत्रीय शिल्पकार और विक्रेता to operate stands downtown.
The downtown is बंद to ट्रैफ़िक लिये at तनिक 5 blocks for most of the day.
Average attendance at the festival is अनुमानित at 60,000 - 70,000 each year.
Black hairy tongue ( BHT, also termed lingua villosa nigra ) refers to a कंडीशन of the जीभ जहाँ the filiform papillae elongate with black or brown discoloration, giving a black and hairy appearance.
The रूप may be alarming, but it is a harmless condition.
Predisposing factors शामिल धूम्रपान, xerostomia ( शुष्क मुँह ), नरम आहार, ग़रीब oral hygiene and certain medications.
Management is by improving मौखिक hygiene, विशेषकर scraping or brushing the tongue.
The IEEE 1394 interface is a serial bus interface standard for high-speed संचार और isochronous real-time आंकड़ा ट्रांसफ़र.
It was developed in the लेट 1980s और जल्दी 1990s by ठहराना, जो पुकारा it FireWire.
The 1394 interface is comparable to usb, और प्रायः those दो technologies हैं considered together, though USB has more market share.
Apple first शामिल firewire in कुछ of इसके 1999 मॉडल, और सबसे ठहराना कंप्यूटर since the year 2000 have included FireWire ports, though, as of 2013, nothing beyond the 800 version ( IEEE-1394b ).
The interface is भी ज्ञात by the ब्रांड i.link ( सोनी ), और लिंक्स ( Texas Instruments ).
IEEE 1394 replaced parallel scsi in अनेक अनुप्रयोग, क्युकी of निम्नतर क्रियान्वयन लागत और a simplified, more adaptable cabling system.
The 1394 standard also defines a backplane इंटरफ़ेस, हालांकि इस is नहीं as widely used.
IEEE 1394 is the High-Definition Audio-Video Network Alliance ( हाना ) मानक कनेक्शन इंटरफ़ेस लिये a/v ( audio/visual ) component communication and control.
firewire is भी उपलब्धियाँ in बेतार, रेशा optic, and coaxial versions using the isochronous protocols.
Stephen `` Stevie '' Ray Vaughan ( October 3, 1954 – August 27, 1990 ) थी an अमरीकी guitarist, singer-songwriter, and record producer.
Often referred to by his initials srv, vaughan is बेहतरीन ज्ञात as a founding सदस्य और नेता of Double Trouble.
Together with drummer Chris Layton and bassist टॉमी शैनन, वे ignited the ब्लूज़ revival of the 1980s.
With a career spanning seven years, Vaughan and Double Trouble consistently बेची आउट कॉन्सर्ट जबकि उनके एल्बम अक्सर गई gold.
He was born और उठाया in डलास, टेक्सास, और लिये a short period of time lived in Graham, Texas.
As the younger brother of Jimmie Vaughan, vaughan प्रारंभ playing the गिटार at आयु सात और formed अनेक bands that occasionally performed in local nightclubs.
At age 17, he dropped out of high school and moved to ऑस्टिन to further pursue उसके musical career, joining groups such as Krackerjack, the Nightcrawlers, and the Cobras.
In 1977, he formed Triple threat revue, a बैंड कि आखिरकार विकसित into दोगुना Trouble and regularly performed around Austin.
In 1982, Vaughan और दोगुना ट्रबल performed at the montreux Jazz Festival in Switzerland, catching the attention of musicians David Bowie and Jackson Browne.
Bowie asked Vaughan to play on his upcoming studio album Let 's Dance, जबकि browne offered the बैंड फ़्री उपयोग of उसके निजी स्टुडियो in लॉस एंजिल्स to रिकार्ड an album.
In March 1983, Vaughan and Double Trouble were signed to Epic Records by veteran रिकार्ड निर्माता जॉन हैमंड sr. और released उनके डेब्यू एल्बम, टेक्सास Flood in June of that year.
After successful touring, the group released the albums, Could n't स्टैंड the मौसम ( 1984 ) और आत्मा to आत्मा ( 1985 ), the latter of जिससे प्रदर्शित नई keyboardist रीज़ wynans.
हालांकि उसके करियर था progressed सफलतापूर्वक, vaughan checked into a पुनर्वास हॉस्पिटल in Atlanta, Georgia to give up a cocaine and alcohol habit and returned to touring with the band.
In June 1989, In Step was released and earned उन्हें a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन समकालीन ब्लूज़ Performance.
On August 27, 1990, vaughan थी मारे in a हेलीकाप्टर क्रैश following a प्रदर्शन in East Troy, Wisconsin.
Vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet intense style was derived इससे a किस्में of musical जाति.
He was influenced by blues संगीतकारों सहित अल्बर्ट किंग, फ्रेडी किंग, ओटिस फटाफट, और muddy Waters, and rock guitarists such as Jimi Hendrix and Lonnie Mack.
His guitar playing reflected the क्लासिक blues and pentatonic scales.
He has received wide critical recognition for his गिटार playing, रैंकिंग at # 6 on रोलिंग पत्थरों सूची of `` 100 महानतम guitarists '' in 2011.
He was posthumously inducted into the Blues Hall of Fame in 2000 and a memorial statue थी erected in ऑस्टिन 's ऑडिटोरियम shores park.
Stevie Ray Vaughan is widely माना to be एक of the महानतम संगीतकारों to आइये इससे the राज्य of Texas.
GigE redirects here.
For the कैमरा प्रोटोकॉल, देखिए gige vision.
In computer नेटवर्किंग, gigabit ईथरनेट ( gbe or 1 gige ) is a पद describing विभिन्न technologies लिये transmitting ईथरनेट फ्रेम्स at a रेट of a gigabit प्रति दूसरी ( 1,000,000,000 bits per second ), as defined by the IEEE 802.3-2008 standard.
It came into use beginning in 1999, gradually supplanting Fast Ethernet in wired local संजाल, जहाँ it performed considerably तेज़.
The cables and equipment are very similar to previous मानकों और यहूद बहुत आम और किफायती by 2010.
Half-duplex gigabit links connected through hubs are अनुमत by the specification, लकिन full-duplex उपयोग साथ switches is much more common.

The प्रमुख components of a stamp:
1. चित्र
2. perforations
3. denomination
4. देश name
A postage stamp is a small piece of paper that is purchased and प्रदर्शित on an मद of मेल as प्रमाण of payment of postage.
Typically, stamps are made from special पेपर, साथ a नेशनल नामांकन और denomination ( दाम ) on the face, and a gum adhesive on the reverse side.
Postage stamps are purchased from a postal administration or other प्राधिकृत विक्रेता और हैं प्रयुक्त to अदा लिये the लागत शामिल in चलती मेल as well as other business necessities such as insurance and registration.
The stamp’s shape is usually that of a small rectangle of varying proportions, हालांकि त्रिकोण or अन्य आकार हैं occasionally used.
The stamp is affixed to an envelope or other postal cover ( i.e., पैकेट, बक्सा, mailing बेलन ) कि the ग्राहक wishes to send.
The item is then processed by the postal system, जहाँ a postmark, sometimes ज्ञात as a रद्दीकरण चिह्नित, is प्रायः लागू over the स्टैम्प और cover ; this procedure marks the stamp as used, which prevents its reuse.
The postmark indicates the तिथि और पाइंट of उत्पत्ति of the mailing.
The mailed item is तब वितरित to the पता कि the ग्राहक रै applied to the envelope or cover.
postage stamps have facilitated the delivery of mail since the 1840s.
Before this time, ink and hand-stamps ( hence the शब्द 'stamp ' ), प्रायः बना इससे लकडी or कॉर्क, यहूद प्रायः प्रयुक्त to frank the mail and confirm the payment of postage.
The first adhesive postage stamp, commonly referred to as the पैनी ब्लैक, थी जारी in the संयुक्त किंगडम in 1840.
The invention of the स्टैम्प थी a भाग of the attempt to सुधार और improve the डाक प्रणाली in the संयुक्त किंगडम of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और Ireland, which in the early 19th century was in disarray and rife with corruption.
वहीँ हैं varying खाते of the inventor or inventors of the stamp.
Before the introduction of postage stamps, mail in the UK was paid for by the recipient, a system that was associated with an irresolvable problem : the costs of delivering mail were not recoverable by the postal सेवा जब प्राप्तकर्ता यहूद असमर्थ or unwilling to अदा लिये वितरित वस्तुएं, और प्रेषकों था no प्रोत्साहन to सीमित the क्रमांक, आकार, or वज़न of वस्तुएं भेजा, whether or नहीं वे would ultimately be paid for.
The postage stamp resolved इस समस्या in a सरल और सुरुचिपूर्ण manner, with the additional benefit of room for an element of beauty to be introduced.
Later related inventions include postal स्टेशनरी ऐसे as prepaid-postage लिफाफे, पोस्ट ताश, lettercards, aerogrammes और wrappers, postage मीटर, and, more recently, specialty boxes and envelopes provided free to the customer by the U.S. postal service for priority or express mailing.
The postage stamp afforded convenience for both the मेलर और डाक officials, अधिक efficiently बरामद लागत लिये the डाक सेवा, और ultimately resulted in a better, faster postal system.
With the conveniences stamps offered, उनके उपयोग resulted in greatly increased mailings during the 19th and 20th centuries.
Postage stamps during this era were the most popular way of paying for mail, but by the end of the 20th century यहूद rapidly होने आत by the उपयोग of metered postage और बल्क mailing by businesses. )
The same result with respect to communications by निजी पार्टियों occurred over the पिछला दशक of the 20th सदी और the पहला दशक of the 21st due to घटती cost of long distance telephone communications and the development and explosive spread of electronic mailing ( `` e-mail '' via the Internet ) and bill paying systems had.
As postage stamps with their engraved imagery began to appear on a फैली आधार, historians and collectors began to take notice.
The study of postage stamps and their उपयोग is referred to as philately.
स्टैम्प collecting can be दोनो a शौक और a रूप of ऐतिहासिक पढ़ाई और सन्दर्भ, as government-issued postage stamps and their mailing systems have always been involved with the history of nations.
The University of Alabama at Birmingham ( UAB ) is a public university in Birmingham in the u.S. राज्य of अलबामा.
Developing from an extension center established in 1936, the institution became an autonomous संस्था in 1969 और is आज एक of तीन संस्थानों in the विश्वविद्यालयों of अलबामा प्रणाली.
UAB offers over 140 कार्यक्रम of पढ़ाई in 12 अकादमिक विभाजन अग्रणी to स्नातक 's, निपुण 's, डॉक्टरेट, और पेशेवर डिग्री in the सोशल और behavioral sciences, the उदार कला, business, education, engineering, and health-related fields such as medicine, dentistry, optometry, nursing, and public health.
The school is अत्यधिक प्रसिद्ध लिये इसके चिकित्सा शोध and natural sciences programs.
The UAB Health System, one of the largest अकादमिक चिकित्सा centers in the संयुक्त राज्य, is संबद्ध with the university.
UAB Hospital प्रायोजकों रेसिडेंसी कार्यक्रम in विभिन्न चिकित्सा specialties, सहित internal medicine, neurology, surgery, radiology, and anesthesiology.
UAB हॉस्पिटल is the तभी acs सत्यापित स्तर i आघात center in Alabama, as rated by the American College of Surgeons Trauma Program.
UAB is the state 's largest नियोक्ता, साथ अधिक than 18,000 संकाय और स्टाफ और over 53,000 कार्य at the university and in the health system.
An estimated 10 percent of the कार्य in the birmingham-hoover महानगर क्षेत्रफल और 1 in 33 कार्य in the state of Alabama are directly or indirectly related to UAB.
The university 's overall annual आर्थिक प्रभाव थी अनुमानित to be $ 4.6 billion in 2010.
In the fall of 2012, the विश्वविद्यालयों of अलबामा at बर्मिंघम नामांकित 17,999 students from more than 110 countries, including 1,605 freshmen.
There are plans to commence with an `` आक्रामक '' विकास in नामांकन at UAB.
The current UAB अध्यक्ष is dr. रे L. watts.
Tofu, also called bean curd, is a food बना by coagulating सोया रस और तब दबाने the resulting curds into soft white blocks.
it is a घटक in अनेक ईस्ट Asian and Southeast Asian cuisines.
There are many अलग किस्में of टोफू, सहित भैस टोफू और tofu that has been processed in some way.
Tofu has a subtle स्वाद और can be प्रयुक्त in savory and sweet dishes.
It is प्रायः seasoned or marinated to suit the dish.
Tofu originated in प्राचीन चीन कुछ 2,000 years ago.
Chinese legend ascribes its आविष्कार to प्रिंस लियू an ( चाइनीज : 劉安 liú Ān, 179–122 BC ).
टोफू और इसके उत्पादन तकनीक यहूद introduced into Korea and then Japan during the Nara period.
It spread into other parts of ईस्ट एशिया as खूब.
This spread likely coincided with the spread of Buddhism क्युकी it is an महत्वपूर्ण सोर्स of प्रोटीन in the शाकाहारी diet of East Asian Buddhism.
Li shizhen in the मिंग राजवंश वर्णित a method of making tofu in Bencao Gangmu.
Tofu has a low calorie count, अपेक्षाकृत विशाल amounts of प्रोटीन, and little fat.
It is high in iron and depending on the coagulant used in निर्माण, may भी be ऊँची in कैल्सियम and/or मैग्नीशियम.
Bubbles ( born 1983 ) is a common chimpanzee, known for being the one-time pet of अमरीकी रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार माइकल जैक्सन, जो खरीदा the primate इससे a टेक्सास शोध facility in the early 1980s.
The animal was a frequent travel companion to the singer, whose attachment to the animal led to media mockery and, among other factors, to a पब्लिक बोध of जैक्सन as an eccentric.
During the Bad World Tour, लिये उदाहरण, जैक्सन brought बुलबुले साथ him to Japan, where they both drank tea with the mayor of Osaka.
बुलबुले थी initially रखा at the Jackson family 's home in Encino, Los Angeles, but was moved to Neverland Ranch in 1988.
There, he slept in a crib in जैक्सन 's बेडरूम, प्रयुक्त the सिंगर 's प्रसाधन, और ate candy in the Neverland movie theater.
In 2003 the public learned that, like all captive chimpanzees, Bubbles had matured into a large and आक्रामक वयस्क chimp unsuitable as a साथी एनिमल.
He was sent to a कैलिफ़ोर्निया एनिमल प्रशिक्षक, where he was reported to have attempted suicide.
When the प्रशिक्षक shut bas उसके आपरेशन in 2004, बुलबुले थी स्थानांतरित to the बीच for Great Apes, a sanctuary in Wauchula, Florida, where he has lived since 2005.

The band consists of school friends Matthew Bellamy ( lead vocals, सीसे गिटार, पियानो, keyboards, keytar ), क्रिस्टोफर wolstenholme ( बास, vocals, keyboards, rhythm guitar, harmonica ) and Dominic Howard ( drums, percussion, synthesisers, sampling ).
Since the release of उनके 2006 एल्बम ब्लैक छेद और खुलासे, keyboardist and percussionist Morgan Nicholls has performed live with the band.
Muse are known लिये उनके ऊर्जावान और हद सजीव प्रदर्शन और उनके संलयन of अनेक म्यूज़िक जाति, सहित स्पेस चट्टान, प्रगतिशील rock, alternative rock, heavy metal, classical music and electronica.
Muse have released छह स्टुडियो एल्बम : showbiz ( 1999 ), उत्पत्ति of सममिति ( 2001 ), absolution ( 2003 ), Black Holes and Revelations ( 2006 ), The Resistance ( 2009 ) and The 2nd Law ( 2012 ).
They have also issued three live albums, Hullabaloo Soundtrack ( 2002 ), जिससे is भी a संकलन of b-sides, absolution दौरे ( 2005 ), and HAARP ( 2008 ), which documents the band 's performances at Wembley Stadium in 2007.
Black Holes and Revelations earned the बैंड a पारा पुरस्कार नामांकन और a तीसरा प्लेस समाप्त in the NME Albums of the Year list for 2006.
Muse have also won a collection of म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार throughout उनके इतिहास, सहित पाँच एमटीवी यूरोपीय म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार, छह q पुरस्कार, आठ nme पुरस्कार, दो ब्रिट पुरस्कार —winning `` Best British Live Act '' twice, an MTV Video Music Award, four Kerrang !
पुरस्कार और an अमरीकी Music Award.
They were also nominated for five Grammy Awards, of जिससे वे जीती बेहतरीन चट्टान एल्बम, लिये उनके पांचवां स्टुडियो एल्बम The Resistance ( 2009 ).
Muse have बेची over 15 लाख एल्बम worldwide.
Bloemfontein (, ; Dutch for `` fountain of flowers '' ) is the पूंजी नगर of the फ़्री राज्य प्रांत of दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी ; और, as the न्यायिक पूंजी of the स्वदेश, एक of दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी 's तीन नेशनल राजधानी – the अन्य दो होने केप कस्बा, the विधान पूंजी, and Pretoria, the administrative capital.
Bloemfontein is popularly and poetically known as `` the city of गुलाब ``, owing to the प्रचुरता of ये पुष्प और the सालाना rose festival held there.
The नगर 's sesotho नाम is mangaung, अर्थ `` place of cheetahs `` and it has been included in the Mangaung Local Municipality since 2000.
bloemfontein is situated on शुष्क घासभूमि at, at an altitude of above sea level.
The city is home to 369,568 निवासियों, जबकि the mangaung लोकल नगरपालिका has a population of 645,455.
