कया हैं We ?
जहाँ हैं We Going ?
One of Post-Impressionist पॉल gauguin 's सबसे प्रसिद्ध paintings.
the अर्थ of जीवन is a philosophical question concerning the significance of life or existence in general.
It can also be expressed in different forms, ऐसे as `` क्यों हैं we यहाँ ? ``, `` कया is जीवन सब परिचय ? ``, and `` What is the purpose of existence ? ''
It has been the subject of much philosophical, वैज्ञानिक, और theological अटकलें throughout history.
वहीँ have महरूम a विशाल क्रमांक of प्रस्तावित answers to these questions from many different cultural and ideological backgrounds.
The अर्थ of जीवन is in the philosophical और धार्मिक conceptions of अस्तित्व, सोशल ties, चेतना, और सुख, और सीमायें on अनेक अन्य मुद्दे, ऐसे as सांकेतिक अर्थ, सत्तामीमांसा, value, purpose, ethics, good and evil, free will, the existence of one or multiple Gods, conceptions of God, the soul, and the afterlife.
Scientific contributions focus primarily on describing related अनुभवजन्य तथ्य परिचय the ब्रह्मांड, exploring the कॉन्टेक्स्ट और पैरामीटर्स concerning the 'how ' of life.
Science also studies and can provide recommendations for the pursuit of well-being और a सम्बन्धित धारणा of morality.
An alternative, humanistic approach मुद्राएँ the सवाल `` कया is the अर्थ of my life ? ''
The value of the question pertaining to the purpose of जीवन may coincide साथ the उपलब्धि of परम वास्तविकता, or a feeling of oneness, or even a feeling of sacredness.
Family Guy creator Seth MacFarlane also provides the voices of Peter Griffin, stewie griffin, ब्रायन griffin, और ग्लेन कीचड़.
Family Guy is an अमरीकी एनिमेटेड sitcom कि सुविधाएँ पाँच प्रमुख आवाज़ अभिनेताओं, और numerous नियमित डाल और recurring guest stars.
The principal voice cast consists of दिखाएँ निर्माता सेठ macfarlane, एलेक्स borstein, सेठ ग्रीन, mila kunis ( जो replaced लेसी Chabert after the first season ) and Mike Henry and now, the new actor Beau Osborne.
Recurring voice actors शामिल पैट्रिक warburton, आदम वेस्ट, जॉन G. ब्रेनन, निकोल सुलीवान and Jennifer Tilly, and repeat guest stars include Phyllis Diller, Charles Durning, Rush Limbaugh, and Phil LaMarr.
Many डाल सदस्यों provide आवाज़ें लिये अनेक characters.
The voice actors, in portraying the various अक्षर personalities on the दिखाएँ, चित्रण प्रेरणा इससे हस्तियाँ and pop culture.
Family Guy characters have been played by more than एक कर्ता, बाद सदस्यों of the दिखाएँ बाएँ the श्रेणी or had conflicting obligations.
Kunis was nominated for an Annie Award for voicing Meg Griffin in the season 5 episode `` Barely Legal `` and MacFarlane has also won an Emmy Award for Outstanding voice-over प्रदर्शन और an एनी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन आवाज़ एक्टिंग in an एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न उत्पादन, हालांकि no other cast member has won an award for their work on the series.
1911 उदाहरण by Edmund Dulac
`` The Princess and the मटर '' ( ; शाब्दिक अनुवाद : `` the राजकुमारी on the Pea '' ) is a literary fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen about a young woman whose royal identity is established by a test of her physical sensitivity.
The tale was first published with three अन्य by andersen in an inexpensive पुस्तिका on 8 may 1835 in Copenhagen by C.A. Reitzel.
Andersen had heard the story as a child, and it likely has its source in folk material, possibly originating from Sweden as it is अनजान in the डैनिश मौखिक परंपरा.
Neither `` The Princess and the Pea '' nor Andersen 's other tales of 1835 were well received by डैनिश आलोचकों, जो disliked उनके कैज़ुअल, chatty स्टाइल, और उनके lack of morals.
In 1959 `` The Princess and the Pea '' was adapted to the musical स्टेज in a उत्पादन पुकारा एकबार upon a गद्दा अभिनीत Carol Burnett.
German Americans ( ) are citizens of the United States who यहूद either born in जर्मनी or हैं of जर्मनी ancestry.
They comprise about 50 million people, making them the largest ancestry group ahead of आयरिश अमेरिकी, अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी और अंग्रेज़ी अमेरिकी.
They comprise about 1/3 of the German diaspora सब over the संसार.
None of the German राज्य था नई संसार colonies.
Not until the 1670s did the पहला significant समूह of जर्मनी आप्रवासियों arrive in the British colonies, settling primarily in New York and Pennsylvania.
आव्रजन जारी in बहुत विशाल संख्याएँ दौरान the 19th century, with some eight million arrivals from Germany.
They were pulled by the attractions of land and धार्मिक स्वतंत्रता, और धकेल आउट of यूरोपीय by shortages of land and religious or political oppression.
Many arrived seeking religious or political स्वतंत्रता, अन्य लिये आर्थिक अवसर वृहद than those in यूरोपीय, और अन्य simply for the chance to start fresh in the New World.
The arrivals before 1850 यहूद ज़्यादातर किसानो जो sought आउट the most productive land, where their intensive farming techniques would pay off.
After 1840, many came to शहरों, जहाँ `` germania '' —german-speaking districts—soon emerged.
German Americans established the first kindergartens in the संयुक्त राज्य, introduced the क्रिसमस पेड़ परंपरा, और originated लोकप्रिय अमरीकी foods such as hot dogs and hamburgers.
German American celebrations are held throughout the country, one of the most well-known होने the german-american steuben परेड in New York City, held every third Saturday in September.
There are also major annual events in Chicago, सिनसिनाटी, मिल्वौकी, पिट्सबर्ग, St. Louis and other cities.
Like अनेक अन्य आप्रवासियों कि आए to the संयुक्त राज्य, an overwhelming क्रमांक of लोगों of German or partial German descent have essentially become Americanized.
The Preamble to the United States संविधान is a ब्रैड परिचयात्मक बयान of the Constitution 's fundamental purposes and guiding principles.
It states in general terms, and courts have referred to it as reliable evidence of, the Founding Fathers ' intentions regarding the Constitution 's meaning and कया वे hoped the संविधान होता achieve as it pertains to सब of the लोगों of the संयुक्त राज्य.
As the phrase, `` we the people '' suggests that the new government originates इससे the लोगों of the संयुक्त राज्य और it सेट into गति a सवाल as it pertains to कि विशाल जनसांख्यिकी concerning the व्यक्तिगत अधिकारों और समता among all people ; this can be seen most broadly in the divide between republicanism and social democracy.
The history of the अंतरजाल began साथ the विकास of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक कंप्यूटर in the 1950s.
The public was first introduced to the concepts that would lead to the Internet when a संदेश थी भेजा over the arpanet इससे कंप्यूटर विज्ञान प्राध्यापक लियोनार्ड kleinrock 's प्रयोगशाला at विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया, लॉस एंजिल्स ( UCLA ), after the second piece of network equipment was installed at Stanford Research Institute ( SRI ).
Packet switched networks such as ARPANET, Mark I at NPL in the UK, CYCLADES, Merit Network, Tymnet, and Telenet, were विकसित in the लेट 1960s और जल्दी 1970s using a किस्में of protocols.
The ARPANET in particular led to the विकास of प्रोटोकॉल लिये internetworking, in जिससे अनेक पृथक networks could be joined together into a network of networks.
In 1982, the Internet protocol suite ( TCP/IP ) was standardized, and नतीजतन, the अवधारणा of a world-wide संजाल of interconnected tcp/ip संजाल, पुकारा the अंतरजाल, was introduced.
Access to the ARPANET was विस्तारित in 1981 जब the नेशनल विज्ञान न्यास ( nsf ) विकसित the कंप्यूटर विज्ञान संजाल ( csnet ) and again in 1986 when NSFNET provided access to supercomputer sites in the United States from research and education organizations.
Commercial अंतरजाल सेवा प्रदाताओं ( isps ) began to emerge in the late 1980s and early 1990s.
The ARPANET was decommissioned in 1990.
The Internet was commercialized in 1995 जब nsfnet थी decommissioned, निकालना the पिछला प्रतिबंध on the उपयोग of the Internet to carry commercial traffic.
Since the mid-1990s, the Internet has had a revolutionary impact on culture and commerce, including the rise of near-instant communication by electronic mail, instant messaging, Voice over Internet प्रोटोकॉल ( voip ) `` फोन काल्स '', two-way इंटरैक्टिव वीडियो काल्स, और the संसार चौड़ी वेब साथ इसके चर्चा forums, ब्लॉग, सोशल नेटवर्किंग, और ऑनलाइन खरीदारी sites.
The research and education community continues to develop and use advanced संजाल ऐसे as nsf 's बहुत ऊँची गति रीढ़ संजाल सेवा ( vbns ), Internet2, and National LambdaRail.
Increasing amounts of आंकड़ा हैं transmitted at उच्चतर और उच्चतर speeds over fiber optic networks operating at 1-Gbit/s, 10-Gbit/s, or more.
The Internet 's takeover over the global communication landscape was almost instant in historical terms : it only communicated 1 % of the information flowing through two-way दूरसंचार संजाल in the साल 1993, already 51 % by 2000, और अधिक than 97 % of the telecommunicated सूचना by 2007.
Today the अंतरजाल continues to grow, चलित by कभी वृहद amounts of online information, commerce, entertainment, and social networking.
Southwest एयरलाइंस co. ( ) is a प्रमुख u.S. एयरलाइन और the संसार 's largest low-cost carrier, headquartered in Dallas, Texas.
It was established in 1967 और अपनाया इसके current name in 1971.
The airline has more than 46,000 employees and operates अधिक than 3,400 फ़्लाइट प्रति day.
As of June 5, 2011, it carries the most घरेलू यात्री of कोई U.S. airline.
As of April 2013, Southwest एयरलाइंस रै अनुसूचित सेवा to 84 गंतव्यों in 41 राज्य and Puerto Rico.
Southwest Airlines has solely संचालित बोइंग 737s, मगर लिये a few सालो in the 1970s and 1980s, when it operated Boeing 727s.
As of August 2012, Southwest is the largest operator of the 737 विश्वव्यापी साथ over 550 in सेवा, प्रत्येक ऑपरेटिंग an औसत of छह फ़्लाइट प्रति day.
In May 2011, the airline acquired airtran एयरवेज़, साथ संयोजन of the carriers expected to be complete by 2014.
On March 1, 2012, the company was issued a single ऑपरेटिंग प्रमाणपत्र, technically becoming one airline.
Rolling Rock is a 4.6 % abv पाले lager शुभारम्भ in 1939 by the Latrobe Brewing Company.
Although founded as a local beer in पश्चिमी पेन्सिलवेनिया, it थी marketed aggressively और आखिरकार became a national product.
The brand was sold to anheuser-busch of st. लुई, मिसौरी, in मिड 2006, which transferred brewing operations to New Jersey.
Benedict XVI (,, ; born जोसेफ aloisius ratzinger on 16 अप्रैल 1927 ) is Pope emeritus of the Catholic Church.
He served as पोप इससे 2005 to 2013.
In that position, he was दोनो the नेता of the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर और Sovereign of the Vatican City State.
Benedict was elected on 19 April 2005 in a papal conclave, celebrated his Papal Inauguration Mass on 24 April 2005, and took कब्ज़ा of उसके गिरजाघर, the archbasilica of st. जॉन lateran, on 7 May 2005.
ordained as a पुजारी in 1951 in उसके देशी बायर्न, ratzinger स्थापित खुद as a highly regarded university theologian by the late 1950s and was appointed a full professor in 1958.
After a long career as an academic, serving as a professor of theology at several German universities—the last being the University of Regensburg, where he served as Vice President of the university in 1976 and 1977—he was नियुक्त archbishop of म्यूनिख और freising और कार्डिनल by पोप पॉल vi in 1977, an unusual promotion for someone with little pastoral experience.
In 1981, he settled in रोम जब he became prefect of the सभा लिये the Doctrine of the Faith, one of the most important dicasteries of the Roman Curia.
From 2002 until his election as पोप, he थी भी डीन of the कॉलेज of कार्डिनल्स, और as such, the primus inter pares among the cardinals.
Prior to becoming pope, he was `` a major figure on the Vatican स्टेज लिये a क्वार्टर of a सदी '' as `` एक of the सबसे आदरणीय, influential और विवादास्पद सदस्यों of the कॉलेज of कार्डिनल्स '' ; he था an influence `` दूसरी to none when it came to setting church priorities and directions '' as one of Pope John Paul II 's closest confidants.
He was originally a उदार theologian, लकिन अपनाया conservative views after 1968.
His prolific कृतियाँ बचाव परंपरागत कैथोलिक doctrine and values.
During his papacy, Benedict XVI advocated a वापसी to आधारभूत ईसाई मान to काउंटर the increased secularisation of many Western countries.
He views relativism 's denial of objective truth, and the denial of moral truths in particular, as the central problem of the 21st century.
He taught the importance of both the Catholic गिरिजाघर और an समझना of God 's redemptive love.
Pope Benedict also revived a number of traditions including elevating the tridentine द्रव्यमान to a अधिक prominent स्थिति.
He renewed the relationship between the Catholic Church and आर्ट, देखने the उपयोग of सौंदर्य as a पाथ to the पवित्र, प्रचारित the उपयोग of लैटिन, और reintroduced परंपरागत papal garments, लिये जिससे reason he was called `` the pope of aesthetics ''.
He has been described as `` the प्रमुख बौद्धिक फ़ोर्स in the गिरिजाघर '' since the mid-1980s.
Several of Pope Benedict 's students from his academic career are also prominent churchmen today और confidantes of उसे, notably Christoph Schönborn.
On 11 फ़रवरी 2013, पोप बेनेडिक्ट घोषित उसके इस्तीफा in a वाक in लैटिन पहले the कार्डिनल्स, citing a `` lack of strength of mind and body '' due to his advanced age.
His इस्तीफा became प्रभावी on 28 February 2013.
He is the first pope to resign since Pope Gregory XII in 1415, और the पहला to do so on उसके अपना पहल चूंकि Pope Celestine V in 1294.
As pope emeritus, Benedict retains the style of His Holiness, और the शीर्षक of पोप, और होगा continue to पोशाक in the papal colour of white.
He was succeeded by पोप फ्रांसिस on 13 कूच 2013, and he moved into the newly renovated Mater Ecclesiae monastery for his retirement on 2 May 2013..
Pocket stereoscope साथ असली test image.
Used by military to जाँचें stereoscopic pairs of aerial छायाचित्र.
View of बोस्टन, c. 1860 ; an जल्दी stereoscopic कार्ड for viewing a scene from nature
Kaiser-Panorama consisted of a multi-station viewing apparatus and sets of stereo slides.
patented by A. fuhrmann around 1890.
Company of ladies watching stereoscopic छायाचित्र, पेंटिंग by Jacob Spoel, before 1868.
A बहुत जल्दी चित्रण of लोगों using a stereoscope.
Stereoscopy ( also called stereoscopics or 3D imaging ) is a तकनीक लिये बनाना or बढ़ाना the भ्रम of depth in an image by means of stereopsis for binocular vision.
The word stereoscopy derives इससे the यूनानी `` στερεός '' ( stereos ), `` कड़, ठोस '' + `` σκοπέω '' ( skopeō ), `` to look '', `` to see ''.
Most stereoscopic methods present two offset बिंब separately to the बाएँ and right eye of the viewer.
ये two-dimensional बिंब हैं तब संयुक्त in the brain to give the perception of 3D depth.
This technique is विशिष्ट इससे 3d प्रदर्शक कि प्रदर्शक an चित्र in तीन पूरा आयाम, allowing the observer to increase information about the 3-dimensional objects being displayed by head and eye movements.
John Adams ( October 30, 1735 ( O.S. अक्तूबर 19, 1735 ) – जुलाई 4, 1826 ) थी the दूसरी अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1797–1801 ), having earlier served as the first vice president of the United States.
An American Founding Father, he was a statesman, diplomat, and a अग्रणी एडवोकेट of अमरीकी स्वतंत्रता इससे ग्रेट ब्रिटेन.
Well educated, he was an Enlightenment political theorist जो प्रचारित republicanism और लिखा prolifically परिचय उसके प्रायः seminal विचार, दोनो in प्रकाशित works and in letters to his wife and key adviser Abigail as well as to other Founding Fathers.
Adams came to prominence in the जल्दी चरण of the American Revolution.
A lawyer and public figure in Boston, as a delegate from Massachusetts to the महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस, he निभाई a अग्रणी भूमिका in persuading कॉंग्रेस to declare independence.
He assisted Thomas Jefferson in drafting the Declaration of स्वतंत्रता in 1776, और थी इसके प्राथमिक एडवोकेट in the कॉंग्रेस.
Later, as a diplomat in Europe, he helped negotiate the eventual सलाम सन्धि साथ ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, और थी जिम्मेदार लिये obtaining vital governmental loans from Amsterdam bankers.
A political theorist and historian, Adams largely wrote the Massachusetts Constitution in 1780, which साथ साथ उसके पहले विचार on सरकारी, बहकावे अमरीकी राजनैतिक विचार.
One of his greatest roles was as a न्यायधीश of अक्षर : in 1775, he मनोनीत जार्ज वॉशिंगटन to be commander-in-chief, और 25 सालो later nominated John Marshall to be Chief Justice of the United States.
Adams ' revolutionary श्रेय secured उसे दो शर्तें as जार्ज वॉशिंगटन 's vice president and his own election in 1796 as the second president.
During his one term, he encountered ferocious attacks by the Jeffersonian Republicans, as well as the प्रबल गुट in उसके अपना federalist पार्टी led by उसके कड़वा दुश्मन सिकंदर Hamilton.
Adams signed the controversial Alien and Sedition Acts, and built up the फौज और नेवी विशेषकर in the फेस of an undeclared नवल युद्ध ( पुकारा the `` quasi-war `` ) with France, 1798–1800.
The major accomplishment of his presidency was his शांतिपूर्ण रेज़ोल्यूशन of the विरोध in the फेस of हैमिल्टन 's opposition.
In 1800, एडम्स थी पराजित लिये re-election by थामस Jefferson and retired to Massachusetts.
He later resumed his दोस्ती साथ जेफरसन.
He and his wife, Abigail एडम्स, संस्थापित an संपन्नता परिवार लकीर of राजनेता, राजनयिकों, और इतिहासकारों now referred to as the Adams political family.
Adams थी the पिता of जॉन क्विंसी एडम्स, the sixth President of the United States.
His achievements have प्राप्त वृहद मान्यता in आधुनिक टाइम्स, हालांकि उसके contributions were not initially as celebrated as those of other Founders.
Adams was the first U.S. president to reside in the भवन कि आखिरकार became known as the White House.
The United States ten-dollar विधेयक ( $ 10 ) is a denomination of संयुक्त राज्य करेंसी.
The first U.S. Secretary of the Treasury ( 1789–95 ), Alexander Hamilton, is currently प्रदर्शित on the obverse of the विधेयक, जबकि the u.S. राजकोष Building is featured on the reverse.
( हैमिल्टन is एक of दो non-presidents featured on currently issued U.S. bills.
The other is बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन, on the $ 100 bill.
Hamilton is one of only four people featured on U.S. paper currency ( 1861 to the present ) who was not born in the महाद्वीपीय संयुक्त राज्य, as he थी इससे the वेस्ट इंडीज.
The others are : Albert Gallatin, Switzerland ( $ 500 1862/63 विधिक टेंडर ) ; जार्ज meade, स्पेन ( $ 1,000 1890/91 राजकोष नोट ) ; और Robert Morris, England ( $ 1,000 1862/63 Legal Tender ; $ 10 1878/80 Silver Certificate ).
In addition, Kamehameha I, appears on the 2008 हवाई राज्य क्वार्टर. )
All $ 10 bills जारी आज हैं संघीय Reserve Notes.
The Bureau of Engraving and Printing says the average life of a $ 10 विधेयक in परिसंचरण is 18 महीने पहले it is replaced due to wear.
लगभग 6 % of सब us banknotes मुद्रित in 2009 were $ 10 bills.
टेन डालर बिल्स हैं वितरित by Federal Reserve Banks in yellow straps.
The source of the face on the $ 10 bill is John Trumbull ’s 1805 portrait of हैमिल्टन कि belongs to the पोर्ट्रेट संग्रहण of नई यॉर्क नगर Hall.
The $ 10 bill is the only U.S. paper currency in circulation in which the portrait faces to the left ( the $ 100,000 bill featured a portrait of Woodrow विल्सन facing to the बाएँ, लकिन थी प्रयुक्त तभी लिये intra-government ट्रांजेक्शन ).
A rider on a Yamaha Waverunner XL performing a high-speed फेरे.
A jetboat is a boat propelled by a जेट of जल ejected इससे the वापस of the craft.
Unlike a powerboat or motorboat that uses a propeller in the water below or पीछे the नाव, a jetboat draws the जल इससे अंतर्गत the नाव into a पंप अंदर the boat, then expels it through a nozzle at the stern.
Jetboats were originally designed by Sir William Hamilton ( who developed a waterjet in 1954 ) लिये आपरेशन in the fast-flowing और उथले नदियाँ of नई जीलैंड, specifically to overcome the problem of propellers striking rocks in such waters.
Previous attempts at waterjet propulsion had very short lifetimes, generally due to the inefficient डिज़ाइन of the इकाई और the फैक्ट कि वे offered few लाभ over conventional propellers.
Unlike these previous waterjet developments, ऐसे as campini 's और the hanley hydrojet, हैमिल्टन had a specific need for a propulsion system to operate in very-shallow water, and the waterjet proved to be the ideal solution.
From this, the लोकप्रियता of the जेट ईकाई और jetboat increased rapidly.
Through further developments, it was found the waterjet offered several other advantages over propellers लिये a चौड़ी दायरा of पोत प्रकार, और as ऐसे, waterjets हैं प्रयुक्त widely आज लिये अनेक high-speed बरतन, सहित यात्री ferries, rescue craft, patrol boats and offshore supply vessels.
jetboats हैं अत्यधिक maneuverable, और अनेक can, इससे पूरा गति, be reversed and brought to a stop within little more than their own length, in a maneuver known as a `` crash stop ''.
The well known Hamilton turn or `` jet spin '' is a high-speed maneuvre where the नाव 's इंजन throttle is काटें, the परिचालन is turned sharply और the throttle खोली again, causing the नाव to स्पिन जल्दी around साथ a large spray of water.
There is no अभियान्त्रिकी सीमा to the आकार of jetboats, हालांकि the वैध of their use depends a lot on the type of application.
Classic prop-drives are generally more efficient and economical at low speeds, up to about, but as boat speed increases beyond this, the extra hull resistance generated by struts, rudders, shafts ( इत्यादि. ) अर्थात् waterjets हैं अधिक कुशल in the 20-50 गांठ दायरा ( up to ).
Also, in परिस्थितियों साथ बहुत विशाल propellers turning at slow speeds ( such as tug boats ), the equivalent size waterjet would be too big to be practical.
For these reasons, the vast majority of waterjet इकाई हैं संस्थापित in high-speed बरतन और in particular परिस्थितियों जहाँ उथले draught, maneuverability, and load flexibility are main concerns.
The biggest jet-driven vessels are मिला in सैन्य उपयोग or the high-speed passenger/car ferry industry.
दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी 's s ( लगभग long ) are the biggest jet-propelled vessels so far.
Even these german-built बरतन हैं सक्षम of performing `` crash stops ''.
uveitis is broadly पारिभाषित as inflammation of the uvea.
The uvea consists of the middle, pigmented, vascular structures of the नजर और शामिल the आईरिस, ciliary body, and choroid.
Uveitis requires an urgent referral and thorough परिक्षा by an ophthalmologist or optometrist along with urgent treatment to control the inflammation.

Murphy is a fictional character on the comedy-drama टेलीविज़न श्रेणी अनुगामी.
He is निभाई by केविन connolly.
the जगमगाता is a 1980 मनोवैज्ञानिक हॉरर फिल्मी उत्पादित और निर्देशित by स्टेनली Kubrick, co-written with novelist Diane Johnson, and starring Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Scatman Crothers, and Danny Lloyd.
The film is based on the स्टीफन किंग अनोखा the जगमगाता.
A writer, जोकर torrance, takes a जॉब as an off-season caretaker at an isolated hotel.
His young son possesses मानसिक abilities और is समर्थ to see things from the past and future, such as the ghosts who inhabit the hotel.
Soon after settling in, the family is trapped in the hotel by a snowstorm, and Jack gradually becomes influenced by a अलौकिक उपस्थिति ; he उतरता into दीवानगी और कोशिशें to हत्या उसके बीवी and son.
Unlike previous kubrick films, जिससे विकसित an दर्शक धीरे by भवन on word-of-mouth, The Shining was released as a mass-market film, opening at first in just two cities on Memorial Day, then nationwide a month later.
Although initial response to the film was mixed, later critical assessment was more favorable and it is now viewed as a क्लासिक of the हॉरर विधा.
Film director Martin Scorsese, writing in The रोज़ जानवर, क्रमित it as एक of the 11 scariest हॉरर फिल्मों of all time.
Film critics, film students, और kubrick 's निर्माता, जन harlan, have remarked on the विशाल influence the film has had on popular culture.
The आरंभिक यूरोपीय रिलीज of the जगमगाता थी 25 मिनट्स shorter than the American version, achieved by removing most of the scenes taking place outside the environs of the hotel.
Patio कोला बोतल
आँगन आहार कोला थी a brand of diet soda introduced by Pepsi in 1963.
It was created in response to Diet Rite कोला, जिससे थी the पहला आहार कोला on the market.
Fitness promoter Debbie Drake थी आँगन आहार कोला 's प्रवक्ता.
In 1964, Patio released नारंगी, अंगूर, और रूट बियर जायका.
This flavor line was not meant to compete with brands like Orange crush, लकिन बल्कि भरण आउट the लकीर.
Patio sodas were उपलब्धियाँ in the cold-bottle मार्केट : किराना और mom-and-pop stores.
विज्ञापन लिये आँगन थी comparatively scarce ; at the time, bottlers were regionally franchised, and related advertising was necessarily local.
in 1964, आँगन आहार कोला became Diet Pepsi.
the newly ब्रांडेड आहार सोडा थी advertised alongside पेप्सी साथ the टैगलाइन `` Pepsi either way '', which replaced the slogan `` Dances with flavor ''.
The short life span of Patio Diet cola makes it a ग्रेट जोड लिये बोतल collectors.
Most of the बाकी आँगन लकीर of जायका यहूद phased आउट by the जल्दी 1970s, while a few survived until the mid 70s
Infrastructure is basic शारीरिक और organizational structures needed लिये the आपरेशन of a समाज or एंटरप्राइज़, or the services and facilities necessary for an economy to function.
It can be generally defined as the set of interconnected संरचनात्मक तत्व कि provide framework supporting an entire structure of development.
It is an महत्वपूर्ण पद लिये judging a country or region 's development.
The पद typically refers to the तकनीकी structures कि support a समाज, ऐसे as सड़कें, पुलों, जल सप्लाई, sewers, विद्युत ग्रिड, दूरसंचार, and so forth, and can be defined as `` the physical components of interrelated systems providing commodities and services essential to enable, sustain, or enhance societal living conditions. ''
Viewed functionally, infrastructure facilitates the production of goods and सेवाएं, और भी the वितरण of समाप्त उत्पाद to बाज़ार, as खूब as मौलिक सोशल सेवाएं ऐसे as schools and hospitals ; for example, roads enable the transport of raw materials to a factory.
In military parlance, the term refers to the buildings and permanent installations necessary for the support, redeployment, और आपरेशन of सैन्य forces.
to मेक it सरल, अवसंरचना is anything that is needed everyday, an everyday item.

mitochondrial डीएनए.
Human genetic variation is the genetic मतभेद दोनो भीतर और among populations.
There may be अनेक विसंगतियाँ of any given gene in the human population ( genes ), leading to polymorphism.
Many genes are not बहुरूपी, अर्थ कि तभी a सिंगल allele is उपस्थित in the जनसांख्यिकी : the जीन is then said to be fixed.
No two humans are genetically एकसमान.
भी monozygotic जुड़वा, जो develop इससे एक zygote, have infrequent genetic differences due to mutations occurring during development and gene copy number variation.
Differences between individuals, even closely सम्बन्धित individuals, हैं the कुंजी to तकनीकों ऐसे as genetic fingerprinting.
alleles occur at अलग बारंबारता in different human populations, with populations that are more geographically and ancestrally remote tending to differ more.
Causes of मतभेद between individuals शामिल the एक्सचेंज of genes during meiosis and various mutational events.
There are at least two reasons why जेनेटिक विभिन्नता exists between populations.
Natural selection may confer an अनुकूली लाभ to individuals in a विशिष्ट environment if an allele provides a competitive advantage.
Alleles under selection are likely to occur तभी in those भौगोलिक regions जहाँ they confer an advantage.
The second main cause of जेनेटिक विभिन्नता is due to the ऊँची उपाधि of neutrality of most mutations.
Most mutations do not appear to have कोई चयनात्मक प्रभाव एक रास्ता or the other on the organism.
The main cause is genetic drift, इस is the प्रभाव of यादृच्छिक परिवर्तन in the gene pool.
In humans, founder effect and past small population size ( increasing the likelihood of जेनेटिक बहाव ) may have था an महत्वपूर्ण influence in neutral differences between populations.
The theory that humans recently migrated आउट of अफ़्रीकी supports this.
The study of human जेनेटिक विभिन्नता रै दोनो विकासवादी significance and medical applications.
It can help वैज्ञानिकों समझे प्राचीन इंसान जनसांख्यिकी migrations as well as how different human groups are biologically related to one another.
For medicine, study of human genetic variation may be महत्वपूर्ण क्युकी कुछ disease-causing alleles occur अधिक प्रायः in लोगों इससे specific geographic regions.
New findings show that each इंसान रै on औसत 60 नई mutations compared to their parents.
Apart from mutations, many जीनों कि may have aided इंसानो in ancient times plague humans today.
For example, it is suspected that genes that allow humans to more efficiently प्रक्रम खाना हैं those कि मेक लोगों susceptible to obesity and diabetes today.
Tea Party प्रदर्शनकारियों on the वेस्ट लॉन of the u.S. कैपिटल और the नेशनल मॉल at the Taxpayer March on Washington on September 12, 2009.
The Tea Party movement is an American political movement that advocates strict adherence to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान, reducing u.S. सरकारी बिता और taxes, and reduction of the U.S. national debt and federal budget deficit.
The movement has been called partly रूढ़िवादी, partly libertarian, and partly populist.
The movement has प्रायोजित विरोध और समर्थित राजनैतिक candidates since 2009.
The name of the movement is निकला इससे the बोस्टन चाय पार्टी of 1773, an iconic इवेंट in American history.
Anti-tax protesters in the United States have प्रायः referred to the असली बोस्टन चाय पार्टी for inspiration.
References to the Boston Tea Party यहूद भाग of कर दिन विरोध आयोजित throughout the 1990s and earlier.
By 2001, a custom had developed among some conservative कार्यकर्ताओं of mailing चाय बैग to विधायक और अन्य officials as a symbolic act.
The currencies of Puerto Rico closely follow the ऐतिहासिक विकास of प्यूर्टो रीको.
As a colony of स्पेन और the संयुक्त राज्य, प्यूर्टो रीको थी granted the उपयोग of दोनो विदेशी and provincial currencies.
Following the Spanish colonization in 1502, प्यूर्टो रीको became an important port, with its own supply of gold.
However, as the mineral reserves ran खाली भीतर the सदी, the द्वीपसमूह 's economy suffered.
The स्पेनी क्राउन जारी the situado mexicano, जिससे meant कि a semi-regular shipment of gold from the Viceroyalty of New Spain would be sent to the island, as a way to provide economic support.
Between 1636 and 1637, फिलिप iv of स्पेन imposed a कर जिससे था to be paid using a revenue stamp.
Inspired by this, Puerto Rico began producing banknotes in 1766, बनने the पहला उपनिवेश to छपाई 8- रियल banknotes in the Spanish Empire and which in the Spanish government 's approval of subsequent issues.
The situado was discontinued during the 19th सदी, बनाना an आर्थिक संकट, as a परिणाम of मैक्सिको gaining इसके स्वतंत्रता इससे Spain.
Salvador Meléndez Bruna, the colonial governor in office, ordered the issue of provincial banknotes, बनाना the प्यूर्टो rican पेसो.
however, मुद्रण of these banknotes ceased after 1815.
During the following दशकों, विदेशी coins became the widespread currency.
In the 1860s and 1870s, banknotes reemerged.
on फ़रवरी 1, 1890, the banco español de प्यूर्टो Rico was inaugurated and began issuing banknotes.
The बैंको designed चार श्रेणी और लगाई तीन in circulation under Spanish rule.
In 1895, a Royal Decree ordered the उत्पादन of प्रांतीय पेसो coins.
on अगस्त 13, 1898, the spanish-american युद्ध ended साथ स्पेन ceding प्यूर्टो रीको to the United States.
The Banco Español de Puerto Rico was renamed Bank of Porto Rico और जारी बिल्स समतुल्य to the United States dollar, creating the Puerto Rican dollar.
In 1902, the First नेशनल बैंको of पोर्टो रीको जारी banknotes in a समानांतर manner.
Two more श्रेणी यहूद जारी जबतक 1913.
After Puerto Rico 's economy and monetary प्रणाली थी fully एकीकृत into the संयुक्त राज्य ' आर्थिक और मौद्रिक प्रणाली, the प्यूर्टो rican dollars were redeemed for those issued by the United States Treasury.
The peso and dollar have been followed by other contemporary issues, including commemorative banknotes, निजी करेंसी, और a क्वार्टर सिक्का designed with Fort San Felipe del Morro in the face.
Pepsi ( stylized in lowercase as pepsi, formerly stylized in uppercase as पेप्सी ) is a कार्बोनेटेड नरम पेय कि is उत्पादित और manufactured by पेप्सिको.
Created and developed in 1893 and introduced as ब्रैड 's पेय, it थी renamed as pepsi-cola on August 28, 1898, then to Pepsi in 1961.
The Book of ezekiel is the तीसरा of the latter नबियों in the यहूदी बाइबल, following the books of Isaiah and Jeremiah and preceding the Book of the Twelve.
( The order is somewhat different in the ईसाई बूढ़ा वसीयत ).
It derives its name from, and रिकॉर्ड the visions of, the 6th सदी bc पुजारी and prophet Ezekiel.
According to the book, the prophet, exiled in Babylon, experienced a series of seven visions दौरान the 22 सालो इससे 593 to 571 bc, a काल जिससे spans the फाइनल विनाश of Jerusalem in 586.
The visions, and the book, are structured around three themes : ( 1 ) judgment on Israel ( chapters 1-24 ) ; ( 2 ) judgment on the राष्ट्र ( अध्याय 25-32 ) ; और भविष्य आशीर्वाद लिये Israel ( chapters 33-48 ).
New Orleans ( or, locally or ; ) is a major United States बंदरगाहों और the largest नगर और महानगर area in the state of Louisiana.
The population of the city was 343,829 as of the 2010 U.S. Census.
The New Orleans metropolitan area ( New Orleans–Metairie–Kenner Metropolitan सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल ) था a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,167,764 in 2010 और थी the 46th largest in the United States.
The New Orleans–Metairie–Bogalusa Combined Statistical Area, a larger व्यापार क्षेत्रफल, था a 2010 जनसांख्यिकी of 1,214,932.
The city is named after Orléans, a city located on the Loire River in केन्द्र, फ़्रांस, और is खूब ज्ञात लिये इसके पृथक फ्रेंच क्रियोल वास्तुकला, as well as its cross-cultural and multilingual heritage.
New Orleans is also famous for its भोजन, म्यूज़िक ( विशेषकर as the जन्मस्थान of जैज़ ), और इसके सालाना जश्न and festivals, most notably Mardi Gras.
The नगर is प्रायः referred to as the `` most unique '' in America.
New Orleans is located in southeastern louisiana, straddling the मिसिसिपी नदी.
The नगर और ऑरलियन्स Parish ( ) are.
The city and parish are bounded by the parishes of st. tammany to the उत्तर, st. बर्नार्ड to the ईस्ट, plaquemines to the दक्षिण और Jefferson to the south and west.
Lake Pontchartrain, part of जिससे is शामिल in the नगर हद, झूठ to the उत्तर और Lake Borgne lies to the east.
The नेशनल जनम कंट्रोल लीग थी a जनम कंट्रोल संगठन in the United States.
It was founded in March 1915 by Mary Dennett, Clara gruening stillman और जेसी एशले.
Its main purpose was to overturn the कानून जिससे बैन contraceptives इससे the U.S. mails.
अभियान यहूद आरोहित in नई यॉर्क, लकिन in 1919 the League was disbanded and reformed into the Voluntary Parenthood League.
Cancer, known medically as a malignant neoplasm, is a व्यापक समूह of विभिन्न रोगों, सब involving unregulated cell growth.
In cancer, cells divide और grow uncontrollably, forming malignant tumors, and invade nearby parts of the body.
The cancer may also spread to more distant parts of the देह through the lymphatic प्रणाली or bloodstream.
Not सब tumors हैं cancerous.
Benign tumors do not grow uncontrollably, do नहीं invade neighboring tissues, and do not spread throughout the body.
There are over 200 different known cancers कि पहुँचकर इंसानो.
Determining what कल्याणकारी कर्कट is जटिल.
Many things हैं ज्ञात to बढ़ाएँ the रिस्क of कर्कट, सहित तम्बाकू उपयोग, निश्चित infections, विकिरण, lack of physical activity, obesity, and environmental pollutants.
These can directly damage जीनों or combine साथ मौजूदा जेनेटिक faults within cells to cause the disease.
Approximately five to ten percent of cancers हैं entirely खानदानी.
कर्कट can be detected in a क्रमांक of तरीके, सहित the presence of certain signs and symptoms, screening tests, or medical imaging.
Once a संभावित कर्कट is detected it is diagnosed by microscopic examination of a tissue sample.
Cancer is प्रायः treated साथ कीमोथेरेपी, विकिरण therapy and surgery.
The chances of surviving the बीमारी vary greatly by the प्रकार और स्थान of the cancer and the extent of disease at the start of treatment.
While cancer can affect people of all ages, and a few types of cancer are more common in children, the रिस्क of विकासशील कर्कट generally increases साथ आयु.
In 2007, cancer caused परिचय 13 % of सब इंसान मौतों worldwide ( 7.9 million ).
Rates are rising as more लोगों सजीव to an बूढ़ा आयु और as द्रव्यमान जीवनशैली परिवर्तन occur in the विकासशील world.

स्कीइंग is a recreational कार्यकलाप और प्रतिस्पर्धी खेल in जिससे the participant attaches long runners or skis to boots or shoes on the feet and uses them to travel on top of snow.
Aside from recreation and प्रतियोगिता, स्कीइंग रै महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये सैन्य उद्देश्य और भी यात्राएं in areas that experience heavy snowfall.
Many types of competitive skiing events are recognized by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय ओलम्पिक कमेटी, and the International Ski Federation.
John Maynard Keynes, 1st Baron Keynes, CB, FBA ( ; 5 June 1883 – 21 अप्रैल 1946 ) थी a अंग्रेजों अर्थशास्त्री जिनकी विचार have fundamentally प्रभावित the सिद्धान्त और अभ्यास of आधुनिक macroeconomics, and informed the economic policies of governments.
He built on and greatly refined earlier work on the कल्याणकारी of कारोबार चक्र, और is widely माना to be एक of the संस्थापकों of आधुनिक macroeconomics and the most influential economist of the 20th century.
His ideas are the basis for the school of thought known as Keynesian अर्थशास्त्र, as खूब as इसके विभिन्न offshoots.
In many तरीके, subsequent developments in 20th century economics can be viewed as either building on Keynes ' ideas or reacting against them.
In the 1930s, Keynes spearheaded a revolution in economic सोच, overturning the पुरानी विचार of neoclassical अर्थशास्त्र कि आयोजित कि फ़्री बाज़ार होता, in the छोटी to मीडियम पद, automatically provide full employment, as long as workers were flexible in their wage demands.
Keynes instead argued that aggregate demand संकल्पित the overall स्तर of आर्थिक कार्यकलाप, और कि अपर्याप्त कुल माँग could सीसे to prolonged periods of high unemployment.
He advocated the use of fiscal and monetary measures to mitigate the प्रतिकूल प्रभाव of आर्थिक recessions और depressions.
Following the outbreak of the Second World War, keynes 's विचार concerning आर्थिक नीति यहूद adopted by leading Western economies.
In 1942, Keynes was awarded a hereditary peerage as सामन्त keynes of tilton in the काउंटी of ससेक्स.
Keynes died in 1946, but during the 1950s and 1960s the success of Keynesian economics resulted in लगभग सब पूंजीवादी सरकारें adopting its policy recommendations.
Keynes 's influence waned in the 1970s, partly as a result of problems that began to afflict the Anglo-American economies from the start of the decade, and partly because of critiques from मिल्टन फ्राइडमैन और अन्य अर्थशास्त्रियों जो यहूद pessimistic परिचय the क्षमता of सरकारें to विनियमित the कारोबार cycle with fiscal policy.
However, the advent of the global financial crisis in 2007 caused a पुनरुत्थान in keynesian thought.
Keynesian economics provided the theoretical underpinning for आर्थिक नीतियों undertaken in जवाब to the संकट by राष्ट्रपतियों जार्ज W. बुश और बराक ओबामा of the United States, Prime Minister Gordon Brown of the United Kingdom, and other heads of governments.
In 1999, Time magazine included Keynes in their list of the 100 सबसे महत्वपूर्ण और influential लोगों of the 20th सदी, commenting कि : `` उसके कट्टरपंथी विचार कि governments should spend money they do n't have may have saved capitalism. ''
In addition to being an economist, Keynes was also a civil servant, a director of the British Eugenics Society, a निदेशक of the बैंको of इंग्लैण्ड, a संरक्षक of the कला और an आर्ट कलेक्टर, a भाग of the bloomsbury समूह of intellectuals, an सलाहकार to अनेक charitable trusts, a लेखक, a philosopher, a private investor, and a farmer.
इस 1768 parchment ( 612×502 mm ) by jekuthiel sofer emulated the 1675 Ten Commandments at the Amsterdam Esnoga synagogue.
The Ten Commandments, also known as the decalogue, हैं a नियत of biblical कानून relating to आचार और इबादत, which play a fundamental role in Judaism, Islam and Christianity.
They शामिल निर्देश to इबादत तभी परमेश्वर, to रखना the sabbath पावन और prohibitions विरूद्ध idolatry, blasphemy, murder, theft, deception and adultery.
Different groups follow slightly different traditions for interpreting और क्रमांकन उन्हें.
the टेन आयतें appear twice in the Hebrew Bible, in the books of Exodus and Deuteronomy.
According to the story in Exodus, God inscribed them on दो स्टोन टैबलेट, जिससे he दिया to मूसा on माउंट Sinai.
आधुनिक स्कॉलरशिप रै मिला संभावित प्रभाव in hittite और mesopotamian कानून और treaties, लकिन is विभाजित over exactly when the Ten Commandments were written and who wrote them.
The discography of the English alternative rock band The Smiths consists of four studio albums, one extended play ( EP ), one live album, ten compilation albums, twenty singles, one video एल्बम और चौदह म्यूज़िक वीडियो on the अशिष्ट व्यापार, sire और wea रिकार्ड लेबल्स.
the बैंड थी formed in 1982 in मैनचेस्टर by vocalist Morrissey, guitarist Johnny Marr, bass player Andy Rourke and drummer Mike Joyce.
Despite being championed by बीबीसी रेडियो 1 डिस्क jockey जॉन छिलके, the बैंड 's डेब्यू सिंगल, `` Hand in Glove `` ( May 1983 ), failed to chart.
Its follow-up, `` इस आकर्षक man `` ( अक्तूबर 1983 ), मिले साथ critical acclaim and reached number twenty-five on the UK Singles Chart.
The Smiths ' cult status was followed by mainstream success in 1984, as वे पहुँचे क्रमांक बारह in the uk साथ the `` कया अंतर करता it मेक ? `` सिंगल और पहुँचे क्रमांक दो on the UK Albums Chart with their debut album, The Smiths ( 1984 ).
उनके अगला तीन singles सब पहुँचे the शीर्ष बीस of the चार्ट in the uk, helping to consolidate their previous chart success.
The next studio album, Meat Is Murder ( 1985 ), पहुँचे the शीर्ष of the अंग्रेजों चार्ट ; however, the तभी सिंगल to be released from the album, `` That Joke Is n't Funny Anymore `` ( 1985 ), failed to break the UK Top 40.
Returning to form, The Smiths ' next six singles सब पहुँचे the उच्चतर than क्रमांक तीस in the uk और उनके तीसरा एल्बम, The Queen Is Dead ( 1986 ), reached number two in the UK.
Despite the band 's चार्ट कामयाबी, marr बाएँ the समूह in August 1987 due to a strained relationship with Morrissey.
Failing to find a replacement, The Smiths disbanded by the समय उनके फाइनल स्टुडियो एल्बम, strangeways, यहाँ we आइये, थी released in September that year.
Strangeways, Here We Come reached number two in the UK and became the band 's highest-charting रिलीज in the संयुक्त राज्य जब it पहुँचे क्रमांक fifty-five on the बिलबोर्ड 200.
In early 1992, WEA acquired the entire back catalogue of The Smiths and उत्पादित दो compilations – बेहतरीन... i और... बेहतरीन ii – the पहला of जिससे पहुँचे the top of the UK Albums Chart.
WEA released two further singles compilations in 1995 and 2001, with a further compilation, the ध्वनि of the smiths, released in November 2008.
गए साथ the हवा is a अनोखा written by Margaret Mitchell, first published in 1936.
it is प्रायः लगाई in the साहित्यिक sub-genre of the historical romance novel.
However, it has been argued the novel is a `` near miss '' and does not contain सब of the तत्व of the रोमांस विधा, बनाना it बस a historical novel.
The story is नियत in क्लेटन काउंटी, जॉर्जिया, और अटलांटा दौरान the American Civil War and Reconstruction.
It depicts the experiences of स्कारलेट o'hara, the बिगड़े बेटी of a well-to-do वृक्षारोपण मालिक, जो जरूर उपयोग प्रत्येक means at her disposal to come out of the poverty she finds herself in after Sherman 's `` March to the Sea ''.
Margaret Mitchell began writing Gone with the Wind in 1926 to pass the time जबकि recovering इससे an auto-crash चोट कि refused to heal.
In April 1935, Harold Latham of Macmillan, an editor who was looking for new fiction, पढ़ा कया वो था लिखा और देखी कि it could be a best-seller.
After Latham agreed to publish the book, Mitchell worked for another छह महीने checking the ऐतिहासिक सन्दर्भ, और rewrote the opening chapter several times.
Mitchell and her husband जॉन दलदल, a नक़ल एडिटर by trade, edited the final version of the novel.
Mitchell wrote the book 's final moments first, और तब लिखा the कार्यक्रम कि led up to it.
As to what became of her lovers, Rhett and Scarlett, बाद the अनोखा ended, मिशेल किया नहीं जान, और कहा, `` लिये सब i जान, रहेट may have मिला किसी else जो थी कम मुश्किल. ''
Mitchell received the पुलित्जर पुरस्कार लिये fiction for the book in 1937.
the किताब थी adapted into a 1939 American film.
Gone with the Wind is the तभी अनोखा by मिशेल published during her lifetime.
Endodontics ( from the Greek endo `` inside '' ; and odons `` tooth '' ) is one of the dental specialties पहचाना by the अमरीकी दंत संघ, royal कॉलेज of dentists of Canada, and Royal Australasian College of Dental Surgeons, and deals with the tooth pulp and the tissues surrounding the root of a tooth.
Endodontists perform a किस्में of प्रक्रियाओं सहित endodontic चिकित्सा ( commonly ज्ञात as `` रूट कनाल चिकित्सा '' ), endodontic retreatment, surgery, treating cracked teeth, and treating dental trauma.
Root canal therapy is one of the सबसे आम प्रक्रियाओं.
If the pulp ( containing nerves, arterioles, venules, lymphatic ऊतक, और fibrous tissue ) becomes diseased or injured, endodontic treatment is required to save the tooth.
Serial Attached SCSI ( SAS ) is a point-to-point सीरियल प्रोटोकॉल कि चालें आंकड़ा to और from computer storage devices such as hard drives and tape drives.
SAS replaces the पुरानी समानांतर scsi ( सुनाया `` scuzzy '' ) bus technology that first appeared in the mid-1980s.
SAS, like its predecessor, uses the मानक scsi कमांड नियत.
SAS offers backward compatibility साथ second-generation sata drives.
SATA 3 Gbit/s ड्राइव may be कनेक्ट to sas backplanes, लकिन sas ड्राइव can not connect to SATA backplanes.
The T10 technical committee of the International Committee for Information Technology Standards ( incits ) develops और maintains the sas प्रोटोकॉल ; the SCSI Trade Association ( SCSITA ) promotes the technology.

Status as a natural-born citizen of the United States is एक of the पात्रता आवश्यकताएँ स्थापित in the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान लिये चुनाव to the office of President or Vice President.
This requirement was intended to protect the स्वदेश इससे foreign influence.
The Constitution does not define the phrase natural-born citizen, and विभिन्न राय have महरूम offered over समय regarding इसके precise meaning.
a 2011 congressional शोध Service report stated
The natural-born-citizen clause has been mentioned in passing in several निर्णय of the संयुक्त राज्य परम् अदालत और निम्नतर न्यायालयों dealing साथ the सवाल of पात्रता लिये नागरिकता by जनम, लकिन the परम् Court has never directly addressed the question of a specific presidential or vice-presidential candidate 's eligibility as a natural-born citizen.
Kurtis Eugene `` Kurt '' Warner ( born June 22, 1971 ) is a पूर्व अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल खिलाड़ी.
He played quarterback for three National Football League ( एनएफएल ) टीमों : the st. लुई मेढ़ों, the नई यॉर्क दिग्गज, और the Arizona Cardinals.
He was originally signed by the Green Bay पैकर्स as an undrafted फ़्री एजेंट in 1994 after playing college football at Northern Iowa.
warner होता go on to be माना the बेहतरीन undrafted खिलाड़ी of सब समय, following a 12-year career regarded as one of the greatest stories in NFL history.
Warner first attained stardom while playing for the St. Louis Rams from 1998 to 2003, where he won two NFL MVP awards in 1999 और 2001 as खूब as the सुपर कटोरी mvp पुरस्कार in सुपर कटोरी xxxiv.
He led the 2008 Arizona Cardinals to Super कटोरी xliii ( the मताधिकार 's पहला सुपर कटोरी berth ), and owns the three highest single-game passing yardage totals in Super Bowl history.
Warner currently holds the seventh-highest career passer rating of all-time ( 93.7 ), और the third-highest करियर पूर्णता प्रतिशत in एनएफएल इतिहास साथ 65.5 %.
In 13 career playoff games, Warner ranks first all-time in completion प्रतिशत ( 66.5 % ), गज प्रति attempt ( 8.55 ), और दूसरी in passer rating ( 102.8 ).
He also holds the highest completion percentage for a सिंगल खेल दौरान the नियमित ऋतु, at 92.3 प्रतिशत ( 24/26 ), on September 20, 2009, against the Jacksonville Jaguars.
He announced his retirement on जनवरी 29, 2010. < संदर्भ name='cnn 2010-01-29 ' >
Janet Kay ruthven hagan ( ; born may 26, 1953 ) is the जूनियर संयुक्त States Senator from North Carolina, in office since January 2009.
Previously वो परोसा in the उत्तर कैरोलिना Senate from 1999 to 2009.
She is a member of the Democratic Party और is viewed as a मॉडरेट member of her party.
When Hagan defeated Republican incumbent Elizabeth Dole in the 2008 United States Senate election, she became the पहला स्त्री to शिकस्त an लाज़िम स्त्री in a सीनेट चुनाव.
The Heisman Memorial Trophy Award ( usually known colloquially as the Heisman Trophy or the Heisman ), is awarded annually to the खिलाड़ी deemed the सबसे बकाया खिलाड़ी in कॉलेजिएट football.
It was created in 1935 as the Downtown Athletic Club trophy and renamed in 1936 following the death of the Club 's एथलेटिक निदेशक, जॉन heisman ( पूर्व भूरा विश्वविद्यालयों और विश्वविद्यालयों of पेन्सिलवेनिया खिलाड़ी ; सिर फ़ुटबॉल कोच at oberlin कॉलेज, auburn विश्वविद्यालयों, clemson विश्वविद्यालयों, राइस विश्वविद्यालयों, और the विश्वविद्यालयों of पेन्सिलवेनिया ; और फ़ुटबॉल, basketball, and baseball head coach and athletic director at Georgia Tech ).
The award is प्रस्तुत by the heisman ट्रॉफी विश्वास in जल्दी दिसम्बर पहले the postseason bowl games.
It is the oldest of अनेक overall पुरस्कार in कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल, सहित the मैक्सवेल Award, Walter Camp Award, and the AP Player of the Year.
The heisman और the ap खिलाड़ी of the साल हैं the तभी पुरस्कार to सम्मान the सबसे बकाया खिलाड़ी, जबकि the मैक्सवेल पुरस्कार और वाल्टर Camp Award recognize the best player, and the Archie Griffin Award recognizes the most valuable player.
The United राष्ट्र कमांड ( unc ) is the एकीकृत कमांड ढांचा लिये the बहुराष्ट्रीय सैन्य forces supporting the Republic of Korea ( South Korea or ROK ) during and after the Korean War.
After troops of the Democratic People 's Republic of Korea ( North Korea or DPRK ) invaded दक्षिण कोरियाई on जून 25, 1950, the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सुरक्षा परिषद अपनाया रेज़ोल्यूशन 82 कॉलिंग on उत्तर कोरियाई to cease hostilities and withdraw to the 38th parallel.
On June 27, 1950, it adopted रेज़ोल्यूशन 83, recommending कि सदस्यों of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र provide सहायता to the Republic of Korea `` to repel the armed attack and to restore international peace and security to the area ''.
Security Council Resolution 84, adopted on July 7, 1950, recommended that members providing सैन्य शक्तियां और अन्य सहायता to दक्षिण कोरियाई `` मेक ऐसे शक्तियां और अन्य सहायता उपलब्धियाँ to a एकीकृत command under the United States of America ''.
Although the resolutions suggested the शक्तियां अंतर्गत the unc यहूद `` संयुक्त राष्ट्र शक्तियां '', और संयुक्त राष्ट्र itself could be माना a belligerent, in practice the United Nations exercised no control over the combat forces, which were controlled by the United States.
Most observers concluded that the forces under the UNC यहूद नहीं in विधि संयुक्त राष्ट्र सैनिकों, और the अधिनियमों of the UNC were not the acts of the United Nations.
The UNC can be regarded as an alliance of नेशनल सेना, ऑपरेटिंग अंतर्गत the सामूहिक right of self-defense.
On August 29, 1950, the अंग्रेजों राष्ट्रमंडल 's 27th infantry ब्रिगेड arrived at Busan to join the UNC, which until then included only ROK and U.S. forces.
The 27th Brigade स्थानांतरित into the naktong River line west of Daegu.
Troop units from other countries of the UN followed in rapid उत्तराधिकार ; ऑस्ट्रेलिया, belgian संयुक्त राष्ट्र कमांड, कनाडा, कोलंबिया, इथियोपिया, फ़्रांस, यूनानियों, ध्वज, the Netherlands, New Zealand, the Philippines, Thailand and Turkey.
The Union of दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी provided एयर इकाई जिससे लड़ा alongside the air forces of other member nations.
Denmark, इण्डिया, नार्वे, और स्वीडन provided medical units.
Italy provided a हॉस्पिटल, भी हालांकि it थी नहीं a un member.
The United राष्ट्र कमांड और the chinese-north कोरियाई कमांड हस्ताक्षरित the Korean Armistice Agreement on 27 July 1953, ending the heavy fighting.
The armistice agreement established the Military Armistice आयोग ( मैक ), consisting of प्रतिनिधि of the two signatories, to supervise the implementation of the armistice terms.
The North Korean-Chinese MAC has been replaced by panmumjon प्रतिनिधि अंतर्गत विशेष उत्तर कोरियाई management.
Regular meetings have महरूम रोका, हालांकि ड्यूटी अधिकारियों of संयुक्त सुरक्षा क्षेत्रफल, commonly ज्ञात as the Truce Village of Panmunjom, from each side meet regularly.
Lincoln Heights is an अमरीकी परिवार नाटक टेलीविज़न श्रेणी परिचय एडी सटन, a मिशन विस्टा पुलिस अधिकारी जो चालें his family back to his old neighborhood, Lincoln Heights, to start a new life and to help out his old neighborhood.
It is a dangerous place to raise a family, and through the many trials the परिवार goes through, वे जल्द सीख कि settling in is नहीं as आसान as it seems.
While Officer Sutton struggles to cope with every day life as a street cop in Los एंजिल्स, उसके बच्चे कोशिश to अनुरूप in at उनके नई स्कूलों और साथ उनके नई पड़ोसी.
The show premiered जनवरी 8, 2007 on the एबीसी परिवार संजाल with 13 episodes ordered for the first season.
It was स्वीकृत लिये a दूसरी ऋतु, which premiered September 4, 2007.
Vanessa Hudgens ' song, Say OK था महरूम प्रयुक्त in a वाणिज्यिक to प्रचार the second season.
To promote the third season, they showed क्लिप्स of cassie और चार्ल्स 's संबंध to the सोंग, crush by the अमरीकी आइडल 's seventh season runner-up, David Archuleta.
To प्रचार ऋतु 4, वे 're using the सोंग, हिमस्खलन by Marie Digby.
The show 's theme song was written and performed by bassist Stanley Clarke और singer-songwriter blaire reinhard.
On January 29, 2010, ABC Family announced the रद्दीकरण of the श्रेणी बाद चार seasons.
a ईसाई denomination is an identifiable धार्मिक body under a common name, structure, and doctrine within Christianity.
In the परंपरागत परंपरा, चर्च हैं विभाजित प्रायः साथ जातीय और linguistic lines, into separate churches and traditions.
Technically, divisions between one group और another हैं पारिभाषित by doctrine and church authority.
Issues such as the nature of Jesus, the authority of अपोस्टोलिक उत्तराधिकार, eschatology, और papal primacy पृथक एक denomination from another.
The रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर is the largest denomination साथ over 1.1 अरब सदस्यों, over हाफ of सब ईसाइयों विश्वव्यापी, बनाना it the largest denomination for any religion worldwide ( although the church does not view itself as a denomination, but as the original pre-denominational church ).
Protestant denominations comprise roughly 38–39 % of Christians worldwide, और साथ the catholics, protestants, anglicans, और अन्य closely सम्बन्धित denominations comprise पश्चिमी christianity.
The Eastern Orthodox Church, Oriental परंपरागत चर्च और the assyrian गिरिजाघर of the ईस्ट are considered Eastern Christian denominations.
Western Christian denominations prevail in Western Europe and इसके पूर्व colonies.
Eastern Christian denominations हैं represented ज़्यादातर in पूर्वी Europe, the Middle East and North Africa.
Christians have various doctrines परिचय the गिरिजाघर, the देह of वफादार कि वे मानना थी स्थापित by Jesus Christ, and how the divine church corresponds to Christian denominations.
Both the Catholics and the Eastern Orthodox consider प्रत्येक of themselves solely to faithfully represent the एक पावन कैथोलिक और अपोस्टोलिक Church to the exclusion of the other.
Protestants separated इससे the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर क्युकी of theologies and practices that they considered to be in violation of their interpretation.
Generally, members of the various denominations acknowledge each other as Christians, at least to the extent कि वे have mutually पहचाना baptisms और acknowledge historically परंपरागत दृश्य सहित the देवत्व of यीशु और doctrines of sin and salvation, even though doctrinal and ecclesiological obstacles hinder full communion between churches.
Since the reforms surrounding वेटिकन ii, the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर रै referred to प्रोटोस्टेंट समुदायों as `` denominations '', while reserving the term `` church '' for apostolic churches, including the Eastern Orthodox ( see subsistit in and branch theory ).
There are however some non-denominational ईसाइयों जो do नहीं follow कोई particular branch.
The panda ( ailuropoda melanoleuca, lit.
`` black and white cat-foot '' ), भी ज्ञात as the दानव पांडा to फर्क it इससे the unrelated red panda, is a bear native to central-western and south western China.
It is easily recognized by the large, distinctive black patches around इसके आँखें, over the कानों, और across its round body.
Though it belongs to the order Carnivora, the panda 's आहार is 99 % बाँसुरी.
Pandas in the wild will occasionally eat other grasses, जंगली tubers, or भी मांस in the रूप of पक्षियों, rodents or carrion.
In captivity, they may receive honey, eggs, fish, yams, shrub leaves, संतरे, or केले along with specially prepared food.
The giant panda lives in a few mountain ranges in सेंट्रल चीन, मुख्यतः in सिचुआन प्रांत, लकिन भी in the shaanxi and Gansu provinces.
As a result of farming, deforestation and other development, the पांडा रै महरूम चलित आउट of the lowland क्षेत्रों जहाँ it once lived.
The panda is a conservation reliant endangered प्रजाति.
A 2007 report shows 239 pandas जीना in captivity अंदर चीन और another 27 outside the country.
Wild population estimates vary ; one अनुमान shows कि वहीँ हैं परिचय 1,590 individuals जीना in the wild, while a 2006 study via DNA analysis estimated that this figure could be as high as 2,000 to 3,000.
Some reports also show that the number of pandas in the जंगली is on the वृद्धि.
However, the IUCN does not believe there is पर्याप्त certainty yet to reclassify the species from Endangered to Vulnerable.
While the ड्रैगन रै प्रायः परोसा as चीन 's नेशनल emblem, internationally the panda appears at least as commonly.
As such, it is becoming widely used within China in international contexts, लिये उदाहरण the पाँच fuwa mascots of the Beijing Olympics.
The Kite Runner is a 2007 American drama film directed by मार्क forster आधारित on the अनोखा of the same name by Khaled Hosseini.
It tells the story of Amir, a well-to-do boy from the वज़ीर akbar खान ज़िला of काबुल, जो is tormented by the guilt of abandoning उसके dost हसन, the son of his father 's Hazara servant.
The story is set against a backdrop of tumultuous events, from the fall of the monarchy in Afghanistan through the Soviet military हस्तक्षेप, the द्रव्यमान exodus of अफगान शरणार्थियों to पाकिस्तानी और the संयुक्त राज्य, और the तालिबान regime.
Though most of the film is set in Afghanistan, these parts were mostly shot in Kashgar, चीन, due to the खतरों of फिल्मांकन in अफगानिस्तान at the समय.
The बहुमत of the फिल्मी 's संवाद is in जमींदारी, साथ the remainder spoken in English.
The child अभिनेताओं हैं देशी अध्यक्षों, लकिन अनेक वयस्क अभिनेताओं had to learn Dari.
Filming लपेटा up on दिसम्बर 21, 2006, और the film was expected to be released on November 2, 2007.
However, after concern for the safety of the young actors in the फिल्मी due to fears of हिंसक reprisals to the यौन प्रकृति of कुछ दृश्यों in जिससे वे appear, इसके रिलीज तिथि थी धकेल वापस छह सप्ताह to दिसम्बर 14, 2007.
The Kite धावक थी released on DVD on March 25, 2008.
A HD DVD रिलीज थी घोषित लिये the वही तिथि, लकिन थी canceled following the format 's demise.
The film was nominated लिये the सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन विदेशी Language Film in 2007.
The film 's score by Alberto Iglesias थी मनोनीत लिये बेहतरीन असली स्कोर at the सुनहरी ग्लोब्स और the अकादमी Awards.
the वैधता of कैनबिस varies from country to country.
Possession of cannabis is illegal in सबसे देशों और रै महरूम चूंकि the शुरूआत of फैली कैनबिस निषेध in the late 1930s.
However, many countries have decriminalized the possession of small quantities of cannabis, particularly in उत्तर अमेरिका, दक्षिण अमेरिका और यूरोपीय.
Furthermore, possession is legal or effectively legal in the Netherlands, North Korea and would be in the U.S. states of कोलोराडो और वॉशिंगटन if it यहूद नहीं लिये संघीय विधि, जिससे governs persons in all states.
The medicinal use of cannabis is legal in a number of देशों, सहित कनाडा, the चेक गणतंत्र and Israel.
While federal law in the United States bans all sale and possession of cannabis, enforcement varies widely at the state level and some राज्य have स्थापित औषधीय मारिजुआना कार्यक्रम in कि खण्डन संघीय विधि ; दो राज्य ( कोलोराडो और वॉशिंगटन ) have repealed their laws prohibiting the recreational use of cannabis and replaced them with a regulatory regime, also contrary to federal statute.
कुछ देशों have कानून कि हैं नहीं as vigorously prosecuted as अन्य लकिन, apart from the countries that offer access to medical marijuana, most countries have various penalties ranging from lenient to very severe.
Some infractions are taken more seriously in some countries than अन्य in लिहाज़ to the cultivation, उपयोग, कब्ज़ा or ट्रांसफ़र of कैनबिस for recreational use.
A few jurisdictions have lessened penalties for possession of small quantities of cannabis, making it दंडनीय by confiscation और a ठीक, बल्कि than कारावास.
Some jurisdictions/ drug courts use अनिवार्य उपचार कार्यक्रम लिये यंग or बारंबार उपयोक्ता, साथ freedom from narcotic drugs as the goal and a few jurisdictions permit cannabis use for medicinal purposes.
There are also changes in a अधिक प्रतिबंधक direction as in Canada.
Drug tests to detect cannabis are increasingly common in many देशों और have resulted in कारावास वाक्य और people losing their jobs.
However, simple possession can carry long jail वाक्य in कुछ देशों, विशेषकर in भाग of ईस्ट एशिया और southeast एशिया where the sale of cannabis may lead to a sentence of life in prison or even execution.
Loxahatchee is a जातियाँ स्तिथ in ताड़ Beach County, Florida, United States.
It is located in the क्षेत्रों उत्तर of वेलिंगटन और वेस्ट और उत्तरपश्चिम of royal ताड़ बीच, फ्लोरिडा और लगभग west of West Palm Beach.
loxahatchee is भी the नाम of the पोस्ट दफ्तर that serves this area, which is under the zip code of 33470.
The name Loxahatchee अर्थात् `` कछुआ नदी. ''
Loxahatchee is located within the Indian Trails सुधार ज़िला और the loxahatchee groves जल कंट्रोल ज़िला.
Lion देश safari, a drive-through safari पार्क, is located in Loxahatchee.
In 2006, the state of Florida स्वीकृत incorporation of भाग of loxahatchee as the कस्बा of loxahatchee groves to become the 38th नगरपालिका in Palm Beach County.
the प्रमुख कारण लिये incorporating थी to बेहतर protect the area from encroaching growth and to preserve the rural character of the neighborhood.
शायद the सबसे ग्रामीण क्षेत्रफल भीतर a बंद निकटता to West Palm Beach, with lot sizes range from 1-20 acres.
Along with The Acreage, it is notable लिये ढीला जमीन प्रतिबंध और the देशी और exotic एनिमल presence is quite notable.

The Canadian Citizenship Test is a test, administered by नागरिकता और आव्रजन कनाडा ( सीआईसी ), कि is जरूरी लिये सब आवेदकों लिये कनाडाई नागरिकता who are aged between 18 and 54 and who meet the basic requirements for citizenship.
The test is available in दोनो फ्रेंच और अंग्रेज़ी, the आधिकारिक languages of Canada.
Renaissance क्रूज़, originally संस्थापित in 1989 स्वामित्व by fearnley & eger rederi in ओस्लो - नार्वे, बाद खरीदा by Edward Rudner ( founder of Alamo Car Rental ) as the company faltered during the Gulf War.
They operated year-round cruise itineraries to the भूमध्यसागरीय, the यूनानी isles, tahiti और the दक्षिण प्रशांत, उत्तरी यूरोपीय और Scandinavia.
The company ceased operations on 25 सितंबर 2001 और accommodated up to 220,000 अतिथि in 2000.
While the company had been in poor वित्तीय स्वास्थ्य लिये काफी कुछ समय, the आर्थिक मनाही resulting इससे the सितंबर 11th terrorist attacks are credited with the demise of this cruise line.
The fleet is listed under सूची of क्रूज जहाजों.
It was headquartered in फोर्ट lauderdale, Florida.
epithelium is एक of the चार मौलिक प्रकार of एनिमल ऊतक, along with connective tissue, muscle tissue and nervous tissue.
Epithelial tissues लकीर the कैविटी और सतहों of structures throughout the body, and also form many glands.
Functions of epithelial कोशिकाएं शामिल स्राव, चयनात्मक absorption, protection, transcellular transport and detection of sensation.
In Greek `` ἐπί '' ( `` epi '' ) अर्थात् `` on '' or `` upon '', और `` θηλή '' ( `` thēlē '' ) means `` nipple ''.
Epithelial layers are avascular, so they must receive nourishment via diffusion of substances इससे the underlying संयोजी tissue, through the basement membrane.
epithelia can भी be व्यवस्थित into क्लस्टर of cells that function as exocrine and endocrine glands.
Kent E. Hovind ( born January 15, 1953 ) is an अमरीकी यंग धरती creationist.
Hovind has spoken on creation science and has aimed to convince श्रोता to अस्वीकृत theories of एवोल्यूशन, भूभौतिकी, और cosmology in एहसान of उसके निर्वचन of the Genesis creation narrative from the Bible.
Hovind 's views are contradicted by scientific evidence and some of his विचार have भी महरूम criticized by यंग धरती creationist संगठन ऐसे as जवाब in उत्पत्ति.
Hovind established the सृष्टि विज्ञान इंजीलवाद in 1991, और अक्सर spoke on यंग धरती creationism at seminars at private schools and churches, debates, and on radio and television broadcasts.
Since January 2007, Hovind has been serving a ten-year prison sentence बाद होने convicted of 58 संघीय रिश्तो, सहित 12 कर offenses, एक गिनती of obstructing federal agents, and 45 counts of structuring cash transactions.
He is incarcerated at the संघीय correctional Institution at Berlin, New Hampshire.
Bride with बिंदी सजा माथे
A bindi (, from Sanskrit bindu, अर्थ `` a बूँद, छोटी कण, बिन्दु '' ), or a pottu/bottu ( in तमिल, तेलुगु, और मलयालम ) is a माथे decoration worn in South Asia ( particularly India, Bangladesh, Nepal, Sri Lanka and Mauritius ) and Southeast Asia.
Traditionally it is a bright dot of red color applied in the center of the forehead close to the eyebrows, लकिन it can भी consist of a चिह्न or टुकड़ा of आभूषण worn at इस location.
The New York gubernatorial election of 2010 was held on Tuesday, November 2, 2010, to elect the राज्यपाल of नई यॉर्क, to serve a four-year term that began in January 2011.
Incumbent Democratic Governor David Paterson, elected as Lieutenant Governor in 2006 as the कार्यशील mate of पूर्व राज्यपाल एलियट स्पिट्जर, chose not to run for a full-term.
On November 2, New York Attorney सामान्य और डेमोक्रेट एंड्रयू cuomo पराजित रिपब्लिकन कार्ल paladino.
Green Party candidate Howie Hawkins received over 57,000 votes, allowing the New यॉर्क ग्रीन पार्टी to be सूचीबद्ध on the बैलट लिये the next 4 years.
The main cast of Dragon बॉल at the समाप्त of the manga.
The Dragon Ball manga and anime series features an extensive डाल of वर्ण निर्मित by अकिरा toriyama.
The series takes place in a fictional ब्रह्मांड, the वही as toriyama 's पिछला श्रेणी dr. slump, और फ़ॉलो the adventures of martial कलाकार बेटे goku इससे बाल्यकाल to adulthood as he searches for the seven spheres known as the Dragon Balls, used to summon a wish-granting dragon.
During the course of the story, he encounters allies such as Bulma, Yamcha, Kuririn और trunks, विरोधियों ऐसे as tenshinhan, piccolo और vegeta, और दुश्मनों ऐसे as freeza और Cell.
While many of the वर्ण हैं इंसानो साथ superhuman शक्ति and/or अलौकिक abilities, the cast also includes anthropomorphic animals and later, extraterrestrial lifeforms.
the श्रेणी भी शामिल depictions of the afterlife, with several characters being gods that govern the universe.

the comanche हैं a मैदान भारतीय जनजाति जिनकी ऐतिहासिक territory, ज्ञात as comancheria, consisted of उपस्थित दिन पूर्वी नई मैक्सिको, southern Colorado, northeastern Arizona, southern Kansas, all of Oklahoma, and most of northwest Texas.
The Comanche people are नामांकित in the federally पहचाना Comanche Nation, in Oklahoma.
historically, the comanches यहूद hunter-gatherers with a horse culture.
There may have been as many as 45,000 comanches in the लेट 18th सदी.
Today, the comanche स्वदेश comanche जनजातीय नामांकन संख्याएँ 15,191 साथ लगभग 7,763 members residing in the Lawton – Fort Sill and surrounding areas of Southwest Oklahoma.
The Comanche Nation Homecoming powwow is आयोजित annually in walters, ओक्लाहोमा in mid-july.
The Comanche spoke the Comanche language, a Numic language of the uto-aztecan परिवार, sometimes वर्गीकृत as a shoshone dialect ; however, तभी परिचय 1 % of Comanches speak it today.

It is set in the fictitious कस्बा of starkfield, मैसाचुसेट्स.
The novel थी adapted into a फिल्मी, ethan Frome, in 1993.
Times Square Studios ( TSS ) is an American television studio located in the टाइम्स वर्गाकार पड़ोस of the मैनहटन बरो of नई यॉर्क नगर, नई York.
The studio is बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the उत्पादन घर of एबीसी न्यूज ' शुभ morning अमेरिका ( जीएमए ), a morning news and talk program and segments for GMA on ABC News Now.

Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink sold in स्टोर्स, रेस्तरां, और वेंडिंग मशीने in प्रत्येक देश मगर Cuba and North Korea.
It is produced by The Coca-Cola Company of Atlanta, Georgia, and is प्रायः referred to बस as कोक ( a पंजीकृत ट्रेडमार्क of the coca-cola कम्पनी in the संयुक्त राज्य since March 27, 1944 ).
originally intended as a पेटेंट आयुर्विज्ञान जब it थी invented in the लेट 19th सदी by जॉन pemberton, coca-cola थी खरीदा आउट by बिजनेसमैन asa griggs Candler, whose marketing tactics led Coke to its dominance of the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century.
The company produces concentrate, which is then sold to licensed coca-cola bottlers throughout the world.
The bottlers, जो थाम territorially विशेष अनुबंध साथ the कम्पनी, उपज समाप्त product in cans and bottles from the concentrate in combination with filtered water and sweeteners.
The bottlers then sell, distribute and merchandise Coca-Cola to retail stores and वेंडिंग मशीने.
Such bottlers include coca-cola उद्यमों, जिससे is the largest सिंगल coca-cola bottler in North America and western Europe.
The Coca-Cola Company also sells concentrate लिये सोडा स्रोतों to प्रमुख रेस्तरां and food service distributors.
the coca-cola कम्पनी रै, on अवसर, introduced other cola drinks under the Coke brand name.
The most common of these is Diet Coke, with others including Caffeine-Free Coca-Cola, Diet Coke caffeine-free, coca-cola चेरी, coca-cola शून्य, coca-cola वैनिला, and special versions with lemon, lime or coffee.
Based on interbrand 's बेहतरीन वैश्विक ब्रांड 2011, coca-cola was the world 's most valuable brand.
प्रकार of bar-lines
In musical notation, a bar ( or measure ) is a segment of time defined by a given number of बीट्स, प्रत्येक of जिससे हैं आबंटित a particular नोट मान.
Dividing music into bars provides regular reference अंक to pin पाइंट स्थितियाँ भीतर a टुकड़ा of music.
It also makes लिखा म्यूज़िक easier to follow, चूंकि प्रत्येक बार of staff symbols can be read and played as a batch.
Typically, a piece consists of several bars of the same length, and in आधुनिक musical संकेतन the क्रमांक of बीट्स in प्रत्येक बार is निर्दिष्ट at the शुरूआत of the स्कोर by the शीर्ष क्रमांक of a समय हस्ताक्षर ( such as 3/4 ), while the bottom number indicates the note value of the beat ( the beat has a quarter note value in the 3/4 example ).
The word bar is more common in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी, और the शब्द माप is अधिक आम in अमरीकी English, although musicians generally understand both usages.
In American English, although the words bar and measure are often used interchangeably the सही उपयोग of the शब्द 'bar ' refers तभी to the लंबवत लकीर itself, जबकि the word 'measure ' refers to the beats contained between bars.
In international usage, it is equally correct to speak of bar numbers and measure numbers, e.g. ‘bars 9–16’ or ‘mm. 9–16’.
Along the same लाइनों, it is हिकमत to आरक्षित the abbreviated form ‘bb.
3–4’ etc. for beats तभी ; बार चाहिए be referred to by name in full.
The first metrically complete measure within a piece of म्यूज़िक is पुकारा ‘bar 1’ or ‘m. 1’.
When the piece begins with an anacrusis ( an incomplete measure at the सिर of a टुकड़ा of म्यूज़िक ), ‘bar 1’ or ‘m. 1’ is the following measure.
The 19.9 MW gemasolar सौर संयंत्र in स्पेन सुविधाएँ 15 hours of storage and can supply power 24 hours a day.
Solar energy, radiant light and heat इससे the सूर्य, रै महरूम harnessed by humans since ancient times using a range of ever-evolving technologies.
Solar energy technologies शामिल सौर हीटिंग, सौर photovoltaics, सौर थर्मल विद्युत, सौर वास्तुकला और कृत्रिम photosynthesis, which can make considerable contributions to solving some of the most urgent energy problems the world now faces.
Solar technologies are broadly characterized as either passive सौर or क्रियाशील solar depending on the way they capture, convert and distribute solar energy.
Active solar तकनीकों शामिल the use of photovoltaic panels and solar thermal collectors to harness the energy.
Passive solar techniques include orienting a building to the Sun, selecting materials with favorable thermal द्रव्यमान or लाइट dispersing गुण, और डिजाइनिंग स्पेसेस कि naturally circulate air.
In 2011, the International Energy Agency said that `` the development of सस्ती, inexhaustible और साफ सौर उर्जा technologies होगा have विशाल longer-term benefits.
It will increase countries’ energy security through reliance on an स्वदेशी, inexhaustible और ज़्यादातर import-independent संसाधन, बढ़ाएँ स्थिरता, reduce pollution, lower the costs of mitigating climate change, and keep fossil fuel prices lower than otherwise.
These लाभ हैं वैश्विक.
Hence the additional costs of the incentives for early deployment चाहिए be माना सीखना निवेश ; वे जरूर be बुद्धिमानी खर्च और need to be widely shared ''.
Primary care may be provided in जातियाँ स्वास्थ्य केंद्रों.
Primary care is the health परवाह दिए by a स्वास्थ्य परवाह प्रदाता.
Typically this provider acts as the principal point of परामर्श लिये मरीजों भीतर a स्वास्थ्य परवाह प्रणाली और निर्देशांक other specialists that the patient may need.
Such a professional can be a primary care physician, such as a general practitioner or family physician, or depending on the मोहल्ले, स्वास्थ्य प्रणाली संगठन, और रोगी 's discretion, वे may देखिए a फार्मासिस्ट, a चिकित्सक सहायक, a नर्स practitioner, a नर्स ( ऐसे as in the संयुक्त किंगडम ), a नैदानिक अधिकारी ( such as in parts of Africa ), or an Ayurvedic or other traditional medicine professional ( such as in parts of Asia ).
Depending on the प्रकृति of the स्वास्थ्य कंडीशन, patients may then be referred for secondary or tertiary care.
`` Ocean Avenue '' is a song recorded by अमरीकी पॉप पंक समूह yellowcard.
It was released in February 2004 as the दूसरी सिंगल इससे Ocean Avenue and the third track.
It is known लिये bringing उन्हें into the मुख्यधारा, as it received numerous spins on MTV and increasing radio airplay.
Ocean Avenue is a street in Jacksonville, Florida, the band 's stomping grounds निकट उनके ऊँची स्कूल, डगलस एंडरसन स्कूल of the Arts, and another street mentioned in the song, Cherry Street.
The नाम of समंदर एवेन्यू in jacksonville is actually Beach Boulevard.
They left their असली आधार पीछे जब वे स्थानांतरित to Los Angeles.
The song was featured on the much म्यूज़िक संकलन एल्बम बिग चमकदार धुनें 9.
A psychiatrist is a चिकित्सक जो specializes in psychiatry.
A मनोचिकित्सक specializes in the treatment of mental disorders.
Psychiatrists are authorized to prescribe medicine, conduct शारीरिक examinations, अनुक्रम और interpret प्रयोगशाला परीक्षण, उपयोग मनोचिकित्सा और may अनुक्रम दिमाग इमेजिंग studies such as computed tomography ( CT/CAT Scan ), magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ), and positron emission tomography ( PET ) scanning.
Within the framework of the World Health Organization 's ( WHO ) definition of health as a state of complete physical, mental and social well-being, and not merely the अनुपस्थिति of बीमारी or infirmity, reproductive स्वास्थ्य, or यौन health/hygiene, पता the reproductive प्रक्रियाओं, कृत्यों और system at all stages of life.
Reproductive स्वास्थ्य, इसलिए, implies कि लोगों हैं समर्थ to have a जिम्मेदार, संतोषजनक और safer sex जीवन और कि वे have the capability to reproduce and the freedom to decide if, when and how often to do so.
One interpretation of this implies that men and women ought to be सूचित of और to have अभिगम to सुरक्षित, प्रभावी, सस्ती और स्वीकार्य विधि of जनम कंट्रोल ; भी अभिगम to उचित स्वास्थ्य परवाह सेवाएं of यौन, reproductive आयुर्विज्ञान और क्रियान्वयन of स्वास्थ्य शिक्षा कार्यक्रम to stress the importance of women to go safely through pregnancy and childbirth could provide couples with the best chance of having a healthy infant.
On the अन्य हाथ individuals do फेस inequalities in reproductive health services.
inequalities vary आधारित on socioeconomic औकात, शिक्षा स्तर, आयु, नस्ल, धर्म, and resources available in their environment.
It is possible for example, that low आय individuals कमी the संसाधन लिये उचित स्वास्थ्य सेवाएं और the ज्ञान to जान कया is उचित for maintaining reproductive health.
According to the WHO, `` Reproductive and sexual ill-health accounts for 20 % of the वैश्विक बोझ of ill-health लिये महिलाओं, और 14 % for men. ''
Reproductive health is a part of यौन और reproductive स्वास्थ्य और rights.
