Core 2 is a brand encompassing a range of Intel 's consumer 64-bit x86-64 single-, दुआl-, और quad-core microprocessors आधारित on the कोर microarchitecture.
The single- और dual-core मॉडल हैं single- die, whereas the quad-core मॉडल comprise दो मरता, प्रत्येक containing two cores, packaged in a multi-chip module.
The introduction of Core 2 relegated the Pentium brand to the mid-range market, and reunified लैपटॉप और डेस्कटॉप cpu लाइनों, जिससे previously था been divided into the Pentium 4, Pentium D, and Pentium M brands.
The Core 2 brand was introduced on 27 July 2006, comprising the सोलो ( single-core ), duo ( dual-core ), क्वाड ( quad-core ), और in 2007, the चरम ( दुआl- or quad-core cpu लिये enthusiasts ) subbrands.
Intel Core 2 processors with vPro प्रौद्योगिकी ( designed लिये व्यवसायों ) शामिल the dual-core and quad-core branches.
The Super Bowl is the annual championship game of the National Football League ( NFL ), the highest level of professional American फ़ुटबॉल in the संयुक्त राज्य, culminating a ऋतु कि begins in the लेट गर्मियाँ of the पिछला पंचांग year.
The Super Bowl uses रोमन numerals to पहचानो each game, rather than the year in which it is held.
For उदाहरण, सुपर कटोरी i थी निभाई on जनवरी 15, 1967, following the 1966 नियमित ऋतु, जबकि सुपर Bowl XLVII was played on February 3, 2013, following the 2012 season.
The game was created as भाग of a विलय अनुबंध between the एनएफएल और इसके then-rival league, the American Football League ( AFL ).
It was agreed that the two leagues ' चैंपियन टीमों होता खेल in an afl–nfl संसार चैंपियनशिप खेल जबतक the merger was to officially begin in 1970.
After the merger, each league was redesignated as a `` conference ``, and the खेल थी तब निभाई between the सम्मेलन champions.
Currently, the National Football Conference ( NFC ) leads the series with 25 wins to 22 विन्स लिये the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( afc ).
The day on which the Super Bowl is played, now माना by कुछ a de facto अमरीकी नेशनल अवकाश, is पुकारा `` सुपर कटोरी Sunday ``.
It is the second-largest day for u.S. खाना खपत, बाद थैंक्सगिविंग Day.
In addition, the Super Bowl रै अक्सर महरूम the सबसे देखी American television broadcast of the year.
Super Bowl XLV, played in 2011, became the most-watched अमरीकी टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम in इतिहास, आरेखण an औसत दर्शक of 111 लाख दर्शक और लेने over the स्पॉट आयोजित by the previous year 's Super Bowl, which itself had taken over the # 1 spot held for twenty-eight years by the final episode of M*A*S*H.
The Super Bowl is also among the most watched sporting events in the world, लगभग सब होने उत्तर अमरीकी ऑडियंस, और is दूसरी to संघ फ़ुटबॉल ’s यूईएफए champions लीग final as the most watched annual sporting event worldwide.
क्युकी of इसके ऊँची viewership, वाणिज्यिक airtime दौरान the Super Bowl broadcast is the most expensive of the year.
Due to the high cost of investing in विज्ञापन on the सुपर कटोरी, कंपनियाँ regularly develop their most expensive advertisements for this broadcast.
As a result, watching और discussing the ब्रॉडकास्ट 's commercials has become a significant aspect of the event.
In addition, many popular singers and musicians have performed दौरान the इवेंट 's pre-game और मध्यांतर ceremonies because of the exposure.
Fiona is a feminine दिए name.
The name Fiona was invented, and first प्रयुक्त, by the स्कॉटिश कवि जेम्स macpherson ( 1736–96 ), लेखक of the ossian poems, which he claimed were translations from ancient Gaelic sources ( sources, when challenged, he never produced ).
The name was subsequently used as a pseudonym by विलियम शार्प ( 1855–1905 ), जो authored अनेक रोमांटिक works under the name `` Fiona Macleod ''.
The name has since become लोकप्रिय in इंग्लैण्ड, स्कॉटलैंड और Ireland.
The name is माना to be a latinised रूप of the गैलिक word fionn, meaning `` white '', `` fair ''.
The name Fiona is also sometimes used as an anglicisation of the irish-language नाम fíona, हालांकि ये names हैं वरना unrelated ( as fíona is derived from an element meaning `` vine '' ).
There is also a modern tendency to equate the प्रामाणिक स्कॉटिश गैलिक feminine नाम Fionnghal with Fiona.
The name Fiona is उठती in लोकप्रियता विशेषकर in जर्मनी -speaking countries.
फिओना थी the 49th सबसे लोकप्रिय name for baby girls born in 2008 in Germany.
Fiona थी tied लिये तीसरा प्लेस in the रैंकिंग of सबसे लोकप्रिय names लिये baby girls born in the tiny principality of Liechtenstein in 2008.
The name was the 347th most popular name for girls born in the संयुक्त राज्य in 2008, where it has ranked among the top 1,000 most popular names for girls since 1990 and among the top 500 since 1999.
The name फिओना रै महरूम विशेषकर लोकप्रिय लिये लड़कियों of एशियाई or प्रशांत islander descent in New York City, where Fiona ranked as the ninth most popular name for girls from those groups in 2007.
Many भाषाएं हैं प्रयुक्त, or historically have been used in the United States.
The most commonly प्रयुक्त भाषा is English.
There are भी अनेक भाषाएं स्वदेशी to उत्तर अमेरिका or to U.S. states or holdings in the Pacific region.
Languages brought to the country by colonists or immigrants from Europe, Asia, or other parts of the संसार मेक up a विशाल portion of the भाषाएं फिलहाल प्रयुक्त ; अनेक भाषाएं, सहित creoles और sign languages, have also developed in the United States.
लगभग 337 भाषाएं हैं बोला or हस्ताक्षरित by the population, of which 176 are indigenous to the area.
Fifty-two भाषाएं formerly बोला in the देश 's territory are now extinct.
The किस्में of अंग्रेज़ी बोला in the संयुक्त States is known as American English.
English is the de facto national language of the United States, with 80 % of the जनसांख्यिकी claiming it as a माँ जीभ, और कुछ 95 % claiming to speak it `` well '' or `` very well ''.
However, no आधिकारिक भाषा exists at the federal level.
There have been several proposals to make English the नेशनल भाषा in amendments to आव्रजन सुधार बिल्स, लकिन none of ये बिल्स has become law with the amendment intact.
The situation is quite varied at the state and territorial levels, with some states mirroring the federal policy of adopting no official language in a de jure क्षमता, अन्य adopting अंग्रेज़ी अलोन, अन्य officially adopting अंग्रेज़ी as खूब as लोकल भाषाएं, और स्टिल अन्य adopting a policy of de facto bilingualism.
स्पेनी is the दूसरी सबसे आम भाषा in the country, and is spoken by over 12 % of the population.
The United States holds the world 's fifth largest spanish-speaking जनसांख्यिकी, outnumbered तभी by मैक्सिको, स्पेन, कोलंबिया, और Argentina.
Throughout the Southwestern United States, long-established spanish-speaking समुदायों coexist साथ विशाल संख्याएँ of अधिक हाल hispanophone immigrants.
Although many new Latin American आप्रवासियों हैं कम than धाराप्रवाह in अंग्रेज़ी, nearly सब second-generation हिस्पैनिक अमेरिकी बोलो English fluently, while only about half still speak Spanish.
According to the 2000 US census, people of जर्मनी ancestry मेक up the largest सिंगल जातीय group in the United States, and the German language ranks fifth.
Italian, पॉलिश, और फ्रेंच हैं स्टिल widely बोला among populations descending इससे आप्रवासियों इससे those देशों in the early 20th century, but the use of these languages is dwindling as the older generations die.
Russian is भी बोला by अप्रवासी populations.
Tagalog and Vietnamese have over एक लाख अध्यक्षों प्रत्येक in the संयुक्त राज्य, लगभग entirely within recent immigrant populations.
Both भाषाएं, साथ साथ the किस्में of the चाइनीज भाषा, जापानी, और कोरियाई, हैं अभी प्रयुक्त in चुनावों in Alaska, California, Hawaii, Illinois, New York, Texas, and Washington.
Native American languages are spoken in smaller pockets of the country, but these populations are अवरोहण, और the भाषाएं हैं लगभग never widely प्रयुक्त बाहर of रिज़र्वेशन.
Hawaiian, although having few native speakers, is an official भाषा साथ साथ अंग्रेज़ी at the राज्य स्तर in हवाई.
The state सरकारी of louisiana offers services and documents in French, as does New Mexico in Spanish.
Besides English, Spanish, French, German, Navajo and other Native American languages, all other languages are usually learned from immigrant पूर्वजो कि आए बाद the समय of स्वतंत्रता or सीखे through कुछ रूप of education.
1990 's Pontiac ग्रैंड am सेडान फेंडर और क्वार्टर panel
On an automobile, a quarter panel ( or rear wing as it is ज्ञात in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी ) is प्रायः माना the देह फलक जिससे goes between the पश्च द्वार और the ट्रंक और typically wraps around the व्हील खूब ; however, the similar front section Fender ( vehicle ), between the door and the hood, is sometimes incorrectly referred to as a quarter panel.
The quarter panel is typically made of Sheet metal, but is sometimes made of fiberglass or fiber-reinforced प्लास्टिक ; हालांकि, इस varies साथ different makes and models.
A quarter panel is typically a welded on component of the uni-body structure or monocoque.
Replacement of a sheet metal quarter panel typically requires it to be काटें बंद the गाडी और a बदलना भाग to be welded ( or sometimes bonded ) to the Vehicle.
Due to this high amount of specialized labor, a क्वार्टर फलक may प्रायः be repaired बल्कि than replaced by hammering आउट the damage, and a body filler sometimes referred to as bondo to be applied to finalize the original surface.
Shropshire ( or ; alternatively Salop ; abbreviated, in छपाई तभी, shrops ) is a काउंटी in the वेस्ट मिडलैंड्स region of England.
It borders Wales to the west, Cheshire to the north, Staffordshire to the ईस्ट, वॉस्टरशायर to the south-east और herefordshire to the south.
A unitary authority ( Shropshire Council ) was created on 1 April 2009, taking over इससे the पिछला काउंटी परिषद और 5 ज़िला councils, और कवर सबसे of the काउंटी.
the बरो of telford और wrekin रै महरूम a पृथक एकात्मक प्राधिकार चूंकि 1998 but continues to be included in the ceremonial county.
The county 's population and economy is centred on five towns : the county town of Shrewsbury, which is culturally और historically महत्वपूर्ण और is स्तिथ in the केन्द्र of the काउंटी ; telford, a नई कस्बा in the ईस्ट जिससे थी constructed around a क्रमांक of पुरानी कस्बों, सबसे notably वेलिंगटन, dawley और madeley, जिससे is today the most populous ; and Oswestry in the north-west, Bridgnorth just to the south of Telford, and Ludlow in the south.
The county has many further market towns, including Whitchurch in the north, Newport just to the north-east of telford, और मार्केट drayton in the north-east of the काउंटी.
The Ironbridge Gorge area is a UNESCO World विरासत साईट, covering ironbridge, coalbrookdale and a part of Madeley.
There are, additionally, other notable historic industrial sites located around the county, such as at shrewsbury, broseley, snailbeach और highley as खूब as the shropshire Union Canal.
The Shropshire Hills Area of Outstanding प्राकृतिक सौंदर्य कवर परिचय a क्वार्टर of the काउंटी, mainly in the south.
Shropshire is one of England 's most rural and sparsely आबादी काउंटी, साथ the जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व of the shropshire परिषद area being just 91/km2 ( 337/sq mi ).
the wrekin is एक of the सबसे प्रसिद्ध प्राकृतिक लैंडमार्क in the काउंटी, हालांकि the highest hills are the Clee Hills, Stiperstones and the Long Mynd.
Wenlock Edge is another significant भौगोलिक और geological लैंडमार्क.
In the low-lying उत्तरपश्चिम of the काउंटी ( और अतिव्यापी the किनारा साथ वेल्स ) is the fenn 's, Whixall and Bettisfield Mosses National Nature Reserve, one of the most important and best preserved bogs in Britain.
The River Severn, Great ब्रिटेन 's longest नदी, रनों through the काउंटी, exiting into Worcestershire via the Severn Valley.
shropshire is landlocked, और साथ an क्षेत्रफल of, is England 's largest inland county.
The काउंटी पुष्प is the round-leaved sundew.
For Eurostat purposes, the county ( कम the एकात्मक ज़िला of telford और wrekin ) is a nuts 3 region ( code UKG22 ).
The two Shropshire unitary areas ( covering all of the ceremonial काउंटी ), साथ साथ the अधिकारियों covering the ceremonial काउंटी of staffordshire, comprise the `` Shropshire and Staffordshire '' NUTS 2 region.
The Big Bang Theory cast at Comic Con 2009, इससे बाएँ : कुणाल नय्यर, साइमन helberg, kaley cuoco, जिम Parsons, and Johnny Galecki
The American sitcom The Big Bang Theory, created and executive उत्पादित by चक lorre और विधेयक prady, premiered on सीबीएस on सितंबर 24, 2007.
The show centers on five characters : roommates Sheldon Cooper and Leonard Hofstadter, two Caltech physicists ; Penny, a waitress and aspiring actress who lives across the hall ; and Leonard and Sheldon 's मित्रों और co-workers aerospace इंजीनियर हावर्ड wolowitz, और astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali.
Over time, several supporting वर्ण have महरूम प्रचारित to अभिनीत भूमिकाएँ : लेस्ली winkle ( ऋतु 1 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 2 नियमित ; ऋतु 3 अतिथि ), a physicist सहयोगी, और, at अलग टाइम्स, a प्रेमी of दोनो लियोनार्ड और हावर्ड ; bernadette rostenkowski-wolowitz ( ऋतु 3 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 4-present नियमित ), a microbiologist, Howard 's fiancée and subsequent wife, and former part-time waitress alongside Penny ; neuroscientist Amy Farrah Fowler ( season 3 guest ; season 4 recurring ; season 4-present regular ), who joins the group after being matched to Sheldon on a dating website ; and comic book store-owner, Stuart Bloom ( seasons 2–5 recurring ; season 6-present regular ), who replaces Howard as Raj 's best friend when Howard is in space.
The show also सुविधाएँ numerous supporting वर्ण, प्रत्येक of जिसको plays a prominent role in a small group of episodes.
The a-team is an अमरीकी action-adventure टेलीविज़न श्रेणी, कार्यशील इससे 1983 to 1987, परिचय a fictional समूह of ex– संयुक्त राज्य फौज Special Forces personnel who work as soldiers of fortune, while on the run from the Army after being branded as war criminals for a `` crime they did n't commit ``.
A feature film based on the series was released by 20th सदी फॉक्स on जून 11, 2010.

Wat Phra kaew, बैंकॉक, थाईलैंड
There is no आधिकारिक राज्य धर्म in the थाई संविधान, जिससे guarantees religious freedom for all Thai citizens, though the king is required by law to be Buddhist.
According to the last census ( 2000 ) 94.6 % of thais हैं बौद्धों of the Theravada tradition.
Muslims are the second largest धार्मिक समूह in थाईलैंड at 4.6 %.
Thailand 's southernmost provinces - Pattani, yala, narathiwat और भाग of songkhla chumphon have प्रबल मुस्लिम populations, consisting of both ethnic Thai and Malay.
the दक्षिणी टिप of थाईलैंड is ज़्यादातर ethnic Malays.
Christians, मुख्यतः catholics, represent 0.7 % of the population.
A small but influential community of Sikhs in Thailand and some Hindus भी सजीव in the देश 's शहरों, और हैं heavily सगाई in खुदरा commerce.
There is also a छोटी यहूदी जातियाँ in थाईलैंड, डेटिंग वापस to the 17th century.
Since 2001, Muslim activists, generally described by the Thai government as terrorists or separatists, have rallied विरूद्ध the सेंट्रल सरकारी क्युकी of कथित भ्रष्टाचार and ethnic bias on the part of officials.
Thailand 's Department of Religion, currently under the Ministry of Culture, is formally जिम्मेदार लिये the पंजीकरण of धार्मिक समूह in थाईलैंड URL_http which hold properties through legally established foundations.
It has oversight, along with the Immigration Police, over the कार्य permits of प्रचारकों जो हैं `` प्रवासी धार्मिक workers '' of all religions.
A मान added कर ( vat ) is a form of consumption tax.
From the perspective of the खरीदार, it is a कर on the खरीदें price.
From that of the seller, it is a tax only on the value added to a product, material, or service, from an accounting point of दृश्य, by इस स्टेज of इसके manufacture or वितरण.
The manufacturer remits to the government the difference between these two amounts, and retains the बाकी लिये themselves to ऑफसेट the कर वे था previously सशुल्क on the inputs.
The मान added to a उत्पाद by or साथ a कारोबार is the बिक्री दाम चार्ज to its customer, minus the cost of materials and other taxable inputs.
A VAT is like a बिक्री कर in कि ultimately only the end consumer is taxed.
It differs from the बिक्री कर in कि, साथ the latter, the कर is एकत्रित and remitted to the government only once, at the point of purchase by the end consumer.
With the VAT, collections, remittances to the सरकारी, और क्रेडिट लिये कर already सशुल्क occur each time a business in the supply chain purchases products.
A referee कॉलिंग a high-sticking penaltyHigh
-sticking is the name of two infractions in the sport of ice hockey that may occur जब a खिलाड़ी intentionally or inadvertently plays साथ उसके or उसके स्टिक ऊपर the height of the shoulders or above the cross bar of a hockey goal.
This can परिणाम in a stoppage of खेल or in a penalty.
In the rules of the National Hockey League, high-sticking is पारिभाषित as a दंड in नियम 60 और as a non-penalty बेईमानी in नियम 80.
A stoppage in play results if a ऊँची स्टिक आता in सम्पर्क साथ the पक और the team who touched it regains control of the puck.
However, play usually continues if a खिलाड़ी छू the पक साथ a ऊँची स्टिक and the opposing team gains control of the puck.
If the puck goes into the opposing net after coming into सम्पर्क साथ a ऊँची स्टिक, the लक्ष्य is प्रतिबंधित.
The level at which a stick is considered too high लिये a लक्ष्य is the crossbar of the जाल.
However, if a खिलाड़ी knocks the पक into उसके अपना जाल साथ a ऊँची stick, the goal is allowed.
A penalty is assessed if a खिलाड़ी हमलों another player with a high stick.
The player is given a minor penalty unless his high stick caused an चोट, in जिससे मामला the रेफरी रै the विकल्प to assess a double-minor, प्रमुख or मैच penalty.
It is the referee 's discretion which penalty to assess : the rule calls for a double minor for an accidental injury, or a मैच दंड लिये a deliberate attempt to injure ( whether the विपक्ष खिलाड़ी थी actually injured ).
Injury is प्रायः decided by the ऊँची स्टिक causing bleeding, लकिन the presence of blood does not automatically mean an extra penalty is awarded.
Some referees have been known to award an extra penalty without the presence of blood if the referee determines कि the चोट sustained थी sufficient to वारंट a double-minor penalty.
Typical modern memory card reader, संगत साथ अनेक आम formats
A memory card reader is a device, typically having a usb इंटरफ़ेस, लिये accessing the आंकड़ा on a मेमोरी कार्ड ऐसे as a compactflash ( cf ), सुरक्षित डिजिटल ( SD ) or MultiMediaCard ( MMC ).
Most card पाठक भी प्रस्ताव लिखें काबिलियत, and together with the card, this can function as a pen drive.
Some printers and निजी कंप्यूटर have a built-in card reader.
A multi card reader is used लिये संचार साथ अधिक than एक प्रकार of फ्लैश memory card.
Multi card पाठक do नहीं have built-in मेमोरी capacity, but are able to accept multiple types and styles of memory cards.
The number of compatible memory cards varies इससे रीडर to रीडर और can शामिल अधिक than 20 अलग types.
The क्रमांक of अलग मेमोरी ताश कि a multi card reader can accept is expressed as x-in-1, with x being a figure of merit indicating the number of memory cards accepted, such as 35-in-1.
There are three श्रेणी of कार्ड पाठक sorted by the प्रकार और मात्रा of the कार्ड slots : single card reader ( e.g. 1x SD-only ), multi card reader ( e.g. 9-in-1 ) and series card reader ( e.g. 4x SD only ).
Some kinds of memory cards with their own USB कृत्यों do नहीं need the कार्ड रीडर, ऐसे as the बुद्धिमान स्टिक मेमोरी card, which can plug directly into a USB slot.
The usb यंत्र क्लास used is 0x08.
धमकाना is हानिकारक to students ' well-being and development.
Bullying is the उपयोग of फ़ोर्स or coercion to abuse or intimidate others.
The बर्ताव can be habitual और involve an imbalance of social or physical power.
It can include verbal harassment or threat, शारीरिक उत्पीड़न or coercion और may be निर्देशित repeatedly towards particular पीड़ितों, perhaps on grounds of race, religion, gender, sexuality, or ability.
If bullying is done by a समूह, it is पुकारा mobbing.
The victim of bullying is sometimes referred to as a `` target ''.
Bullying can be पारिभाषित in अनेक different ways.
The UK फिलहाल रै no विधिक परिभाषा of धमकाना, जबकि कुछ U.S. states have laws against it.
Bullying consists of three basic types of abuse – emotional, मौखिक, और शारीरिक.
It typically involves हल्का विधि of coercion such as intimidation.
Bullying ranges from simple one-on-one धमकाना to अधिक जटिल धमकाना in जिससे the बुली may have एक or अधिक `` lieutenants '' who may seem to be willing to assist the primary bully in his or her bullying activities.
Bullying in school and the कार्यस्थल is भी referred to as पीर abuse.
Robert W. फुलर रै analyzed धमकाना in the context of rankism.
A धमकाना संस्कृति can develop in कोई कॉन्टेक्स्ट in जिससे इंसान beings interact with each other.
इस शामिल स्कूल, गिरिजाघर, family, the workplace, home, and neighborhoods.

Laura Bush and Rae Leigh Bradbury ( formerly missing ) on April 4, 2007, in Austin, Texas, बाद the 8-year-old introduced mrs. बुश दौरान घोषणा of the भविष्य खोलने of the टेक्सास क्षेत्रीय दफ्तर of the नेशनल बीच लिये लापता and Exploited Children.
Rae Leigh was the पहला चाइल्ड in the u.S. to be बरामद as a result of an AMBER Alert when she was 8 weeks old in November 1998.
An AMBER Alert or a Child abduction आपात ( वही कोड : cae ) is a चाइल्ड abduction चेतावनी system originating in 1996, now employed in 9 countries.
एम्बर is officially a backronym लिये अमेरिका 's लापता : Broadcasting Emergency Response, named for Amber Hagerman, a 9-year-old abducted and murdered in Arlington, Texas in 1996.
Alternate regional alert names were once used ; in Georgia, `` Levi 's Call '' ( named after Levi Frady ) ; in हवाई, `` maile एम्बर चेतावनी '' ( बाद maile गिल्बर्ट ) ; और अरकंसास, `` Morgan Nick Amber Alert '' ( in memory of Morgan Chauntel Nick ).
AMBER Alerts are distributed via commercial radio stations, Internet रेडियो, उपग्रह रेडियो, टेलीविज़न स्टेशन, और केबल tv by the आपात चेतावनी प्रणाली और noaa मौसम रेडियो ( where they are termed `` Child Abduction Emergency '' or `` Amber Alerts '' ).
The alerts are also issued via e-mail, electronic traffic-condition लक्षण, the led billboards जिससे हैं स्तिथ बाहर of नए walgreens स्थितियाँ, साथ साथ the led/lcd लक्षण of बिलबोर्ड companies such as Clear Channel Outdoor, CBS Outdoor and Lamar, or through wireless device SMS text messages.
AMBER Alert रै भी teamed up साथ google और फेसबुक to रिले सूचना regarding an AMBER Alert to an ever growing demographic.
Those interested in subscribing to receive AMBER Alerts in their area via SMS messages can visit Wireless एम्बर चेतावनियाँ, जिससे हैं offered by विधि as फ़्री messages.
In some states, the display scrollboards in सामने of लॉटरी terminals are also used.
The decision to घोषित an एम्बर चेतावनी is बना by प्रत्येक पुलिस संगठन ( in अनेक मामले, the राज्य पुलिस or राजमार्ग patrol ) which investigates each of the abductions.
पब्लिक सूचना in an एम्बर चेतावनी प्रायः consists of the नाम और वर्णन of the abductee, a वर्णन of the suspected abductor, and a description and license plate number of the abductor 's vehicle, if available.
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born July 23, 1973 ) is an American woman with whom United States अध्यक्ष विधेयक क्लिंटन admitted to having था an `` improper संबंध '' while she worked at the White House in 1995 and 1996.
The affair and its परखना ( जिससे शामिल क्लिंटन 's महाभियोग ) became known as the Lewinsky scandal.
House of Night is a series of vampire -themed काल्पनिक novels by अमरीकी लेखक P. C. Cast and her daughter Kristin Cast.
It follows the adventures of zoey redbird, a sixteen-year-old लड़की जो रै बस become a `` fledgling vampyre '' and is required to attend the House of Night boarding school in Tulsa, Oklahoma.
The series has been on the नई यॉर्क टाइम्स बेहतरीन विक्रेता सूची लिये 63 सप्ताह और वहीँ हैं over सात लाख नक़ल in print in North America alone.
The sixth novel, Tempted, which went on sale on October 27, 2009 with a पहला मुद्रण of a लाख नक़ल, डाला the यूएसए आज bestseller list that week at # 1.
In January, 2010, gezeichnet, a जर्मनी अनुवाद of चिह्नित, reached the # 1 spot on the Der Spiegel bestseller list.
The series has so दूर बेची अधिक than टेन लाख books in 39 countries.
Burned was released on April 27, 2010, and like इम्तिहान, it डाला the यूएसए आज बेस्टसेलर सूची that week at # 1.
awakened, released in जनवरी, 2011, also entered the list at # 1.
The series, which is प्रकाशित by st मार्टिन 's दबायें is नियोजित to include twelve books.
In 2008, plans for a film अनुकूलन यहूद भी घोषित.
The tenth book in the series, छुपा, थी released on अक्तूबर 16, 2012.
The second book in the novellas ( which give पृष्ठभूमि on supporting वर्ण ), lenobia 's Vow, was released January 31, 2012.
किताब ग्यारह is फिलहाल पुकारा नाज़िल, और the casts have घोषित कि दो अधिक novellas, Neferet’s Curse, planned to be released February 19, 2013, and a prequel novel about Kalona, are to be released to coincide with the eleventh and twelfth books.
In Greek mythology, the Trojan War was waged विरूद्ध the नगर of ट्रॉय by the achaeans ( यूनानियों ) बाद पेरिस of ट्रॉय took Helen from her husband Menelaus king of Sparta.
The war is one of the most important events in Greek mythology and has been narrated through many works of Greek साहित्य, सबसे notably through होमर 's इलियड और the ओडिसी.
The Iliad relates a part of the पिछला साल of the घेरा of ट्रॉय ; the ओडिसी describes Odysseus 's journey home.
Other parts of the war are contained in a साईकिल of एपिक कविताएं, जिससे have बच through fragments.
एपीसोड इससे the युद्ध provided सामग्री लिये यूनानी त्रासदी और अन्य works of Greek literature, and for Roman poets including Virgil and Ovid.
The war originated इससे a झगड़ा between the देवियाँ एथेना, hera, और aphrodite, बाद eris, the देवी of संघर्ष और अनबन, gave them a golden apple, sometimes known as the Apple of Discord, marked `` for the fairest ''.
Zeus sent the देवियाँ to पेरिस, जो judged कि aphrodite, as the `` fairest '', should receive the apple.
in एक्सचेंज, aphrodite बना हेलेन, the सबसे खूबसूरत of सब महिलाओं और बीवी of Menelaus, fall in love with Paris, who took her to Troy.
Agamemnon, king of Mycenae और the bhai of हेलेन 's husband menelaus, led an expedition of Achaean troops to Troy and besieged the city for ten years because of Paris ' insult.
After the deaths of many heroes, including the achaeans achilles और अजाक्स, और the ट्रोजन्स हेक्टर और पेरिस, the नगर गिरी to the ruse of the Trojan Horse.
the achaeans slaughtered the ट्रोजन्स ( मगर लिये कुछ of the महिलाओं and children whom they kept or sold as slaves ) and desecrated the temples, thus earning the gods ' wrath.
Few of the Achaeans returned सकुशल to उनके घरों और अनेक संस्थापित colonies in दूर shores.
The Romans later traced their origin to Aeneas, one of the Trojans, who was said to have led the surviving ट्रोजन्स to modern-day Italy.
The ancient यूनानियों विचार कि the trojan युद्ध थी a ऐतिहासिक इवेंट कि था लिया प्लेस in the 13th or 12th सदी BC, and believed that Troy was located in modern-day Turkey near the Dardanelles.
By modern times, दोनो the युद्ध और the नगर यहूद widely believed to be non-historical.
In 1868, however, the जर्मनी पुरातत्ववेत्ताओं heinrich schliemann मिले फ़्रैंक calvert, जो कायल schliemann कि ट्रॉय थी at hissarlik और schliemann took over calvert 's excavations on property belonging to Calvert ; this claim is now accepted by most scholars.
Whether there is any historical वास्तविकता पीछे the trojan युद्ध is an खोलें question.
Many scholars believe that there is a historical core to the tale, though this may बस औसत कि the homeric कहानियां हैं a संलयन of विभिन्न किस्से of sieges और रिझाने by माइसीनियाई Greeks during the Bronze Age.
those जो मानना कि the कहानियां of the trojan युद्ध हैं निकला इससे a विशिष्ट ऐतिहासिक विरोध usually date it to the 12th or 11th centuries BC, often preferring the dates given by Eratosthenes, 1194–1184 BC, which roughly corresponds with archaeological evidence of a catastrophic burning of Troy VIIa.
Anarchists have employed certain symbols for their कारण, सहित सबसे prominently the circle-a और the ब्लैक ध्वज, हालांकि anarchists have historically largely denied the importance of symbols to political movement.
Since the revival of anarchism around the start of the 21st-century संयुक्त साथ the वृद्धि of the anti-globalization गति, अराजकतावादी cultural symbols are widely present.
The greater palatine canal ( or pterygopalatine canal ) is a passage in the कपाल कि transmits the वृहद palatine धमनी, रग, और तंत्रिका between the pterygopalatine fossa and the oral cavity.
Surface temperature of Antarctica in शीत और गर्मियाँ इससे the यूरोपीय केन्द्र लिये Medium-Range Weather Forecasts
The climate of अंटार्कटिक is the coldest on the whole of Earth.
Antarctica has the lowest naturally occurring तापमान कभी अंकित on the मैदान on धरती : −89.2 °c ( −128.6 °f ) at Vostok Station.
It is also extremely dry ( technically a मरुस्थल ), averaging 166 mm ( 6.5 in ) of वर्षण per year.
Even so, on most parts of the continent the snow rarely melts और is आखिरकार संपीडित to become the glacial ice that makes up the ice sheet.
मौसम fronts rarely घुस far into the continent.
Most of Antarctica has an ice cap climate ( Köppen EF ) साथ बहुत ठंडा, generally अत्यधिक शुष्क मौसम throughout the साल और no माह averaging above 0 °C ( 32 °F ).
Some fringe coastal areas have a tundra climate ( köppen et ) साथ a छोटी गर्मियाँ averaging ऊपर जमने, और much higher precipitation.
वर्तमान सिर कोच माइक Tomlin, during the 2007 season
The Pittsburgh स्टीलर्स मताधिकार रै था 16 सिर कोच throughout its history.
Founded as the Pittsburgh Pirates in, the नाम थी बदला to the स्टीलर्स prior to the ऋतु to celebrate the नगर 's heritage of producing steel.
Joe Bach served two separate terms as सिर कोच और वॉल्ट kiesling परोसा तीन separate terms.
During the और सीज़न, due to the राशि of खिलाड़ी जो लड़ा in World War II, the Steelers combined their team with Philadelphia and Chicago, respectively.
During these seasons, स्टीलर्स ' कोच वॉल्ट kiesling साझा कोचिंग कर्तव्य साथ चिकनी neale और फिल हैंडलर, who have not been included within this list.
Struggling for much of the मताधिकार 's जल्दी सालो, the टोली 's पहला ऋतु साथ अधिक विन्स than नुकसान थी coached by Jock Sutherland in.
In, अंतर्गत sutherland, the स्टीलर्स निभाई उनके पहला playoff game against the Philadelphia Eagles.
Ten of the 16 head coaches spent their संपूर्ण पेशेवर कोचिंग करियर साथ the मताधिकार, सहित जॉन mcnally, वॉल्ट kiesling और चक noll, जो have also been voted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame.
One of only four men to coach the वही टोली लिये 23 सालो, चक Noll retired in.
Noll is also the only coach in National Football League history to जीत चार सुपर प्याले.
Bill cowher, noll 's बदलना, coached the स्टीलर्स to उनके पांचवां Super Bowl victory, in 2005.
The Steelers sixth Super Bowl win came in Super कटोरी xliii, जबकि सिर coached by Mike Tomlin, the team 's current head coach.
In criminal law, धोखाधड़ी is जानबूझकर deception बना लिये निजी लाभ or to क्षति another व्यक्तिगत ; the related adjective is fraudulent, and verb is defraud.
Fraud is a crime and a civil law उल्लंघन, हालांकि the विशिष्ट दण्ड विधि definition varies by legal jurisdiction.
Defrauding people or entities of money or valuables is a आम purpose of धोखाधड़ी.
A hoax also involves deception, but without the इरादे of लाभ or of damaging or depriving the victim.
Fraud is a defense in a सिविल कार्रवाई लिये उल्लंघन of contract or specific performance of a contract.
Fraud is a आधार लिये निष्पक्ष jurisdiction.
Passover, or Pesach ( from : in Hebrew, Yiddish ), Tiberian :, Modern यहूदी : /ˈpesaχ/ pesah, pesakh, यहूदी : peysekh, paysakh, paysokh ) is an important Biblically -derived Jewish festival.
Historically, together with Shavuot ( `` Pentecost '' ) and Sukkot ( `` झोपड़ियों '' ), passover is एक of the तीन यात्राएं त्यौहार ( Shalosh Regalim ) during which the entire population of the kingdom of Judah made a pilgrimage to the Temple in Jerusalem.
Samaritans स्टिल मेक इस यात्राएं to माउंट gerizim, but only men participate in public worship.
Passover commences on the 15th of the Hebrew month of Nisan and lasts for either seven days ( in इसराईल ) or आठ दिनों ( in the diaspora ).
In Judaism, a day commences at dusk and lasts until the following dusk, thus the first day of Passover तभी begins बाद संध्या of the 14th of nisan और ends at dusk of the 15th day of the month of Nisan.
The rituals unique to the passover जश्न commence साथ the passover Seder when the 15th of Nisan has begun.
in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध Passover takes place in spring as the Torah prescribes it : `` in the month of [ the ] spring '' ( בחדש האביב ).
it is एक of the सबसे widely observed Jewish holidays.
The Jewish people celebrate Passover as a commemoration of their liberation over 3,300 years ago by God इससे गुलामी in प्राचीन मिश्र कि थी शासित by the pharaohs, और उनके जनम as a nation under the leadership of Moses.
It commemorates the story of the exodus as वर्णित in the यहूदी बाइबल विशेषकर in the किताब of exodus, in which the Israelites were freed from slavery in Egypt.
In the कथा of the exodus, the बाइबल tells कि परमेश्वर helped the children of इसराईल एस्केप इससे their slavery in Egypt by inflicting ten plagues upon the ancient Egyptians before the Pharaoh would release his Israelite slaves ; the tenth and worst of the plagues was the death of the Egyptian first-born.
The Israelites were instructed to mark the doorposts of their homes साथ the रक्त of a slaughtered वसन्त मेमने और, upon देखकर इस, the स्पिरिट of the रब knew to pass over the first-born in ये घरों, hence the नाम of the holiday.
There is some debate over जहाँ the पद is दरअसल निकला from.
When the Pharaoh freed the israelites, it is कहा कि वे बाएँ in such a hurry that they could not wait for bread dough to rise ( leaven ).
In commemoration, लिये the अवधि of passover no leavened ब्रैड is खाया, लिये जिससे reason it is called `` The Festival of the Unleavened Bread ''.
Thus Matzo ( चपटा unleavened ब्रैड ) is खाया दौरान Passover and it is a symbol of the holiday.
हैली 's धूमकेतु or धूमकेतु हैली ( or ), officially designated 1P/Halley, is the best-known of the short-period comets and is visible from Earth every 75–76 years.
Halley is the only short-period धूमकेतु कि is clearly दृश्य to the नग्न नजर इससे धरती, और यूँ the only naked-eye comet that might appear twice in a human lifetime.
Other naked-eye comets may be उज्जवल और अधिक spectacular, लकिन होगा appear तभी once in thousands of years.
Halley 's रिटर्न to the भीतरी सौर प्रणाली have महरूम observed और recorded by astronomers since at least 240 BCE.
Clear records of the comet 's appearances यहूद बना by चाइनीज, babylonian, और मध्यकालीन यूरोपीय chroniclers, लकिन यहूद नहीं पहचाना as reappearances of the same object at the time.
The comet 's periodicity was first determined in 1705 by अंग्रेज़ी astronomer edmond हैली, बाद जिसको it is now named.
हैली 's धूमकेतु पिछला appeared in the भीतरी Solar System in 1986 and will next appear in mid-2061.
दौरान इसके 1986 apparition, हैली became the पहला धूमकेतु to be observed in विवरण by spacecraft, providing the first observational data on the structure of a comet nucleus and the mechanism of coma and tail formation.
These observations समर्थित a क्रमांक of longstanding hypotheses परिचय धूमकेतु निर्माण, विशेषकर फ्रेड whipple 's `` गंदा स्नोबॉल '' model, which correctly predicted that Halley would be composed of a mixture of volatile ices – such as water, carbon dioxide and ammonia – and dust.
The missions also provided data which substantially reformed and reconfigured these ideas ; for instance it is now understood that हैली 's सतह is largely रचित of dusty, non-volatile सामग्री, और कि तभी a छोटी portion of it is icy.
anti-communism is विपक्ष to communism.
Organized anti-communism developed in reaction to the वृद्धि of साम्यवादी, विशेषकर बाद the 1917 अक्तूबर क्रान्ति in रूस और reaching वैश्विक dimensions during the Cold War.
Most anti-communists reject the अवधारणा of ऐतिहासिक भौतिकवाद, जिससे is a central idea in Marxism.
anti-communists अस्वीकृत the मार्क्सवादी विश्वास कि पूंजीवाद होगा be followed by समाजवादी and communism, just as feudalism was followed by capitalism.
Anti-communists question the वैध of the मार्क्सवादी अर्जी कि the समाजवादी राज्य होगा `` wither दूर '' जब it becomes unnecessary in a true communist society.
Anti-communists argue that the दमन in the जल्दी सालो of bolshevik नियम, जबकि नहीं as चरम as कि दौरान जोसेफ स्टालिन 's नियम, was still severe by reasonable standards, citing examples such as Felix Dzerzhinsky 's secret police, which eliminated numerous political opponents by extrajudicial executions, and the brutal crushing of the Kronstadt rebellion and Tambov rebellion.
Some anti-communists refer to both Communism and fascism as सर्वसत्तावाद, देखकर समानता between the क्रियाएँ of communist and fascist governments.
Historian Robert Conquest has argued कि साम्यवादी थी जिम्मेदार लिये tens of millions of deaths during the 20th century.
Opponents argue that Communist parties that have come to शक्ति have tended to be rigidly असहिष्णु of राजनैतिक opposition.
These opponents claim कि सबसे कम्युनिस्ट देशों have दिखाया no लक्षण of advancing इससे मार्क्स 's समाजवादी stage of economy to an ideal communist stage.
Rather, Communist governments have been accused of creating a new ruling क्लास ( a nomenklatura ), साथ शक्तियां और privileges वृहद than those previously enjoyed by the upper classes in the non- communist regimes.
Gil Heron ( 9 April 1922 – 27 November 2008 ) was a jamaican पेशेवर footballer.
He was the first black player to play for स्कॉटिश क्लबों सेल्टिक, और थी the पिता of कवि and musician Gil Scott-Heron.
He died in Detroit of a दिल आक्रमण on 27 नवम्बर 2008.
The soybean ( US ) or soya bean ( UK ) ( Glycine max ) is a species of legume native to East एशिया, widely grown लिये इसके खाद्य सेम जिससे रै numerous उपयोग.
The संयंत्र is classed as an oilseed बल्कि than a pulse by the UN Food and Agricultural Organization ( FAO ).
fat-free ( defatted ) सोयाबीन भोजन is a significant और सस्ती सोर्स of प्रोटीन लिये एनिमल feeds and many prepackaged meals ; soy vegetable oil is another product of processing the soybean crop.
For example, soybean products such as textured सब्ज़ी प्रोटीन ( tvp ) हैं संघटक in many meat and dairy analogues.
Soybeans produce significantly अधिक प्रोटीन प्रति एकड़ than most other uses of land.
Traditional nonfermented खाना उपयोग of soybeans शामिल सोया मिल्क, and from the latter tofu and tofu skin.
fermented भोजन शामिल सोया सॉस, fermented bean paste, natto, and tempeh, among others.
The oil is used in अनेक औद्योगिक अनुप्रयोग.
The main producers of soy are the United States ( 35 % ), Brazil ( 27 % ), अर्जेंटीना ( 19 % ), चीन ( 6 % ) and India ( 4 % ).
The beans contain significant amounts of phytic एसिड, alpha-linolenic acid, and isoflavones.
हैरिसन घाट ( born जुलाई 13, 1942 ) is an American film actor and producer.
He is famous for his प्रदर्शन as हान सोलो in the असली स्टार युद्धों त्रयी और the शीर्षक अक्षर of the इंडियाना जोन्स film series.
Ford is also known for his roles as Rick Deckard in Blade Runner, जॉन किताब in गवाह और जोकर रयान in patriot खेल और साफ और उपस्थित Danger.
His career has spanned six decades and includes roles in several Hollywood blockbusters, सहित presumed निर्दोष, the भगोड़े, एयर फ़ोर्स एक, और कया Lies Beneath.
At one point, four of the शीर्ष छह box-office हिट्स of all time included one of his roles.
Five of his films have been inducted into the नेशनल Film Registry.
In 1997, Ford was ranked No. 1 in साम्राज्य `` the शीर्ष 100 फिल्म सितारों of All Time '' list.
, the United States domestic बक्सा दफ्तर grosses of घाट 's films कुल over us $ 3.5 अरब, साथ विश्वव्यापी grosses surpassing $ 6 billion, making Ford the third highest grossing U.S. domestic box-office star.
घाट is the husband of actress Calista Flockhart.
a ट्यूब of ChapStick
ChapStick is a brand name for lip balm manufactured by फाइजर उपभोक्ता healthcare और प्रयुक्त in अनेक देशों विश्वव्यापी.
It is intended to help treat and prevent chapped होठ ; hence the नाम.
Many varieties also include sunscreen in अनुक्रम to prevent sunburn.
Due to इसके लोकप्रियता, the पद रै become a genericized trademark.
It popularly refers to any lip balm contained in a lipstick-style tube और लागू in the वही manner as लिपस्टिक.
However, the पद is स्टिल a पंजीकृत ट्रेडमार्क, साथ rights exclusively owned by Pfizer.
In Sweden and in the United Kingdom, the product 's main competitor is Lypsyl, made by novartis उपभोक्ता स्वास्थ्य, जिससे is वितरित in समान पैकेजिंग to ChapStick.
George Berkeley ( ; 12 March 168514 January 1753 ), also known as Bishop Berkeley ( Bishop of Cloyne ), was an Anglo-Irish philosopher whose primary achievement थी the उन्नति of a सिद्धान्त he पुकारा `` immaterialism '' ( बाद referred to as `` subjective आदर्शवाद `` by अन्य ).
This सिद्धान्त झुठलाए the अस्तित्व of सामग्री पदार्थ और बजाय contends कि परिचित वस्तुएँ जैसे टेबल and chairs are only ideas in the minds of perceivers, and as a result can not exist without being perceived.
Thus, as Berkeley famously put it, लिये शारीरिक वस्तुएँ `` esse est percipi '' ( `` to be is to be perceived `` ).
Berkeley is also known for his critique of abstraction, an महत्वपूर्ण आधार in उसके तर्क for immaterialism.
In 1709, बर्कली प्रकाशित उसके पहला प्रमुख कार्य,, in जिससे he discussed the सीमाएं of इंसान दृष्टि और उन्नत the सिद्धान्त that the proper objects of sight are not material objects, but light and colour.
This foreshadowed his chief philosophical work A Treatise Concerning the Principles of Human Knowledge in 1710 जिससे, बाद इसके ग़रीब रिसेप्शन, he rewrote in संवाद रूप और प्रकाशित अंतर्गत the शीर्षक तीन संवाद between Hylas and Philonous in 1713.
In this book, Berkeley 's views were represented by Philonous ( Greek : 'lover of दिमाग ' ), जबकि hylas ( यूनानी : 'मैटr ' ) embodies the आयरिश thinker’s प्रतिद्वंद्वियों, in particular John Locke.
Berkeley argued against Sir Isaac Newton 's doctrine of निरपेक्ष स्पेस, समय और गति in de मोटू ( on गति ), published 1721.
His arguments यहूद a precursor to the views of Mach and Einstein.
In 1732, he published Alciphron, a Christian क्षमाप्रार्थी विरूद्ध the free-thinkers, और in 1734, he प्रकाशित the विश्लेषक, an empiricist critique of the मूलाधार of infinitesimal calculus, which was influential in the development of mathematics.
His last major philosophical work, Siris ( 1744 ), begins by advocating the medicinal use of tar water, and तब continues to discuss a चौड़ी दायरा of विषय सहित विज्ञान, philosophy, and theology.
Interest in Berkeley 's work increased after World War II, because he tackled many of the issues of paramount interest to दर्शनशास्त्र in the 20th सदी ऐसे as the समस्याएं of बोध, the अंतर between प्राथमिक और द्वितीयक qualities, और the महत्व of भाषा.
Qingdao ( ), historically known as Tsingtao, is a प्रमुख नगर in पूर्वी शानदोंग प्रांत, पूर्वी चीन, साथ a जनसांख्यिकी of over 8.715 million ( 2010 census ).
Its built up area, made of 6 urban districts and 4 county-level शहरों, is घर to परिचय 4,896,000 निवासियों in 2010.
It borders Yantai to the northeast, Weifang to the वेस्ट और rizhao to the southwest.
Qīng ( ) in Chinese means `` ग्रीन '' or `` रसीले '', जबकि dǎo ( ) अर्थात् `` द्वीप ''.
Qingdao is administered at the sub-provincial level.
Lying आरपार the शानदोंग प्रायद्वीप जबकि looking आउट to the पीला समुद्र, Qingdao is a major seaport, naval base, and industrial centre.
It is भी the साईट of the Tsingtao Brewery.
The world 's longest sea सेतु, the चिंगदाओ haiwan सेतु, कड़ी the प्रमुख शहरी क्षेत्रफल of Qingdao with Huangdao district, straddling the Jiaozhou Bay sea areas.
Qingdao is named China 's सबसे livable city.
Mimivirus is a वाइरल genus containing a सिंगल पहचाना प्रजाति नामित acanthamoeba polyphaga mimivirus ( apmv ), or is a group of phylogenetically related large viruses ( designated usually MimiN ).
In colloquial speech, APMV is more commonly referred to as बस `` mimivirus ''.
Until October 2011, जब a larger वायरस megavirus chilensis थी वर्णित, it था the largest capsid diameter of all known viruses.
Mimivirus has a विशाल और जटिल genome compared साथ most other viruses.
Mimivirus, short for `` mimicking microbe '', is so पुकारा to प्रतिबिंबित इसके विशाल आकार और apparent gram-staining properties.
The Mexican War of स्वतंत्रता ( 1810–1821 ) थी an हथियारबंद विरोध between the people of Mexico and the Spanish colonial authorities which started on September 16, 1810.
The movement, which became known as the Mexican War of Independence, was led by mexican-born spaniards, mestizos and Amerindians who sought independence from Spain.
It started as an idealistic peasants ' rebellion against उनके औपनिवेशिक मास्टर्स, लकिन ended as an असंभावित गठबंधन between Mexican ex-royalists and Mexican guerrilla insurgents.
Crohn 's disease, also known as crohn सिंड्रोम और क्षेत्रीय enteritis, is a प्रकार of जलन bowel disease that may affect any part of the gastrointestinal tract from mouth to anus, causing a wide variety of symptoms.
It primarily causes abdominal pain, अतिसार ( जिससे may be खूनी if सूजन is at इसके worst ), उल्टी ( can be निरन्तर ), or वज़न घाटा, लकिन may भी कारण जटिलताओं बाहर the जठरांत्र ट्रैक्ट such as skin rashes, arthritis, inflammation of the eye, tiredness, and lack of concentration.
Crohn 's बीमारी is caused by interactions between पर्यावरणीय, immunological and bacterial factors in genetically susceptible individuals.
This results in a chronic inflammatory disorder, in which the body 's immune system attacks the जठरांत्र ट्रैक्ट संभवतः निर्देशित at सूक्ष्मजैविक antigens.
Crohn 's disease has wrongly been described as an असंक्राम्य बीमारी in the पास्ट ; हाल जांचकर्ताओं have वर्णित it as an immune deficiency state.
There is a genetic association with Crohn 's disease, primarily with variations of the nod2 जीन और इसके प्रोटीन, जिससे senses bacterial cell walls.
Siblings of affected individuals हैं at उच्चतर risk.
Males and females हैं बराबर प्रभावित.
Smokers are two times more likely to develop crohn 's बीमारी than nonsmokers.
crohn 's बीमारी affects between 400,000 और 600,000 people in North America.
व्यापकता estimates लिये उत्तरी यूरोपीय have ranged from 27–48 per 100,000.
Crohn 's disease tends to present initially in the teens and twenties, with another peak incidence in the fifties to seventies, हालांकि the बीमारी can occur at any age.
There is no known फार्मास्युटिकल or सर्जिकल इलाज़ लिये crohn 's disease.
Treatment options हैं प्रतिबंधित to controlling लक्षण, maintaining remission, और preventing relapse.
The disease was named after gastroenterologist Burrill बर्नार्ड crohn, जो, in 1932, साथ साथ दो अन्य सहयोगियों at माउंट sinai हॉस्पिटल in नई यॉर्क, वर्णित a श्रेणी of patients with inflammation of the terminal ileum, the area most commonly affected by the illness.

The list directly शामिल the tallest इमारतें और structures लिये प्रत्येक देश, और where appropriate, it also points to more detailed country-specific lists.
Rough and Ready is a census-designated place in नेवाडा काउंटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, संयुक्त राज्य.
It is स्तिथ वेस्ट of ग्रास घाटी, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, लगभग 62 miles ( 100 km ) from Sacramento.
The population was 963 at the 2010 census.
YouTube is a video-sharing website, निर्मित by तीन पूर्व paypal कर्मचारी in फ़रवरी 2005, on जिससे उपयोक्ता can अपलोड, view and share videos.
The company is based in San Bruno, California, and uses Adobe Flash Video and HTML5 technology to display a wide variety of user-generated video content, including movie क्लिप्स, tv क्लिप्स, और म्यूज़िक वीडियो, as खूब as amateur content such as video blogging, short original videos, and educational videos.
Most of the content on YouTube has been uploaded by individuals, although media corporations सहित सीबीएस, the बीबीसी, vevo, hulu, और अन्य संगठन प्रस्ताव कुछ of उनके सामग्री via the site, as part of the YouTube partnership program.
Unregistered users can देखें वीडियो, जबकि पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता can upload an unlimited number of videos.
Videos माना to contain potentially अप्रिय सामग्री are available only to registered users at least 18 years old.
In November 2006, YouTube, LLC was खरीदा by google लिये us $ 1.65 अरब, और operates as a subsidiary of Google.
Sister Act is a musical लिखा by cheri steinkellner और विधेयक steinkellner साथ अतिरिक्त किताब सामग्री by Douglas Carter Beane, with lyrics by Glenn Slater and music by Alan Menken.
It is based on the hit 1992 फिल्मी कॉमेडी of the same name.

गोल्डबर्ग is भी a producer of the 2011 Broadway adaptation.
Microsoft DirectX is a collection of application programming अंतरफलक ( api ) लिये हैंडलिंग कार्य सम्बन्धित to मल्टीमीडिया, विशेषकर game programming and video, on Microsoft platforms.
originally, the names of ये api सब began साथ सीधा, ऐसे as direct3d, DirectDraw, DirectMusic, DirectPlay, DirectSound, and so forth.
The name DirectX was coined as आशुलिपि पद लिये सब of ये api ( the x खड़ा in लिये the particular api names ) and soon became the name of the collection.
When Microsoft later set out to develop a गेमिंग कंसोल, the x थी प्रयुक्त as the आधार of the नाम एक्सबॉक्स to indicate that the console was based on DirectX technology.
The X initial has महरूम carried आगे in the नामकरण of api designed लिये the एक्सबॉक्स ऐसे as xinput और the cross-platform Audio Creation Tool ( XACT ), while the DirectX pattern has been continued for Windows APIs such as Direct2D and DirectWrite.
Direct3D ( the 3D graphics api भीतर डाइरेक्टएक्स ) is widely प्रयुक्त in the विकास of वीडियो खेल लिये microsoft खिड़कियाँ, microsoft एक्सबॉक्स, Microsoft Xbox 360 and some Sega Dreamcast games.
Direct3D is also used by other software applications for visualization और ग्राफिक्स कार्य ऐसे as cad/cam अभियान्त्रिकी.
As Direct3D is the most widely publicized component of DirectX, it is आम to देखिए the names `` डाइरेक्टएक्स '' और `` direct3d '' used interchangeably.
The DirectX software development kit ( SDK ) consists of runtime पुस्तकालयों in redistributable binary form, along with accompanying documentation and headers for use in coding.
originally, the runtimes यहूद तभी installed by games or explicitly by the user.
Windows 95 did not launch with DirectX, but DirectX थी शामिल साथ खिड़कियाँ 95 OEM Service Release 2.
Windows 98 and Windows nt 4.0 दोनो shipped साथ डाइरेक्टएक्स, as रै प्रत्येक संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ released since.
The SDK is उपलब्धियाँ as a फ़्री डाउनलोड.
While the runtimes are proprietary, closed-source software, सोर्स कोड is provided लिये सबसे of the sdk नमूने.
Starting with the release of Windows 8 Developer Preview, DirectX sdk रै महरूम एकीकृत into खिड़कियाँ sdk.
Direct3D 9Ex, Direct3D 10, and Direct3D 11 are only available for Windows Vista and newer क्युकी प्रत्येक of ये नई संस्करण थी निर्मित to निर्भर upon the नई खिड़कियाँ प्रदर्शक ड्राइवर मॉडल that was introduced for Windows Vista.
The new Vista/WDDM graphics architecture includes a नई वीडियो मेमोरी मैनेजर supporting आभासीकरण of ग्राफिक्स हार्डवेयर लिये various applications and services like the Desktop Window Manager.
Quetzaltenango, also commonly known by its indigenous name, xelajú, or अधिक commonly, xela, is the दूसरी largest नगर of ग्वाटेमाला.
It is both the पूंजी of quetzaltenango Department and the municipal seat of Quetzaltenango municipality.
It रै an अनुमानित population of 224,703.
the जनसांख्यिकी is परिचय 61 % स्वदेशी or amerindian, 34 % Mestizo or ladino and 5 % European.
Quetzaltenango is located in a mountain घाटी at an उन्नयन of 2,330 मीटर ( 7,655 ft ) ऊपर समुद्र स्तर at इसके lowest part.
It may reach above 2,400 मीटर भीतर the city.
The Municipality of quetzaltenango consists of an area of.
Municipalities abutting the municipality of Quetzaltenango include : Salcajá, Cantel, Almolonga, Zunil, El Palmar, concepción chiquirichapa, सैन mateo, la esperanza, olintepeque, और San Andrés Xecul.
All these municipalities are part of the विभाग of quetzaltenango, मगर सैन आन्द्रेस xecul which is a part of the Department of Totonicapán.
The Epic of Gilgamesh, an epic poem from मेसोपोटामिया, is amongst the earliest surviving works of literature.
the साहित्यिक इतिहास of gilgamesh begins साथ पाँच स्वतंत्र Sumerian poems about 'Bilgamesh ' ( Sumerian for Gilgamesh ), king of Uruk.
Four of these were प्रयुक्त as सोर्स सामग्री for a combined epic in Akkadian.
This first combined epic, known as the `` Old Babylonian '' version, dates to the 18th सदी bc और is titled बाद इसके incipit, shūtur एली sharrī ( `` Surpassing All Other Kings '' ).
Only a few fragments of it have survived.
The later `` Standard Babylonian '' version dates from the 13th to the 10th centuries BC and bears the incipit शा naqba īmuru ( `` he जो देखी the Deep '' ).
fragments of लगभग दो thirds of this longer, twelve-tablet version have been recovered.
कुछ of the बेहतरीन नक़ल यहूद खोजा in the पुस्तकालयों तबाह of the 7th-century BC Assyrian king Ashurbanipal.
The story centers on a दोस्ती between gilgamesh and Enkidu.
Enkidu is a wild man created by the gods as Gilgamesh 's बराबर to distract उसे इससे oppressing the लोगों of uruk.
Together, they यात्रा to the देवदार पहाड़ to शिकस्त humbaba, इसके monstrous guardian.
Later they kill the सांड of स्वर्ग, जिससे the देवी इश्तार भेजना to सजा gilgamesh for spurning her advances.
As a दंड लिये ये क्रियाएँ, the देवताओं sentence Enkidu to death.
The second half of the epic focuses on gilgamesh 's तकलीफ at enkidu 's मौत, और उसके quest for immortality.
In order to learn the secret of अनन्त जीवन, gilgamesh undertakes a long and perilous journey.
He learns that `` the जीवन कि तुम हैं seeking तुम होगा never find.
When the gods created man they आवंटित to उसे मौत, लकिन जीवन वे retained in उनके अपना keeping. ''
This quote was originally attributed to Siduri in the बूढ़ा babylonian संस्करण of the एपिक, और तब attributed to the अमर बाढ़ नायिका utnapishtim in the Akkadian version of the epic.
Nevertheless, Gilgamesh 's fame lived on बाद उसके मौत, क्युकी of उसके ग्रेट भवन projects, and his account of what Utnapishtim told him happened during the flood.
The story has been translated into many different languages, and gilgamesh रै चूंकि become adapted in works of popular fiction.
There are numerous debates over जो निर्मित the पहला वीडियो खेल, साथ the जवाब depending largely on how video games are defined.
The evolution of video games represents a tangled web of several अलग उद्योग, सहित वैज्ञानिक, कंप्यूटर, आर्केड, and consumer electronics.
The `` वीडियो '' in `` वीडियो खेल `` traditionally refers to a raster display device.
With the लोकप्रिय कैच phrase उपयोग of the पद `` वीडियो खेल '', the पद अभी implies all display types, formats, and platforms.
Historians have भी sought to बायपास the समस्या by बजाय using the अधिक विशिष्ट `` digital games '' descriptive.
इस पद पत्ते आउट the पहले analog-based computer games.
This is a list of best-selling वीडियो खेल franchises that have sold or shipped at least 5 million copies.
Unless otherwise stated, numbers indicate worldwide units sold, ordered alphabetically whenever दो or अधिक सूची the वही राशि.
The exception are the ones specifying shipments, जिससे have निम्नतर पूर्वता than अन्य लिस्टिंग sales.
Franchise बिक्री शामिल विस्तार पैक भी हालांकि वे are not considered full video games.
For best-selling व्यक्तिगत वीडियो खेल, see List of best-selling video games.
The sales figures given below do not शामिल आर्केड खेल बिक्री, जिससे can be मिला at List of highest-grossing arcade video games.

This does not necessarily लागू लिये श्रेणी कि हैं नहीं वीडियो game-based.
Dorothy Ann विलिस रिचर्ड्स ( सितंबर 1, 1933 – September 13, 2006 ) was an American politician and the 45th Governor of Texas.
She first came to national attention as the state कोषाध्यक्ष of टेक्सास, जब वो वितरित the keynote पता at the 1988 Democratic National Convention.
Richards परोसा as the 45th राज्यपाल of टेक्सास इससे 1991 to 1995 और was defeated for re-election in 1994 by George W. Bush.
Ann Richards was the second मादा राज्यपाल of Texas.
Data Execution Prevention ( DEP ) is a सुरक्षा feature included in modern operating systems.
It is known to be available in Linux, Mac OS X, iOS, Microsoft Windows and Android operating systems and is intended to prevent an अनुप्रयोग or सेवा इससे निष्पादित कोड इससे a non-executable मेमोरी प्रदेश.
This helps prevent निश्चित कारनामे कि स्टोर कोड via a बफ़र overflow, for example.
DEP runs in two modes : hardware-enforced dep लिये cpu कि can चिह्नित मेमोरी पृष्ठों as nonexecutable, और software-enforced dep with limited protection for CPUs that do not have hardware support.
Software-enforced DEP does not protect against execution of code in data pages, but बजाय counters seh मिटाकर, another प्रकार of आक्रमण.
DEP was introduced on Linux in 2004 ( kernel 2.6.8 ), on खिड़कियाँ in 2004 साथ खिड़कियाँ xp सेवा पैक 2, जबकि ठहराना introduced dep when they moved to x86 in 2006.
Example उदाहरण of दो आम futanari विसंगतियाँ
, is the Japanese word for hermaphroditism, जिससे is भी प्रयुक्त in a broader भाव लिये androgyny.
Beyond Japan the term is used to describe a commonly pornographic विधा of कंप्यूटर खेल, कॉमिक्स और एनिमेशन, जिससे शामिल वर्ण कि दिखाएँ दोनो प्राथमिक यौन विशेषताएँ.
But in today 's language it refers almost exclusively लिये वर्ण जो have an overall feminine appearance.
In that case the term is भी प्रायः abbreviated as futa ( s ), जिससे is occasionally also used as term for the works itself.
Early CAPTCHAs such as these, उत्पन्न by the ez-gimpy कार्यक्रम, यहूद प्रयुक्त on याहू !
A modern CAPTCHA, rather than attempting to create a distorted पृष्ठभूमि और ऊँची स्तर of warping on the टेक्स्ट, might फ़ोकस on बनाना segmentation मुश्किल by adding an angled line.
Another way to make segmentation difficult is to crowd प्रतीकों साथ, as in याहू ! 's वर्तमान captcha स्वरूप.
Some captchas कोशिश to utilize the क्षमता of people to see three-dimensional objects.
On this image, symbols are drawn with lines of different मोटाई to मेक an प्रभाव of extrusion.
A CAPTCHA ( ) is a type of challenge-response test used in कम्प्यूटिंग as an attempt to ensure कि the जवाब is उत्पन्न by a इंसान होने.
The प्रक्रम प्रायः involves a कंप्यूटर पूछे a उपयोक्ता to complete a simple test which the computer is able to grade.
These परीक्षण हैं designed to be आसान लिये a कंप्यूटर to generate लकिन मुश्किल लिये a कंप्यूटर to solve, but again easy for a human.
If a सही समाधान is प्राप्त, it can be presumed to have been entered by a human.
A common type of CAPTCHA requires the user to प्रकार अक्षर and/or अंक इससे a distorted image that appears on the screen.
Such tests हैं commonly प्रयुक्त to prevent अनावश्यक अंतरजाल बॉट इससे accessing वेबसाइटों, चूंकि a सामान्य इंसान can easily पढ़ा a captcha, while the bot can not process the image letters and therefore, can not answer properly, or at all.
Although most CAPTCHAs are letter pictures randomly generated, many of them have become difficult even for a human to read, so picture CAPTCHAs were created in which a human is shown a simple test to show a picture of a certain animal ( given few animal तस्वीरें ), जिससे is सरल लिये a इंसान होने to प्रक्रम, और इसलिए आसान to चुनें, जबकि a bot can नहीं प्रक्रम और solve the सवाल क्युकी हालांकि it can analyze the चित्र, it can नहीं easily अंदाज़ा the animal.
The term `` CAPTCHA '' was coined in 2000 by लुइस वोन ahn, मैनुएल ब्लम, निकोलस J. हॉपर, और जॉन langford ( all of Carnegie Mellon University ).
It is an acronym based on the शब्द `` कैप्चर '' और खड़ा लिये `` completely स्वचालित पब्लिक turing test to tell Computers and Humans Apart ''.
Carnegie Mellon University attempted to trademark the पद on 15 अक्तूबर 2004, लकिन the ट्रेडमार्क अनुप्रयोग थी abandoned on 21 अप्रैल 2008.
A CAPTCHA is sometimes described as a reverse turing परीक्षण, क्युकी it is administered by a यंत्र और targeted at a इंसान, in कंट्रास्ट to the मानक turing परीक्षण that is typically administered by a human and targeted at a machine.
Jacques-Yves Cousteau ( ; commonly known in अंग्रेज़ी as ज़ाक cousteau ; 11 जून 1910 – 25 जून 1997 ) थी a फ्रेंच नवल अधिकारी, एक्सप्लोरर, conservationist, फिल्मकार, innovator, वैज्ञानिक, फ़ोटोग्राफ़र, लेखक और शोधकर्ता जो पढ़ाई the sea and all forms of life in water.
He co-developed the aqua-lung, pioneered समुद्री संरक्षण और was a member of the Académie française.
KFC ( Kentucky Fried Chicken ) is a तेज़ खाना रेस्तरां कड़ी headquartered in louisville, केंटकी, United States, which specializes in fried chicken.
An `` American icon '', it is the world 's second largest restaurant chain overall ( as measured by बिक्री ) बाद मैकडोनाल्ड 's, साथ over 18,000 आउटलेट in 120 countries and territories.
The company is a subsidiary of Yum !
Brands, a restaurant company जिससे भी owns पिज़्ज़ा हट और Taco Bell.
KFC was founded by Harland सैंडर्स, जो began selling fried मुर्गा इससे उसके roadside रेस्तरां in Corbin, Kentucky during the Great Depression.
Sanders was one of the पहला लोगों to देखिए the संभावित of the रेस्तरां फ़्रेंचाइज़िंग अवधारणा, साथ the पहला `` Kentucky Fried Chicken '' franchise opening in Utah in 1952.
The franchise popularized chicken in the fast food उद्योग, thereby diversifying the मार्केट और चुनौतीपूर्ण the दबदबा of the hamburger.
Marketing himself as `` कर्नल सैंडर्स '', he became a legendary फिगर of अमरीकी cultural history, and his image is still prominently used in KFC branding.
The company 's rapid expansion saw it grow too large for Sanders to manage, and in 1964 he sold the company to a group of investors led by John Y. Brown, jr. और जोकर massey.
KFC was one of the पहला तेज़ खाना जंजीरों to विस्तार internationally, खोलने आउटलेट in England, Mexico and Puerto Rico by the mid-1960s.
Throughout the 1970s and 1980s, KFC अनुभवी मिश्रित सौभाग्य domestically, as it गई through a श्रेणी of कॉरपोरेट owners who had little or no experience in the restaurant business.
In the early 1970s, KFC थी बेची to the आत्माओं कड़ heublein, जो यहूद लिया over by the r.J. रेनॉल्ड्स food and tobacco conglomerate, who sold the chain to PepsiCo.
The chain continued to expand overseas however, and in 1987 केएफसी became the पहला पश्चिमी रेस्तरां chain to open in China.
The chain has since expanded rapidly in China, और the देश is अभी the कम्पनी 's सबसे लाभप्रद मार्केट.
PepsiCo spun off its रेस्तरां प्रभाग as tricon वैश्विक रेस्तरां, जिससे later changed its name to Yum !
ब्रांड्स.
केएफसी primarily बिकता fried मुर्गा टुकड़े और विसंगतियाँ ऐसे as मुर्गा सैंडविच और wraps, salads and side dishes such as French fries and coleslaw, desserts and soft drinks, often supplied by PepsiCo.
Its most famous product is pressure fried chicken pieces, seasoned साथ सैंडर्स ' `` असली रेसिपी '' of 11 herbs and spices.
The exact nature of ये संघटक is अनजान, और represents a notable trade secret.
Larger portions of fried मुर्गा हैं परोसा in a distinctive cardboard `` bucket '', which has become a signature of the chain since being introduced by franchisee Pete Harman.
KFC is famous for the slogan `` उंगली lickin ' शुभ '', जिससे रै चूंकि महरूम replaced by `` nobody करता मुर्गा like KFC '' and `` So good ''.
Cnidaria ( with a silent c ) or Coelenterata is a phylum containing over 10,000 species of पशु मिला exclusively in जलीय और ज़्यादातर समुद्री environments.
Their distinguishing feature is cnidocytes, specialized कोशिकाएं कि वे उपयोग मुख्यतः लिये capturing शिकार.
Their bodies consist of mesoglea, a non-living jelly-like पदार्थ, sandwiched between two layers of epithelium that are mostly one cell thick.
वे have दो मौलिक देह फ़ॉर्म : तैराकी medusae और sessile polyps, both of which are radially symmetrical with mouths surrounded by tentacles that bear cnidocytes.
Both forms have a सिंगल orifice और देह गुहा कि हैं प्रयुक्त for digestion and respiration.
Many cnidarian प्रजाति उपज colonies कि हैं सिंगल जीवों composed of medusa-like or polyp-like zooids, or both.
Cnidarians ' क्रियाएँ हैं समन्वित by a विकेन्द्रित तंत्रिका net and simple receptors.
Several free-swimming cubozoa और scyphozoa possess balance-sensing statocysts, and some have simple eyes.
Not all cnidarians reproduce sexually.
Many have जटिल lifecycles साथ अलैंगिक polyp चरण और यौन medusae, but some omit either the polyp or the medusa stage.
Cnidarians were for a long time grouped with Ctenophores in the phylum Coelenterata, but increasing जागरूकता of उनके मतभेद caused उन्हें to be लगाई in पृथक phyla.
Cnidarians are classified into four main groups : the almost wholly sessile Anthozoa ( sea anemones, corals, sea pens ) ; swimming Scyphozoa ( jellyfish ) ; Cubozoa ( बक्सा jellies ) ; और hydrozoa, a विविध समूह कि शामिल सब the freshwater cnidarians as खूब as अनेक समुद्री फ़ॉर्म, और रै दोनो स्थानबद्ध सदस्यों ऐसे as hydra और colonial swimmers such as the Portuguese Man o ' War.
Staurozoa have recently been recognised as a class in their own right rather than a sub-group of scyphozoa, और वहीँ is बहस परिचय whether myxozoa और polypodiozoa हैं cnidarians or closer to bilaterians ( more complex animals ).
Most cnidarians prey on organisms ranging in size from plankton to animals several times larger than themselves, लकिन अनेक obtain much of उनके पोषण इससे endosymbiotic शैवाल, और a few हैं परजीवी.
Many are preyed upon by other पशु सहित starfish, समुद्र slugs, fish and turtles.
Coral reefs, whose polyps are rich in endosymbiotic शैवाल, support कुछ of the संसार 's सबसे उत्पादक ecosystems, और protect वनस्पति in tidal zones and on shorelines from strong currents and tides.
While corals are almost entirely प्रतिबंधित to गरम, उथले समुद्री waters, अन्य cnidarians सजीव in the गहराइयों, in polar seas and in freshwater.
Fossil cnidarians have been found in rocks formed about, and अन्य जीवाश्मों दिखाएँ कि corals may have महरूम उपस्थित shortly पहले और diversified a few लाख सालो later.
Fossils of cnidarians that do नहीं निर्माण mineralized structures हैं very rare.
Scientists currently think that cnidarians, ctenophores and bilaterians हैं अधिक closely सम्बन्धित to calcareous sponges than ये हैं to अन्य sponges, और कि anthozoans हैं the विकासवादी `` aunts '' or `` sisters '' of other cnidarians, and the most closely related to bilaterians.
Recent analyses have concluded that cnidarians, हालांकि माना अधिक `` आदिम '' than bilaterians, have a wider range of genes.
The Aztec Pyramid at St. cecilia acatitlan, मैक्सिको राज्य.
Aztec jade मुखौटा depicting the परमेश्वर Xipe Totec.

एज़टेक cosmogram in the pre-hispanic Codex Fejérváry-Mayer - the fire god Xiuhtecuhtli is in the center.
The Aztec people यहूद निश्चित जातीय समूह of सेंट्रल मैक्सिको, विशेषकर those समूह जो spoke the नावातल भाषा और जो वर्चस्व large parts of Mesoamerica from the 14th to 16th centuries.
The Nahuatl words aztecatl ( singular ) and aztecah ( बहुवचन ) औसत `` लोगों इससे aztlan ``, a पौराणिक प्लेस लिये the nahuatl-speaking संस्कृति of the समय, और बाद अपनाया as the word to define the Mexica people.
Often the term `` Aztec '' refers exclusively to the Mexica people of Tenochtitlan ( now the location of Mexico नगर ), situated on an द्वीप in झील texcoco, जो referred to themselves as Mexica Tenochca or Cōlhuah Mexica.
Sometimes the term also शामिल the निवासियों of tenochtitlan 's दो प्रिंसिपल अलाइड city-states, the acolhuas of texcoco और the tepanecs of tlacopan, जो साथ साथ the mexica formed the एज़टेक ट्रिपल गठबंधन which controlled what is often known as `` the Aztec Empire ''.
In अन्य contexts, एज़टेक may refer to सब the विभिन्न नगर राज्य और उनके peoples, जो साझा विशाल भाग of their ethnic history and cultural traits with the Mexica, Acolhua and Tepanecs, and who often also used the Nahuatl language as a lingua franca.
In this meaning it is possible to talk about an Aztec civilization including all the particular सांस्कृतिक पैटर्न आम लिये सबसे of the peoples inhabiting सेंट्रल मैक्सिको in the late postclassic period.
From the 13th century, the Valley of Mexico was the heart of Aztec सभ्यता : यहाँ the पूंजी of the एज़टेक ट्रिपल गठबंधन, the नगर of tenochtitlan, was built upon raised islets in Lake Texcoco.
The Triple Alliance formed a उपनदी साम्राज्य expanding इसके राजनैतिक आधिपत्य दूर परे the घाटी of मैक्सिको, conquering अन्य city states throughout Mesoamerica.
At its pinnacle, Aztec culture had समृद्ध और जटिल पौराणिक और धार्मिक परंपराओं, as खूब as reaching उल्लेखनीय architectural and artistic accomplishments.
In 1521 Hernán Cortés, along with a large क्रमांक of नावातल बोलना स्वदेशी allies, conquered tenochtitlan और पराजित the एज़टेक ट्रिपल गठबंधन अंतर्गत the नेतृत्व of hueyi Tlatoani Moctezuma II.
Subsequently the Spanish founded the new settlement of मैक्सिको नगर on the साईट of the ruined एज़टेक पूंजी, इससे जहाँ वे proceeded with the process of colonizing Central America.
Aztec संस्कृति और इतिहास is primarily ज्ञात through पुरातत्व प्रमाण मिला in excavations ऐसे as कि of the प्रसिद्ध templo महापौर in मैक्सिको नगर ; इससे स्वदेशी छाल पेपर codices ; इससे eyewitness खाते by स्पेनी conquistadors such as Hernán Cortés and Bernal Díaz del Castillo ; and especially from 16th and 17th century descriptions of Aztec culture and history written by Spanish clergymen and literate Aztecs in the Spanish or Nahuatl language, such as the famous Florentine Codex compiled by the Franciscan monk Bernardino de Sahagún with the help of indigenous Aztec informants.
एंडरसन hays कूपर ( born जून 3, 1967 ) is an अमरीकी journalist, author, and television personality.
He is the primary anchor of the CNN न्यूज दिखाएँ एंडरसन कूपर 360°.
The program is normally broadcast live from a New York City studio ; however, Cooper प्रायः प्रसारण सजीव on location for breaking news stories.
As of September 2011, he भी serves as मेजबान of उसके अपना eponymous syndicated दिन बात दिखाएँ, एंडरसन सजीव, जिससे होगा be cancelled at the end of the second season.
A plot of a सामान्य वितरण ( or bell-shaped वक्र ) जहाँ प्रत्येक बैंड रै a width of 1 standard deviation – See also : 68-95-99.7 rule
Cumulative probability of a normal वितरण साथ अपेक्षित मान 0 और मानक विचलन 1.
In statistics and probability theory, standard deviation ( represented by the प्रतीक सिग्मा, σ ) shows कैसा much विभिन्नता or dispersion exists from the average ( mean ), or expected value.
A low standard deviation indicates कि the आंकड़ा अंक tend to be बहुत बंद to the औसत ; ऊँची मानक विचलन indicates that the data points are spread out over a large range of values.
The standard deviation of a random variable, statistical जनसांख्यिकी, आंकड़ा नियत, or संभाव्यता वितरण is the square root of its variance.
It is algebraically simpler though practically कम मजबूत than the औसत निरपेक्ष विचलन.
A useful प्रॉपर्टी of मानक विचलन is कि, नापसंद variance, it is expressed in the same units as the data.
Note, however, that for measurements with percentage as unit, the मानक विचलन होगा have प्रतिशत अंक as unit.
In addition to expressing the variability of a population, मानक विचलन is commonly प्रयुक्त to माप विश्वास in statistical conclusions.
For example, the margin of error in polling data is determined by calculating the अपेक्षित मानक विचलन in the परिणाम if the same poll were to be conducted multiple times.
The reported margin of error is typically about twice the मानक विचलन ­– the दायरा of a 95 प्रतिशत विश्वास interval.
In science, researchers commonly report the standard विचलन of प्रायोगिक आंकड़ा, और तभी प्रभाव कि पतन दूर बाहर the दायरा of मानक विचलन हैं माना statistically significant – सामान्य यादृच्छिक गलती or विभिन्नता in the measurements is in this way distinguished from causal variation.
Standard deviation is also important in finance, जहाँ the मानक विचलन on the रेट of वापसी on an निवेश is a माप of the volatility of the investment.
When तभी a नमूना of आंकड़ा इससे a जनसांख्यिकी is उपलब्धियाँ, the मानक विचलन of the जनसांख्यिकी can be estimated by a modified quantity called the `` sample standard deviation ''.
When the sample is the entire population, its unmodified standard विचलन is पुकारा the `` जनसांख्यिकी मानक deviation ''.
Ulluco ( u : ju : kɔ : ) ( Ullucus tuberosus ) is a संयंत्र grown primarily as a root vegetable, secondarily as a leaf vegetable.
The ulluco is one of the सबसे widely grown और economically महत्वपूर्ण रूट crops in the Andean region of South America, second only to the potato.
It is known there with the common name of पापा लिसा, लकिन भी by the क्षेत्रीय names melloco ( इक्वाडोर ), olluco ( पेरू ), chugua ( Colombia ) or ruba ( Venezuela ), among others.
The leaf and the tuber हैं खाद्य, समान to पालक and the potato, respectively.
They are known to contain high levels of protein, कैल्सियम, और carotene.
papalisa यहूद प्रयुक्त by the Incas prior to arrival of Europeans in South America.
Ulluco tubers are marketed as `` धरती रत्नों '' in नई जीलैंड, by Halfords Exotic Produce.

An April 24, 1851 पोस्टर चेतावनी the `` रंगीन people of Boston '' about policemen acting as slave catchers.
The Fugitive Slave Law or Fugitive Slave Act was passed by the संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस on सितंबर 18, 1850, as भाग of the सुलह of 1850 between दक्षिणी slave-holding interests and Northern Free-Soilers.
This was one of the most controversial acts of the 1850 सुलह और heightened उत्तरी fears of a `` स्लेव शक्ति षड्यंत्र ''.
It declared that all runaway slaves were, upon कैप्चर, to be लौटे to their masters.
abolitionists nicknamed it the `` bloodhound विधि '' for the dogs that were used to track down runaway slaves.

he is a सदस्य of the Democratic Party.

Trin-i-tee 5:7 is a gospel duo इससे नई ऑरलियन्स, louisiana in the संयुक्त राज्य.
The group was marketed as a इन्जील वैकल्पिक to r & b लड़की समूह ऐसे as नियति 's Child and TLC.
Trin-i-tee 5:7 has sold over 2.5 लाख एल्बम.
In 1998, the group released their first album हकदार trin-i-tee 5:7 जिससे डेब्यू at # 1 on the शीर्ष इन्जील charts.
The album प्रदर्शित the गीतों `` परमेश्वर 's अनुग्रह '' and the cover song `` Oh !
मरियम do n't तुम Weep ''.
The एल्बम बाद became certified gold.
In 1999, Terri Brown left the group and was later replaced by सिंगर एड्रियन Anderson.
