kennewick is a नगर in benton काउंटी in the southeastern भाग of the U.S. state of Washington, near the Hanford nuclear site.
It is the most populous of the तीन शहरों collectively referred to as the tri-cities ( the others being Pasco and Richland ).
Kennewick is located along the southwest बैंको of the कोलंबिया नदी, विपरीत pasco और बस south of the confluence of the Columbia and Yakima rivers.
The जनसांख्यिकी थी 73,917 at the 2010 census.
April 1, 2012 estimates from the Washington राज्य दफ्तर of वित्तीय प्रबन्धन put the नगर 's जनसांख्यिकी at 75,160.
The nearest commercial विमानक्षेत्र is the tri-cities विमानक्षेत्र in Pasco, a regional commercial and private airport.
Forbes magazine named kennewick the # 2 क्षेत्रफल in the संयुक्त राज्य लिये जॉब विकास, while nearby Yakima was named # 1.
The article cites the number of scientists employed by the प्रशांत उत्तरपश्चिम नेशनल प्रयोगशाला और क्षेत्रफल farmland लिये इस आउटलुक.
The prothrombin time ( PT ) और इसके निकला उपायों of prothrombin अनुपात ( pr ) और अंतरराष्ट्रीय सामान्यीकृत अनुपात ( inr ) हैं उपायों of the extrinsic pathway of coagulation.
This test is भी पुकारा `` protime inr '' and `` PT/INR ''.
वे हैं प्रयुक्त to determine the clotting tendency of blood, in the measure of warfarin dosage, liver damage, and vitamin K status.
PT उपायों कारकों i ( fibrinogen ), II ( prothrombin ), V, VII, and X.
It is used in conjunction साथ the activated आंशिक thromboplastin समय ( aPTT ) which measures the intrinsic pathway.
`` I 'm in the Mood लिये प्रेम '' is a लोकप्रिय song.
The music was लिखा by jimmy mchugh, the गीत by Dorothy Fields.
The song थी प्रकाशित in 1935.
It was introduced by Frances Langford in the movie Every Night at आठ released कि साल.
The song was featured in the 1936 Our Gang ( Little Rascals ) short, the पिंच सिंगर, सुंग by कार्ल `` अल्फाल्फा '' Switzer, and in the 1936 film Palm Springs.
It is often known to be switzer 's हस्ताक्षर सोंग.
James Moody 's saxophone सोलो on a 1952 रिकॉर्डिंग of इस सोंग प्रेरित the song `` Moody 's Mood for Love ``.
Hip hop artist Prince Paul sampled the song as the basis for the track `` Mood for Love '' on his album A Prince Among Thieves ( 1999 ), साथ डॉन newkirk गायन इसके original lyrics.
The सोंग 's शीर्षक प्रेरित the अंग्रेज़ी title of Wong Kar Wai 's movie In the Mood for Love.
Cross-cultural psychology is the scientific study of human behavior and mental प्रक्रियाओं, सहित दोनो उनके variability और invariance, अंतर्गत विविध cultural conditions.
Through expanding research methodologies to recognize cultural variance in behavior, भाषा, और अर्थ it seeks to extend और develop psychology.
Since psychology as an academic discipline was developed largely in North America, some psychologists became concerned that constructs स्वीकृत as सार्वभौमिक यहूद नहीं as निश्चर as previously assumed, विशेषकर चूंकि अनेक कोशिशें to replicate notable experiments in other cultures had varying success.
Since there are questions as to whether theories dealing with central themes, such as affect, cognition, conceptions of the self, and मुद्दे ऐसे as psychopathology, चिंता, और अवसाद, may कमी बाह्य वैध जब `` exported '' to अन्य सांस्कृतिक contexts, cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान re-examines उन्हें using methodologies designed to फ़ैक्टर in सांस्कृतिक मतभेद so as to खाता लिये सांस्कृतिक variance.
Although some critics have pointed to methodological flaws in cross-cultural psychological शोध और अर्जी कि गंभीर त्रुटियां in the सैद्धांतिक और methodological bases प्रयुक्त impede बल्कि than सहायता the वैज्ञानिक ढूंढें लिये सार्वभौमिक सिद्धान्त in मनोविज्ञान, cross-cultural psychologists हैं turning अधिक to the पढ़ाई of कैसा differences ( variance ) occur, rather than searching for universals in the style of physics or chemistry.
In 1972 the International Association of cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान ( iaccp ) थी स्थापित.
This branch of psychology has जारी to विस्तार as वहीँ रै महरूम an increasing लोकप्रियता of incorporating संस्कृति और विविधता into studies.
Cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान is differentiated इससे सांस्कृतिक psychology.
The latter is the branch of psychology that holds that human behavior is significantly influenced by cultural differences, meaning that psychological phenomena can तभी be compared साथ प्रत्येक अन्य आरपार संस्कृतियों to a बहुत सीमित extent.
In contrast, cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान शामिल a search for possible universals in behavior and mental processes.
Walter J. Lonner, लिखने लिये नजर on psi ची, रै stated कि `` cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान can be thought of as a type research methodology, rather than an entirely separate field within psychology ( 2000 ). ''
`` Judas '' is a song by American recording artist महिला गागा, इससे उसके दूसरी स्टुडियो एल्बम Born This Way ( 2011 ).
It was released by interscope रिकॉर्ड on अप्रैल 15, 2011, चार दिनों ahead of its scheduled release.
Written and produced by Lady Gaga and RedOne, `` Judas '' is a dance और इलेक्ट्रो हाउस सोंग परिचय a स्त्री in प्रेम साथ a man जो गद्दारी उसके.
It embodies the incidents कि have haunted गागा in the पास्ट, और its core meaning refers to the negative parts of her life that she ca n't escape.
Gaga has further explained that the सोंग थी भी परिचय honoring एक 's भीतरी अंधेरा in order to bring oneself into the light.
The artwork for the सिंगल थी designed by Gaga in Microsoft Word.
In spite of a polarizing प्रभाव on अनेक धार्मिक समूह, the सोंग थी generally खूब प्राप्त by आलोचकों, जो likened the song to `` Bad Romance `` with some noting it should have been the album 's lead single.
The song has a similar sound to Gaga 's previous redone-produced ट्रैक्स, सहित `` पोकर फेस ``, `` lovegame ``, `` Bad Romance '', and `` Alejandro ``.
it contains तीन पृथक hooks and a house -influenced break down.
Gaga समझाया कि the लाइनों बोला दौरान the विश्लेषण talk about her as beyond redemption, regarding the traditional views of what a woman should be.
`` Judas '' initially had a strong sales opening, but थी कम कामयाब commercially in तुलना to गागा 's previous singles.
The song reached the top टेन of the चार्ट in सबसे प्रमुख म्यूज़िक बाज़ार, और भी पहुँचे the top of the charts in South Korea.
a म्यूज़िक वीडियो लिये the सोंग थी फिल्माया in अप्रैल 2011, co-directed by Gaga and Laurieann Gibson and co-starring Norman Reedus.
It has a Biblical storyline where Reedus निभाई यहूदा इस्कैरियट और गागा निभाई मरियम magdalene.
The video portrays उन्हें as आधुनिक दिन प्रचारकों going to Jerusalem.
It included the Biblical story of Judas betraying Jesus, and ended साथ गागा as magdalene getting stoned to मौत.
Before its release, the Catholic League condemned गागा लिये the कथित उपयोग of धार्मिक imagery और उसके भूमिका in the video.
However, critics generally praised the वीडियो, नहीं ढूंढना any offensive content.
the वीडियो थी मनोनीत for two awards at the 2011 MTV Video Music Awards.
Gaga has performed `` यहूदा '' on a क्रमांक of टेलीविज़न shows, सहित the ग्राहम नॉर्टन दिखाएँ, शनिवार रात्रि सजीव, Good Morning Americas `` Summer Concert Series '', the French X Factor as well as on The Ellen DeGeneres Show.
H.264/MPEG-4 Part 10 or avc ( उन्नत वीडियो कोडिंग ) is a मानक लिये वीडियो संपीडन, और is फिलहाल एक of the सबसे commonly प्रयुक्त स्वरुप लिये the रिकॉर्डिंग, संपीडन, and distribution of high definition video.
The final drafting work on the पहला संस्करण of the मानक थी completed in May 2003.
H.264/MPEG-4 AVC is a block-oriented motion-compensation -आधारd कोडेक मानक विकसित by the itu-t वीडियो कोडिंग विशेषज्ञ Group ( VCEG ) together with the ISO/IEC JTC1 Moving Picture Experts Group ( MPEG ).
The project साझेदारी प्रयत्न is ज्ञात as the Joint Video Team ( JVT ).
The itu-t h.264 मानक और the iso/iec mpeg-4 avc मानक ( formally, iso/iec 14496-10 – mpeg-4 भाग 10, उन्नत वीडियो कोडिंग ) हैं jointly maintained so that they have identical technical content.
H.264 is perhaps best known as being one of the codec standards for blu-ray discs ; सब blu-ray डिस्क खिलाड़ी जरूर be समर्थ to decode H.264.
It is also widely used by streaming internet sources, such as videos from Vimeo, youtube, और the itunes स्टोर, वेब तन्त्र ऐसे as the adobe फ्लैश खिलाड़ी और microsoft silverlight, और भी विभिन्न hdtv प्रसारण over स्थलीय ( atsc, isdb-t, dvb-t or DVB-T2 ), cable ( DVB-C ) and satellite ( DVB-S and DVB-S2 ).
Non-binding arbitration is a type of arbitration in which the arbitrator makes a determination of the rights of the पार्टियों to the विवाद, लकिन इस determination is नहीं बाइंडिंग upon them, and no enforceable arbitration award is issued.
The `` award '' is in प्रभाव an सलाहकार राय of the arbitrator 's view of the respective merits of the parties cases.
Non-binding arbitration is used in कनेक्शन साथ कोशिशें to पहुँचें a negotiated settlement.
The role of an arbitrator in non-binding मध्यस्थता is, on the सतह, similar to that of a mediator in a mediation.
However, the principal distinction is that whereas a mediator will try to help the parties ढूँढें a मध्य मैदान to सुलह at, the arbitrator remains totally removed इससे the उपनिवेश प्रक्रम और होगा तभी दे a determination of देयता and, if appropriate, an indication of the quantum of damages payable.
subsequent to a non-binding मध्यस्थता, the पार्टियों remain फ़्री to pursue उनके दावा either through the courts, or by way of a binding arbitration, although in practice a settlement is the most common outcome.
the पुरस्कार और तर्क in a non-binding मध्यस्थता is लगभग invariably inadmissible in any subsequent action in the courts or in another arbitration tribunal.
Non-binding मध्यस्थता is utilised ज़्यादातर in the United States and Canada.
It is largely unknown in Europe, although in the United Kingdom there is a practice of parties who are seeking a settlement to jointly instruct a Queen 's Counsel for an राय on the merits और संभावित क्वांटम of a अर्जी, और तब to negotiate on the आधार of the दृश्य expressed in that opinion.
Augustine Volcano is a Lava Dome Complex on अगस्टाइन द्वीप in southwestern कुक इनलेट in the kenai Peninsula Borough of southcentral coastal Alaska, southwest of Anchorage.
The Alaska Volcano Observatory currently rates Mount Augustine as Level of Concern Color Code ग्रीन लिये विमानन और the ज्वालामुखी चेतावनी स्तर is at सामान्य.
Augustine Island रै a जमीन क्षेत्रफल of, जबकि वेस्ट द्वीप, बस off Augustine 's western shores, has.
The द्वीप is बना up मुख्यतः of past eruption deposits.
Scientists have been able to discern that पास्ट गुम्बद पतन रै resulted in विशाल avalanches.
A मैप of Belize.
The country of Belize रै roughly 386 km of तटरेखा, और रै अनेक मूँगा reefs, cays, और आइलैंड्स in the Caribbean Sea.
सबसे of ये रूप the बेलीज़ अवरोध रीफ, the longest in the western hemisphere stemming approximately.
the रीफ और इसके आइलैंड्स have महरूम a UNESCO World Heritage Site since 1996.
the following is a सूची of oceanic आइलैंड्स of बेलीज़, arranged according to region but all of which are in the Caribbean Sea.
Most of the islands variate in स्पेलिंग between `` cay '' और `` caye '', and also use the Spanish `` cayo ''.
River islands have नहीं महरूम सूचीबद्ध.
Drive Letter Access ( DLA ) is a discontinued commercial packet writing application for the microsoft खिड़कियाँ ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली कि allows ऑप्टिकल disc data storage devices to be used in a manner similar to floppy disks.
DLA is a पैकेट लिखने प्रौद्योगिकी लिये cd and DVD media that uses the UDF file system.
DLA is not compatible with Windows Vista और नए, हालांकि a पैच exists to फिक्स this issue under Windows Vista.
roxio बर्न थी introduced on April 30, 2009.
As a बदलना लिये dla, it remedies संगतता issues Internet Explorer 8.
Alpha रेक्स emmanuel humbard ( अगस्त 13, 1919 – सितंबर 21, 2007 ) थी a well-known अमरीकी टेलीविज़न evangelist whose Cathedral of Tomorrow show was shown on over 600 stations at the peak of its popularity.
Limitless is a 2011 American थ्रिलर फिल्मी निर्देशित by neil बर्गर और अभिनीत ब्राडली Cooper, Abbie Cornish, and Robert De Niro.
It is based on the 2001 अनोखा the अंधेरा फ़ील्ड by एलन glynn साथ the पटकथा by Leslie Dixon.
Alaska ( ) is a state in the United States, situated in the northwest extremity of the North American continent, with the अंतरराष्ट्रीय boundary साथ कनाडा to the ईस्ट, the आर्कटिक समंदर to the उत्तर, और the प्रशांत Ocean to the west and south, with Russia further west across the Bering Strait.
Alaska is the largest राज्य in the संयुक्त राज्य by क्षेत्रफल, the 4th तनिक populous और the तनिक densely populated of the 50 United States.
लगभग हाफ of अलास्का 's 731,449 निवासियों live within the Anchorage metropolitan area.
Alaska 's economy is वर्चस्व by the आयल, प्राकृतिक गैस, और फ़िशिंग उद्योग ; it रै ये संसाधन in abundance.
Alaska was purchased from Russia on March 30, 1867, लिये $ 7.2 लाख ( $ समायोजित for inflation ) at approximately two cents per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ).
The land went through several administrative changes before becoming an organized ( or incorporated ) territory on may 11, 1912, और the 49th राज्य of the u.S. on January 3, 1959.
The name `` Alaska '' ( Аляска ) was already introduced in the रूसी औपनिवेशिक काल, जब it थी प्रयुक्त तभी लिये the प्रायद्वीप और is निकला इससे the aleut alaxsxaq, अर्थ `` the मेनलैंड '' or, more literally, `` the object towards which the action of the sea is directed ''.
It is also known as alyeska, the `` ग्रेट जमीन '', an Aleut word derived from the same root.
नेल्सन मंडेला महानगर विश्वविद्यालयों ( nmmu ) is a दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी tertiary education institution with its main administration in the coastal city of Port Elizabeth.
A विलय of तीन संस्थानों संस्थापित nmmu in जनवरी 2005 लकिन इसके इतिहास तिथियाँ वापस to 1882 with the foundation of Port Elizabeth Art School.
The University draws अंतरराष्ट्रीय विद्यार्थी इससे all over the world.
There are over 3000 international students and include students from the United States, France, China, Germany, Belgium, Denmark, फिनलैंड, नीदरलैंड्स, नार्वे, स्वीडन, संयुक्त किंगडम और अनेक other countries.
NMMU is a comprehensive university offering पेशेवर और वोकेशनल प्रशिक्षण.
The विश्वविद्यालयों रै छह campuses - five in Port Elizabeth and one in George.
the प्रमुख कैम्पस is the South Campus.
Students at NMMU can study towards diplomas and डिग्री up to और सहित डॉक्टरेट स्तर योग्यता.
A number of पाठ्यक्रम शामिल कार्यस्थल अनुभव as भाग of the curriculum.
CoverGirl is an American cosmetics brand founded in Maryland, by the noxzema रासायनिक कम्पनी ( बाद पुकारा noxell ) and acquired by Procter & Gamble in 1989.
The Noxell Company advertised इस कॉस्मेटिक्स लकीर by allowing `` कवर लड़कियों '', फ़ैशन मॉडल जो appear on the front cover of women 's magazines, to wear its products.
CoverGirl makes up for lack of direct individual customer service by providing a चौड़ी किस्में of कॉस्मेटिक्स उपलब्धियाँ at उचित कीमतें.
On the Origin of Species, published on 24 November 1859, is a कार्य of वैज्ञानिक साहित्य by चार्ल्स डार्विन जिससे is माना to be the foundation of evolutionary biology.
Its full title was On the Origin of Species by Means of प्राकृतिक चयन, or the संरक्षण of favoured दौड़ in the संघर्ष for Life.
लिये the छठे संस्करण of 1872, the short title was changed to The Origin of Species.
Darwin 's book introduced the scientific theory that populations evolve over the कोर्स of पीढियां through a प्रक्रम of प्राकृतिक चयन.
It presented a body of evidence that the diversity of life arose by आम descent through a branching pattern of evolution.
Darwin शामिल प्रमाण कि he था gathered on the beagle expedition in the 1830s और उसके subsequent findings from research, correspondence, and experimentation.
विभिन्न विकासवादी विचार था already महरूम proposed to explain new findings in biology.
There was growing support for such ideas among dissident anatomists and the general public, but during the first half of the 19th century the English वैज्ञानिक स्थापना थी closely tied to the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड, जबकि विज्ञान थी भाग of प्राकृतिक धर्मशास्त्र.
Ideas about the transmutation of species were controversial as they conflicted with the beliefs that species were unchanging parts of a designed पदानुक्रम और कि इंसानो यहूद अद्वितीय, unrelated to अन्य पशु.
The political and theological implications यहूद पडती debated, लकिन transmutation थी नहीं accepted by the scientific mainstream.
The book was written for non-specialist पाठक और आकर्षित फैली ब्याज upon इसके प्रकाशन.
As Darwin was an eminent scientist, his findings were taken seriously and the evidence he प्रस्तुत उत्पन्न वैज्ञानिक, philosophical, and religious discussion.
The debate over the किताब contributed to the अभियान by t.h. हक्स्ले और उसके fellow सदस्यों of the x क्लबों to secularise science by promoting scientific naturalism.
Within two decades there was widespread scientific agreement that evolution, with a branching pattern of common descent, had occurred, लकिन वैज्ञानिकों यहूद slow to दे प्राकृतिक चयन the significance कि डार्विन विचार appropriate.
During the `` eclipse of डार्विनवाद `` इससे the 1880s to the 1930s, विभिन्न अन्य mechanisms of evolution were given more credit.
With the development of the modern evolutionary synthesis in the 1930s and 1940s, डार्विन 's अवधारणा of विकासवादी अनुकूलन through प्राकृतिक चयन became सेंट्रल to आधुनिक विकासवादी theory, now the unifying concept of the life sciences.
Charles डिलन `` केसी '' स्टेंगल ( ; जुलाई 30, 1890 – सितंबर 29, 1975 ), nicknamed `` The Old Perfessor '', was an American Major League Baseball outfielder and manager.
He was निर्वाचित to the Baseball Hall of Fame in.
Stengel was born in Kansas City, Missouri, and originally nicknamed `` डच '', a आम उपनाम at कि time for Americans of German ancestry.
After his major league career began, he acquired the nickname `` Casey '', which originally came from the initials of his गृहनगर ( `` K. C. '' ), जिससे विकसित into `` केसी '', बहकावे by the चौड़ी लोकप्रियता of the कविता केसी at the Bat.
In the 1950s, sportswriters उतावले उसे साथ yet another उपनाम, `` The Old Professor '' ( or `` Perfessor '' ), for his sharp wit and his ability to talk at length on anything baseball -related.
Although उसके बेसबॉल करियर spanned a क्रमांक of टीमों और शहरों, he is primarily associated with clubs in New York City.
between playing और मैनेजिंग, he is the only man to have worn four of New York 's major league clubs ' uniforms.
He was the पहला of चार मेन ( through the ऋतु ) to मैनेज दोनो the नई यॉर्क यांकीज़ and New York Mets ; Yogi Berra, Dallas Green, and Joe Torre are the others.
जैसे टोरेस, he भी प्रबंधित the Braves and the Dodgers.
He ended his baseball career as the beloved मैनेजर लिये the तब विस्तार नई यॉर्क मेट्स, जिससे जीती over the hearts of New York partly due to the unique character of their veteran leader.
June ( ) is the sixth माह of the साल in the जूलियन और gregorian calendars and one of the four months with a length of 30 days.
Ovid provides two etymologies for June 's name in उसके कविता concerning the महीने हकदार the Fasti.
The first is कि the माह is नामित बाद the रोमन देवी juno, बीवी of बृहस्पति और समतुल्य to the यूनानी देवी hera ; the दूसरी is कि the नाम comes from the Latin word iuniores, meaning `` younger ones, '' as opposed to maiores ( `` elders '' ) for which the preceding month May may be named ( Fasti VI.1–88 ).
See : Months in various calendars also called the season of the June is the माह साथ the longest daylight घंटों of the साल in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध और the shortest daylight hours of the year in the Southern Hemisphere.
June in the Northern Hemisphere is the seasonal समतुल्य to दिसम्बर in the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध और वाइस versa.
In the Northern hemisphere, the शुरूआत of the meteorological गर्मियाँ is 1 June.
In the Southern गोलार्ध, the शुरूआत of the meteorological winter is 1 June.
At the प्रारंभ of जून, the सूर्य उदय in the नक्षत्र of वृष ; at the end of June, the sun rises in the constellation of Gemini.
However, due to the precession of the equinoxes, जून begins साथ the सूर्य in the astrological sign of Gemini, and ends with the sun in the astrological sign of Cancer.
June is known for the विशाल क्रमांक of विवाह कि occur over the course of the month.
According to one etymology, जून is नामित after Juno ( Hera ).
Juno was the goddess of विवाह और a शादीशुदा युगल 's household, so कुछ consider it शुभ लक to be married in this month.
According to another etymology provided by the Roman poet Ovid, June is named for the iuniores, latin for `` young लोगों '' ( fasti vi.88 ) और कि the माह of may is नामित लिये the maiores, लैटिन लिये `` बड़ो ''.
In आइसलैंड, लोकगीत says कि if तुम bathe नग्न in the morning ओस on the morning of June 24, you are supposed to keep aging at bay for longer.
A constitution is a set of fundamental principles or established precedents according to जिससे a राज्य or अन्य organization is governed.
These नियम साथ मेक up, i.e. constitute, what the entity is.
When these principles are written down into a single document or set of legal दस्तावेज़, those दस्तावेज़ may be कहा to embody a लिखा संविधान ; if वे हैं लिखा down in a single comprehensive document, it is said to embody a codified constitution.
constitutions चिंता अलग स्तर of संगठन, from sovereign states to companies and unincorporated associations.
A treaty which establishes an international organization is also its संविधान, in कि it होता define कैसा कि संगठन is गठित.
Within states, whether sovereign or federated, a संविधान defines the सिद्धान्त upon जिससे the राज्य is based, the procedure in which laws are made and by whom.
Some constitutions, विशेषकर संहिताबद्ध constitutions, भी अधिनियम as limiters of state power, by establishing lines which a state 's rulers can not cross, such as fundamental rights.
George Washington at संवैधानिक सम्मेलन of 1787, हस्ताक्षर of U.S. Constitution.
The Constitution of India is the longest लिखा संविधान of कोई sovereign देश in the संसार, containing 448 आलेख, 12 schedules और 100 amendments, with 117,369 words in its English language version, while the United States Constitution is the shortest written constitution, at 7 articles and 27 amendments.
Ron Diftler ( left ), NASA Robonaut manager assisting in a Robonaut familiarization training session in the स्पेस पर्यावरण सिमुलेशन प्रयोगशाला at नासा 's जॉनसन Space Center.
Engineering management is a specialized form of प्रबन्धन कि is चिंतित साथ the अनुप्रयोग of engineering principles to business practice.
Engineering management is a करियर कि brings साथ the technological problem-solving savvy of अभियान्त्रिकी और the organizational, administrative, and planning abilities of management in order to oversee complex enterprises from conception to completion.
Example areas of engineering are product development, manufacturing, construction, design engineering, industrial अभियान्त्रिकी, प्रौद्योगिकी, उत्पादन, or कोई अन्य फ़ील्ड कि employs कर्मियों जो perform an अभियान्त्रिकी function.
Successful engineering प्रबंधक typically आवश्यकता प्रशिक्षण और अनुभव in business and engineering.
Technically inept managers tend to be deprived of support by their technical team, and non-commercial प्रबंधक tend to कमी वाणिज्यिक सूझबूझ to उद्धार in a market economy.
Largely, engineering managers manage engineers who are driven by non-entrepreneurial सोच, यूँ आवश्यकता the जरुरी लोगों कौशल to कोच, mentor और motivate technical professionals.
Engineering professionals joining manufacturing companies sometimes become अभियान्त्रिकी प्रबंधक by डिफॉल्ट बाद a काल of समय.
They are required to learn how to manage once they are on the job, though इस is प्रायः an अप्रभावी रास्ता to develop managerial abilities.
In an insurance policy, the deductible is the राशि of खर्च कि जरूर be सशुल्क आउट of जेब पहले an insurer will pay any expenses.
In general उपयोग, the पद deductible may be प्रयुक्त to describe एक of अनेक प्रकार of clauses ( see below ) that are used by insurance companies as a threshold for policy payments.
Deductibles are typically प्रयुक्त to deter the विशाल क्रमांक of नगण्य दावा कि a उपभोक्ता can be reasonably expected to bear the cost of.
By restricting इसके कवरेज to कार्यक्रम कि हैं significant पर्याप्त to incur large costs, the insurance firm expects to pay out slightly smaller amounts much less frequently, incurring much higher savings.
As a result, insurance premiums are typically सस्ता जब वे involve उच्चतर deductibles.
Deductibles are normally provided as clauses in an insurance नीति कि dictate कैसा much of an insurance-covered व्यय is borne by the policyholder.
वे हैं सामान्यतः कोटेड as a फिक्स्ड मात्रा और is a part of most policies covering losses to the policy holder.
The insurer तब becomes liable लिये claimable खर्च कि exceed this amount ( subject to the maximum sum claimable indicated in the contract ).
Depending on the policy, the deductible may लागू प्रति covered घटना, or प्रति साल.
For policies where incidences are not easy to delimit ( लिये उदाहरण स्वास्थ्य बीमे ), the deductible is typically applied per year.
Several deductibles can be नियत by the insurer based on the cause of the claim.
For example, a single आवास बीमे नीति may contain अनेक deductible amounts for loss or damage arising from theft, fire, natural calamities, evacuation etc.
There are also deductible reimbursement कार्यक्रम कि reimburse a deductible in the event of an auto, home, boat/yacht or health insurance claim.
An invoice or bill is a commercial document issued by a seller to a buyer, indicating the उत्पाद, quantities, और सहमत कीमतें लिये उत्पाद or सेवाएं the विक्रेता रै provided the buyer.
An invoice indicates the बिक्री लेनदेन तभी.
Payment terms हैं स्वतंत्र of the चालान और हैं negotiated by the buyer and the seller.
Payment terms are usually शामिल on the चालान.
The buyer could have already सशुल्क लिये the उत्पाद or सेवाएं सूचीबद्ध on the invoice.
Buyer can also have a maximum number of दिनों in जिससे to अदा लिये ये goods और is sometimes offered a छूट if सशुल्क पहले the due date.
In the rental industry, an invoice must include a specific सन्दर्भ to the अवधि of the समय होने billed, so in जोड to मात्रा, दाम और छूट the invoicing amount is also based on duration.
Generally प्रत्येक लकीर of a rental चालान होगा refer to the वास्तविक घंटों, दिनों, weeks, months, etc., being billed.
From the point of view of a विक्रेता, an चालान is a बिक्री invoice.
From the पाइंट of दृश्य of a खरीदार, an चालान is a purchase invoice.
The document indicates the buyer and विक्रेता, लकिन the पद चालान indicates धन is owed or owing.
In English, the context of the पद चालान is प्रायः प्रयुक्त to clarify इसके अर्थ, ऐसे as `` we भेजा उन्हें an invoice '' ( they owe us money ) or `` We received an invoice from them '' ( we owe them money ).
The right main bronchus ( or right primary bronchus, or right प्रिंसिपल bronchus ) is a bronchus of the respiratory system.
It is wider, shorter, and अधिक लंबवत in दिशा than the left.
It is about 2.5 cm long, और enters the सही फेफड़ों nearly विपरीत the fifth thoracic vertebra.
The azygos रग arches over it इससे पीछे ; और the सही pulmonary artery lies at first below and then in front of it.
परिचय 2 cm इससे इसके शुरुआत it देता बंद a branch to the upper lobe of the right lung.
This is termed the eparterial branch of the bronchus, क्युकी it arises ऊपर the सही pulmonary artery.
The bronchus now passes below the artery, and is known as the hyparterial शाखा ; it divides into दो शाखाओं for the middle and lower lobes.
If a foreign body in the airway passes through the श्वासनली, it होगा सबसे संभावित डालें the सही प्रमुख bronchus बजाय of the बाएँ, due to the straighter alignment of the right bronchus to the trachea.
Squash is a racquet sport played by two ( singles ) or four players ( doubles ) in a four-walled court with a छोटी, खोखला रबर बॉल.
The players must alternate in striking the ball with their racquet और hit the बॉल onto the playable surfaces of the four walls of the court.
The game was formerly called squash racquets, a reference to the `` squashable '' नरम बॉल प्रयुक्त in the खेल ( compared साथ the fatter बॉल प्रयुक्त in इसके जनक खेल racquets or rackets ).
Squash is पहचाना by the ioc और समर्थक हैं lobbying for its incorporation in a future Olympic program.
In 2003, Forbes rated squash as the क्रमांक एक healthiest खेल to play.
Residual oil is oil found in low एकाग्रता naturally or in बेहाल oil fields.
Often mixed with water, it can नहीं be बरामद by conventional techniques.
However, it can be recovered using carbon dioxide-enhanced oil रिकवरी ( co2 eor ) जिससे involves injecting कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड into the खूब reducing श्यानता and enhancing flow of the oil.
The technique is not new but has not been used extensively on residual oil zones, low-grade जमा of पेट्रोलियम ऐसे as the 38 वर्गाकार मील in the permian जलाशय of टेक्सास leased by elliott रूज़वेल्ट Jr.
The technique is सीमित by उपलब्धता of carbon dioxide.
It does not परिणाम in sequestration of the कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड लकिन the gas is recycled as much as possible.
संयुक्त राज्य reserves of अवशेष आयल are estimated to be 100 billion barrels.
Artist 's rendering of the fire, by जॉन R. chapin, originally मुद्रित in हार्पर 's साप्ताहिक ; the दृश्य चेहरों पूर्वोत्तर across the Randolph Street Bridge.
The Great Chicago आग थी a conflagration कि burned इससे संडे, अक्तूबर 8, to early Tuesday, October 10, 1871, killing hundreds and destroying about in Chicago, Illinois.
Though the fire was one of the largest U.S. आपदाओं of the 19th सदी, the पुनर्निर्माण कि began helped develop शिकागो as एक of the सबसे populous और economically important American cities.
Henry VIII ( 28 June 1491 – 28 January 1547 ) थी किंग of इंग्लैण्ड इससे 21 अप्रैल 1509 जबतक उसके death.
He was lord, और बाद किंग, of आयरलैंड, as well as continuing the nominal claim by the English monarchs to the Kingdom of France.
Henry was the second monarch of the ट्यूडर राजवंश, succeeding उसके पिता, हेनरी VII.
Besides his six विवाह, हेनरी viii is ज्ञात लिये उसके भूमिका in the विरह of the Church of England from the Roman Catholic Church.
Henry 's struggles with Rome led to the separation of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड इससे papal प्राधिकार, the विच्छेद of the Monasteries, and his own establishment as the Supreme Head of the Church of England.
Yet he remained a आस्तिक in कोर कैथोलिक theological शिक्षाओं, even after his excommunication from the Roman Catholic Church.
Henry oversaw the legal union of England and वेल्स साथ the कानून in वेल्स अधिनियमों 1535 और 1542.
In 1513, the new king allied with the Holy Roman Emperor, Maximillian I, and invaded फ़्रांस in 1513 साथ a विशाल, well-equipped फौज, लकिन हासिल छोटी at a considerable financial cost.
Maximillian, for his भाग, प्रयुक्त the अंग्रेज़ी आक्रमण to उसके अपना ends, और इस prejudiced England 's ability to defeat the French.
This foray would prove the start of an obsession लिये हेनरी, जो invaded again in 1544.
This time, Henry 's forces captured the महत्वपूर्ण नगर of boulogne, लकिन again the पावन रोमन सम्राट, चार्ल्स v, समर्थित हेनरी तभी as long as he needed to and England, strained by the enormous cost of the war, ransomed the city back for peace.
His contemporaries considered Henry in his prime to be an attractive, शिक्षित और संपन्नता किंग, और he रै महरूम वर्णित as `` एक of the सबसे charismatic rulers to sit on the English throne ''.
Besides ruling with absolute power, he also सगाई खुद as an लेखक और composer.
His desire to provide England with a male heir – which stemmed partly from personal vanity and partly क्युकी he believed a बेटी होता be असमर्थ to consolidate the ट्यूडर राजवंश और the नाजुक सलाम कि existed following the युद्धों of the Roses – led to the two things for which Henry is most remembered : his six marriages and the English Reformation.
Henry became रुग्ण मोटे और उसके स्वास्थ्य suffered, contributing to his death in 1547.
He is frequently characterised in उसके बाद जीवन as a lustful, egotistical, हर्ष, और असुरक्षित king.
La Reina del Sur ( The Queen of the South ) is a Spanish-language telenovela produced by the United States टेलीविज़न संजाल telemundo, in संयोजन साथ the एंटेना 3 संजाल और rti producciones.
Based on a novel of the same name by स्पेनी लेखक arturo pérez-reverte, the नाटक depicts the वृद्धि of टेरेसा मेंडोज़ा ( केट डेल कैस्टिलो ), a यंग स्त्री इससे मैक्सिको जो becomes the most powerful drug trafficker in southern Spain.
Patricio Wills, the अध्यक्ष of telemundo टेलीविज़न studios, थी the कार्यपालिका निर्माता.
Though La Reina del Sur was nominated for Novela of the साल, पसंदीदा सीसे अभिनेत्री, और बेहतरीन ख़राब लक वीडियो, it won no awards.
With a $ 10 लाख बजट, la reina डेल सूर थी the most expensive telenovela ever produced by Telemundo.
The program 's प्रीमियर on फ़रवरी 28, 2011, थी the संजाल 's उच्चतम rated premiere for a telenovela to date.
The program frequently dominated its time slot, even over English भाषा प्रोग्रामिंग on अन्य प्रमुख U.S. networks.
La Reina del Sur समाप्त इसके 63 एपीसोड चलाएं on telemundo और इसके 13 एपीसोड चलाएं on Antena 3 simultaneously on May 30, 2011.
The final episode was the उच्चतम रेटेड ब्रॉडकास्ट in telemundo 's 19-year इतिहास ( 4.2 लाख दर्शक ), और ताल सब of the English language U.S. television networks to earn the number one slot in the 18-49 adult demographic.
The program 's success spurred telemundo to लॉन्च इसके पहला अभियान to लाभ the श्रेणी an एमी पुरस्कार नामांकन.
A one-night special featuring अनेक डाल सदस्यों aired on may 31, 2011, और चिह्नित the telemundo डेब्यू of noted Latina television personality Cristina Saralegui.
La Reina del Sur is broadcast in several other markets, including सर्बिया, कोलंबिया, चिली, साइप्रस, निकारागुआ, कोस्टा रिका, मैक्सिको, अल्बानियाई, हंगेरियाई, स्लोवेनियाई, क्रोएशिया, Romania, ( among others ).
an उदाहरण of रैक mounted servers
A web hosting service is a type of अंतरजाल होस्टिंग सेवा कि allows individuals and organizations to make their website accessible via the World Wide Web.
Web hosts are companies that provide space on a server स्वामित्व or leased लिये उपयोग by क्लाइंट, as खूब as providing अंतरजाल कनेक्टिविटी, typically in a data center.
Web hosts can also provide data center space and connectivity to the Internet लिये अन्य सर्वर स्तिथ in उनके आंकड़ा बीच, पुकारा colocation, भी ज्ञात as आवास in Latin America or France.
The scope of वेब होस्टिंग सेवाएं varies greatly.
the सबसे मौलिक is वेब पेज और small-scale संचिका होस्टिंग, जहाँ files can be uploaded via File Transfer Protocol ( FTP ) or a Web interface.
The files are usually delivered to the Web `` as is '' or साथ minimal प्रसंस्करण.
Many अंतरजाल सेवा प्रदाताओं ( ISPs ) offer this service free to subscribers.
Individuals and organizations may भी obtain वेब पेज होस्टिंग इससे alternative service providers.
Personal web site होस्टिंग is typically फ़्री, advertisement-sponsored, or inexpensive.
Business web site hosting often रै a उच्चतर व्यय depending upon the size and type of the website.
Single page hosting is generally sufficient लिये personal web pages.
A complex site calls for a more comprehensive package that provides डेटाबेस support और अनुप्रयोग विकास प्लेटफ़ॉर्म ( e.g. पीएचपी, जावा, माणिक्य on rails, coldfusion, or ASP.NET ).
These सुविधाएं allow ग्राहक to लिखें or स्थापना स्क्रिप्ट लिये applications like forums and content management.
Also, Secure Sockets परत ( एसएसएल ) is typically प्रयुक्त लिये e-commerce.
The host may also provide an interface or control panel for managing the Web सर्वर और installing स्क्रिप्ट, as खूब as अन्य मौड्यूल और सेवा अनुप्रयोग like e-mail.
Some hosts specialize in निश्चित तन्त्र or सेवाएं ( e.g. e-commerce ), जिससे हैं commonly प्रयुक्त by larger companies that outsource network infrastructure.
मैडेन एनएफएल ( ज्ञात as जॉन मैडेन फ़ुटबॉल पहले 1993 ) is an अमरीकी football video game series developed by Electronic Arts Tiburon for EA Sports.
The game series is named after Pro फ़ुटबॉल हॉल of famer जॉन मैडेन, a well-known पूर्व सुपर कटोरी –winning कोच of the ओकलैंड Raiders and color commentator.
The series is the बेहतरीन selling ea खेल series.
The games have consistently महरूम a बेहतरीन विक्रेता, और रै भी spawned TV shows where players compete.
Among the game 's realistic features include sophisticated playbooks और खिलाड़ी आंकडे, और आवाज़ commentary कि allows खिलाड़ी to hear the game as if it were a real TV broadcast.
The Madden NFL series रै महरूम nicknamed the एनएफएल 's 33rd मताधिकार.
The series was originally conceived by इलेक्ट्रॉनिक कला संस्थापक ट्रिप हॉकिन्स, जो then approached Madden in 1984 for his endorsement and expertise.
Due to Madden 's insistence कि the खेल be as यथार्थवादी as संभावित, the पहला version of John Madden Football was not released until 1988.
The second संस्करण of the खेल थी released in 1990, साथ सालाना versions since then.
The श्रेणी ' नाम थी बदला to मैडेन एनएफएल in 1993 बाद EA acquired the rights to use NFL teams and players.
despite मैडेन 's रिटायरमेंट as a प्रसारणकर्ता in 2009, he continues to lend his name and provide expertise for the game.
Cindy Lee Miller Sheehan ( born जुलाई 10, 1957 ) is an अमरीकी antiwar activist whose son, U.S. Army Specialist Casey Sheehan, was killed by enemy action during the Iraq War.
She attracted national and international media attention in August 2005 for her extended antiwar विरोध at a makeshift शिविर बाहर अध्यक्ष जार्ज W. बुश 's टेक्सास ranch —a स्टैंड कि खींचा दोनो passionate support and angry criticism.
Sheehan भागा unsuccessfully लिये Congress in 2008.
She is a vocal आलोचक of अध्यक्ष बराक ओबामा 's foreign policy.
Her संस्मरण, सलाम माँ : a माँ 's यात्रा Through Heartache to Activism, was published in 2006.
Sheehan थी the 2012 vice-presidential nominee of the Peace and Freedom Party.
Wyclef jeanelle जां ( ; ; born अक्तूबर 17, 1969 ) wyclef Dumped From Haiti 's Presidential Ballot – TIME, Aug 21, 2010.
`` Before he announced on August 5 that he was running लिये अध्यक्ष of हैती, wyclef जां थी स्टिल लिस्टिंग उसके आयु as तभी 37 सालो old.
But after declaring himself a presidential candidate, the haitian-american-irish hip-hop स्टार भी decided to आइये साफ और confirm कि he थी really 40. '' is a three-time Grammy Award -winning Haitian-American rapper, singer-songwriter, musician, record producer, and politician.
At age nine, जां स्थानांतरित to the संयुक्त राज्य साथ उसके परिवार and has spent much of his life in the country.
He first received fame as a member of the acclaimed नई जर्सी हिप हॉप समूह the fugees.
On August 5, 2010, Jean दायर लिये उम्मीदवारी in the 2010 haitian अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, हालांकि the Electoral Commission subsequently ruled him ineligible to stand as he had not met the requirement to have been resident in Haiti for five years.
Wyclef Jean to अपील विरूद्ध हैती चुनाव सत्ताधारी – बीबीसी न्यूज, Aug 22, 2010.
Haiti 's electoral commission said that Mr Jean was ineligible to stand as the Haitian संविधान requires उम्मीदवार to have जिया in the देश लिये पाँच सालो prior to an election.
The 40-year-old सिंगर जीवनदान in the US.
Jean 's efforts at earthquake relief, highly publicized in 2010 throughout हैती और the संयुक्त राज्य, यहूद channeled through his charitable organization, Yéle Haiti.
the दान, जिससे performed a किस्में of charitable works in Haiti between 2005 and 2010, effectively closed in 2012.
In law, a set-off is a statutory रक्षा to the पूरे or to a portion of a plaintiff 's claim.
It had no existence under the English आम विधि, होने निर्मित by 2 जियो. ii c. 22 लिये the relief of insolvent debtors, although set-off was recognized in equity.
Such a defense could be pleaded only in respect of परस्पर debts of a definite अक्षर, और किया नहीं लागू to cases in which damages were claimed, nor to equitable claims or demands.
By the rules of the Supreme Court ( O. XIX. r. 3 ) a प्रतिवादी in an कार्रवाई may नियत बंद or नियत up कोई सही or अर्जी by रास्ता of counterclaim against the claims of a plaintiff, and such set-off or counterclaim has the same effect as a statement of claim in a cross-action.
The legal defense of set-off ( above ) was originally introduced to prevent the unfair situation whereby a person ( `` Party A '' ) who owed धन to another ( `` पार्टी b '' ) could be भेजा to कर्जदार थाना, despite the फैक्ट कि पार्टी b भी owed money to Party A.
The law thus allows both parties to टालना भुगतान जबतक उनके संबंधित दावा have महरूम सुना in court.
Upon निर्णय, दोनो दावा हैं बुझे और replaced by a सिंगल जाल योग owing ( e.g. if पार्टी a owes पार्टी b 100 और पार्टी b owes पार्टी a 105, the two sums are set off and replaced with a single obligation of 5 from Party B to Party A ).
Set-off can also be incorporated by contractual अनुबंध so कि, जहाँ a पार्टी मूलभूत, the mutual amounts owing are automatically set off and extinguished.
In certain jurisdictions ( including the UK ), set-off takes प्लेस automatically upon the insolvency of a company.
This means that, for each party which is both a creditor and debtor of the insolvent company, mutual debts are set-off against each other, and then either the bankrupt 's creditor can claim the balance in the दिवालियापन or the ट्रस्टी in दिवालियापन can पूछो लिये the संतुलन बाकी to be सशुल्क, depending on जिससे पक्ष owed the most.
This has been criticized as an undeclared सुरक्षा ब्याज कि violates the principle of pari passu.
The alternative, where a creditor has to pay all its debts, but receive only a सीमित portion of the leftover moneys कि अन्य unsecured लेनदारों मिलेंगी, मुद्राएँ the danger of 'knock-on ' insolvencies.
The right to set off is विशेषकर महत्वपूर्ण जब रिपोर्टिंग a बैंको 's exposures to regulatory authorities.
The situation where a bank has to report that it has lent a विशाल योग to a borrower ( और is इसलिए उजागर, क्युकी वहीँ is a रिस्क कि the borrower might डिफॉल्ट thereby अग्रणी to the घाटा of the बैंको 's or इसके जमाकर्ताओं ' धन ) is thus replaced ( where the bank has taken security over shares or securities of the borrower ) with an exposure of the money lent minus the value of the security taken.
Jennifer Joanna Aniston ( born फ़रवरी 11, 1969 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री, film director, and producer.
Aniston gained worldwide recognition in the 1990s for portraying Rachel Green on the television sitcom मित्रों, a भूमिका जिससे अर्जित उसके an एमी पुरस्कार, a सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार, और a स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड Award.
Aniston has also enjoyed a successful हॉलीवुड फिल्मी करियर.
She gained critical acclaim for her performances in the स्वतंत्र films वो 's the एक ( 1996 ), दफ्तर स्पेस ( 1999 ), the शुभ लड़की ( 2002 ) और मित्रों साथ Money ( 2006 ).
She has had her greatest commercial सफलताओं साथ the films ब्रूस सर्वशक्तिमान ( 2003 ), the break-up ( 2006 ), मार्ले & me ( 2008 ), Just Go with It ( 2011 ) and Horrible Bosses ( 2011 ).
Aniston received a star on the हॉलीवुड चलना of कीर्ति on फ़रवरी 22, 2012.
A white Bengal बाघ at the ह्यूस्टन Aquarium
( वीडियो )
a श्वेत बाघ at tobu Zoo, in Saitama, Japan.
The white tiger is a recessive म्यूटेंट of the बंगाल बाघ, जिससे थी reported in the जंगली इससे समय to time in Assam, Bengal, Bihar and especially from the former State of Rewa.
Conventional PCI ( PCI is an initialism formed from परिधीय घटक इंटरकनेक्ट, भाग of the पीसीआई लोकल बस मानक और प्रायः shortened to just PCI ) is a local computer bus for attaching hardware devices in a computer.
The PCI bus supports the कृत्यों मिला on a प्रोसेसर bus, but in a standardized format that is independent of any particular processor.
Devices connected to the bus appear to the प्रोसेसर to be कनेक्ट सीधे to the प्रोसेसर बस, और हैं आबंटित पता in the processor 's address space.
Attached devices can take either the form of an एकीकृत सर्किट fitted onto the मदरबोर्ड itself, पुकारा a planar यंत्र in the पीसीआई specification, or an expansion card that fits into a slot.
The PCI Local Bus was first implemented in ibm pc compatibles, जहाँ it विस्थापित the संयोजन of isa प्लस एक vesa लोकल बस as the bus configuration.
It has subsequently महरूम अपनाया लिये अन्य कंप्यूटर प्रकार.
PCI and PCI-X are being replaced by PCI Express, but, most motherboards हैं स्टिल बना साथ एक or अधिक पीसीआई स्लॉट, जिससे हैं sufficient for many uses.
The PCI specification covers the शारीरिक आकार of the बस ( सहित the आकार और अंतरण of the circuit board edge electrical contacts ), electrical characteristics, bus timing, and protocols.
The specification can be खरीदा इससे the पीसीआई खास Interest Group ( PCI-SIG ).
Typical पीसीआई ताश प्रयुक्त in pcs शामिल : संजाल ताश, ध्वनि ताश, modems, extra ports such as USB or serial, TV tuner cards and disk controllers.
PCI video cards replaced ISA and VESA cards, जबतक growing बैंडविड्थ आवश्यकताएँ outgrew the capabilities of PCI ; the preferred interface for video cards became AGP, and then PCI Express.
PCI video cards remain available for use साथ बूढ़ा pcs बगैर अगप or पीसीआई एक्स्प्रेस स्लॉट.
Many devices previously provided on पीसीआई विस्तार ताश हैं अभी commonly एकीकृत onto motherboards or available in universal serial bus and PCI Express versions.
Caffeine is a bitter, white crystalline xanthine एल्कलॉएड that acts as a stimulant drug.
कैफीन is मिला in varying quantities in the बीज, पत्ते, और फल of कुछ पौधे, जहाँ it अधिनियमों as a प्राकृतिक कीटनाशक कि paralyzes and kills certain insects feeding on the plants, as well as enhancing the reward memory of pollinators.
It is most commonly consumed by humans in infusions निकाली इससे the बीज of the कॉफी संयंत्र और the पत्ते of the tea bush, as well as from various foods and drinks containing products derived from the kola nut.
Other sources शामिल yerba maté, guarana जामुन, guayusa, and the yaupon holly.
In humans, caffeine acts as a central बेचैन प्रणाली उत्तेजक, temporarily warding बंद drowsiness और restoring alertness.
It is the संसार 's सबसे widely खपत psychoactive ड्रग, लकिन नापसंद many other psychoactive substances, it is legal and unregulated in nearly all parts of the world.
Beverages containing कैफीन, ऐसे as कॉफी, चाय, नरम पेय, और energy drinks, enjoy great popularity.
In North अमेरिका, 90 % of adults consume caffeine daily.
Part of the reason caffeine is classified by the Food and Drug Administration as GRAS ( generally recognized as सुरक्षित ) is कि विषाक्त doses ( over 10 गामा ) हैं much उच्चतर than typically प्रयुक्त doses ( कम than 500 milligrams ).
Ordinary consumption can have low health risks, even when carried on for years – there may be a modest सुरक्षात्मक प्रभाव विरूद्ध कुछ रोगों, सहित parkinsons बीमारी, and certain types of cancer.
Caffeine can have both positive और ऋणात्मक प्रभाव on चिंता disorders.
Some people experience sleep disruption if वे consume कैफीन, विशेषकर दौरान the संध्या घंटों, लकिन अन्य दिखाएँ छोटी disturbance and the effect of caffeine on sleep is highly variable.
Evidence of a रिस्क to गर्भावस्था is equivocal, लकिन कुछ अधिकारियों have concluded कि दूरदर्शी advice is for pregnant women to limit consumption to the equivalent of two cups of coffee per day or less.
The अमरीकी कॉंग्रेस of obstetricians और स्त्रीरोग ( acog ) concluded in 2010 that caffeine consumption is safe up to 200 mg per day in pregnant women.
Caffeine रै pressor और mild diuretic प्रभाव जब administered to लोगों जो हैं नहीं प्रयुक्त to it, लकिन नियमित उपयोक्ता develop a सहिष्णुता to इस प्रभाव, और अध्ययन have generally failed to support the common notion that ordinary consumption contributes significantly to dehydration.
With heavy use, tolerance develops rapidly to autonomic प्रभाव ऐसे as elevated दिल rate and muscle twitching, but not to the cognitive or arousal effects of caffeine.
The degree to which कैफीन can उपज clinically significant शारीरिक और दिमागी dependence remains a subject of controversy in the medical literature.
a kicktail cruiser
A longboard is a longer रूपांतर of a skateboard.
It is commonly used for cruising, downhill रेसिंग, slalom racing, sliding, and/or transport.
Sources outside of विकिपीडिया दे differing अनुमानs:
The CIA 's World Factbook gives the world population as 7,021,836,029 ( July 2012 est. ) and the distribution of धर्मों as ईसाई 100 % ( of जिससे रोमन कैथोलिक 18.85 %, प्रोटोस्टेंट 8.15 %, परंपरागत 4.96 %, anglican 1.26 % ), मुस्लिम 22.74 %, हिन्दू 13.8 %, Buddhist 6.77 %, Sikh 0.35 %, Jewish 0.22 %, Baha'i 0.11 %, other religions 10.95 %, non-religious 9.66 %, atheists 2.01 %.
( 2010 est. ).
The coast सीमाएँ of कैलिफ़ोर्निया स्पैन इससे हम्बोल्ट County, California south to Santa Barbara County.
The other three coastal California mountain ranges are the अनुप्रस्थ सीमाएँ, प्रायद्वीपीय सीमाएँ और the Klamath Mountains.
physiographically, वे हैं a खण्ड of the larger प्रशांत किनारा प्रांत, जिससे in फेरे are part of the larger Pacific Mountain System physiographic division.
UNESCO has included the `` California coast सीमाएँ जीवमंडल आरक्षित `` in इसके man और the जीवमंडल कार्यक्रम of World Network of Biosphere Reserves since 1983.

an ऑटोमोबाइल, autocar, मोटर car or car is a wheeled motor vehicle used for transporting passengers, which also carries its own engine or motor.
Most definitions of the पद बताएँ कि ऑटोमोबाइल हैं designed to चलाएं primarily on सड़कें, to have seating लिये एक to आठ लोगों, to typically have four wheels, and to be constructed principally for the transport of people rather than goods.
The term motorcar has also been प्रयुक्त in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of electrified रेल प्रणालियों to denote a car जिससे कृत्यों as a छोटी लोकोमोटिव but also provides space for passengers and baggage.
These लोकोमोटिव गाड़ियाँ यहूद प्रायः प्रयुक्त on suburban रूट by दोनो interurban and intercity railroad systems.
it थी अनुमानित in 2010 कि the क्रमांक of ऑटोमोबाइल था risen to over 1 billion vehicles, up from the 500 million of 1986.
The numbers हैं increasing rapidly, especially in China and India.
John Fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy ( May 29, 1917 – November 22, 1963 ), प्रायः referred to by उसके आद्याक्षर jfk, थी the 35th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य, सेवारत इससे 1961 जबतक his death in 1963.
After military service as commander of the मोटर torpedo नौकाएँ pt-109 और pt-59 दौरान संसार युद्ध ii in the दक्षिण प्रशांत, कैनेडी represented मैसाचुसेट्स ' 11th congressional district in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1947 to 1953 as a Democrat.
Thereafter, he परोसा in the u.S. सीनेट from 1953 until 1960.
Kennedy defeated Vice President and Republican candidate Richard Nixon in the 1960 u.S. अध्यक्षीय चुनाव.
At 43 years of age, he is the youngest to have महरूम निर्वाचित to the दफ्तर, the second-youngest अध्यक्ष ( बाद थियोडोर रूज़वेल्ट ), and the first person born in the 20th century to serve as president.
A Catholic, Kennedy is the तभी non- प्रोटोस्टेंट अध्यक्ष, और is the तभी अध्यक्ष to have won a Pulitzer Prize.
Events during his presidency included the Bay of Pigs Invasion, the क्यूबन मिसाइल संकट, the भवन of the बर्लिन वॉल, the स्पेस रेस, the african-american Civil Rights Movement, and early stages of the Vietnam War.
Therein, Kennedy increased the number of military advisers, special operation शक्तियां, और helicopters in an प्रयत्न to कोर the स्प्रेड of communism in South East Asia.
The Kennedy प्रशासन अपनाया the नीति of the रणनीतिक Hamlet Program which was implemented by the South Vietnamese government.
It involved निश्चित मजबूर relocation, गाँव internment, और पृथक्करण of ग्रामीण दक्षिण वियतनामी from the northern and southern communist insurgents.
Kennedy was assassinated on नवम्बर 22, 1963 in डलास, Texas.
ली घनघोर ओसवाल्ड थी चार्ज साथ the अपराधों, but he was shot and killed by Jack Ruby two days later, before a trial could take place.
The FBI and the Warren Commission officially concluded कि Oswald was the lone assassin.
However, the United States House Select Committee on assassinations ( hsca ) concluded कि those investigations यहूद flawed and that Kennedy was probably assassinated as the result of a conspiracy.
However, ABC News in their investigation, The Kennedy Assassination : Beyond Conspiracy, पुष्टि the निष्कर्षों of the वारेन आयोग ; having concluded ओसवाल्ड acted alone.
Kennedy 's controversial Department of रक्षा tfx सेनानी bomber कार्यक्रम led to a congressional investigation that lasted from 1963 to 1970.
चूंकि the 1960s सूचना concerning Kennedy 's private life has come to light.
Details of कैनेडी 's स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं in जिससे he struggled have become better known, especially since the 1990s.
हालांकि initially रखा रहस्य इससे the सामान्य public, reports of Kennedy 's philandering have garnered much press.
Kennedy बाँधने अत्यधिक in public opinion ratings of U.S. presidents.
A Siemens MXL fire alarm control panel ( शीर्ष ) और ग्राफिक annunciator ( नीचे ) लिये potomac हॉल, at जेम्स Madison University.
A Vigilant VM-1 fire alarm control ईकाई ( facu ) / autonomous कंट्रोल ईकाई ( acu ) साथ integrated voice evacuation and fire fighter telephone system.
manufactured by एडवर्ड्स, A UTC F & S Company
A Fire Alarm Control Panel ( FACP ), or आग सचेतक कंट्रोल ईकाई ( facu ), is the controlling component of a Fire Alarm System.
The panel receives information from environmental sensors designed to detect changes associated with fire, मॉनीटर उनके operational अखंडता और provides लिये स्वचालित कंट्रोल of उपकरण, और हस्तांतरण of सूचना जरुरी to तैयारी the सुविधा लिये आग based on a predetermined sequence.
The panel may also supply electrical energy to operate कोई संबद्ध सेंसर, कंट्रोल, ट्रांसमीटर, or relay.
There are four basic types of panels : coded panels, conventional panels, addressable panels, और मल्टीप्लेक्स systems.
