MTV 's first day on the air was rebroadcast on vh1 क्लासिक in 2006 और अपलोड onto youtube in 2010 ( हालांकि तभी the first four hours were authentic ; the rest were edited VH1 rebroadcasts ).
Bandaranaike International Airport ( BIA ) ( भी ज्ञात as katunayake अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र और कोलोन अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र ) is एक of the दो अंतरराष्ट्रीय एयरपोर्ट serving the city of Colombo, the other is Ratmalana International Airport.
Mattala Rajapaksa अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र स्तिथ in दक्षिणी नगर of hambantota is the other international airport in Sri Lanka.
भण्डारनायके अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र is स्तिथ in Katunayake, 22 miles ( 35 km ) north of Colombo.
It is administered by विमानक्षेत्र और विमानन सेवाएं ( Sri Lanka ) Ltd.
It is the hub of SriLankan Airlines, the नेशनल वाहक of श्री लंका, और mihin लंका, the बजट एयरलाइन of Sri Lanka.
Black swan is a 2010 अमरीकी मनोवैज्ञानिक थ्रिलर और हॉरर फिल्मी निर्देशित by Darren Aronofsky and starring Natalie Portman, Vincent Cassel, and Mila Kunis.
The plot घूमती around a उत्पादन of tchaikovsky 's swan झील बैले by a prestigious New York City company.
The production requires a नर्तकी to खेल the निर्दोष और नाजुक श्वेत swan, लिये जिससे the वचनबद्ध dancer Nina ( Portman ) is a perfect fit, as well as the dark and sensual Black Swan, which are qualities embodied by the new arrival Lily ( Kunis ).
नीना is अभिभूत by a अहसास of immense दबाव जब वो पाता herself स्पर्धा लिये the part, causing her to lose her tenuous grip on reality and descend into a living nightmare.
Aronofsky conceived the premise by connecting his viewings of a production of Swan Lake with an unrealized पटकथा परिचय understudies और the ख़्याल of होने haunted by a दोगुना, समान to the लोकगीत surrounding doppelgängers.
Aronofsky cites fyodor दोस्तोयेव्स्की 's `` the दोगुना `` as another inspiration for the film.
The director also considered ब्लैक swan a साथी टुकड़ा to उसके 2008 फिल्मी the पहलवान, with both films involving demanding performances for different kinds of art.
he और पोर्टमैन पहला discussed the प्रोजेक्ट in 2000, और बाद a ब्रैड अनुलग्नक to सार्वभौमिक studios, ब्लैक Swan was produced in New York City in 2009 by Fox Searchlight Pictures.
Portman and Kunis trained in ballet for several महीने prior to फिल्मांकन, and notable figures from the ballet world helped with film production to shape the ballet presentation.
The film premiered as the opening film for the 67th वेनिस अंतरराष्ट्रीय फिल्मी पर्व on सितंबर 1, 2010.
It था a सीमित रिलीज in the संयुक्त राज्य starting दिसम्बर 3, 2010 and opened nationwide on December 17.
Black Swan received critical तारीफ़ upon इसके रिलीज, विशेषकर लिये पोर्टमैन 's प्रदर्शन और aronofsky 's दिशा, और थी a significant बक्सा दफ्तर कामयाबी, grossing $ 329 million worldwide.
The film received five Academy Award nominations and पोर्टमैन जीती the बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री पुरस्कार लिये the फिल्मी, as खूब as अनेक अन्य बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री पुरस्कार in अनेक guilds and festivals, while Aronofsky was nominated for Best Director.
In addition, the film itself प्राप्त a नामांकन लिये बेहतरीन चित्र.
The world’s first ice-calorimeter, used in the winter of 1782-83, by Antoine Lavoisier and pierre-simon लाप्लास, to determine the ऊष्मा शामिल in विभिन्न रासायनिक परिवर्तन ; calculations जिससे यहूद based on Joseph Black ’s prior discovery of latent heat.
These experiments mark the न्यास of thermochemistry.
A calorimeter ( from Latin calor, meaning heat ) is an object used for calorimetry, or the प्रक्रम of measuring the ऊष्मा of रासायनिक प्रतिक्रियाएँ or शारीरिक changes as well as heat capacity.
अवकल स्कैनिंग calorimeters, समतापी microcalorimeters, titration calorimeters और त्वरित rate calorimeters are among the most common types.
A simple calorimeter just consists of a थर्मामीटर संलग्न to a मेटल संग्राहक पूरा of जल suspended above a combustion chamber.
To find the enthalpy change per mole of a substance A in a reaction between two substances A और b, the substances हैं added to a ऊष्मामापी और the आरंभिक and final temperatures ( before the reaction started and after it has finished ) are noted.
Multiplying the temperature change by the mass and specific ऊष्मा capacities of the substances देता a मान लिये the उर्जा दिए बंद or अवशोषित दौरान the प्रतिक्रिया.
dividing the उर्जा बदलें by कैसा अनेक moles of A were present gives its enthalpy change of reaction.
This विधि is प्रयुक्त primarily in अकादमिक शिक्षण as it describes the theory of calorimetry.
It does not account for the heat घाटा through the संग्राहक or the ऊष्मा क्षमता of the थर्मामीटर and container itself.
In addition, the object placed inside the calorimeter shows that the objects transferred their heat to the calorimeter और into the द्रव, और the ऊष्मा अवशोषित by the ऊष्मामापी और the द्रव is बराबर to the ऊष्मा दिए बंद by the धातुओं.
A जोड़ी of ग्रीन flip-flops
Flip-flops ( also called zōri, thongs, jandals, or a variety of other names throughout the संसार ) हैं a प्रकार of open-toed चन्दन typically worn in casual situations, such as outside or at the beach.
They consist of a चपटा एकमात्र आयोजित loosely on the पैर by a y-shaped डोरी कि गुजरता between the पहला and second toes and around either side of the foot.
वे may भी be आयोजित to the पैर साथ a सिंगल strap over the front of the foot rather than a thong.
the नाम `` flip-flop '' originated क्युकी of the sound that is made by slapping between the sole of the foot and the floor when walking.
This style of footwear has been worn by the लोगों of अनेक संस्कृतियों throughout the संसार, originating as early as the ancient Egyptians in 4,000 B.C.
The modern flip-flop descends from the Japanese zōri, which became popular after World War II when soldiers returning to the संयुक्त राज्य brought उन्हें back.
They became लोकप्रिय in कैज़ुअल जमावट दौरान the 1960s, 1990s, और 2000s, और कुछ किस्में have even found their way into more formal attire, despite criticism.
The use of flip-flops can result in many pains और चोटों, सहित टखने sprains and broken bones.
Some individuals जो चलना लिये long अवधि report pain in the feet, ankles, and lower legs.
The lack of support provided by flip-flops प्रायः परिणाम in over-pronation चोटों, caused by the पैर slipping inwards further than normal.
इस can सीसे to flat feet and tendonitis.
Other injuries that may परिणाम हैं due to the जूते 's open-toed प्रकृति, such as stubbed toes, cuts, and bruises.
Doctors recommend purchasing pricier sandals with thick-cushioned soles, as well as those that have a डोरी कि is नहीं कैनवास और कि आता वापस लगभग to the टखने.
The स्वामी of hanjin ओसाका, देखी यहाँ transiting the पनामा कनाल in 2008, declared general average following an explosion in the ship 's engine room on.
The law of general average is a legal principle of मेरीटाइम विधि according to जिससे सब पार्टियों in a समुद्र venture proportionally share कोई नुकसान resulting from a voluntary sacrifice of part of the ship or cargo to save the whole in an emergency.
In the exigencies of hazards faced at sea, crew members प्रायः have अनमोल छोटी समय in जिससे to determine precisely जिनकी cargo they are jettisoning.
Thus, to avoid quarrelling that could waste valuable time, there arose the equitable practice whereby all the merchants whose cargo landed सकुशल होता be पुकारा on to योगदान a portion, आधारित upon a share or प्रतिशत, to the व्यापारी or व्यापारियों जिनकी goods था महरूम tossed overboard to avert imminent peril.
While general औसत traces इसके origins in प्राचीन मेरीटाइम विधि, स्टिल it remains part of the admiralty law of most countries.
The first codification of सामान्य औसत थी the यॉर्क antwerp नियम of 1890.
अमरीकी कंपनियाँ accepted it in 1949.
सामान्य औसत requires तीन तत्व जिससे हैं clearly stated by Mr. Justice Grier in Barnard v. Adams:
`` 1st.
A common danger : a danger in which vessel, cargo and crew all participate ; a danger imminent and जाहिर 'inevitable, ' मगर by voluntarily रूष्ट the घाटा of a portion of the पूरे to सहेजें the शेष. ''
`` 2nd. There must be a voluntary jettison, jactus, or ढलाई दूर, of कुछ portion of the संयुक्त चिंता लिये the purpose of बचने इस निकट peril, periculi imminentis evitandi causa, or, in other words, a transfer of the peril from the whole to a particular portion of the whole. ''
`` 3rd.
This attempt to avoid the निकट आम peril जरूर be successful ''.
Example Polish call लिये टीकाकरण विरूद्ध डिप्थीरिया और टेटनस.
A vaccination अनुसूची is a श्रेणी of vaccinations, सहित the समय of सब doses, which may be either recommended or compulsory, depending on the country of residence.
A vaccine is an antigenic preparation used to produce active immunity to a disease, in order to prevent or reduce the effects of संक्रमण by कोई प्राकृतिक or `` जंगली '' pathogen.
Many vaccines require multiple doses for maximum effectiveness, either to produce sufficient आरंभिक प्रतिरक्षा जवाब or to boost response that fades over time.
लिये उदाहरण, टेटनस टीका boosters are often recommended every 10 years.
Vaccine schedules are विकसित by सरकारी एजेंसियों or physicians समूह to achieve अधिकतम प्रभावकारिता using required and recommended vaccines for a locality while minimizing the number of health care system interactions.
Over the past two decades, the recommended vaccination schedule रै grown rapidly और become अधिक जटिल as अनेक नई टीके have महरूम विकसित.
Some vaccines are अनुशंसित तभी in निश्चित क्षेत्रों ( देशों, subnational क्षेत्रों, or at-risk populations ) where a disease is common.
For instance, yellow fever vaccination is on the routine vaccine अनुसूची of फ्रेंच guiana, is अनुशंसित in निश्चित regions of ब्राज़ील लकिन in the संयुक्त राज्य is तभी दिए to travelers heading to countries with a history of the disease.
In developing countries, vaccine recommendations भी लो into खाता the स्तर of स्वास्थ्य परवाह अभिगम, the cost of vaccines and issues with vaccine availability and storage.
Sample vaccinations schedules discussed by the संसार स्वास्थ्य संगठन दिखाएँ a विकसित country using a schedule which extends over the first five years of a child 's life and uses vaccines which cost over $ 700 including administration costs while a developing country uses a schedule providing vaccines in the first 9 months of life and costing only $ 25.
This अंतर is due to the निम्नतर लागत of स्वास्थ्य परवाह, the निम्नतर लागत of अनेक टीके provided to developing nations, and that more expensive vaccines, often for less common diseases, are not utilized.
In 1900, the smallpox टीका थी the तभी एक administered to children.
By the early 1950s, children routinely received four vaccines, for सुरक्षा विरूद्ध ( डिप्थीरिया, pertussis, टेटनस, पोलियो, और smallpox ), और as अनेक as पाँच shots by two years of age.
Since the mid-1980s, many टीके have महरूम added to the schedule.
, the US Centers for Disease कंट्रोल और रोकथाम ( सीडीसी ) अभी अनुशंसा टीकाकरण against at least fourteen diseases.
By two years of age, U.S. children receive as many as 24 vaccine injections, और might प्राप्त up to पाँच गोलियाँ during one visit to the doctor.
The use of combination vaccine products means that,, the United Kingdom 's immunization program consists of 10 injections by the आयु of दो, बल्कि than 25 if टीकाकरण लिये प्रत्येक बीमारी थी दिए as a separate injection.
Two revellers नृत्य in the streets.
The रूप of नाचना is पुकारा `` wining '' ( winding ) pronounced wine-ing
A Music Truck entertains the भीड on the गलियों.
Trucks are an integral part of the गली परेड, featuring सजीव प्रदर्शन or deejays
The Trinidad and टोबैगो कार्निवल is an सालाना इवेंट आयोजित on the सोमवार और मंगलवार पहले राख बुधवार, and is well known for participant 's colorful costumes and exuberant celebrations.
Carnival in Trinidad and टोबैगो is the सबसे significant इवेंट on the आइलैंड्स ' सांस्कृतिक और पर्यटन पंचांग, साथ numerous cultural events running in the lead up to the street parade on Carnival Monday and Tuesday.
It is said that if the आइलैंडर्स हैं नहीं celebrating it, तब they are preparing for it, while reminiscing about the past year 's festival.
The heart of the musical celebration has been calypso ; recently सोका रै replaced कैलिप्सो as the सबसे मनाये प्रकार of म्यूज़िक.
Costumes, stickfighting और limbo प्रतियोगिताओं हैं also important components of the festival.
Carnival as it is celebrated in Trinidad and टोबैगो is भी मनाये in शहरों worldwide.
These including Toronto 's caribana, मियामी 's मियामी कार्निवल, ह्यूस्टन carifest, लंदन 's नॉटिंग Hill Carnival as well as New York City 's Labor Day Carnival to name a few.
कार्निवल थी निर्मित जब वेस्ट अफ़्रीकी स्लेव mimicked their French owners who where known for their lavish costumes balls.
Forbidden to partake in these festivities and confined to their quarters, स्लेव संयुक्त तत्व इससे उनके अपना संस्कृतियों to their master 's fete.
Hence the creation of characters such as Jab Jab or Jab molassie ( शैतानों ), मध्यरात्रि लुटेरों, imps, lagahroo, soucouyant, la diablesse and Demons.
With the abolition of slavery in 1838, freed Africans took their version of Carnival to the streets through अभिव्यक्ति of ड्रम, riddim भाग जैसे tamboo बाँसुरी और as प्रत्येक नई अप्रवासी जनसांख्यिकी entered Trinidad, Carnival evolved into what we know today.
The city of Chicago, Illinois आयोजित a nonpartisan mayoral चुनाव on मंगलवार, फ़रवरी 22, 2011.
Incumbent Mayor Richard M. Daley, a member of the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी जो था महरूम in दफ्तर चूंकि 1989, did not seek a seventh term as mayor.
Candidates needed to collect 12,500 petition signatures by नवम्बर 22, 2010 to qualify लिये a प्लेस on the ballot.
April 5, 2011 was scheduled to be a runoff election तिथि if no प्रत्याशी प्राप्त an निरपेक्ष बहुमत.
Rahm Emanuel won the race लिये महापौर साथ अधिक than 55 % of the vote.
He was उदघाटन on may 16, 2011.
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' is a song by अमरीकी इंडी पॉप बैंड फोस्टर the लोगों.
It was released as the group 's debut सिंगल in सितंबर 2010, और the following साल थी शामिल on उनके ep फोस्टर the People and their debut album Torches.
`` उत्तेजित up kicks '' became the समूह 's भेदन hit और was one of the most popular songs of 2011.
The song was written और अंकित by frontman चिह्नित फोस्टर जबकि he was working as a commercial jingle writer.
Contrasting with the upbeat musical composition, the lyrics describe the homicidal विचार of a troubled युवावस्था.
The track received considerable attention after it was posted ऑनलाइन in 2010 as a फ़्री डाउनलोड, और it helped the समूह गार्नर a multi-album record deal with Columbia Records imprint Startime International.
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' proved to be a स्लीपर hit ; in 2011, बाद receiving significant airplay on modern rock stations, the song crossed-over onto contemporary hit radio stations.
The song खर्च आठ लगातार सप्ताह at क्रमांक तीन on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 चार्ट in the संयुक्त राज्य, बनाना it the first Billboard Alternative Songs number-one single to crack the U.S. top 5 since Kings of Leon 's `` Use Somebody `` in 2009.
The song was widely praised by critics, और it रै महरूम licensed लिये उपयोग in a wide range of popular media since its release.
`` Pumped up kicks '' प्राप्त a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार नामांकन लिये बेहतरीन Pop Duo/Group Performance.
The State Fair of West Virginia is an सालाना राज्य मेला लिये वेस्ट वर्जिनिया.
It is held annually in mid-august on the राज्य fairgrounds in fairlea, निकट lewisburg, वेस्ट वर्जिनिया in the southeastern part of the state.
The State Fairgrounds consists of a विशाल खोलें फ़ील्ड लिये carnivals और प्रदर्शनियों, a घोड़ा track, grandstands, and several exhibition buildings.
फ़्री पार्किंग is provided सटा to the fairgrounds और, जबतक 2006, फ़्री कैंप was also available in a large field with running-water toilets and showers, but no hookups.
Campers are now चार्ज a छोटी शुल्क.
The श्वेत हाउस, the अध्यक्ष 's आधिकारिक निवास and center of the administration
Under the United States Constitution, the President of the United राज्य is the सिर of राज्य और सिर of सरकारी of the United States.
As chief of the executive branch and head of the federal government as a पूरे, the प्रेसिडेंसी is the उच्चतम राजनैतिक दफ्तर in the संयुक्त राज्य by influence and recognition.
the अध्यक्ष is भी the commander-in-chief of the United States Armed Forces.
The president is indirectly निर्वाचित to a four-year पद by an चुनावी कॉलेज ( or by the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि चाहिए the Electoral College fail to award an absolute majority of votes to any person ).
Since the ratification of the Twenty-second Amendment to the United States Constitution in 1951, no व्यक्ति may be निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष अधिक than twice, और no एक जो रै परोसा अधिक than two years of a term to which someone else was elected may be elected more than once.
Upon the death, resignation, or removal from दफ्तर of an लाज़िम अध्यक्ष, the वाइस President assumes the office.
The President must be at least 35 सालो of आयु और a `` प्राकृतिक born '' नागरिक of the United States.
This list includes only those persons who were sworn into office as president following the अनुसमर्थन of the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान, जिससे took effect on March 4, 1789.
For American leaders पहले इस अनुसमर्थन, देखिए अध्यक्ष of the Continental Congress.
The list does not include any Acting Presidents under the twenty-fifth amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान.
There have been 43 people sworn into office, और 44 presidencies, as ग्रोवर क्लीवलैंड परोसा दो non-consecutive शर्तें और is counted chronologically as both the 22nd and 24th president.
Of the individuals elected as president, four died in office of natural causes ( William Henry Harrison, Zachary Taylor, Warren G. Harding, and Franklin D. Roosevelt ), four were assassinated ( अब्राहम lincoln, जेम्स A. गारफ़ील्ड, विलियम mckinley, और जॉन F. Kennedy ) and one resigned ( Richard Nixon ).
George Washington, the first president, was उदघाटन in 1789 बाद a सर्वसम्मत vote of the Electoral College.
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest time in office with 32 days in 1841, and Franklin D. रूज़वेल्ट खर्च the longest साथ over बारह सालो, लकिन died shortly into his fourth term in 1945.
He is the only president to serve more than two terms, and a constitutional amendment, affecting राष्ट्रपतियों बाद हैरी ट्रूमैन, थी passed to सीमा the क्रमांक of टाइम्स an व्यक्तिगत can be निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष.
Andrew Jackson, the seventh president, was the first to be निर्वाचित by मेन of सब वर्ग in 1828 बाद सबसे कानून barring non-land-owners इससे voting were repealed.
Warren Harding was the first elected बाद महिलाओं gained मतदान अधिकारों in 1920.
इतिहास रिकॉर्ड चार राष्ट्रपतियों – जॉन q एडम्स, रदरफोर्ड B. हेज़, बेंजामिन हैरिसन and George W. Bush – who lost the popular vote but assumed office.
John F. कैनेडी रै महरूम the तभी अध्यक्ष of रोमन कैथोलिक आस्था, और the वर्तमान अध्यक्ष, Barack Obama, is the first president of African descent.
`` लोम्बार्डी ट्रॉफी '' redirects here.
For the award awarded annually to the बेहतरीन कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल lineman or linebacker, see Lombardi Award.
The विंस लोम्बार्डी ट्रॉफी is the ट्रॉफी awarded प्रत्येक साल to the जीतना टोली of the National Football League 's championship game, the Super Bowl.
The trophy is नामित in सम्मान of legendary एनएफएल coach Vince Lombardi.
This is a list of tables of the verified oldest people in the world in ordinal रैंक, ऐसे as oldest व्यक्ति or oldest man.
In these tables, a supercentenarian is considered 'verified ' if his or her claim has been validated by an अंतरराष्ट्रीय देह कि specifically सौदे in आयु शोध, such as the Gerontology Research Group ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records.
The longest unambiguously documented इंसान जीवनकाल is कि of jeanne calment of फ़्रांस ( 1875–1997 ), जो died at age 122 years, 164 days.
She met Vincent वैन gogh जब वो थी 12 or 13.
This led to न्यूज मीडिया ध्यान in 1985, after Calment turned 110.
Subsequent investigation found documentation for Calment 's age, परे कोई उचित सवाल, in the रिकॉर्ड of her native city, Arles, France.
More evidence of Calment 's lifespan has been produced than for any other supercentenarian ; उसके मामला serves as an archetype in the methodology लिये verifying the ages of the world 's oldest people.
The longest undisputed lifespan for male supercentenarians is that of jiroemon किमुरा, जो फिलहाल जीवनदान in जापानी and is age as of.
Since the death of 115-year old Dina manfredini of the संयुक्त राज्य, on 17 दिसम्बर 2012, किमुरा, born 19 अप्रैल 1897, is the oldest living person in the world whose age can be documented.
He has also been the oldest living man since the मौत of 114-year बूढ़ा वाल्टर breuning on 14 अप्रैल 2011.
चूंकि the मौत of 115-year बूढ़ा koto okubo of Japan on 12 January 2013, the oldest living woman has been -year-old Misao Okawa, also from Japan, born on 5 March 1898.
The People 's Court is an American arbitration-based reality court दिखाएँ, फिलहाल presided over by रिटायर्ड फ्लोरिडा राज्य सर्किट अदालत न्यायधीश मर्लिन milian, in which small claims disputes are handled.
The People 's अदालत is the पहला अदालत दिखाएँ to उपयोग बाइंडिंग मध्यस्थता, introducing the format into the genre in 1981.
The system has महरूम duplicated by सबसे of the दिखाएँ 's successors in the judicial genre.
Moreover, The People 's Court is the first लोकप्रिय, long-running वास्तविकता in the न्यायिक विधा.
It was preceded only by a few short-lived realities in the विधा ; ये short-lived पूर्ववर्तियों यहूद तभी loosely सम्बन्धित to न्यायिक कार्यवाही, मगर लिये एक : पैरोल ( 1959 ) took footage from real-life courtrooms holding legal proceedings.
Prior to The लोगों 's अदालत, the विशाल बहुमत of tv courtroom shows प्रयुक्त अभिनेताओं, and recreated or fictional cases ( as did radio before that ).
Among examples of these प्रकार of अदालत shows शामिल प्रसिद्ध जूरी Trials and Your Witness.
the लोगों 's अदालत has had two contrasting lives.
The show 's first जीवन थी presided over solely by पूर्व लॉस Angeles County Superior Court Judge Joseph Wapner.
His tenure lasted इससे the दिखाएँ 's डेब्यू on सितंबर 14, 1981, until May 21, 1993, when the show was cancelled due to low ratings.
This left the दिखाएँ साथ a कुल of 2,484 1⁄2-hour episodes and 12 seasons.
The show थी taped in लॉस एंजिल्स during its first life.
After being रद्द, reruns aired जबतक September 9, 1994.
On September 8, 1997, after being आउट of उत्पादन लिये चार सालो, the लोगों 's अदालत थी revived लिये a दूसरी life in first-run syndication as a 60-minute program.
Former lawyer और महापौर of नई यॉर्क ed koch थी चुनी as arbiter, जिससे he कायम लिये 2 सीज़न इससे the 1997–98 season through the 1998–99 season ( the present life 's 2nd season and overall show 's 14th ).
By the 1999–00 ऋतु, husband of जूडिथ sheindlin ( जो presides over न्यायधीश जुडी ) and former New York State Supreme Court Judge Jerry Sheindlin succeeded Koch.
Sheindlin lasted एक और a हाफ सीज़न as he थी replaced towards the समाप्त of the 2000–01 season ( present life 's 4th season and overall show 's 17th ).
शुरूआत in वसन्त 2001, फ्लोरिडा न्यायधीश मर्लिन milian took over The People 's Court and has presided over the show ever since.
Once Milian completes the 2012–13 season, she will have परोसा as longest arbiter over the श्रेणी साथ 12 और a हाफ seasons.
As of the उपस्थित, however, उसके सालो on the कार्यक्रम tie Wapner at 12 seasons.
in the 2009-10 टेलीविज़न ऋतु, the लोगों 's न्यायालयों 2nd/present life outlasted its first when it reached 13 seasons.
जबकि the दिखाएँ taped in नई York City for the first 15 seasons of its second life, it now tapes in Stamford, Connecticut as of the 2012-13 season.
On September 3, 2012, The People 's Court 's 2nd/present life entered its 16th ऋतु ( 28th overall ऋतु ).
With 28 total seasons, The People 's अदालत बाँधने as the 2nd longest-running courtroom कार्यक्रम पीछे the जारी तलाक Court at 33 seasons ( from its 3 combined lives ).
Utah ( or ) ( Arapaho : wo'tééneihí ' ) is a राज्य in the पश्चिमी संयुक्त States.
It became the 45th state admitted to the संघ on जनवरी 4, 1896.
यूटा is the 13th-largest, the 34th-most populous, and the 10th-least-densely populated of the 50 United States.
Approximately 80 % of Utah 's 2,817,222 people live along the Wasatch Front, centering on Salt Lake City, leaving vast expanses of the राज्य nearly uninhabited और बनाना the जनसांख्यिकी the छठे सबसे urbanized in the U.S. Utah is bordered by Colorado on the east, Wyoming on the northeast, Idaho on the north, Arizona on the south, and Nevada on the west.
It also touches a कोने of नई मैक्सिको on the southeast.
Utah is the most religiously समरूप राज्य in the संघ.
Approximately 63 % of Utahns are reported to be members of The Church of Jesus Christ of latter-day संतो or lds ( mormons ), जिससे greatly प्रभाव यूटा संस्कृति और रोज़ life.
The world headquarters of the गिरिजाघर of यीशु मसीह of latter-day संतो ( lds गिरिजाघर ) is located in Utah 's state capital.
The state is a center of transportation, शिक्षा, सूचना प्रौद्योगिकी और शोध, सरकारी सेवाएं, खनन, और a प्रमुख tourist destination for outdoor recreation.
According to the U.S. Census Bureau 's population estimates, Utah is the fifth fastest-growing राज्य in the संयुक्त राज्य as of 2012.
St. George, was the fastest–growing महानगर क्षेत्रफल in the संयुक्त राज्य from 2000 to 2005.
A 2012 Gallup national survey found Utah overall to be the `` best राज्य to सजीव in '' आधारित on 13 forward-looking माप सहित विभिन्न आर्थिक, lifestyle, and health-related outlook metrics.
coldwater is a छोटी कस्बा in टेट काउंटी, Mississippi.
It is in the मेम्फिस महानगर Area.
The population थी 1,674 at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी.
The hard palate is a thin आड़ा बोनी थाली of the कपाल, स्तिथ in the roof of the mouth.
it spans the मेहराब formed by the upper teeth.
It is formed by the palatine process of the maxilla और आड़ा थाली of palatine bone.
It forms a partition between the nasal passages और the mouth.
Also on the anterior portion of the roof of the hard palate is the Rugae which are the irregular ridges in the mucous membrane कि सहायता सुकर the गति of खाना backwards towards the pharynx.
This partition is continued deeper into the मुँह by a मांसल एक्सटेंशन पुकारा the soft palate.
Complete set of scrolls, constituting the entire Tanakh.
The Tanakh (, or ; भी tenakh, tenak, tanach ) is a name used in Judaism for the canon of the Hebrew Bible.
The tanakh is भी ज्ञात as the Masoretic Text or the Miqra.
The name is an acronym formed from the आरंभिक यहूदी अक्षर of the masoretic टेक्स्ट 's तीन परंपरागत subdivisions : the तोरा ( `` शिक्षण '', also known as the Five Books of Moses ), Nevi'im ( `` Prophets '' ) and Ketuvim ( `` Writings '' ) —hence TaNaKh.
The name `` Miqra '' ( מקרא ), अर्थ `` कि जिससे is पढ़ा '', is an वैकल्पिक Hebrew term for the Tanakh.
The books of the Tanakh were relayed with an accompanying oral परंपरा passed on by प्रत्येक पीढी, पुकारा the मौखिक Torah.
Sobriety नाका in जर्मनी
Driving under the influence ( DUI ), driving while intoxicated ( dwi ), शराबी ड्राइविंग, नशे ड्राइविंग, पेय ड्राइविंग, ऑपरेटिंग अंतर्गत the influence, पीने और ड्राइविंग, or impaired ड्राइविंग is the अपराधों of ड्राइविंग a मोटर गाडी साथ रक्त levels of alcohol in excess of a legal limit ( `` Blood Alcohol Content '', or `` BAC '' ).
Similar regulations कवर ड्राइविंग or ऑपरेटिंग निश्चित प्रकार of मशीनरी जबकि प्रभावित by drinking alcohol or taking other drugs, including, but not limited to prescription drugs.
This is a दण्ड ठोकर in most nations.
Convictions do not necessarily involve वास्तविक ड्राइविंग of the गाडी.
In most jurisdictions a measurement such as a blood alcohol सामग्री ( bac ) in excess of a विशिष्ट दहलीज स्तर, ऐसे as 0.05 % or 0.08 % defines the ठोकर, साथ no need to prove पुतलियों or being under the influence of alcohol.
In कुछ jurisdictions, वहीँ is an क्रोधित श्रेणी of the offense at a higher level e.g. 0.12 %.
In most countries, anyone who is convicted of injuring or killing someone while under the influence of दारू or दवाएँ can be heavily fined, as in फ़्रांस, in जोड to होने given a lengthy prison sentence.
कुछ कार्य have उनके अपना नियम और bac हद, लिये उदाहरण वाणिज्यिक पायलट, और the Federal Railroad Administration in the United States has a 0.04 % limit for train crew.
Some jurisdictions have multiple levels of BAC ; for example, the state of कैलिफ़ोर्निया रै a 0.08 % bac सीमा, जिससे is lowered to 0.04 % if the ऑपरेटर holds a commercial driver 's license.
The कैलिफ़ोर्निया bac सीमा is 0.01 % लिये those younger than 21 सालो of आयु और those on probation for a previous DUI conviction.
Some large corporations have their own rules ; Union Pacific Railroad has their own BAC limit of 0.02 % that, if violated दौरान a यादृच्छिक परीक्षण or a for-cause परीक्षण — लिये उदाहरण, बाद a ट्रैफ़िक दुर्घटना — can result in termination of employment with no chance of future re-hire.
Many states in the U.S. and provinces in Canada have adopted सच्चाई in sentencing कानून कि enforce सख्त दिशानिर्देश on sentencing, differing इससे पिछला अभ्यास जहाँ prison time was reduced or suspended after sentencing had been issued.
Some jurisdictions have न्यायिक दिशानिर्देश requiring a mandatory minimum sentence.
Penalties for DUI charges range from expensive fees to forfetiruree of अपना अनुज्ञा प्लेटों और in कुछ गंभीर हालातों, your vehicle.
A drunk driving सिम्युलेटर in montréal, Canada
The specific criminal offense may be called, depending on the jurisdiction, driving under the influence [ of alcohol or other drugs ] ( DUI ), driving under intense influence ( DUII ), driving while intoxicated ( DWI ), operating under the influence ( OUI ) ऑपरेटिंग जबकि intoxicated ( owi ), ऑपरेटिंग a मोटर गाडी जबकि intoxicated ( omvi ), ड्राइविंग अंतर्गत the संयुक्त influence of दारू and/or अन्य दवाएँ, ड्राइविंग अंतर्गत the influence प्रति se or नशे in charge [ of a vehicle ].
Many such laws apply also to motorcycling, boating, piloting aircraft, use of motile farm equipment such as tractors और combines, सवारी घोड़े or ड्राइविंग a horse-drawn गाडी, or bicycling, possibly with different BAC level than driving.
In some jurisdictions वहीँ हैं पृथक आरोप depending on the vehicle used, such as BWI ( bicycling while intoxicated ), which may carry a lighter sentence.
In the United States, local law enforcement agencies made 1,467,300 arrests nationwide for driving अंतर्गत the influence of दारू in 1996, compared to 1.9 लाख ऐसे रखवाले दौरान the peak year in 1983.
in 1997 an अनुमानित 513,200 dwi अपराधियों यहूद in थाना or jail, down from 593,000 in 1990 and up from 270,100 in 1986.
Officers from US कस्टम और किनारा सुरक्षा बोर्डिंग a ship
Law enforcement in the United States is one of तीन प्रमुख components of the दण्ड इंसाफ प्रणाली of the United States, along with courts and corrections.
Although there exists an inherent interrelatedness between the अलग समूह कि मेक up the दण्ड इंसाफ प्रणाली आधारित on उनके crime deterrence purpose, each component operates independently from one another.
However, the judiciary is vested with the power to make legal determinations regarding the conduct of the अन्य दो components.
Apart from maintaining order and service कृत्यों, the purpose of policing is the छानबीन of suspected दण्ड कार्यकलाप और the referral of the results of investigations and of suspected criminals to the courts.
Law enforcement, to varying degrees at different levels of government and in different agencies, is also commonly charged with the responsibilities of deterring criminal activity and of preventing the successful commission of crimes in progress ; the सेवा और प्रवर्तन of वारंट, writs और अन्य आदेश of the न्यायालयों.
Law enforcement agencies are also involved in providing पहला जवाब to emergencies और अन्य खतरे to पब्लिक सुरक्षा ; the सुरक्षा of निश्चित पब्लिक सुविधाएं और अवसंरचना ; the maintenance of public order ; the protection of public officials ; and the operation of some correctional facilities ( usually at the local level ).
Elmer Figueroa Arce ( born June 28, 1968 ), बेहतरीन ज्ञात अंतर्गत the स्टेज नाम chayanne, is a प्यूर्टो rican लैटिन पॉप singer and actor.
As a solo artist, Chayanne has released 21 सोलो एल्बम और बेची over 15 लाख एल्बम worldwide.
`` संसार युद्ध हल्क '' is a कॉमिक किताब क्रॉसओवर कथानक that ran through a self titled limited series and various other titles published by Marvel Comics in 2007, featuring the Hulk.
the श्रेणी consists of पाँच प्रमुख मुद्दे titled संसार युद्ध हल्क, साथ ग्रेग पाक as लेखक और जॉन romita, Jr. as penciller, and three other limited series : World War Hulk : Front Line, World War Hulk : Gamma Corps, and World War Hulk : X-Men.
It also ran through several अन्य आश्चर्य कॉमिक्स श्रेणी.
The plot is the culmination of a series of events that began with the Hulk being tricked into स्पेस by the illuminati और a जीवन मॉडल decoy of उपनाम फ़्यूरी, the हल्क 's subsequent निर्वासन देखी in Planet Hulk and his imminent return to Earth to seek revenge on the Illuminati.
Marion Mitchell Morrison ( born Marion Robert Morrison ; May 26, 1907 – जून 11, 1979 ), बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम जॉन वेन, थी an American film actor, director and producer.
An Academy Award -winner, Wayne was among the top box office draws for three decades, और थी नामित the all-time शीर्ष money-making स्टार.
An enduring American icon, he epitomized rugged मर्दानगी और is प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके demeanor, सहित उसके distinctive calm voice, walk, and height.
Wayne was born in Winterset, Iowa but his family relocated to the वृहद लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल जब he थी चार years old.
He found work at local film studios when he खोया उसके फ़ुटबॉल स्कॉलरशिप to यूएससी as a परिणाम of a bodysurfing accident.
Initially working लिये the फॉक्स फिल्मी निगम, he mostly appeared in small bit parts.
His first leading role came in the widescreen epic the बिग ट्रेल ( 1930 ), जिससे led to अग्रणी भूमिकाएँ in numerous films throughout the 1930s, many of them in the western genre.
His करियर रोज़ to further हाइट्स in 1939, साथ जॉन Ford 's Stagecoach making him an instant superstar.
Wayne would go on to star in 142 तस्वीरें, primarily typecast in पश्चिमी films.
Among his best known later films are The Quiet Man ( 1952 ), which follows him as an Irish-American boxer and his love affair with a fiery spinster played by Maureen O'Hara ; the searchers ( 1956 ), in जिससे he plays a सिविल युद्ध दिग्गज जो seeks आउट उसके abducted भांजी ; रिओ ब्रावो ( 1959 ), playing a शेरिफ साथ डीन मार्टिन ; सच्चा grit ( 1969 ), playing a humorous u.s. मार्शल जो सेट out to avenge a man 's death in the role that won Wayne an Academy Award ; and The Shootist ( 1976 ), his final screen performance in which he plays an aging gunslinger battling cancer.
Wayne moved to Orange County, California in the 1960s, and was a prominent रिपब्लिकन in हॉलीवुड, supporting anti-communist positions.
He died of पेट कर्कट in 1979.
In June 1999, the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान नामित वेन 13th among the Greatest Male Screen Legends of All Time.
Galileo Galilei ( ; 15 February 1564 – 8 January 1642 ), was an Italian physicist, गणितज्ञ, astronomer, और पारस जो निभाई a प्रमुख भूमिका in the वैज्ञानिक Revolution.
His उपलब्धियाँ शामिल सुधार to the दूरदर्शी और consequent astronomical observations and support for Copernicanism.
Galileo has been called the `` father of modern observational खगोलशास्त्र ``, the `` पिता of आधुनिक भौतिकी ``, the `` father of science '', and `` the Father of Modern Science ''.
His योगदान to observational खगोलशास्त्र शामिल the telescopic पुष्टि of the phases of शुक्र, the डिस्कवरी of the four largest satellites of Jupiter ( named the Galilean moons in his honour ), and the observation and analysis of sunspots.
Galileo also worked in applied science and technology, inventing an improved सैन्य कम्पास and other instruments.
Galileo 's championing of heliocentrism was विवादास्पद भीतर उसके आजीवन, जब सबसे subscribed to either geocentrism or the Tychonic system.
He met with opposition from astronomers, who doubted heliocentrism due to the अनुपस्थिति of an observed तारकीय लंबन.
The matter was investigated by the Roman Inquisition in 1615, and they concluded कि it could be समर्थित as तभी a सम्भावना, नहीं an स्थापित fact.
Galileo later defended his views in Dialogue Concerning the Two Chief World Systems, which appeared to attack Pope Urban viii और यूँ alienated उसे और the jesuits, जो था दोनो समर्थित गैलीलियो up until this point.
He was tried by the Inquisition, found `` vehemently suspect of heresy '', मजबूर to recant, and spent the rest of his life under house arrest.
It was while Galileo was under house arrest that he लिखा एक of उसके finest works, दो नई sciences, in जिससे he summarised the work he had done some forty years earlier, on the two sciences now called kinematics and strength of materials.

प्रोटोटाइप oled lighting फलक developed by Lumiotec
demonstration of a लचीली OLED device
An OLED ( organic light-emitting डायोड ) is a light-emitting डायोड ( led ) in जिससे the emissive electroluminescent layer is a film of organic compound which emits light in response to an electric current.
This layer of organic सेमीकंडक्टर is situated between दो electrodes.
Generally, at least one of these electrodes is पारदर्शी.
OLEDs are used to create digital displays in devices such as television screens, कंप्यूटर मॉनीटर, पोर्टेबल प्रणालियों ऐसे as mobile phones, handheld games consoles and PDAs.
A major area of research is the विकास of श्वेत oled डिवाइस लिये उपयोग in solid-state lighting applications.
There are two main परिवारों of oleds : those आधारित on small molecules and those employing polymers.
Adding mobile ions to an oled creates a light-emitting electrochemical कोशिका or लैक, which has a slightly different mode of operation.
OLED displays can उपयोग either passive-matrix ( pmoled ) or active-matrix addressing schemes.
Active-matrix OLEDs ( amoled ) आवश्यकता a thin-film ट्रांजिस्टर backplane to स्विच प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत pixel on or off, but allow for higher resolution and larger display sizes.
an oled प्रदर्शक works without a backlight.
यूँ, it can प्रदर्शक गहन ब्लैक स्तर और can be thinner और हल्का than a liquid crystal display ( LCD ).
In low ambient light शर्तें ऐसे as a अंधेरा रूम an oled स्क्रीन can achieve a उच्चतर कंट्रास्ट ratio than an LCD, whether the LCD uses cold cathode fluorescent lamps or LED backlight.
A carton and a glass of eggnog from Montreal, Canada, showing its French facade ( English रिवर्स ) और the फ्रेंच पद लेत de poule ( वस्तुतः, `` मुर्गी 's milk '' )
Eggnog, or egg nog, is a sweetened dairy -based पेय traditionally बना साथ मिल्क and/or मलाई, शुगर, और whipped eggs ( which gives it a frothy texture ).
Brandy, rum, whisky, bourbon, वोदका, or a संयोजन of liquors are often added.
The finished serving is often garnished with a sprinkling of मैदान दालचीनी or nutmeg.
it थी भी ज्ञात as the egg milk punch.
Eggnog is a popular पेय throughout the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा, और is usually associated with Christmas.
Eggnog may be added as a flavoring to खाना or पेय ऐसे as कॉफी और चाय.
eggnog as a कस्टर्ड can भी be used as an ice cream base.
A pasty (, ), ( sometimes known in Britain as a Cornish pasty, and in the United States as a pastie or अंग्रेजों pasty ) is a baked पेस्ट्री, a परंपरागत किस्में of जिससे is particularly associated with Cornwall, the westernmost county in England.
It is made by placing uncooked filling typically of meat और सब्जियां, बगैर मांस in शाकाहारी संस्करण, on a चपटा पेस्ट्री वृत्त और फोल्डिंग it to wrap the filling, crimping the edge to form a seal.
After baking, the परिणाम is a उठाया semicircular comestible.
The traditional Cornish pasty, which has Protected Geographical Indication ( PGI ) status in Europe, is filled with beef, sliced or diced आलू, swede ( भी ज्ञात as a पीला शलजम or rutabaga – referred to in कॉर्नवॉल as शलजम ) और प्याज, seasoned साथ नमक और pepper, and is baked.
Today, the pasty is the food most संबद्ध साथ कॉर्नवॉल, it is regarded as the नेशनल डिश, and it accounts for 6 % of the Cornish food economy.
Pasties with many different fillings are बना ; कुछ दुकानें specialise in selling सब sorts of pasties.
The origins of the pasty are unclear, though there are many references to उन्हें throughout ऐतिहासिक दस्तावेज़ और fiction.
The pasty is अभी लोकप्रिय world-wide due to the स्प्रेड of cornish खनिक, और विसंगतियाँ can be found in Australia, the United States, Mexico and elsewhere.
The ( ortho- ) sympathetic nervous system ( SNS ) is one of three प्रमुख भाग of the autonomic बेचैन प्रणाली : the अन्य होने the enteric और parasympathetic systems.
Its general action is to mobilize the देह 's बेचैन प्रणाली fight-or-flight response.
It is, however, constantly क्रियाशील at a basic level to maintain homeostasis.
Secure Digital or ( SD ) is a non-volatile मेमोरी कार्ड स्वरूप लिये उपयोग in पोर्टेबल डिवाइस, ऐसे as मोबाईल फोन, digital cameras, GPS navigation devices, and tablet computers.
the सुरक्षित डिजिटल standard is maintained by the SD Card Association ( SDA ).
SD technologies have been implemented in more than 400 brands across dozens of उत्पाद श्रेणी और अधिक than 8,000 मॉडल.
The Secure Digital format includes चार कार्ड परिवारों उपलब्धियाँ in तीन अलग form factors.
The चार परिवारों हैं the असली standard-capacity ( sdsc ), the high-capacity ( SDHC ), the eXtended-Capacity ( SDXC ), and the SDIO, which combines input/output functions with data storage.
the तीन रूप कारकों हैं the असली आकार, the `` मिनी '' आकार, और the `` micro '' size ( see illustration ).
There are many combinations of रूप कारकों और यंत्र families.
Electrically passive adapters allow the उपयोग of a छोटी card in a host device built to hold a larger card.
Host devices that comply with newer versions of the specification provide पिछड़ा संगतता और accept पुरानी sd ताश, लकिन इस आलेख explains अनेक factors that can prevent the use of a newer SD card:
A newer card may प्रस्ताव वृहद क्षमता than the मेजबान यंत्र can handle.
A newer card may use a file system the मेजबान यंत्र can नहीं navigate.
Use of an SDIO card requires the host यंत्र be designed लिये the input/output कृत्यों the card provides.
The organization of the card was changed starting साथ the sdhc परिवार.
Some vendors produced SDSC cards above 1 GB पहले the sda था मानकीकृत a विधि of doing so.
The SDA uses several trademarked logos to enforce अनुपालन साथ इसके विशेषताएँ and assure users of compatibility.

Daniel Lawrence व्हिटनी ( born फ़रवरी 17, 1963 ) बेहतरीन ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम और अक्षर लैरी the केबल guy, is an अमरीकी stand-up हास्य, actor, country music artist, voice actor, and former radio personality.
He was one of the members of the Blue Collar Comedy Tour, a comedy troupe which शामिल विधेयक engvall, रॉन श्वेत, और जेफ़ foxworthy ( साथ जिसको he has starred on Blue Collar TV ).
Whitney has released सात कॉमेडी एल्बम, of जिससे तीन have महरूम certified सुनहरा by the RIAA for shipments of 500,000 copies.
In addition, he has starred in तीन ब्लू कॉलर कॉमेडी tour-related फिल्मों, as खूब as in the films लैरी the केबल guy : स्वास्थ्य इंस्पेक्टर, डेल्टा तमाशा, और witless Protection, as well as voicing Mater in the Cars franchise.
Whitney 's catchphrase : `` git-r-done ! '' is भी the title of his book.
On January 26, 2010, the TV channel History announced that it was ordering a series starring Whitney called Only in America with Larry the Cable guy, in जिससे he होता explore the देश और immerse खुद in अलग lifestyles, कार्य, और शौक.
The first episode of the श्रेणी aired on फ़रवरी 8, 2011.
Vitamin d is a समूह of fat-soluble secosteroids जिम्मेदार for intestinal absorption of calcium and phosphate.
In humans, the most महत्वपूर्ण सम्बन्धित यौगिकों of विटामिन d हैं विटामिन D2 and vitamin D3.
Cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3 ) और ergocalciferol ( विटामिन d2 ) हैं अद्वितीय as वे constitute कया we जान as विटामिन d और can be ingested from the diet and/or supplements.
The body can also synthesize vitamin D ( from cholesterol ) when sun एक्सपोज़र is पर्याप्त ( hence इसके उपनाम, the `` sunshine vitamin '' ).
Although vitamin D is commonly called a vitamin, it is not actually an अनिवार्य dietary विटामिन in the सख्त भाव, as it can be synthesized in पर्याप्त amounts by सबसे स्तनधारियों उजागर to sunlight.
( Cats and dogs can not synthesize विटामिन d efficiently और जरूर प्राप्त it in उनके diet. )
An organic chemical compound ( or related set of compounds ) is तभी scientifically पुकारा a विटामिन जब it can नहीं be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism, and must be obtained from their diet.
However, as साथ अन्य यौगिकों commonly पुकारा विटामिन, विटामिन d थी खोजा in an प्रयत्न to find the dietary substance that was lacking in a disease, namely, rickets, the childhood form of osteomalacia.
Additionally, like other यौगिकों पुकारा विटामिन, in the विकसित संसार विटामिन d is added to staple foods, such as milk, to avoid disease due to deficiency.
Measures of serum levels reflect endogenous संश्लेषण इससे एक्सपोज़र to धूप as खूब as सेवन from the diet, and it is believed that synthesis may contribute generally to the maintenance of adequate serum concentrations.
The evidence indicates that the synthesis of vitamin D from sun exposure works in a feedback loop that prevents toxicity लकिन, क्युकी of अनिश्चितता परिचय the कर्कट रिस्क इससे धूप, no सुझाव हैं जारी by the संस्थान of आयुर्विज्ञान, यूएसए, लिये the राशि of सूर्य एक्सपोज़र जरूरी to meet vitamin D requirements.
Accordingly, the Dietary Reference Intakes for vitamin D assume that no संश्लेषण occurs और कि सब of a व्यक्ति 's विटामिन d is इससे उनके आहार, although that will rarely occur in practice.
In the liver vitamin D is converted to calcidiol, जिससे is भी ज्ञात as calcifediol ( इन ), 25-hydroxycholecalciferol, or 25-hydroxyvitamin d—abbreviated 25 ( OH ) D ; and which is the specific vitamin D metabolite that is measured in serum to determine a person 's vitamin D status.
Part of the calcidiol is converted by the kidneys to calcitriol, the biologically active form of vitamin D. Calcitriol circulates as a हार्मोन in the रक्त, regulating the विशेषज्ञता of कैल्सियम और फास्फेट in the bloodstream और promoting the healthy growth and remodeling of bone.
Calcidiol is also converted to calcitriol outside of the kidneys for अन्य उद्देश्य, ऐसे as the अप्रसार, differentiation और apoptosis of कोशिकाएं ; calcitriol भी affects neuromuscular फलन and inflammation.
Beyond its उपयोग to prevent osteomalacia or rickets, the प्रमाण लिये अन्य स्वास्थ्य प्रभाव of vitamin D supplementation in the general population is inconsistent.
The बेहतरीन प्रमाण of लाभ is लिये bone health and a decrease in mortality in elderly women.
Standard रूप of the आवधिक table.
The colors represent अलग श्रेणी of elements explained below.
The periodic table is a tabular display of the रासायनिक तत्व, व्यवस्थित on the आधार of their atomic numbers, electron configurations, and recurring chemical properties.
Elements are प्रस्तुत in अनुक्रम of increasing परमाणु क्रमांक ( number of protons ).
The standard form of तालिका comprises an 18 × 7 ग्रिड or प्रमुख देह of तत्व, positioned above a smaller double row of elements.
The तालिका can भी be deconstructed into चार आयताकार ब्लॉक : the s-block to the बाएँ, the p-block to the right, the d-block in the middle, and the f-block below that.
The rows of the table are पुकारा अवधि ; the कालम of the s-, d-, और p-blocks हैं पुकारा समूह, साथ कुछ of ये having names such as the halogens or the noble gases.
चूंकि, by परिभाषा, a आवधिक तालिका incorporates पुनरावर्ती रुझान, कोई such table can be used to derive relationships between the properties of the elements and predict the properties of new, yet to be discovered or synthesized, elements.
as a परिणाम, a आवधिक table—whether in the मानक रूप or कुछ अन्य variant—provides a उपयोगी फ्रेमवर्क लिये analyzing chemical behavior, and such tables are widely used in chemistry and other sciences.
Although precursors exist, Dmitri Mendeleev is generally credited with the प्रकाशन, in 1869, of the पहला widely पहचाना periodic table.
He developed his table to illustrate periodic trends in the गुण of the then-known तत्व.
Mendeleev also पूर्वानुमानित कुछ गुण of then-unknown तत्व कि होता be expected to fill gaps in this table.
Most of his predictions were proved correct when the तत्व in सवाल यहूद subsequently खोजा.
Mendeleev 's periodic table रै चूंकि महरूम विस्तारित और परिष्कृत साथ the डिस्कवरी or संश्लेषण of further नई तत्व और the विकास of new theoretical models to explain chemical behavior.
All elements from atomic numbers 1 ( हाइड्रोजन ) to 118 ( ununoctium ) have महरूम खोजा or synthesized.
The elements from 1 to 98 ( californium ) have been found to exist naturally, हालांकि कुछ हैं मिला तभी in ट्रेस amounts और यहूद initially खोजा by संश्लेषण in laboratories.
the तत्व बाद 98 have तभी been synthesized in laboratories.
Production of elements beyond ununoctium is being pursued, with the question of how the periodic table may need to be परिवर्धित to accommodate कोई ऐसे परिवर्धन होने a पदार्थ of जारी बहस.
Numerous synthetic radionuclides of naturally occurring तत्व have भी महरूम उत्पादित in laboratories.
न्यूनतम मजदूरी by u.S. राज्य और u.S. territory ( अमरीकी Samoa, Guam, Puerto Rico, Virgin Islands ), as of Jan. 1, 2013.
In the United States, workers are generally entitled to be सशुल्क no कम than the statutory minimum wage.
The federal government mandates a nationwide minimum wage level of $ 7.25 प्रति घंटा, जबकि कुछ राज्य और municipalities have नियत न्यूनतम मजदूरी स्तर उच्चतर than the संघीय स्तर, साथ the उच्चतम राज्य न्यूनतम मजदूरी होने $ 9.19 per hour in Washington as of 2013.
Among those paid by the घंटा in 2012, 1.6 लाख यहूद reported as earning exactly the prevailing federal minimum wage.
About 2.0 लाख यहूद reported as कमाई wages below the minimum.
Together, these 3.6 million मजदूर साथ मजदूरी at or below the minimum made up 4.7 percent of all hourly-paid workers.
A selection of Bourbons and Tennessee whiskeys offered at a liquor स्टोर in decatur, Georgia
Evan विलियम्स bourbon whiskey
bourbon whiskey is a प्रकार of अमरीकी whiskey – a barrel-aged distilled spirit made primarily from corn.
The name of the spirit derives from its historical association with an क्षेत्रफल ज्ञात as बूढ़ा bourbon, around कया is अभी bourbon काउंटी, केंटकी ( जिससे, in फेरे, was named after the French House of Bourbon royal family ).
It has महरूम उत्पादित चूंकि the 18th century.
While it may be बना anywhere in the संयुक्त राज्य, it is strongly संबद्ध साथ the अमरीकी South in general, and Kentucky in particular.
The Mona Lisa ( La Gioconda or La Joconde ) is a half-length portrait of a woman by the इतालवी कलाकार लियोनार्डो da विंची, जिससे रै महरूम acclaimed as `` the बेहतरीन ज्ञात, the सबसे visited, the सबसे लिखा परिचय, the most sung about, the most parodied work of art in the world. ''
The painting, विचार to be a पोर्ट्रेट of लिसा gherardini, the बीवी of francesco del Giocondo, is in oil on a poplar panel, and is believed to have been painted between 1503 and 1506.
It was acquired by King Francis I of France and is now the प्रॉपर्टी of the फ्रेंच गणतंत्र, on स्थाई प्रदर्शक at the Musée du Louvre in Paris since 1797.
The ambiguity of the subject 's expression, which is frequently described as enigmatic, the monumentality of the संयोजन, the हल्का मॉडलिंग of फ़ॉर्म और the वायुमंडलीय illusionism यहूद अनोखा qualities that have contributed to the continuing fascination and study of the work.
Robert Allen Palmer ( 19 January 1949 – 26 September 2003 ), was an अंग्रेज़ी singer-songwriter और musician.
He was known for his distinctive voice and the eclectic mix of musical शैलियाँ on उसके एल्बम, combining आत्मा, जैज़, चट्टान, पॉप, reggae and blues.
He found success both in his solo career and in the musical अधिनियम the शक्ति स्टेशन, और था शीर्ष 10 songs in both the UK and the US.
His iconic music videos by टेरेंस डोनोवन लिये the हिट्स `` आदी to प्रेम `` और `` बस irresistible `` प्रदर्शित identically वेश नाचना महिलाओं with pale faces, dark eye makeup and bright red lipstick, which resembled the women in the art of Patrick Nagel, an artist popular in the 1980s.
Sharp-suited, his involvement in the music उद्योग commenced in the 1960s, covered पाँच दशकों और शामिल a spell with Vinegar Joe.
Palmer received a number of awards throughout his career, including two Grammy Awards for Best Male चट्टान गायन प्रदर्शन, an एमटीवी वीडियो म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार, और थी twice मनोनीत लिये the ब्रिट Award for Best British Male.
Computed tomography angiography ( CTA ) is a computed टोमोग्राफी तकनीक प्रयुक्त to visualize arterial और venous बरतन throughout the body.
This ranges from arteries सेवारत the दिमाग to those bringing रक्त to the lungs, kidneys, arms and legs.
the champs-élysées सजा साथ flags for Bastille Day
Horseman of the फ्रेंच रिपब्लिकन गार्ड दौरान the 2007 military parade on the Champs-Élysées.
Prise de la bastille by jean-pierre-louis-laurent Houel
Bastille Day is the name given in English-speaking देशों to the फ्रेंच नेशनल दिन, जिससे is मनाये on the 14th of जुलाई each year.
In France, it is formally called la fête nationale ( ; the नेशनल जश्न ) और commonly le quatorze juillet ( ; the fourteenth of July ).
It commemorates the 1790 Fête de la fédération, आयोजित on the पहला वर्षगांठ of the storming of the bastille on 14 जुलाई 1789 ; the वर्षगांठ of the storming of the bastille fortress-prison was seen as a symbol of the uprising of the modern nation, and of the reconciliation of all the French inside the constitutional monarchy which preceded the First Republic, during the French Revolution.
Festivities and official ceremonies हैं आयोजित सब over फ़्रांस.
The oldest and largest regular military parade in यूरोपीय is आयोजित on the morning of 14 जुलाई, on the champs-élysées एवेन्यू in पेरिस in सामने of the अध्यक्ष of the Republic, French officials and foreign guests.
The United States of America ( यूएसए or u.s.A. ), commonly पुकारा the संयुक्त राज्य ( us or u.S. ) or अमेरिका, is a federal republic consisting of fifty states and a federal district.
The lower forty-eight contiguous states and the federal district of Washington, D.C. are in सेंट्रल उत्तर अमेरिका between कनाडा और मैक्सिको.
The state of अलास्का is वेस्ट of कनाडा और ईस्ट of रूस आरपार the बेरिंग जलसन्धि, and the state of Hawaii is in the mid-North Pacific.
The country also has five populated and nine unpopulated territories in the प्रशांत और the caribbean.
At 3.79 million वर्गाकार मील ( 9.83 लाख km2 ) और साथ around 315 लाख लोगों, the संयुक्त राज्य is the third- or fourth-largest country by total area and the third-largest by both land area and population.
It is एक of the संसार 's सबसे ethnically विविध और multicultural nations, the product of large-scale immigration from many countries.
The geography and climate of the U.S. is also extremely diverse, with deserts, plains, वनों, और kyu कि हैं घर to a चौड़ी किस्में of प्रजाति.
paleoindians migrated इससे एशिया to कया is अभी the संयुक्त States mainland around 15,000 years ago.
After 1500, Old World diseases introduced by europeans greatly घटाया उनके populations.
European colonization began around 1600 और आए ज़्यादातर from England.
The United States emerged from thirteen British colonies स्तिथ साथ the अटलांटिक seaboard.
विवादों between ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और the अमरीकी colonies led to the American Revolution.
On July 4, 1776, delegates इससे the 13 colonies unanimously जारी the Declaration of Independence, which established the United States of America.
The American Revolutionary War, which ended with the recognition of independence of the संयुक्त राज्य इससे the किंगडम of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, थी the पहला कामयाब युद्ध of स्वतंत्रता विरूद्ध a यूरोपीय औपनिवेशिक empire.
the वर्तमान संविधान थी अपनाया on सितंबर 17, 1787 ; twenty-seven Amendments have since been added to the Constitution.
The first ten amendments, collectively named the Bill of अधिकारों, यहूद ratified in 1791 और गारंटी अनेक आधारभूत सिविल अधिकारों और freedoms.
Driven by the doctrine of manifest destiny, the संयुक्त राज्य embarked on a vigorous विस्तार आरपार उत्तर America throughout the 19th century.
This शामिल displacing देशी जनजातियों, acquiring new territories, and gradually admitting new states.
The American Civil War ended legalized गुलामी in the संयुक्त राज्य.
by the समाप्त of the उन्नीसवीं सदी, the संयुक्त राज्य विस्तारित into the Pacific Ocean, and its economy was the world 's largest.
The spanish–american युद्ध और पुष्टि the country 's status as a global military power.
The United States emerged from as a global superpower, the first country with nuclear हथियार, और a स्थाई सदस्य of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सुरक्षा परिषद.
The end of the Cold युद्ध और the विच्छेद of the सोवियत संघ left the United States as the sole superpower.
The United States is a developed देश और रै the संसार 's largest नेशनल अर्थव्यवस्था, साथ an अनुमानित 2012 जीडीपी of $ 15.6 trillion 19 % of global GDP at purchasing-power parity, as of 2011.
the प्रति capita जीडीपी of the u.S. थी the संसार 's sixth-highest as of 2010, although America 's wealth inequality was also ranked highest among OECD countries by the World Bank.
The economy is fueled by an abundance of प्राकृतिक संसाधन, a well-developed अवसंरचना, और ऊँची उत्पादकता ; और जबकि इसके अर्थव्यवस्था is माना post-industrial it continues to be one of the world 's largest manufacturers.
The country accounts for 39 % of global military spending, and is a leading economic, राजनैतिक, और सांस्कृतिक फ़ोर्स in the संसार, as खूब as a नेता in scientific research and technological innovation.
The NCAA Men 's प्रभाग i बास्केट चैंपियनशिप is a single-elimination टूर्नामेंट निभाई प्रत्येक वसन्त in the United States, currently featuring 68 college basketball teams, to determine the national championship of the major college basketball teams.
The tournament, organized by the National Collegiate Athletic Association ( NCAA ), was created during 1939 by the नेशनल संघ of बास्केट कोच, और थी the विचार of ओहियो राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों कोच Harold Olsen.
निभाई ज़्यादातर दौरान कूच, it is ज्ञात informally as कूच दीवानगी or the बिग नृत्य, और रै become एक of the most famous annual sporting events in the United States.
The NCAA has credited bob वाल्श of the सिएटल आयोजन Committee for starting the March Madness celebration during 1984.
The tournament teams include champions from 31 प्रभाग i सम्मेलनों ( जिससे प्राप्त स्वचालित बोलियों ), और 37 टीमों जिससे हैं awarded at-large berths.
These `` at-large '' teams हैं चुनी by an ncaa चयन committee, as detailed below.
The 64 teams are divided into four regions and organized into a सिंगल विलोपन `` कोष्ठक '', जिससे predetermines, जब a टोली विन्स a खेल, which team it will face next.
प्रत्येक टोली is `` seeded '', or ranked, within its region.
After an initial four games between आठ lower-ranked टीमों, the टूर्नामेंट occurs दौरान the कोर्स of तीन weekends, at pre-selected neutral sites around the United States.
Lower-ranked teams are placed in the कोष्ठक विरूद्ध उच्चतर ranked teams.
Each weekend eliminates three-fourths of the teams, from a round of 64, to a `` Sweet Sixteen '', and लिये the पिछला वीकेंड of the टूर्नामेंट a फाइनल चार ; the फाइनल चार is प्रायः निभाई दौरान the पहला वीकेंड of April.
These four teams, one from प्रत्येक प्रदेश, तब compete in एक स्थान for the national championship.
The tournament has been at तनिक partially televised since 1969.
Presently, the games are reported by सीबीएस, tbs, टीएनटी, और trutv by the trade-name NCAA March Madness.
चूंकि 2011, सब खेल हैं उपलब्धियाँ for viewing nationwide.
As टेलीविज़न कवरेज रै grown, so too has the tournament 's popularity.
presently, लाखो of अमेरिकी `` fill out a bracket '', predicting winners of all 67 games.
साथ 11 नेशनल शीर्षक, ucla रै the रिकार्ड लिये the सबसे ncaa मेन 's प्रभाग I Basketball Championships ; John Wooden coached UCLA to 10 of its 11 titles.
The University of Kentucky is second, with 8 national titles, while Indiana University and the विश्वविद्यालयों of उत्तर कैरोलिना हैं tied लिये तीसरा साथ 5 नेशनल शीर्षक.
Duke University ranks पांचवां साथ 4 नेशनल titles.
A sample of सिंथेटिक मोटर oil
सिंथेटिक आयल is a स्नेहक consisting of रासायनिक यौगिकों कि हैं artificially made ( synthesized ).
Synthetic lubricants can be manufactured using chemically परिवर्धित पेट्रोलियम components बल्कि than पूरे crude आयल, लकिन can भी be synthesized from other raw materials.
Synthetic oil is used as a substitute for lubricant refined from petroleum when operating in extremes of temperature, because, in general, it provides superior mechanical and chemical properties than those मिला in परंपरागत खनिज oils.
Aircraft jet engines, for example, require the use of synthetic oils, whereas वायुयान पिस्टन engines do not.
Jackass is an American reality series, originally shown on MTV from 2000 to 2002, featuring लोगों performing विभिन्न खतरनाक, crude self-injuring stunts and pranks.
The show served as a launchpad for the television और एक्टिंग करियर of bam margera, steve-o, और भी जॉनी knoxville, जो previously had only a few minor acting roles.
Since 2002, three Jackass films have been उत्पादित और released by एमटीवी कॉरपोरेट सहोदर सर्वोपरि तस्वीरें, continuing the मताधिकार बाद its run on television.
The show sparked several spin-offs सहित चिरायु la bam, wildboyz, homewrecker, Dr. Steve-O and Blastazoid.
The show placed # 68 on entertainment साप्ताहिक `` नई tv क्लासिक '' list.
Roseanne Cherrie Barr ( born November 3, 1952 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री, comedienne, लेखक, टेलीविज़न निर्माता, निदेशक, और 2012 अध्यक्षीय nominee of the California -based Peace and Freedom Party.
Barr began her करियर in stand-up कॉमेडी at क्लब पहले gaining कीर्ति लिये उसके भूमिका in the sitcom Roseanne.
The show was a hit and lasted nine सीज़न, इससे 1988 to 1997.
वो जीती दोनो an एमी और a सुनहरी Globe Award for Best Actress for her work on the show.
barr था crafted a `` fierce working-class घरेलू देवी '' persona in the eight years preceding her sitcom and wanted to do a realistic show about a strong mother who was not a victim of patriarchal consumerism.
The granddaughter of immigrants from Europe and Russia, Barr was the oldest of चार children in a working-class यहूदी नमक झील नगर परिवार ; वो थी भी active in the LDS Church.
In 1974, she married Bill Pentland, with whom she had three children, पहले divorcing in 1990 और marrying हास्य tom अर्नाल्ड लिये चार सालो.
Controversy arose when वो संग `` the star-spangled ध्वज `` off-key at a 1990 nationally aired baseball game, followed by grabbing her crotch and spitting.
After her sitcom ended, she launched उसके अपना बात दिखाएँ, the roseanne Show, which aired from 1998 to 2000.
In 2005, वो लौटे to stand-up comedy with a world tour.
In 2011, she starred in an unscripted TV show, Roseanne 's Nuts, that lasted from July to सितंबर of कि साल, परिचय उसके जीवन on a Hawaiian farm.
In early 2012, Barr घोषित उसके उम्मीदवारी लिये the अध्यक्षीय nomination of the Green Party.
Barr lost the नामांकन to Jill Stein.
She then sought the presidential nomination of the सलाम और स्वतंत्रता पार्टी, जिससे वो जीती on अगस्त 4, 2012.
Barr received 61,971 votes in the सामान्य चुनाव, रखकर छठे overall.
Francesco Albani 's 17th century Baptism of मसीह is a ठेठ चित्रण साथ the आसमान खोलने और the पावन Spirit descending as a dove.
The baptism of Jesus marks the शुरूआत of उसके पब्लिक मंत्रालय.
This इवेंट is अंकित in the canonical gospels of मैथ्यू, Mark and Luke.
John 's gospel does not describe Jesus ' baptism, but जॉन the बैपटिस्ट करता गवाही of the अन्य बाते in.
In the New Testament, John the Baptist preached the बपतिस्मा of तौबा लिये the remission of पापों ( ), and declared himself a forerunner of he that would baptize `` with the Holy Ghost and with fire '' ( ).
In so doing he थी तैयारी the रास्ता for Jesus.
Jesus came to the जॉर्डन नदी जहाँ he थी baptized by John.
The baptismal झाँकी शामिल the आकाश खोलने, a dove-like descent of the पावन स्पिरिट, और a आवाज़ इससे heaven saying, `` This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased. ''
Most modern scholars view the fact that यीशु थी baptized by जॉन as an ऐतिहासिक इवेंट to जिससे a ऊँची उपाधि of certainty can be assigned.
Along with the crucifixion of Jesus most scholars view it as one of the two historically निश्चित तथ्य परिचय उसे, और प्रायः उपयोग it as the starting अंक लिये the study of the historical Jesus.
The baptism is one of the five major milestones in the इन्जील कथा of the जीवन of यीशु, the अन्य होने the बासीलीक, crucifixion, क़यामत, and Ascension.
Most Christian denominations view the baptism of Jesus as an important इवेंट और a आधार लिये the ईसाई रीति of बपतिस्मा ( देखिए भी ).
In Eastern christianity, यीशु ' बपतिस्मा is commemorated on 6 जनवरी, the feast of Epiphany.
In the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर, the anglican नियाज़, the लूथरन चर्च और कुछ other Western denominations, it is recalled on a day within the following week, the feast of the baptism of the Lord.
In Roman Catholicism, the baptism of Jesus is one of the चमकदार रहस्यों sometimes added to the rosary.
It is a trinitarian feast in the पूर्वी Orthodox Churches.
Methylcobalamin ( shown ) is a रूप of विटामिन B12.
Physically it resembles the other फ़ॉर्म of विटामिन b12, occurring as अंधेरा रेड crystals that freely form cherry-colored transparent solutions in water.
Vitamin B12, vitamin B12 or विटामिन b-12, भी पुकारा cobalamin, is a water-soluble विटामिन साथ a कुंजी भूमिका in the सामान्य कामकाज of the brain and nervous system, and for the formation of blood.
It is one of the eight B विटामिन.
It is normally involved in the metabolism of every cell of the human body, especially affecting DNA संश्लेषण और विनियमन, लकिन भी वसीय एसिड संश्लेषण and energy production.
Neither fungi, plants, nor पशु हैं सक्षम of producing विटामिन b12.
Only bacteria and archaea have the enzymes required for its संश्लेषण, हालांकि अनेक भोजन हैं a प्राकृतिक सोर्स of b12 क्युकी of bacterial symbiosis.
The vitamin is the largest and सबसे structurally जटिल विटामिन और can be उत्पादित industrially only through bacterial fermentation-synthesis.
Vitamin B12 consists of a class of chemically related compounds ( vitamers ), सब of जिससे have विटामिन कार्यकलाप.
It contains the biochemically rare element cobalt.
Biosynthesis of the basic structure of the विटामिन is संपन्नता तभी by जीवाणु ( जिससे प्रायः उपज hydroxocobalamin ), लकिन conversion between different forms of the vitamin can be accomplished in the human body.
A common semi-synthetic form of the vitamin, cyanocobalamin, does not occur in nature, but is produced from bacterial hydroxocobalamin और तब प्रयुक्त in अनेक दवाएँ और पूरक, और as a खाना योगात्मक, क्युकी of इसके स्थिरता और निम्नतर उत्पादन लागत.
In the body it is converted to the इंसान physiological फ़ॉर्म methylcobalamin और adenosylcobalamin, leaving behind the cyanide, albeit in minimal concentration.
More recently, hydroxocobalamin, methylcobalamin, और adenosylcobalamin can be मिला in अधिक महंगी pharmacological products and food supplements.
The अतिरिक्त यूटिलिटी of ये is currently debated.
Vitamin B12 was discovered from its relationship to the disease pernicious anemia, जिससे is an असंक्राम्य बीमारी in जिससे parietal कोशिकाएं of the पेट जिम्मेदार for secreting intrinsic factor are destroyed.
Intrinsic factor is crucial for the normal absorption of B12, so a कमी of मूलभूत फ़ैक्टर, as देखी in घातक रक्ताल्पता, कल्याणकारी a vitamin B12 deficiency.
Many अन्य subtler kinds of विटामिन b12 deficiency and their biochemical effects have since been elucidated.
Full Metal Jacket is a 1987 युद्ध फिल्मी उत्पादित, निर्देशित और co-written by Stanley Kubrick.
It is an adaptation of Gustav Hasford 's 1979 अनोखा the short-timers और सितारों मैथ्यू modine, विंसेंट d'onofrio, R. Lee Ermey, Arliss Howard, and Adam Baldwin.
The film follows a प्लाटून of u.S. marines through उनके प्रशिक्षण और the अनुभवों of दो of the platoon 's Marines in the Tet Offensive during the Vietnam War.
The फिल्मी 's शीर्षक refers to the full metal jacket bullet used by infantry riflemen.
the फिल्मी प्राप्त critical acclaim.
It received an अकादमी पुरस्कार नामांकन लिये बेहतरीन adapted पटकथा लिये kubrick, Michael Herr and Gustav Hasford.
In 2001, the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान लगाई पूरा मेटल जैकेट at # 95 in उनके `` AFI 's 100 Years... 100 Thrills `` poll.
TMZ is a celebrity news website कि debuted on नवम्बर 8, 2005.
It was a collaboration between AOL and telepictures प्रोडक्शन्स, a प्रभाग of warner भाईs., जबतक Time Warner divested AOL in 2009.
However, it remained संबद्ध साथ एओएल न्यूज और रै the एओएल न्यूज logo affixed in the upper right corner.
The name TMZ stands for the historic `` studio zone `` or 30-mile zone दायरा इससे the चौराहे of वेस्ट बेवर्ली boulevard और उत्तर la cienega boulevard in लॉस एंजिल्स.
TMZ 's managing editor is Harvey Levin, a lawyer-turned-journalist who was previously a विधिक विशेषज्ञ लिये the लॉस एंजिल्स टेलीविज़न स्टेशन KCBS-TV.
The site claims that it does not pay for stories or interviews ; however, levin रै admitted कि tmz करता `` sometimes अदा स्त्रोत लिये लीड on stories ''.
Levin has stated that `` सबकुछ is शोधकार्य और vetted for accuracy. ''
A साथी tv श्रेणी, tmz on TV, debuted on September 10, 2007.
चीख 3 is a 2000 अमरीकी slasher फिल्मी निर्मित by केविन विलियमसन, निर्देशित by वेस craven और लिखा by Ehren Kruger, starring Neve Campbell, Courteney Cox Arquette and David Arquette.
It was released on February 4, 2000 as the तीसरा किश्त in the चीख फिल्मी श्रेणी.
The events of the story are set three years after those of Scream 2 and follows sidney प्रेस्कॉट ( कैम्पबेल ) जो रै गए into self-imposed अलगाव following the कार्यक्रम of the पिछला दो films लकिन is drawn to हॉलीवुड बाद a नई ghostface begins killing the cast of the film within a film `` Stab 3 ''.
Scream 3 combines the हिंसा of the slasher विधा साथ कॉमेडी और `` whodunit `` रहस्य जबकि satirizing the cliché of film trilogies.
Unlike the previous Scream films, वहीँ थी an increased जोर on comedic तत्व और the हिंसा और हॉरर थी घटाया in जवाब to increased पब्लिक scrutiny about violence in media following the Columbine High School massacre.
The film was the concluding chapter of the Scream series जबतक it थी revived साथ a sequel, Scream 4, in 2011.
Williamson provided a five-page outline for two सिक्वेल to चीख जब auctioning उसके असली स्क्रिप्ट, उम्मीद to entice bidders with the potential of buying a franchise.
Williamson 's commitments to other projects meant he was unable to develop a पूरा स्क्रिप्ट लिये चीख 3 और लिखने कर्तव्य यहूद undertaken by ehren क्रूगर जो discarded much of विलियमसन 's टीप.
Craven and Marco Beltrami लौटे to सीधा और स्कोर the फिल्मी क्रमशः as वे था साथ the previous two series entries.
Production was troubled with script rewrites, with पृष्ठों sometimes तभी तैयार on the दिन of फिल्मांकन, and scheduling difficulties with the main cast.
Scream 3 performed दोनो financially और critically बदतर than इसके preceding films, कमाई over $ 161 लाख और साथ अनेक critics claiming that the film had become what Scream originally `` spoofed ``.
Despite negative criticism the film did receive तारीफ़ साथ reviewers कॉलिंग it the पूर्ण समाप्त to the Scream trilogy.
As of 2012, the film is currently the number 3 highest-grossing slasher-film in उत्तर अमेरिका, following चीख at क्रमांक 1 और चीख 2 at number 2.
The film 's soundtrack was well-received, बिता चौदह सप्ताह on the बिलबोर्ड 200 और reaching a high of # 32.
Shoulder impingement सिंड्रोम, भी पुकारा दुखद चाप सिंड्रोम, supraspinatus सिंड्रोम, तैराक 's कंधे, और thrower 's कंधे, is a नैदानिक syndrome which occurs when the tendons of the rotator cuff muscles become irritated and inflamed as they pass through the subacromial space, the passage beneath the acromion.
This can result in pain, कमज़ोरी और घाटा of गति at the कंधे.
JLA was a मासिक कॉमिक किताब प्रकाशित by dc कॉमिक्स इससे जनवरी 1997 to April 2006 featuring the Justice League.
The colonial history of the United States कवर the इतिहास of यूरोपीय settlements इससे the प्रारंभ of colonization of अमेरिका जबतक उनके incorporation into the United States.
In the लेट 16th सदी, इंग्लैण्ड, फ़्रांस, स्पेन और the नीदरलैंड्स launched major colonization programs in eastern North America.
Small early attempts—such as the English Lost उपनिवेश of roanoke —often disappeared ; everywhere the मौत रेट of the पहला आमद थी very high.
Nevertheless कामयाब colonies यहूद स्थापित.
European settlers आए इससे a किस्में of सोशल and religious groups.
No aristocrats settled permanently, लकिन a number of adventurers, soldiers, farmers, and tradesmen arrived.
Diversity was an American characteristic as the Dutch of New Netherland, the swedes और finns of नई स्वीडन, the अंग्रेज़ी quakers of पेन्सिलवेनिया, the अंग्रेज़ी puritans of नई इंग्लैण्ड, the अंग्रेज़ी settlers of jamestown, और the `` worthy poor '' of Georgia, came to the new continent and built colonies with distinctive social, religious, political and economic styles.
Occasionally one colony took कंट्रोल of another ( दौरान युद्धों between their European parents ).
तभी in नोवा स्कोटिया ( अभी भाग of कनाडा ) किया the conquerors expel the previous colonists.
Instead they all जिया पक्ष by पक्ष in सलाम.
There were no major civil wars among the 13 colonies, और the दो मुख्य हथियारबंद विद्रोहों ( in वर्जिनिया in 1676 और in नई यॉर्क in 1689–91 ) were short-lived failures.
Wars between the French and the British—the French and Indian युद्धों और पिता rale 's युद्ध —were तूल, और शामिल french-support for Wabanaki Confederacy attacks on the frontiers.
By 1760 France was defeated और the अंग्रेजों जब्त इसके colonies.
The four distinct regions यहूद : नई इंग्लैण्ड, the मध्य colonies, the Chesapeake Bay Colonies ( Upper South ) and the Lower South.
Some historians add a fifth प्रदेश, the frontier, जिससे थी never separately organized.
By the time यूरोपीय settlers arrived around 1600–1650, the बहुमत of the देशी अमेरिकी जीना in the पूर्वी United States had been decimated by new diseases, introduced to them decades before by explorers and sailors.
