Gloria Laura Vanderbilt ( born February 20, 1924 ) is an अमरीकी कलाकार, लेखक, अभिनेत्री, heiress, और socialite most noted as an early developer of designer blue jeans.
She is a member of the prominent Vanderbilt परिवार of नई यॉर्क और the माँ of सीएनएन 's एंडरसन Cooper.
Greece ( Romanization of Greek| ), officially the हैलेनिक गणतंत्र ( ' ), is a country in Southeast Europe.
According to the 2011 जनसांख्यिकी, यूनानियों 's जनसांख्यिकी is around 11 million.
Athens is the nation 's capital और largest नगर, इसके शहरी क्षेत्रफल भी including Piraeus.
Greece is strategically located at the crossroads of Europe, Asia, the Middle East, और अफ़्रीकी, और रै जमीन सीमायें साथ अल्बानियाई, the गणतंत्र of मकदूनिया और बुल्गारिया to the north, and Turkey to the northeast.
The Aegean Sea lies to the east of mainland Greece, the आयोनियन समुद्र to the वेस्ट, और the भूमध्यसागरीय समुद्र to the south.
यूनानियों रै the 11th longest तटरेखा in the संसार at in लंबाई, featuring a विशाल number of islands ( approximately 1,400, of which 227 are inhabited ), including Crete, the Dodecanese, the Cyclades, and the Ionian Islands among others.
Eighty percent of Greece consists of kyu, of जिससे माउंट ओलम्पस is the highest at.
Modern Greece traces its जड़ें to the सभ्यता of प्राचीन यूनानियों, generally considered the cradle of Western civilization.
As such, it is the birthplace of democracy, Western philosophy, the Olympic Games, Western literature and historiography, राजनैतिक विज्ञान, प्रमुख वैज्ञानिक और mathematical principles, and Western drama, including both tragedy and comedy.
This legacy is partly reflected in the सत्रह UNESCO World Heritage Sites located in Greece, ranking it 7th in Europe and 13th in the world.
The modern यूनानी राज्य थी स्थापित in 1830, following the Greek War of Independence.
यूनानियों is a founding सदस्य of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र, रै महरूम a सदस्य of कया is अभी the European Union since 1981 ( and the eurozone since 2001 ), and has been a member of NATO since 1952.
यूनानियों is a विकसित देश साथ an उन्नत, high-income economy and very high standards of living, including the world 's 21st highest quality of life as of 2010.
Greece 's economy is also the largest in the balkans, जहाँ यूनानियों is an important regional investor.
A prime meridian is a meridian, i.e. a line of longitude, at which देशांतर is पारिभाषित to be 0°.
A prime meridian and its विपरीत in a 360°-system, the 180th मध्याह्न ( at 180° देशांतर ), form a great circle.
This great circle divides the गोला, e.g. the धरती, into two hemispheres.
If one uses दिशानिर्देश of ईस्ट और वेस्ट इससे a पारिभाषित प्रधान मध्याह्न, तब वे can be called Eastern Hemisphere and Western Hemisphere.
Gerardus Mercator in his Atlas Cosmographicae ( 1595 ) उपयोग a प्रधान मध्याह्न कही बंद to 25°W, passing just to the west of Santa Maria Island in the Atlantic.
His 180th meridian runs along the जलसन्धि of anián ( बेरिंग जलसन्धि )
A prime meridian is ultimately मनमानी, नापसंद an equator, जिससे is संकल्पित by the अक्ष of rotation—and विभिन्न conventions have been used or advocated in different regions and throughout history.
minka dumont केली ( born minka dumont Dufay ; June 24, 1980 ) is an American actress.
She is शायद बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उसके भूमिकाएँ in चार्ली 's फ़रिश्ते, Friday Night Lights, and The Roommate.
R.O.B. ( Robotic Operating दोस्त ), released in जापानी as the, is an accessory for the Nintendo Entertainment System ( NES ).
It was released in July 1985 in Japan और बाद कि साल in उत्तर अमेरिका.
It had a short product lifespan, with support for only two games जिससे comprised the `` रोबोट श्रेणी '' ; Gyromite and Stack-Up.
R.O.B. was released with the intention of portraying the Nintendo Entertainment System as कुछ अनोखा in अनुक्रम to alleviate खुदरा fears following the video game crash of 1983.
R.O.B. was available in the Deluxe Set, a विन्यास लिये the कंसोल कि शामिल, among अन्य बाते, r.o.b. और Gyromite.
Stack-Up was purchased separately और शामिल इसके अपना शारीरिक खेल pieces.
The Walking Liberty half dollar was a silver 50-cent piece or half dollar coin issued by the United States मिंट इससे 1916 to 1947 ; it थी designed by एडाल्फ A. weinman.
In 1915, the new Mint Director, Robert W. Woolley, came to believe that he was not तभी अनुमत लकिन जरूरी by विधि to बदलें सिक्का डिजाइन कि था महरूम in use for 25 years.
He therefore began the process of replacing the Barber coinage : dimes, quarters और हाफ डॉलर, सब bearing समान डिजाइन by long-time मिंट engraver चार्ल्स E. Barber, and first struck in 1892.
Woolley had the आयोग of ठीक कला conduct a प्रतियोगिता, as a परिणाम of which Weinman was selected to design the dime and half dollar.
Weinman 's design of Liberty striding towards the Sun for the half dollar proved difficult to perfect, and Treasury सचिव विलियम G. mcadoo, जिनकी विभाग शामिल the मिंट, माना having नाई create his own design.
Mint officials were successful in getting Weinman 's design into production, although it never struck बहुत खूब, जिससे may have महरूम a फ़ैक्टर in इसके बदलना by the फ्रैंकलिन हाफ डालर beginning in 1948.
Nevertheless, art historian Cornelius Vermeule considered the piece to be among the सबसे खूबसूरत us coins.
Since 1986, a modification of Weinman 's obverse डिज़ाइन रै महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये the अमरीकी Silver Eagle.
The Toyota 4runner is a mid-size खेल यूटिलिटी गाडी ( एसयूवी ) उत्पादित by the Japanese manufacturer Toyota and sold throughout the world from 1984 to present.
In जापानी it थी ज्ञात as the Toyota Hilux Surf.
The original 4Runner was a compact SUV and little more than a टोयोटा पिकअप ट्रक साथ a fiberglass शेल over the bed, लकिन the मॉडल रै चूंकि undergone significant independent development into a cross between a compact and a mid-size SUV.
All 4Runners have been built at Toyota 's Tahara plant in Tahara, Aichi, Japan, or at hino मोटर्स ' hamura, जापानी संयंत्र, और in Brazil.
इसके mid-size क्रॉसओवर एसयूवी बंटवारा is the Toyota Highlander.
This article deals with medicine as practiced by प्रशिक्षित पेशेवर इससे ancient times to the present.
The ancient Egyptians had a system of आयुर्विज्ञान कि थी बहुत उन्नत लिये इसके समय और बहकावे later medical traditions.
The Egyptians and Babylonians both introduced the अवधारणाओं of निदान, prognosis, and medical examination.
The Greeks गई भी further, और उन्नत as well medical ethics.
The hippocratic शपथ, स्टिल लिया by डॉक्टर today, was written in Greece in the 5th century BCE.
In the medieval era, surgical practices inherited from the ancient masters were improved and then systematized in rogerius 's the Practice of Surgery.
विश्वविद्यालयों began व्यवस्थित प्रशिक्षण of physicians around the years 1220 in Italy.
During the Renaissance, समझना of anatomy improved, और the microscope was invented.
The germ theory of बीमारी in the 19th सदी led to cures लिये अनेक संक्रामक diseases.
Military डॉक्टर उन्नत the विधि of trauma treatment and surgery.
Public स्वास्थ्य उपायों यहूद विकसित विशेषकर in the 19th सदी as the rapid growth of cities required systematic sanitary measures.
Advanced research centers opened in the जल्दी 20th सदी, प्रायः कनेक्ट with major hospitals.
the mid-20th सदी थी characterized by नई biological treatments, such as antibiotics.
These advancements, along with developments in रसायन, आनुवंशिकी, और lab प्रौद्योगिकी ( ऐसे as the x-ray ) led to modern medicine.
Medicine थी heavily professionalized in the 20th सदी, और नई करियर opened to women as nurses ( from the 1870s ) and as physicians ( especially after 1970 ).
The 21st century is characterized by बहुत उन्नत शोध involving numerous फ़ील्ड of science.
The hippocratic कॉर्पस, is a संग्रहण of जल्दी चिकित्सा works इससे प्राचीन यूनानियों strongly संबद्ध साथ the ancient Greek physician Hippocrates and his teachings.
Potassium is a chemical तत्व साथ प्रतीक k ( इससे neo-latin kalium ) और atomic number 19.
Elemental potassium is a soft silvery-white क्षारीय मेटल कि oxidizes rapidly in एयर और is बहुत प्रतिक्रिया with water, generating sufficient heat to ignite the hydrogen emitted in the reaction and burning with a lilac flame.
Because potassium and सोडियम हैं chemically बहुत समान, उनके लवण यहूद नहीं at first differentiated.
The existence of अनेक तत्व in उनके लवण थी suspected इससे 1702, और इस थी सिद्ध in 1807 when potassium and sodium were individually isolated from different salts by electrolysis.
Potassium in nature occurs तभी in ionic लवण.
as ऐसे, it is मिला dissolved in seawater ( which is 0.04 % potassium by weight ), and is part of many minerals.
Most industrial chemical applications of पोटैशियम employ the अपेक्षाकृत ऊँची घुलनशीलता in water of potassium compounds, such as potassium soaps.
Potassium metal has only a few special अनुप्रयोग, होने replaced in सबसे रासायनिक प्रतिक्रियाएँ साथ सोडियम metal.
Potassium ions are जरुरी लिये the फलन of all living cells.
Potassium ion diffusion is a key mechanism in तंत्रिका हस्तांतरण, और पोटैशियम depletion in पशु, including humans, results in various cardiac dysfunctions.
Potassium accumulates in plant cells, and thus भैस फल और सब्जियां हैं a शुभ dietary source of it.
Conversely, most plants except विशेषज्ञ halophytes हैं असहिष्णु of नमक, और सोडियम is present in them only in low concentration.
This resulted in पोटैशियम पहला होने isolated from potash, the ashes of plants, giving the element its name.
For the same reason, heavy crop production rapidly depletes soils of potassium, and agricultural fertilizers consume 95 % of वैश्विक पोटैशियम chemical production.
The Singapore डालर or डालर ( चिह्न : $ ; कोड : sgd ) is the official currency of Singapore.
It is normally abbreviated with the डालर चिह्न $, or alternatively s $ to फर्क it from other dollar -denominated currencies.
it is विभाजित into 100 cents.
The Monetary Authority of Singapore and the Brunei करेंसी और मौद्रिक फलक स्टिल maintain the ऐतिहासिक exchangeability of their two currencies, the Singaporean dollar and the Brunei dollar, respectively.
The dollar is accepted as `` प्रथागत टेंडर '' in ब्रुनेई according to the Currency Interchangeability Agreement.
Likewise, the ब्रुनेई डालर is customarily स्वीकृत in सिंगापुर
James Samuel Coleman ( May 12, 1926 – March 25, 1995 ) थी an अमरीकी समाजशास्त्री, theorist और अनुभवजन्य researcher, based chiefly at the University of Chicago.
He was elected अध्यक्ष of the अमरीकी Sociological Association.
Coleman studied the sociology of education, public policy, and was एक of the earliest उपयोक्ता of the पद `` सोशल capital ``.
His Foundations of सोशल सिद्धान्त बहकावे समाजशास्त्रीय theory.
His The Adolescent Society ( 1961 ) and `` Coleman रपट '' ( समता of शैक्षणिक अवसर, 1966 ) यहूद दो of the सबसे heavily cited books in educational sociology.
The landmark Coleman Report helped transform educational theory, reshape national education policies, and influenced पब्लिक और scholarly राय regarding the भूमिका of schooling in determining समता और उत्पादकता in the United States.
Superman ( from DC कॉमिक्स ) थी the पहला सुपरहीरो निर्मित, art by Jim Lee.
A superhero ( sometimes rendered super-hero or सुपर नायिका ) is a प्रकार of भण्डार अक्षर possessing `` extraordinary or superhuman powers '' and dedicated to protecting the public.
चूंकि the डेब्यू of the prototypical सुपरहीरो सुपरमैन in 1938, कहानियां of superheroes—ranging इससे ब्रैड episodic adventures to continuing years-long sagas—have dominated American comic books and crossed over into other media.
The word itself तिथियाँ to at तनिक 1917.
A मादा सुपरहीरो is sometimes पुकारा a superheroine ( also rendered super-heroine or super heroine ).
`` SUPER नायक '' is a ट्रेडमार्क co-owned by DC Comics and Marvel Comics.
By most परिभाषाएं, वर्ण do नहीं सख्ती आवश्यकता वास्तविक superhuman शक्तियां to be deemed superheroes, हालांकि शर्तें ऐसे as costumed crime fighters or masked vigilantes are sometimes used to refer to those such as Batman and Green Arrow without such powers who share other common superhero traits.
Such characters were generally referred to as `` mystery men '' in the so-called Golden आयु of कॉमिक किताबे to फर्क उन्हें इससे वर्ण साथ super-powers.
Normally, superheroes use their powers to counter day-to-day crime while also combating खतरे विरूद्ध मानवता by supervillains, उनके दण्ड counterparts.
Often, one of ये supervillains होगा be the superhero 's archenemy.
As well, some longrunning superheroes, such as Superman, Batman, spider-man और आयरन man प्रत्येक रै a rogues दीर्घा of दुश्मनों.
As well, superheroes sometimes will combat ऐसे irregular खतरे as एलियंस, magical/ काल्पनिक entities, American war enemies such as nazism or communism, and godlike or demonic creatures.

The Shawshank मोचन is a 1994 अमरीकी नाटक फिल्मी लिखा और निर्देशित by फ़्रैंक darabont and starring Tim Robbins and Morgan Freeman.
Adapted from the Stephen King novella Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption, the film tells the story of Andy Dufresne, a banker who spends nearly दो दशकों in shawshank राज्य थाना लिये the हत्या of his wife and her lover despite his claims of innocence.
During his time at the prison, he befriends a fellow inmate, Ellis Boyd `` Red '' Redding, and finds himself सुरक्षित by the गार्ड बाद the वार्डन begins using उसे in उसके धन laundering operation.
Despite a lukewarm box office reception that barely recouped its budget, the film received अनुकूल समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों, अनेक पुरस्कार nominations, और रै चूंकि enjoyed a उल्लेखनीय जीवन on केबल टेलीविज़न, VHS, DVD, and Blu-ray.
It was included in the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान 's 100 सालो... 100 Movies 10th Anniversary Edition.
IT management is the discipline whereby सब of the प्रौद्योगिकी संसाधन of a कड़ हैं प्रबंधित in accordance with its needs and priorities.
These resources may include tangible निवेश जैसे कंप्यूटर हार्डवेयर, तन्त्र, आंकड़ा, संजाल और आंकड़ा केन्द्र सुविधाएं, as खूब as the staffs who are hired to maintain them.
Managing this जिम्मेदारी भीतर a कम्पनी entails अनेक of the मौलिक प्रबन्धन कृत्यों, जैसे budgeting, स्टॉफ, और आयोजन और controlling, साथ with other aspects that are unique to technology, like change management, software design, network planning, tech support etc.
The Penitentiary of New Mexico Prison Riot, which took place on February 2 and 3, 1980, in the state 's maximum सुरक्षा थाना दक्षिण of सांता fe, थी एक of the सबसे हिंसक थाना दंगे in the इतिहास of the अमरीकी correctional प्रणाली : 33 inmates died और अधिक than 200 inmates यहूद treated लिये चोटों.
None of the 12 officers taken hostage were killed, but seven were treated लिये चोटों caused by beatings और rapes.
This was the third major riot at the NM State Penitentiary, the first occurring on 19 जुलाई 1922 और the दूसरी on 15 जून 1953.
Author Roger Morris suggests the death toll may have been higher, as a number of bodies were incinerated or dismembered दौरान the कोर्स of the mayhem.

The Northern Cardinal ( Cardinalis cardinalis ) is a North American bird in the genus cardinalis ; it is भी ज्ञात colloquially as the redbird or common cardinal.
It can be found in southern Canada, through the पूर्वी संयुक्त राज्य इससे maine to टेक्सास और दक्षिण through Mexico.
It is मिला in वुडलैंड्स, gardens, shrublands, and swamps.
the उत्तरी कार्डिनल is a mid-sized songbird with a body length of 21 centimeters ( 8.3 inches ).
It has a distinctive crest on the head and a mask on the फेस जिससे is ब्लैक in the पुरूष और धूसर in the मादा.
The male is a vibrant red, while the मादा is a फीकी red-brown shade.
The उत्तरी कार्डिनल is मुख्यतः granivorous, लकिन भी फ़ीड्स on कीट and fruit.
The male behaves territorially, अंकन आउट उसके territory साथ song.
During courtship, the पुरूष फ़ीड्स बीज to the मादा beak-to-beak.
a क्लच of तीन to चार अंडे is रखी, और two to four clutches are produced each year.
It was once prized as a pet, but its sale as cage पक्षियों is अभी बैन in the संयुक्त राज्य by the migratory Bird Treaty Act of 1918.

Topsoil as well as farm fertilizers and other potential pollutants run बंद unprotected फार्म फ़ील्ड जब भारी rains occur.
topsoil is the अपर, outermost layer of soil, usually the top to.
It has the highest विशेषज्ञता of सशुल्क पदार्थ और microorganisms और is जहाँ सबसे of the Earth 's biological soil activity occurs.

Sechs kleine Klavierstücke, Op. 19 ( or Six Little Piano टुकड़े ) is a नियत of टुकड़े लिये सोलो पियानो लिखा by the आस्ट्रिया composer Arnold Schoenberg, published in 1913.
मैक्एफ़ी, inc. ( ) is an अमरीकी वैश्विक कंप्यूटर सुरक्षा तन्त्र कम्पनी headquartered in सांता क्लारा, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, and the world 's largest dedicated security technology company.
As of February 28, 2011, मैक्एफ़ी is a wholly स्वामित्व subsidiary of इंटेल.

Saint Rita of Cascia ( Born Margherita lotti 1381 - may 22, 1457 ) थी an इतालवी augustinian नन, विधवा और saint venerated in the Roman Catholic Church.
Rita was शादीशुदा at an जल्दी आयु.
The marriage lasted for 18 सालो, दौरान जिससे वो is remembered लिये her Christian values as a model wife and mother who made efforts to convert her husband from his abusive behavior.
Upon the हत्या of उसके husband by another feuding family, she sought to dissuade her sons from revenge.
She subsequently joined an Augustinian community of धार्मिक बहनों, जहाँ वो थी ज्ञात लिये practicing mortification of the flesh, along with the apparent efficacy of her prayers.
St. Rita is venerated due to various miracles attributed to her सिफ़ारिश, और is प्रायः portrayed साथ a bleeding घाव on उसके माथे, जिससे the रोमन Catholic Church claims to have been a partial stigmata.
The Roman Catholic Church, अंतर्गत the pontificate of पोप leo xiii officially canonized रीता on May 24, 1900, while her feast day is celebrated every May 22.
In many pious कैथोलिक देशों, रीता is ज्ञात to be a patroness for abused wives and mourning women.
North America is a continent wholly within the Northern Hemisphere और लगभग wholly भीतर the पश्चिमी गोलार्ध.
It is also considered a उत्तरी उपमहाद्वीप of the americas.
It is bordered to the north by the आर्कटिक समंदर, to the ईस्ट by the अटलांटिक समंदर, to the west and south by the Pacific Ocean, and to the southeast by South America and the Caribbean Sea.
उत्तर अमेरिका कवर an क्षेत्रफल of परिचय 24,709,000 वर्गाकार किलोमीटर ( 9,540,000 वर्गाकार miles ), about 4.8 % of the planet 's surface or about 16.5 % of its land area.
As of July 2008, its population was estimated at nearly 529 million people across 23 independent states, representing परिचय 7.5 % of the इंसान जनसांख्यिकी.
North America is the third-largest continent in area, following Asia and अफ़्रीकी, और the चौथी in जनसांख्यिकी बाद एशिया, अफ़्रीकी, और यूरोपीय.
The first people to live in North America were Paleoindians who began to arrive दौरान the पिछला glacial काल by क्रासिंग the बेरिंग जमीन सेतु.
They differentiated into a number of विविध संस्कृतियों और समुदायों आरपार the महाद्वीप.
The largest and most advanced Pre-Columbian सभ्यताओं in उत्तर अमेरिका यहूद the aztecs in कया is अभी मैक्सिको और the Mayans in Central America.
European colonists began to arrive starting in the 16th and 17th centuries, wiping आउट विशाल संख्याएँ of the देशी populations और शुरूआत an era of यूरोपीय dominance.
Jermaine Lamarr Cole ( born जनवरी 28, 1985 ), बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम J. कोल, is an अमरीकी hip-hop रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार and record producer from Fayetteville, North Carolina.
in 2009, he became the पहला कलाकार to sign to Jay-Z 's Roc Nation label.
His long-awaited डेब्यू एल्बम, हकदार Cole World : The Sideline Story, was released on September 27, 2011.
The album debuted at number one on the US बिलबोर्ड 200, शीर्ष r & b एल्बम और शीर्ष रैप एल्बम चार्ट, selling अधिक than 218,000 in its first week.
He received a नामांकन लिये बेहतरीन नई कलाकार at the 54th Grammy Awards.
The two main characters of the श्रेणी, ratchet ( सही ) and Clank ( left ).
Ratchet & clank is a श्रेणी of platform video games.
The franchise was created and developed by Insomniac Games and published by Sony Computer Entertainment for many अलग प्लेस्टेशन consoles, ऐसे as प्लेस्टेशन 2 और प्लेस्टेशन 3 साथ the exclusion of आकार matters और रहस्य एजेंट clank, जिससे यहूद विकसित by ऊँची प्रभाव खेल लिये the PlayStation Portable.
Every game in the series has been released लिये प्रत्येक कंसोल, as the ip is owned by Sony Computer Entertainment.
An animated विशेषता फिल्मी अनुकूलन उत्पादित by rainmaker entertainment और नाकेबंदी Entertainment is scheduled for a theatrical release sometime in 2015.
The games take place in a science fiction setting and follow the adventures of Ratchet ( an animalistic human-like character known as a Lombax, who is a मैकेनिक ) और clank ( a diminutive, sentient रोबोट ) as वे सफर through the ब्रह्मांड, छायांकन it इससे दुष्ट शक्तियां on a regular basis.
The series is noted for the inclusion of अनेक exotic और अद्वितीय, over the शीर्ष हथियार और डिवाइस, a अवधारणा कि insomniac Games also expanded into their other games.
A will or testament is a legal declaration by which a person, the testator, names एक or अधिक व्यक्तियों to मैनेज his/her estate and provides for the transfer of his property at death.
For the devolution of प्रॉपर्टी नहीं disposed of by will, see inheritance and intestacy.
In the strictest sense, a `` होगा '' रै historically महरूम सीमित to रियल प्रॉपर्टी जबकि `` वसीयत '' applies तभी to dispositions of personal property ( thus giving rise to the popular title of the document as `` Last Will and Testament '' ), though this distinction is seldom observed today.
A will may also create a testamentary trust कि is प्रभावी तभी बाद the मौत of the testator.
The 19.9 mw gemasolar सौर संयंत्र in स्पेन सुविधाएँ 15 घंटों of storage and can supply power 24 hours a day.
Solar energy, रौशन लाइट और ऊष्मा इससे the सूर्य, रै महरूम harnessed by इंसानो since ancient times using a range of ever-evolving technologies.
Solar energy technologies include solar हीटिंग, सौर photovoltaics, सौर थर्मल विद्युत, सौर वास्तुकला और कृत्रिम photosynthesis, which can make considerable contributions to solving some of the most urgent energy problems the world now faces.
Solar technologies are broadly characterized as either passive solar or क्रियाशील सौर depending on the रास्ता वे कैप्चर, बदलें और वितरित सौर energy.
Active solar तकनीकों शामिल the उपयोग of photovoltaic panels और सौर thermal collectors to harness the energy.
Passive solar techniques शामिल orienting a भवन to the सूर्य, selecting सामग्री साथ अनुकूल थर्मल द्रव्यमान or light dispersing properties, and designing spaces that naturally circulate air.
in 2011, the अंतरराष्ट्रीय उर्जा एजेंसी कहा कि `` the विकास of सस्ती, inexhaustible and clean solar energy technologies will have huge longer-term benefits.
It will increase countries’ energy security through रिलायंस on an स्वदेशी, inexhaustible और ज़्यादातर import-independent संसाधन, बढ़ाएँ स्थिरता, reduce प्रदूषण, lower the costs of mitigating climate change, and keep fossil fuel prices lower than otherwise.
These लाभ हैं वैश्विक.
Hence the additional costs of the incentives for early deployment should be considered learning investments ; they जरूर be बुद्धिमानी खर्च और need to be widely साझा ''.
Sir Thomas More ( ; 7 February 14786 July 1535 ), known to Roman Catholics as संत थामस अधिक चूंकि 1935, थी an अंग्रेज़ी वकील, सोशल पारस, author, statesman, and noted Renaissance humanist.
He was an important पार्षद to हेनरी viii of इंग्लैण्ड और थी रब Chancellor from October 1529 to 16 May 1532.
He was canonized by Pope Pius XI in 1935 as एक of the जल्दी शहीदो of the schism कि अलग the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड इससे Rome in the 16th century.
In 2000, Pope जॉन पॉल ii घोषित उसे संरक्षक of कैथोलिक statesmen and politicians.
More was an opponent of the Protestant Reformation, in particular of मार्टिन लूथर और विलियम टिंडेल.
However, since 1980, he is भी commemorated by the गिरिजाघर of England as a reformation martyr.
More coined the word `` utopia `` – a name he दिया to the आदर्श और काल्पनिक द्वीप स्वदेश, the राजनैतिक प्रणाली of जिससे he वर्णित in Utopia, published in 1516.
He opposed the King 's विरह इससे the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर और refused to accept उसे as परम् सिर of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड, a title which had been given by parliament through the Act of Supremacy of 1534.
He was imprisoned in 1534 for his refusal to take the oath required by the First उत्तराधिकार अधिनियम, क्युकी the अधिनियम disparaged papal प्राधिकार और henry’s विवाह to कैथरीन of aragon.
In 1535, he थी आजमाया लिये देशद्रोह, convicted on perjured गवाही, and beheaded.
More भी helped to originate the phrase `` grasp at लोभी '' to mean `` desperately trying even useless things '', in his Dialogue of Comfort Against Tribulation.
Intellectuals and कूटनीतिज्ञों आरपार यूरोपीय were stunned by More 's execution.
Erasmus saluted him as एक `` जिनकी आत्मा थी अधिक pure than कोई हिम, जिनकी प्रतिभाशाली थी ऐसे कि इंग्लैण्ड never had and never again will have its like ''.
There was a अधिक विवादास्पद पक्ष to अधिक 's जीवन, क्युकी he advocated the persecution और निष्पादन of Protestants who refused to recant their faith.
However, the judgement of history has been largely willing to forgive इस in लाइट of the टाइम्स he जिया in और उसके शहादत in the रोमन कैथोलिक कारण.
Two centuries later Jonathan Swift said More was `` the person of the महानतम पुण्य इस किंगडम कभी उत्पादित '', a भावना साथ जिससे सैमुएल Johnson agreed.
Historian Hugh Trevor-Roper said in 1977 that More was `` the पहला ग्रेट अंग्रेज जिसको we महसूस कि we जान, the सबसे saintly of humanists, the most human of saints, the universal man of our cool northern renaissance. ''
Captain Nemo, also known as प्रिंस dakkar, is a fictional अक्षर invented by the French science fiction author Jules Verne.
Nemo appears in two of Verne 's novels, Twenty Thousand Leagues अंतर्गत the समुद्र ( 1870 ) और the रहस्यमय द्वीप ( 1874 ), और makes a कैमियो रूप in वर्न 's play Journey Through the Impossible ( 1882 ).
Nemo, one of the most famous antiheroes in fiction, is a रहस्यमय figure.
The son of an Indian Raja, he is a वैज्ञानिक प्रतिभाशाली जो roams the गहराइयों of the समुद्र in उसके पनडुब्बी, the Nautilus, which was built on a deserted island.
Nemo tries to project a stern, controlled विश्वास, लकिन he is चलित by a प्यास लिये प्रतिशोध और a द्वेष of साम्राज्यवाद ( particularly the British Empire ).
He is also wracked by पछतावा over the मौतों of उसके क्रू सदस्यों और भी by the मौतों of enemy sailors.
Nemo has appeared in various adaptations of वर्न 's novels, सहित films, जहाँ he रै महरूम portrayed by a number of different actors.
He has furthermore been अपनाया by अन्य लेखक लिये समावेश in उनके novels, सबसे notably in Alan Moore 's The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen and Philip José Farmer 's The Other Log of Phileas Fogg.
Listed below are the Major लीग बेसबॉल टीमों साथ the बेहतरीन ऋतु won-lost रिकॉर्ड in इतिहास, as determined by winning percentage (.700 or better ), minimum 120 games played.
ध्वनिक coupler modem
A modem ( modulator-demodulator ) is a यंत्र कि modulates an एनालॉग वाहक सिग्नल to encode digital information, and also demodulates such a carrier signal to decode the transmitted information.
The goal is to produce a signal that can be transmitted easily और decoded to reproduce the original digital data.
Modems can be used over any means of transmitting analog signals, इससे लाइट emitting diodes to रेडियो.
The most familiar example is a आवाज़ बैंड मॉडेम कि turns the डिजिटल आंकड़ा of a निजी कंप्यूटर into modulated विद्युत सिग्नल in the voice frequency range of a telephone channel.
These सिग्नल can be transmitted over टेलीफोन लाइनों और demodulated by another modem at the receiver side to recover the digital data.
Modems are generally classified by the amount of data they can भेजें in a दिए ईकाई of समय, प्रायः expressed in बिट्स प्रति दूसरी ( bit/s, or bps ), or bytes per second ( B/s ).
Modems can alternatively be वर्गीकृत by उनके प्रतीक रेट, measured in baud.
The baud unit denotes symbols per second, or the क्रमांक of टाइम्स प्रति दूसरी the मॉडेम भेजना a new signal.
For example, the ITU V.21 standard used audio frequency shift keying with two possible बारंबारता सम्बन्धित to दो पृथक प्रतीकों ( or एक बिट per symbol ), to carry 300 bits per second using 300 baud.
By contrast, the original ITU V.22 standard, which was समर्थ to संचारण और प्राप्त चार पृथक प्रतीकों ( दो बिट्स per symbol ), handled 1,200 bit/s by sending 600 symbols per second ( 600 baud ) using phase shift keying.
The घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता is a बयान अपनाया by the महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस on जुलाई 4, 1776, जिससे घोषित कि the तेरह American colonies, then at war with Great Britain, regarded themselves as independent states, and no longer a part of the British Empire.
Instead they now formed a नई nation—the संयुक्त States of America.
John Adams was a leader in pushing for independence, जिससे थी unanimously स्वीकृत on July 2.
A कमेटी था already drafted the formal declaration, to be ready when congress voted on independence.
Adams persuaded the committee to select Thomas Jefferson to compose the original draft of the document, जिससे कॉंग्रेस होता संपादन to उपज the फाइनल संस्करण.
The Declaration was ultimately a formal explanation of why Congress had voted on July 2 to declare स्वतंत्रता इससे ग्रेट ब्रिटेन, अधिक than a साल बाद the outbreak of the अमरीकी क्रांतिकारी War.
The national birthday, the स्वतंत्रता दिन is मनाये on जुलाई 4, हालांकि Adams wanted July 2.
After ratifying the टेक्स्ट on जुलाई 4, कॉंग्रेस जारी the Declaration of Independence in several forms.
it थी initially प्रकाशित as the मुद्रित डनलप broadside कि was widely distributed and read to the public.
The most famous version of the Declaration, a signed copy that is popularly regarded as the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता, is प्रदर्शित at the नेशनल अभिलेख in वॉशिंगटन, D.C.
Although the wording of the Declaration was approved on July 4, the तिथि of इसके हस्ताक्षर थी अगस्त 2.
The original July 4 United States Declaration of स्वतंत्रता पाण्डुलिपि थी खोया जबकि सब अन्य नक़ल have been derived from this original document.
The sources and निर्वचन of the घोषणा have महरूम the विषय of much scholarly inquiry.
The Declaration justified the independence of the संयुक्त राज्य by लिस्टिंग औपनिवेशिक grievances विरूद्ध किंग जार्ज iii, और by asserting certain natural and legal rights, including a right of revolution.
Having served its original purpose in announcing स्वतंत्रता, the टेक्स्ट of the घोषणा was initially ignored after the American Revolution.
Since then, it has come to be माना a प्रमुख बयान on इंसान rights, particularly its second sentence:
We hold these truths to be self-evident, that all men are निर्मित बराबर, कि वे हैं endowed by उनके निर्माता साथ निश्चित unalienable अधिकारों, कि among ये हैं जीवन, स्वतंत्रता और the pursuit of Happiness.
This has been called `` one of the best-known sentences in the English language '', containing `` the सबसे potent और consequential शब्द in अमरीकी इतिहास. ''
The passage came to represent a moral standard to जिससे the संयुक्त राज्य चाहिए नीयत.
This view was notably promoted by Abraham Lincoln, who माना the घोषणा to be the न्यास of उसके राजनैतिक दर्शनशास्त्र, और argued कि the घोषणा is a statement of principles through which the United States Constitution should be interpreted.
It रै प्रेरित कार्य लिये the अधिकारों of अधिकारहीन people throughout the world.
The अर्थव्यवस्था of ग्रीनलैंड can be characterized as small, mixed and vulnerable.
The present economy consists of a big public sector and comprehensive foreign trade, which has resulted in an economy with periods of strong growth, considerable महंगाई, बेरोजगारी समस्याएं और चरम dependence on पूंजी inflow इससे डेनमार्क और उपयोग of बाहर, मुख्यतः डैनिश, skilled labor.
GDP per capita is similar to the average European economies but the economy is critically निर्भर upon substantial support इससे the डैनिश सरकारी, जिससे आपूर्तियाँ परिचय हाफ the revenues of the घर नियम सरकारी जो in turn employ about 8,000 Greenlanders out of a labor force of 40,156 ( Jan. 2012 ).
Unemployment nonetheless remains high, with the बाकी of the अर्थव्यवस्था निर्भर upon माँग लिये exports of shrimp and fish.
Hydrogen is a रासायनिक तत्व साथ प्रतीक h और atomic number 1.
With an atomic weight of ( for hydrogen-1 ), हाइड्रोजन is the lightest तत्व और इसके monatomic रूप ( h1 ) is the सबसे abundant रासायनिक पदार्थ, constituting roughly 75 % of the Universe 's baryonic mass.
Non- remnant stars are mainly composed of हाइड्रोजन in इसके प्लाज्मा राज्य.
At standard temperature and pressure, hydrogen is a colorless, odorless, tasteless, non-toxic, nonmetallic, अत्यधिक combustible diatomic गैस साथ the आणविक सूत्र H2.
Most of the hydrogen on Earth is in अणुओं ऐसे as जल और सशुल्क यौगिकों क्युकी hydrogen readily forms covalent compounds with most non-metallic elements.
Hydrogen plays a particularly important role in acid-base रसायन साथ अनेक प्रतिक्रियाएँ exchanging protons between घुलनशील molecules.
In ionic यौगिकों, it can लो a ऋणात्मक चार्ज ( an anion ज्ञात as a हाइड्राइड and written as H− ), or as a positively charged species H+.
The latter cation is लिखा as हालांकि रचित of a bare प्रोटॉन, लकिन in वास्तविकता, hydrogen cations in ionic compounds always occur as more complex species.
The most आम समस्थानिक of हाइड्रोजन is protium ( नाम rarely used, symbol 1H ) with a single proton and no neutrons.
As the simplest atom ज्ञात, the हाइड्रोजन अणु रै महरूम of सैद्धांतिक use.
लिये उदाहरण, as the तभी न्यूट्रल अणु साथ an analytic समाधान to the श्रोडिंगर equation, the study of the energetics and bonding of the hydrogen atom played a key role in the development of quantum mechanics.
Hydrogen gas was first artificially produced in the जल्दी 16th सदी, via the mixing of metals with acids.
In 1766–81, Henry Cavendish was the first to recognize that hydrogen gas was a discrete substance, and that it produces water when burned, a प्रॉपर्टी जिससे बाद दिया it इसके नाम : in यूनानी, हाइड्रोजन अर्थात् `` water-former ''.
Industrial production is mainly from the steam reforming of प्राकृतिक गैस, और कम प्रायः इससे अधिक energy-intensive हाइड्रोजन production methods like the electrolysis of water.
Most hydrogen is employed near its production site, with the two largest उपयोग होने चट्टान ईंधन प्रसंस्करण ( e.g., hydrocracking ) और अमोनिया उत्पादन, ज़्यादातर लिये the उर्वरक मार्केट.
Hydrogen is a concern in metallurgy as it can embrittle अनेक धातुओं, complicating the डिज़ाइन of pipelines और storage tanks.
Unstoppable is a 2010 American action थ्रिलर फिल्मी निर्देशित by टोनी स्कॉट, लिखा by चिह्नित Bomback, and starring Denzel Washington and Chris Pine.
The film, loosely based on the real-life csx 8888 घटना, tells the स्टोरी of a runaway भाड़ा ट्रैन, और the two men ( Washington and Pine ) who manage to stop it.
It थी स्कॉट 's फाइनल विशेषता film before his death in 2012.
The film was released in the United States and Canada on November 12, 2010, और in the संयुक्त किंगडम on नवम्बर 24, 2010.
It प्राप्त ज़्यादातर अनुकूल समीक्षाएँ इससे फिल्मी आलोचकों ; it garnered a `` certified भैस '' दरजा on Rotten Tomatoes based upon aggregated reviews and a rating of `` Generally favorable reviews '' at Metacritic.
The film was nominated for an Academy Award लिये बेहतरीन ध्वनि संपादन at the 83rd अकादमी पुरस्कार, लकिन खोया to inception.
In photography, bracketing is the general तकनीक of लेने अनेक गोलियाँ of the वही विषय using different camera settings.
Bracketing is useful and often recommended in परिस्थितियों कि मेक it मुश्किल to obtain a संतोषजनक चित्र साथ a सिंगल शॉट, especially when a small variation in exposure parameters has a comparatively large effect on the resulting image.
Autobracketing is automatic bracketing by using a सेटिंग on the कैमरा to take several bracketed shots ( in contrast to the photographer altering the settings by hand between each shot ).
दिए the समय it takes to accomplish अनेक गोलियाँ, it is typically, but not always, used for static subjects.
Insulated glazing ( IG ), more commonly known as double glazing ( or double-pane, and increasingly triple glazing/pane ) हैं दोगुना or ट्रिपल कांच खिड़की panes अलग by an एयर or other gas filled space to reduce heat transfer across a part of the building envelope.
Insulated Glass इकाई हैं manufactured साथ कांच in दायरा of thickness from 3 mm to 10 mm or more in special applications.
Laminated or tempered कांच may भी be प्रयुक्त as भाग of the construction.
Most units are manufactured साथ the वही मोटाई of कांच प्रयुक्त on दोनो panes लकिन खास अनुप्रयोग ऐसे as ध्वनिक क्षीणन or security may require wide ranges of thicknesses to be incorporated in the same unit.
A sectioned आरेख of a फिक्स्ड insulated चमकीले ईकाई ( igu ), indicating the numbering convention used in this article.
Surface # 1 is facing बाहर, सतह # 2 is the अंदर सतह of the exterior फलक, सतह # 3 is the बाहर surface of the interior pane, and Surface # 4 is the inside surface of interior pane.
The window frame is labelled # 5, a spacer is indicated as # 6, seals are दिखाया in रेड ( # 7 ), the आतंरिक खुलासा is on the सही हाथ side ( # 8 ) and the exterior windowsill on the left ( # 9 )
To reduce shear effects on the sealed unit ( a major cause of premature failure ), निर्माताओं उपयोग a नियम of अंगूठा कि permits a अंतर of 1 mm between the मोटाई of the panes of glass used in the unit and still maintain the warranty for the unit.
For example, a unit may be ordered with a 4 mm फलक on the exterior और a 3 mm फलक on the interior.
These विसंगतियाँ हैं अनुमत लिये architectural and cost reasons.
Other combinations can be specified and produced but the manufacturer may आरक्षित the सही to सीमा the पद of the वारंटी or इंकार to वारंटी the unit altogether.
For ease of description the surfaces of a double paned unit are named according to the following convention : Surface # 1 ( facing outside ), Surface # 2 ( inside of बाहर फलक ), सतह # 3 ( बाहर of अंदर फलक ) और सतह # 4 ( अंदर सतह of अंदर pane ).
Applying the सम्बन्धित नामकरण लिये ट्रिपल paned units results in surfaces # 1 through # 6.
The performance of insulating glazing can be परिवर्धित through the उपयोग of the following:
A typical संस्थापना of insulated glazing खिड़कियाँ साथ upvc window frames.
Selenium is a chemical element साथ प्रतीक se और परमाणु क्रमांक 34.
it is a अधातु साथ गुण कि हैं इंटरमीडिएट between those of its periodic table column-adjacent chalcogen elements sulfur and tellurium.
it rarely occurs in इसके elemental राज्य in nature, or as pure ore compounds.
Selenium ( Greek σελήνη selene meaning `` चंद्रमा '' ) थी खोजा in 1817 by jöns याक़ूब berzelius, जो विख्यात the समानता of the नई तत्व to the previously-known tellurium ( named for the Earth ).
सेलेनियम is मिला impurely in मेटल sulfide ores, where it partially replaces the sulfur.
Commercially, सेलेनियम is उत्पादित as a byproduct in the refining of these ores, most often during copper production.
Minerals that हैं pure selenide or selenate compounds are known, but are rare.
The chief commercial uses for selenium आज हैं in glassmaking और in pigments.
Selenium is a सेमीकंडक्टर और is प्रयुक्त in photocells.
Uses in electronics, once important, have been ज़्यादातर supplanted by सिलिकॉन सेमीकंडक्टर devices.
Selenium continues to be used in a few types of DC शक्ति surge protectors और एक प्रकार of fluorescent क्वांटम dot.
Selenium salts are toxic in large amounts, but trace amounts हैं जरुरी लिये सेल्यूलर function in many organisms, including all animals.
Selenium is a component of the antioxidant enzymes glutathione peroxidase और thioredoxin reductase ( जिससे indirectly reduce निश्चित oxidized molecules in animals and some plants ).
it is भी मिला in तीन deiodinase एंजाइमों, जिससे बदलें one thyroid hormone to another.
Selenium requirements in plants differ by प्रजाति, साथ कुछ पौधे requiring अपेक्षाकृत विशाल amounts, और अन्य जाहिर requiring none.
The United States presidential election of 2008 was the 56th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय election.
It was held on मंगलवार, नवम्बर 4, 2008.
Democrat Barack Obama, then the junior Senator from इलिनोइस, पराजित रिपब्लिकन जॉन मैक्केन, the वरिष्ठ Senator from Arizona.
As the campaign progressed, the War in Iraq and outgoing रिपब्लिकन अध्यक्ष जार्ज W. बुश था become increasingly unpopular, और the major-party उम्मीदवार ran on a platform of change and reform.
Domestic policy और the अर्थव्यवस्था आखिरकार उभरा as the प्रमुख विषयवस्तु in the पिछला few महीने of the election campaign after the onset of the worst recession since the 1930s.
Obama would go on to win a निर्णायक विजय over मैक्केन in दोनो the चुनावी and popular vote.
Obama received the most votes for a presidential candidate in American history, and won the popular and electoral vote by the largest margin in 12 सालो, as खूब as the largest प्रतिशत of the लोकप्रिय vote लिये a Democrat in nearly a half-century.
इस थी the पहला u.S. अध्यक्षीय चुनाव in जिससे an अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी थी निर्वाचित, having भी महरूम the first in which an African American won the nomination of either major party.
This election was also notable for being the first time in U.S. history that both major party candidates were sitting U.S. Senators, only the तीसरा समय ( बाद 1920 और 1960 ) कि कोई बैठे u.s. सीनेटर was elected president, and only the second time that the winning President and Vice President ( Obama and Biden ) were both sitting U.S. Senators.
This was also the first election since 1952 in which neither of the प्रमुख पार्टियों ' नामांकित थी the लाज़िम अध्यक्ष or वाइस अध्यक्ष.
The Sovereign Prince or राजकुमारी of मोनाको is the reigning monarch और head of state of the Principality of Monaco.
All princes or princesses have officially taken the name of the House of grimaldi, लकिन have belonged to विभिन्न अन्य घरों ( goyon de matignon, polignac ) in पुरूष लकीर.
The reigning प्रिंस is Albert II.
कल्पना of fragmentation and then of defragmentation
In the maintenance of संचिका प्रणालियों, defragmentation is a प्रक्रम कि reduces the amount of fragmentation.
It does this by physically organizing the सामग्री of the द्रव्यमान भंडार यंत्र प्रयुक्त to स्टोर फाइलें into the smallest number of contiguous regions ( fragments ).
It also attempts to बनाएँ larger regions of फ़्री स्पेस using compaction to impede the return of fragmentation.
Some defragmentation utilities try to keep smaller फाइलें भीतर a सिंगल निर्देशिका साथ, as they are often accessed in sequence.
defragmentation is लाभदायक और प्रासंगिक to संचिका प्रणालियों on electromechanical disk drives.
The movement of the hard drive 's read/write heads over different areas of the disk when accessing fragmented files is slower, compared to accessing the संपूर्ण सामग्री of a non-fragmented संचिका sequentially बगैर चलती the read/write heads to तलाश other fragments.
a service-level अनुबंध ( sla ) is a भाग of a service contract where a service is formally defined.
In अभ्यास, the पद sla is sometimes प्रयुक्त to refer to the contracted delivery time ( of the service or performance ).
As an example, internet service providers will commonly include service level समझौतों भीतर the शर्तें of उनके अनुबंध साथ ग्राहक to define the level ( s ) of service being sold in plain language terms.
In this case the SLA will typically have a technical definition in terms of mean समय between असफलताओं ( mtbf ), औसत समय to मरम्मत or औसत समय to रिकवरी ( mttr ) ; विभिन्न आंकड़ा rates ; throughput ; jitter ; or similar measurable details.
संघ स्टेशन is a पूर्व खरीदारी मॉल in संघ नगर, Georgia, in southwest metro Atlanta adjacent to Interstate 85.
After new ownership and renovations in 2006, the नाम थी बदला इससे शैनन southpark Mall in 2007 to Union Station Mall.
A पिछला नवीकरण थी किया in the late 1990s.
The mall has महरूम बंद चूंकि नवम्बर 2010.
This map shows the contiguous United States and, in insets at the निम्नतर बाएँ, the दो states that are not contiguous.
The contiguous United States are the 48 adjoining u.S. राज्य on the महाद्वीप of उत्तर अमेरिका कि हैं दक्षिण of कनाडा और उत्तर of मैक्सिको, plus the District of Columbia.
The term excludes the states of Alaska and Hawaii, and all off-shore u.S. territories और possessions, such as Puerto Rico.
साथ, the 48 संलग्न राज्य और d.C. occupy a combined area of, which is 1.58 % of the total surface area of the Earth.
Of this, is land, composing 83.65 % of U.S. land area.
Officially, is water area, composing 62.66 % of the स्वदेश 's जल area.
The 2010 census population was 306,675,006, composing 99.33 % of the nation 's जनसांख्यिकी, और a घनत्व of 103.639 inhabitants/sq mi ( 40.015/km2 ), compared to 87.264/sq mi ( 33.692/km2 ) लिये the nation as a whole.
`` Why '' is the शीर्षक of a सोंग अंकित by अमरीकी country band Rascal Flatts.
It is the third सिंगल इससे उनके छठे स्टुडियो album, Unstoppable.
It was released to रेडियो स्टेशन on सितंबर 29, 2009 और debuted at # 44 on the u.s. बिलबोर्ड us Billboard Hot Country Songs chart for the week of October 10, 2009.
It was written by रोब mathes और एलन Shamblin.
Utilization management is the evaluation of the appropriateness, medical need and efficiency of स्वास्थ्य परवाह सेवाएं प्रक्रियाओं और सुविधाएं according to स्थापित मापदण्ड or दिशानिर्देश and under the provisions of an applicable health benefits plan.
typically it शामिल नई क्रियाएँ or निर्णय आधारित upon the analysis of a case.
Utilization management describes proactive प्रक्रियाओं, सहित निर्वहन नियोजन, संयुक्त नियोजन, pre-certification और clinical case appeals.
It also covers proactive processes, such as संयुक्त नैदानिक समीक्षाएँ और पीर समीक्षाएँ, as खूब as appeals introduced by the provider, payer or patient.
As pre-certification and concurrent review of मामले grew, utilization प्रबन्धन spun आउट of utilization review.
While not synonymous, स्वास्थ्य परवाह पेशेवर tend to उपयोग the terms as interchangeable.
The अंतर is utilization प्रबन्धन is और intends to मैनेज स्वास्थ्य परवाह मामले efficiently और लागत effectively पहले और दौरान health care administration.
Utilization review is more considering whether स्वास्थ्य परवाह थी appropriately लागू बाद it was administered.
There are चार मौलिक तकनीकों in utilization management:
Demand प्रबन्धन
utilization पुनर्विलोकन
Case प्रबन्धन
बीमारी प्रबन्धन
The Outsiders is a coming-of-age अनोखा by S. E. hinton, पहला प्रकाशित in 1967 by viking दबायें.
Hinton थी 15 जब वो प्रारंभ लिखने the अनोखा, लकिन किया सबसे of the कार्य when she was sixteen and a junior in high school.
Hinton थी 18 जब the किताब थी published.
The book follows two rival groups, the Greasers and the socs ( सुनाया by the लेखक as, छोटी लिये socials ), जो are divided by their socioeconomic status.
The book takes place in Tulsa, Oklahoma, in 1965, लकिन it is never stated in the किताब.
A film adaptation was produced in 1983, and a little-known short-lived टेलीविज़न श्रेणी appeared in 1990, picking up जहाँ the फिल्म left off.
the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि is one of the two houses of the United States Congress ( a bicameral legislature ).
It is अक्सर referred to as the House.
The other हाउस is the सीनेट.
The composition and powers of the House are स्थापित in आलेख एक of the संयुक्त राज्य Constitution.
the प्रमुख शक्ति of the हाउस is to pass संघीय विधान कि affects the संपूर्ण देश हालांकि इसके बिल्स जरूर भी be passed by the सीनेट और further सहमत to by the U.S. President before becoming law ( unless both the House and Senate re-pass the legislation with a two-thirds majority in each chamber ).
The House has several विशेष शक्तियां : the शक्ति to initiate आय बिल्स, to impeach officials, and to elect the U.S. President in case there is no majority in the Electoral College.
Each U.S. state is represented in the House in proportion to its जनसांख्यिकी लकिन is हकदार to at तनिक एक प्रतिनिधि.
The most populous state, कैलिफ़ोर्निया, फिलहाल रै 53 representatives.
The total number of voting प्रतिनिधि is fixed by law at 435.
Each प्रतिनिधि serves लिये a two-year term.
The Speaker of the United States House of प्रतिनिधि, जो presides over the कक्ष, is निर्वाचित by the सदस्यों of the House, and is therefore traditionally the leader of the House Democratic Caucus or the House Republican Conference, whichever party has more voting members.
The House meets in the south wing of the संयुक्त राज्य Capitol.
A supply chain is actually a जटिल और डायनेमिक सप्लाई and demand network.
( cf. wieland/wallenburg, 2011 )
A supply chain is a system of organizations, people, activities, information, and संसाधन शामिल in चलती a उत्पाद or सेवा इससे supplier to customer.
Supply chain activities transform प्राकृतिक संसाधन, कच्चा सामग्री, और components into a समाप्त product that is delivered to the end customer.
In sophisticated supply chain systems, used products may re-enter the supply कड़ी at कोई पाइंट जहाँ अवशेष मान is recyclable.
Supply जंजीरों कड़ी मान जंजीरों.
`` Purple Haze '' is a song written and अंकित by जिमि हेंड्रिक्स in 1967, released as the दूसरी सिंगल by The Jimi Hendrix Experience in both the United Kingdom and the United States.
It later appeared on the अमरीकी संस्करण of the बैंड 's 1967 एल्बम हैं तुम अनुभवी.
`` जामुनी haze '' रै become one of the `` archetypical psychedelic drug songs of the sixties ''.
`` Purple haze 's '' गिटार virtuosic तकनीकों होता be emulated by many metal guitarists.
A close up चित्र of a rhinoceros skin.
Skin is the soft outer covering of vertebrates.
Other animal coverings ऐसे as the सन्धिपाद बहि have अलग developmental origin, structure and chemical composition.
the क्रियाशील cutaneous अर्थात् `` of the skin '' ( from Latin cutis, skin ).
In mammals, the skin is the largest organ of the integumentary system made up of अनेक परतों of ectodermal ऊतक, और गार्ड the underlying मांसपेशियां, हड्डियों, ligaments और आतंरिक organs.
Skin of a different nature exists in amphibians, सरीसृपों, और birds.
All स्तनधारियों have कुछ बाल on उनके स्किन, भी समुद्री स्तनधारियों which appear to be hairless.
The स्किन अंतरफलक साथ the पर्यावरण और is the पहला line of defense from external factors.
For example, the स्किन plays a कुंजी भूमिका in protecting the देह विरूद्ध pathogens and excessive water loss.
Its other functions are insulation, तापमान विनियमन, सनसनी, और the उत्पादन of विटामिन d folates.
Severely damaged skin may चंगा by forming scar tissue.
This is sometimes discoloured और depigmented.
The thickness of skin भी varies इससे स्थान to स्थान on an सजीव.
In humans for example, the skin located under the eyes and around the eyelids is the thinnest स्किन in the देह at 0.5 mm मोटा, और is एक of the पहला क्षेत्रों to दिखाएँ signs of aging such as `` crows feet '' and wrinkles.
The स्किन on the हथेलियां और the सोल्स of the फीट is 4 mm thick and the thickest skin in the body.
Fur is घना बाल.
Primarily, fur augments the इन्सुलेशन the स्किन provides लकिन can भी serve as a द्वितीयक sexual characteristic or as camouflage.
On some animals, the स्किन is बहुत मुश्किल और मोटा, और can be processed to create leather.
Reptiles और मछली have मुश्किल सुरक्षात्मक तराजू on उनके स्किन लिये सुरक्षा, और birds have hard feathers, all made of tough β- keratins.
Amphibian skin is नहीं a दमदार अवरोध to ड्योढ़ी of chemicals and is often subject to osmosis and diffusive forces.
लिये उदाहरण, a मेंढक बैठे in an anesthetic समाधान होता be sedated quickly, as the chemical diffuses through its skin.

डेनियल radcliffe, जो portrays हैरी कुम्हार, has been the icon of the film series since the release of the first film in 2001.

जब वे यहूद डाल तभी radcliffe had previously acted in a film.

Thirteen actors have appeared as the same अक्षर in सब आठ films of the मताधिकार.

i थी a बिट too बूढ़ा for Harry ''.

A twelve-step program is a set of guiding principles ( accepted by members as 'spiritual principles, ' आधारित on the स्वीकृत साहित्य ) outlining a कोर्स of कार्रवाई लिये रिकवरी इससे, मजबूरी, or other behavioral problems.
Originally proposed by Alcoholics Anonymous ( AA ) as a method of recovery from alcoholism, the Twelve कदम यहूद पहला प्रकाशित in the किताब alcoholics बेनाम : the स्टोरी of कैसा अधिक than एक सौ Men Have Recovered from Alcoholism in 1939.
The method was then adapted और became the न्यास of अन्य twelve-step programs.
As summarized by the अमरीकी मनोवैज्ञानिक Association, the process involves the following:
admitting that one can नहीं कंट्रोल एक 's व्यसन or compulsion ;
recognizing a उच्चतर शक्ति कि can दे शक्ति ;
examining past errors with the help of a प्रायोजक ( अनुभवी सदस्य ) ;
बनाना amends लिये ये errors ;
learning to सजीव a नई जीवन साथ a new code of behavior ;
helping others who suffer from the same व्यसनों or compulsions.
Witness impeachment, in the law of प्रमाण of the संयुक्त राज्य, is the प्रक्रम of कॉलिंग into सवाल the विश्वसनीयता of an individual who is testifying in a trial.
The Federal नियम of प्रमाण contain the नियम शासी impeachment in federal courts.
Party leaders and whips of the United States House of Representatives are elected by their संबंधित पार्टियों in a closed-door caucus by रहस्य बैलट और हैं भी ज्ञात as floor leaders.
The U.S. House of Representatives करता नहीं officially उपयोग the पद `` अल्पसंख्यक नेता '' हालांकि the मीडिया अक्सर do.
The House instead uses the terms `` Republican Leader '' or `` Democratic नेता '' depending on जिससे पार्टी holds a अल्पसंख्यक of सीटे.
The current House Majority Leader is रिपब्लिकन eric cantor, जबकि the वर्तमान हाउस अल्पसंख्यक नेता is Democrat Nancy Pelosi.
The current House Majority Whip is Republican Kevin McCarthy, जबकि the वर्तमान हाउस अल्पसंख्यक चाबुक is Democrat Steny Hoyer.
Following the outbreak of World War I in 1914, the जर्मनी फौज खोली the पश्चिमी सामने by पहला आक्रमणकारी ध्वज और बेल्जियम, then gaining military control of important industrial regions in France.
The tide of the advance was dramatically turned साथ the बैटल of the Marne.
following the रेस to the समुद्र, दोनो पहलू खोदा in साथ a meandering लकीर of fortified trenches, stretching from the North Sea to the Swiss frontier with France.
This line remained essentially अपरिवर्तित लिये सबसे of the war.
Between 1915 and 1917 there were अनेक प्रमुख offensives साथ इस सामने.
The हमले employed विशाल तोपखाने bombardments and massed infantry advances.
However, a संयोजन of entrenchments, यंत्र गन nests, कंटीले तार, and artillery repeatedly inflicted severe casualties on the attackers and counterattacking defenders.
As a result, no significant अग्रिम यहूद made.
Among the सबसे costly of ये offensives यहूद the बैटल of verdun साथ a संयुक्त [ अनुमानित ] 700,000 मुर्दे, the बैटल of the Somme with more than [ an estimated ] million casualties, and the Battle of Passchendaele with roughly [ an estimated ] 600,000 casualties.
In an effort to break the deadlock, this front देखी the परिचय of नई सैन्य technology, including poison gas, aircraft and tanks.
But it was only after the adoption of improved tactics कि कुछ उपाधि of गतिशीलता थी लौटी.
the जर्मनी वसन्त अप्रिय of 1918 was made possible by the Treaty of Brest-Litovsk that marked the end of the conflict on the Eastern Front.
Using the recently-introduced infiltration tactics, the German armies advanced nearly to the west, which marked the deepest अग्रिम by either पक्ष चूंकि 1914 और बहुत nearly succeeded in forcing a breakthrough.
In spite of the generally stagnant प्रकृति of इस सामने, इस थिएटर होता prove decisive.
The inexorable अग्रिम of the अलाइड सेना दौरान the दूसरी हाफ of 1918 persuaded the German commanders that defeat was inevitable, and the government was forced to sue for conditions of an armistice.
The शर्तें of सलाम यहूद सहमत upon साथ the signing of the Treaty of Versailles in 1919.

The First Lady of the United राज्य ( flotus ) is the होस्टेस of the White House.
Because this स्थिति is traditionally भर by the बीवी of the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त States, the title is most often applied to the wife of a sitting president.
The current पहला महिला is मिशेल Obama.
बाद उसके husband बराक ओबामा थी re-elected on नवम्बर 6, 2012, she is scheduled to serve until January 20, 2017.
Septic shock is a medical condition as a परिणाम of कठोर संक्रमण और सेप्सिस, हालांकि the microbe may be systemic or localized to a particular site.
It can cause अनेक अंग dysfunction सिंड्रोम ( formerly known as multiple organ failure ) and death.
Its most common victims are children, immunocompromised individuals, and the elderly, as their immune प्रणालियों can नहीं सौदे साथ the संक्रमण as effectively as those of स्वस्थ adults.
अक्सर, मरीजों कष्ट इससे septic shock are cared for in intensive care units.
The mortality रेट इससे सेप्टिक shock is approximately 25–50 %.
Kevin Brereton ( born फ़रवरी 20, 1972 ), बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम k-os ( ; `` chaos '' ), is a Canadian rapper, singer, songwriter and record producer.
His given name may भी be cited as kheaven, a स्पेलिंग he later adopted.
The alias `` k-os '', spelled with a lower case `` k '', was intended to be कम आक्रामक than the pseudonyms of अन्य rappers जिनकी names were all upper case, such as KRS-One.
It is an एक्रोनिम लिये `` ज्ञान of स्वः, '' हालांकि in a बाद इंटरव्यू he कहा कि it originally stood लिये `` केविन 's असली ध्वनि. '' k-os ' म्यूज़िक incorporates a चौड़ी variety of music genres, including rap, funk, rock, and reggae.
The lyrics frequently focus on promoting a `` positive message '' while at times expressing criticism of mainstream hip हॉप संस्कृति 's obsession साथ धन, कीर्ति और glorification of हिंसा.
A musician as खूब as a निर्माता, k-os रै लिखा और उत्पादित nearly every part of all four of his albums.
k-os प्रायः performs साथ a सजीव बैंड, कुछ कि is uncommon in the hip hop genre.
He sometimes plays गिटार और कुंजीपटल दोनो दौरान सजीव performances and in the studio.
k-os received his first musical exposure with the सिंगल `` musical essence '', released in 1993.
After the release of his second single `` Rise Like the Sun '' in 1996, he withdrew from the industry क्युकी he थी असंतुष्ट साथ his musical style.
He reappeared briefly in 1999 और released his debut album Exit in 2002.
The album received धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ लकिन बेची अपेक्षाकृत few copies.
He released his second album आनन्द विद्रोह in 2004, जिससे प्राप्त platinum status in Canada.
A third एल्बम,, थी released in 2006 and also went platinum.
His fourth album, यस !
, was released in 2009.
His fifth एल्बम ब्लैक on सुनहरे was released in 2013.
The आधिकारिक 2007 संस्करण of the UCC.
भी the गोपनीय अशिष्ट drafts of the UCC were saved and published as a 10-volume set.
The Uniform Commercial Code ( UCC or the Code ), पहला प्रकाशित in 1952, is एक of a क्रमांक of वर्दी अधिनियमों कि have महरूम promulgated in संयोजन साथ प्रयत्न to harmonize the विधि of बिक्री and other commercial transactions in all 50 states within the United States of America.
Multi-pitch climbing is the ascent of चढ़ाई रूट साथ एक or अधिक stops at a belay station.
Each section of वास्तविक चढ़ाई between stops at the belay stations is called a pitch.
The leader ascends the pitch, रखकर गियर और stopping to लंगर themselves to the belay स्टेशन.
The reason लिये the stops can be संकल्पित by choice, convention or necessity.
लिये example:
The rope is too छोटी to do the संपूर्ण रूट in एक पिच ( necessity ).
the नेता रै चलाएं आउट of protective gear ( necessity ).
वहीँ is a सुविधाजनक protectable ledge, or fixed bolts placed by previous climbers, at the location for a belay station ( convention ).
the नेता chooses to बाकी or एक्सचेंज लीड पहले the next section of the climb ( choice ).
The general purpose of these stops is to allow the दूसरी to ascend to the पाइंट of the सीसे climber जबकि collecting the protective gear from the route in the course of the lead climber 's ascent.
At the belay station, the protective gear is collected, possibly exchanged to a नई नेता, और the नेता of the अगला पिच ascends the रूट.
A आरेख प्रर्दशित an i गठन on offense and a 4-3 Formation on defense
In American football, प्रत्येक टोली रै ग्यारह खिलाड़ी on the field at one time.
The विशिष्ट भूमिका कि a खिलाड़ी takes on the फ़ील्ड is called their position.
Under the modern rules of American football, teams are allowed unlimited subsititutions, कि is टीमों may बदलें कोई क्रमांक of खिलाड़ी after any play.
This has resulted in the development of three `` platoons '' of players, the offense ( the team with the ball, who is trying to score ), the defense ( the टोली trying to prevent the अन्य टोली इससे स्कोरिंग, और to लो the बॉल इससे उन्हें ), और the खास टीमों ( जो खेल in kicking situations ).
Within those platoons, various specific positions मौजूद depending on कया the खिलाड़ी 's प्रमुख job is.
The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into विधि by the कॉंग्रेस of the संयुक्त राज्य as शीर्षक ii of the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970.
The CSA is the federal u.S. ड्रग नीति अंतर्गत जिससे the manufacture, importation, कब्ज़ा, उपयोग और वितरण of certain substances is regulated.
The Act also served as the नेशनल implementing विधान लिये the Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs.
The legislation निर्मित पाँच schedules ( classifications ), with varying qualifications for a substance to be included in each.
Two federal agencies, the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug Administration, determine which substances are added to or removed from the various schedules, though the statute passed by कॉंग्रेस निर्मित the आरंभिक लिस्टिंग, और कॉंग्रेस रै sometimes अनुसूचित अन्य substances through विधान ऐसे as the hillory J. farias और सामन्था reid date-rape रोकथाम अधिनियम of 2000, जिससे लगाई गामा hydroxybutyrate in अनुसूची i. वर्गीकरण निर्णय हैं जरूरी to be बना on मापदण्ड सहित संभावित लिये गाली ( an अपरिभाषित term ), currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States, and international treaties.
The Wayne Route 23 Transit Center is a New Jersey Transit park-and-ride स्टेशन in वेन, नई जर्सी साथ the montclair-boonton लकीर कि provides बस सेवा to नई यॉर्क नगर और विभिन्न अन्य अंक in the क्षेत्रफल as खूब as montclair-boonton Line train service to New York, Hoboken, and intermediate points along the line between Hackettstown and Montclair State University.
It is located off of the southbound lanes of New Jersey Route 23 on West Belt Road, निकट the इंटरचेंज जहाँ रूट 23, अंतरराज्यीय 80, और u.S. रूट 46 मिलें, across from the Willowbrook Mall.
The station opened in January 2008 और रै 1,000 पार्किंग स्पेसेस.
New Jersey Transit intends for this combined rail and bus station to become an `` interceptor स्टेशन, '' कि होगा सहायता relieve the habitual जमघट at the वेस्ट बेल्ट सड़क इंटरचेंज, जहाँ the तीन major highways meet.
In addition, the construction of the station was meant to also ease the congestion at what was then Route 23 Park & Ride, a bus depot on Route 23 North that रै चूंकि महरूम renamed माँ 's पार्क & सवारी, और the willowbrook मॉल पार्क & सवारी ; the now-mother 's साईट था सीमित पार्किंग जबकि njt थी having ट्रबल साथ overfull पार्किंग क्षेत्रों at Willowbrook.
The वेन township bus garage is located on the opposite side of Route 23.
There has been a proposal to build a parking deck with another thousand spots और develop the जमीन at the स्टेशन.
In addition to montclair-boonton रेल, the पारगमन बीच is served by the following New Jersey Transit bus lines:
75 to न्यूर्क penn स्टेशन और Butler

324 to Port प्राधिकार और वेन रूट 23
748 to willowbrook मॉल and Paterson
The at sign @ is also commonly पुकारा the at प्रतीक, ampersat, apetail or वाणिज्यिक at in English—and less commonly a wide range of other terms.
The fact कि वहीँ is no सिंगल शब्द in अंग्रेज़ी लिये the प्रतीक रै prompted कुछ लेखक to उपयोग the फ्रेंच arobase or स्पेनी and Portuguese arroba—or to coin new words such as asperand, ampersat—but none of these has achieved wide currency.
Originally an accounting and commercial invoice abbreviation meaning `` at the rate of '' ( e.g. 7 विजेट @ $ 2 = $ 14 ), it थी नहीं शामिल on the कुंजीपटल of the earliest commercially कामयाब typewriters, लकिन थी on at तनिक एक 1889 मॉडल और the बहुत successful Underwood models from the `` Underwood No. 5 '' in 1900 onward.
It is now universally शामिल on कंप्यूटर keyboards.
In recent years, its meaning has grown to include the sense of being `` स्तिथ at, '' `` और, '' or `` निर्देशित at '', विशेषकर in ईमेल पता और सोशल मीडिया, particularly Twitter.
The mark is एनकोडेड at.
The catcher in the rye is a 1951 novel by J. D. Salinger.
originally प्रकाशित लिये वयस्कों, it रै चूंकि become लोकप्रिय साथ adolescent पाठक for its themes of teenage angst and alienation.
It has महरूम अनूदित into लगभग सब of the संसार 's major languages.
Around 250,000 copies हैं बेची प्रत्येक साल साथ कुल बिक्री of अधिक than 65 million books.
The novel 's protagonist and antihero, होल्डन caulfield, रै become an icon for teenage rebellion.
the अनोखा थी शामिल on टाइम्स 2005 सूची of the 100 बेहतरीन english-language novels लिखा चूंकि 1923, and it was named by Modern Library and its readers as one of the 100 best English-language novels of the 20th century.
It has been frequently challenged in the संयुक्त राज्य और अन्य देशों लिये इसके liberal use of profanity and portrayal of sexuality.
It also सौदे साथ जटिल मुद्दे of पहचान, belonging, connection, and alienation.
Skeletal muscles होमो sapiens
This is a table of muscles of the इंसान anatomy.
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles within the typical human, and almost every muscle constitutes one part of a pair of identical bilateral muscles, found on दोनो पहलू, resulting in लगभग 320 pairs of मांसपेशियां, as प्रस्तुत in इस article.
Nevertheless, the exact number is difficult to define because different sources group muscles differently, e.g. regarding कया is पारिभाषित as अलग भाग of a सिंगल मांसपेशी or as several muscles.
Examples range इससे 640 to 850.
The मांसपेशियां of the इंसान देह can be categorized into a क्रमांक of समूह जिससे शामिल मांसपेशियां relating to the head and neck, muscles of the torso or trunk, muscles of the upper limbs, and muscles of the lower limbs.
The action refers to the कार्रवाई of प्रत्येक मांसपेशी इससे the standard anatomical position.
In other positions, अन्य क्रियाएँ may be performed.
Bad Girls Club ( BGC ) is an American reality television series created by Jonathan मरे लिये the ऑक्सीजन टेलीविज़न स्टेशन.
The show centers on seven feisty and mischievous women साथ अलग पृष्ठभूमि और personalities, जो have a क्रमांक of मनोवैज्ञानिक और behavioral problems.
They are introduced to the show off their pernicious behavior और accomplish विशिष्ट goals.
The cast, deemed `` ख़राब लड़कियों '', आनंद a luxurious जीवनशैली in a ठीक mansion for three months, during which they must obey specified rules.
उनके जीवनदान अंदर – और बाहर – of the हाउस हैं chronicled and recorded by the production team.
The Bad Girls Club is ब्रॉडकास्ट in पाँच देशों ( United States, Netherlands, Australia, Hungary, and Sweden ).
It रै प्राप्त ऋणात्मक समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों, who believe the show promotes violence by adolescent viewers.
Furthermore, several cast members made विवादास्पद remarks जिससे outraged अनेक दर्शक.
the स्वरूप of the show has changed from early seasons.
If a `` bad girl '' breaks a rule, she is evicted from the show and, if it is जल्दी in the ऋतु, replaced by a नई `` ख़राब girl ''.
There have been nine पूरा सीज़न of the ख़राब लड़कियों क्लबों, साथ the tenth season currently airing.
The चौथी ऋतु था the उच्चतम दरजा in the show 's history, becoming its `` breakthrough season ''.
There have been three spin-offs of the ख़राब लड़कियों Club.
One of them, Love खेल : ख़राब लड़कियों need प्रेम too, जहाँ पास्ट डाल सदस्यों तलाश सच्चा love, has gained high ratings.
Oxygen has also released a mobile game, कॉमिक स्ट्रिप और merchandise to प्रचार the दिखाएँ.
