Thomas, who has been dubbed the `` गॉडमदर '' to सब प्रतियोगी, रै उसके अपना टेलीविज़न documentary entitled Tanisha Gets Married.
As of Season 8 वो 's महरूम the मेजबान of the reunion specials.
The आयोवा सीनेट is the अपर house of the Iowa General Assembly.
There are 50 सीटे in the आयोवा सीनेट, representing 50 single-member districts across the state with populations of approximately 60,927 per constituency,.
Each Senate ज़िला is रचित of दो हाउस जिले.
The Senate meets at the आयोवा राज्य कैपिटल in Des Moines.
Unlike the lower house, the Iowa House of प्रतिनिधि, सीनेटरों serve four-year शर्तें, साथ हाफ of the सीनेट staggered for re-election every two years.
There are no पद हद लिये the Senate.
mechanical repair
Maintenance, repair, and operations ( MRO ) or maintenance, मरम्मत, और overhaul involves फिक्सिंग कोई sort of mechanical, plumbing or विद्युत यंत्र चाहिए it become आउट of अनुक्रम or टूटा ( ज्ञात as मरम्मत, unscheduled or casualty maintenance ).
It also includes performing routine actions which keep the device in working order ( known as अनुसूचित मेंटेनेंस ) or prevent ट्रबल इससे arising ( निवारक मेंटेनेंस ).
MRO may be defined as, `` All actions which have the objective of retaining or restoring an मद in or to a राज्य in जिससे it can perform its required function.
The क्रियाएँ शामिल the संयोजन of सब तकनीकी और सम्बन्धित प्रशासनिक, managerial, and supervision actions. ''
MRO परिचालन can be categorised by whether the उत्पाद remains the प्रॉपर्टी of the ग्राहक, i.e. a service is being offered, or whether the product is bought by the reprocessing organisation and sold to any customer wishing to make the purchase ( Guadette, 2002 ).
In the former case it may be a backshop आपरेशन भीतर a larger संगठन or छोटी आपरेशन.
The former of these represents a closed loop supply chain and प्रायः रै the पैमाना of मेंटेनेंस, मरम्मत or of the उत्पाद.
The latter of the categorisations is an खोलें लूप supply chain and is typified by refurbishment and remanufacture.
The main characteristic of the बंद लूप प्रणाली is कि the माँग लिये a उत्पाद is matched with the supply of a used product.
neglecting एसेट write-offs और असाधारण क्रियाएँ the कुल जनसांख्यिकी of the product between the customer and the service provider remains constant.
प्रिंस विलियम, ड्यूक of कैम्ब्रिज ( विलियम आर्थर फिलिप लुई ; born 21 जून 1982 ), is the elder बेटे of चार्ल्स, Prince of Wales, and Diana, Princess of Wales, and third-eldest grandchild of Queen Elizabeth II and Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh.
He is second in the line of succession, behind his father, to the तख्तों of सोलह स्वतंत्र sovereign राज्य ज्ञात as the राष्ट्रमंडल realms : the संयुक्त किंगडम, कनाडा, ऑस्ट्रेलिया, नई जीलैंड, जमैका, बारबाडोस, the बहामा, हरा, पापुआ नई गिनी, the सुलेमान आइलैंड्स, Tuvalu, Saint Lucia, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, Belize, Antigua and Barbuda, and Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Prince William was educated at four schools in the United किंगडम और प्राप्त a उपाधि इससे the विश्वविद्यालयों of st एंड्रयूज.
He spent भाग of a गैप साल in चिली, बेलीज़, तंजानिया, और कीनिया जहाँ he has lived and holidayed several times.
Prince William has also taken Kiswahili अध्ययन at विश्वविद्यालयों in Kenya and Tanzania.
He was commissioned as a Lieutenant in the Blues and Royals Regiment of the Household प्यादे —serving साथ उसके bhai प्रिंस हैरी —and, दो सालो बाद, अर्जित उसके विंग्स by completing पायलट प्रशिक्षण at royal एयर फ़ोर्स College Cranwell.
In 2009, he transferred to the royal एयर फ़ोर्स, थी प्रचारित to उड़ान लेफ्टिनेंट और underwent हेलीकाप्टर flying training in order to become a full-time pilot with the Search and Rescue Force.
In 2010, he समाप्त उसके सामान्य और special-to-type हेलीकाप्टर प्रशिक्षण और गई on to raf घाटी on no. 22 स्क्वाड्रन performing co-pilot duties on board a Sea King search and rescue helicopter.
Prince William married his longtime girlfriend, Catherine Middleton, on 29 अप्रैल 2011 at वेस्टमिंस्टर ऐबी.
Hours prior to his wedding, प्रिंस विलियम थी निर्मित ड्यूक of कैम्ब्रिज, अर्ल of Strathearn, and Baron Carrickfergus.
DeAndre Cortez Way ( born July 28, 1990 ), बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम soulja लड़के बताना 'em, or बस soulja लड़के, is an American rapper, record producer, actor, and entrepreneur.
In September 2007, उसके सिंगल `` crank कि ( soulja लड़के ) `` पहुँचे क्रमांक एक on the बिलबोर्ड Hot 100.
The single was initially self-published on the अंतरजाल, और it बाद became a number-one hit in the संयुक्त राज्य लिये seven non-consecutive weeks starting in September 2007.
On August 17 Way was listed at # 18 on the Forbes list of hip-hop नकदी किंग्स of 2010 कमाई $ 7 लाख लिये कि साल.
Way has currently released three स्टुडियो एल्बम और एक स्वतंत्र एल्बम : उसके डेब्यू स्टुडियो एल्बम souljaboytellem.com ( 2007 ) was certified platinum by the RIAA.
However, his next two albums, iSouljaBoyTellem ( 2008 ) and The DeAndre Way ( 2010 ) did not match the commercial success of his debut, the latter only selling 100,000 नक़ल, despite the कामयाबी of अनेक singles आरपार दोनो एल्बम, ऐसे as `` चुंबन me thru the फोन `` और `` फेरे my swag on `` ( isouljaboytellem ) और `` pretty लड़के Swag `` ( The DeAndre Way ).
This was mainly due to negotiation problems with Interscope Records which meant a सीमित राशि of रिकॉर्ड यहूद made available to the public.
as of 2011, रास्ता रै पुष्टि he is working on उसके fourth studio album, entitled USA DRE, which will be released in 2013.
The electron transport chain in the mitochondrion is the site of oxidative phosphorylation in eukaryotes.
The NADH and succinate generated in the citric acid cycle are oxidized, providing उर्जा to शक्ति एटीपी synthase.
Photosynthetic इलेक्ट्रॉन हस्तांतरण कड़ी of the thylakoid membrane.
An electron transport chain ( ETC ) couples electron transfer between an electron दाता ( ऐसे as nadh ) और an इलेक्ट्रॉन acceptor ( ऐसे as o2 ) साथ the ट्रांसफ़र of H+ ions ( protons ) across a membrane.
The resulting electrochemical proton अनुपात is प्रयुक्त to generate रासायनिक उर्जा in the form of adenosine triphosphate ( ATP ).
Electron transport chains are the cellular mechanisms used for extracting energy from sunlight in photosynthesis और भी इससे रेडॉक्स प्रतिक्रियाएँ, ऐसे as the oxidation of sugars ( respiration ).
In chloroplasts, लाइट ड्राइव the परिवर्तन of जल to ऑक्सीजन और nadP+ to NADPH with transfer of H+ ions across chloroplast membranes.
In mitochondria, it is the conversion of oxygen to water, NADH to NAD+ and succinate to fumarate कि हैं जरूरी to generate the प्रोटॉन अनुपात.
Electron transport जंजीरों हैं प्रमुख साइट of असामयिक इलेक्ट्रॉन leakage to ऑक्सीजन, generating superoxide and potentially resulting in increased oxidative stress.
Tramadol hydrochloride ( trademarked as Conzip, Ryzolt, Ultracet, Ultram in the USA, ralivia, zytram xl durella { cr-100/200 mg } in कनाडा or adolonta in स्पेन ) is a centrally acting synthetic analgesic used to treat moderate to moderately severe pain.
The drug has a wide range of applications, including treatment of rheumatoid arthritis, बेचैन टाँगे सिंड्रोम, मोटर neurone बीमारी and fibromyalgia.
It was launched and marketed as tramal by the जर्मनी फार्मास्युटिकल कम्पनी grünenthal GmbH in 1977.
Tramadol is a weak μ-opioid receptor agonist कि भी induces serotonin release and inhibits the reuptake of norepinephrine.
Tramadol is metabolized to o-desmethyltramadol, a significantly अधिक potent μ-opioid agonist.
Tramadol and its major metabolite ( s ) are distinguished इससे अन्य अधिक potent opioid agonists by सापेक्ष selectivity लिये μ-opioid receptors.
बर्नार्ड लॉरेंस `` बर्नी '' madoff ( ; born अप्रैल 29, 1938 ) is an अमरीकी former stockbroker, investment advisor, financier, and white collar criminal.
He is the former non-executive Chairman of the नैस्डैक भण्डार मार्केट, और the admitted ऑपरेटर of a पेन्शन योजना कि is माना to be the largest financial fraud in U.S. history.
Madoff founded the Wall Street firm बर्नार्ड L. madoff निवेश प्रतिभूति llc in 1960, और थी इसके अध्यक्ष until his arrest on December 11, 2008.
The firm was one of the top market maker businesses on Wall गली, जिससे bypassed `` विशेषज्ञ '' firms by सीधे निष्पादित orders over the counter from retail brokers.
He employed at the firm his brother Peter as Senior Managing Director and Chief अनुपालन अधिकारी ; पीटर रै चूंकि महरूम sentenced to 10 सालो in थाना.
Peter 's daughter Shana Madoff as the firm 's rules and compliance officer and attorney, and his sons एंड्रयू और चिह्नित ( चिह्नित वचनबद्ध आत्महत्या by फांसी exactly दो सालो बाद उसके father 's arrest ).
On December 10, 2008, Madoff 's sons told authorities that their father had confessed to them कि the एसेट प्रबन्धन ईकाई of उसके कड़ थी a विशाल Ponzi scheme, and quoted him as describing it as `` one big lie. ''
The following day, FBI एजेंटों गिरफ्तार madoff और चार्ज उसे साथ one count of securities fraud.
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission ( SEC ) had previously conducted investigations into madoff 's कारोबार practices, लकिन किया नहीं ख़ोज the विशाल धोखाधड़ी.
In March 2009, Madoff pleaded guilty to 11 federal felonies and admitted to turning his wealth management business into a विशाल पेन्शन योजना कि झांसे हज़ारों of निवेशकों of अरबों of डॉलर.
madoff कहा he began the पेन्शन scheme in the early 1990s.
However, federal जांचकर्ताओं मानना the धोखाधड़ी began as जल्दी as the 1970s, और those चार्ज साथ recovering the missing money believe the investment operation may never have been legitimate.
The amount missing from client accounts, सहित fabricated gains, थी almost $ 65 billion.
the court-appointed ट्रस्टी अनुमानित वास्तविक losses to investors of $ 18 billion.
On June 29, 2009, he was sentenced to 150 years in थाना, the अधिकतम अनुमत.
प्रशासनिक पेशेवर दिन ( भी ज्ञात as secretaries दिन or एडमिन दिन ) is an unofficial धर्मनिरपेक्ष अवकाश observed in several countries to recognize the work of secretaries, administrative assistants, receptionists, and other administrative support professionals.
In North America, it is celebrated on the बुधवार of the पिछला पूरा सप्ताह of अप्रैल ( अप्रैल 24 in 2013 ).
In फ़्रांस it is मनाये on the तीसरा गुरुवार in April ( April 18 in 2013 ).
In Australia it is मनाये on the पहला शुक्रवार in May
A quasi-judicial body is an entity such as an arbitrator or tribunal board, generally of a public administrative agency, जिससे रै शक्तियां और प्रक्रियाओं resembling those of a अदालत of विधि or judge, and which is obligated to objectively determine facts and draw conclusions from them so as to provide the basis of an official action.
Such actions are able to remedy a situation or impose legal penalties, and may affect the विधिक अधिकारों, कर्तव्य or privileges of विशिष्ट पार्टियों.
Monument of Tycho Brahe और योहानेस कॅप्लर in Prague
Tycho Brahe ( 14 December 154624 October 1601 ), born Tyge ottesen ब्राहे, थी a डैनिश nobleman ज्ञात लिये उसके सटीक और व्यापक खगोलीय and planetary observations.
He थी born in स्कैनिया, तब भाग of Denmark, now part of modern-day Sweden.
tycho थी खूब ज्ञात in उसके आजीवन as an astronomer and alchemist.
in उसके de नोवा स्टेला ( on the नई star ) of 1573, he refuted the Aristotelian belief in an unchanging celestial realm.
His precise measurements indicated that `` new stars, '' ( stellae novae, अभी ज्ञात as supernovae ) in particular कि of 1572, lacked the लंबन अपेक्षित in sub-lunar phenomena, and were therefore not `` atmospheric '' tailless comets as previously believed, but were above the atmosphere and moon.
Using similar measurements he showed that comets यहूद भी नहीं वायुमंडलीय phenomena, as previously विचार, और जरूर pass through the supposedly `` immutable '' celestial spheres.
As an astronomer, Tycho worked to combine what he saw as the geometrical benefits of the Copernican system साथ the philosophical लाभ of the ptolemaic प्रणाली into उसके अपना मॉडल of the ब्रह्मांड, the Tychonic system.
Furthermore, he थी the पिछला of the प्रमुख नग्न नजर खगोलशास्त्रियों, working without telescopes for his observations.
Tycho Brahe was granted an estate on the island of Hven and the funding to build the Uraniborg, an early research institute, where he built large astronomical instruments and took many careful measurements, and later Stjerneborg, भूमिगत, जब he खोजा कि उसके यंत्र in the पूर्व यहूद not sufficiently steady.
On the island ( on which he demonstrated निरंकुश अक्षर और बर्ताव toward the निवासियों ) he संस्थापित manufactories ऐसे as paper-making to provide सामग्री for printing his results.
बाद मतभिन्नता साथ the नई डैनिश किंग ईसाई iv in 1597, he थी आमंत्रित by the Bohemian king and Holy Roman emperor Rudolph II to Prague, where he became the official imperial astronomer.
He निर्मित the नई वेधशाला at Benátky nad Jizerou.
Here, from 1600 जबतक उसके मौत in 1601, he थी assisted by योहानेस कॅप्लर जो बाद प्रयुक्त Tycho 's astronomical data to develop Kepler 's laws of planetary motion.
Guro District ( Guro-gu ) is a district of सियोल, दक्षिण कोरियाई, जिससे थी अलग इससे yeongdeungpo District on April 1, 1980.
Located in the southwestern part of the नगर, जहाँ besides yangcheon ज़िला और geumcheon ज़िला guro ज़िला रै an महत्वपूर्ण स्थिति as a हस्तांतरण कड़ी जिससे contains railroads, जमीन रूट from the rest of Seoul to the south of the country.
The gyeongbu और gyeongin रेल lines connect Seoul to Busan and Incheon.
In addition, सियोल महानगर सबवे लाइनों 1, 2, और 7, और प्रमुख highways intersect in Guro District.
The name guro originates इससे the लेजेंड कि नौ ( ) बूढ़ा मेन ( Korean : ro ) enjoyed longevity in the district.
A digital industrial complex is स्तिथ in guro ज़िला.
The Guro Digital Industrial Complex, which played a leading industrial role mainly with textile manufacturing, dressmaking and other labour-intensive उद्योग in 1967, रै महरूम rapidly बदला into an it औद्योगिक complex.
This complex played a pivotal role in the economic growth of the South Korea 's development era, referred to as the `` चमत्कार on the हान नदी ``, और भी contributed 10 प्रतिशत of नेशनल निर्यात in the 1970s.
Twenty-one प्रतिशत of the कुल क्षेत्रफल of guro ज़िला is a प्रतिबंधित मण्डल to be used as a greenbelt with the only arboretum in Seoul.
The zone is changing into a lively district as large labour-intensive कारखानों हैं चलती इससे the क्षेत्रफल और the परिषद is developing what it terms its four zones.
An `` e-government `` प्रणाली आधारित on इस hosted the अंतरराष्ट्रीय e-participation फ़ोरम on फ़रवरी 7–9, 2007, with the participation of more than thirty-seven countries.
The forum was launched with the theme `` Promoting Democracy and Regional Development '' and twenty-five mayors including André Santini ( Issy-les-Moulineaux, France ), Kevin Foy ( Chapel Hill, US ), apirak kosayothin ( बैंकॉक, थाईलैंड ), uvais मोहम्मद emthiyas ( कोलोन, श्री लंका ), और संसार विशेषज्ञ ऐसे as dr विलियम H. dutton ( निदेशक of ऑक्सफोर्ड अंतरजाल संस्थान at the विश्वविद्यालयों of ऑक्सफोर्ड, uk ) और dr ari-veiko anttiroiko ( professor at the University of Tampere, Finland ) participated in the forum.
The Guro Declaration, अपनाया दौरान the फ़ोरम, aims to नियत up a पोर्टल साईट लिये e-government विकास और to establish a concrete project in order to bridge the digital divide among the world 's cities.
This practice has महरूम recognised लिये providing a नई महत्वपूर्ण step in the development of e-democracy.
The e-participation forum was a key factor for Guro to play the leading role in bridging the digital divide among cities, to provide I.T. enterprises स्तिथ in guro डिजिटल औद्योगिक जटिल the अवसर to लॉन्च into the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मार्केट, to improve its image and become a global leader to concrete e-democracy.
the अंतरराष्ट्रीय e-participation forum on February 7–9, 2007
A wonton ( also spelled wantan, wanton, or wuntun in ट्रांसक्रिप्शन इससे cantonese ; मंदारिन : húndùn ) is a प्रकार of पकौड़ी commonly मिला in a number of Chinese cuisines.
Many people यहूद शामिल in the आविष्कार of radio as we now know it.
Several possible methods of wireless communication were considered, including inductive and capacitive induction और हस्तांतरण through the मैदान, however the विधि प्रयुक्त लिये रेडियो आज exclusively involves the हस्तांतरण और रिसेप्शन of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक waves.
After early speculation on the subject, experimental work on the connection between electricity and magnetism began around 1820 with the work of Hans Christian Ørsted and जारी साथ the कार्य of andré-marie एम्पीयर, जोसेफ हेनरी, और माइकल Faraday.
These investigations culminated in the पूरा theory of electromagnetism developed by James Clerk Maxwell.
This सिद्धान्त वर्णित the सैद्धांतिक basis of the propagation of electromagnetic waves.
After Maxwell 's सिद्धान्त थी प्रकाशित अनेक लोगों experimented साथ बेतार संचार, कुछ intentionally using Maxwell 's theory some not.
It is considered likely that the first intentional transmission of a signal by means of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक लहरें थी performed by दाउद एडवर्ड ह्यूजेस around 1880, हालांकि इस थी considered to be induction at the time.
The first systematic and unequivocal transmission of EM waves was performed by Heinrich रुडॉल्फ हर्ट्ज़ और वर्णित in papers प्रकाशित in 1887 and 1890.
Hertz famously considered these results as होने of छोटी व्यावहारिक value.
After Hertz 's work many लोगों यहूद शामिल in the विकास of components और सिद्धान्त involved with the transmission and reception of electromagnetic waves.
Others, notably Guglielmo Marconi, यहूद चिंतित साथ व्यावहारिक सुधार और the commercial application of radio to wireless telegraphy.
Later on Reginald A. fessenden became the पहला to send an audio signal by means of electromagnetic waves.
Scurvy is a disease resulting from a कमियां of विटामिन c, जिससे is जरूरी लिये the संश्लेषण of collagen in humans.
The chemical name for vitamin C, ascorbic acid, is derived from the Latin name of scurvy, scorbutus, जिससे भी provides the क्रियाशील scorbutic ( `` of, characterized by or having to do साथ स्कर्वी '' ).
Scurvy often presents itself initially as लक्षण of malaise और lethargy, followed by गठन of spots on the skin, spongy gums, and bleeding from the mucous membranes.
Spots are most abundant on the जांघों और टाँगे, और a व्यक्ति साथ the ailment looks pale, feels depressed, and is partially immobilized.
As scurvy advances, there can be open, suppurating wounds, घाटा of दांत, पीलिया, ज्वर, neuropathy and death.
Scurvy was at one time common among sailors, pirates and others aboard ships at समुद्र longer than perishable फल और सब्जियां could be भंडारित ( subsisting बजाय तभी on cured और salted meats और सूखी दाने ) और by soldiers similarly deprived of these foods for extended periods.
It was described by Hippocrates ( c. 460 BC–c. 380 BC ), and herbal cures लिये स्कर्वी have महरूम ज्ञात in अनेक देशी संस्कृतियों चूंकि प्रागितिहास.
Scurvy was एक of the limiting कारकों of समुद्री सफर, often killing large numbers of the passengers and crew on long-distance voyages.
This became a significant issue in Europe इससे the शुरूआत of the आधुनिक era in the आयु of डिस्कवरी in the 15th century, continuing to play a significant role through World War I in the 20th century.
While आज स्कर्वी is ज्ञात to be caused by a nutritional कमियां, जबतक the अलगाव of विटामिन c और सीधा प्रमाण of its link to scurvy in 1932, numerous theories and treatments were proposed, often on little or no experimental data.
This inconsistency is attributed to the lack of vitamin C as a distinct concept, an inability to reliably कड़ी अलग भोजन ( notably उपस्थित in भैस citrus, watercress, and organ meat ) to scurvy.
An अतिरिक्त अवधारणा जरूरी to समझे स्कर्वी थी the degradation of विटामिन c by एक्सपोज़र to air and copper and other transition metal salts such as those of iron, thus changing the links of foods to scurvy over time.
Treatment by भैस खाना, विशेषकर citrus फल, थी periodically implemented, as it had been since antiquity.
however जबतक the 1930s, उपचार थी असंगत, with many ineffective treatments used into the 20th century.
It was a Scottish surgeon in the Royal Navy, James Lind जो पहला proved it could be treated साथ citrus फल in प्रयोग he described in his 1753 book, A Treatise of the Scurvy, though his advice was not implemented by the Royal Navy for several decades.
In infants, scurvy is sometimes referred to as Barlow 's बीमारी, नामित बाद सर थामस barlow, a अंग्रेजों चिकित्सक who described it.
However, Barlow 's बीमारी may भी refer to mitral valve prolapse.
Other eponyms for स्कर्वी शामिल moeller 's बीमारी और cheadle 's disease.
Scurvy does नहीं occur in सबसे पशु क्युकी वे can synthesize their own vitamin C.
However, humans and other higher primates ( the simians - monkeys and apes - and tarsiers ), guinea pigs, most or सब bats, और कुछ प्रजाति of पक्षियों और मछली कमी an एंजाइम ( l-gulonolactone oxidase ) जरुरी लिये ऐसे संश्लेषण and must obtain vitamin C through their diet.
Vitamin C is widespread in plant tissues, with particularly high concentrations occurring in citrus fruits ( oranges, lemons, limes, grapefruits ), टमाटर, आलू, पत्तागोभी, और green peppers.
Iron is a रासायनिक तत्व साथ the प्रतीक fe ( इससे ) और atomic number 26.
it is a मेटल in the पहला परिवर्तन series.
It is the most common element ( by mass ) forming the planet धरती as a पूरे, forming much of धरती 's बाहरी और भीतरी core.
It is the चौथी सबसे आम element in the Earth 's crust.
Iron 's very common presence in rocky planets like Earth is due to its abundant उत्पादन as a परिणाम of संलयन in high-mass सितारों, जहाँ the उत्पादन of nickel-56 ( जिससे decays to the सबसे आम isotope of iron ) is the last nuclear fusion reaction that is exothermic.
This causes radioactive nickel to become the last element to be produced before collapse of a supernova leads to the विस्फोटक कार्यक्रम कि scatter इस precursor radionuclide of iron abundantly into space.
Like other group 8 elements, iron exists in a wide range of oxidation states, −2 to +6, हालांकि +2 और +3 हैं the most common.
elemental आयरन occurs in meteoroids और अन्य कम oxygen environments, but is reactive to oxygen and water.
Fresh iron सतहों appear lustrous silvery-gray, लकिन oxidize in normal air to give hydrated iron oxides, commonly known as rust.
Unlike many other metals which form passivating oxide layers, iron oxides occupy अधिक आवाज़ than आयरन मेटल, और यूँ आयरन आक्साइड फ्लेक बंद और expose भैस सतहों for corrosion.
Iron metal has been used since प्राचीन टाइम्स, हालांकि तांबे alloys, जिससे have निम्नतर melting temperatures, were used first in history.
Pure iron is soft ( softer than एल्युमिनियम ), लकिन is unobtainable by smelting.
The material is significantly hardened और strengthened by impurities इससे the smelting process, such as carbon.
A certain proportion of carbon ( between 0.002 % and 2.1 % ) produces स्टील, जिससे may be up to 1000 टाइम्स harder than pure iron.
Crude iron metal is produced in blast furnaces, where अयस्क is घटाया by कोक to सुअर आयरन, which has a high carbon content.
Further refinement with oxygen reduces the carbon content to the सही proportion to मेक steel.
Steels and low carbon iron alloys with other metals ( alloy steels ) are by दूर the सबसे आम धातुओं in औद्योगिक उपयोग, due to उनके ग्रेट दायरा of वांछनीय गुण और the abundance of iron.
Iron chemical यौगिकों, जिससे शामिल अमिश्रित and ferric compounds, have many uses.
Iron oxide mixed with aluminium powder can be ignited to बनाएँ a थर्माइट प्रतिक्रिया, प्रयुक्त in वेल्डिंग और सुथरा ores.
it फ़ॉर्म शब्दकोष यौगिकों with the halogens and the chalcogens.
Among its कार्बधातुक यौगिकों is ferrocene, the पहला सैंडविच compound discovered.
Iron plays an important भूमिका in जीवविज्ञान, forming देवालय साथ आणविक ऑक्सीजन in हीमोग्लोबिन and myoglobin ; these two compounds are common oxygen transport proteins in vertebrates.
Iron is also the metal used at the क्रियाशील साईट of अनेक महत्वपूर्ण रेडॉक्स एंजाइमों dealing साथ सेल्यूलर श्वसन and oxidation and reduction in plants and animals.
The Blue Cross Blue Shield Association ( BCBSA ) is a संघ of 38 पृथक स्वास्थ्य बीमे संगठन और कंपनियाँ in the संयुक्त States.
Combined, they directly or indirectly provide स्वास्थ्य बीमे to over 99 million Americans.
The history of Blue क्रॉस तिथियाँ वापस to 1929, जबकि the इतिहास of ब्लू Shield dates to 1939.
the ब्लू क्रॉस संघ तिथियाँ वापस to 1960, while its Blue Shield counterpart was created in 1948.
The दो संगठन मिलाया in 1982, forming the current association.
A potato chip ( known as a chip in American, Australian, New Zealand, Canadian, singaporean, हांग काँग, दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी और jamaican अंग्रेज़ी ; as a कुरकुरे in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी और hiberno-english, और as either a चिप or wafer in भारतीय अंग्रेज़ी ) is a पतला टुकड़ा of आलू that is deep fried or baked until crunchy.
Potato chips are commonly served as an क्षुधावर्धक, पक्ष डिश, or स्नैक.
The basic chips are cooked and salted ; additional varieties हैं manufactured using विभिन्न flavorings और संघटक सहित seasonings, herbs, मसाले, cheeses, and artificial additives.
`` Crisps '', however, may भी refer to अनेक अलग प्रकार of savory स्नैक उत्पाद बेची in the संयुक्त Kingdom and Ireland, some made from potato, but may also be made from maize, tapioca or other cereals.
An example of these kinds of savory स्नैक्स is दानव चबाना.
Potato chips are a predominant part of the snack food market in english-speaking देशों and numerous other Western nations.
The global potato chip market generated कुल revenues of us $ 16.4 अरब in 2005.
This accounted for 35.5 % of the कुल savory स्नैक्स market in that year ( US $ 46.1 billion ).
Henry Clay, Sr. ( April 12, 1777 – June 29, 1852 ) was a lawyer, politician and skilled orator who represented केंटकी in दोनो the सीनेट और in the House of Representatives.
He served three different terms as Speaker of the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि और थी भी Secretary of State from 1825 to 1829.
He lost his अभियान लिये अध्यक्ष in 1824, 1832 and 1844.
Clay was a dominant figure in both the पहला और दूसरी पार्टी प्रणालियों.
As a leading war hawk in 1812, he favored war with ब्रिटेन और निभाई a significant भूमिका in अग्रणी the स्वदेश to युद्ध in the युद्ध of 1812.
In 1824 he ran for अध्यक्ष और खोया, लकिन फेंका उसके चुनावी मत to जॉन क्विंसी एडम्स, जो बना him secretary of state as the Jacksonians denounced what they considered a `` corrupt bargain. ''
He ran and lost again in 1832 and 1844 as the candidate of the whig पार्टी, जिससे he संस्थापित और प्रायः वर्चस्व.
Clay was the foremost proponent of the American System, fighting for an increase in tariffs to फोस्टर उद्योग in the संयुक्त राज्य, the use of federal funding to build and maintain infrastructure, and a strong national bank.
He opposed the annexation of टेक्सास, fearing it होता इंजेक्ट the slavery issue into politics.
मिट्टी भी opposed the mexican-american युद्ध और the `` manifest नियति `` policy of Democrats, which cost him votes in the close 1844 election.
Dubbed the `` Great Pacificator, '' मिट्टी brokered महत्वपूर्ण compromises दौरान the Nullification Crisis and on the slavery issue.
As part of the `` Great Triumvirate `` or `` Immortal Trio, '' along with his सहयोगियों डेनियल वेबस्टर और जॉन C. calhoun, he थी इंस्ट्रूमेंटल in formulating the मिसौरी Compromise of 1820 and the Compromise of 1850.
He was viewed as the primary प्रतिनिधि of पश्चिमी रूचि in इस समूह, और was given the names `` Henry of the West '' and `` The Western Star. ''
A plantation owner, Clay held स्लेव दौरान उसके आजीवन लकिन freed उन्हें in his Will.
Abraham Lincoln, the whig नेता in इलिनोइस, थी a ग्रेट admirer of मिट्टी, saying he was `` my ideal of a great man. ''
lincoln wholeheartedly समर्थित मिट्टी 's economic programs.
In 1957, a Senate Committee selected Clay as one of the पाँच महानतम u.s. सीनेटरों, साथ साथ डेनियल वेबस्टर, जॉन C. calhoun, रॉबर्ट la follette, and Robert Taft.
BJ 's Wholesale Club, Inc., commonly referred to बस as bj 's, is a membership-only गोदाम क्लबों कड़ी ऑपरेटिंग on the United States East Coast, as well as in the state of Ohio.
The company is ranked # 232 on सौभाग्य पत्रिका 's 2010 लिस्टिंग of अमेरिका 's 500 largest public corporations.
The जादूगर of oz, ज्ञात दौरान उसके शासनकाल as the ग्रेट और शक्तिशाली oz, is the epithet of Oscar Zoroaster Phadrig Isaac Norman Henkel Emmannuel Ambroise Diggs, a fictional character in the Land of Oz, created by American author L. Frank Baum.
The character was further popularized by the क्लासिक 1939 फिल्म, wherein उसके पूरा नाम is not mentioned.
Kristinia Jamie DeBarge ( ; born March 8, 1990 ) is an अमरीकी सिंगर, songwriter, नर्तकी and actress.
She first appeared on नेशनल टेलीविज़न in 2003 as a प्रतियोगी on the अमरीकी Idol spin-off, American Juniors.
In 2009, DeBarge signed a contract with the Island Records विभाग sodapop, releasing उसके डेब्यू एल्बम उजागर in जुलाई of the वही year.
The first single, `` अलविदा ``, पहुँचे the top 20 in the US and Canada.
The lead single ( `` Cry Wolf '' ) from उसके बेनाम sophomore एल्बम थी released on September 27, 2012.
The Hawaii Warriors football team represents the विश्वविद्यालयों of hawaiʻi at mānoa in ncaa प्रभाग i fbs कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल.
The team is coached by norm चाउ.

Marvin Gaye ( April 2, 1939April 1, 1984 ), born मारविन pentz gay, jr., थी an American singer-songwriter and musician.
Gaye helped to shape the sound of Motown Records in the 1960s साथ a स्ट्रिंग of हिट्स सहित `` कैसा मीठी it is ( to be loved by तुम ) `` और `` i सुना it through the grapevine `` and duet recordings with Mary Wells and Tammi Terrell, later earning the titles `` Prince of Motown '' and `` Prince of Soul ''.
During the 1970s, Gaye recorded the अवधारणा एल्बम कया 's going on और let 's मिलेंगी it on और became among the first artists in Motown to break away from the reins of its production company.
Gaye 's later recordings influenced several R & B subgenres ऐसे as शांत तूफ़ान और neo-soul.
following a काल in Europe under a tax exile in the early 1980s, Gaye released the 1982 Grammy Award-winning hit `` Sexual Healing `` and the Midnight Love album.
Since his death in 1984, Gaye has महरूम मरणोपरांत सम्मानित by अनेक संस्थानों, सहित the ग्रैमी आजीवन उपलब्धि Award and the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame.

The Chernobyl disaster (, Chornobylska Katastrofa – Chornobyl Catastrophe ) was a अनर्थकारी नाभिकीय दुर्घटना कि occurred on 26 अप्रैल 1986 at the chernobyl नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र in युक्त ( तब officially the Ukrainian SSR ), which was under the direct jurisdiction of the central authorities of the Soviet Union.
An explosion and fire released large quantities of radioactive अणु into the माहौल, जिससे स्प्रेड over much of the पश्चिमी ussr और यूरोपीय.
The Chernobyl disaster is widely considered to have been the worst nuclear power plant accident in history, and is one of only two classified as a स्तर 7 इवेंट on the अंतरराष्ट्रीय नाभिकीय इवेंट स्केल ( the अन्य होने the फुकुशिमा daiichi नाभिकीय विपत्ति in 2011 ).
The बैटल to contain the संदूषण और avert a वृहद प्रलय ultimately शामिल over 500,000 workers and cost an estimated 18 billion rubles.
The official Soviet casualty count of 31 deaths has been विवादित, और long-term प्रभाव ऐसे as cancers और deformities हैं स्टिल being accounted for.
Mrs. Claus says अलविदा to उसके husband as he सेट बंद on उसके यात्रा in this 1919 postcard
Mrs. Claus is the wife of Santa Claus, the Christmas gift-bringer in उत्तर अमरीकी और यूरोपीय क्रिसमस परंपरा.
She is known for making cookies with the elves और तैयारी खिलौने साथ उसके husband Santa Claus.
Her first name is a mystery, though she रै महरूम referred to as मरियम, जेसिका, layla, annette, हीदी, or Martha.
HijackThis ( also HiJackThis or HJT ) is an open source enumerating tool for Microsoft Windows originally निर्मित by merijn bellekom, और बाद बेची to ट्रेंड Micro.
The program is notable for लक्ष्यीकरण browser-hijacking विधि, बल्कि than relying on a database of known spyware.
It scans a उपयोक्ता 's कंप्यूटर जल्दी, और प्रदर्शक ब्राउजर hijacking स्थितियाँ, showing what entries are there.
HijackThis is used primarily for निदान of ब्राउजर hijacking, as uninformed उपयोग of its removal facilities can cause significant software damage to a computer.
HijackThis does not remove or detect spyware ; it lists most common locations where ब्राउजर hijacking कार्यकलाप can occur.
Browser hijacking can कारण मैलवेयर to be installed on a computer.
On February 16, 2012, Trend Micro released the HijackThis सोर्स कोड as खोलें सोर्स और it is अभी उपलब्धियाँ on the sourceforge site.
Saddle Creek रिकॉर्ड is an अमरीकी रिकार्ड लेबल based in Omaha, Nebraska.
Started as a college class project on entrepreneurship, the लेबल थी संस्थापित by माइक mogis और जस्टिन Oberst in 1993 ( as Lumberjack Records ).
Mogis soon turned over उसके भूमिका in the कम्पनी to Robb Nansel.
The label is named after Saddle Creek Road, a street that cuts through the east side of midtown Omaha, and the beginnings of a scene whose members included Conor Oberst ( then a solo artist, currently of उज्जवल आँखें, conor oberst और the रहस्यवादी घाटी बैंड, desaparecidos और राक्षस of लोक ), टिम kasher ( तब of slowdown वर्जिनिया, फिलहाल of Cursive and The Good Life ), and others.
Collectively, they were known unofficially as the `` creekers ''.
काठी क्रीक पहला appeared in छपाई on a दिखाएँ flyer, offering to `` Spend an evening with Saddle Creek '' ( later to be the title of the label 's DVD. )
Saddle Creek became an incorporated entity as a परिणाम of a क्लास प्रोजेक्ट on उद्यमिता.
Distribution is handled by the Alternative Distribution गठबंधन, जिससे is अंतर्गत the warner Music Group umbrella.
Saddle Creek Records continues to be the फ्लैगशिप लेबल of a स्टाइल of म्यूज़िक पुकारा `` the ओमाहा Sound ``, characterized by a slight country twang.
This is increasingly inaccurate, हालांकि, साथ the वृद्धि of अधिक इलेक्ट्रॉनिक ध्वनि ऐसे as those favored by The Faint and Broken Spindles.
The eclectic sounds of Saddle Creek 's disparate member bands is somewhat explained by their history ; a क्रमांक of the असली सदस्यों of the लेबल attended grade school together.
A `` sister label '', of sorts, to Saddle Creek is टोली प्रेम, प्रारंभ by conor oberst in 2004.
The label opened arms to their पहला bands नहीं आधारित in ओमाहा in 2001 साथ रिलीज by अभी it 's ओवरहेड and Sorry About Dresden.
Other non-Nebraskan artists followed, including Los Angeles 's Rilo Kiley, Eric Bachmann ( formerly leader of Archers of Loaf and Crooked उंगलियाँ इससे उत्तर कैरोलिना ), georgie जेम्स ( वॉशिंगटन d.C. ), दो gallants ( सैन फ्रांसिस्को ), and most recently Tokyo Police Club ( Toronto ).
In 2005, खर्च an संध्या साथ काठी क्रीक, a वृत्तचित्र detailing the first ten years of the record label 's history, was released.
The DVD features extensive interviews साथ the काठी क्रीक bands, archival फुटेज, और विरल सजीव प्रदर्शन.
On June 8, 2007, the label opened their अपना म्यूज़िक स्थान नामित slowdown ( बाद the समूह slowdown Virginia ), located in downtown Omaha, Nebraska.
The following is a सूची of एपीसोड लिये the टेलीविज़न show Full House.
In कुल, वहीँ यहूद 192 एपीसोड फिल्माया लिये the दिखाएँ over the कोर्स of its eight seasons, from 1987 to 1995.
Full House is a situation comedy which chronicles a विधवा पिता 's struggles of उठाने उसके तीन यंग बेटियां और the जीवनदान कि वे have छुआ.
The patriarch of the family, Danny ( Bob Saget ), आमंत्रण उसके brother-in-law जेसी ( जॉन stamos ) और उसके बेहतरीन dost जॉय ( डेव coulier ), to सहायता उठाएँ उसके children ( Candace Cameron, Jodie Sweetin, and Mary Kate/Ashley Olsen ), after his wife was killed during an automobile accident involving a drunk driver.
After episodes 88 and 89, Jesse marries बेकी ( लोरी loughlin ), और वे move into the attic.
Then, after episodes 104 and 105, Becky and Jesse have जुड़वा लड़कों नामित nicky और एलेक्स ( डेनियल और केविन renteria/blake और Dylan Tuomy-Wilhoit ).
The series ends with episode 192, `` Michelle यात्राएँ again भाग 2 '', जब मिशेल loses उसके मेमोरी और the परिवार कोशिशें to restore it.
Notice of स्टैम्प अधिनियम of 1765 in समाचारपत्र
American newspapers reacted to the स्टैम्प अधिनियम साथ गुस्सा और predictions of the demise of journalism.
The Stamp Act 1765 ( short title Duties in American Colonies Act 1765 ; 5 George III, c. 12 ) imposed a direct tax by the अंग्रेजों पार्लियामेंट specifically on the colonies of अंग्रेजों अमेरिका, और it जरूरी कि अनेक मुद्रित सामग्री in the colonies be उत्पादित on stamped पेपर उत्पादित in लंदन, carrying an embossed आय स्टैम्प.
These printed materials were legal documents, magazines, newspapers and many other प्रकार of पेपर प्रयुक्त throughout the colonies.
Like previous taxes, the stamp tax had to be paid in मान्य अंग्रेजों करेंसी, नहीं in औपनिवेशिक paper money.
The purpose of the tax was to help pay for troops stationed in North अमेरिका बाद the अंग्रेजों विजय in the सात सालो ' युद्ध.
The British सरकारी लगा कि the colonies यहूद the प्राथमिक beneficiaries of this military presence, and should pay at least a portion of the expense.
The स्टैम्प अधिनियम मिले ग्रेट resistance in the colonies.
The colonies sent no प्रतिनिधि to पार्लियामेंट, और इसलिए था no influence over what taxes were raised, how they were levied, or how they would be spent.
Many colonists considered it a उल्लंघन of उनके अधिकारों as अंग्रेजो to be taxed बगैर their consent —consent that only the colonial legislatures could grant.
Colonial assemblies भेजा याचिकाएं और विरोध.
The Stamp Act Congress आयोजित in नई यॉर्क नगर, reflecting the पहला significant संयुक्त औपनिवेशिक response to any British measure, also petitioned Parliament and the King.
Local protest groups, led by औपनिवेशिक व्यापारियों और landowners, स्थापित कनेक्शन्स through पत्राचार that created a loose coalition that extended from New England to Georgia.
Protests and demonstrations initiated by the बेटे of स्वतंत्रता प्रायः turned violent and destructive as the masses became involved.
Very soon all stamp tax distributors यहूद सहमे into resigning उनके commissions, and the tax was never effectively collected.
Opposition to the Stamp Act was not सीमित to the colonies.
British merchants and manufacturers, whose exports to the colonies यहूद threatened by औपनिवेशिक आर्थिक समस्याएं exacerbated by the tax, also pressured Parliament.
The Act was repealed on कूच 18, 1766 as a पदार्थ of expedience, लकिन पार्लियामेंट affirmed its power to legislate for the colonies “in all cases whatsoever” by also passing the Declaratory Act.
वहीँ followed a श्रेणी of नई कर और regulations, likewise opposed by the colonists.
the एपीसोड निभाई a प्रमुख भूमिका in धमक the grievances और enabling the व्यवस्थित colonial resistance that led to the American Revolution in 1775.
PT-105 underway.
PT boats were a variety of torpedo-armed तेज़ आक्रमण शिल्प प्रयुक्त by the United States Navy in World War II to attack larger surface ships.
`` PT '' is the US hull classification प्रतीक लिये `` पैट्रोल torpedo ''.
The PT boat squadrons were nicknamed `` the मच्छर बेड़े ''.
The Japanese पुकारा उन्हें `` शैतान नौकाएँ ''.
The original pre– World War I torpedo नौकाएँ यहूद designed साथ `` विस्थापन '' hulls.
They displaced up to 300 टन और the शीर्ष गति was.
The PT boats used in संसार युद्ध ii यहूद निर्मित using the planing -type hull form developed for racing boats.
They were much छोटी ( 30–75 टन ) और तेज़ ( 35–40 knots ).
Both types यहूद designed to स्ट्राइक at larger warships साथ torpedoes, using अपेक्षाकृत high speed to get close, and small size to avoid being spotted and hit by gunfire.
They were much less महंगी than विशाल warships.
PT boats यहूद much तेज़, छोटी, और सस्ता than conventional ( displacement hull ) vessels.
During World War II, American PT boats engaged enemy destroyers and numerous अन्य सतह शिल्प, ranging इससे छोटी नौकाएँ to विशाल सप्लाई जहाजों.
PT boats also operated as gunboats against enemy small शिल्प, ऐसे as कराया barges प्रयुक्त by the जापानी forces for inter-island transport.
Good शुक्रवार is a धार्मिक अवकाश observed primarily by ईसाइयों commemorating the crucifixion of Jesus Christ and his death at Calvary.
The holiday is observed during Holy Week as part of the paschal triduum on the शुक्रवार preceding ईस्टर संडे, और may coincide with the Jewish observance of Passover.
It is also known as Holy Friday, Great Friday, Black Friday, or ईस्टर शुक्रवार, हालांकि the latter properly refers to the Friday in Easter week.
Based on the details of the Canonical gospels, the crucifixion of यीशु थी सबसे संभावित to have been on a Friday ( the day before the Sabbath ) ( ).
The estimated year of the Crucifixion is AD 33, by two different groups, and originally as AD 34 by Isaac Newton via the differences between the biblical और जूलियन पंचांग और the crescent of the moon.
A तीसरा विधि, using a completely अलग खगोलीय दृष्टिकोण आधारित on a चंद्र crucifixion darkness and eclipse model ( consistent with Apostle Peter 's reference to a `` moon of blood '' in Acts 2:20 ), points to Friday, 3 April AD 33.
The Great Basin is the largest area of endorheic watersheds in उत्तर America.
It is noted for both its arid conditions and इसके जलाशय और दायरा स्थलाकृति कि varies इससे the उत्तर अमरीकी कम पाइंट at badwater जलाशय to the highest point of the contiguous United States, less than away at the summit of Mount Whitney.
The region spans अनेक physiographic विभाजन, biomes / ecoregions, and deserts.
Raster may refer to:
Raster graphics, आलेखीय तकनीकों using arrays of pixel values
रास्टर ग्राफिक्स एडिटर, a कंप्यूटर program
Raster scan, the pattern of चित्र readout, हस्तांतरण, भंडार, और reconstruction in television and computer images
Rasterisation, or rasterization, परिवर्तन of a वेक्टर चित्र to a raster image
Raster image processor, or RIP, a component of a मुद्रण प्रणाली कि performs rasterisation
Raster इन्टरनेट, a कंप्यूटर interrupt signal
Raster to वेक्टर, an चित्र परिवर्तन process
Raster bar, an प्रभाव प्रयुक्त in कंप्यूटर demos
raster-noton, a रिकार्ड label
Rastrum, a device used in मध्यकालीन म्यूज़िक पांडुलिपियों to चित्रण स्टाफ lines
रास्टर दस्तावेज़ Object, a file format
Beowulf ( ; Old English : ) is a legendary geatish नायिका और बाद turned किंग in the एपिक कविता नामित after him, one of the oldest surviving pieces of literature in the English language.
The attack on Pearl Harbor ( पुकारा हवाई आपरेशन or आपरेशन ai by the जापानी इम्पीरियल सामान्य मुख्यालय ( आपरेशन z in नियोजन ) और the बैटल of पर्ल हार्बर ) थी a आश्चर्य सैन्य स्ट्राइक conducted by the इम्पीरियल Japanese Navy against the United States naval base at Pearl Harbor, Hawaii, on the morning of December 7, 1941 ( December 8 in Japan ).
From the standpoint of the defenders, the आक्रमण commenced at 7:48 a.m. Hawaiian Time.
The attack was intended as a निवारक कार्रवाई in अनुक्रम to रखना the u.S. प्रशांत बेड़े इससे दखल साथ सैन्य क्रियाएँ the साम्राज्य of जापानी थी नियोजन in southeast एशिया विरूद्ध overseas territories of the United Kingdom, the Netherlands, and the United States.
The base was attacked by 353 Japanese सेनानी, बमवर्षक और torpedo planes in दो लहरें, शुभारम्भ from six aircraft carriers.
All eight U.S. Navy battleships यहूद क्षतिग्रस्त, with four being sunk.
Two of these were बाद उठाया, और साथ the बाकी चार repaired, छह battleships लौटे to service later in the war.
The Japanese also sank or क्षतिग्रस्त तीन cruisers, तीन destroyers, an anti-aircraft प्रशिक्षण जलयान, और one minelayer.
188 U.S. वायुयान यहूद नष्ट ; 2,402 Americans were killed and 1,282 wounded.
Important base installations such as the power station, shipyard, maintenance, और ईंधन और torpedo भंडार सुविधाएं, as खूब as the पनडुब्बी पियर और मुख्यालय भवन ( भी घर of the प्रज्ञा section ) were not attacked.
Japanese losses यहूद लाइट : 29 वायुयान और पाँच midget submarines खोया, and 65 servicemen killed or wounded.
One Japanese sailor was captured.
The attack came as a profound shock to the American people and led directly to the अमरीकी प्रविष्टि into संसार युद्ध ii in दोनो the Pacific and European theaters.
The following दिन ( दिसम्बर 8 ), the United States declared war on Japan.
Domestic support for non-interventionism, जिससे था महरूम दमदार, disappeared.
Clandestine support of Britain ( for example the neutrality पैट्रोल ) थी replaced by क्रियाशील गठबंधन.
subsequent परिचालन by the u.S. prompted जर्मनी और इटली to घोषित युद्ध on the u.S. on December 11, which was reciprocated by the U.S. the same day.
There were numerous ऐतिहासिक precedents लिये unannounced military action by Japan.
However, the lack of any formal warning, particularly while negotiations were still जाहिर जारी, led अध्यक्ष फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट to proclaim दिसम्बर 7, 1941, `` a date which will live in infamy ``.
U.S. Route 85 ( US 85 ) is a north–south संयुक्त राज्य राजमार्ग कि रनों लिये in the पहाड़ - उत्तरी मैदान राज्य of the United States.
The southern terminus of the route is at the United states-mexico किनारा in el पासो, टेक्सास, connecting with Mexican Federal Highway 45.
The उत्तरी टर्मिनस is at the संयुक्त states-canada border in Fortuna, North Dakota, where the route continues north as Saskatchewan Highway 35.
In both the United States and Saskatchewan, Canada the रूट is ज्ञात as the canam राजमार्ग.
Sections of us 85 हैं माना भाग of the Theodore Roosevelt Expressway.
The United States presidential election of 1968 थी the 46th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय चुनाव, आयोजित on मंगलवार, November 5, 1968.
The Republican nominee, former Vice-President Richard निक्सन, जीती the चुनाव over the लोकतांत्रिक nominee, incumbent Vice-President Hubert Humphrey.
Nixon ran on a campaign that promised to restore विधि और अनुक्रम to the स्वदेश 's शहरों, फटा by दंगे and crime.
Analysts have argued the election of 1968 is a realigning चुनाव as it permanently disrupted the नई सौदे गठबन्धन कि था वर्चस्व अध्यक्षीय politics for 36 years.
Coming four years after Democrat Lyndon B. Johnson won in a historic landslide, the चुनाव देखी the लाज़िम अध्यक्ष मजबूर आउट of the रेस और a रिपब्लिकन elected for the first time in twelve years.
It was a wrenching national experience, conducted during a year of violence that शामिल the हत्या of सिविल अधिकारों नेता मार्टिन लूथर किंग, jr., और subsequent रेस दंगे आरपार the स्वदेश, the assasination of लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी रॉबर्ट F. Kennedy, widespread opposition to the Vietnam War across university campuses, and violent confrontations between police and anti-war protesters at the 1968 Democratic National Convention as the Democratic party split again and again.
The election featured the strongest तीसरा पार्टी प्रयत्न चूंकि 1912 by पूर्व अलबामा Governor George Wallace, a Democrat.
Because Wallace 's campaign opposed federal intervention in the South to end स्कूल पृथक्करण, he carried the गहन दक्षिण और भागा खूब in जातीय औद्योगिक जिले in the North.
This was the last चुनाव in जिससे नई यॉर्क था the सबसे मत in the electoral college ( 43 votes ).
After the 1970 census, कैलिफ़ोर्निया gained the सबसे चुनावी मत और रै remained the most populous state since then.
This is the latest election where a presidential ticket won without carrying the वाइस अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी 's घर state.
Windows Task Manager is a task manager or प्रणाली मॉनिटर अनुप्रयोग शामिल साथ the microsoft खिड़कियाँ nt परिवार of ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों कि provides सीमित सूचना परिचय कंप्यूटर प्रदर्शन और कार्यशील अनुप्रयोग, प्रक्रियाओं और cpu उपयोग, कमिट चार्ज और मेमोरी सूचना, संजाल कार्यकलाप and statistics, logged-in users, and system services ( and as often is the case with software tools provided by Microsoft for Windows, 3rd party software is available which fills the requirements more thoroughly, e.g, `` Process Explorer '', `` Extended Task Manager '', `` Anvir Task Manager '', `` Process Hacker '', and `` System Explorer '' ).
The Task Manager can also be used to set प्रक्रम प्राथमिकताएं, प्रोसेसर अपनापन, forcibly terminate प्रक्रियाओं, और shut bas, restart, hibernate or log off from Windows.
Windows Task मैनेजर थी introduced साथ खिड़कियाँ NT 4.0.
Previous versions of Windows NT included the Task सूची अनुप्रयोग, जिससे था दूर कम सुविधाएँ.
The task list was capable of listing currently running प्रक्रियाओं और हत्या उन्हें, or बनाना a new process.
In Windows XP only, a shutdown मेनू is भी उपस्थित कि allows अभिगम to Standby, Hibernate, Turn off, Restart, Log Off and Switch User.
Earlier versions of Microsoft Windows ( Microsoft खिड़कियाँ 3.x, खिड़कियाँ 95, खिड़कियाँ 98 ) था a कार्यक्रम ज्ञात as कार्य to प्रदर्शक the कार्यक्रम currently running.
This file was executed by कार्यशील the taskman.exe संचिका इससे the c : \Windows directory.
Kanji ( ; ) are the adopted logographic Chinese characters ( hanzi ) that are used in the modern Japanese writing system along with hiragana ( ひらがな, ), katakana ( カタカナ, ), hindu-arabic numerals, और the occasional उपयोग of the लैटिन alphabet.
The Japanese term kanji ( ) for the Chinese characters वस्तुतः अर्थात् `` हान वर्ण '' और is लिखा using the same characters as the Chinese hanzi ( ).
John r विलियम्स ( may 4, 1782 – अक्तूबर 20, 1854 ) थी an अमरीकी सिपाही, व्यापारी, और राजनेता who is most well known for serving as the first mayor of Detroit, Michigan.
In total, he परोसा as डेट्रॉयट 's महापौर for five other terms.
He also थी a ब्रिगेडियर सामान्य in the United States Army during the Black Hawk War.

A smartphone कि can be प्रयुक्त as a कम्पास क्युकी of the magnetometer inside.

A military compass that was used दौरान संसार युद्ध I.
A compass is a navigational instrument that shows दिशानिर्देश in a फ़्रेम of सन्दर्भ कि is stationary सापेक्ष to the surface of the earth.
The frame of reference defines the चार कार्डिनल दिशानिर्देश ( or अंक ) – उत्तर, दक्षिण, east, and west.
इंटरमीडिएट दिशानिर्देश are also defined.
Usually, a diagram called a compass rose, जिससे shows the दिशानिर्देश ( साथ उनके names प्रायः abbreviated to initials ), is marked on the compass.
When the compass is in use, the rose is aligned with the real दिशानिर्देश in the फ़्रेम of सन्दर्भ, so, लिये उदाहरण, the `` n '' चिह्नित on the रोज़ वाकई अंक to the north.
Frequently, in जोड to the रोज़ or sometimes बजाय of it, कोण markings in degrees are shown on the compass.
North corresponds to zero degrees, और the कोण बढ़ाएँ clockwise, so ईस्ट is 90 degrees, south is 180, and west is 270.
These numbers allow the compass to show azimuths or बियरिंग, जिससे हैं commonly stated in इस संकेतन.
The magnetic compass was पहला invented as a यंत्र लिये भविष्यवाणी as early as the Chinese Han Dynasty ( Since about 206 BC ).
The compass was used in Song Dynasty China by the सैन्य लिये navigational orienteering by 1040-1044, and was used for maritime navigation by 1111 to 1117.
the उपयोग of a कम्पास is अंकित in पश्चिमी यूरोपीय between 1187 and 1202, and in Persia in 1232.
The dry कम्पास थी invented in यूरोपीय around 1300.
इस थी supplanted in the जल्दी 20th सदी by the liquid-filled magnetic compass.
The Inca Empire or Inka Empire ( Quechua : tawantinsuyu ) थी the largest साम्राज्य in pre-Columbian America.
The administrative, political and military center of the साम्राज्य थी स्तिथ in कुज़्को in modern-day पेरू.
The Inca civilization arose from the highlands of पेरू sometime in the जल्दी 13th century.
From 1438 to 1533, the Incas used a variety of methods, from conquest to peaceful assimilation, to incorporate a large portion of western South America, centered on the Andean mountain ranges, including, besides Peru, large parts of modern Ecuador, western and south सेंट्रल बोलीविया, उत्तरपश्चिम अर्जेंटीना, उत्तर और सेंट्रल चिली, और दक्षिणी कोलंबिया into a राज्य comparable to the historical empires of Eurasia.
The official language of the empire was Quechua, although hundreds of लोकल भाषाएं और dialects of quechua यहूद बोला.
The Inca referred to their साम्राज्य as tawantinsuyu जिससे can be अनूदित as the चार Regions or The Four United Provinces.
There were many local forms of worship, most of them concerning local sacred `` Huacas ``, but the Inca leadership encouraged the इबादत of inti —the सूर्य god—and imposed इसके प्रभुता ऊपर अन्य cults ऐसे as कि of pachamama.
The Incas considered their King, the Sapa इन्का, to be the `` चाइल्ड of the सूर्य. ''
The kidneys are organs that serve several अनिवार्य नियामक भूमिकाएँ in सबसे पशु, सहित vertebrates और कुछ invertebrates.
They are essential in the urinary system and भी serve homeostatic कृत्यों ऐसे as the विनियमन of इलेक्ट्रोलाइट्स, मेंटेनेंस of acid–base balance, and regulation of blood pressure ( via maintaining salt and water balance ).
They serve the body as a natural filter of the blood, and हटाएँ wastes जिससे हैं diverted to the urinary bladder.
In producing urine, the गुर्दे excrete wastes ऐसे as यूरिया और अमोनियम, और वे हैं भी जिम्मेदार for the reabsorption of water, glucose, and amino acids.
the गुर्दे भी उपज हार्मोन सहित calcitriol, erythropoietin, and the enzyme renin.
Located at the पश्च of the abdominal गुहा in the retroperitoneum, the kidneys receive blood from the paired renal arteries, and drain into the paired renal veins.
Each kidney excretes urine into a ureter, itself a युग्म structure that empties into the urinary bladder.
Renal physiology is the study of गुर्दा फलन, जबकि nephrology is the चिकित्सा specialty concerned with kidney diseases.
Diseases of the गुर्दा हैं विविध, लकिन individuals साथ गुर्दा बीमारी frequently display characteristic clinical features.
Common clinical conditions involving the kidney include the nephritic और nephrotic syndromes, renal cysts, अधि गुर्दा चोट, दीर्घकालिक गुर्दा बीमारी, urinary ट्रैक्ट संक्रमण, nephrolithiasis, and urinary tract obstruction.
Various cancers of the गुर्दा मौजूद ; the सबसे आम वयस्क renal cancer is renal cell carcinoma.
cancers, cysts, और कुछ अन्य renal शर्तें can be managed with removal of the kidney, or nephrectomy.
When renal function, measured by glomerular filtration रेट, is persistently ग़रीब, डायलिसिस और गुर्दा प्रत्यारोपण may be treatment options.
Although they are not severely नुकसानदेह, गुर्दा पत्थरों can be दुखद और a nuisance.
The removal of kidney stones involves ultrasound treatment to break up the stones into छोटी टुकड़े, जिससे हैं तब passed through the urinary tract.
One आम लक्षण of गुर्दा पत्थरों is a शार्प pain in the medial/lateral segments of the lower back.
Lockton Companies Inc. is the world 's largest privately held बीमे brokerage कड़, providing बीमे, रिस्क प्रबन्धन और कर्मचारी लाभ solutions.
In जोड to इसके कान्सास नगर, मिसौरी headquarters, Lockton operates 60 locations in 17 countries.
lockton is फिलहाल घर to अधिक than 4,450 Associates worldwide.
The company was founded by Jack Lockton in 1966 and has since become the world’s 9th largest बीमे brokerage firm.
lockton serves a चौड़ी सरणी of उद्योग साथ सेवाएं कि शामिल risk management, casualty, surety, professional indemnity and more.
लिये 46 सालो, lockton posted असाधारण सशुल्क विकास, with global revenues reaching $ 915 million in fiscal 2012.
Lockton Benefits Group : Lockton’s Employee Benefit’s team works closely साथ बीमे वाहक और प्रशासकों to बनाएँ व्यापक और एकीकृत लाभ strategies for clients.
The Lockton लाभ समूह provides सेवाएं सहित अनुपालन, कार्यपालिका लाभ, health and welfare, health risk solutions, retirement and more.
Lockton Affinity : Lockton Affinity, an affiliate of Lockton कंपनियाँ, meets the बीमे needs of अपनापन समूह, franchises, पेशेवर संगठन, और एसोसिएशन of सब sizes.
Lockton Affinity offers a variety of बीमे उत्पाद विकल्प और कार्यक्रम.
Products include : General Liability, Professional Liability, प्रॉपर्टी, मजदूर मुआवजे, निर्देशकों & अधिकारियों देयता, वाणिज्यिक स्वचालित, specialty Coverage, Excess, Health Plans and more.
Lockton International : Lockton International operates कार्यालयों in the uk और आयरलैंड, as खूब as कार्यालयों throughout Asia and Latin America.
In Europe, Lockton International is a partner in EOS RISQ, Europe’s leading बीमे ब्रोकिंग और रिस्क प्रबन्धन consultancy.
EOS RISQ is an equity-based European partnership of major independent बीमे brokers साथ over 3,500 कर्मचारी आधारित in अधिक than 30 countries in Europe.
Lockton अंतरराष्ट्रीय provides specialized समाधान लिये निजी lines, SME’s and major multi-national clients.
White chocolate is a चॉकलेट डेरिवेटिव.
it commonly consists of cocoa मक्खन, शुगर, मिल्क solids और salt, and is characterized by a pale yellow or ivory appearance.
The melting point of cocoa मक्खन, इसके प्राथमिक cocoa सेम घटक, is ऊँची पर्याप्त to keep white chocolate solid at room temperature.
Donald Leon `` Don '' blankenship ( born कूच 14, 1950 ) थी अध्यक्ष और सीईओ of massey उर्जा co., the छठे largest कोयले कम्पनी ( by 2008 production ) in the United States.
He served in those भूमिकाएँ इससे नवम्बर 30, 2000, जबतक दिसम्बर 31, 2010.
Blankenship is an active financial backer of the Republican पार्टी और भागीदार in लोकल और राज्य राजनीती, विशेषकर in उसके घर राज्य of वेस्ट Virginia.
He has frequently बोला आउट सरेआम परिचय राजनीती, the पर्यावरण, unions, and coal production.
U.S. प्रतिभूति और एक्सचेंज आयोग filings दिखाएँ blankenship थी सशुल्क $ 17.8 लाख in 2009, the highest in the coal industry.
His 2009 pay represents a $ 6.8 लाख उठाएँ over 2008 और लगभग दोगुना उसके मुआवजे package in 2007.
Blankenship also received a deferred मुआवजे पैकेज valued at $ 27.2 million in 2009.
on दिसम्बर 3, 2010, blankenship घोषित कि he थी retiring as सीईओ at the समाप्त of the साल, and would be succeeded by Massey President Baxter F. Phillips Jr.

Bow wow ( बैंड ), a जापानी hard rock/heavy metal band
