Negligence ( Lat. negligentia, from neglegere, to उपेक्षा, वस्तुतः `` नहीं to चुनें up कुछ '' ) is a विफलता to कसरत the परवाह कि a reasonably prudent person would exercise in like circumstances.
The area of tort law known as negligence involves नुक़सान caused by carelessness, नहीं जानबूझकर harm.
According to Jay M. feinman of the rutgers University School of Law ;
`` The कोर विचार of लापरवाही is कि लोगों चाहिए कसरत उचित परवाह जब वे अधिनियम by लेने खाता of the संभावित harm that they might foreseeably cause harm to other people. ''
`` those who go personally or bring प्रॉपर्टी जहाँ वे जान कि वे or it may आइये into टक्कर साथ the व्यक्तियों or property of others have by law a duty cast upon them to use reasonable care and skill to avoid such a collision. ''
Fletcher v Rylands ( [ 1866 ] lr 1 ex 265 )
Through civil litigation, if an injured person proves कि another व्यक्ति acted negligently to कारण उनके चोट, they can recover damages to compensate for their harm.
Proving a case for negligence can potentially entitle the injured plaintiff to compensation लिये नुक़सान to उनके देह, प्रॉपर्टी, दिमागी well-being, वित्तीय औकात, or अंतरंग relationships.
However, because negligence cases are very fact-specific, इस सामान्य परिभाषा करता नहीं fully बताइये the अवधारणा of जब the विधि होगा require one person to compensate another for losses caused by accidental injury.
Further, the law of negligence at common law is only एक पहलू of the विधि of देयता.
Although resulting damages must be proven in order to recover compensation in a लापरवाही कार्रवाई, the प्रकृति और extent of those क्षतिपूर्ति हैं नहीं the प्राथमिक फ़ोकस of लापरवाही cases.
A melanocytic nevus ( also known as `` Nevocytic nevus '' ) is a प्रकार of lesion कि contains nevus कोशिकाएं ( a प्रकार of melanocyte ).
Some स्त्रोत equate the term mole with `` melanocytic nevus ''.
Other sources reserve the पद `` mole '' लिये other purposes.
The majority of औज़ार appear दौरान the पहला दो दशकों of a person’s life, while about one in every 100 babies is born with moles.
Acquired moles हैं a रूप of benign फुलाव, जबकि जन्मजात औज़ार, or जन्मजात nevi, are considered a minor malformation or hamartoma and may be at a higher risk for melanoma.
A mole can be either subdermal ( under the skin ) or a pigmented विकास on the स्किन, formed ज़्यादातर of a प्रकार of कोशिका ज्ञात as a melanocyte.
The high concentration of the body’s pigmenting एजेंट, मेलेनिन, is जिम्मेदार for their dark color.
औज़ार हैं a सदस्य of the परिवार of skin lesions known as nevi.
The व्यापक metabolic फलक, or रासायनिक screen, ( CMP ; CPT code 80053 ) is a panel of 14 blood tests which serves as an initial broad medical screening tool.
The CMP provides a rough check of kidney फलन, जिगर फलन, और electrolyte और द्रव संतुलन, लकिन it is far from perfect.
Abnormal values from a CBC may be a परिणाम of गलत positives और यूँ the CBC may need to be repeated for a patient ( or replaced with a more specific test ).
The CMP is an विस्तारित संस्करण of the मौलिक metabolic फलक ( bmp ), which does not include liver tests.
A CMP ( or BMP ) can be ordered as part of a routine शारीरिक परिक्षा, or may be प्रयुक्त to मॉनिटर a रोगी साथ a दीर्घकालिक बीमारी, such as diabetes mellitus or hypertension.
Previous names for the panel of tests have been Chem 12, रसायन फलक, रसायन स्क्रीन, sma 12, sma 20 और smac ( sequential अनेक विश्लेषण - कंप्यूटर ).
The परीक्षण हैं performed on मशीने आधारित on the AutoAnalyzer invented in 1957.
Natural gas extraction by देशों in घन मीटर प्रति साल.
Natural gas is a naturally occurring hydrocarbon gas mixture consisting primarily of methane, लकिन commonly सहित varying amounts of अन्य hydrocarbons, कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड, नाइट्रोजन, और हाइड्रोजन sulfide.
Natural gas is an energy सोर्स प्रायः प्रयुक्त लिये हीटिंग, कुकिंग, and electricity generation.
It is also used as fuel for vehicles and as a रासायनिक फर्टिलाइजर in the manufacture of प्लास्टिक और अन्य commercially important organic chemicals.
Natural gas is found in deep underground natural rock formations or संबद्ध साथ अन्य हाइड्रोकार्बन टंकी in कोयले beds और as मिथेन clathrates.
पेट्रोलियम is भी another resource found in proximity to and with natural gas.
Most natural gas was created over समय by दो mechanisms : biogenic और thermogenic.
Biogenic gas is निर्मित by methanogenic जीवों in marshes, bogs, landfills, and shallow sediments.
Deeper in the earth, at greater तापमान और दबाव, thermogenic गैस is निर्मित from buried organic material.
Before natural gas can be used as a fuel, it must undergo processing to हटाएँ impurities, सहित जल, to मिलें the विशेषताएँ of marketable प्राकृतिक गैस.
The by-products of processing include ethane, propane, butanes, pentanes, and higher molecular weight hydrocarbons, hydrogen sulfide ( जिससे may be परिवर्तित into pure गंधक ), कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड, जल वाष्प, और sometimes हीलियम और nitrogen.
प्राकृतिक गैस is प्रायः informally referred to बस as gas, especially when compared to other energy sources such as oil or coal.
This page is about the कल्पना मूवर्स band.
For सूचना परिचय the tv दिखाएँ अभिनीत the band, see Imagination Movers ( TV series ).
Imagination मूवर्स is a बैंड formed in नई Orleans, Louisiana, in 2003.
The लाइनअप शामिल समृद्ध कॉलिन्स, स्कॉट durbin, Dave Poche, and Scott `` Smitty '' Smith.
Members of the group यहूद longtime friends and neighbors.
The group started as a television/music concept which was pitched to लोकल pbs affiliates in नई ऑरलियन्स.
WLAE-TV was the first to take an interest in the group and later introduced them to बेथ कोर्टनी, the अध्यक्ष & मुख्य कार्यपालिका अधिकारी at louisiana पब्लिक प्रसारण.
Soon after, LPB began airing one-minute वीडियो उत्पादित by the कल्पना मूवर्स themselves.
The Movers built a sizable regional following by सेटिंग शैक्षणिक गीतों लिये बच्चे to melodies और लय that adults appreciate as well.
They sold more than 100,000 copies of their self-produced cds और dvds.
Their three indie CDs : `` Good Ideas, '' `` Calling All Movers, '' and `` Eight Feet '' along with their grass roots DVD `` Stir It Up '' have, संयुक्त, जीती चौदह नेशनल पुरस्कार, इससे ऐसे समूह as the नेशनल संघ of परवरिश publications ( nappa ) और अभिभावक ' चुनाव.
in जल्दी 2005, डिज़्नी took सूचना, और initiated negotiations to add the Movers to the company 's roster.
These were interrupted in August when the flood सुरक्षा designed और निर्मित by the फौज corps of इंजीनियर्स to protect New Orleans failed.
The resulting floodwater claimed the band 's दफ्तर, as खूब as the घरों of कॉलिन्स, durbin और poche – लकिन the deal was signed in the spring of 2006.
In 2008, वॉल्ट डिज़्नी रिकॉर्ड introduced the कल्पना मूवर्स ' म्यूज़िक to the स्वदेश साथ the release of the Movers ' first nationally-released CD, `` Juice Box Heroes. ''
In September 2008, a 30-minute show featuring the group began airing on the डिज़्नी चैनल 's प्रीस्कूल प्रोग्रामिंग ब्लाक ज्ञात as playhouse डिज़्नी, and currently airs on Playhouse Disney 's replacement, Disney Junior.
The Movers लिखें और perform सब the गीतों on their show.
Moreover, the Imagination Movers have प्राप्त नाजुक kudos लिये उनके सजीव कॉन्सर्ट प्रदर्शन.
In October 2009, the कल्पना मूवर्स प्रारंभ the `` सजीव इससे the Idea Warehouse Concert Tour 2009 ''.
Traveling from mid-October to mid-December 2009 their सजीव प्रदर्शन शामिल लोट of उनके पसंदीदा गीतों और नाचना, as खूब as वीडियो दिखावे of Warehouse Mouse.
Beginning in early-February 2011 and wrapping up in late May 2011, the कल्पना मूवर्स प्रस्तुत उनके `` in a बिग गोदाम Concert Tour, '' playing more than 100 shows in 50+ cities across North America.
From March to October 2012, the कल्पना मूवर्स toured उत्तर अमेरिका on उनके post-Disney `` Rock-O-Matic '' tour.
The show maintained several elements of the असली tv अवधारणा, ऐसे as an on-stage `` विचार आपात '' और अनेक सेट इससे उनके पुरानी catalogue ; however, with the departure of Wendy Calio back to her native Hawaii, the character `` Nina '', along with her musical numbers, is not present.
The tour promotes the Imagination मूवर्स ' नई album/dvd रिलीज, `` rock-o-matic '', जिससे सुविधाएँ all new music from the band.
The album itself is उत्पादित independently of डिज़्नी और रै a notably अधिक वयस्क, समकालीन rock-and-roll sound, though still very appropriate for children.
Several performance dates were moved to बाद in 2012 to लाभ इससे the increased एक्सपोज़र of the Imagination Movers TV show now playing daily on Disney Junior.
The platypus ( ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is a semiaquatic स्तनधारी endemic to eastern Australia, including Tasmania.
Together with the four species of एकिडना, it is एक of the पाँच extant प्रजाति of monotremes, the तभी स्तनधारियों that lay eggs instead of giving birth.
It is the sole living representative of its family ( ornithorhynchidae ) और genus ( ornithorhynchus ), हालांकि a क्रमांक of related species have been found in the fossil record.
The unusual appearance of this egg-laying, duck -billed, beaver -tailed, otter -footed स्तनधारी मनोरथ यूरोपीय naturalists जब वे पहला encountered it, साथ कुछ considering it an elaborate fraud.
It is one of the few venomous mammals, the पुरूष platypus having a spur on the हिन्द पैर कि delivers a venom capable of causing severe pain to humans.
The unique features of the platypus make it an important subject in the study of विकासवादी जीवविज्ञान और a recognisable और iconic प्रतीक of ऑस्ट्रेलिया ; it रै appeared as a mascot at national events and is featured on the reverse of its 20-cent coin.
The platypus is the एनिमल emblem of the state of New South Wales.
Until the early 20th सदी, it थी hunted लिये इसके फर, लकिन it is अभी सुरक्षित throughout its range.
Although खिलाते प्रजनन programmes have था तभी सीमित कामयाबी और the platypus is vulnerable to the effects of pollution, it is not under any immediate threat.
the chupacabra or chupacabras (, इससे chupar `` to चूस '' और cabra `` goat '', literally `` goat sucker '' ) is a legendary cryptid rumored to inhabit parts of the Americas.
It is associated more recently with sightings of an allegedly अनजान एनिमल in प्यूर्टो रीको ( जहाँ ये sightings यहूद पहला reported ), Mexico, and the United States, especially in the latter 's Latin American communities.
The name comes from the animal 's reported आदत of attacking और पीने the रक्त of पशुधन, especially goats.
शारीरिक descriptions of the creature vary.
Eyewitness sightings have been claimed as early as 1995 in Puerto Rico, and have since महरूम reported as दूर उत्तर as maine, और as दूर दक्षिण as चिली, and even being spotted outside the Americas in countries like Russia and The Philippines.
It is supposedly a heavy creature, the आकार of a छोटी भालू, साथ a पंक्ति of कांटे reaching from the neck to the base of the tail.
Sighting रिपोर्ट्स of the chupacabra have महरूम disregarded as uncorroborated or lacking evidence, while most reports in northern Mexico and the southern United States have been verified as canids afflicted by mange.
Biologists and wildlife management officials दृश्य the chupacabra as a contemporary legend.
The North American Free Trade Agreement ( NAFTA ) is an agreement signed by कनाडा, मैक्सिको, और the संयुक्त राज्य, बनाना a trilateral व्यापार bloc in उत्तर अमेरिका.
The agreement came into फ़ोर्स on जनवरी 1, 1994.
It superseded the Canada–United राज्य फ़्री व्यापार अनुबंध between the u.S., Canada, and Mexico
NAFTA has two supplements : the North American Agreement on पर्यावरणीय सहयोग ( naaec ) और the North American Agreement on Labor Cooperation ( NAALC ).
Thermal comfort is the condition of mind कि expresses संतोष साथ the थर्मल पर्यावरण and is assessed by subjective evaluation ( ANSI / ASHRAE Standard 55 ).
maintaining इस मानक of थर्मल सुकून लिये occupants of इमारतें or other enclosures is one of the important goals of HVAC ( heating, ventilation, and air conditioning ) design engineers.
The Predicted Mean Vote ( pmv ) मॉडल स्टैंड among the सबसे पहचाना thermal comfort models.
It was developed using सिद्धान्त of ऊष्मा संतुलन और प्रायोगिक आंकड़ा collected in a controlled climate chamber under steady state conditions.
क्युकी the pmv मॉडल थी निकला इससे आंकड़ा एकत्रित in a नियंत्रित जलवायु, it is नहीं उपयुक्त लिये अनुप्रयोग in naturally ventilated spaces which often have high levels of air movement.
This shortcoming प्रेरित the विकास of a परिवार of अनुभवजन्य सांख्यिकीय मॉडल of thermal comfort in naturally ventilated spaces known as adaptive models.
Adaptive models of थर्मल सुकून consider occupants as dynamically interacting साथ उनके environment, and controlling their thermal comfort by means of clothing or window-opening and closing.
This is in contrast to thermal comfort in sealed buildings, in जिससे occupants अनुभव the पर्यावरण passively.
Thermal comfort is affected by heat conduction, संवहन, विकिरण, और evaporative heat loss.
Thermal comfort is maintained when the ऊष्मा उत्पन्न by इंसान चयापचय is अनुमत to dissipate, यूँ maintaining थर्मल संतुलन with the surroundings.
It has been long recognized that the sensation of अहसास hot or ठंडा is नहीं बस निर्भर on एयर तापमान alone.
Thermal comfort calculations according to ansi/ashrae मानक 55 can be freely performed with the CBE Thermal Comfort Tool for ASHRAE-55.
Durante degli Alighieri, बस referred to as दांते (, ; ; c. 1265–1321 ), थी a प्रमुख इतालवी कवि of the Middle Ages.
His Divine Comedy, originally called ' and later called ' by Boccaccio, is widely माना the महानतम साहित्यिक कार्य रचित in the Italian language and a masterpiece of world literature.
in इटली he is ज्ञात as ' ( `` the Supreme Poet '' ) or just '.
he, petrarch और boccaccio हैं भी ज्ञात as `` the three fountains '' or `` the three crowns ''.
Dante is also called the `` Father of the इतालवी भाषा ''.
मुख्यालय ( कोबे, Japan )
( ) is a tire and rubber company आधारित in जापानी.
it is भाग of the Sumitomo Group.
The company traces its origins to 1909, when the Sumitomo Group बना an निवेश in dunlop जापानी, the newly formed जापानी subsidiary of the British company Dunlop Rubber.
Over the years Sumitomo and Dunlop developed a close business relationship, and in 1963 the sumitomo समूह acquired कंट्रोल of dunlop जापानी और renamed it sumitomo Rubber Industries Ltd.
In 1985, when Dunlop Rubber was taken over by BTR plc, the company acquired the automobile tire assets of Dunlop, सहित the सही to उपयोग the dunlop ब्रांड on ऑटोमोबाइल टायर.
The acquisition did not include the US and Australian व्यवसायों, जिससे यहूद separately स्वामित्व, लकिन in 1986 sumitomo भी acquired the dunlop टायर निगम of the US from its management.
In 1997, Sumitomo formed a joint venture with Goodyear Tire and Rubber Company, by which Goodyear और sumitomo सहमत to manufacture टायर लिये प्रत्येक अन्य 's बाज़ार, सहित Dunlop branded tires.
As part of the agreement, Goodyear acquired 75 % interests in Dunlop Tyres, the uk कम्पनी जिससे sumitomo था formed, और in dunlop टायर Corporation.
goodyear और sumitomo भी बना निवेश in each other.
Today, the company makes a चौड़ी दायरा of रबर आधारित उत्पाद, सहित ऑटोमोबाइल tires, golf balls and tennis balls.
Microsoft Visual Studio Express is a set of freeware integrated विकास environments ( आईडीई ) विकसित by microsoft कि हैं lightweight संस्करण of the Microsoft Visual Studio product line.
एक्स्प्रेस संस्करण यहूद conceived beginning with Visual Studio 2005.
The idea of Express editions is to provide streamlined, easy-to-use और easy-to-learn ides लिये users other than professional software developers, such as hobbyists and students.
The Alps are one of the great mountain range systems of Europe stretching लगभग आरपार आठ अल्पाइन देशों इससे ऑस्ट्रिया और स्लोवेनियाई in the ईस्ट, Switzerland, Liechtenstein, Germany, France to the west and Italy and Monaco to the south.
The mountains were formed over सैंकड़ों of लाखो of सालो as the अफ़्रीकी and Eurasian tectonic plates collided.
Extreme shortening caused by the event resulted in समुद्री sedimentary रॉक्स उठती by thrusting और फोल्डिंग into ऊँची पहाड़ peaks such as Mont Blanc and the Matterhorn.
Mont Blanc spans the french–italian किनारा, और at is the उच्चतम पहाड़ in the Alps.
The Alpine region area contains many peaks higher than, ज्ञात as the `` four-thousanders ``.
The altitude and size of the range affects the climate in यूरोपीय ; in the kyu वर्षण स्तर vary greatly और climatic शर्तें consist of distinct zones.
Wildlife such as ibex live in the higher चोटियों to elevations of, और पौधे ऐसे as edelweiss grow in रॉकी areas in lower elevations as well as in higher elevations.
Evidence of human habitation in the ऐल्प्स goes वापस to the paleolithic era.
A mummified man, संकल्पित to be 5,000 सालो बूढ़ा, थी खोजा on a glacier at the Austrian–Italian border in 1991.
By the 6th सदी bc, the सेल्टिक la tène culture was well established.
Hannibal may have crossed the ऐल्प्स साथ a झुंड of हाथियों, और the romans था settlements in the region.
In 1800 Napoleon crossed एक of the पहाड़ गुजरता साथ an army of 40,000.
The 18th and 19th centuries saw an influx of naturalists, writers, and artists, in particular the romantics, followed by the सुनहरी आयु of alpinism as mountaineers began to ascend the peaks.
In World युद्ध ii the तीसरा reich invaded the अल्पाइन देशों, साथ the एक्सेप्शन of स्विट्ज़रलैंड और liechtenstein ; Adolf Hitler kept a base of operation in the Bavarian Alps throughout the war.
The अल्पाइन प्रदेश रै a दमदार cultural identity.
The traditional संस्कृति of खेती, cheesemaking, और woodworking स्टिल exists in अल्पाइन गांवों, हालांकि the पर्यटक उद्योग began to grow जल्दी in the 20th सदी और विस्तारित greatly after World War II to become the dominant industry by the end of the century.
The Winter Olympic Games have महरूम hosted in the स्विस, फ्रेंच, इतालवी, Austrian and German Alps.
At present the region is home to 14 million people और रै 120 लाख सालाना visitors.
Lois patrice griffin ( née pewterschmidt ) is a अक्षर from the animated television series Family Guy.
She is voiced by लेखक एलेक्स borstein और पहला appeared on टेलीविज़न, साथ साथ the बाकी of the family in the 15-minute short on December 20, 1998.
Lois was created और designed by श्रेणी creator Seth MacFarlane.
MacFarlane was asked to pitch a पायलट to the फॉक्स प्रसारण कम्पनी आधारित on लैरी और स्टीव, a छोटी बना by macfarlane जिससे featured a middle-aged character named Larry and an intellectual dog, Steve.
After the pilot was दिए the ग्रीन लाइट, the griffin परिवार appeared on the episode `` Death Has a Shadow ``.
Lois is the mother of the griffin परिवार.
With her husband पीटर, वो रै था तीन children : Meg, Chris, and Stewie.
Lois is often portrayed as a stereotypical television mother, despite her admitting to होने a ड्रग उपयोक्ता, a recovering मेथ addict kleptomaniac.
Lois रै भी था अनेक अफेयर्स, एक of जिससे allegedly resulted in the conception of Meg.
She has appeared in other media relating to Family Guy—including a वीडियो खेल, commercials और books—and प्रेरित an संपूर्ण लकीर of merchandise.
Lois 's distinctive New York accent originated इससे a अक्षर in a स्टेज दिखाएँ कि एलेक्स borstein था performed in, जिससे थी largely प्रेरित by a relative who grew up on Long Island, New York.
Family हस्तांतरण of बास्क भाषा ( बास्क as आरंभिक language )
प्रतिशत of विद्यार्थी पंजीकृत in बास्क भाषा schools ( 2000–2005 ).
Location of the basque-language provinces within Spain and France
Basque ( endonym :, ) is the ancestral language of the Basque people, who inhabit the Basque Country, a प्रदेश spanning an क्षेत्रफल in northeastern स्पेन और southwestern फ़्रांस.
It is spoken by 27 % of basques in सब territories ( 714,136 आउट of 2,648,998 ).
Of these, 663,035 live in the Spanish part of the बास्क देश और the बाकी 51,100 सजीव in the French part.
In academic चर्चाएँ of the वितरण of बास्क in स्पेन और फ़्रांस, it is प्रथागत to refer to three ancient provinces in France and four Spanish provinces.
Native speakers are concentrated in a contiguous area including parts of the Spanish autonomous समुदायों of the बास्क देश और नावारा और in the पश्चिमी हाफ of the फ्रेंच département of Pyrénées-Atlantiques.
The Basque Autonomous Community is an administrative entity within the binational ethnographic Basque Country incorporating the traditional Spanish प्रांतों of biscay, gipuzkoa, और álava, जिससे retain उनके अस्तित्व as politico-administrative divisions.
These provinces and many areas of Navarre are heavily populated by ethnic Basques, but Basque was, at तनिक जबतक the 1990s, नहीं बोला as a देशी भाषा in सबसे of álava, पश्चिमी भाग of biscay और सेंट्रल and southern areas of Navarre, either because it had been replaced by Spanish along the centuries, in some areas, or because it had never been spoken there, in other areas.
In southwestern फ़्रांस, the प्राचीन basque-populated प्रांतों were Labourd, Lower Navarre, and Soule.
They and other regions were consolidated into a single département in 1790 अंतर्गत the नाम basses-pyrénées, a नाम जिससे persisted until 1970.
A मानकीकृत रूप of the बास्क भाषा, पुकारा euskara batua, थी विकसित by the बास्क Language Academy in the late 1960s.
euskara batua थी निर्मित so कि बास्क भाषा could be used—and easily समझा by सब बास्क speakers—in औपचारिक परिस्थितियों ( education, mass media, literature ), and this is its main use today.
The role of इस मानक बास्क भाषा depends on the भाषाई शैक्षणिक model of each region and each school.
In most areas of the स्पेनी बास्क देश, the शैक्षणिक मॉडल d, जहाँ सब विषय हैं सिखाया in बास्क, मगर `` स्पेनी language and literature '' ( which is taught in Spanish ) is now the predominant model.
In France, the Basque language school Seaska and the association for a bilingual ( Basque and French ) schooling ikasbi मिलें a चौड़ी दायरा of बास्क भाषा शैक्षणिक needs up to the छठे रूप, जबकि often struggling to surmount financial and administrative constraints.
Apart from this मानकीकृत संस्करण, वहीँ हैं पाँच प्रमुख बास्क dialects : bizkaian, gipuzkoan, और Upper Navarrese in Spain, and Navarrese–Lapurdian and Zuberoan ( in France ).
Although they take their names from the mentioned historic प्रांतों, the dialect सीमाएँ हैं नहीं congruent साथ प्रांत सीमाएँ.
The President, Directors and Company, of the Bank of the United States, commonly known as the First Bank of the United States, was a central bank, chartered for a पद of बीस सालो, by the संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस on फ़रवरी 25, 1791.
Establishment of the Bank was शामिल in a three-part विस्तार of संघीय फिस्कल और मौद्रिक शक्ति ( साथ साथ a संघीय mint and excise taxes ) championed by Alexander Hamilton, first Secretary of the Treasury.
Hamilton believed a सेंट्रल बैंको थी जरुरी to stabilize और improve the स्वदेश 's क्रेडिट, और to improve handling of the financial business of the United States government under the newly enacted Constitution.
Officially proposed to the first session of the First Congress in 1790, Hamilton 's Bank faced फैली प्रतिरोध इससे प्रतिद्वंद्वियों of increased संघीय शक्ति.
Secretary of State Thomas Jefferson and James Madison led the opposition, which claimed कि the बैंको थी असंवैधानिक, और कि it benefited व्यापारियों और निवेशकों at the व्यय of the बहुमत of the population.
The पहला बैंको भवन is अभी a नेशनल ऐतिहासिक लैंडमार्क located in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania within Independence National Historical Park.
James Wesley Marsters ( born August 20, 1962 ) is an अमरीकी कर्ता and musician.
Marsters first came to the attention of the general public playing the लोकप्रिय अक्षर स्पाइक, a platinum-blond yobbish अंग्रेज़ी पिशाच in the टेलीविज़न श्रेणी buffy the पिशाच slayer और इसके spin-off series, Angel, from 1997 to 2004.
Since then, he रै गए on to खेल अन्य विज्ञान fiction भूमिकाएँ, ऐसे as the एलियन supervillain brainiac on the सुपरमैन -inspired श्रेणी smallville, the omnisexual time traveller Captain John Hart in British science-fiction show Torchwood and terrorist Barnabas Greeley in Sci fi 's Caprica.
Marsters appeared in a supporting भूमिका in the 2007 movie P.S.
I Love You and as the main विपक्षी, piccolo, in the 2009 काल्पनिक एडवेंचर फिल्मी dragonball Evolution.
he appeared as a पुनरावर्ती अक्षर in the पहला ऋतु of the revival of Hawaii 5-0.
In molecular biology, इंसान chorionic gonadotropin ( hcg ) is a हार्मोन उत्पादित by the fertilized egg after conception.
Later during pregnancy it is made by the developing placenta, और बाद by the placental घटक syncytiotrophoblast.
Some cancerous tumors produce this hormone ; therefore, elevated स्तर measured जब the रोगी is नहीं pregnant can lead to a cancer diagnosis.
However, it is not ज्ञात whether इस उत्पादन is a contributing कारण or an effect of tumorigenesis.
The pituitary एनॉलॉग of hcg, ज्ञात as luteinizing हार्मोन ( lh ), is उत्पादित in the pituitary gland of males and females of all ages.
, the FDA has prohibited the sale of `` homeopathic '' और over the काउंटर hcg आहार उत्पाद और घोषित them fraudulent and illegal.
Beyoncé Giselle Knowles-Carter, known by her stage name Beyoncé ( ; born सितंबर 4, 1981 ), is an अमरीकी सिंगर, songwriter, dancer, and actress.
Born and raised in Houston, Texas, she performed in singing and dancing प्रतियोगिताओं as a चाइल्ड पहले forming in 1990 a समूह साथ केली Rowland and LaTavia Roberson that was eventually named Destiny 's Child.
Once signed to Columbia Records, the girls subsequently became one of the संसार 's best-selling लड़की समूह of सब समय.
The group was plagued by आतंरिक विरोध और विधिक turmoil और Knowles suffered from depression that lasted for a number of years.
During the group 's hiatus, Knowles released her debut solo album Dangerously in Love ( 2003 ), which अर्जित उसके पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार और रै बेची a कुल of 4.9 लाख नक़ल in the US alone.
It spawned Billboard number one singles `` Crazy in Love, '' माना by vh1 to be the `` महानतम सोंग of the 00 's, '' और `` Baby Boy. ''
Following the disbandment of Destiny 's Child in 2005, नॉलेस 's दूसरी सोलो एल्बम b'day ( 2006 ) contained the शीर्ष पाँच singles `` déjà vu ``, `` अपूरणीय ``, and `` Beautiful Liar ``.
Her performance in Dreamgirls ( 2006 ) earned her two Golden ग्लोब nominations.
Knowles ' work playing Etta James in कि फिल्मी प्रेरित उसके subsequent एल्बम i am...
Sasha Fierce ( 2008 ) which spawned hits `` If I Were a Boy ``, `` Single Ladies ( put a रिंग on it ) ``, `` हेलो ``, और `` मीठी सपनो ``.
The album also helped Knowles earn six grammys in 2010, तोड़कर the रिकार्ड लिये सबसे ग्रैमी पुरस्कार जीती by a मादा artist in one night.
Her fourth album 4 ( 2011 ) deviated towards traditional R & B and became her fourth consecutive number one album on the Billboard 200.

Knowles has sold over 13 million albums in the US and 118 million records worldwide ( as well as a further 50 लाख रिकॉर्ड साथ नियति 's चाइल्ड ), और is एक of the best-selling music artists of all time.
The Recording Industry Association of America ( RIAA ) पहचाना नॉलेस as the शीर्ष certified कलाकार of the 2000s.
In 2009, Billboard named her the Top Radio Songs Artist of the decade and क्रमित उसके the शीर्ष मादा कलाकार और the fourth Artist of the Decade.
Beyoncé Knowles is the most nominated woman in Grammy Award history, receiving 17 awards ; other accolades include 12 MTV Video Music Awards, 7 Billboard Awards सहित a मिलेनियम पुरस्कार, और a स्टार on the हॉलीवुड चलना of कीर्ति as भाग of नियति 's Child.

released in जुलाई 2001, mcgraw 's संस्करण थी the दूसरी सिंगल इससे McGraw 's Set This Circus Down album.

Santa Fe ( ; ( tewa : ogha po'oge, ) ) is the पूंजी of the u.S. state of New Mexico.
It is the fourth-largest city in the राज्य और is the सीट of.

It is the principal नगर of a महानगर सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल जिससे encompasses सब of सांता fe काउंटी और is part of the larger Albuquerque-Santa Fe-Las Vegas Combined Statistical Area.

The Sons of Liberty was a group consisting of American patriots that originated in the pre-independence उत्तर अमरीकी अंग्रेजों colonies.
The group was formed to protect the rights of the colonists और to लो to the गलियों विरूद्ध the कर by the अंग्रेजों सरकारी.
They are best known for undertaking the Boston Tea Party in 1773, which led to the असहनीय अधिनियमों ( an तीव्र crackdown by the अंग्रेजों सरकारी ), and a counter-mobilization by the Patriots.
ओसाका किला
is a city in the Kansai region of जापानी 's प्रमुख द्वीप of होन्शू, a designated नगर अंतर्गत the लोकल स्वायत्तता विधि, the capital city of Osaka Prefecture and also the largest part of the Keihanshin metropolis, which comprises three major cities of Japan, Kyoto, Osaka and Kobe.
Located at the mouth of the Yodo River on Osaka Bay, Osaka is Japan 's third largest city by जनसांख्यिकी बाद टोकियो ( खास wards ) और yokohama.
Keihanshin is the second largest महानगर क्षेत्रफल in जापानी by जनसांख्यिकी और एक of the largest महानगर क्षेत्रों highly ranked in the world, with nearly 19 million people, and by GDP the second largest area in Japan and the seventh largest area in the world.
Historically the commercial center of जापानी, ओसाका कृत्यों as एक of the command centers for the Japanese economy.
The ratio between daytime and रात्रि समय जनसांख्यिकी is 141 %, the उच्चतम in जापानी, highlighting its status as an economic center.
Its nighttime population is 2.6 लाख, the तीसरा in the देश, लकिन in दिन the जनसांख्यिकी surges to 3.7 लाख, दूसरी तभी बाद टोकियो ( combining the खास wards of टोकियो, जिससे is not a single incorporated city, for statistical purposes ; see the Tokyo article for more information on the definition and makeup of Tokyo ).
Osaka used to be referred to as the in सामंती ईदो काल क्युकी it थी the केन्द्र of व्यापार लिये राइस, creating the first modern futures exchange market in the world.
the छोटी मरमेड is a 1989 अमरीकी एनिमेटेड musical fantasy film produced by Walt Disney Feature Animation and distributed by Walt Disney Pictures.
Based on the Danish fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen, The Little Mermaid tells the story of a खूबसूरत मरमेड जो सपनो of बनने इंसान.
लिखा, निर्देशित, और उत्पादित by रॉन क्लेमेंट्स और जॉन musker, साथ म्यूज़िक by एलन menken और हावर्ड ashman, the फिल्मी features the voices Jodi Benson, Christopher Daniel Barnes, Pat Carroll, Samuel E. Wright, Jason Marin, Kenneth Mars, Buddy Hacket, and Rene Auberjonois.
The 28th film in the Walt Disney Animated Classics series, The Little Mermaid was released to theaters on November 14, 1989 to largely positive समीक्षाएँ, garnering $ 84 लाख at the बक्सा दफ्तर दौरान इसके आरंभिक रिलीज, और $ 211 लाख in कुल lifetime gross.
After the success of the 1988 Disney / Amblin film Who Framed Roger Rabbit, The Little Mermaid is given credit for breathing life back into the आर्ट of डिज़्नी एनिमेटेड विशेषता films बाद a स्ट्रिंग of नाजुक or वाणिज्यिक असफलताओं उत्पादित by Disney that dated back to the early 1970s.
It also marked the start of the era ज्ञात as the डिज़्नी पुनर्जागरण.
A stage adaptation of the film with a book by Doug Wright and additional songs by Alan menken और नई गीतों ग्लेन स्लेटर खोली in डेनवर in जुलाई 2007 और began प्रदर्शन on Broadway January 10, 2008.

Purple drank is a slang term for a recreational drug popular in the hip hop community in the दक्षिणी संयुक्त राज्य, originating in Houston, Texas.
इसके प्रमुख संघटक is नुस्खा -strength cough syrup containing codeine and promethazine.
Cough syrup is typically mixed with संघटक ऐसे as sprite नरम पेय or पहाड़ ओस और pieces of Jolly Rancher candy.
The purplish वर्ण of जामुनी पिया आता इससे dyes in the cough syrup.
There are numerous कठबोली शर्तें लिये जामुनी पिया, सहित sizzurp, झुकना, syrup, drank, barre, purple jelly, Texas tea, and Tsikuni.
first/given, मध्य, और last/family/surname diagram with J. S. Bach as example.
J. S. Bach shared his given name with छह तात्कालिक परिवार सदस्यों और अनेक विस्तारित family members.
He shared his family name साथ सबसे परिवार सदस्यों.
A given name, in Western contexts often referred to as a first name, is a personal name that specifies and differentiates between सदस्यों of a समूह of individuals, विशेषकर in a परिवार, सब of whose members usually share the same family name ( surname ).
A given name is purposefully given, प्रायः by a चाइल्ड 's अभिभावक at or निकट जनम, in कंट्रास्ट to an inherited एक ऐसे as a family name.
A given name is sometimes legally बदला through a name change.
Given names are प्रायः प्रयुक्त in a परिचित और दोस्ताना manner in informal situations.
In more formal परिस्थितियों the उपनाम is प्रयुक्त बजाय, जबतक it is जरुरी to फर्क between people with the same surname.
The idiom `` on a first-name basis '' ( or `` on first-name शर्तें '' ) alludes to the अपनेपन of संबोधित another by a given name.
The western style of having both a परिवार नाम ( उपनाम ) और a दिए नाम is दूर इससे universal.
In अनेक देशों it is आम for ordinary people to have only one name ( a mononym ).
Hydrochloric acid is a clear, colourless समाधान of हाइड्रोजन chloride ( h cl ) in water.
It is a highly corrosive, दमदार खनिज एसिड साथ many industrial uses.
हाइड्रोक्लोरिक एसिड is मिला naturally in gastric acid.
Historically called muriatic acid, और आत्माओं of नमक, हाइड्रोक्लोरिक एसिड थी उत्पादित इससे vitriol ( sulfuric acid ) and common salt.
It first appeared during the Renaissance, and तब it थी प्रयुक्त by chemists ऐसे as glauber, Priestley and Davy in their scientific research.
With major production starting in the Industrial Revolution, hydrochloric acid is used in the रासायनिक उद्योग as a chemical reagent in the large-scale production of vinyl chloride for PVC plastic, and MDI / TDI for polyurethane.
It has numerous smaller-scale applications, including household cleaning, उत्पादन of जिलेटिन और अन्य खाना एडिटिव, descaling, और leather processing.
परिचय 20 लाख टन of हाइड्रोक्लोरिक acid are produced annually.
गेहूं ( triticum spp. ) is a खाद्यान्न अनाज, originally इससे the Levant region of the Near East and Ethiopian Highlands, but now cultivated worldwide.
In 2010, world production of wheat was 651 million tons, बनाना it the तीसरा most-produced खाद्यान्न बाद मक्का ( 844 लाख टन ) and rice ( 672 million tons ).
Wheat was the second most-produced cereal in 2009 ; संसार उत्पादन in कि साल थी 682 लाख टन, बाद maize ( 817 million tons ), and with rice as a close third ( 679 million tons ).
This grain is grown on अधिक जमीन area than any other commercial food.
World trade in wheat is greater than लिये सब अन्य crops combined.
Globally, wheat is the leading source of vegetable protein in human खाना, having a उच्चतर प्रोटीन सामग्री than soybeans or the अन्य प्रमुख cereals, maize ( corn ) or rice.
In terms of total production tonnages used for food, it is currently second to rice as the प्रमुख इंसान खाना क्रॉप और ahead of मक्का, बाद allowing लिये मक्का 's अधिक extensive उपयोग in animal feeds.
Wheat was a key फ़ैक्टर enabling the emergence of city-based समाजों at the प्रारंभ of सभ्यता क्युकी it थी एक of the पहला फसलों कि could be easily cultivated on a large scale, and had the additional advantage of yielding a harvest that provides long-term storage of food.
Wheat contributed to the emergence of city-states in the fertile crescent, सहित the babylonian and Assyrian empires.
Wheat grain is a staple food used to make flour for leavened, flat and steamed breads, biscuits, cookies, cakes, breakfast खाद्यान्न, पास्ता, नूडल्स, couscous और लिये fermentation to मेक बियर, अन्य alcoholic पेय, or biofuel.
Wheat is planted to a सीमित extent as a forage क्रॉप लिये पशुधन, और इसके स्ट्रॉ can be used as a construction material for roofing thatch.
The whole grain can be milled to छोड़ बस the भ्रूणपोष for white flour.
The by-products of this are bran and germ.
The whole grain is a concentrated source of विटामिन, खनिज, और प्रोटीन, जबकि the परिष्कृत grain is mostly starch.

To publish is to मेक सामग्री available to the general public.
While specific use of the term may vary among countries, it is प्रायः लागू to टेक्स्ट, बिंब, or अन्य audio-visual सामग्री on कोई परंपरागत मीडियम, सहित पेपर ( newspapers, magazines, catalogs, etc. ).
The word publication means the अधिनियम of प्रकाशन, और भी refers to any printed copies.
Melissa & Joey is an ABC Family original television series starring मेलिसा जोन हार्ट और जॉय लॉरेंस.
It first aired on ABC परिवार on अगस्त 17, 2010.
The श्रेणी फ़ॉलो लोकल राजनेता mel बुर्के ( मेलिसा जोन हार्ट ) और जो longo ( जॉय लॉरेंस ), whom Mel hires to look after her niece and nephew after a Ponzi scheme leaves him broke.
The series was renewed by ABC Family for a second season of पंद्रह एपीसोड, जिससे began airing on may 30, 2012 और ended on अगस्त 29, 2012.
Melissa & Joey ranks as cable TV 's # 1 telecast at 8 o'clock across target ऑडियंस 18–34, 18–49 और 12–34 जनसांख्यिकी.
On August 17, 2012, ABC परिवार नवीनीकृत मेलिसा & जॉय लिये a तीसरा season, set to premiere in spring 2013.
The Dharma wheel, प्रायः प्रयुक्त to represent the Noble Eightfold Path
The Noble eightfold पाथ (, ) is एक of the प्रिंसिपल शिक्षाओं of the बुद्ध, जो वर्णित it as the way leading to the cessation of suffering ( dukkha ) and the achievement of self-awakening.
It is used to develop insight into the सच्चा प्रकृति of phenomena ( or वास्तविकता ) और to eradicate greed, hatred, and delusion.
The Noble Eightfold Path is the fourth of the बुद्ध 's चार प्रतिष्ठित सच्चाई ; the पहला तत्व of the Noble Eightfold Path is, in turn, an understanding of the Four Noble Truths.
It is भी ज्ञात as the मध्य Path or Middle Way.
All eight elements of the Path begin साथ the शब्द `` सही '', जिससे translates the शब्द samyañc ( in Sanskrit ) or sammā ( in Pāli ).
These denote completion, togetherness, and coherence, and can भी सुझाएँ the होश of `` पूर्ण '' or `` ideal ''.
'Samma ' is also translated as `` wholesome '', `` हिकमत '' और `` skillful ''.
In Buddhist symbolism, the प्रतिष्ठित eightfold पाथ is प्रायः represented by अर्थात् of the धर्मं व्हील ( dharmachakra ), whose eight spokes represent the eight elements of the path.
The Grammy पुरस्कार लिये सोंग of the साल is an सम्मान प्रस्तुत at the ग्रैमी पुरस्कार, a रस्म कि थी स्थापित in 1958 and originally called the Gramophone Awards.
Awards in several categories are distributed annually by the National अकादमी of रिकॉर्डिंग कला और sciences of the संयुक्त राज्य to `` सम्मान कलाकारी उपलब्धि, technical proficiency and overall excellence in the recording industry, without regard to album sales or chart position. ''
Economics is the social science that analyzes the production, वितरण, और खपत of goods and services.
The term economics comes इससे the प्राचीन यूनानी ( ', `` प्रबन्धन of a household, प्रशासन '' ) इससे ( ', `` house '' ) + ( ', `` custom '' or `` law '' ), hence `` rules of the house ( hold ) ''.
Political economy was the earlier name for the subject, but economists in the late 19th century suggested `` economics '' as a shorter पद लिये `` आर्थिक विज्ञान '' कि भी avoided a सीमित political-interest connotation और as similar in form to `` mathematics ``, `` ethics '', and so forth.
A focus of the subject is how आर्थिक एजेंटों व्यवहार or interact and how economies work.
Consistent with this, a primary textbook distinction is between microeconomics और macroeconomics.
Microeconomics examines the behavior of basic तत्व in the अर्थव्यवस्था, सहित व्यक्तिगत agents ( such as households and firms or as buyers and sellers ) and markets, and their interactions.
Macroeconomics analyzes the संपूर्ण अर्थव्यवस्था और मुद्दे affecting it, सहित बेरोजगारी, महंगाई, economic growth, and monetary and fiscal policy.
Other broad distinctions include those between positive अर्थशास्त्र ( describing `` कया is '' ) और normative अर्थशास्त्र ( वकालत `` कया ought to be '' ) ; between आर्थिक सिद्धान्त और applied economics ; between rational and behavioral economics ; and between mainstream economics ( more `` orthodox '' and dealing with the `` rationality-individualism-equilibrium nexus '' ) and heterodox economics ( more `` radical '' and dealing with the `` institutions-history-social structure nexus '' ).
Economic विश्लेषण may be लागू throughout समाज, as in कारोबार, वित्त, स्वास्थ्य care, and government, but also to such diverse subjects as crime, education, the family, law, politics, religion, social institutions, war, and science.
At the turn of the 21st सदी, the expanding डोमेन of अर्थशास्त्र in the सोशल sciences has been described as economic imperialism.
An increasing number of economists have called for increased जोर on पर्यावरणीय स्थिरता ; इस क्षेत्रफल of शोध is ज्ञात as Ecological economics.
This is a सूची of अनुसूची iv दवाएँ अंतर्गत the Controlled Substances Act for the United States.
Required निष्कर्षों लिये दवाएँ to be placed in this schedule:
the ड्रग or अन्य पदार्थ रै a कम संभावित लिये abuse relative to the drugs or other substances in schedule III.
The drug or अन्य पदार्थ रै a फिलहाल स्वीकृत medical use in treatment in the United States.
Abuse of the drug or other substance may lead to limited physical dependence or मनोवैज्ञानिक dependence सापेक्ष to the दवाएँ or अन्य substances in अनुसूची III.
The complete list of Schedule iv दवाएँ हैं as फ़ॉलो.
The Administrative नियंत्रित substances कोड क्रमांक for each drug is included.
US county household मध्य आय 2009.
Median US household आय, 2001-2011
Household income is a माप commonly प्रयुक्त by the संयुक्त राज्य government and private institutions.
Each household is measured by the आय of प्रत्येक निवासी over the age of 15.
Income includes wages and salaries, unemployment insurance, disability payments, child support भुगतान प्राप्त, नियमित rental रसीदें, as खूब as कोई निजी कारोबार, investment, or other kinds of income received routinely.
While inflation-adjusted ( `` real '' ) household income had been increasing almost every साल इससे 1945 to 1999, it रै चूंकि महरूम चपटा और भी decreased recently.
U.S. median household income fell from $ 51,144 in 2010 to $ 50,502 in 2011.
Extreme poverty in the United States, meaning households living on less than $ 2 प्रति दिन पहले सरकारी लाभ, doubled इससे 1996 to 1.5 लाख households in 2011, including 2.8 million children.
The residents of the household do not have to be related to the head of the household लिये उनके आय to be माना part of the household 's income.
As households tend to share a समान आर्थिक कॉन्टेक्स्ट, the उपयोग of household आय remains among the most widely accepted measures of income.
That the size of a household is not commonly लिया into खाता in ऐसे उपायों may विकृत कोई विश्लेषण of fluctuations भीतर or among the household आय श्रेणी, and may render direct comparisons between quintiles difficult or even impossible.
The lapse rate is defined as the rate of घटी साथ ऊँचाई लिये an वायुमंडलीय variable.
the परिवर्तनीय शामिल is तापमान जबतक specified otherwise.
The terminology arises from the शब्द बीतने in the भाव of a घटी or decline.

Blue पहाड़ राज्य is an अमरीकी कॉमेडी series that premiered on Spike on January 11, 2010.
The series निर्माता शामिल क्रिस romano और eric falconer, और it is उत्पादित by Lionsgate Television.
The series is about a fictional विश्वविद्यालयों, ब्लू पहाड़ राज्य, और इसके फ़ुटबॉल टोली, `` The Mountain Goats. ''
It portrays certain aspects of American university life, including फ़ुटबॉल, sex, binge पीने, दवाएँ, जंगली पार्टी, और hazing.
In फ़रवरी 2012, it थी reported कि ब्लू पहाड़ State would not be renewed for a fourth season.
In March 2013, Ed marinaro stated कि he is working on a Blue Mountain State film.
Apple Inc., formerly Apple Computer, Inc., is an American multinational corporation headquartered in Cupertino, कैलिफ़ोर्निया कि डिजाइन, develops, और बिकता उपभोक्ता electronics, computer software and personal computers.
Its best-known hardware products are the मैक लकीर of कंप्यूटर, the ipod म्यूज़िक खिलाड़ी, the iPhone smartphone, and the iPad tablet computer.
Its software includes the OS X and iOS operating systems, the iTunes media browser, the safari वेब ब्राउजर, और the ilife और iwork creativity and production suites.
The company was founded on April 1, 1976, and incorporated as Apple Computer, inc. on जनवरी 3, 1977.
the शब्द `` कंप्यूटर '' थी removed इससे इसके नाम on जनवरी 9, 2007, reflecting its shifted focus towards consumer electronics after the introduction of the iPhone.
Apple is the world 's second-largest information technology company by revenue after Samsung Electronics, and the संसार 's third-largest मोबाईल फोन मेकर बाद samsung and Nokia.
Fortune magazine named Apple the most admired company in the United States in 2008, और in the संसार इससे 2008 to 2012.
However, the कम्पनी रै प्राप्त आलोचना लिये इसके ठेकेदारों ' labor practices, and for Apple 's own environmental and business practices.
, Apple maintains 394 retail stores in चौदह देशों as खूब as the ऑनलाइन ठहराना स्टोर और itunes Store.
It is the second-largest publicly traded corporation in the world by market capitalization, साथ an अनुमानित मान of us $ 414 अरब as of जनवरी 2013.
, the company had 72,800 स्थाई full-time कर्मचारी और 3,300 अस्थाई full-time employees worldwide.
Its worldwide annual आय in 2012 totalled $ 156 billion.
Section 8 housing in the दक्षिण bronx
Section 8 of the Housing Act of 1937 ( ), प्रायः बस ज्ञात as खण्ड 8, as repeatedly amended, authorizes the भुगतान of rental आवास सहायता to निजी जमींदार on निमित्त of लगभग 3.1 million low-income households.
It operates through several programs, the largest of जिससे, the आवास चुनाव वाउचर कार्यक्रम, pays a विशाल portion of the rents और उपयोगिताएँ of about 2.1 million households.
The US Department of Housing and Urban विकास manages the खण्ड 8 programs.
The Housing Choice Voucher Program provides `` tenant-based '' rental सहायता, so a किरायेदार can मूव from one unit of at least minimum housing quality to another.
It also allows individuals to लागू उनके मासिक वाउचर towards the खरीदें of a घर, साथ over $ 17 billion going towards such purchases each year ( from ncsha.org analysis ).
The maximum अनुमत वाउचर is $ 2200 a month.
Section 8 also authorizes a किस्में of `` project-based '' rental सहायता कार्यक्रम, अंतर्गत जिससे the मालिक reserves कुछ or सब of the इकाई in a भवन लिये low-income किरायेदारों, in वापसी लिये a संघीय सरकारी गारंटी to मेक up the difference between the tenant 's contribution and the rent for 1 cent in the owner 's contract with the government.
A tenant who leaves a subsidized project होगा खोना अभिगम to the project-based subsidy.
The United States Department of Housing and Urban विकास और संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of दिग्गजों अफेयर्स have a खास खण्ड 8 कार्यक्रम पुकारा vash ( दिग्गजों अफेयर्स supportive आवास ), or HUD-VASH, which gives out a certain number of Section 8 vouchers to eligible homeless and otherwise vulnerable US armed forces veterans.
